40001001	Che sī Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok ê ka-phó͘: Iâ-so͘ sī [Tāi-pi̍t] ê hō͘-tāi, [Tāi-pi̍t] sī [A-pek-la-hán] ê hō͘-tāi.
40001002	[A-pek-la-hán] siⁿ [Í-sat], [Í-sat] siⁿ [Ngá-kok], [Ngá-kok] siⁿ [Iû-tāi] kap i ê hiaⁿ-tī.
40001003	[Iû-tāi] tùi [Thah-má] siⁿ [Hoat-le̍k-su] kap [Siā-la̍h], [Hoat-le̍k-su] siⁿ [Hi-su-lûn], [Hi-su-lûn] siⁿ [A-lân],
40001004	[A-lân] siⁿ [A-bí-ná-ta̍t], [A-bí-ná-ta̍t] siⁿ [Ná-sūn], [Ná-sūn] siⁿ [Sat-bûn],
40001005	[Sat-bûn] tùi [Lat-ha̍p] siⁿ [Pho-a-su], [Pho-a-su] tùi [Lō͘-tek] siⁿ [O-pī-tek], [O-pī-tek] siⁿ [Iâ-se],
40001006	[Iâ-se] siⁿ [Tāi-pi̍t]-ông. [Tāi-pi̍t] tùi [O͘-lī-a] ê bó͘ siⁿ [Só͘-lô-bûn],
40001007	[Só͘-lô-bûn] siⁿ [Lô-pho-àm], [Lô-pho-àm] siⁿ [A-pí-a], [A-pí-a] siⁿ [A-sat],
40001008	[A-sat] siⁿ [Iok-sa-hoat], [Iok-sa-hoat] siⁿ [Iok-lân], [Iok-lân] siⁿ [O͘-se-a],
40001009	[O͘-se-a] siⁿ [Iok-thán], [Iok-thán] siⁿ [A-hap-su], [A-hap-su] siⁿ [Hi-se-ka],
40001010	[Hi-se-ka] siⁿ [Má-ná-se], [Má-ná-se] siⁿ [A-mô͘-sū], [A-mô͘-sū] siⁿ [Iok-se-a].
40001011	[Í-sek-lia̍t]-lâng siū chhian-sóa khì [Pa-pí-lûn] ê sî, [Iok-se-a] siⁿ [Iâ-ko-nî-a] kap i ê hiaⁿ-tī.
40001012	Siū chhian-sóa khì [Pa-pí-lûn] í-āu, [Iâ-ko-nî-a] siⁿ [Sat-lia̍p-thiat], [Sat-lia̍p-thiat] siⁿ [Só͘-lô-pa-pek],
40001013	[Só͘-lô-pa-pek] siⁿ [A-pí-ut], [A-pí-ut] siⁿ [Í-lī-a-kim], [Í-lī-a-kim] siⁿ [A-só͘],
40001014	[A-só͘] siⁿ [Sat-to̍k], [Sat-to̍k] siⁿ [A-kim], [A-kim] siⁿ [Í-lu̍t],
40001015	[Í-lu̍t] siⁿ [Í-lī-a-sat], [Í-lī-a-sat] siⁿ [Má-tàn], [Má-tàn] siⁿ [Ngá-kok],
40001016	[Ngá-kok] siⁿ [Iok-sek], [Iok-sek] sī [Má-lī-a] ê tiōng-hu; hit-ê chheng-chòe Ki-tok ê Iâ-so͘ sī tùi chit-ê [Má-lī-a] siⁿ ê.
40001017	Án-ni, tùi [A-pek-la-hán] kàu [Tāi-pi̍t] lóng-chóng ū cha̍p-sì tāi, tùi [Tāi-pi̍t] kàu siū chhian-sóa khì [Pa-pí-lûn] ū cha̍p-sì tāi, tùi siū chhian-sóa khì [Pa-pí-lûn] kàu Ki-tok mā ū cha̍p-sì tāi.
40001018	Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok chhut-sì ê keng-kè sī án-ni: I ê lāu-bú [Má-lī-a] í-keng kap [Iok-sek] tèng-hun, iáu-bē kiat-hun chiū tùi Sèng Sîn hoâi-īn.
40001019	I ê bī-hun-hu [Iok-sek] sī chèng-ti̍t ê lâng, bô ài hō͘ i tī lâng ê bīn-chêng kiàn-siàu, siūⁿ-beh àm-tiong kái-tû hun-iok.
40001020	I teh siūⁿ chit-ê tāi-chì ê sî, tī bîn-bāng tiong, Chú ê thiⁿ-sài tùi i chhut-hiān, kóng, “[Tāi-pi̍t] ê hō͘-tāi [Iok-sek], m̄-bián kiaⁿ, tio̍h chhōa [Má-lī-a] ji̍p-mn̂g chòe bó͘, in-ūi i só͘ hoâi-īn ê thai sī tùi Sèng Sîn lâi ê.
40001021	I ōe siⁿ chi̍t ê ta-po͘-kiáⁿ, lí tio̍h kā I hō-miâ kiò-chòe Iâ-so͘, in-ūi I beh kiù I ê chú-bîn thoat-lī in ê chōe.”
40001022	Che it-chhè ê sū hoat-seng sī beh èng-giām Chú thok sian-ti só͘ kóng ê ōe:
40001023	Lí khòaⁿ, chāi-sek-lú ōe hoâi-īn siⁿ kiáⁿ, I ê miâ beh kiò-chòe Í-má-lōe-lī. “Í-má-lōe-lī” ê ì-sù sī “Siōng-tè kap lán tông-chāi”.
40001024	[Iok-sek] chi̍t-ē khùn-chhíⁿ, chiū chiàu Chú ê thiⁿ-sài só͘ hoan-hù chhōa [Má-lī-a] ji̍p-mn̂g chòe bó͘,
40001025	put-kò chit-ê ta-po͘-kiáⁿ iáu-bē chhut-sì í-chêng bô kap [Má-lī-a] tâng-pâng. Eⁿ-á chhut-sì, [Iok-sek] chiū kā I hō-miâ kiò-chòe Iâ-so͘.
40002001	[Hi-lu̍t] choh-ông ê sî, Iâ-so͘ tī [Iû-thài] ê [Pek-lī-hêng] chhut-sì. Ū kúi-nā ê seng-siōng-ka tùi tang-hng lâi-kàu [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng].
40002002	In mn̄g kóng, “Hit-ê chhut-sì chòe [Iû-thài]-lâng ê Ông ê tī sím-mi̍h só͘-chāi? Goán ū khòaⁿ-tio̍h I ê chhiⁿ chhut-hiān, choan-kang lâi beh pài I.”
40002003	[Hi-lu̍t]-ông thiaⁿ-tio̍h, sim-lāi tio̍h-kip put-an; [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] choân-siâⁿ ê lâng mā-sī án-ni.
40002004	I chiū tiàu-chi̍p só͘-ū ê chè-si-tiúⁿ kap bîn-kan ê keng-ha̍k-kàu-su, mn̄g in kóng, “Ki-tok eng-kai tī sím-mi̍h só͘-chāi chhut-sì?”
40002005	In ìn kóng, “[Iû-thài] ê [Pek-lī-hêng]. In-ūi sian-ti ū án-ni kì-chài:
40002006	[Iû-tāi] tōe-khu ê [Pek-lī-hêng] ah, lí tī [Iû-tāi] léng-tō-chiá tiong m̄-sī siōng bî-sòe ê; in-ūi ū chi̍t ê léng-siù ōe tùi lí hia chhut-lâi, I beh bo̍k-ióng góa ê chú-bîn [Í-sek-lia̍t].”
40002007	[Hi-lu̍t] chiū àm-tiong tiàu hit kúi ê seng-siōng-ka, siông-sè kā in mn̄g hit lia̍p chhiⁿ sím-mi̍h sî chhut-hiān.
40002008	Āu-lâi, I chhe in khì [Pek-lī-hêng], kóng, “Lín khì siông-sè chhâ-mn̄g koan-hē chit-ê sòe-hàn gín-á ê sū; chhē-tio̍h, tio̍h lâi pò góa chai, góa mā thang khì pài I.”
40002009	In thiaⁿ ông ê ōe chiū khì. In tī tang-hng khòaⁿ-tio̍h ê hit lia̍p chhiⁿ chòe-thâu chhōa in, lâi-kàu hit-ê sòe-hàn gín-á ê só͘-chāi chiū thêng tī téng-bīn.
40002010	In khòaⁿ-tio̍h hit lia̍p chhiⁿ, hui-siông hoaⁿ-hí.
40002011	In ji̍p-khì chhù-lāi, khòaⁿ-tio̍h sòe-hàn gín-á kap I ê lāu-bú [Má-lī-a], chiū phak lo̍h-khì pài I, jiân-āu khui in ê pó-a̍h, chiong n̂g-kim, jú-hiuⁿ, kap bu̍t-io̍h chòe lé-mi̍h hiàn hō͘ I.
40002012	Tī bîn-bāng tiong, Siōng-tè chí-sī in m̄-thang tò-khì [Hi-lu̍t] hia, in chiū tùi pa̍t tiâu lō͘ tò-khì pún-kok.
40002013	Seng-siōng-ka lī-khui liáu-āu, Chú ê thiⁿ-sài tī [Iok-sek] ê bîn-bāng tiong tùi i chhut-hiān, kóng, “Khí-lâi, chhōa sòe-hàn gín-á kap I ê lāu-bú tô-cháu khì [Ai-ki̍p], tòa hia kàu góa kóng thang lī-khui ê sî, in-ūi [Hi-lu̍t] teh chhē chit-ê sòe-hàn gín-á, beh kā I thâi-sí.”
40002014	[Iok-sek] chiū khí-lâi, chhōa sòe-hàn gín-á kap I ê lāu-bú thàu-mî lī-khui khì [Ai-ki̍p],
40002015	tòa tī hia kàu [Hi-lu̍t] sí. Che sī beh èng-giām Chú thong-kè sian-ti só͘ kóng ê ōe: Góa ū tiàu góa ê kiáⁿ chhut [Ai-ki̍p].
40002016	[Hi-lu̍t] chi̍t-ē chai ka-kī hō͘ seng-siōng-ka phiàn-khì, hui-siông siū-khì, chiū chhe lâng chiong [Pek-lī-hêng] í-ki̍p chiu-ûi só͘-ū ê ta-po͘ gín-á, chiàu i tùi seng-siōng-ka siông-sè chhâ-mn̄g ê sî sǹg-khí, nn̄g hè í-hā ê lóng thâi-sí.
40002017	Chit-ê tāi-chì ū èng-giām thong-kè sian-ti [Iâ-lī-bí] só͘ kóng ê ōe:
40002018	Tī [La-má] ū thiaⁿ-tio̍h siaⁿ, thî-khàu chin pi-siong; [Lúi-kiat] ūi-tio̍h i ê kiáⁿ-jî teh khàu, m̄-khéng siū an-ùi, in-ūi in lóng bô-khì.
40002019	[Hi-lu̍t] sí í-āu, Chú ê thiⁿ-sài tī [Ai-ki̍p], tī [Iok-sek] ê bîn-bāng tiong tùi i chhut-hiān,
40002020	kóng, “Khí-lâi, chhōa sòe-hàn gín-á kap I ê lāu-bú tò-khì [Í-sek-lia̍t] tōe; in-ūi beh hāi sòe-hàn gín-á ê sìⁿ-miā hiah-ê lâng í-keng sí.”
40002021	[Iok-sek] chiū khí-lâi, chhōa sòe-hàn gín-á kap I ê lāu-bú tò-khì [Í-sek-lia̍t] tōe.
40002022	[Iok-sek] thiaⁿ-kìⁿ [A-ki-ló] sòa-chiap i ê lāu-pē [Hi-lu̍t] chòe [Iû-thài] ê ông, m̄-káⁿ tò-khì hia; āu-lâi tī bîn-bāng tiong tit-tio̍h chí-sī, chiū thòe-khì [Ka-lī-lī] kéng-lāi,
40002023	kàu chi̍t ê siâⁿ kiò-chòe [Ná-sat-le̍k], tòa tī hia. Che sī beh èng-giām Chú thong-kè sian-ti só͘ kóng ê ōe: I beh kiò-chòe [Ná-sat-le̍k]-lâng.
40003001	Tng-sî, Si-sóe-chiá [Iok-hān] lâi [Iû-thài] ê khòng-iá teh thoân-tō.
40003002	I soan-iông kóng, “Lín tio̍h hóe-kái, in-ūi Thian-kok teh-beh si̍t-hiān lah!”
40003003	Chit-ê lâng chiū-sī sian-ti [Í-sài-a] só͘ teh kóng ê: Ū siaⁿ tī khòng-iá teh hoah: Tio̍h ūi Chú chún-pī tō-lō͘, ūi I siu-ti̍t sió-lō͘.
40003004	[Iok-hān] chhēng lo̍k-tô-mn̂g ê saⁿ, io hâ phê-tòa, só͘ chia̍h-ê sī chháu-meh kap iá-bi̍t.
40003005	Ū chin chōe lâng tùi [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng], [Iû-thài] ta̍k só͘-chāi, kap [Iok-tàn]-hô it-tài lâi i hia,
40003006	jīn-chōe, tī [Iok-tàn]-hô tùi i niá-siū sóe-lé.
40003007	[Iok-hān] khòaⁿ-tio̍h chin chōe [Hoat-lī-sài-phài] kap [Sat-to͘-kai-phài] ê lâng mā lâi niá-siū sóe-lé, chiū tùi in kóng, “Lín chiah-ê to̍k-chôa, sím-mi̍h lâng kéng-kò lín siám-pī Siōng-tè teh-beh hoat ê siū-khì?
40003008	Tio̍h ēng hêng-ûi chèng-bêng lín ū hóe-kái.
40003009	Lín m̄-thang ka-kī siūⁿ-kóng ‘[A-pek-la-hán] sī goán ê chó͘-sian’, góa kā lín kóng, Siōng-tè ōe-tàng ēng chiah-ê chio̍h-thâu chō kiáⁿ-sun hō͘ [A-pek-la-hán].
40003010	Pó͘-thâu í-keng khòa tī chhiū-thâu; só͘-ū bô kiat hó ké-chí ê chhiū lóng beh kā chhò khí-lâi, hiat-lo̍h hé.
40003011	Góa ēng chúi kā lín sóe-lé, piáu-sī lín í-keng ū hóe-kái; m̄-kú tī góa āu-bīn teh lâi Hit-ūi pí góa khah ū koân-lêng, góa liân kā I kōaⁿ ôe to bōe kham-tit; I beh ēng Sèng Sîn kap hé kā lín sóe-lé.
40003012	I ê chhiú the̍h pòa-ki, beh chiong be̍h-tiâⁿ pòa chheng-khì, be̍h-á siu-ji̍p chhng-khò͘, be̍h-hiūⁿ chiū ēng bōe hoa ê hé sio hiat-ka̍k.”
40003013	Hit sî, Iâ-so͘ tùi [Ka-lī-lī] lâi [Iok-tàn]-hô [Iok-hān] hia, beh tùi i niá-siū sóe-lé.
40003014	[Iok-hān] beh kā I chó͘-chí, kóng, “Góa eng-kai tùi lí niá-siū sóe-lé, lí hoán-tńg lâi chhē góa?”
40003015	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Lán hiān-chāi án-ni chòe chiah ha̍h Siōng-tè it-chhè ê iau-kiû.” [Iok-hān] chiū tông-ì.
40003016	Iâ-so͘ niá-siū sóe-lé í-āu sûi-sî tùi chúi-ni̍h khí-lâi; hut-jiân thiⁿ ūi-tio̍h I khui, I khòaⁿ-kìⁿ Siōng-tè ê Sîn chhin-chhiūⁿ hún-chiáu kàng lo̍h-lâi, hioh tī I sin-chiūⁿ.
40003017	Koh tùi thiⁿ ū siaⁿ kóng: Chit-ê sī góa só͘ thiàⁿ ê Kiáⁿ, I, góa chin ì-ài.
40004001	Āu-lâi, Iâ-so͘ hō͘ Sèng Sîn chhōa-khì khòng-iá, tī hia siū Mô͘-kúi chhì-thàm.
40004002	Iâ-so͘ kìm-chia̍h sì-cha̍p mî-ji̍t, āu-lâi chiū iau.
40004003	Chhì-thàm-chiá óa-lâi tùi I kóng, “Kì-jiân lí sī Siōng-tè ê Kiáⁿ, bēng-lēng chiah-ê chio̍h-thâu pìⁿ-chòe piáⁿ!”
40004004	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Sèng-keng ū kì-chài: Lâng teh oa̍h m̄-nā óa-khò piáⁿ, sī óa-khò tùi Siōng-tè ê chhùi só͘ chhut ta̍k kù ōe.”
40004005	Jiân-āu, Mô͘-kúi chhōa Iâ-so͘ ji̍p-khì Sèng-tiān, hō͘ I khiā tī Sèng-tiān chhù-téng siōng-koân ê só͘-chāi,
40004006	tùi I kóng, “Kì-jiân lí sī Siōng-tè ê Kiáⁿ, thiàu lo̍h-khì! In-ūi Sèng-keng ū kì-chài: Siōng-tè ōe ūi-tio̍h lí bēng-lēng I ê thiⁿ-sài, in ōe ēng chhiú hû lí, hō͘ lí ê kha bōe kha̍p-tio̍h chio̍h-thâu.”
40004007	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Sèng-keng koh ū kì-chài: M̄-thang chhì-thàm Chú --- lí ê Siōng-tè.”
40004008	Mô͘-kúi koh chhōa Iâ-so͘ chiūⁿ chi̍t ê chin koân ê soaⁿ, chiong sè-chiūⁿ bān-kok kap in ê êng-hôa hō͘ I khòaⁿ,
40004009	tùi I kóng, “Lí nā phak lo̍h-lâi pài góa, chiah-ê it-chhè góa lóng hō͘ lí.”
40004010	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Sat-tàn, cháu! Sèng-keng ū kì-chài: Tio̍h pài Chú --- lí ê Siōng-tè, chí-ū ho̍k-sāi I.”
40004011	Jiân-āu Mô͘-kúi lī-khui Iâ-so͘; ū thiⁿ-sài lâi kā I sū-hāu.
40004012	Iâ-so͘ thiaⁿ-tio̍h [Iok-hān] hō͘ lâng lia̍h-khì chiū thòe-khì [Ka-lī-lī].
40004013	I lī-khui [Ná-sat-le̍k] khì tòa tī [Se-pò͘-lûn] kap [Ná-hut-tha-lī] tōe-khu, [Ka-lī-lī] ô͘-piⁿ ê [Ka-pek-lông].
40004014	Che sī beh èng-giām thong-kè sian-ti [Í-sài-a] só͘ kóng ê ōe:
40004015	[Se-pò͘-lûn] ê tōe, [Ná-hut-tha-lī] ê tōe, iân-hái ê lō͘, [Iok-tàn-hô] tang-hōaⁿ, Gōa-pang-lâng ê [Ka-lī-lī],
40004016	tiàm tī o͘-àm tiong ê lâng ū khòaⁿ-kìⁿ tōa-kng; tiàm tī sí-ìm ê tōe ê ū kng chiò in.
40004017	Tùi hit sî, Iâ-so͘ khai-sí soan-iông kóng, “Tio̍h hóe-kái, in-ūi Thian-kok teh-beh si̍t-hiān lah!”
40004018	Iâ-so͘ tī [Ka-lī-lī] ô͘-piⁿ teh kiâⁿ ê sî, khòaⁿ-tio̍h nn̄g ê hiaⁿ-tī, kiò-chòe [Pí-tek] ê [Se-bûn] kap i ê sió-tī [An-tek-lia̍t], tī ô͘-ni̍h teh pha-bāng, in-ūi in sī lia̍h-hî-ê.
40004019	I tùi in kóng, “Lâi tè góa, góa beh hō͘ lín tit-tio̍h lâng chhin-chhiūⁿ lia̍h-hî-ê tit-tio̍h hî.”
40004020	In sûi-sî kā bāng pàng-leh, khì tè Iâ-so͘.
40004021	Iâ-so͘ kiâⁿ chìn-chêng, khòaⁿ-tio̍h lēng-gōa nn̄g ê hiaⁿ-tī, [Se-pí-thài] ê kiáⁿ [Ngá-kok] kap i ê sió-tī [Iok-hān]. In kap lāu-pē [Se-pí-thài] tī chûn-téng teh chéng-lí bāng, I chiū ho͘-tiàu in.
40004022	In sûi-sî chiong chûn kap lāu-pē pàng-leh, khì tè Iâ-so͘.
40004023	Iâ-so͘ kàu [Ka-lī-lī] ta̍k só͘-chāi, tī in ê hōe-tn̂g kà-sī lâng, thoân Thian-kok ê hok-im, i-hó bîn-kan ta̍k khoán ê pīⁿ-chèng.
40004024	I ê miâ-siaⁿ thoân kàu [Sū-lī-a] ê ta̍k só͘-chāi. Lâng chiong só͘-ū ê pīⁿ-lâng, chiū-sī siâ-sîn hū-sin, iûⁿ-hîn, kap poàn-sūi, téng, hoān-tio̍h ta̍k khoán chèng-thâu kap pīⁿ-thiàⁿ ê lâng, lóng chhōa lâi I hia, I chiū kā in i-hó.
40004025	Ū chi̍t tōa-tīn lâng tùi [Ka-lī-lī], [Te-ka-pho-lí], [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng], [Iû-thài], kap [Iok-tàn-hô] tang-hōaⁿ lâi tè I.
40005001	Iâ-so͘ khòaⁿ-tio̍h chi̍t tōa-tīn lâng, chiū peh chiūⁿ-soaⁿ. I chē lo̍h-khì, bûn-tô͘ óa-lâi,
40005002	chiū khai-sí kà-sī in, kóng:
40005003	“Sim-lêng sàn-chhiah ê lâng chin ū hok-khì, in-ūi Thian-kok sī chit khoán lâng ê.
40005004	Iu-siong ê lâng chin ū hok-khì, in-ūi Siōng-tè ōe kā in an-ùi.
40005005	Un-jiû ê lâng chin ū hok-khì, in-ūi Siōng-tè ōe hō͘ in sêng-siū èng-ún ê thó͘-tōe.
40005006	Iau chhùi-ta him-bō͘ Siōng-tè chí-ì si̍t-hiān ê lâng chin ū hok-khì, in-ūi Siōng-tè ōe hō͘ in pá-chiok.
40005007	Gâu lîn-bín ê lâng chin ū hok-khì, in-ūi Siōng-tè ōe kā in lîn-bín.
40005008	Sim chheng-khì ê lâng chin ū hok-khì, in-ūi in ōe kìⁿ-tio̍h Siōng-tè.
40005009	Chhiok-chìn hô-pêng ê lâng chin ū hok-khì, in-ūi in ōe chiâⁿ-chòe Siōng-tè ê kiáⁿ-jî.
40005010	Ūi-tio̍h si̍t-chián Siōng-tè ê chí-ì siū pek-hāi ê lâng chin ū hok-khì, in-ūi Thian-kok sī chit khoán lâng ê.
40005011	Ūi-tio̍h góa ê iân-kò͘, lâng kā lín bú-jio̍k, pek-hāi, kóng ta̍k khoán pháiⁿ-ōe húi-pòng, lín chin ū hok-khì.
40005012	Tio̍h hoaⁿ-hí khoài-lo̍k, in-ūi lín tī thiⁿ-téng ê pò-siúⁿ chin tōa; lín í-chêng ê sian-ti mā bat án-ni siū pek-hāi.”
40005013	“Lín sī tōe-chiūⁿ ê iâm; iâm nā sit-bī, beh án-chóaⁿ hō͘ i koh kiâm? Iâm sit-bī chiū bô lō͘-ēng, chí-ū hìⁿ-sak, hō͘ lâng thún-ta̍h.
40005014	“Lín sī sè-kan ê kng. Khí tī soaⁿ-téng ê siâⁿ khàm bōe-tiâu.
40005015	Lâng teng tiám-to̍h liáu-āu bōe ēng táu kā i khàm khí-lâi, it-tēng ōe kā i chhāi tī teng-tâi téng, thang kā chhù-lāi só͘-ū ê lâng chiò-kng.
40005016	Chhin-chhiūⁿ án-ni, lín ê kng tio̍h chiò tī lâng ê bīn-chêng, thang hō͘ in khòaⁿ-kìⁿ lín ê hó hêng-ûi lâi êng-kng lín ê Thiⁿ-pē.”
40005017	“M̄-thang siūⁿ-kóng góa lâi sī beh hòe-tû [Mô͘-se] ê Lu̍t-hoat á-sī sian-ti ê kà-sī. Góa lâi m̄-sī beh hòe-tû, sī beh si̍t-hiān.
40005018	Góa si̍t-chāi kā lín kóng, thiⁿ kap tōe ōe siau-sit, Lu̍t-hoat ê chi̍t-tiám chi̍t-u̍ih choa̍t-tùi bōe siau-sit, lóng ōe si̍t-hiān.
40005019	Só͘-í, bô-lūn sím-mi̍h lâng hoān-tio̍h chiah-ê kài-bēng siōng-sòe ê chi̍t tiâu, koh kà lâng án-ni khì hoān, tī Thian-kok i sǹg-chòe sī siōng-sòe ê. Bô-lūn sím-mi̍h lâng ka-kī chun-siú, mā kà lâng chun-siú, tī Thian-kok chit-ê lâng sǹg-chòe sī siōng-tōa ê.
40005020	Góa kā lín kóng, lín nā bô pí keng-ha̍k-kàu-su kap Hoat-lī-sài-phài ê lâng koh-khah tiong-si̍t chun-siú Siōng-tè ê chí-ì, choa̍t-tùi bōe-tàng ji̍p Thian-kok.”
40005021	“Lín ū thiaⁿ-tio̍h Lu̍t-hoat án-ni kà-sī kó͘-chá lâng, kóng, ‘M̄-thang thâi-sí lâng; thâi-sí lâng ê tio̍h siū sím-phòaⁿ.’
40005022	M̄-kú góa kā lín kóng, tùi hiaⁿ-tī á-sī chí-bē hoat siū-khì, lóng tio̍h siū sím-phòaⁿ. Bô-lūn sím-mi̍h lâng mē hiaⁿ-tī á-sī chí-bē ‘hòe-jîn’, tio̍h chiūⁿ hoat-têng; mē hiaⁿ-tī á-sī chí-bē ‘tòng-gōng’, tio̍h siū tōe-ge̍k ê hé sio.
40005023	Só͘-í, lí tī chè-tôaⁿ beh hiàn lé-mi̍h ê sî, nā siūⁿ-tio̍h lí ê hiaⁿ-tī á-sī chí-bē tùi lí ū put-móa,
40005024	tio̍h chiong lé-mi̍h pàng-hē tī chè-tôaⁿ chêng, seng khì kap i hô-hó, jiân-āu chiah lâi hiàn lé-mi̍h.
40005025	“Lâng kā lí khòng-kò, beh thoa lí khì hoat-têng, iáu tī lō͘-tiong ê sî tio̍h kóaⁿ-kín kap i hô-kái, chiah-bián hō͘ khòng-kò lí ê lâng kā lí kau hō͘ phòaⁿ-koaⁿ, phòaⁿ-koaⁿ kā lí kau hō͘ hoat-kéng khì koaiⁿ-kaⁿ. Góa si̍t-chāi kā lí kóng, chòe-āu ê chi̍t-sián gō͘-lî bô hêng chheng-chhó, choa̍t-tùi bōe-tàng chhut-kaⁿ.”
40005027	“Lín ū thiaⁿ-tio̍h Lu̍t-hoat án-ni kà-sī kóng, ‘M̄-thang kan-îm.’
40005028	M̄-kú góa kā lín kóng, lâng nā ēng siâ-liām khòaⁿ hū-lú, í-keng tī sim-lāi hoān kan-îm.
40005029	Lí ê chiàⁿ-ba̍k nā ín-khí lí hoān-chōe, tio̍h kā i ó͘ hiat-ka̍k, lêng-khó sit-khì seng-khu ê chi̍t pō͘-hūn, pí kui seng-khu hó-hó hiat-lo̍h tōe-ge̍k khah hó.
40005030	Lí ê chiàⁿ-chhiú nā ín-khí lí hoān-chōe, tio̍h kā i chām hiat-ka̍k, lêng-khó sit-khì seng-khu ê chi̍t pō͘-hūn, pí kui seng-khu hó-hó hiat-lo̍h tōe-ge̍k khah hó.”
40005031	“Koh ū Lu̍t-hoat án-ni kóng, ‘Lâng nā beh lî i ê bó͘, tio̍h hō͘ i lî-hun-su.’
40005032	M̄-kú góa kā lín kóng, nā m̄-sī in-ūi bó͘ put-cheng, m̄-thang kā i lî, in-ūi i nā koh khì kè chiū-sī hāi i hoān kan-îm; chhōa lî-hun ê hū-lú ê lâng mā-sī hoān kan-îm.”
40005033	“Lín koh ū thiaⁿ-tio̍h Lu̍t-hoat án-ni kà-sī kó͘-chá lâng kóng, ‘M̄-thang ûi-pōe chiù-chōa, tī Chú ê bīn-chêng só͘ chiù ê chōa tio̍h si̍t-hêng.’
40005034	M̄-kú góa kā lín kóng, lóng m̄-thang chiù-chōa. M̄-thang kí thiⁿ chiù-chōa, in-ūi thiⁿ sī Siōng-tè ê pó-chō;
40005035	mā m̄-thang kí tōe chiù-chōa, in-ūi tōe sī Siōng-tè ê kha-tiam; mā m̄-thang kí [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] chiù-chōa, in-ūi [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] sī tōa Kun-ông ê siâⁿ.
40005036	Mā m̄-thang kí lí ê thâu-khak chiù-chōa, in-ūi lí bōe-tàng hō͘ chi̍t ki thâu-mn̂g pìⁿ-o͘ á-sī pìⁿ-pe̍h.
40005037	Lín kóng-ōe, sī, chiū kóng sī, m̄-sī, chiū kóng m̄-sī; kî-tha ke kóng ê sī tùi Siâ-ok-chiá chhut-lâi ê.”
40005038	“Lín ū thiaⁿ-tio̍h Lu̍t-hoat án-ni kà-sī kóng, ‘Ba̍k-chiu pê ba̍k-chiu; chhùi-khí pê chhùi-khí.’
40005039	M̄-kú góa kā lín kóng, m̄-thang tí-khòng choh-ok ê lâng. Lâng nā siàn lí chiàⁿ-pêng ê chhùi-phóe, liân tò-pêng mā oa̍t hō͘ i siàn.
40005040	Lâng nā kò lí, beh the̍h lí ê lāi-saⁿ, liân gōa-saⁿ mā hō͘ i.
40005041	Chiàm-léng-kun ê kun-jîn nā kiông-pek lí kiâⁿ chi̍t lí lō͘, tio̍h kap i kiâⁿ nn̄g lí.
40005042	Lâng nā tùi lí kiû, tio̍h hō͘ i; kā lí chioh, m̄-thang kū-choa̍t.”
40005043	“Lín ū thiaⁿ-tio̍h chit khoán kà-sī, ‘Tio̍h thiàⁿ lí ê chhù-piⁿ, oàn-hūn lí ê tùi-te̍k.’
40005044	M̄-kú góa kā lín kóng, tio̍h thiàⁿ lín ê tùi-te̍k, thòe pek-hāi lín ê lâng kî-tó.
40005045	Án-ni, lín chiah ōe-tàng chiâⁿ-chòe lín Thiⁿ-pē ê kiáⁿ-jî, in-ūi I hō͘ ji̍t-thâu chhut-lâi chiò pháiⁿ-lâng kap hó-lâng, mā lo̍h-hō͘ hō͘ gī-lâng kap put-gī ê lâng.
40005046	In-ūi lín nā thiàⁿ hiah-ê thiàⁿ lín ê lâng, ū sím-mi̍h pò-siúⁿ? Kiám m̄-sī liân hiah-ê bau̍h-sè-ê mā án-ni chòe?
40005047	Lín nā chí-ū tùi ka-kī ê hiaⁿ-tī á-sī chí-bē chhéng-an, ū sím-mi̍h pí pa̍t-lâng khah te̍k-pia̍t? Kiám m̄-sī liân Gōa-pang-lâng mā án-ni chòe?
40005048	Kì-jiân lín ê Thiⁿ-pē sī oân-choân, lín mā tio̍h oân-choân.”
40006001	“Tio̍h kín-sīn, m̄-thang ūi-tio̍h beh hō͘ lâng khòaⁿ chiah kò͘-ì tī lâng ê bīn-chêng tián lín ê kèng-khiân; án-ni chòe bōe-tàng tùi lín ê Thiⁿ-pē tit-tio̍h pò-siúⁿ.
40006002	“Só͘-í, lí chín-chè ê sî, m̄-thang seng pûn lat-pah pò lâng chai, chhin-chhiūⁿ ké-hó ê lâng tī hōe-tn̂g kap koe-lō͘ án-ni chòe, ài hō͘ lâng o-ló. Góa si̍t-chāi kā lín kóng, in í-keng tit-tio̍h èng-tit ê pò-siúⁿ lah.
40006003	Lí chín-chè ê sî, m̄-thang hō͘ lí ê tò-chhiú chai chiàⁿ-chhiú ê só͘-chòe,
40006004	hō͘ lí thang tiām-tiām-á chín-chè, tiām-tiām-á teh khòaⁿ ê lí ê Pē ōe kā lí pò-siúⁿ.”
40006005	“Lín kî-tó ê sî, m̄-thang chhin-chhiūⁿ ké-hó ê lâng, in-ūi in ài hō͘ lâng khòaⁿ, kò͘-ì khiā tī hōe-tn̂g á-sī lō͘-kháu kî-tó. Góa si̍t-chāi kā lín kóng, in í-keng tit-tio̍h èng-tit ê pò-siúⁿ lah.
40006006	Lí kî-tó ê sî, tio̍h ji̍p-khì pâng-keng lāi, koaiⁿ-mn̂g, tùi lí tiām-tiām-á teh khòaⁿ ê Pē kiû, án-ni tiām-tiām-á teh khòaⁿ ê Pē ōe kā lí pò-siúⁿ.
40006007	“Lín kî-tó ê sî, m̄-thang chhin-chhiūⁿ Gōa-pang-lâng kóng liáu koh-kóng, in-ūi in siūⁿ, kóng khah chōe ōe Siōng-tè chiah ōe thiaⁿ-kìⁿ.
40006008	Lín m̄-thang kap in siâng-khoán; in-ūi iáu-bē kiû í-chêng, lín ê Pē í-keng chai lín ê su-iàu.
40006009	Só͘-í, lín tio̍h án-ni kî-tó: Goán ê Thiⁿ-pē: Goān lí ê sèng-miâ siū chun-chông.
40006010	Goān lí si-hêng chú-koân; goān lí ê chí-ì si̍t-hiān, tī tōe-chiūⁿ chhin-chhiūⁿ tī thiⁿ-téng.
40006011	Kiû lí kin-á-ji̍t sù goán su-iàu ê chia̍h-mi̍h.
40006012	Kiû lí sià-bián goán ê ko͘-hū, chhin-chhiūⁿ goán mā ū sià-bián ko͘-hū goán ê lâng.
40006013	Kiû lí m̄-thang hō͘ goán hām-lo̍h tam-tng bōe-khí ê chhì-thàm, kiù goán thoat-lī hit-ê Siâ-ok-chiá.
40006014	“Lín nā sià-bián lâng ê kè-sit, lín ê Thiⁿ-pē mā ōe sià-bián lín;
40006015	lín nā bô sià-bián lâng, lín ê Thiⁿ-pē mā bōe sià-bián lín ê kè-sit.”
40006016	“Lín kìm-chia̍h ê sî, m̄-thang chhin-chhiūⁿ ké-hó ê lâng bīn iu-thâu kat-bīn; in-ūi in kò͘-ì hō͘ bīn pháiⁿ-khòaⁿ, ài hō͘ lâng khòaⁿ-chhut in teh kìm-chia̍h. Góa si̍t-chāi kā lín kóng, in í-keng tit-tio̍h èng-tit ê pò-siúⁿ lah.
40006017	Lí kìm-chia̍h ê sî, thâu-mn̂g tio̍h boah-iû, bīn tio̍h sóe,
40006018	hō͘ lâng khòaⁿ bōe chhut lí teh kìm-chia̍h, chí-ū hō͘ tiām-tiām-á teh khòaⁿ ê Pē khòaⁿ-kìⁿ, án-ni tiām-tiām-á teh khòaⁿ ê Pē ōe kā lí pò-siúⁿ.”
40006019	“M̄-thang ūi-tio̍h ka-kī chek-chū châi-pó tī tōe-chiūⁿ, tī chia ū thâng kā, ōe siⁿ-sian, chha̍t ōe ó͘-khang thau-the̍h.
40006020	Tio̍h ūi-tio̍h ka-kī chek-chū châi-pó tī thiⁿ-téng, tī hia bô thâng kā, bōe siⁿ-sian, bô chha̍t ó͘-khang thau-the̍h.
40006021	In-ūi lí ê châi-pó tī tó-ūi, lí ê sim mā ōe tī hia.”
40006022	“Ba̍k-chiu sī seng-khu ê teng. Lí ê ba̍k-chiu nā kim, kui seng-khu chiū kng-bêng;
40006023	lí ê ba̍k-chiu nā hoe, kui seng-khu chiū o͘-àm. Án-ni, lí lāi-bīn ê kng nā pìⁿ-chòe àm, chit-ê o͘-àm sī jōa-á-ni̍h giâm-tiōng!”
40006024	“Bô-lâng ōe-tàng ho̍k-sāi nn̄g ê chú-lâng; i nā m̄-sī oàn-hūn chit-ê, thiàⁿ hit-ê, chiū-sī khòaⁿ-tāng chit-ê, khòaⁿ-khin hit-ê. Lín bōe-tàng siâng-sî ho̍k-sāi Siōng-tè kap chîⁿ-châi.
40006025	“Só͘-í, góa kā lín kóng, m̄-thang ūi-tio̍h lín ê sìⁿ-miā beh chia̍h sím-mi̍h, beh lim sím-mi̍h teh chhau-hoân; mā m̄-thang ūi-tio̍h lín ê seng-khu beh chhēng sím-mi̍h teh chhau-hoân. Sìⁿ-miā kiám m̄-sī pí chia̍h-mi̍h khah tiōng-iàu? Seng-khu kiám m̄-sī pí i-ho̍k khah tiōng-iàu?
40006026	Lín khòaⁿ khong-tiong ê pe-chiáu, in bô chèng-choh, bô siu-sêng, mā bô tún-chek niû-si̍t tī chhng-khò͘, lín ê Thiⁿ-pē mā teh kā in iúⁿ-chhī. Lín kiám bô pí in khah kùi-tiōng?
40006027	Lín kiám ū lâng siūⁿ-kóng chhau-hoân ōe-tàng hō͘ ka-kī ê sìⁿ-miā ke oa̍h chi̍t-sî-á kú?
40006028	“Lín ná-tio̍h in-ūi beh chhēng sím-mi̍h chhau-hoân? Lín siūⁿ-khòaⁿ soaⁿ-iá ê hoe án-chóaⁿ teh tōa-châng; in bô lô-khó͘, mā bô pháng-chit.
40006029	Put-kò góa kā lín kóng, liân [Só͘-lô-bûn] siōng êng-hôa ê sî, i chhēng ê saⁿ to bô pí chiah-ê hoe ê chi̍t lúi koh-khah súi.
40006030	Soaⁿ-iá ê hoe-chháu kin-á-ji̍t teh oa̍h, bîn-á-chài hō͘ lâng hiat-lo̍h hé-lô͘, Siōng-tè to án-ni kā in chng-thāⁿ, I kiám bōe koh-khah kā lín chng-thāⁿ? Lín ná-ōe chiah-ni̍h bô sìn-sim!
40006031	“Só͘-í, lín m̄-bián chhau-hoân kóng, ‘Goán beh chia̍h sím-mi̍h?’ á-sī ‘Goán beh lim sím-mi̍h, beh chhēng sím-mi̍h?’
40006032	Chiah-ê lóng sī Gōa-pang-lâng teh tui-kiû ê. Lín ê Thiⁿ-pē chai chiah-ê lóng sī lín só͘ su-iàu ê.
40006033	Tio̍h seng tui-kiû I ê chú-koân kap I ê chí-ì si̍t-hiān, chiah-ê mi̍h-kiāⁿ chiū ōe sòa lóng hō͘ lín.
40006034	Só͘-í, m̄-thang ūi-tio̍h bîn-á-chài chhau-hoân; bîn-á-chài ê tāi-chì bîn-á-chài chiah chhau-hoân. Chi̍t ji̍t ê kan-khó͘ chi̍t ji̍t tng.”
40007001	“M̄-thang phoe-phòaⁿ lâng, chiah-bián siū Siōng-tè sím-phòaⁿ.
40007002	In-ūi lín ēng sím-mi̍h phiau-chún phoe-phòaⁿ lâng, Siōng-tè mā ōe chiàu án-ni kā lín sím-phòaⁿ; lín ēng sím-mi̍h niû niû hō͘ lâng, Siōng-tè mā ōe chiàu án-ni niû hō͘ lín.
40007003	Lí ná kan-ta teh khòaⁿ hiaⁿ-tī ba̍k-chiu lāi ê chhâ-iù-á, ia̍h bô chù-ì tio̍h ka-kī ba̍k-chiu lāi ū chhâ-kho͘?
40007004	Lí ka-kī ba̍k-chiu lāi ū chhâ-kho͘, ná ōe-tàng tùi hiaⁿ-tī kóng ‘Lí ba̍k-chiu lāi ū chhâ-iù-á, góa kā lí the̍h chhut-lâi’?
40007005	Ké-hó ê lâng, ka-kī ba̍k-chiu lāi ê chhâ-kho͘ tio̍h seng the̍h chhut-lâi, chiah ōe-tàng khòaⁿ chheng-chhó thang kā hiaⁿ-tī ba̍k-chiu lāi ê chhâ-iù-á the̍h chhut-lâi.
40007006	“M̄-thang the̍h sîn-sèng ê mi̍h hō͘ káu, in ōe oa̍t kè-lâi kā lín; mā m̄-thang chiong lín ê chin-chu hiat tī ti ê bīn-chêng, in ōe ēng kha thún-ta̍h.”
40007007	“Kiû, ōe tit-tio̍h; chhē, ōe chhē-tio̍h; phah-mn̂g, ōe kā lín khui.
40007008	In-ūi kiû ê, chiū tit-tio̍h; chhē ê, chiū chhē-tio̍h; phah-mn̂g ê, chiū kā i khui.
40007009	Lín tiong-kan kiám ū lâng, in kiáⁿ kā i thó mī-pau, ōe the̍h chio̍h-thâu hō͘ i?
40007010	Kā i thó hî, ōe lia̍h chôa hō͘ i?
40007011	Lín sui-jiân pháiⁿ, iáu ōe-hiáu the̍h hó-mi̍h hō͘ lín ê kiáⁿ-jî, hô-hòng lín ê Thiⁿ-pē, I it-tēng ōe the̍h hó-mi̍h hō͘ tùi I kî-kiû ê lâng!
40007012	“Só͘-í, lín ài lâng án-chóaⁿ tùi-thāi lín, mā tio̍h án-ni tùi-thāi in. Che chiū-sī Lu̍t-hoat kap sian-ti ê kà-sī.”
40007013	“Lín tio̍h tùi hit-ê oe̍h ê mn̂g ji̍p-khì; in-ūi thàu kàu bia̍t-bông hit-ê mn̂g khoah, hit tiâu lō͘ hó kiâⁿ, ji̍p-khì ê lâng chin chōe.
40007014	Thàu kàu oa̍h-miā hit-ê mn̂g sòe, hit tiâu lō͘ oe̍h, chhē-tio̍h ê lâng chin chió.”
40007015	“Tio̍h hông-pī ké sian-ti. In lâi lín chia, gōa-piáu chhin-chhiūⁿ mî-iûⁿ, lāi-bīn khiok sī hiong-ok ê chhâi-lông.
40007016	Lín ōe-tàng tùi in ê ké-chí lâi bat in. Kiám ōe-tàng tùi chhì-phè bán phû-tô? Á-sī tùi chi̍t-lê bán bû-hoa-kó?
40007017	Án-ni, hó-chhiū kiat hó ké-chí; pháiⁿ-chhiū kiat pháiⁿ ké-chí.
40007018	Hó-chhiū bōe kiat pháiⁿ ké-chí; pháiⁿ-chhiū mā bōe kiat hó ké-chí.
40007019	Bōe kiat hó ké-chí ê chhiū lóng tio̍h chhò khí-lâi, hiat-lo̍h hé.
40007020	Án-ni, lín ōe-tàng tùi in ê ké-chí lâi bat in.”
40007021	“Chheng-ho͘ góa ‘Chú ah, Chú ah’ ê lâng, bōe lóng ji̍p Thian-kok; chí-ū si̍t-hêng góa ê Thiⁿ-pē ê chí-ì ê lâng chiah ōe.
40007022	Tī hit Ji̍t, ū chin chōe lâng ōe tùi góa kóng, ‘Chú ah, Chú ah, goán kiám m̄-sī bat hōng lí ê miâ thoân sìn-sit, bat hōng lí ê miâ kóaⁿ-kúi, bat hōng lí ê miâ kiâⁿ chin chōe sîn-jiah?’
40007023	Hit sî góa ōe bêng-bêng tùi in kóng, ‘Góa lóng m̄-bat lín. Lín chiah-ê chòe-pháiⁿ ê lâng, lóng lī-khui góa!’ ”
40007024	“Só͘-í, thiaⁿ góa chiah-ê ōe koh khì si̍t-hêng ê lâng lóng chhin-chhiūⁿ chhong-bêng ê lâng kā chhù khí tī chio̍h-pôaⁿ téng,
40007025	hō͘ phoah, tōa-chúi lâi, hong sàu, chhiong-tio̍h chhù, chhù mā bōe tó, in-ūi khí tī chio̍h-pôaⁿ téng.
40007026	“Thiaⁿ góa chiah-ê ōe bô khì si̍t-hêng ê lâng chhin-chhiūⁿ gōng-lâng kā chhù khí tī soa téng,
40007027	hō͘ phoah, tōa-chúi lâi, hong sàu, chhiong-tio̍h chhù, chhù chiū tó, koh tó-kah chin lī-hāi.”
40007028	Iâ-so͘ chiah-ê ōe kóng soah, kûn-chiòng tùi I ê kà-sī kám-kak hui-siông hi-kî,
40007029	in-ūi I ê kà-sī chin ū koân-ui, kap in ê keng-ha̍k-kàu-su bô kâng-khoán.
40008001	Iâ-so͘ tùi soaⁿ-téng lo̍h-lâi ê sî, ū kui tōa-tīn ê lâng tè I.
40008002	Tú hit sî, ū chi̍t ê bâ-hong pīⁿ-lâng kiâⁿ óa-lâi, kūi lo̍h-khì I ê bīn-chêng, kóng, “Chú ah, lí nā khéng, ōe-tàng hō͘ góa chheng-khì.”
40008003	Iâ-so͘ chhun-chhiú kā i bong, kóng, “Góa khéng, hō͘ lí chheng-khì!” I ê bâ-hong-pīⁿ sûi-sî chheng-khì.
40008004	Iâ-so͘ kā i kóng, “Tio̍h chù-ì, lóng m̄-thang kā lâng kóng. Put-kò tio̍h khì hō͘ chè-si giām, koh chiàu [Mô͘-se] ê kui-tēng hiàn lé-mi̍h, thang tùi chèng-lâng chèng-bêng.”
40008005	Iâ-so͘ ji̍p-khì [Ka-pek-lông] ê sî, ū chi̍t ê [Lô-má] kun-koaⁿ kiâⁿ óa-lâi kā I khún-kiû,
40008006	kóng, “Chú ah, góa ê lô͘-po̍k tó tī chhù-lāi bōe tín-tāng, hui-siông kan-khó͘.”
40008007	Iâ-so͘ kā i kóng, “Góa lâi-khì kā i i-tī.”
40008008	Kun-koaⁿ ìn kóng, “Chú ah, lí lâi goán tau, góa bōe kham-tit. Lí kan-ta kóng chi̍t kù ōe, góa ê lô͘-po̍k chiū ōe hó.
40008009	In-ūi góa sī hō͘ lâng koán ê lâng, mā ū peng hō͘ góa koán. Góa kā chit-ê kóng ‘Khì’, i chiū khì; kā pa̍t-ê kóng ‘Lâi’, i chiū lâi; kā góa ê lô͘-po̍k kóng ‘Lí chòe chit-ê’, i chiū khì chòe.”
40008010	Iâ-so͘ thiaⁿ liáu kám-kak chin ì-gōa, chiū tùi hiah-ê tè I ê lâng kóng, “Góa si̍t-chāi kā lín kóng, liân tī [Í-sek-lia̍t]-lâng ê tiong-kan, góa to iáu m̄-bat khòaⁿ-tio̍h chit khoán ê sìn-sim.
40008011	Góa kā lín kóng, ū chin chōe lâng ōe tùi tang tùi sai lâi kap [A-pek-la-hán], [Í-sat], [Ngá-kok] tī Thian-kok chē-toh.
40008012	Put-kò hiah-ê pún-lâi sī Thian-kok ê kiáⁿ-jî ê, hoán-tńg ōe siū kóaⁿ chhut-khì gōa-bīn o͘-àm ê só͘-chāi, tī hia thî-khàu, kā-gê chhiat-chhí.”
40008013	Jiân-āu Iâ-so͘ tùi hit-ê kun-koaⁿ kóng, “Lí khì, hō͘ lí só͘ sìn ê si̍t-hiān!” Tú-tú hit sî, lô͘-po̍k ê pīⁿ chiū hó-khì.
40008014	Iâ-so͘ ji̍p-khì [Pí-tek] in tau, khòaⁿ-tio̍h i ê tiūⁿ-ḿ hoat-jia̍t, tó tī bîn-chhn̂g.
40008015	Iâ-so͘ bong i ê chhiú, jia̍t thòe-khì, i chiū khí-lâi sū-hāu I.
40008016	Hông-hun ê sî, ū chi̍t-kóa lâng chhōa chin chōe hō͘ siâ-sîn hū-sin ê lâng lâi Iâ-so͘ hia. I ēng chi̍t kù ōe chiū kā siâ-sîn lóng kóaⁿ chhut-khì, koh i-hó só͘-ū ê pīⁿ-lâng.
40008017	Che sī beh èng-giām thong-kè sian-ti [Í-sài-a] só͘ kóng ê ōe: I sêng-siū lán ê loán-jio̍k, tam-tng lán ê pīⁿ-thiàⁿ.
40008018	Iâ-so͘ khòaⁿ-tio̍h chi̍t tōa-tīn lâng ûi tī I chiu-ûi, chiū hoan-hù bûn-tô͘ kè-khì ô͘ ê hit pêng hōaⁿ.
40008019	Ū chi̍t ê keng-ha̍k-kàu-su kiâⁿ óa-lâi kā I kóng, “Lāu-su, lí bô-lūn khì tó-ūi, góa lóng beh tè lí.”
40008020	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Hô͘-lî ū khang, khong-tiong ê chiáu ū siū, put-kò Jîn-chú liân khòa thâu-khak ê só͘-chāi to bô.”
40008021	Lēng-gōa chi̍t ê bûn-tô͘ kā I kóng, “Chú ah, hō͘ góa seng tńg-khì bâi-chòng góa ê lāu-pē.”
40008022	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Lâi tè góa, hō͘ sí-lâng khì bâi-chòng in ka-kī ê sí-lâng!”
40008023	Iâ-so͘ chiūⁿ-chûn, I ê bûn-tô͘ tè I khì.
40008024	Hut-jiân, ô͘ khí tōa hong-éng, chûn soah hō͘ éng khàm-kah beh tîm lo̍h-khì, m̄-kú Iâ-so͘ teh khùn.
40008025	Bûn-tô͘ khì kā I kiò chhíⁿ, kóng, “Chú ah, kiù-leh ò͘, goán teh-beh bô-miā lò͘!”
40008026	Iâ-so͘ tùi in kóng, “Sió-sìn ê lâng, lín ná chiah bô-táⁿ?” I chiū khí-lâi, chek-pī hong kap éng, ô͘ chiū chēng-chēng-chēng.
40008027	Hiah-ê lâng tio̍h-kiaⁿ kóng, “Chit-ê sī sím-mi̍h khoán lâng, liân hong kap éng to sūn-ho̍k!”
40008028	Iâ-so͘ kè-khì ô͘ ê hit pêng hōaⁿ, kàu [Ka-tāi-lia̍p]-lâng ê tōe-khu, ū nn̄g ê hō͘ siâ-sîn hū-sin ê lâng tùi bōng-á-po͘ chhut-lâi, tú-tio̍h I. In hiong-kài-kài, só͘-í bô-lâng káⁿ tùi hit tiâu lō͘ keng-kè.
40008029	In hut-jiân tōa-siaⁿ hoah, “Siōng-tè ê Kiáⁿ, lí mài chhap goán! Sî iáu-bē kàu, lí chiū lâi beh kā goán khó͘-chhó͘ sī-bô?”
40008030	Hit sî, lī in ū hiah-hn̄g-à ê só͘-chāi, ū chi̍t tōa-kûn ti teh thó-chia̍h.
40008031	Siâ-sîn kiû Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Lí nā beh kā goán kóaⁿ chhut-khì, tio̍h chhe goán chìn-ji̍p hit kûn ti.”
40008032	Iâ-so͘ kā in kóng, “Lín khì!” Siâ-sîn chiū chhut-khì, chìn-ji̍p ti-kûn; hut-jiân kui-kûn ti lóng tùi soaⁿ-phiâⁿ chông lo̍h-khì ô͘-ni̍h, tū-sí tī chúi-lāi.
40008033	Chhī-ti ê lâng chiū tô-cháu, cháu ji̍p-khì siâⁿ-lāi, chiong it-chhè só͘ hoat-seng í-ki̍p hō͘ kúi hū-sin ê lâng só͘ tú-tio̍h ê tāi-chì lóng pò lâng chai.
40008034	Choân siâⁿ ê lâng lóng chhut-lâi beh khòaⁿ Iâ-so͘; in chi̍t-ē khòaⁿ-tio̍h I, chiū khún-kiû I lī-khui in ê tōe-khu.
40009001	Iâ-so͘ chē-chûn kè ô͘, tńg-khì ka-kī ê siâⁿ.
40009002	Ū lâng ēng chhn̂g kng chi̍t ê poàn-sin-put-sūi ê lâng lâi Iâ-so͘ hia. I khòaⁿ-kìⁿ in ê sìn-sim, chiū tùi hit-ê poàn-sin-put-sūi ê lâng kóng, “Siàu-liân-lâng, an-sim, lí ê chōe sià-bián lah!”
40009003	Ū kúi-nā ê keng-ha̍k-kàu-su sim-lāi siūⁿ, “Chit-ê lâng teh siat-to̍k Siōng-tè!”
40009004	Iâ-so͘ chai in ê sim-su chiū mn̄g in, “Sī-án-chóaⁿ lín sim-lāi ū chit khoán pháiⁿ liām-thâu?
40009005	Tùi chit-ê lâng kóng ‘Lí ê chōe sià-bián lah’, á-sī kóng ‘Lí khí-lâi kiâⁿ’, tó chi̍t hāng khah kán-tan?
40009006	Put-kò góa beh hō͘ lín chai, Jîn-chú tī tōe-chiūⁿ ū sià-chōe ê koân-pèng.” Jiân-āu I tùi hit-ê poàn-sin-put-sūi ê lâng kóng, “Khí-lâi, giâ lí ê chhn̂g, tńg-khì lín tau!”
40009007	Hit-ê lâng chiū khí-lâi, tńg-khì in tau.
40009008	Chèng-lâng khòaⁿ-tio̍h chin tio̍h-kiaⁿ, kui êng-kng hō͘ Siōng-tè, in-ūi I ū chiong chit khoán koân-pèng sù hō͘ lâng.
40009009	Iâ-so͘ lī-khui hia ǹg thâu-chêng kiâⁿ ê sî khòaⁿ-tio̍h chi̍t ê lâng, miâ kiò-chòe [Má-thài], chē tī sè-koan. Iâ-so͘ kā i kóng, “Lâi tè góa!” I chiū khí-lâi tè I.
40009010	Iâ-so͘ tī [Má-thài] ê chhù chia̍h-pn̄g ê sî, ū chin chōe bau̍h-sè-ê kap chōe-jîn mā lâi kap Iâ-so͘ í-ki̍p I ê bûn-tô͘ chòe-hé chia̍h.
40009011	Hoat-lī-sài-phài ê lâng khòaⁿ-tio̍h chiū tùi I ê bûn-tô͘ kóng, “Sī-án-chóaⁿ lín lāu-su kap bau̍h-sè-ê í-ki̍p chōe-jîn chòe-hé chia̍h-pn̄g?”
40009012	Iâ-so͘ thiaⁿ-tio̍h chiū kóng, “Kiān-khong-ê bô su-iàu i-seng, phòa-pīⁿ-ê chiah ū su-iàu.
40009013	Lín khì ha̍k-si̍p chit kù Sèng-keng ê ōe: ‘Góa ài lîn-bín, bô ài chè-mi̍h.’ In-ūi góa lâi, m̄-sī beh chio gī-lâng, sī beh chio chōe-jîn.”
40009014	Ū chi̍t piàn, [Iok-hān] ê bûn-tô͘ lâi kìⁿ Iâ-so͘, tùi I kóng, “Goán kap Hoat-lī-sài-phài ê lâng siông-siông kìm-chia̍h, sī-án-chóaⁿ lí ê bûn-tô͘ bô kìm-chia̍h?”
40009015	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Sin-lông iáu kap hun-iàn ê lâng-kheh chòe-hé ê sî, lâng-kheh kiám ōe ai-siong? Ji̍t-chí teh-beh kàu, sin-lông ōe hō͘ lâng tùi in tiong-kan lia̍h-khì, hit sî in chiū ōe kìm-chia̍h.
40009016	“Bô-lâng ēng bô kiu-chúi ê pò͘ khì pó͘ kū-saⁿ, in-ūi pó͘-ê hit tè ōe kā saⁿ kiù-li̍h, tian-tò phòa koh-khah tōa khang.
40009017	Mā bô-lâng ēng sin chiú ji̍p tī kū phê-tē; nā án-ni, phê-tē ōe piak-phòa, chiú lâu chhut-lâi, phê-tē mā phòa-khì. Sin chiú eng-kai ji̍p tī sin phê-tē, án-ni nn̄g hāng chiū lóng pó-choân.”
40009018	Iâ-so͘ tùi in kóng chiah-ê ōe ê sî, ū chi̍t ê hōe-tn̂g ê chú-koán lâi kūi tī I ê bīn-chêng, kóng, “Góa ê cha-bó͘-kiáⁿ tú-á sí-khì, chhiáⁿ lí lâi kā i hōaⁿ-chhiú, i chiū ōe oa̍h khí-lâi.”
40009019	Iâ-so͘ chiū khí-lâi, tè i khì; I ê bûn-tô͘ mā khì.
40009020	Tú hit sî, ū chi̍t ê tì-tio̍h hiat-lāu-pīⁿ cha̍p-jī nî kú ê hū-jîn-lâng kiâⁿ óa-khì Iâ-so͘ ê āu-bīn, bong I saⁿ-á-ku ê chhiu.
40009021	In-ūi i sim-lāi siūⁿ, “Góa kan-ta bong-tio̍h I ê saⁿ, pīⁿ chiū ōe hó.”
40009022	Iâ-so͘ oa̍t kè-lâi khòaⁿ i, kā i kóng, “Cha-bó͘-kiáⁿ, an-sim; lí ê sìn-sim hō͘ lí hó-khì lah!” Hū-jîn-lâng sûi-sî tit-tio̍h i-hó.
40009023	Iâ-so͘ lâi-kàu hōe-tn̂g chú-koán ê chhù, khòaⁿ-tio̍h pûn-ta̍t-á-ê kap kui tōa-tīn lâng lōng-lōng-kún,
40009024	chiū kā in kóng, “Lín lóng chhut-khì, chit-ê cha-bó͘ gín-á bô sí, sī teh khùn.” In chiū kā I thí-chhiò.
40009025	Kóaⁿ kûn-chiòng chhut-khì liáu-āu, Iâ-so͘ ji̍p-khì cha-bó͘ gín-á ê pâng-keng, khan i ê chhiú, cha-bó͘ gín-á chiū khí-lâi.
40009026	Tùi án-ni, chit-ê siau-sit thoân kàu hit tōe-khu ê ta̍k só͘-chāi.
40009027	Iâ-so͘ lī-khui hia ê sî, ū nn̄g ê bông-jîn tè I khì; in tōa-siaⁿ hoah, “Tāi-pi̍t ê Kiáⁿ, lîn-bín goán!”
40009028	Iâ-so͘ ji̍p-khì chhù-lāi, bông-jîn chiū kiâⁿ óa-khì. Iâ-so͘ mn̄g in, “Lín sìn góa ōe-tàng kā lín chòe chit-ê tāi-chì sī-bô?” In ìn kóng, “Chú ah, lí ōe.”
40009029	Jiân-āu, Iâ-so͘ bong in ê ba̍k-chiu, kóng, “Chiàu lín ê sìn-sim hō͘ lín si̍t-hiān.”
40009030	In ê ba̍k-chiu chiū khui, ōe khòaⁿ-kìⁿ. Iâ-so͘ giâm-giâm hoan-hù in kóng, “Chhian-bān m̄-thang hō͘ lâng chai chit-ê tāi-chì.”
40009031	M̄-kú in chi̍t-ē chhut-khì, soah chiong Iâ-so͘ ê tāi-chì thoân-piàn hit tōe-khu ê ta̍k só͘-chāi.
40009032	In chhut-khì ê sî, ū lâng chhōa chi̍t ê hō͘ siâ-sîn hū-sin bōe kóng-ōe ê lâng lâi Iâ-so͘ hia.
40009033	Siâ-sîn chi̍t-ē hō͘ Iâ-so͘ kóaⁿ chhut-khì, hit-ê bōe kóng-ōe ê lâng chiū kóng-ōe. Kûn-chiòng lóng tio̍h-kiaⁿ, kóng, “Tī [Í-sek-lia̍t] goán m̄-bat khòaⁿ-tio̍h chit khoán tāi-chì.”
40009034	Put-kò Hoat-lī-sài-phài ê lâng kóng, “I sī khò kúi-ông teh kóaⁿ-kúi.”
40009035	Iâ-so͘ kiâⁿ-thàu chiu-ûi só͘-ū ê siâⁿ-chhī kap chng-siā, tī ta̍k ê hōe-tn̂g kà-sī lâng, thoân Thian-kok ê hok-im, i-hó ta̍k khoán ê chèng-thâu kap pīⁿ-thiàⁿ.
40009036	I khòaⁿ-tio̍h hiah tōa-tīn ê lâng, chiū khó-lîn in, in-ūi in chhin-chhiūⁿ iûⁿ bô bo̍k-chiá, khùn-khó͘, bô-lâng chiàu-kò͘.
40009037	Iâ-so͘ chiū tùi I ê bûn-tô͘ kóng, “Thang siu-sêng ê chin chōe, chòe-kang ê lâng chin chió.
40009038	Só͘-í, lín tio̍h kî-kiû koán siu-sêng ê Chú phài kang-lâng khì siu-sêng.”
40010001	Iâ-so͘ kiò I cha̍p-jī ê bûn-tô͘ lâi, hō͘ in ū koân-pèng thang kóaⁿ siâ-sîn, i-tī ta̍k khoán ê chèng-thâu kap pīⁿ-thiàⁿ.
40010002	Chit cha̍p-jī sù-tô͘ ê miâ chiū-sī chiah-ê: Tē-it sī [Se-bûn], mā kiò-chòe [Pí-tek], kap i ê sió-tī [An-tek-lia̍t]; [Se-pí-thài] ê kiáⁿ [Ngá-kok] kap i ê sió-tī [Iok-hān];
40010003	[Hui-le̍k] kap [Pa-to-lô-mái]; [To-má] kap bau̍h-sè ê [Má-thài]; [A-le̍k-hui] ê kiáⁿ [Ngá-kok] kap [Ta̍t-thài];
40010004	Kek-chìn-tóng ê [Se-bûn] kap chhut-bōe Iâ-so͘ hit-ê [Í-su-ka-lio̍k] ê [Iû-tāi].
40010005	Iâ-so͘ chhe chit cha̍p-jī sù-tô͘ chhut-khì, hoan-hù in kóng, “Lín m̄-thang khì Gōa-pang-lâng ê tōe-khu; m̄-thang chìn-ji̍p [Sat-má-lī-a]-lâng ê siâⁿ,
40010006	chí-ū tio̍h khì chhē [Í-sek-lia̍t]-ke sit-bê ê iûⁿ.
40010007	Lín khì ê sî tio̍h soan-iông kóng, ‘Thian-kok teh-beh si̍t-hiān lah!’
40010008	Lín tio̍h i-hó phòa-pīⁿ ê lâng, hō͘ sí-lâng koh-oa̍h, hō͘ bâ-hong pīⁿ-lâng chheng-khì, koh kóaⁿ-chhut siâ-sîn. Lín pe̍h-pe̍h tit-tio̍h, mā tio̍h pe̍h-pe̍h hō͘ lâng.
40010009	Io-tòa lāi-bīn m̄-bián tòa kim-pè, gûn-pè, á-sī tâng-pè;
40010010	chhut-mn̂g m̄-bián tòa lú-hêng-tē á-sī nn̄g niá lāi-saⁿ, mā m̄-bián tòa liâng-ôe á-sī gia̍h koáiⁿ-á; in-ūi kang-lâng tit-tio̍h chia̍h-mi̍h sī eng-kai.
40010011	“Lín bô-lūn ji̍p-khì tó chi̍t ê siâⁿ tó chi̍t ê chng-siā, tio̍h thàm-thiaⁿ khòaⁿ sím-mi̍h lâng goān-ì chiap-thāi lín, chiah khì tòa hia, tòa kàu lī-khui.
40010012	Lín ji̍p-khì chhù-lāi ê sî, tio̍h kā in chhéng-an.
40010013	Chit ke ê lâng nā goān-ì chiap-thāi lín, tio̍h chiong lín ê pêng-an hō͘ in; nā bô goān-ì chiap-thāi lín, tio̍h chiong pêng-an siu-hôe.
40010014	M̄ chiap-thāi lín, m̄-thiaⁿ lín ê ōe ê lâng, lín lī-khui hit keng chhù á-sī hit-ê siâⁿ ê sî, tio̍h chiong lín kha-ni̍h ê thô͘-hún pōaⁿ hō͘ i chheng-khì.
40010015	Góa si̍t-chāi kā lín kóng, tī Sím-phòaⁿ ê Ji̍t, [Só͘-to-má] kap [Gô-mô͘-la] ê tōe só͘ siū ê hêng-hoa̍t ōe pí hit-ê siâⁿ só͘ siū ê koh-khah hó jím-siū.”
40010016	“Tio̍h chai, góa chhe lín chhut-khì, chhin-chhiūⁿ sàng iûⁿ ji̍p-khì chhâi-lông ê tiong-kan. Só͘-í, tio̍h chhin-chhiūⁿ chôa hiah-ni̍h lêng-khiáu, chhin-chhiūⁿ hún-chiáu hiah-ni̍h sûn-liông.
40010017	Lín tio̍h tî-hông, in-ūi ū lâng ōe kā lín lia̍h-khì kau hō͘ gī-hōe, tī in ê hōe-tn̂g ēng piⁿ kā lín phah.
40010018	Koh ūi-tio̍h góa ê iân-kò͘, lín ōe hō͘ lâng thoa kàu chóng-tok kap kun-ông ê bīn-chêng, lâi tùi in kap Gōa-pang-lâng chòe kiàn-chèng.
40010019	M̄-kú, lín hō͘ lâng lia̍h-khì sím-mn̄g ê sî, m̄-bián hoân-ló beh án-chóaⁿ kóng, á-sī beh kóng sím-mi̍h; hit sî lín só͘ tio̍h kóng ê, ōe kā lín chí-sī,
40010020	in-ūi teh kóng ê m̄-sī lín ka-kī, sī lín Thiⁿ-pē ê Sîn thong-kè lín teh kóng.
40010021	“Hiaⁿ-tī ōe chhut-bōe hiaⁿ-tī, hō͘ i sí; lāu-pē mā ōe án-ni tùi-thāi kiáⁿ-jî. Kiáⁿ-jî ōe khí-lâi kong-kek pē-bú, kā in hāi-sí.
40010022	Lín ōe ūi-tio̍h góa ê miâ siū chèng-lâng oàn-hūn, put-kò jím-nāi kàu chòe-āu ê ōe tit-tio̍h kiù.
40010023	In tī chit-ê siâⁿ pek-hāi lín, tio̍h tô-cháu khì pa̍t ê siâⁿ. Góa si̍t-chāi kā lín kóng, [Í-sek-lia̍t] ê siâⁿ-chhī lín kiâⁿ iáu-bē thàu, Jîn-chú chiū lâi!
40010024	“Ha̍k-seng bōe chhiau-kè lāu-su; lô͘-po̍k mā bōe chhiau-kè chú-lâng.
40010025	Ha̍k-seng kap lāu-su kâng-khoán, lô͘-po̍k kap chú-lâng kâng-khoán, án-ni chiū ū-kàu. Lâng to kā chit ke ê chú-lâng kiò-chòe [Pia̍t-se-pok], hô-hòng i ke-lāi ê lâng.”
40010026	“Só͘-í, m̄-bián kiaⁿ in; in-ūi bô chi̍t hāng khàm-ba̍t ê bōe lō͘-hiān; mā bô chi̍t hāng pì-bi̍t ê bōe hō͘ lâng chai.
40010027	Góa tī àm-tiong kā lín kóng ê, lín tio̍h tī kng-bêng-tiong kóng chhut-lâi; lín tī hīⁿ-khang-piⁿ thiaⁿ-tio̍h ê, tio̍h tī chhù-bé-téng soan-pò͘.
40010028	Ōe hāi-sí seng-khu khiok bōe hāi-sí lêng-hûn ê, lín m̄-bián kiaⁿ; tian-tò tio̍h kiaⁿ ōe chiong lêng-hûn kap seng-khu hiat-lo̍h tōe-ge̍k húi-bia̍t hit-ūi Siōng-tè.
40010029	Nn̄g chiah chhek-chiáu-á kiám m̄-sī bōe chi̍t kak gûn nā-tiāⁿ? Lín ê Thiⁿ-pē nā bô ún-chún, liân chi̍t chiah to bōe poa̍h-lo̍h tōe.
40010030	Lín leh, liân lín ê thâu-mn̂g to lóng ū sǹg kè.
40010031	Só͘-í, m̄-bián kiaⁿ, lín pí kui-kûn chhek-chiáu-á koh-khah kùi-tiōng!”
40010032	“Só͘-í, tī lâng ê bīn-chêng soan-jīn góa ê, góa tī góa Thiⁿ-pē ê bīn-chêng mā ōe jīn i.
40010033	Tī lâng ê bīn-chêng m̄-jīn góa ê, góa tī góa Thiⁿ-pē ê bīn-chêng mā m̄-jīn i.”
40010034	“M̄-thang siūⁿ-kóng góa lâi sī beh tòa hô-pêng hō͘ tōe-chiūⁿ; góa tòa-lâi ê m̄-sī hô-pêng, sī to-kiàm.
40010035	In-ūi góa lâi sī beh hō͘ lâng hun-lia̍t: lâng tùi-khòng lāu-pē, cha-bó͘-kiáⁿ tùi-khòng lāu-bú, sim-pū tùi-khòng ta-ke.
40010036	Lâng ê tùi-te̍k sī ka-kī ke-lāi ê lâng.
40010037	“Thiàⁿ pē-bú iâⁿ-kè thiàⁿ góa ê, bô chu-keh tè góa; thiàⁿ kiáⁿ á-sī cha-bó͘-kiáⁿ iâⁿ-kè thiàⁿ góa ê, bô chu-keh tè góa.
40010038	M̄ giâ ka-kī ê si̍p-jī-kè lâi tè góa ê, mā bô chu-keh tè góa.
40010039	Beh tit-tio̍h ka-kī ê sìⁿ-miā ê, ōe sòng-sit sìⁿ-miā; ūi-tio̍h góa sòng-sit ka-kī ê sìⁿ-miā ê, ōe tit-tio̍h sìⁿ-miā.”
40010040	“Chiap-la̍p lín ê chiū-sī chiap-la̍p góa; chiap-la̍p góa ê chiū-sī chiap-la̍p chhe góa lâi Hit-ūi.
40010041	Chiap-la̍p sian-ti chòe sian-ti ê, ōe tit-tio̍h sian-ti èng-tit ê pò-siúⁿ; chiap-la̍p gī-lâng chòe gī-lâng ê, ōe tit-tio̍h gī-lâng èng-tit ê pò-siúⁿ.
40010042	Góa si̍t-chāi kā lín kóng, bô-lūn sím-mi̍h lâng, kan-ta the̍h chi̍t poe léng-chúi hō͘ chiah-ê siōng bî-sòe ê chi̍t ê lim, in-ūi siōng bî-sòe-ê sī góa ê bûn-tô͘, chit-ê lâng it-tēng ōe tit-tio̍h pò-siúⁿ.”
40011001	Iâ-so͘ kà-sī cha̍p-jī ê bûn-tô͘ í-āu lī-khui hit só͘-chāi, khì hù-kūn ê siâⁿ-chhī kà-sī lâng kap thoân hok-im.
40011002	[Iok-hān] tī kaⁿ-ni̍h thiaⁿ-tio̍h Ki-tok só͘ chòe ê sū, chiū chhe i ê bûn-tô͘ khì
40011003	mn̄g I, “Lí chiū-sī teh-beh lâi Hit-ūi, á-sī goán tio̍h thèng-hāu pa̍t-lâng?”
40011004	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Lín chiong só͘ thiaⁿ-tio̍h, só͘ khòaⁿ-tio̍h ê khì kā [Iok-hān] kóng,
40011005	chiū-sī sit-bêng ê lâng koh khòaⁿ-kìⁿ, kha pái ê lâng kiâⁿ-lō͘, bâ-hong pīⁿ-lâng chheng-khì, hīⁿ-khang bōe thiaⁿ-kìⁿ ê lâng thiaⁿ-kìⁿ, sí-lâng koh-oa̍h, sàn-chhiah-lâng ū hó siau-sit thoân hō͘ in.
40011006	Tùi góa bô sit-khì sìn-sim ê lâng chin ū hok-khì!”
40011007	[Iok-hān] ê bûn-tô͘ lī-khui liáu-āu, Iâ-so͘ chiah tùi kûn-chiòng kóng-khí [Iok-hān] ê sū. I kóng, “Lín chhut-khì khòng-iá sī beh khòaⁿ sím-mi̍h? Beh khòaⁿ hō͘ hong chhe iô-lâi iô-khì ê lô͘-úi sī-bô?
40011008	Nā m̄-sī, lín chhut-khì beh khòaⁿ sím-mi̍h? Beh khòaⁿ chhēng ko-kùi i-ho̍k ê lâng sī-bô? Lín khòaⁿ, chhēng ko-kùi i-ho̍k ê lâng sī tī ông-kiong.
40011009	Án-ni, lín chhut-khì beh khòaⁿ sím-mi̍h? Beh khòaⁿ sian-ti sī-bô? Sī, m̄-kú góa kā lín kóng, i pí sian-ti koh-khah úi-tāi.
40011010	Koan-hē [Iok-hān], Sèng-keng ū án-ni kì-chài: Khòaⁿ ah, góa chhe góa ê sù-chiá chòe lí ê sian-hong; i beh tī lí ê thâu-chêng kā lí khui-lō͘.
40011011	“Góa si̍t-chāi kā lín kóng, hū-jîn-lâng só͘ siⁿ ê bô-lâng pí [Iok-hān] khah úi-tāi; m̄-kú, tī Thian-kok siōng bî-sòe-ê iáu pí i koh-khah úi-tāi.
40011012	Tùi Si-sóe-chiá [Iok-hān] ê ji̍t kàu hiān-chāi, Thian-kok it-ti̍t siū kiông-lia̍t ê kong-kek, hiong-béng ê lâng ēng pō-le̍k kā i chhiúⁿ-khì.
40011013	Sian-ti kap Lu̍t-hoat só͘-ū ê ū-giân kàu [Iok-hān] ûi-chí.
40011014	Lín nā goān-ì chiap-siū chiah-ê ū-giân, chiū ōe bêng-pe̍k [Iok-hān] chiū-sī hit-ê teh-beh lâi ê [Í-lī-a].
40011015	Ū hī-khang ê, tio̍h thiaⁿ!
40011016	“Góa beh ēng sím-mi̍h pí-phēng chit sè-tāi? In chhin-chhiūⁿ chi̍t tīn gín-á chē tī chhī-tiûⁿ-kháu tùi lēng-gōa chi̍t tīn hoah:
40011017	Goán tùi lín pûn phín-á, lín bô thiàu-bú! Goán thî-khàu, lín mā bô pi-siong!
40011018	[Iok-hān] lâi, bô chia̍h bô lim, lâng chiū kóng, ‘I hō͘ kúi hū-sin!’
40011019	Jîn-chú lâi, mā chia̍h mā lim, lâng chiū kóng, ‘I sī tham-chia̍h hò͘ⁿ-chiú ê lâng, sī bau̍h-sè-ê kap chōe-jîn ê pêng-iú!’ Put-kò, si̍t-chāi ê tì-hūi tùi hêng-ûi tit-tio̍h chèng-si̍t.”
40011020	Iâ-so͘ ū tī chi̍t-kóa siâⁿ-chhī kiâⁿ chin chōe sîn-jiah, m̄-kú hiah-ê siâⁿ-chhī ê lâng lóng bô hóe-kái, I chiū kā in chek-pī.
40011021	I kóng, “[Ko-lia̍p-sìn], lí chhám à! [Pek-sài-tāi], lí chhám à! Góa tī lín tiong-kan kiâⁿ ê sîn-jiah nā tī [Thài-ní] kap [Se-tùn] kiâⁿ, in chá chiū chhēng môa-saⁿ sám hé-hu hóe-kái lah.
40011022	Góa kā lín kóng ô͘, tī Sím-phòaⁿ ê Ji̍t, [Thài-ní] kap [Se-tùn] siū ê hêng-hoa̍t pí lín tio̍h siū ê khah hó jím-siū.
40011023	Lí leh, [Ka-pek-lông], Lí ài lâng kā lí hû chiūⁿ-thiⁿ sī-bô? Bōe, Siōng-tè ōe kā lí hiat-lo̍h im-kan. Tī lí hia kiâⁿ ê sîn-jiah nā tī [Só͘-to-má] kiâⁿ, [Só͘-to-má] it-tēng iáu lâu kàu kin-á-ji̍t.
40011024	Chóng-sī góa kā lín kóng, tī Sím-phòaⁿ ê Ji̍t, [Só͘-to-má] tōe-khu siū ê hêng-hoa̍t pí lí tio̍h siū ê khah hó jím-siū.”
40011025	Hit sî, Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Pē ah, thiⁿ-tōe ê Chú, góa kám-siā lí, in-ūi lí chiong chiah-ê sū tùi ū tì-hūi ū ha̍k-būn ê lâng khàm khí-lâi, khiok tùi sòe-hàn gín-á khé-sī.
40011026	Pē ah, sī lah, in-ūi che sī lí ê hó chí-ì.
40011027	“Góa ê Pē í-keng ū chiong it-chhè lóng kau-thok góa. Pē í-gōa bô-lâng bat Kiáⁿ; Kiáⁿ kap Kiáⁿ ài-beh khé-sī ê lâng í-gōa mā bô-lâng bat Pē.
40011028	“Lô-khó͘ pē tāng-tàⁿ ê lâng lóng tio̍h lâi góa chia, góa beh hō͘ lín an-hioh.
40011029	Tio̍h pē góa ê taⁿ, tùi góa lâi o̍h, in-ūi góa ê sim un-jiû khiam-sùn, lín ê sim-sîn chiū ōe tit-tio̍h an-hioh.
40011030	In-ūi góa ê taⁿ ha̍h-ēng, góa ê tàⁿ chin khin.”
40012001	Kè bô jōa kú, tī An-hioh-ji̍t Iâ-so͘ tùi be̍h-hn̂g keng-kè. I ê bûn-tô͘ pak-tó͘ iau, chiū tiah be̍h-sūi lâi chia̍h.
40012002	Hoat-lī-sài-phài ê lâng khòaⁿ-tio̍h, tùi Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Lí khòaⁿ, lí ê bûn-tô͘ tī An-hioh-ji̍t chòe bōe ēng-tit chòe ê tāi-chì.”
40012003	Iâ-so͘ kā in kóng, “Lín kiám bô tha̍k-tio̍h [Tāi-pi̍t] kap tè i ê lâng pak-tó͘ iau ê sî só͘ chòe ê tāi-chì?
40012004	I ji̍p-khì Siōng-tè ê tiān chia̍h hiàn-chè ê piáⁿ, chit khoán piáⁿ chí-ū chè-si chiah thang chia̍h, i kap tè i ê lâng lóng bōe ēng-tit chia̍h.
40012005	Lēng-gōa, lín kiám bô tha̍k-tio̍h Lu̍t-hoat ê kì-chài, chiū-sī An-hioh-ji̍t chè-si tī Sèng-tiān hoān-tio̍h An-hioh-ji̍t ê kui-kú mā sǹg bô-chōe.
40012006	Góa kā lín kóng, tī chia ū chi̍t ê pí Sèng-tiān khah tiōng-iàu ê.
40012007	Sèng-keng ū kóng, ‘Góa ài lîn-bín, bô ài chè-mi̍h.’ Lín nā liáu-kái chit kù ōe ê ì-sù, chiū bōe kā bô-chōe ê lâng tēng-chōe.
40012008	In-ūi Jîn-chú sī An-hioh-ji̍t ê Chú.”

40012010	Tú-hó ū chi̍t ê chi̍t ki chhiú khê-khì ê lâng tī-hia. Ū chi̍t-kóa lâng siūⁿ-beh khòng-kò Iâ-so͘, chiū mn̄g I kóng, “Tī An-hioh-ji̍t i-pīⁿ ū ha̍h Lu̍t-hoat bô?”
40012011	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Lín tiong-kan ū lâng ū chi̍t chiah iûⁿ, tú-hó tī An-hioh-ji̍t poa̍h-lo̍h khut-á, i kiám bōe kā i khiú khí-lâi?
40012012	Lâng pí iûⁿ ke jōa-á-ni̍h kùi-tiōng! Só͘-í, tī An-hioh-ji̍t chòe hó-sū ū ha̍h Lu̍t-hoat.”
40012013	Iâ-so͘ chiū kā hit-ê lâng kóng, “Chhiú chhun chhut-lâi!” Chit-ê lâng chhiú chhun chhut-lâi, chiū ho̍k-goân, oân-choân hó-khì, kap lēng-gōa hit ki chhiú kâng-khoán.
40012014	[Hoat-lī-sài]-phài ê lâng chhut-khì, chiū kè-bô͘ beh tùi-hù Iâ-so͘, khòaⁿ beh án-chóaⁿ kā I hāi-sí.
40012015	Iâ-so͘ chai-iáⁿ in ê kè-bô͘ chiū lī-khui hia; ū chin chōe lâng tè I khì, I chiū i-hó in tiong-kan só͘-ū ê pīⁿ-lâng.
40012016	I bēng-lēng in m̄-thang tùi lâng pò-iông I ê tāi-chì.
40012017	Che sī beh èng-giām thong-kè sian-ti [Í-sài-a] só͘ kóng ê ōe:
40012018	Lín khòaⁿ, góa só͘ kéng-soán ê lô͘-po̍k, góa só͘ thiàⁿ, só͘ ì-ài ê. Góa beh sù góa ê Sîn hō͘ I; I beh tùi bān-bîn soan-kò góa ê kong-gī.
40012019	I bōe cheng-piān, bōe soan-jióng; tī koe-lō͘ bô-lâng ōe thiaⁿ-tio̍h I ê siaⁿ.
40012020	Siū-siong ê lô͘-úi, I bōe at-chi̍h; beh hoa ê teng-hé, I bōe pûn-sit, ti̍t-kàu I hō͘ kong-gī tek-sèng.
40012021	Bān-bîn lóng ōe chiong ǹg-bāng kau-thok I.
40012022	Hit sî, ū lâng chhōa chi̍t ê hō͘ kúi hū-sin, sit-bêng koh bōe-kóng-ōe ê lâng lâi Iâ-so͘ hia; Iâ-so͘ kā i i-hó, hit-ê bōe-kóng-ōe ê lâng chiū ōe kóng-ōe, koh ōe khòaⁿ-kìⁿ.
40012023	Kûn-chiòng lóng chin tio̍h-kiaⁿ, kóng, “Chit-ê lâng káⁿ sī [Tāi-pi̍t] ê Kiáⁿ hò͘ⁿ?”
40012024	Hoat-lī-sài-phài ê lâng thiaⁿ-tio̍h chiū kóng, “Chit-ê lâng sī khò kúi-ông [Pia̍t-se-pok] teh kóaⁿ-kúi.”
40012025	Iâ-so͘ chai-iáⁿ in ê sim-su chiū kā in kóng, “Kok-ka ka-kī hun-cheng, ōe hong-hòe; siâⁿ-chhī á-sī ka-têng ka-kī hun-cheng, khiā bōe-tiâu.
40012026	Sat-tàn nā kóaⁿ Sat-tàn, sī ka-kī hun-cheng, i ê kok beh-ná khiā ōe-tiâu?
40012027	Góa nā khò [Pia̍t-se-pok] kóaⁿ-kúi, lín ê chú-tē sī khò sím-mi̍h âng kóaⁿ-kúi? Án-ni, lín ka-kī ê chú-tē ōe kā lín phòaⁿ-chōe.
40012028	Put-kò góa nā-sī khò Siōng-tè ê Sîn kóaⁿ-kúi, Siōng-tè ê chú-koân chiū í-keng tī lín tiong-kan si̍t-hiān lah.
40012029	“Lâng án-chóaⁿ chiah ōe-tàng ji̍p-khì ióng-sū ê chhù chhiúⁿ i ê châi-bu̍t, kiám m̄-sī tio̍h seng kā i pa̍k khí-lâi?
40012030	“Bô ūi góa ê chiū-sī hoán-tùi góa; bô kap góa chòe-hé siu-chi̍p ê chiū-sī teh phah-sòaⁿ.
40012031	Só͘-í, góa kā lín kóng, lâng it-chhè ê chōe kap húi-pòng lóng ōe tit-tio̍h sià-bián, m̄-kú siat-to̍k Sèng Sîn bōe tit-tio̍h sià-bián.
40012032	Bô-lūn sím-mi̍h lâng kóng-ōe kong-kek Jîn-chú, ōe tit-tio̍h sià-bián, m̄-kú bô-lūn sím-mi̍h lâng kóng-ōe kong-kek Sèng Sîn, tī kim-sè kap lâi-sè lóng bōe tit-tio̍h sià-bián.”
40012033	“Hó-chhiū kiat hó ké-chí; pháiⁿ-chhiū kiat pháiⁿ ké-chí; tùi só͘ kiat ê ké-chí thang chai chhiū ê hó-pháiⁿ.
40012034	Lín chiah-ê to̍k-chôa, lín pún-lâi sī pháiⁿ ê, beh ná-ōe kóng hó-ōe? In-ūi lâng sim-lāi chhiong-móa sím-mi̍h, chhùi chiū kóng sím-mi̍h.
40012035	Hó-lâng tùi só͘ chek-chū ê hó hoat-chhut hó; pháiⁿ-lâng tùi só͘ chek-chū ê pháiⁿ hoat-chhut pháiⁿ.
40012036	“Góa kā lín kóng, lâng só͘ kóng it-chhè ê êng-á-ōe, tī Sím-phòaⁿ ê Ji̍t ta̍k kù lóng tio̍h hū-chek.
40012037	In-ūi Siōng-tè beh ēng lí ê ōe lâi phòaⁿ lí bô-chōe, mā beh ēng lí ê ōe lâi tēng lí ū-chōe.”
40012038	Hit sî, ū kúi-nā ê keng-ha̍k-kàu-su kap Hoat-lī-sài-phài ê lâng tùi Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Lāu-su, goán ài lí kiâⁿ chi̍t ê sîn-jiah hō͘ goán khòaⁿ.”
40012039	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Siâ-ok kan-îm ê sè-tāi iau-kiû sîn-jiah, tû-liáu sian-ti [Iok-ná] ê sîn-jiah, bōe-koh ū sîn-jiah hō͘ in.
40012040	Chhin-chhiūⁿ [Iok-ná] saⁿ mî saⁿ ji̍t tī tōa-hî ê pak-tó͘ lāi, Jîn-chú mā ōe saⁿ mî saⁿ ji̍t tī tōe chhim ê só͘-chāi.
40012041	Tī Sím-phòaⁿ ê sî, [Nî-nî-bî]-lâng ōe kap chit sè-tāi ê lâng chòe-hé khí-lâi, kā chit sè-tāi ê lâng tēng-chōe, in-ūi in thiaⁿ-tio̍h [Iok-ná] ê thoân-tō ū hóe-kái. Lín khòaⁿ, ū pí [Iok-ná] koh-khah úi-tāi-ê tī chia!
40012042	Tī Sím-phòaⁿ ê sî, Lâm-hng ê lú-ông ōe kap chit sè-tāi ê lâng chòe-hé khí-lâi, kā chit sè-tāi ê lâng tēng-chōe, in-ūi i ū tùi tōe ê ke̍k-thâu lâi thiaⁿ [Só͘-lô-bûn] tì-hūi ê ōe. Lín khòaⁿ, ū pí [Só͘-lô-bûn] koh-khah úi-tāi-ê tī chia!”
40012043	“Siâ-sîn lī-khui só͘ hū-sin ê lâng liáu-āu, kiâⁿ-thàu bô-chúi ê tōe-khu, beh chhē chi̍t ê hioh-khùn ê só͘-chāi, chhē lóng bô,
40012044	chiū kóng, ‘Góa beh tńg-khì góa chhut-lâi hit keng chhù.’ I tńg-khì, khòaⁿ-tio̍h chhù khang-khang, sàu-kah chin chheng-khì, koh chéng-lí hó-sè.
40012045	Āu-lâi, i khì chhōa chhit ê pí i khah pháiⁿ ê siâ-sîn kap i chòe-hé lâi, ji̍p-khì hia tòa. Án-ni, hit-ê lâng ê kiat-kio̍k pí khí-thâu koh-khah chhám. Chit-ê siâ-ok ê sè-tāi mā ōe chhin-chhiūⁿ án-ni.”
40012046	Iâ-so͘ iáu teh tùi chèng-lâng kóng-ōe ê sî, I ê lāu-bú kap hiaⁿ-tī lâi khiā tī gōa-bīn, ài-beh kap I kóng-ōe.
40012047	Ū lâng kā Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Lí khòaⁿ leh, lí ê lāu-bú kap hiaⁿ-tī khiā tī gōa-bīn, ài-beh kap lí kóng-ōe.”
40012048	Iâ-so͘ kā hit-ê lâng kóng, “Sím-mi̍h lâng sī góa ê lāu-bú? Sím-mi̍h lâng sī góa ê hiaⁿ-tī?”
40012049	Jiân-āu I chhun-chhiú kí I ê bûn-tô͘ kóng, “Lín khòaⁿ, góa ê lāu-bú, góa ê hiaⁿ-tī.
40012050	Si̍t-hêng góa Thiⁿ-pē chí-ì ê lâng chiū-sī góa ê hiaⁿ-tī, chí-bē, kap lāu-bú.”
40013001	Siâng hit ji̍t, Iâ-so͘ tùi chhù-ni̍h chhut-khì, tī ô͘-piⁿ chē.
40013002	Ū chi̍t tōa-tīn lâng chū-chi̍p óa-lâi I hia, I soah tio̍h khì chē tī chûn-téng, kui tōa-tīn lâng lóng khiā tī hōaⁿ-téng.

40013004	I iā ê sî, ū-ê chéng-chí lak tī lō͘-piⁿ, chiáu-á pe lâi, kā chéng-chí chia̍h liáu-liáu.
40013005	Ū-ê lak tī chio̍h-thâu tōe, thô͘ chió ê só͘-chāi, in-ūi thô͘ bô chhim, chin kín chiū puh-gê;
40013006	put-kò ji̍t-thâu chi̍t-ē chhut, kā in pha̍k-tio̍h, in-ūi bô kun chiū ta-khì.
40013007	Ū-ê lak tī chhì-phè lāi, chhì-á tōa-châng khí-lâi chiū kā in hip-sí.
40013008	Put-kò ū-ê lak tī hó thó͘-tōe, chiū kiat-si̍t; ū-ê chi̍t-pah pē, ū-ê la̍k-cha̍p pē, ū-ê saⁿ-cha̍p pē.
40013009	Ū hī-khang ê, tio̍h thiaⁿ!”
40013010	Bûn-tô͘ lâi mn̄g Iâ-so͘, “Sī-án-chóaⁿ lí tùi kûn-chiòng lóng ēng phì-jū kā in kóng?”

40013013	Ūi-tio̍h chit-ê iân-kò͘, góa ēng phì-jū tùi in kóng, in-ūi: In khòaⁿ mā khòaⁿ bô, thiaⁿ mā thiaⁿ bô, koh bōe liáu-kái.
40013014	[Í-sài-a] ê ū-giân tú tī in sin-chiūⁿ èng-giām: Lín thiaⁿ koh thiaⁿ mā bōe liáu-kái; lín khòaⁿ koh khòaⁿ mā bōe khòaⁿ-kìⁿ.
40013015	In-ūi chit-ê chú-bîn ê sim í-keng tūn, hī-khang tāng, ba̍k-chiu khoeh. Nā m̄-sī án-ni, in ê ba̍k-chiu ōe khòaⁿ-kìⁿ, hī-khang ōe thiaⁿ-kìⁿ, sim ōe hiáu-ngō͘, ōe hôe-sim tńg-ì, góa chiū kā in i-hó.
40013016	“M̄-kú lín chin ū hok-khì, in-ūi lín ba̍k-chiu ū khòaⁿ-kìⁿ, hīⁿ-khang ū thiaⁿ-kìⁿ.
40013017	Góa si̍t-chāi kā lín kóng, í-chêng ū chin chōe sian-ti kap gī-lâng ài-beh khòaⁿ lín só͘ khòaⁿ-kìⁿ ê ia̍h bô khòaⁿ-tio̍h, beh thiaⁿ lín só͘ thiaⁿ-kìⁿ ê ia̍h bô thiaⁿ-tio̍h.”
40013018	“Só͘-í, lín tio̍h chù-ì thiaⁿ chit-ê iā chéng-chí ê phì-jū.
40013019	Só͘-ū thiaⁿ-tio̍h Thian-kok ê sìn-sit bô bêng-pe̍k ê, sī chhin-chhiūⁿ iā tī lō͘-piⁿ ê chéng-chí, hit-ê Siâ-ok-chiá lâi, kā iā tī i sim-lāi ê chéng-chí chhiúⁿ-khì.
40013020	Iā tī chio̍h-thâu tōe ê, sī chí lâng thiaⁿ-tio̍h sìn-sit, sûi-sî hoaⁿ-hí chiap-siū,
40013021	m̄-kú tī i ê sim-lāi tèng-kun bô chhim, tòng bōe kú, chi̍t-ē ūi-tio̍h sìn-sit tú-tio̍h hoān-lān á-sī pek-hāi, sûi-sî chiū pàng-sak.
40013022	Iā tī chhì-phè lāi ê, sī chí lâng thiaⁿ-tio̍h sìn-sit liáu-āu, seng-oa̍h ê khòa-lū kap chîⁿ-châi ê bê-he̍k kā só͘ thiaⁿ-tio̍h ê sìn-sit hip-sí, soah bōe kiat-si̍t.
40013023	Iā tī hó thó͘-tōe ê, sī chí lâng thiaⁿ-tio̍h sìn-sit, ū liáu-kái, chin-chiàⁿ ū kiat-si̍t; ū-ê chi̍t-pah pē, ū-ê la̍k-cha̍p pē, ū-ê saⁿ-cha̍p pē.”
40013024	Iâ-so͘ koh tùi in kóng chi̍t ê phì-jū: “Thian-kok thang phì-jū chòe ū chi̍t ê lâng iā hó chéng-chí tī ka-kī ê hn̂g-ni̍h.
40013025	Lâng teh khùn ê sî, tùi-te̍k lâi, chiong phōe-á iā tī be̍h-á ê tiong-kan, chiū lī-khui.
40013026	Be̍h-á hoat khí-lâi, chhut-sūi ê sî, phōe-á mā hoat chhut-lâi.
40013027	Lô͘-po̍k lâi kìⁿ i ê chú-lâng kóng, ‘Thâu-ke, lí kiám m̄-sī iā hó ê chéng-chí tī hn̂g-ni̍h? Ná-ōe ū chiah-ê phōe-á?’
40013028	Chú-lâng ìn kóng, ‘Che sī tùi-te̍k chòe ê lah.’ Lô͘-po̍k kóng, ‘Án-ni, goán lâi-khì kā hiah-ê phōe-á khau khí-lâi hó-bô?’
40013029	Chú-lâng ìn kóng, ‘M̄-hó, lín khau phōe-á ê sî, m̄ tú-hó liân be̍h-á soah khau-khau khí-lâi.
40013030	Hō͘ phōe-á kap be̍h-á tâng-chôe tōa-châng, siu-sêng ê sî góa chiah hoan-hù siu-koah ê lâng seng kā phōe-á khau khí-lâi, khún kui-pé khì sio, jiân-āu kā be̍h-á siu ji̍p-khì góa ê chhng-khò͘.’ ”
40013031	Iâ-so͘ koh kā in kóng chi̍t ê phì-jū: “Thian-kok chhin-chhiūⁿ chi̍t lia̍p kòa-chhài-chí, lâng kā i the̍h-khì iā tī ka-kī ê hn̂g-ni̍h.
40013032	Kòa-chhài-chí sī só͘-ū chéng-chí tiong siōng sòe-lia̍p ê, tōa-châng khí-lâi, pí só͘-ū ê chhài-soe koh-khah tōa-châng, chiâⁿ-chòe chi̍t châng chhiū, liân khong-tiong ê chiáu-á to lâi tī chhiū-ki chòe siū.”
40013033	Iâ-so͘ koh kā in kóng chi̍t ê phì-jū: “Thian-kok chhin-chhiūⁿ kàⁿ-bú, ū chi̍t ê hū-jîn-lâng the̍h-khì lām tī saⁿ táu mī-hún chòe-hé chhiau, chòe-āu kui-ē lóng hoat khí-lâi.”
40013034	Chiah-ê it-chhè ê kà-sī Iâ-so͘ lóng ēng phì-jū tùi chèng-lâng kóng; I bô ēng pa̍t khoán ê hong-sek, chí-ū ēng phì-jū tùi in kóng.
40013035	I án-ni chòe sī beh èng-giām Chú thong-kè sian-ti só͘ kóng ê ōe: Góa beh khui-chhùi kóng phì-jū, kóng chhòng-sè í-lâi ún-ba̍t ê sū.
40013036	Iâ-so͘ lī-khui chèng-lâng, ji̍p-khì chhù-lāi. I ê bûn-tô͘ lâi kā I kóng, “Chhiáⁿ kā goán kóe-seh hn̂g-ni̍h ê phōe-á ê phì-jū.”

40013038	hn̂g sī sè-kài; hó chéng-chí sī Thian-kok ê kiáⁿ-jî; phōe-á sī hit-ê Siâ-ok-chiá ê kiáⁿ-jî;
40013039	iā phōe-á hit-ê te̍k-jîn sī Mô͘-kúi; siu-koah sī chí kim-sè ê chiong-kio̍k; siu-koah-ê sī thiⁿ-sài.
40013040	Tī kim-sè ê chiong-kio̍k, pháiⁿ-lâng ōe chhin-chhiūⁿ phōe-á hō͘ lâng khioh kui-pé ēng hé kā i sio.
40013041	Jîn-chú ōe chhe I ê thiⁿ-sài lâi, tùi I ê kok-lāi chiong it-chhè hō͘ lâng poa̍h-tó hoān-chōe kap put-hoat ê lâng lóng lia̍h-lâi,
40013042	kā in hiat-lo̍h hé-lô͘, tī hia in ōe thî-khàu, kā-gê chhiat-chhí.
40013043	Hit sî, gī-lâng tī in ê Pē ê Kok-tō͘ ōe chhin-chhiūⁿ ji̍t-thâu hoat-kng. Ū hī-khang ê, tio̍h thiaⁿ!”
40013044	“Thian-kok chhin-chhiūⁿ pó-pòe chhàng tī hn̂g-ni̍h, ū lâng chhē-tio̍h, kā i khàm khí-lâi, chin hoaⁿ-hí khì bōe it-chhè só͘-ū ê lâi bóe hit khu hn̂g.
40013045	“Thian-kok mā chhin-chhiūⁿ chi̍t ê seng-lí-lâng teh chhē súi ê chin-chu.
40013046	I chi̍t-ē chhē-tio̍h chi̍t lia̍p chin ta̍t-chîⁿ ê chin-chu, chiū khì bōe it-chhè só͘-ū ê lâi bóe hit lia̍p chin-chu.”
40013047	“Thian-kok mā chhin-chhiūⁿ lâng tī ô͘-ni̍h pha-bāng, lia̍h ta̍k khoán hî;
40013048	bāng móa chiū thoa chiūⁿ-hōaⁿ, chē lo̍h-lâi, kéng hó-ê khǹg lo̍h-khì tháng-á lāi, bái-ê hiat-ka̍k.
40013049	Kim-sè ê chiong-kio̍k mā chhin-chhiūⁿ án-ni; thiⁿ-sài beh chhut-khì, tùi gī-lâng ê tiong-kan kā pháiⁿ-lâng hun-pia̍t chhut-lâi,
40013050	hiat-lo̍h hé-lô͘; tī hia in ōe thî-khàu, kā-gê chhiat-chhí.”
40013051	Iâ-so͘ mn̄g I ê bûn-tô͘ kóng, “Chiah-ê lín lóng ū bêng-pe̍k bô?” In ìn kóng, “Ū.”
40013052	I chiū kā in kóng, “Só͘-í, ta̍k ê ha̍k-si̍p Thian-kok tō-lí ê keng-ha̍k-kàu-su, chhin-chhiūⁿ chi̍t ke ê chú-lâng tùi chhng-khò͘ kā sin kap kū ê mi̍h-kiāⁿ lóng poaⁿ chhut-lâi.”
40013053	Iâ-so͘ kóng chiah-ê phì-jū liáu-āu lī-khui hia,
40013054	tò-khì ka-kī ê kò͘-hiong. I tī in ê hōe-tn̂g kà-sī lâng, in lóng chin tio̍h-kiaⁿ, kóng, “Chit-ê lâng tùi tó-ūi tit-tio̍h chit khoán ê tì-hūi kap kiâⁿ sîn-jiah ê khùi-la̍t?
40013055	I kiám m̄-sī hit-ê ba̍k-chhiūⁿ ê kiáⁿ? I ê lāu-bú kiám m̄-sī kiò-chòe [Má-lī-a]? I ê hiaⁿ-tī kiám m̄-sī [Ngá-kok], [Iok-sek], [Se-bûn], kap [Iû-tāi]?
40013056	I ê sió-bē kiám m̄-sī lóng kap lán tī chia? Án-ni, chit-ê lâng tùi tó-ūi tit-tio̍h chit khoán ê tì-hūi kap khùi-la̍t?”
40013057	In soah tùi Iâ-so͘ khí hoán-kám. Iâ-so͘ kā in kóng, “Sian-ti tī ka-kī ê kò͘-hiong ka-kī ê ka-cho̍k í-gōa, it-tēng ōe siū chun-tiōng.”
40013058	In-ūi in m̄-sìn, Iâ-so͘ tī hia bô kiâⁿ chin chōe sîn-jiah.
40014001	Hit sî, [Ka-lī-lī] hun-hong ê ông [Hi-lu̍t] thiaⁿ-tio̍h Iâ-so͘ ê miâ-siaⁿ,
40014002	chiū tùi i ê pō͘-hā kóng, “Chit-ê lâng sī Si-sóe-chiá [Iok-hān], i í-keng tùi sí-lâng tiong koh-oa̍h, só͘-í chiah ū koân-lêng kiâⁿ chiah-ê sîn-jiah.”
40014003	Goân-lâi, [Hi-lu̍t] ūi-tio̍h i ê sió-tī [Hui-le̍k] ê bó͘ [Hi-lô-tí] ê iân-kò͘ ū lia̍h [Iok-hān], kā i liān khí-lâi, koaiⁿ-lo̍h kaⁿ.
40014004	In-ūi [Iok-hān] tiāⁿ-tiāⁿ tùi i kóng, “Lí chhōa chit-ê hū-jîn-lâng chòe bó͘ bô ha̍p-hoat.”
40014005	[Hi-lu̍t] siūⁿ-beh kā i thâi, put-kò kiaⁿ kûn-chiòng, in-ūi in lóng siūⁿ-kóng i sī sian-ti.
40014006	[Hi-lu̍t] choh siⁿ-ji̍t ê sî, [Hi-lô-tí] ê cha-bó͘-kiáⁿ tī lâi-pin bīn-chêng thiàu-bú; [Hi-lu̍t] chin hoaⁿ-hí,
40014007	chiū kong-khai chiù-chōa tah-èng hit-ê cha-bó͘ gín-á bô-lūn kiû sím-mi̍h lóng beh hō͘ i.
40014008	Cha-bó͘ gín-á hō͘ lāu-bú sái-lōng, chiū kóng, “Chhiáⁿ chiong Si-sóe-chiá [Iok-hān] ê thâu-khak khǹg tī pôaⁿ-ni̍h hō͘ góa.”
40014009	Ông ê sim chin kan-khó͘, put-kò in-ūi í-keng tī kùi-pin ê bīn-chêng chiù-chōa, chiū bēng-lēng chiàu só͘ kiû ê hō͘ i.
40014010	Ông chhe lâng khì kaⁿ-ni̍h chām [Iok-hān] ê thâu,
40014011	chiong thâu-khak hē tī pôaⁿ-ni̍h, kau hō͘ cha-bó͘ gín-á, cha-bó͘ gín-á chiū phâng khì hō͘ i ê lāu-bú.
40014012	[Iok-hān] ê bûn-tô͘ lâi siu i ê sin-si khì bâi-chòng, jiân-āu khì kā Iâ-so͘ pò-kò.
40014013	Iâ-so͘ thiaⁿ-tio̍h chit-ê siau-sit chiū lī-khui hia, kan-ta ka-kī chē-chûn thòe-khì phian-phiah bô-lâng tòa ê só͘-chāi. Chi̍t tōa-tīn lâng thiaⁿ-tio̍h chiū tùi ta̍k siâⁿ-chhī kiâⁿ-lō͘ tè I.
40014014	Iâ-so͘ chiūⁿ-hōaⁿ, khòaⁿ-tio̍h chi̍t tōa-tīn lâng chiū khó-lîn in, i-hó in ê pīⁿ.
40014015	Hông-hun-àm, bûn-tô͘ óa-lâi kā I kóng, “Chia sī phian-phiah ê só͘-chāi, thiⁿ mā teh àm à; chhiáⁿ kā kûn-chiòng kái-sàn, hō͘ in thang ka-kī khì hù-kūn ê chng-siā bóe chia̍h-mi̍h.”
40014016	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “In m̄-bián khì, lín hō͘ in chia̍h.”
40014017	Bûn-tô͘ tùi I kóng, “Lán chia chí-ū gō͘ ê piáⁿ, nn̄g bé hî.”
40014018	Iâ-so͘ kóng, “The̍h lâi chia hō͘ góa.”
40014019	I chiū kiò chèng-lâng chē tī chháu-po͘, jiân-āu the̍h hit gō͘ ê piáⁿ kap nn̄g bé hî, ǹg thiⁿ kám-siā; piáⁿ peh-khui, the̍h hō͘ bûn-tô͘, bûn-tô͘ chiū pun hō͘ chèng-lâng.
40014020	Tāi-ke lóng chia̍h, chia̍h kàu pá. Bûn-tô͘ khioh chia̍h chhun ê chhùi-sut-á, móa cha̍p-jī nâ.
40014021	Chia̍h ê lâng, hū-jîn-lâng kap gín-á bô sǹg, iok ū gō͘-chheng ê ta-po͘-lâng.
40014022	Iâ-so͘ sûi-sî pek bûn-tô͘ chiūⁿ-chûn seng kè-khì tùi-bīn hōaⁿ, I ka-kī lâu teh kái-sàn kûn-chiòng.
40014023	Kûn-chiòng sì-sòaⁿ liáu-āu, I ka-kī chiūⁿ-soaⁿ kî-tó. Thiⁿ àm ê sî, I iáu ka-kī chi̍t ê tī hia.
40014024	Hit sî, chûn í-keng lī hōaⁿ chin hn̄g, in-ūi chìⁿ-hong hō͘ éng poah-lâi poah-khì.
40014025	Thiⁿ beh kng ê sî, Iâ-so͘ tī ô͘ ê téng-bīn ǹg bûn-tô͘ hia kiâⁿ-khì.
40014026	Bûn-tô͘ khòaⁿ-tio̍h I tī ô͘ ê téng-bīn teh kiâⁿ, chin tio̍h-kiaⁿ, kóng, “Sī kúi!” In kiaⁿ-kah tōa-siaⁿ hoah chhut-lâi.
40014027	Iâ-so͘ sûi-sî kā in kóng, “An-sim, sī góa, m̄-bián kiaⁿ!”
40014028	[Pí-tek] ìn kóng, “Chú ah, nā chin-chiàⁿ sī lí, bēng-lēng góa kiâⁿ chúi-bīn khì lí hia.”
40014029	Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Lâi!” [Pí-tek] chiū tùi chûn-téng lo̍h-lâi, kiâⁿ chúi-bīn khì Iâ-so͘ hia.
40014030	I chi̍t-ē khòaⁿ-tio̍h hong hiah-ni̍h tōa chiū kiaⁿ, soah beh tîm lo̍h-khì, tōa-siaⁿ hoah, “Chú ah, kiù-leh-ò͘!”
40014031	Iâ-so͘ sûi-sî chhun-chhiú kā i khiú-teh, kóng, “Sió-sìn ê lâng, sī-án-chóaⁿ teh giâu-gî?”
40014032	In chiūⁿ-chûn, hong chiū tiām-khì.
40014033	Chûn-téng ê lâng kūi lo̍h-khì pài I, kóng, “Lí chin-chiàⁿ sī Siōng-tè ê Kiáⁿ!”
40014034	Iâ-so͘ kap bûn-tô͘ kè ô͘ liáu-āu, tī [Kek-nî-sat-le̍k] chiūⁿ-hōaⁿ.
40014035	Hit só͘-chāi ê lâng chi̍t-ē jīn-chhut Iâ-so͘, chiū phài lâng khì sì-chiu-ûi kā só͘-ū pīⁿ-lâng lóng chhōa lâi I hia.
40014036	In khún-kiû Iâ-so͘ hō͘ pīⁿ-lâng kan-ta bong I saⁿ-á-ku ê chhiu chiū hó; só͘-ū bong-tio̍h ê lâng lóng tit-tio̍h i-hó.
40015001	Ū Hoat-lī-sài-phài ê lâng kap keng-ha̍k-kàu-su tùi [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] lâi kìⁿ Iâ-so͘, mn̄g I kóng,
40015002	“Sī-án-chóaⁿ lí ê bûn-tô͘ bô seng sóe-chhiú chiū chia̍h-pn̄g, ûi-hoān kó͘-chá-lâng ê thoân-thóng?”
40015003	I ìn kóng, “Lín sī-án-chóaⁿ in-ūi lín ê thoân-thóng lâi ûi-hoān Siōng-tè ê kài-bēng?
40015004	Siōng-tè kóng, ‘Tio̍h hàu-kèng pē-bú’; koh kóng, ‘Mē lāu-pē á-sī mē lāu-bú ê lâng eng-kai chhú-sí.’
40015005	M̄-kú lín kóng, ‘Lâng nā tùi ka-kī ê lāu-pē á-sī lāu-bú kóng: Góa eng-kai hō͘ lí ê í-keng hiàn hō͘ Siōng-tè,
40015006	i chiū bô su-iàu hàu-kèng lāu-pē. Án-ni, lín in-ūi ka-kī ê thoân-thóng hòe-tû Siōng-tè ê ōe.
40015007	Lín ké-hó ê lâng, [Í-sài-a] só͘ kóng koan-hē lín ê ū-giân chin tio̍h; i kóng:
40015008	Chit-ê chú-bîn ēng chhùi-tûn chun-kèng góa, in ê sim khiok lī-khui góa hn̄g-hn̄g.
40015009	In ēng lâng ê kui-lē chòe góa ê kà-sī kà-sī lâng; in kèng-pài góa lóng bô chhái-kang.”
40015010	Iâ-so͘ kiò chèng-lâng lâi, kā in kóng, “Tio̍h thiaⁿ, tio̍h liáu-kái:
40015011	M̄-sī tùi chhùi ji̍p-khì ê hō͘ lâng bô chheng-khì, sī tùi chhùi chhut-lâi ê chiah hō͘ lâng bô chheng-khì.”
40015012	Bûn-tô͘ lâi tùi I kóng, “Hoat-lī-sài-phài ê lâng thiaⁿ-tio̍h lí chit-ê ōe chin hoán-kám, lí chai bô?”
40015013	I ìn kóng, “M̄-sī góa ê Thiⁿ-pē chai-chèng ê, lóng beh kā i khau khí-lâi.
40015014	Chhut-chāi in kóng. In sī chhiⁿ-mî teh khan chhiⁿ-mî; nā chhiⁿ-mî khan chhiⁿ-mî, nn̄g ê lóng ōe poa̍h-lo̍h khut-á.”
40015015	[Pí-tek] ìn I kóng, “Chhiáⁿ lí kā goán kóe-seh chit-ê phì-jū.”
40015016	I chiū kóng, “Liân lín to iáu bô bêng-pe̍k ò͘?
40015017	Lín kiám bô liáu-kái, só͘-ū tùi chhùi ji̍p ê lóng ji̍p-khì pak-tó͘ lāi, āu-lâi pàng lo̍h-khì piān-só͘?
40015018	Tùi chhùi chhut-lâi ê sī tùi sim chhut, che chiah ōe hō͘ lâng bô chheng-khì.
40015019	In-ūi tùi sim chhut-lâi ê ū pháiⁿ liām-thâu, hiong-sat, su-thong, kan-îm, thau-the̍h, gūi-chèng, kap húi-pòng.
40015020	Chiah-ê chiah ōe hō͘ lâng bô chheng-khì; bô sóe-chhiú chiū chia̍h-pn̄g, bōe hō͘ lâng bô chheng-khì.”
40015021	Iâ-so͘ lī-khui hit só͘-chāi, thòe-khì [Thài-ní] kap [Se-tùn] ê kéng-lāi.
40015022	Tú-hó ū chi̍t ê [Ka-lâm] ê hū-jîn-lâng tùi hit tōe-khu lâi, tōa-siaⁿ hoah, “Chú ah, Tāi-pi̍t ê Kiáⁿ, lîn-bín góa! Góa ê cha-bó͘-kiáⁿ hō͘ siâ-sîn hū-sin, chin kan-khó͘.”
40015023	Iâ-so͘ bô kā i ìn pòaⁿ-kù. I ê bûn-tô͘ lâi kiû I kóng, “Kā i kóaⁿ cháu, i tè tī lán āu-bīn ti̍t-ti̍t teh hoah.”
40015024	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Góa siū chhe-phài chí-ū sī beh chhē [Í-sek-lia̍t]-ke sit-lo̍h ê iûⁿ.”
40015025	M̄-kú hū-jîn-lâng lâi kūi tī I ê bīn-chêng, kóng, “Chú ah, chhiáⁿ pang-chān góa!”
40015026	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “The̍h gín-á ê chia̍h-mi̍h hiat hō͘ káu-á chia̍h, m̄-hó.”
40015027	Hū-jîn-lâng kóng, “Chú, sī lah, káu-á mā ū chia̍h chú-lâng toh-téng lak lo̍h-lâi ê piáⁿ-iù-á.”
40015028	Āu-lâi, Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Hū-jîn-lâng, lí ê sìn-sim chin tōa. Hō͘ lí ê sim-goān si̍t-hiān!” I ê cha-bó͘-kiáⁿ tī hit-chūn tit-tio̍h i-hó.
40015029	Iâ-so͘ lī-khui hit só͘-chāi, iân [Ka-lī-lī] ô͘-piⁿ kiâⁿ, āu-lâi chiūⁿ-soaⁿ, tī hia chē.
40015030	Ū chin tōa-tīn ê lâng chhōa kha-chhiú khê-khì, kha pái, ba̍k-chiu bô khòaⁿ-kìⁿ, chhùi bōe kóng-ōe, kap chin chōe ū pa̍t khoán pīⁿ ê lâng lâi Iâ-so͘ hia, hē tī I ê kha-chêng, I chiū kā in i-hó.
40015031	Chèng-lâng khòaⁿ-tio̍h bōe-kóng-ōe ê lâng ōe kóng-ōe, chhiú khê-khì ê lâng ho̍k-goân, kha pái ê lâng ōe kiâⁿ, bōe khòaⁿ-kìⁿ ê lâng ōe khòaⁿ-kìⁿ, chin tio̍h-kiaⁿ, chiū kui êng-kng hō͘ [Í-sek-lia̍t] ê Siōng-tè.
40015032	Iâ-so͘ kiò I ê bûn-tô͘ lâi, kā in kóng, “Góa khó-lîn chit tīn lâng, in-ūi in í-keng kap góa chòe-hé saⁿ-ji̍t kú, hiān-chāi bô mi̍h thang chia̍h lah. Góa m̄-kam hō͘ in sì-sòaⁿ iau-iau tńg-khì, kiaⁿ-liáu in tī lō͘-tiong hūn-tó.”
40015033	Bûn-tô͘ kā I kóng, “Tī chit-ê phian-phiah bô-lâng tòa ê só͘-chāi, goán beh khì tó-ūi the̍h hiah-chōe piáⁿ lâi hō͘ chiah-chōe lâng chia̍h?”
40015034	Iâ-so͘ mn̄g in kóng, “Lín ū jōa chōe piáⁿ?” In kóng, “Chhit ê; mā ū kúi-bé-á sòe bé hî.”
40015035	I bēng-lēng kûn-chiòng chē lo̍h-khì thô͘-kha,
40015036	jiân-āu the̍h hit chhit ê piáⁿ kap hiah-ê hî, kám-siā, peh-khui, the̍h hō͘ bûn-tô͘, bûn-tô͘ chiū the̍h hō͘ kûn-chiòng.
40015037	Chèng-lâng lóng chia̍h, chia̍h kàu pá; in khioh chia̍h chhun ê chhùi-sut-á, tóe móa chhit láng.
40015038	Chia̍h ê lâng, hū-jîn-lâng kap gín-á bô sǹg, kan-ta ta-po͘-lâng chiū ū sì-chheng.
40015039	Iâ-so͘ kái-sàn kûn-chiòng liáu-āu, chiūⁿ-chûn khì [Má-ka-tan] tōe-khu.
40016001	Ū Hoat-lī-sài-phài kap Sat-to͘-kai-phài ê lâng lâi chhì-thàm Iâ-so͘, iau-kiû I hō͘ in khòaⁿ tùi thiⁿ lâi ê sîn-jiah.
40016002	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Hông-hun ê sî, lín kóng ‘Bîn-á-chài ōe hó-thiⁿ, in-ūi thiⁿ-sek âng.’
40016003	Chá-khí-sî lín kóng ‘Kin-á-ji̍t ū hong-hō͘, in-ūi thiⁿ-sek àm koh âng.’ Lín to khòaⁿ ōe-chhut thiⁿ ê kéng-siōng, ná khòaⁿ bōe-chhut chit-ê sî-tāi ê tiāu-thâu.
40016004	Siâ-ok kan-îm ê sè-tāi kiû sîn-jiah, m̄-kú [Iok-ná] ê sîn-jiah í-gōa bōe-koh ū sîn-jiah hō͘ chit sè-tāi ê lâng.” Kóng liáu, Iâ-so͘ chiū lī-khui in khì pa̍t-ūi.
40016005	Bûn-tô͘ kàu ô͘ ê hit pêng hōaⁿ chiah chai in bōe kì-tit tòa piáⁿ.
40016006	Iâ-so͘ kā in kóng, “Tio̍h chù-ì, tio̍h tî-hông [Hoat-lī-sài]-phài kap Sat-to͘-kai-phài ê kàⁿ.”
40016007	In hō͘-siōng gī-lūn kóng, “Sī in-ūi lán bô tòa piáⁿ sī-bô?”
40016008	Iâ-so͘ chai-iáⁿ chiū kóng, “Sió-sìn ê lâng, lín sī-án-chóaⁿ teh gī-lūn bô tòa piáⁿ ê tāi-chì?
40016009	Lín kiám iáu-bē bêng-pe̍k, kiám bōe kì-tit góa ēng gō͘ ê piáⁿ hō͘ gō͘-chheng lâng chia̍h, chia̍h chhun-ê lín ū khioh kúi nâ?
40016010	Lín kiám bōe kì-tit góa ēng chhit ê piáⁿ hō͘ sì-chheng lâng chia̍h, chia̍h chhun-ê lín ū khioh kúi láng?
40016011	Sī-án-chóaⁿ lín bô bêng-pe̍k góa kā lín kóng ê m̄-sī koan-hē piáⁿ ê tāi-chì? Tio̍h tî-hông Hoat-lī-sài-phài kap Sat-to͘-kai-phài ê kàⁿ!”
40016012	Chit sî bûn-tô͘ chiah bêng-pe̍k Iâ-so͘ m̄-sī kóng tio̍h tî-hông piáⁿ ê kàⁿ, sī tio̍h tî-hông Hoat-lī-sài-phài kap [Sat-to͘-kai]-phài ê kà-sī.
40016013	Iâ-so͘ lâi-kàu [Khái-sat-lī-a] [Hui-li̍p-pí] kéng-lāi ê sî, mn̄g I ê bûn-tô͘ kóng, “Lâng kóng Jîn-chú sī sím-mi̍h lâng?”
40016014	In ìn kóng, “Ū lâng kóng sī Si-sóe-chiá [Iok-hān]; ū lâng kóng sī [Í-lī-a]; mā ū lâng kóng sī [Iâ-lī-bí] á-sī sian-ti tiong ê chi̍t ūi.”
40016015	Iâ-so͘ mn̄g in kóng, “Lín leh, lín kóng góa sī sím-mi̍h lâng?”
40016016	[Se-bûn] [Pí-tek] ìn kóng, “Lí sī Ki-tok, éng-oa̍h Siōng-tè ê Kiáⁿ.”
40016017	Iâ-so͘ ìn i kóng, “[Se-bûn] [Pa-iok-ná], lí chin ū hok-khì, in-ūi kā lí khé-sī ê m̄-sī lâng, sī góa ê Thiⁿ-pē.
40016018	Góa koh kā lí kóng, lí sī [Pí-tek], sī chio̍h-pôaⁿ, góa beh tī chit-ê chio̍h-pôaⁿ téng khí-chō góa ê kàu-hōe, im-kan sí-bông ê koân-sè to bōe iâⁿ-kè i.
40016019	Góa beh chiong Thian-kok ê só-sî hō͘ lí; lí tī tōe-chiūⁿ kìm-chí ê, tī thiⁿ-téng mā ōe kìm-chí; lí tī tōe-chiūⁿ ún-chún ê, tī thiⁿ-téng mā ōe ún-chún.”
40016020	Āu-lâi, I bēng-lēng bûn-tô͘ m̄-thang kā lâng kóng I chiū-sī Ki-tok.
40016021	Hit sî, Iâ-so͘ khai-sí tùi I ê bûn-tô͘ piáu-sī I it-tēng tio̍h khì [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng], tùi tiúⁿ-ló, chè-si-tiúⁿ, kap keng-ha̍k-kàu-su siū chin chōe khó͘-lān, koh hō͘ lâng hāi-sí, tē-saⁿ ji̍t Siōng-tè ōe hō͘ I koh-oa̍h.
40016022	[Pí-tek] chiū khiú Iâ-so͘ khì piⁿ-a, kā I chek-pī kóng, “Chú ah, choa̍t-tùi m̄-thang! Lí bōe ēng-tit ū chit khoán tāi-chì!”
40016023	Iâ-so͘ oa̍t-tńg-sin tùi [Pí-tek] kóng, “Sat-tàn, siám-khui! Lí teh kā góa tîⁿ-kha-pòaⁿ-chhiú; lí siūⁿ ê m̄-sī Siōng-tè ê sū, sī lâng ê sū.”
40016024	Āu-lâi, Iâ-so͘ tùi I ê bûn-tô͘ kóng, “Beh tè góa ê lâng, tio̍h oân-choân hó͘-tēng ka-kī, giâ ka-kī ê si̍p-jī-kè lâi tè góa.
40016025	In-ūi beh kiù ka-kī ê sìⁿ-miā ê, ōe sòng-sit sìⁿ-miā; ūi-tio̍h góa ê iân-kò͘ sòng-sit ka-kī ê sìⁿ-miā ê, ōe tit-tio̍h sìⁿ-miā.
40016026	Lâng nā tit-tio̍h choân sè-kài soah sòng-sit ka-kī ê sìⁿ-miā ū sím-mi̍h lī-ek? Lâng ōe-tàng ēng sím-mi̍h tāi-kè lâi kau-ōaⁿ ka-kī ê sìⁿ-miā?
40016027	Jîn-chú teh-beh tī I ê Pē ê êng-iāu tiong kap I ê thiⁿ-sài lâi-lîm, hit sî I ōe chiàu ta̍k ê lâng ê hêng-ûi kā in pò-siúⁿ á-sī hêng-hoa̍t.
40016028	Góa si̍t-chāi kā lín kóng, khiā tī chia ê lâng, ū-ê iáu-bē sí í-chêng ōe khòaⁿ-kìⁿ Jîn-chú choh-ông lâi-lîm.”
40017001	La̍k ji̍t āu, Iâ-so͘ chhōa [Pí-tek], [Ngá-kok], kap [Ngá-kok] ê sió-tī [Iok-hān], kan-ta in ka-kī peh-chiūⁿ chi̍t chō koân-soaⁿ.
40017002	Tī in bīn-chêng, Iâ-so͘ ê hêng-siōng kái-piàn: I ê bīn chhin-chhiūⁿ ji̍t-thâu hoat-kng; I ê saⁿ piàn-kah chhin-chhiūⁿ kng hiah-ni̍h pe̍h.
40017003	Hut-jiân-kan, [Mô͘-se] kap [Í-lī-a] tùi in hián-hiān, kap I kóng-ōe.
40017004	[Pí-tek] tùi Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Chú ah, lán tī chia chin hó! Lí nā beh, góa tī chia tah saⁿ keng liâu-á, chi̍t keng hō͘ lí, chi̍t keng hō͘ [Mô͘-se], chi̍t keng hō͘ [Í-lī-a].”
40017005	I iáu teh kóng ê sî, hut-jiân ū chi̍t phìⁿ chhàn-lān ê hûn kā in tà-leh, ū siaⁿ tùi hûn chhut-lâi, kóng, “Chit-ê sī góa só͘ thiàⁿ ê Kiáⁿ, I, góa chin ì-ài, lín tio̍h thiaⁿ-thàn I.”
40017006	Bûn-tô͘ chi̍t-ē thiaⁿ-tio̍h chiū phak lo̍h-khì, hui-siông kiaⁿ-hiâⁿ.
40017007	Iâ-so͘ kiâⁿ óa-khì, kā in bong, kóng, “Khí-lâi, m̄-bián kiaⁿ!”
40017008	In chi̍t-ē gia̍h-ba̍k khòaⁿ, chí-ū khòaⁿ-tio̍h Iâ-so͘, í-gōa bô pa̍t-lâng.
40017009	In lo̍h-soaⁿ ê sî, Iâ-so͘ bēng-lēng in kóng, “Jîn-chú tùi sí-lâng tiong koh-oa̍h í-chêng, lín m̄-thang kā lâng kóng-khí só͘ khòaⁿ-kìⁿ ê īⁿ-siōng.”
40017010	Bûn-tô͘ mn̄g I, kóng, “Nā án-ni, sī-án-chóaⁿ keng-ha̍k-kàu-su kóng [Í-lī-a] it-tēng tio̍h seng lâi?”
40017011	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “[Í-lī-a] it-tēng tio̍h lâi tiông-sin chéng-lí it-chhè.
40017012	Góa kā lín kóng, [Í-lī-a] í-keng lâi lah, m̄-kú lâng m̄-bat i, hoán-tńg chiàu ka-kī ê ì-sù tùi-thāi i. Chhin-chhiūⁿ án-ni, Jîn-chú mā teh-beh tī in ê chhiú-ē siū-khó͘.”
40017013	Hit sî bûn-tô͘ chiah bêng-pe̍k I tùi in kóng ê sī chí Si-sóe-chiá Iok-hān.
40017014	In lâi-kàu kûn-chiòng hia, ū chi̍t ê lâng lâi, kūi tī Iâ-so͘ ê kha-chêng,
40017015	tùi I kóng, “Chú ah, lîn-bín góa ê kiáⁿ! In-ūi i tì-tio̍h iûⁿ-hîn, hui-siông kan-khó͘, put-sî poa̍h-lo̍h hé, mā put-sî poa̍h-lo̍h chúi.
40017016	Góa chhōa i kàu lí ê bûn-tô͘ hia, in bô hoat-tō͘ kā i i-hó.”
40017017	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Ài à, m̄-sìn koh hú-pāi ê sè-tāi, góa tio̍h kap lín tòa jōa kú? Góa tio̍h koh jím-nāi lín jōa kú? Kā i chhōa lâi góa chia.”
40017018	Iâ-so͘ chek-pī siâ-sîn, siâ-sîn chiū tùi gín-á chhut-khì; i ê pīⁿ sûi-sî hó-khì.
