40017019	Āu-lâi, bûn-tô͘ su-hā lâi mn̄g Iâ-so͘, “Sī-án-chóaⁿ goán bô hoat-tō͘ kā siâ-sîn kóaⁿ chhut-khì?”
40017020	Iâ-so͘ kā in kóng, “Sī in-ūi lín sió-sìn. Góa si̍t-chāi kā lín kóng, lín ê sìn nā ū kòa-chhài-chí hiah tōa, lín tùi chit chō soaⁿ kóng, ‘Tùi chia sóa khì hia!’ soaⁿ mā ōe sóa khì; bô chi̍t hāng sū lín chòe bōe kàu.”
40017021	Bûn-tô͘ chū-chi̍p tī [Ka-lī-lī] ê sî, Iâ-so͘ kā in kóng, “Jîn-chú teh-beh hō͘ lâng chhut-bōe.
40017023	In ōe kā I hāi-sí, tē-saⁿ ji̍t Siōng-tè ōe hō͘ I koh-oa̍h.” Bûn-tô͘ chiū hui-siông siong-sim.
40017024	Iâ-so͘ kap bûn-tô͘ lâi-kàu [Ka-pek-lông] ê sî, ū chi̍t-kóa siu sèng-tiān-sè ê lâng khì mn̄g [Pí-tek], “Lín lāu-su ū la̍p sèng-tiān-sè bô?”
40017025	I kóng, “Ū.” [Pí-tek] ji̍p-khì chhù-lāi ê sî, Iâ-so͘ seng mn̄g i kóng, “Tōe-chiūⁿ ê kun-ông sī tùi sím-mi̍h-lâng siu koan-sè á-sī lâng-thâu-sè? Sī tùi pún-kok-lâng á-sī gōa-kok-lâng? [Se-bûn], lí siūⁿ án-chóaⁿ?”
40017026	[Pí-tek] ìn kóng, “Tùi gōa-kok-lâng.” Iâ-so͘ kā i kóng, “Án-ni, pún-kok-lâng chiū m̄-bián la̍p-sè lò͘.
40017027	Put-kò, lán ūi-tio̍h bô ài tek-chōe chiah-ê lâng, lí khì ô͘-ni̍h tiò-hî, tiò khí-lâi ê thâu-chi̍t bé, kā hî ê chhùi peh-khui chiū ōe khòaⁿ-tio̍h chi̍t ê gûn-á, the̍h khì hō͘ in, thòe góa kap lí la̍p sèng-tiān-sè.”
40018001	Hit sî, bûn-tô͘ lâi mn̄g Iâ-so͘, “Tī Thian-kok sím-mi̍h-lâng siōng-tōa?”
40018002	Iâ-so͘ kiò chi̍t ê gín-á lâi, hō͘ i khiā tī in tiong-kan,
40018003	kóng, “Góa si̍t-chāi kā lín kóng, lín nā bô kái-piàn pìⁿ-chòe chhin-chhiūⁿ gín-á, choa̍t-tùi bōe-tàng ji̍p Thian-kok.
40018004	Só͘-í, lâng ka-kī khiam-pi chhin-chhiūⁿ chit-ê gín-á, chit-ê lâng tī Thian-kok chiū-sī siōng-tōa.
40018005	Bô-lūn sím-mi̍h lâng, ūi-tio̍h góa ê miâ chiap-la̍p chit khoán gín-á chiū-sī chiap-la̍p góa.”
40018006	“Bô-lūn sím-mi̍h-lâng hō͘ sìn góa ê lâng tiong-kan bî-sòe ê chi̍t-ê hoān-chōe, lêng-khó hō͘ lâng ēng tōa chio̍h-bō pa̍k tī ām-kún thiām-lo̍h chhim-hái.
40018007	Chit-ê sè-kan chhám à, in-ūi ū hō͘ lâng poa̍h-tó hoān-chōe. Hō͘ lâng hoān-chōe ê sū it-tēng ū, m̄-kú ín-khí lâng hoān-chōe ê lâng chhám à.
40018008	“Lí ê chi̍t ki chhiú á-sī chi̍t ki kha nā hō͘ lí hoān-chōe, tio̍h kā i chām khí-lâi, tàn hiat-ka̍k. Lêng-khó chi̍t-kha chi̍t-chhiú ji̍p éng-oán-oa̍h, pí siang-kha siang-chhiú hó-hó hō͘ lâng hiat-lo̍h éng-oán ê hé khah hó.
40018009	Lí ê ba̍k-chiu nā hō͘ lí hoān-chōe, tio̍h kā i ó͘ chhut-lâi, tàn hiat-ka̍k. Lêng-khó kiám chi̍t lúi ba̍k-chiu ji̍p éng-oán-oa̍h, pí nn̄g lúi ba̍k-chiu hó-hó, hō͘ lâng hiat-lo̍h hé teh to̍h ê tōe-ge̍k khah hó.”
40018010	“Lín tio̍h kín-sīn, m̄-thang khòaⁿ-khin chiah-ê bî-sòe ê lâng ê chi̍t ê. Góa kā lín kóng, in ê thiⁿ-sài tī thiⁿ-téng sî-siông teh kìⁿ góa Thiⁿ-pē ê bīn.
40018012	Lín siūⁿ siáⁿ-khoán? Ū chi̍t ê lâng ū chi̍t-pah chiah iûⁿ, kî-tiong chi̍t chiah sit-bê, i kiám bōe chiong káu-cha̍p-káu chiah pàng tī soaⁿ-téng, khì chhē hit chiah sit-bê-ê?
40018013	Góa si̍t-chāi kā lín kóng, i nā chhē-tio̍h hit chiah sit-bê ê iûⁿ, it-tēng chin hoaⁿ-hí, pí ū káu-cha̍p-káu chiah bô sit-bê-ê koh-khah hoaⁿ-hí.
40018014	Siâng-khoán, lín ê Thiⁿ-pē m̄-kam chiah-ê bî-sòe ê lâng ê chi̍t ê bia̍t-bông.”
40018015	“Lí ê hiaⁿ-tī á-sī chí-bē nā tek-chōe lí, tio̍h khì chhē i, kan-ta lín nn̄g lâng chòe-hé ê sî su-hā kā i chí-chhut chhò-gō͘. I nā beh thiaⁿ, chiū hôe-ho̍k lí kap i chòe hiaⁿ-tī á-sī chí-bē ê koan-hē.
40018016	I nā m̄-thiaⁿ, tio̍h chhōa chi̍t nn̄g ê lâng kap lí khì, án-ni ta̍k kù ōe ū nn̄g ê á-sī saⁿ ê lâng thang choh-chèng.
40018017	I nā iáu m̄-thiaⁿ, tio̍h kā kàu-hōe kóng; i nā liân kàu-hōe to m̄-thiaⁿ, chiū kā i khòaⁿ-chòe Gōa-pang-lâng á-sī bau̍h-sè-ê.”
40018018	“Góa si̍t-chāi kā lín kóng, lín tī tōe-chiūⁿ kìm-chí ê, tī thiⁿ-téng mā ōe kìm-chí; lín tī tōe-chiūⁿ ún-chún ê, tī thiⁿ-téng mā ōe ún-chún.
40018019	“Góa koh kā lín kóng, lín tiong-kan nā ū nn̄g ê lâng tī tōe-chiūⁿ tâng-sim ha̍p-ì kî-kiû, góa ê Thiⁿ-pē lóng ōe kā in sêng-choân.
40018020	In-ūi, ū nn̄g ê á-sī saⁿ ê lâng hōng góa ê miâ chū-hōe, góa chiū tī in tiong-kan.”
40018021	[Pí-tek] lâi mn̄g Iâ-so͘, “Chú ah, góa ê hiaⁿ-tī á-sī chí-bē tek-chōe góa, góa tio̍h sià-bián i kúi piàn? Kàu chhit piàn sī-bô?”
40018022	Iâ-so͘ kā i kóng, “M̄-sī. Góa m̄-sī kā lí kóng tio̍h kàu chhit piàn, sī tio̍h kàu chhit-cha̍p ê chhit piàn.
40018023	“Án-ni, Thian-kok thang ēng chit-ê phì-jū lâi soat-bêng: Ū chi̍t ê kok-ông beh kap i ê lô͘-po̍k kiat-siàu,
40018024	i khai-sí sǹg-siàu ê sî, ū lâng chiong khiàm kúi-nā pah bān gûn-á ê lâng chhōa lâi i ê bīn-chêng.
40018025	Hit-ê lâng bōe-tàng hêng, chú-lâng chiū bēng-lēng lâng chiong hit-ê lâng kap i ê bó͘-kiáⁿ í-ki̍p it-chhè só͘-ū ê lóng khì bōe lâi hêng-chè.
40018026	Hit-ê lô͘-po̍k chiū kūi lo̍h-khì kiû kóng, ‘Chhiáⁿ hō͘ góa ān chi̍t-ē, góa ōe lóng hêng.’
40018027	Lô͘-po̍k ê chú-lâng chiū khó-lîn i, chhat-siau i ê chè, pàng i khì.
40018028	“Hit-ê lô͘-po̍k chhut-khì, tú-tio̍h chi̍t ê pîⁿ-pîⁿ chòe lô͘-po̍k-ê, hit-ê lâng chí-ū khiàm i kúi ê gûn-á, chiū kā i lia̍h, tīⁿ i ê ām-kún, kóng, ‘Lí só͘ khiàm ê, lóng tio̍h hêng!’
40018029	Pîⁿ-pîⁿ chòe lô͘-po̍k-ê kūi lo̍h-khì kiû i kóng, ‘Pài-thok hō͘ góa ān chi̍t-ē, góa ōe lóng hêng.’
40018030	I m̄-khéng, tian-tò chiong chit-ê lâng koaiⁿ-lo̍h kaⁿ, koaiⁿ kàu só͘ khiàm ê lóng hêng chheng-chhó.
40018031	Lēng-gōa pîⁿ-pîⁿ chòe lô͘-po̍k-ê khòaⁿ-tio̍h, hui-siông thòng-sim, chiū chiong só͘ hoat-seng it-chhè ê tāi-chì khì kā chú-lâng pò-kò.
40018032	Chú-lâng chiū kiò hit-ê lô͘-po̍k lâi, tùi i kóng, ‘Lí chit-ê pháiⁿ lô͘-po̍k, in-ūi lí tùi góa kiû, góa chiū chiong lí só͘ khiàm ê chè lóng chhat-siau.
40018033	Góa ū lîn-bín lí, lí kiám m̄ eng-kai chhin-chhiūⁿ án-ni lîn-bín hit-ê pîⁿ-pîⁿ chòe lô͘-po̍k-ê?’
40018034	I ê chú-lâng chin siū-khì, chiū kā i koaiⁿ-lo̍h kaⁿ siū-hêng, koaiⁿ kàu i chiong it-chhè ê chè-bū lóng hêng chheng-chhó.
40018035	“Lín ta̍k ê lâng nā bô tùi sim-tóe sià-bián ka-kī ê hiaⁿ-tī á-sī chí-bē, góa ê Thiⁿ-pē mā ōe án-ni tùi-thāi lín, bōe kā lín sià-bián.”
40019001	Iâ-so͘ kóng chiah-ê ōe liáu-āu, lī-khui [Ka-lī-lī] khì [Iok-tàn]-hô tùi-hōaⁿ ê [Iû-thài] tōe-khu.
40019002	Ū kui tōa-tīn ê lâng tè I, I chiū tī hia i-hó in ê pīⁿ.
40019003	Ū chi̍t-kóa Hoat-lī-sài-phài ê lâng lâi chhì-thàm I, kóng, “Lâng bô-lūn sím-mi̍h lí-iû to thang lî i ê bó͘, ū ha̍h Lu̍t-hoat bô?”
40019004	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Lín kiám bô tha̍k-tio̍h Chhòng-chō-chú tī khí-thâu chhòng-chō lâng ū lâm ū lú?
40019005	Siōng-tè kóng, ‘In-ūi chit-ê lí-iû, lâng beh lī-khui i ê pē-bú, kap i ê bó͘ kiat-ha̍p, nn̄g lâng chiâⁿ-chòe chi̍t-thé.’
40019006	Án-ni, in í-keng m̄-sī nn̄g ê, sī chi̍t-thé. Só͘-í, Siōng-tè só͘ phòe-ha̍p ê, lâng m̄-thang thiah-khui.”
40019007	Hoat-lī-sài-phài ê lâng mn̄g I kóng, “Nā án-ni, [Mô͘-se] sī-án-chóaⁿ bēng-lēng lâng hō͘ i ê bó͘ chi̍t tiuⁿ lî-hun-su chiū thang kā i lî?”
40019008	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “In-ūi lín ê sim ngī, [Mô͘-se] chiah iông-ún lín lî lín ê bó͘. Khí-thâu chhòng-chō ê sî Siōng-tè ê ì-sù pèng m̄-sī án-ni.
40019009	Góa kā lín kóng, nā m̄-sī in-ūi bó͘ put-cheng, bōe ēng-tit kā i lî, nā kā i lî koh chhōa pa̍t ê hū-jîn-lâng chiū-sī hoān kan-îm.”
40019010	Bûn-tô͘ kā I kóng, “Kì-jiân hu-hū ê koan-hē sī án-ni, lêng-khó mài kiat-hun khah hó.”
40019011	Iâ-so͘ kā in kóng, “Chit-ê ōe m̄-sī ta̍k ê lâng lóng ōe-tàng chiap-siū, chí-ū ū chit khoán un-sù ê lâng chiah ōe.
40019012	Ū lâng tùi chhut-sì chiū bô sek-ha̍p kiat-hun; ū lâng sī jîn-ûi ê goân-in bōe-tàng kiat-hun; mā ū lâng sī ūi-tio̍h Thian-kok ê iân-kò͘ bô ài kiat-hun. Ōe-tàng chiap-siū ê lâng tio̍h chiap-siū.”
40019013	Ū lâng chhōa gín-á lâi Iâ-so͘ hia, ài I kā in hōaⁿ-chhiú kî-tó. Bûn-tô͘ chek-pī hiah-ê lâng.
40019014	M̄-kú Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Hō͘ gín-á lâi góa chia, m̄-thang kā in chó͘-tòng, in-ūi Thian-kok sī chit khoán lâng ê.”
40019015	I chiū kā in hōaⁿ-chhiú chiok-hok, jiân-āu lī-khui hia.
40019016	Ū chi̍t piàn, ū chi̍t ê lâng lâi chhē Iâ-so͘, tùi I kóng, “Lāu-su, góa tio̍h chòe sím-mi̍h hó-sū chiah ōe-tàng tit-tio̍h éng-oán ê oa̍h-miā?”
40019017	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Lí ná-ōe mn̄g góa hó ê sū? Chí-ū Chi̍t-ūi sī hó. Lí nā ài chìn-ji̍p éng-oán ê oa̍h-miā, tio̍h chun-siú kài-bēng.”
40019018	I mn̄g Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Sī tó chi̍t tiâu kài-bēng?” Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “M̄-thang thâi-sí lâng; m̄-thang kan-îm; m̄-thang thau-the̍h; m̄-thang choh gūi-chèng;
40019019	tio̍h hàu-kèng pē-bú; tio̍h thiàⁿ chhù-piⁿ chhin-chhiūⁿ thiàⁿ ka-kī.”
40019020	Chit-ê siàu-liân-lâng kā I kóng, “Chiah-ê góa it-ti̍t ū teh chun-siú, iáu khiàm sím-mi̍h?”
40019021	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Lí nā ài chòe oân-choân ê lâng, lí khì, khì bōe lí ê châi-sán, pun hō͘ sàn-chhiah-lâng, lí tī thiⁿ-téng chiū ū châi-pó, jiân-āu lâi tè góa.”
40019022	Siàu-liân-lâng thiaⁿ-tio̍h chit-ê ōe, chiū iu-iu chhiû-chhiû lī-khui; in-ūi i châi-sán chin chōe .
40019023	Iâ-so͘ chiū kā I ê bûn-tô͘ kóng, “Góa si̍t-chāi kā lín kóng, hó-gia̍h-lâng ji̍p Thian-kok si̍t-chāi chin khùn-lân!
40019024	Góa koh kā lín kóng, lo̍k-tô chhng-kè chiam-phīⁿ mā pí hó-gia̍h-lâng ji̍p Siōng-tè-kok koh-khah kán-tan.”
40019025	Bûn-tô͘ thiaⁿ-tio̍h, chin tio̍h-kiaⁿ, kóng, “Nā án-ni, sím-mi̍h-lâng ōe-tàng tit-tio̍h kiù?”
40019026	Iâ-so͘ chù-ba̍k kā in khòaⁿ, kóng, “Chit-ê sū, lâng chòe bōe-kàu, m̄-kú Siōng-tè ta̍k hāng lóng ōe.”
40019027	[Pí-tek] ìn kóng, “Goán í-keng pàng-sak it-chhè lâi tè lí lah, goán ōe tit-tio̍h sím-mi̍h?”
40019028	Iâ-so͘ tùi in kóng, “Góa si̍t-chāi kā lín kóng, chiong-lâi ê sin sè-kài, Jîn-chú chē tī I êng-kng ê pó-chō ê sî, lín tè góa ê lâng ōe chē tī cha̍p-jī ê pó-chō lâi sím-phòaⁿ [Í-sek-lia̍t] ê cha̍p-jī chi-cho̍k.
40019029	Ūi-tio̍h góa ê miâ pàng-sak ka-kī ê chhù, hiaⁿ-tī, chí-bē, pē-bú, kiáⁿ-jî, á-sī chhân-hn̂g ê lâng, lóng ōe tit-tio̍h pah pē ê pò-siúⁿ, koh sêng-siū éng-oán ê oa̍h-miā.
40019030	Chóng-sī chin chōe tē-it-ê ōe chòe siōng lō͘-bé; siōng lō͘-bé-ê ōe chòe tē-it.”
40020001	“Thian-kok chhin-chhiūⁿ chi̍t ê hn̂g-chú thàu-chá chhut-khì chhiàⁿ kang-lâng lâi i ê phû-tô-hn̂g chòe-kang.
40020002	I kap kang-lâng iok-tēng chi̍t ji̍t chi̍t ê gûn, chiū chhe in khì phû-tô-hn̂g chòe-kang.
40020003	Chá-khí-sî káu tiám chó-iū i koh chhut-khì, khòaⁿ-tio̍h ū chi̍t-kóa lâng tī chhī-tiûⁿ-kháu teh khiā, bô tāi-chì chòe,
40020004	chiū tùi in kóng, ‘Lín mā khì phû-tô-hn̂g chòe-kang, góa ōe hō͘ lín kong-tō ê kang-chîⁿ.’
40020005	In chiū khì. Tiong-tàu cha̍p-jī tiám kap ē-po͘ saⁿ tiám chó-iū i koh chhut-khì, mā án-ni chòe.
40020006	Ē-po͘ gō͘ tiám, i koh chhut-khì, khòaⁿ-tio̍h ū chi̍t-kóa lâng khiā tī hia, chiū tùi in kóng, ‘Lín ná kui-ji̍t khiā tī chia, bô tāi-chì chòe.’
40020007	In kā i kóng, ‘In-ūi bô-lâng chhiàⁿ goán.’ Chú-lâng kā in kóng, ‘Lín mā khì phû-tô-hn̂g chòe-kang.’
40020008	“Hông-hun ê sî, hn̂g-chú kā i ê koán-ke kóng, ‘Lí khì kiò kang-lâng lâi, hoat kang-chîⁿ hō͘ in, tùi lō͘-bé lâi-ê seng hoat, jiân-āu chiah hoat hō͘ tāi-seng lâi-ê.’
40020009	Hiah-ê ē-po͘ gō͘ tiám chiah lâi ê, ta̍k ê lâng niá-tio̍h chi̍t ê gûn.
40020010	Tāi-seng khì chòe-kang ê lâng lâi niá kang-chîⁿ ê sî, in siūⁿ ka-kī ōe niá khah chōe, m̄-kú ta̍k ê lâng mā chí-ū niá chi̍t ê gûn.
40020011	In niá liáu, tùi chú-lâng bâi-oàn,
40020012	kóng, ‘Chiah-ê chòe-āu lâi ê lâng chí-ū chòe chi̍t tiám cheng nā-tiāⁿ, goán hō͘ ji̍t-thâu pha̍k kui-ji̍t, lô-khó͘ kang-chok, lí kèng-jiân hō͘ in kap goán niá pîⁿ chōe!’
40020013	Chú-lâng ìn kî-tiong chi̍t ê lâng kóng, ‘Pêng-iú, góa tùi lí m̄-sī bô kong-tō. Lí kiám m̄-sī kap góa iok-tēng chi̍t ji̍t chi̍t ê gûn?
40020014	The̍h lí ê kang-chîⁿ, tńg-khì! Góa beh hō͘ siōng-bé lâi-ê kap lí niá pîⁿ chōe.
40020015	Góa ēng ka-kī ê mi̍h chòe góa ài chòe ê kiám bōe ēng-tit? Góa khóng-khài, lí teh ba̍k-kháng-chhiah sī-bô?’
40020016	“Án-ni, siōng lō͘-bé-ê ōe chòe tē-it; tē-it-ê ōe chòe siōng lō͘-bé.”
40020017	Iâ-so͘ tī chiūⁿ [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] ê lō͘-tiong kiò cha̍p-jī ê bûn-tô͘ lâi, su-hā tùi in kóng,
40020018	“Taⁿ lán beh chiūⁿ [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng], Jîn-chú ōe siū chhut-bōe hō͘ chè-si-tiúⁿ kap keng-ha̍k-kàu-su. In ōe kā I tēng sí-chōe,
40020019	āu-lâi chiong I kau hō͘ Gōa-pang-lâng, kā I hì-lāng, piⁿ-phah, tèng si̍p-jī-kè; tē-saⁿ ji̍t Siōng-tè ōe hō͘ I koh-oa̍h.”
40020020	Hit sî, [Se-pí-thài] ê bó͘ chhōa i nn̄g ê kiáⁿ lâi kìⁿ Iâ-so͘, kūi lo̍h-khì I bīn-chêng, kiû chi̍t hāng tāi-chì.
40020021	Iâ-so͘ mn̄g i kóng, “Lí ài sím-mi̍h?” I ìn kóng, “Lí choh-ông ê sî, chhiáⁿ lí hō͘ góa chit nn̄g ê kiáⁿ chi̍t ê chē lí ê chiàⁿ-pêng, chi̍t ê chē lí ê tò-pêng.”
40020022	Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Lín m̄-chai ka-kī teh kiû sím-mi̍h. Góa teh-beh lim ê poe, lín ōe-tàng lim bōe?” In kóng, “Goán ōe.”
40020023	Iâ-so͘ kā in kóng, “Góa ê poe lín beh lim, put-kò chē góa ê chiàⁿ-pêng tò-pêng m̄-sī góa ōe-tàng hō͘ lâng ê. Góa ê Pē ūi-tio̍h sím-mi̍h-lâng chún-pī chiū hō͘ hit-ê lâng.”
40020024	Kî-tha cha̍p ê bûn-tô͘ thiaⁿ-tio̍h, chiū tùi hit nn̄g ê hiaⁿ-tī siū-khì.
40020025	Iâ-so͘ kiò in lâi, kā in kóng, “Lín chai Gōa-pang-lâng ū thóng-tī-chiá teh kā in koán-hat, ū léng-siù teh kā in chi-phòe.
40020026	Lín tiong-kan chiū m̄ eng-kai án-ni. Lín tiong-kan ài chòe tōa ê, tio̍h chòe lín ê chhe-ēng;
40020027	ài chòe tē-it ê, tio̍h chòe lín ê lô͘-po̍k;
40020028	tú chhin-chhiūⁿ Jîn-chú lâi, m̄-sī beh hō͘ lâng ho̍k-sāi, hoán-tńg sī beh kā lâng ho̍k-sāi, sīm-chì hi-seng ka-kī ê sìⁿ-miā lâi sio̍k-hôe chin chōe lâng.”
40020029	In lī-khui [Iâ-lī-ko] ê sî, ū chi̍t tōa-kûn lâng tè Iâ-so͘ khì.
40020030	Tú ū nn̄g ê bông-jîn chē tī lō͘-piⁿ, thiaⁿ-tio̍h Iâ-so͘ tùi hia keng-kè, chiū tōa-siaⁿ hoah, “Tāi-pi̍t ê Kiáⁿ, lîn-bín goán!”
40020031	Kûn-chiòng kā in chek-pī, kiò in tiām-tiām. M̄-kú in koh-khah tōa-siaⁿ hoah, “Chú, Tāi-pi̍t ê Kiáⁿ, lîn-bín goán!”
40020032	Iâ-so͘ thêng-kha, kiò in, kóng, “Lín ài góa kā lín chòe sím-mi̍h?”
40020033	In kóng, “Chú ah, goán ài ba̍k-chiu ōe khòaⁿ-kìⁿ.”
40020034	Iâ-so͘ khó-lîn in, bong in ê ba̍k-chiu, in sûi-sî koh ōe khòaⁿ-kìⁿ, chiū tè I khì.
40021001	Iâ-so͘ kap bûn-tô͘ teh-beh kàu [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng], lâi-kàu [Ka-ná-soaⁿ] hù-kūn ê [Pek-hoat-kî]. Hit sî I chhe nn̄g ê bûn-tô͘,
40021002	kā in kóng, “Lín khì tùi-bīn ê chng-siā, kàu hia sûi-sî ōe khòaⁿ-tio̍h chi̍t chiah lû pa̍k-teh, koh ū chi̍t chiah lû-á-kiáⁿ kap i tī hia; lín kā in tháu-khui, khan lâi góa chia.
40021003	Nā ū lâng tùi lín kóng sím-mi̍h, lín chiū kóng, ‘Chú beh ēng in.’ Hit-ê lâng ōe sûi-sî chún lín khan lâi.”
40021004	Chit-ê tāi-chì hoat-seng sī beh èng-giām Siōng-tè thong-kè sian-ti só͘ kóng ê ōe:
40021005	Tio̍h kā [Sek-an] ê hū-jîn-lâng kóng: Khòaⁿ leh, lín ê Ông beh lâi lín chia; I khiam-sùn khiâ lû-á, khiâ lû-á-kiáⁿ.
40021006	Bûn-tô͘ chiū khì, chiàu Iâ-so͘ ê chí-sī khì chòe.
40021007	In khan lû-á kap lû-á-kiáⁿ lâi, chiong gōa-saⁿ phoa̍h tī in téng-bīn, Iâ-so͘ chiū peh-khì khiâ.
40021008	Tōa-pō͘-hūn ê kûn-chiòng chiong in ka-kī ê gōa-saⁿ pho͘ tī lō͘-ni̍h, mā ū lâng chhò chhiū-oe pho͘ tī lō͘-ni̍h kā I hoan-gêng.
40021009	Chêng-kiâⁿ āu-tè ê kûn-chiòng hoah kóng: Tāi-pi̍t ê Kiáⁿ, hô-sàn-ná! Hōng Chú ê miâ lâi Hit-ūi eng-kai siū chheng-chàn! Chì-koân ê Siōng-tè, hô-sàn-ná!
40021010	Iâ-so͘ chi̍t-ē chìn-ji̍p [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng], choân siâⁿ lóng hán khí-lâi, kóng, “Chit-ê sī siáⁿ-lâng?”
40021011	Chèng-lâng kóng, “Chit-ê sī tùi [Ka-lī-lī] ê [Ná-sat-le̍k] lâi ê sian-ti Iâ-so͘.”
40021012	Iâ-so͘ ji̍p-khì Sèng-tiān, chiong tiān-lāi só͘-ū teh bóe-bōe ê lâng lóng kóaⁿ chhut-khì, koh chhia-tó ōaⁿ-chîⁿ ê lâng ê toh kap bōe hún-chiáu ê lâng ê í.
40021013	I tùi in kóng, “Sèng-keng ū kì-chài: Góa ê chhù beh kiò-chòe kî-tó ê tiān, lín soah kā i pìⁿ-chòe thó͘-húi-á-khut.”
40021014	Ū bông-jîn kap kha pái ê lâng lâi Sèng-tiān chhē Iâ-so͘, I chiū kā in i-hó.
40021015	Chè-si-tiúⁿ kap keng-ha̍k-kàu-su khòaⁿ-tio̍h Iâ-so͘ só͘ kiâⁿ ê kî-sū, koh thiaⁿ-kìⁿ sòe-hàn gín-á tī Sèng-tiān tōa-siaⁿ hoah “Tāi-pi̍t ê Kiáⁿ, hô-sàn-ná”, chiū chin siū-khì,
40021016	kā Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Lí ū thiaⁿ-tio̍h in teh hoah sím-mi̍h bô?” Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Ū. Lín kiám bô tha̍k-tio̍h Sèng-keng ê ōe: Lí hō͘ gín-á kap eⁿ-á ê chhùi tōa-siaⁿ chhiùⁿ-chhut o-ló.”
40021017	Āu-lâi Iâ-so͘ lī-khui in, chhut-siâⁿ khì [Pek-tāi-nî], tī hia kè-mî.
40021018	Keh chá-khí, beh tò-khì [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] ê sî, Iâ-so͘ pak-tó͘ iau.
40021019	I khòaⁿ-tio̍h lō͘-piⁿ ū chi̍t châng bû-hoa-kó-chhiū, chiū kiâⁿ óa-khì, m̄-kú chhiū-téng lóng bô khòaⁿ-tio̍h pòaⁿ-hāng, chí-ū hio̍h nā-tiāⁿ. I tùi hit châng chhiū kóng, “Lí éng-oán bōe-koh kiat ké-chí.” Hit châng bû-hoa-kó-chhiū sûi-sî ta-khì.
40021020	Bûn-tô͘ khòaⁿ-tio̍h, chin tio̍h-kiaⁿ, kóng, “Chit châng bû-hoa-kó-chhiū ná-ōe hut-jiân-kan ta-khì?”
40021021	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Góa si̍t-chāi kā lín kóng, lín nā ū sìn-sim, bô giâu-gî, m̄-nā ōe-tàng chòe góa tùi chit châng bû-hoa-kó-chhiū só͘ chòe ê tāi-chì, sīm-chì bēng-lēng chit chō soaⁿ kóng, ‘Khí-lâi, khì thiām-hái!’ mā it-tēng ōe si̍t-hiān.
40021022	Kî-tó ê sî, lín só͘ kiû ê it-chhè, ū sìn chiū ōe tit-tio̍h.”
40021023	Iâ-so͘ ji̍p-khì Sèng-tiān teh kà-sī lâng ê sî, chè-si-tiúⁿ kap bîn-kan ê tiúⁿ-ló lâi I hia, tùi I kóng, “Lí khò sím-mi̍h koân-pèng chòe chiah-ê tāi-chì? Sím-mi̍h-lâng hō͘ lí chit-ê koân-pèng?”
40021024	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Góa mā beh mn̄g lín chi̍t kù ōe, lín nā kā góa ìn, góa chiah kā lín kóng góa khò sím-mi̍h koân-pèng chòe chiah-ê tāi-chì.
40021025	[Iok-hān] kā lâng sóe-lé ê koân-pèng tùi tó-ūi lâi, sī tùi Thiⁿ á-sī tùi lâng?” In hō͘-siōng gī-lūn kóng, “Lán nā kóng ‘Tùi Thiⁿ’, I ōe kā lán kóng ‘Án-ni, lín sī-án-chóaⁿ bô sìn [Iok-hān]?’
40021026	Lán nā kóng ‘Tùi lâng’, khióng-kiaⁿ kûn-chiòng hoán-kám, in-ūi in lóng siūⁿ-kóng [Iok-hān] sī sian-ti.”
40021027	In chiū ìn Iâ-so͘, “Goán m̄-chai.” Iâ-so͘ kā in kóng, “Án-ni, góa mā m̄ kā lín kóng góa khò sím-mi̍h koân-pèng chòe chiah-ê tāi-chì.”
40021028	Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Lín siūⁿ án-chóaⁿ? Ū chi̍t ê lâng ū nn̄g ê kiáⁿ; i khì kā tōa-kiáⁿ kóng, ‘Kiáⁿ ah, lí kin-á-ji̍t khì phû-tô-hn̂g chòe-kang.’
40021029	Tōa-kiáⁿ ìn kóng, ‘Góa m̄ khì’, āu-lâi kái-piàn sim-ì ū khì.
40021030	Lāu-pē mā khì kā tē-jī kiáⁿ kóng siâng-khoán ê ōe. Tē-jī kiáⁿ ìn kóng, ‘A-pa, góa lâi-khì,’ āu-lâi bô khì.
40021031	Chit nn̄g ê kiáⁿ tó chi̍t ê ū chiàu lāu-pē ê ì-sù khì chòe?” In kóng, “Tōa-kiáⁿ.” Iâ-so͘ kā in kóng, “Góa si̍t-chāi kā lín kóng, bau̍h-sè-ê kap chhiong-ki ōe pí lín seng chìn-ji̍p Siōng-tè-kok.
40021032	In-ūi Si-sóe-chiá [Iok-hān] lâi lín chia, chí-sī lín kiâⁿ chiàⁿ-lō͘, lín bô sìn i, m̄-kú bau̍h-sè-ê kap chhiong-ki ū sìn. Sīm-chì lín khòaⁿ-tio̍h liáu-āu mā bô hóe-kái lâi sìn i.”
40021033	Iâ-so͘ kā in kóng, “Lín koh thiaⁿ chi̍t ê phì-jū. Ū chi̍t ê hn̂g-chú khai-khún chi̍t khu phû-tô-hn̂g, sì-bīn ûi lî-pa, lāi-bīn ó͘ chi̍t ê chiú-khut, khí chi̍t ê siú-bōng-tâi, chiong chit khu hn̂g cho͘ hō͘ tiān-lông, āu-lâi chhut-gōa khì chin hn̄g ê só͘-chāi.
40021034	Siu-sêng ké-chí ê sî kàu, hn̂g-chú chhe lô͘-po̍k khì tiān-lông hia, beh tùi in siu ké-chí.
40021035	Tiān-lông kā chiah-ê lô͘-po̍k lia̍h khí-lâi, chi̍t ê kā i phah, chi̍t ê kā i thâi-sí, chi̍t ê ēng chio̍h-thâu kā i tìm-sí.
40021036	Hn̂g-chú koh chhe lēng-gōa chi̍t-kóa lô͘-po̍k khì, pí thâu-chi̍t piàn khah chōe lâng. Tiān-lông mā chiàu án-ni tùi-thāi in.
40021037	Chòe-āu, hn̂g-chú chhe ka-kī ê kiáⁿ khì in hia, siūⁿ-kóng ‘In ōe chun-tiōng góa ê kiáⁿ.’
40021038	M̄-kú tiān-lông chi̍t-ē khòaⁿ-tio̍h i ê kiáⁿ chiū chham-siông kóng, ‘Chit-ê sī i ê kè-sêng-jîn. Lâi, lán lâi kā i thâi-sí, thang tit i ê châi-sán!’
40021039	In chiū kā i lia̍h khí-lâi, hiat chhut-khì phû-tô-hn̂g ê gōa-bīn, kā i thâi-sí.
40021040	“Án-ni, phû-tô-hn̂g ê chú-lâng tò-lâi ê sî ōe án-chóaⁿ chhú-lí hiah-ê tiān-lông?”
40021041	In kā Iâ-so͘ kóng, “I it-tēng ōe chiong hiah-ê pháiⁿ-lâng thiat-tóe siau-bia̍t, chiong phû-tô-hn̂g cho͘ hō͘ pa̍t ê ōe chiàu kùi-chiat la̍p ké-chí-cho͘ ê tiān-lông.”
40021042	Iâ-so͘ kā in kóng, “Lín kiám m̄-bat tha̍k-tio̍h Sèng-keng ū kì-chài: Khí-chhù-sai-hū só͘ khì-sak ê chio̍h, í-keng chiâⁿ-chòe siōng tiōng-iàu ê ki-chio̍h. Che sī Chú ê chok-ûi, tùi lán lâi khòaⁿ si̍t-chāi chin kî-biāu!
40021043	“Só͘-í, góa kā lín kóng, Siōng-tè ōe chiong Siōng-tè-kok tùi lín chhiúⁿ khí-lâi, kau hō͘ ōe kiat ké-chí ê lâng.
40021044	Hit-ê siak lo̍h-khì chit tè chio̍h-thâu téng ê lâng, ōe siak-kah chhùi-kut hun-si; hō͘ hit tè chio̍h-thâu teh-tio̍h ê lâng, ōe teh-kah chhùi-kô͘-kô͘.”
40021045	Chiah-ê chè-si-tiúⁿ kap Hoat-lī-sài-phài ê lâng thiaⁿ-tio̍h Iâ-so͘ ê phì-jū, chai-iáⁿ I sī teh kóng in.
40021046	In chiū chhē khang-phāng beh kā I lia̍h, m̄-kú kiaⁿ kûn-chiòng, in-ūi in khòaⁿ I sī sian-ti.
40022001	Iâ-so͘ koh ēng phì-jū kā in kóng:
40022002	“Thian-kok thang phì-jū chòe chi̍t ê kok-ông kā i ê kiáⁿ pān hun-iàn.
40022003	I chhe lô͘-po̍k khì kiò só͘ chhiáⁿ ê lâng-kheh lâi hù hun-iàn, put-kò in m̄-lâi.
40022004	Kok-ông koh chhe kî-tha ê lô͘-po̍k, kā in kóng, ‘Lín khì kā hiah-ê siū iau-chhiáⁿ ê lâng kóng, góa ê iàn-se̍k í-keng chún-pī hó-sè; góa ê gû kap pûi ê gû-á-kiáⁿ mā í-keng thâi, it-chhè lóng chún-pī hó-sè lah, chhiáⁿ lín lâi hù hun-iàn.’
40022005	M̄-kú hiah-ê siū iau-chhiáⁿ ê lâng bô khòaⁿ-chòe iàu-kín, chòe in khì; chi̍t ê khì hn̂g-ni̍h chòe-kang; chi̍t ê khì chòe seng-lí;
40022006	kî-tha ê lia̍h i ê lô͘-po̍k, kā in lêng-jio̍k, sòa kā in thâi-sí.
40022007	Kok-ông hui-siông siū-khì, chiū phài peng khì châu-bia̍t hiah-ê hiong-siú, pàng-hé sio in ê siâⁿ.
40022008	Jiân-āu i kā lô͘-po̍k kóng, ‘Hun-iàn chún-pī hó lah, m̄-kú só͘ iau-chhiáⁿ ê lóng put-phòe hō͘ lán chhiáⁿ.
40022009	Só͘-í, lín khì koe-lō͘-kháu, tú-tio̍h ê lâng lóng kā in chhiáⁿ lâi hù hun-iàn.’
40022010	Hiah-ê lô͘-po̍k chiū chhut-khì koe-ni̍h, tú-tio̍h ê bô-lūn hó-lâng pháiⁿ-lâng lóng kā in chhiáⁿ lâi; hun-iàn ê só͘-chāi lâng-kheh chiū chē kàu móa-móa.
40022011	“Kok-ông ji̍p-lâi khòaⁿ hiah-ê lâng-kheh, khòaⁿ-tio̍h tī hia ū chi̍t ê lâng bô chhēng hun-iàn ê lé-ho̍k.
40022012	I chiū kā i mn̄g, ‘Pêng-iú ah, lí ji̍p-lâi chia ná bô chhēng hun-iàn ê lé-ho̍k?’ Hit-ê lâng lóng bô ìn.
40022013	Kok-ông chiū tùi chhe-ēng-ê kóng, ‘Kha-chhiú kā pa̍k khí-lâi, kā i hiat chhut-khì gōa-bīn o͘-àm ê só͘-chāi. Tī hia, i ōe thî-khàu, kā-gê chhiat-chhí.’
40022014	“Siū ho͘-tiàu-ê chin chōe, m̄-kú siū kéng-soán-ê chin chió.”
40022015	[Hoat-lī-sài]-phài ê lâng chhut-khì, chòe-hé chham-siông beh án-chóaⁿ lia̍h Iâ-so͘ ê ōe-phāng thang kā I hām-hāi.
40022016	In chhe ka-kī ê bûn-tô͘ kap [Hi-lu̍t]-tóng ê lâng khì Iâ-so͘ hia, tùi I kóng, “Lāu-su, goán chai lí chin sêng-si̍t, chiàu-si̍t chiong Siōng-tè ê tō-lí kà-sī lâng, bô-lūn sím-mi̍h khoán lâng, lí tùi-thāi in lóng bô chha-pia̍t.
40022017	La̍p-sè hō͘ [Lô-má] hông-tè Khái-sat ū ha̍h Lu̍t-hoat bô? Chhiáⁿ kā goán kóng lí ê siūⁿ-hoat siáⁿ-khoán.”
40022018	Iâ-so͘ chai-iáⁿ in ê ok-ì, chiū tùi in kóng, “Ké-hó ê lâng, sī-án-chóaⁿ beh kā góa chhì-thàm?
40022019	The̍h chi̍t ê la̍p-sè ê gûn-pè hō͘ góa khòaⁿ.” In chiū the̍h chi̍t ê gûn-pè hō͘ I.
40022020	Iâ-so͘ mn̄g in kóng, “Che sī siáⁿ-lâng ê siōng, siáⁿ-lâng ê jī-hō?”
40022021	In kóng, “[Khái-sat] ê.” Iâ-so͘ chiū kā in kóng, “Án-ni, [Khái-sat] ê mi̍h hō͘ [Khái-sat]; Siōng-tè ê mi̍h hō͘ Siōng-tè.”
40022022	In thiaⁿ liáu chin tio̍h-kiaⁿ, chiū lī-khui.
40022023	Siâng hit ji̍t, chi̍t-kóa chú-tiuⁿ bô koh-oa̍h ê Sat-to͘-kai-phài ê lâng lâi Iâ-so͘ hia, mn̄g I kóng,
40022024	“Lāu-su, [Mô͘-se] kóng, ‘Ū lâng bô siⁿ-kiáⁿ chiū sí-khì, sió-tī tio̍h chhōa hiaⁿ-só thòe hiaⁿ-ko thoân-chong-chiap-tāi.’
40022025	Í-chêng goán chia bat ū chhit ê hiaⁿ-tī; siōng-tōa ê kiat-hun, bô lâu hō͘-tāi chiū sí-khì, pàng bó͘ hō͘ sió-tī.
40022026	Tē-jī ê, tē-saⁿ ê, kàu tē-chhit ê lóng siâng-khoán.
40022027	In lóng sí liáu-āu, hit-ê hū-jîn-lâng mā sí-khì.
40022028	Án-ni, koh-oa̍h ê sî, chit-ê hū-jîn-lâng sī chit chhit ê lâng tiong-kan tó chi̍t-ê ê bó͘? In-ūi in lóng bat chhōa i.”
40022029	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Lín m̄-tio̍h. Lín m̄-bat Sèng-keng, mā m̄-bat Siōng-tè ê koân-lêng.
40022030	In-ūi koh-oa̍h ê sî, in kap thiⁿ-téng ê thiⁿ-sài siâng-khoán, bô-kè bô-chhōa.
40022031	Koan-hē sí-lâng koh-oa̍h ê sū, lín kiám bô tha̍k-tio̍h Siōng-tè tùi lín kóng ê ōe:
40022032	‘Góa chiū-sī [A-pek-la-hán] ê Siōng-tè, [Í-sat] ê Siōng-tè, [Ngá-kok] ê Siōng-tè’? I m̄-sī sí-lâng ê Siōng-tè, sī oa̍h-lâng ê Siōng-tè.”
40022033	Kûn-chiòng chi̍t-ē thiaⁿ-tio̍h, tùi I ê kà-sī kám-kak chin tio̍h-kiaⁿ.
40022034	[Hoat-lī-sài]-phài ê lâng thiaⁿ-tio̍h Iâ-so͘ hō͘ [Sat-to͘-kai]-phài ê lâng bô ōe thang ìn, chiū chū-chi̍p chòe-hé.
40022035	Kî-tiong ū chi̍t ê Lu̍t-hoat-kàu-su lâi mn̄g chi̍t ê būn-tôe, beh kā I chhì-thàm, kóng,
40022036	“Lāu-su, [Mô͘-se] ê Lu̍t-hoat tó chi̍t tiâu sī siōng-tōa ê kài-bēng?”
40022037	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Lí tio̍h choân-sim, choân-chêng, choân-ì thiàⁿ Chú lí ê Siōng-tè.
40022038	Che sī siōng-tōa koh tē-it ê kài-bēng.
40022039	Tē-jī tiâu mā siâng-khoán. Tio̍h thiàⁿ chhù-piⁿ chhin-chhiūⁿ thiàⁿ ka-kī.
40022040	Choân-pō͘ Lu̍t-hoat kap sian-ti ê kà-sī lóng ēng chit nn̄g tiâu chòe kun-kù.”
40022041	[Hoat-lī-sài]-phài ê lâng chū-chi̍p ê sî, Iâ-so͘ mn̄g in,
40022042	“Koan-hē Ki-tok, I sī sím-mi̍h lâng ê hō͘-tāi, lín siūⁿ án-chóaⁿ?” In kóng, “I sī [Tāi-pi̍t] ê hō͘-tāi.”
40022043	Iâ-so͘ tùi in kóng, “Nā-sī án-ni, sī án-chóaⁿ [Tāi-pi̍t] siū Sèng Sîn kám-tōng ê sî chheng Ki-tok chòe Chú, kóng:
40022044	Chú kā góa ê Chú kóng: Lí chē góa ê chiàⁿ-pêng, kàu góa hō͘ lí ê tùi-te̍k khut-ho̍k tī lí kha-ē.
40022045	Kì-jiân [Tāi-pi̍t] chheng-ho͘ Ki-tok chòe ‘Chú’, Ki-tok ná-ōe sī [Tāi-pi̍t] ê hō͘-tāi?”
40022046	Bô-lâng ōe-tàng hôe-tap pòaⁿ-kù. Tùi hit ji̍t khí, bô-lâng káⁿ koh kā I mn̄g sím-mi̍h būn-tôe.
40023001	Āu-lâi, Iâ-so͘ tùi kûn-chiòng kap I ê bûn-tô͘ kóng,
40023002	“Keng-ha̍k-kàu-su kap Hoat-lī-sài-phài ê lâng chē [Mô͘-se] ê ūi kóe-seh Lu̍t-hoat.
40023003	Só͘-í, in só͘ kā lín kóng ê, lín lóng tio̍h chòe, tio̍h chun-siú; put-kò m̄-thang o̍h in ê hêng-ûi, in-ūi in ōe-kóng bōe-chòe.
40023004	In chiong lâng taⁿ bô-hoat ê tāng-tàⁿ khún hō͘ lâng taⁿ, ka-kī liân chi̍t ki chńg-thâu-á to m̄-khéng tín-tāng.
40023005	In só͘-ū ê hêng-ûi lóng sī beh chòe hō͘ lâng khòaⁿ, in-ūi in chiong ka-kī ê keng-bûn-tē chòe khah khoah, saⁿ-á-ku ê chhiu chòe khah tn̂g.
40023006	In ài tī iàn-hōe chē tōa-ūi, tī hōe-tn̂g lāi chē koân-ūi,
40023007	tī chhī-tiûⁿ-kháu hō͘ lâng chhéng-an, hō͘ lâng chheng-ho͘ ‘lia̍p-pí’.
40023008	M̄-kú lín m̄-thang hō͘ lâng chheng-chòe ‘lia̍p-pí’, in-ūi lín chí-ū chi̍t ūi ‘Lāu-su’, lín lóng sī hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē.
40023009	Tī tōe-chiūⁿ, lín m̄-thang chheng-ho͘ lâng chòe ‘lāu-pē’, in-ūi lín chí-ū chi̍t ūi ‘Lāu-pē’, chiū-sī tī thiⁿ-téng Hit-ūi.
40023010	Lín mā m̄-thang hō͘ lâng chheng-chòe ‘kàu-su’, in-ūi lín chí-ū chi̍t ūi ‘Kàu-su’, chiū-sī Ki-tok.
40023011	Lín tiong-kan siōng-tōa-ê tio̍h chòe lín ê chhe-ēng.
40023012	Chū-ko-ê ōe siū kàng-kē; chū-khiam-ê ōe siū ko-seng.”
40023013	“Ké-hó ê keng-ha̍k-kàu-su kap Hoat-lī-sài-lâng, lín chhám à! Lín chiong Thian-kok ê mn̂g koaiⁿ khí-lâi, m̄ hō͘ lâng ji̍p-khì; lín ka-kī m̄ ji̍p-khì, liân beh ji̍p-khì ê lâng mā m̄ hō͘ in ji̍p-khì.
40023015	Ké-hó ê keng-ha̍k-kàu-su kap Hoat-lī-sài-lâng, lín chhám à! Lín ūi-tio̍h beh hō͘ chi̍t ê lâng kái-chong ji̍p-kàu, thiⁿ-piⁿ hái-kak kiâⁿ thàu-thàu. Hit-ê lâng ji̍p-kàu liáu-āu, lín soah hō͘ i pìⁿ-chòe pí lín têng-pē pháiⁿ.
40023016	“Chhiⁿ-mî chòe chhōa-lō͘-ê, lín chhám à! Lín kóng, ‘Lâng kí Sèng-tiān chiù-chōa bô chún-sǹg, m̄-kú nā kí tiān-lāi ê kim-khì chiù-chōa chiū tio̍h siú.’
40023017	Lín chiah-ê tòng-gōng koh chhiⁿ-mî ê lâng ah, tó chi̍t hāng khah tiōng-iàu? Sī kim-khì á-sī hō͘ kim-khì chiâⁿ-chòe sîn-sèng ê Sèng-tiān?
40023018	Lín koh kóng, ‘Lâng kí chè-tôaⁿ chiù-chōa bô chún-sǹg, nā kí chè-tôaⁿ téng ê chè-mi̍h chiù-chōa chiū tio̍h siú.’
40023019	Lín chiah-ê chhiⁿ-mî ê lâng ah, sī chè-mi̍h á-sī hō͘ chè-mi̍h chiâⁿ-chòe sîn-sèng ê chè-tôaⁿ, tó chi̍t hāng khah tiōng-iàu?
40023020	Só͘-í, lâng kí chè-tôaⁿ chiù-chōa, chiū-sī kí chè-tôaⁿ kap hit téng-bīn só͘-ū ê chè-mi̍h chiù-chōa.
40023021	Lâng kí Sèng-tiān chiù-chōa, chiū-sī kí Sèng-tiān kap tiàm tī hit lāi-bīn ê Siōng-tè chiù-chōa.
40023022	Lâng kí thiⁿ chiù-chōa, chiū-sī kí Siōng-tè ê pó-chō kap chē tī hit téng-bīn ê Siōng-tè chiù-chōa.
40023023	“Ké-hó ê keng-ha̍k-kàu-su kap [Hoat-lī-sài-lâng], lín chhám à! In-ūi lín liân phang-liāu, po̍k-hô, poeh-kak, sió-hôe-hiong to hiàn cha̍p-hūn-chi̍t hō͘ Siōng-tè, Lu̍t-hoat só͘ tiōng-sī ê chèng-gī, jîn-chû, kap sìn-si̍t, lín tian-tò hut-lio̍k. Chiah-ê chiah-sī lín eng-kai si̍t-hêng ê; téng-bīn hiah-ê mā m̄-thang hut-lio̍k.
40023024	Lín chiah-ê chhiⁿ-mî chòe chhōa-lō͘-ê, chi̍t chiah sòe chiah báng-thâng lín to kā lū chhut-lâi, lo̍k-tô tian-tò kui-chiah kā thun lo̍h-khì.
40023025	“Ké-hó ê keng-ha̍k-kàu-su kap [Hoat-lī-sài-lâng], lín chhám à! In-ūi lín chiong poe kap pôaⁿ ê gōa-bīn sóe chheng-khì, lāi-bīn khiok tóe móa tham-io̍k kap hòng-chhiòng.
40023026	Lín chiah-ê chhiⁿ-mî ê [Hoat-lī-sài-lâng] ah, tio̍h seng kā poe ê lāi-bīn sóe chheng-khì, gōa-bīn chū-jiân chiū chheng-khì.
40023027	“Ké-hó ê keng-ha̍k-kàu-su kap [Hoat-lī-sài-lâng], lín chhám à! In-ūi lín chhin-chhiūⁿ chhat pe̍h-pe̍h ê bōng, gōa-bīn hó-khòaⁿ, lāi-bīn khiok tóe móa sí-lâng ê kut-thâu kap ta̍k hāng ê ù-òe.
40023028	Lín mā chhin-chhiūⁿ án-ni, gōa-bīn hō͘ lâng khòaⁿ-chòe gī-lâng, lāi-bīn khiok chhiong-móa ké-hó kap put-hoat.
40023029	“Ké-hó ê keng-ha̍k-kàu-su kap Hoat-lī-sài-lâng, lín chhám à! In-ūi lín chō sian-ti ê bōng, chéng-siu gī-lâng ê kì-liām-pi,
40023030	koh kóng ‘Goán nā oa̍h tī goán chó͘-sian ê sî-tāi, it-tēng bōe kap in chòe-hé sat-hāi sian-ti’.
40023031	Án-ni, lín sī teh chèng-si̍t lín ka-kī sī sat-hāi sian-ti ê lâng ê kiáⁿ-sun.
40023032	Lín chó͘-sian chòe ê pháiⁿ-tāi, chòe lín khì oân-sêng hó lah!
40023033	Lín chiah-ê to̍k-chôa ê kiáⁿ-sun, kan-kúi ê lâng ah, lín kiám ōe-tàng tô-siám tōe-ge̍k ê hêng-hoa̍t?
40023034	Só͘-í, góa beh chhe sian-ti, tì-hūi ê lâng, kap keng-ha̍k-kàu-su khì lín hia; in ū-ê ōe hō͘ lín sat-hāi á-sī tèng si̍p-jī-kè, ū-ê ōe hō͘ lín tī lín ê hōe-tn̂g piⁿ-phah, hō͘ lín tùi chit-ê siâⁿ kóaⁿ kàu hit-ê siâⁿ.
40023035	Án-ni, lín tī tōe-chiūⁿ thâi-sí gī-lâng ê huih-chè lóng kui tī lín sin-chiūⁿ; chiū-sī tùi gī-lâng [A-pek] lâu ê huih kàu [Pa-lia̍p-ka] ê kiáⁿ [Sat-ka-lī-a] tī sèng-só͘ kap chè-tôaⁿ ê tiong-kan lâu ê huih, lóng kui tī lín sin-chiūⁿ.
40023036	Góa si̍t-chāi kā lín kóng, chiah-ê huih-chè lóng ōe kui tī chit sè-tāi ê lâng.”
40023037	“[Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] ah, [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] ah, lí thâi-sí sian-ti, koh ēng chio̍h-thâu tìm-sí Siōng-tè chhe lâi lí chia ê sù-chiá. Góa jōa chōe piàn ài-beh chū-chi̍p lí ê kiáⁿ-jî, chhin-chhiūⁿ koe-bú chū-chi̍p koe-á-kiáⁿ kā in áⁿ tī si̍t-kó͘-ē, lín lóng bô ài!
40023038	Lín khòaⁿ, lín ê chhù ōe hong-hòe, bô-lâng tòa.
40023039	Góa kā lín kóng, tùi taⁿ í-āu lín choa̍t-tùi khòaⁿ bōe-tio̍h góa, ti̍t-kàu lín kóng, ‘Hōng Chú ê miâ lâi Hit-ūi eng-kai siū chheng-chàn!’ ”
40024001	Iâ-so͘ tùi Sèng-tiān chhut-lâi, tú-beh lī-khui ê sî, bûn-tô͘ óa-lâi, pò I khòaⁿ Sèng-tiān ê kiàn-tio̍k-bu̍t.
40024002	Iâ-so͘ kā in kóng, “Chiah-ê lín kiám m̄-sī lóng ū khòaⁿ-tio̍h? Góa si̍t-chāi kā lín kóng, tī chia it-chheh lóng ōe siū thiah-húi, thiah-kah bô chi̍t tè chio̍h ōe tha̍h tī pa̍t-tè téng-bīn.”
40024003	Iâ-so͘ tī [Ka-ná-soaⁿ] téng teh chē ê sî, bûn-tô͘ su-hā lâi mn̄g I, “Chhiáⁿ kā goán kóng chit-ê tāi-chì sím-mi̍h sî ōe hoat-seng? Lí ê lâi-lîm kap kim-sè ê kiat-kio̍k ū sím-mi̍h tiāu-thâu?”
40024004	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Tio̍h kín-sīn, chiah-bián hō͘ lâng kā lín bê-he̍k.
40024005	In-ūi ū chin chōe lâng ōe lī-iōng góa ê miâ, kóng ‘Góa chiū-sī Ki-tok’ lâi bê-he̍k chin chōe lâng.
40024006	Lín ōe thiaⁿ-tio̍h chiàn-cheng í-ki̍p chiàn-cheng ê hong-siaⁿ. Tio̍h kín-sīn, m̄-bián kiaⁿ. Chiah-ê tāi-chì it-tēng ōe hoat-seng, m̄-kú chiong-kio̍k iáu-bē kàu.
40024007	In-ūi bîn-cho̍k ōe khí-lâi kong-kek bîn-cho̍k, kok-ka kong-kek kok-ka; chin chōe só͘-chāi ū ki-hng kap tōe-tāng.
40024008	Che it-chhè ê tāi-chì put-kò sī chhui-chūn thàng-thiàⁿ ê khai-sí.
40024009	“Hit sî, lín ōe hō͘ lâng lia̍h-khì, siū khó͘-chhó͘, sat-hāi; lín ōe in-ūi góa ê miâ hō͘ bān-bîn oàn-hūn.
40024010	Hit sî, chin chōe lâng ōe sit-khì sìn-sim, hō͘-siōng chhut-bōe, pí-chhú oàn-hūn.
40024011	Ū chin chōe ké sian-ti ōe chhut-hiān lâi bê-he̍k chin chōe lâng.
40024012	Put-hoat ê tāi-chì ná ke-thiⁿ, chin chōe lâng ê thiàⁿ-sim ōe chiām-chiām léng-tām.
40024013	M̄-kú jím-nāi kàu chòe-āu ê lâng ōe tit-tio̍h kiù.
40024014	Chit-ê Thian-kok ê hok-im ōe thoân kàu phó͘-thiⁿ-ē, tùi bān-bîn chòe kiàn-chèng, chòe-āu chiong-kio̍k chiah ōe kàu.”
40024015	“Só͘-í, tng lín khòaⁿ-tio̍h Siōng-tè thong-kè sian-ti [Tān-í-lí] só͘ kóng hit-ê ‘Khó-ò͘ⁿ ê Húi-bia̍t-chiá’ khiā tī sîn-sèng ê só͘-chāi --- tha̍k ê lâng tio̍h bêng-pe̍k chit kù ōe ê ì-sù ---
40024016	hit sî tī [Iû-thài] ê tio̍h tô-cháu khì soaⁿ-lāi;
40024017	tī chhù-téng ê m̄-thang lo̍h-lâi the̍h chhù-lāi ê mi̍h;
40024018	tī hn̂g-ni̍h ê m̄-thang tńg-khì hiahⁿ gōa-saⁿ.
40024019	Tī hiah-ê ji̍t-chí, ū sin-īn ê kap hō͘ eⁿ-á chia̍h-lin ê hū-jîn-lâng hui-siông put-hēng!
40024020	Tio̍h kî-tó, lín chiah-bián tī tang-thiⁿ á-sī An-hioh-ji̍t tô-lān.
40024021	In-ūi tī hiah-ê ji̍t-chí teh-beh ū tōa chai-lān, sī chhòng-chō ú-tiū í-lâi m̄-bat ū ê, chiong-lâi mā bōe-koh ū.
40024022	Siōng-tè nā bô kiám-chió hiah-ê ji̍t-chí, sè-kan-lâng bô chi̍t ê ōe tit-tio̍h kiù. Chóng-sī ūi-tio̍h I ê soán-bîn, Siōng-tè ōe kiám-chió hiah-ê ji̍t-chí.
40024023	“Nā ū lâng kā lín kóng ‘Lín khòaⁿ, Ki-tok tī chia’, á-sī kóng ‘I tī hia’, m̄-thang siong-sìn.
40024024	In-ūi ū chi̍t-kóa ké Ki-tok kap ké sian-ti ōe chhut-hiān, kiâⁿ tōa sîn-jiah kap kî-sū lâi bê-he̍k lâng, nā ōe-tàng, liân soán-bîn to beh kā in bê-he̍k.
40024025	Góa í-keng seng kā lín kóng lah.
40024026	“Só͘-í, nā ū lâng kā lín kóng ‘Lín khòaⁿ, Ki-tok tī khòng-iá’, m̄-thang chhut-khì; á-sī kóng ‘Lín khòaⁿ, I tī pâng-keng lāi’, mā m̄-thang siong-sìn.
40024027	Sih-nà tùi tang-pêng sih kàu sai-pêng, Jîn-chú ê lâi-lîm mā ōe chhin-chhiūⁿ án-ni.
40024028	“Si-thé tī tó-ūi, thuh-thâu-eng lóng ōe khîⁿ óa-khì hia.”
40024029	“Chit-ê chai-lān ê ji̍t-chí chi̍t-ē kè-khì, ji̍t ōe pìⁿ o͘-àm, ge̍h bōe hoat-kng, chhiⁿ ōe tùi thiⁿ-téng lak lo̍h-lâi, thiⁿ-téng ê kng-thé lóng ōe iô-choah.
40024030	Hit sî Jîn-chú ê tiāu-thâu ōe tī thiⁿ-téng chhut-hiān. Tōe-chiūⁿ bān-cho̍k bān-bîn lóng ōe thî-khàu; in ōe khòaⁿ-kìⁿ Jîn-chú chhiong-móa koân-lêng kap tōa êng-kng chē thiⁿ-téng ê hûn lâi-lîm.
40024031	I ōe chhe I ê thiⁿ-sài pûn hiáng-liāng ê lat-pah, tùi thiⁿ ê chit pêng kàu thiⁿ ê hit pêng, tùi sì-hng chū-chi̍p I ê soán-bîn.”
40024032	“Tio̍h tùi bû-hoa-kó-chhiū ha̍k-si̍p: Ki puh-íⁿ hoat-hio̍h ê sî, lín chiū chai hē-thiⁿ teh-beh kàu à.
40024033	Chhin-chhiūⁿ án-ni, lín khòaⁿ-tio̍h che it-chhè ê tāi-chì ê sî chiū chai Jîn-chú í-keng chiap-kūn, kàu mn̂g-kháu lah.
40024034	Góa si̍t-chāi kā lín kóng, chit sè-tāi iáu-bē kè-khì, che it-chhè lóng ōe hoat-seng.
40024035	Thiⁿ kap tōe ōe siau-sit, m̄-kú góa ê ōe choa̍t-tùi bōe siau-sit.”
40024036	“Koan-hē hit-ê ji̍t, hit-ê sî, bô-lâng chai; thiⁿ-téng ê thiⁿ-sài m̄-chai, Kiáⁿ mā m̄-chai, chí-ū Pē chai nā-tiāⁿ.
40024037	In-ūi Jîn-chú ê lâi-lîm mā ōe chhin-chhiūⁿ [Ná-a] ê sî ê chêng-kéng.
40024038	Tōa-chúi lâi í-chêng kàu [Ná-a] chìn-ji̍p tōa-chûn hit ji̍t, lâng chiàu-siông lim-chia̍h kè-chhōa.
40024039	In hô͘-lí-hô͘-tô͘ lóng m̄-chai, tōa-chúi hut-jiân lâi, kā in lóng chhiong-cháu. Jîn-chú ê lâi-lîm mā ōe án-ni.
40024040	Hit sî, ū nn̄g ê lâng tī chhân-ni̍h, chi̍t ê siū chiap-khì; chi̍t ê pàng-teh.
40024041	Nn̄g ê hū-jîn-lâng tī oe-bō-keng teh oe chio̍h-bō, chi̍t ê siū chiap-khì; chi̍t ê pàng-teh.
40024042	“Tio̍h kéng-séng, in-ūi lín m̄-chai lín ê Chú sím-mi̍h ji̍t ōe lâi-lîm.
40024043	Lín tio̍h chai, chhù ê chú-lâng nā chai àm-sî kúi tiám chha̍t-á ōe lâi, it-tēng ōe kéng-séng, bōe hō͘ chha̍t-á ó͘ piah-khang ji̍p-lâi chhù-lāi.
40024044	Só͘-í, lín mā tio̍h chún-pī piān-piān, in-ūi Jîn-chú ōe tī lín siūⁿ bōe-kàu ê sî-chūn lâi-lîm.”
40024045	“Nā-sī án-ni, sím-mi̍h-lâng sī tiong-si̍t koh chhong-bêng ê lô͘-po̍k? Chīu-sī chú-lâng kau-tài i koán ke-lāi kî-tha ê lô͘-po̍k, chiàu sî pun chia̍h-mi̍h hō͘ in ê lâng.
40024046	Chú-lâng tńg-lâi ê sî khòaⁿ-tio̍h ū chiàu án-ni teh chòe hit-ê lô͘-po̍k si̍t-chāi ū hok-khì.
40024047	Góa si̍t-chāi kā lín kóng, chú-lâng ōe phài chit-ê lô͘-po̍k khì koán-lí i lóng-chóng ê châi-sán.
40024048	Hit-ê pháiⁿ ê lô͘-po̍k nā sim-lāi siūⁿ-kóng ‘Góa ê chú-lâng bōe hiah kín tńg-lâi’,
40024049	chiū phah pîⁿ-pîⁿ chòe lô͘-po̍k-ê, koh kap chiú-chùi-ê chòe-hé ia̍h-lim-ia̍h-chia̍h.
40024050	Chú-lâng ōe tī i bô àn-sǹg ê ji̍t, m̄-chai ê sî-chūn tńg-lâi.
40024051	Chú-lâng ōe giâm-giâm kā i chhú-hoa̍t, kā i kap ké-hó ê lâng hē chòe-tui; tī hia in ōe thî-khàu, kā-gê chhiat-chhí.”
40025001	“Thian-kok thang phì-jū chòe cha̍p ê chāi-sek-lú gia̍h teng chhut-khì gêng-chiap sin-lông.
40025002	Kî-tiong ū gō͘ ê gōng-ê, gō͘ ê khiáu-ê.
40025003	Hiah-ê gōng-ê gia̍h teng, bô lēng-gōa tòa iû,
40025004	m̄-kú khiáu-ê gia̍h teng, ū lēng-gōa tòa kúi-nā koàn iû.
40025005	Sin-lông khah òaⁿ kàu, in soah lóng tuh-ku khùn-khì.
40025006	“Pòaⁿ-mî, ū lâng tōa-siaⁿ hoah, ‘Sin-lông lâi lah, chhut-lâi gêng-chiap!’
40025007	Hit sî, hiah-ê chāi-sek-lú lóng chhíⁿ khí-lâi, siu-chéng in ê teng.
40025008	Gōng-ê kā khiáu-ê kóng, ‘Goán ê teng teh-beh hoa khì lah, lín ê iû pun chi̍t-kóa hō͘ goán.’
40025009	Khiáu-ê ìn kóng, ‘Kiaⁿ-liáu iû bô kàu pun lín ēng, siōng-hó lín ka-kī khì kā bōe-iû-ê bóe.’
40025010	In khì bóe ê sî sin-lông kàu-ūi, hiah-ê chún-pī hó-sè-ê kap i ji̍p khì hù hun-iàn, mn̂g chiū koaiⁿ khí-lâi.
40025011	“Āu-lâi hiah-ê gōng ê chāi-sek-lú mā lâi, kóng, ‘Sian-siⁿ, sian-siⁿ, chhiáⁿ kā goán khui-mn̂g.’
40025012	Sin-lông ìn kóng, ‘Góa si̍t-chāi kā lín kóng, góa m̄-bat lín!’
40025013	“Só͘-í, tio̍h kéng-séng, in-ūi hit-ê ji̍t hit-ê sî lín m̄-chai.”
40025014	“Thian-kok chhin-chhiūⁿ ū chi̍t ê lâng beh chhut-gōa lú-hêng, kiò ka-kī ê lô͘-po̍k lâi, chiong châi-sán kau-tài in.
40025015	I chiàu ta̍k lâng ê châi-tiāu kau kim-pè hō͘ in, chi̍t ê gō͘-chheng, chi̍t ê nn̄g-chheng, chi̍t ê chi̍t-chheng, chiū chhut-gōa khì.
40025016	Hit-ê niá gō͘-chheng ê sûi-sî the̍h khì chòe seng-lí, koh thàn gō͘-chheng.
40025017	Siâng-khoán, hit-ê niá nn̄g-chheng ê mā koh thàn nn̄g-chheng.
40025018	M̄-kú hit-ê niá chi̍t-chheng ê chhut-khì, tī thô͘-kha ó͘ chi̍t khang, kā chú-lâng ê kim-pè chhàng khí-lâi.
40025019	“Kè chin kú, hiah-ê lô͘-po̍k ê chú-lâng tńg-lâi, kap in sǹg-siàu.
40025020	Hit-ê niá gō͘-chheng ê kiâⁿ chìn-chêng, lēng-gōa the̍h gō͘-chheng lâi, kóng, ‘Thâu-ke, lí kau-tài góa gō͘-chheng ê kim-pè, chhiáⁿ khòaⁿ, góa ū koh thàn gō͘-chheng.’
40025021	Chú-lâng kā i kóng, ‘Chin hó, hó koh tiong-si̍t ê lô͘-po̍k, lí kì-jiân tī chió-ê ū tiong-si̍t, góa beh phài lí koán khah chōe-ê; ji̍p-lâi kap chú-lâng chòe-hé hoaⁿ-hí.’
40025022	“Niá nn̄g-chheng ê mā lâi, kóng, ‘Thâu-ke, lí kau-tài góa nn̄g-chheng ê kim-pè, chhiáⁿ lí khòaⁿ, góa ū koh thàn nn̄g-chheng.’
40025023	Chú-lâng kā i kóng, ‘Chin hó, hó koh tiong-si̍t ê lô͘-po̍k, lí kì-jiân tī chió-ê ū tiong-si̍t, góa beh phài lí koán khah chōe-ê; ji̍p-lâi kap chú-lâng chòe-hé hoaⁿ-hí.’
40025024	“Chit sî, hit-ê niá chi̍t-chheng ê mā kiâⁿ chìn-chêng, kóng, ‘Thâu-ke, góa chai lí sī giâm-hat ê lâng, bô iā-chéng mā beh siu-koah, bô chèng-choh mā beh siu-sêng.
40025025	Góa chin kiaⁿ, chiah chiong lí ê kim-pè the̍h-khì chhàng tī thô͘-kha-tóe. Taⁿ lí ê kim-pè hêng lí.’
40025026	“Chú-lâng ìn kóng, ‘Pháiⁿ koh pîn-tōaⁿ ê lô͘-po̍k, lí kì-jiân chai góa bô iā-chéng mā beh siu-koah, bô chèng-choh mā beh siu-sêng,
40025027	lí eng-kai chiong góa ê kim-pè kià gûn-hâng, góa tńg-lâi ê sî thang liân-pún tài-lī siu-hôe.
40025028	Lín kā i ê kim-pè the̍h-lâi, kau hō͘ ū chi̍t-bān kim-pè hit-ê lâng.
40025029	In-ūi ū-ê, beh hō͘ i koh-khah chōe; bô-ê, liân i só͘-ū ê mā beh kā i chhiúⁿ khí-lâi.
40025030	Chit-ê bô lō͘-ēng ê lô͘-po̍k, kā i kóaⁿ chhut-khì gōa-bīn o͘-àm ê só͘-chāi; tī hia i ōe thî-khàu, kā-gê chhiat-chhí.’ ”
40025031	“Jîn-chú choh-ông chhōa chèng thiⁿ-sài lâi-lîm ê sî, I ōe chē tī êng-iāu ê pó-chō.
40025032	Tōe-chiūⁿ bān-bîn lóng ōe chū-chi̍p tī I bīn-chêng. I ōe chiong in hun-chòe nn̄g pêng, chhin-chhiūⁿ bo̍k-chiá chiong mî-iûⁿ kap soaⁿ-iûⁿ hun-khui;
40025033	kā mî-iûⁿ an-pâi tī chiàⁿ-pêng, soaⁿ-iûⁿ tī tò-pêng.
40025034	Āu-lâi, Ông ōe kā chiàⁿ-pêng ê lâng kóng, ‘Lâi, lín chiah-ê siū góa ê Pē chiok-hok ê, lâi sêng-siū tùi chhòng-chō ú-tiū í-lâi chiū ūi-tio̍h lín chún-pī ê kok-tō͘.
40025035	In-ūi góa iau, lín ū hō͘ góa chia̍h; góa chhùi-ta, lín ū hō͘ góa lim; góa choh chhut-gōa-lâng, lín ū kā góa siu-liû;
40025036	góa chhiah-sin lō͘-thé, lín ū hō͘ góa chhēng; góa phòa-pīⁿ, lín ū kā góa chiàu-kò͘; góa tī kaⁿ-ni̍h, lín ū lâi thàm góa.’
40025037	“Hit sî, gī-lâng ōe ìn I kóng, ‘Chú ah, sím-mi̍h sî goán khòaⁿ-tio̍h lí iau ū hō͘ lí chia̍h, chhùi-ta ū hō͘ lí lim?
40025038	Sím-mi̍h sî goán khòaⁿ-tio̍h lí choh chhut-gōa-lâng ū kā lí siu-liû, chhiah-sin lō͘-thé ū hō͘ lí chhēng?
40025039	Sím-mi̍h sî goán khòaⁿ-tio̍h lí phòa-pīⁿ á-sī tī kaⁿ-ni̍h, goán ū khì thàm lí?’
40025040	Ông ōe ìn kóng, ‘Góa si̍t-chāi kā lín kóng, lín ū án-ni tùi-thāi góa hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē siōng bî-sòe ê chi̍t ê, chiū-sī hó khoán-thāi góa.’
40025041	“Āu-lâi, Ông ōe kā tò-pêng ê lâng kóng, ‘Lín chiah-ê siū chiù-chó͘ ê lâng, lī-khui góa, ji̍p-khì ūi-tio̍h Mô͘-kúi kap i ê sù-chiá só͘ chún-pī éng-oán ê hé-ni̍h.
40025042	In-ūi góa iau, lín bô hō͘ góa chia̍h; góa chhùi-ta, lín bô hō͘ góa lim;
40025043	góa choh chhut-gōa-lâng, lín bô kā góa siu-liû; góa chhiah-sin lō͘-thé, lín bô hō͘ góa chhēng; góa phòa-pīⁿ á-sī tī kaⁿ-ni̍h, lín bô lâi thàm góa.’
40025044	“Hit sî, in mā ōe ìn kóng, ‘Chú ah, sím-mi̍h sî goán khòaⁿ-tio̍h lí iau, chhùi-ta, choh chhut-gōa-lâng, chhiah-sin lō͘-thé, phòa-pīⁿ, á-sī tī kaⁿ-ni̍h, bô kā lí chiàu-kò͘?’
40025045	Ông ōe kā in kóng, ‘Góa si̍t-chāi kā lín kóng, lín bô án-ni tùi-thāi siōng bî-sòe ê chi̍t ê, chiū-sī bô hó khoán-thāi góa.’
40025046	Chiah-ê lâng ōe siū éng-oán ê hêng-hoa̍t, chóng-sī gī-lâng ōe tit-tio̍h éng-oán ê oa̍h-miā.”
40026001	Iâ-so͘ kóng chiah-ê ōe liáu-āu kā I ê bûn-tô͘ kóng,
40026002	“Lín chai koh kè nn̄g ji̍t chiū-sī Pôaⁿ-kè-choeh, Jîn-chú ōe siū chhut-bōe hō͘ lâng tèng si̍p-jī-kè.”
40026003	Hit sî, chè-si-tiúⁿ kap bîn-kan ê tiúⁿ-ló chū-chi̍p tī tōa-chè-si [Kai-a-hoat] ê kong-koán.
40026004	In chham-siông beh ēng kè-bô͘ lia̍h Iâ-so͘, kā I hāi-sí.
40026005	M̄-kú in kóng, “M̄-thang tī choeh-kî tiong, kiaⁿ-liáu bîn-chiòng khí pō-tōng.”
40026006	Iâ-so͘ tī [Pek-tāi-nî] bâ-hong pīⁿ-lâng [Se-bûn] ê chhù teh chē-toh chia̍h-pn̄g ê sî, ū chi̍t ê hū-jîn-lâng the̍h chi̍t koàn ge̍k-pân, lāi-bīn tóe hui-siông ko-kùi ê phang-iû, kiâⁿ óa-lâi, chiong phang-iû tò tī Iâ-so͘ ê thâu-khak téng.
40026008	Bûn-tô͘ khòaⁿ-tio̍h chin siū-khì, kóng, “Ná-tio̍h chiah lōng-hùi?
40026009	Chit koàn phang-iû ōe-tàng bōe chin chōe chîⁿ lâi kiù-chè sàn-chhiah-lâng.”
40026010	Iâ-so͘ chai-iáⁿ, chiū tùi in kóng, “Lín ná-beh tiau-lân chit-ê hū-jîn-lâng? I ū ūi-tio̍h góa chòe chi̍t hāng hó-sū.
40026011	Put-sî ū sàn-chhiah-lâng kap lín chòe-hé, put-kò góa bōe put-sî kap lín chòe-hé.
40026012	I tò phang-iû tī góa ê seng-khu sī kā góa chún-pī bâi-chòng.
40026013	Góa si̍t-chāi kā lín kóng, chit-ê hok-im bô-lūn thoân kàu choân sè-kài sím-mi̍h só͘-chāi, lâng lóng ōe kóng-khí chit-ê hū-jîn-lâng ê só͘-chòe lâi kā i kì-liām.”
40026014	Cha̍p-jī sù-tô͘ ê chi̍t ê, kiò-chòe [Í-su-ka-lio̍k] ê [Iû-tāi], khì kìⁿ hiah-ê chè-si-tiúⁿ,
40026015	kóng, “Góa nā chiong Iâ-so͘ kau hō͘ lín, lín beh hō͘ góa sím-mi̍h?” In chiū the̍h saⁿ-cha̍p ê gûn-á hō͘ i.
40026016	Tùi hit sî khí, [Iû-tāi] it-ti̍t teh chhē ki-hōe beh chhut-bōe Iâ-so͘.
40026017	Tû-kàⁿ-choeh ê thâu-chi̍t ji̍t, bûn-tô͘ lâi mn̄g Iâ-so͘, “Lí ài goán tī tó-ūi kā lí chún-pī chia̍h Pôaⁿ-kè-choeh ê boán-chhan?”
40026018	Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Lín ji̍p-siâⁿ khì chhē hit-ê bó͘-lâng, kā i kóng, ‘Lāu-su kóng: Góa ê sî í-keng kàu, góa beh kap góa ê bûn-tô͘ tī lí ê chhù siú Pôaⁿ-kè-choeh.’ ”
40026019	Bûn-tô͘ chiū chiàu Iâ-so͘ ê hoan-hù khì chún-pī Pôaⁿ-kè-choeh ê boán-chhan.
40026020	Hông-hun ê sî, Iâ-so͘ kap cha̍p-jī sù-tô͘ chē-toh.
40026021	In teh chia̍h-pn̄g ê sî, Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Góa si̍t-chāi kā lín kóng, lín tiong-kan ū chi̍t ê lâng beh kā góa chhut-bōe.”
40026022	In chin siong-sim, chi̍t-ê chi̍t-ê kā I mn̄g, “Chú ah, m̄-sī góa hò͘ⁿ?”
40026023	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Chhun-chhiú kap góa siâng-sî the̍h chia̍h-mi̍h tī pôaⁿ-ni̍h teh ùn hit-ê lâng beh kā góa chhut-bōe.
40026024	Chiàu Sèng-keng só͘ kì-chài, Jîn-chú ōe siū hāi, put-kò chhut-bōe Jîn-chú ê lâng chhám à! Hit-ê lâng lêng-khó bô chhut-sì khah hó.”
40026025	Chhut-bōe Iâ-so͘ ê [Iû-tāi] mā kā I mn̄g, “Lia̍p-pí, m̄-sī góa hò͘ⁿ?” Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Che sī lí kóng ê.”
40026026	In teh chia̍h ê sî, Iâ-so͘ the̍h piáⁿ, kám-siā liáu-āu peh-khui, pun hō͘ bûn-tô͘, kóng, “The̍h-khì chia̍h; che sī góa ê seng-khu.”
40026027	Jiân-āu I phâng-poe, kám-siā liáu-āu the̍h hō͘ bûn-tô͘, kóng, “Lín lóng tio̍h lim chit poe,
40026028	in-ūi che sī góa ê huih, sī li̍p-iok ê huih, ūi-tio̍h chin chōe lâng lâu-chhut ê, beh hō͘ in ê chōe tit-tio̍h sià-bián.
40026029	Góa kā lín kóng, tī góa ê Pē ê Kok kap lín lim sin ê phû-tô-chiú hit ji̍t í-chêng, góa choa̍t-tùi bōe-koh lim chit-ê chiú.”
40026030	In gîm-si liáu-āu chiū chhut-khì, khì [Ka-ná-soaⁿ].
40026031	Iâ-so͘ kā in kóng, “Kim-mî lín lóng ōe pàng-sak góa, in-ūi Sèng-keng ū kì-chài: Góa beh phah bo̍k-chiá, kui-kûn iûⁿ chiū sì-sòaⁿ.
40026032	M̄-kú góa koh-oa̍h í-āu ōe pí lín seng khì [Ka-lī-lī].”
40026033	[Pí-tek] tùi Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Sui-jiân in tāi-ke lóng pàng-sak lí, góa choa̍t-tùi bōe pàng-sak lí!”
40026034	Iâ-so͘ kā i kóng, “Góa si̍t-chāi kā lí kóng, kim-mî koe thî í-chêng, lí ōe saⁿ pái m̄-jīn góa.”
40026035	[Pí-tek] ìn kóng, “Nā it-tēng tio̍h kap lí chòe-hé sí, góa mā choa̍t-tùi bōe m̄-jīn lí!” Kî-tha ê bûn-tô͘ mā lóng án-ni kóng.
40026036	Āu-lâi, Iâ-so͘ kap bûn-tô͘ lâi-kàu chi̍t ê só͘-chāi kiò-chòe [Khek-se-má-nî]. I kā bûn-tô͘ kóng, “Góa khì hia kî-tó, lín tiàm chia chē.”
40026037	I chiū chhōa [Pí-tek] kap [Se-pí-thài] ê nn̄g ê kiáⁿ chòe-hé khì. I pi-siong, hui-siông thòng-khó͘,
40026038	tùi in kóng, “Góa sim iu-siong kàu beh sí. Lín tiàm chia! Kap góa chòe-hé kéng-séng.”
40026039	I kiâⁿ khah chìn-chêng, bīn phak lo̍h-khì, kî-tó kóng, “Góa ê Pē ah, nā ōe-tàng, kiû lí hō͘ góa bián lim chit-ê poe, m̄-kú m̄-sī chiàu góa ê ì-sù, tio̍h chiàu lí ê chí-ì si̍t-hiān.”
40026040	I tńg-lâi bûn-tô͘ hia, khòaⁿ-tio̍h in teh khùn, chiū tùi [Pí-tek] kóng, “Lín chin-chiàⁿ bōe-tàng kap góa kéng-séng chi̍t tiám cheng kú sī-bô?
40026041	Tio̍h kéng-séng, tio̍h kî-tó, chiah bōe hām-lo̍h iú-he̍k; lín sui-jiân sim chin ì-ài, m̄-kú jio̍k-thé loán-jio̍k.”
40026042	Iâ-so͘ tē-jī piàn koh khì kî-tó, kóng, “Góa ê Pē ah, chit-ê poe nā bōe-tàng bián, góa it-tēng tio̍h lim, goān lí ê chí-ì si̍t-hiān.”
40026043	I koh tńg-lâi, khòaⁿ-tio̍h in in-ūi ba̍k-chiu siap iáu teh khùn.
40026044	Iâ-so͘ koh lī-khui in, tē-saⁿ piàn khì kî-tó, mā-sī kóng siâng-khoán ê ōe.
40026045	Jiân-āu I koh tńg-lâi bûn-tô͘ hia, tùi in kóng, “Lín iáu teh khùn, iáu teh hioh-khùn ò͘? Lín khòaⁿ, sî-kan chiap-kūn lah; Jîn-chú siū chhut-bōe kau tī chōe-jîn ê chhiú-thâu lah.
40026046	Khí-lâi, lán lâi-khì. Lín khòaⁿ, chhut-bōe góa ê lâng lâi lah.”
40026047	Iâ-so͘ iáu teh kóng-ōe ê sî, cha̍p-jī sù-tô͘ ê chi̍t ê --- [Iû-tāi] lâi, chè-si-tiúⁿ kap bîn-kan ê tiúⁿ-ló phài lâi ê chi̍t tōa-tīn lâng gia̍h to gia̍h kùn kap i tàu-tīn lâi.
40026048	Chhut-bōe Iâ-so͘ hit-ê lâng ū hō͘ in chi̍t ê àm-hō, kóng, “Góa kā I chim hit-ê chiū-sī; lín kā I lia̍h.”
40026049	[Iû-tāi] sûi-sî kiâⁿ-óa Iâ-so͘, tùi I kóng, “Lia̍p-pí, pêng-an!” chiū kā I chim.
40026050	Iâ-so͘ kā i kóng, “Pêng-iú, lí ná tī chia?” Hiah-ê lâng chiū óa-khì, hē-chhiú lia̍h Iâ-so͘.
40026051	Hut-jiân, ū chi̍t ê kap Iâ-so͘ tàu-tīn ê lâng chhun-chhiú pu̍ih-to tùi tōa-chè-si ê lô͘-po̍k phut lo̍h-khì, kā chi̍t pêng ê hīⁿ-á siah khí-lâi.
40026052	Iâ-so͘ kā i kóng, “To siu khí-lâi, in-ūi gia̍h-to-ê lóng ōe sí tī to-ē.
40026053	Lí siūⁿ-kóng góa bōe-tàng khún-kiû góa ê Pē sûi-sî chhe cha̍p-jī iâⁿ khah ke ê thiⁿ-sài lâi sī-bô?
40026054	Góa nā án-ni chòe, Sèng-keng só͘ kì-chài it-tēng tio̍h hoat-seng ê tāi-chì ná-ōe èng-giām?”
40026055	Hit sî Iâ-so͘ tùi kûn-chiòng kóng, “Lín gia̍h to gia̍h kùn chhut-lâi lia̍h góa sī beh lia̍h kiông-tō sī-bô? Góa ta̍k ji̍t tī Sèng-tiān chē teh kà-sī lâng, lín bô kā góa lia̍h.
40026056	Put-kò che it-chhè ê tāi-chì lóng í-keng si̍t-hiān, sī beh èng-giām sian-ti tī Sèng-keng só͘ kóng ê ōe.” Jiân-āu, só͘-ū ê bûn-tô͘ lóng pàng-sak Iâ-so͘ tô-cháu.
40026057	Hiah-ê lia̍h Iâ-so͘ ê lâng kā I chhōa-khì tōa-chè-si [Kai-a-hoat] hia; keng-ha̍k-kàu-su kap tiúⁿ-ló lóng í-keng chū-chi̍p tī hia.
40026058	[Pí-tek] lī hn̄g-hn̄g teh tè Iâ-so͘, tè kàu tōa-chè-si kong-koán ê tiâⁿ. I ji̍p-khì lāi-bīn kap kéng-ōe chòe-hé chē, beh khòaⁿ tāi-chì ê kiat-kio̍k.
40026059	Chè-si-tiúⁿ kap choân gī-hōe it-ti̍t teh chhē ké chèng-kù beh kò Iâ-so͘, thang kā I chhú-sí.
40026060	Sui-jiân ū chin chōe lâng chhut-lâi kā I bû-kò, m̄-kú in lóng chhē bô chèng-kù. Āu-lâi ū nn̄g ê lâng chhut-lâi,
40026061	kóng, “Chit-ê lâng bat kóng ‘Góa ū hoat-tō͘ húi-hoāi Siōng-tè ê Sèng-tiān, saⁿ ji̍t lāi koh kā i khí khí-lâi.’ ”
40026062	Tōa-chè-si khiā khí-lâi tùi Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Chiah-ê lâng teh kā lí kò sím-mi̍h? Lí ná lóng bô tap-piān?”
40026063	M̄-kú Iâ-so͘ lóng tiām-tiām. Tōa-chè-si koh chi̍t piàn tùi I kóng, “Góa bēng-lēng lí kí éng-oán-oa̍h ê Siōng-tè chiù-chōa kā goán kóng, lí sī Ki-tok, Siōng-tè ê Kiáⁿ á m̄-sī.”
40026064	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Lí í-keng kóng lah. M̄-kú góa kā lín kóng, tùi taⁿ í-āu lín ōe khòaⁿ-kìⁿ Jîn-chú chē tī Choân-lêng-chiá ê chiàⁿ-pêng, chē thiⁿ-téng ê hûn lâi-lîm.”
40026065	Tōa-chè-si chiū thiah-phòa gōa-saⁿ, kóng, “I í-keng siat-to̍k Siōng-tè. Lán iáu su-iàu sím-mi̍h chèng-jîn? Taⁿ lín í-keng ū thiaⁿ-tio̍h I siat-to̍k Siōng-tè.
40026066	Lín siūⁿ án-chóaⁿ?” In ìn kóng, “I kai sí!”
40026067	Āu-lâi in phùi-nōa tī Iâ-so͘ ê bīn, kā I cheng, koh ū lâng kā I siàn,
40026068	kóng, “Ki-tok à, lí sī sian-ti, kā goán kóng khòaⁿ-bāi, siáⁿ-lâng kā lí phah?”
40026069	[Pí-tek] tī kong-koán gōa-bīn ê tiâⁿ teh chē, ū chi̍t ê lú-pī kiâⁿ óa-khì, kóng, “Lí mā lóng ū teh kap hit-ê [Ka-lī-lī]-lâng Iâ-so͘ chòe-hé.”
40026070	[Pí-tek] tī chèng-lâng ê bīn-chêng m̄-jīn, kóng, “Góa m̄-chai lí teh kóng sím-mi̍h.”
40026071	[Pí-tek] kiâⁿ chhut-khì kàu tōa mn̂g-kháu ê sî, ū lēng-gōa chi̍t ê lú-pī khòaⁿ-tio̍h i, chiū kā tī hia ê lâng kóng, “Chit-ê lâng ū teh kap [Ná-sat-le̍k]-lâng Iâ-so͘ chòe-hé.”
40026072	[Pí-tek] koh chi̍t piàn chiù-chōa m̄-jīn, kóng, “Góa m̄-bat hit-ê lâng.”
40026073	Kè bô jōa kú, khiā tī piⁿ-a ê lâng óa-lâi, tùi [Pí-tek] kóng, “Lí khak-si̍t mā-sī in hit tīn ê lâng, thiaⁿ lí ê khiuⁿ chiū chai.”
40026074	I chiū chiù-chōa kóng, “Góa m̄-bat hit-ê lâng. Góa nā kóng pe̍h-chha̍t, goān Thiⁿ chek-hoa̍t góa!” Koe sûi-sî thî.
40026075	[Pí-tek] siūⁿ-tio̍h Iâ-so͘ só͘ kóng ê ōe, “Koe thî í-chêng, lí ōe saⁿ pái m̄-jīn góa”; i chiū chhut-khì gōa-bīn tōa-siaⁿ thî-khàu.
40027001	Thàu-chá, só͘-ū ê chè-si-tiúⁿ kap bîn-kan ê tiúⁿ-ló tàu-tīn chham-siông beh hām-hāi Iâ-so͘, kā I chhú sí-hêng.
40027002	In kā Iâ-so͘ pa̍k khí-lâi, ah-khì kau hō͘ [Lô-má] chóng-tok [Pí-lia̍p-to].
40027003	Chhut-bōe Iâ-so͘ ê [Iû-tāi] khòaⁿ-tio̍h Iâ-so͘ í-keng siū tēng-chōe, chiū hō͘-hóe, the̍h hit saⁿ-cha̍p ê gûn-á khì hêng hō͘ hiah-ê chè-si-tiúⁿ kap tiúⁿ-ló,
40027004	kóng, “Chhut-bōe bû-ko͘ ê lâng, góa ū chōe lah!” In ìn kóng, “Bô goán ê tāi-chì, lí ka-kī hū-chek!”
40027005	[Iû-tāi] chiong hiah-ê gûn-á hiat tī Sèng-tiān ê lāi-bīn chiū lī-khui, khì tiàu-sí.
40027006	Hiah-ê chè-si-tiúⁿ chiong gûn-á khioh khí-lâi, kóng, “Che sī huih-chîⁿ, bô eng-kai khǹg ji̍p Sèng-tiān ê kim-khò͘.”
40027007	In chham-siông liáu koat-tēng ēng chiah-ê chîⁿ khì bóe sio-hûi-lâng ê hn̂g, thang bâi-chòng chhut-gōa-lâng.
40027008	Só͘-í hit-ê hn̂g kàu kin-á-ji̍t iáu kiò-chòe Huih-hn̂g.
40027009	Chit-ê tāi-chì èng-giām Siōng-tè thong-kè sian-ti [Iâ-lī-bí] só͘ kóng ê ōe: “In the̍h hit saⁿ-cha̍p ê gûn-á, chiū-sī [Í-sek-lia̍t]-lâng ūi-tio̍h i kó͘-kè ê kè-chîⁿ,
40027010	chiàu Chú só͘ bēng-lēng góa ê, khì bóe hit khu sio-hûi-lâng ê hn̂g.”
40027011	Iâ-so͘ khiā tī chóng-tok ê bīn-chêng, chóng-tok mn̄g I kóng, “Lí sī [Iû-thài]-lâng ê Ông sī-bô?” Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Che sī lí kóng ê.”
40027012	Hiah-ê chè-si-tiúⁿ kap tiúⁿ-ló khòng-kò Iâ-so͘ ê sî, I lóng bô ìn.
40027013	Āu-lâi [Pí-lia̍p-to] tùi I kóng, “In kā lí khòng-kò chiah-chōe hāng tāi-chì, lí kiám bô thiaⁿ-kìⁿ?”
40027014	Iâ-so͘ iû-goân bô kā i ìn, liân chi̍t kù mā bô, chóng-tok soah kám-kak hui-siông kî-koài.
40027015	Ta̍k nî ê Pôaⁿ-kè-choeh, chiàu koàn-lē chóng-tok lóng ū pàng chi̍t ê kûn-chiòng ài pàng ê hoān-lâng.
40027016	Hit sî tú-hó ū chi̍t ê tāi-ke lóng bat ê hoān-lâng, miâ kiò-chòe [Iâ-so͘] [Pa-lia̍p-pa].
40027017	Só͘-í, kûn-chiòng chū-chi̍p ê sî, [Pí-lia̍p-to] mn̄g in kóng, “Lín ài góa pàng tó chi̍t ê hō͘ lín? [Iâ-so͘] [Pa-lia̍p-pa], á-sī chheng-chòe Ki-tok ê Iâ-so͘?”
40027018	[Pí-lia̍p-to] chai in sī in-ūi oàn-tò͘ chiah chiong Iâ-so͘ kau hō͘ i.
40027019	[Pí-lia̍p-to] khui-têng sím-mn̄g ê sî, i ê hu-jîn chhe lâng lâi kā i kóng, “Hit-ê gī-lâng ê tāi-chì, lí chhian-bān m̄-thang chhap; cha-àm góa tī bîn-bāng tiong in-ūi I siū chin chōe khó͘.”
40027020	Hiah-ê chè-si-tiúⁿ kap tiúⁿ-ló siàn-tōng bîn-chiòng, kah in tio̍h iau-kiû pàng [Pa-lia̍p-pa], kā Iâ-so͘ chhú sí-hêng.
40027021	Chóng-tok koh mn̄g in, “Chit nn̄g ê lâng lín ài góa pàng tó chi̍t ê hō͘ lín?” In ìn, “[Pa-lia̍p-pa]!”
40027022	[Pí-lia̍p-to] mn̄g in, “Án-ni, hit-ê chheng-chòe Ki-tok ê Iâ-so͘, lín ài góa án-chóaⁿ chhú-lí?” Kûn-chiòng lóng ìn, “Kā tèng si̍p-jī-kè!”
40027023	[Pí-lia̍p-to] kóng, “Sī-án-chóaⁿ? I ū chòe sím-mi̍h pháiⁿ tāi-chì?” In koh-khah tōa-siaⁿ hoah, “Kā tèng si̍p-jī-kè!”
40027024	[Pí-lia̍p-to] khòaⁿ í-keng bô chhái-kang, kiông-beh ín-khí pō-tōng, chiū the̍h chúi tī kûn-chiòng bīn-chêng sóe-chhiú, kóng, “Lín ka-kī hū-chek.”
40027025	Bîn-chiòng lóng ìn kóng, “Chit-ê lâng ê huih-chè, goán kap goán ê kiáⁿ-sun lâi tam-tng.”
40027026	[Pí-lia̍p-to] chiū pàng [Pa-lia̍p-pa] hō͘ in, koh bēng-lēng lâng ēng piⁿ phah Iâ-so͘, jiân-āu kau I khì tèng si̍p-jī-kè.
40027027	Chóng-tok ê peng-sū ah Iâ-so͘ ji̍p-khì chóng-tok-hú, tiàu-chi̍p choân-tūi ê peng kā I ûi khí-lâi.
40027028	In chiong Iâ-so͘ ê saⁿ thǹg khí-lâi, kā I chhēng chu-âng-sek ê tn̂g-phàu,
40027029	koh ēng chhì-á pīⁿ chi̍t téng ông-koan kā tì tī thâu-khak-téng, chiong chi̍t ki lô͘-tek-á hō͘ I gia̍h tī chiàⁿ-chhiú. In koh kūi tī I ê bīn-chêng hì-lāng, kóng, “[Iû-thài]-lâng ê Ông bān-sòe!”
40027030	In koh kā I phùi chhùi-nōa, gia̍h hit ki lô͘-tek-á sut I ê thâu-khak.
40027031	In kā I hì-lāng liáu-āu, chiong hit niá tn̂g-phàu kā thǹg khí-lâi, koh chiong I ka-kī ê saⁿ kā chhēng tò tńg-khì, jiân-āu kau I khì tèng si̍p-jī-kè.
40027032	In chhut-khì ê sî tú-tio̍h chi̍t ê [Kó͘-lī-nāi]-lâng, miâ kiò-chòe [Se-bûn]. In kiông-pek i giâ Iâ-so͘ ê si̍p-jī-kè.
40027033	In kàu chi̍t ê só͘-chāi kiò-chòe [Kok-kok-tha], chiū-sī “[Thâu-khak-óaⁿ-niá]”,
40027034	chiū ēng chham khó͘-táⁿ ê chiú hō͘ Iâ-so͘ lim; I tam chi̍t-ē, m̄ lim.
40027035	Peng-sū tèng Iâ-so͘ tī si̍p-jī-kè liáu-āu thiu-chhiam pun I ê saⁿ,
40027036	jiân-āu chē tī hia kò͘-siú.
40027037	In tī I ê thâu-khak téng tèng chi̍t ê chōe-chn̄g, siá kóng, “Chit-ê sī [Iû-thài]-lâng ê Ông Iâ-so͘.”
40027038	Ū nn̄g ê kiông-tō kap Iâ-so͘ chòe-hé tèng si̍p-jī-kè, chi̍t ê tī chiàⁿ-pêng, chi̍t ê tī tò-pêng.
40027039	Tùi hia keng-kè ê lâng kā I bú-jio̍k, iô-thâu,
40027040	kóng, “Lí chit-ê lâng, kóng beh thiah-húi Sèng-tiān saⁿ ji̍t lāi koh khí khí-lâi, tio̍h kiù ka-kī. Lí nā-sī Siōng-tè ê Kiáⁿ, tio̍h tùi si̍p-jī-kè lo̍h-lâi.”
40027041	Chè-si-tiúⁿ, keng-ha̍k-kàu-su, kap tiúⁿ-ló mā lóng án-ni kā I thí-chhiò, kóng,
40027042	“I kiù pa̍t-lâng, bô hoat-tō͘ kiù ka-kī. I sī [Í-sek-lia̍t] ê Ông, hiān-chāi tio̍h tùi si̍p-jī-kè lo̍h-lâi, lán chiū sìn I.
40027043	I sìn-khò Siōng-tè; Siōng-tè nā beh kiù I, hiān-chāi tio̍h kiù I; in-ūi I kóng, ‘Góa sī Siōng-tè ê Kiáⁿ.’ ”
40027044	Kap Iâ-so͘ chòe-hé tèng si̍p-jī-kè hit nn̄g ê kiông-tō mā kâng-khoán kā I bú-jio̍k.
40027045	Tùi tiong-tàu khí sòa kàu ē-po͘ saⁿ tiám, choân-tōe lóng o͘-àm.
40027046	Ē-po͘ saⁿ tiám chó-iū, Iâ-so͘ tōa-siaⁿ hoah, “Í-lī, Í-lī, la-má sat-pak-tāi-nî?” ì-sù sī “Góa ê Siōng-tè, góa ê Siōng-tè, lí sī-án-chóaⁿ pàng-sak góa?”
40027047	Ū chi̍t-kóa khiā tī hia ê lâng thiaⁿ-tio̍h, kóng, “Chit-ê lâng teh kiò [Í-lī-a].”
40027048	Kî-tiong ū chi̍t ê lâng sûi-sî cháu-khì the̍h hái-mî, chìm sng-chiú, pa̍k tī lô͘-tek-á bé, tu-khì hō͘ Iâ-so͘ suh.
40027049	Kî-tha ê lâng kóng, “Tán chi̍t-ē! Khòaⁿ [Í-lī-a] ōe lâi kā I kiù bōe.”
40027050	Iâ-so͘ koh tōa-siaⁿ hoah chi̍t siaⁿ, khùi chiū tn̄g.
40027051	Hut-jiân, Sèng-tiān lāi ê tiùⁿ-lî tùi-téng-kàu-ē li̍h-chòe nn̄g pêng; tōe tōa tín-tāng, chio̍h-pôaⁿ piak-li̍h;
40027052	bōng mā khui; ū chin chōe í-keng sí-khì ê Siōng-tè chú-bîn ê si-thé lóng koh-oa̍h khí-lâi.
40027053	Iâ-so͘ koh-oa̍h í-āu hiah-ê lâng tùi bōng chhut-lâi, ji̍p-khì Sèng-siâⁿ, chhut-hiān hō͘ chin chōe lâng khòaⁿ-kìⁿ.
40027054	Hit-ê kun-koaⁿ kap chòe-hé kò͘-siú Iâ-so͘ ê peng-sū khòaⁿ-tio̍h tōe-tāng kap só͘ hoat-seng ê tāi-chì, hui-siông kiaⁿ-hiâⁿ, kóng “Chit-ê khak-si̍t sī Siōng-tè ê Kiáⁿ!”
40027055	Tī hia ū chin chōe hū-jîn-lâng tùi hn̄g-hn̄g teh khòaⁿ; in sī tùi [Ka-lī-lī] tè Iâ-so͘ lâi sū-hāu I ê,
40027056	kî-tiong ū [Boa̍t-tāi-lia̍p] ê [Má-lī-a], [Ngá-kok] kap [Iok-sek] ê lāu-bú [Má-lī-a], koh ū [Se-pí-thài] nn̄g ê kiáⁿ ê lāu-bú.
40027057	Hông-hun ê sî, ū chi̍t ê [A-lī-má-thài] ê hó-gia̍h-lâng lâi, i miâ kiò-chòe [Iok-sek], mā-sī Iâ-so͘ ê bûn-tô͘.
40027058	Chit-ê lâng khì kìⁿ [Pí-lia̍p-to], chhéng-kiû chiong Iâ-so͘ ê ûi-thé hō͘ i. [Pí-lia̍p-to] chiū hoan-hù lâng chiong ûi-thé hō͘ i.
40027059	[Iok-sek] kā Iâ-so͘ ê ûi-thé siu lo̍h-lâi í-āu, ēng chheng-khì ê iù-môa-pò͘ pau khí-lâi,
40027060	jiân-āu kā I an-chòng tī ka-kī ê sin bōng, chiū-sī [Iok-sek] phah tī chio̍h-piah ni̍h ê bōng. I koh kō chi̍t tè tōa tè chio̍h lâi that tī bōng-kháu chiah lī-khui.
40027061	Hit sî, ū [Boa̍t-tāi-lia̍p] ê [Má-lī-a] kap pa̍t ê [Má-lī-a] tī hia, chē tī bōng ê tùi-bīn.
40027062	Keh-ji̍t, chiū-sī Pī-pān-ji̍t āu hit ji̍t, hiah-ê chè-si-tiúⁿ kap Hoat-lī-sài-phài ê lâng chòe-hé khì kìⁿ [Pí-lia̍p-to],
40027063	kóng, “Tāi-jîn, goán ōe kì-tit hit-ê pián-sian-á iáu oa̍h-teh ê sî bat kóng, ‘Saⁿ ji̍t āu, góa ōe koh-oa̍h.’
40027064	Só͘-í, chhiáⁿ lí hā-lēng giâm-siú hûn-bōng kàu tē-saⁿ ji̍t, chiah bōe hō͘ I ê bûn-tô͘ lâi thau-the̍h I ê sin-si, soah kā bîn-chiòng kóng ‘I í-keng tùi sí-lâng tiong koh-oa̍h’. Nā án-ni, chit-ê chòe-āu ê khi-phiàn ōe pí thâu-chi̍t-piàn ê koh-khah giâm-tiōng.”
40027065	[Pí-lia̍p-to] kā in kóng, “Lín chhōa ōe-peng khì, chīn-só͘-ōe giâm-bi̍t kò͘-siú hit-ê bōng.”
40027066	In chiū khì, ēng hong-tiâu hong hit tè chio̍h-thâu, lâu ōe-peng tī hia kò͘-siú.
40028001	An-hioh-ji̍t kè liáu, Lé-pài-ji̍t thiⁿ beh kng ê sî, [Boa̍t-tāi-lia̍p] ê [Má-lī-a] kap pa̍t ê [Má-lī-a] khì thàm-bōng.
40028002	Hut-jiân, ū tōa tōe-tāng, in-ūi Chú ê chi̍t ê thiⁿ-sài tùi thiⁿ kàng-lîm, chiong hit tè chio̍h-thâu kō-khui, chē tī hit téng-bīn.
40028003	I ê bīn-māu chhin-chhiūⁿ sih-nà, i ê saⁿ chhin-chhiūⁿ seh hiah-ni̍h pe̍h.
40028004	Hiah-ê kò͘-siú ê ōe-peng kiaⁿ-kah phi̍h-phi̍h-chhoah, soah pìⁿ-chòe chhin-chhiūⁿ sí-lâng.
40028005	Hit-ê thiⁿ-sài kā hiah-ê hū-jîn-lâng kóng, “M̄-bián kiaⁿ; góa chai lín teh chhē hō͘ lâng tèng si̍p-jī-kè ê Iâ-so͘.
40028006	I bô tī chia, chiàu I só͘ kóng, I í-keng koh-oa̍h. Lâi, lâi khòaⁿ I tó ê só͘-chāi.
40028007	Lín kóaⁿ-kín khì kā I ê bûn-tô͘ kóng, ‘I í-keng tùi sí-lâng tiong koh-oa̍h lah. I pí lín seng khì [Ka-lī-lī]; tī hia lín ōe kìⁿ-tio̍h I.’ Tio̍h ōe kì-tit góa í-keng ū kā lín kóng lah.”
40028008	In chiū kóaⁿ-kín lī-khui bōng, iā kiaⁿ iā tōa hoaⁿ-hí, cháu-khì kā Iâ-so͘ ê bûn-tô͘ kóng.
40028009	Hut-jiân, Iâ-so͘ chhut-hiān, tùi in kóng, “Tāi-ke pêng-an!” In kiâⁿ chìn-chêng lám I ê kha, kā I pài.
40028010	Iâ-so͘ kā in kóng, “M̄-bián kiaⁿ! Khì kā góa ê hiaⁿ-tī kóng, kiò in khì [Ka-lī-lī], tī hia in ōe kìⁿ-tio̍h góa.”
40028011	Hiah-ê hū-jîn-lâng lī-khui ê sî, ū chi̍t-kóa kò͘-siú bōng ê ōe-peng ji̍p-khì siâⁿ-lāi, chiong só͘ hoat-seng ê tāi-chì lóng kā chè-si-tiúⁿ pò-kò.
40028012	Chè-si-tiúⁿ kap tiúⁿ-ló chū-chi̍p chham-siông liáu-āu, the̍h chin chōe gûn-á hō͘ hiah-ê peng,
40028013	kóng, “Lín tio̍h án-ni kóng, ‘I ê bûn-tô͘ àm-sî lâi, tī goán teh khùn ê sî chiong I ê sin-si thau the̍h-khì.’
40028014	Bān-it chóng-tok thiaⁿ-tio̍h chit-ê tāi-chì, goán ōe khì kā i an-tah, pau lín bô tāi-chì.”
40028015	Ōe-peng chiū the̍h hiah-ê gûn-á chiàu in só͘ hoan-hù ê khì chòe. Chit-ê tāi-chì kàu kin-á-ji̍t iáu tī [Iû-thài]-lâng ê tiong-kan teh liû-thoân.
40028016	Cha̍p-it ê bûn-tô͘ khì [Ka-lī-lī], kàu Iâ-so͘ chí-tēng in khì hit chō soaⁿ-téng.
40028017	In kìⁿ-tio̍h Iâ-so͘ chiū kā I pài, put-kò ū lâng iáu teh giâu-gî.
40028018	Iâ-so͘ kiâⁿ óa-khì kā in kóng, “Siōng-tè í-keng chiong thiⁿ-téng tōe-ē it-chhè ê koân-pèng lóng hō͘ góa.
40028019	Só͘-í, lín tio̍h khì chio bān-bîn lâi chòe bûn-tô͘, kā in sóe-lé, hō͘ in kui tī Pē, Kiáⁿ, Sèng Sîn ê miâ,
40028020	kà-sī in chun-siú góa só͘ hō͘ lín it-chhè ê bēng-lēng. Tio̍h ōe kì-tit, góa ta̍k ji̍t kap lín tông-chāi, ti̍t-kàu kim-sè ê kiat-sok.”
41001001	Siōng-tè ê Kiáⁿ Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok ê hok-im án-ni khai-sí.
41001002	Sian-ti [Í-sài-a] ê chheh ū kì-chài: Siōng-tè kóng: Khòaⁿ ah, góa chhe góa ê sù-chiá chòe lí ê sian-hong, i beh kā lí khui-lō͘.
41001003	Ū siaⁿ tī khòng-iá teh hoah: Ūi Chú chún-pī tō-lō͘, ūi I siu-ti̍t sió-lō͘.
41001004	Kó-jiân, [Iok-hān] tī khòng-iá chhut-hiān, kā lâng sóe-lé, soan-iông kóng, “Tio̍h hóe-kái, niá-siū sóe-lé, Siōng-tè chiū sià-bián lín ê chōe.”
41001005	[Iû-thài] ta̍k só͘-chāi ū chin chōe lâng kap [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] só͘-ū ê lâng lóng chhut-lâi, khì [Iok-hān] hia, kò-pe̍k ka-kī ê chōe, tī [Iok-tàn-hô] tùi i niá-siū sóe-lé.
41001006	[Iok-hān] chhēng lo̍k-tô-mn̂g ê saⁿ, io hâ phê-tòa, chia̍h chháu-meh kap iá-bi̍t.
41001007	I soan-iông kóng, “Ū chi̍t ūi pí góa khah ū koân-lêng-ê tī góa āu-bīn teh lâi, góa liân khû lo̍h-khì kā I tháu ôe-tòa to bōe kham-tit.
41001008	Góa ēng chúi kā lín sóe-lé, m̄-kú I beh ēng Sèng Sîn kā lín sóe-lé.”
41001009	Kè bô kúi-ji̍t, Iâ-so͘ tùi [Ka-lī-lī] ê [Ná-sat-le̍k] lâi, tī [Iok-tàn-hô] tùi [Iok-hān] niá-siū sóe-lé.
41001010	Iâ-so͘ chi̍t-ē tùi chúi-ni̍h khí-lâi, chiū khòaⁿ-kìⁿ thiⁿ li̍h-khui, Sèng Sîn chhin-chhiūⁿ hún-chiáu kàng-lo̍h tī I sin-chiūⁿ.
41001011	Koh tùi thiⁿ ū siaⁿ kóng: Lí sī góa só͘ thiàⁿ ê Kiáⁿ, lí, góa chin ì-ài.
41001012	Sèng Sîn sûi-sî chhui-pek Iâ-so͘ khì khòng-iá.
41001013	I tī khòng-iá sì-cha̍p ji̍t kú siū Sat-tàn chhì-thàm; I it-ti̍t lóng kap iá-siù chòe-hé, m̄-kú ū thiⁿ-sài teh kā I sū-hāu.
41001014	[Iok-hān] siū lia̍h liáu-āu, Iâ-so͘ khì [Ka-lī-lī] soan-iông Siōng-tè ê hok-im,
41001015	kóng, “Sî-ki kàu à, Siōng-tè ê chú-koân teh-beh si̍t-hiān lah, tio̍h hóe-kái, sìn hok-im.”
41001016	Iâ-so͘ tùi [Ka-lī-lī] ô͘-piⁿ keng-kè ê sî, khòaⁿ-tio̍h [Se-bûn] kap i ê sió-tī [An-tek-lia̍t] tī ô͘-ni̍h teh pha-bāng, in-ūi in sī lia̍h-hî-ê.
41001017	Iâ-so͘ tùi in kóng, “Lâi tè góa, góa beh hō͘ lín tit-tio̍h lâng chhin-chhiūⁿ lia̍h-hî-ê tit-tio̍h hî.”
41001018	In sûi-sî kā bāng pàng-leh, khì tè Iâ-so͘.
41001019	Kiâⁿ bô jōa hn̄g, Iâ-so͘ khòaⁿ-tio̍h [Se-pí-thài] ê kiáⁿ [Ngá-kok] kap i ê sió-tī [Iok-hān] tī chûn-téng teh chéng-lí bāng.
41001020	I sûi-sî ho͘-tiàu in, in chiū chiong lāu-pē [Se-pí-thài] kap chhiàⁿ ê kang-lâng pàng tī chûn-téng, tè Iâ-so͘ khì.
41001021	Iâ-so͘ kap I ê bûn-tô͘ kàu [Ka-pek-lông]; An-hioh-ji̍t chi̍t-ē kàu, I sûi-sî ji̍p-khì hōe-tn̂g kà-sī.
41001022	Chèng-lâng tùi I ê kà-sī kám-kak hui-siông hi-kî, in-ūi I ê kà-sī chin ū koân-ui, kap keng-ha̍k-kàu-su bô sio-siâng.
41001023	Hit sî, hōe-tn̂g lāi ū chi̍t ê siâ-sîn hū-sin ê lâng hiông-hiông hoah chhut-lâi,
41001024	“[Ná-sat-le̍k]-lâng Iâ-so͘, lí mài chhap goán! Lí lâi beh húi-bia̍t goán sī-bô? Góa chai lí sī sím-mi̍h-lâng; lí sī Siōng-tè ê Sèng-chiá.”
41001025	Iâ-so͘ kā i chek-pī kóng, “Tiām-tiām! Tùi chit-ê lâng chhut-khì!”
41001026	Siâ-sîn hō͘ hit-ê lâng thiu-chhoah, tōa-siaⁿ hoah chi̍t siaⁿ, chiū tùi i chhut-khì.
41001027	Chèng-lâng tio̍h-kiaⁿ, gī-lūn hun-hun kóng, “Che sī sím-mi̍h tāi-chì? Sī ū koân-pèng ê sin kà-sī! I bēng-lēng siâ-sîn, in lóng hâng-ho̍k.”
41001028	Iâ-so͘ ê miâ-siaⁿ sûi-sî thoân kàu [Ka-lī-lī] kap chiu-ûi ta̍k só͘-chāi.
41001029	Iâ-so͘ chi̍t-ē lī-khui hōe-tn̂g, sûi-sî chhōa [Ngá-kok] kap [Iok-hān] khì [Se-bûn] kap [An-tek-lia̍t] in tau.
41001030	[Se-bûn] ê tiūⁿ-ḿ tú teh hoat-jia̍t, tó tī bîn-chhn̂g, in sûi-sî chiong i ê chêng-hêng kā Iâ-so͘ kóng.
41001031	Iâ-so͘ kiâⁿ óa-khì khan i ê chhiú, kā i hû khí-lâi; i ê jia̍t thòe-khì, chiū kā in sū-hāu.
41001032	Hông-hun, ji̍t-lo̍h ê sî, chèng-lâng chiong ta̍k chióng pīⁿ-lâng kap kúi hū-sin ê lâng lóng chhōa lâi Iâ-so͘ hia.
41001033	Thong-siâⁿ ê lâng lóng chū-chi̍p tī mn̂g-kháu.
41001034	Iâ-so͘ i-hó chin chōe hoān-tio̍h ta̍k khoán pīⁿ ê lâng, koh kóaⁿ-chhut chin chōe kúi. I m̄-chún kúi kóng-ōe, in-ūi in chai I sī sím-mi̍h lâng.
41001035	Keh-ji̍t thàu-chá, thiⁿ iáu-bē kng, Iâ-so͘ chiū khí-lâi, chhut-khì phian-phiah bô-lâng tòa ê só͘-chāi, tī hia kî-tó.
41001036	[Se-bûn] kap tâng-phōaⁿ khì chhē I.
41001037	In chhē-tio̍h chiū kā I kóng, “Ta̍k ê lóng teh chhē lí.”
41001038	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Lán lâi-khì hù-kūn ê chng-siā, góa mā thang tī hia thoân-tō, in-ūi che sī góa chhut-lâi ê bo̍k-te̍k.”
41001039	Iâ-so͘ khì [Ka-lī-lī] ta̍k só͘-chāi, tī in ê hōe-tn̂g thoân-tō koh kóaⁿ-kúi.
41001040	Ū chi̍t ê bâ-hong pīⁿ-lâng lâi khún-kiû Iâ-so͘, kūi lo̍h-khì tùi I kóng, “Lí nā khéng, ōe-tàng hō͘ góa chheng-khì.”
41001041	Iâ-so͘ móa-sim lîn-bín, chhun-chhiú kā i bong, kóng, “Góa khéng, hō͘ lí chheng-khì!”
41001042	I ê bâ-hong sûi-sî bô-khì, i chiū chheng-khì.
41001043	Iâ-so͘ sûi-sî kiò i lī-khui, giâm-giâm kā i hoan-hù,
41001044	kóng, “Chhian-bān m̄-thang kā lâng kóng. Put-kò lí tio̍h khì hō͘ chè-si giām, koh chiàu [Mô͘-se] ê kui-tēng ūi-tio̍h lí ū tit-tio̍h chheng-khì hiàn chè-mi̍h, thang tùi chèng-lâng chèng-bêng.”
41001045	M̄-kú, i chi̍t-ē chhut-khì chiū sì-kòe soan-thoân pò-iông chit-ê siau-sit, tì-kàu Iâ-so͘ bōe-tàng kong-khai ji̍p-siâⁿ, soah tio̍h tòa tī siâⁿ-gōa phian-phiah ê só͘-chāi. Chèng-lâng iû-goân tùi ta̍k só͘-chāi khì chhē I.
41002001	Kúi ji̍t āu, Iâ-so͘ koh khì [Ka-pek-lông], ū siau-sit thoân kóng I tī chhù-lāi,
41002002	chiū ū chin chōe lâng chū-chi̍p óa-lâi, soah lóng bô khang-ūi, liân mn̂g-kháu to bô. Iâ-so͘ tùi in teh káng-tō ê sî,
41002003	ū sì ê lâng kng chi̍t ê poàn-sin-put-sūi ê lâng lâi I hia.
41002004	In-ūi lâng chin chōe, bōe-tàng kng kàu Iâ-so͘ ê bīn-chêng, in chiū tī I téng-bīn ê chhù-téng thiah chi̍t khang, hō͘ hit-ê poàn-sin-put-sūi ê lâng tó tī chhn̂g-pho͘ lūi lo̍h-khì.
41002005	Iâ-so͘ khòaⁿ-kìⁿ in ê sìn-sim, chiū tùi hit-ê poàn-sin-put-sūi ê lâng kóng, “Siàu-liân-lâng, lí ê chōe sià-bián lah!”
41002006	Ū kúi-nā ê keng-ha̍k-kàu-su chē tī hia, sim-lāi teh gī-lūn,
41002007	“Chit-ê lâng ná-ōe án-ni kóng? I teh siat-to̍k Siōng-tè! To̍k-it ê Siōng-tè í-gōa, sím-mi̍h lâng ōe-tàng sià-chōe?”
41002008	Iâ-so͘ lāi-sim sûi-sî chai-iáⁿ in án-ni teh gī-lūn, chiū tùi in kóng, “Sī-án-chóaⁿ lín sim-lāi teh chit-būn chit-ê tāi-chì?
41002009	Tùi poàn-sin-put-sūi ê lâng kóng ‘Lí ê chōe sià-bián lah’, á-sī kóng ‘Khí-lâi, giâ lí ê chhn̂g-pho͘ khí-lâi kiâⁿ’, tó chi̍t hāng khah kán-tan?
41002010	Put-kò góa beh hō͘ lín chai Jîn-chú tī tōe-chiūⁿ ū sià-chōe ê koân-pèng.” Iâ-so͘ chiū tùi hit-ê poàn-sin-put-sūi ê lâng kóng,
41002011	“Góa kā lí kóng, khí-lâi, giâ lí ê chhn̂g-pho͘, tńg-khì lín tau!”
41002012	I chiū khí-lâi, sûi-sî giâ i ê chhn̂g-pho͘, tī chèng-lâng ê bīn-chêng kiâⁿ chhut-khì. Chèng-lâng lóng tōa tio̍h-kiaⁿ, kui êng-kng hō͘ Siōng-tè kóng, “Goán chêng-kàu-taⁿ m̄-bat khòaⁿ-tio̍h chit khoán tāi-chì!”
41002013	Iâ-so͘ koh khì [Ka-lī-lī] ô͘-piⁿ, ū chi̍t tōa-tīn lâng lâi I hia, I chiū kā in kà-sī.
41002014	Iâ-so͘ keng-kè ê sî khòaⁿ-tio̍h [A-le̍k-hui] ê kiáⁿ [Lī-bī] chē tī sè-koan, chiū tùi i kóng, “Lâi tè góa!” [Lī-bī] chiū khí-lâi tè Iâ-so͘.
41002015	Āu-lâi, Iâ-so͘ tī [Lī-bī] in tau chia̍h-pn̄g. Ū chin chōe bau̍h-sè-ê kap chōe-jîn mā kap Iâ-so͘ í-ki̍p I ê bûn-tô͘ chòe-hé chia̍h-pn̄g, in-ūi ū chin chōe lâng teh tè Iâ-so͘.
41002016	Chi̍t-kóa [Hoat-lī-sài]-phài ê keng-ha̍k-kàu-su khòaⁿ-tio̍h Iâ-so͘ kap chōe-jîn í-ki̍p bau̍h-sè-ê chòe-hé chia̍h-pn̄g, chiū tùi I ê bûn-tô͘ kóng, “Sī-án-chóaⁿ I kap bau̍h-sè-ê í-ki̍p chōe-jîn chòe-hé chia̍h?”
41002017	Iâ-so͘ thiaⁿ-tio̍h chiū kā in kóng, “Kiān-khong-ê bô su-iàu i-seng, phòa-pīⁿ-ê chiah ū su-iàu. Góa lâi, m̄-sī beh chio gī-lâng, sī beh chio chōe-jîn.”
41002018	[Iok-hān] ê bûn-tô͘ kap [Hoat-lī-sài]-phài ê lâng teh kìm-chia̍h. Ū lâng lâi mn̄g Iâ-so͘, “[Iok-hān] ê bûn-tô͘ kap [Hoat-lī-sài]-phài ê bûn-tô͘ kìm-chia̍h, sī-án-chóaⁿ lí ê bûn-tô͘ bô kìm-chia̍h?”
41002019	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Sin-lông iáu kap hun-iàn ê lâng-kheh chòe-hé ê sî, lâng-kheh kiám ōe kìm-chia̍h? In iáu kap sin-lông chòe-hé ê sî bōe kìm-chia̍h.
41002020	Ji̍t-chí teh-beh kàu, sin-lông ōe hō͘ lâng tùi in tiong-kan lia̍h-khì, hit ji̍t in chiū ōe kìm-chia̍h.
41002021	“Bô-lâng ēng bô kiu-chúi ê pò͘ khì pó͘ kū-saⁿ. Nā án-ni chòe, hit tè sin-pò͘ ōe kiù-li̍h kū-saⁿ, tian-tò phòa koh-khah tōa khang.
41002022	Mā bô-lâng chiong sin-chiú ji̍p tī kū phê-tē. Nā án-ni chòe, sin-chiú ōe kā phê-tē piak-phòa, chiú lâu chhut-lâi, phê-tē mā pháiⁿ-khì. Sin-chiú eng-kai ji̍p tī sin phê-tē!”
41002023	Ū chi̍t ê An-hioh-ji̍t, Iâ-so͘ tùi be̍h-hn̂g keng-kè. I ê bûn-tô͘ ná kiâⁿ ná tiah be̍h-sūi.
41002024	[Hoat-lī-sài]-phài ê lâng tùi Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Lí khòaⁿ! In sī-án-chóaⁿ tī An-hioh-ji̍t chòe bōe ēng-tit chòe ê tāi-chì?”
41002025	Iâ-so͘ kā in kóng, “Lín kiám m̄-bat tha̍k-tio̍h [Tāi-pi̍t] kap tè i ê lâng pak-tó͘ iau su-iàu chia̍h-mi̍h ê sî só͘ chòe ê tāi-chì?
41002026	[A-pí-a-tha] chòe tōa-chè-si ê sî, [Tāi-pi̍t] ji̍p-khì Siōng-tè ê tiān chia̍h hiàn-chè ê piáⁿ, mā hō͘ tè i ê lâng chia̍h; chit khoán piáⁿ chè-si í-gōa ê lâng bōe ēng-tit chia̍h.”
41002027	Iâ-so͘ kā in kóng, “An-hioh-ji̍t sī ūi-tio̍h lâng lâi siat-li̍p; lâng m̄-sī ūi-tio̍h An-hioh-ji̍t lâi chhòng-chō.
41002028	Só͘-í, Jîn-chú mā-sī An-hioh-ji̍t ê Chú.”
41003001	Iâ-so͘ koh ji̍p-khì hōe-tn̂g, tī hia ū chi̍t ê chi̍t ki chhiú khê-khì ê lâng.
41003002	Ū chi̍t-kóa lâng teh tng-tán khòaⁿ Iâ-so͘ tī An-hioh-ji̍t ōe kā chit-ê lâng i-tī á-bōe, thang kā I kò.
41003003	Iâ-so͘ tùi hit-ê chhiú khê-khì ê lâng kóng, “Khí-lâi, lâi tiong-ng chia.”
41003004	Jiân-āu I mn̄g chèng-lâng, “Tī An-hioh-ji̍t, chòe hó-sū á-sī chòe pháiⁿ-sū, kiù sìⁿ-miā á-sī hāi sìⁿ-miā, tó chi̍t hāng ha̍h Lu̍t-hoat?” In lóng tiām-tiām.
41003005	Iâ-so͘ siū-khì, chi̍t-ê chi̍t-ê kā in khòaⁿ, ūi-tio̍h in ê ngī-sim iu-siong, chiū tùi hit-ê lâng kóng, “Chhiú chhun chhut-lâi!” I chhiú chhun chhut-lâi, chiū ho̍k-goân.
41003006	Hiah-ê [Hoat-lī-sài]-phài ê lâng chiū lī-khui hōe-tn̂g, sûi-sî kap [Hi-lu̍t]-tóng ê lâng tàu-tīn kè-bô͘ tùi-hù Iâ-so͘, khòaⁿ beh án-chóaⁿ kā I hāi-sí.
41003007	Iâ-so͘ kap bûn-tô͘ thòe-khì [Ka-lī-lī] ô͘-piⁿ, ū chi̍t tōa-tīn [Ka-lī-lī]-lâng tè I khì;
41003008	koh ū chi̍t tōa-tīn lâng thiaⁿ-tio̍h Iâ-so͘ só͘ chòe ê tāi-chì, tùi [Iû-thài], [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng], [Í-thó͘-mái], [Iok-tàn-hô] tang-hōaⁿ, í-ki̍p [Thài-ní] kap [Se-tùn] chiu-ûi lâi chhē I.
