41003009	In-ūi lâng chin chōe, Iâ-so͘ hoan-hù bûn-tô͘ kā I chún-pī chi̍t chiah chûn, chiah-bián hō͘ lâng kā I khoeh píⁿ-khì.
41003010	In-ūi Iâ-so͘ bat i-hó chin chōe pīⁿ-lâng, só͘-í só͘-ū ê pīⁿ-lâng lóng khoeh óa-lâi beh kā I bong.
41003011	Hiah-ê siâ-sîn chi̍t-ē khòaⁿ-tio̍h Iâ-so͘ chiū phak tī I ê bīn-chêng, tōa-siaⁿ hoah, “Lí sī Siōng-tè ê Kiáⁿ!”
41003012	Iâ-so͘ giâm-giâm bēng-lēng in m̄-thang tùi lâng kong-khai kóng-khí I ê tāi-chì.
41003013	Iâ-so͘ chiūⁿ-soaⁿ, tiàu-chi̍p I só͘ ì-ài ê lâng, in chiū lâi.
41003014	I siat-li̍p cha̍p-jī lâng, chheng in chòe sù-tô͘, sī beh hō͘ in kap I chòe-hé, koh chhe in khì thoân-tō,
41003015	mā hō͘ in ū koân-pèng kóaⁿ-kúi.
41003016	I só͘ jīm-bēng ê cha̍p-jī lâng chiū-sī: [Se-bûn] --- Iâ-so͘ kā i kiò-chòe [Pí-tek],
41003017	[Se-pí-thài] ê kiáⁿ [Ngá-kok] kap i ê sió-tī [Iok-hān] --- Iâ-so͘ kā in kiò-chòe [Poàn-nî-kî], ì-sù sī “Lûi-kong-á kiáⁿ”,
41003018	[An-tek-lia̍t], [Hui-le̍k], [Pa-to-lô-mái], [Má-thài], [To-má], [A-le̍k-hui] ê kiáⁿ [Ngá-kok], [Ta̍t-thài], Kek-chìn-tóng-oân [Se-bûn],
41003019	kap chhut-bōe Iâ-so͘ hit-ê [Í-su-ka-lio̍k] ê [Iû-tāi].
41003020	Iâ-so͘ tńg-khì chhù-ni̍h. Ū chi̍t tīn lâng koh chū-chi̍p óa-lâi, Iâ-so͘ kap bûn-tô͘ soah liân pn̄g to bōe kò͘-tit chia̍h.
41003021	I ê chhin-lâng thiaⁿ-tio̍h chit-ê tāi-chì chiū chhut-lâi beh kā I chó͘-chí, in-ūi in kóng “I cheng-sîn sit-siông!”
41003022	Tùi [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] lo̍h-lâi ê keng-ha̍k-kàu-su kóng, “I sī hō͘ [Pia̍t-se-pok] hū-sin, khò kúi-ông teh kóaⁿ-kúi.”
41003023	Iâ-so͘ kiò in lâi, ēng phì-jū tùi in kóng, “Sat-tàn ná-ōe kóaⁿ Sat-tàn?
41003024	Kok-ka nā ka-kī hun-cheng, hit-ê kok-ka chiū khiā bōe-tiâu.
41003025	Ka-têng nā ka-kī hun-cheng, hit-ê ka-têng mā khiā bōe-tiâu.
41003026	Sat-tàn nā ka-kī kong-kek, hun-cheng, i khiā bōe-tiâu, it-tēng ōe bia̍t-bông.
41003027	“Bô-lâng ōe-tàng ji̍p-khì ióng-sū ê chhù chhiúⁿ i ê châi-bu̍t; tio̍h seng kā i pa̍k khí-lâi, chiah ōe-tàng kiap i ê chhù.
41003028	“Góa si̍t-chāi kā lín kóng, lâng bô-lūn hoān sím-mi̍h chōe, kóng sím-mi̍h pòng-to̍k ê ōe, lóng ōe tit-tio̍h sià-bián.
41003029	M̄-kú bô-lūn sím-mi̍h lâng siat-to̍k Sèng Sîn, éng-oán bōe tit-tio̍h sià-bián, i sī hoān-tio̍h éng-oán ê chōe.”
41003030	Iâ-so͘ kóng chiah-ê ōe sī in-ūi in kóng “I hō͘ siâ-sîn hū-sin.”
41003031	Iâ-so͘ ê lāu-bú kap I ê hiaⁿ-tī lâi, khiā tī gōa-bīn, chhe lâng khì kiò I.
41003032	Ū chi̍t tīn lâng chē tī Iâ-so͘ chiu-ûi; ū lâng kā I kóng, “Lí khòaⁿ, lí ê lāu-bú kap lí ê sió-tī sió-bē tī gōa-bīn beh chhē lí!”
41003033	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Sím-mi̍h lâng sī góa ê lāu-bú, góa ê hiaⁿ-tī?”
41003034	Jiân-āu I tùi chē tī chiu-ûi ê lâng chi̍t-ê chi̍t-ê kā in khòaⁿ, kóng, “Góa ê lāu-bú kap góa ê hiaⁿ-tī tī chia.
41003035	Si̍t-hêng Siōng-tè chí-ì ê lâng chiū-sī góa ê hiaⁿ-tī, chí-bē, kap lāu-bú.”
41004001	Iâ-so͘ koh chi̍t piàn tī [Ka-lī-lī] ô͘-piⁿ teh kà-sī lâng. Ū chi̍t tōa-tīn lâng chū-chi̍p óa-lâi, I soah tio̍h chiūⁿ-khì chûn-téng chē; chûn tī ô͘-ni̍h, kui tōa-tīn lâng tī hōaⁿ-téng.
41004002	Iâ-so͘ ēng phì-jū kà-sī in chin chōe hāng sū. I kà-sī ê sî kā in kóng:
41004003	“Tio̍h chù-ì thiaⁿ! Ū chi̍t ê iā chéng-chí ê lâng chhut-khì iā chéng-chí.
41004004	I iā ê sî, ū-ê chéng-chí lak tī lō͘-piⁿ, chiáu-á pe-lâi, kā i chia̍h liáu-liáu.
41004005	Ū-ê lak tī chio̍h-thâu-tōe, thô͘ chió ê só͘-chāi, in-ūi thô͘ bô chhim, chin kín chiū puh-gê,
41004006	ji̍t-thâu chi̍t-ē chhut, kā i pha̍k-tio̍h, in-ūi bô kun chiū ta-khì.
41004007	Ū-ê lak tī chhì-phè lāi, chhì-á tōa-châng khí-lâi, kā i hip-sí, chiū bô kiat-si̍t.
41004008	Ū-ê lak tī hó thó͘-tōe, chiū hoat-íⁿ, sêng-tióng, kiat-si̍t; ū-ê kiat saⁿ-cha̍p pē, ū-ê la̍k-cha̍p pē, ū-ê chi̍t-pah pē.”
41004009	Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Ū hīⁿ-khang thang thiaⁿ ê lâng, tio̍h thiaⁿ!”
41004010	Iâ-so͘ ka-kī chi̍t-ê ê sî, tī I chiu-ûi ê lâng kap cha̍p-jī sù-tô͘ lâi mn̄g I chiah-ê phì-jū ê ì-sù.
41004011	Iâ-so͘ chiū kā in kóng, “Siōng-tè-kok ê ò-pì í-keng ū hō͘ lín, m̄-kú tùi gōa-lâng ta̍k hāng lóng sī ēng phì-jū,
41004012	beh hō͘ In khòaⁿ koh khòaⁿ, mā khòaⁿ bô, thiaⁿ koh thiaⁿ, mā bōe liáu-kái; nā m̄-sī án-ni, in ōe hôe-sim tńg-ì, Siōng-tè chiū kā in sià-bián.
41004013	Iâ-so͘ koh mn̄g in kóng, “Chit-ê phì-jū lín bōe bêng-pe̍k sī-bô? Án-ni lín ná-ōe bêng-pe̍k kî-tha só͘-ū ê phì-jū?
41004014	Iā-chéng-chí-ê sī iā Siōng-tè ê sìn-sit.
41004015	Iā tī lō͘-piⁿ ê sī chí lâng thiaⁿ-tio̍h sìn-sit, Sat-tàn sûi-sî lâi, kā iā tī in sim-lāi ê sìn-sit chhiúⁿ-khì.
41004016	Siâng-khoán, iā tī chio̍h-thâu-tōe ê sī chí lâng thiaⁿ-tio̍h sìn-sit, sûi-sî hoaⁿ-hí chiap-siū,
41004017	put-kò tī in ê sim-lāi tèng-kun bô chhim, tòng bōe kú, chi̍t-ē ūi-tio̍h sìn-sit tú-tio̍h hoān-lān á-sī pek-hāi, sûi-sî pàng-sak.
41004018	Iā tī chhì-phè lāi ê sī chí lâng thiaⁿ-tio̍h sìn-sit liáu-āu,
41004019	in-ūi seng-oa̍h ê khòa-lū, chîⁿ-châi ê bê-he̍k, kap kî-tha ta̍k khoán ê su-io̍k ji̍p-khì sim-lāi, kā só͘ thiaⁿ-tio̍h ê sìn-sit hip-sí, soah bōe kiat-si̍t.
41004020	Hiah-ê iā tī hó thó͘-tōe ê sī chí lâng thiaⁿ-tio̍h sìn-sit, hoaⁿ-hí chiap-siū chiū kiat-si̍t; ū-ê saⁿ-cha̍p pē, ū-ê la̍k-cha̍p pē, ū-ê chi̍t-pah pē.”
41004021	Iâ-so͘ mn̄g in kóng, “Kiám ū lâng tiám teng ēng táu khàm khí-lâi á-sī khǹg-tī bîn-chhn̂g kha, bô kā i chhāi tī teng-tâi téng?
41004022	In-ūi it-chhè ún-ba̍t ê bô chi̍t hāng bōe hián-lō͘; it-chhè am-khàm ê bô chi̍t hāng bōe lō͘-hiān.
41004023	Ū hīⁿ-khang thang thiaⁿ ê lâng, tio̍h thiaⁿ!”
41004024	Iâ-so͘ koh kā in kóng, “Tio̍h chù-ì lín só͘ thiaⁿ ê. Lín ēng sím-mi̍h niû niû hō͘ lâng, Siōng-tè ōe ēng siâng-khoán ê niû niû hō͘ lín, sīm-chì hō͘ lín koh-khah chōe.
41004025	In-ūi ū-ê, beh hō͘ i koh-khah chōe; bô-ê, liân i só͘ ū-ê mā beh kā i chhiúⁿ khí-lâi.”
41004026	Iâ-so͘ koh kóng, “Siōng-tè-kok chhin-chhiūⁿ lâng chiong chéng-chí iā tī tōe-ni̍h.
41004027	I àm-sî khì khùn, ji̍t-sî khí-lâi, chéng-chí teh puh-gê tōa-châng, i m̄-chai sī-án-chóaⁿ ōe án-ni.
41004028	Thó͘-tōe chū-jiân seng-sán ngó͘-kok, tāi-seng puh-gê, āu-lâi thò͘-sūi, chòe-āu pá-sūi.
41004029	Ngó͘-kok sek ê sî, sûi-sî ēng liâm-le̍k-á siu-koah, in-ūi siu-sêng ê sî kàu lah.”
41004030	Iâ-so͘ mn̄g kóng, “Lán beh ēng sím-mi̍h lâi pí-phēng Siōng-tè-kok, beh ēng sím-mi̍h phì-jū lâi soat-bêng?
41004031	Siōng-tè-kok chhin-chhiūⁿ chi̍t lia̍p kòa-chhài-chí, iā lo̍h-tōe ê sî sī tōe-chiūⁿ chéng-chí tiong siōng sòe-lia̍p ê;
41004032	iā lo̍h-khì, tōa-châng khí-lâi, pí só͘-ū ê chhài-soe koh-khah tōa-châng, hoat-chhut tōa ki oe, sīm-chì khong-tiong ê chiáu-á to ōe-tàng tī chhiū-ńg-ē chòe siū.”
41004033	Iâ-so͘ ēng chin chōe chhin-chhiūⁿ chit khoán ê phì-jū tùi chèng-lâng soan-káng sìn-sit, lóng chiàu in só͘ ōe bêng-pe̍k ê kā in kóng.
41004034	I bô ēng pa̍t khoán ê hong-sek, chí-ū ēng phì-jū tùi in kóng, put-kò kan-ta kap ka-kī ê bûn-tô͘ chòe-hé ê sî chiah ta̍k hāng kā in soat-bêng.
41004035	Hit ji̍t thiⁿ àm ê sî, Iâ-so͘ tùi bûn-tô͘ kóng, “Lán kè lâi-khì hit pêng hōaⁿ.”
41004036	Bûn-tô͘ chiū lī-khui kûn-chiòng chiūⁿ-chûn, kap í-keng tī chûn-téng ê Iâ-so͘ chòe-hé khì. Ū kúi-nā chiah chûn mā chòe-hé khì.
41004037	Hut-jiân khí tōa-hong, éng phoah ji̍p chûn-lāi, chûn soah hō͘ chúi im kàu beh móa.
41004038	Iâ-so͘ tī chûn-bé khòa chím-thâu teh khùn; bûn-tô͘ kā I kiò-chhíⁿ, kóng, “Lāu-su, goán teh-beh bô-miā lò͘, lí bô iàu-kín ò͘?”
41004039	Iâ-so͘ khí-lâi, chek-pī hong, koh bēng-lēng éng, kóng, “Chēng lo̍h-khì! Tiāⁿ lo̍h-lâi!” Hong tiām-khì, ô͘ chiū chēng-chēng-chēng.
41004040	Iâ-so͘ tùi bûn-tô͘ kóng, “Lín ná hiah-ni̍h kiaⁿ? Lín iáu bô sìn-sim sī-bô?”
41004041	In hui-siông kiaⁿ-hiâⁿ, kóng-lâi kóng-khì, “Chit-ê sī sím-mi̍h lâng, liân hong kap éng to sūn-ho̍k!”
41005001	Iâ-so͘ kè-khì [Ka-lī-lī-ô͘] ê hit pêng hōaⁿ, kàu [Kek-la̍h-sim]-lâng ê tōe-khu.
41005002	I chi̍t-ē lo̍h-chûn, ū chi̍t ê hō͘ siâ-sîn hū-sin ê lâng tú tùi bōng-á-po͘ chhut-lâi, tú-tio̍h I.
41005003	Chit-ê lâng lóng tòa tī bōng-á-po͘, lâng ēng thih-liān to kā i liān bōe-tiâu.
41005004	Chin chōe piàn lâng ēng thih-liān kap kha-khàu kā i khún-pa̍k, thih-liān hō͘ i chhoah-tn̄g, kha-khàu hō͘ i kòng-chhùi, bô-lâng ū khùi-la̍t kā i chè-ho̍k.
41005005	I mî-ji̍t tī bōng-á-po͘ á-sī soaⁿ-phiâⁿ loān jióng, koh ēng chio̍h-thâu siong-hāi ka-kī.
41005006	I tī hn̄g-hn̄g ê só͘-chāi khòaⁿ-tio̍h Iâ-so͘, chiū cháu-lâi kūi tī I ê bīn-chêng,
41005007	tōa-siaⁿ hoah, “Chì-koân Siōng-tè ê Kiáⁿ Iâ-so͘, lí mài chhap góa! Góa kí Siōng-tè ê miâ khún-kiû lí m̄-thang khó͘-chhó͘ góa.”
41005008	In-ūi Iâ-so͘ ū tùi i kóng, “Siâ-sîn, tùi chit-ê lâng chhut-khì!”
41005009	Iâ-so͘ mn̄g i, “Lí sím-mi̍h miâ?” I ìn kóng, “Góa ê miâ sī ‘Kun-thoân’, in-ūi goán chin tōa-tīn.”
41005010	I pek-chhiat ai-kiû Iâ-so͘ m̄-thang kóaⁿ in lī-khui hit-ê tōe-khu.
41005011	Hit sî, hù-kūn ê soaⁿ-phiâⁿ ū chi̍t tōa-kûn ti teh thó-chia̍h.
41005012	Siâ-sîn kiû Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Hō͘ goán khì ti-kûn hia, thang ji̍p-khì in lāi-bīn.”
41005013	Iâ-so͘ chún in. Siâ-sîn chiū chhut-khì, chìn-ji̍p hit kûn ti; kui kûn ti, iok ū nn̄g-chheng chiah, tùi soaⁿ-phiâⁿ chông lo̍h-khì ô͘-ni̍h, hō͘ chúi tū-sí.
41005014	Chhī-ti ê lâng chiū kiaⁿ-kah cháu khì siâⁿ-lāi kap hiuⁿ-siā pò chit-ê siau-sit. Chèng-lâng chiū chhut-lâi beh khòaⁿ ū hoat-seng sím-mi̍h tāi-chì.
41005015	In lâi Iâ-so͘ hia, khòaⁿ-tio̍h hit-ê hō͘ kúi hū-sin, chiū-sī bat hō͘ “Kun-thoân” tîⁿ-tio̍h ê lâng chē tī hia, ū chhēng-saⁿ, cheng-sîn chèng-siông, chiū chin tio̍h-kiaⁿ.
41005016	Khòaⁿ-tio̍h ê lâng chiū chiong hō͘ kúi hū-sin ê lâng kap ti-kûn só͘ tú-tio̍h ê tāi-chì kā lâng kóng.
41005017	In chiū iau-kiû Iâ-so͘ lī-khui in ê tōe-khu.
41005018	Iâ-so͘ beh chiūⁿ-chûn ê sî, bat hō͘ kúi hū-sin hit-ê lâng kiû Iâ-so͘ chún i chòe-hé khì.
41005019	Iâ-so͘ m̄-chún, kā i kóng, “Tńg-khì lín tau, lín chhin-lâng hia, chiong Chú lîn-bín lí, tùi lí só͘ chòe hiah-ni̍h tōa ê tāi-chì lóng pò in chai.”
41005020	Hit-ê lâng chiū lī-khui, tī [Te-ka-pho-lí] thoân-iông Iâ-so͘ tùi i só͘ chòe hiah-ni̍h tōa ê tāi-chì; só͘-ū ê lâng lóng tio̍h-kiaⁿ kî-koài.
41005021	Iâ-so͘ koh chē-chûn kè-khì ô͘ ê hit pêng hōaⁿ; I tī ô͘-piⁿ, ū chi̍t tōa-tīn lâng chū-chi̍p óa-lâi.
41005022	Ū chi̍t ê hōe-tn̂g ê chú-koán kiò-chòe [Ia̍p-ló͘] lâi, chi̍t-ē khòaⁿ-tio̍h Iâ-so͘ chiū phak tī I ê kha-chêng,
41005023	khún-kiû I kóng, “Góa ê sòe-hàn cha-bó͘-kiáⁿ teh-beh sí à, chhiáⁿ lí lâi kā i hōaⁿ-chhiú, i-hó, hō͘ i ōe oa̍h.”
41005024	Iâ-so͘ chiū kap i khì; ū chi̍t tōa-tīn lâng mā oe-oe khoeh-khoeh tè I khì.
41005025	Ū chi̍t ê hū-jîn-lâng tì-tio̍h hiat-lāu-pīⁿ cha̍p-jī nî kú;
41005026	i ū hō͘ chin chōe i-seng khòaⁿ-kè, siū-tio̍h chin chōe thòng-khó͘, koh chîⁿ lóng khai liáu-liáu, i ê pīⁿ m̄-nā bô khah hó, tian-tò ná siong-tiōng.
41005027	I ū thiaⁿ-tio̍h Iâ-so͘ ê tāi-chì, chiū khoeh ji̍p-khì kûn-chiòng lāi-bīn, kiâⁿ óa-khì Iâ-so͘ ê āu-bīn, bong I ê saⁿ.
41005028	I siūⁿ-kóng, “Góa kan-ta bong-tio̍h I ê saⁿ, pīⁿ chiū ōe hó.”
41005029	I ê hiat-lāu sûi-sî chí, kám-kak seng-khu ê pīⁿ í-keng hó.
41005030	Iâ-so͘ sûi-sî chai ū khùi-la̍t tùi I chhut-khì, chiū oa̍t kè-lâi, mn̄g kûn-chiòng, “Sím-mi̍h lâng bong góa ê saⁿ?”
41005031	Bûn-tô͘ ìn kóng, “Lí khòaⁿ kui-tīn lâng teh kā lí khoeh, lí ná-ōe kóng ‘Sím-mi̍h lâng kā góa bong’?”
41005032	Iâ-so͘ sì-kho͘-lìn-tńg khòaⁿ chi̍t-ē, ài chai sím-mi̍h lâng kā I bong.
41005033	Hit-ê hū-jîn-lâng chai tī i sin-chiūⁿ só͘ hoat-seng ê tāi-chì, kiaⁿ-kah phi̍h-phi̍h-chhoah, chiū kūi tī Iâ-so͘ kha-chêng, chiong lóng-chóng ê si̍t-chêng kóng chhut-lâi.
41005034	Iâ-so͘ kā i kóng, “Cha-bó͘-kiáⁿ, lí ê sìn-sim hō͘ lí hó-khì lah, pêng-an tò-khì, lí ê pīⁿ í-keng hó à.”
41005035	Iâ-so͘ iáu teh kóng ê sî, ū lâng tùi hōe-tn̂g chú-koán ê chhù lâi, kā [Ia̍p-ló͘] kóng, “Lí ê cha-bó͘-kiáⁿ í-keng sí-khì, ná-tio̍h koh lô-hoân lāu-su.”
41005036	Iâ-so͘ ū thiaⁿ-tio̍h in kóng ē ōe, chiū tùi hōe-tn̂g chú-koán kóng, “M̄-bián kiaⁿ, chí-ū tio̍h sìn!”
41005037	I chiū chhōa [Pí-tek], [Ngá-kok], kap [Ngá-kok] ê sió-tī [Iok-hān] chòe-hé khì, í-gōa m̄-chún pa̍t-lâng tè-khì.
41005038	In lâi-kàu hōe-tn̂g chú-koán ê chhù, Iâ-so͘ khòaⁿ-tio̍h tiûⁿ-bīn chin loān, ū lâng teh háu, ū lâng tōa-siaⁿ teh khàu.
41005039	I chi̍t-ē ji̍p-khì chiū kā in kóng, “Lín ná khàu-kah loān chhau-chhau? Chit-ê gín-á bô sí, sī teh khùn.”
41005040	In chiū kā I thí-chhiò, m̄-kú I kā in lóng kóaⁿ chhut-khì, jiân-āu chhōa gín-á ê pē-bú kap hit saⁿ ê bûn-tô͘ ji̍p-khì gín-á ê pâng-keng.
41005041	I khan gín-á ê chhiú, tùi i kóng, “Tāi-lī-tāi kó͘-bí!” ì-sù chiū-sī “Cha-bó͘ gín-á, góa kā lí kóng, khí-lâi!”
41005042	Cha-bó͘ gín-á sûi-sî peh khí-lâi kiâⁿ, in-ūi i í-keng cha̍p-jī hè. In hui-siông tio̍h-kiaⁿ.
41005043	Iâ-so͘ giâm-giâm kéng-kài in m̄-thang chiong chit-ê tāi-chì hō͘ lâng chai, koh kiò in the̍h mi̍h-kiāⁿ hō͘ cha-bó͘ gín-á chia̍h.
41006001	Iâ-so͘ lī-khui hia, tò-khì ka-kī ê kò͘-hiong, bûn-tô͘ tè I khì.
41006002	An-hioh-ji̍t, I tī hōe-tn̂g kà-sī lâng. Chin chōe lâng thiaⁿ-tio̍h I ê kà-sī, lóng chin tio̍h-kiaⁿ, kóng, “Chit-ê lâng ê pún-sū tùi tó-ūi lâi? I tit-tio̍h ê tàu-tóe sī sím-mi̍h khoán ê tì-hūi? I ê chhiú ná ōe-tàng kiâⁿ chit khoán sîn-jiah?
41006003	I kiám m̄-sī ba̍k-chhiūⁿ? Kiám m̄-sī [Má-lī-a] ê kiáⁿ, [Ngá-kok], [Iok-se], [Iû-tāi], kap [Se-bûn] ê hiaⁿ-tī? I ê sió-bē kiám m̄-sī kap lán tòa tī chia?” In soah tùi Iâ-so͘ khí hoán-kám.
41006004	Iâ-so͘ kā in kóng, “Sian-ti tī ka-kī ê kò͘-hiong, ka-kī ê chhin-lâng, ka-kī ê ka-cho̍k í-gōa, it-tēng ōe siū chun-tiōng.”
41006005	I tī hia bōe-tàng kiâⁿ sím-mi̍h sîn-jiah, chí-ū kā kúi-ê-á pīⁿ-lâng hōaⁿ-chhiú, kā in i-hó.
41006006	Iâ-so͘ tùi in ê m̄-sìn kám-kak chin kî-koài. Iâ-so͘ kiâⁿ-thàu chiu-ûi ê hiuⁿ-siā kà-sī lâng.
41006007	I tiàu-chi̍p cha̍p-jī sù-tô͘ lâi, chhe in nn̄g-ê nn̄g-ê chhut-khì, hō͘ in ū koân-pèng thang chè-ap siâ-sîn.
41006008	I hoan-hù in, chhut-mn̂g ê sî koáiⁿ-á í-gōa sím-mi̍h lóng m̄-thang tòa; m̄-thang tòa chia̍h-mi̍h; m̄-thang tòa lú-hêng-tē; io-tòa lāi-bīn m̄-thang tòa chîⁿ;
41006009	chí-ū chhēng liâng-ôe; m̄-thang chhēng nn̄g niá lāi-saⁿ.
41006010	I koh kā in kóng, “Lín bô-lūn ji̍p-khì sím-mi̍h lâng ê chhù, tio̍h tòa hia kàu lī-khui hit só͘-chāi.
41006011	Bô-lūn sím-mi̍h só͘-chāi, lâng nā m̄ chiap-la̍p lín, m̄ thiaⁿ lín ê kà-sī, lín lī-khui ê sî tio̍h chiong kha-ni̍h ê thô͘-hún pōaⁿ-tiāu, piáu-sī tùi in kéng-kò.”
41006012	Sù-tô͘ chiū chhut-khì thoân-tō, khǹg lâng hóe-kái.
41006013	In koh kóaⁿ-chhut chin chōe kúi, mā ēng iû boah chin chōe pīⁿ-lâng, kā in i-hó.
41006014	[Hi-lu̍t]-ông ū thiaⁿ-tio̍h Iâ-so͘ ê sū, in-ūi I ê miâ thoân-piàn ta̍k só͘-chāi. Ū lâng kóng, “I sī Si-sóe-chiá [Iok-hān], tùi sí-lâng tiong koh-oa̍h, só͘-í ū koân-lêng kiâⁿ chiah-ê sîn-jiah.”
41006015	M̄-kú mā ū lâng kóng, “I sī [Í-lī-a]”; koh ū lâng kóng, “I sī sian-ti, chhin-chhiūⁿ kó͘-chá ê chi̍t ê sian-ti.”
41006016	[Hi-lu̍t] thiaⁿ-tio̍h chiū kóng, “Sī góa kā i chām-thâu hit-ê [Iok-hān], i ū koh-oa̍h.”
41006017	[Hi-lu̍t] ū phài lâng khì lia̍h [Iok-hān], kā i liān tī kaⁿ-ni̍h, goân-in sī [Hi-lu̍t] ū chhōa sió-tī [Hui-le̍k] ê bó͘ [Hi-lô-tí] chòe bó͘;
41006018	in-ūi [Iok-hān] tiāⁿ-tiāⁿ tùi [Hi-lu̍t] kóng, “Lí chhōa sió-tī ê bó͘ bô ha̍p-hoat!”
41006019	[Hi-lô-tí] sim-lāi tùi [Iok-hān] khioh-hūn, siūⁿ-beh kā i thâi, m̄-kú bōe-tàng chiàu sim-goān,
41006020	in-ūi [Hi-lu̍t] kiaⁿ [Iok-hān], chai-iáⁿ i sī chèng-gī koh sèng-kiat ê lâng, ū kā i pó-hō͘. [Hi-lu̍t] ta̍k piàn thiaⁿ [Iok-hān] ê ōe, hui-siông put-an, iáu-kú chin ài thiaⁿ.
41006021	[Hi-lô-tí] ê ki-hōe lâi lah. [Hi-lu̍t] choh siⁿ-ji̍t ê sî, pān iàn-se̍k chhiáⁿ bûn-bú pah-koaⁿ kap [Ka-lī-lī] bîn-kan ê léng-siù.
41006022	[Hi-lô-tí] ê cha-bó͘-kiáⁿ ji̍p-lâi thiàu-bú, hō͘ [Hi-lu̍t] kap chāi-chō ê kùi-pin hoaⁿ-hí. Ông kā hit-ê cha-bó͘ gín-á kóng, “Khòaⁿ lí ài sím-mi̍h, chòe lí kiû, góa lóng beh hō͘ lí.”
41006023	[Hi-lu̍t] koh tùi i chiù-chōa kóng, “Lí bô-lūn kiû sím-mi̍h, liân góa ông-kok ê chi̍t-pòaⁿ mā ōe hō͘ lí.”
41006024	Cha-bó͘ gín-á chhut-khì mn̄g i ê lāu-bú, “Góa tio̍h kiû sím-mi̍h?” I ê lāu-bú kā i kóng, “Si-sóe-chiá [Iok-hān] ê thâu.”
41006025	I sûi-sî kóaⁿ tò tńg-lâi, tùi ông iau-kiû kóng, “Chhiáⁿ lí sûi-sî chiong Si-sóe-chiá [Iok-hān] ê thâu-khak khǹg tī pôaⁿ-ni̍h hō͘ góa.”
41006026	Ông ê sim hui-siông kan-khó͘, put-kò í-keng tī kùi-pin ê bīn-chêng chiù-chōa, chiū bô kā i kū-choa̍t.
41006027	Ông sûi-sî chhe chi̍t ê kéng-ōe khì the̍h [Iok-hān] ê thâu. Kéng-ōe chiū khì kaⁿ-ni̍h chām [Iok-hān] ê thâu,
41006028	chiong thâu-khak hē tī pôaⁿ-ni̍h phâng lâi hō͘ cha-bó͘ gín-á, cha-bó͘ gín-á chiū hō͘ i ê lāu-bú.
41006029	[Iok-hān] ê bûn-tô͘ thiaⁿ-tio̍h chiū lâi siu i ê sin-si, kā i bâi-chòng tī bōng-ni̍h.
41006030	Sù-tô͘ tńg-lâi Iâ-so͘ hia, chiong in só͘ chòe só͘ kà-sī ê lóng kā I pò-kò.
41006031	Iâ-so͘ kā in kóng, “Án-ni, lín mā tio̍h ka-kī khì phian-phiah bô-lâng tòa ê só͘-chāi sió-khóa hioh-khùn chi̍t-ē.” In-ūi chhut-chhut ji̍p-ji̍p ê lâng chin chōe, in liân chia̍h-pn̄g ê sî-kan to bô.
41006032	In chiū chē-chûn kan-ta in ka-kī khì phian-phiah bô-lâng tòa ê só͘-chāi.
41006033	Chin chōe lâng khòaⁿ-tio̍h in lī-khui, jīn-chhut sī in, chiū tùi ta̍k ê siâⁿ-chhī sūn lio̍k-lō͘ cháu chìn-chêng, pí in tāi-seng kàu hit só͘-chāi.
41006034	Iâ-so͘ chiūⁿ-hōaⁿ, khòaⁿ-tio̍h chi̍t tōa-tīn lâng chiū khó-lîn in, in-ūi in chhin-chhiūⁿ bô bo̍k-chiá ê iûⁿ. I chiū kà-sī in chin chōe hāng sū.
41006035	Sî-kan í-keng chin òaⁿ, bûn-tô͘ óa-lâi kā I kóng, “Chit-ê só͘-chāi chin phian-phiah, sî-kan mā chin òaⁿ lah.
41006036	Chhiáⁿ kā in kái-sàn, hō͘ in khì hù-kūn ê hiong-chhoan chng-siā ka-kī bóe mi̍h-kiāⁿ chia̍h.”
41006037	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Lín hō͘ in chia̍h.” Bûn-tô͘ mn̄g kóng, “Goán tio̍h khì bóe nn̄g-pah ê gûn-á ê piáⁿ hō͘ in chia̍h o͘h?”
41006038	Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Lín ū jōa chōe piáⁿ, khì khòaⁿ-bāi leh!” In khòaⁿ liáu chiū kóng, “Ū gō͘ ê; mā ū nn̄g bé hî.”
41006039	Iâ-so͘ hoan-hù bûn-tô͘ kā chèng-lâng hun-cho͘, hō͘ in chē tī chhiⁿ-chhùi ê chháu-po͘.
41006040	Chèng-lâng chiū chi̍t-cho͘ chi̍t-cho͘ chē lo̍h-khì, ū ê chi̍t-pah ê, ū ê gō͘-cha̍p ê.
41006041	Āu-lâi Iâ-so͘ the̍h hit gō͘ ê piáⁿ kap nn̄g bé hî, ǹg thiⁿ kám-siā, peh-khui, the̍h hō͘ bûn-tô͘ khì pun hō͘ chèng-lâng. I koh chiong hit nn̄g bé hî pun hō͘ chèng-lâng.
41006042	Tāi-ke lóng chia̍h, chia̍h kàu pá.
41006043	Bûn-tô͘ khioh chia̍h chhun ê piáⁿ-iù-á kap hî-sut-á, móa cha̍p-jī nâ.
41006044	Chia̍h piáⁿ ê, kan-ta ta-po͘-lâng chiū ū gō͘-chheng.
41006045	Iâ-so͘ sûi-sî pek I ê bûn-tô͘ chiūⁿ-chûn seng kè-khì tùi-bīn hōaⁿ, khì [Pek-sài-tāi], ka-kī lâu teh kái-sàn kûn-chiòng.
41006046	Iâ-so͘ lī-khui kûn-chiòng liáu-āu chiū chiūⁿ-soaⁿ kî-tó.
41006047	Thiⁿ àm ê sî, chûn kiâⁿ kàu ô͘ ê tiong-ng; Iâ-so͘ ka-kī chi̍t ê tī hōaⁿ-téng.
41006048	I khòaⁿ-tio̍h bûn-tô͘ chìⁿ-hong teh kò-chiúⁿ, kò-kah chin kan-khó͘. Thiⁿ beh kng ê sî, Iâ-so͘ tī ô͘ ê téng-bīn ǹg in hia kiâⁿ khì, siūⁿ-beh tùi piⁿ-a kè-khì.
41006049	Bûn-tô͘ khòaⁿ-tio̍h I tī ô͘ ê téng-bīn teh kiâⁿ, siūⁿ-kóng sī kúi, chiū tōa-siaⁿ hoah,
41006050	in-ūi tāi-ke lóng ū khòaⁿ-tio̍h I, chin kiaⁿ. Iâ-so͘ sûi-sî kā in kóng, “An-sim, sī góa, bián kiaⁿ!”
41006051	Iâ-so͘ chiūⁿ-chûn khì kap in chòe-hé, hong chiū tiām-khì. Bûn-tô͘ hui-siông tio̍h-kiaⁿ,
41006052	in-ūi in bô bêng-pe̍k hit-ê piáⁿ ê ì-gī, sim iáu chin tūn.
41006053	Iâ-so͘ kap bûn-tô͘ kè ô͘ liáu-āu tī [Kek-nî-sat-le̍k] chiūⁿ-hōaⁿ, kā chûn pha tī hōaⁿ-piⁿ.
41006054	In chi̍t-ē lo̍h-chûn, chèng-lâng sûi-sî jīn-chhut Iâ-so͘,
41006055	chiū sì-kòe kiâⁿ thàu-thàu, thiaⁿ-tio̍h Iâ-so͘ tī tó-ūi chiū ēng chhn̂g-pho͘ kng pīⁿ-lâng khì hia.
41006056	Iâ-so͘ bô-lūn kiâⁿ kàu sím-mi̍h chng-siā, siâⁿ-chhī, hiong-chhoan, lâng chiū kā pīⁿ-lâng kng lâi khǹg tī chhī-tiûⁿ-kháu, khún-kiû Iâ-so͘ siōng-bô mā hō͘ pīⁿ-lâng bong-tio̍h I saⁿ-á-ku ê chhiu; só͘-ū bong-tio̍h ê lâng lóng tit-tio̍h i-hó.
41007001	[Hoat-lī-sài-phài] ê lâng kap chi̍t-kóa tùi [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] lâi ê keng-ha̍k-kàu-su tàu-tīn lâi chhē Iâ-so͘.
41007002	In khòaⁿ-tio̍h Iâ-so͘ ê bûn-tô͘ ū lâng ēng bô chheng-khì ê chhiú, chiū-sī bô sóe-chhiú chiū chia̍h-pn̄g.
41007003	Goân-lâi [Hoat-lī-sài-phài] ê lâng kap só͘-ū ê [Iû-thài]-lâng lóng chip-siú chó͘-sian ê thoân-thóng, nā bô chiàu hoat-tō͘ sóe-chhiú chiū bô chia̍h-pn̄g;
41007004	tùi chhī-tiûⁿ tò-lâi, nā bô sóe mā bô chia̍h. In koh chun-siú kî-tha chin chōe thoân-thóng ê kui-lē, chhin-chhiūⁿ sóe poe-á, koàn-á, tâng-khì, kap chhn̂g-pho͘, téng.
41007005	Só͘-í, [Hoat-lī-sài-phài] ê lâng kap keng-ha̍k-kàu-su mn̄g Iâ-so͘, “Sī-án-chóaⁿ lí ê bûn-tô͘ ēng bô chheng-khì ê chhiú chia̍h-pn̄g, ûi-hoān chó͘-sian ê thoân-thóng?”
41007006	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “[Í-sài-a] só͘ kóng koan-hē lín chiah-ê ké-hó ê lâng ê ū-giân chin tio̍h; i án-ni siá: Chit-ê chú-bîn ēng chhùi-tûn chun-kèng góa, in ê sim khiok lī-khui góa hn̄g-hn̄g.
41007007	In ēng lâng ê kui-lē chòe góa ê kà-sī kà-sī lâng; in kèng-pài góa lóng bô chhái-kang.
41007008	“Lín kèng-jiân pàng-sak Siōng-tè ê kài-bēng, khì chip-siú lâng ê thoân-thóng.”
41007009	Iâ-so͘ koh kóng, “Lín ūi-tio̍h beh chip-siú thoân-thóng, ēng kháu-biāu ê hong-hoat lâi kū-choa̍t Siōng-tè ê kài-bēng.
41007010	[Mô͘-se] bēng-lēng lín ‘Tio̍h hàu-kèng pē-bú’, koh kóng ‘Mē lāu-pē á-sī mē lāu-bú ê lâng eng-kai chhú-sí’.
41007011	M̄-kú lín kóng, lâng nā tùi ka-kī ê lāu-pē á-sī lāu-bú kóng ‘Góa eng-kai hō͘ lí ê í-keng chòe Kok-ní-pán’ --- Kok-ní-pán ê ì-sù chiū-sī hiàn hō͘ Siōng-tè ê lé-mi̍h,
41007012	lín chiū chún i bián hōng-ióng ka-kī ê pē-bú.
41007013	Lín ēng lín só͘ thoân-siū ê thoân-thóng lâi hòe-tû Siōng-tè ê ōe. Lín koh chòe chin chōe chit khoán ê tāi-chì.”
41007014	Iâ-so͘ koh kiò chèng-lâng lâi, kā in kóng, “Lín tāi-ke lóng tio̍h thiaⁿ góa ê ōe, tio̍h liáu-kái:
41007015	Tùi gōa-bīn ji̍p-khì lâng lāi-bīn ê bô chi̍t hāng ōe hō͘ lâng bô chheng-khì; tùi lāi-bīn chhut-lâi ê mi̍h chiah ōe hō͘ lâng bô chheng-khì.”
41007017	Iâ-so͘ lī-khui chèng-lâng, ji̍p-khì chhù-lāi, I ê bûn-tô͘ chiū mn̄g I chit-ê phì-jū ê ì-sù.
41007018	I kā in kóng, “Án-ni liân lín to bô bêng-pe̍k ò͘? Lín kiám bô liáu-kái, tùi gōa-bīn ji̍p-khì lâng lāi-bīn ê lóng bōe hō͘ lâng bô chheng-khì?
41007019	In-ūi tùi gōa-bīn ji̍p-khì ê m̄-sī ji̍p-khì sim-lāi, sī ji̍p-khì pak-tó͘-lāi, āu-lâi pàng lo̍h-khì piān-só͘.” Iâ-so͘ án-ni kóng sī chí só͘-ū ê chia̍h-mi̍h lóng chheng-khì.
41007020	I koh kóng, “Tùi lâng lāi-bīn chhut-lâi ê chiah ōe hō͘ lâng bô chheng-khì.
41007021	In-ūi tùi lāi-bīn chhut-lâi ê, chiū-sī tùi lâng ê sim chhut ê, ū pháiⁿ liām-thâu, su-thong, thau-the̍h, hiong-sat,
41007022	kan-îm, tham-sim, siâ-ok, kan-chà, hòng-chhiòng, chi̍t-tò͘, húi-pòng, kiau-ngō͘, bōe hiáu hun-pia̍t sī-hui.
41007023	Chiah-ê it-chhè siâ-ok ê sū lóng sī tùi lāi-bīn chhut-lâi ê, che chiah ōe hō͘ lâng bô chheng-khì.”
41007024	Iâ-so͘ tùi hia chhut-hoat khì [Thài-ní] tōe-khu. I ji̍p-khì chi̍t keng chhù, bô ài lâng chai, put-kò bô hoat-tō͘ pó-bi̍t.
41007025	Sûi-sî ū chi̍t ê hū-jîn-lâng thiaⁿ-tio̍h Iâ-so͘ ê tāi-chì, chiū lâi kūi tī I ê kha-chêng; i ê cha-bó͘-kiáⁿ hō͘ siâ-sîn hū-sin.
41007026	Chit-ê hū-jîn-lâng sī chhut-sì tī [Sū-lī-a] [Hui-nî-ki] ê [Hi-la̍h-lâng]. I kiû Iâ-so͘ kā i ê cha-bó͘-kiáⁿ kóaⁿ-kúi.
41007027	Iâ-so͘ kā i kóng, “Tio̍h seng hō͘ gín-á chia̍h; the̍h gín-á ê chia̍h-mi̍h hiat hō͘ káu-á chia̍h m̄-hó.”
41007028	[Hū-jîn-lâng] ìn kóng, “Chú ah, toh-á-kha ê káu-á to chia̍h gín-á ê piáⁿ-iù-á.”
41007029	Iâ-so͘ kā i kóng, “In-ūi lí chit kù ōe, lí thang tńg-khì; kúi í-keng lī-khui lí ê cha-bó͘-kiáⁿ lah!”
41007030	[Hū-jîn-lâng] tńg-khì in tau, khòaⁿ-tio̍h cha-bó͘-kiáⁿ tó tī chhn̂g-ni̍h, kúi í-keng lī-khui.
41007031	Iâ-so͘ koh lī-khui [Thài-ní] tōe-khu, keng-kè [Se-tùn] í-ki̍p [Te-ka-pho-lí] tōe-khu, lâi-kàu [Ka-lī-lī-ô͘.]
41007032	Ū lâng chhōa chi̍t ê bōe thiaⁿ-kìⁿ koh bōe kóng-ōe ê lâng lâi Iâ-so͘ hia, khún-kiû Iâ-so͘ kā i hōaⁿ-chhiú.
41007033	Iâ-so͘ chhōa hit-ê lâng lī-khui chèng-lâng khì piⁿ-a, chhng chńg-thâu-á ji̍p-khì i siang pêng ê hīⁿ-khang, koh phùi-nōa boah i ê chi̍h,
41007034	jiân-āu ǹg-thiⁿ, thó͘-khùi, kā i kóng, “Í-hoat-tāi”, ì-sù chiū-sī “Khui!”
41007035	Hit lâng ê hī-khang sûi-sî khui, chi̍h-kun lēng, kóng-ōe kóng-kah chin chheng-chhó.
41007036	Iâ-so͘ giâm-giâm bēng-lēng in m̄-thang kā lâng kóng, m̄-kú I jú kìm-chí, in jú chhut-la̍t pò-iông.
41007037	Tāi-ke lóng hui-siông tio̍h-kiaⁿ, kóng, “I ta̍k hāng lóng chòe-kah chin hó, liân bōe thiaⁿ-kìⁿ ê lâng to ōe thiaⁿ-kìⁿ, bōe kóng-ōe ê lâng to ōe kóng-ōe!”
41008001	Kè bô kúi ji̍t, koh ū chi̍t tōa-tīn kûn-chiòng chū-chi̍p. In bô mi̍h thang chia̍h, Iâ-so͘ chiū kiò I ê bûn-tô͘ lâi, kā in kóng,
41008002	“Góa chin khó-lîn chit tīn lâng, in-ūi in í-keng kap góa chòe-hé saⁿ-ji̍t kú, hiān-chāi bô mi̍h thang chia̍h lah.
41008003	Góa nā hō͘ in sì-sòaⁿ iau-iau tńg-khì in tau, in ōe tī lō͘-tiong hūn-tó, in-ūi ū lâng tùi chin hn̄g ê só͘-chāi lâi.”
41008004	Bûn-tô͘ kā I kóng, “Tī chit-ê phian-phiah bô-lâng tòa ê só͘-chāi, beh khì tó-ūi chhē chia̍h-mi̍h hō͘ chiah-ê lâng chia̍h pá?”
41008005	Iâ-so͘ mn̄g in, “Lín ū jōa chōe piáⁿ?” In kóng, “Chhit ê.”
41008006	Iâ-so͘ bēng-lēng kûn-chiòng chē lo̍h-khì thô͘-kha, jiân-āu the̍h hit chhit ê piáⁿ, kám-siā, peh-khui, the̍h hō͘ bûn-tô͘ khì pun, in chiū pun hō͘ kûn-chiòng.
41008007	In mā ū kúi-nā bé sòe bé hî, Iâ-so͘ kám-siā liáu, kiò bûn-tô͘ the̍h khì pun.
41008008	In lóng chia̍h, chia̍h kàu pá, koh khioh chia̍h chhun ê chhùi-sut-á, lóng-chóng khioh chhit láng.
41008009	Lâng-sò͘ iok ū sì-chheng. Iâ-so͘ kā in kái-sàn,
41008010	jiân-āu sûi-sî kap bûn-tô͘ chiūⁿ-chûn, khì [Tāi-má-lô͘-tha] ê kéng-lāi.
41008011	Chi̍t-kóa [Hoat-lī-sài-phài] ê lâng lâi chhē Iâ-so͘, kap I piān-lūn. In siūⁿ-beh kā I chhì-thàm, iau-kiû I kiâⁿ tùi thiⁿ lâi ê sîn-jiah.
41008012	Iâ-so͘ tùi sim-tóe thó͘ chi̍t ê tōa-khùi, kóng, “Sī-án-chóaⁿ chit sè-tāi ê lâng kiû sîn-jiah? Góa si̍t-chāi kā lín kóng, bōe-koh ū sîn-jiah hō͘ chit sè-tāi ê lâng.”
41008013	I chiū lī-khui in, koh chiūⁿ-chûn kè-khì ô͘ ê hit pêng hōaⁿ.
41008014	Bûn-tô͘ bōe kì-tit tòa piáⁿ, put-kò in tī chûn-lāi ū chi̍t ê piáⁿ.
41008015	Iâ-so͘ kā in kéng-kò, “Tio̍h chù-ì, tio̍h tî-hông [Hoat-lī-sài-phài] ê kàⁿ kap [Hi-lu̍t] ê kàⁿ!”
41008016	Bûn-tô͘ hō͘-siōng gī-lūn, “Sī in-ūi lán bô piáⁿ sī-bô?”
41008017	Iâ-so͘ chai-iáⁿ chiū kā in kóng, “Lín sī-án-chóaⁿ teh gī-lūn bô tòa piáⁿ ê tāi-chì? Lín kiám iáu-bô liáu-kái, iáu-bô bêng-pe̍k? Lín ê sim kiám hiah-ni̍h tūn?
41008018	Lín ū ba̍k-chiu, kiám bô khòaⁿ-kìⁿ? Lín ū hī-khang, kiám bô thiaⁿ-kìⁿ? Lín kiám bōe kì-tit,
41008019	góa peh gō͘ ê piáⁿ hō͘ gō͘-chheng lâng chia̍h ê sî, chia̍h chhun ê chhùi-sut-á, lín ū khioh móa kúi nâ?” In kóng, “Cha̍p-jī nâ.”
41008020	Iâ-so͘ koh mn̄g, “Góa peh chhit ê piáⁿ hō͘ sì-chheng lâng chia̍h ê sî, chia̍h chhun ê chhùi-sut-á, lín ū khioh kúi láng?” In kóng, “Chhit láng.”
41008021	Iâ-so͘ chiū kā in kóng, “Án-ni, lín kiám iáu-bô bêng-pe̍k?”
41008022	Iâ-so͘ kap bûn-tô͘ lâi-kàu [Pek-sài-tāi]. Ū lâng chhōa chi̍t ê bông-jîn lâi Iâ-so͘ hia, khún-kiû Iâ-so͘ kā i bong.
41008023	Iâ-so͘ khan hit-ê bông-jîn ê chhiú, chhōa i chhut-khì chng-gōa, jiân-āu chiong chhùi-nōa phùi tī i ê ba̍k-chiu, koh ēng siang-chhiú kā i bong, mn̄g kóng, “Lí ū khòaⁿ-tio̍h sím-mi̍h?”
41008024	I gia̍h-thâu khí-lâi khòaⁿ, kóng, “Góa khòaⁿ-tio̍h lâng, khòaⁿ khí-lâi chhin-chhiūⁿ chhiū-á teh kiâⁿ-lâi kiâⁿ-khì.”
41008025	Iâ-so͘ koh chi̍t piàn ēng siang-chhiú bong i ê ba̍k-chiu, i chù-sîn khòaⁿ, sī-le̍k chiū ho̍k-goân, ta̍k hāng lóng khòaⁿ-kah chin chheng-chhó.
41008026	Iâ-so͘ kiò i tńg-khì in tau, kā i kóng, “Lí liân chng-lāi to m̄-thang ji̍p-khì.”
41008027	Iâ-so͘ kap I ê bûn-tô͘ khì [Khái-sat-lī-a] [Hui-li̍p-pí] hù-kūn ê hiong-chhoan. Tī lō͘-tiong, I mn̄g in kóng, “Lâng kóng góa sī sím-mi̍h lâng?”
41008028	In ìn kóng, “Ū lâng kóng lí sī Si-sóe-chiá [Iok-hān]; ū lâng kóng sī [Í-lī-a]; mā ū lâng kóng sī sian-ti tiong ê chi̍t ê.”
41008029	Iâ-so͘ koh mn̄g in kóng, “Lín leh, lín kóng góa sī sím-mi̍h lâng?” [Pí-tek] ìn kóng, “Lí sī Ki-tok.”
41008030	Iâ-so͘ bēng-lēng in chhian-bān m̄-thang tùi lâng kóng-khí I ê tāi-chì.
41008031	Iâ-so͘ khai-sí kà-sī bûn-tô͘ kóng, “Jîn-chú it-tēng tio̍h siū chin chōe khó͘-lān, hō͘ tiúⁿ-ló, chè-si-tiúⁿ, kap keng-ha̍k-kàu-su kū-choa̍t, koh hō͘ lâng hāi-sí, saⁿ ji̍t āu koh-oa̍h.”
41008032	I chiong chit-ê tāi-chì chheng-chheng chhó-chhó kā in kóng. [Pí-tek] chiū khiú Iâ-so͘ khì piⁿ-a, kā I chek-pī.
41008033	Iâ-so͘ oa̍t kè-lâi khòaⁿ bûn-tô͘, chek-pī [Pí-tek], kóng, “Sat-tàn, siám-khui! Lí só͘ siūⁿ ê m̄-sī Siōng-tè ê sū, sī lâng ê sū.”
41008034	Jiân-āu, Iâ-so͘ kā kûn-chiòng kap bûn-tô͘ kiò óa-lâi, tùi in kóng, “Beh tè góa ê lâng, tio̍h oân-choân hó͘-tēng ka-kī, giâ ka-kī ê si̍p-jī-kè lâi tè góa.
41008035	In-ūi beh kiù ka-kī ê sìⁿ-miā ê, ōe sòng-sit sìⁿ-miā; ūi-tio̍h góa kap hok-im ê iân-kò͘ sòng-sit ka-kī ê sìⁿ-miā ê, ōe kiù-tio̍h sìⁿ-miā.
41008036	Lâng tit-tio̍h choân sè-kài soah sòng-sit ka-kī ê sìⁿ-miā ū sím-mi̍h lī-ek?
41008037	Lâng ōe-tàng ēng sím-mi̍h tāi-kè lâi kau-ōaⁿ ka-kī ê sìⁿ-miā?
41008038	Tī chit-ê îm-loān siâ-ok ê sè-tāi, lâng nā in-ūi góa kap góa ê ōe kám-kak kiàn-siàu, Jîn-chú tī I ê Pē ê êng-kng tiong kap sèng thiⁿ-sài lâi-lîm ê sî mā ōe in-ūi i kám-kak kiàn-siàu.”
41009001	Iâ-so͘ koh kā in kóng, “Góa si̍t-chāi kā lín kóng, khiā tī chia ê lâng, ū-ê iáu-bē sí í-chêng ōe khòaⁿ-kìⁿ Siōng-tè-kok í-keng chhiong-móa tōa lêng-le̍k lâi-lîm.”
41009002	La̍k ji̍t āu, Iâ-so͘ chhōa [Pí-tek], [Ngá-kok], kap [Iok-hān], kan-ta in ka-kī peh-chiūⁿ chi̍t chō koân soaⁿ. Tī in ê bīn-chêng, Iâ-so͘ ê hêng-siōng hut-jiân kái-piàn.
41009003	I ê saⁿ piàn-kàu kng-iàⁿ-iàⁿ, hui-siông pe̍h, tōe-chiūⁿ ê phiò-pò͘ sai-hū mā bōe-tàng phiò-kàu hiah-ni̍h pe̍h.
41009004	Hit sî [Í-lī-a] kap [Mô͘-se] chòe-hé chhut-hiān, kap Iâ-so͘ kóng-ōe.
41009005	[Pí-tek] tùi Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Lia̍p-pí, lán tī chia chin hó, goán lâi tah saⁿ keng liâu-á, chi̍t keng hō͘ lí, chi̍t keng hō͘ [Mô͘-se], chi̍t keng hō͘ [Í-lī-a].”
41009006	[Pí-tek] m̄-chai tio̍h kóng sím-mi̍h, in-ūi in hui-siông kiaⁿ-hiâⁿ.
41009007	Hit sî, ū chi̍t phìⁿ hûn kā in tà-teh, koh ū siaⁿ tùi hûn chhut-lâi, kóng, “Chit-ê sī góa só͘ thiàⁿ ê Kiáⁿ, lín tio̍h thiaⁿ-thàn I.”
41009008	In kóaⁿ-kín sì-chiu-ûi khòaⁿ chi̍t lìn, chí-ū khòaⁿ-tio̍h Iâ-so͘, bô pa̍t-lâng tī hia.
41009009	In lo̍h-soaⁿ ê sî, Iâ-so͘ bēng-lēng in kóng, “Jîn-chú tùi sí-lâng tiong koh-oa̍h í-chêng, m̄-thang chiong só͘ khòaⁿ-kìⁿ ê sū kā lâng kóng.”
41009010	In chiong Iâ-so͘ ê ōe khǹg tī sim-lāi, su-hā teh gī-lūn tùi sí-lâng tiong koh-oa̍h chit kù ōe sī sím-mi̍h ì-sù.
41009011	In mn̄g Iâ-so͘, “Sī-án-chóaⁿ keng-ha̍k-kàu-su kóng [Í-lī-a] it-tēng tio̍h seng lâi?”
41009012	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “[Í-lī-a] it-tēng tio̍h seng lâi hôe-ho̍k it-chhè. Án-ni, Sèng-keng ná-ōe kì-chài kóng Jîn-chú it-tēng tio̍h siū chin chōe khó͘-lān koh hō͘ lâng biáu-sī?
41009013	Góa kā lín kóng, tú-tú chiàu Sèng-keng só͘ kì-chài, [Í-lī-a] í-keng lâi lah, lâng chiàu in ê ì-sù tùi-thāi i.”
41009014	In lâi-kàu kî-tha ê bûn-tô͘ hia, khòaⁿ-tio̍h chi̍t tōa-kûn lâng kā in ûi-teh, ū kúi-nā ê keng-ha̍k-kàu-su kap in teh piān-lūn.
41009015	Kûn-chiòng chi̍t-ē khòaⁿ-tio̍h Iâ-so͘, chin tio̍h-kiaⁿ, sûi-sî cháu óa-khì kā I chhéng-an.
41009016	Iâ-so͘ mn̄g bûn-tô͘ kóng, “Lín kap in teh piān-lūn sím-mi̍h?”
41009017	Kûn-chiòng ê tiong-kan ū chi̍t ê ìn I kóng, “Lāu-su, góa chhōa góa ê kiáⁿ lâi chhē lí, i hō͘ kúi hū-sin bōe kóng-ōe.
41009018	Bô-lūn tī tó-ūi, kúi chi̍t-ē hū-sin, kā i siak-tó, i chiū phū pe̍h-pho-nōa, kā chhùi-khí-kun, kui seng-khu ngī-khok-khok. Góa chhiáⁿ lí ê bûn-tô͘ kā kúi kóaⁿ chhut-khì, in bô hoat-tō͘.”
41009019	Iâ-so͘ kā in kóng, “Ài à, m̄-sìn ê sè-tāi! Góa tio̍h kap lín tòa jōa kú? Góa tio̍h koh jím-nāi lín jōa kú? Kā gín-á chhōa lâi chia!”
41009020	In chiū kā i chhōa lâi. Hit-ê kúi chi̍t-ē khòaⁿ-tio̍h Iâ-so͘, sûi-sî hō͘ hit-ê gín-á thiu-chhoah, tó tī thô͘-kha kō-lâi kō-khì, phū pe̍h-pho-nōa.
41009021	Iâ-so͘ mn̄g i ê lāu-pē, “I án-ni jōa kú à?” I ìn kóng, “Tùi sòe-hàn chiū án-ni.
41009022	Kúi tiāⁿ-tiāⁿ kā i hiat-lo̍h hé, chhia-lo̍h chúi, beh kā i hāi-sí. Lí nā ōe, kiû lí khó-lîn goán, pang-chān goán!”
41009023	Iâ-so͘ kā i kóng, “Lí kóng ‘Lí nā ōe!’ Ū sìn ê lâng ta̍k hāng lóng ōe.”
41009024	Gín-á ê lāu-pē sûi-sî hoah kóng, “Góa sìn! Góa ê sìn bô kàu, kiû lí pang-chān!”
41009025	Iâ-so͘ khòaⁿ-tio̍h kûn-chiòng cháu óa-lâi, giâm-giâm chek-pī hit-ê siâ-sîn, kóng, “Lí chit-ê é-káu koh chhàu-hī ê kúi, góa bēng-lēng lí tùi chit-ê gín-á chhut-lâi, m̄-chún lí koh ji̍p-khì!”
41009026	Kúi tōa-siaⁿ hoah, hō͘ hit-ê gín-á tōa thiu-chhoah chiah chhut-khì. Hit-ê gín-á pìⁿ-chòe kap sí-lâng siâng-khoán, só͘-í tōa-pō͘-hūn ê lâng kóng, “I sí-khì lah.”
41009027	Chóng-sī Iâ-so͘ khan gín-á ê chhiú, kā i hû khí-lâi, i chiū khí-lâi.
41009028	Iâ-so͘ ji̍p-khì chhù-lāi, i ê bûn-tô͘ su-hā kā I mn̄g, “Sī-án-chóaⁿ goán bô hoat-tō͘ kā kúi kóaⁿ chhut-khì?”
41009029	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Chit chióng kúi chí-ū khò kî-tó chiah kóaⁿ ōe chhut-khì.”
41009030	Iâ-so͘ kap bûn-tô͘ lī-khui hia, keng-kè [Ka-lī-lī]. Iâ-so͘ bô ài lâng chai I tī tó-ūi,
41009031	in-ūi I tú teh kà-sī bûn-tô͘, tùi in kóng, “Jîn-chú ōe hō͘ lâng chhut-bōe, in ōe kā I hāi-sí, sí liáu saⁿ-ji̍t āu ōe koh-oa̍h.”
41009032	In bōe bêng-pe̍k chit kù ōe, koh m̄-káⁿ kā I mn̄g.
41009033	In lâi-kàu [Ka-pek-lông]. Iâ-so͘ tī chhù-ni̍h ê sî mn̄g bûn-tô͘ kóng, “Lín tī lō͘-tiong teh gī-lūn sím-mi̍h?”
41009034	In lóng tiām-tiām, in-ūi tī lō͘-tiong in hō͘-siōng teh cheng-lūn sím-mi̍h lâng siōng-tōa.
41009035	Iâ-so͘ chē lo̍h-khì, kiò cha̍p-jī sù-tô͘ lâi, tùi in kóng, “Nā ū lâng beh chòe tē-it, tio̍h chòe chèng-lâng ê siōng lō͘-bé, chòe chèng-lâng ê chhe-ēng.”
41009036	I chiū khan chi̍t ê sòe-hàn gín-á lâi, hō͘ i khiā tī in tiong-kan, kā i phō khí-lâi, tùi in kóng,
41009037	“Bô-lūn sím-mi̍h lâng nā ūi-tio̍h góa ê miâ chiap-la̍p chi̍t ê chit khoán gín-á, chiū-sī chiap-la̍p góa. Chiap-la̍p góa ê, m̄-sī chiap-la̍p góa, sī chiap-la̍p chhe góa lâi Hit-ūi.”
41009038	[Iok-hān] tùi Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Lāu-su, goán ū khòaⁿ-tio̍h chi̍t ê lâng hōng lí ê miâ teh kóaⁿ-kúi, goán kā i chó͘-tòng, in-ūi i bô teh tè lán.”
41009039	Iâ-so͘ kóng, “M̄-thang kā i chó͘-tòng, in-ūi bô-lâng ōe hōng góa ê miâ kiâⁿ sîn-jiah, sûi-sî koh kóng góa ê pháiⁿ-ōe.
41009040	Bô hoán-tùi lán ê chiū-sī ūi lán.
41009041	Góa si̍t-chāi kā lín kóng, bô-lūn sím-mi̍h lâng, in-ūi lín sio̍k Ki-tok, ēng chi̍t poe chúi hō͘ lín lim, i it-tēng ōe tit-tio̍h pò-siúⁿ.”
41009042	Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Bô-lūn sím-mi̍h-lâng hō͘ sìn góa ê lâng tiong-kan bî-sòe ê chi̍t-ê hoān-chōe, i khah hó hō͘ lâng ēng tōa chio̍h-bō kā i tiàu tī ām-kún, hiat-lo̍h hái.
41009043	“Lí ê chhiú nā hō͘ lí hoān-chōe, tio̍h chām hiat-ka̍k, lêng-khó kiám chi̍t ki chhiú ji̍p éng-oán-oa̍h, pí siang-chhiú hó-hó lo̍h tōe-ge̍k hō͘ bōe hoa ê hé sio khah hó.
41009045	Lí ê kha nā hō͘ lí hoān-chōe, tio̍h chām hiat-ka̍k, lêng-khó kiám chi̍t ki kha ji̍p éng-oán-oa̍h, pí siang-kha hó-hó hō͘ lâng hiat-lo̍h tōe-ge̍k khah hó.
41009047	Lí ê ba̍k-chiu nā hō͘ lí hoān-chōe, tio̍h ó͘ hiat-ka̍k, lêng-khó kiám chi̍t lúi ba̍k-chiu ji̍p Siōng-tè-kok, pí nn̄g-lúi ba̍k-chiu hó-hó hō͘ lâng hiat-lo̍h tōe-ge̍k khah hó.
41009048	Tī tōe-ge̍k, thâng bōe sí, hé bōe hoa.
41009049	“In-ūi ta̍k ê lâng lóng tio̍h ēng hé liān, chhin-chhiūⁿ ēng iâm sīⁿ.
41009050	Iâm chin ū lō͘-ēng; m̄-kú iâm nā sit-khì kiâm-bī, beh án-chóaⁿ koh hō͘ i kiâm? Lín ka-kī tio̍h ū iâm ê chok-iōng, hō͘-siōng hô-hó.”
41010001	Iâ-so͘ lī-khui hit só͘-chāi ji̍p-khì [Iû-thài] tōe-khu, kè-khì [Iok-tàn]-hô ê hit pêng hōaⁿ. Kûn-chiòng koh chū-chi̍p khì I hia, I koh chiàu-siông kà-sī in.
41010002	Ū chi̍t-kóa [Hoat-lī-sài-phài] ê lâng beh chhì-thàm Iâ-so͘, óa-lâi mn̄g I kóng, “Tiōng-hu lî i ê bó͘ ū ha̍h Lu̍t-hoat bô?”
41010003	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “[Mô͘-se] ū hō͘ lín sím-mi̍h bēng-lēng?”
41010004	In kóng, “[Mô͘-se] ún-chún lâng siá lî-hun-su chiū thang lî i ê bó͘.”
41010005	Iâ-so͘ kā in kóng, “[Mô͘-se] sī in-ūi lín ê sim ngī chiah siá chit tiâu kài-bēng hō͘ lín.
41010006	M̄-kú khí-thâu chhòng-chō ê sî, Siōng-tè chō lâng, ū lâm ū lú.
41010007	In-ūi chit-ê lí-iû, lâng beh lī-khui i ê pē-bú, kap i ê bó͘ kiat-ha̍p,
41010008	nn̄g lâng chiâⁿ-chòe chi̍t-thé. Án-ni, in í-keng m̄-sī nn̄g ê, sī chi̍t-thé.
41010009	Só͘-í, Siōng-tè só͘ phòe-ha̍p ê, lâng m̄-thang thiah-khui.”
41010010	In ji̍p-khì chhù-lāi ê sî, bûn-tô͘ koh mn̄g Iâ-so͘ chit-ê tāi-chì.
41010011	Iâ-so͘ kā in kóng, “Bô-lūn sím-mi̍h lâng, lî i ê bó͘ khì chhōa pa̍t ê hū-jîn-lâng chiū-sī hoān kan-îm, ko͘-hū i ê bó͘;
41010012	bó͘ nā lî i ê tiōng-hu khì kè pa̍t-lâng mā-sī hoān kan-îm.”
41010013	Ū lâng chhōa gín-á lâi Iâ-so͘ hia, ài I kā in hōaⁿ-chhiú chiok-hok; bûn-tô͘ kā in chek-pī.
41010014	Iâ-so͘ khòaⁿ-tio̍h, chin siū-khì, tùi bûn-tô͘ kóng, “Hō͘ gín-á lâi góa chia, m̄-thang kā in chó͘-tòng, in-ūi Siōng-tè-kok sī chit khoán lâng ê.
41010015	Góa si̍t-chāi kā lín kóng, lâng nā bô chhin-chhiūⁿ gín-á án-ni chiap-siū Siōng-tè-kok, choa̍t-tùi bōe-tàng ji̍p-khì.”
41010016	Iâ-so͘ chiū kā in phō, hōaⁿ-chhiú chiok-hok.
41010017	Iâ-so͘ tú-beh chhut-gōa ê sî, ū chi̍t ê lâng cháu-lâi, kūi tī I ê bīn-chêng, mn̄g I kóng, “Hó ê Lāu-su, góa tio̍h chòe sím-mi̍h chiah ōe-tàng sêng-siū éng-oán ê oa̍h-miā?”
41010018	Iâ-so͘ kā i kóng, “Lí ná-ōe kóng góa sī hó? Siōng-tè í-gōa, bô chi̍t ê sī hó.
41010019	Chiah-ê kài-bēng lí lóng bat: M̄-thang thâi-sí lâng; m̄-thang kan-îm; m̄-thang thau-the̍h; m̄-thang choh gūi-chèng; m̄-thang chà-khi; tio̍h hàu-kèng pē-bú.”
41010020	Hit-ê lâng ìn Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Lāu-su, chiah-ê kài-bēng góa tùi sòe-hàn chiū it-ti̍t ū teh chun-siú.”
41010021	Iâ-so͘ chù-ba̍k khòaⁿ i, thiàⁿ i, kā i kóng, “Lí iáu khiàm chi̍t hāng; lí khì, khì bōe só͘-ū ê lâi pun hō͘ sàn-chhiah-lâng, lí tī thiⁿ-téng chiū ū châi-pó; jiân-āu lâi tè góa.”
41010022	Hit-ê lâng chi̍t-ē thiaⁿ-tio̍h chit kù ōe, bīn sit-sek, iu-iu chhiû-chhiû lī-khui; in-ūi i châi-sán chin chōe.
41010023	Iâ-so͘ sì-chiu-ûi khòaⁿ chi̍t lìn, kā bûn-tô͘ kóng, “Ū-chîⁿ-lâng ji̍p Siōng-tè-kok jōa-á-ni̍h khùn-lân!”
41010024	Bûn-tô͘ thiaⁿ-tio̍h I só͘ kóng ê ōe, hui-siông tio̍h-kiaⁿ. Iâ-so͘ koh kā in kóng, “Sòe-kiáⁿ ah, ji̍p Siōng-tè-kok chin-chiàⁿ khùn-lân!
41010025	Lo̍k-tô chhng-kè chiam-phīⁿ mā pí hó-gia̍h-lâng ji̍p Siōng-tè-kok koh-khah kán-tan.”
41010026	Bûn-tô͘ koh-khah tio̍h-kiaⁿ, tāi-ke kóng-lâi kóng-khì, “Nā án-ni, sím-mi̍h lâng ōe-tàng tit-tio̍h kiù?”
41010027	Iâ-so͘ chù-ba̍k kā in khòaⁿ, kóng, “Chit-ê sū, lâng chòe bōe-kàu, Siōng-tè chiū m̄-sī án-ni, in-ūi Siōng-tè ta̍k hāng lóng ōe.”
41010028	[Pí-tek] chiū kā Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Goán í-keng pàng-sak it-chhè lâi tè lí.”
41010029	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Góa si̍t-chāi kā lín kóng, bô-lūn sím-mi̍h lâng, nā ūi-tio̍h góa kap hok-im ê iân-kò͘ pàng-sak chhù-the̍h, hiaⁿ-tī, chí-bē, lāu-bú, lāu-pē, kiáⁿ-jî, kap chhân-hn̂g,
41010030	tī kim-sè ōe tit-tio̍h pah-pē ê chhù-the̍h, hiaⁿ-tī, chí-bē, lāu-bú, kiáⁿ-jî kap chhân-hn̂g, koh ū pek-hāi; tī lâi-sè ōe tit-tio̍h éng-oán ê oa̍h-miā.
41010031	Chóng-sī chin chōe tē-it-ê ōe chòe siōng lō͘-bé; siōng lō͘-bé-ê ōe chòe tē-it.”
41010032	Iâ-so͘ kap I ê bûn-tô͘ chiūⁿ [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] ê lō͘-tiong, I kiâⁿ tī thâu-chêng; bûn-tô͘ kám-kak chin kî-koài, tè ê lâng chin kiaⁿ-hiâⁿ. Iâ-so͘ koh chi̍t piàn chhōa cha̍p-jī sù-tô͘ khì piⁿ-a, chiong I teh-beh tú-tio̍h ê sū kā in kóng,
41010033	“Taⁿ lán beh chiūⁿ [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng]; Jîn-chú ōe siū chhut-bōe hō͘ chè-si-tiúⁿ kap keng-ha̍k-kàu-su. In ōe kā I tēng sí-chōe, āu-lâi chiong I kau hō͘ Gōa-pang-lâng.
41010034	In ōe kā I hì-lāng, phùi-nōa, piⁿ-phah, hāi-sí; saⁿ ji̍t āu, I ōe koh-oa̍h.”
41010035	[Se-pí-thài] ê kiáⁿ [Ngá-kok] kap [Iok-hān] kiâⁿ chìn-chêng, kā Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Lāu-su, goán só͘ kiû ê, chhiáⁿ lí kā goán sêng-choân.”
41010036	Iâ-so͘ mn̄g kóng, “Lín ài góa kā lín chòe sím-mi̍h?”
41010037	In kóng, “Lí tit-tio̍h êng-kng ê sî, chhiáⁿ hō͘ goán chi̍t ê chē lí ê chiàⁿ-pêng, chi̍t ê chē lí ê tò-pêng.”
41010038	Iâ-so͘ kā in kóng, “Lín m̄-chai ka-kī teh kiû sím-mi̍h. Góa lim ê poe, lín ōe-tàng lim bōe? Góa siū ê sóe, lín ōe-tàng siū bōe?”
41010039	In kóng, “Goán ōe!” Iâ-so͘ kā in kóng, “Góa só͘ lim ê poe, lín beh lim; góa só͘ siū ê sóe, lín beh siū,
41010040	put-kò chē góa ê chiàⁿ-pêng tò-pêng m̄-sī góa ōe-tàng hō͘ lâng ê. Siōng-tè ūi-tio̍h sím-mi̍h lâng chún-pī chiū hō͘ hit-ê lâng.”
41010041	Kî-tha hit cha̍p ê bûn-tô͘ thiaⁿ-tio̍h chiū tùi [Ngá-kok] kap [Iok-hān] siū-khì.
41010042	Iâ-so͘ kiò in lâi, kā in kóng, “Lín chai, tī Gōa-pang-lâng ê tiong-kan, hiah-ê hō͘ lâng khòaⁿ-chòe thóng-tī-chiá ê chòe chú kā in koán-hat, in ê léng-siù kā in chi-phòe.
41010043	Put-kò lín tiong-kan chiū m̄ eng-kai án-ni; lín tiong-kan ài chòe tōa-ê tio̍h chòe lín ê chhe-ēng;
41010044	ài chòe tē-it-ê tio̍h chòe chèng-lâng ê lô͘-po̍k.
41010045	In-ūi Jîn-chú m̄-sī lâi beh hō͘ lâng ho̍k-sāi, hoán-tńg sī beh kā lâng ho̍k-sāi, sīm-chì hi-seng ka-kī ê sìⁿ-miā lâi sio̍k-hôe chin chōe lâng.”
41010046	Iâ-so͘ kap I ê bûn-tô͘ lâi-kàu [Iâ-lī-ko]. In kap chi̍t tōa-tīn lâng beh tùi [Iâ-lī-ko] chhut-khì ê sî, ū chi̍t ê sit-bêng ê khit-chia̍h, [Tí-mái] ê kiáⁿ [Pa-tí-mái], chē tī lō͘-piⁿ.
41010047	I thiaⁿ-kóng [Ná-sat-le̍k]-lâng Iâ-so͘ tùi hia kè, chiū hoah, “[Tāi-pi̍t] ê Kiáⁿ Iâ-so͘, lîn-bín góa!”
41010048	Chin chōe lâng kā i chek-pī, kiò i tiām-tiām, m̄-kú i jú tōa-siaⁿ hoah, “[Tāi-pi̍t] ê Kiáⁿ, lîn-bín góa!”
41010049	Iâ-so͘ thêng-kha, kóng, “Kiò i lâi!” In chiū khì kiò hit-ê bông-jîn, kā i kóng, “An-sim, khí-lâi! I teh kiò lí.”
41010050	Bông-jîn chiū chiong gōa-saⁿ hiat-tiāu, thiàu khí-lâi, lâi-kàu Iâ-so͘ hia.
41010051	Iâ-so͘ kā i kóng, “Lí ài góa kā lí chòe sím-mi̍h?” Bông-jîn ìn kóng, “Góa ê lia̍p-pí, góa ài koh khòaⁿ-kìⁿ!”
41010052	Iâ-so͘ kā i kóng, “Lí tńg-khì. Lí ê sìn-sim hō͘ lí tit-tio̍h i-hó!” Bông-jîn sûi-sî koh ōe khòaⁿ-kìⁿ, chiū kui lō͘ tè Iâ-so͘.
41011001	Iâ-so͘ kap bûn-tô͘ teh-beh kàu [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng], kàu [Ka-ná-soaⁿ] kha ê [Pek-hoat-kî] kap [Pek-tāi-nî] ê sî, I chhe nn̄g ê bûn-tô͘,
41011002	kā in kóng, “Lín khì tùi-bīn ê chng-siā, ji̍p-khì, sûi-sî ōe khòaⁿ-tio̍h chi̍t chiah m̄-bat hō͘ lâng khiâ-kè ê lû-á-kiáⁿ pa̍k tī hia; lín kā i tháu-khui, khan lâi chia.
41011003	Nā ū lâng mn̄g lín sī-án-chóaⁿ án-ni chòe, tio̍h kā i kóng, ‘Chú beh ēng i, liâm-piⁿ ōe-koh khan tńg-lâi hêng.’ ”
41011004	In khì, khòaⁿ-tio̍h lō͘-piⁿ ū chi̍t chiah lû-á-kiáⁿ pa̍k tī mn̂g-kháu, chiū kā i tháu-khui.
41011005	Ū chi̍t-kóa khiā tī hia ê lâng mn̄g in kóng, “Lín tháu lû-á-kiáⁿ beh chhòng sím-mi̍h?”
41011006	In chiàu Iâ-so͘ só͘ hoan-hù ê kā in hôe-tap; hiah-ê lâng chiū chún in khan-khì.
41011007	In khan hit chiah lû-á-kiáⁿ kàu Iâ-so͘ hia, chiong ka-kī ê gōa-saⁿ phoa̍h tī lû-á téng, Iâ-so͘ chiū peh-khì khiâ.
41011008	Ū chin chōe lâng ēng in ê gōa-saⁿ pho͘ tī lō͘-ni̍h, mā ū lâng tùi iá-gōa chhò chhiū-oe pho͘ tī lō͘-ni̍h kā I hoan-gêng.
41011009	Chêng-kiâⁿ āu-tè ê lâng tōa-siaⁿ hoah: Hô-sàn-ná! Hōng Chú ê miâ lâi Hit-ūi eng-kai siū chheng-chàn!
41011010	Teh-beh lâi lán chó͘-sian [Tāi-pi̍t] ê ông-kok eng-kai siū chheng-chàn! Chì-koân ê Siōng-tè, hô-sàn-ná!
41011011	Iâ-so͘ chìn-ji̍p [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng], ji̍p-khì Sèng-tiān, ta̍k hāng khòaⁿ chi̍t lìn. In-ūi thiⁿ í-keng àm, I chiū kap cha̍p-jī sù-tô͘ chhut siâⁿ khì [Pek-tāi-nî].
41011012	Keh-ji̍t, Iâ-so͘ kap bûn-tô͘ tùi [Pek-tāi-nî] chhut-lâi ê sî, Iâ-so͘ pak-tó͘ iau.
41011013	I tī hn̄g-hn̄g khòaⁿ-tio̍h chi̍t châng ū chin chōe hio̍h ê bû-hoa-kó-chhiū, chiū kiâⁿ óa-khì beh khòaⁿ ū ké-chí á bô. I kiâⁿ kàu hia, chhiū-téng chhiū-hio̍h í-gōa, lóng bô khòaⁿ-tio̍h pòaⁿ-hāng, in-ūi m̄-sī bû-hoa-kó ê kùi-chiat.
41011014	I chiū tùi hit châng bû-hoa-kó-chhiū kóng, “Éng-oán bô-lâng ōe-koh chia̍h lí ê ké-chí!” I ê bûn-tô͘ lóng ū thiaⁿ-tio̍h.
41011015	Āu-lâi in lâi-kàu [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng], Iâ-so͘ ji̍p-khì Sèng-tiān, khí-chhiú chiong tī tiān-lāi teh bóe-bōe ê lâng kóaⁿ chhut-khì, koh chhia-tó ōaⁿ-chîⁿ ê lâng ê toh kap bōe hún-chiáu ê lâng ê í.
41011016	I mā m̄-chún lâng the̍h mi̍h-kiāⁿ ēng Sèng-tiān chòe thong-lō͘ kè-lâi kè-khì.
41011017	I kà-sī in kóng, “Sèng-keng kiám bô kì-chài: Góa ê chhù beh kiò-chòe bān-bîn kî-tó ê tiān, lín soah kā i pìⁿ-chòe thó͘-húi-á khut.”
41011018	Chè-si-tiúⁿ kap keng-ha̍k-kàu-su thiaⁿ-tio̍h chiū it-ti̍t siūⁿ pān-hoat beh hāi-sí Iâ-so͘, m̄-kú in kiaⁿ I, in-ūi kûn-chiòng tùi I ê kà-sī lóng chin kám-ho̍k.
41011019	Hông-hun ê sî, Iâ-so͘ kap bûn-tô͘ chhut-khì siâⁿ-gōa.
41011020	Keh chá-khí, Iâ-so͘ kap bûn-tô͘ tùi hia keng-kè ê sî, khòaⁿ-tio̍h hit châng bû-hoa-kó-chhiū kui-châng lóng ta-khì.
41011021	[Pí-tek] kì-tit chiū kā Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Lia̍p-pí, lí khòaⁿ, lí chiù-chó͘ hit châng bû-hoa-kó-chhiū í-keng ta-khì.”
41011022	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Lín tio̍h sìn Siōng-tè.
41011023	Góa si̍t-chāi kā lín kóng, bô-lūn sím-mi̍h lâng tùi chit chō soaⁿ kóng ‘Khí-lâi, khì thiām-hái’, i sim nā bô giâu-gî, sìn só͘ kóng ê it-tēng ōe si̍t-hiān, mā ōe án-ni hō͘ i si̍t-hiān.
41011024	Só͘-í, góa kā lín kóng, lín kî-tó ê sî bô-lūn kiû sím-mi̍h, sìn í-keng tit-tio̍h chiū ōe tit-tio̍h.
41011025	Lín khiā-teh kî-tó ê sî, nā tùi bó͘-lâng sim ū put-pêng, tio̍h kā i sià-bián; án-ni, lín ê Thiⁿ-pē mā ōe sià-bián lín ê kè-sit..
41011027	In koh lâi-kàu [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng]. Iâ-so͘ tī Sèng-tiān teh kiâⁿ ê sî, chè-si-tiúⁿ, keng-ha̍k-kàu-su, kap tiúⁿ-ló lâi I hia,
41011028	mn̄g I kóng, “Lí khò sím-mi̍h koân-pèng chòe chiah-ê tāi-chì? Sím-mi̍h lâng hō͘ lí chit-ê koân-pèng lâi chòe chiah-ê tāi-chì?”
41011029	Iâ-so͘ kā in ìn kóng, “Góa beh mn̄g lín chi̍t kù ōe. Lín kā góa ìn-tap, góa chiah kā lín kóng góa khò sím-mi̍h koân-pèng chòe chiah-ê tāi-chì.
41011030	[Iok-hān] sóe-lé ê koân-pèng sī tùi Thiⁿ á-sī tùi lâng lâi ê? Lín kā góa kóng.”
41011031	In hō͘-siōng gī-lūn kóng, “Lán nā kóng ‘Tùi Thiⁿ’, I ōe kóng ‘Án-ni lín sī-án-chóaⁿ bô sìn [Iok-hān]?’
41011032	M̄-kú lán nā kóng ‘Tùi lâng...’, khióng-kiaⁿ kûn-chiòng hoán-kám, in-ūi in lóng siūⁿ-kóng [Iok-hān] chin-chiàⁿ sī sian-ti.”
41011033	In chiū ìn Iâ-so͘, “Goán m̄-chai.” Iâ-so͘ chiū tùi in kóng, “Án-ni, góa mā m̄ kā lín kóng góa khò sím-mi̍h koân-pèng chòe chiah-ê tāi-chì.”
41012001	Iâ-so͘ koh ēng phì-jū tùi in kóng: “Ū chi̍t ê lâng khai-khún chi̍t khu phû-tô-hn̂g, sì-bīn ûi lî-pa, ó͘ chi̍t ê chiú-khut, khí chi̍t ê siú-bōng-tâi, chiong chit khu hn̂g cho͘ hō͘ tiān-lông, āu-lâi chhut-gōa khì hn̄g-hn̄g ê só͘-chāi.
41012002	Siu-sêng ê sî kàu, i chhe chi̍t ê lô͘-po̍k khì tiān-lông hia, beh kā in siu hn̂g-ni̍h ê ké-chí.
41012003	In lia̍h hit-ê lô͘-po̍k, kā i phah, kóaⁿ i khang-chhiú tò-khì.
41012004	I koh chhe lēng-gōa chi̍t ê lô͘-po̍k khì, in siong-hāi i ê thâu-khak, kā i bú-jio̍k.
41012005	Āu-lâi, hn̂g-chú koh chhe pa̍t ê lô͘-po̍k khì, in kā i thâi-sí. I koh chhe chin chōe lô͘-po̍k khì, ū-ê hō͘ in phah, ū-ê hō͘ in thâi-sí.
41012006	I iáu ū chi̍t ê, chiū-sī só͘ thiàⁿ ê kiáⁿ, chòe-āu mā chhe i khì tiān-lông hia, siūⁿ-kóng ‘In ōe chun-tiōng góa ê kiáⁿ’.
41012007	M̄-kú hiah-ê tiān-lông chham-siông kóng, ‘Chit-ê sī i ê kè-sêng-jîn. Lâi, lán lâi kā i thâi-sí, i ê châi-sán chiū pìⁿ-chòe lán ê.’
41012008	In chiū kā i lia̍h khí-lâi, kā i thâi-sí, kā hiat chhut-khì phû-tô-hn̂g ê gōa-bīn.
41012009	“Án-ni, phû-tô-hn̂g ê chú-lâng ōe án-chóaⁿ chhú-lí? I ōe lâi châu-bia̍t chiah-ê tiān-lông, chiong phû-tô-hn̂g cho͘ hō͘ pa̍t-lâng.
41012010	Lín kiám m̄-bat tha̍k-tio̍h chit tōaⁿ Sèng-keng ê kì-chài: Khí-chhù-sai-hū só͘ khì-sak ê chio̍h í-keng chiâⁿ-chòe siōng tiōng-iàu ê ki-chio̍h.
41012011	Che sī Chú ê chok-ûi, tùi lán lâi khòaⁿ si̍t-chāi chin kî-biāu?”
41012012	Hiah-ê [Iû-thài-lâng] ê léng-tō-chiá chai-iáⁿ Iâ-so͘ kóng chit-ê phì-jū sī teh chí in, chiū siūⁿ-beh kā I lia̍h, m̄-kú kiaⁿ kûn-chiòng, chiū lī-khui.
41012013	In chhe kúi-nā ê [Hoat-lī-sài-phài] ê lâng kap [Hi-lu̍t-tóng] ê lâng khì Iâ-so͘ hia, beh chhē I ê ōe-pìⁿ thang kā I hām-hāi.
41012014	In chiū khì, tùi Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Lāu-su, goán chai lí chin sêng-si̍t, bô-lūn sím-mi̍h khoán lâng, lí tùi-thāi in lóng bô chha-pia̍t, lí chí-ū tiong-si̍t kà-sī Siōng-tè ê tō-lí. Án-ni, la̍p-sè hō͘ [Lô-má] hông-tè [Khái-sat] ū ha̍h Lu̍t-hoat bô? Goán tio̍h la̍p-sè á m̄-bián?”
41012015	Iâ-so͘ khòaⁿ-chhut in ê khúi-kè, chiū tùi in kóng, “Sī-án-chóaⁿ beh kā góa chhì-thàm? The̍h chi̍t ê gûn-pè hō͘ góa khòaⁿ-bāi leh.”
41012016	In chiū the̍h chi̍t ê gûn-pè lâi. Iâ-so͘ mn̄g in, “Che sī sím-mi̍h lâng ê siōng, sím-mi̍h lâng ê jī-hō?” In ìn kóng, “[Khái-sat] ê.”
41012017	Iâ-so͘ kā in kóng, “[Khái-sat] ê mi̍h hō͘ [Khái-sat]; Siōng-tè ê mi̍h hō͘ Siōng-tè.” In tùi Iâ-so͘ kám-kak chin tio̍h-kiaⁿ.
41012018	Ū chi̍t-kóa chú-tiuⁿ bô koh-oa̍h ê [Sat-to͘-kai-phài] ê lâng lâi Iâ-so͘ hia, mn̄g I kóng,
41012019	“Lāu-su, [Mô͘-se] só͘ siá ê Lu̍t-hoat kā goán kóng, ‘Nā ū lâng i ê hiaⁿ sí-khì, pàng bó͘ bô pàng kiáⁿ, i choh sió-tī ê tio̍h chhōa hiaⁿ-só thòe hiaⁿ thoân-chong-chiap-tāi.’
41012020	Bat ū chhit ê hiaⁿ-tī, siōng-tōa ê chhōa-bó͘, bô lâu hō͘-tāi chiū sí-khì.
41012021	Tē-jī ê chhōa i ê hiaⁿ-só, mā bô lâu hō͘-tāi chiū sí-khì. Tē-saⁿ ê mā siâng-khoán.
41012022	Chit chhit ê hiaⁿ-tī lóng bô lâu hō͘-tāi, chòe-āu chit-ê hū-jîn-lâng mā sí-khì.
41012023	Koh-oa̍h ê sî, in lóng koh-oa̍h, án-ni chit-ê hū-jîn-lâng sī tó chi̍t ê lâng ê bó͘? In-ūi chit chhit-ê lóng bat chhōa i chòe bó͘.”
41012024	Iâ-so͘ kā in kóng, “Lín m̄-tio̍h, in-ūi lín m̄-bat Sèng-keng, mā m̄-bat Siōng-tè ê koân-lêng.
41012025	In tùi sí-lâng tiong koh-oa̍h ê sî, kap thiⁿ-téng ê thiⁿ-sài siâng-khoán, bô kè bô chhōa.
41012026	Koan-hē sí-lâng koh-oa̍h, lín kiám m̄-bat tha̍k-tio̍h [Mô͘-se] ê chheh ‘Teh to̍h ê chhì-phè’ hit tōaⁿ? Siōng-tè tùi [Mô͘-se] kóng, ‘Góa sī [A-pek-la-hán] ê Siōng-tè, [Í-sat] ê Siōng-tè, [Ngá-kok] ê Siōng-tè.’
41012027	I m̄-sī sí-lâng ê Siōng-tè, sī oa̍h-lâng ê Siōng-tè. Lín oân-choân m̄-tio̍h!”
41012028	Ū chi̍t ê keng-ha̍k-kàu-su lâi, thiaⁿ-tio̍h Iâ-so͘ kap [Sat-to͘-kai-phài] ê lâng teh piān-lūn, khòaⁿ Iâ-so͘ ìn liáu chin tio̍h, chiū mn̄g I, “Só͘-ū ê kài-bēng tiong, tó chi̍t tiâu tē-it tiōng-iàu?”
41012029	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Tē-it sī: [Í-sek-lia̍t] ah, lín tio̍h thiaⁿ! Chú lán ê Siōng-tè sī to̍k-it ê Chú.
41012030	Lí tio̍h choân-sim, choân-chêng, choân-ì, choân-le̍k thiàⁿ Chú lí ê Siōng-tè.
41012031	Tē-jī sī: Tio̍h thiàⁿ chhù-piⁿ chhin-chhiūⁿ thiàⁿ ka-kī. Bô pa̍t ê kài-bēng pí chiah-ê koh-khah tiōng-iàu.”
41012032	Hit-ê keng-ha̍k-kàu-su tùi Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Lāu-su, lí só͘ kóng ê chin tio̍h. Lí kóng Siōng-tè chí-ū chi̍t ūi, I í-gōa bô pa̍t-ê;
41012033	koh kóng tio̍h ēng choân-sim, choân-tì, choân-le̍k thiàⁿ Siōng-tè, koh thiàⁿ chhù-piⁿ chhin-chhiūⁿ thiàⁿ ka-kī sī pí hiàn lóng-chóng ê sio-chè kap chè-mi̍h koh-khah iàu-kín.”
41012034	Iâ-so͘ khòaⁿ-tio̍h i ìn liáu chin ū tì-hūi, chiū kā i kóng, “Lí lī Siōng-tè-kok bô hn̄g.” Hit sî í-āu, bô-lâng káⁿ koh mn̄g Iâ-so͘ sím-mi̍h būn-tôe.
41012035	Iâ-so͘ tī Sèng-tiān teh kà-sī ê sî, mn̄g kóng, “Keng-ha̍k-kàu-su ná-ōe kóng Ki-tok sī [Tāi-pi̍t] ê hō͘-tāi?
41012036	[Tāi-pi̍t] pún-sin siū Sèng Sîn kám-tōng kóng: Chú kā góa ê Chú kóng: Lí chē góa ê chiàⁿ-pêng, kàu góa hō͘ lí ê tùi-te̍k khut-ho̍k tī lí ê kha-ē.
41012037	[Tāi-pi̍t] pún-sin kóng Ki-tok sī Chú, Ki-tok ná-ōe sī [Tāi-pi̍t] ê hō͘-tāi?” Ū chi̍t tōa-kûn lâng ài thiaⁿ Iâ-so͘ ê kà-sī.
41012038	Iâ-so͘ kà-sī kóng, “Tio̍h tî-hông keng-ha̍k-kàu-su. In ài chhēng tn̂g-saⁿ kiâⁿ-lâi kiâⁿ-khì, tī chhī-tiûⁿ-kháu hō͘ lâng chhéng-an,
41012039	tī hōe-tn̂g lāi chē koân-ūi, tī iàn-hōe chē tōa-ūi.
41012040	In chhim-chiàm kóaⁿ-hū ê ke-hé, thiau-kò͘-ì kî-tó chin tn̂g. In ōe siū koh-khah tāng ê hêng-hoa̍t.”
41012041	Iâ-so͘ chē tī Sèng-tiān hōng-hiàn-kūi ê tùi-bīn teh khòaⁿ lâng hiàn chîⁿ lo̍h-khì. Chin chōe hó-gia̍h-lâng hiàn chin chōe chîⁿ.
41012042	Ū chi̍t ê sàn-chhiah ê kóaⁿ-hū lâi, hiàn nn̄g ê tâng-chîⁿ-á, chiū-sī chi̍t kak gûn.
41012043	Iâ-so͘ kiò bûn-tô͘ lâi, kā in kóng, “Góa si̍t-chāi kā lín kóng, chit-ê sàn-chhiah ê kóaⁿ-hū hiàn ji̍p-khì hōng-hiàn-kūi ê, pí chèng-lâng hiàn ê koh-khah chōe.
41012044	In-ūi in lóng sī hiàn ēng chhun ê, m̄-kú chit-ê kóaⁿ-hū sui-jiân chin sàn-chhiah, iáu-kú the̍h só͘-ū ê, chiū-sī choân-pō͘ ê seng-oa̍h-hùi lóng hiàn lo̍h-khì.”
41013001	Iâ-so͘ tùi Sèng-tiān chhut-lâi ê sî, ū chi̍t ê bûn-tô͘ tùi I kóng, “Lāu-su, lí khòaⁿ, chio̍h chiah-ni̍h tōa tè! Kiàn-tio̍k-bu̍t chiah-ni̍h tông-hông!”
41013002	Iâ-so͘ kā in kóng, “Lín teh khòaⁿ chiah-ê tōa ê kiàn-tio̍k-bu̍t ò͘. Chiah-ê lóng ōe siū thiah-húi, thiah-kah bô chi̍t tè chio̍h ōe tha̍h tī pa̍t tè téng-bīn.”
41013003	Iâ-so͘ tī [Ka-ná-soaⁿ] téng, bīn ǹg Sèng-tiān teh chē ê sî, [Pí-tek], [Ngá-kok], [Iok-hān], kap [An-tek-lia̍t] su-hā kā I mn̄g,
41013004	“Chhiáⁿ kā goán kóng, chit-ê tāi-chì sím-mi̍h sî ōe hoat-seng? Chiah-ê it-chhè ê tāi-chì teh-beh oân-sêng ê sî ū sím-mi̍h tiāu-thâu?”
41013005	Iâ-so͘ chiū kā in kóng, “Tio̍h kín-sīn chiah-bián siū bê-he̍k.
41013006	Ū chin chōe lâng ōe lī-iōng góa ê miâ lâi, kóng ‘Góa chiū-sī Ki-tok’ thang bê-he̍k chin chōe lâng.
41013007	Lín thiaⁿ-tio̍h chiàn-cheng í-ki̍p chiàn-cheng ê hong-siaⁿ ê sî, m̄-bián kiaⁿ. Chiah-ê tāi-chì it-tēng ōe hoat-seng, m̄-kú chiong-kio̍k iáu-bē kàu.
41013008	In-ūi bîn-cho̍k ōe khí-lâi kong-kek bîn-cho̍k, kok-ka kong-kek kok-ka. Chin chōe só͘-chāi ū tōe-tāng, ū ki-hng. Chiah-ê tāi-chì put-kò sī chhui-chūn thàng-thiàⁿ ê khai-sí.
41013009	“Lín ka-kī tio̍h kín-sīn, lín ōe hō͘ lâng kau hō͘ gī-hōe, tī hōe-tn̂g siū piⁿ-phah. Lín ōe ūi-tio̍h góa ê iân-kò͘ khiā tī chóng-tok kap kun-ông ê bīn-chêng, tùi in chòe kiàn-chèng.
41013010	M̄-kú hok-im it-tēng tio̍h tāi-seng thoân hō͘ bān-bîn.
41013011	In kā lín lia̍h-khì kau hō͘ hoat-têng ê sî, m̄-bián seng hoân-ló beh kóng sím-mi̍h, hit sî lín tit-tio̍h sím-mi̍h chí-sī chiū chiàu án-ni kóng, in-ūi teh kóng-ê m̄-sī lín ka-kī, sī Sèng Sîn.
41013012	Hiaⁿ-tī ōe chhut-bōe hiaⁿ-tī, hō͘ i sí; lāu-pē mā ōe án-ni tùi-thāi kiáⁿ-jî. Kiáⁿ-jî ōe khí-lâi kong-kek pē-bú, kā in hāi-sí.
41013013	Lín ōe ūi-tio̍h góa ê miâ hō͘ chèng-lâng oàn-hūn. M̄-kú jím-nāi kàu chòe-āu ê lâng ōe tit-tio̍h kiù.”
41013014	“Tng lín khòaⁿ-tio̍h hit-ê ‘Khó-ò͘ⁿ ê Húi-bia̍t-chiá’ khiā tī m̄ eng-kai khiā ê só͘-chāi --- tha̍k ê lâng tio̍h bêng-pe̍k chit kù ōe ê ì-sù --- hit sî tī [Iû-thài] ê tio̍h tô-cháu khì soaⁿ-lāi;
41013015	tī chhù-téng ê m̄-thang lo̍h-lâi, mā m̄-thang ji̍p-khì chhù-lāi the̍h mi̍h-kiāⁿ;
41013016	tī hn̂g-ni̍h ê m̄-thang tńg-khì hiahⁿ gōa-saⁿ.
41013017	Tī hiah-ê ji̍t-chí, ū sin-īn ê kap hō͘ eⁿ-á chia̍h-lin ê hū-jîn-lâng hui-siông put-hēng!
41013018	Tio̍h kî-tó, chiah-ê tāi-chì chiah-bián tī tang-thiⁿ hoat-seng.
41013019	In-ūi tī hiah-ê ji̍t-chí teh-beh ū chai-lān, sī tùi Siōng-tè chhòng-chō bān-mi̍h í-lâi m̄-bat ū ê, chiong-lâi mā bōe-koh ū.
41013020	Chú nā bô kiám-chió hiah-ê ji̍t-chí, bô-lâng ōe tit-tio̍h kiù; m̄-kú ūi-tio̍h I só͘ kéng ê soán-bîn, I í-keng ū kiám-chió hiah-ê ji̍t-chí.
41013021	“Hit sî, nā ū lâng kā lín kóng ‘Lín khòaⁿ, Ki-tok tī chia’, á-sī kóng ‘Lín khòaⁿ, I tī hia’, m̄-thang siong-sìn.
41013022	In-ūi ū chi̍t-kóa ké Ki-tok kap ké sian-ti ōe chhut-hiān, kiâⁿ sîn-jiah kî-sū, nā ōe, liân soán-bîn to beh kā in bê-he̍k.
41013023	Tio̍h kín-sīn; góa í-keng chiong it-chhè lóng seng kā lín kóng lah.”
41013024	“Tī hit-ê chai-lān kè liáu hiah-ê ji̍t-chí, ji̍t ōe pìⁿ o͘-àm, ge̍h bōe hoat-kng,
41013025	chhiⁿ ōe tùi thiⁿ-téng lak lo̍h-lâi, thiⁿ-téng ê kng-thé lóng ōe iô-choah.
41013026	Hit sî, lâng ōe khòaⁿ-kìⁿ Jîn-chú chhiong-móa tōa koân-lêng kap êng-kng chē hûn lâi-lîm.
41013027	I ōe chhe-khián thiⁿ-sài tùi sì-hng, tùi tōe ê chit pêng kàu thiⁿ ê hit pêng chū-chi̍p I ê soán-bîn.”
41013028	“Lín tio̍h tùi bû-hoa-kó-chhiū ha̍k-si̍p: Ki puh-íⁿ hoat-hio̍h ê sî, lín chiū chai hē-thiⁿ teh-beh kàu.
41013029	Chhin-chhiūⁿ án-ni, lín khòaⁿ-tio̍h chiah-ê tāi-chì hoat-seng ê sî chiū chai Jîn-chú í-keng chiap-kūn, kàu mn̂g-kháu lah.
41013030	Góa si̍t-chāi kā lín kóng, chit sè-tāi iáu-bē kè-khì, che it-chhè lóng ōe hoat-seng.
41013031	Thiⁿ kap tōe ōe siau-sit, m̄-kú góa ê ōe choa̍t-tùi bōe siau-sit.”
41013032	“Koan-hē hit-ê ji̍t, hit-ê sî, bô-lâng chai; thiⁿ-téng ê thiⁿ-sài m̄-chai, Kiáⁿ mā m̄-chai, chí-ū Pē chai.
41013033	Tio̍h kín-sīn, tio̍h kéng-séng, in-ūi lín m̄-chai hit-ê sî-khek sím-mi̍h sî ōe kàu.
41013034	Chhin-chhiūⁿ ū chi̍t ê lâng beh chhut-gōa, chiong koân kau hō͘ lô͘-po̍k, hun-phòe kang-chok hō͘ ta̍k ê lâng, koh hoan-hù siú-ōe sió-sim kò͘-siú.
41013035	Só͘-í, tio̍h kéng-séng, chiah-bián chit ke ê chú-lâng hut-jiân tńg-lâi khòaⁿ-tio̍h lín teh khùn, in-ūi lín m̄-chai i sím-mi̍h sî ōe tńg-lâi, sī hông-hun á-sī pòaⁿ-mî, sī thiⁿ-beh-kng á-sī ji̍t-chhut ê sî.
41013037	Góa kā lín kóng ê ōe mā beh tùi chèng-lâng kóng: Tio̍h kéng-séng!”
41014001	Koh nn̄g-ji̍t chiū-sī Pôaⁿ-kè-choeh kap Tû-kàⁿ-choeh. Chè-si-tiúⁿ kap keng-ha̍k-kàu-su teh chhē-khòaⁿ beh ēng sím-mi̍h kè-bô͘ thang lia̍h Iâ-so͘, kā I hāi-sí;
41014002	put-kò in kóng, “M̄-thang tī choeh-kî tiong, kiaⁿ-liáu bîn-chiòng khí pō-tōng.”
41014003	Iâ-so͘ tī [Pek-tāi-nî] bâ-hong pīⁿ-lâng [Se-bûn] ê chhù teh chē-toh chia̍h-pn̄g ê sî, ū chi̍t ê hū-jîn-lâng lâi, the̍h chi̍t koàn ge̍k-pân, lāi-bīn tóe móa sûn koh kùi ê Ná-ta̍t phang-iû. I kòng-phòa ge̍k-pân, chiong phang-iû tò tī Iâ-so͘ ê thâu-khak téng.
41014004	Ū chi̍t-kóa lâng chin siū-khì, hō͘-siōng gī-lūn kóng, “Ná-tio̍h án-ni lōng-hùi phang-iû?
41014005	Chit koàn phang-iû ōe-tàng bōe saⁿ-pah gōa ê gûn lâi kiù-chè sàn-chhiah-lâng!” In chiū kā i chek-pī.
41014006	M̄-kú Iâ-so͘ kóng, “M̄-thang kā i tòng! Ná-beh kā i tiau-lân? I ū ūi-tio̍h góa chòe chi̍t hāng hó-sū.
41014007	Put-sî ū sàn-chhiah-lâng kap lín chòe-hé, lín nā beh, put-koán-sî to ōe-tàng pang-chān in; put-kò góa bōe put-sî kap lín chòe-hé.
41014008	Chit-ê hū-jîn-lâng í-keng chīn-la̍t chòe lah; i seng ēng phang-iû boah góa ê seng-khu chún-pī góa ê bâi-chòng.
41014009	Góa si̍t-chāi kā lín kóng, hok-im bô-lūn thoân kàu choân sè-kài sím-mi̍h só͘-chāi, lâng lóng ōe kóng-khí chit-ê hū-jîn-lâng só͘ chòe ê tāi-chì lâi kì-liām i.”
41014010	Cha̍p-jī sù-tô͘ ê chi̍t ê, [Í-su-ka-lio̍k] ê [Iû-tāi], khì kìⁿ hiah-ê chè-si-tiúⁿ, beh chiong Iâ-so͘ chhut-bōe hō͘ in.
41014011	In thiaⁿ-tio̍h chin hoaⁿ-hí, tah-èng beh chîⁿ hō͘ i. [Iû-tāi] chiū it-ti̍t teh chhē ki-hōe khòaⁿ-beh án-chóaⁿ thang chhut-bōe Iâ-so͘.
41014012	Tû-kàⁿ-choeh ê thâu-chi̍t ji̍t, chiū-sī thâi Pôaⁿ-kè-choeh ê iûⁿ-ko hit ji̍t, bûn-tô͘ lâi mn̄g Iâ-so͘, “Lí ài goán khì tó-ūi kā lí chún-pī chia̍h Pôaⁿ-kè-choeh ê boán-chhan?”
41014013	Iâ-so͘ chhe nn̄g ê bûn-tô͘, hoan-hù in kóng, “Lín ji̍p-khì siâⁿ-lāi, ōe tú-tio̍h chi̍t ê the̍h chúi-pân ê lâng, lín tè i khì.
41014014	I bô-lūn ji̍p-khì tó chi̍t keng chhù, lín tio̍h kā hit ke ê chú-lâng kóng, ‘Lāu-su teh mn̄g, I kap bûn-tô͘ beh chia̍h Pôaⁿ-kè-choeh boán-chhan ê kheh-thiaⁿ tī tó-ūi?’
41014015	I ōe pò lín khòaⁿ lâu-téng chi̍t keng khoán hó-sè ê tōa-thiaⁿ, lín chiū tī hia ūi-tio̍h lán chún-pī.”
41014016	Hit nn̄g ê bûn-tô͘ chiū chhut-khì, kàu siâⁿ-lāi, khòaⁿ-tio̍h ta̍k hāng kap Iâ-so͘ kā in kóng ê lóng siâng-khoán; in chiū tī hia chún-pī Pôaⁿ-kè-choeh ê boán-chhan.
41014017	Hông-hun ê sî, Iâ-so͘ kap cha̍p-jī sù-tô͘ chòe-hé lâi.
41014018	In teh chia̍h-pn̄g ê sî, Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Góa si̍t-chāi kā lín kóng, lín chiah-ê kap góa chòe-hé teh chia̍h ê lâng tiong-kan ū chi̍t ê beh kā góa chhut-bōe.”
41014019	In chin siong-sim, chi̍t-ê chi̍t-ê kā I mn̄g, “M̄-sī góa hò͘ⁿ?”
41014020	Iâ-so͘ kā in kóng, “Sī lín cha̍p-jī lâng tiong ê chi̍t ê, chiū-sī the̍h piáⁿ kap góa tī pôaⁿ-ni̍h teh ùn hit-ê.
41014021	Chiàu Sèng-keng só͘ kì-chài, Jîn-chú ōe siū hāi, put-kò chhut-bōe Jîn-chú hit-ê lâng chhám à! Hit-ê lâng lêng-khó bô chhut-sì khah hó!”
41014022	In teh chia̍h ê sî, Iâ-so͘ the̍h piáⁿ, kám-siā liáu-āu peh-khui, pun hō͘ bûn-tô͘, kóng, “The̍h khì; che sī góa ê seng-khu.”
41014023	Āu-lâi I phâng-poe, kám-siā liáu-āu the̍h hō͘ bûn-tô͘, in chiū lóng lim hit poe.
41014024	Iâ-so͘ kā in kóng, “Che sī góa ê huih, sī li̍p-iok ê huih, ūi-tio̍h chin chōe lâng lâu-chhut ê.
41014025	Góa si̍t-chāi kā lín kóng, tī Siōng-tè-kok lim sin ê phû-tô-chiú hit ji̍t í-chêng, góa choa̍t-tùi bōe-koh lim chit-ê phû-tô-chiú.”
41014026	In gîm-si liáu-āu chiū chhut-khì, khì [Ka-ná-soaⁿ].
41014027	Iâ-so͘ kā in kóng, “Lín lóng ōe pàng-sak góa, in-ūi Sèng-keng ū kì-chài: Góa beh phah bo̍k-chiá, iûⁿ chiū sì-sòaⁿ.
41014028	Put-kò góa koh-oa̍h í-āu ōe pí lín seng khì [Ka-lī-lī].”
41014029	[Pí-tek] kā Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Chèng-lâng nā lóng pàng-sak lí, góa it-tēng bōe!”
41014030	Iâ-so͘ kā [Pí-tek] kóng, “Góa si̍t-chāi kā lí kóng, kin-á-ji̍t, chiū-sī kim-mî, koe thî nn̄g piàn í-chêng, lí ōe saⁿ pái m̄-jīn góa.”
41014031	M̄-kú [Pí-tek] kian-chhî kóng, “Nā it-tēng tio̍h kap lí chòe-hé sí, góa mā choa̍t-tùi bōe m̄-jīn lí!” Kî-tha ê lâng mā lóng án-ni kóng.
41014032	Iâ-so͘ kap bûn-tô͘ lâi-kàu chi̍t ê só͘-chāi, miâ kiò-chòe [Khek-se-má-nî]. I kā bûn-tô͘ kóng, “Góa khì kî-tó, lín tiàm chia chē.”
41014033	I chiū chhōa [Pí-tek], [Ngá-kok], [Iok-hān] chòe-hé khì. I chin kiaⁿ-hiâⁿ, hui-siông thòng-khó͘,
41014034	tùi in kóng, “Góa ê sim iu-siong kàu beh sí. Lín tiàm chia. Tio̍h kéng-séng!”
41014035	Iâ-so͘ kiâⁿ khah chìn-chêng, phak tī thô͘-kha kî-kiû, khòaⁿ ōe-tàng hō͘ I bián keng-kè chit-ê thòng-khó͘ ê sî-kan bōe.
41014036	I kiû kóng, “A-pa Pē ah, lí ta̍k hāng lóng ōe. Chit-ê poe kiû lí kā góa the̍h khui, m̄-kú m̄-sī chiàu góa ê ì-sù, tio̍h chiàu lí ê chí-ì si̍t-hiān.”
41014037	Āu-lâi Iâ-so͘ tńg-lâi, khòaⁿ-tio̍h bûn-tô͘ teh khùn, chiū kā [Pí-tek] kóng, “[Se-bûn], lí teh khùn ò͘? Lí bōe-tàng kéng-séng chi̍t tiám-cheng kú sī-bô?
41014038	Tio̍h kéng-séng, tio̍h kî-tó, chiah bōe hām-lo̍h iú-he̍k. Lín ê sim chin ì-ài, m̄-kú jio̍k-thé loán-jio̍k.”
41014039	Iâ-so͘ koh khì kî-tó, mā-sī kóng siâng-khoán ê ōe.
41014040	I koh tńg-lâi, khòaⁿ-tio̍h in in-ūi ba̍k-chiu chin siap iáu teh khùn; in m̄-chai beh kā Iâ-so͘ ìn sím-mi̍h.
41014041	Iâ-so͘ tē-saⁿ piàn tńg-lâi, tùi in kóng, “Lín iáu teh khùn, iáu teh hioh-khùn ò͘? Kàu-gia̍h lah! Sî-kan í-keng kàu; lín khòaⁿ, Jîn-chú siū chhut-bōe kau tī chōe-jîn ê chhiú-thâu lah.
41014042	Khí-lâi, lán lâi-khì. Lín khòaⁿ, chhut-bōe góa ê lâng beh kàu lah.”
41014043	Iâ-so͘ iáu teh kóng ê sî, cha̍p-jī sù-tô͘ ê chi̍t ê --- [Iû-tāi] sûi-sî lâi. Chè-si-tiúⁿ, keng-ha̍k-kàu-su, kap tiúⁿ-ló phài lâi ê chi̍t tīn lâng gia̍h to gia̍h kùn kap i tàu-tīn lâi.
41014044	Hit-ê chhut-bōe-chiá ū hō͘ in chi̍t ê àm-hō, kóng, “Góa kā I chim hit-ê chiū-sī, lín kā I lia̍h, giâm-bi̍t khàn-siú, kā I ah-khì.”
41014045	[Iû-tāi] chi̍t-ē kàu, sûi-sî kiâⁿ-óa Iâ-so͘, kiò “Lia̍p-pí”, chiū kā I chim,
41014046	in chiū hē-chhiú lia̍h Iâ-so͘.
41014047	Ū chi̍t ê khiā tī piⁿ-a ê lâng pu̍ih to tùi tōa-chè-si ê lô͘-po̍k phut lo̍h-khì, siah-tiāu i ê chi̍t pêng hī-á.
41014048	Iâ-so͘ kā in kóng, “Lín gia̍h to gia̍h kùn chhut-lâi lia̍h góa, sī teh lia̍h kiông-tō sī-bô?
41014049	Góa ta̍k ji̍t tī Sèng-tiān teh kà-sī lâng, lín mā ū tī hia, lín bô kā góa lia̍h. M̄-kú che sī beh hō͘ Sèng-keng ê ōe tit-tio̍h èng-giām.”
41014050	Hit sî, só͘-ū ê bûn-tô͘ lóng pàng-sak Iâ-so͘, tô-cháu.
41014051	Ū chi̍t ê siàu-liân-lâng teh tè Iâ-so͘, seng-khu chí-ū moa chi̍t tè iù-môa-pò͘. In beh kā i lia̍h,
41014052	m̄-kú i kā iù-môa-pò͘ pàng-leh, thǹg-pak-theh tô-cháu.
41014053	In kā Iâ-so͘ chhōa-khì tōa-chè-si hia; só͘-ū ê chè-si-tiúⁿ, tiúⁿ-ló, kap keng-ha̍k-kàu-su lóng chū-chi̍p tī hia.
41014054	[Pí-tek] lī hn̄g-hn̄g tè Iâ-so͘, tè ji̍p-khì tōa-chè-si kong-koán ê tiâⁿ, kap hiah-ê kéng-ōe chòe-hé chē-teh hang-hé.
41014055	Hiah-ê chè-si-tiúⁿ kap choân gī-hōe it-ti̍t teh chhē chèng-kù beh kò Iâ-so͘, kā I tēng sí-chōe, m̄-kú chhē lóng bô.
41014056	In-ūi ū chin chōe lâng kā Iâ-so͘ bû-kò, in ê chèng-sû bô it-tì.
41014057	Ū kúi-nā ê lâng khí-lâi kā I bû-kò, kóng
41014058	“Goán bat thiaⁿ-kìⁿ I kóng, ‘Góa beh thiah-húi chit keng lâng ê chhiú só͘ khí ê Sèng-tiān, saⁿ ji̍t lāi beh koh lēng-gōa khí chi̍t keng m̄-sī lâng ê chhiú khí ê.’ ”
41014059	Liân chit-ê, in ê chèng-sû mā bô it-tì.
41014060	Tōa-chè-si tī chèng-lâng ê bīn-chêng khiā khí-lâi, mn̄g Iâ-so͘, “Chiah-ê lâng teh kā lí kò sím-mi̍h? Lí ná lóng bô tap-piān?”
41014061	M̄-kú Iâ-so͘ tiām-tiām, lóng bô ìn pòaⁿ-kù. Tōa-chè-si koh mn̄g I kóng, “Lí sī Ki-tok, sī eng-kai tit-tio̍h chheng-chàn Hit-ūi ê Kiáⁿ á m̄-sī?”
41014062	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Góa sī. Lín ōe khòaⁿ-kìⁿ Jîn-chú chē tī Choân-lêng-chiá ê chiàⁿ-pêng, chē thiⁿ-téng ê hûn lâi!”
41014063	Tōa-chè-si thiah-li̍h ka-kī ê gōa-saⁿ, kóng, “Lán iáu su-iàu sím-mi̍h chèng-jîn?
41014064	Lín í-keng ū thiaⁿ-tio̍h I siat-to̍k Siōng-tè. Lín phah-sǹg án-chóaⁿ?” In lóng phòaⁿ I ū-chōe, eng-kai chhú-sí.
41014065	Ū chi̍t-kóa lâng kā Iâ-so͘ phùi chhùi-nōa, ng I ê bīn, ēng kûn-thâu-bú kā I cheng, koh tùi I kóng, “Sian-ti à, kóng khòaⁿ-bāi, siáⁿ-lâng kā lí cheng?” Kéng-ōe kā I lia̍h-teh ti̍t-ti̍t siàn.
41014066	[Pí-tek] iáu tī tōa-chè-si kong-koán ē-bīn ê tiâⁿ, ū chi̍t ê tōa-chè-si ê lú-pī lâi.
41014067	I khòaⁿ-tio̍h [Pí-tek] teh hang-hé, ti̍t-ti̍t kā i siòng, kóng, “Lí mā lóng ū teh kap hit-ê [Ná-sat-le̍k]-lâng Iâ-so͘ chòe-hé.”
41014068	[Pí-tek] m̄-jīn, kóng, “Góa m̄-chai, mā thiaⁿ bô lí teh kóng sím-mi̍h.” I chiū chhut-khì tiâⁿ ê gōa-bīn. Hit sî koe chiū thî.
41014069	Hit-ê lú-pī khòaⁿ-tio̍h i, koh kā khiā tī piⁿ-a ê lâng kóng, “Chit-ê lâng sī in hit tīn ê lâng.”
41014070	[Pí-tek] koh-chài m̄-jīn. Kè bô jōa kú, hiah-ê khiā tī piⁿ-a ê lâng koh tùi [Pí-tek] kóng, “Lí khak-si̍t sī in hit tīn ê lâng, in-ūi lí mā-sī [Ka-lī-lī]-lâng.”
41014071	[Pí-tek] chiū chiù-chōa kóng, “Lín teh kóng hit-ê lâng, góa m̄-bat. Góa nā kóng pe̍h-chha̍t, goān Siōng-tè chek-hoa̍t góa!”
41014072	Hit sî, koe tē-jī piàn thî. [Pí-tek] siūⁿ-khí Iâ-so͘ kā i kóng ê ōe “Koe thî nn̄g piàn í-chêng, lí ōe saⁿ pái m̄-jīn góa”, chiū chhut-siaⁿ khàu.
41015001	Thiⁿ chi̍t-ē kng, hiah-ê chè-si-tiúⁿ, tiúⁿ-ló, keng-ha̍k-kàu-su, í-ki̍p choân gī-hōe ê lâng tàu-tīn chham-siông. In kā Iâ-so͘ pa̍k khí-lâi, ah-khì kau hō͘ [Pí-lia̍p-to].
41015002	[Pí-lia̍p-to] mn̄g Iâ-so͘, “Lí sī [Iû-thài]-lâng ê Ông sī-bô?” Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Che sī lí kóng ê.”
41015003	Chè-si-tiúⁿ kò Iâ-so͘ chin chōe hāng tāi-chì.
41015004	[Pí-lia̍p-to] koh mn̄g Iâ-so͘, “Lí khòaⁿ, in kā lí kò chiah-chōe hāng, lí ná lóng bô tap-piān?”
41015005	Iâ-so͘ iû-goân bô ìn pòaⁿ-kù, [Pí-lia̍p-to] soah kám-kak chin kî-koài.
41015006	Ta̍k nî tī Pôaⁿ-kè-choeh ê sî, [Pí-lia̍p-to] lóng ū chiàu bîn-chiòng ê iau-kiû pàng chi̍t ê hoān-lâng hō͘ in.
41015007	Ū chi̍t ê lâng miâ kiò-chòe [Pa-lia̍p-pa], i kap chi̍t-kóa poān-tô͘ chòe-hé koaiⁿ-kaⁿ; in bat tī pō-loān tiong thâi-sí lâng.
41015008	Kûn-chiòng chū-chi̍p óa-lâi, iau-kiû [Pí-lia̍p-to] chiàu koàn-lē pān-lí.
41015009	[Pí-lia̍p-to] mn̄g in kóng, “Lín ài góa pàng [Iû-thài]-lâng ê Ông hō͘ lín bô?”
41015010	In-ūi i chai hiah-ê chè-si-tiúⁿ sī ūi-tio̍h oàn-tò͘ chiah chiong Iâ-so͘ kau hō͘ i.
41015011	Hiah-ê chè-si-tiúⁿ siàn-tōng kûn-chiòng, tian-tò iau-kiû [Pí-lia̍p-to] pàng [Pa-lia̍p-pa] hō͘ in.
41015012	[Pí-lia̍p-to] koh chi̍t piàn mn̄g in kóng, “Án-ni, lín chheng-chòe ‘[Iû-thài-lâng] ê Ông’ ê, lín ài góa án-chóaⁿ chhú-lí?”
41015013	In koh tōa-siaⁿ hoah, “Kā tèng si̍p-jī-kè!”
41015014	[Pí-lia̍p-to] mn̄g in kóng, “Sī-án-chóaⁿ? I ū chòe sím-mi̍h pháiⁿ tāi-chì?” In koh-khah tōa-siaⁿ hoah, “Kā tèng si̍p-jī-kè!”
41015015	[Pí-lia̍p-to] ūi-tio̍h beh hō͘ kûn-chiòng hoaⁿ-hí, chiū pàng [Pa-lia̍p-pa] hō͘ in, koh bēng-lēng lâng ēng piⁿ phah Iâ-so͘, jiân-āu kau I khì tèng si̍p-jī-kè.
41015016	Peng-sū tòa Iâ-so͘ khì chóng-tok-hú ê īⁿ-lāi, āu-lâi tiàu-chi̍p choân-tūi ê peng.
41015017	In kā Iâ-so͘ chhēng chi̍t niá chí-sek ê gōa-phàu, koh ēng chhì-á pīⁿ chi̍t téng ông-koan kā I tì.
41015018	In kā I kiâⁿ-lé, hoah kóng, “[Iû-thài]-lâng ê Ông bān-sòe!”
41015019	In koh ēng chi̍t ki lô͘-tek-á sut I ê thâu-khak, kā I phùi chhùi-nōa, kūi lo̍h-khì pài I.
41015020	In hì-lāng I liáu-āu, hit niá chí-sek ê gōa-phàu kā thǹg khí-lâi, koh chiong I ka-kī ê saⁿ kā chhēng lo̍h-khì, jiân-āu ah I chhut-khì tèng si̍p-jī-kè.
41015021	Ū chi̍t ê [Kó͘-lī-nāi]-lâng [Se-bûn], sī [A-le̍k-san-tāi] kap [Ló͘-hu] ê lāu-pē, i tùi chng-kha lâi, tú-hó tùi hia keng-kè; peng-sū kiông-pek i giâ Iâ-so͘ ê si̍p-jī-kè.
41015022	In kā Iâ-so͘ ah-kàu chi̍t ê só͘-chāi kiò-chòe [Kok-kok-tha], hoan-e̍k sī “[Thâu-khak-óaⁿ-niá]”.
41015023	In ēng chham bu̍t-io̍h ê chiú hō͘ Iâ-so͘ lim, m̄-kú I bô lim .
41015024	Jiân-āu in kā I tèng si̍p-jī-kè, koh pun I ê saⁿ, thiu-chhiam koat-tēng ta̍k ê lâng tit-tio̍h sím-mi̍h.
41015025	In tèng Iâ-so͘ tī si̍p-jī-kè ê sî sī chá-khí-sî káu tiám.
41015026	Ū chi̍t ê pâi-á siá I ê chōe-chn̄g: “Iû-thài-lâng ê Ông”.
41015027	Ū nn̄g ê kiông-tō kap I chòe-hé tèng si̍p-jī-kè, chi̍t ê tī chiàⁿ-pêng, chi̍t ê tī tò-pêng.
41015029	Tùi hia keng-kè ê lâng kā I bú-jio̍k, iô-thâu, kóng, “Ài à, lí chit-ê lâng, kóng beh thiah-húi Sèng-tiān saⁿ ji̍t lāi koh kā khí khí-lâi,
41015030	tio̍h kiù lí ka-kī, tùi si̍p-jī-kè lo̍h-lâi!”
41015031	Chè-si-tiúⁿ kap keng-ha̍k-kàu-su mā án-ni kā I thí-chhiò, kóng-lâi kóng-khì, “I kiù pa̍t-lâng, bô hoat-tō͘ kiù ka-kī!
41015032	I sī Ki-tok, [Í-sek-lia̍t] ê Ông, hiān-chāi tio̍h tùi si̍p-jī-kè lo̍h-lâi, hō͘ lán thang khòaⁿ, thang sìn.” Kap Iâ-so͘ chòe-hé tèng si̍p-jī-kè hiah-ê kiông-tō mā kā I bú-jio̍k.
41015033	Tiong-tàu ê sî, choân-tōe lóng o͘-àm, sòa kàu ē-po͘ saⁿ tiám.
41015034	Saⁿ tiám ê sî, Iâ-so͘ tōa-siaⁿ hoah, “Í-lô-i, Í-lô-i, la-má sat-pak-tāi-nî?” ì-sù sī “Góa ê Siōng-tè, góa ê Siōng-tè, lí sī-án-chóaⁿ pàng-sak góa?”
41015035	Ū chi̍t-kóa khiā tī piⁿ-a ê lâng thiaⁿ-tio̍h, kóng, “Lín khòaⁿ, I teh kiò [Í-lī-a]!”
41015036	Ū chi̍t ê lâng cháu-khì, the̍h hái-mî chìm sng-chiú, pa̍k tī lô͘-tek-á bé, tu-khì hō͘ Iâ-so͘ suh, kóng, “Tán chi̍t-ē! Lán khòaⁿ [Í-lī-a] ōe lâi kā I kiù bōe.”
41015037	Iâ-so͘ tōa-siaⁿ hoah chi̍t siaⁿ, chiū tn̄g-khùi.
41015038	Hit sî Sèng-tiān lāi ê tiùⁿ-lî tùi-téng kàu-ē li̍h-chòe nn̄g pêng.
41015039	Khiā tī Iâ-so͘ tùi-bīn ê kun-koaⁿ khòaⁿ-tio̍h I tn̄g-khùi ê chêng-hêng, kóng, “Chit-ê lâng khak-si̍t sī Siōng-tè ê Kiáⁿ!”
41015040	Mā ū chi̍t-kóa hū-jîn-lâng tùi hn̄g-hn̄g teh khòaⁿ, kî-tiong ū [Boa̍t-tāi-lia̍p] ê [Má-lī-a], sió [Ngá-kok] kap [Iok-sek] ê lāu-bú [Má-lī-a], í-ki̍p [Sat-lô-bí].
41015041	In sī Iâ-so͘ tī [Ka-lī-lī] ê sî chiū tè I koh ho̍k-sāi I ê hū-jîn-lâng. Lēng-gōa koh ū chin chōe kap Iâ-so͘ chòe-hé lâi [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] ê hū-jîn-lâng mā tī hia.
41015042	Í-keng hông-hun, in-ūi hit ji̍t sī Pôaⁿ-kè-choeh ê Pī-pān-ji̍t, sī An-hioh-ji̍t ê chêng chi̍t ji̍t,
41015043	[A-lī-má-thài] ê [Iok-sek] lâi, hó-táⁿ khì kìⁿ [Pí-lia̍p-to], chhéng-kiû chiong Iâ-so͘ ê ûi-thé hō͘ i. [Iok-sek] sī chi̍t ê siū lâng chun-kèng ê gī-oân, pún-sin mā ū teh kî-thāi Siōng-tè-kok ê lâi-lîm.
41015044	[Pí-lia̍p-to] thiaⁿ-tio̍h Iâ-so͘ í-keng sí, kám-kak kî-koài, chiū kiò kun-koaⁿ lâi, mn̄g khòaⁿ Iâ-so͘ sī m̄-sī í-keng sí-khì.
41015045	I tùi kun-koaⁿ thiaⁿ-tio̍h Iâ-so͘ khak-si̍t sí ê siau-sit, chiū chiong ûi-thé kau hō͘ [Iok-sek].
41015046	[Iok-sek] bóe chi̍t tè iù-môa-pò͘, jiân-āu chiong Iâ-so͘ ê ûi-thé tùi si̍p-jī-kè sóa lo̍h-lâi, ēng hit tè iù-môa-pò͘ kā I pau, an-chòng tī í-keng phah hó tī chio̍h-piah-lāi ê bōng, koh kō chi̍t tè chio̍h lâi that tī bōng-kháu.
41015047	[Boa̍t-tāi-lia̍p] ê [Má-lī-a] kap [Iok-sek] ê lāu-bú [Má-lī-a] ū khòaⁿ-tio̍h an-chòng Iâ-so͘ ê só͘-chāi.
41016001	An-hioh-ji̍t kè liáu, [Boa̍t-tāi-lia̍p] ê [Má-lī-a], [Ngá-kok] ê lāu-bú [Má-lī-a], kap [Sat-lô-bí] bóe phang-liāu beh khì boah Iâ-so͘ ê ûi-thé.
41016002	Lé-pài-ji̍t thàu-chá, ji̍t tú-á chhut ê sî, in chiū khì bōng-tōe.
41016003	In hō͘-siōng kóng, “Sím-mi̍h lâng beh thòe lán chiong bōng-kháu hit tè chio̍h kō-khui?”
41016004	Hit tè chio̍h hui-siông tōa tè. In chi̍t-ē gia̍h-thâu, khòaⁿ-tio̍h hit tè chio̍h í-keng kō-khui.
41016005	In ji̍p-khì bōng-lāi, khòaⁿ-tio̍h chi̍t ê chhēng pe̍h saⁿ ê siàu-liân-lâng chē tī chiàⁿ-pêng, hui-siông tio̍h-kiaⁿ.
