41016006	Hit-ê siàu-liân-lâng tùi in kóng, “Bián kiaⁿ! Góa chai lín teh chhē hō͘ lâng tèng si̍p-jī-kè ê [Ná-sat-le̍k]-lâng Iâ-so͘ ; I í-keng koh-oa̍h, bô tī chia. Lâi khòaⁿ khǹg I ê só͘-chāi.
41016007	Lín khì, khì kā I ê bûn-tô͘ kap [Pí-tek] kóng, ‘I pí lín seng khì [Ka-lī-lī], tī hia lín ōe kìⁿ-tio̍h I, tú-tú chiàu I kā lín kóng ê.’ ”
41016008	In tùi bōng-ni̍h chhut-lâi, ti̍t-ti̍t cháu, kiaⁿ-kah phi̍h-phi̍h-chhoah koh gāng-khì. In lóng bô tùi lâng kóng sím-mi̍h, in-ūi in chin kiaⁿ. Hiah-ê hū-jîn-lâng khì [Pí-tek] kap i ê pêng-iú hia, tùi in kán-tan pò-kò só͘ thiaⁿ-kìⁿ lóng-chóng ê tāi-chì. Chiah-ê tāi-chì í-āu, Iâ-so͘ pún-sin chhe-khián I ê bûn-tô͘, tùi-tang-kàu-sai soan-iông sîn-sèng, put-bia̍t, hō͘ lâng tit-tio̍h éng-oán chín-kiù ê sìn-sit. Amen!
41016009	Lé-pài-ji̍t thàu-chá, Iâ-so͘ koh-oa̍h liáu-āu, tāi-seng tùi [Boa̍t-tāi-lia̍p] ê [Má-lī-a] hián-hiān; Iâ-so͘ bat kā i kóaⁿ-chhut chhit ê kúi.
41016010	I khì kā hiah-ê tè Iâ-so͘ ê lâng pò-kò, hit sî in teh ai-siong thî-khàu.
41016011	In thiaⁿ-kìⁿ Iâ-so͘ koh-oa̍h koh ū hō͘ [Má-lī-a] khòaⁿ-tio̍h, in iáu m̄-sìn.
41016012	Chiah-ê tāi-chì í-āu, ū nn̄g ê bûn-tô͘ kiâⁿ-lō͘ beh khì chng-kha ê sî, Iâ-so͘ ēng pa̍t khoán ê hêng-siōng tùi in hián-hiān.
41016013	In tńg-khì kā kî-tha ê lâng pò-kò, m̄-kú hiah-ê lâng lóng m̄-sìn.
41016014	Āu-lâi, cha̍p-it ê sù-tô͘ teh chia̍h-pn̄g ê sî, Iâ-so͘ tùi in hián-hiān. I chek-pī in m̄-sìn kap ngī-sim, in-ūi in bô sìn khòaⁿ-tio̍h Iâ-so͘ koh-oa̍h ê lâng kā in kóng ê ōe.
41016015	Iâ-so͘ kā in kóng, “Lín tio̍h khì choân sè-kài tùi só͘-ū pī-chō-ê soan-iông hok-im.
41016016	Sìn lâi niá-siū sóe-lé ê lâng ōe tit-tio̍h kiù; m̄-sìn ê lâng ōe siū tēng-chōe.
41016017	Sìn ê lâng ōe kiâⁿ ē-bīn chiah-ê sîn-jiah: In ōe hōng góa ê miâ kóaⁿ-kúi; in ōe kóng sin ê gú-giân;
41016018	in lia̍h chôa á-sī lim to̍k mā bōe siū siong-hāi; in kā pīⁿ-lâng hōaⁿ-chhiú, pīⁿ-lâng ōe tit-tio̍h i-hó.”
41016019	Chú Iâ-so͘ kā in kóng chiah-ê ōe liáu-āu siū chiap chiūⁿ-thiⁿ, chē tī Siōng-tè ê chiàⁿ-pêng.
41016020	Bûn-tô͘ chhut-khì ta̍k só͘-chāi thoân hok-im. Chú kap in tâng-kang, ēng in só͘ kiâⁿ ê sîn-jiah chèng-si̍t in só͘ thoân ê tō-lí.
42001001	Só͘ chun-kèng ê [Thê-o-hui-lô] sian-siⁿ: Tī goán tiong-kan só͘ hoat-seng ê tāi-chì, í-keng ū chin chōe lâng chéng-lí koh phian-siá;
42001002	chiah-ê tāi-chì sī chiàu hiah-ê tùi khí-thâu chiū chhin-ba̍k khòaⁿ-kìⁿ ê lâng kap thoân-tō ê lâng só͘ thoân-siū hō͘ goán ê.
42001003	Chiah-ê lóng-chóng ê tāi-chì, góa ū tùi-thâu-kàu-bé siông-sè chhâ-khó, chiah siūⁿ-kóng tio̍h ūi-tio̍h lí chiàu sūn-sū siá chhut-lâi,
42001004	hō͘ lí thang bêng-pe̍k só͘ ha̍k-si̍p ê tō-lí sī khak-si̍t.
42001005	[Hi-lu̍t] chòe [Iû-thài]-ông ê sî, ū chi̍t ê [A-pí-a] pan ê chè-si, miâ kiò-chòe [Sat-ka-lī-a]; i ê bó͘ [I-lī-sa-pek] mā-sī chè-si [A-lûn] ê hō͘-tāi.
42001006	In nn̄g lâng oân-choân chun-siú Chú it-chhè ê kài-bēng kap kui-lē, hō͘ Siōng-tè khòaⁿ-chòe gī-lâng.
42001007	In bô kiáⁿ, in-ūi [I-lī-sa-pek] bōe siⁿ, in nn̄g lâng mā lóng í-keng chin lāu.
42001008	Ū chi̍t ji̍t, [Sat-ka-lī-a] ti̍t-pan, tī Siōng-tè ê bīn-chêng chip-hêng chè-si ê chit-bū.
42001009	Chiàu chè-si-chit ê kui-lē, i thiu-tio̍h khau ji̍p-khì Chú ê sèng-só͘ sio-hiuⁿ.
42001010	I teh sio-hiuⁿ ê sî, kui tōa-tīn bîn-chiòng tī gōa-bīn teh kî-tó.
42001011	Ū Chú ê chi̍t ê thiⁿ-sài hián-hiān, khiā tī hiuⁿ-tôaⁿ ê chiàⁿ-pêng.
42001012	[Sat-ka-lī-a] chi̍t-ē khòaⁿ-tio̍h chin tio̍h-kiaⁿ, hui-siông put-an.
42001013	Thiⁿ-sài kā i kóng, “[Sat-ka-lī-a], m̄-bián kiaⁿ, in-ūi Siōng-tè í-keng thiaⁿ-tio̍h lí ê kî-tó; lí ê bó͘ [I-lī-sa-pek] ōe kā lí siⁿ chi̍t ê hāu-siⁿ. Lí tio̍h kā i hō-miâ kiò-chòe [Iok-hān].
42001014	Lí ōe hoaⁿ-hí khoài-lo̍k; chin chōe lâng mā ōe in-ūi i ê chhut-sì lâi hoaⁿ-hí,
42001015	in-ūi i tī Chú ê bīn-chêng ōe chòe tōa jîn-bu̍t. Po̍h-chiú kāu-chiú i lóng bōe ēng-tit lim. I iáu tī bú-thai chiū hō͘ Sèng Sîn chhiong-móa.
42001016	I ōe hō͘ chin chōe [Í-sek-lia̍t] ê kiáⁿ-sun kui-ǹg Chú --- in ê Siōng-tè.
42001017	I ōe ēng sian-ti [Í-lī-a] ê cheng-sîn kap lêng-le̍k lâi chòe Chú ê sian-hong. I ōe hō͘ pē-bú kap kiáⁿ-jî hô-hó; hō͘ pōe-ge̍k ê lâng choán-ǹg lâi tè gī-lâng ê ì-liām; hō͘ chú-bîn chún-pī piān thang gêng-chiap Chú.”
42001018	[Sat-ka-lī-a] tùi thiⁿ-sài kóng, “Góa tio̍h án-chóaⁿ chiah ōe chai chit-ê tāi-chì? Góa í-keng lāu, góa ê bó͘ mā hiah-chōe hè à.”
42001019	Thiⁿ-sài ìn kóng, “Góa sī teh sū-hāu Siōng-tè ê [Ka-pek-lia̍t], siū phài lâi thoân-ōe, tùi lí pò chit-ê hó siau-sit.
42001020	Kàu chiah-ê tāi-chì èng-giām hit ji̍t, lí ōe é-káu bōe kóng-ōe, in-ūi lí bô siong-sìn góa só͘ kóng sî kàu ōe si̍t-hiān chiah-ê ōe.”
42001021	Hit sî, bîn-chiòng teh thèng-hāu [Sat-ka-lī-a], in chin kî-koài i ná-ōe ji̍p-khì sèng-só͘ hiah-ni̍h kú.
42001022	I chhut-lâi ê sî soah bōe-tàng tùi in kóng-ōe, in chiah chai i tī sèng-só͘ ū khòaⁿ-kìⁿ īⁿ-siōng. I bōe kóng-ōe, it-ti̍t tùi in pí-chhiú.
42001023	[Sat-ka-lī-a] ho̍k-sāi ê ji̍t-kî kè liáu chiū tńg-khì chhù-ni̍h.
42001024	Kè bô jōa kú, i ê bó͘ [I-lī-sa-pek] hoâi-īn, gō͘ ge̍h-ji̍t kú bô chhut-mn̂g.
42001025	[I-lī-sa-pek] kóng, “Chú chiah-ni̍h khòaⁿ-kò͘ góa, kā góa tû-khì tī lâng bīn-chêng ê kiàn-siàu.”
42001026	[I-lī-sa-pek] hoâi-īn tē-la̍k ge̍h-ji̍t, thiⁿ-sài [Ka-pek-lia̍t] hōng Siōng-tè chhe-phài kàu [Ka-lī-lī] chi̍t ê siâⁿ, kiò-chòe [Ná-sat-le̍k],
42001027	khì kìⁿ chi̍t ê chāi-sek-lú, miâ kiò-chòe [Má-lī-a]. Chit-ê chāi-sek-lú í-keng kap [Tāi-pi̍t]-ke chi̍t ê lâng miâ kiò-chòe [Iok-sek] tèng-hun.
42001028	Thiⁿ-sài kàu [Má-lī-a] hia, tùi i kóng, “Pêng-an! Lí sī chèng hū-lú tiong-kan siōng ū hok-khì ê; Chú kap lí tông-chāi!”
42001029	[Má-lī-a] in-ūi chiah-ê ōe hui-siông put-an, sim-lāi it-ti̍t teh siūⁿ chit-ê chhéng-an sī sím-mi̍h ì-sù.
42001030	Thiⁿ-sài tùi i kóng, “[Má-lī-a], m̄-bián kiaⁿ, in-ūi lí ū tit-tio̍h Siōng-tè sù-hok.
42001031	Lí ōe hoâi-īn siⁿ chi̍t ê hāu-siⁿ, lí tio̍h kā I hō-miâ kiò-chòe Iâ-so͘.
42001032	I ōe chòe tōa jîn-bu̍t, lâng ōe chheng-ho͘ I chòe Chì-koân Siōng-tè ê Kiáⁿ. Chú Siōng-tè ōe chiong I chó͘-sian [Tāi-pi̍t] ê ông-ūi hō͘ I.
42001033	I ōe éng-oán thóng-tī [Ngá-kok] ê kiáⁿ-sun; I ê ông-kok bû-kiông-chīn.”
42001034	[Má-lī-a] tùi thiⁿ-sài kóng, “Góa iáu-bē chhut-kè, ná-ōe ū chit khoán tāi-chì?”
42001035	Thiⁿ-sài ìn kóng, “Sèng Sîn beh lîm-kàu lí, Chì-koân Siōng-tè ê koân-lêng beh tì-ìm lí. In-ūi án-ni, hit-ê teh-beh chhut-sì ê eⁿ-á sī sèng-ê, lâng ōe chheng-ho͘ I chòe Siōng-tè ê Kiáⁿ.
42001036	Lí khòaⁿ, lí ê chhin-chiâⁿ [I-lī-sa-pek], i sui-jiân nî-lāu, mā í-keng hoâi-īn beh siⁿ chi̍t ê hāu-siⁿ. Lâng kóng i bōe siⁿ, m̄-kú i í-keng ū-sin la̍k ge̍h-ji̍t.
42001037	In-ūi Siōng-tè bô chi̍t hāng tāi-chì chòe bōe-kàu.”
42001038	[Má-lī-a] kóng, “Góa sī Chú ê lú-pī, goān chiàu lí ê ōe tī góa sin-chiūⁿ si̍t-hiān.” Thiⁿ-sài chiū lī-khui i.
42001039	Kè bô jōa kú, [Má-lī-a] chhut-hoat, kóaⁿ-kín khì [Iû-thài] soaⁿ-tōe ê chi̍t ê siâⁿ.
42001040	I ji̍p-khì [Sat-ka-lī-a] ê chhù, kā [I-lī-sa-pek] chhéng-an.
42001041	[I-lī-sa-pek] thiaⁿ-tio̍h [Má-lī-a] ê chhéng-an, pak-tó͘ lāi ê eⁿ-á chiū tiô-thiàu. [I-lī-sa-pek] hō͘ Sèng Sîn chhiong-móa,
42001042	tōa-siaⁿ kóng, “Hū-jîn-lâng tiong lí siōng siū chiok-hok! Lí pak-tó͘ lāi ê gín-á mā siū chiok-hok!
42001043	Góa ê Chú ê lāu-bú lâi hóng-būn góa, góa ná-ōe kham-tit?
42001044	In-ūi góa chi̍t-ē thiaⁿ-tio̍h lí chhéng-an ê siaⁿ, pak-tó͘ lāi ê eⁿ-á chiū hoaⁿ-hí tiô-thiàu.
42001045	Siong-sìn Chú kóng ê ōe it-tēng ōe si̍t-hiān hit-ê hū-jîn-lâng chin ū hok-khì!”
42001046	[Má-lī-a] kóng: Góa ê sim chun Chú chòe tōa;
42001047	Góa ê sîn in-ūi Siōng-tè --- góa ê Kiù-chú lâi hoaⁿ-hí.
42001048	In-ūi Chú ū khòaⁿ-kò͘ I pi-bî ê lú-pī. Tùi taⁿ í-āu, bān sè-tāi ê lâng lóng ōe kóng góa ū hok-khì,
42001049	in-ūi Choân-lêng ê Siōng-tè ūi-tio̍h góa chòe úi-tāi ê tāi-chì; I ê miâ sī sèng.
42001050	Tùi kèng-ùi I ê lâng, I lîn-bín in kàu sè-sè tāi-tāi.
42001051	I chhun-chhut koân-lêng ê chhiú, kóaⁿ-sòaⁿ sim kiau-ngō͘ ê lâng.
42001052	I chiong chiáng-koân-ê tùi pó-chō thoa lo̍h-lâi, pi-bî ê lâng kā in ko-seng.
42001053	Iau-gō ê lâng, I ēng hó-mi̍h hō͘ in pá-chiok; hó-gia̍h ê lâng, I kóaⁿ in khang-chhiú chhut-khì.
42001054	I hû-chō͘ I ê po̍k-jîn [Í-sek-lia̍t], kì-tit kā in lîn-bín;
42001055	chiàu I tùi lán chó͘-sian ê èng-ún, lîn-bín [A-pek-la-hán] kap i ê kiáⁿ-sun kàu éng-oán.
42001056	[Má-lī-a] kap [I-lī-sa-pek] chòe-hé tòa chha-put-to saⁿ ge̍h-ji̍t, jiân-āu tńg-khì in tau.
42001057	[I-lī-sa-pek] seng-sán ê ji̍t-kî í-keng kàu, chiū siⁿ chi̍t ê hāu-siⁿ.
42001058	Chhù-piⁿ kap chhin-chiâⁿ thiaⁿ-kóng Chú ū tōa-tōa lîn-bín i, chiū kap i chòe-hé hoaⁿ-hí.
42001059	Gín-á chhut-sì tē-poeh ji̍t, in lâi beh kā i kat-lé, koh chiàu in lāu-pē ê miâ kiò i chòe [Sat-ka-lī-a].
42001060	Chóng-sī i ê lāu-bú kóng, “M̄-thang! Tio̍h kā i hō-miâ chòe [Iok-hān].”
42001061	In tùi i kóng, “Lín chhin-chiâⁿ tiong-kan bô-lâng hō chit-ê miâ.”
42001062	In chiū ēng chhiú pí, mn̄g gín-á ê lāu-pē khòaⁿ beh kā i hō sím-mi̍h miâ.
42001063	[Sat-ka-lī-a] kā in thó chi̍t tè siá-jī-pán, siá kóng, “I ê miâ sī [Iok-hān].” Tāi-ke lóng tio̍h-kiaⁿ.
42001064	[Sat-ka-lī-a] sûi-sî khui-chhùi kóng-ōe, chheng-chàn Siōng-tè.
42001065	Chhù-piⁿ-keh-piah lóng chin tio̍h-kiaⁿ; choân [Iû-thài] ê soaⁿ-tōe lóng teh tâm-lūn chit hāng tāi-chì.
42001066	Thiaⁿ-tio̍h chit hāng tāi-chì ê lâng siūⁿ-kóng, “Chit-ê eⁿ-á chiong-lâi ōe chiâⁿ-chòe sím-mi̍h khoán lâng?” In-ūi ū Chú ê koân-lêng kap i tông-chāi.
42001067	[Iok-hān] ê lāu-pē [Sat-ka-lī-a] hō͘ Sèng Sîn chhiong-móa, ū-giân kóng:
42001068	Tio̍h chheng-chàn Chú [Í-sek-lia̍t] ê Siōng-tè! In-ūi I ū khòaⁿ-kò͘ koh kiù-sio̍k I ê chú-bîn.
42001069	I tùi I ê po̍k-jîn [Tāi-pi̍t] ê ke, kā lán siat-li̍p chi̍t ūi ū tōa khùi-la̍t ê Chín-kiù-chiá.
42001070	Chiàu I tī kó͘-chá thong-kè I sèng sian-ti ê chhùi èng-ún kóng:
42001071	I beh chín-kiù lán thoat-lī lán ê tùi-te̍k, thoat-lī it-chhè oàn-hūn lán ê lâng ê chhiú.
42001072	I èng-ún beh lîn-bín lán ê chó͘-sian, koh kì-tit I só͘ li̍p sîn-sèng ê iok,
42001073	chiū-sī I tùi lán ê chó͘ [A-pek-la-hán] só͘ li̍p ê iok. I beh kiù lán thoat-lī tùi-te̍k ê chhiú, hō͘ lán bô kiaⁿ-hiâⁿ, chi̍t-sì-lâng tī I ê bīn-chêng, ēng sèng-kiat kong-gī ho̍k-sāi I.
42001076	Sòe-kiáⁿ ah, lí ōe hō͘ lâng chheng-ho͘ chòe Chì-koân Siōng-tè ê sian-ti; in-ūi lí ōe chòe Chú ê sian-hong lâi chún-pī I beh kiâⁿ ê lō͘,
42001077	hō͘ I ê chú-bîn in-ūi chōe tit-tio̍h sià-bián thang bêng-pe̍k Siōng-tè ê chín-kiù.
42001078	In-ūi lán ê Siōng-tè un-jiû chû-pi, I hō͘ chheng-chá ê ji̍t-thâu tùi thiⁿ-téng chiò lán,
42001079	chiò lán chiah-ê tiàm tī o͘-àm kap sí-bông ìm-ńg-ē ê lâng, ín-chhōa lán ê kha kiâⁿ-ji̍p hô-pêng ê lō͘.
42001080	Chit-ê gín-á chiām-chiām tōa-hàn, sim-lêng ji̍t-ji̍t ióng-chòng. I tòa khòng-iá, it-ti̍t kàu i tī [Í-sek-lia̍t]-lâng ê tiong-kan kong-khai chhut-hiān hit ji̍t.
42002001	Hit sî, [Lô-má] hông-tè [A-kó͘-sū-tok] pan-pò͘ bēng-lēng, kiò choân-kok ê jîn-bîn lóng teng-kì hō͘-kháu.
42002002	Chit-ê thâu-chi̍t-piàn ê hō͘-kháu phó͘-cha sī [Ku-lí-liú] chòe [Sū-lī-a] chóng-tok ê sî si̍t-si ê.
42002003	Chèng-lâng lóng tńg-khì ka-kī ê kò͘-hiong teng-kì hō͘-kháu.
42002004	[Iok-sek] mā tùi [Ka-lī-lī] ê [Ná-sat-le̍k] khì [Iû-thài] ê [Pek-lī-hêng], chiū-sī [Tāi-pi̍t] chhut-sì ê siâⁿ, in-ūi i sio̍k [Tāi-pi̍t] ê ke, sī [Tāi-pi̍t] ê sè-hē.
42002005	[Iok-sek] kap i ê bī-hun-chhe [Má-lī-a] chòe-hé khì teng-kì. Hit sî, [Má-lī-a] í-keng hoâi-īn.
42002006	In tī hia ê sî, [Má-lī-a] seng-sán ê sî kàu,
42002007	chiū siⁿ thâu-chiūⁿ-kiáⁿ; i ēng pò͘ kā I pau, hō͘ I khùn tī chô-ni̍h, in-ūi kheh-koán bô só͘-chāi thang hō͘ in tòa.
42002008	Hit tōe-khu ū chi̍t-kóa kò͘-iûⁿ ê lâng tī iá-gōa, mî-sî lûn-liû teh kò͘ in ê iûⁿ-kûn.
42002009	Chú ê chi̍t ê thiⁿ-sài tùi in chhut-hiān; Chú ê êng-kng sì-bīn kā in chiò, in chiū hui-siông kiaⁿ-hiâⁿ.
42002010	Thiⁿ-sài kā in kóng, “M̄-bián kiaⁿ! Góa kā lín pò chi̍t ê beh hō͘ bān-bîn tōa hoaⁿ-hí ê hó siau-sit.
42002011	Kin-á-ji̍t, tī [Tāi-pi̍t] ê siâⁿ ū chi̍t ūi Kiù-chú ūi-tio̍h lín chhut-sì, chiū-sī Chú Ki-tok.
42002012	Lín ōe khòaⁿ-tio̍h chi̍t ê eⁿ-á ēng pò͘ pau-teh tó tī chô-ni̍h; che hō͘ lín chòe kì-hō.”
42002013	Hut-jiân ū chi̍t tōa-tīn thian-kun kap hit-ê thiⁿ-sài chòe-hé siōng-chàn Siōng-tè kóng:
42002014	Goān êng-kng kui tī chì-koân ê Siōng-tè; goān I sù hô-pêng hō͘ tōe-chiūⁿ I só͘ ì-ài ê lâng.
42002015	Chiah-ê thiⁿ-sài lī-khui in chiūⁿ-thiⁿ ê sî, kò͘-iûⁿ-ê lóng kóng, “Lán lâi-khì [Pek-lī-hêng], khòaⁿ Chú pò lán chai chit-ê só͘ hoat-seng ê tāi-chì.”
42002016	In chiū kóaⁿ-kín khì, chhē-tio̍h [Má-lī-a] kap [Iok-sek], í-ki̍p tó tī chô-ni̍h ê eⁿ-á.
42002017	In khòaⁿ liáu, chiū chiong thiⁿ-sài tùi in kóng chit-ê eⁿ-á ê tāi-chì pò lâng chai.
42002018	Thiaⁿ-tio̍h kò͘-iûⁿ-ê só͘ kóng chiah-ê ōe ê lâng lóng kám-kak chin kî-koài.
42002019	Put-kò [Má-lī-a] chiong chiah-ê tāi-chì lóng khǹg tī sim-lāi, put-sî teh siūⁿ.
42002020	Kò͘-iûⁿ-ê tńg-khì, in-ūi só͘ thiaⁿ-kìⁿ só͘ khòaⁿ-tio̍h it-chhè ê tāi-chì lóng kap thiⁿ-sài tùi in kóng ê oân-choân kâng-khoán, chiū chiong êng-kng chheng-chàn kui hō͘ Siōng-tè.
42002021	Chhut-sì tē-poeh ji̍t, kā eⁿ-á kat-lé ê ji̍t kàu, in chiū kā I hō-miâ kiò-chòe Iâ-so͘; chit-ê miâ sī [Má-lī-a] iáu-bē hoâi-īn ê sî thiⁿ-sài kā I hō ê.
42002022	Chiàu [Mô͘-se] ê Lu̍t-hoat, kiat-chēng-lé ê ji̍t kè liáu, [Iok-sek] kap [Má-lī-a] phō eⁿ-á khì [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] beh chiong I hiàn hō͘ Chú.
42002023	Chiàu Chú ê Lu̍t-hoat kì-chài, “Thâu-chi̍t-the ê ta-po͘-kiáⁿ lóng tio̍h sèng-pia̍t kui hō͘ Chú.”
42002024	Koh chiàu Chú ê Lu̍t-hoat kui-tēng tio̍h hiàn “chi̍t tùi pan-kah, á-sī nn̄g chiah hún-chiáu-á kiáⁿ” chòe seng-lé.
42002025	Hit sî, tī [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] ū chi̍t ê lâng miâ kiò-chòe [Se-biān]. Chit-ê lâng gī koh kèng-khiân, it-ti̍t teh kî-thāi [Í-sek-lia̍t] ê ho̍k-heng. Sèng Sîn ū kap i tông-chāi.
42002026	I tit-tio̍h Sèng Sîn ê khé-sī, chai-iáⁿ i sí í-chêng it-tēng ōe khòaⁿ-tio̍h Chú só͘ èng-ún ê Ki-tok.
42002027	I hō͘ Sèng Sîn kám-tōng ji̍p-khì Sèng-tiān. Tú hit sî, Iâ-so͘ ê pē-bú phō eⁿ-á Iâ-so͘ ji̍p-lâi, beh chiàu Lu̍t-hoat ê koàn-lē kā i kú-hêng gî-sek.
42002028	[Se-biān] ēng siang chhiú phō eⁿ-á, chheng-chàn Siōng-tè kóng:
42002029	Chú ah, taⁿ chiàu lí ê ōe, hō͘ lí ê lô͘-po̍k pêng-pêng an-an lī-khui sè-kan;
42002030	in-ūi góa í-keng ū chhin-ba̍k khòaⁿ-tio̍h lí ê chín-kiù,
42002031	chiū-sī lí tī bān-bîn bīn-chêng só͘ chún-pī ê.
42002032	I chòe khé-sī Gōa-pang-lâng ê kng, chòe lí ê chú-bîn [Í-sek-lia̍t] ê êng-kng.
42002033	Iâ-so͘ ê pē-bú thiaⁿ-tio̍h [Se-biān] kóng-khí koan-hē eⁿ-á ê sū, chin tio̍h-kiaⁿ.
42002034	[Se-biān] kā in chiok-hok, koh tùi eⁿ-á ê lāu-bú [Má-lī-a] kóng, “Chit-ê eⁿ-á siū soán-li̍p sī beh hō͘ [Í-sek-lia̍t] tiong chin chōe lâng poa̍h-tó, chin chōe lâng peh khí-lâi, koh chiâⁿ-chòe siū kong-kek ê kì-hō,
42002035	hō͘ chin chōe lâng sim-lāi ê ì-liām lō͘-hiān; lí pún-sin ê sim mā ōe hō͘ lāi-kiàm chha̍k thàu-kè.”
42002036	Koh ū chi̍t ê lú sian-ti [A-ná], sī [A-siat] chi-cho̍k ê [Hoat-lōe-le̍k] ê cha-bó͘-kiáⁿ. I í-keng chin lāu. I kiat-hun liáu kap tiōng-hu seng-oa̍h chhit nî,
42002037	hiān-chāi í-keng poeh-cha̍p-sì hè. I lóng bô lī-khui Sèng-tiān, mî-ji̍t ho̍k-sāi Siōng-tè, kìm-chia̍h kî-tó.
42002038	Tú hit sî, i mā lâi kám-siā Siōng-tè, tùi só͘-ū teh kî-thāi Siōng-tè kiù-sio̍k [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] ê lâng kóng-khí chit-ê eⁿ-á ê sū.
42002039	[Iok-sek] kap [Má-lī-a] chiàu Chú ê Lu̍t-hoat oân-sêng it-chhè ê kui-tēng chiū tńg-khì [Ka-lī-lī], kàu in ê kò͘-hiong [Ná-sat-le̍k].
42002040	Chit-ê gín-á chiām-chiām tōa-hàn, ji̍t-ji̍t ióng-chòng, chhiong-móa tì-hūi; Siōng-tè ê un-hūi kap I tông-chāi.
42002041	Iâ-so͘ ê pē-bú ta̍k nî lóng ū khì [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] siú Pôaⁿ-kè-choeh.
42002042	Iâ-so͘ cha̍p-jī hè ê sî, in mā chiàu koàn-lē chiūⁿ-khì.
42002043	Choeh-kî soah, in chhut-hoat beh tńg-khì, gín-á Iâ-so͘ lâu tī [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng]. I ê pē-bú lóng m̄-chai,
42002044	siūⁿ-chòe I sī tī chòe-hé kiâⁿ hit tīn lâng ê tiong-kan. In kiâⁿ chi̍t ji̍t ê lō͘-thêng liáu-āu chiah khai-sí tī chhin-chiâⁿ kap se̍k-sāi-lâng ê tiong-kan teh chhē.
42002045	In chhē bô, chiū tò tńg-khì [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] chhē,
42002046	saⁿ ji̍t āu chiah tī Sèng-tiān khòaⁿ-tio̍h I chē tī kàu-su ê tiong-kan, iā teh thiaⁿ iā teh mn̄g.
42002047	Só͘-ū thiaⁿ-tio̍h I kóng-ōe ê lâng lóng in-ūi I chhong-bêng ê ìn-tap kám-kak tio̍h-kiaⁿ kî-koài.
42002048	I ê pē-bú khòaⁿ-tio̍h I, hui-siông tio̍h-kiaⁿ. I ê lāu-bú tùi I kóng, “Kiáⁿ ah, lí ná thang án-ni tùi-thāi goán? Lí khòaⁿ leh, lí ê lāu-pē kap góa chin hoân-ló it-ti̍t teh chhē lí!”
42002049	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Lín ná-tio̍h chhē góa? Kiám m̄-chai góa it-tēng tio̍h tī góa ê Pē ê chhù?”
42002050	Put-kò in bōe liáu-kái I tùi in kóng ê ōe.
42002051	Āu-lâi Iâ-so͘ kap in chòe-hé tńg-khì [Ná-sat-le̍k], sū-sū sūn-thàn in. I ê lāu-bú chiong chiah-ê tāi-chì lóng khǹg tī sim-lāi.
42002052	Iâ-so͘ ê tì-hūi kap nî-hè ná ke-thiⁿ; Siōng-tè kap lâng mā ná thiàⁿ I.
42003001	[Lô-má] hông-tè [Thê-pí-liû] thóng-tī tē-cha̍p-gō͘ nî, [Pâng-siu] [Pí-lia̍p-to] choh [Iû-thài] chóng-tok, [Hi-lu̍t] choh [Ka-lī-lī] hun-hong ê ông, i ê sió-tī [Hui-le̍k] choh [Í-thó͘-lī-a] kap [Tek-lia̍p-khó-nî] tōe-hng hun-hong ê ông, [Lū-sat-liap] choh [A-pí-lī-nî] hun-hong ê ông,
42003002	[A-ná] kap [Kai-a-hoat] choh tōa-chè-si ê sî, Siōng-tè ê ōe lîm-kàu [Sat-ka-lī-a] ê kiáⁿ [Iok-hān], hit sî i tī khòng-iá.
42003003	[Iok-hān] chiū khì [Iok-tàn-hô] it-tài ta̍k só͘-chāi soan-iông kóng, “Tio̍h hóe-kái, niá-siū sóe-lé, Siōng-tè chiū sià-bián lín ê chōe!”
42003004	Chiàu sian-ti [Í-sài-a] ê chheh kì-chài: Ū siaⁿ tī khòng-iá teh hoah: Tio̍h kā Chú chún-pī tō-lō͘, ūi-tio̍h I siu-ti̍t sió-lō͘.
42003005	It-chhè ê soaⁿ-kok tio̍h thūn hō͘ tīⁿ; só͘-ū tōa-soaⁿ sió-soaⁿ tio̍h siah hō͘ kē; oan-khiau ê lō͘ tio̍h kái hō͘ ti̍t; khâm-khia̍t ê lō͘ tio̍h siu hō͘ pîⁿ!
42003006	Bān-bîn lóng ōe khòaⁿ-kìⁿ Siōng-tè ê chín-kiù.
42003007	[Iok-hān] kā lâi beh niá-siū sóe-lé hiah-ê kûn-chiòng kóng, “Lín chiah-ê to̍k-chôa, sím-mi̍h lâng kéng-kò lín siám-pī Siōng-tè teh-beh hoat ê siū-khì?
42003008	Tio̍h ēng hêng-ûi chèng-bêng lín ū hóe-kái! Lín m̄-thang ka-kī siūⁿ kóng ‘[A-pek-la-hán] sī goán ê chó͘-sian’, góa kā lín kóng, Siōng-tè ōe-tàng ēng chiah-ê chio̍h-thâu chō kiáⁿ-sun hō͘ [A-pek-la-hán].
42003009	Pó͘-thâu í-keng khòa tī chhiū-thâu; só͘-ū bô kiat hó ké-chí ê chhiū lóng beh kā chhò khí-lâi, hiat-lo̍h hé.”
42003010	Chèng-lâng mn̄g [Iok-hān], “Án-ni, goán tio̍h chòe sím-mi̍h?”
42003011	I ìn kóng, “Ū nn̄g niá saⁿ-ê, tio̍h pun hō͘ bô-ê; ū chia̍h-mi̍h-ê, mā tio̍h án-ni chòe.”
42003012	Ū chi̍t-kóa bau̍h-sè-ê mā lâi beh niá-siū sóe-lé. In mn̄g [Iok-hān], “Lāu-su, goán tio̍h chòe sím-mi̍h?”
42003013	I kā in kóng, “Kui-tēng ê sè-kim í-gōa m̄-thang ke siu.”
42003014	Ū chi̍t-kóa kun-jîn mā mn̄g i, “Goán tio̍h chòe sím-mi̍h?” I kā in kóng, “M̄-thang kā lâng khióng-hat the̍h-chîⁿ; mā m̄-thang kā lâng khà-iû; só͘ niá ê sin-súi tio̍h boán-chiok.”
42003015	Bîn-chiòng teh kî-thāi, tāi-ke sim-lāi siūⁿ-kóng [Iok-hān] kiám-chhái sī Ki-tok ê sî,
42003016	[Iok-hān] tùi tāi-ke kóng, “Góa ēng chúi kā lín sóe-lé; m̄-kú ū chi̍t ūi pí góa khah ū koân-lêng ê teh-beh lâi, góa liân kā I tháu ôe-tòa to bōe kham-tit. I beh ēng Sèng Sîn kap hé kā lín sóe-lé.
42003017	I ê chhiú the̍h pòa-ki beh chiong be̍h-tiâⁿ pòa chheng-khì, be̍h-á siu-ji̍p chhng-khò͘, be̍h-hiūⁿ chiū ēng bōe hoa ê hé kā i sio-tiāu.”
42003018	[Iok-hān] tùi bîn-chiòng thoân hok-im, ēng chin chōe bô kâng-khoán ê kóng-hoat kā in khoàn-bián.
42003019	Put-kò [Iok-hān] chek-pī hun-hong ê ông [Hi-lu̍t], in-ūi i ū chhōa tē-hū [Hi-lô-tí] chòe bó͘, koh in-ūi i ū chòe chin chōe pháiⁿ tāi-chì.
42003020	Chiah-ê í-gōa, i ū chòe chi̍t hāng koh-khah pháiⁿ ê tāi-chì, chiū-sī kā [Iok-hān] koaiⁿ-lo̍h kaⁿ.
42003021	Bîn-chiòng lóng niá-siū sóe-lé liáu-āu, Iâ-so͘ mā lâi niá-siū sóe-lé. I teh kî-tó ê sî, thiⁿ khui,
42003022	Sèng Sîn kàng-lo̍h tī I téng-bīn, hêng-chōng chhin-chhiūⁿ hún-chiáu; koh tùi thiⁿ ū siaⁿ kóng: Lí sī góa só͘ thiàⁿ ê Kiáⁿ, lí, góa chin ì-ài.
42003023	Iâ-so͘ khai-sí thoân-tō ê sî, iok saⁿ-cha̍p hè. Chèng-lâng khòaⁿ I chòe [Iok-sek] ê kiáⁿ, [Iok-sek] sī [Hi-lí] ê kiáⁿ,
42003024	[Hi-lí] sī [Má-thah] ê kiáⁿ, [Má-thah] sī [Lī-bī] ê kiáⁿ, [Lī-bī] sī [Be̍k-ki] ê kiáⁿ, [Be̍k-ki] sī [Ngá-ná] ê kiáⁿ, [Ngá-ná] sī [Iok-sek] ê kiáⁿ,
42003025	[Iok-sek] sī [Má-tha-thê-a] ê kiáⁿ, [Má-tha-thê-a] sī [A-mô͘-su] ê kiáⁿ, [A-mô͘-su] sī [Ná-hông] ê kiáⁿ, [Ná-hông] sī [Í-su-lī] ê kiáⁿ, [Í-su-lī] sī [Ná-kai] ê kiáⁿ,
42003026	[Ná-kai] sī [Má-ap] ê kiáⁿ, [Má-ap] sī [Má-tha-thê-a] ê kiáⁿ, [Má-tha-thê-a] sī [Se-bí] ê kiáⁿ, [Se-bí] sī [Iok-sek-khek] ê kiáⁿ, [Iok-sek-khek] sī [Iok-tāi] ê kiáⁿ,
42003027	[Iok-tāi] sī [Iok-a-ná] ê kiáⁿ, [Iok-a-ná] sī [Lī-sat] ê kiáⁿ, [Lī-sat] sī [Só͘-lô-pa-pek] ê kiáⁿ, [Só͘-lô-pa-pek] sī [Sat-lia̍p-thiat] ê kiáⁿ, [Sat-lia̍p-thiat] sī [Nî-lī] ê kiáⁿ,
42003028	[Nî-lī] sī [Be̍k-ki] ê kiáⁿ, [Be̍k-ki] sī [A-tí] ê kiáⁿ, [A-tí] sī [Ko-song] ê kiáⁿ, [Ko-song] sī [Í-mô͘-tông] ê kiáⁿ, [Í-mô͘-tông] sī [Ní] ê kiáⁿ,
42003029	[Ní] sī [Iok-sè] ê kiáⁿ, [Iok-sè] sī [Í-lī-í-siā] ê kiáⁿ, [Í-lī-í-siā] sī [Iok-lēng] ê kiáⁿ, [Iok-lēng] sī [Má-thah] ê kiáⁿ, [Má-thah] sī [Lī-bī] ê kiáⁿ,
42003030	[Lī-bī] sī [Se-biān] ê kiáⁿ, [Se-biān] sī [Iû-tāi] ê kiáⁿ, [Iû-tāi] sī [Iok-sek] ê kiáⁿ, [Iok-sek] sī [Iok-lâm] ê kiáⁿ, [Iok-lâm] sī [Í-lī-a-kèng] ê kiáⁿ,
42003031	[Í-lī-a-kèng] sī [Bí-lī-a] ê kiáⁿ, [Bí-lī-a] sī [Mái-lâm] ê kiáⁿ, [Mái-lâm] sī [Má-ta̍t-tha] ê kiáⁿ, [Má-ta̍t-tha] sī [Ná-tan] ê kiáⁿ, [Ná-tan] sī [Tāi-pi̍t] ê kiáⁿ,
42003032	[Tāi-pi̍t] sī [Iâ-se] ê kiáⁿ, [Iâ-se] sī [O-pī-tek] ê kiáⁿ, [O-pī-tek] sī [Pho-a-su] ê kiáⁿ, [Pho-a-su] sī [Sat-la] ê kiáⁿ, [Sat-la] sī [Ná-sūn] ê kiáⁿ,
42003033	[Ná-sūn] sī [A-bí-ná-ta̍t] ê kiáⁿ, [A-bí-ná-ta̍t] sī [A-bîn] ê kiáⁿ, [A-bîn] sī [A-nî] ê kiáⁿ, [A-nî] sī [Hi-su-lûn] ê kiáⁿ, [Hi-su-lûn] sī [Hoat-le̍k-su] ê kiáⁿ, [Hoat-le̍k-su] sī [Iû-tāi] ê kiáⁿ,
42003034	[Iû-tāi] sī [Ngá-kok] ê kiáⁿ, [Ngá-kok] sī [Í-sat] ê kiáⁿ, [Í-sat] sī [A-pek-la-hán] ê kiáⁿ, [A-pek-la-hán] sī [Tha-la] ê kiáⁿ, [Tha-la] sī [Ná-ho̍k] ê kiáⁿ,

42003036	[Sa-la] sī [Kai-lâm] ê kiáⁿ, [Kai-lâm] sī [A-hoat-sat] ê kiáⁿ, [A-hoat-sat] sī [Siám] ê kiáⁿ, [Siám] sī [Ná-a] ê kiáⁿ, [Ná-a] sī [La-be̍k] ê kiáⁿ,
42003037	[La-be̍k] sī [Má-thó͘-sat-la̍h] ê kiáⁿ, [Má-thó͘-sat-la̍h] sī [Í-lo̍k] ê kiáⁿ, [Í-lo̍k] sī [Ngá-lia̍t] ê kiáⁿ, [Ngá-lia̍t] sī [Má-le̍k-lia̍t] ê kiáⁿ, [Má-le̍k-lia̍t] sī [Kai-lâm] ê kiáⁿ,
42003038	[Kai-lâm] sī [Í-ná-sū] ê kiáⁿ, [Í-ná-sū] sī [Sài-te̍k] ê kiáⁿ, [Sài-te̍k] sī [A-tong] ê kiáⁿ, [A-tong] sī Siōng-tè ê kiáⁿ.
42004001	Iâ-so͘ siū Sèng Sîn chhiong-móa, tùi [Iok-tàn-hô] tńg-lâi. I hō͘ Sèng Sîn chhōa-khì khòng-iá,
42004002	tī hia sì-cha̍p ji̍t kú siū Mô͘-kúi chhì-thàm. Hit-ê kî-kan I lóng bô chia̍h sím-mi̍h, hiah-ê ji̍t-chí kè liáu, pak-tó͘ chiū iau.
42004003	Mô͘-kúi tùi I kóng, “Kì-jiân lí sī Siōng-tè ê Kiáⁿ, tio̍h bēng-lēng chit tè chio̍h-thâu pìⁿ-chòe piáⁿ.”
42004004	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Sèng-keng ū kì-chài: ‘Lâng teh oa̍h m̄-nā óa-khò piáⁿ.’ ”
42004005	Jiân-āu Mô͘-kúi chhōa Iâ-so͘ kàu koân ê só͘-chāi, chi̍t-ba̍k-nih-kú chiong thiⁿ-ē bān-kok hō͘ I khòaⁿ,
42004006	kā I kóng, “Chiah-ê it-chhè ê koân-sè kap êng-hôa, góa lóng beh hō͘ lí; in-ūi chiah-ê it-chhè í-keng lóng kau hō͘ góa, góa beh hō͘ sím-mi̍h lâng chiū hō͘ hit-ê lâng.
42004007	Só͘-í, lí nā kūi lo̍h-lâi pài góa, chiah-ê it-chhè lóng-chóng sī lí ê.”
42004008	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Sèng-keng ū kì-chài: Tio̍h pài Chú --- lí ê Siōng-tè, chí-ū ho̍k-sāi I.”
42004009	Mô͘-kúi koh chhōa Iâ-so͘ khì [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng], hō͘ I khiā tī Sèng-tiān siōng-koân ê só͘-chāi, kā I kóng, “Kì-jiân lí sī Siōng-tè ê Kiáⁿ, tùi chia thiàu lo̍h-khì,
42004010	in-ūi Sèng-keng ū kì-chài: ‘Siōng-tè ōe ūi-tio̍h lí bēng-lēng I ê thiⁿ-sài lâi pó-hō͘ lí’;
42004011	koh kóng: In ōe ēng chhiú kā lí hû-teh, hō͘ lí ê kha bōe kha̍p-tio̍h chio̍h-thâu.”
42004012	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Sèng-keng ū kì-chài: ‘M̄-thang chhì-thàm Chú --- lí ê Siōng-tè.’ ”
42004013	Só͘-ū ê chhì-thàm lóng ēng liáu, Mô͘-kúi chiū lī-khui Iâ-so͘, thèng-hāu āu-piàn ê ki-hōe.
42004014	Iâ-so͘ siū Sèng Sîn ê koân-lêng chhiong-móa, tńg-khì [Ka-lī-lī]. I ê miâ-siaⁿ thoân kàu sì-ûi ta̍k tōe-khu.
42004015	I tī ta̍k ê hōe-tn̂g kà-sī lâng, siū chèng-lâng chun-kèng.
42004016	Iâ-so͘ tò-khì I tióng-tōa ê só͘-chāi [Ná-sat-le̍k], chiàu si̍p-koàn tī An-hioh-ji̍t ji̍p-khì hōe-tn̂g. I khiā khí-lâi beh tha̍k Sèng-keng.
42004017	Ū lâng the̍h chi̍t kńg sian-ti [Í-sài-a] ê chheh hō͘ I, I chiū thí-khui, chhē-tio̍h chi̍t só͘-chāi ū kì-chài:
42004018	Chú ê Sîn lîm-kàu góa, in-ūi I ēng iû boah góa, hō͘ góa thoân hó siau-sit hō͘ sàn-chhiah-lâng. I chhe-phài góa soan-pò͘: Siū-lia̍h-ê tit-tio̍h tháu-pàng, bô khòaⁿ-kìⁿ-ê koh khòaⁿ-kìⁿ, siū-ap-pek-ê tit-tio̍h chū-iû,
42004019	soan-pò͘ Chú Un-hūi ê Nî.
42004020	Iâ-so͘ kā chheh kńg-khí-lâi, hêng hō͘ hōe-tn̂g ê chō͘-lí, chiū chē lo̍h-khì. Hōe-tn̂g lāi ê chèng-lâng lóng chù-ba̍k kā I khòaⁿ.
42004021	I chiū kā in kóng, “Chit tōaⁿ Sèng-keng, kin-á-ji̍t lín teh thiaⁿ ê sî í-keng si̍t-hiān lah.”
42004022	Tāi-ke lóng chheng-chàn Iâ-so͘, tùi I só͘ kóng jîn-chû ê ōe kám-kak kî-koài, kóng, “Chit-ê lâng kiám m̄-sī [Iok-sek] ê kiáⁿ?”
42004023	Iâ-so͘ tùi in kóng, “Lín it-tēng ōe ín-iōng ‘I-seng ah, tio̍h i-tī lí ka-kī’ chit kù sio̍k-gú lâi tùi góa kóng, ‘Goán ū thiaⁿ-tio̍h lí tī [Ka-pek-lông] chòe chin chōe tāi-chì, taⁿ mā tio̍h tī lí ê kò͘-hiong chòe.’ ”
42004024	Iâ-so͘ koh kóng, “Góa si̍t-chāi kā lín kóng, sian-ti bô chi̍t ê tī ka-kī ê kò͘-hiong siū hoan-gêng.
42004025	Góa kā lín kóng si̍t-ōe, tī [Í-lī-a] ê sî-tāi ū khòng-hān saⁿ nî pòaⁿ kú, ta̍k só͘-chāi ū tōa ki-hng, hit sî [Í-sek-lia̍t] tiong ū chin chōe kóaⁿ-hū;
42004026	[Í-lī-a] pèng bô siū chhe khì in hia, chí-ū khì [Se-tùn] [Sat-le̍k-hoat] chi̍t ê kóaⁿ-hū hia.
42004027	Sian-ti [Í-lī-sa] ê sî, [Í-sek-lia̍t] tiong ū chin chōe bâ-hong pīⁿ-lâng, tû-khí [Sū-lī-a]-lâng [Nái-bān] í-gōa, bô chi̍t ê tit-tio̍h chheng-khì.”
42004028	Hōe-tn̂g lāi só͘-ū ê lâng chi̍t-ē thiaⁿ-tio̍h chiah-ê ōe chin siū-khì.
42004029	In khiā khí-lâi, kā Iâ-so͘ kóaⁿ-chhut siâⁿ-gōa, khiú kàu soaⁿ-khàm, beh kā I chhia lo̍h-khì; in ê siâⁿ sī khí tī soaⁿ-téng.
42004030	Iâ-so͘ khiok tùi in tiong-kan kiâⁿ-kè, chòe I khì.
42004031	Iâ-so͘ lo̍h-khì [Ka-lī-lī] ê [Ka-pek-lông]-siâⁿ, ta̍k ê An-hioh-ji̍t lóng ū teh kà-sī lâng.
42004032	In tùi I ê kà-sī kám-kak hui-siông hi-kî, in-ūi I ê ōe ū koân-ui.
42004033	Hōe-tn̂g lāi ū chi̍t ê hō͘ bô chheng-khì ê kúi-sîn hū-sin ê lâng, i tōa-siaⁿ hoah,
42004034	“[Ná-sat-le̍k]-lâng Iâ-so͘, lí mài chhap goán! Lí lâi beh húi-bia̍t goán sī-bô? Góa chai lí sī sím-mi̍h lâng; lí sī Siōng-tè ê Sèng-chiá.”
42004035	Iâ-so͘ kā i chek-pī kóng, “Tiām-tiām! Tùi chit-ê lâng chhut-khì!” Kúi tī chèng-lâng ê bīn-chêng kā i siak-tó, chiū tùi i chhut-khì, lóng bô kā i siong-hāi-tio̍h.
42004036	Chèng-lâng chin tio̍h-kiaⁿ, kóng-lâi kóng-khì, “I ê ōe ná hiah lī-hāi? I ēng koân-ui kap lêng-le̍k bēng-lēng bô chheng-khì ê siâ-sîn, in chiū chhut-khì.”
42004037	Iâ-so͘ ê miâ-siaⁿ chiū thoân kàu sì-ûi ta̍k só͘-chāi.
42004038	Iâ-so͘ lī-khui hōe-tn̂g, ji̍p-khì [Se-bûn] in tau. [Se-bûn] ê tiūⁿ-ḿ phòa-pīⁿ, hoat-jia̍t chin sio, ū lâng kā Iâ-so͘ kóng chit-ê tāi-chì.
42004039	Iâ-so͘ khiā óa-khì i ê piⁿ-a, chek-pī jia̍t-pīⁿ, jia̍t chiū thòe; hū-jîn-lâng sûi-sî khí-lâi kā in sū-hāu.
42004040	Ji̍t-lo̍h ê sî, chèng-lâng chiong ū ta̍k chióng pīⁿ ê lâng lóng chhōa lâi chhē Iâ-so͘. Iâ-so͘ chi̍t-ê chi̍t-ê kā in hōaⁿ-chhiú, lóng kā in i-hó.
42004041	Mā ū kúi tùi chin chōe lâng ê seng-khu chhut-lâi, hoah kóng, “Lí sī Siōng-tè ê Kiáⁿ!” Iâ-so͘ kā in chek-pī, m̄-chún in kóng, in-ūi in chai Iâ-so͘ sī Ki-tok.
42004042	Thiⁿ chi̍t-ē kng, Iâ-so͘ chiū chhut siâⁿ khì phian-phiah bô-lâng tòa ê só͘-chāi. Kui-tīn lâng teh chhē I, chhē-tio̍h chiū kā I lâu-teh, bô ài I lī-khui.
42004043	M̄-kú Iâ-so͘ kā in kóng, “Góa mā tio̍h khì pa̍t ê siâⁿ-chhī thoân Siōng-tè-kok ê hok-im; che sī Siōng-tè chhe-phài góa lâi ê bo̍k-te̍k.”
42004044	I chiū kè-sio̍k tī [Iû-thài] ta̍k ê hōe-tn̂g thoân-tō.
42005001	Ū chi̍t piàn, Iâ-so͘ khiā tī [Kek-nî-sat-le̍k] ô͘-piⁿ, ū chi̍t tīn lâng khoeh óa-khì beh thiaⁿ Siōng-tè ê ōe.
42005002	I khòaⁿ-tio̍h nn̄g chiah chûn thêng tī ô͘-piⁿ, lia̍h-hî-ê lī-khui chûn teh sóe-bāng.
42005003	Kî-tiong chi̍t chiah sī [Se-bûn] ê; Iâ-so͘ chiūⁿ hit chiah chûn, kiò i kò sió-khóa lī-khui hōaⁿ, jiân-āu chē lo̍h-khì, tùi chûn-téng kà-sī chèng-lâng.
42005004	Iâ-so͘ kóng soah, tùi [Se-bûn] kóng, “Kā chûn kò khì khah chhim ê só͘-chāi, pha-bāng lo̍h-khì lia̍h-hî.”
42005005	[Se-bûn] ìn kóng, “Lāu-su, goán piàⁿ kui-mî lia̍h lóng bô, m̄-kú lí to teh kóng à, góa chiū lâi lo̍h-bāng.”
42005006	In chi̍t-ē pàng lo̍h-khì, bāng-tio̍h chin chōe hî, bāng soah giōng-beh phòa-khì.
42005007	In ia̍t-chhiú kiò pa̍t chiah chûn ê tâng-phōaⁿ lâi tàu-kha-chhiú. In chiū lâi, chiong hî tóe tī nn̄g chiah chûn, tóe kàu móa-móa soah giōng-beh tîm lo̍h-khì.
42005008	[Se-bûn] [Pí-tek] chi̍t-ē khòaⁿ-tio̍h, chiū kūi lo̍h-khì Iâ-so͘ ê kha-chêng, kóng, “Chú ah, chhiáⁿ lī-khui góa! Góa sī chi̍t ê ū-chōe ê lâng.”
42005009	[Se-bûn] kap i ê tâng-phōaⁿ in-ūi lia̍h-tio̍h hiah-chōe hî chin tio̍h-kiaⁿ.
42005010	[Se-bûn] ê tâng-phōaⁿ [Se-pí-thài] ê kiáⁿ [Ngá-kok] kap [Iok-hān] mā chin tio̍h-kiaⁿ. Iâ-so͘ kā [Se-bûn] kóng, “M̄-bián kiaⁿ, tùi taⁿ í-āu, lí ōe tit-tio̍h lâng.”
42005011	In thoa chûn óa hōaⁿ liáu-āu, chiong it-chhè pàng-leh, khì tè Iâ-so͘.
42005012	Ū chi̍t piàn Iâ-so͘ tī chi̍t ê siâⁿ, tī hia ū chi̍t ê lâng kui seng-khu jiám-tio̍h bâ-hong. I khòaⁿ-tio̍h Iâ-so͘ chiū phak lo̍h-khì kî-kiû kóng, “Chú ah, lí nā khéng, ōe-tàng hō͘ góa chheng-khì.”
42005013	Iâ-so͘ chhun-chhiú kā i bong, kóng, “Góa khéng, hō͘ lí chheng-khì!” I ê bâ-hong sûi-sî bô-khì.
42005014	Iâ-so͘ bēng-lēng i, kóng, “M̄-thang kā lâng kóng; tio̍h khì hō͘ chè-si giām, koh chiàu [Mô͘-se] ê kui-tēng, ūi-tio̍h lí ū tit-tio̍h chheng-khì hiàn chè-mi̍h, thang tùi chèng-lâng chèng-bêng.”
42005015	Iâ-so͘ ê miâ-siaⁿ ná thoân ná khoah; kui tōa-tīn lâng chū-chi̍p lâi beh thiaⁿ tō-lí, koh kiû I hō͘ in ê pīⁿ tit-tio̍h i-hó.
42005016	M̄-kú Iâ-so͘ thòe-khì phian-phiah ê só͘-chāi kî-tó.
42005017	Ū chi̍t ji̍t, Iâ-so͘ teh kà-sī lâng ê sî, ū [Hoat-lī-sài]-phài ê lâng kap Lu̍t-hoat-kàu-su tī hia teh chē. In sī tùi [Ka-lī-lī] kap [Iû-thài] ta̍k hiuⁿ-siā, í-ki̍p [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] lâi ê. Chú ê koân-lêng kap Iâ-so͘ tông-chāi, hō͘ I ōe-tàng i-hó pīⁿ-lâng.
42005018	Hit sî, ū lâng ēng chhn̂g kng chi̍t ê poàn-sin-put-sūi ê lâng lâi, siūⁿ-beh kng ji̍p-khì hē tī Iâ-so͘ ê bīn-chêng;
42005019	m̄-kú in-ūi lâng chin chōe, chhē bô lō͘ thang kng ji̍p-khì, chiū peh-khì chhù-téng, thiah chhù-hiā, chiong hit-ê poàn-sin-put-sūi-ê liân chhn̂g lūi lo̍h-khì chèng-lâng ê tiong-kan, hē tī Iâ-so͘ ê bīn-chêng.
42005020	Iâ-so͘ khòaⁿ-kìⁿ in ê sìn-sim, chiū kóng, “Pêng-iú à, lí ê chōe sià-bián lah.”
42005021	Hiah-ê keng-ha̍k-kàu-su kap [Hoat-lī-sài]-phài ê lâng gī-lūn kóng, “Chit-ê teh siat-to̍k Siōng-tè ê sī siáⁿ-lâng? Siōng-tè í-gōa, sím-mi̍h lâng ōe-tàng sià-chōe.”
42005022	Iâ-so͘ chai-iáⁿ in teh chit-būn sím-mi̍h, chiū tùi in kóng, “Sī án-chóaⁿ lín sim-lāi teh chit-būn?
42005023	Kóng ‘Lí ê chōe sià-bián lah’, á-sī kóng ‘Khí-lâi kiâⁿ’, tó chi̍t hāng khah kán-tan?
42005024	Put-kò góa beh hō͘ lín chai Jîn-chú tī tōe-chiūⁿ ū sià-chōe ê koân-pèng.” Iâ-so͘ tùi hit-ê poàn-sin-put-sūi ê lâng kóng, “Góa kā lí kóng, khí-lâi, giâ lí ê chhn̂g, tńg-khì lín tau!”
42005025	Hit-ê lâng sûi-sî tī chèng-lâng ê bīn-chêng peh khí-lâi, giâ i só͘ tó ê chhn̂g tńg-khì in tau, ná kiâⁿ ná kui êng-kng hō͘ Siōng-tè.
42005026	Chèng-lâng lóng chin tio̍h-kiaⁿ, kui êng-kng hō͘ Siōng-tè, sim-lāi chhiong-móa kèng-ùi kóng, “Goán kin-á-ji̍t ū khòaⁿ-tio̍h kî-biāu ê tāi-chì!”
42005027	Chiah-ê tāi-chì í-āu, Iâ-so͘ chhut-khì, khòaⁿ-tio̍h chi̍t ê bau̍h-sè-ê, miâ kiò-chòe [Lī-bī], chē tī sè-koan, chiū tùi i kóng, “Lâi tè góa!”
42005028	[Lī-bī] chiū pàng-sak it-chhè, khí-lâi tè I.
42005029	[Lī-bī] tī in tau ūi-tio̍h Iâ-so͘ pān tōa iàn-se̍k. Ū chi̍t tōa-tīn bau̍h-sè-ê í-ki̍p kî-tha ê lâng kap in chòe-hé chē-toh chia̍h-pn̄g.
42005030	Ū chi̍t-kóa [Hoat-lī-sài]-phài ê lâng kap sio̍k in ê keng-ha̍k-kàu-su tùi Iâ-so͘ ê bûn-tô͘ bâi-oàn, kóng, “Sī-án-chóaⁿ lín kap bau̍h-sè-ê í-ki̍p chōe-jîn chòe-hé lim-chia̍h?”
42005031	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Kiān-khong-ê bô su-iàu i-seng, phòa-pīⁿ-ê chiah ū su-iàu.
42005032	Góa lâi, m̄-sī beh chio gī-lâng, sī beh chio chōe-jîn lâi hóe-kái.”
42005033	Āu-lâi in tùi Iâ-so͘ kóng, “[Iok-hān] ê bûn-tô͘ siông-siông kìm-chia̍h kî-tó, [Hoat-lī-sài]-phài ê bûn-tô͘ mā-sī án-ni, m̄-kú lí ê bûn-tô͘ iā chia̍h iā lim.”
42005034	Iâ-so͘ tùi in kóng, “Sin-lông iáu kap hun-iàn ê lâng-kheh chòe-hé ê sî, lín kiám ōe hō͘ lâng-kheh kìm-chia̍h?
42005035	Ji̍t-chí teh-beh kàu, sin-lông ōe hō͘ lâng tùi in tiong-kan lia̍h-khì, tī hiah-ê ji̍t in chiū ōe kìm-chia̍h.”
42005036	Iâ-so͘ koh ēng chi̍t ê phì-jū kā in kóng: “Bô-lâng thiah sin-saⁿ lâi pó͘ kū-saⁿ, nā án-ni chòe, m̄-nā sin-saⁿ thiah-phòa, thiah khí-lâi hit tè sin-pò͘ kap kū-saⁿ mā bōe ha̍h.
42005037	Mā bô-lâng ēng sin-chiú ji̍p tī kū phê-tē. I nā án-ni chòe, sin-chiú ōe kā kū phê-tē piak-phòa, chiú lâu chhut-lâi, phê-tē mā phòa-khì.
42005038	Sin-chiú tio̍h ji̍p tī sin phê-tē.
42005039	Bô-lâng lim kū-chiú liáu-āu ài lim sin-chiú, lâng lóng ōe kóng ‘Iáu-sī kū-chiú khah hó.’ ”
42006001	Ū chi̍t ê An-hioh-ji̍t, Iâ-so͘ tùi be̍h-hn̂g keng-kè. I ê bûn-tô͘ tiah be̍h-sūi, ēng chhiú jôe lâi chia̍h.
42006002	Ū chi̍t-kóa [Hoat-lī-sài]-phài ê lâng kā in kóng, “Lín sī-án-chóaⁿ chòe An-hioh-ji̍t bōe ēng-tit chòe ê tāi-chì?”
42006003	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Lín kiám m̄-bat tha̍k-tio̍h [Tāi-pi̍t] kap tè i ê lâng pak-tó͘ iau ê sî só͘ chòe ê tāi-chì?
42006004	I ji̍p-khì Siōng-tè ê tiān the̍h hiàn-chè ê piáⁿ lâi chia̍h, mā hō͘ tè i ê lâng chia̍h. Chit khoán piáⁿ chí-ū chè-si chiah thang chia̍h.”
42006005	Iâ-so͘ kā in kóng, “Jîn-chú sī An-hioh-ji̍t ê Chú.”
42006006	Lēng-gōa chi̍t ê An-hioh-ji̍t, Iâ-so͘ ji̍p-khì hōe-tn̂g kà-sī; tī hia ū chi̍t ê chiàⁿ-chhiú khê-khì ê lâng.
42006007	Ū chi̍t-kóa keng-ha̍k-kàu-su kap [Hoat-lī-sài]-phài ê lâng teh tng-tán khòaⁿ Iâ-so͘ tī An-hioh-ji̍t ōe kā i i-tī á bōe, thang chhē khang-phāng lâi kò I.
42006008	Iâ-so͘ chai in teh siūⁿ sím-mi̍h, chiū kā hit-ê chhiú khê-khì ê lâng kóng, “Khí-lâi, lâi khiā tī tiong-ng!” I chiū khí-lâi, khiā tī hia.
42006009	Iâ-so͘ tùi in kóng, “Góa mn̄g lín, tī An-hioh-ji̍t chòe hó-sū á-sī chòe pháiⁿ-sū, kiù sìⁿ-miā á-sī hāi sìⁿ-miā, tó chi̍t hāng ha̍p-hoat?”
42006010	Iâ-so͘ chiū chi̍t-ê chi̍t-ê kā in khòaⁿ, jiân-āu tùi hit-ê lâng kóng, “Chhiú chhun chhut-lâi!” I chiàu án-ni chòe, chhiú chiū ho̍k-goân.
42006011	Hiah-ê lâng hui-siông siū-khì, chham-siông beh án-chóaⁿ tùi-hù Iâ-so͘.
42006012	Ū chi̍t ji̍t, Iâ-so͘ chhut-khì soaⁿ-ni̍h kî-tó, thong-mî tùi Siōng-tè kî-kiû.
42006013	Thiⁿ-kng ê sî, I kiò bûn-tô͘ lâi, tùi in tiong-kan kéng-soán cha̍p-jī ê, chheng in chòe sù-tô͘,
42006014	chiū-sī [Se-bûn] --- Iâ-so͘ koh kā i hō-miâ kiò-chòe [Pí-tek] --- kap i ê sió-tī [An-tek-lia̍t], [Ngá-kok] kap [Iok-hān], [Hui-le̍k] kap [Pa-to-lô-mái],
42006015	[Má-thài] kap [To-má], [A-le̍k-hui] ê kiáⁿ [Ngá-kok] kap chheng-chòe Kek-chìn-tóng ê [Se-bûn],
42006016	[Ngá-kok] ê kiáⁿ [Iû-tāi] kap āu-lâi chhut-bōe Iâ-so͘ hit-ê [Í-su-ka-lio̍k] ê [Iû-tāi].
42006017	Iâ-so͘ kap sù-tô͘ lo̍h-soaⁿ, lâi khiā tī pîⁿ-tōe, tī hia ū chi̍t tōa-tīn I ê bûn-tô͘, koh ū chi̍t tōa-tīn bîn-chiòng. Chiah-ê lâng sī tùi [Iû-thài] choân-tōe kap [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng], í-ki̍p [Thài-ní] kap [Se-tùn] iân-hái lâi ê.
42006018	In beh thiaⁿ Iâ-so͘ kóng tō-lí, mā beh hō͘ I i-pīⁿ. Hiah-ê hō͘ siâ-sîn kiáu-jiáu ê lâng mā lâi, lóng tit-tio̍h i-tī.
42006019	Kui tōa-tīn ê lâng lóng siūⁿ-beh kā I bong, in-ūi ū koân-lêng tùi I hoat-chhut, hō͘ in lóng tit-tio̍h i-hó.
42006020	Iâ-so͘ chù-ba̍k khòaⁿ I ê bûn-tô͘, kóng: Lín chiah-ê sàn-chhiah-lâng chin ū hok-khì, in-ūi lín sī Siōng-tè-kok ê chú-bîn.
42006021	Lín hiān-chāi teh iau ê lâng chin ū hok-khì, in-ūi Siōng-tè ōe hō͘ lín pá-chiok. Lín hiān-chāi teh thî-khàu ê lâng chin ū hok-khì, in-ūi Siōng-tè ōe hō͘ lín chhiò.
42006022	Lâng oàn-hūn lín, ūi-tio̍h Jîn-chú ê iân-kò͘ kā lín khì-sak, kā lín bú-jio̍k, kā lín khòaⁿ-chòe pháiⁿ-lâng, lín chin ū hok-khì.
42006023	Hit ji̍t lín tio̍h hoaⁿ-hí tiô-thiàu, in-ūi lín tī thiⁿ-ni̍h ê pò-siúⁿ chin tōa. Chá-chêng chiah-ê lâng ê chó͘-sian mā án-ni tùi-thāi sian-ti.
42006024	M̄-kú lín chiah-ê hó-gia̍h-lâng chhám à, in-ūi lín í-keng hióng-siū an-lo̍k.
42006025	Lín hiān-chāi pá-chiok ê lâng chhám à, in-ūi lín ōe iau-gō. Lín hiān-chāi teh chhiò ê lâng chhám à, in-ūi lín ōe ai-siong thî-khàu.
42006026	Chèng-lâng lóng teh o-ló lín ê sî, lín chhám à, in-ūi in ê chó͘-sian mā bat án-ni tùi-thāi ké sian-ti.”
42006027	“Lín chiah-ê teh thiaⁿ ê lâng, góa kā lín kóng: Tio̍h thiàⁿ lín ê tùi-te̍k, hó khoán-thāi oàn-hūn lín ê lâng.
42006028	Tio̍h chiok-hok lóe-mē lín ê lâng, ūi-tio̍h bú-jio̍k lín ê lâng kî-tó.
42006029	Ū lâng siàn lí ê chhùi-phóe, lēng-gōa chi̍t-pêng mā hō͘ i siàn. Ū lâng pak lí ê gōa-saⁿ, lāi-saⁿ mā sòa hō͘ i.
42006030	Ū lâng kā lí kiû sím-mi̍h, tio̍h hō͘ i. Ū lâng chhiúⁿ lí ê mi̍h-kiāⁿ, m̄-thang kā i thó.
42006031	Lín ài lâng án-chóaⁿ tùi-thāi lín, mā tio̍h án-ni tùi-thāi in.
42006032	“Lín nā chí-ū thiàⁿ hiah-ê thiàⁿ lín ê lâng, ū sím-mi̍h kong-lô? In-ūi liân pháiⁿ-lâng mā thiàⁿ hiah-ê thiàⁿ in ê lâng.
42006033	Lín nā chí-ū hó khoán-thāi hiah-ê hó khoán-thāi lín ê lâng, ū sím-mi̍h kong-lô? Liân pháiⁿ-lâng mā án-ni chòe.
42006034	Lín nā chîⁿ chioh hō͘ hiah-ê lín ǹg-bāng ōe hêng ê lâng, ū sím-mi̍h kong-lô? Liân pháiⁿ-lâng mā chioh hō͘ hiah-ê ōe lóng-chóng hêng ê pháiⁿ-lâng.
42006035	Chóng-sī lín tio̍h thiàⁿ lín ê tùi-te̍k, hó khoán-thāi in; chioh-lâng mā m̄-thang ǹg-bāng beh siu-hôe. Án-ni, lín chiū ōe tit-tio̍h chin tōa ê pò-siúⁿ, koh ōe chiâⁿ-chòe Chì-koân Siōng-tè ê kiáⁿ-jî, in-ūi I tùi bōng-un pōe-gī kap siâ-ok ê lâng chin chû-pi.
42006036	Lín ê Thiⁿ-pē sī jîn-chû, lín mā tio̍h jîn-chû.”
42006037	“M̄-thang phoe-phòaⁿ lâng, chiah bōe siū Siōng-tè sím-phòaⁿ; m̄-thang kā lâng tēng-chōe, chiah bōe siū Siōng-tè tēng-chōe. Tio̍h sià-bián lâng, chiah ōe siū Siōng-tè sià-bián.
42006038	Tio̍h hō͘ lâng, Siōng-tè chiū ōe hō͘ lín; I ōe ji̍h koh iô, hō͘ i cha̍t, koh niû kàu móa-móa, tò lo̍h-khì lín ê saⁿ-á-phè. Lín ēng sím-mi̍h niû niû hō͘ lâng, Siōng-tè mā ōe chiàu án-ni niû tò-tńg hō͘ lín.”
42006039	Iâ-so͘ koh ēng phì-jū tùi in kóng, “Bông-jîn kiám ōe khan bông-jîn? Kiám bōe nn̄g ê lóng poa̍h-lo̍h khiⁿ-kau?
42006040	Ha̍k-seng bōe chhiau-kè lāu-su, put-kò ha̍k-seng nā o̍h ū khí, i chiū ōe chhin-chhiūⁿ lāu-su.
42006041	“Lí ná kan-ta teh khòaⁿ hiaⁿ-tī ba̍k-chiu lāi ê chhâ-iù-á, ia̍h bô chù-ì-tio̍h ka-kī ba̍k-chiu lāi ū chhâ-kho͘?
42006042	Lí bô khòaⁿ-kìⁿ ka-kī ba̍k-chiu lāi ū chhâ-kho͘, ná ōe-tàng kā lí ê hiaⁿ-tī kóng, ‘Hiaⁿ-tī ah, lí ba̍k-chiu lāi ê chhâ-iù-á góa lâi kā lí the̍h chhut-lâi.’ Ké-hó ê lâng ah, ka-kī ba̍k-chiu lāi ê chhâ-kho͘ tio̍h seng the̍h chhut-lâi, chiah ōe-tàng khòaⁿ chheng-chhó, thang kā hiaⁿ-tī ba̍k-chiu lāi ê chhâ-iù-á the̍h chhut-lâi.”
42006043	“Hó-chhiū bōe kiat pháiⁿ ké-chí; pháiⁿ-chhiū mā bōe kiat hó ké-chí.
42006044	Ta̍k châng chhiū tùi só͘ kiat ê ké-chí lâi chai i ê hó-pháiⁿ. Bōe-tàng tùi chhì-phè bán bû-hoa-kó, mā bōe-tàng tùi chháu-chhì siu phû-tô.
42006045	Hó-lâng tùi sim-lāi só͘ chek-chū ê hó hoat-chhut hó; pháiⁿ-lâng tùi só͘ chek-chū ê pháiⁿ hoat-chhut pháiⁿ. In-ūi lâng sim-lāi chhiong-móa sím-mi̍h, chhùi chiū kóng sím-mi̍h.”
42006046	“Sī-án-chóaⁿ lín chheng-ho͘ góa ‘Chú ah, Chú ah’ khiok bô si̍t-hêng góa ê kà-sī?
42006047	Lâi góa chia thiaⁿ góa ê ōe, koh si̍t-hêng ê lâng, góa kā lín kóng i chhin-chhiūⁿ sím-mi̍h.
42006048	I chhin-chhiūⁿ lâng khí-chhù, thô͘ ku̍t chin chhim, tōe-ki hē tī chio̍h-pôaⁿ téng; tōa-chúi lâi, chúi chhiong-tio̍h chhù, chhù mā bōe iô-tāng, in-ūi chhù khí chin kian-kò͘.
42006049	M̄-kú thiaⁿ góa chiah-ê ōe bô si̍t-hêng ê lâng chhin-chhiūⁿ lâng khí-chhù bô hē tōe-ki, chúi chi̍t-ē chhiong, chhù sûi-sî tó lo̍h-khì, sīm-chì tó-kah chin lī-hāi.”
42007001	Iâ-so͘ kóng hō͘ bîn-chiòng thiaⁿ ê ōe lóng kóng soah, chiū ji̍p-khì [Ka-pek-lông].
42007002	Ū chi̍t ê [Lô-má] kun-koaⁿ, i só͘ tiōng-iōng ê lô͘-po̍k phòa-pīⁿ, pīⁿ-kah teh-beh sí.
42007003	Kun-koaⁿ thiaⁿ-tio̍h Iâ-so͘ ê tāi-chì, chiū chhe kúi-nā ê [Iû-thài]-lâng ê tiúⁿ-ló khì Iâ-so͘ hia, chhiáⁿ Iâ-so͘ lâi i-tī i ê lô͘-po̍k.
42007004	Chiah-ê tiúⁿ-ló kàu Iâ-so͘ hia, khún-chhiat kiû I kóng, “Chit-ê lâng ōe kham-tit lí kā i pang-chān,
42007005	in-ūi i ài-hō͘ lán [Iû-thài]-lâng, koh kā lán khí hōe-tn̂g.”
42007006	Iâ-so͘ chiū kap in khì. Iâ-so͘ teh-beh kàu i ê chhù ê sî, hit-ê kun-koaⁿ chhe kúi-nā ê pêng-iú lâi kā I kóng, “Chú ah, m̄-thang lô-hoân lí, lí lâi goán tau, góa bōe kham-tit.
42007007	Só͘-í góa chiah m̄-káⁿ ka-kī lâi kìⁿ lí. Lí chí-ū kóng chi̍t kù ōe, góa ê lô͘-po̍k chiū ōe hó.
42007008	In-ūi góa sī hō͘ lâng koán ê lâng, mā ū peng hō͘ góa koán. Góa kā chit-ê kóng ‘Khì’, i chiū khì; kā pa̍t-ê kóng ‘Lâi’, i chiū lâi; kā góa ê lô͘-po̍k kóng ‘Lí chòe chit-ê’, i chiū khì chòe.”
42007009	Iâ-so͘ thiaⁿ-tio̍h chiah-ê ōe tùi i kám-kak chin ì-gōa, oa̍t tńg-sin kā tè I ê kûn-chiòng kóng, “Góa kā lín kóng, liân tī [Í-sek-lia̍t]-lâng ê tiong-kan, góa to iáu m̄-bat khòaⁿ-tio̍h chit khoán ê sìn-sim.”
42007010	Siū chhe ê lâng tńg-khì kun-koaⁿ ê chhù, khòaⁿ-tio̍h lô͘-po̍k í-keng hó-khì.
42007011	Kè bô jōa kú, Iâ-so͘ khì chi̍t ê siâⁿ, kiò-chòe [Ná-in]. I ê bûn-tô͘ kap kui tōa-tīn lâng tè I khì.
42007012	Iâ-so͘ beh kàu siâⁿ-mn̂g ê sî, tú-hó ū lâng kng chi̍t ê sí-lâng chhut-lâi, i ê lāu-bú ko͘-ko͘ siⁿ chit-ê kiáⁿ, koh sī kóaⁿ-hū. Ū chi̍t tīn siâⁿ-lāi ê lâng chhut-lâi sàng-chòng.
42007013	Chú chi̍t-ē khòaⁿ-tio̍h chit-ê kóaⁿ-hū chiū khó-lîn i, kā i kóng, “M̄-thang khàu!”
42007014	Jiân-āu Iâ-so͘ kiâⁿ óa-khì hōaⁿ kng sin-si ê kè, kng ê lâng chiū thêng-kha. Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Siàu-liân-lâng, góa kā lí kóng, ‘Khí-lâi!’ ”
42007015	Hit-ê sí-lâng chiū peh khí-lâi chē, khui-chhùi kóng-ōe. Iâ-so͘ chiū chiong i kau hō͘ i ê lāu-bú.
42007016	Chèng-lâng lóng hui-siông kiaⁿ-hiâⁿ, chiong êng-kng kui hō͘ Siōng-tè kóng, “Lán tiong-kan ū chhut-hiān chi̍t ūi tōa sian-ti lah!”; koh kóng, “Siōng-tè ū khòaⁿ-kò͘ I ê chú-bîn!”
42007017	Koan-hē Iâ-so͘ chit-ê hong-siaⁿ thoân kàu choân [Iû-thài] kap chiu-ûi ta̍k tōe-khu.
42007018	[Iok-hān] ê bûn-tô͘ chiong chiah-ê tāi-chì lóng kā [Iok-hān] pò-kò. [Iok-hān] chiū kiò nn̄g ê bûn-tô͘ lâi,
42007019	chhe in khì kìⁿ Chú, kóng, “Lí chiū-sī teh-beh lâi Hit-ūi, á-sī goán tio̍h thèng-hāu pa̍t-lâng?”
42007020	Chiah-ê lâng lâi-kàu Iâ-so͘ hia, chiū kóng, “Si-sóe-chiá [Iok-hān] chhe goán lâi mn̄g lí kóng ‘Lí chiū-sī teh-beh lâi Hit-ūi, á-sī goán tio̍h thèng-hāu pa̍t-lâng?’ ”
42007021	Tú hit sî, Iâ-so͘ ū i-hó chin chōe sin-khó͘ pīⁿ-thiàⁿ kap hō͘ kúi hū-sin ê lâng, koh hō͘ chin chōe sit-bêng ê lâng ōe khòaⁿ-kìⁿ.
42007022	Iâ-so͘ chiū ìn kóng, “Lín tńg-khì kā [Iok-hān] pò-kò lín só͘ khòaⁿ-tio̍h kap thiaⁿ-tio̍h ê, chiū-sī sit-bêng ê lâng koh khòaⁿ-kìⁿ, kha pái ê lâng kiâⁿ-lō͘, bâ-hong pīⁿ-lâng chheng-khì, hīⁿ-khang bōe thiaⁿ-kìⁿ ê lâng thiaⁿ-kìⁿ, sí-lâng koh-oa̍h, sàn-chhiah-lâng ū hó siau-sit thoân hō͘ in.
42007023	Tùi góa bô sit-khì sìn-sim ê lâng chin ū hok-khì!”
42007024	[Iok-hān] chhe lâi ê lâng lī-khui liáu-āu, Iâ-so͘ chiah tùi chèng-lâng kóng-khí [Iok-hān] ê sū. I kóng, “Lín chhut-khì khòng-iá sī beh khòaⁿ sím-mi̍h? Beh khòaⁿ hō͘ hong chhe iô-lâi iô-khì ê lô͘-úi sī-bô?
42007025	Án-ni, lín chhut-khì beh khòaⁿ sím-mi̍h? Beh khòaⁿ chhēng ko-kùi i-ho̍k ê lâng sī-bô? Lín khòaⁿ, chhēng chhia-hoa ê i-ho̍k seng-oa̍h chhia-chhí ê lâng sī tī ông-kiong.
42007026	Án-ni, lín chhut-khì beh khòaⁿ sím-mi̍h? Beh khòaⁿ sian-ti sī-bô? Sī, m̄-kú góa kā lín kóng, i pí sian-ti koh-khah úi-tāi.
42007027	Koan-hē [Iok-hān], Sèng-keng ū án-ni kì-chài: Khòaⁿ ah, góa chhe góa ê sù-chiá chòe lí ê sian-hong; i beh tī lí ê thâu-chêng kā lí khui-lō͘.
42007028	Góa kā lín kóng, hū-jîn-lâng só͘ siⁿ ê bô chi̍t ê pí [Iok-hān] khah úi-tāi. M̄-kú, tī Siōng-tè-kok siōng-sòe-ê iáu pí i koh-khah úi-tāi!”
42007029	Thiaⁿ-tio̍h chiah-ê ōe ê bîn-chiòng kap bau̍h-sè-ê mā lóng sêng-jīn Siōng-tè sī kong-gī, in-ūi in ū niá-siū [Iok-hān] ê sóe-lé.
42007030	M̄-kú [Hoat-lī-sài]-phài ê lâng kap Lu̍t-hoat-kàu-su lóng kū-choa̍t Siōng-tè tùi in só͘ tēng ê chí-ì, bô niá-siū [Iok-hān] ê sóe-lé.
42007031	Iâ-so͘ koh kóng, “Án-ni, chit sè-tāi ê lâng góa beh ēng sím-mi̍h lâi pí-phēng? In chhin-chhiūⁿ sím-mi̍h?
42007032	In chhin-chhiūⁿ chi̍t tīn gín-á chē tī chhī-tiûⁿ-kháu tùi tâng-phōaⁿ hō͘-siōng hoah: Goán tùi lín pûn phín-á, lín bô thiàu-bú! Goán chhiùⁿ ai-ko, lín mā bô khàu!
42007033	Si-sóe-chiá [Iok-hān] lâi, bô chia̍h-pn̄g, bô lim-chiú, lín chiū kóng, ‘I hō͘ kúi hū-sin!’
42007034	Jîn-chú lâi, mā chia̍h mā lim, lín chiū kóng, ‘I sī tham-chia̍h hò͘ⁿ-chiú ê lâng, sī bau̍h-sè-ê kap chōe-jîn ê pêng-iú.’
42007035	Tì-hūi sī tùi ū tì-hūi ê lâng tit-tio̍h chèng-si̍t.”
42007036	Ū chi̍t ê [Hoat-lī-sài]-phài ê lâng chhiáⁿ Iâ-so͘ chia̍h-pn̄g, Iâ-so͘ chiū ji̍p-khì hit-ê [Hoat-lī-sài]-lâng ê chhù chē-toh chia̍h-pn̄g.
42007037	Hit-ê siâⁿ-lāi ū chi̍t ê ū chōe ê hū-jîn-lâng, i chai Iâ-so͘ tī hit-ê [Hoat-lī-sài]-lâng ê chhù teh chia̍h-pn̄g, chiū tòa chi̍t koàn tóe phang-iû ê ge̍k-pân lâi.
42007038	I khiā tī Iâ-so͘ ê āu-bīn, óa I ê kha teh khàu, ba̍k-sái tih-tâm I ê kha, chiū ēng ka-kī ê thâu-mn̂g kā chhit, koh ti̍t-ti̍t chim I ê kha, ēng phang-iû kā boah.
42007039	Chhiáⁿ Iâ-so͘ hit-ê [Hoat-lī-sài]-lâng chi̍t-ē khòaⁿ-tio̍h, sim-lāi siūⁿ, “Chit-ê lâng nā-sī sian-ti, it-tēng ōe chai teh kā I bong ê sī siáⁿ-lâng, sī sím-mi̍h khoán hū-jîn-lâng, in-ūi i sī chōe-jîn.”
42007040	Iâ-so͘ chiū tùi i kóng, “[Se-bûn], góa ū ōe beh kā lí kóng.” [Se-bûn] kóng, “Lāu-su, chhiáⁿ kóng.”
42007041	Iâ-so͘ chiū kóng, “Ū nn̄g ê lâng tùi chi̍t ê chè-chú chioh chîⁿ, chi̍t ê khiàm i gō͘-pah ê gûn-á, iáu chi̍t ê khiàm i gō͘-cha̍p.
42007042	In bô hoat-tō͘ thang hêng, chè-chú chiū chhat-siau in ê chè. Án-ni, tó chi̍t ê ōe khah thiàⁿ chè-chú?”
42007043	[Se-bûn] ìn kóng, “Góa siūⁿ sī chè siū chhat-siau khah chōe hit-ê.” Iâ-so͘ kā i kóng, “Lí ê phòaⁿ-toàn chin tio̍h.”
42007044	Jiân-āu Iâ-so͘ oa̍t-thâu ǹg hū-jîn-lâng, tùi [Se-bûn] kóng, “Lí ū khòaⁿ-tio̍h chit-ê hū-jîn-lâng bô? Góa ji̍p lí ê chhù, lí bô ēng chúi hō͘ góa sóe-kha, m̄-kú i ēng ba̍k-sái tih-tâm góa ê kha, koh ēng i ê thâu-mn̂g chhit.
42007045	Lí bô kā góa chim, m̄-kú góa ji̍p-lâi liáu-āu, i ti̍t-ti̍t chim góa ê kha.
42007046	Lí bô ēng iû boah góa ê thâu-khak, m̄-kú i ēng phang-iû boah góa ê kha.
42007047	Só͘-í, góa kā lí kóng, i thiàⁿ khah chōe, piáu-sī i chin chōe ê chōe-kò í-keng ū tit-tio̍h sià-bián. Tit-tio̍h sià-bián chió, thiàⁿ chiū chió.”
42007048	Iâ-so͘ chiū kā hū-jîn-lâng kóng, “Lí ê chōe tit-tio̍h sià-bián lah.”
42007049	Kâng toh hiah-ê lâng sim-lāi siūⁿ, “Chit-ê tàu-tóe sī sím-mi̍h lâng, I kèng-jiân sià-bián lâng ê chōe!”
42007050	Iâ-so͘ kā hit-ê hū-jîn-lâng kóng, “Lí ê sìn-sim ū kiù lí; pêng-an tò-khì.”
42008001	Kè bô jōa kú, Iâ-so͘ ta̍k siâⁿ-chhī ta̍k hiuⁿ-siā kiâⁿ thàu-thàu thôan-tō, soan-iông Siōng-tè-kok ê hok-im. Cha̍p-jī sù-tô͘ kap I chòe-tīn,
42008002	ū chi̍t-kóa bat hō͘ siâ-sîn hū-sin á-sī phòa-pīⁿ hō͘ Iâ-so͘ i-hó ê hū-jîn-lâng mā kap I chòe-hé khì, kî-tiong ū [Boa̍t-tāi-lia̍p] ê [Má-lī-a] --- Iâ-so͘ bat tùi i sin-chiūⁿ kóaⁿ-chhut chhit ê kúi,
42008003	[Hi-lu̍t] ê koán-ke [Khó͘-sat] ê bó͘ [Iok-a-ná], kap [So͘-sat-ná], í-ki̍p kî-tha chin chōe hū-jîn-lâng, in bat ēng ka-kī ê châi-bu̍t lâi ho̍k-sāi Iâ-so͘ kap I ê bûn-tô͘.
42008004	Ū chi̍t tōa-tīn lâng tùi ta̍k ê siâⁿ-chhī it-ti̍t chū-chi̍p lâi Iâ-so͘ hia ê sî, I ēng phì-jū kā in kóng:
42008005	“Ū chi̍t ê iā-chéng-chí-ê chhut-khì iā chéng-chí. I iā ê sî, ū-ê lak tī lō͘-piⁿ, hō͘ lâng ta̍h, khong-tiong ê chiáu kā i chia̍h liáu-liáu.
42008006	Ū-ê lak tī chio̍h-thâu tōe, in-ūi bô chúi-hun, hoat chhut-lâi chiū ta-khì.
42008007	Ū-ê lak tī chhì-phè lāi, chhì-á kap chéng-chí pîⁿ-pîⁿ tōa-châng khí-lâi, soah kā i hip-sí.
42008008	Ū-ê lak lo̍h-khì hó thó͘-tōe, tōa-châng khí-lâi, kiat-si̍t chi̍t-pah pē.” Chiah-ê ōe kóng soah, Iâ-so͘ koh tōa-siaⁿ kóng, “Ū hīⁿ-khang thang thiaⁿ ê lâng, tio̍h thiaⁿ!”
42008009	Iâ-so͘ ê bûn-tô͘ mn̄g I chit-ê phì-jū sī sím-mi̍h ì-sù.
42008010	I kóng, “Siōng-tè-kok ê ò-pì í-keng ū hō͘ lín chai, m̄-kú tùi pa̍t-lâng chiū ēng phì-jū, beh hō͘ In khòaⁿ, mā khòaⁿ bô, thiaⁿ, mā thiaⁿ bōe liáu-kái.”
42008011	“Chit-ê phì-jū ê ì-sù sī án-ni: Chéng-chí sī Siōng-tè ê sìn-sit.
42008012	Lak tī lō͘-piⁿ ê sī lâng thiaⁿ-tio̍h sìn-sit, Mô͘-kúi sûi-sî lâi, tùi in sim-lāi chiong sìn-sit chhiúⁿ-khì, chiah bōe hō͘ in sìn lâi tit-kiù.
42008013	Lak tī chio̍h-thâu tōe ê sī lâng thiaⁿ-tio̍h sìn-sit, sûi-sî hoaⁿ-hí chiap-siū, put-kò bô tèng-kun, chí-ū chiām-sî sìn, chi̍t-ē tú-tio̍h chhì-liān chiū pàng-sak.
42008014	Lak tī chhì-phè lāi ê sī lâng thiaⁿ-tio̍h sìn-sit liáu-āu, siū-tio̍h seng-oa̍h ê khòa-lū, chîⁿ-châi kap hióng-lo̍k ê chó͘-gāi, sìn-sit siū hip-sí soah bōe sêng-se̍k.
42008015	Lak tī hó thó͘-tōe ê sī lâng thiaⁿ-tio̍h sìn-sit, ēng sêng-si̍t siān-liông ê sim chiap-siū, nāi-sim thèng-hāu kàu kiat-si̍t.”
42008016	“Bô-lâng teng tiám liáu ēng àng-á khàm khí-lâi á-sī khǹg tī bîn-chhn̂g kha, sī kā i chhāi tī teng-tâi téng, thang hō͘ ji̍p-lâi ê lâng khòaⁿ-tio̍h kng.
42008017	In-ūi bô chi̍t hāng ún-ba̍t-ê bōe hián-lō͘; bô chi̍t hāng am-khàm-ê bōe lō͘-hiān, bōe hō͘ lâng chai.
42008018	“Só͘-í, tio̍h chù-ì beh án-chóaⁿ thiaⁿ; in-ūi ū-ê, beh hō͘ i koh-khah chōe; bô-ê, liân i siūⁿ-kóng ū-ê mā beh kā i chhiúⁿ khí-lâi.”
42008019	Iâ-so͘ ê lāu-bú kap hiaⁿ-tī lâi chhē I, m̄-kú lâng chin chōe, bōe-tàng óa-khì.
42008020	Ū lâng kā I kóng, “Lí ê lāu-bú kap hiaⁿ-tī khiā tī gōa-bīn beh kìⁿ lí.”
42008021	Iâ-so͘ tùi in kóng, “Thiaⁿ Siōng-tè ê ōe ū khì si̍t-hêng ê lâng chiū-sī góa ê lāu-bú, góa ê hiaⁿ-tī.”
42008022	Ū chi̍t ji̍t, Iâ-so͘ kap I ê bûn-tô͘ chiūⁿ-chûn ê sî kā in kóng, “Lán kè lâi-khì hit pêng hōaⁿ.” In chiū khui-chûn.
42008023	Chûn teh kiâⁿ ê sî, Iâ-so͘ khùn-khì. Hut-jiân ū chi̍t chūn tōa-hong sàu lo̍h-lâi ô͘-ni̍h, chûn hō͘ chúi im kàu beh móa, chin gûi-hiám.
42008024	Bûn-tô͘ khì kā I kiò-chhíⁿ, kóng, “Lāu-su, lāu-su, lán beh bô-miā lò͘!” Iâ-so͘ chhíⁿ khí-lâi, chek-pī hong kap tōa-éng, hong-éng tiāⁿ, it-chhè chiū chēng-chēng.
42008025	Iâ-so͘ tùi bûn-tô͘ kóng, “Lín ná hiah-ni̍h bô sìn-sim?” In kiaⁿ-hiâⁿ koh kî-koài, tāi-ke kóng-lâi kóng-khì, “Chit-ê sī sím-mi̍h lâng? I chi̍t-ē bēng-lēng, liân hong kap éng lóng sūn-ho̍k.”
42008026	Iâ-so͘ kap bûn-tô͘ chē-chûn kàu [Ka-lī-lī] ê tùi-bīn hōaⁿ, [Kek-la̍h-sim]-lâng ê tōe-khu.
42008027	Iâ-so͘ lo̍h-chûn chiūⁿ-hōaⁿ; ū chi̍t ê kúi hū-sin ê lâng tùi siâⁿ-ni̍h chhut-lâi tú-tio̍h I. Chit-ê lâng í-keng chin kú bô chhēng-saⁿ, mā bô tòa tī chhù-lāi, lóng tòa tī bōng-á-po͘.
42008028	I chi̍t-ē khòaⁿ-tio̍h Iâ-so͘, chiū phak tī I ê bīn-chêng, tōa-siaⁿ hoah, “Chì-koân Siōng-tè ê Kiáⁿ Iâ-so͘, mài chhap góa! Góa khún-kiû lí, m̄-thang kā góa khó͘-chhó͘!”
42008029	In-ūi Iâ-so͘ ū bēng-lēng siâ-sîn tùi chit-ê lâng chhut-khì --- Siâ-sîn bat chin chōe pái kā i lia̍h-teh, lâng kā i koaiⁿ khí-lâi, ēng thih-liān kā i liān, ēng kha-khàu kā i khàu, m̄-kú i kā só-liān lóng chhoah-tn̄g, koh hō͘ kúi kóaⁿ khì khòng-iá.
42008030	Iâ-so͘ mn̄g i, “Lí kiò-chòe sím-mi̍h miâ?” I ìn kóng, “Kun-thoân”, in-ūi ū chin chōe kúi kā i hū-sin.
42008031	Kúi ai-kiû Iâ-so͘ m̄-thang bēng-lēng in ji̍p-khì chhim-ian.
42008032	Hit sî, hù-kūn ê soaⁿ-phiâⁿ ū chi̍t tōa-kûn ti teh thó-chia̍h, kúi chiū kiû Iâ-so͘ tio̍h hō͘ in ji̍p-khì ti-kûn. Iâ-so͘ chún in.
42008033	Kúi chiū tùi hit-ê lâng chhut-khì, chìn-ji̍p ti-kûn. Kui-kûn ti chiū tùi soaⁿ-phiâⁿ chông lo̍h-khì ô͘-ni̍h tū-sí.
42008034	Hiah-ê chhī-ti ê lâng khòaⁿ-tio̍h só͘ hoat-seng ê tāi-chì, chiū kiaⁿ-kah cháu khì siâⁿ-lāi kap hiuⁿ-siā pò lâng chai.
42008035	Chèng-lâng chiū chhut-lâi beh khòaⁿ hoat-seng sím-mi̍h tāi-chì. In lâi-kàu Iâ-so͘ hia, khòaⁿ-tio̍h siâ-sîn í-keng tùi i chhut-khì hit-ê lâng ū chhēng-saⁿ, cheng-sîn chèng-siông, chē tī Iâ-so͘ ê kha-chêng, in chiū chin tio̍h-kiaⁿ.
42008036	Chhin-ba̍k khòaⁿ-tio̍h chit-ê tāi-chì ê lâng chiū chiong hit-ê hō͘ siâ-sîn hū-sin ê lâng án-chóaⁿ tit-tio̍h i-hó ê tāi-chì kā chèng-lâng pò-kò.
42008037	[Kek-la̍h-sim] hù-kūn só͘-ū ê lâng kiû Iâ-so͘ lī-khui in hia, in-ūi in hui-siông kiaⁿ-hiâⁿ. Iâ-so͘ chiū chē-chûn tò-tńg-khì.
42008038	Kúi tùi i chhut-khì hit-ê lâng kiû Iâ-so͘, ài-beh tè I khì. M̄-kú Iâ-so͘ kiò i tńg-khì, kóng,
42008039	“Tńg-khì lín tau, chiong Siōng-tè ūi-tio̍h lí só͘ chòe it-chhè ê tāi-chì pò hō͘ lâng chai.” Hit-ê lâng chiū tńg-khì, chiong Iâ-so͘ ūi-tio̍h i só͘ chòe hiah-ni̍h tōa ê tāi-chì thoân-iông hō͘ choân-siâⁿ ê lâng chai.
42008040	Iâ-so͘ tńg-lâi ê sî, ū chi̍t tīn lâng kā I hoan-gêng, in-ūi in lóng teh thèng-hāu I.
42008041	Ū chi̍t ê hōe-tn̂g ê chú-koán miâ kiò-chòe [Ia̍p-ló͘] lâi, i chi̍t-ē khòaⁿ-tio̍h Iâ-so͘ chiū phak tī I ê kha-chêng, khún-kiû I khì in tau.
42008042	In-ūi i cha̍p-jī hè ê to̍k-siⁿ cha-bó͘-kiáⁿ teh-beh sí à. Iâ-so͘ chiū kap i khì; ū kui tōa-tīn lâng mā oe-oe khoeh-khoeh tè I khì.
42008043	Hit sî, ū chi̍t ê hū-jîn-lâng tì-tio̍h hiat-lāu-pīⁿ í-keng cha̍p-jī nî kú, sui-jiân kheng-ka-tōng-sán chhē i-seng, m̄-kú bô-lâng ōe-tàng kā i i-hó.
42008044	I kiâⁿ óa-khì Iâ-so͘ ê āu-bīn, bong I saⁿ-á-ku ê chhiu, i ê hiat-lāu sûi-sî chí.
42008045	Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Sím-mi̍h lâng kā góa bong?” Tāi-ke lóng kóng bô. [Pí-tek] kóng, “Lāu-su, sī kûn-chiòng khoeh-lâi khoeh-khì ê sî kā lí khoeh-tio̍h.”
42008046	Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Ū lâng kā góa bong-tio̍h, in-ūi góa chai ū tōa lêng-le̍k tùi góa chhut-khì.”
42008047	Hū-jîn-lâng chai-iáⁿ am-khàm bōe-tiâu, chiū phi̍h-phi̍h-chhoah, lâi phak tī Iâ-so͘ ê kha-chêng, tī chèng-lâng ê bīn-chêng kóng i sī-án-chóaⁿ bong Iâ-so͘, koh i ê pīⁿ án-chóaⁿ sûi-sî hó-khì.
42008048	Iâ-so͘ kā i kóng, “Cha-bó͘-kiáⁿ, lí ê sìn-sim hō͘ lí hó-khì lah, pêng-an tò-khì.”
42008049	Iâ-so͘ iáu teh kóng-ōe ê sî, ū lâng tùi hōe-tn̂g chú-koán ê chhù lâi, kā [Ia̍p-ló͘] kóng, “Lí ê cha-bó͘-kiáⁿ í-keng sí-khì, m̄-thang koh lô-hoân lāu-su.”
42008050	Iâ-so͘ thiaⁿ-tio̍h chiū kā [Ia̍p-ló͘] kóng, “M̄-bián kiaⁿ, chí-ū sìn, i ōe hó khí-lâi.”
42008051	Iâ-so͘ lâi-kàu in tau ê sî, [Pí-tek], [Iok-hān], [Ngá-kok], kap gín-á ê pē-bú í-gōa, m̄-chún pa̍t-lâng kap I chòe-hé ji̍p-khì.
42008052	Tāi-ke lóng ūi-tio̍h sí-khì ê cha-bó͘ gín-á teh háu teh khàu. Iâ-so͘ kóng, “M̄-thang khàu, in-ūi i m̄-sī sí, sī teh khùn.”
42008053	In-ūi in lóng chai hit-ê cha-bó͘ gín-á í-keng sí-khì, chiū kā I thí-chhiò.
42008054	Iâ-so͘ khan cha-bó͘ gín-á ê chhiú, tōa-siaⁿ kóng, “Cha-bó͘ gín-á, khí-lâi!”
42008055	I chiū hôe-hûn, sûi-sî peh khí-lâi. Iâ-so͘ hoan-hù in tio̍h hō͘ cha-bó͘ gín-á chia̍h.
42008056	I ê pē-bú hui-siông tio̍h-kiaⁿ. Iâ-so͘ bēng-lēng in m̄-thang chiong só͘ hoat-seng ê tāi-chì pò lâng chai.
42009001	Iâ-so͘ tiàu-chi̍p cha̍p-jī sù-tô͘, hō͘ in ū lêng-le̍k kap koân-pèng thang chè-ap lóng-chóng ê kúi, koh i-hó chin chōe pīⁿ-chèng.
42009002	Jiân-āu I chhe in chhut-khì soan-káng Siōng-tè-kok ê hok-im, koh i-tī pīⁿ-lâng.
42009003	I kau-tài in kóng, “Chhut-mn̂g ê sî sím-mi̍h lóng m̄-thang tòa: M̄-thang tòa koáiⁿ-á; m̄-thang tòa lú-hêng-tē; m̄-thang tòa chia̍h-mi̍h; m̄-thang tòa chîⁿ; mā m̄-thang ū nn̄g niá lāi-saⁿ.
42009004	Lín bô-lūn ji̍p-khì tó chi̍t keng chhù, tio̍h tòa tī hia, iā tùi hia lī-khui.
42009005	In nā m̄ chiap-la̍p lín, lín lī-khui hit-ê siâⁿ ê sî, tio̍h chiong kha-ni̍h ê thô͘-hún pōaⁿ-tiāu, piáu-sī tùi in kéng-kò.”
42009006	In chhut-khì, chi̍t-chng kè chi̍t-chng thoân hok-im, koh tī ta̍k só͘-chāi i-hó pīⁿ-lâng.
42009007	[Ka-lī-lī] hun-hong ê ông [Hi-lu̍t] thiaⁿ-tio̍h só͘ hoat-seng it-chhè ê tāi-chì, sim-lāi hui-siông put-an, in-ūi ū lâng kóng Si-sóe-chiá [Iok-hān] í-keng tùi sí-lâng tiong koh-oa̍h;
42009008	mā ū lâng kóng [Í-lī-a] ū chhut-hiān; koh ū lâng kóng kó͘-chá ê chi̍t ê sian-ti ū koh-oa̍h.
42009009	[Hi-lu̍t] kóng, “[Iok-hān], góa í-keng kā i chām-thâu lah, án-ni góa thiaⁿ lín teh kóng chit-ê tàu-tóe sī sím-mi̍h lâng?” I chiū ài-beh kìⁿ Iâ-so͘.
42009010	Sù-tô͘ tńg-lâi Iâ-so͘ hia, chiong in só͘ chòe ê tāi-chì lóng kā I pò-kò. Iâ-so͘ chiū kan-ta chhōa in thòe-khì chi̍t ê kiò-chòe [Pek-sài-tāi] ê siâⁿ.
42009011	Kûn-chiòng chi̍t-ē chai chiū tè I khì. Iâ-so͘ hoan-gêng in, kóng Siōng-tè-kok ê sū hō͘ in thiaⁿ, koh i-hó hiah-ê su-iàu i-tī ê lâng.
42009012	Ji̍t beh àm ê sî, cha̍p-jī sù-tô͘ lâi kā Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Chhiáⁿ kā kûn-chiòng kái-sàn, thang hō͘ in khì hù-kūn ê chng-siā chhē chia̍h-mi̍h kap tòa ê só͘-chāi, in-ūi lán tī chia phian-phiah bô-lâng tòa.”
42009013	Iâ-so͘ kā in kóng, “Lín hō͘ in chia̍h.” In kóng, “Lán chí-ū gō͘ ê piáⁿ, nn̄g bé hî, nā bô khì bóe ná ū kàu thang hō͘ chiah-chōe lâng chia̍h?”
42009014	Tī hia chha-put-to ū gō͘-chheng ê ta-po͘-lâng. Iâ-so͘ chiū tùi bûn-tô͘ kóng, “Kiò in hun-cho͘ chē lo̍h-khì, ta̍k cho͘ chha-put-to gō͘-cha̍p ê lâng.”
42009015	In chiàu án-ni chòe, kiò chèng-lâng lóng chē lo̍h-khì.
42009016	Iâ-so͘ the̍h hit gō͘ ê piáⁿ kap nn̄g bé hî, ǹg thiⁿ kám-siā, peh-khui, the̍h hō͘ bûn-tô͘ khì pun hō͘ kûn-chiòng.
42009017	Tāi-ke lóng chia̍h, chia̍h kàu pá-pá. Bûn-tô͘ chiong só͘ chhun ê sut-á lóng khioh khí-lâi, lóng-chóng ū cha̍p-jī nâ.
42009018	Ū chi̍t piàn, Iâ-so͘ ka-kī chi̍t ê teh kî-tó ê sî, bûn-tô͘ lâi chhē I. I mn̄g in kóng, “Chèng-lâng kóng góa sī sím-mi̍h lâng?”
42009019	In ìn kóng, “Ū lâng kóng lí sī Si-sóe-chiá [Iok-hān]; m̄-kú ū lâng kóng sī [Í-lī-a]; mā ū lâng kóng sī kó͘-chá ê chi̍t ê sian-ti koh-oa̍h.”
42009020	Iâ-so͘ koh mn̄g in kóng, “Lín leh, lín kóng góa sī sím-mi̍h lâng?” [Pí-tek] ìn kóng, “Lí sī Siōng-tè siat-li̍p ê Ki-tok!”
42009021	Iâ-so͘ bēng-lēng in m̄-thang tùi lâng kóng-khí chit-ê tāi-chì.
42009022	I kóng, “Jîn-chú it-tēng tio̍h siū chin chōe khó͘-lān, hō͘ tiúⁿ-ló, chè-si-tiúⁿ, kap keng-ha̍k-kàu-su kū-choa̍t, koh hō͘ in hāi-sí, tē-saⁿ ji̍t Siōng-tè ōe hō͘ I koh-oa̍h.”
42009023	Iâ-so͘ koh tùi chèng-lâng kóng, “Beh tè góa ê lâng, tio̍h hó͘-tēng ka-kī, ta̍k ji̍t giâ ka-kī ê si̍p-jī-kè lâi tè góa.
42009024	In-ūi beh kiù ka-kī ê sìⁿ-miā ê, ōe sòng-sit sìⁿ-miā; ūi-tio̍h góa ê iân-kò͘ sòng-sit ka-kī ê sìⁿ-miā ê, i ōe kiù-tio̍h sìⁿ-miā.
42009025	Lâng tit-tio̍h choân sè-kài soah sòng-sit ka-kī, á-sī húi-bia̍t ka-kī, ū sím-mi̍h lī-ek?
42009026	Tùi góa kap góa ê ōe kám-kak kiàn-siàu ê lâng, Jîn-chú tī I ka-kī kap Pē í-ki̍p sèng thiⁿ-sài ê êng-kng tiong lâi-lîm ê sî, mā ōe in-ūi chit-ê lâng kám-kak kiàn-siàu.
42009027	Góa si̍t-chāi kā lín kóng, khiā tī chia ê lâng, ū-ê iáu-bē sí í-chêng ōe khòaⁿ-kìⁿ Siōng-tè-kok.”
42009028	Chiah-ê ōe kóng liáu, chha-put-to poeh ji̍t āu, Iâ-so͘ chhōa [Pí-tek], [Iok-hān], kap [Ngá-kok] chiūⁿ-soaⁿ khì kî-tó.
42009029	I teh kî-tó ê sî, bīn-māu kái-piàn, I ê saⁿ piàn-kah pe̍h-siak-siak.
42009030	Hut-jiân-kan, ū nn̄g ê lâng, chiū-sī [Mô͘-se] kap [Í-lī-a], lâi kap Iâ-so͘ kóng-ōe.
42009031	In tī êng-kng tiong chhut-hiān, tâm-lūn Iâ-so͘ teh-beh tī [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] sí lâi oân-sêng sú-bēng ê sū.
42009032	[Pí-tek] kap i ê tâng-phōaⁿ thiám-kah khùn-khì. In chi̍t-ē chhíⁿ, khòaⁿ-kìⁿ Iâ-so͘ ê êng-kng í-ki̍p kap I khiā chòe-hé hit nn̄g ê lâng.
42009033	In teh-beh lī-khui Iâ-so͘ ê sî, [Pí-tek] kā Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Lāu-su, lán tī chia chin hó, goán lâi tah saⁿ keng liâu-á, chi̍t keng hō͘ lí, chi̍t keng hō͘ [Mô͘-se], chi̍t keng hō͘ [Í-lī-a].” I m̄-chai ka-kī teh kóng sím-mi̍h.
42009034	I teh kóng chiah-ê ōe ê sî, ū chi̍t phìⁿ hûn lâi, kā in tà-teh; in hō͘ hûn pau-ûi ê sî, khí kiaⁿ-hiâⁿ.
42009035	Ū siaⁿ tùi hûn chhut-lâi kóng, “Chit-ê sī góa ê Kiáⁿ, góa só͘ kéng-soán ê, lín tio̍h thiaⁿ-thàn I.”
42009036	Hit-ê siaⁿ kóng liáu, kan-ta chhun Iâ-so͘ chi̍t ê tī hia. Ū chi̍t tōaⁿ sî-kan, bûn-tô͘ lóng tiām-tiām, bô kā lâng kóng-khí in só͘ khòaⁿ-kìⁿ ê tāi-chì.
42009037	Keh-ji̍t, in tùi soaⁿ-téng lo̍h-lâi ê sî, ū kui tōa-tīn lâng lâi gêng-chiap Iâ-so͘.
42009038	Hit sî, kûn-chiòng ê tiong-kan ū chi̍t ê lâng hoah kóng, “Sian-siⁿ, góa chit-ê hāu-siⁿ kiû lí kā i khòaⁿ-chi̍t-è, i sī góa ê ko͘-kiáⁿ.
42009039	Kúi chi̍t-ē hū-sin, i sûi-sî loān hoah. Kúi hō͘ i thiu-chhoah, phū pe̍h-pho-nōa, koh kā i siong-hāi, lóng m̄ pàng i soah.
42009040	Góa ū chhiáⁿ lí ê bûn-tô͘ kā kúi kóaⁿ chhut-khì, in lóng bô hoat-tō͘.”
42009041	Iâ-so͘ ìn i kóng, “Ài à, m̄-sìn koh hú-pāi ê sè-tāi! Góa tio̍h kap lín tòa jōa kú? Góa tio̍h jím-nāi lín jōa kú? Kā lí ê hāu-siⁿ chhōa lâi chia!”
42009042	I hō͘ lâng chhōa lâi ê sî, kúi kā i siak-tó, hō͘ i thiu-chhoah. Iâ-so͘ chiū chek-pī siâ-sîn, i-hó hit-ê gín-á, chiong i kau hō͘ lāu-pē.
42009043	Chèng-lâng tùi Siōng-tè úi-tāi ê koân-lêng kám-kak chin tio̍h-kiaⁿ. Chèng-lâng tùi Iâ-so͘ só͘ chòe it-chhè ê tāi-chì iáu teh tio̍h-kiaⁿ ê sî, Iâ-so͘ tùi I ê bûn-tô͘ kóng,
42009044	“Chiah-ê ōe lín tio̍h chù-ì thiaⁿ: Jîn-chú teh-beh hō͘ lâng chhut-bōe kau tī lâng ê chhiú-thâu.”
42009045	Put-kò bûn-tô͘ bô bêng-pe̍k chit kù ōe, in-ūi ì-sù ū tùi in khàm khí-lâi hō͘ in bōe liáu-kái, in mā m̄-káⁿ mn̄g Iâ-so͘ chit kù ōe ê ì-sù.
42009046	Bûn-tô͘ hō͘-siōng cheng-lūn sím-mi̍h lâng siōng-tōa.
42009047	Iâ-so͘ chai in sim-lāi teh cheng-lūn sím-mi̍h, chiū khan chi̍t ê gín-á lâi khiā tī I sin-piⁿ,
42009048	jiân-āu kā in kóng, “Bô-lūn sím-mi̍h lâng ūi-tio̍h góa ê miâ chiap-la̍p chit-ê gín-á, chiū-sī chiap-la̍p góa; chiap-la̍p góa ê chiū-sī chiap-la̍p chhe góa lâi Hit-ūi. Lín chèng-lâng tiong-kan siōng-sòe-ê chiū-sī siōng-tōa.”
42009049	[Iok-hān] kóng, “Lāu-su, goán ū khòaⁿ-tio̍h chi̍t ê lâng hōng lí ê miâ kóaⁿ-kúi, goán kā i chó͘-tòng, in-ūi i bô kap goán tè lí.”
42009050	Iâ-so͘ kā i kóng, “M̄-thang kā i chó͘-tòng, in-ūi bô hoán-tùi lín ê chiū-sī ūi lín.”
42009051	Iâ-so͘ siū chiap chiūⁿ-thiⁿ ê ji̍t-chí teh-beh kàu, chiū koat-ì beh khì [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng].
42009052	I chhe-phài sù-chiá tāi-seng khì. In ji̍p-khì [Sat-má-lī-a]-lâng ê chng-thâu, ūi-tio̍h Iâ-so͘ chún-pī.
42009053	Hit só͘-chāi ê lâng bô hoan-gêng Iâ-so͘, in-ūi I beh khì [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng].
42009054	I ê bûn-tô͘ [Ngá-kok] kap [Iok-hān] khòaⁿ-tio̍h, chiū kóng, “Chú ah, goán tùi thiⁿ-téng kiò hé lo̍h-lâi kā in húi-bia̍t hó bô?”
42009055	Iâ-so͘ oa̍t kè-lâi, kā in chek-pī.
42009056	In chiū khì pa̍t ê chng-thâu.
42009057	In tī lō͘-tiong ê sî, ū chi̍t ê lâng tùi Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Lí bô-lūn khì tó-ūi, góa lóng beh tè lí.”
42009058	Iâ-so͘ kā i kóng, “Hô͘-lî ū khang, khong-tiong ê chiáu ū siū, put-kò Jîn-chú liân khòa thâu-khak ê só͘-chāi to bô.”
42009059	Iâ-so͘ koh tùi lēng-gōa chi̍t ê lâng kóng, “Lâi tè góa!” Hit-ê lâng ìn kóng, “Chú ah, hō͘ góa seng tńg-khì bâi-chòng góa ê lāu-pē.”
42009060	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Hō͘ sí-lâng khì bâi-chòng in ka-kī ê sí-lâng. Put-kò, lí tio̍h khì soan-káng Siōng-tè-kok ê hok-im.”
42009061	Koh ū chi̍t ê lâng kóng, “Chú ah, góa beh tè lí; put-kò hō͘ góa tāi-seng tńg-khì chhù-ni̍h kap ke-lāi ê lâng saⁿ-sî.”
42009062	Iâ-so͘ tùi i kóng, “Chhiú hōaⁿ tī lôe-bé iáu ti̍t-ti̍t oa̍t-thâu khòaⁿ āu-bīn ê lâng bô sek-ha̍p Siōng-tè-kok.”
42010001	Chiah-ê tāi-chì liáu-āu, Chú lēng-gōa kéng chhit-cha̍p-jī lâng, chhe in nn̄g-ê nn̄g-ê seng khì I pún-sin siūⁿ-beh khì ê ta̍k ê siâⁿ ta̍k ê só͘-chāi.
42010002	Iâ-so͘ kā in kóng, “Thang siu-sêng ê chin chōe, chòe-kang ê lâng chin chió. Só͘-í, lín tio̍h kî-kiû koán siu-sêng ê chú-lâng phài kang-lâng khì siu-sêng.
42010003	Khì! Góa chhe lín chhut-khì, chhin-chhiūⁿ sàng iûⁿ-á ji̍p-khì chhâi-lông ê lāi-bīn.
42010004	M̄-thang tòa chîⁿ-tē, m̄-thang tòa lú-hêng-tē, mā m̄-thang tòa ôe, tī lō͘-ni̍h m̄-thang kā lâng chhéng-an.
42010005	Lín bô-lūn ji̍p-khì tó chi̍t keng chhù, tio̍h tāi-seng kóng ‘Goān lín chit ke pêng-an!’
42010006	Tī hia nā ū ài pêng-an ê lâng, lín ê pêng-an ōe lâu tī in hia; nā bô, hit-ê pêng-an ōe tò-tńg-lâi kui lín.
42010007	Lín tio̍h tiàm hit-ê ke. In chún-pī sím-mi̍h, lín chiū chia̍h sím-mi̍h, lim sím-mi̍h, in-ūi chòe-kang ê lâng eng-kai tit-tio̍h kang-chîⁿ. Lín m̄-thang tùi chit ke sóa kè hit ke.
42010008	Lín bô-lūn ji̍p-khì tó chi̍t ê siâⁿ, lâng nā chiap-thāi lín, phâng sím-mi̍h chhut-lâi, lín chiū chia̍h sím-mi̍h.
42010009	Siâⁿ-lāi ū pīⁿ ê lâng tio̍h kā in i, sòa kā in kóng, ‘Siōng-tè-kok teh-beh si̍t-hiān lah.’
42010010	“Bô-lūn ji̍p-khì tó chi̍t ê siâⁿ, lâng nā bô hoan-gêng lín, lín tio̍h chhut-khì tōa koe-lō͘ kóng,
42010011	‘Liân lín chit-ê siâⁿ tiâu tī goán kha ê thô͘-hún, goán to beh pōaⁿ-tiāu kā lín kéng-kò; put-kò lín tio̍h chai Siōng-tè-kok teh-beh si̍t-hiān lah.’
42010012	Góa kā lín kóng, tī Sím-phòaⁿ ê Ji̍t, [Só͘-to-má] tio̍h siū ê hêng-hoa̍t ōe pí hit-ê siâⁿ tio̍h siū ê khah hó jím-siū.”
42010013	“[Ko-lia̍p-sìn], lí chhám à! [Pek-sài-tāi], lí chhám à! Góa tī lín tiong-kan kiâⁿ ê sîn-jiah nā tī [Thài-ní] kap [Se-tùn] kiâⁿ, in chá chiū chhēng môa-saⁿ, chē tī hé-hu téng hóe-kái lah.
42010014	Tī Sím-phòaⁿ ê sî, [Thài-ní] kap [Se-tùn] tio̍h siū ê hêng-hoa̍t ōe pí lín tio̍h siū ê khah hó jím-siū.
42010015	Lí leh, [Ka-pek-lông], Lí ài lâng kā lí hû chiūⁿ-thiⁿ sī-bô? Bōe, Siōng-tè ōe kā lí hiat-lo̍h im-kan!
42010016	“Thiaⁿ-thàn lín ê lâng chiū-sī thiaⁿ-thàn góa, kū-choa̍t lín ê lâng chiū-sī kū-choa̍t góa; kū-choa̍t góa ê lâng chiū-sī kū-choa̍t chhe góa lâi Hit-ūi.”
42010017	Hit chhit-cha̍p-jī lâng hoaⁿ-hoaⁿ hí-hí tò-lâi, pò-kò kóng, “Chú ah, goán hōng lí ê miâ bēng-lēng, liân kúi to ho̍k-chiông goán!”
42010018	Iâ-so͘ kā in kóng, “Góa ū khòaⁿ-kìⁿ Sat-tàn chhin-chhiūⁿ sih-nà tùi thiⁿ-téng siak lo̍h-lâi.
42010019	Tio̍h chai, góa ū sù lín koân-pèng thang ta̍h chôa kap giat-á-thâng, koh thang chè-ho̍k tùi-te̍k it-chhè ê lêng-le̍k; bô chi̍t hāng ōe kā lín siong-hāi.
42010020	Put-kò, m̄-thang in-ūi chiah-ê siâ-sîn hâng-ho̍k lín, lín chiū hoaⁿ-hí; tio̍h in-ūi lín ê miâ kì-chài tī thiⁿ-téng lâi hoaⁿ-hí.”
42010021	Hit sî, Iâ-so͘ hō͘ Sèng Sîn kám-tōng móa-sim hoaⁿ-hí, kóng, “Pē ah, thiⁿ-tōe ê Chú, góa kám-siā lí, in-ūi lí ū chiong chiah-ê sū tùi ū tì-hūi ū ha̍k-būn ê lâng khàm khí-lâi, tùi sòe-hàn gín-á khé-sī. Pē ah, sī lah, in-ūi che sī lí ê hó chí-ì.
42010022	“Góa ê Pē í-keng ū chiong it-chhè lóng kau-thok góa. Pē í-gōa bô-lâng bat Kiáⁿ sī sím-mi̍h lâng; Kiáⁿ kap Kiáⁿ ài-beh khé-sī ê lâng í-gōa mā bô-lâng bat Pē sī sím-mi̍h lâng.”
42010023	Iâ-so͘ oa̍t tńg-sin su-hā tùi bûn-tô͘ kóng, “Ū ba̍k-chiu thang khòaⁿ lín só͘ khòaⁿ-kìⁿ ê lâng chin ū hok-khì!
42010024	Góa kā lín kóng, í-chêng ū chin chōe sian-ti kap kun-ông ài khòaⁿ lín só͘ khòaⁿ-kìⁿ ê ia̍h bô khòaⁿ-tio̍h; ài thiaⁿ lín só͘ thiaⁿ-kìⁿ ê ia̍h bô thiaⁿ-tio̍h.”
42010025	Ū chi̍t ê Lu̍t-hoat-kàu-su khiā khí-lâi chhì-thàm Iâ-so͘, kóng, “Lāu-su, góa tio̍h chòe sím-mi̍h chiah ōe tit-tio̍h éng-oán ê oa̍h-miā?”
42010026	Iâ-so͘ ìn i kóng, “Lu̍t-hoat ū siá sím-mi̍h? Lí án-chóaⁿ liáu-kái?”
42010027	Hit-ê lâng ìn kóng, “Lí tio̍h choân-sim, choân-chêng, choân-le̍k, choân-ì thiàⁿ Chú --- lí ê Siōng-tè; koh tio̍h thiàⁿ chhù-piⁿ chhin-chhiūⁿ thiàⁿ ka-kī.”
42010028	Iâ-so͘ kā i kóng, “Lí ìn liáu chin tio̍h. Chiàu án-ni khì chòe chiū ōe tit-tio̍h oa̍h-miā.”
42010029	Hit-ê Lu̍t-hoat-kàu-su ūi-tio̍h beh piáu-bêng ka-kī sī tio̍h, chiū koh mn̄g Iâ-so͘, “Sím-mi̍h lâng sī góa ê chhù-piⁿ?”
42010030	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Ū chi̍t ê lâng tùi [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] lo̍h-khì [Iâ-lī-ko], tú-tio̍h kiông-tō; in pak i ê saⁿ, koh kā i phah kàu pòaⁿ-sí, jiân-āu kā i pàng hē-teh, chòe in khì.
42010031	Tú-hó ū chi̍t ê chè-si tùi hit tiâu lō͘ lo̍h-lâi, khòaⁿ-tio̍h hit-ê lâng chiū siám tùi lō͘ ê hit pêng kè-khì.
42010032	Siâng-khoán, ū chi̍t ê [Lī-bī]-lâng lâi-kàu hit-ê só͘-chāi, khòaⁿ-tio̍h hit-ê lâng mā siám tùi lō͘ ê hit pêng kè-khì.
42010033	Chóng-sī, ū chi̍t ê [Sat-má-lī-a]-lâng tùi hia keng-kè, chi̍t-ē khòaⁿ-tio̍h hit-ê lâng chiū khó-lîn i, kiâⁿ óa-khì,
42010034	ēng iû kap chiú boah i ê khang-chhùi, koh ēng pò͘ kā i pau-chat, jiân-āu kā i hû khì khiâ ka-kī ê lû-á, chhōa i khì lú-koán, kā i chiàu-kò͘.
42010035	Keh-ji̍t, i the̍h nn̄g ê gûn-á kau hō͘ lú-koán ê thâu-ke, kau-tài kóng, ‘Chhiáⁿ lí chiàu-kò͘ chit-ê lâng, nā só͘-hùi tio̍h khah chōe, góa tò-lâi ê sî ōe pó͘ lí.’ ”
42010036	Iâ-so͘ mn̄g hit-ê Lu̍t-hoat-kàu-su, “Lí siūⁿ, chit saⁿ ê lâng tó chi̍t ê sī hō͘ kiông-tō chhiúⁿ hit-ê lâng ê chhù-piⁿ?”
42010037	I ìn kóng, “Kā i lîn-bín hit-ê.” Iâ-so͘ kā i kóng, “Lí khì, chiàu án-ni khì chòe.”
42010038	Iâ-so͘ kap bûn-tô͘ kè-sio̍k kiâⁿ. Iâ-so͘ ji̍p-khì chi̍t ê chng-thâu, ū chi̍t ê hū-jîn-lâng, kiò-chòe [Má-tāi], kā I chiap-thāi.
42010039	[Má-tāi] ū chi̍t ê sió-bē, kiò-chòe [Má-lī-a], chē tī Chú ê kha-chêng thiaⁿ I ê kà-sī.
42010040	[Má-tāi] ūi-tio̍h chiap-thāi, tāi-chì chōe sim ak-chak, chiū lâi kā Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Chú ah, góa ê sió-bē pàng góa ka-kī chi̍t ê teh bong, lí ná bô iàu-kín? Kiò i lâi kā góa tàu kha-chhiú.”
42010041	Chú ìn i kóng, “[Má-tāi], [Má-tāi], lí ūi-tio̍h tāi-chì chōe teh khòa-lū chhau-hoân;
42010042	só͘ su-iàu ê chí-ū chi̍t hāng. [Má-lī-a] í-keng kéng-tio̍h siōng-hó hit hūn, bô-lâng ōe-tàng kā i chhiúⁿ-khì.”
42011001	Ū chi̍t piàn, Iâ-so͘ tī chi̍t ê só͘-chāi teh kî-tó. I kî-tó soah ê sî, ū chi̍t ê bûn-tô͘ kā I kóng, “Chú ah, [Iok-hān] ū kà i ê bûn-tô͘ kî-tó, chhiáⁿ lī mā kà goán kî-tó.”
42011002	Iâ-so͘ kā in kóng, “Lín kî-tó ê sî, tio̍h án-ni kóng: Pē ah, goān lí ê sèng-miâ siū chun-chông. Goān lí si-hêng chú-koân.
42011003	Kiû lí ta̍k ji̍t sù goán su-iàu ê chia̍h-mi̍h.
42011004	Kiû lí sià-bián goán ê chōe, in-ūi goán ka-kī mā ū sià-bián só͘-ū ko͘-hū goán ê lâng. Kiû lí m̄-thang hō͘ goán hām-lo̍h tam-tng bōe-khí ê chhì-thàm.”
42011005	Iâ-so͘ koh tùi I ê bûn-tô͘ kóng, “Lín tiong-kan ū sím-mi̍h lâng pòaⁿ-mî khì pêng-iú hia, kā i kóng, ‘Pêng-iú, chhiáⁿ lí chioh góa saⁿ tè piáⁿ,
42011006	in-ūi góa ū chi̍t ê pêng-iú lú-hêng lâi-kàu goán chia, góa bô mi̍h-kiāⁿ thang chhiáⁿ i.’
42011007	Lí ê pêng-iú ōe tùi chhù-lāi ìn kóng, ‘Mài kā góa chhá, mn̂g í-keng koaiⁿ, góa kap gín-á tī bîn-chhn̂g teh khùn lah, bōe-tàng khí-lâi the̍h hō͘ lí.’
42011008	Góa kā lí kóng, sui-jiân hit-ê lâng bōe in-ūi i sī pêng-iú khí-lâi the̍h piáⁿ hō͘ i, mā ōe in-ūi i pek-chhiat khún-kiû, khí-lâi the̍h só͘ su-iàu ê mi̍h hō͘ i.
42011009	“Só͘-í, góa kā lín kóng: Kiû, ōe tit-tio̍h; chhē, ōe chhē-tio̍h; phah-mn̂g, ōe kā lín khui.
42011010	In-ūi kiû ê, chiū tit-tio̍h; chhē ê, chiū chhē-tio̍h; phah-mn̂g ê, chiū kā i khui.
42011011	Lín tiong-kan choh lāu-pē ê, ka-kī ê kiáⁿ kā lín thó hî, kiám ōe lia̍h chôa hō͘ i?
42011012	á-sī kā lín thó nn̄g, kiám ōe lia̍h giat-á-thâng hō͘ i?
42011013	Lín sui-jiân pháiⁿ, iáu-kú ōe-hiáu the̍h hó-mi̍h hō͘ ka-kī ê kiáⁿ-jî, hô-hòng lín ê Thiⁿ-pē, I it-tēng ōe chiong Sèng Sîn sù hō͘ tùi I kî-kiû ê lâng!”
42011014	Iâ-so͘ kóaⁿ chi̍t ê é-káu-kúi; kúi chi̍t-ē chhut-khì, hit-ê bōe-kóng-ōe ê lâng chiū kóng-ōe, kûn-chiòng lóng tio̍h-kiaⁿ.
42011015	M̄-kú, kî-tiong ū lâng kóng, “I khò kúi-ông Pia̍t-se-pok kóaⁿ-kúi.”
42011016	Koh ū chi̍t-kóa lâng beh chhì-thàm Iâ-so͘, it-ti̍t iau-kiû I kiâⁿ tùi thiⁿ lâi ê sîn-jiah.
42011017	Iâ-so͘ chai-iáⁿ in teh siūⁿ sím-mi̍h, chiū kā in kóng, “Kok-ka ka-kī hun-cheng, ōe hong-hòe; ka-têng ka-kī hun-cheng, ōe tó-hoāi.
42011018	Sat-tàn nā ka-kī hun-cheng, Sat-tàn ê kok ná khiā ōe-tiâu? Lín kóng góa sī óa-khò Pia̍t-se-pok kóaⁿ-kúi.
42011019	Góa nā khò Pia̍t-se-pok kóaⁿ-kúi, lín ê chú-tē sī khò sím-mi̍h lâng kóaⁿ-kúi? Án-ni, lín ka-kī ê chú-tē ōe kā lín phòaⁿ-chōe.
42011020	Put-kò góa nā-sī khò Siōng-tè ê khùi-la̍t teh kóaⁿ-kúi, Siōng-tè ê chú-koân chiū í-keng si̍t-hiān tī lín tiong-kan.
