42011021	“Ióng-sū bú-chong choân-pī kò͘-siú ka-kī ê chhù, i ê châi-bu̍t chiū an-choân.
42011022	M̄-kú ū chi̍t ê pí i khah ióng ê lâng lâi kong-kek, phah-iâⁿ, chiū chiong i só͘ óa-khò ê bú-khì chhiúⁿ-khì, koh chiong só͘ chhiúⁿ ê châi-bu̍t pun liáu-liáu.
42011023	“Bô ūi góa ê chiū-sī hoán-tùi góa; bô kap góa chòe-hé siu-chi̍p ê chiū-sī teh phah-sòaⁿ.”
42011024	“Siâ-sîn lī-khui só͘ hū-sin ê lâng liáu-āu tī bô-chúi ê tōe-khu kiâⁿ thàu-thàu, beh chhē chi̍t ê hioh-khùn ê só͘-chāi, chhē lóng bô, chiū kóng, ‘Góa beh tńg-lâi-khì góa chhut-lâi hit keng chhù.’
42011025	I tńg-khì, khòaⁿ-tio̍h chhù-lāi sàu-kah chin chheng-khì, koh chéng-lí hó-sè.
42011026	Āu-lâi, i khì chhōa chhit ê pí i khah pháiⁿ ê siâ-sîn lâi, ji̍p-khì hia tòa. Án-ni, hit-ê lâng ê kiat-kio̍k pí khí-thâu koh-khah chhám.”
42011027	Iâ-so͘ teh kóng chiah-ê ōe ê sî, kûn-chiòng lāi-bīn ū chi̍t ê hū-jîn-lâng tōa-siaⁿ tùi Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Siⁿ lí, hō͘ lí suh-lin ê hū-jîn-lâng chin ū hok-khì!”
42011028	Put-kò Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Thiaⁿ Siōng-tè ê ōe koh chun-siú ê lâng koh-khah ū hok-khì!”
42011029	Kûn-chiòng jú-lâi jú-chōe, Iâ-so͘ chiū kóng, “Chit sè-tāi chin-chiàⁿ sī siâ-ok ê sè-tāi! In kiû sîn-jiah, tû-liáu [Iok-ná] ê sîn-jiah, bōe-koh ū sîn-jiah hō͘ in.
42011030	Tú chhin-chhiūⁿ [Iok-ná] chiâⁿ-chòe [Nî-nî-bî]-lâng ê sîn-jiah, Jîn-chú mā beh chiâⁿ-chòe chit sè-tāi ê lâng ê sîn-jiah.
42011031	Tī Sím-phòaⁿ ê sî, Lâm-hng ê lú-ông ōe kap chit sè-tāi ê lâng chòe-hé khí-lâi kā in tēng-chōe, in-ūi i ū tùi tōe ê ke̍k-thâu lâi thiaⁿ [Só͘-lô-bûn] tì-hūi ê ōe. Lín khòaⁿ, ū pí [Só͘-lô-bûn] koh-khah úi-tāi ê tī chia!
42011032	Tī Sím-phòaⁿ ê sî, [Nî-nî-bî]-lâng ōe kap chit sè-tāi ê lâng chòe-hé khí-lâi kā in tēng-chōe, in-ūi [Nî-nî-bî]-lâng thiaⁿ [Iok-ná] ê thoân-tō liáu-āu lóng hóe-kái. Lín khòaⁿ, ū pí [Iok-ná] koh-khah úi-tāi ê tī chia!”
42011033	“Bô-lâng tiám-teng hē tī lâng khòaⁿ bōe-tio̍h ê só͘-chāi, á-sī khàm tī táu-ē; it-tēng sī hē tī teng-tâi téng, thang hō͘ ji̍p-lâi ê lâng khòaⁿ-tio̍h kng.
42011034	Lí ê ba̍k-chiu sī seng-khu ê teng. Lí ê ba̍k-chiu nā kim, kui seng-khu chiū kng-bêng; lí ê ba̍k-chiu nā hoe, kui seng-khu chiū o͘-àm.
42011035	Só͘-í, tio̍h sió-sim, m̄-thang hō͘ lí lāi-bīn ê kng pìⁿ-chòe àm.
42011036	Lí kui seng-khu nā lóng kng-bêng, liân chi̍t-tiám-á o͘-àm to bô, chiū ōe chhin-chhiūⁿ teng kng-iàⁿ-iàⁿ teh kā lí chiò, oân-choân kng-bêng.”
42011037	Iâ-so͘ teh kóng chiah-ê ōe ê sî, ū chi̍t ê [Hoat-lī-sài-phài] ê lâng chhiáⁿ I chia̍h-pn̄g, I chiū ji̍p-khì chē-toh.
42011038	Hit-ê [Hoat-lī-sài-lâng] khòaⁿ-tio̍h I chia̍h-pn̄g bô seng sóe-chhiú, kám-kak chin kî-koài.
42011039	Chú chiū kā i kóng, “Lín [Hoat-lī-sài]-lâng chí-ū chiong poe kap pôaⁿ ê gōa-bīn sóe chheng-khì, m̄-kú lín ê lāi-bīn chhiong-móa tham-io̍k kap siâ-ok!
42011040	Lín chiah-ê gōng-lâng! Hit-ūi chhòng-chō gōa-bīn ê Siōng-tè kiám m̄-sī mā ū chhòng-chō lāi-bīn?
42011041	Tio̍h the̍h poe kap pôaⁿ lāi-bīn ê mi̍h-kiāⁿ khì chín-chè, án-ni lín ê it-chhè chiū lóng chheng-khì.
42011042	“Lín chiah-ê [Hoat-lī-sài-lâng] chhám à! In-ūi lín chiong po̍k-hô, ûn-hiong, kap ta̍k khoán chhài-soe hōng-hiàn cha̍p-hūn-chi̍t hō͘ Siōng-tè, m̄-kú bô tiōng-sī kong-gī kap thiàⁿ Siōng-tè. Kî-si̍t chiah-ê chiah-sī lín eng-kai si̍t-hêng ê, kî-tha ê mā m̄-thang hut-lio̍k.
42011043	“Lín chiah-ê [Hoat-lī-sài-lâng] chhám à! In-ūi lín ài tī hōe-tn̂g lāi chē tōa-ūi, tī chhī-tiûⁿ-kháu hō͘ lâng kā lín chhéng-an.
42011044	Lín chhám à! In-ūi lín chhin-chhiūⁿ khòaⁿ bōe-chhut ê bōng, lâng tùi téng-bīn kiâⁿ-kè mā m̄-chai.”
42011045	Ū chi̍t ê Lu̍t-hoat-kàu-su kā Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Lāu-su, lí kóng chiah-ê ōe mā-sī teh bú-jio̍k goán!”
42011046	Iâ-so͘ ìn i kóng, “Liân lín chiah-ê Lu̍t-hoat-kàu-su mā chhám à! In-ūi lín chiong taⁿ bô-hoat ê tāng-tàⁿ hō͘ lâng taⁿ, ka-kī liân chi̍t ki chńg-thâu-á to m̄-khéng tín-tāng lâi kiám-khin in ê tāng-tàⁿ.
42011047	Lín chhám à! Lín ê chó͘-sian thâi-sí hiah-ê sian-ti, lín kā in chō bōng.
42011048	Án-ni, lín ka-kī chèng-si̍t, mā chàn-sêng chó͘-sian só͘ chòe ê tāi-chì, in-ūi in thâi-sí sian-ti, lín kā in chō bōng.
42011049	Só͘-í, Siōng-tè ê Tì-hūi mā ū kóng, ‘Góa beh chhe sian-ti kap sù-tô͘ khì in hia, kî-tiong ū-ê ōe hō͘ in thâi-sí, ū-ê ōe hō͘ in pek-hāi.’
42011050	Án-ni, tùi chhòng-chō thiⁿ-tōe í-lâi, chiū-sī tùi [A-pek] khí ti̍t-kàu tī chè-tôaⁿ kap sèng-só͘ ê tiong-kan hō͘ lâng sat-hāi ê [Sat-ka-lī-a] ûi-chí, in só͘ lâu ê huih, chit sè-tāi ê lâng lóng tio̍h hêng. Tio̍h, góa kā lín kóng, hiah-ê chè lóng ōe kā lín chit sè-tāi ê lâng thó.
42011052	“Lín chiah-ê Lu̍t-hoat-kàu-su chhám à! In-ūi lín chiong khui tì-sek ê mn̂g ê só-sî kā lâng the̍h cháu, ka-kī m̄ ji̍p-khì, beh ji̍p-khì ê lâng, lín soah kā in chó͘-tòng!”
42011053	Iâ-so͘ tùi hia chhut-lâi ê sî, keng-ha̍k-kàu-su kap [Hoat-lī-sài-lâng] chiū ke̍k-lia̍t kā I kong-kek, pek I kóng khah chōe ōe,
42011054	tng-tán I kóng m̄-tio̍h, thang lia̍h I ê ōe-phāng.
42012001	Hit sî, ū kúi-nā chheng lâng khoeh chòe-hé, tì-kàu hō͘-siōng thún-ta̍h. Iâ-so͘ chiū seng tùi I ê bûn-tô͘ kóng, “Tio̍h tî-hông [Hoat-lī-sài-phài] ê lâng ê kàⁿ-bú, chiū-sī ké-hó.
42012002	Bô chi̍t hāng khàm-ba̍t ê sū bōe lō͘-hiān; mā bô chi̍t hāng pì-bi̍t ê sū bōe hō͘ lâng chai.
42012003	Só͘-í, lín tī àm-tiong kóng ê, ōe tī kng-bêng tiong hō͘ lâng thiaⁿ-tio̍h; lín tī pâng-keng lāi hīⁿ-khang piⁿ kóng ê, ōe hō͘ lâng tī chhù-bé téng kong-khai soan-pò͘.”
42012004	“Pêng-iú, góa kā lín kóng, hāi-sí lín ê seng-khu liáu-āu, bōe-tàng koh tùi lín chòe sím-mi̍h ê, m̄-bián kiaⁿ.
42012005	Góa beh chí-sī lín eng-kai kiaⁿ ê sī tó chi̍t ūi. Lín eng-kai kiaⁿ Siōng-tè; I hō͘ lâng sí liáu-āu, iáu ū koân thang kā lâng hiat-lo̍h tōe-ge̍k. Sī! góa kā lín kóng, tio̍h kiaⁿ Chit-ūi!
42012006	“Gō͘ chiah chhek-chiáu-á kiám m̄-sī bōe nn̄g kak gûn nā-tiāⁿ? Siōng-tè liân chi̍t chiah to bô bōe kì-tit.
42012007	Liân lín ê thâu-mn̂g to lóng ū sǹg kè. M̄-bián kiaⁿ! Lín pí kui-kûn chhek-chiáu-á koh-khah kùi-tiōng!”
42012008	“Góa kā lín kóng, tī lâng ê bīn-chêng soan-jīn góa ê, Jîn-chú tī Siōng-tè ê thiⁿ-sài bīn-chêng mā ōe jīn i.
42012009	M̄-kú tī lâng ê bīn-chêng m̄-jīn góa ê, Jîn-chú tī Siōng-tè ê thiⁿ-sài bīn-chêng mā m̄-jīn i.
42012010	“Bô-lūn sím-mi̍h lâng kóng-ōe te̍k-tùi Jîn-chú, ōe tit-tio̍h sià-bián. M̄-kú siat-to̍k Sèng Sîn ê, bōe tit-tio̍h sià-bián.
42012011	“Lín hō͘ lâng lia̍h kàu hōe-tn̂g, tī thóng-tī-chiá á-sī koaⁿ-oân bīn-chêng ê sî, m̄-bián hoân-ló tio̍h án-chóaⁿ tap-piān, á-sī tio̍h kóng sím-mi̍h.
42012012	In-ūi hit-ê sî Sèng Sîn ōe kà lín tio̍h kóng sím-mi̍h.”
42012013	Chèng-lâng ê tiong-kan ū chi̍t ê lâng kā Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Lāu-su, chhiáⁿ lí kah góa ê hiaⁿ-tī kap góa pun ke-hé.”
42012014	Iâ-so͘ kā i kóng, “Lí chit-ê lâng, siáⁿ-lâng jīm-bēng góa chòe lín ê phòaⁿ-koaⁿ á-sī kong-chhin?”
42012015	I chiū tùi chèng-lâng kóng, “Tio̍h kín-sīn, tio̍h tî-hông ta̍k khoán ê tham-sim, in-ūi lâng ê sìⁿ-miā m̄-sī chāi tī châi-sán ê chōe-chió.”
42012016	Āu-lâi Iâ-so͘ ēng chi̍t ê phì-jū kā in kóng: “Ū chi̍t ê hó-gia̍h-lâng, i ê chhân-hn̂g tōa hong-siu.
42012017	I sim-lāi siūⁿ-lâi siūⁿ-khì, kóng, ‘Góa bô kàu só͘-chāi thang tún ngó͘-kok, taⁿ beh án-chóaⁿ?’
42012018	I chiū kóng, ‘Góa tio̍h án-ni chòe. Góa beh kā chhng-khò͘ thiah khí-lâi koh khí khah tōa keng, thang lâi tún ngó͘-kok kap it-chhè ê châi-bu̍t,
42012019	jiân-āu tùi góa ka-kī kóng: ‘Eh, lí í-keng chek-chū chin chōe châi-bu̍t, ū kàu thang ēng chin chōe nî. Taⁿ chheng-êng lah, lâi lim, lâi chia̍h, lâi hióng-siū!’
42012020	M̄-kú Siōng-tè kā i kóng, ‘Gōng-lâng! Kim-mî chiū beh siu-hôe lí ê sìⁿ-miā; lí só͘ chek-chū ê it-chhè beh lâu hō͘ siáⁿ-lâng?’
42012021	Kâng-khoán, ūi-tio̍h ka-kī chek-chū châi-hù, bô hō͘ Siōng-tè khòaⁿ-chòe hó-gia̍h ê mā ōe án-ni.”
42012022	Iâ-so͘ koh tùi I ê bûn-tô͘ kóng, “Só͘-í góa kā lín kóng, m̄-thang ūi-tio̍h lín ê sìⁿ-miā beh chia̍h sím-mi̍h teh chhau-hoân; mā m̄-thang ūi-tio̍h lín ê seng-khu beh chhēng sím-mi̍h teh chhau-hoân.
42012023	In-ūi sìⁿ-miā pí chia̍h-mi̍h khah tiōng-iàu; seng-khu pí i-ho̍k khah tiōng-iàu.
42012024	Lín khòaⁿ o͘-a, in sui-jiân bô chèng-choh, bô siu-sêng, bô chhek-chhng mā bô chhng-khò͘, Siōng-tè mā teh kā in iúⁿ-chhī, lín kiám bô pí hiah-ê chiáu-á koh-khah kùi-tiōng!
42012025	Lín kiám ū lâng siūⁿ-kóng chhau-hoân ōe-tàng hō͘ ka-kī ê sìⁿ-miā ke oa̍h chi̍t-sî-á kú?
42012026	Kì-jiân liân chiah-ni̍h sòe-hāng tāi-chì to bô châi-tiāu chòe, ná-tio̍h ūi kî-tha ê sū chhau-hoân?
42012027	Lín khòaⁿ soaⁿ-iá ê hoe, in án-chóaⁿ teh tōa-châng? In bô lô-khó͘, mā bô pháng-chit. Put-kò góa kā lín kóng, liân [Só͘-lô-bûn] siōng êng-hôa ê sî chhēng ê saⁿ to bô pí chiah-ê hoe ê chi̍t lúi khah súi.
42012028	Soaⁿ-iá ê hoe-chháu kin-á-ji̍t teh oa̍h, bîn-á-chài hō͘ lâng hiat-lo̍h hé-lô͘, Siōng-tè to án-ni kā in chng-thāⁿ, I koh-khah ōe kā lín chng-thāⁿ! Lín ná chiah-ni̍h bô sìn-sim!
42012029	Só͘-í, lín m̄-thang kan-ta teh siūⁿ-beh chia̍h sím-mi̍h, lim sím-mi̍h; mā m̄-thang chhau-hoân.
42012030	Chiah-ê lóng sī chit sè-kan bô sìn ê lâng só͘ teh tui-kiû ê. Lín ê Pē chai lín ū su-iàu chiah-ê mi̍h-kiāⁿ.
42012031	Tian-tò tio̍h tāi-seng tui-kiû I chú-koân ê si̍t-hiān, chiah-ê mi̍h-kiāⁿ chiū lóng ōe sòa hō͘ lín.”
42012032	“Lín sòe-sòe ê iûⁿ-kûn ah, m̄-bián kiaⁿ, in-ūi lín ê Pē hoaⁿ-hí chiong I ê kok hō͘ lín.
42012033	Tio̍h bōe lín ê châi-sán lâi chín-chè sàn-chhiah-lâng. Tio̍h ūi-tio̍h lín ka-kī chún-pī ēng bōe phòa ê chîⁿ-tē lâi chek-chū ēng bōe liáu ê châi-pó tī thiⁿ-téng; tī hia chha̍t-á the̍h bōe-tio̍h, chiù-thâng mā kā bōe-tio̍h.
42012034	In-ūi lín ê châi-pó tī tó-ūi, lín ê sim mā ōe tī hia.”
42012035	“Saⁿ tio̍h chhēng hó-sè; teng tio̍h tiám hō͘ to̍h.
42012036	Tio̍h chhin-chhiūⁿ lô͘-po̍k teh thèng-hāu chú-lâng tùi hun-iàn tńg-lâi; chú-lâng tńg-lâi, chi̍t-ē phah-mn̂g thang sûi-sî kā i khui.
42012037	Chú-lâng tńg-lâi ê sî khòaⁿ-tio̍h lô͘-po̍k chhíⁿ-chhíⁿ, hiah-ê lô͘-po̍k chin ū hok-khì! Góa si̍t-chāi kā lín kóng, chú-lâng ōe ka-kī saⁿ chhēng hó-sè, chhiáⁿ in chē-toh, lâi kā in sū-hāu.
42012038	Chú-lâng nā tī pòaⁿ-mî á-sī thiⁿ-beh-kng ê sî tńg-lâi, khòaⁿ-tio̍h lô͘-po̍k chhíⁿ-chhíⁿ, hiah-ê lô͘-po̍k chin ū hok-khì!
42012039	Chit ke ê chú-lâng nā chai chha̍t-á sím-mi̍h sî-chūn ōe lâi, it-tēng bōe hō͘ chha̍t-á chhim-ji̍p i ê chhù.
42012040	Só͘-í, lín mā tio̍h chún-pī piān-piān, in-ūi Jîn-chú ōe tī lín siūⁿ bōe-kàu ê sî-chūn lâi-lîm.”
42012041	[Pí-tek] kóng, “Chú ah, lí chit-ê phì-jū sī tùi goán kóng, á-sī tùi chèng-lâng kóng?”
42012042	Chú kóng, “Sím-mi̍h lâng sī tiong-si̍t koh chhong-bêng ê koán-ke? Chiū-sī chú-lâng ōe kau-tài i koán-lí kî-tha ê lô͘-po̍k, chiàu-sî hun-phòe chia̍h-mi̍h hō͘ in ê hit-ê lâng.
42012043	I ê chú-lâng tńg-lâi ê sî, hō͘ i khòaⁿ-tio̍h ū chiàu án-ni chòe hit-ê lô͘-po̍k chin ū hok-khì!
42012044	Góa si̍t-chāi kā lín kóng, chú-lâng ōe phài chit-ê lô͘-po̍k koán-lí i lóng-chóng ê châi-sán.
42012045	Hit-ê lô͘-po̍k nā sim-lāi siūⁿ-kóng ‘Góa ê chú-lâng ōe khah bān tńg-lâi,’ chiū khí-chhiú phah kî-tha ê lô͘-po̍k lú-pī, ia̍h-chia̍h-ia̍h-lim, koh lim kàu chiú-chùi.
42012046	Hit-ê lô͘-po̍k ê chú-lâng ōe tī i bô àn-sǹg ê ji̍t, m̄-chai ê sî tńg-lâi. Chú-lâng ōe giâm-giâm kā i chhú-hoa̍t, kā i kap bô tiong-si̍t ê lâng khǹg chòe-tui.
42012047	“Lô͘-po̍k chai chú-lâng ê ì-sù khiok bô khì chún-pī, á-sī bô chiàu chú-lâng ê ì-sù khì chòe, i ōe hō͘ chú-lâng phah chin thiám.
42012048	Put-kò m̄-chai chú-lâng ê ì-sù khì chòe eng-kai siū chhú-hoa̍t ê tāi-chì hit-ê lô͘-po̍k ōe hō͘ chú-lâng phah khah khin. Hō͘ i khah chōe, chiū tùi i the̍h khah chōe; kau-tài i khah chōe, chiū tùi i iau-kiû khah chōe.”
42012049	“Góa lâi sī beh chiong hé hiat-lo̍h tōe-chiūⁿ, góa jōa-á-ni̍h ài hé í-keng to̍h khí-lâi!
42012050	Góa ū eng-kai siū ê sóe-lé; chit-ê sóe-lé iáu-bē siū í-chêng, góa si̍t-chāi chin kan-khó͘!
42012051	Lín siūⁿ-kóng góa lâi sī beh hō͘ tōe-chiūⁿ hô-pêng sī-bô? Góa kā lín kóng, m̄-sī, tian-tò sī hun-lia̍t.
42012052	Tùi taⁿ í-āu, chi̍t ke ū gō͘ ê lâng, in ōe hun-lia̍t, saⁿ ê tùi nn̄g ê, nn̄g ê tùi saⁿ ê.
42012053	In ōe hun-lia̍t, lāu-pē tùi hāu-siⁿ, hāu-siⁿ tùi lāu-pē; lāu-bú tùi cha-bó͘-kiáⁿ, cha-bó͘-kiáⁿ tùi lāu-bú; ta-ke tùi sim-pū, sim-pū tùi ta-ke.”
42012054	Iâ-so͘ koh kā chèng-lâng kóng, “Lín khòaⁿ-tio̍h hûn tùi sai-pêng khí-lâi ê sî, sûi-sî kóng ‘Teh-beh lo̍h-hō͘ lah’, kó-jiân chiū lo̍h-hō͘.
42012055	Thàu lâm-hong ê sî, lín kóng ‘Teh-beh sio-joa̍h lah’, chiū chin-chiàⁿ sio-joa̍h.
42012056	Ké-hó ê lâng, lín to ōe-hiáu phòaⁿ-toàn thiⁿ kap tōe ê kéng-siōng, ná bōe-hiáu phòaⁿ-toàn chit-ê sî-tāi?”
42012057	“Lín sī-án-chóaⁿ m̄ ka-kī phòaⁿ-toàn sím-mi̍h sī ha̍p-lí?
42012058	Lí kap khòng-kò lí ê lâng khì kìⁿ koaⁿ-tiúⁿ ê sî, tio̍h tī lō͘-tiong siat-hoat kap i hô-kái; nā bô, i ōe thoa lí khì kìⁿ phòaⁿ-koaⁿ, phòaⁿ-koaⁿ chiong lí kau hō͘ hoat-kéng, hoat-kéng chiū kā lí koaiⁿ-lo̍h kaⁿ.
42012059	Góa kā lí kóng, chòe-āu ê chi̍t-sián-gō͘-lî bô hêng chheng-chhó, lí choa̍t-tùi bōe-tàng tùi kaⁿ-ni̍h chhut-lâi.”
42013001	Tú hit-ê sî, ū kúi-nā ê lâng lâi, tùi Iâ-so͘ kóng-khí [Pí-lia̍p-to] thâi-sí tī chè-tôaⁿ hiàn-chè ê [Ka-lī-lī]-lâng ê tāi-chì.
42013002	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “In-ūi chiah-ê [Ka-lī-lī]-lâng siū chit khoán ê chai-lān, lín chiū siūⁿ-kóng in pí kî-tha ê [Ka-lī-lī]-lâng ū hoān khah tāng ê chōe sī-bô?
42013003	Góa kā lín kóng, m̄-sī, lín nā bô hóe-kái, lóng ōe chhin-chhiūⁿ in án-ni bia̍t-bông.
42013004	Kiám-chhái lín mā siūⁿ-kóng, [Se-lô-a] ê thah tó lo̍h-khì ê sî, hō͘ i teh-sí hit cha̍p-poeh ê lâng pí tòa tī [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] lóng-chóng ê lâng ū hoān khah tāng ê chōe.
42013005	Góa kā lín kóng, m̄-sī, lín nā bô hóe-kái, lóng ōe chhin-chhiūⁿ in án-ni bia̍t-bông.”
42013006	Āu-lâi, Iâ-so͘ kā in kóng chit-ê phì-jū. I kóng: “Ū chi̍t ê lâng tī i ê phû-tô-hn̂g chèng chi̍t châng bû-hoa-kó-chhiū. I lâi hit châng chhiū chhē ké-chí, m̄-kú khòaⁿ lóng bô.
42013007	I chiū tùi kò͘-hn̂g ê lâng kóng, ‘Lí khòaⁿ, góa liân-sòa saⁿ nî lâi chit châng bû-hoa-kó-chhiū chia chhē ké-chí, chhē lóng bô. Kā i chhò khí-lâi! Ná-tio̍h lâu-teh tìn só͘-chāi?’
42013008	Hit-ê kò͘-hn̂g-ê ìn kóng, ‘Chú-lâng ah, koh kā i lâu chi̍t nî, góa lâi ku̍t sì-piⁿ ê thô͘, koh lo̍h-pûi;
42013009	mê-nî nā ū kiat ké-chí chiū hó, nā bô, chiah kā i chhò khí-lâi.’ ”
42013010	Ū chi̍t ê An-hioh-ji̍t, Iâ-so͘ tī chi̍t ê hōe-tn̂g lāi teh kà-sī lâng.
42013011	Ū chi̍t ê hū-jîn-lâng hō͘ siâ-sîn hū-sin, phòa-pīⁿ cha̍p-poeh nî, seng-khu oan-khiau chhun bōe-ti̍t.
42013012	Iâ-so͘ chi̍t-ē khòaⁿ-tio̍h, chiū kiò i lâi, kā i kóng, “Hū-jîn-lâng, lí ê pīⁿ í-keng hó lah!”
42013013	Iâ-so͘ ēng siang chhiú kā i hōaⁿ; i ê seng-khu sûi-sî chhun-ti̍t, chiū kui êng-kng hō͘ Siōng-tè.
42013014	Put-kò hōe-tn̂g ê chú-koán, in-ūi Iâ-so͘ tī An-hioh-ji̍t kā lâng i-pīⁿ, chiū chin siū-khì, tùi chèng-lâng kóng, “Lán ū la̍k ji̍t thang chòe-kang, beh i-pīⁿ tio̍h tī chit tiong-kan lâi i, m̄ eng-kai tī An-hioh-ji̍t.”
42013015	Chú ìn kóng, “Ké-hó ê lâng, lín ta̍k ê lâng kiám bô tī An-hioh-ji̍t tùi tiâu-ni̍h tháu gû á-sī lû, khan khì lim-chúi?
42013016	Chit-ê hū-jîn-lâng sī [A-pek-la-hán] ê kiáⁿ-sun, í-keng siū Sat-tàn sok-pa̍k cha̍p-poeh nî kú, tī An-hioh-ji̍t kā i tháu-pàng kiám m̄ eng-kai?”
42013017	Iâ-so͘ kóng chiah-ê ōe ê sî, I ê tùi-te̍k lóng kám-kak kiàn-siàu; só͘-ū ê kûn-chiòng in-ūi I só͘ chòe it-chhè kî-biāu ê tāi-chì lóng chin hoaⁿ-hí.
42013018	Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Siōng-tè-kok chhin-chhiūⁿ sím-mi̍h? Góa tio̍h ēng sím-mi̍h lâi pí-phēng?
42013019	Siōng-tè-kok chhin-chhiūⁿ chi̍t lia̍p kòa-chhài-chí, ū lâng the̍h-khì iā tī ka-kī ê hn̂g-ni̍h. Kòa-chhài chiām-chiām tōa-châng, chiâⁿ-chòe chhiū, khong-tiong ê chiáu-á mā tī chhiū-ki chòe siū.”
42013020	Iâ-so͘ koh kóng, “Góa beh ēng sím-mi̍h lâi pí-phēng Siōng-tè-kok?
42013021	Siōng-tè-kok chhin-chhiūⁿ kàⁿ-bú, ū chi̍t ê hū-jîn-lâng the̍h-khì lām tī saⁿ táu mī-hún chòe-hé chhiau, chòe-āu kui-ē lóng hoat khí-lâi.”
42013022	Iâ-so͘ keng-kè siâⁿ-chhī kap chng-kha khì [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng], iân-lō͘ kà-sī lâng.
42013023	Ū lâng mn̄g I kóng, “Chú ah, ōe tit-tio̍h kiù ê lâng chin chió sī-bô?” Iâ-so͘ kā in kóng,
42013024	“Tio̍h chīn-la̍t tùi oe̍h ê mn̂g ji̍p-khì. Góa kā lín kóng, ū chin chōe lâng siūⁿ-beh ji̍p-khì ia̍h bōe-tàng ji̍p.
42013025	Chú-lâng khí-lâi koaiⁿ-mn̂g liáu-āu, lín chiah khiā tī mn̂g gōa phah-mn̂g, kóng, ‘Chú ah, kā goán khui!’ I ōe ìn kóng, ‘Góa m̄-chai lín sī tó-ūi lâi ê lâng.’
42013026	Hit sî, lín ōe kóng, ‘Goán bat kap lí chòe-hé lim-chia̍h; lí mā bat tī goán ê koe-lō͘ kà-sī.’
42013027	M̄-kú I ōe kóng, ‘Góa kā lín kóng, góa m̄-chai lín sī tó-ūi lâi ê lâng. Lín chiah-ê choh-pháiⁿ ê lâng lóng lī-khui góa!’
42013028	Lín khòaⁿ-tio̍h [A-pek-la-hán], [Í-sat], [Ngá-kok], kap it-chhè ê sian-ti tī Siōng-tè-kok ê lāi-bīn, ka-kī khiok siū kóaⁿ chhut-khì gōa-bīn, hit sî lín ōe tī hia thî-khàu, kā-gê chhiat-chhí.
42013029	Lâng ōe tùi tang-sai lâm-pak lâi, tī Siōng-tè-kok chē-toh chham-ka iàn-hōe.
42013030	Án-ni, siōng lō͘-bé-ê ōe chòe tē-it; tē-it-ê ōe chòe siōng lō͘-bé.”
42013031	Tú hit-ê sî, ū chi̍t-kóa [Hoat-lī-sài]-phài ê lâng óa-lâi kā Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Lí tio̍h lī-khui chia khì pa̍t ê só͘-chāi, in-ūi [Hi-lu̍t] siūⁿ-beh thâi lí.”
42013032	Iâ-so͘ kā in kóng, “Lín khì kā hit chiah hô͘-lî kóng, ‘Lí khòaⁿ, kin-á-ji̍t bîn-á-ji̍t góa kóaⁿ-kúi, i-pīⁿ, tē-saⁿ ji̍t oân-sêng góa ê kang-chok.
42013033	Sui-jiân sī án-ni, kin-á-ji̍t, bîn-á-ji̍t, kap āu-ji̍t, góa it-tēng tio̍h kè-sio̍k kiâⁿ góa ê lō͘, in-ūi sian-ti bô eng-kai tī [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] í-gōa ê só͘-chāi hō͘ lâng thâi-sí.’
42013034	“[Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] ah, [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] ah, lí thâi-sí sian-ti, koh ēng chio̍h-thâu tìm-sí Siōng-tè chhe lâi lí chia ê sù-chiá. Góa jōa chōe piàn ài-beh chū-chi̍p lí ê kiáⁿ-jî, chhin-chhiūⁿ koe-bú chū-chi̍p koe-á-kiáⁿ kā in áⁿ tī si̍t-kó͘-ē, lín lóng bô ài.
42013035	Lín khòaⁿ, lín ê chhù ōe hong-hòe! Góa kā lín kóng, tùi taⁿ í-āu lín choa̍t-tùi khòaⁿ bōe-tio̍h góa, ti̍t-kàu lín kóng ‘Hōng Chú ê miâ lâi Hit-ūi eng-kai tit-tio̍h chheng-chàn!’ ”
42014001	Ū chi̍t ê An-hioh-ji̍t, Iâ-so͘ khì chi̍t ê [Hoat-lī-sài]-phài ê léng-siù in tau chia̍h-pn̄g. Tāi-ke chù-ì teh kā I khòaⁿ.
42014002	Hit sî, tī I ê bīn-chêng ū chi̍t ê kó͘-tiòng-pīⁿ ê lâng.
42014003	Iâ-so͘ mn̄g Lu̍t-hoat-kàu-su kap [Hoat-lī-sài]-lâng kóng, “Tī An-hioh-ji̍t i-pīⁿ ū ha̍p-hoat bô?”
42014004	In lóng bô ìn. Iâ-so͘ chiū khan hit-ê lâng lâi, kā i i-hó, hō͘ i tńg-khì.
42014005	Jiân-āu Iâ-so͘ kā in kóng, “Lín tiong-kan kiám ū lâng ka-kī ê kiáⁿ á-sī gû tī An-hioh-ji̍t poa̍h-lo̍h kó͘-chíⁿ, i bōe sûi-sî kā i khiú khí-lâi?”
42014006	In tùi Iâ-so͘ só͘ mn̄g ê ōe lóng bōe-hiáu ìn.
42014007	Iâ-so͘ khòaⁿ-tio̍h lâng-kheh teh kéng tōa-ūi, chiū ēng chi̍t ê phì-jū kā in kóng:
42014008	“Lín hō͘ lâng chhiáⁿ khì hù hun-iàn ê sî, m̄-thang chē tōa-ūi, kiaⁿ-liáu ū pí lí khah chun-kùi ê lâng-kheh mā lâi hō͘ i chhiáⁿ.
42014009	Hit sî, chhiáⁿ i kap lí hit-ê chú-lâng ōe lâi kā lí kóng, ‘Chhiáⁿ niū-ūi hō͘ chit-ê lâng-kheh.’ Hit-chūn, lí ōe kám-kak chin pháiⁿ-sè, soah tio̍h khì chē siōng-sòe ê ūi.
42014010	Lí hō͘ lâng chhiáⁿ ê sî, lêng-khó khì chē siōng-sòe ê ūi. Án-ni, chhiáⁿ lí ê chú-lâng ōe lâi kā lí kóng, ‘Pêng-iú, chhiáⁿ lâi chē tōa-ūi.’ Hit-chūn, lí tī kâng-toh ê lâng-kheh bīn-chêng chiū ū thé-biān.
42014011	In-ūi thê-ko ka-kī ê, ōe siū kàng-kē; m̄-kú ka-kī khut-kē ê, ōe siū thê-ko.”
42014012	Jiân-āu, Iâ-so͘ mā kā chhiáⁿ I ê chú-lâng kóng, “Lí chhiáⁿ lâng chia̍h tiong-tàu-tǹg á-sī àm-tǹg ê sî, m̄-thang chhiáⁿ lí ê pêng-iú, hiaⁿ-tī, chhin-chiâⁿ, hó-gia̍h ê chhù-piⁿ, chiah-bián in kā lí chhiáⁿ tò-tńg, lí soah siū pò-tap.
42014013	Lí chhiáⁿ lâng-kheh ê sî, lêng-khó chhiáⁿ sàn-chhiah-lâng, hêng-tōng bô hong-piān ê lâng, kha-pái ê lâng, sit-bêng ê lâng.
42014014	Án-ni, lí it-tēng ōe siū chiok-hok, in-ūi in bōe-tàng kā lí pò-tap. Tī gī-lâng koh-oa̍h ê sî, Siōng-tè ōe kā lí pò-tap.”
42014015	Kâng-toh ū chi̍t ê lâng thiaⁿ-tio̍h chiah-ê ōe chiū kā Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Ōe-tàng tī Siōng-tè-kok lim-chia̍h ê lâng chin ū hok-khì!”
42014016	Iâ-so͘ kā i kóng, “Ū chi̍t ê lâng pān tōa iàn-se̍k, chhiáⁿ chin chōe lâng-kheh.
42014017	Beh khui-toh ê sî, i chhe lô͘-po̍k khì kā siū chhiáⁿ ê lâng-kheh kóng, ‘Chhiáⁿ lín lâi; ta̍k hāng lóng chún-pī hó-sè lah.’
42014018	M̄-kú in chi̍t-ê chi̍t-ê the-sî. Thâu-chi̍t ê kā i kóng, ‘Góa ū bóe chi̍t tè tōe, tio̍h khì khòaⁿ-bāi leh. Chhiáⁿ lí liōng-kái.’
42014019	Lēng-gōa chi̍t ê kóng, ‘Góa ū bóe gō͘ tùi gû, tio̍h khì chhì-ēng khòaⁿ-bāi leh. Chhiáⁿ lí liōng-kái.’
42014020	Koh chi̍t ê kóng, ‘Góa tú chhōa-bó͘, só͘-í bōe-tàng khì.’
42014021	Hit-ê lô͘-po̍k tńg-lâi kā chú-lâng pò-kò chiah-ê tāi-chì. Hit ke ê chú-lâng chiū siū-khì, kā lô͘-po̍k kóng, ‘Kóaⁿ-kín chhut-khì siâⁿ-lāi koe-thâu-hāng-bé, chhōa hiah-ê sàn-chhiah-lâng, hêng-tōng put-piān ê lâng, sit-bêng ê lâng, kha-pái ê lâng lâi.’
42014022	Hit-ê lô͘-po̍k kóng, ‘Chú-lâng, lí só͘ hoan-hù ê góa í-keng lóng ū chòe, m̄-kú iáu ū khang-ūi.’
42014023	Chú-lâng chiū kā lô͘-po̍k kóng, ‘Chhut-khì tōa-koe-sió-hāng kiông-pek lâng ji̍p-lâi, thang hō͘ góa ê chhù chē móa.
42014024	Góa kā lín kóng, seng chhiáⁿ hiah-ê lâng bô chi̍t ê ōe-tàng chia̍h góa ê iàn-se̍k.’ ”
42014025	Chi̍t tōa-tīn lâng kap Iâ-so͘ chòe-tīn kiâⁿ-lō͘, Iâ-so͘ oa̍t kè-lâi kā in kóng,
42014026	“Tè góa ê lâng nā thiàⁿ ka-kī ê pē-bú, bó͘-kiáⁿ, hiaⁿ-tī, chí-bē, sīm-chì ka-kī ê sìⁿ-miā iâⁿ-kè thiàⁿ góa, bōe-tàng chòe góa ê bûn-tô͘.
42014027	Bô giâ ka-kī ê si̍p-jī-kè lâi tè góa ê bōe-tàng chòe góa ê bûn-tô͘.
42014028	Lín tiong-kan ū lâng siūⁿ-beh khí chi̍t ê thah, kiám bô tāi-seng chē lo̍h-lâi kó͘-kè khòaⁿ ū kàu chîⁿ thang oân-sêng kang-thêng á-bô?
42014029	Nā bô án-ni chòe, i phah tōe-ki liáu-āu soah bōe-tàng oân-sêng kang-thêng, só͘-ū khòaⁿ-tio̍h ê lâng ōe kā i thí-chhiò,
42014030	kóng, ‘Chit-ê lâng ū khai-sí khí soah bōe-tàng oân-sêng!’
42014031	Á-sī, ū chi̍t ê kok-ông beh khì kap pa̍t-ê kok-ông kau-chiàn, i kiám bōe seng chē lo̍h-lâi, siūⁿ-khòaⁿ i ōe-tàng ēng chi̍t bān ê peng tí-khòng ū nn̄g bān ê peng ê kok-ông á-bōe?
42014032	Nā chai-iáⁿ bōe, i ōe thàn hit-ê kok-ông iáu tī hn̄g-hn̄g ê sî, chhe sù-chiá khì kap i kóng-hô.
42014033	Kâng-khoán, lín tiong-kan bô-lūn sím-mi̍h lâng, nā bô pàng-sak ka-kī só͘-ū ê it-chhè, bōe-tàng chòe góa ê bûn-tô͘.”
42014034	“Iâm chin ū lō͘-ēng, m̄-kú nā sit-bī, beh án-chóaⁿ hō͘ i koh kiâm?
42014035	Sit-bī ê iâm bōe-tàng lo̍h-chhân, mā bōe-tàng kauh-pûi, chí-ū hìⁿ-sak. Ū hīⁿ-khang thang thiaⁿ ê, tio̍h thiaⁿ!”
42015001	Ū chi̍t piàn, chin chōe bau̍h-sè-ê kap chōe-jîn óa-lâi Iâ-so͘ hia beh thiaⁿ I káng-tō.
42015002	[Hoat-lī-sài]-phài ê lâng kap keng-ha̍k-kàu-su ngau̍h-ngau̍h-liām, kóng, “Chit-ê lâng chiap-la̍p chōe-jîn, kap in chia̍h-pn̄g!”
42015003	Iâ-so͘ chiū kā in kóng chit-ê phì-jū:
42015004	“Lín tiong-kan sím-mi̍h lâng ū chi̍t-pah chiah iûⁿ phah-m̄-kìⁿ chi̍t chiah, i kiám bōe pàng hit káu-cha̍p-káu chiah tī khòng-iá, khì chhē phah-m̄-kìⁿ hit chiah, chhē kàu tio̍h?
42015005	Chi̍t-ē chhē-tio̍h, i chiū chin hoaⁿ-hí chiong hit chiah iûⁿ phāiⁿ tī keng-thâu.
42015006	I tńg-lâi kàu chhù, kiò pêng-iú kap chhù-piⁿ lâi, kā in kóng, ‘Lâi tàu hoaⁿ-hí, in-ūi phah-m̄-kìⁿ hit chiah iûⁿ í-keng chhē-tio̍h.’
42015007	Góa kā lín kóng, chhin-chhiūⁿ án-ni, ūi-tio̍h ū chi̍t ê hóe-kái ê chōe-jîn, pí ū káu-cha̍p-káu ê m̄-bián hóe-kái ê gī-lâng, tī thiⁿ-téng ê hoaⁿ-hí ōe koh-khah tōa.”
42015008	“Á-sī, ū chi̍t ê hū-jîn-lâng ū cha̍p ê gûn-oân, phah-m̄-kìⁿ chi̍t ê, kiám bōe tiám-teng, sàu chhù-lāi, phah-piàⁿ chhē, chhē kàu tio̍h?
42015009	Chi̍t-ē chhē-tio̍h, i chiū kiò pêng-iú kap chhù-piⁿ lâi, kā in kóng, ‘Lâi tàu hoaⁿ-hí, in-ūi phah-m̄-kìⁿ hit-ê gûn-oân í-keng chhē-tio̍h.’
42015010	Góa kā lín kóng, chhin-chhiūⁿ án-ni, Siōng-tè ê thiⁿ-sài ōe ūi-tio̍h chi̍t ê chōe-jîn hóe-kái lâi hoaⁿ-hí.”
42015011	Iâ-so͘ koh kóng: “Ū chi̍t ê lâng ū nn̄g ê kiáⁿ;
42015012	sòe-hàn-ê kā lāu-pē kóng, ‘A-pa, góa eng-kai tit ê châi-sán, chhiáⁿ lí pun hō͘ góa.’ Lāu-pē chiū chiong châi-sán pun hō͘ in nn̄g ê.
42015013	Kè bô kúi ji̍t, sòe-hàn kiáⁿ chiong só͘ tit-tio̍h choân-pō͘ ê châi-sán lóng ōaⁿ chòe hiān-kim, jiân-āu chhut-gōa khì chin hn̄g ê só͘-chāi, tī hia hòng-tōng, chîⁿ o͘-pe̍h khai.
42015014	I só͘-ū ê lóng khai liáu-liáu ê sî, tú-hó hit só͘-chāi hoat-seng tōa ki-hng, i chiah chai khiàm-kheh ê kan-khó͘.
42015015	I chiū khì hō͘ hit só͘-chāi ê chi̍t ê lâng chhiàⁿ. Hit-ê lâng kiò i khì hn̂g-ni̍h chhī-ti.
42015016	I iau-kah siūⁿ-beh the̍h ti teh chia̍h ê tāu-phoh chí-ki, m̄-kú liân che lâng mā bô hō͘ i.
42015017	“Āu-lâi, i kak-chhíⁿ, kóng, ‘Goán lāu-pē ū hiah-ni̍h chōe chhiàⁿ-kang, in lóng ū mi̍h thang chia̍h, koh chia̍h kàu ū chhun, m̄-kú góa tī chia teh-beh gō-sí.
42015018	Góa beh khí-lâi, tńg-khì góa ê lāu-pē hia, kā i kóng, ‘A-pa, góa ū tek-chōe Thiⁿ, mā ū tek-chōe lí,
42015019	í-keng bô chu-keh chòe lí ê kiáⁿ. Chhiáⁿ hō͘ góa chòe lí ê chhiàⁿ-kang chiū hó.’
42015020	I chiū chhut-hoat tńg-khì lāu-pē hia. “I lī in tau iáu chin hn̄g, lāu-pē chiū khòaⁿ-tio̍h i, sim chin m̄-kam, kóaⁿ-kín cháu óa-khì kā i lám-teh, ti̍t-ti̍t kā i chim.
42015021	Kiáⁿ chiū tùi lāu-pē kóng, ‘A-pa, góa ū tek-chōe Thiⁿ, mā ū tek-chōe lí. Góa í-keng bô chu-keh chòe lí ê kiáⁿ.’
42015022	M̄-kú, lāu-pē kā lô͘-po̍k kóng, ‘Kóaⁿ-kín hiahⁿ siōng-hó ê saⁿ lâi kā i chhēng, kā i kòa chhiú-chí, koh kā i chhēng-ôe,
42015023	sòa khan hit chiah pûi ê gû-á-kiáⁿ lâi thâi, lâi khèng-chiok.
42015024	In-ūi góa chit-ê kiáⁿ sī sí-khì ū koh-oa̍h, sit-lo̍h ū koh tit-tio̍h.’ In chiū khai-sí khèng-chiok.
42015025	“Hit sî, tōa-kiáⁿ tī hn̂g-ni̍h. I tńg-lâi, teh-beh kàu chhù ê sî thiaⁿ-tio̍h chàu-ga̍k kap thiàu-bú ê siaⁿ.
42015026	I kiò chi̍t ê lô͘-po̍k lâi mn̄g-khòaⁿ sī sím-mi̍h tāi-chì.
42015027	Hit-ê lô͘-po̍k kā i kóng, ‘Lín sió-tī tńg-lâi; lín lāu-pē in-ūi i pêng-an bô-sū tò-lâi, chiū thâi hit chiah pûi ê gû-á-kiáⁿ.’
42015028	Tōa-kiáⁿ hui-siông siū-khì, m̄ ji̍p-khì. I ê lāu-pē chhut-lâi kā i khó͘-khǹg.
42015029	M̄-kú i ìn lāu-pē kóng, ‘Lí siūⁿ-khòaⁿ leh, góa choh lô͘-châi ho̍k-sāi lí chiah-chōe nî, m̄-bat ûi-pōe lí ê bēng-lēng, lí liân chi̍t chiah soaⁿ-iûⁿ-á to m̄-bat hō͘ góa kap pêng-iú chòe-hé hoaⁿ-hí!
42015030	M̄-kú, lí chit-ê kiáⁿ ūi-tio̍h chhiong-ki kā lí ê châi-sán khai liáu-liáu, i chi̍t-ē tńg-lâi, lí chiū ūi i thâi hit chiah pûi ê gû-á-kiáⁿ.’
42015031	I ê lāu-pē ìn kóng, ‘Kiáⁿ ah, lí put-sî to kap góa chòe-hé, góa ū ê lóng sī lí ê.
42015032	Chóng-sī lí chit-ê sió-tī, i sī sí-khì ū koh-oa̍h, sit-lo̍h ū koh tit-tio̍h, lán eng-kai hoaⁿ-hoaⁿ-hí-hí lâi khèng-chiok.’ ”
42016001	Iâ-so͘ koh tùi bûn-tô͘ kóng: “Ū chi̍t ê lâng chin hó-gia̍h, i ū chi̍t ê koán-ke, ū lâng tùi chú-lâng kiám-kú chit-ê koán-ke lōng-hùi i ê châi-sán.
42016002	Chú-lâng kiò i lâi, kā i mn̄g, ‘Góa ū thiaⁿ-tio̍h lí chit-ê tāi-chì, tàu-tóe sī án-chóaⁿ? Lí só͘ koán-lí ê siàu-phō͘ kau chhut-lâi, m̄ hō͘ lí koh choh koán-ke.’
42016003	Hit-ê koán-ke ka-kī siūⁿ-kóng, ‘Chú-lâng beh kā góa sî-chit, m̄ hō͘ góa koh choh koán-ke, taⁿ góa beh án-chóaⁿ? Gia̍h tî-thâu bô khùi-la̍t, choh khit-chia̍h koh kiaⁿ kiàn-siàu.
42016004	Taⁿ, góa chai tio̍h án-chóaⁿ chòe, bô choh koán-ke í-āu chiah ū pêng-iú thang kā góa siu-liû.’
42016005	“I chiū chiong chú-lâng ê chè-bū-jîn chi̍t-ê chi̍t-ê kiò lâi. I kā thâu-chi̍t ê kóng, ‘Lí khiàm goán chú-lâng jōa chōe?’
42016006	I ìn kóng, ‘Chi̍t-pah tháng ka-ná-iû.’ Koán-ke kā i kóng, ‘Lí ê chioh-tiâu tī chia, kóaⁿ-kín chē lo̍h-lâi, kā kái-chòe gō͘-cha̍p.’
42016007	I koh kā lēng-gōa chi̍t-ê kóng, ‘Lí khiàm jōa chōe?’ I ìn kóng, ‘Chi̍t-pah chio̍h be̍h-á.’ Koán-ke kā i kóng, ‘Lí ê chioh-tiâu tī chia, kā kái-chòe poeh-cha̍p.’
42016008	“Chú-lâng po-chióng chit-ê bô láu-si̍t ê koán-ke chòe liáu chin khiáu, in-ūi sio̍k sè-kan ê lâng chhú-lí sè-sū pí sio̍k kng-bêng ê lâng khah ū piàn-khiàu.”
42016009	Iâ-so͘ kè-sio̍k kóng, “Góa kā lín kóng: Tio̍h ēng put-gī ê chîⁿ-châi ūi-tio̍h ka-kī kiat-kau pêng-iú, án-ni chîⁿ-châi bô-khì ê sî, in ōe chiap-la̍p lín ji̍p-khì éng-oán khiā-khí ê só͘-chāi.
42016010	Tùi chin sòe-hāng tāi-chì tiong-si̍t ê lâng, tùi tōa-hāng tāi-chì mā ōe tiong-si̍t; tùi chin sòe-hāng tāi-chì bô láu-si̍t ê lâng, tùi tōa-hāng tāi-chì mā bōe láu-si̍t.
42016011	Só͘-í, lín tùi put-gī ê chîⁿ-châi nā bô láu-si̍t, síaⁿ-lâng beh chiong chin-chiàⁿ ê châi-pó kau-tài lín?
42016012	Lín tùi pa̍t-lâng ê mi̍h nā bô láu-si̍t, síaⁿ-lâng beh chiong lín ê mi̍h hō͘ lín?
42016013	“Bô chi̍t ê lô͘-po̍k ōe-tàng ho̍k-sāi nn̄g ê chú-lâng; i nā m̄-sī oàn-hūn chit-ê, thiàⁿ hit-ê, chiū-sī khòaⁿ-tāng chit-ê, khòaⁿ-khin hit-ê. Lín bōe-tàng siâng-sî hok-sāi Siōng-tè koh ho̍k-sāi chîⁿ-châi.”
42016014	Hiah-ê tham-châi ê [Hoat-lī-sài]-phài ê lâng thiaⁿ-tio̍h Iâ-so͘ kóng chiah-ê ōe chiū kā I thí-chhiò.
42016015	Iâ-so͘ kā in kóng, “Lín chiah-ê lâng tī lâng ê bīn-chêng chū-chheng chòe-gī, m̄-kú Siōng-tè chai lín ê lāi-sim, in-ūi lâng khòaⁿ-chòe chun-kùi ê, tùi Siōng-tè lâi khòaⁿ sī thang iàm-ò͘ⁿ ê.
42016016	“[Mô͘-se] ê Lu̍t-hoat kap sian-ti ê kà-sī kàu Si-sóe-chiá [Iok-hān] kiat-sok. Tùi hit sî khí, Siōng-tè-kok ê hok-im chiū thoân chhut-khì, lâng-lâng lóng ngī-beh chiⁿ ji̍p-khì.
42016017	M̄-kú thiⁿ-tōe siau-sit pí hòe-tû Lu̍t-hoat ê chi̍t-u̍ih koh-khah kán-tan.
42016018	“Bô-lūn sím-mi̍h lâng, lî ka-kī ê bó͘ khì chhōa pa̍t ê hū-jîn-lâng chiū-sī hoān kan-îm; chhōa hō͘ lâng lî-hun ê hū-jîn-lâng mā-sī hoān kan-îm.”
42016019	“Ū chi̍t ê lâng chin hó-gia̍h, i chhēng chí-sek chin ko-kùi ê i-ho̍k, ta̍k ji̍t chhia-hoa iàn-lo̍k.
42016020	Koh ū chi̍t ê khit-chia̍h, miâ kiò-chòe [Lia̍p-sat-lō͘], kui seng-khu siⁿ chhng, tó tī hit-ê hó-gia̍h-lâng ê mn̂g-kháu,
42016021	beh khioh hó-gia̍h-lâng toh-téng lak lo̍h-lâi ê sap-á chí-ki; káu mā lâi chīⁿ i ê chhng.
42016022	“Āu-lâi, chit-ê khit-chia̍h sí-khì, thiⁿ-sài kā i chhōa-khì [A-pek-la-hán] ê seng-khu piⁿ. Hit-ê hó-gia̍h-lâng mā sí-khì, koh bâi-chòng.
42016023	I tī im-kan siū chin tōa ê thòng-khó͘, gia̍h-thâu khòaⁿ, khòaⁿ-tio̍h [A-pek-la-hán] tī hn̄g-hn̄g ê só͘-chāi, [Lia̍p-sat-lō͘] tī i ê seng-khu piⁿ.
42016024	I chiū chhut-siaⁿ kiò, ‘Góa ê chó͘ [A-pek-la-hán], lîn-bín góa! Chhiáⁿ lí chhe [Lia̍p-sat-lō͘] ēng chńg-thâu-á-bé ùn chúi lâi hō͘ góa ê chhùi-chi̍h liâng chi̍t-ē, in-ūi góa tī chit-ê hé-iām tiong teh siū khó͘-chhó͘.’
42016025	“M̄-kú [A-pek-la-hán] kóng, ‘Kiáⁿ ah, tio̍h ōe kì-tit lí chāi-siⁿ hióng-siū it-chhè ê khoài-lo̍k, m̄-kú [Lia̍p-sat-lō͘] chāi-siⁿ siū-chīn thòng-khó͘, I hiān-chāi tī chia tit-tio̍h an-ùi, lí tī hia teh siū khó͘-chhó͘.
42016026	M̄-nā án-ni, goán kap lín ê tiong-kan ū tōa chhim-ian keh-khui, án-ni tùi chia bô-lâng ōe-tàng kè-khì lín hia, mā bô-lâng ōe-tàng tùi lín hia kè-lâi goán chia.’
42016027	Hit-ê hó-gia̍h-lâng chiū kóng, ‘Góa ê chó͘ ah, kì-jiân sī án-ni, góa khún-kiû lí chhe [Lia̍p-sat-lō͘] khì goán lāu-pē ê chhù;
42016028	góa ū gō͘ ê hiaⁿ-tī tī hia, i thang khì kā in kéng-kò, chiah-bián in mā lâi-kàu chit-ê hui-siông thòng-khó͘ ê só͘-chāi.’
42016029	“M̄-kú [A-pek-la-hán] ìn kóng, ‘Lí ê hiaⁿ-tī ū [Mô͘-se] kap sian-ti, in eng-kai khì thiaⁿ in ê ōe.’
42016030	Hit-ê hó-gia̍h-lâng ìn kóng, ‘Góa ê chó͘ [A-pek-la-hán], in bōe lah. Nā ū lâng tùi sí-lâng tiong koh-oa̍h khì chhē in, in chiū ōe hóe-kái.’
42016031	[A-pek-la-hán] kā i kóng, ‘In nā m̄-thiaⁿ [Mô͘-se] kap sian-ti ê ōe, ū lâng tùi sí-lâng tiong koh-oa̍h, in mā bōe siong-sìn.’ ”
42017001	Iâ-so͘ koh tùi I ê bûn-tô͘ kóng, “Ín-khí lâng hoān-chōe ê sū it-tēng ū, put-kò chō-sêng chit-ê sū ê lâng chhám à!
42017002	Lêng-khó ēng tōa chio̍h-bō kā i tiàu tī ām-kún hiat-lo̍h hái, mā m̄-thang hō͘ bî-sòe ê chi̍t-ê poa̍h-tó hoān-chōe.
42017003	Lín ka-kī mā tio̍h kín-sīn! “Lí ê hiaⁿ-tī á-sī chí-bē nā hoān-chōe, tio̍h kā i chek-pī, i nā hóe-kái, tio̍h kā i sià-bián.
42017004	Nā ū lâng chi̍t ji̍t tek-chōe lí chhit piàn, chhit piàn lóng oa̍t tò-tńg lâi kā lí kóng ‘Góa hóe-kái lah’, lí mā lóng tio̍h kā i sià-bián.”
42017005	Sù-tô͘ tùi Chú kóng, “Kiû lí ke-thiⁿ goán ê sìn-sim!”
42017006	Chú kóng, “Lín nā ū chhin-chhiūⁿ kòa-chhài-chí hiah tōa ê sìn-sim, kā chit châng sng-châi-chhiū kóng, ‘Liân kun pu̍ih khí-lâi, khì chai tī hái-ni̍h,’ hit châng chhiū mā ōe ho̍k-chiông lín.
42017007	“Lín tiong-kan ū sím-mi̍h lâng, i ê lô͘-po̍k khì choh-hn̂g á-sī chhī-iûⁿ, tùi hn̂g-ni̍h tńg-lâi ê sî, kiám ōe kā lô͘-po̍k kóng ‘Kóaⁿ-kín chē lo̍h-lâi chia̍h-pn̄g’?
42017008	I kiám bōe kā i kóng ‘Kā góa chún-pī àm-tǹg; hâ ûi-kûn lâi sū-hāu góa chia̍h-pn̄g, āu-lâi lí chiah chia̍h chiah lim’?
42017009	Lô͘-po̍k chòe chú-lâng só͘ hoan-hù ê tāi-chì, chú-lâng kiám tio̍h kā i seh-siā?
42017010	Lín mā-sī án-ni, lín chòe siū kau-tài ê tāi-chì liáu-āu, tio̍h kóng ‘Goán sī bô lō͘-ēng ê lô͘-po̍k, goán put-kò chīn pún-hūn chòe nā-tiāⁿ.’ ”
42017011	Iâ-so͘ khì [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] ê lō͘-tiong, keng-kè [Sat-má-lī-a] kap [Ka-lī-lī] ê kau-kài.
42017012	I ji̍p-khì chi̍t ê chng-siā ê sî tú-tio̍h cha̍p ê bâ-hong pīⁿ-lâng. In khiā tī hn̄g-hn̄g ê só͘-chāi,
42017013	tōa-siaⁿ hoah, “Iâ-so͘ lāu-su ah, lîn-bín goán!”
42017014	Iâ-so͘ chi̍t-ē khòaⁿ-tio̍h, chiū kā in kóng, “Lín khì hō͘ chè-si kiám-cha!” In tī lō͘-tiong, chiū tit-tio̍h chheng-khì.
42017015	Kî-tiong ū chi̍t ê khòaⁿ-tio̍h ka-kī ê pīⁿ í-keng hó, chiū tò tńg-lâi tōa-siaⁿ o-ló Siōng-tè,
42017016	phak tī Iâ-so͘ ê kha-chêng, kā I kám-siā. Chit-ê sī [Sat-má-lī-a]-lâng.
42017017	Iâ-so͘ mn̄g kóng, “Kiám m̄-sī ū cha̍p ê lâng tit-tio̍h i-hó? Iáu hit káu ê tī tó-ūi?
42017018	Chit-ê gōa-cho̍k ê lâng í-gōa kiám bô-lâng tńg-lâi kám-siā Siōng-tè?”
42017019	Iâ-so͘ chiū kā hit-ê lâng kóng, “Khí-lâi, tńg-khì. Lí ê sìn-sim ū kiùi lí.”
42017020	Ū chi̍t piàn, chi̍t-kóa [Hoat-lī-sài]-phài ê lâng mn̄g Iâ-so͘, Siōng-tè-kok sím-mi̍h sî ōe lâi-lîm. Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Siōng-tè-kok ê lâi-lîm m̄-sī lâng khòaⁿ ōe chhut-lâi,
42017021	mā bô-lâng ōe-tàng kóng ‘Lí khòaⁿ, tī hia!’ á-sī kóng ‘Lí khòaⁿ, tī chia!’ in-ūi Siōng-tè-kok sī tī lín tiong-kan.”
42017022	Iâ-so͘ chiū tùi I ê bûn-tô͘ kóng, “Ji̍t-chí teh-beh kàu, lín siūⁿ-beh khòaⁿ Jîn-chú lâi-lîm ê ji̍t-chí, liân chi̍t ji̍t mā khòaⁿ bōe-tio̍h.
42017023	Ū lâng ōe kā lín kóng ‘Lí khòaⁿ, tī hia!’ á-sī kóng ‘Lí khòaⁿ, tī chia!’ M̄-thang chhut-khì, mā m̄-thang tè in khì.
42017024	Chhin-chhiūⁿ sih-nà tùi thiⁿ chit pêng sih, chiò kàu thiⁿ hit pêng, Jîn-chú tī hit ji̍t mā ōe chhin-chhiūⁿ án-ni lâi-lîm.
42017025	Put-kò, I it-tēng tio̍h seng siū chin chōe khó͘-lān, koh hō͘ chit sè-tāi ê lâng kū-choa̍t.
42017026	Jîn-chú lâi-lîm ê ji̍t-chí ōe kap [Ná-a] ê sî kâng-khoán;
42017027	hit sî lâng chiàu-siông lim-chia̍h kè-chhōa, it-ti̍t kàu [Ná-a] ji̍p-khì tōa-chûn hit ji̍t. Tōa-chúi kàu, kā in lóng siau-bia̍t.
42017028	Mā kap [Lô-tek] ê ji̍t-chí kâng-khoán, lâng chiàu-siông lim-chia̍h, bóe-bōe, chèng-choh, khí-chhù,
42017029	m̄-kú [Lô-tek] tùi [Só͘-to-má] chhut-khì hit ji̍t, tùi thiⁿ ū lo̍h hé kap liû-hông, kā in lóng siau-bia̍t.
42017030	Jîn-chú hián-hiān ê ji̍t mā ōe chhin-chhiūⁿ án-ni.
42017031	“Hit ji̍t, tī chhù-téng-ê, m̄-thang lo̍h-lâi the̍h chhù-lāi ê mi̍h-kiāⁿ; tī chhân-ni̍h-ê, mā m̄-thang tò tńg-khì.
42017032	Tio̍h ōe kì-tit [Lô-tek] ê bó͘ só͘ tú-tio̍h ê tāi-chì!
42017033	Só͘-ū siūⁿ-beh pó-chûn ka-kī sìⁿ-miā-ê, ōe sòng-sit sìⁿ-miā; só͘-ū sòng-sit ka-kī ê sìⁿ-miā-ê, ōe tit-tio̍h sìⁿ-miā.
42017034	Góa kā lín kóng, tī hit àm, ū nn̄g ê lâng khùn kâng chi̍t téng bîn-chhn̂g, chi̍t-ê ōe siū chhōa-khì, lēng-gōa chi̍t-ê ōe lâu-teh.
42017035	Ū nn̄g ê hū-jîn-lâng chòe-hé teh oe chio̍h-bō, chi̍t-ê siū chhōa-khì, chi̍t-ê lâu-teh.
42017036	Ū nn̄g ê lâng tī chhân-ni̍h, chi̍t-ê siū chiap-khì, chi̍t-ê lâu-teh.”
42017037	Bûn-tô͘ mn̄g Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Chú ah, ōe tī tó-ūi hoat-seng?” Iâ-so͘ kā in kóng, “Si-thé tī tó-ūi, thuh-thâu-eng chiū lóng ōe khîⁿ óa-khì hia.”
42018001	Iâ-so͘ koh tùi bûn-tô͘ kóng chi̍t ê phì-jū, kà-sī in tio̍h siông-siông kî-tó, m̄-thang hoe-sim.
42018002	I kóng, “Bó͘ chi̍t ê siâⁿ ū chi̍t ê phòaⁿ-koaⁿ, i bô kèng-ùi Siōng-tè, mā bô chun-tiōng lâng.
42018003	Tī hit-ê siâⁿ ū chi̍t ê kóaⁿ-hū it-ti̍t lâi chhē i, kóng, ‘Góa ū chi̍t ê sò͘-siōng ê tùi-thâu, chhiáⁿ lí thòe góa chú-chhî kong-tō.’
42018004	Chit-ê phòaⁿ-koaⁿ chin kú lóng m̄ tah-èng, āu-lâi i ka-kī siūⁿ-kóng, ‘Góa sui-jiân bô kèng-ùi Siōng-tè, mā bô chun-tiōng lâng,
42018005	m̄-kú in-ūi chit-ê kóaⁿ-hū it-ti̍t lâi kā góa chhá, góa beh thòe i chú-chhî kong-tō, chiah-bián i it-ti̍t lâi kô-kô-tîⁿ.’ ”
42018006	Chú koh kóng, “Lín tio̍h thiaⁿ chit-ê put-gī ê phòaⁿ-koaⁿ só͘ kóng ê ōe!
42018007	Siōng-tè só͘ kéng-soán ê lâng mî-ji̍t tùi I ai-kiû, I kiám bōe thòe in chú-chhî kong-tō? I kiám ōe thoa-iân chin kú?
42018008	Góa kā lín kóng, I chin kín chiū ōe thòe in chú-chhî kong-tō. Chóng-sī, Jîn-chú lâi-lîm ê sî, I tī tōe-chiūⁿ kiám ōe khòaⁿ-tio̍h chit khoán ê sìn-sim?”
42018009	Iâ-so͘ tùi hiah-ê khòaⁿ ka-kī chòe gī-lâng koh khòaⁿ-khin pa̍t-lâng ê lâng ū kóng chit-ê phì-jū:
42018010	“Ū nn̄g ê lâng chiūⁿ Sèng-tiān kî-tó; chi̍t ê sī [Hoat-lī-sài]-phài ê lâng, lēng-gōa chi̍t ê sī bau̍h-sè-ê.
42018011	[Hoat-lī-sài]-lâng khiā thêng-thêng ka-kī kî-tó kóng, ‘Siōng-tè ah, góa kám-siā lí, in-ūi góa bô chhin-chhiūⁿ kî-tha ê lâng khióng-hat-chhú-châi, put-gī, îm-loān, mā bô chhin-chhiūⁿ chit-ê bau̍h-sè-ê.
42018012	Góa chi̍t lé-pài kìm-chia̍h nn̄g piàn, koh hōng-hiàn choân-pō͘ siu-ji̍p ê cha̍p-hūn-chi̍t.’
42018013	M̄-kú hit-ê bau̍h-sè-ê khiā tī hn̄g-hn̄g ê só͘-chāi, liân gia̍h-thâu khí-lâi khòaⁿ-thiⁿ to m̄-káⁿ, chí-ū tûi-heng kóng, ‘Siōng-tè ah, lîn-bín góa chit-ê ū chōe ê lâng!’
42018014	Góa kā lín kóng, chōe tit-tio̍h sià-bián tńg-khì in tau ê sī chit-ê lâng, m̄-sī hit-ê [Hoat-lī-sài]-lâng; in-ūi thê-ko ka-kī ê, ōe siū kàng-kē; ka-kī khut-kē ê, ōe siū thê-ko.”
42018015	Ū lâng liân eⁿ-á mā chhōa lâi Iâ-so͘ hia, beh hō͘ I hōaⁿ-chhiú chiok-hok; bûn-tô͘ khòaⁿ-tio̍h chiū kā in chek-pī.
42018016	M̄-kú Iâ-so͘ kiò in lâi, kóng, “Hō͘ gín-á lâi góa chia, m̄-thang kā in chó͘-tòng, in-ūi Siōng-tè-kok sī chit khoán lâng ê.
42018017	Góa si̍t-chāi kā lín kóng, lâng nā bô chhin-chhiūⁿ gín-á án-ni chiap-siū Siōng-tè-kok, choa̍t-tùi bōe-tàng ji̍p-khì.”
42018018	Ū chi̍t ê [Iû-thài]-lâng ê léng-tō-chiá lâi mn̄g Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Hó ê lāu-su, góa tio̍h chòe sím-mi̍h chiah ōe-tàng sêng-siū éng-oán ê oa̍h-miā?”
42018019	Iâ-so͘ kā i kóng, “Lí ná-ōe kóng góa sī hó? Siōng-tè í-gōa, bô chi̍t-ê sī hó.
42018020	Chiah-ê kài-bēng lí lóng bat: ‘M̄-thang kan-îm; m̄-thang thâi-sí lâng; m̄-thang thau-the̍h; m̄-thang choh gūi-chèng; tio̍h hàu-kèng pē-bú.’ ”
42018021	Hit-ê lâng kóng, “Chiah-ê kài-bēng góa tùi sòe-hàn chiū it-ti̍t ū teh chun-siú.”
42018022	Iâ-so͘ thiaⁿ-tio̍h chiah-ê ōe, chiū kā i kóng, “Lí iáu khiàm chi̍t hāng. Khì bōe só͘-ū ê, tit-tio̍h ê chîⁿ lóng pun hō͘ sàn-chhiah-lâng, lí tī thiⁿ-téng chiū ū châi-pó, jiân-āu lâi tè góa.”
42018023	Hit-ê lâng chi̍t-ē thiaⁿ-tio̍h chiah-ê ōe, chin siong-sim, in-ūi i hui-siông hó-gia̍h.
42018024	Iâ-so͘ khòaⁿ hit-ê lâng chiū kóng, “Ū-chîⁿ-lâng ji̍p Siōng-tè-kok jōa-á-ni̍h khùn-lân!
42018025	Lo̍k-tô chhng-kè chiam-phīⁿ mā pí hó-gia̍h-lâng ji̍p Siōng-tè-kok koh-khah kán-tan!”
42018026	Thiaⁿ-tio̍h chiah-ê ōe ê lâng mn̄g I kóng, “Nā án-ni, sím-mi̍h lâng ōe-tàng tit-tio̍h kiù?”
42018027	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Lâng chòe bōe-kàu ê, Siōng-tè lóng ōe.”
42018028	[Pí-tek] kóng, “Goán í-keng pàng-sak goán só͘-ū ê lâi tè lí lah.”
42018029	Iâ-so͘ kā in kóng, “Góa si̍t-chāi kā lín kóng, lâng nā ūi-tio̍h Siōng-tè-kok pàng-sak chhù-the̍h, bó͘, hiaⁿ-tī, pē-bú á-sī kiáⁿ-jî,
42018030	tī kim-sè it-tēng ōe tit-tio̍h koh-khah chōe, tī lâi-sè tit-tio̍h éng-oán ê oa̍h-miā.”
42018031	Iâ-so͘ chhōa cha̍p-jī sù-tô͘ khì piⁿ-a, kā in kóng, “Taⁿ lán beh chiūⁿ [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng], sian-ti só͘ kì-chài koan-hē Jîn-chú ê it-chhè lóng ōe èng-giām.
42018032	I ōe siū chhut-bōe hō͘ Gōa-pang-lâng; in ōe kā I thí-chhiò, bú-jio̍k, phùi-nōa.
42018033	In ōe ēng piⁿ kā I phah, kā I hāi-sí, tē-saⁿ ji̍t I ōe koh-oa̍h.”
42018034	M̄-kú sù-tô͘ tùi chiah-ê tāi-chì lóng bô liáu-kái; chiah-ê ōe ê ì-sù ū tùi in khàm-teh, in m̄-chai Iâ-so͘ teh kóng sím-mi̍h.
42018035	Iâ-so͘ teh-beh kàu [Iâ-lī-ko] ê sî, ū chi̍t ê bông-jîn chē tī lō͘-piⁿ teh kiû-khit.
42018036	I thiaⁿ-tio̍h kûn-chiòng tùi hia keng-kè, chiū mn̄g lâng khòaⁿ sī sím-mi̍h tāi-chì.
42018037	In kā i kóng, “[Ná-sat-le̍k]-lâng Iâ-so͘ teh-beh tùi chia keng-kè.”
42018038	I chiū tōa-siaⁿ hoah, “[Tāi-pi̍t] ê Kiáⁿ Iâ-so͘ ah, lîn-bín góa!”
42018039	Tī thâu-chêng teh kiâⁿ ê lâng kā i chek-pī, kiò i tiām-tiām; m̄-kú i jú tōa-siaⁿ hoah, “[Tāi-pi̍t] ê Kiáⁿ, lîn-bín góa!”
42018040	Iâ-so͘ chiū thêng-kha, kiò lâng chhōa i lâi. I óa-lâi ê sî, Iâ-so͘ mn̄g i kóng:
42018041	“Lí ài góa kā lí chòe sím-mi̍h?” I kóng, “Chú ah, góa ài koh khòaⁿ-kìⁿ!”
42018042	Iâ-so͘ kā i kóng, “Hó, hō͘ lí koh khòaⁿ-kìⁿ! Lí ê sìn-sim hō͘ lí tit-tio̍h i-hó!”
42018043	I sûi-sî ōe-koh khòaⁿ-kìⁿ, chiū tè Iâ-so͘, kui êng-kng hō͘ Siōng-tè. Chèng-lâng khòaⁿ-tio̍h chit-ê tāi-chì, lóng chheng-chàn Siōng-tè.
42019001	Iâ-so͘ ji̍p-khì [Iâ-lī-ko], tùi hia teh keng-kè.
42019002	Tī hia ū chi̍t ê lâng miâ kiò-chòe [Sat-kai]; i sī bau̍h-sè ê thâu-lâng, chin hó-gia̍h.
42019003	I ài-beh khòaⁿ Iâ-so͘ sī sím-mi̍h khoán lâng, put-kò in-ūi lâng chin chōe, i ê sin-châi koh óe, khòaⁿ bōe-tio̍h.
42019004	I chiū cháu chìn-chêng, peh-chiūⁿ chi̍t châng sng-châi-chhiū beh khòaⁿ Iâ-so͘, in-ūi Iâ-so͘ teh-beh tùi hia keng-kè.
42019005	Iâ-so͘ kiâⁿ kàu hit-ê só͘-chāi, gia̍h-thâu khòaⁿ, tùi i kóng, “[Sat-kai], kóaⁿ-kín lo̍h-lâi, kin-á-ji̍t góa it-tēng beh tòa lín tau.”
42019006	[Sat-kai] chiū kóaⁿ-kín lo̍h-lâi, hoaⁿ-hoaⁿ hí-hí chiap-thāi Iâ-so͘.
42019007	Chèng-lâng chi̍t-ē khòaⁿ-tio̍h, ngau̍h-ngau̍h-liām kóng, “Chit-ê lâng soah ji̍p-khì chōe-jîn ê chhù tòa!”
42019008	[Sat-kai] khiā-teh, tùi Chú kóng, “Chú ah, góa beh the̍h châi-sán ê chi̍t pòaⁿ chín-chè sàn-chhiah-lâng. Góa nā ū kā lâng pián-chîⁿ, beh sì pē hêng i.”
42019009	Iâ-so͘ tùi i kóng, “Kin-á-ji̍t chín-kiù í-keng lîm-kàu chit-ê ke, in-ūi i mā-sī [A-pek-la-hán] ê kiáⁿ-sun.
42019010	Jîn-chú lâi sī beh tui-chhē koh chín-kiù sit-lo̍h ê lâng.”
42019011	Chèng-lâng teh thiaⁿ chiah-ê ōe ê sî, Iâ-so͘ koh kā in kóng chi̍t ê phì-jū, in-ūi I teh-beh kàu [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng], koh hiah-ê lâng siūⁿ-kóng Siōng-tè-kok liâm-piⁿ ōe si̍t-hiān.
42019012	Só͘-í Iâ-so͘ kā in kóng, “Ū chi̍t ê kùi-cho̍k khì chin hn̄g ê só͘-chāi beh siū hong choh-ông chiah tńg-lâi.
42019013	I tiàu-chi̍p cha̍p ê lô͘-po̍k lâi, hō͘ in cha̍p ê kim-pè, kā in kóng, ‘Góa tńg-lâi í-chêng, ēng chiah-ê kim-pè khì chòe seng-lí.’
42019014	Pún-kok ê jîn-bîn oàn-hūn i, chhe chi̍t ê sù-chiá tè i ê āu-bīn khì, chàu kóng, ‘Goán bô ài chit-ê lâng chòe goán ê ông.’
42019015	“Chit-ê kùi-cho̍k siū hong choh-ông tńg-lâi ê sî, kiò hiah-ê niá-tio̍h chîⁿ ê lô͘-po̍k lâi, ài chai in ta̍k ê lâng thàn jōa chōe.
42019016	Thâu-chi̍t ê lâi i ê bīn-chêng, kóng, ‘Chú ah, góa ū ēng lí hit-ê kim-pè thàn cha̍p ê.’
42019017	Chú-lâng kā i kóng, ‘Chin hó, hó ê lô͘-po̍k! Lí kì-jiân tī sió-sū tiong-si̍t, góa beh hō͘ lí koán-lí cha̍p ê siâⁿ.’
42019018	Tē-jī ê lâi kóng, ‘Chú ah, góa ū ēng lí hit-ê kim-pè thàn gō͘ ê.’
42019019	Chú-lâng mā án-ni kā chit-ê lâng kóng, ‘Góa beh hō͘ lí koán-lí gō͘ ê siâⁿ.’
42019020	Koh lēng-gōa chi̍t-ê lâi, kóng, ‘Chú ah, lí khòaⁿ, lí ê kim-pè tī chia. Góa ēng chhiú-kun kā i pau khí-lâi khǹg.
42019021	Góa chin kiaⁿ lí, in-ūi lí sī chi̍t ūi giâm-hat ê lâng, bô kià, lí mā beh niá, bô chèng, lí mā beh siu.’
42019022	Chú-lâng kā i kóng, ‘Lí chit-ê khó-ò͘ⁿ ê lô͘-po̍k, góa beh chiàu lí ka-kī só͘ kóng ê kā lí tēng-chōe. Lí kì-jiân chai góa sī giâm-hat ê lâng, bô kià mā beh niá, bô chèng mā beh siu,
42019023	lí ná bô chiong góa ê chîⁿ kià tī gûn-hâng, tán góa tńg-lâi ê sî thang niá bú-chîⁿ kap lī-sek?’
42019024	“Chú-lâng chiū kā khiā tī piⁿ-a ê lâng kóng, ‘Kā i ê kim-pè the̍h-lâi, kau hō͘ hit-ê ū cha̍p ê kim-pè ê!’
42019025	In chiū tùi i kóng, ‘Chú ah, i í-keng ū cha̍p ê kim-pè lah.’
42019026	Chú-lâng kóng, ‘Góa kā lín kóng, í-keng ū-ê, beh koh-khah chōe hō͘ i; bô-ê, liân i só͘-ū ê mā beh kā i the̍h-lâi.
42019027	M̄-kú hiah-ê tùi-te̍k góa, bô ài góa chòe in ê ông ê, kā in thoa lâi chia, tī góa ê bīn-chêng kā in thâi-sí!’ ”
42019028	Kóng chiah-ê ōe liáu-āu, Iâ-so͘ kiâⁿ chòe-chêng chiūⁿ [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng].
42019029	I teh-beh kàu [Ka-ná] soaⁿ soaⁿ-kha ê [Pek-hoat-kî] kap [Pek-tāi-nî] ê sî, chhe nn̄g ê bûn-tô͘,
42019030	hoan-hù in kóng, “Lín khì tùi-bīn ê chng-siā, ji̍p-khì ê sî ōe khòaⁿ-tio̍h chi̍t chiah iáu bô-lâng khiâ kè ê lû-á-kiáⁿ pa̍k tī hia. Lín kā i tháu-khui, khan lâi chia.
42019031	Nā ū lâng mn̄g ‘Lín sī án-chóaⁿ teh tháu lû-á-kiáⁿ?’ Lín tio̍h kóng, ‘Chú beh ēng i.’ ”
42019032	In chiū khì, só͘ tú-tio̍h ê tāi-chì ta̍k hāng kap Iâ-so͘ só͘ kóng ê siâng-khoán.
42019033	In teh tháu hit chiah lû-á-kiáⁿ ê sî, chú-lâng mn̄g in kóng, “Lín sī án-chóaⁿ teh tháu chit chiah lû-á-kiáⁿ?”
42019034	In ìn kóng, “Chú beh ēng i.”
42019035	In chiū khan hit chiah lû-á-kiáⁿ lâi hō͘ Iâ-so͘, chiong in ka-kī ê gōa-saⁿ phoa̍h tī lû-á téng, kā Iâ-so͘ hû-khí khiâ.
42019036	Iâ-so͘ khiâ lû-á-kiáⁿ chìn-chêng kiâⁿ ê sî, chèng-lâng chiong ka-kī ê gōa-saⁿ pho͘ tī lō͘-ni̍h kā I hoan-gêng.
42019037	Iâ-so͘ teh-beh kàu [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] beh lo̍h [Ka-ná-soaⁿ] ê só͘-chāi, kui tōa-tīn ê bûn-tô͘ in-ūi khòaⁿ-tio̍h it-chhè kî-biāu ê sū chiū lóng hoaⁿ-hí, tōa-siaⁿ o-ló Siōng-tè kóng:
42019038	Hōng Chú ê miâ lâi ê Ông eng-kai siū chheng-chàn! Goān thiⁿ-téng hô-pêng, êng-kng kui hō͘ chì-koân ê Siōng-tè!
42019039	Chèng-lâng tiong-kan, ū kúi-nā ê [Hoat-lī-sài]-phài ê lâng kā Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Lāu-su, tio̍h chek-pī lí ê bûn-tô͘!”
42019040	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Góa kā lín kóng, in nā tiām-tiām, chiah-ê chio̍h-thâu mā ōe tōa-siaⁿ hoah chhut-lâi.”
42019041	Iâ-so͘ teh-beh kàu [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng], khòaⁿ-tio̍h siâⁿ, chiū ūi-tio̍h siâⁿ ai-khàu,
42019042	kóng “Góa si̍t-chāi chin ài lí kin-á-ji̍t chai án-chóaⁿ chiah ōe kiâⁿ-ǹg hô-pêng! M̄-kú hiān-chāi tùi lí khàm-teh, hō͘ lí khòaⁿ bōe-tio̍h.
42019043	In-ūi ji̍t-chí teh-beh kàu, hit sî lí ê tùi-te̍k ōe tī lí ê chiu-ûi chō thô͘-tui pau-ûi, tùi sì-bīn kā lí kong-kek.
42019044	In ōe chiong lí kap lí siâⁿ-lāi ê jîn-bîn choân-pō͘ húi-bia̍t, bô lâu nn̄g tè chio̍h sio-tha̍h, in-ūi lí khòaⁿ bōe chhut Siōng-tè chín-kiù lí ê sî-ki.”
42019045	Iâ-so͘ ji̍p-khì Sèng-tiān, khí-chhiú kóaⁿ hiah-ê bōe mi̍h-kiāⁿ ê lâng chhut-khì.
42019046	I kā in kóng, “Sèng-keng ū kì-chài: Góa ê chhù eng-kai sī kî-tó ê tiān, lín soah kā i pìⁿ-chòe thó͘-húi-á khut.”
42019047	Iâ-so͘ ta̍k ji̍t tī Sèng-tiān kà-sī lâng. Chè-si-tiúⁿ, keng-ha̍k-kàu-su, kap jîn-bîn ê thâu-lâng it-ti̍t kè-bô͘ beh hāi-sí Iâ-so͘,
42019048	m̄-kú chhē bô hoat-tō͘, in-ūi chèng-lâng lóng chin chù-ì teh thiaⁿ I ê ōe.
42020001	Ū chi̍t ji̍t, Iâ-so͘ tī Sèng-tiān teh kà-sī lâng koh thoân hok-im. Ū chè-si-tiúⁿ, keng-ha̍k-kàu-su, kap tiúⁿ-ló chòe-hé lâi,
42020002	mn̄g I, “Kā goán kóng, lí khò sím-mi̍h koân-pèng chòe chiah-ê tāi-chì? Sím-mi̍h lâng hō͘ lí chit-ê koân-pèng?”
42020003	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Góa mā beh mn̄g lín chi̍t kù ōe. Lín kā góa ìn.
42020004	[Iok-hān] kā lâng sóe-lé ê koân-pèng sī tùi Thiⁿ á-sī tùi lâng lâi ê?”
42020005	In hō͘-siōng gī-lūn, “Lán nā kóng ‘Tùi Thiⁿ’, I ōe kóng ‘Án-ni, lín sī-án-chóaⁿ bô sìn [Iok-hān]’?
42020006	Lán nā kóng ‘Tùi lâng’, chèng-lâng ōe ēng chio̍h-thâu kā lán tìm, in-ūi in lóng sìn [Iok-hān] sī sian-ti.”
42020007	Só͘-í in ìn kóng m̄-chai tùi tó-ūi lâi.
42020008	Iâ-so͘ kā in kóng, “Án-ni, góa mā m̄ kā lín kóng góa khò sím-mi̍h koân-pèng chòe chiah-ê tāi-chì.”
42020009	Iâ-so͘ koh ēng chi̍t ê phì-jū kā chèng-lâng kóng, “Ū chi̍t ê lâng khai-khún chi̍t khu phû-tô-hn̂g. I chiong chit khu hn̂g cho͘ hō͘ tiān-lông, āu-lâi chhut-gōa chin kú.
42020010	Siu-sêng ê sî kàu, i chhe chi̍t ê lô͘-po̍k khì tiān-lông hia, beh kā in siu hn̂g-ni̍h ê ké-chí. Tiān-lông kā i phah, hō͘ i khang-chhiú tò-khì.
42020011	Chú-lâng koh chhe pa̍t ê lô͘-po̍k khì. In mā kā i phah, kā i bú-jio̍k, kóaⁿ i khang-chhiú tò-khì.
42020012	Chú-lâng chiū chhe tē-saⁿ ê lô͘-po̍k khì. In mā kā i siong-hāi, kā i kóaⁿ chhut-khì.
42020013	Āu-lâi phû-tô-hn̂g ê chú-lâng kóng, ‘Taⁿ góa tio̍h án-chóaⁿ chòe? Góa beh chhe góa só͘ thiàⁿ ê kiáⁿ khì. In tāi-khài ōe kā i chun-tiōng.’
42020014	M̄-kú tiān-lông khòaⁿ-tio̍h i, chiū chham-siông kóng, ‘Chit-ê sī i ê kè-sêng-jîn. Lán lâi kā i thâi-sí, án-ni i ê châi-sán chiū pìⁿ-chòe lán ê.’
42020015	In chiū kā i hiat chhut-khì phû-tô-hn̂g ê gōa-bīn, kā i thâi-sí. “Án-ni, phû-tô-hn̂g ê chú-lâng ōe án-chóaⁿ kā in chhú-lí?
42020016	I ōe lâi châu-bia̍t chiah-ê tiān-lông, chiong phû-tô-hn̂g cho͘ hō͘ pa̍t-lâng.” Chèng-lâng thiaⁿ-tio̍h chiah-ê ōe, chiū kóng, “Chhian-bān m̄-thang ū chit khoán tāi-chì!”
42020017	Iâ-so͘ chù-ì kā in khòaⁿ, kóng, “Sèng-keng só͘ kì-chài ê sī sím-mi̍h ì-sù: Khí-chhù sai-hū só͘ khì-sak ê chio̍h í-keng chiâⁿ-chòe siōng tiōng-iàu ê ki-chio̍h.
42020018	Só͘-ū siak lo̍h-khì hit tè chio̍h-thâu téng ê, ōe siak-kah chhùi-kut hun-si; hō͘ hit tè chio̍h-thâu teh-tio̍h ê, ōe teh-kah chhùi-kô͘-kô͘.”
42020019	Hit sî, keng-ha̍k-kàu-su kap chè-si-tiúⁿ chai-iáⁿ Iâ-so͘ kóng chit-ê phì-jū sī teh chí in, chiū siūⁿ-beh tong-tiûⁿ hē-chhiú lia̍h Iâ-so͘, put-kò kiaⁿ chèng-lâng.
42020020	Só͘-í, in chiū chhē ki-hōe, phài bi̍t-thàm ké-chòe láu-si̍t-lâng, beh lia̍h Iâ-so͘ ê ōe-phāng, chiong I kau hō͘ chóng-tok thang ēng i ê koân-pèng i-hoat pān-lí.
42020021	Chiah-ê bi̍t-thàm lâi mn̄g Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Lāu-su, goán chai lí só͘ kóng só͘ kà-sī ê lóng chin tio̍h, bô phian-sim, chí-ū tiong-si̍t kà-sī Siōng-tè ê tō-lí.
42020022	Goán la̍p-sè hō͘ [Lô-má] hông-tè [Khái-sat] ū ha̍h Lu̍t-hoat bô?”
42020023	Iâ-so͘ khòaⁿ-chhut in ê khúi-kè, chiū tùi in kóng,
42020024	“The̍h chi̍t ê gûn-pè hō͘ góa khòaⁿ. Che ū sím-mi̍h lâng ê siōng kap jī-hō?” In ìn kóng, “[Khái-sat] ê.”
42020025	Iâ-so͘ chiū tùi in kóng, “Án-ni, [Khái-sat] ê mi̍h hō͘ [Khái-sat]; Siōng-tè ê mi̍h hō͘ Siōng-tè.”
42020026	In tī kong-chiòng bīn-chêng lia̍h bōe-tio̍h Iâ-so͘ ê ōe-phāng, koh I ê ìn-tap hō͘ in chin tio̍h-kiaⁿ, chiū tiām-khì.
42020027	Ū chi̍t-kóa chú-tiuⁿ bô koh-oa̍h ê [Sat-to͘-kai]-phài ê lâng lâi Iâ-so͘ hia, mn̄g I kóng,
42020028	“Lāu-su, [Mô͘-se] só͘ siá ê Lu̍t-hoat kā goán kóng, ‘Nā ū lâng i ê hiaⁿ sí-khì, bó͘ iáu tī-teh m̄-kú bô kiáⁿ, i choh sió-tī ê tio̍h chhōa hiaⁿ-só thòe hiaⁿ thoân-chong-chiap-tāi.’
42020029	Í-chêng bat ū chhit ê hiaⁿ-tī, siōng-tōa ê chhōa-bó͘, bô kiáⁿ chiū sí-khì.
42020030	Tē-jī ê,
42020031	tē-saⁿ ê mā chhōa in hiaⁿ-só. Chhit ê lóng án-ni, bô kiáⁿ chiū sí-khì.
42020032	Āu-lâi, hit-ê hū-jîn-lâng mā sí-khì.
42020033	Án-ni, koh-oa̍h ê sî, chit-ê hū-jîn-lâng sī tó chi̍t ê lâng ê bó͘? In-ūi chit chhit-ê lóng bat chhōa i chòe bó͘.”
42020034	Iâ-so͘ kā in kóng, “Kim-sè ê lâng ū kè ū chhōa;
42020035	put-kò ōe kham-tit tùi sí-lâng tiong koh-oa̍h koh chìn-ji̍p lâi-sè ê lâng chiū bô kè bô chhōa.
42020036	In-ūi in sī koh-oa̍h ê lâng, bōe-koh sí, kap thiⁿ-sài siâng-khoán sī Siōng-tè ê kiáⁿ-jî.
42020037	Koan-hē sí-lâng koh-oa̍h ê sū, [Mô͘-se] í-keng tī ‘Teh-to̍h ê chhì-phè’ hit tōaⁿ keng-chat ū chí-bêng, mā chheng-ho͘ Chú sī [A-pek-la-hán] ê Siōng-tè, [Í-sat] ê Siōng-tè, [Ngá-kok] ê Siōng-tè.
42020038	I m̄-sī sí-lâng ê Siōng-tè, sī oa̍h-lâng ê Siōng-tè. In-ūi tùi Siōng-tè lâi khòaⁿ in lóng teh oa̍h.”
42020039	Ū kúi-nā ê keng-ha̍k-kàu-su tùi Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Lāu-su, lí kóng liáu chin hó.”
42020040	In chiū m̄-káⁿ koh kā I mn̄g sím-mi̍h.
42020041	Iâ-so͘ tùi in kóng: “Lâng ná-ōe kóng, Ki-tok sī [Tāi-pi̍t] ê hō͘-tāi?
42020042	In-ūi [Tāi-pi̍t] pún-sin tī Si-phian kóng: Chú kā góa ê Chú kóng: Lí chē góa ê chiàⁿ-pêng,
42020043	kàu góa hō͘ lí ê tùi-te̍k chòe lí ê kha-tiam.
42020044	[Tāi-pi̍t] to chheng-ho͘ Ki-tok chòe Chú, Ki-tok ná-ōe sī [Tāi-pi̍t] ê hō͘-tāi?”
42020045	Chèng-lâng teh thiaⁿ ê sî, Iâ-so͘ tùi I ê bûn-tô͘ kóng,
42020046	“Tio̍h tî-hông keng-ha̍k-kàu-su. In ài chhēng tn̂g-saⁿ kiâⁿ-lâi kiâⁿ-khì, tī chhī-tiûⁿ-kháu hō͘ lâng chhéng-an, tī hōe-tn̂g chē koân-ūi, tī iàn-hōe chē tōa-ūi.
42020047	In chhim-chiàm kóaⁿ-hū ê ke-hé, thiau-kò͘-ì kî-tó chin tn̂g. In ōe siū koh-khah tāng ê hêng-hoa̍t.”
42021001	Iâ-so͘ gia̍h-thâu khòaⁿ-tio̍h hó-gia̍h-lâng chiong in ê hiàn-kim hiàn lo̍h-khì hōng-hiàn-kūi.
42021002	I koh khòaⁿ-tio̍h chi̍t ê sàn-chhiah ê kóaⁿ-hū hiàn nn̄g ê tâng-chîⁿ-á lo̍h-khì.
42021003	Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Góa si̍t-chāi kā lín kóng, chit-ê sàn-chhiah kóaⁿ-hū hiàn ji̍p-khì ê pí chèng-lâng hiàn ê koh-khah chōe.
42021004	In-ūi in lóng sī hiàn ēng chhun-ê, m̄-kú chit-ê kóaⁿ-hū sui-jiân chin sàn-chhiah, iáu-kú the̍h só͘-ū ê seng-oa̍h-hùi lóng hiàn lo̍h-khì.”
42021005	Ū lâng teh tâm-lūn Sèng-tiān sī ēng hó chio̍h kap hōng-hiàn ê mi̍h lâi chong-sek ê. Iâ-so͘ kóng,
42021006	“Ji̍t-chí teh-beh kàu, lín teh khòaⁿ ê chiah-ê it-chhè lóng ōe siū thiah-húi, thiah-kah bô chi̍t tè ōe tha̍h tī pa̍t tè téng-bīn.”
42021007	Bûn-tô͘ mn̄g Iâ-so͘, “Lāu-su, chit-ê tāi-chì sím-mi̍h sî ōe hoat-seng? Chit-ê tāi-chì beh hoat-seng ê sî ū sím-mi̍h tiāu-thâu?”
42021008	Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Tio̍h kín-sīn, m̄-thang siū bê-he̍k. In-ūi ū chin chōe lâng ōe lī-iōng góa ê miâ lâi, kóng ‘Góa chiū-sī Ki-tok’, koh kóng ‘Sî-ki teh-beh kàu lah’. Lín m̄-thang tè in khì.
42021009	Lín thiaⁿ-tio̍h chiàn-cheng kap pō-loān ê siau-sit, m̄-bián kiaⁿ-hiâⁿ. Chiah-ê tāi-chì it-tēng ōe tāi-seng hoat-seng, m̄-kú chiong-kio̍k bōe sûi-sî kàu.”
42021010	Iâ-so͘ kè-sio̍k kā in kóng, “Bîn-cho̍k ōe khí-lâi kong-kek bîn-cho̍k, kok-ka kong-kek kok-ka.
42021011	Ū tōa tōe-tāng, chin chōe só͘-chāi ū ki-hng kap un-e̍k, koh ū thang kiaⁿ ê kéng-siōng kap tōa kî-chek tùi thiⁿ-téng chhut-hiān.
42021012	Chiah-ê tāi-chì hoat-seng í-chêng, lâng ōe lia̍h lín, pek-hāi lín, kā lín kau hō͘ hōe-tn̂g kap kaⁿ-ga̍k. Lín ōe ūi-tio̍h góa ê iân-kò͘ hō͘ lâng lia̍h-khì kun-ông kap chóng-tok ê bīn-chêng.
42021013	Chit-ê sī lín chòe kiàn-chèng ê ki-hōe.
42021014	Só͘-í, lín ê sim tio̍h lia̍h hō͘ tiāⁿ, m̄-bián seng siūⁿ-beh án-chóaⁿ piān-bêng.
42021015	In-ūi góa beh sù lín kháu-châi kap tì-hūi, hō͘ lín ê tùi-te̍k bô chi̍t ê ōe-tàng tùi-khòng á-sī hoán-pok.
42021016	Liân lín ê pē-bú, hiaⁿ-tī, chhin-chiâⁿ, kap pêng-iú mā ōe kā lín chhut-bōe; lín tiong-kan ū lâng ōe hō͘ in hāi-sí.
42021017	Lín ōe in-ūi góa ê miâ hō͘ chèng-lâng oàn-hūn.
42021018	Put-kò lín liân chi̍t ki thâu-mn̂g to bōe sit-lo̍h.
42021019	Tio̍h jím-nāi chiah ōe tit-tio̍h sìⁿ-miā.”
42021020	“Lín khòaⁿ-tio̍h [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] hō͘ kun-tūi pau-ûi ê sî, chiū chai chit-ê siâⁿ teh-beh húi-bia̍t lah.
42021021	Hit sî, tī [Iû-thài] ê lâng tio̍h tô-cháu khì soaⁿ-lāi; tī siâⁿ-lāi ê lâng tio̍h lī-khui; tī chng-kha ê lâng m̄-thang ji̍p siâⁿ.
42021022	In-ūi che sī Pò-èng ê Ji̍t-chí, sī beh èng-giām Sèng-keng só͘ kì-chài ê it-chhè.
42021023	Tī hiah-ê ji̍t-chí, ū sin-īn ê kap hō͘ eⁿ-á chia̍h-lin ê hū-jîn-lâng hui-siông put-hēng! In-ūi tōa chai-hō teh-beh lîm-kàu chit-ê tōe; Siōng-tè ê tōa siū-khì teh-beh lîm-kàu chit-ê peh-sìⁿ.
42021024	In ōe hō͘ to-kiàm thâi-sí, mā ōe hō͘ lâng lia̍h-khì ta̍k kok. [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] ōe hō͘ Gōa-pang-lâng thún-ta̍h, ti̍t-kàu Gōa-pang-lâng ê kî-hān móa.”
42021025	“Ji̍t, ge̍h, chhiⁿ lóng ōe hián-chhut tiāu-thâu. Tōe-chiūⁿ bān-bîn ōe in-ūi hái-éng hōa-hōa-háu kiaⁿ-hiâⁿ put-an.
42021026	Lâng ōe in-ūi chit sè-kài teh-beh hoat-seng ê tāi-chì kiaⁿ-kah hūn-khì, in-ūi thiⁿ-téng ê kng-thé lóng ōe iô-choah.
42021027	Hit sî, lâng ōe khòaⁿ-kìⁿ Jîn-chú chhiong-móa koân-lêng kap tōa êng-kng chē hûn lâi-lîm.
42021028	Chiah-ê tāi-chì teh-beh hoat-seng ê sî, lín tio̍h gia̍h-thâu théng-sin, in-ūi lín ê chín-kiù teh-beh kàu lah.”
42021029	Iâ-so͘ koh ēng phì-jū kā in kóng, “Lín khòaⁿ bû-hoa-kó-chhiū kap it-chhè ê chhiū.
42021030	Lín khòaⁿ-tio̍h chiah-ê chhiū puh-íⁿ ê sî chiū chai hē-thiⁿ teh-beh kàu.
42021031	Chhin-chhiūⁿ án-ni, lín khòaⁿ-tio̍h chiah-ê tāi-chì hoat-seng ê sî chiū chai Siōng-tè ê chú-koân teh-beh si̍t-hiān.
42021032	Góa si̍t-chāi kā lín kóng, chit sè-tāi iáu-bē kè-khì, chiah-ê tāi-chì lóng ōe hoat-seng.
42021033	Thiⁿ kap tōe ōe siau-sit, m̄-kú góa ê ōe choa̍t-tùi bōe siau-sit.”
42021034	“Lín ka-kī tio̍h kín-sīn, chiah-bián in-ūi tham-chia̍h, chiú-chùi, kap seng-oa̍h ê khòa-lū hō͘ lín ê sim bâ-pì, tì-kàu hit Ji̍t chhin-chhiūⁿ lô-bāng hut-jiân lîm-kàu lín, in-ūi hit Ji̍t ōe lîm-kàu tòa tī choân sè-kài ta̍k só͘-chāi ê lâng.
42021036	Tio̍h put-sî kéng-séng, kî-tó, hō͘ lín ū khùi-la̍t thang tô-pī it-chhè teh-beh hoat-seng ê tāi-chì, thang khiā tī Jîn-chú ê bīn-chêng.”
42021037	Chit kúi ji̍t, Iâ-so͘ ji̍t-sî lóng tī Sèng-tiān kà-sī lâng, mî-sî chhut-siâⁿ khì [Ka-ná-soaⁿ] kè-mî.
42021038	Chèng-lâng lóng thàu-chá chiū khì Sèng-tiān thiaⁿ Iâ-so͘ kóng tō-lí.
42022001	Tû-kàⁿ-choeh, iā kiò-chòe Pôaⁿ-kè-choeh, teh-beh kàu.
42022002	Chè-si-tiúⁿ kap keng-ha̍k-kàu-su in-ūi kiaⁿ bîn-chiòng, só͘-í teh chhē-khòaⁿ ū sím-mi̍h hoat-tō͘ thang hāi-sí Iâ-so͘.
42022003	Sat-tàn ji̍p-khì hit-ê kiò-chòe [Í-su-ka-lio̍k] ê [Iû-tāi] ê sim-lāi; i sī cha̍p-jī sù-tô͘ ê chi̍t ê.
42022004	I khì kap chè-si-tiúⁿ í-ki̍p Sèng-tiān ê siú-ōe-koaⁿ chham-siông, khòaⁿ-beh ēng sím-mi̍h hoat-tō͘ chiong Iâ-so͘ chhut-bōe hō͘ in.
42022005	In chin hoaⁿ-hí, iok beh hō͘ i chîⁿ.
42022006	[Iû-tāi] tông-ì, chiū it-ti̍t teh chhē ki-hōe, thang tī kûn-chiòng bô tī in tiong-kan ê sî chhut-bōe Iâ-so͘.
42022007	Tû-kàⁿ-choeh, chiū-sī tio̍h thâi Pôaⁿ-kè-choeh ê iûⁿ-ko ê ji̍t, kàu lah.
42022008	Iâ-so͘ chhe [Pí-tek] kap [Iok-hān], kā in kóng, “Lín khì chún-pī Pôaⁿ-kè-choeh ê boán-chhan, lán thang chia̍h.”
42022009	In kā I mn̄g, “Lí ài goán tī tó-ūi chún-pī?”
42022010	Iâ-so͘ kā in kóng, “Lín ji̍p-khì siâⁿ-lāi, ōe tú-tio̍h chi̍t ê lâng the̍h chúi-pân, lín tè i khì i beh ji̍p-khì hit keng chhù,
42022011	kā hit ke ê chú-lâng kóng, ‘Lāu-su teh mn̄g, I kap I ê bûn-tô͘ beh chia̍h Pôaⁿ-kè-choeh boán-chhan ê kheh-thiaⁿ tī tó-ūi?’
42022012	Hit-ê lâng ōe pò lín khòaⁿ lâu-téng chi̍t keng khoán hó-sè ê tōa-thiaⁿ. Lín chiū tī hia chún-pī.”
42022013	In khì, khòaⁿ-tio̍h ta̍k hāng kap Iâ-so͘ kā in kóng ê lóng siâng-khoán; in chiū tī hia chún-pī Pôaⁿ-kè-choeh ê boán-chhan.
42022014	Boán-chhan ê sî-kan kàu, Iâ-so͘ chiū chē-toh, sù-tô͘ kap I chòe-hé chē.
42022015	Iâ-so͘ kā in kóng, “Góa siū-lān í-chêng chin ài kap lín chia̍h chit-ê Pôaⁿ-kè-choeh ê boán-chhan.
42022016	Góa kā lín kóng, chit-ê Boán-chhan tī Siōng-tè-kok oân-choân si̍t-hiān í-chêng, góa choa̍t-tùi bōe-koh chia̍h.”
42022017	Iâ-so͘ chiong poe chiap kè-lâi, kám-siā liáu-āu, kóng, “Lín phâng chit-ê poe, pun hō͘ tāi-ke lim.
42022018	Góa kā lín kóng, tùi hiān-chāi khí ti̍t-kàu Siōng-tè-kok lâi-lîm, góa choa̍t-tùi bōe-koh lim chit-ê phû-tô-chiú.”
42022019	Jiân-āu Iâ-so͘ the̍h piáⁿ, kám-siā liáu-āu peh-khui, the̍h hō͘ in kóng, “Chit-ê sī góa ê seng-khu, sī ūi-tio̍h lín lâi hiàn ê. Lín tio̍h chòe chit-ê lâi kì-liām góa.”
42022020	Chia̍h liáu-āu I koh chiàu án-ni phâng poe, kóng, “Chit-ê poe sī sin ê iok, ēng góa ūi-tio̍h lín lâu-chhut ê huih lâi siat-li̍p ê.
42022021	“Lín khòaⁿ! Chhut-bōe góa hit-ê lâng chit-chūn kap góa chòe-hé chhun-chhiú tī toh-téng.
42022022	In-ūi Jîn-chú ōe chiàu Siōng-tè ê koat-tēng lī-khui sè-kan; m̄-kú chhut-bōe Jîn-chú hit-ê lâng chhám à!”
42022023	In chiū mn̄g-lâi mn̄g-khì, ài chai in tiong-kan sím-mi̍h lâng ōe chòe chit-ê tāi-chì.
42022024	Bûn-tô͘ tiong-kan ū khí cheng-lūn, khòaⁿ sím-mi̍h lâng sǹg siōng-tōa.
42022025	Iâ-so͘ kā in kóng, “Gōa-pang-lâng ê kun-ông choh-chú koán-hat peh-sìⁿ; thóng-tī-chiá hō͘ lâng chheng-chòe un-chú.
42022026	Chóng-sī lín m̄-sī án-ni! Lín tiong-kan siōng-tōa-ê tian-tò tio̍h chiâⁿ-chòe siōng-sòe-ê; choh léng-siù-ê tio̍h chiâⁿ-chòe ho̍k-sāi-ê.
42022027	Án-ni, sím-mi̍h lâng khah tōa? Sī chē-toh chia̍h-pn̄g-ê á-sī ho̍k-sāi-ê? Kiám m̄-sī chē-toh-ê? M̄-kú góa tī lín tiong-kan sī hit-ê ho̍k-sāi-ê.
42022028	“Lín chiah-ê lâng tī góa ê chhì-liān tiong it-ti̍t kap góa chòe-hé.
42022029	Góa ê Pē chiong ông ê koân-pèng sù hō͘ góa, góa mā án-ni chiong ông ê koân-pèng sù hō͘ lín,
42022030	hō͘ lín thang tī góa ê Kok-tō͘ kap góa chē-toh, lim-chia̍h, koh chē tī pó-chō sím-phòaⁿ [Í-sek-lia̍t] ê cha̍p-jī chi-cho̍k.”
42022031	Iâ-so͘ koh kóng, “[Se-bûn], [Se-bûn], Sat-tàn í-keng tùi Siōng-tè iau-kiû beh chhin-chhiūⁿ pòa be̍h-á án-ni kā lín pòa.
42022032	Put-kò góa ū ūi-tio̍h lí kî-tó, hō͘ lí bōe sit-khì sìn-sim. Lí hôe-thâu tńg-lâi liáu-āu, tio̍h kian-kò͘ lí ê hiaⁿ-tī ê sìn-sim.”
42022033	[Pí-tek] ìn I kóng, “Chú ah, góa í-keng chún-pī piān-piān beh kap lí chē-kaⁿ, kap lí chòe-hé sí!”
42022034	Iâ-so͘ kā i kóng, “[Pí-tek], góa kā lí kóng, kin-á-ji̍t koe thî í-chêng, lí ōe saⁿ pái m̄-jīn góa.”
42022035	Iâ-so͘ koh kā bûn-tô͘ kóng, “Í-chêng góa chhe lín chhut-khì, kiò lín chîⁿ-tē, lú-hêng-tē, kap ôe lóng bián tòa, lín kiám ū khiàm sím-mi̍h?” In ìn kóng, “Lóng bô.”
42022036	I chiū kā in kóng, “M̄-kú hiān-chāi, ū chîⁿ-tē ê tio̍h tòa-leh; ū lú-hêng-tē ê mā tio̍h tòa-leh; bô to-ê tio̍h bōe ka-kī ê gōa-saⁿ khì bóe.
42022037	In-ūi góa kā lín kóng, Sèng-keng kì-chài, ‘I hō͘ lâng sǹg-chòe put-hoat ê lâng’ chit kù ōe it-tēng tio̍h tī góa ê sin-chiūⁿ èng-giām. Sèng-keng kì-chài koan-hē góa ê tāi-chì í-keng teh èng-giām lah.”
42022038	Bûn-tô͘ kóng, “Chú ah, lí khòaⁿ, chia ū nn̄g ki to.” Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Kàu-gia̍h lah!”
42022039	Iâ-so͘ chhut-khì, chiàu-siông khì [Ka-ná-soaⁿ]; bûn-tô͘ tè I khì.
42022040	Kàu hit-ê só͘-chāi, I kā in kóng, “Tio̍h kî-tó chiah bōe hām-lo̍h chhì-thàm.”
42022041	Jiân-āu I lī-khui in kàu hiat chio̍h-thâu ōe kàu hiah hn̄g ê só͘-chāi, kūi lo̍h-khì kî-tó,
42022042	kóng, “Pē ah, lí nā khéng, kiû lí chiong chit-ê poe kā góa the̍h khui! Chóng-sī m̄-thang chiàu góa ê ì-sù, tio̍h chiàu lí ê chí-ì si̍t-hiān.”
42022043	Ū chi̍t ê thiⁿ-sài tùi thiⁿ chhut-hiān, lâi chān I ê la̍t.
42022044	Iâ-so͘ hui-siông thòng-khó͘, jú jia̍t-chhiat kî-tó; I ê kōaⁿ chhin-chhiūⁿ tōa tiám huih tih-lo̍h tōe.
42022045	Kî-tó soah, Iâ-so͘ khiā khí-lâi, tò-khì bûn-tô͘ hia, khòaⁿ-tio̍h in in-ūi iu-siong soah khùn-khì.
42022046	I chiū kā in kóng, “Lín ná teh khùn? Khí-lâi kî-tó chiah bōe hām-lo̍h chhì-thàm.”
42022047	Iâ-so͘ iáu teh kóng-ōe ê sî, hut-jiân ū chi̍t tīn lâng lâi; cha̍p-jī sù-tô͘ ê chi̍t ê, kiò-chòe [Iû-tāi] ê, chòe-chêng chhōa-lō͘. I kiâⁿ-óa Iâ-so͘, beh kā i chim.
42022048	Iâ-so͘ kā i kóng, “[Iû-tāi], lí ēng chim-chhùi lâi chhut-bōe Jîn-chú ò͘?”
42022049	Iâ-so͘ sin-piⁿ ê bûn-tô͘ khòaⁿ-tio̍h teh hoat-seng ê tāi-chì, chiū kóng, “Chú ah, goán ēng to kā in thâi hó-bô?”
42022050	Kî-tiong ū chi̍t ê kā tōa-chè-si ê lô͘-po̍k phut lo̍h-khì, kā i chiàⁿ-pêng ê hī-á siah khí-lâi.
42022051	Iâ-so͘ kóng, “M̄-thang koh tāng-chhiú!” Iâ-so͘ bong hit-ê lô͘-po̍k ê hī-á, kā i i-hó.
42022052	Iâ-so͘ kā hiah-ê lâi beh lia̍h I ê chè-si-tiúⁿ, Sèng-tiān ê kéng-ōe-tiúⁿ, kap tiúⁿ-ló kóng, “Lín gia̍h-to gia̍h-kùn chhut-lâi, sī teh lia̍h kiông-tō sī-bô?
42022053	Góa ta̍k ji̍t kap lín tī Sèng-tiān, lín bô hē-chhiú kā góa lia̍h. Che sī lín ê sî, o͘-àm teh chiáng-koân lah.”
42022054	In lia̍h Iâ-so͘, ah I ji̍p-khì tōa-chè-si ê kong-koán. [Pí-tek] lī hn̄g-hn̄g teh tè Iâ-so͘.
42022055	In tī tiâⁿ ê tiong-ng khí hé, ûi tī hé piⁿ chòe-hé teh chē; [Pí-tek] mā chē tī in tiong-kan.
42022056	Ū chi̍t ê lú-pī khòaⁿ-tio̍h [Pí-tek] ǹg hé teh chē, kim-kim kā i siòng, kóng, “Chit-ê mā-sī Iâ-so͘ in hit tīn ê lâng.”
42022057	[Pí-tek] m̄-jīn, kóng, “Góa m̄-bat I.”
42022058	Kè bô jōa kú, lēng-gōa chi̍t ê lâng khòaⁿ-tio̍h i, kóng, “Lí mā-sī in hit tīn ê lâng.” [Pí-tek] kóng, “Góa m̄-sī!”
42022059	Chha-put-to kè chi̍t tiám-cheng, koh ū chi̍t ê lâng kian-chhî kóng, “Chit-ê lâng khak-si̍t mā ū teh kap Iâ-so͘ chòe-hé, in-ūi i sī [Ka-lī-lī]-lâng.”
42022060	M̄-kú [Pí-tek] kóng, “M̄-sī, góa m̄-chai lí teh kóng sím-mi̍h!” I iáu teh kóng ê sî, koe sûi-sî thî.
42022061	Hit sî Chú oa̍t-thâu khòaⁿ [Pí-tek], [Pí-tek] chiū siūⁿ-khí Chú tùi i só͘ kóng ê ōe, “Kin-á-ji̍t koe thî í-chêng, lí ōe saⁿ pái m̄-jīn góa.”
42022062	I chiū chhut-khì gōa-bīn tōa-siaⁿ thî-khàu.
42022063	Hiah-ê khàn-siú Iâ-so͘ ê lâng kā I hì-lāng, koh kā I phah.
42022064	In ng I ê ba̍k-chiu, mn̄g I kóng, “Sian-ti, lí kā goán kóng, siáⁿ-lâng kā lí phah?”
42022065	In koh kóng chin chōe ōe kā I bú-jio̍k.
42022066	Thiⁿ-kng, [Iû-thài]-lâng ê tiúⁿ-ló, chè-si-tiúⁿ, kap keng-ha̍k-kàu-su chū-chi̍p. In kā Iâ-so͘ ah khì in ê gī-hōe,
42022067	kā I kóng, “Lí nā-sī Ki-tok, tio̍h kā goán kóng.” Iâ-so͘ kā in kóng, “Góa nā kā lín kóng, lín mā m̄-sìn.
42022068	Góa mn̄g lín, lín mā m̄ ìn.
42022069	Tùi hiān-chāi khí, Jîn-chú ōe chē tī Choân-lêng Siōng-tè ê chiàⁿ-pêng.”
42022070	Chèng-lâng kóng, “Án-ni lí chiū-sī Siōng-tè ê Kiáⁿ lò͘?” Iâ-so͘ ìn in kóng, “Góa sī, sī lín kóng ê.”
42022071	In chiū kóng, “Lán iáu su-iàu sím-mi̍h chèng-kù? Lán í-keng ū thiaⁿ-tio̍h I chhin-chhùi kóng lah!”
42023001	Choân-thé gī-oân lóng khiā khí-lâi, ah Iâ-so͘ khì [Pí-lia̍p-to] bīn-chêng.
42023002	In chiū khòng-kò kóng, “Goán ū khòaⁿ-tio̍h chit-ê lâng teh bê-he̍k goán ê bîn-cho̍k, kìm-chí lâng la̍p-sè hō͘ Khái-sat, koh chū-chheng sī Ki-tok, sī Ông.”
42023003	[Pí-lia̍p-to] mn̄g Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Lí sī ‘[Iû-thài]-lâng ê Ông’ sī-bô?” Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Che sī lí kóng ê.”
42023004	[Pí-lia̍p-to] chiū tùi hiah-ê chè-si-tiúⁿ kap kûn-chiòng kóng, “Góa chhâ bōe chhut chit-ê lâng ū sím-mi̍h chōe.”
42023005	M̄-kú in kian-chhî kóng, “I tùi [Ka-lī-lī] kàu chia, tī [Iû-thài] choân-tōe kà-sī lâng, siàn-tōng bîn-chiòng.”
42023006	[Pí-lia̍p-to] chi̍t-ē thiaⁿ-tio̍h, chiū mn̄g khòaⁿ chit-ê lâng sī [Ka-lī-lī]-lâng á m̄-sī.
42023007	I chi̍t-ē chai Iâ-so͘ sio̍k [Hi-lu̍t]-ông ê koán-hat, chiū kā I sàng khì [Hi-lu̍t] hia; hit sî [Hi-lu̍t] pún-lâng mā tī [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng].
42023008	[Hi-lu̍t] khòaⁿ-tio̍h Iâ-so͘, hui-siông hoaⁿ-hí, in-ūi i bat thiaⁿ-tio̍h Iâ-so͘ ê tāi-chì, it-ti̍t ài-beh kìⁿ I, koh ǹg-bāng ōe-tàng khòaⁿ-tio̍h I kiâⁿ sîn-jia̍h.
42023009	I mn̄g Iâ-so͘ chin chōe tāi-chì, Iâ-so͘ lóng bô ìn i.
42023010	Chè-si-tiúⁿ kap keng-ha̍k-kàu-su khiā khí-lâi, kek-lia̍t kā I khòng-kò.
42023011	[Hi-lu̍t] kap i ê peng mā kā I bú-jio̍k, hì-lāng, jiân-āu koh kā I chhēng chi̍t niá chin súi ê tn̂g-phàu, chiah kā I sàng tńg-khì hō͘ [Pí-lia̍p-to].
42023012	[Hi-lu̍t] kap [Pí-lia̍p-to] pún-lâi ū oan-siû, tī hit chi̍t ji̍t soah pìⁿ-chòe pêng-iú.
42023013	[Pí-lia̍p-to] tiàu-chi̍p chè-si-tiúⁿ, koaⁿ-oân, kap bîn-chiòng lâi,
42023014	kā in kóng, “Lín ah chit-ê lâng lâi góa chia, khòng-kò I siàn-tōng bîn-chiòng. Taⁿ góa tī lín ê bīn-chêng ū kā I sím-mn̄g, chhâ lóng bô lín só͘ khòng-kò ê chōe.
42023015	[Hi-lu̍t] mā jīn-tēng I bô-chōe chiah chiong I sàng tò-lâi lán chia. Khó-kiàn I bô chòe sím-mi̍h kai-sí ê tāi-chì.
42023016	Só͘-í, góa beh ēng piⁿ kā I kà-sī chi̍t-ē, chiah pàng I khì.”
42023017	Ta̍k nî ê Pôaⁿ-kè-choeh, chóng-tok tio̍h chiàu peh-sìⁿ ê iau-kiû pàng chi̍t ê hoān-lâng hō͘ in.
42023018	Kûn-chiòng lóng hoah, “Chit-ê lâng tio̍h hō͘ I sí! Pàng [Pa-lia̍p-pa] hō͘ goán.”
42023019	Chit-ê [Pa-lia̍p-pa] in-ūi tī siâⁿ-lāi chok-loān koh thâi-lâng chiah siū koaiⁿ-kaⁿ.
42023020	[Pí-lia̍p-to] siūⁿ-beh pàng Iâ-so͘, chiū koh sòe-ho̍k chèng-lâng.
42023021	M̄-kú in tōa-siaⁿ hoah, “Kā tèng si̍p-jī-kè! Kā tèng si̍p-jī-kè!”
42023022	[Pí-lia̍p-to] tē-saⁿ piàn tùi in kóng, “Sī-án-chóaⁿ? I ū chòe sím-mi̍h pháiⁿ-tāi? Góa chhâ bōe chhut I ū kai-sí ê chōe. Só͘-í, góa beh ēng piⁿ kā I kà-sī chi̍t-ē, chiah pàng I khì.”
42023023	Put-kò kûn-chiòng kian-chhî, tōa-siaⁿ iau-kiû kā Iâ-so͘ tèng si̍p-jī-kè, chòe-āu in ê siaⁿ soah khah-iâⁿ.
42023024	[Pí-lia̍p-to] chiū soan-phòaⁿ, chiàu in ê iau-kiû khì chip-hêng,
42023025	pàng in só͘ iau-kiû hit-ê in-ūi chok-loān, thâi-lâng, hō͘ lâng koaiⁿ-kaⁿ ê [Pa-lia̍p-pa], kā Iâ-so͘ kau hō͘ in chiàu in ê ì-sù khì chhú-lí.
42023026	Hiah-ê peng-sū ah Iâ-so͘ ah chhut-khì ê sî, tú-hó ū chi̍t ê [Kó͘-lī-nāi]-lâng miâ kiò-chòe [Se-bûn] tùi chng-kha lâi. In kā i lia̍h lâi, chiong si̍p-jī-kè khǹg tī keng-thâu hō͘ i giâ, tè Iâ-so͘ ê āu-bīn kiâⁿ.
42023027	Ū chi̍t tōa-tīn bîn-chiòng tè Iâ-so͘, kî-tiong ū chi̍t-kóa hū-jîn-lâng ūi-tio̍h I tûi-heng pi-siong thî-khàu.
42023028	Iâ-so͘ oa̍t-thâu tùi in kóng, “[Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] ê hū-jîn-lâng ah, m̄-bián ūi-tio̍h góa thî-khàu; tio̍h ūi lín ka-kī kap lín ê kiáⁿ-jî thî-khàu!
42023029	In-ūi ji̍t-chí teh-beh kàu, lâng ōe kóng, ‘Bōe hoâi-īn, m̄-bat siⁿ-kiáⁿ, m̄-bat hō͘ gín-á chia̍h-lin ê hū-jîn-lâng chin ū hok-khì!’
42023030	Hit sî, lâng ōe tùi tōa-soaⁿ kóng: Kā goán teh lo̍h-lâi! tùi sió-soaⁿ kóng: Kā goán khàm lo̍h-lâi!
42023031	In-ūi liân oa̍h-teh ê chhiū-ba̍k to ōe án-ni, ta-khì ê chhiū-ba̍k kiám bōe koh-khah lī-hāi?”
42023032	Lēng-gōa nn̄g ê hoān-lâng mā hō͘ lâng ah khì kap Iâ-so͘ chòe-hé chhú sí-hêng.
42023033	In kàu chi̍t ê só͘-chāi kiò-chòe “[Thâu-khak-óaⁿ]”, chiū tī hia kā Iâ-so͘ tèng si̍p-jī-kè, mā tèng hit nn̄g ê hoān-lâng, chi̍t ê tī chiàⁿ-pêng, chi̍t ê tī tò-pêng.
42023034	Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Pē ah, sià-bián in, in-ūi in m̄-chai in teh chòe sím-mi̍h.” Āu-lâi in thiu-chhiam pun Iâ-so͘ ê saⁿ.
42023035	Bîn-chiòng khiā tī hia teh khòaⁿ. Hiah-ê [Iû-thài]-lâng ê léng-siù kā I thí-chhiò, kóng, “I kiù pa̍t-lâng; I nā-sī Siōng-tè só͘ kéng-soán ê Ki-tok, tio̍h kiù ka-kī!”
42023036	Hiah-ê peng-sū mā kā I hì-lāng, kiâⁿ óa-khì, the̍h chhò͘ hō͘ I,
42023037	kóng, “Lí nā-sī ‘[Iû-thài]-lâng ê Ông’, tio̍h kiù ka-kī.”
42023038	Tī I ê thâu-khak téng ū chōe-chn̄g ê pâi-á siá “Chit-ê sī [Iû-thài]-lâng ê Ông.”
42023039	Chòe-hé tèng ê hoān-lâng, ū chi̍t-ê it-ti̍t kā Iâ-so͘ bú-jio̍k kóng, “Lí kiám m̄-sī Ki-tok? Kiù lí ka-kī mā kap goán.”
42023040	Lēng-gōa chi̍t-ê kā i chek-pī kóng, “Lí kap I siâng-khoán siū-hêng, lí kiám m̄ kiaⁿ Siōng-tè?
42023041	Lán siū hêng sī kong-tō, in-ūi lán só͘ siū ê sī chōe-kai-èng-tit, m̄-kú chit-ê lâng lóng m̄-bat chòe m̄-tio̍h ê tāi-chì.”
42023042	I chiū tùi Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Iâ-so͘ ah, lí choh-ông lâi-lîm ê sî, chhiáⁿ ōe kì-tit góa!”
42023043	Iâ-so͘ kā i kóng, “Góa si̍t-chāi kā lí kóng, kin-á-ji̍t lí ōe kap góa chòe-hé tī Lo̍k-hn̂g.”
42023044	Chha-put-to tiong-tàu ê sî, o͘-àm jia-khàm choân-tōe kàu ē-po͘ saⁿ tiám, ji̍t-thâu sit kng,
42023045	Sèng-tiān lāi ê pò͘-lî li̍h-chòe nn̄g pêng.
42023046	Iâ-so͘ tōa-siaⁿ hoah, “Pē ah, góa chiong góa ê lêng-hûn kau-tài lí”; kóng soah, chiū tn̄g-khùi.
42023047	Chi̍t ê kun-koaⁿ khòaⁿ-tio̍h só͘ hoat-seng ê tāi-chì, kui êng-kng hō͘ Siōng-tè kóng, “Chit-ê lâng chin-chiàⁿ sī gī-lâng!”
42023048	Chū-chi̍p tī hia teh khòaⁿ chit-ê tāi-chì ê chèng-lâng, khòaⁿ-tio̍h só͘ hoat-seng ê tāi-chì, lóng ná kiâⁿ ná tûi-heng pi-siong tńg-khì.
42023049	Hiah-ê bat Iâ-so͘ ê lâng, í-ki̍p tùi [Ka-lī-lī] tè lâi ê hū-jîn-lâng, lóng khiā tī hn̄g-hn̄g ê só͘-chāi khòaⁿ chiah-ê tāi-chì.
42023050	Ū chi̍t ê lâng kiò-chòe [Iok-sek]; i sī gī-oân, sī chi̍t ê siān-liông chèng-gī ê lâng.
42023051	I bô chàn-sêng kî-tha gī-oân ê kè-bô͘ kap hêng-tōng. I sī [Iû-thài]-lâng ê siâⁿ [A-lī-má-thài] ê lâng, it-ti̍t teh kî-thāi Siōng-tè-kok ê lâi-lîm.
42023052	Chit-ê lâng khì kìⁿ [Pí-lia̍p-to], chhéng-kiû chiong Iâ-so͘ ê ûi-thé hō͘ i.
42023053	I chiong ûi-thé siu lo̍h-lâi, ēng iù-môa-pò͘ pau, jiân-āu kā I an-chòng tī phah hó tī chio̍h-piah ê bōng-lāi; chit-ê bōng lóng iáu m̄-bat lâng ēng.
42023054	Hit ji̍t sī Pī-pān-ji̍t, An-hioh-ji̍t tú-beh khai-sí.
42023055	Tùi [Ka-lī-lī] kap Iâ-so͘ chòe-hé lâi hiah-ê hū-jîn-lâng tè [Iok-sek] khì. In chim-chiok khòaⁿ hit-ê bōng, khòaⁿ Iâ-so͘ ê ûi-thé án-chóaⁿ hē,
42023056	chiū tńg-khì chún-pī phang-liāu kap phang-iû. An-hioh-ji̍t, hiah-ê hū-jîn-lâng chiàu Lu̍t-hoat ê kui-tēng hioh-khùn.
42024001	Lé-pài-ji̍t thàu-chá, thiⁿ beh kng ê sî, hiah-ê hū-jîn-lâng tòa in só͘ chún-pī ê phang-liāu khì bōng-tōe.
42024002	In khòaⁿ-tio̍h chio̍h-thâu í-keng tùi bōng kō khui,
42024003	chiū ji̍p-khì, m̄-kú chhē bô Chú Iâ-so͘ ê ûi-thé.
42024004	In ūi-tio̍h chit hāng tāi-chì gāng-khì m̄-chai beh án-chóaⁿ ê sî, hut-jiân ū nn̄g ê lâng chhēng kng-iàⁿ-iàⁿ ê saⁿ khiā tī in sin-piⁿ.
