42024005	Chiah-ê hū-jîn-lâng hui-siông tio̍h-kiaⁿ, bīn phak-lo̍h thô͘-kha. Hit nn̄g ê lâng kā in kóng, “Lín sī-án-chóaⁿ tī sí-lâng ê tiong-kan teh chhē oa̍h-lâng? I bô tī chia, í-keng koh-oa̍h.
42024006	Lín tio̍h kì-tit I iáu tī [Ka-lī-lī] ê sî kā lín kóng ê ōe:
42024007	‘Jîn-chú it-tēng ōe siū chhut-bōe tī chōe-jîn ê chhiú, hō͘ in tèng si̍p-jī-kè, tē-saⁿ ji̍t koh-oa̍h.’ ”
42024008	Hiah-ê hū-jîn-lâng chiū siūⁿ-tio̍h Iâ-so͘ ê ōe.
42024009	In lī-khui bōng tńg-khì, chiong chiah-ê tāi-chì lóng tùi cha̍p-it ê sù-tô͘ kap kî-tha lóng-chóng ê lâng pò-kò.
42024010	Tùi sù-tô͘ pò-kò chiah-ê tāi-chì ê, chiū-sī [Boa̍t-tāi-lia̍p] ê [Má-lī-a], [Iok-a-ná], [Ngá-kok] ê lāu-bú [Má-lī-a], í-ki̍p kî-tha kap in chòe-tīn ê hū-jîn-lâng.
42024011	Sù-tô͘ siūⁿ-kóng chiah-ê hū-jîn-lâng só͘ kóng ê ōe bô-iáⁿ-bô-chiah, só͘-í bô siong-sìn.
42024012	M̄-kú [Pí-tek] khí-lâi, cháu khì bōng-ni̍h, àⁿ lo̍h-khì khòaⁿ, chí-ū khòaⁿ-tio̍h iù-môa-pò͘ nā-tiāⁿ. I chiū tńg-khì, tùi só͘ hoat-seng ê tāi-chì kám-kak chin kî-koài.
42024013	Siâng hit ji̍t, bûn-tô͘ tiong ū nn̄g ê lâng beh khì chi̍t ê chng-thâu, kiò-chòe [Í-má-ngó͘-su], chit-ê só͘-chāi lī [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] iok cha̍p-it kong-lí.
42024014	In tī lō͘-tiong hō͘-siōng teh tâm-lūn só͘ hoat-seng lóng-chóng ê tāi-chì.
42024015	In tâm-lūn lâi tâm-lūn khì ê sî, Iâ-so͘ chhin-sin kiâⁿ óa-lâi kap in chòe-tīn kiâⁿ.
42024016	In khòaⁿ-tio̍h, m̄-kú bōe jīn-tit.
42024017	Iâ-so͘ mn̄g in, “Lín ná kiâⁿ ná teh gī-lūn ê sī sím-mi̍h tāi-chì?” In chiū thêng lo̍h-lâi, móa-bīn iu-chhiû.
42024018	Kî-tiong ū chi̍t ê lâng kiò-chòe [Kek-liû-pa] ìn I kóng, “Chit kúi ji̍t tī [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] só͘ hoat-seng ê tāi-chì, tùi gōa-tōe lâi tòa tī [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] ê lâng, sī-án-chóaⁿ kan-ta lí chi̍t-ê m̄-chai?”
42024019	Iâ-so͘ mn̄g in, “Sím-mi̍h tāi-chì?” In kā I kóng, “[Ná-sat-le̍k]-lâng Iâ-so͘ ê tāi-chì. I sī sian-ti, tī Siōng-tè kap chèng-lâng ê bīn-chêng, bô-lūn kóng-ōe á-sī chòe tāi-chì lóng chin ū koân-lêng.
42024020	Goán ê chè-si-tiúⁿ kap léng-siù kā I sàng-khì hō͘ lâng phòaⁿ sí-hêng, tèng si̍p-jī-kè.
42024021	I chiū-sī goán só͘ teh kî-thāi beh lâi chín-kiù [Í-sek-lia̍t] Hit-ūi. M̄-nā án-ni, chit-ê tāi-chì hoat-seng kàu kin-á-ji̍t í-keng tē-saⁿ ji̍t lah.
42024022	Koh goán tiong-kan ū kúi-nā ê hū-jîn-lâng hō͘ goán chin tio̍h-kiaⁿ. In thiⁿ phú-kng chiū kàu bōng-ni̍h,
42024023	m̄-kú chhē bô Iâ-so͘ ê ûi-thé. In tńg-lâi pò-kò kóng ū khòaⁿ-tio̍h thiⁿ-sài chhut-hiān, kā in kóng I koh-oa̍h lah.
42024024	Goán tiong-kan mā ū kúi-nā ê lâng khì bōng-ni̍h, khòaⁿ-tio̍h ê tāi-chì ta̍k hāng kap hū-jîn-lâng só͘ kóng ê lóng siâng-khoán, in mā bô khòaⁿ-tio̍h Iâ-so͘.”
42024025	Iâ-so͘ chiū tùi in kóng, “Ài à, lín ná chiah-ni̍h gōng, sim ná chiah-ni̍h tūn, bōe siong-sìn sian-ti só͘ kóng it-chhè ê ōe!
42024026	Ki-tok siū chiah-ê khó͘-lān lâi ji̍p I ê êng-kng kiám m̄-sī eng-kai?”
42024027	Iâ-so͘ chiū tùi [Mô͘-se] kap chèng sian-ti khí, kā in kóe-seh Sèng-keng tiong só͘-ū koan-hē I pún-sin ê kì-chài.
42024028	In teh-beh kàu só͘ beh khì hit-ê chng-thâu, Iâ-so͘ ná chhin-chhiūⁿ beh kè-sio̍k kiâⁿ,
42024029	put-kò in nn̄g ê kiông-kiông kā I lâu, kóng, “Ji̍t-thâu í-keng lo̍h-soaⁿ, thiⁿ àm lah, chhiáⁿ kap goán tòa.” Iâ-so͘ chiū ji̍p-khì kap in tòa.
42024030	Iâ-so͘ kap in chē-toh ê sî, the̍h piáⁿ kám-siā, jiân-āu peh-khui, pun hō͘ in.
42024031	In ê ba̍k-chiu khui, jīn-tio̍h I; I hut-jiân tùi in bīn-chêng siau-sit.
42024032	In chiū hō͘-siōng kóng, “I tī lō͘-tiong kap lán kóng-ōe, kā lán soat-bêng Sèng-keng ê sî, lán ê sim kiám bô chhin-chhiūⁿ hé teh to̍h?”
42024033	In sûi-sî chhut-hoat, tò tńg-khì [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng], khòaⁿ-tio̍h hit cha̍p-it ê sù-tô͘ kap kî-tha ê lâng chū-chi̍p tī hia,
42024034	teh kóng, “Chú chin-chiàⁿ koh-oa̍h lah! I í-keng ū chhut-hiān hō͘ [Se-bûn] khòaⁿ.”
42024035	Hit nn̄g ê lâng chiū chiong tī lō͘-tiong só͘ hoat-seng ê tāi-chì, kap Iâ-so͘ teh peh-piáⁿ ê sî in chiah jīn-tio̍h I ê keng-kè, lóng kā in kóng.
42024036	Hit nn̄g ê bûn-tô͘ teh kóng chiah-ê tāi-chì ê sî, Iâ-so͘ chhin-sin khiā tī in tiong-kan, tùi in kóng, “Goān lín pêng-an!”
42024037	In ia̍h-kiaⁿ ia̍h-chhoah, siūⁿ-kóng sī khòaⁿ-tio̍h kúi.
42024038	Iâ-so͘ kā in kóng, “Lín sī-án-chóaⁿ put-an, sim-lāi thái ōe teh giâu-gî?
42024039	Khòaⁿ góa ê chhiú, góa ê kha; khak-si̍t sī góa. Lín bong chiū chai, in-ūi kúi bô-kut bô-bah; bong khòaⁿ-bāi leh, góa lóng ū!”
42024040	I kóng liáu chiū chiong I ê kha kap chhiú chhun hō͘ in khòaⁿ.
42024041	In hoaⁿ-hí-kah m̄-káⁿ siong-sìn, iáu kám-kak kî-koài ê sî, Iâ-so͘ mn̄g in, “Lín chia ū sím-mi̍h thang chia̍h bô?”
42024042	In the̍h chi̍t bé hang hó ê hî hō͘ I,
42024043	I chiū tī in ê bīn-chêng chiap khì chia̍h.
42024044	Āu-lâi Iâ-so͘ kā in kóng, “[Mô͘-se] ê Lu̍t-hoat kap sian-ti ê chheh, í-ki̍p Si-phian kì-chài koan-hē góa ê tāi-chì, it-tēng tio̍h èng-giām. Chiah-ê ōe góa iáu kap lín chòe-hé ê sî í-keng ū kā lín kóng lah.”
42024045	Iâ-so͘ chiū khui in ê sim-khiàu, hō͘ in bêng-pe̍k Sèng-keng,
42024046	tùi in kóng, “Sèng-keng ū án-ni kì-chài: Ki-tok tio̍h siū khó͘-lān, tē-saⁿ ji̍t tùi sí-lâng tiong koh-oa̍h,
42024047	koh lín tio̍h hōng I ê miâ thoân hóe-kái lâi tit-tio̍h sià-chōe ê tō-lí, tùi [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] khí, thoân kàu bān-kok.
42024048	Lín chiū-sī chiah-ê tāi-chì ê kiàn-chèng-jîn.
42024049	Góa chiong góa ê Pē só͘ èng-ún ê kau hō͘ lín; tio̍h tī chit-ê siâⁿ thèng-hāu, kàu lín tit-tio̍h tùi téng-bīn lâi ê lêng-le̍k.”
42024050	Iâ-so͘ chhōa in chhut-khì, it-ti̍t kàu [Pek-tāi-nî], jiân-āu gia̍h siang-chhiú kā in chiok-hok.
42024051	I teh kā in chiok-hok ê sî lī-khui in, siū chiap chiūⁿ-thiⁿ.
42024052	In chiū kā I pài, jiân-āu hoaⁿ-hoaⁿ hí-hí tńg-khì [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng],
42024053	kè-sio̍k tī Sèng-tiān chheng-chàn Siōng-tè.
43001001	Chhòng-sè í-chêng chiū ū Tō, Tō kap Siōng-tè tông-chāi, Tō sī Siōng-tè.
43001002	I tī chhòng-sè í-chêng chiū kap Siōng-tè tông-chāi.
43001003	Siōng-tè thong-kè I lâi chhòng-chō bān-iú; it-chhè siū-chō ê ta̍k hāng lóng sī thong-kè Tō lâi chhòng-chō.
43001004	Tī I lāi-bīn ū oa̍h-miā; chit-ê oa̍h-miā sī jîn-lūi ê kng.
43001005	Chit-ê kng tī o͘-àm tiong teh chiò, o͘-àm m̄-bat iâⁿ-kè kng.
43001006	Ū Siōng-tè chhe-lâi ê chi̍t ê lâng, miâ kiò-chòe [Iok-hān].
43001007	Chit-ê lâng lâi sī beh choh-chèng, ūi-tio̍h kng choh-chèng, beh hō͘ só͘-ū ê lâng thong-kè i lâi sìn.
43001008	I pún-sin m̄-sī hit-ê kng, sī beh ūi-tio̍h hit-ê kng choh-chèng.
43001009	Ū chin ê kng chìn-ji̍p sè-kan lâi chiò choân jîn-lūi.
43001010	I tī sè-kan; sè-kan thong-kè I lâi chhòng-chō, m̄-kú sè-kan m̄-bat I.
43001011	I lâi-kàu ka-kī ê só͘-chāi, ka-kī ê lâng bô chiap-la̍p I.
43001012	Hiah-ê chiap-la̍p I ê, chiū-sī sìn I ê lâng, I sù in ū koân chiâⁿ-chòe Siōng-tè ê kiáⁿ-jî.
43001013	In m̄-sī tùi hiat-thóng, m̄-sī tùi jio̍k-io̍k, mā m̄-sī tùi ta-po͘-lâng ê ì-liām, sī tùi Siōng-tè siⁿ ê.
43001014	Tō chiâⁿ-chòe lâng, tiàm tī lán tiong-kan, chhiong-móa un-tián kap chin-lí; goán ū khòaⁿ-kìⁿ I ê êng-iāu, sī Thiⁿ-pē to̍k-it ê Kiáⁿ chiah ū ê êng-iāu.
43001015	[Iok-hān] ūi-tio̍h I choh-chèng, hoah kóng, “Chit-ūi chiū-sī góa bat kā lín kóng ê, I tī góa āu-bīn teh lâi, khiok pí góa khah tōa; in-ūi góa iáu-bē chhut-sì, I chiū chûn-chāi.”
43001016	Tùi I ê hong-hù lán lóng niá-siū un-tián, un-siōng-ka-un.
43001017	Lu̍t-hoat thong-kè [Mô͘-se] pan-pò͘; un-tián kap chin-lí sī thong-kè Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok lâi ê.
43001018	Bô-lâng bat khòaⁿ-kìⁿ Siōng-tè, chí-ū Pē sim-hoâi tiong to̍k-it ê Kiáⁿ ū kā I hián-sī chhut-lâi.
43001019	Í-hā sī [Iok-hān] ê kiàn-chèng: [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] ê Iû-thài-kàu tong-kio̍k phài chè-si kap [Lī-bī]-lâng khì mn̄g Iok-hān ê sî, kóng, “Lí sī sím-mi̍h lâng?”
43001020	I bô kū-choa̍t hôe-tap, kong-khai seng-bêng “Góa m̄-sī Ki-tok”.
43001021	In koh mn̄g i, “Nā án-ni, lí sī [Í-lī-a] sī-bô?” [Iok-hān] ìn kóng, “Góa m̄-sī.” In koh mn̄g, “Lí sī hit-ūi Sian-ti sī-bô?” Iok-hān ìn kóng, “M̄-sī.”
43001022	In chiū kā i kóng, “Án-ni lí sī sím-mi̍h lâng? Chhiáⁿ kā goán kóng, hō͘ goán thang hôe-tap phài goán lâi ê lâng. Lí kóng, tàu-tóe lí sī sím-mi̍h lâng?”
43001023	[Iok-hān] ín-iōng sian-ti [Í-sài-a] ê ōe, kóng: Góa chiū-sī tī khòng-iá teh hoah ê siaⁿ, kóng: Tio̍h ūi Chú siu-ti̍t tō-lō͘.
43001024	Hiah-ê lâng sī Hoat-lī-sài-phài ê lâng chhe lâi ê.
43001025	In koh mn̄g Iok-hān, kóng, “Lí nā m̄-sī Ki-tok, m̄-sī [Í-lī-a], mā m̄-sī hit-ūi Sian-ti, lí sī-án-chóaⁿ kā lâng sóe-lé?”
43001026	[Iok-hān] ìn kóng, “Góa ēng chúi kā lâng sóe-lé; m̄-kú ū chi̍t ūi lín m̄-bat-ê khiā tī lín tiong-kan.
43001027	I tī góa āu-bīn teh lâi, góa liân kā I tháu ôe-tòa to bōe kham-tit.”
43001028	Chiah-ê sū tī [Iok-tàn]-hô tang-hōaⁿ ê [Pek-tāi-nî] hoat-seng, [Iok-tàn]-hô chiū-sī Iok-hān teh kā lâng sóe-lé ê só͘-chāi.
43001029	Keh-ji̍t, [Iok-hān] khòaⁿ-tio̍h Iâ-so͘ kiâⁿ óa-lâi, chiū kóng, “Lín khòaⁿ, Siōng-tè ê Iûⁿ-ko, I beh tû-khì sè-kan-lâng ê chōe.
43001030	Koan-hē I ê tāi-chì, góa bat kā lín kóng, I pí góa khah bān lâi, chóng-sī pí góa khah tōa, in-ūi góa iáu-bē chhut-sì, I chiū chûn-chāi.
43001031	Góa ka-kī mā m̄-bat I, m̄-kú góa lâi ēng chúi kā lâng sóe-lé, sī beh hō͘ [Í-sek-lia̍t]-lâng jīn-bat I.”
43001032	[Iok-hān] koh choh-chèng, kóng, “Góa ū khòaⁿ-tio̍h Sèng Sîn chhin-chhiūⁿ hún-chiáu tùi thiⁿ kàng lo̍h-lâi, hioh tī I téng-bīn.
43001033	Góa ka-kī mā m̄-bat I, m̄-kú chhe góa ēng chúi kā lâng sóe-lé hit-ūi Siōng-tè ū tùi góa kóng, ‘Lí khòaⁿ-tio̍h Sèng Sîn kàng lo̍h-lâi hioh tī I téng-bīn hit-ê, I chiū-sī beh ēng Sèng Sîn kā lâng sóe-lé Hit-ūi.’
43001034	Góa ū khòaⁿ-tio̍h, koh choh-chèng, chit-ūi chiū-sī Siōng-tè ê Kiáⁿ.”
43001035	Keh-ji̍t, [Iok-hān] koh kap i nn̄g ê bûn-tô͘ khiā tī hia;
43001036	i khòaⁿ-tio̍h Iâ-so͘ keng-kè, chiū kóng, “Lín khòaⁿ, Siōng-tè ê Iûⁿ-ko!”
43001037	Chit nn̄g ê bûn-tô͘ thiaⁿ-tio̍h i án-ni kóng, chiū khì tè Iâ-so͘.
43001038	Iâ-so͘ oa̍t kè-lâi, khòaⁿ-tio̍h in teh tè I, chiū mn̄g in, “Lín teh chhē sím-mi̍h?” In kā I kóng, “Lia̍p-pí, lí tòa tó-ūi?” Lia̍p-pí ê ì-sù sī lāu-su.
43001039	Iâ-so͘ kā in kóng, “Lín lâi khòaⁿ!” In chiū khì khòaⁿ Iâ-so͘ tòa ê só͘-chāi, hit ji̍t kap I chòe-hé tòa. Hit sî tāi-iok ē-po͘ sì tiám.
43001040	Thiaⁿ [Iok-hān] ê ōe lâi tè Iâ-so͘ hit nn̄g lâng, chi̍t ê sī [Se-bûn] [Pí-tek] ê sió-tī [An-tek-lia̍t].
43001041	I seng khì chhē i ê hiaⁿ-ko [Se-bûn], tùi i kóng, “Goán í-keng ū tú-tio̍h [Bí-sài-a].” Bí-sài-a ê ì-sù sī Ki-tok.
43001042	I chiū chhōa [Se-bûn] khì kìⁿ Iâ-so͘. Iâ-so͘ chù-ba̍k kā i khòaⁿ, kóng, “Lí sī [Iok-hān] ê kiáⁿ [Se-bûn], lí ê miâ beh kiò-chòe [Ki-hoat].” [Ki-hoat] kap [Pí-tek] siâng ì-sù, chiū-sī chio̍h-pôaⁿ.
43001043	Keh-ji̍t, Iâ-so͘ koat-tēng beh khì [Ka-lī-lī]. I tú-tio̍h [Hui-le̍k], tùi i kóng, “Lâi tè góa!”
43001044	[Hui-le̍k] sī [Pek-sài-tāi]-lâng, [An-tek-lia̍t] kap [Pí-tek] ê tông-hiong.
43001045	[Hui-le̍k] tú-tio̍h [Ná-tàn-gia̍p], tùi i kóng, “[Mô͘-se] tī Lu̍t-hoat-su só͘ siá, í-ki̍p sian-ti só͘ kì-chài Hit-ūi, goán í-keng ū tú-tio̍h, chiū-sī [Iok-sek] ê kiáⁿ [Ná-sat-le̍k]-lâng Iâ-so͘.”
43001046	[Ná-tàn-gia̍p] ìn kóng, “[Ná-sat-le̍k] hit khoán só͘-chāi kiám ōe chhut sím-mi̍h hó-mi̍h?” [Hui-le̍k] kā i kóng, “Lí lâi khòaⁿ!”
43001047	Iâ-so͘ khòaⁿ-tio̍h [Ná-tàn-gia̍p] kiâⁿ óa-lâi, chiū kóng, “Lín khòaⁿ, i sī chin-chiàⁿ ê [Í-sek-lia̍t]-lâng, lóng bô hu-ké!”
43001048	[Ná-tàn-gia̍p] mn̄g Iâ-so͘, “Lí ná-ōe bat góa?” Iâ-so͘ kā i kóng, “[Hui-le̍k] iáu-bē kiò lí, góa chiū khòaⁿ-tio̍h lí tī hit châng bû-hoa-kó-chhiū kha.”
43001049	[Ná-tàn-gia̍p] ìn kóng, “Lia̍p-pí, lí sī Siōng-tè ê Kiáⁿ! Lí sī [Í-sek-lia̍t] ê Ông!”
43001050	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “In-ūi góa kā lí kóng góa ū khòaⁿ-tio̍h lí tī hit châng bû-hoa-kó-chhiū kha, lí chiū sìn ò͘? Lí ōe khòaⁿ-tio̍h pí che koh-khah tōa ê sū.”
43001051	Iâ-so͘ koh kā i kóng, “Góa si̍t-si̍t chāi-chāi kā lín kóng, lín ōe khòaⁿ-kìⁿ thiⁿ khui, Siōng-tè ê thiⁿ-sài tī Jîn-chú ê sin-chiūⁿ chiūⁿ-lo̍h óng-lâi.”
43002001	Nn̄g ji̍t āu, tī [Ka-lī-lī] ê [Ka-ná] ū hun-lé; Iâ-so͘ ê lāu-bú ū tī hia.
43002002	Iâ-so͘ kap I ê bûn-tô͘ mā siū iau-chhiáⁿ khì chham-ka.
43002003	Chiú ēng liáu ê sî, Iâ-so͘ ê lāu-bú tùi I kóng, “In í-keng bô chiú lah.”
43002004	Iâ-so͘ kóng, “A-bú, che kap lí góa ū sím-mi̍h koan-hē; góa ê sî iáu-bē kàu.”
43002005	I ê lāu-bú hoan-hù chhe-ēng ê lâng kóng, “I kā lín kóng sím-mi̍h, tio̍h chiàu án-ni khì chòe.”
43002006	Chiàu [Iû-thài]-lâng kiat-chēng ê kui-lē, tī hia ū la̍k ê chio̍h-àng, ta̍k ê ōe-tàng tóe chha-put-to chi̍t pah li̍p.
43002007	Iâ-so͘ kā hiah-ê chhe-ēng kóng, “Chiah-ê chúi-àng, chúi lóng tò hō͘ i tīⁿ.” In chiū chiong chúi tò ji̍p-khì chúi-àng, tò kàu móa.
43002008	Jiân-āu Iâ-so͘ kā in kóng, “Taⁿ lín kā chúi iúⁿ chhut-lâi, the̍h hō͘ pān-toh ê chóng-koán.” In chiū phâng-khì hō͘ i.
43002009	Pān-toh ê chóng-koán chi̍t-ē tam-tio̍h í-keng pìⁿ-chòe chiú ê chúi, m̄-chai chit-ê chiú tùi tó-ūi lâi; put-kò iúⁿ-chúi ê chhe-ēng chai, chóng-koán chiū kiò sin-lông lâi,
43002010	tùi i kóng, “Lâng lóng seng chhut hó chiú, tán lâng-kheh lim kàu chùi chiah chhut khah bái ê chiú, lí tian-tò chiong hó chiú lâu kàu chit-chūn.”
43002011	Iâ-so͘ tī [Ka-lī-lī] ê [Ka-ná] kiâⁿ chit-ê tē-it ê sîn-jiah, tī hia hián-sī I ê êng-kng; I ê bûn-tô͘ lóng sìn I.
43002012	Chit-ê tāi-chì í-āu, Iâ-so͘ kap I ê lāu-bú, hiaⁿ-tī, í-ki̍p bûn-tô͘ lo̍h-khì [Ka-pek-lông], tī hia tòa kúi-nā ji̍t.
43002013	[Iû-thài]-lâng ê Pôaⁿ-kè-choeh teh-beh kàu, Iâ-so͘ chiūⁿ-khì [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng].
43002014	I khòaⁿ-tio̍h ū lâng tī Sèng-tiān ê gōa-īⁿ teh bōe gû, iûⁿ, hún-chiáu; mā ū ōaⁿ-chîⁿ ê lâng teh hō͘ lâng ōaⁿ-chîⁿ.
43002015	Iâ-so͘ chiū ēng soh-á chòe piⁿ, chiong gû, iûⁿ lóng tùi Sèng-tiān kóaⁿ chhut-khì, chhia-tó chîⁿ-toh-á, iā-sòaⁿ in ê chîⁿ.
43002016	I koh tùi bōe hún-chiáu ê lâng kóng, “Chiah-ê lóng poaⁿ-poaⁿ chhut-khì; m̄-thang kā góa ê Pē ê chhù pìⁿ-chòe bóe-bōe ê chhù!”
43002017	I ê bûn-tô͘ kì-tit Sèng-keng ū kì-chài, “Siōng-tè ah, góa ūi-tio̍h lí ê tiān sim-jia̍t chhin-chhiūⁿ hé teh to̍h.”
43002018	[Iû-thài]-kàu tong-kio̍k ê lâng hoán-mn̄g Iâ-so͘, “Lí beh ēng sím-mi̍h sîn-jiah kā goán chèng-bêng lí ū koân chòe chiah-ê tāi-chì?”
43002019	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Lín thiah-húi chit keng Sèng-tiān, saⁿ ji̍t lāi góa beh koh kā i khí khí-lâi.”
43002020	In kóng, “Chit keng Sèng-tiān sì-cha̍p-la̍k nî chiah khí hó, lí saⁿ ji̍t lāi chiū beh khí khí-lâi ò͘?”
43002021	Kî-si̍t, Iâ-so͘ só͘ kóng ê Sèng-tiān sī chí I ê seng-khu.
43002022	I tùi sí-lâng tiong koh-oa̍h í-āu, I ê bûn-tô͘ chiah kì-tit I bat án-ni kóng, in chiū sìn Sèng-keng kap Iâ-so͘ kóng ê ōe.
43002023	Iâ-so͘ tī [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] kè Pôaⁿ-kè-choeh ê sî, chin chōe lâng khòaⁿ-tio̍h I kiâⁿ ê sîn-jiah chiū sìn I.
43002024	Put-kò Iâ-so͘ bô sìn-jīm in, in-ūi I liáu-kái só͘-ū ê lâng.
43002025	Koan-hē lâng ê tāi-chì, I bô su-iàu lâng kā I chèng-bêng, in-ūi I chin-chiàⁿ liáu-kái lâng ê lāi-sim.
43003001	Ū chi̍t ê [Hoat-lī-sài]-phài ê lâng miâ kiò [Nî-ko-tek-bō͘], sī [Iû-thài]-lâng ê léng-tō-chiá.
43003002	Ū chi̍t àm, chit-ê lâng lâi kìⁿ Iâ-so͘, kóng, “Lia̍p-pí, goán chai lí sī Siōng-tè chhe lâi ê kàu-su. Nā m̄-sī Siōng-tè tông-chāi, bô-lâng ōe-tàng kiâⁿ lí só͘ kiâⁿ chiah-ê sîn-jiah.”
43003003	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Góa si̍t-si̍t chāi-chāi kā lí kóng, lâng nā bô têng chhut-sì, chiū bōe-tàng khòaⁿ-kìⁿ Siōng-tè-kok.”
43003004	[Nî-ko-tek-bō͘] mn̄g kóng, “Lâng í-keng lāu, ná ōe-tàng têng chhut-sì? Kiám kóng i ōe-tàng koh chi̍t piàn ji̍p-khì bú-thai lâi chhut-sì?”
43003005	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Góa si̍t-si̍t chāi-chāi kā lí kóng, lâng nā bô tùi chúi kap Sèng Sîn lâi chhut-sì, chiū bōe-tàng chiâⁿ-chòe Siōng-tè-kok ê chú-bîn.
43003006	Tùi jio̍k-thé siⁿ ê, sī jio̍k-thé; tùi Sèng Sîn siⁿ ê, sī sîn-lêng.
43003007	M̄-thang in-ūi góa kóng ‘lín tio̍h têng chhut-sì’ lâi kî-koài.
43003008	Hong beh chhe-khì tó-ūi chiū chhe-khì tó-ūi, lí ū thiaⁿ-tio̍h siaⁿ, m̄-kú m̄-chai i tùi tó-ūi lâi, tùi tó-ūi khì. Ta̍k ê tùi Sèng Sîn siⁿ ê mā-sī án-ni.”
43003009	[Nî-ko-tek-bō͘] mn̄g Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Chit khoán tāi-chì ná ū khó-lêng?”
43003010	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Lí sī [Í-sek-lia̍t]-lâng ê kàu-su, liân che to m̄-chai ò͘?
43003011	“Góa si̍t-si̍t chāi-chāi kā lí kóng, goán kóng goán só͘ chai ê, mā ūi-tio̍h goán só͘ khòaⁿ-tio̍h ê choh-chèng, m̄-kú lín m̄ chiap-siū goán ê kiàn-chèng.
43003012	Góa kā lín kóng chit sè-kan ê tāi-chì, lín to m̄-sìn, góa nā kā lín kóng thiⁿ-téng ê tāi-chì, lín ná-beh sìn?
43003013	Tùi thiⁿ-téng kàng-lîm ê Jîn-chú í-gōa, bô-lâng bat chiūⁿ-thiⁿ.
43003014	“Chhin-chhiūⁿ [Mô͘-se] tī khòng-iá kú-khí tâng-chôa, Jîn-chú mā it-tēng tio̍h án-ni siū kú-khí,
43003015	hō͘ ta̍k ê sìn I ê lâng tit-tio̍h éng-oán ê oa̍h-miā.
43003016	Siōng-tè liân I to̍k-it ê Kiáⁿ to sù hō͘ sè-kan, beh hō͘ ta̍k ê sìn I ê lâng bián bia̍t-bông, hoán-tńg tit-tio̍h éng-oán ê oa̍h-miā, I chiah-ni̍h thiàⁿ sè-kan!
43003017	In-ūi Siōng-tè chhe I ê Kiáⁿ lâi sè-kan, m̄-sī beh sím-phòaⁿ sè-kan, sī beh thong-kè I lâi chín-kiù sè-kan.
43003018	“Sìn Kiáⁿ ê lâng bōe siū tēng-chōe; m̄ sìn ê lâng í-keng siū tēng-chōe, in-ūi i m̄ sìn Siōng-tè to̍k-it ê Kiáⁿ.
43003019	Siōng-tè ê sím-phòaⁿ sī án-ni: Kng chìn-ji̍p sè-kan, sè-kan-lâng khah ài o͘-àm, khah bô ài kng-bêng, in-ūi in ê hêng-ûi siâ-ok.
43003020	Chòe pháiⁿ ê lâng lóng oàn-hūn kng, m̄ chiap-kūn kng, án-ni i ê hêng-ûi chiah bōe lō͘-hiān.
43003021	M̄-kú si̍t-hêng chin-lí ê lâng chiap-kūn kng, sī beh hián-bêng i ê hêng-ûi sī sūn-thàn Siōng-tè lâi chòe ê.”
43003022	Chiah-ê tāi-chì í-āu, Iâ-so͘ kap I ê bûn-tô͘ khì [Iû-thài] tōe-khu, I kap in chiām-sî tòa hia, koh kā lâng sóe-lé.
43003023	[Iok-hān] mā tī [Sat-léng] hù-kūn ê [Ai-loán] teh kā lâng sóe-lé, in-ūi hia ū chin chōe chúi, chèng-lâng sòa-chiap lâi chiap-siū [Iok-hān] ê sóe-lé.
43003024	Hit sî [Iok-hān] iáu-bē hō͘ lâng koaiⁿ-kaⁿ.
43003025	Kúi-nā ê [Iok-hān] ê bûn-tô͘ kap chi̍t ê [Iû-thài]-lâng ūi-tio̍h kiat-chēng ê lé-gî piān-lūn.
43003026	In lâi kìⁿ [Iok-hān], tùi i kóng, “Lia̍p-pí, í-chêng tī [Iok-tàn]-hô tang-hōaⁿ kap lí chòe-hé, lí bat ūi-tio̍h I choh-chèng Hit-ūi, lí khòaⁿ, I hiān-chāi teh kā lâng sóe-lé, chèng-lâng lóng khì I hia.”
43003027	[Iok-hān] ìn kóng, “Nā m̄-sī thiⁿ siúⁿ-sù, lâng bōe-tàng tit-tio̍h sím-mi̍h.
43003028	Góa bat kóng ‘Góa m̄-sī Ki-tok, put-kò sī siū phài choh I ê sian-hong’. Chit-ê tāi-chì, lín pún-sin sī góa ê kiàn-chèng-jîn.
43003029	Chhōa sin-niû ê sī sin-lông; sin-lông ê pêng-iú khiā tī piⁿ-a, chi̍t-ē thiaⁿ-tio̍h sin-lông ê siaⁿ chiū hui-siông hoaⁿ-hí. Só͘-í, góa ê hoaⁿ-hí móa-móa.
43003030	I it-tēng ná heng-ōng, góa it-tēng ná soe-bî.”
43003031	Tùi téng-bīn lâi ê, tī bān-iú ê téng-bīn; tùi tōe-chiūⁿ lâi ê, sio̍k tōe-chiūⁿ, só͘ kóng ê sī tōe-chiūⁿ ê sū. Tùi thiⁿ-téng lâi ê, tī bān-iú ê téng-bīn.
43003032	I ūi-tio̍h só͘ khòaⁿ-kìⁿ ê kap só͘ thiaⁿ-kìⁿ ê choh-chèng, put-kò bô-lâng chiap-siū I ê kiàn-chèng.
43003033	Chiap-siū I kiàn-chèng ê lâng chèng-bêng Siōng-tè sī sìn-si̍t.
43003034	Siōng-tè só͘ chhe-khián Hit-ūi kóng Siōng-tè só͘ kóng ê ōe, in-ūi Siōng-tè bû-hān-liōng sù Sèng Sîn hō͘ I.
43003035	Pē thiàⁿ Kiáⁿ, í-keng chiong it-chhè lóng kau tī I ê chhiú-tiong.
43003036	Sìn Kiáⁿ ê lâng ōe tit-tio̍h éng-oán ê oa̍h-miā; m̄ sūn-ho̍k Kiáⁿ ê lâng m̄-nā bōe tit-tio̍h oa̍h-miā, hoán-tńg kè-sio̍k hō͘ Siōng-tè siū-khì.
43004001	Hoat-lī-sài-phài ê lâng ū thiaⁿ-tio̍h Iâ-so͘ pí [Iok-hān] chio khah chōe bûn-tô͘, koh kā khah chōe lâng sóe-lé.
43004002	Kî-si̍t Iâ-so͘ m̄-bat kā lâng sóe-lé, sī I ê bûn-tô͘ kā lâng sóe-lé.
43004003	Iâ-so͘ thiaⁿ-tio̍h chit-ê tāi-chì chiū lī-khui [Iû-thài], tńg-khì [Ka-lī-lī];
43004004	I tio̍h keng-kè [Sat-má-lī-a].
43004005	Iâ-so͘ lâi-kàu [Sat-má-lī-a] ê chi̍t ê siâⁿ, kiò-chòe [Sū-ka], chit-ê siâⁿ óa-kūn [Ngá-kok] hō͘ i ê kiáⁿ [Iok-sek] hit tè tōe.
43004006	[Ngá-kok]-chíⁿ tī hia. Iâ-so͘ in-ūi kiâⁿ-lō͘ chin siān chiū chē tī chíⁿ-piⁿ. Hit sî chha-put-to sī tiong-tàu.
43004007	Ū chi̍t ê [Sat-má-lī-a] ê hū-jîn-lâng lâi chhiūⁿ-chúi. Iâ-so͘ tùi i kóng, “Chhiáⁿ chi̍t-sut-á chúi hō͘ góa lim.”
43004008	Hit sî I ê bûn-tô͘ í-keng ji̍p-khì siâⁿ-lāi bóe chia̍h-mi̍h.
43004009	[Sat-má-lī-a] ê hū-jîn-lâng ìn Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Lí sī [Iû-thài]-lâng, ná-ōe tùi góa chit-ê [Sat-má-lī-a] ê cha-bó͘-lâng thó chúi lim?” Goân-lâi [Iû-thài]-lâng kap [Sat-má-lī-a]-lâng bô lâi-óng.
43004010	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Lí nā liáu-kái Siōng-tè hō͘ lâng ê un-sù, koh bat tùi lí kóng ‘Chhiáⁿ chi̍t-sut-á chúi hō͘ góa lim’ hit-ê sī sím-mi̍h lâng, lí chá ōe chiū kā I kiû, I chá chiū chiong oa̍h-chúi hō͘ lí.”
43004011	Hū-jîn-lâng kóng, “Sian-siⁿ, lí bô chhiūⁿ-chúi ê khì-khū, chíⁿ koh chhim, lí beh án-chóaⁿ tit-tio̍h oa̍h-chúi?
43004012	Goán ê chó͘-sian [Ngá-kok] lâu chit-ê chíⁿ hō͘ goán, i ka-kī, i ê kiáⁿ-sun, kap i ê cheng-siⁿ, lóng lim chit-ê chíⁿ-chúi, lí kiám ōe pí i khah gâu?”
43004013	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Lim chit-ê chíⁿ-chúi ê lâng lóng ōe-koh chhùi-ta;
43004014	put-kò lim góa só͘ beh hō͘ i ê chúi ê bōe-koh chhùi-ta. In-ūi góa beh hō͘ i ê chúi tī i ê lāi-bīn ōe chiâⁿ-chòe chúi-chôaⁿ, it-ti̍t chhèng-chhut oa̍h-chúi, hō͘ i tit-tio̍h éng-oán ê oa̍h-miā.”
43004015	Hū-jîn-lâng kóng, “Sian-siⁿ, chhiáⁿ hō͘ góa chit-ê chúi, góa chiah bōe-koh chhùi-ta, mā bián koh lâi chia chhiūⁿ-chúi.”
43004016	Iâ-so͘ kā i kóng, “Lí khì kiò lí ê tiōng-hu, chhōa i lâi chia.”
43004017	Hū-jîn-lâng ìn kóng, “Góa bô tiōng-hu.” Iâ-so͘ kā i kóng, “Lí kóng ‘Góa bô tiōng-hu’ ū iáⁿ.
43004018	Lí bat ū gō͘ ê tiōng-hu, hiān-chāi chit-ê m̄-sī lí ê tiōng-hu, lí kóng ê sī sū-si̍t.”
43004019	Hū-jîn-lâng kóng, “Sian-siⁿ, góa khòaⁿ lí sī sian-ti.
43004020	Goán [Sat-má-lī-a]-lâng ê chó͘-sian tī chit-ê soaⁿ-téng kèng-pài Siōng-tè; lín [Iû-thài]-lâng kóng [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] chiah-sī kèng-pài Siōng-tè ê só͘-chāi.”
43004021	Iâ-so͘ tùi i kóng, “Hū-jîn-lâng, tio̍h sìn góa. Sî teh-beh kàu, hit sî lín bōe tī chit-ê soaⁿ-téng, mā bōe tī [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] kèng-pài Pē.
43004022	Lín [Sat-má-lī-a]-lâng kèng-pài lín só͘ m̄-bat ê; goán [Iû-thài]-lâng kèng-pài goán só͘ bat ê; in-ūi chín-kiù tùi [Iû-thài]-lâng chhut.
43004023	Put-kò, sî teh-beh kàu, hiān-chāi chiū-sī, chin-chiàⁿ kèng-pài Pē ê lâng ōe ēng sim-lêng kap chin-sêng kèng-pài. In-ūi Pē ài chit khoán ê lâng kèng-pài I.
43004024	Siōng-tè sī Sîn, kèng-pài I ê lâng tio̍h ēng sim-lêng kap chin-sêng kèng-pài.”
43004025	Hū-jîn-lâng tùi I kóng, “Góa chai hit-ūi chheng-chòe Ki-tok ê Bí-sài-a teh-beh lâi, I lâi ê sî ōe chiong it-chhè ê tāi-chì kā goán kóng.”
43004026	Iâ-so͘ kā i kóng, “Góa, chit-ê teh kap lí kóng-ōe ê chiū-sī.”
43004027	Tú chit-ê sî, Iâ-so͘ ê bûn-tô͘ tńg-lâi. In khòaⁿ-tio̍h Iâ-so͘ kap hū-jîn-lâng teh kóng-ōe, kám-kak chin kî-koài, put-kò bô-lâng mn̄g hū-jîn-lâng “Lí beh chhòng sím-mi̍h?” á-sī mn̄g Iâ-so͘ “Lí ná teh kap hū-jîn-lâng kóng-ōe?”
43004028	Hū-jîn-lâng chiū chiong chúi-pân pàng hē-teh, tńg-khì siâⁿ-lāi, tùi lâng kóng
43004029	“Lâi-khì khòaⁿ, chit-ê lâng chiong góa kè-khì ê tāi-chì lóng kóng chhut-lâi. I káⁿ sī Ki-tok ô͘?”
43004030	Tāi-ke chiū chhut-siâⁿ khì khòaⁿ Iâ-so͘.
43004031	Hit sî bûn-tô͘ kā Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Lia̍p-pí, chhiáⁿ lâi chia̍h.”
43004032	Iâ-so͘ kā in kóng, “Góa ū lín m̄-chai ê chia̍h-mi̍h.”
43004033	Bûn-tô͘ chiū mn̄g-lâi mn̄g-khì kóng, “Kiám ū lâng the̍h mi̍h-kiāⁿ hō͘ I chia̍h?”
43004034	Iâ-so͘ kā in kóng, “Góa ê chia̍h-mi̍h chiū-sī si̍t-hêng chhe góa Hit-ūi ê chí-ì, koh oân-sêng I ê kang-chok.
43004035	Lín kiám bô án-ni kóng ‘Koh sì ge̍h-ji̍t chiū ū thang siu-sêng’? Góa kā lín kóng, ba̍k-chiu peh hō͘ kim khòaⁿ sì-bīn ê chhân-hn̂g; ngó͘-kok í-keng sek, thang siu-sêng lah.
43004036	Hiān-chāi siu-koah ê lâng í-keng teh niá kang-chîⁿ, koh-teh siu-sêng hō͘ lâng tit-tio̍h éng-oán oa̍h-miā ê ngó͘-kok, hō͘ iā-chéng-ê kap siu-koah-ê chòe-hé hoaⁿ-hí.
43004037	In-ūi sio̍k-gú kóng ‘Chi̍t ê iā-chéng, chi̍t ê siu-koah’, kóng liáu chin tio̍h.
43004038	Lín bô sin-khó͘ keng-choh ê, góa chhe lín khì siu-sêng; pa̍t-lâng sin-khó͘, lín hióng-siū in sin-khó͘ ê sêng-kó.”
43004039	Hit-ê siâⁿ ū chin chōe [Sat-má-lī-a]-lâng sìn Iâ-so͘, in-ūi hit-ê hū-jîn-lâng choh-chèng kóng, “I chiong góa kè-khì só͘ chòe ê tāi-chì lóng kā góa kóng chhut-lâi.”
43004040	Só͘-í hiah-ê [Sat-má-lī-a]-lâng lâi kìⁿ Iâ-so͘, kiû I tòa in hia, I chiū tī hia tòa nn̄g ji̍t.
43004041	In-ūi Iâ-so͘ só͘ kóng ê ōe, ū koh-khah chōe lâng lâi sìn.
43004042	Hiah-ê lâng kā hit-ê hū-jîn-lâng kóng, “Hiān-chāi goán sìn, m̄-sī in-ūi lí só͘ kóng ê ōe, sī in-ūi goán ū chhin-hī thiaⁿ-tio̍h Iâ-so͘ ê ōe, chai-iáⁿ I chin-chiàⁿ sī sè-kan ê Kiù-chú.”
43004043	Nn̄g ji̍t āu, Iâ-so͘ lī-khui hia khì [Ka-lī-lī].
43004044	In-ūi Iâ-so͘ ka-kī bat kóng, “Sian-ti tī ka-kī ê kò͘-hiong bōe siū chun-tiōng.”
43004045	Iâ-so͘ kàu [Ka-lī-lī] ê sî [Ka-lī-lī]-lâng ū kā I hoan-gêng, in-ūi in khì [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] kè Pôaⁿ-kè-choeh ê sî mā ū khòaⁿ-tio̍h I tī choeh-kî tiong só͘ chòe it-chhè ê tāi-chì.
43004046	Iâ-so͘ koh tńg-khì [Ka-lī-lī] ê [Ka-ná], chiū-sī I bat ēng chúi pìⁿ-chòe chiú ê só͘-chāi. Tī hia ū chi̍t ê [Ka-pek-lông] ê koaⁿ-oân, i ê kiáⁿ phòa-pīⁿ.
43004047	I thiaⁿ-tio̍h Iâ-so͘ tùi [Iû-thài] lâi-kàu [Ka-lī-lī], chiū khì kiû Iâ-so͘ lo̍h-khì [Ka-pek-lông] i-tī i ê kiáⁿ, in-ūi i ê kiáⁿ teh-beh sí lah.
43004048	Iâ-so͘ kā i kóng, “Lín nā bô khòaⁿ-kìⁿ sîn-jiah kî-sū, it-tēng bōe sìn.”
43004049	Hit-ê koaⁿ-oân ìn kóng, “Sian-siⁿ, chhiáⁿ lí tī góa ê sòe-kiáⁿ iáu-bē sí í-chêng lo̍h lâi-khì.”
43004050	Iâ-so͘ tùi i kóng, “Tńg-khì, lí ê kiáⁿ bōe sí.” Hit-ê lâng sìn Iâ-so͘ kā i kóng ê ōe, chiū tńg-khì.
43004051	Tī lō͘-tiong, i ê lô͘-po̍k tú-tio̍h, kā i kóng i ê sòe-kiáⁿ oa̍h khí-lâi lah.
43004052	I chiū mn̄g in i ê kiáⁿ sím-mi̍h sî hó khí-lâi. In ìn kóng, “Cha-hng ē-po͘ chi̍t tiám jia̍t chiū thòe-khì.”
43004053	Lāu-pē chai-iáⁿ, tú-tú hit-ê sî Iâ-so͘ kā i kóng “Lí ê kiáⁿ bōe sí”. I ka-kī sìn, choân-ke ê lâng mā lóng sìn.
43004054	Che sī Iâ-so͘ tùi [Iû-thài] lâi [Ka-lī-lī] í-āu só͘ kiâⁿ ê tē-jī ê sîn-jiah.
43005001	Chiah-ê tāi-chì í-āu, ū chi̍t ê [Iû-thài]-lâng ê choeh-kî, Iâ-so͘ chiūⁿ-khì [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng].
43005002	Tī [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng], kūn [Iûⁿ-mn̂g] ê só͘-chāi ū chi̍t ê chúi-tî, [Hi-pek-lâi]-ōe kiò-chòe [Pit-sū-tāi], chúi-tî piⁿ ū gō͘ ê cháu-lông.
43005003	Tī cháu-lông ū chin chōe pīⁿ-lâng tó tī hia; ū sit-bêng-ê, kha-pái-ê, kap poàn-sin-put-sūi-ê.
43005005	Tī hia ū chi̍t ê phòa-pīⁿ saⁿ-cha̍p-poeh nî kú ê lâng.
43005006	Iâ-so͘ khòaⁿ-tio̍h i tī hia, chai-iáⁿ i í-keng tī hia tó chin kú, chiū kā i kóng, “Lí ài hó khí-lâi bô?”
43005007	Hit-ê pīⁿ-lâng ìn kóng, “Sian-siⁿ, chúi tín-tāng ê sî bô-lâng thang kā góa phō lo̍h-khì chúi-tî, góa siūⁿ-beh lo̍h-khì ê sî, pa̍t-lâng pí góa seng lo̍h-khì lah.”
43005008	Iâ-so͘ kā i kóng, “Khí-lâi, giâ lí ê chhn̂g-pho͘, khí-lâi kiâⁿ.”
43005009	Hit-ê lâng sûi-sî hó khí-lâi, chiū giâ i ê chhn̂g-pho͘ khí-lâi kiâⁿ. Hit ji̍t sī An-hioh-ji̍t.
43005010	Só͘-í [Iû-thài]-lâng tùi hit-ê hō͘ Iâ-so͘ i-hó ê lâng kóng, “Kin-á-ji̍t sī An-hioh-ji̍t, lí giâ chhn̂g-pho͘ bô ha̍p-hoat.”
43005011	I ìn kóng, “I-hó góa hit-ê lâng kā góa kóng, ‘Giâ lí ê chhn̂g-pho͘, khí-lâi kiâⁿ.’ ”
43005012	In chiū mn̄g i, “Kiò lí giâ chhn̂g-pho͘ khí-lâi kiâⁿ hit-ê sī siáⁿ-lâng?”
43005013	I m̄-chai hit-ê kā i i-hó ê sī siáⁿ-lâng, in-ūi ū chin chōe lâng tī hia, koh Iâ-so͘ ia̍h í-keng tiām-tiām-á lī-khui.
43005014	Āu-lâi, Iâ-so͘ tī Sèng-tiān tú-tio̍h i, kā i kóng, “Lí í-keng hó lah, m̄-thang koh hoān-chōe, chiah bōe tú-tio̍h koh-khah chhám ê tāi-chì.”
43005015	Hit-ê lâng lī-khui liáu-āu tùi [Iû-thài]-lâng kóng, kā i i-hó ê sī Iâ-so͘.
43005016	In-ūi án-ni, in khai-sí pek-hāi Iâ-so͘, in-ūi I tī An-hioh-ji̍t kā lâng i-pīⁿ.
43005017	Iâ-so͘ tùi in kóng, “Góa ê Pē kàu hiān-chāi it-ti̍t teh kang-chok, góa mā teh kang-chok.”
43005018	Ūi-tio̍h án-ni, [Iû-thài]-kàu tong-kio̍k koh-khah siūⁿ-beh hāi-sí Iâ-so͘; in-ūi Iâ-so͘ m̄-nā ûi-hoān An-hioh-ji̍t ê kui-tēng, koh chheng Siōng-tè chòe I ka-kī ê Pē, khòaⁿ ka-kī kap Siōng-tè pêng-téng.
43005019	Iâ-so͘ tùi in kóng, “Góa si̍t-si̍t chāi-chāi kā lín kóng, Kiáⁿ bōe-tàng chiàu ka-kī ê ì-sù chòe tāi-chì, chí-ū khòaⁿ Pē chòe sím-mi̍h, I chiah chiàu án-ni chòe. Pē só͘ chòe ê, Kiáⁿ mā chiàu án-ni chòe.
43005020	In-ūi Pē thiàⁿ Kiáⁿ, chiong ka-kī só͘ teh chòe ê it-chhè lóng chí-sī Kiáⁿ, mā ōe chiong pí chiah-ê khah tōa ê sū chí-sī I, beh hō͘ lín kám-kak kî-koài.
43005021	Pē án-chóaⁿ hō͘ sí-lâng koh-oa̍h, sù in oa̍h-miā, chhin-chhiūⁿ án-ni, Kiáⁿ mā beh chiong oa̍h-miā sù hō͘ ka-kī só͘ ài ê lâng.
43005022	Pē lóng bô kā lâng sím-phòaⁿ. I í-keng chiong sím-phòaⁿ ê koân-pèng lóng kau hō͘ Kiáⁿ,
43005023	sī beh hō͘ chèng-lâng chun-kèng Kiáⁿ, chhin-chhiūⁿ chun-kèng Pē. Bô chun-kèng Kiáⁿ chiū-sī bô chun-kèng chhe I lâi ê Pē.
43005024	“Góa si̍t-si̍t chāi-chāi kā lín kóng, thiaⁿ góa ê ōe koh sìn chhe góa Hit-ūi ê lâng ū éng-oán ê oa̍h-miā; i í-keng chhut-sí-ji̍p-oa̍h, m̄-bián siū sím-phòaⁿ.
43005025	Góa si̍t-si̍t chāi-chāi kā lín kóng, sî teh-beh kàu, hiān-chāi chiū-sī, sí-lâng ōe thiaⁿ-kìⁿ Siōng-tè ê Kiáⁿ ê siaⁿ, thiaⁿ-kìⁿ ê lâng ōe oa̍h khí-lâi.
43005026	In-ūi Pē pún-sin sī oa̍h-miā ê kun-goân, I mā án-ni hō͘ Kiáⁿ chiâⁿ-chòe oa̍h-miā ê kun-goân.
43005027	I í-keng chiong sím-phòaⁿ ê koân-pèng sù hō͘ Kiáⁿ, in-ūi Kiáⁿ sī Jîn-chú.
43005028	Chit-ê sū lín m̄-thang kám-kak kî-koài, in-ūi sî teh-beh kàu, só͘-ū sí-khì ê lâng lóng ōe thiaⁿ-kìⁿ Kiáⁿ ê siaⁿ,
43005029	in ōe tùi bōng-ni̍h chhut-lâi: Choh-hó-ê koh-oa̍h, tit-tio̍h oa̍h-miā; choh-pháiⁿ-ê koh-oa̍h, siū tēng-chōe.”
43005030	“Góa bōe-tàng chiàu ka-kī ê ì-sù chòe sím-mi̍h; góa chí-ū chiàu só͘ thiaⁿ-tio̍h ê lâi sím-phòaⁿ. Góa ê sím-phòaⁿ kong-chèng, in-ūi góa m̄-sī thàn ka-kī ê ì-sù, sī chiàu chhe góa lâi Hit-ūi ê chí-ì.
43005031	“Góa nā ūi-tio̍h ka-kī choh-chèng, góa ê kiàn-chèng chiū bô chin-si̍t.
43005032	Ū lēng-gōa chi̍t ê lâng teh ūi-tio̍h góa choh-chèng, góa chai i ūi-tio̍h góa só͘ chòe ê kiàn-chèng sī chin-si̍t.
43005033	Lín bat phài lâng khì kìⁿ [Iok-hān], i ū ūi-tio̍h chin-lí choh-chèng.
43005034	M̄-sī kóng góa bô su-iàu lâng ūi-tio̍h góa choh-chèng; put-kò góa kóng chiah-ê sū sī beh hō͘ lín tit-tio̍h kiù.
43005035	[Iok-hān] sī teh to̍h teh chiò-kng ê teng, lín hoaⁿ-hí chiām-sî hióng-siū i ê kng.
43005036	Put-kò góa ū pí [Iok-hān] khah ū-la̍t ê kiàn-chèng. Pē kau-tài góa oân-sêng ê kang-chok, chiū-sī góa hiān-chāi teh chòe ê kang-chok, ōe-tàng ūi-tio̍h góa choh-chèng, piáu-sī Pē ū chhe góa.
43005037	Koh chhe góa ê Pē í-keng chhin-sin ūi-tio̍h góa choh-chèng. Lín iáu m̄-bat thiaⁿ-tio̍h I ê siaⁿ, mā m̄-bat khòaⁿ-tio̍h I ê hêng-chōng.
43005038	Lín bô chiong I ê ōe khǹg tī sim-lāi, in-ūi lín m̄-sìn I só͘ chhe Hit-ūi.
43005039	Lín gián-kiù Sèng-keng, in-ūi lín siūⁿ, tī hit lāi-bīn ōe chhē-tio̍h éng-oán ê oa̍h-miā. Kî-si̍t, chiū-sī Sèng-keng teh ūi-tio̍h góa choh-chèng.
43005040	Án-ni, lín iáu-kú m̄-khéng lâi góa chia tit-tio̍h oa̍h-miā.
43005041	“Góa bô chiap-siū lâng ê chheng-chàn.
43005042	M̄-kú góa chin-chiàⁿ liáu-kái lín, tī lín lāi-bīn bô thiàⁿ Siōng-tè ê sim.
43005043	Góa hōng góa ê Pē ê miâ lâi, lín bô chiap-la̍p góa; nā ū pa̍t-lâng hōng ka-kī ê miâ lâi, lín tian-tò kā i chiap-la̍p.
43005044	Lín hō͘-siōng chheng-chàn, chóng-sī bô tui-kiû tùi î-it ê Siōng-tè lâi ê chheng-chàn, án-ni lín ná ōe-tàng sìn góa?
43005045	M̄-thang siūⁿ-kóng góa ōe tī Pē ê bīn-chêng khòng-kò lín. Teh khòng-kò lín ê sī lín it-ti̍t teh gióng-bōng ê [Mô͘-se].
43005046	Lín nā chin-chiàⁿ ū sìn [Mô͘-se], mā ōe sìn góa; in-ūi i ū siá góa ê tāi-chì.
43005047	I siá ê chheh lín to m̄-sìn, ná-ōe sìn góa kóng ê ōe?”
43006001	Chit-ê tāi-chì liáu-āu, Iâ-so͘ kè-khì [Ka-lī-lī]-ô͘, chiū-sī [Thê-pí-lī-a]-ô͘ ê hit pêng hōaⁿ.
43006002	Ū chi̍t tōa-tīn lâng tè I khì, in-ūi in ū khòaⁿ-tio̍h Iâ-so͘ i-hó pīⁿ-lâng ê sîn-jiah.
43006003	Iâ-so͘ peh chiūⁿ-soaⁿ, kap I ê bûn-tô͘ tī hia chē.
43006004	Hit sî [Iû-thài]-lâng ê Pôaⁿ-kè-choeh teh-beh kàu.
43006005	Iâ-so͘ gia̍h-thâu khòaⁿ-tio̍h chi̍t tōa-tīn lâng it-ti̍t ǹg I hia teh lâi, chiū kā [Hui-le̍k] kóng, “Lán beh khì tó-ūi bóe chia̍h-mi̍h thang hō͘ chiah-ê lâng chia̍h?”
43006006	I kóng án-ni sī teh chhì-giām [Hui-le̍k]; kî-si̍t, I ka-kī í-keng chai teh-beh chòe ê tāi-chì.
43006007	[Hui-le̍k] ìn kóng, “Ēng nn̄g pah ê gûn-á khì bóe piáⁿ mā bô kàu hō͘ ta̍k ê lâng chia̍h chi̍t-sut-á.”
43006008	Lēng-gōa chi̍t ê bûn-tô͘, chiū-sī [Se-bûn] [Pí-tek] ê sió-tī [An-tek-lia̍t], kā Iâ-so͘ kóng,
43006009	“Chia ū chi̍t ê gín-á, i ū gō͘ ê tōa-be̍h piáⁿ kap nn̄g bé hî; m̄-kú lâng chiah-ni̍h chōe, kan-ta chiah-ê ná ū kàu?”
43006010	Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Lín kiò chèng-lâng chē lo̍h-khì.” Hit-ê só͘-chāi chháu chin chōe. Chèng-lâng chiū chē lo̍h-khì; kan-ta ta-po͘-lâng chiū ū gō͘-chheng.
43006011	Jiân-āu Iâ-so͘ the̍h hiah-ê piáⁿ, kám-siā liáu-āu pun hō͘ chē tī hia ê lâng; hî mā án-ni pun, chhut-chāi in chia̍h.
43006012	In chia̍h pá liáu-āu, Iâ-so͘ kā I ê bûn-tô͘ kóng, “Chiong chia̍h chhun ê sut-á khioh khí-lâi, m̄-thang phah-sńg.”
43006013	In chiū chiong hit gō͘ ê piáⁿ ê sut-á, chiū-sī tāi-ke chia̍h chhun ê, khioh khí-lâi, lóng-chóng móa cha̍p-jī nâ.
43006014	Chèng-lâng khòaⁿ-tio̍h Iâ-so͘ só͘ kiâⁿ ê sîn-jiah, chiū kóng, “Chit-ê chin-chiàⁿ sī beh lâi chit sè-kan hit-ūi Sian-ti!”
43006015	Iâ-so͘ chai-iáⁿ chèng-lâng teh-beh kiông-pek I choh-ông, chiū ka-kī chi̍t ê koh thòe-khì soaⁿ-ni̍h.
43006016	Hông-hun ê sî, I ê bûn-tô͘ lo̍h-khì ô͘-piⁿ,
43006017	chiūⁿ-chûn beh kè ô͘ khì [Ka-pek-lông]. Hit sî thiⁿ í-keng àm, Iâ-so͘ iáu-bē kàu in hia.
43006018	Hut-jiân, in-ūi thàu tōa-hong, ô͘ khí tōa-éng.
43006019	Bûn-tô͘ kò-chûn, tāi-iok kò gō͘ la̍k kong-lí ê sî, khòaⁿ-tio̍h Iâ-so͘ tī ô͘ ê téng-bīn teh kiâⁿ, kiâⁿ óa-kūn chûn, in chiū khí kiaⁿ.
43006020	Iâ-so͘ tùi in kóng, “Sī góa, bián kiaⁿ!”
43006021	Bûn-tô͘ chiū hoaⁿ-hí chiap I chiūⁿ-chûn; chûn liâm-piⁿ kàu in beh khì ê só͘-chāi.
43006022	Keh-ji̍t, iáu tī ô͘ tùi-bīn hōaⁿ hit tīn lâng hoat-kak tī hia chí-ū chi̍t chiah chûn nā-tiāⁿ, Iâ-so͘ mā bô kap bûn-tô͘ chòe-hé chē-chûn, kan-ta bûn-tô͘ ka-kī kè-khì.
43006023	M̄-kú ū kúi-nā chiah chûn tùi [Thê-pí-lī-a] lâi-kàu óa-kūn Chú kám-siā liáu-āu pun piáⁿ hō͘ chèng-lâng chia̍h hit-ê só͘-chāi.
43006024	Chèng-lâng chi̍t-ē hoat-kak Iâ-so͘ kap I ê bûn-tô͘ lóng bô tī hia, chiū chē hiah-ê chûn kè-khì [Ka-pek-lông] chhē Iâ-so͘.
43006025	Chèng-lâng tī ô͘ ê tùi-bīn hōaⁿ chhē-tio̍h Iâ-so͘, chiū kā I mn̄g, “Lia̍p-pí, lí sím-mi̍h sî lâi chia?”
43006026	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Góa si̍t-si̍t chāi-chāi kā lín kóng, lín chhē góa, sī in-ūi ū piáⁿ chia̍h kàu pá, m̄-sī in-ūi khòaⁿ-kìⁿ sîn-jiah.
43006027	M̄-thang ūi-tio̍h ōe pāi-hoāi ê chia̍h-mi̍h phah-piàⁿ, tio̍h ūi-tio̍h kú-tn̂g tī-teh, ōe-tàng hō͘ lâng tit-tio̍h éng-oán ê oa̍h-miā hit-ê chia̍h-mi̍h lâi phah-piàⁿ, chiū-sī Jîn-chú beh hō͘ lín ê; in-ūi Pē Siōng-tè í-keng kā I khàm-ìn jīn-tēng.”
43006028	In chiū mn̄g Iâ-so͘, “Beh oân-sêng Siōng-tè ê kang, goán tio̍h chòe sím-mi̍h?”
43006029	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Sìn Siōng-tè só͘ chhe Hit-ūi chiū-sī chòe Siōng-tè ê kang.”
43006030	In chiū kóng, “Lí beh kiâⁿ sím-mi̍h sîn-jiah hō͘ goán khòaⁿ lâi sìn lí? Lí beh chòe sím-mi̍h?
43006031	Goán ê chó͘-sian tī khòng-iá chia̍h má-ná, tú-tú chiàu Sèng-keng só͘ kì-chài: ‘I ū chiong tùi thiⁿ lâi ê piáⁿ hō͘ in chia̍h.’ ”
43006032	Iâ-so͘ chiū kā in kóng, “Góa si̍t-si̍t chāi-chāi kā lín kóng, m̄-sī [Mô͘-se] chiong tùi thiⁿ lâi ê piáⁿ hō͘ lín, sī góa ê Pē chiong tùi thiⁿ lâi chin ê piáⁿ hō͘ lín.
43006033	In-ūi Siōng-tè só͘ sù ê piáⁿ chiū-sī tùi thiⁿ kàng lo̍h-lâi, sù oa̍h-miā hō͘ sè-kan ê.”
43006034	In chiū kā Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Sian-siⁿ, chhiáⁿ lí put-sî chiong chit-ê piáⁿ hō͘ goán.”
43006035	Iâ-so͘ kā in kóng, “Góa chiū-sī oa̍h-miā ê piáⁿ; lâi góa chia ê lâng it-tēng bōe iau, sìn góa ê lâng it-tēng bōe chhùi-ta.
43006036	M̄-kú góa bat kā lín kóng, lín í-keng ū khòaⁿ-tio̍h góa, iáu-kú m̄-sìn.
43006037	Pē só͘ hō͘ góa ê lâng lóng ōe lâi góa chia; lâi góa chia ê lâng, góa choa̍t-tùi bōe kā i khì-sak;
43006038	in-ūi góa tùi thiⁿ kàng lo̍h-lâi, m̄-sī beh chiàu ka-kī ê ì-sù chòe tāi-chì, sī beh si̍t-hêng chhe góa lâi Hit-ūi ê chí-ì.
43006039	Chhe góa lâi Hit-ūi ê chí-ì sī án-ni: I só͘ hō͘ góa ê lâng, góa liân chi̍t ê to bōe sòng-sit, tī Boa̍t-ji̍t góa ōe hō͘ i koh-oa̍h.
43006040	In-ūi góa ê Pē ê chí-ì sī beh hō͘ só͘-ū khòaⁿ-kìⁿ Kiáⁿ lâi sìn Kiáⁿ ê lâng lóng ōe tit-tio̍h éng-oán ê oa̍h-miā; tī Boa̍t-ji̍t góa ōe hō͘ i koh-oa̍h.”
43006041	In-ūi Iâ-so͘ kóng “Góa sī tùi thiⁿ kàng lo̍h-lâi ê piáⁿ”, [Iû-thài]-lâng chiū su-hā gī-lūn,
43006042	kóng, “Chit-ê lâng kiám m̄-sī [Iok-sek] ê kiáⁿ Iâ-so͘? Lán bat I ê pē-bú, hiān-chāi I ná-ōe kóng ‘góa sī tùi thiⁿ kàng lo̍h-lâi ê’? ”
43006043	Iâ-so͘ chiū tùi in kóng, “Lín mài-teh su-hā gī-lūn.
43006044	Nā m̄-sī chhe góa ê Pē ín-chhōa, bô-lâng ōe lâi góa chia. Lâi góa chia ê, tī Boa̍t-ji̍t góa ōe hō͘ i koh-oa̍h.
43006045	Sian-ti ê chheh ū kì-chài, ‘Chèng-lâng lóng ōe chiap-siū Siōng-tè ê kàu-tō.’ Só͘-ū thiaⁿ-thàn Pē, tùi I ha̍k-si̍p ê lâng, ōe lâi góa chia.
43006046	Che m̄-sī kóng ū lâng bat khòaⁿ-kìⁿ Pē; chí-ū tùi Siōng-tè hia lâi Hit-ūi bat khòaⁿ-kìⁿ.
43006047	Góa si̍t-si̍t chāi-chāi kā lín kóng: Sìn ê lâng ū éng-oán ê oa̍h-miā.
43006048	Góa chiū-sī oa̍h-miā ê piáⁿ.
43006049	Lín ê chó͘-sian tī khòng-iá chia̍h má-ná mā sí-khì.
43006050	Che chiū-sī tùi thiⁿ kàng lo̍h-lâi ê piáⁿ, hō͘ lâng chia̍h-liáu bōe sí.
43006051	Góa chiū-sī tùi thiⁿ kàng lo̍h-lâi hit-ê oa̍h-miā ê piáⁿ. Lâng nā chia̍h chit-ê piáⁿ, ōe éng-oán oa̍h-teh. Góa beh hō͘ lâng ê piáⁿ chiū-sī góa ê bah, sī ūi-tio̍h beh hō͘ sè-kan-lâng ū oa̍h-miā lâi hiàn ê.”
43006052	Tùi án-ni, [Iû-thài]-lâng hō͘-siōng cheng-lūn kóng, “Chit-ê lâng ná ōe-tàng ēng I ê bah hō͘ lán chia̍h?”
43006053	Iâ-so͘ chiū tùi in kóng, “Góa si̍t-si̍t chāi-chāi kā lín kóng, lín nā bô chia̍h Jîn-chú ê bah, bô lim I ê huih, lín lāi-bīn chiū bô oa̍h-miā.
43006054	Chia̍h góa ê bah, lim góa ê huih ê lâng, chiū ū éng-oán ê oa̍h-miā; tī Boa̍t-ji̍t góa ōe hō͘ i koh-oa̍h.
43006055	Góa ê bah chin-chiàⁿ ōe chia̍h-tit, góa ê huih chin-chiàⁿ ōe lim-tit.
43006056	Chia̍h góa ê bah, lim góa ê huih ê lâng, tiàm tī góa lāi-bīn, góa mā tiàm tī i lāi-bīn.
43006057	Éng-oa̍h ê Pē chhe góa, góa mā in-ūi Pē lâi oa̍h; chhin-chhiūⁿ án-ni, chia̍h góa ê lâng mā ōe in-ūi góa lâi oa̍h.
43006058	Che chiū-sī tùi thiⁿ kàng lo̍h-lâi ê piáⁿ; m̄-sī chhin-chhiūⁿ lín ê chó͘-sian só͘ chia̍h ê piáⁿ, in chia̍h-liáu mā sí-khì; chia̍h chit-ê piáⁿ ê lâng ōe éng-oán oa̍h-teh.”
43006059	Chiah-ê sī Iâ-so͘ tī [Ka-pek-lông] ê hōe-tn̂g kà-sī lâng ê sî kóng ê ōe.
43006060	Iâ-so͘ ê bûn-tô͘ tiong ū chin chōe lâng thiaⁿ-tio̍h, chiū kóng, “Chit-ê ōe chin khùn-lân liáu-kái, siáⁿ-lâng thiaⁿ ōe lo̍h-khì?”
43006061	Iâ-so͘ sim-lāi chai-iáⁿ I ê bûn-tô͘ su-hā teh gī-lūn chit-ê sū, chiū tùi in kóng, “Chit-ê ōe kā lín jiá-tio̍h sī-bô?
43006062	Án-ni, lín nā khòaⁿ-tio̍h Jîn-chú seng-koân khì-kàu I goân-lâi ê só͘-chāi, lín beh án-chóaⁿ?
43006063	Sù oa̍h-miā ê sī Siōng-tè ê Sîn; jio̍k-thé lóng bô kong-hāu. Góa kā lín kóng chiah ê ōe sī Sîn, sī oa̍h-miā.
43006064	M̄-kú lín tiong-kan ū lâng m̄-sìn.” In-ūi Iâ-so͘ tùi khí-thâu chiū chai sím-mi̍h lâng m̄-sìn, sím-mi̍h lâng beh kā I chhut-bōe.
43006065	I koh kóng, “In-ūi án-ni, góa bat kā lín kóng, nā m̄-sī Pē ún-chún, bô-lâng ōe-tàng lâi góa chia.”
43006066	In-ūi án-ni, I ê bûn-tô͘ tiong ū chin chōe lâng lī-khui, bô koh tè I.
43006067	Iâ-so͘ chiū tùi cha̍p-jī sù-tô͘ kóng, “Lín mā beh lī-khui ò͘?”
43006068	[Se-bûn] [Pí-tek] ìn kóng, “Chú ah, lí ū éng-oán-oa̍h ê ōe, goán beh khì tè siáⁿ-lâng?
43006069	Goán í-keng sìn, koh khak-si̍t chai lí sī Siōng-tè ê Sèng-chiá.”
43006070	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Góa kiám m̄-sī kéng-soán lín cha̍p-jī lâng? Lín tiong-kan ū chi̍t ê sī mô͘-kúi.”
43006071	I án-ni kóng sī teh chí [Í-su-ka-lio̍k] 2 [Se-bûn] ê kiáⁿ [Iû-tāi], i sī cha̍p-jī sù-tô͘ ê chi̍t ê, teh-beh chhut-bōe Iâ-so͘.
43007001	Chit-ê tāi-chì í-āu, Iâ-so͘ khì [Ka-lī-lī] kéng-lāi ta̍k só͘-chāi; I bô ài khì [Iû-thài], in-ūi [Iû-thài]-kàu ê léng-siù chhē ki-hōe beh kā I thâi.
43007002	[Iû-thài]-lâng ê Tah-liâu-choeh teh-beh kàu.
43007003	Só͘-í Iâ-so͘ ê hiaⁿ-tī kā I kóng, “Lí tio̍h lī-khui chia khì [Iû-thài], hō͘ lí ê bûn-tô͘ mā thang khòaⁿ lí teh chòe ê tāi-chì.
43007004	Lâng beh chhut-miâ bōe tiām-tiām-á chòe. Kì-jiân lí teh chòe chiah-ê tāi-chì, tio̍h khì chòe hō͘ sè-kan-lâng khòaⁿ.”
43007005	In-ūi liân I ê hiaⁿ-tī to bô sìn I.
43007006	Iâ-so͘ kā in kóng, “Góa ê sî iáu-bē kàu; put-kò lín ta̍k-sî lóng piān-piān.
43007007	Sè-kan-lâng bô lí-iû oàn-hūn lín; in oàn-hūn góa, in-ūi góa put-sî teh chí-chhut in ê hêng-ûi siâ-ok.
43007008	Lín chòe lín chiūⁿ-khì siú-choeh; góa bô ài chiūⁿ-khì siú chit-ê choeh, in-ūi góa ê sî-ki iáu-bē sêng-se̍k.”
43007009	Iâ-so͘ kóng chiah-ê ōe liáu-āu kè-sio̍k lâu tī [Ka-lī-lī].
43007010	Iâ-so͘ ê hiaⁿ-tī chiūⁿ-khì siú-choeh, I mā khì, m̄-sī kong-khai, sī tiām-tiām-á khì.
43007011	Choeh-kî ê tiong-kan, [Iû-thài]-kàu ê léng-siù teh chhē Iâ-so͘, mn̄g kóng, “I tī sím-mi̍h só͘-chāi?”
43007012	Kûn-chiòng ê tiong-kan ū chin chōe lâng su-hā teh gī-lūn Iâ-so͘ ê tāi-chì. Ū lâng kóng, “I sī hó-lâng.” Mā ū lâng kóng, “M̄-sī, I sī teh siàn-tōng kûn-chiòng.”
43007013	M̄-kú in kiaⁿ [Iû-thài]-kàu ê léng-siù, bô-lâng káⁿ kong-jiân kóng-khí I ê tāi-chì.
43007014	Choeh-kî kè chi̍t-pòaⁿ, Iâ-so͘ chiah chiūⁿ-khì Sèng-tiān kà-sī lâng.
43007015	[Iû-thài]-kàu ê léng-siù kám-kak kî-koài, kóng, “Chit-ê lâng bô siū-kè kàu-io̍k, ná hiah-ni̍h ū ha̍k-būn?”
43007016	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Góa ê kà-sī m̄-sī góa ka-kī ê, sī chhe góa lâi Hit-ūi ê kà-sī.
43007017	Lâng nā goān-ì si̍t-hêng Siōng-tè ê chí-ì, chiū ōe chai góa ê kà-sī sī tùi Siōng-tè lâi á-sī chiàu ka-kī ê ì-sù teh kóng.
43007018	Óa-khò ka-kī kóng ê sī teh kiû ka-kī ê êng-kng; kiû chhe i Hit-ūi ê êng-kng ê lâng sī chin-si̍t, i ê lāi-bīn lóng bô put-gī.
43007019	[Mô͘-se] kiám bô hō͘ lín Lu̍t-hoat? Put-kò lín tiong-kan bô-kah chi̍t-ê chun-siú Lu̍t-hoat. Sī-án-chóaⁿ lín siūⁿ-beh thâi góa?”
43007020	Kûn-chiòng ìn kóng, “Lí m̄-teh khòaⁿ-tio̍h kúi. Siáⁿ-lâng siūⁿ-beh thâi lí?”
43007021	Iâ-so͘ tùi in kóng, “Góa kan-ta chòe chi̍t hāng tāi-chì, lín chiū lóng kám-kak kî-koài.
43007022	[Mô͘-se] bēng-lēng lín kiâⁿ kat-lé, lín mā tī An-hioh-ji̍t kā lâng kiâⁿ kat-lé. Sū-si̍t, chit-ê lé-gî m̄-sī tùi [Mô͘-se], sī tùi lín chó͘-sian khai-sí.
43007023	Kì-jiân lín tī An-hioh-ji̍t kā chi̍t ê ta-po͘ gín-á kat-lé sī ūi-tio̍h beh chun-siú [Mô͘-se] ê Lu̍t-hoat, án-ni góa tī An-hioh-ji̍t hō͘ chi̍t ê pīⁿ-lâng oân-choân hó khí-lâi, lín sī-án-chóaⁿ tùi góa siū-khì?
43007024	M̄-thang khòaⁿ gōa-piáu lâi phòaⁿ-toàn sī-hui, tio̍h chiàu kong-chèng phòaⁿ-toàn.”
43007025	Ū chi̍t-kóa [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] ê lâng teh kóng, “Chit-ê kiám m̄-sī in siūⁿ-beh sat-hāi hit-ê lâng?
43007026	Lí khòaⁿ, I kong-khai teh kóng-ōe, in mā bô kóng sím-mi̍h kā I hoán-tùi. Kiám kóng chiah-ê koaⁿ-tiúⁿ chin-chiàⁿ chai chit-ê lâng sī Ki-tok?
43007027	M̄-kú chit-ê lâng ê lâi-le̍k lán lóng chai; Ki-tok lâi ê sî, bô-lâng ōe chai I tùi tó-ūi lâi.”
43007028	Iâ-so͘ tī Sèng-tiān teh kà-sī ê sî, tōa-siaⁿ kóng, “Lín bat góa, mā chai góa ê lâi-le̍k; put-kò góa m̄-sī chiàu ka-kī ê ì-sù lâi. Chhe góa lâi Hit-ūi sī chin-si̍t, lín khiok m̄-bat I.
43007029	Góa bat I, in-ūi góa tùi I hia lâi, I chhe-khián góa lâi.”
43007030	In chiū siūⁿ-beh kā I lia̍h, put-kò bô-lâng hē-chhiú, in-ūi I ê sî iáu-bē kàu.
43007031	Kûn-chiòng ê tiong-kan ū chin chōe lâng sìn I, kóng, “Ki-tok lâi ê sî, kiám ōe pí chit-ê lâng kiâⁿ khah chōe sîn-jiah?”
43007032	Hoat-lī-sài-phài ê lâng thiaⁿ-tio̍h kûn-chiòng su-hā teh gī-lūn Iâ-so͘ ê tāi-chì, chè-si-tiúⁿ kap Hoat-lī-sài-lâng chiū phài Sèng-tiān ê kéng-ōe khì lia̍h Iâ-so͘.
43007033	Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Góa koh kap lín chòe-hé bô jōa kú chiū beh tńg-khì chhe góa lâi Hit-ūi hia.
43007034	Lín beh chhē góa, m̄-kú chhē bōe-tio̍h, in-ūi góa khì ê só͘-chāi, lín bōe-tàng khì.”
43007035	[Iû-thài]-kàu ê léng-siù hō͘-siōng kóng, “Chit-ê lâng beh khì tó-ūi hō͘ lán chhē bōe-tio̍h? I siūⁿ-beh khì sì-sòaⁿ tī [Hi-la̍h] siâⁿ-chhī ê [Iû-thài] kiâu-bîn hia, khì kà-sī [Hi-la̍h]-lâng sī-bô?
43007036	I kóng ‘Lín beh chhē góa, m̄-kú chhē bōe-tio̍h’, koh kóng ‘Góa khì ê só͘-chāi, lín bōe-tàng khì’, che sī sím-mi̍h ì-sù?”
43007037	Choeh-kî ê chòe-āu hit ji̍t, iā-sī siōng tiōng-iàu ê ji̍t, Iâ-so͘ khiā khí-lâi, tōa-siaⁿ kóng, “Chhùi-ta ê lâng tio̍h lâi góa chia lim.
43007038	Sìn góa ê lâng, chiàu Sèng-keng só͘ kóng, ‘Ū oa̍h-chúi ê khoe ōe tùi i ê pak-lāi chhèng chhut-lâi.’ ”
43007039	Iâ-so͘ án-ni kóng sī chí sìn I ê lâng teh-beh niá-siū ê Sèng Sîn. Hit sî, Siōng-tè iáu-bē sù Sèng Sîn, in-ūi Iâ-so͘ iáu-bē tit-tio̍h êng-kng.
43007040	Kûn-chiòng ê tiong-kan ū lâng thiaⁿ-tio̍h chiah-ê ōe chiū kóng, “Chit-ê lâng chin-chiàⁿ sī hit-ūi Sian-ti.”
43007041	Koh ū lâng kóng, “Chit-ê lâng sī Ki-tok.” Put-kò mā ū lâng kóng, “Ki-tok ná-ōe tùi [Ka-lī-lī] chhut?
43007042	Sèng-keng kiám m̄-sī kóng Ki-tok sī [Tāi-pi̍t] ê kiáⁿ-sun, sī tùi [Tāi-pi̍t] ê kò͘-hiong [Pek-lī-hêng] chhut?”
43007043	Án-ni, kûn-chiòng in-ūi Iâ-so͘ ê iân-kò͘ khí hun-cheng.
43007044	Kî-tiong ū chi̍t-kóa lâng siūⁿ-beh lia̍h Iâ-so͘, m̄-kú bô-lâng hē-chhiú.
43007045	Sèng-tiān ê kéng-ōe tńg-khì kìⁿ chè-si-tiúⁿ kap Hoat-lī-sài-phài ê lâng. In chiū mn̄g kéng-ōe kóng, “Lín ná bô kā I ah lâi?”
43007046	Kéng-ōe ìn kóng, “M̄-bat ū lâng kóng-ōe chhin-chhiūⁿ chit-ê lâng.”
43007047	[Hoat-lī-sài]-lâng chiū tùi in kóng, “Lín mā hō͘ I bê-khì ò͘?
43007048	Lán ê koaⁿ-tiúⁿ á-sī [Hoat-lī-sài]-lâng kiám ū lâng sìn I?
43007049	Chit tīn m̄-bat Lu̍t-hoat ê kûn-chiòng sī siū chiù-chó͘ ê.”
43007050	[Hoat-lī-sài]-lâng ê tiong-kan bat khì kìⁿ Iâ-so͘ ê [Nî-ko-tek-bō͘] kā in kóng,
43007051	“Chiàu lán ê Lu̍t-hoat, bô seng sím-mn̄g koh chhâ-bêng lâng ū chòe sím-mi̍h, kiám ōe-tàng kā i tēng-chōe?”
43007052	In ìn kóng, “Lí mā-sī [Ka-lī-lī] lâi ê sī-bô? Lí chhâ-khó Sèng-keng chiū chai [Ka-lī-lī] m̄-bat chhut sian-ti.”
43008001	Chèng-lâng lóng tńg-khì ka-kī ê chhù, m̄-kú Iâ-so͘ khì [Ka-ná]-soaⁿ.
43008002	Keh-ji̍t thàu-chá, Iâ-so͘ koh khì Sèng-tiān. Bîn-chiòng lóng óa-lâi I hia, I chiū chē lo̍h-khì kā in kà-sī.
43008003	Hit sî keng-ha̍k-kàu-su kap Hoat-lī-sài-phài ê lâng chhōa chi̍t ê hū-jîn-lâng lâi, i teh hoān kan-îm ê sî hō͘ lâng lia̍h-tio̍h. In hō͘ i khiā tī tiong-ng,
43008004	mn̄g Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Lāu-su, chit-ê cha-bó͘-lâng hoān kan-îm ê sî hō͘ lâng lia̍h-tio̍h.
43008005	Kun-kù Lu̍t-hoat, [Mô͘-se] bēng-lēng lán tio̍h ēng chio̍h-thâu tìm-sí chit khoán cha-bó͘-lâng. Lí ū sím-mi̍h ì-kiàn?”
43008006	In án-ni kóng sī beh chhì-thàm Iâ-so͘, thang chhē khang-phāng kā I kò. Iâ-so͘ khû lo̍h-khì, ēng chńg-thâu-á tī thô͘-kha siá-jī.
43008007	In ti̍t-ti̍t kā I mn̄g, Iâ-so͘ chiū khiā khí-lâi, tùi in kóng, “Lín tiong-kan bô-chōe ê lâng seng the̍h chio̍h-thâu kā i tìm.”
43008008	Jiân-āu I koh khû lo̍h-khì tī thô͘-kha siá-jī.
43008009	In chi̍t-ē thiaⁿ-tio̍h chiah-ê ōe, tùi lāu ê khai-sí chi̍t-ê chi̍t-ê liu chhut-khì, chhun Iâ-so͘ chi̍t ê, hit-ê hū-jîn-lâng iáu khiā tī hia.
43008010	Iâ-so͘ khiā khí-lâi, kā i kóng, “Hū-jîn-lâng, in tī tó-ūi? Bô-lâng kā lí tēng-chōe sī-bô?”
43008011	I ìn kóng, “Sian-siⁿ, bô.” Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Góa mā bô kā lí tēng-chōe. Lí tńg-khì, í-āu m̄-thang koh hoān-chōe.” ]
43008012	Iâ-so͘ koh kā chèng-lâng kóng, “Góa sī sè-kan ê kng; tè góa ê lâng bōe tī o͘-àm tiong seng-oa̍h, hoán-tńg ū oa̍h-miā ê kng.”
43008013	[Hoat-lī-sài]-phài ê lâng chiū tùi I kóng, “Lí teh ūi ka-kī choh-chèng, lí ê kiàn-chèng bô-hāu.”
43008014	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Sui-jiân góa ūi ka-kī choh-chèng, góa ê kiàn-chèng ū-hāu, in-ūi góa chai góa tùi tó-ūi lâi, beh khì tó-ūi; m̄-kú lín m̄-chai góa tùi tó-ūi lâi, beh khì tó-ūi.
43008015	Lín ēng lâng ê phiau-chún phoe-phòaⁿ lâng, góa bô kā lâng phoe-phòaⁿ.
43008016	Góa nā phoe-phòaⁿ, góa ê phòaⁿ-toàn chèng-khak, in-ūi góa m̄-sī ka-kī chi̍t ê teh phòaⁿ-toàn, sī chhe góa ê Pē kap góa chòe-hé phòaⁿ-toàn.
43008017	Koh lín ê Lu̍t-hoat ū kì-chài, ū nn̄g lâng choh-chèng, in ê kiàn-chèng chiah ū-hāu.
43008018	Góa ūi ka-kī choh-chèng, chhe góa ê Pē mā ūi góa choh-chèng.”
43008019	In chiū mn̄g Iâ-so͘, “Lí ê Pē tī tó-ūi?” Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Lín m̄-bat góa, mā m̄-bat góa ê Pē. Lín nā bat góa, mā ōe bat góa ê Pē.”
43008020	Chiah-ê ōe sī Iâ-so͘ tī Sèng-tiān kà-sī lâng ê sî, tī khǹg hōng-hiàn-kūi hia kóng ê. Put-kò bô-lâng kā I lia̍h, in-ūi I ê sî iáu-bē kàu.
43008021	Iâ-so͘ koh kā in kóng, “Góa beh lī-khui lah. Lín ōe chhē góa, m̄-kú lín ōe in-ūi ka-kī ê chōe lâi sí; góa khì ê só͘-chāi, lín bōe-tàng khì.”
43008022	[Iû-thài]-kàu ê léng-siù kóng, “I kóng ‘Góa khì ê só͘-chāi, lín bōe-tàng khì’, kiám kóng I beh khì chū-sat?”
43008023	Iâ-so͘ kā in kóng, “Lín tùi ē-bīn lâi, góa tùi téng-bīn lâi. Lín sio̍k chit sè-kan, góa bô sio̍k chit sè-kan.
43008024	Só͘-í góa chiah kā lín kóng lín ōe in-ūi ka-kī ê chōe lâi sí; in-ūi lín nā m̄-sìn góa chiū-sī ‘Chū-iú-éng-iú’ Hit-ūi, lín ōe in-ūi ka-kī ê chōe lâi sí.”
43008025	In chiū mn̄g Iâ-so͘, “Lí sī sím-mi̍h lâng?” Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Góa tùi khí-thâu chiū kā lín kóng lah.
43008026	Koan-hē lín, góa ū chin chōe thang kóng, thang tēng-chōe. M̄-kú chhe góa Hit-ūi sī chin-si̍t, góa chiong tùi I thiaⁿ-tio̍h ê thoân hō͘ sè-kan-lâng.”
43008027	In bô liáu-kái Iâ-so͘ sī tùi in teh kóng Pē ê tāi-chì.
43008028	Só͘-í Iâ-so͘ kā in kóng, “Lín kú-khí Jîn-chú liáu-āu chiū ōe chai, góa chiū-sī ‘Chū-iú-éng-iú’ hit-ūi, koh góa chòe tāi-chì bô chi̍t hāng sī chiàu góa ka-kī ê ì-sù, chí-ū chiàu Pē kà-sī góa ê lâi kóng.
43008029	Chhe góa Hit-ūi kap góa tông-chāi; I m̄-bat pàng góa ka-kī chi̍t ê, in-ūi góa put-sî teh chòe I só͘ hoaⁿ-hí ê tāi-chì.”
43008030	Iâ-so͘ kóng chiah-ê ōe ê sî, ū chin chōe lâng sìn I.
43008031	Iâ-so͘ tùi sìn I hiah-ê [Iû-thài]-lâng kóng, “Lín nā kè-sio̍k chun-siú góa ê ōe, chiū si̍t-chāi sī góa ê bûn-tô͘;
43008032	lín ōe bat chin-lí, chin-lí ōe hō͘ lín tit-tio̍h chū-iû.”
43008033	In ìn kóng, “Goán sī [A-pek-la-hán] ê kiáⁿ-sun, m̄-bat chòe lâng ê lô͘-lē. Lí ná-ōe kóng ‘Lín ōe tit-tio̍h chū-iû’?”
43008034	Iâ-so͘ kā in kóng, “Góa si̍t-si̍t chāi-chāi kā lín kóng, ta̍k ê hoān-chōe ê lâng chiū-sī chōe ê lô͘-lē.
43008035	Lô͘-lē bô éng-oán sio̍k tī chú-lâng ê ka-têng, kiáⁿ chiū éng-oán ū.
43008036	Só͘-í, Siōng-tè ê Kiáⁿ nā hō͘ lín chū-iû, lín chiū si̍t-chāi ū chū-iû.
43008037	Góa chai lín sī [A-pek-la-hán] ê kiáⁿ-sun; m̄-kú lín siūⁿ-beh thâi góa, in-ūi lín m̄ chiap-siū góa ê ōe.
43008038	Góa sī teh kóng tùi góa ê Pē hia khòaⁿ-tio̍h ê; lín sī teh chòe tùi lín ê pē hia thiaⁿ-tio̍h ê.”
43008039	In ìn Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Goán ê pē sī [A-pek-la-hán].” Iâ-so͘ tùi in kóng, “Lín nā-sī [A-pek-la-hán] ê kiáⁿ-sun, lín ōe chòe [A-pek-la-hán] só͘ chòe ê tāi-chì.
43008040	Hiān-chāi góa chiong tùi Siōng-tè thiaⁿ-tio̍h ê chin-lí kā lín kóng, lín soah siūⁿ-beh thâi góa. [A-pek-la-hán] pèng bô chòe chit khoán tāi-chì.
43008041	Lín sī teh chòe lín ê pē só͘ chòe ê tāi-chì.” In ìn kóng, “Goán m̄-sī su-seng-chú; Siōng-tè sī goán î-it ê Pē.”
43008042	Iâ-so͘ chiū tùi in kóng, “Siōng-tè nā chin-chiàⁿ sī lín ê Pē, lín ōe thiàⁿ góa, in-ūi góa tùi Siōng-tè hia lâi, hiān-chāi tī chia. Góa m̄-sī chiàu góa ka-kī ê ì-sù lâi, sī Siōng-tè chhe-khián góa lâi.
43008043	Sī-án-chóaⁿ lín bô bêng-pe̍k góa ê ōe? Sī in-ūi góa ê ōe lín thiaⁿ bōe ji̍p-khì.
43008044	Lín ê pē sī Mô͘-kúi; lín kan-ta siūⁿ-beh si̍t-hêng lín ê pē ê io̍k-bōng. I tùi khí-thâu chiū-sī sat-jîn-hoān, bô chun-siú chin-lí, in-ūi i ê lāi-bīn bô chin-lí. Kóng pe̍h-chha̍t sī i ê pún-sèng, in-ūi i sī kóng pe̍h-chha̍t ê, mā-sī kóng pe̍h-chha̍t ê lâng ê pē.
43008045	In-ūi góa kóng chin-lí, lín m̄-sìn góa.
43008046	Lín tiong-kan sím-mi̍h lâng ōe-tàng chí-chèng góa ū chōe? Kì-jiân góa kóng chin-lí, sī-án-chóaⁿ lín m̄-sìn góa?
43008047	Sio̍k Siōng-tè ê lâng thiaⁿ Siōng-tè ê ōe; lín m̄-thiaⁿ, in-ūi lín m̄-sī sio̍k Siōng-tè.”
43008048	[Iû-thài]-kàu ê léng-siù tùi Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Goán kóng lí sī [Sat-má-lī-a]-lâng, koh hoān-tio̍h kúi, kiám m̄-tio̍h?”
43008049	Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Góa bô hoān-tio̍h kúi; góa chun-kèng góa ê Pē, lín tian-tò bô chun-kèng góa.
43008050	Góa bô tui-kiû ka-kī ê êng-kng, put-kò ū Chi̍t-ūi ūi-tio̍h góa tui-kiû, ūi-tio̍h góa chhâi-koat.
43008051	Góa si̍t-si̍t chāi-chāi kā lín kóng, chun-siú góa ê ōe ê lâng it-tēng éng-oán bōe sí.”
43008052	[Iû-thài]-kàu ê léng-siù ìn kóng, “Taⁿ goán khak-si̍t chai lí hoān-tio̍h kúi. [A-pek-la-hán] í-keng sí, chèng sian-ti mā sí-khì, lí ná kóng ‘chun-siú góa ê ōe ê lâng éng-oán bōe sí’?
43008053	Lí kiám pí goán ê pē [A-pek-la-hán] khah úi-tāi? I í-keng sí, chèng sian-ti mā sí-khì. Lí siūⁿ lí sī siáⁿ-lâng?”
43008054	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Góa nā êng-iāu ka-kī, góa ê êng-kng chiū bô kè-ta̍t. Êng-iāu góa ê sī góa ê Pē, chiū-sī lín kóng ‘I sī goán ê Siōng-tè’ Hit-ūi.
43008055	Lín m̄-bat I, m̄-kú góa bat I. Góa nā kóng góa m̄-bat I, góa chiū kap lín kâng-khoán sī pe̍h-chha̍t. M̄-kú góa bat I, koh chun-siú I ê ōe.
43008056	Lín ê pē [A-pek-la-hán] hoaⁿ-hí teh thèng-hāu góa lâi-lîm ê ji̍t-chí; i ū khòaⁿ-tio̍h, khòaⁿ-liáu chin hoaⁿ-hí.”
43008057	[Iû-thài]-kàu ê léng-siù tùi Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Lí iáu-bē gō͘-cha̍p hè, kiám bat khòaⁿ-tio̍h [A-pek-la-hán]?”
43008058	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Góa si̍t-si̍t chāi-chāi kā lín kóng, [A-pek-la-hán] iáu-bē chhut-sì, góa í-keng chûn-chāi.”
43008059	In chiū the̍h chio̍h-thâu beh kā I tìm; m̄-kú Iâ-so͘ siám-khui, lī-khui Sèng-tiān.
43009001	Iâ-so͘ keng-kè ê sî, khòaⁿ-tio̍h chi̍t ê chhut-sì chiū sit-bêng ê lâng.
43009002	I ê bûn-tô͘ kā I mn̄g, “Lia̍p-pí, chit-ê lâng chhut-sì chiū sit-bêng, sī siáⁿ-lâng hoān-chōe, sī i pún-sin á-sī i ê pē-bú?”
43009003	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “M̄-sī in-ūi chit-ê lâng hoān-chōe, mā m̄-sī i ê pē-bú hoān-chōe, sī beh thong-kè i lâi hián-bêng Siōng-tè ê chok-ûi.
43009004	Thàn iáu sī ji̍t-sî, lán tio̍h chòe chhe góa Hit-ūi ê kang; àm-sî chi̍t-ē kàu, bô-lâng ōe-tàng chòe-kang.
43009005	Góa tī sè-kan ê sî, sī sè-kan ê kng.”
43009006	Chiah-ê ōe kóng liáu, I phùi chhùi-nōa tī thô͘-kha, ēng chhùi-nōa chhiau thô͘, jiân-āu ēng thô͘ kô͘ hit-ê lâng ê ba̍k-chiu,
43009007	kā i kóng, “Lí khì [Se-lô-a]-tî sóe,” --- [Se-lô-a] ê ì-sù sī “Hōng chhe-khián” --- i chiū khì sóe, tńg-lâi ê sî í-keng ōe khòaⁿ-kìⁿ.
43009008	I ê chhù-piⁿ kap bat khòaⁿ-tio̍h i í-chêng teh chòe khit-chia̍h ê lâng, kóng, “Chit-ê kiám m̄-sī put-sî chē teh kā lâng pun hit-ê lâng?”
43009009	Ū lâng kóng, “I chiū-sī.” Koh ū lâng kóng, “M̄-sī; sī chhin-chhiūⁿ i.” M̄-kú hit-ê lâng ka-kī kóng, “Góa chiū-sī.”
43009010	In koh mn̄g i, “Lí ê ba̍k-chiu án-chóaⁿ ōe khòaⁿ-kìⁿ?”
43009011	I ìn kóng, “Kiò-chòe Iâ-so͘ hit-ê lâng chhiau thô͘ kô͘ góa ê ba̍k-chiu, kā góa kóng, ‘lí khì [Se-lô-a]-tî sóe’; góa khì, chi̍t-ē sóe, chiū ōe khòaⁿ-kìⁿ.”
43009012	In mn̄g i, “Hit-ê lâng tī tó-ūi?” I kóng, “Góa m̄-chai.”
43009013	In chiū chhōa í-chêng sit-bêng hit-ê lâng khì Hoat-lī-sài-phài ê lâng hia.
43009014	Iâ-so͘ chhiau thô͘ lâi khui i ê ba̍k-chiu hit ji̍t sī An-hioh-ji̍t.
43009015	Só͘-í, Hoat-lī-sài-lâng koh chi̍t piàn mn̄g i sī án-chóaⁿ ōe khòaⁿ-kìⁿ. I kā in kóng, “I ēng thô͘ kô͘ góa ê ba̍k-chiu, góa khì sóe, chiū ū khòaⁿ-kìⁿ.”
43009016	Ū chi̍t-kóa [Hoat-lī-sài]-lâng kóng, “Chit-ê lâng m̄-sī tùi Siōng-tè hia lâi ê, in-ūi I bô siú An-hioh-ji̍t.” Koh ū pa̍t ê lâng kóng, “Chi̍t ê ū-chōe ê lâng ná ōe-tàng kiâⁿ chit khoán sîn-jiah?” In tiong-kan soah khí hun-lia̍t.
43009017	Hoat-lī-sài-lâng chiū mn̄g hit-ê sit-bêng ê lâng, “Kì-jiân I hō͘ lí ê ba̍k-chiu ū khòaⁿ-kìⁿ, lí kóng I sī sím-mi̍h lâng?” I ìn kóng, “I sī sian-ti.”
43009018	[Iû-thài]-kàu ê léng-siù it-ti̍t bô siong-sìn i í-chêng sit-bêng, hiān-chāi ū khòaⁿ-kìⁿ, chiū tiàu i ê pē-bú lâi,
43009019	mn̄g in kóng, “Chit-ê sī lín kóng chhut-sì chiū sit-bêng hit-ê kiáⁿ sī-bô? Sī án-chóaⁿ i hiān-chāi ōe khòaⁿ-kìⁿ?”
43009020	I ê pē-bú ìn kóng, “Goán chai i sī goán kiáⁿ, chhut-sì chiū sit-bêng.
43009021	M̄-kú i hiān-chāi án-chóaⁿ ōe khòaⁿ-kìⁿ, goán m̄-chai; mā m̄-chai sím-mi̍h lâng hō͘ i ōe khòaⁿ-kìⁿ. Lín kā i mn̄g, i í-keng tōa-hàn, ka-kī ōe-hiáu ìn.”
43009022	I ê pē-bú án-ni kóng, sī in-ūi kiaⁿ [Iû-thài]-kàu ê léng-siù; in-ūi in í-keng chham-siông hó-sè, nā ū lâng sêng-jīn Iâ-so͘ sī Ki-tok, tio̍h tùi hōe-tn̂g kā i kóaⁿ chhut-khì.
43009023	In-ūi án-ni, i ê pē-bú chiah kóng, “I í-keng tōa-hàn, lín kā i mn̄g.”
43009024	[Hoat-lī-sài]-lâng tē-jī piàn kiò hit-ê chhut-sì chiū sit-bêng ê lâi, kā i kóng, “Tī Siōng-tè bīn-chêng tio̍h chiàu-si̍t kóng. Goán chai chit-ê lâng sī ū-chōe ê lâng.”
43009025	I ìn kóng, “I sī ū chōe ê lâng á m̄-sī, góa m̄-chai. Góa chí-ū chai chi̍t hāng tāi-chì, góa chêng sit-bêng, taⁿ ōe khòaⁿ-kìⁿ.”
43009026	In chiū mn̄g i, “I kā lí chòe sím-mi̍h? I án-chóaⁿ hō͘ lí ōe khòaⁿ-kìⁿ?”
43009027	I ìn kóng, “Góa í-keng kā lín kóng lah, lín m̄-thiaⁿ, lín ná beh koh thiaⁿ? Lín mā siūⁿ-beh chòe I ê bûn-tô͘ sī-bô?”
43009028	In chiū kā i mē, “Lí chiah-sī hit-ê lâng ê bûn-tô͘; goán sī [Mô͘-se] ê bûn-tô͘.
43009029	Goán chai Siōng-tè bat tùi [Mô͘-se] kóng-ōe, m̄-kú chit-ê lâng, i tùi tó-ūi lâi, goán m̄-chai.”
43009030	Hit-ê lâng ìn kóng, “Án-ni ū-kàu kî-koài! I i-hó góa ê ba̍k-chiu, lín iáu-kú m̄-chai I tùi tó-ūi lâi?
43009031	Lán chai Siōng-tè bô thiaⁿ chōe-jîn ê kî-kiû; m̄-kú lâng nā kèng-ùi Siōng-tè, si̍t-hêng I ê chí-ì, Siōng-tè chiū kā i thiaⁿ.
43009032	Tùi chhòng-sè í-lâi, iáu m̄-bat thiaⁿ-kìⁿ kóng ū lâng hō͘ chhut-sì chiū sit-bêng ê lâng ōe khòaⁿ-kìⁿ.
43009033	Chit-ê lâng nā m̄-sī tùi Siōng-tè lâi, bōe-tàng chòe chit khoán tāi-chì.”
43009034	In chiū tùi i kóng, “Lí chhut-sì chiū ū-chōe, tī chōe tiong tōa-hàn, koh káⁿ beh kà-sī goán!” In chiū kā i kóaⁿ chhut-khì.
43009035	Iâ-so͘ thiaⁿ-tio̍h in kā i kóaⁿ-chhut hōe-tn̂g, āu-lâi chhē-tio̍h i, chiū kā i mn̄g, “Lí ū sìn Jîn-chú bô?”
43009036	I ìn kóng, “Sian-siⁿ, sím-mi̍h lâng sī Jîn-chú, góa thang sìn I?”
43009037	Iâ-so͘ tùi i kóng, “Lí í-keng ū khòaⁿ-tio̍h I; chit-chūn teh kap lí kóng-ōe ê chiū-sī I.”
43009038	I kóng, “Chú ah, góa sìn,” chiū kūi lo̍h-khì kā I pài.
43009039	Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Góa ūi-tio̍h sím-phòaⁿ lâi-kàu chit sè-kan, thang hō͘ sit-bêng-ê khòaⁿ-kìⁿ, hō͘ ba̍k-kng-ê pìⁿ-chòe sit-bêng.”
43009040	Chi̍t-kóa [Hoat-lī-sài]-lâng thiaⁿ-tio̍h chiū mn̄g Iâ-so͘, “Lí sī kóng goán mā sit-bêng ò͘?”
43009041	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Lín nā sit-bêng chiū bô-chōe; m̄-kú lín kóng ‘Goán sī ba̍k-kng-ê’, án-ni lín iáu ū-chōe.”
43010001	“Góa si̍t-si̍t chāi-chāi kā lín kóng, beh ji̍p-khì iûⁿ-tiâu, bô tùi mn̂g ji̍p, tùi pa̍t só͘-chāi pôaⁿ kè-khì ê, sī chha̍t, sī kiông-tō.
43010002	Tùi mn̂g ji̍p-khì ê chiah-sī iûⁿ ê bo̍k-chiá.
43010003	Kò͘-mn̂g-ê kā bo̍k-chiá khui-mn̂g; iûⁿ jīn-tit bo̍k-chiá ê siaⁿ. I Ka-kī ê iûⁿ, chi̍t-chiah chi̍t-chiah kiò-miâ chhōa in chhut-lâi.
43010004	I chhōa ka-kī ê iûⁿ chhut-lâi liáu-āu, kiâⁿ tī iûⁿ ê thâu-chêng, iûⁿ chiū tè i kiâⁿ, in-ūi jīn-tit i ê siaⁿ.
43010005	In it-tēng bōe tè siⁿ-hūn-lâng, tian-tò ōe cháu-siám, in-ūi in m̄-bat siⁿ-hūn-lâng ê siaⁿ.”
43010006	Iâ-so͘ kā in kóng chit-ê phì-jū, m̄-kú in m̄-chai I teh kā in kóng sím-mi̍h.
43010007	Só͘-í, Iâ-so͘ koh kā in kóng, “Góa si̍t-si̍t chāi-chāi kā lín kóng, góa sī iûⁿ ê mn̂g.
43010008	Só͘-ū pí góa khah tāi-seng lâi ê lóng sī chha̍t, sī kiông-tō, iûⁿ bōe thiaⁿ in.
43010009	Góa sī mn̂g; thong-kè góa chit-ê mn̂g ji̍p-lâi ê, ōe an-choân, thang chhut-chhut ji̍p-ji̍p, koh ōe chhē-tio̍h chháu-tiûⁿ.
43010010	Chha̍t lâi, it-tēng sī beh thau-the̍h, beh thâi, beh húi-bia̍t. Góa lâi sī beh hō͘ in tit-tio̍h oa̍h-miā, tit-kah chin chhiong-chiok.
43010011	“Góa sī hó ê bo̍k-chiá; hó ê bo̍k-chiá ūi-tio̍h iûⁿ pàng-sak sìⁿ-miā.
43010012	Hō͘ lâng chhiàⁿ ê m̄-sī bo̍k-chiá, iûⁿ m̄-sī ka-kī ê, i chi̍t-ē khòaⁿ-tio̍h chhâi-lông lâi chiū kā iûⁿ pàng-teh, tô-cháu; chhâi-lông chiong iûⁿ kā-khì, kā in kóaⁿ-sòaⁿ.
43010013	I tô-cháu, in-ūi i sī hō͘ lâng chhiàⁿ ê, bô chin-chiàⁿ koan-sim iûⁿ-kûn.
43010014	Góa sī hó ê bo̍k-chiá; góa bat góa ka-kī ê iûⁿ, góa ka-kī ê iûⁿ mā bat góa.
43010015	Chhin-chhiūⁿ Pē bat góa, góa mā bat Pē. Góa ūi-tio̍h iûⁿ pàng-sak sìⁿ-miā.
43010016	Góa iáu ū kî-tha ê iûⁿ bô sio̍k chit-ê iûⁿ-tiâu; góa mā it-tēng tio̍h chhōa in lâi. In ōe thiaⁿ góa ê siaⁿ, mā ōe chiâⁿ-chòe chi̍t kûn, kui-sio̍k chi̍t ê bo̍k-chiá.
43010017	“Pē thiàⁿ góa, in-ūi góa pàng-sak ka-kī ê sìⁿ-miā, thang koh tit-tio̍h sìⁿ-miā.
43010018	Bô-lâng chhiúⁿ góa ê sìⁿ-miā, sī góa chū-goān pàng-sak. Góa ū koân pàng-sak, mā ū koân the̍h-tńg-lâi. Che sī góa tùi Pē chiap-siū ê bēng-lēng.”
43010019	In-ūi Iâ-so͘ só͘ kóng chiah-ê ōe, [Iû-thài]-lâng koh khí hun-lia̍t.
43010020	In tiong-kan ū chin chōe lâng kóng, “I hoān-tio̍h kúi, cheng-sîn sit-siông, ná-tio̍h thiaⁿ I ê ōe?”
43010021	Lēng-gōa ū lâng kóng, “Hoān-tio̍h kúi ê lâng bōe kóng chiah-ê ōe. Kúi kiám ōe khui sit-bêng ê lâng ê ba̍k-chiu?”
43010022	[Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] tú teh khèng-chiok Hiàn-tiān-choeh, hit sî sī tang-thiⁿ.
43010023	Iâ-so͘ tī Sèng-tiān ê [Só͘-lô-bûn] cháu-lông teh kiâⁿ.
43010024	[Iû-thài]-lâng kā Iâ-so͘ ûi-teh, tùi I kóng, “Lí beh hō͘ goán chhai-gî jōa kú ? Lí nā-sī Ki-tok, tio̍h chiàu-si̍t kā goán kóng.”
43010025	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Góa í-keng ū kā lín kóng, lín m̄-sìn. Góa hōng góa ê Pē ê miâ só͘ chòe ê tāi-chì teh ūi góa choh-chèng.
43010026	M̄-kú lín m̄-sìn, in-ūi lín m̄-sī góa ê iûⁿ.
43010027	Góa ê iûⁿ thiaⁿ góa ê siaⁿ, góa bat in, in tè góa.
43010028	Góa sù in éng-oán ê oa̍h-miā; in éng-oán bōe bia̍t-bông; bô-lâng ōe tùi góa ê chhiú kā in chhiúⁿ-khì.
43010029	Chiong iûⁿ sù hō͘ góa ê Pē pí it-chhè khah úi-tāi; bô-lâng ōe-tàng kā in tùi Pē ê chhiú chhiúⁿ-khì.
43010030	Góa kap Pē sī chi̍t-ê.”
43010031	[Iû-thài]-lâng koh the̍h chio̍h-thâu beh kā I tìm.
43010032	Iâ-so͘ tùi in kóng, “Pē kiò góa chòe ê chin chōe hó tāi-chì, góa í-keng ū chòe hō͘ lín khòaⁿ, lín sī ūi-tio̍h tó chi̍t hāng beh ēng chio̍h-thâu kā góa tìm?”
43010033	[Iû-thài]-lâng ìn kóng, “Goán beh ēng chio̍h-thâu kā lí tìm, m̄-sī in-ūi lí chòe ê hó tāi-chì, sī in-ūi lí siat-to̍k Siōng-tè. Lí put-kò sī lâng, iáu-kú chū-chheng chòe Siōng-tè.”
43010034	Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Lín ê Lu̍t-hoat kiám m̄-sī ū kì-chài ‘Góa kóng: Lín sī sîn’?
43010035	Sèng-keng ê ōe éng-oán bōe kái-piàn. Kì-jiân Siōng-tè chheng-ho͘ hiah-ê chiap-siū Siōng-tè ê ōe ê lâng chòe sîn,
43010036	án-ni, góa sī Pē hun-pia̍t chòe sèng, koh chhe-khián ji̍p sè-kan ê, sī-án-chóaⁿ góa kóng ‘Góa sī Siōng-tè ê Kiáⁿ’, lín chiū kóng góa siat-to̍k Siōng-tè?
43010037	Góa nā m̄-sī teh chòe góa ê Pē ê tāi-chì, lín m̄-bián sìn góa;
43010038	góa nā teh chòe Pē ê tāi-chì, sui-jiân lín m̄-sìn góa, mā tio̍h sìn góa só͘ chòe ê tāi-chì, thang hō͘ lín khak-si̍t chai Pē tī góa lāi-bīn, góa tī Pē lāi-bīn.”
43010039	In koh siūⁿ-beh kā I lia̍h, I chiū siám-cháu lī-khui.
43010040	Iâ-so͘ koh kè-khì [Iok-tàn]-hô tùi-hōaⁿ, kàu khah-chá [Iok-hān] kā lâng sóe-lé ê só͘-chāi, tī hia tòa.
43010041	Ū chin chōe lâng lâi kìⁿ Iâ-so͘, kóng, “Sui-jiân [Iok-hān] bô kiâⁿ sîn-jiah, i só͘ kóng it-chhè koan-hē chit-ê lâng ê tāi-chì lóng khak-si̍t.”
43010042	Tī hia ū chin chōe lâng sìn Iâ-so͘.
43011001	Ū chi̍t ê lâng kiò-chòe [Lia̍p-sat-lō͘], phòa-pīⁿ, tòa tī [Pek-tāi-nî], chiū-sī [Má-lī-a] kap i ê a-chí [Má-tāi] tòa ê chng-siā.
43011002	Chit-ê [Má-lī-a] bat ēng phang-iû boah Chú, koh ēng thâu-mn̂g chhit I ê kha; i ê sió-tī [Lia̍p-sat-lō͘] phòa-pīⁿ.
43011003	Chit nn̄g ê chí-bē chhe lâng khì kìⁿ Iâ-so͘, kóng, “Chú ah, lí só͘ thiàⁿ ê lâng teh phòa-pīⁿ.”
43011004	Iâ-so͘ thiaⁿ-tio̍h chiū kóng, “Chit-ê pīⁿ bōe tì-kàu sí; sī beh hián-bêng Siōng-tè ê êng-kng, thang hō͘ Siōng-tè ê Kiáⁿ tùi chit hāng tāi-chì tit-tio̍h êng-kng.”
43011005	Iâ-so͘ chin thiàⁿ [Má-tāi] kap i ê sió-bē, í-ki̍p [Lia̍p-sat-lō͘].
43011006	I thiaⁿ-tio̍h [Lia̍p-sat-lō͘] phòa-pīⁿ, kè-sio̍k tī hit só͘-chāi tòa nn̄g ji̍t.
43011007	Āu-lâi, I kā bûn-tô͘ kóng, “Lán koh lâi-khì [Iû-thài].”
43011008	Bûn-tô͘ ìn kóng, “Lia̍p-pí, [Iû-thài]-lâng tú-á chiah teh chhē ki-hōe beh ēng chio̍h-thâu kā lí tìm, lí kiám beh koh khì hia?”
43011009	Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Ji̍t-sî kiám m̄-sī ū cha̍p-jī tiám-cheng? Lâng nā tī ji̍t-sî kiâⁿ chiū bōe poa̍h-tó, in-ūi ū khòaⁿ-kìⁿ chit sè-kài ê kng.
43011010	Lâng nā tī àm-sî kiâⁿ ōe poa̍h-tó, in-ūi i bô kng.”
43011011	Iâ-so͘ kóng chiah-ê ōe liáu, koh kā in kóng, “Lán ê pêng-iú [Lia̍p-sat-lō͘] khùn-khì lah, góa beh lâi-khì kā i kiò chhíⁿ.”
43011012	Bûn-tô͘ kóng, “Chú ah, i nā-sī khùn-khì chiū ōe hó khí-lâi.”
43011013	Iâ-so͘ sī kóng [Lia̍p-sat-lō͘] í-keng sí-khì, m̄-kú in siūⁿ-chòe i chin-chiàⁿ teh khùn.
43011014	Só͘-í Iâ-so͘ bêng-bêng kā in kóng, “[Lia̍p-sat-lō͘] sí-khì lah.
43011015	Ūi-tio̍h lín ê iân-kò͘, kai-chài góa bô tī-hia, sī beh hō͘ lín sìn góa. Taⁿ, lán lâi-khì i hia.”
43011016	Hit-ê kiò-chòe [Siang-siⁿ-á] ê [To-má] kā bûn-tô͘-phōaⁿ kóng, “Lán mā lâi-khì kap I chòe-hé sí!”
43011017	Iâ-so͘ kàu [Pek-tāi-nî] ê sî chiah chai [Lia̍p-sat-lō͘] í-keng chòng tī bōng-lāi sì ji̍t.
43011018	[Pek-tāi-nî] lī [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] chha-put-to saⁿ kong-lí;
43011019	ū chin chōe [Iû-thài]-lâng in-ūi in sió-tī ê tāi-chì lâi an-ùi [Má-tāi] kap [Má-lī-a].
43011020	[Má-tāi] thiaⁿ-tio̍h Iâ-so͘ kàu-ūi, chiū chhut-khì kā I gêng-chiap; [Má-lī-a] iû-goân chē tī chhù-lāi.
43011021	[Má-tāi] kā Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Chú ah, lí nā ū tī chia, góa ê sió-tī chiū bōe sí.
43011022	Sīm-chì hiān-chāi, góa chai lí bô-lūn tùi Siōng-tè kiû sím-mi̍h, I lóng ōe hō͘ lí!”
43011023	Iâ-so͘ kā i kóng, “Lí ê sió-tī ōe-koh oa̍h khí-lâi.”
43011024	Má-tāi ìn kóng, “Góa chai tī Boa̍t-ji̍t koh-oa̍h ê sî, i ōe koh-oa̍h.”
43011025	Iâ-so͘ kā i kóng, “Góa sī koh-oa̍h, sī oa̍h-miā; sìn góa ê lâng sui-jiân sí, iáu-kú ōe oa̍h.
43011026	Só͘-ū hiān-chāi teh oa̍h lâi sìn góa ê lâng éng-oán bōe sí. Lí ū sìn bô?”
43011027	[Má-tāi] ìn kóng, “Chú ah, góa sìn lí sī Ki-tok, sī hit-ūi teh-beh lâi sè-kan ê Siōng-tè ê Kiáⁿ.”
43011028	[Má-tāi] kóng chiah-ê ōe liáu-āu chiū tńg-khì, kiò i ê sió-bē [Má-lī-a] lâi, su-hā kā i kóng, “Lāu-su lâi lah, I teh kiò lí.”
43011029	[Má-lī-a] chi̍t-ē thiaⁿ-tio̍h, kóaⁿ-kín khí-lâi, khì Iâ-so͘ hia.
43011030	Hit sî Iâ-so͘ iáu-bē kàu chng-lāi, iáu tī [Má-tāi] khì gêng-chiap I ê só͘-chāi.
43011031	Tī chhù-lāi teh an-ùi [Má-lī-a] ê [Iû-thài]-lâng, khòaⁿ-tio̍h [Má-lī-a] kóaⁿ-kín peh khí-lâi koh cháu chhut-khì, chiū tè i khì, siūⁿ-kóng i beh khì bōng hia khàu.
43011032	[Má-lī-a] kàu Iâ-so͘ hia, khòaⁿ-tio̍h I, chiū phak lo̍h-khì I ê kha-chêng, tùi I kóng, “Chú ah, lí nā ū tī chia, góa ê sió-tī chiū bōe sí.”
43011033	Iâ-so͘ khòaⁿ-tio̍h i teh khàu, koh khòaⁿ-tio̍h kap i chòe-hé lâi hiah-ê [Iû-thài]-lâng mā teh khàu, sim chin pi-siong kek-tōng,
43011034	mn̄g in kóng, “Lín kā i chòng tī tó-ūi?” In ìn kóng, “Chú ah, lâi-khì khòaⁿ.”
43011035	Iâ-so͘ lâu ba̍k-sái.
43011036	Iû-thài-lâng kóng, “Lí khòaⁿ, I hiah-ni̍h thiàⁿ i!”
43011037	In tiong-kan ū chi̍t-kóa lâng kóng, “I bat hō͘ sit-bêng ê lâng ōe khòaⁿ-kìⁿ, kiám bōe-tàng hō͘ chit-ê lâng bô sí?”
43011038	Iâ-so͘ iū-koh chin pi-siong, lâi-kàu bōng hia; hit-ê bōng sī chi̍t ê tōng-hia̍t, ū chi̍t tè chio̍h that-teh.
43011039	Iâ-so͘ bēng-lēng, kóng, “Kā hit tè chio̍h sóa-khui!” Sí-khì hit-ê lâng ê a-chí [Má-tāi] kā Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Chú ah, i sí sì ji̍t lah, í-keng chhàu à.”
43011040	Iâ-so͘ kā i kóng, “Góa kiám bô kā lí kóng, lí nā sìn, ōe khòaⁿ-kìⁿ Siōng-tè ê êng-kng?”
43011041	In chiū chiong hit tè chio̍h sóa-khui. Iâ-so͘ gia̍h-ba̍k ǹg thiⁿ kóng, “Pē ah, góa kám-siā lí, in-ūi lí í-keng ū thiaⁿ góa ê kî-tó.
43011042	Góa chai lí put-sî lóng ū teh thiaⁿ góa ê kî-tó, m̄-kú góa án-ni kóng sī ūi-tio̍h khiā tī chiu-ûi ê kûn-chiòng, thang hō͘ in sìn lí ū chhe góa.”
43011043	Kóng soah, Iâ-so͘ tōa-siaⁿ hoah, “[Lia̍p-sat-lō͘], chhut-lâi!”
43011044	Hit-ê sí-khì ê lâng chiū chhut-lâi; i ê kha-chhiú chat pò͘, bīn ēng kun-á pau-teh. Iâ-so͘ kā in kóng, “Kā i tháu-khui, hō͘ i kiâⁿ!”
43011045	Lâi thàm [Má-lī-a] ê [Iû-thài]-lâng, ū chin chōe lâng khòaⁿ-tio̍h Iâ-so͘ ê só͘-chòe chiū sìn I.
43011046	Ū chi̍t-kóa lâng khì chhē [Hoat-lī-sài]-phài ê lâng, kā in pò-kò Iâ-so͘ só͘ chòe ê tāi-chì.
43011047	In-ūi án-ni, hiah-ê chè-si-tiúⁿ kap [Hoat-lī-sài]-lâng tiàu-khui gī-hōe, kóng, “Chit-ê lâng kiâⁿ chiah-ni̍h chōe sîn-jiah, lán beh án-chóaⁿ tùi-hù?
43011048	Lán nā pàng I kè-sio̍k án-ni chòe, tāi-ke lóng ōe khì sìn I, [Lô-má]-lâng ōe lâi húi-hoāi lán ê Sèng-tiān, koh húi-bia̍t lán ê bîn-cho̍k.”
43011049	Kî-tiong ū chi̍t ê lâng kiò-chòe [Kai-a-hoat], sī hit nî ê tōa-chè-si, i kā in kóng, “Lín m̄-bat pòaⁿ-hāng.
43011050	Lín bōe-hiáu siūⁿ, lêng-khó hō͘ chi̍t ê lâng thòe chèng-lâng sí, chiah-bián hō͘ choân bîn-cho̍k bia̍t-bông, án-ni tùi lín sī khah hó.”
43011051	I án-ni kóng m̄-sī ka-kī ê ì-sù, sī i chòe hit nî ê tōa-chè-si teh ū-giân Iâ-so͘ teh-beh ūi-tio̍h chit-ê bîn-cho̍k lâi sí;
43011052	m̄-nā ūi-tio̍h chit-ê bîn-cho̍k, mā beh chiong Siōng-tè sì-sòaⁿ ê kiáⁿ-jî chū-chi̍p chòe chi̍t-ê.
43011053	Tùi hit ji̍t khí, [Iû-thài]-kàu ê léng-siù kè-bô͘ beh thâi Iâ-so͘.
43011054	In-ūi án-ni, Iâ-so͘ bô koh kong-jiân tī [Iû-thài]-lâng ê tiong-kan chhut-ji̍p; I lī-khui hia, khì óa-kūn khòng-iá ê só͘-chāi, kàu chi̍t ê kiò-chòe [Í-hoat-liân] ê siâⁿ, kap I ê bûn-tô͘ tī hia tòa.
43011055	[Iû-thài]-lâng ê Pôaⁿ-kè-choeh teh-beh kàu. Choeh-kî chêng, ū chin chōe lâng tùi hiong-chhoan lâi-kàu [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] beh siú kiat-chēng-lé.
43011056	In teh chhē Iâ-so͘, khiā tī Sèng-tiān lāi hō͘-siōng mn̄g kóng, “Lín siūⁿ án-chóaⁿ? I it-tēng bōe lâi kè-choeh hò͘ⁿ?”
43011057	In-ūi hiah-ê chè-si-tiúⁿ kap [Hoat-lī-sài]-lâng ū hoat bēng-lēng, nā ū lâng chai Iâ-so͘ tī tó-ūi, tio̍h lâi pò-kò, hō͘ in thang khì kā I lia̍h.
43012001	Pôaⁿ-kè-choeh ê la̍k ji̍t chêng, Iâ-so͘ khì [Pek-tāi-nî], chiū-sī Iâ-so͘ hō͘ i tùi sí koh-oa̍h hit-ê [Lia̍p-sat-lō͘] tòa ê só͘-chāi.
43012002	Ū lâng tī hia ūi-tio̍h Iâ-so͘ chún-pī àm-tǹg. [Má-tāi] teh chiau-thāi; [Lia̍p-sat-lō͘] sī kap Iâ-so͘ kâng toh ê chi̍t ê.
43012003	[Má-lī-a] the̍h chi̍t koàn sûn ê ko-kùi ná-ta̍t phang-iû lâi boah Iâ-so͘ ê kha, koh ēng ka-kī ê thâu-mn̂g kā I chhit; iû ê phang-bī hō͘ kui chhù-lāi phang-kòng-kòng.
43012004	Iâ-so͘ ê chi̍t ê bûn-tô͘, chiū-sī āu-lâi chhut-bōe Iâ-so͘ hit-ê [Í-su-ka-lio̍k] ê [Iû-tāi], kóng,
43012005	“Ná m̄ the̍h chit-ê phang-iû khì bōe saⁿ-pah ê gûn-á lâi chín-chè sàn-chhiah-lâng?”
43012006	I án-ni kóng m̄-sī i koan-sim sàn-chhiah-lâng, sī in-ūi i sī chha̍t, koh siông-siông thau-the̍h i teh koán-lí ê kong-khóaⁿ.
43012007	Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Mài kā i tòng! Chit-ê phang-iû sī i ūi-tio̍h góa bâi-chòng ê ji̍t chún-pī ê.
43012008	Put-sî ū sàn-chhiah-lâng kap lín chòe-hé, put-kò góa bô put-sî kap lín chòe-hé.”
43012009	Ū chi̍t tōa-kûn [Iû-thài]-lâng thiaⁿ-tio̍h Iâ-so͘ tī [Pek-tāi-nî] chiū khì hia; in m̄-nā ūi-tio̍h beh khòaⁿ Iâ-so͘, mā siūⁿ-beh khòaⁿ Iâ-so͘ hō͘ i tùi sí koh-oa̍h hit-ê [Lia̍p-sat-lō͘].
43012010	Só͘-í, chiah-ê chè-si-tiúⁿ kè-bô͘ liân [Lia̍p-sat-lō͘] ia̍h beh kā i thâi,
43012011	in-ūi ū chin chōe [Iû-thài]-lâng ūi-tio̍h [Lia̍p-sat-lō͘] ê iân-kò͘ lī-khui in khì sìn Iâ-so͘.
43012012	Keh-ji̍t, lâi kè-choeh ê chi̍t tōa-kûn lâng thiaⁿ-tio̍h Iâ-so͘ beh lâi [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng],
43012013	chiū gia̍h chang-chhiū-ki chhut-khì gêng-chiap, hoah kóng: Hô-sán-ná! Hōng Chú ê miâ lâi Hit-ūi eng-kai siū chheng-chàn! Í-sek-lia̍t ê Ông eng-kai siū chheng-chàn!
43012014	Iâ-so͘ khòaⁿ-tio̍h chi̍t chiah lû-á-kiáⁿ, chiū khan lâi khiâ. Chiàu Sèng-keng só͘ kì-chài:
43012015	Sek-an ê hū-jîn-lâng ah, m̄-bián kiaⁿ! Khòaⁿ, lín ê Ông khiâ lû-á-kiáⁿ teh lâi lah!
43012016	I ê bûn-tô͘ goân-lâi bōe liáu-kái chit hāng tāi-chì, m̄-kú Iâ-so͘ tit-tio̍h êng-kng ê sî, in chiah siūⁿ-tio̍h Sèng-keng só͘ kì-chài chit hāng tāi-chì sī teh chí Iâ-so͘; tāi-chì mā chiàu án-ni hoat-seng tī I sin-chiūⁿ.
