43012017	Iâ-so͘ kiò [Lia̍p-sat-lō͘] chhut bōng hō͘ i tùi sí koh-oa̍h hit sî, kap Iâ-so͘ chòe-hé tī hia hit kûn lâng ū kè-sio̍k teh chòe kiàn-chèng.
43012018	Chèng-lâng mā chhut-khì gêng-chiap Iâ-so͘, in-ūi in ū thiaⁿ-tio̍h I kiâⁿ chit-ê sîn-jiah.
43012019	[Hoat-lī-sài]-phài ê lâng chiū hō͘-siōng kóng, “Lán khah chòe mā bô chhái-kang. Lín khòaⁿ, choân sè-kài lóng tè I khì lah!”
43012020	Choeh-kî tiong khì [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] tiâu-pài ê ū kúi-nā ê [Hi-la̍h]-lâng.
43012021	Chiah-ê lâng lâi kìⁿ [Ka-lī-lī] ê [Pek-sài-tāi]-lâng [Hui-le̍k], kā i kóng, “Sian-siⁿ, goán ài kìⁿ Iâ-so͘.”
43012022	[Hui-le̍k] khì kā [An-tek-lia̍t] kóng, [An-tek-lia̍t] kap [Hui-le̍k] chiū chòe-hé khì kā Iâ-so͘ kóng.
43012023	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Jîn-chú tit-tio̍h êng-kng ê sî kàu lah.
43012024	Góa si̍t-si̍t chāi-chāi kā lín kóng, chi̍t lia̍p be̍h-á nā bô lo̍h tōe sí, iû-goân sī chi̍t lia̍p nā-tiāⁿ; nā sí, chiū kiat chin chōe be̍h-á.
43012025	Thiàⁿ-sioh ka-kī ê sìⁿ-miā ê, ōe sòng-sit sìⁿ-miā; tī chit sè-kan kam-goān hi-seng ka-kī ê sìⁿ-miā ê, ōe pó-siú sìⁿ-miā ti̍t-kàu éng-oán-oa̍h.
43012026	Lâng nā beh ho̍k-sāi góa, tio̍h tè góa; góa tī tó-ūi, ho̍k-sāi góa ê lâng mā ōe tī hia. Lâng nā ho̍k-sāi góa, góa ê Pē ōe kā i chun-tiōng.”
43012027	“Chit-chūn, góa ê sim loān chhau-chhau, góa beh kóng sím-mi̍h? Kiám beh kóng ‘Pē ah, kiù góa thoat-chhut chit-ê sî-khek’? M̄-sī. Góa sī ūi-tio̍h chit-ê sî-khek chiah lâi.
43012028	Pē ah, goān lí êng-iāu lí ê miâ.” Jiân-āu ū siaⁿ tùi thiⁿ-téng lâi, kóng, “Góa í-keng ū êng-iāu góa ê miâ, beh koh-chài êng-iāu.”
43012029	Khiā tī hia ê kûn-chiòng thiaⁿ-tio̍h chit-ê siaⁿ, siūⁿ-kóng “Lûi teh tân”; mā ū lâng kóng “Thiⁿ-sài ū kā I kóng-ōe.”
43012030	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Chit-ê siaⁿ m̄-sī ūi-tio̍h góa, sī beh hō͘ lín thiaⁿ ê.”
43012031	Hiān-chāi sī chit-ê sè-kan siū sím-phòaⁿ ê sî; hiān-chāi chit sè-kan ê thóng-tī-chiá teh-beh siū thui-hoan.
43012032	Góa tùi tōe-chiūⁿ siū kú-khí ê sî, ōe khip-ín bān-bîn kui-óa góa.”
43012033	Iâ-so͘ án-ni kóng sī piáu-bêng I teh-beh án-chóaⁿ sí.
43012034	Kûn-chiòng ìn I kóng, “Goán thiaⁿ-tio̍h Lu̍t-hoat ū kì-chài, Ki-tok éng-oán chûn-chāi. Lí ná-ōe kóng Jîn-chú tio̍h siū kú-khí? Chit-ê Jîn-chú sī sím-mi̍h lâng?”
43012035	Iâ-so͘ tùi in kóng, “Kng iáu ōe tī lín tiong-kan chi̍t-sî-á kú. Lín tio̍h thàn ū kng ê sî kè-sio̍k kiâⁿ, chiah bōe hō͘ o͘-àm jia-khàm. Tī o͘-àm tiong teh kiâⁿ ê lâng m̄-chai ōe kiâⁿ khì tó-ūi.
43012036	Thàn ū kng ê sî, lín tio̍h sìn kng, hō͘ lín thang chiâⁿ-chòe kng-bêng ê lâng.” Chiah-ê ōe kóng soah, Iâ-so͘ lī-khui in, bih khí-lâi.
43012037	Sui-jiân Iâ-so͘ tī in bīn-chêng ū kiâⁿ hiah-chōe sîn-jiah, in iáu m̄-sìn I.
43012038	Che sī beh èng-giām sian-ti [Í-sài-a] ê ōe, kóng: Chú ah, sím-mi̍h lâng ū sìn goán só͘ thoân ê sìn-sit? Chú ê koân-lêng ū tùi sím-mi̍h lâng hián-sī?
43012039	In bōe-tàng siong-sìn ê goân-in, [Í-sài-a] ū koh án-ni kóng:
43012040	Siōng-tè hō͘ in ê ba̍k-chiu bōe khòaⁿ-kìⁿ, hō͘ in ê sim ngī, chiah-bián in ê ba̍k-chiu khòaⁿ-kìⁿ, in ê sim hiáu-ngō͘, lâi kui-ǹg góa, Góa chiū kā in i-hó.
43012041	[Í-sài-a] án-ni kóng, sī in-ūi i ū khòaⁿ-kìⁿ Iâ-so͘ ê êng-iāu, chiah kóng koan-hē I ê tāi-chì.
43012042	Sui-jiân sī án-ni, iáu-kú ū chin chōe [Iû-thài]-lâng ê léng-siù sìn Iâ-so͘; put-kò in-ūi in kiaⁿ [Hoat-lī-sài]-lâng, m̄-káⁿ kong-khai sêng-jīn, chiah-bián siū kóaⁿ-chhut hōe-tn̂g.
43012043	In ài lâng ê chheng-chàn iâⁿ-kè Siōng-tè ê chheng-chàn.
43012044	Iâ-so͘ tōa-siaⁿ hoah, “Sìn góa ê lâng m̄-sī sìn góa, sī sìn chhe góa lâi Hit-ūi.
43012045	Khòaⁿ-kìⁿ góa chiū-sī khòaⁿ-kìⁿ chhe góa lâi Hit-ūi.
43012046	Góa choh kng lâi-kàu chit sè-kan, sī beh hō͘ sìn góa ê lâng lóng bōe tiàm tī o͘-àm.
43012047	Thiaⁿ góa ê ōe bô chun-siú ê lâng, góa bōe kā i sím-phòaⁿ. In-ūi góa m̄-sī lâi beh sím-phòaⁿ sè-kan-lâng, sī beh chín-kiù sè-kan-lâng.
43012048	Kū-choa̍t góa, m̄ chiap-siū góa ê ōe ê lâng, ū chi̍t ê sím-phòaⁿ-chiá ōe kā i sím-phòaⁿ. Tī Boa̍t-ji̍t, góa só͘ kóng ê ōe ōe kā i sím-phòaⁿ.
43012049	In-ūi góa m̄-sī chiàu ka-kī ê ì-sù kóng, sī chiàu chhe góa lâi ê Pē hō͘ góa ê bēng-lēng kóng sím-mi̍h, thoân sím-mi̍h.
43012050	Góa chai I ê bēng-lēng ōe hō͘ lâng tit-tio̍h éng-oán ê oa̍h-miā. Só͘-í, góa kóng ê lóng sī chiàu Pē kā góa kóng ê.”
43013001	Pôaⁿ-kè-choeh chêng, Iâ-so͘ chai I lī-khui chit sè-kan tńg-khì Pē hia ê sî-kan í-keng kàu. I it-ti̍t ū thiàⁿ chit sè-kan sio̍k I ka-kī ê lâng, chiū thiàⁿ in kàu-tóe.
43013002	Iâ-so͘ kap I ê bûn-tô͘ teh chia̍h àm-tǹg ê sî, Mô͘-kúi í-keng chiong chhut-bōe Iâ-so͘ ê ì-sù hē tī [Í-su-ka-lio̍k] [Se-bûn] ê kiáⁿ [Iû-tāi] ê sim.
43013003	Iâ-so͘ chai Pē í-keng chiong it-chhè kau tī I ê chhiú, mā chai ka-kī tùi Siōng-tè hia lâi, beh koh tńg-khì Siōng-tè hia,
43013004	chiū lī-khui toh, thǹg gōa-saⁿ, the̍h chi̍t tiâu kun-á hâ tī io-ni̍h,
43013005	jiân-āu chiong chúi tò tī chúi-phûn, kā bûn-tô͘ sóe-kha, koh ēng hâ tī io-ni̍h ê kun-á kā in chhit.
43013006	I sóe kàu [Se-bûn] [Pí-tek] hia, [Pí-tek] kā I kóng, “Chú ah, lí beh kā góa sóe-kha ò͘?”
43013007	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Góa teh chòe ê, lí hiān-chāi m̄-chai, āu-lâi chiū ōe bêng-pe̍k.”
43013008	[Pí-tek] kā I kóng, “Lí choa̍t-tùi bōe ēng-tit kā góa sóe-kha.” Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Góa nā bô kā lí sóe-kha, lí chiū kap góa bô koan-hē.”
43013009	[Se-bûn] [Pí-tek] kā I kóng, “Chú ah, m̄-nā kha, liân chhiú kap thâu-khak mā kā góa sóe.”
43013010	Iâ-so͘ kā i kóng, “Lâng seng-khu sóe liáu, kui seng-khu lóng chheng-khì; kan-ta sóe-kha chiū hó. Lín í-keng chheng-khì, m̄-kú m̄-sī ta̍k ê lóng án-ni.”
43013011	In-ūi Iâ-so͘ chai sím-mi̍h lâng teh-beh kā I chhut-bōe, só͘-í chiah kóng “Lín m̄-sī ta̍k ê lóng chheng-khì.”
43013012	Iâ-so͘ kā in sóe-kha liáu-āu, chhēng gōa-saⁿ, tò tńg-khì I ê chē-ūi. I mn̄g in kóng, “Lín kiám ū bêng-pe̍k góa tùi lín só͘ chòe ê?
43013013	Lín chheng-ho͘ góa ‘Lāu-su’, mā chheng-ho͘ góa ‘Chú’; lín án-ni chheng-ho͘ chin tio̍h, in-ūi góa chiū-sī.
43013014	Góa choh Chú, choh Lāu-su, to kā lín sóe-kha, lín mā tio̍h hō͘-siōng sóe-kha.
43013015	Góa ū lâu bô͘-iūⁿ hō͘ lín, sī beh hō͘ lín thang chiàu góa tùi lín só͘ chòe ê khì chòe.
43013016	Góa si̍t-si̍t chāi-chāi kā lín kóng, lô͘-po̍k bōe pí i ê chú-lâng khah tōa; hōng chhe-phài ê mā bōe pí chhe-phài i ê khah tōa.
43013017	Kì-jiân lín bêng-pe̍k chit-ê sū, nā khì si̍t-hêng chiū chin ū hok-khì.”
43013018	“Góa m̄-sī chí lín choân-thé teh kóng; góa jīn-bat góa só͘ kéng-soán ê. Put-kò che sī beh hō͘ Sèng-keng só͘ kóng ‘Kap góa chòe-hé chia̍h-pn̄g ê lâng kèng-jiân pōe-ge̍k góa’ chit kù ōe ōe èng-giām.
43013019	Taⁿ tāi-chì iáu-bē hoat-seng, góa seng kā lín kóng, hō͘ lín tī tāi-chì hoat-seng ê sî thang sìn góa chiū-sī hit-ūi ‘Chū-iú-éng-iú’ ê.
43013020	Góa si̍t-si̍t chāi-chāi kā lín kóng: chiap-la̍p góa só͘ chhe ê chiū-sī chiap-la̍p góa; chiap-la̍p góa ê chiū-sī chiap-la̍p chhe góa Hit-ūi.”
43013021	Iâ-so͘ kóng chiah-ê ōe liáu-āu, sim-lāi hui-siông kek-tōng, chiū bêng-bêng kóng, “Góa si̍t-si̍t chāi-chāi kā lín kóng, lín tiong-kan ū chi̍t ê lâng beh kā góa chhut-bōe”
43013022	Bûn-tô͘ lí-khòaⁿ-góa góa-khòaⁿ-lí, m̄-chai I sī teh kóng sím-mi̍h lâng.
43013023	Bûn-tô͘ tiong-kan ū chi̍t ê sī Iâ-so͘ só͘-thiàⁿ-ê, i chē tī Iâ-so͘ ê sin-piⁿ.
43013024	[Se-bûn] [Pí-tek] chiū ǹg hit-ê bûn-tô͘ tìm-thâu piáu-sī, kiò i mn̄g-khòaⁿ Iâ-so͘ sī teh kóng sím-mi̍h lâng?
43013025	Hit-ê bûn-tô͘ chiū the-óa Iâ-so͘, kā I mn̄g, “Chú ah, sī sím-mi̍h lâng?”
43013026	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Góa beh ùn chit tè piáⁿ the̍h hō͘ chi̍t ê lâng, hit-ê lâng chiū-sī.” I chiū the̍h hit tè piáⁿ ùn chiùⁿ, jiân-āu the̍h hō͘ [Í-su-ka-lio̍k] [Se-bûn] ê kiáⁿ [Iû-tāi].
43013027	I chi̍t-ē chiap-tio̍h hit tè piáⁿ, Sat-tàn chiū ji̍p i ê sim. Iâ-so͘ kā [Iû-tāi] kóng, “Lí siūⁿ-beh chòe ê, kóaⁿ-kín khì chòe!”
43013028	Tâng chē-toh ê lâng bô chi̍t ê chai sī án-chóaⁿ Iâ-so͘ kā i kóng chit kù ōe.
43013029	In-ūi [Iû-tāi] sī koán-chîⁿ-ê, ū lâng siūⁿ-chòe Iâ-so͘ sī teh kiò i khì bóe siú-choeh beh ēng ê mi̍h, á-sī kiò i khì chín-chè sàn-chhiah-lâng.
43013030	[Iû-tāi] chiap hit tè piáⁿ liáu-āu sûi-sî chhut-khì. Hit sî sī àm-sî.
43013031	[Iû-tāi] chhut-khì liáu-āu, Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Taⁿ Jîn-chú í-keng tit-tio̍h êng-kng; Siōng-tè mā thong-kè Jîn-chú tit-tio̍h êng-kng.
43013032	Kì-jiân Siōng-tè thong-kè Jîn-chú tit-tio̍h êng-kng, Siōng-tè ka-kī mā beh êng-iāu Jîn-chú, koh beh sûi-sî hō͘ I tit-tio̍h êng-kng.
43013033	Sòe-kiáⁿ, góa kap lín chòe-hé chhun bô jōa kú lah. Lín ōe chhē góa, chiàu góa bat kā [Iû-thài]-lâng kóng, taⁿ góa kā lín kóng, ‘Góa beh khì ê só͘-chāi, lín bōe-tàng khì.’
43013034	Góa hō͘ lín chi̍t tiâu sin ê kài-bēng: Lín tio̍h saⁿ-thiàⁿ; chiàu góa thiàⁿ lín án-ni, lín mā tio̍h saⁿ-thiàⁿ.
43013035	Lín nā saⁿ-thiàⁿ, chèng-lâng ōe tùi che lâi chai lín sī góa ê bûn-tô͘.”
43013036	[Se-bûn] [Pí-tek] mn̄g Iâ-so͘, “Chú ah, lí beh khì tó-ūi?” Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Góa beh khì ê só͘-chāi, lí hiān-chāi bōe-tàng tè góa khì, put-kò āu-lâi ōe tè góa khì.”
43013037	[Pí-tek] kóng, “Chú ah, sī-án-chóaⁿ góa hiān-chāi bōe-tàng tè lí khì? Góa kam-goān ūi-tio̍h lí pàng-sak sìⁿ-miā!”
43013038	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Lí beh ūi-tio̍h góa pàng-sak sìⁿ-miā ò͘? Góa si̍t-si̍t chāi-chāi kā lí kóng, koe thî í-chêng, lí ōe saⁿ pái m̄-jīn góa.”
43014001	Iâ-so͘ koh kóng, “Lín ê sim m̄-thang tio̍h-kip put-an. Tio̍h sìn Siōng-tè, mā tio̍h sìn góa.
43014002	Tī góa ê Pē ê chhù ū chin chōe pâng-keng, góa khì sī beh kā lín chún-pī só͘-chāi. Nā m̄-sī án-ni, góa bōe kā lín kóng chit-ê tāi-chì.
43014003	Góa khì kā lín pī-pān só͘-chāi liáu-āu, ōe-koh lâi chhōa lín khì góa hia; góa tī hia, lín mā ōe tī hia.
43014004	Góa beh khì ê hit tiâu lō͘, lín chai.”
43014005	[To-má] kā Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Chú ah, goán to m̄-chai lí beh khì tó-ūi, beh ná-ōe chai hit tiâu lō͘?”
43014006	Iâ-so͘ kā i kóng, “Góa chiū-sī tō-lō͘, chin-lí, oa̍h-miā. Nā m̄-sī thong-kè góa, bô-lâng ōe-tàng khì Pē hia.
43014007	Lín nā bat góa, mā ōe bat góa ê Pē. Tùi taⁿ í-āu, lín bat I, in-ūi lín í-keng ū khòaⁿ-kìⁿ I.”
43014008	[Hui-le̍k] kā Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Chú ah, chiong Pē hián-sī hō͘ goán khòaⁿ, goán chiū boán-chiok.”
43014009	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “[Hui-le̍k], góa kap lín chòe-hé chiah-ni̍h kú, lí iáu m̄-bat góa ò͘? Khòaⁿ-kìⁿ góa, chiū-sī khòaⁿ-kìⁿ Pē. Lí ná-ōe kóng ‘Chiong Pē hián-sī hō͘ goán khòaⁿ’?
43014010	Góa tī Pē lāi-bīn, Pē mā tī góa lāi-bīn, lí bô sìn sī-bô? Góa kā lín kóng ê ōe m̄-sī chhut tī góa ka-kī, sī tiàm tī góa lāi-bīn ê Pē teh chòe I ka-kī ê tāi-chì.
43014011	Tio̍h sìn góa tī Pē lāi-bīn, Pē tī góa lāi-bīn; nā bô, mā tio̍h in-ūi góa só͘ chòe ê tāi-chì lâi sìn.
43014012	Góa si̍t-si̍t chāi-chāi kā lín kóng, “Sìn góa ê lâng ōe chòe góa só͘ chòe ê sū, sīm-chì ōe chòe koh-khah tōa ê, in-ūi góa beh khì Pē hia.
43014013	Lín hōng góa ê miâ bô-lūn kiû sím-mi̍h, góa it-tēng ōe kā lín chòe, thang hō͘ Pē tùi Kiáⁿ tit-tio̍h êng-kng.
43014014	Lín nā hōng góa ê miâ bô-lūn kiû sím-mi̍h, góa it-tēng ōe kā lín chòe.”
43014015	“Lín nā thiàⁿ góa, ōe chun-siú góa ê bēng-lēng.
43014016	Góa beh tùi Pē kiû, I ōe sù lín lēng-gōa chi̍t ūi Ùi-chō͘-chiá, thang kap lín éng-oán tông-chāi.
43014017	I sī chin-lí ê Sîn, sè-kan-lâng bōe-tàng chiap-siū ê, in-ūi in bô khòaⁿ-kìⁿ I, mā m̄-bat I. M̄-kú lín bat I, in-ūi I kap lín tông-chāi, ōe kè-sio̍k tī lín lāi-bīn.
43014018	“Góa bōe pàng lín chòe ko͘-jî; góa ōe-koh tò tńg-lâi lín chia.
43014019	Koh bô jōa kú, sè-kan-lâng bōe-koh khòaⁿ-kìⁿ góa, put-kò lín ōe khòaⁿ-kìⁿ góa, in-ūi góa oa̍h, lín mā ōe oa̍h.
43014020	Kàu hit ji̍t, lín ōe chai góa tī góa ê Pē lāi-bīn, lín tī góa lāi-bīn, góa mā tī lín lāi-bīn.
43014021	“Chiap-siū góa ê bēng-lēng koh chun-siú ê chiū-sī thiàⁿ góa ê lâng. Thiàⁿ góa ê, góa ê Pē ōe thiàⁿ i; góa mā ōe thiàⁿ i, koh chiong pún-sin hián-hiān hō͘ i khòaⁿ.”
43014022	[Iû-tāi] --- m̄-sī hit-ê [Í-su-ka-lio̍k] --- mn̄g Iâ-so͘, “Chú ah, sī-án-chóaⁿ lí beh chiong pún-sin tùi goán hián-hiān, m̄ tùi sè-kan-lâng hián-hiān?”
43014023	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Thiàⁿ góa ê lâng ōe chun-siú góa ê ōe. Góa ê Pē ōe thiàⁿ i; góa ê Pē kap góa ōe lâi i hia, kap i chòe-hé tòa.
43014024	Bô thiàⁿ góa ê lâng bōe chun-siú góa ê ōe. Lín só͘ thiaⁿ-kìⁿ ê m̄-sī góa ka-kī ê ōe, sī chhe góa lâi ê Pē ê ōe.
43014025	“Góa iáu kap lín chòe-hé ê sî, í-keng ū chiong chiah-ê ōe kā lín kóng.
43014026	M̄-kú Ùi-chō͘-chiá, chiū-sī Pē ēng góa ê miâ beh chhe-lâi ê Sèng Sîn, ōe chiong it-chhè ê tāi-chì kà-sī lín, mā ōe hō͘ lín kì-tit góa kā lín kóng it-chhè ê ōe.
43014027	“Góa chiong pêng-an lâu hō͘ lín; góa chiong góa ê pêng-an sù hō͘ lín. Góa sù hō͘ lín ê kap chit sè-kan teh hō͘ lâng ê bô kâng-khoán. Lín ê sim m̄-thang tio̍h-kip put-an, mā m̄-thang kiaⁿ-hiâⁿ.
43014028	Lín í-keng ū thiaⁿ-kìⁿ góa kā lín kóng, ‘Góa khì, beh koh tńg-lâi lín chia.’ Lín nā ū thiàⁿ góa, ōe in-ūi góa beh khì Pē hia lâi hoaⁿ-hí, in-ūi Pē pí góa khah tōa.
43014029	Taⁿ tāi-chì iáu-bē hoat-seng, góa seng kā lín kóng, hō͘ lín tī tāi-chì hoat-seng ê sî thang sìn.
43014030	Góa bōe-koh kap lín kóng chin chōe ōe, in-ūi chit sè-kài ê thóng-tī-chiá teh lâi lah. I choa̍t-tùi bōe-tàng tùi góa chòe sím-mi̍h,
43014031	m̄-kú beh hō͘ sè-kan-lâng chai góa thiàⁿ Pē, ū chiàu Pē ê bēng-lēng khì chòe. “Khí-lâi, lán lâi-khì.”
43015001	“Góa sī chin ê phû-tô-chhiū, góa ê Pē sī chèng phû-tô ê.
43015002	Liân tī góa koh bô kiat ké-chí ê ki, I chiū kā i chián khí-lâi; ū kiat ké-chí ê ki, I chiū kā i siu-chián, hō͘ i kiat khah chōe ké-chí.
43015003	Góa tùi lín kóng ê ōe í-keng hō͘ lín chheng-khì lah.
43015004	Lín tio̍h put-sî kap góa kiat-liân, góa chiū put-sî kap lín kiat-liân. Ki bô liân tī phû-tô-chhiū, ka-kī bōe kiat ké-chí; lín nā bô kap góa kiat-liân mā-sī án-ni.
43015005	“Góa sī phû-tô-chhiū, lín sī ki. Kap góa kiat-liân, góa mā kap i kiat-liân ê, ōe kiat chin chōe ké-chí, in-ūi bô góa, lín bōe-tàng chòe sím-mi̍h.
43015006	Lâng nā bô kap góa kiat-liân, ōe chhin-chhiūⁿ ta-khì ê ki hō͘ lâng hiat chhut-khì gōa-bīn, khioh kui-tui, hiat-lo̍h hé sio.
43015007	Lín nā kap góa kiat-liân, góa ê ōe tī lín lāi-bīn, lín bô-lūn ài sím-mi̍h, kiû chiū hō͘ lín si̍t-hiān.
43015008	Lín nā kiat chin chōe ké-chí, chin-chiàⁿ chòe góa ê bûn-tô͘, góa ê Pē ōe in-ūi án-ni tit-tio̍h êng-kng.
43015009	Chhin-chhiūⁿ Pē ū thiàⁿ góa, góa mā ū thiàⁿ lín, lín tio̍h put-sî tiàm tī góa ê thiàⁿ lāi-bīn.
43015010	Lín nā chun-siú góa ê bēng-lēng, lín ōe put-sî tiàm tī góa ê thiàⁿ lāi-bīn, chhin-chhiūⁿ góa ū chun-siú góa ê Pē ê bēng-lēng, put-sî tiàm tī I ê thiàⁿ lāi-bīn.
43015011	“Góa kā lín kóng chiah-ê tāi-chì, sī beh hō͘ góa ê hoaⁿ-hí tī lín lāi-bīn, koh hō͘ lín ê hoaⁿ-hí móa-móa.
43015012	Chhin-chhiūⁿ góa ū thiàⁿ lín, lín tio̍h saⁿ-thiàⁿ; che sī góa ê bēng-lēng.
43015013	Lâng ūi-tio̍h pêng-iú hi-seng sìⁿ-miā, bô pí che khah tōa ê thiàⁿ.
43015014	Lín nā chun-siú góa ê bēng-lēng chiū-sī góa ê pêng-iú.
43015015	Góa bô koh kiò lín chòe lô͘-po̍k, in-ūi lô͘-po̍k m̄-chai chú-lâng teh chòe sím-mi̍h; taⁿ góa í-keng kiò lín chòe pêng-iú, in-ūi góa tùi góa ê Pē só͘ thiaⁿ-tio̍h ê lóng ū kā lín kóng lah.
43015016	M̄-sī lín kéng-soán góa, sī góa kéng-soán lín, koh jīm-bēng lín, hō͘ lín khì kiat ké-chí, hō͘ lín ê ké-chí ōe-tàng éng-oán pó-chûn. Án-ni, lín hōng góa ê miâ bô-lūn tùi Pē kiû sím-mi̍h, I ōe hō͘ lín.
43015017	Che sī góa hō͘ lín ê bēng-lēng: Lín tio̍h pí-chhú saⁿ-thiàⁿ.”
43015018	“Sè-kan-lâng nā oàn-hūn lín, tio̍h chai in oàn-hūn lín í-chêng seng oàn-hūn góa lah.
43015019	Lín nā sio̍k chit sè-kan, sè-kan-lâng ōe khòaⁿ lín chòe ka-kī ê lâng thiàⁿ lín. Put-kò góa í-keng tùi sè-kan kā lín kéng-soán chhut-lâi, lín m̄-sī sio̍k chit sè-kan, in-ūi án-ni sè-kan-lâng oàn-hūn lín.
43015020	Tio̍h kì-tit góa kā lín kóng ê ōe, ‘Lô͘-po̍k bōe pí chú-lâng khah tōa.’ Sè-kan-lâng nā pek-hāi góa, mā ōe pek-hāi lín; in nā chun-siú góa ê ōe, mā ōe chun-siú lín ê ōe.
43015021	Put-kò ūi-tio̍h góa ê iân-kò͘, in ōe tùi lín chòe chiah-ê lóng-chóng ê tāi-chì, in-ūi in m̄-bat chhe góa lâi Hit-ūi.
43015022	Góa nā bô lâi, bô kā in kóng, in chiū bô-chōe; put-kò in hiān-chāi bô hoat-tō͘ ūi-tio̍h ka-kī ê chōe piān-kái.
43015023	Oàn-hūn góa ê lâng mā oàn-hūn góa ê Pē.
43015024	Góa tī in tiong-kan nā bô chòe pa̍t-lâng m̄-bat chòe ê tāi-chì, in chiū bô-chōe; hiān-chāi in ū khòaⁿ-tio̍h góa ê só͘-chòe, iáu-kú oàn-hūn góa kap góa ê Pē.
43015025	Che sī beh si̍t-hiān in ê Lu̍t-hoat só͘ kì-chài ê ōe, ‘In bô-iân bô-kò͘ oàn-hūn góa.’
43015026	“Góa beh tùi Pē hia chhe chi̍t ūi Ùi-chō͘-chiá lâi lín chia, I chiū-sī tùi Pē hia lâi hit-ūi khé-sī chin-lí ê Sîn, I lâi ê sî ōe ūi-tio̍h góa choh-chèng.
43015027	Lín mā tio̍h ūi-tio̍h góa choh-chèng, in-ūi lín tùi khai-sí chiū kap góa chòe-hé.”
43016001	“Góa í-keng ū chiong chiah-ê tāi-chì kā lín kóng, sī beh hō͘ lín ê sìn-sim bōe iô-tāng.
43016002	Lâng ōe kā lín kóaⁿ-chhut hōe-tn̂g; sî teh-beh kàu, beh thâi lín ê lâng lóng ōe siūⁿ-kóng in sī teh ho̍k-sāi Siōng-tè.
43016003	In ōe chòe chiah-ê tāi-chì, sī in-ūi in m̄-bat Pē, mā m̄-bat góa.
43016004	M̄-kú góa í-keng ū chiong chiah-ê tāi-chì kā lín kóng, sī beh hō͘ lín sî kàu ōe kì-tit góa ū kā lín kóng.” “Góa bô tùi khí-thâu chiū chiong chiah-ê tāi-chì kā lín kóng, sī in-ūi góa it-ti̍t lóng ū kap lín chòe-hé.
43016005	Hiān-chāi góa teh-beh tńg-khì chhe góa lâi Hit-ūi hia, lín tiong-kan bô-lâng mn̄g góa ‘Lí beh khì tó-ūi?’
43016006	Góa chiong chiah-ê tāi-chì kā lín kóng, lín soah móa-sim iu-būn.
43016007	Put-kò, góa tio̍h chiong si̍t-chêng kā lín kóng: Góa khì, sī tùi lín ū lī-ek, in-ūi góa nā bô khì, Ùi-chō͘-chiá chiū bōe lâi lín chia; góa nā khì, góa ōe chhe I lâi lín chia.
43016008	I lâi ê sî, ōe kā sè-kan-lâng chí-chèng in tùi chōe, tùi gī, tùi sím-phòaⁿ ū chhò-gō͘.
43016009	Tùi chōe, in-ūi in m̄-sìn góa;
43016010	tùi gī, in-ūi góa teh-beh khì Pē hia, lín bōe-koh khòaⁿ-kìⁿ góa;
43016011	tùi sím-phòaⁿ, in-ūi chit sè-kan ê thóng-tī-chiá í-keng siū sím-phòaⁿ.
43016012	“Góa iáu ū chin chōe tāi-chì beh kā lín kóng, m̄-kú lín hiān-chāi iáu bōe-tàng liáu-kái.
43016013	Chin-lí ê Sîn lâi ê sî, I ōe chhōa lín liáu-kái it-chhè ê chin-lí. I bōe chiàu ka-kī ê ì-sù lâi kóng, ōe chiàu só͘ thiaⁿ-kìⁿ ê lâi kóng, mā ōe kā lín thoân-pò teh-beh lâi ê sū.
43016014	I ōe chiong êng-iāu kui hō͘ góa, in-ūi I ōe chiong góa kau-tài I ê kā lín thoân-pò.
43016015	Góa ê Pē só͘-ū ê lóng sī góa ê; in-ūi án-ni, góa chiah kóng Sèng Sîn ōe chiong góa kau-tài I ê kā lín thoân-pò.”
43016016	“Koh bô jōa kú, lín bōe-koh khòaⁿ-kìⁿ góa; iū-koh bô jōa kú, lín ōe-koh khòaⁿ-kìⁿ góa.”
43016017	Ū kúi-nā ê bûn-tô͘ kóng-lâi kóng-khì, “I kā lán kóng ‘Koh bô jōa kú, lín bōe-koh khòaⁿ-kìⁿ góa; iū-koh bô jōa kú, lín ōe-koh khòaⁿ-kìⁿ góa,’ koh kóng ‘In-ūi góa teh-beh khì Pē hia’, chiah-ê ōe sī sím-mi̍h ì-sù?”
43016018	Só͘-í in it-ti̍t mn̄g “I só͘ kóng ‘Koh bô jōa kú’ sī sím-mi̍h ì-sù? Lán m̄-chai I teh kóng sím-mi̍h.”
43016019	Iâ-so͘ chai in ài-beh mn̄g I, chiū kā in kóng, “Lín in-ūi góa kóng ‘Koh bô jōa kú, lín bōe-koh khòaⁿ-kìⁿ góa; iū-koh bô jōa kú, lín ōe-koh khòaⁿ-kìⁿ góa’ teh mn̄g-lâi mn̄g-khì sī-bô?
43016020	Góa si̍t-si̍t chāi-chāi kā lín kóng, lín ōe thî-khàu ai-siong, m̄-kú sè-kan-lâng ōe hoaⁿ-hí; lín ōe iu-chhiû, m̄-kú lín ê iu-chhiû ōe pìⁿ-chòe hoaⁿ-hí.
43016021	Sán-hū siⁿ-kiáⁿ ê sî ū iu-chhiû, in-ūi sán-kî í-keng kàu; eⁿ-á chi̍t-ē chhut-sì chiū bô koh kì-tit seng-sán ê thòng-khó͘, i ōe in-ūi eⁿ-á í-keng chhut-sì tī sè-kan lâi hoaⁿ-hí.
43016022	Chhin-chhiūⁿ án-ni, hiān-chāi lín ū iu-chhiû, put-kò góa ōe-koh kìⁿ-tio̍h lín, lín ê sim chiū ōe hoaⁿ-hí; lín ê hoaⁿ-hí bô-lâng ōe kā lín chhiúⁿ-khì.
43016023	“Tī hit ji̍t, lín bōe-koh kā góa mn̄g sím-mi̍h. Góa si̍t-si̍t chāi-chāi kā lín kóng: Lín hōng góa ê miâ bô-lūn tùi Pē kiû sím-mi̍h, I ōe sù hō͘ lín.
43016024	Kàu hiān-chāi, lín iáu m̄-bat hōng góa ê miâ kiû sím-mi̍h. Lín tio̍h kiû, chiū ōe tit-tio̍h, thang hō͘ lín ê hoaⁿ-hí móa-móa.”
43016025	“Chiah-ê tāi-chì góa í-keng ēng phì-jū kā lín kóng lah. Sî teh-beh kàu, góa bōe koh-chài ēng phì-jū, ōe bêng-bêng tùi lín kóng-khí Pē ê sū.
43016026	Tī hit ji̍t, lín ōe hōng góa ê miâ kî-kiû; góa pèng bô kā lín kóng góa ōe thòe lín tùi Pē khún-kiû.
43016027	Pē pún-sin thiàⁿ lín, in-ūi lín ū thiàⁿ góa, koh ū sìn góa sī tùi Siōng-tè hia lâi ê.
43016028	Góa tùi Pē hia chhut-lâi, lâi-kàu sè-kan; hiān-chāi góa beh lī-khui sè-kan, tńg-khì Pē hia.”
43016029	I ê bûn-tô͘ kóng, “Hiān-chāi lí bêng-bêng kóng lí bô ēng phì-jū lâi kóng.
43016030	Taⁿ goán chai lí bû-só͘-put-ti, bô su-iàu lâng kā lí mn̄g; in-ūi án-ni goán sìn lí sī tùi Siōng-tè hia lâi ê.”
43016031	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Chit-chūn lín ū sìn bô?
43016032	Lín khòaⁿ, sî teh-beh kàu, taⁿ í-keng kàu, lín ōe hun-sòaⁿ, ta̍k ê lâng lóng tńg-khì ka-kī ê só͘-chāi, pàng góa ka-kī chi̍t ê. Kî-si̍t góa m̄-sī ka-kī chi̍t ê, in-ūi ū Pē kap góa tông-chāi.
43016033	Góa ū chiong chiah-ê tāi-chì kā lín kóng, sī beh hō͘ lín tī góa lāi-bīn ū pêng-an. Tī sè-kan lín ū khó͘-lān, m̄-kú tio̍h ióng-kám, góa í-keng khah-iâⁿ sè-kan.”
43017001	Iâ-so͘ kóng chiah-ê ōe liáu-āu, gia̍h-ba̍k ǹg thiⁿ kóng: “Pē ah, sî í-keng kàu, goān lí êng-iāu lí ê Kiáⁿ, hō͘ Kiáⁿ thang êng-iāu lí.
43017002	Lí ū chiong thóng-tī bān-bîn ê koân-pèng sù hō͘ Kiáⁿ, hō͘ I thang chiong éng-oán ê oa̍h-miā sù hō͘ it-chhè lí kau-tài I ê lâng.
43017003	Éng-oán ê oa̍h-miā chiū-sī: Jīn-bat lí sī to̍k-it chin Sîn, koh jīn-bat lí chhe-lâi ê Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok.
43017004	Góa í-keng tī tōe-chiūⁿ ū oân-sêng lí kau-tài góa ê kang-chok lâi êng-iāu lí.
43017005	Pē ah, hiān-chāi kiû lí hō͘ góa tī lí bīn-chêng tit-tio̍h êng-kng, chiū-sī chhòng-sè í-chêng góa kap lí í-keng ū ê êng-kng.
43017006	“Lí tùi chit sè-kan kéng chhut-lâi hō͘ góa ê lâng, góa í-keng ū chiong lí tùi in hián-bêng. In sī lí ê, lí ū chiong in hō͘ góa; in í-keng ū chun-siú lí ê ōe.
43017007	Hiān-chāi in chai, lí hō͘ góa ê ta̍k hāng lóng sī tùi lí lâi ê.
43017008	In-ūi góa ū chiong lí hō͘ góa ê sìn-sit hō͘ in; in í-keng chiap-siū koh chin-chiàⁿ chai góa tùi lí hia lâi, koh ū sìn lí chhe góa.
43017009	“Góa ūi-tio̍h in kî-kiû, m̄-sī ūi-tio̍h sè-kan-lâng, sī ūi-tio̍h lí hō͘ góa ê lâng kî-kiû, in-ūi in sī lí ê.
43017010	Góa só͘-ū ê it-chhè lóng sī lí ê, lí só͘-ū ê lóng sī góa ê; góa ū thong-kè in tit-tio̍h êng-kng.
43017011	Góa bô koh tiàm chit sè-kan; put-kò in iáu tiàm tī chit sè-kan. Sèng ê Pē ah, kiû lí ēng lí hō͘ góa ê miâ pó-siú in, thang hō͘ in chiâⁿ-chòe chi̍t-ê, chhin-chhiūⁿ lán sī chi̍t-ê.
43017012	Góa kap in chòe-hé ê sî, góa ū ēng lí hō͘ góa ê miâ pó-siú in. Góa ū pó-hō͘ in, tû-khì chù-tiāⁿ bia̍t-bông hit-ê lâng, chi̍t ê mā bōe bia̍t-bông, thang hō͘ Sèng-keng ê ōe èng-giām.
43017013	Hiān-chāi góa teh-beh khì lí hia; góa iáu tī chit sè-kan kóng chiah-ê ōe, sī beh hō͘ in sim-lāi chhiong-móa góa ê hoaⁿ-hí.
43017014	Góa ū chiong lí ê ōe hō͘ in; sè-kan-lâng oàn-hūn in, in-ūi in m̄-sī sio̍k chit sè-kan, chhin-chhiūⁿ góa m̄-sī sio̍k chit sè-kan.
43017015	Góa m̄-sī kiû lí chhōa in lī-khui chit sè-kan, sī kiû lí pó-siú in thoat-lī hit-ê Siâ-ok-chiá.
43017016	In m̄-sī sio̍k chit sè-kan, chhin-chhiūⁿ góa m̄-sī sio̍k chit sè-kan.
43017017	Kiû lí ēng chin-lí kā in sèng-hòa. Lí ê ōe chiū-sī chin-lí.
43017018	Chhin-chhiūⁿ lí ū chhe góa ji̍p sè-kan, góa mā chhe in ji̍p sè-kan.
43017019	Ūi-tio̍h in ê iân-kò͘, góa ka-kī hun-pia̍t chòe sèng hō͘ lí ēng, hō͘ in mā thang thong-kè chin-lí hun-pia̍t chòe sèng hō͘ lí ēng.
43017020	“Góa m̄-nā ūi-tio̍h lí tùi sè-kan kéng chhut-lâi hō͘ góa hiah-ê lâng kî-kiû, mā ūi-tio̍h tùi in só͘ kóng ê ōe lâi sìn góa hiah-ê lâng kî-kiû,
43017021	thang hō͘ in lóng-chóng chiâⁿ-chòe chi̍t-ê. Pē ah, chhin-chhiūⁿ lí tī góa lāi-bīn, góa mā tī lí lāi-bīn, kiû lí hō͘ in tī lán lāi-bīn, thang hō͘ sè-kan-lâng sìn sī lí chhe góa lâi.
43017022	Lí hō͘ góa ê êng-kng, góa mā ū hō͘ in, thang hō͘ in chiâⁿ-chòe chi̍t-ê, chhin-chhiūⁿ lán sī chi̍t-ê.
43017023	Góa tī in lāi-bīn, lí tī góa lāi-bīn, sī beh hō͘ in oân-choân chiâⁿ-chòe chi̍t-ê, thang hō͘ sè-kan-lâng chai sī lí chhe góa lâi, mā chai lí thiàⁿ in, chhin-chhiūⁿ lí ū thiàⁿ góa.
43017024	“Pē ah, lí hō͘ góa hiah-ê lâng, góa tī tó-ūi, góa mā ài in kap góa chòe-hé tī hia, thang hō͘ in khòaⁿ-kìⁿ lí sù hō͘ góa ê êng-kng, in-ūi lí tī chhòng-sè í-chêng í-keng thiàⁿ góa.
43017025	Kong-gī ê Pē ah, sè-kan-lâng m̄-bat lí, m̄-kú góa bat lí; chiah-ê lâng chai lí í-keng ū chhe-khián góa.
43017026	Góa í-keng ū hō͘ in bat lí ê miâ, mā beh kè-sio̍k hō͘ in bat, thang hō͘ lí tùi góa ê thiàⁿ tī in lāi-bīn, góa mā tī in lāi-bīn.”
43018001	Iâ-so͘ kî-tó soah chiū kap I ê bûn-tô͘ chhut-khì, kè-khì [Khip-lûn]-khoe ê hit-pêng. Tī hia ū chi̍t khu hn̂g, Iâ-so͘ kap I ê bûn-tô͘ ji̍p-khì.
43018002	Chhut-bōe Iâ-so͘ ê [Iû-tāi] mā chai hit só͘-chāi, in-ūi Iâ-so͘ kap I ê bûn-tô͘ siông-siông tī hia chū-chi̍p.
43018003	Só͘-í [Iû-tāi] chiū chhōa chi̍t tūi [Lô-má] peng, í-ki̍p chè-si-tiúⁿ kap [Hoat-lī-sài]-phài ê lâng só͘ phài Sèng-tiān ê kéng-ōe kàu hia, chhiú-ni̍h gia̍h teng, hé-pé, kap bú-khì.
43018004	Iâ-so͘ chai I só͘ beh tú-tio̍h it-chhè ê tāi-chì, chiū kiâⁿ chìn-chêng, tùi in kóng, “Lín teh chhē sím-mi̍h lâng?”
43018005	In ìn kóng, “[Ná-sat-le̍k]-lâng Iâ-so͘.” Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Góa chiū-sī.” Chhut-bōe Iâ-so͘ ê [Iû-tāi] mā kap in khiā chòe-hé.
43018006	Iâ-so͘ chi̍t-ē kā in kóng “Góa chiū-sī”, in chiū tò-thòe, tó lo̍h-khì thô͘-kha.
43018007	Iâ-so͘ koh chi̍t piàn mn̄g in, “Lín teh chhē sím-mi̍h lâng?” In ìn kóng, “[Ná-sat-le̍k]-lâng Iâ-so͘.”
43018008	Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Góa í-keng kā lín kóng góa chiū-sī. Lín nā-sī teh chhē góa, chiah-ê lâng tio̍h pàng in khì.”
43018009	Chit-ê ōe sī beh èng-giām I chêng kóng ê, “Lí só͘ hō͘ góa ê lâng, chi̍t ê to bōe bia̍t-bông.”
43018010	[Se-bûn] [Pí-tek] ū tòa chi̍t ki to, chiū pu̍ih chhut-lâi, tùi tōa-chè-si ê lô͘-po̍k phut lo̍h-khì, kā i chiàⁿ-pêng ê hī-á siah khí-lâi; hit-ê lô͘-po̍k ê miâ kiò-chòe [Má-le̍k-kó͘].
43018011	Iâ-so͘ kā [Pí-tek] kóng, “To siu-ji̍p siù! Pē só͘ hō͘ góa ê khó͘-poe, góa kiám ōe-tàng bô lim?”
43018012	Āu-lâi, hit tūi Lô-má peng kap tūi-tiúⁿ, í-ki̍p [Iû-thài]-lâng ê kéng-ōe lia̍h Iâ-so͘, kā I pa̍k khí-lâi.
43018013	In seng kā I ah-khì hō͘ [A-ná], in-ūi [A-ná] sī hit nî ê tōa-chè-si [Kai-a-hoat] ê tiūⁿ-lâng.
43018014	Chit-ê [Kai-a-hoat] í-chêng bat tùi [Iû-thài]-kàu tong-kio̍k kiàn-gī, kóng “Lêng-khó hō͘ chi̍t ê lâng thòe chèng-lâng sí sī khah hó”.
43018015	[Se-bûn] [Pí-tek] kap lēng-gōa chi̍t ê bûn-tô͘ tè Iâ-so͘ khì; hit-ê bûn-tô͘ kap tōa-chè-si ū se̍k-sāi, só͘-í tè Iâ-so͘ ji̍p-khì tōa-chè-si kong-koán ê lāi-bīn-tiâⁿ,
43018016	m̄-kú [Pí-tek] khiā tī mn̂g-kháu. Kap tōa-chè-si se̍k-sāi hit-ê bûn-tô͘ chhut-lâi, kā kò͘-mn̂g ê lú-pī kóng chi̍t-ē, chiū chhōa [Pí-tek] ji̍p-khì.
43018017	Kò͘-mn̂g ê lú-pī tùi [Pí-tek] kóng, “Lí mā-sī hit-ê lâng ê bûn-tô͘ hò͘ⁿ?” I kóng, “Góa m̄-sī!”
43018018	In-ūi thiⁿ-khì léng, hiah-ê lô͘-po̍k kap kéng-ōe sio hé-thòaⁿ, khiā-teh hang-sio; [Pí-tek] mā kap in chòe-hé khiā-teh hang.
43018019	Tōa-chè-si sím-mn̄g Iâ-so͘ koan-hē I ê bûn-tô͘ kap I ê kàu-hùn ê tāi-chì.
43018020	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Góa lóng kong-khai tùi sè-kan-lâng kóng-ōe. Góa siông-siông tī hōe-tn̂g kap tī [Iû-thài]-lâng chū-chi̍p ê Sèng-tiān lāi kà-sī lâng; góa m̄-bat pì-bi̍t kóng.
43018021	Lí sī-án-chóaⁿ sím-mn̄g góa? Lí khì mn̄g bat thiaⁿ góa kóng-ōe ê lâng, khòaⁿ góa tùi in kóng sím-mi̍h, in chai góa só͘ kóng ê.”
43018022	Iâ-so͘ kóng liáu, khiā tī piⁿ-a ê chi̍t ê kéng-ōe kā I siàn chhùi-phóe, kóng, “Lí káⁿ án-ni ìn tōa-chè-si?”
43018023	Iâ-so͘ ìn i kóng, “Góa nā kóng m̄-tio̍h, lí tio̍h chí-chhut chhò-gō͘; nā kóng tio̍h, sī-án-chóaⁿ kā góa phah?”
43018024	Jiân-āu [A-ná] chiong hō͘ lâng pa̍k-teh ê Iâ-so͘ ah-khì hō͘ tōa-chè-si [Kai-a-hoat].
43018025	[Se-bûn] [Pí-tek] iáu khiā-teh hang-hé. Ū lâng mn̄g i, “Lí mā-sī hit-ê lâng ê bûn-tô͘ hò͘ⁿ?” [Pí-tek] m̄-jīn, kóng, “Góa m̄-sī!”
43018026	Tōa-chè-si ê chi̍t ê lô͘-po̍k, sī hī-á hō͘ [Pí-tek] siah khí-lâi hit-ê lâng ê chhin-chiâⁿ, tùi i kóng, “Góa kiám m̄-sī ū khòaⁿ-tio̍h lí kap I tī hn̂g-lāi?”
43018027	[Pí-tek] koh-chài m̄-jīn; hit sî, koe sûi-sî thî.
43018028	Thàu-chá, [Iû-thài]-lâng ê léng-siù chiong Iâ-so͘ tùi [Kai-a-hoat] hia ah-khì chóng-tok-hú; in ka-kī bô ji̍p-khì, in-ūi kiaⁿ-liáu bak-tio̍h lâ-sâm soah bōe-tàng chia̍h Pôaⁿ-kè-choeh ê boán-chhan.
43018029	Só͘-í, [Pí-lia̍p-to] chhut-lâi kìⁿ in, mn̄g in kóng, “Lín kò chit-ê lâng sím-mi̍h chōe?”
43018030	In ìn kóng, “Chit-ê lâng nā bô chòe pháiⁿ tāi-chì, goán bōe kā I kau hō͘ lí.”
43018031	[Pí-lia̍p-to] kā in kóng, “Lín ka-kī khì pān, chiàu lín ê Lu̍t-hoat kā I sím-phòaⁿ.” In tùi i kóng, “Goán bô koân kā lâng phòaⁿ sí-hêng.”
43018032	Che sī beh èng-giām Iâ-so͘ chêng só͘ kóng ê ōe, piáu-sī I teh-beh án-chóaⁿ sí.
43018033	[Pí-lia̍p-to] koh ji̍p-khì chóng-tok-hú, tiàu Iâ-so͘ lâi, mn̄g I kóng, “Lí sī [Iû-thài]-lâng ê Ông sī-bô?”
43018034	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Lí án-ni mn̄g góa sī lí ka-kī ê ì-sù, á-sī thiaⁿ-tio̍h pa̍t-lâng kā lí kóng góa ê tāi-chì?”
43018035	[Pí-lia̍p-to] kóng, “Góa kiám sī [Iû-thài]-lâng? Lí pún-cho̍k ê lâng kap chè-si-tiúⁿ chiong lí kau hō͘ góa. Lí ū chòe sím-mi̍h tāi-chì?”
43018036	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Góa ê Kok-tō͘ m̄-sī sio̍k chit sè-kan. Góa ê Kok-tō͘ nā sio̍k chit sè-kan, góa ê pō͘-hā ōe ūi góa cheng-chiàn, bián tì-kàu góa siū chhut-bōe hō͘ [Iû-thài]-lâng ê léng-siù. Kî-si̍t, góa ê Kok-tō͘ m̄-sī sio̍k chit sè-kan.”
43018037	[Pí-lia̍p-to] chiū mn̄g I kóng, “Án-ni lí sī ông lò͘?” Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Lí kóng góa sī ông. Góa ūi-tio̍h chit-ê chhut-sì, ūi-tio̍h chit-ê lâi sè-kan, sī beh ūi chin-lí choh-chèng. Sio̍k chin-lí ê lâng lóng ōe thiaⁿ góa ê siaⁿ.”
43018038	[Pí-lia̍p-to] mn̄g I kóng, “Sím-mi̍h sī chin-lí?” Kóng soah, [Pí-lia̍p-to] chiū koh chhut-khì gōa-bīn tùi in kóng, “Góa chhâ bōe chhut I ū sím-mi̍h chōe.
43018039	Lín ū chi̍t ê koàn-lē, tī Pôaⁿ-kè-choeh góa tio̍h pàng chi̍t ê hoān-lâng hō͘ lín. Án-ni, lín ài góa pàng [Iû-thài]-lâng ê Ông hō͘ lín bô?”
43018040	In koh tōa-siaⁿ hoah, “M̄-sī chit-ê lâng, sī [Pa-lia̍p-pa]!” [Pa-lia̍p-pa] sī chi̍t ê pō-tōng hūn-chú.
43019001	Āu-lâi, [Pí-lia̍p-to] kiò lâng chhōa Iâ-so͘ chhut-khì ēng piⁿ kā I phah.
43019002	Hiah-ê peng ēng chhì-á pīⁿ chi̍t téng ông-koan kā I tì tī thâu-khak téng, koh kā I moa chi̍t niá chí-sek ê tn̂g-phàu.
43019003	In óa-khì, tùi I kóng, “[Iû-thài]-lâng ê Ông bān-sòe!” jiân-āu kā I siàn chhùi-phóe.
43019004	[Pí-lia̍p-to] koh chhut-lâi gōa-bīn, tùi hiah-ê [Iû-thài]-lâng kóng, “Lín khòaⁿ, góa chhōa I chhut-lâi hō͘ lín, hō͘ lín chai góa chhâ bōe chhut I ū-chōe.”
43019005	Iâ-so͘ chiū chhut-lâi, tì chhì-á ê ông-koan, moa chí-sek ê tn̂g-phàu. [Pí-lia̍p-to] kā in kóng, “Khòaⁿ, chit-ê lâng!”
43019006	Chè-si-tiúⁿ kap Sèng-tiān ê kéng-ōe khòaⁿ-tio̍h Iâ-so͘ chiū tōa-siaⁿ hoah, “Kā tèng si̍p-jī-kè! Kā tèng si̍p-jī-kè!” [Pí-lia̍p-to] tùi in kóng, “Lín ka-kī kā I chhōa-khì tèng si̍p-jī-kè, in-ūi góa chhâ bōe chhut I ū-chōe.”
43019007	Hiah-ê [Iû-thài]-lâng ìn kóng, “Goán ū Lu̍t-hoat, chiàu Lu̍t-hoat I eng-kai sí, in-ūi I hong ka-kī chòe Siōng-tè ê Kiáⁿ.”
43019008	[Pí-lia̍p-to] thiaⁿ-tio̍h in án-ni kóng chiū jú kiaⁿ.
43019009	I koh ji̍p-khì chóng-tok-hú, mn̄g Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Lí tùi tó-ūi lâi?” M̄-kú Iâ-so͘ bô kā i ìn.
43019010	[Pí-lia̍p-to] tùi I kóng, “Lí m̄ kā góa kóng ò͘? Kiám m̄-chai góa ū koân thang pàng lí, mā ū koân kā lí tèng si̍p-jī-kè?”
43019011	Iâ-so͘ ìn kóng, “Nā m̄-sī Siōng-tè sù lí koân-pèng, lí bô koân thang pān góa. In-ūi án-ni, kā góa kau hō͘ lí hit-ê lâng, i ê chōe koh-khah tāng.”
43019012	[Pí-lia̍p-to] thiaⁿ-tio̍h chit-ê ōe jú siūⁿ-beh pàng Iâ-so͘, m̄-kú hiah-ê [Iû-thài]-lâng it-ti̍t hoah kóng, “Lí nā pàng chit-ê lâng, lí chiū m̄-sī [Lô-má]-hông-tè [Khái-sat] ê pêng-iú. Bô-lūn sím-mi̍h lâng hong ka-kī chòe ông chiū-sī pōe-poān [Khái-sat].”
43019013	[Pí-lia̍p-to] thiaⁿ-tio̍h chiah-ê ōe chiū chhōa Iâ-so͘ chhut-lâi, ka-kī chē tī sím-phòaⁿ-se̍k. Hit-ê só͘-chāi kiò-chòe “Pho͘-chio̍h-tōe,” [Hi-pek-lâi-ōe] kiò-chòe “[Ka-pa-tāi].”
43019014	Hit ji̍t sī Pôaⁿ-kè-choeh ê chêng-ji̍t, sî-kan chha-put-to tiong-tàu. [Pí-lia̍p-to] tùi hiah-ê [Iû-thài]-lâng kóng, “Khòaⁿ, lín ê ông!”
43019015	In chiū hoah kóng, “Hō͘ sí, hō͘ sí! Kā tèng si̍p-jī-kè!” [Pí-lia̍p-to] tùi in kóng, “Lín ài góa chiong lín ê ông tèng si̍p-jī-kè ò͘?” Chè-si-tiúⁿ kóng, “[Khái-sat] í-gōa, goán bô ông!”
43019016	Āu-lâi Pí-lia̍p-to chiong Iâ-so͘ kau hō͘ in khì tèng si̍p-jī-kè. In chiū kā Iâ-so͘ ah-khì.
43019017	Iâ-so͘ chhut-lâi, pōe ka-kī ê si̍p-jī-kè, lâi-kàu hit-ê kiò-chòe “[Thâu-khak-óaⁿ-niá]” ê só͘-chāi, [Hi-pek-lâi]-ōe kiò-chòe “Kok-kok-tha”.
43019018	In tī hia kā Iâ-so͘ tèng tī si̍p-jī-kè; í-gōa ū nn̄g ê lâng kap I chòe-hé tèng, chi̍t pêng chi̍t ê, Iâ-so͘ tī tiong-ng.
43019019	[Pí-lia̍p-to] siá chi̍t tè chōe-chn̄g, tèng tī si̍p-jī-kè téng, téng-bīn siá, “[Ná-sat-le̍k]-lâng Iâ-so͘, [Iû-thài]-lâng ê Ông.”
43019020	Ū chin chōe [Iû-thài]-lâng tha̍k-tio̍h chōe-chn̄g, in-ūi Iâ-so͘ hō͘ lâng tèng si̍p-jī-kè ê só͘-chāi óa-kūn [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng], koh chōe-chn̄g sī ēng [Hi-pek-lâi]-bûn, [La-teng]-bûn, [Hi-la̍h]-bûn siá ê.
43019021	[Iû-thài-kàu] ê chè-si-tiúⁿ tùi [Pí-lia̍p-to] kóng, “M̄-thang siá ‘[Iû-thài]-lâng ê Ông’, tio̍h siá ‘chit-ê lâng ka-kī kóng: Góa sī [Iû-thài]-lâng ê Ông.’ ”
43019022	[Pí-lia̍p-to] ìn kóng, “Góa só͘ siá ê í-keng siá lah, bô beh kái!”
43019023	Hiah-ê peng chiong Iâ-so͘ tèng si̍p-jī-kè liáu-āu, the̍h I ê gōa-phàu pun-chòe sì hūn, chi̍t lâng chi̍t hūn. In koh the̍h I ê lāi-saⁿ; chit niá lāi-saⁿ bô kap-chōa, téng-ē chit-chòe chi̍t tè.
43019024	Só͘-í, in chham-siông kóng, “Chit niá mài thiah-khui, lán lâi thiu-khau khòaⁿ sī siáⁿ-lâng ê.” Che sī beh èng-giām Sèng-keng ê ōe: In pun góa ê gōa-phàu, ūi-tio̍h góa ê saⁿ thiu-khau. Chiah-ê peng tú chiàu án-ni chòe.
43019025	Iâ-so͘ ê lāu-bú, I ê a-î, [Kek-lô-pa] ê bó͘ [Má-lī-a], kap [Boa̍t-tāi-lia̍p] ê [Má-lī-a] lóng khiā tī Iâ-so͘ ê si̍p-jī-kè piⁿ.
43019026	Iâ-so͘ khòaⁿ-tio̍h I ê lāu-bú, koh khòaⁿ-tio̍h I só͘ thiàⁿ hit-ê bûn-tô͘ khiā tī piⁿ-a, chiū tùi I ê lāu-bú kóng, “A-bú, khòaⁿ, lí ê kiáⁿ!”
43019027	Āu-lâi I tùi hit-ê bûn-tô͘ kóng, “Khòaⁿ, lí ê lāu-bú!” Tùi hit sî khí, hit-ê bûn-tô͘ kā Iâ-so͘ ê lāu-bú chiap tńg-khì in tau.
43019028	Chit-ê sū í-āu, Iâ-so͘ chai it-chhè ê tāi-chì í-keng oân-sêng, ūi-tio̍h beh èng-giām Sèng-keng ê ōe chiū kóng, “Góa chhùi-ta.”
43019029	Tī hia ū chi̍t ê tóe móa sng-chiú ê pân, in chiū ēng hái-mî chìm chiú, pa̍k tī gû-chhek-chháu bé, tu kàu I ê chhùi.
43019030	Tam liáu-āu, Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Oân-sêng lah!” Kóng liáu, thâu kau lo̍h-khì, khùi chiū tn̄g.
43019031	Hit ji̍t sī pài-gō͘, sī Pī-pān-ji̍t. In-ūi keh-ji̍t sī te̍k-pia̍t ê An-hioh-ji̍t, [Iû-thài]-lâng ê léng-siù ūi-tio̍h bô ài tī An-hioh-ji̍t lâu sin-si tī si̍p-jī-kè téng, chiū kiû [Pí-lia̍p-to] kah lâng kòng-tn̄g siū-hêng-chiá ê kha-kut, thang chiong sin-si siu lo̍h-lâi.
43019032	Hiah-ê peng chiū khì, chiong kap Iâ-so͘ chòe-hé tèng si̍p-jī-kè thâu-chi̍t ê kap lēng-gōa chi̍t-ê ê kha-kut kòng-tn̄g.
43019033	In lâi-kàu Iâ-so͘ hia, khòaⁿ-tio̍h I í-keng sí, chiū bô kā I ê kha-kut kòng-tn̄g.
43019034	M̄-kú ū chi̍t ê peng ēng chhiuⁿ chha̍k Iâ-so͘ ê hia̍p-ē, sûi-sî ū huih kap chúi lâu chhut-lâi.
43019035	Khòaⁿ-tio̍h ê lâng í-keng ū choh-chèng, sī beh hō͘ lín mā sìn; i ê kiàn-chèng sī chin-si̍t, i chai i só͘ kóng ê sī sū-si̍t.
43019036	Chiah-ê tāi-chì hoat-seng sī beh èng-giām Sèng-keng ê ōe, “I ê kut liân chi̍t ki to bô kòng-tn̄g.”
43019037	Koh lēng-gōa ū chi̍t kù keng-bûn kóng, “In ōe gióng-bōng in ēng chhiuⁿ kā i chha̍k ê lâng.”
43019038	Chiah-ê tāi-chì liáu-āu, ū chi̍t ê [A-lī-má-thài]-lâng [Iok-sek] lâi kiû [Pí-lia̍p-to] chún i khì siu Iâ-so͘ ê ûi-thé. I in-ūi kiaⁿ [Iû-thài-kàu] tong-kio̍k, só͘-í pì-bi̍t choh Iâ-so͘ ê bûn-tô͘. [Pí-lia̍p-to] ún-chún, [Iok-sek] chiū khì siu Iâ-so͘ ê ûi-thé.
43019039	Koh chêng bat tī àm-sî khì kìⁿ Iâ-so͘ hit-ê [Nî-ko-tek-bō͘] mā tòa iok saⁿ-cha̍p kong-kun ê bu̍t-io̍h chhiau tîm-hiuⁿ ê phang-liāu lâi.
43019040	In nn̄g lâng chiong Iâ-so͘ ê ûi-thé siu lo̍h-lâi, chiàu [Iû-thài]-lâng an-chòng ê koàn-lē kā I boah phang-liāu, koh ēng iù-môa-pò͘ kā I pau-chat.
43019041	Iâ-so͘ tèng si̍p-jī-kè ê só͘-chāi ū chi̍t khu hn̂g, hn̂g-lāi ū chi̍t ê iáu m̄-bat chòng kè lâng ê sin bōng.
43019042	In-ūi hit ji̍t sī pài-gō͘, sī [Iû-thài]-lâng ê Pī-pān-ji̍t, bōng koh bô hn̄g, in chiū kā Iâ-so͘ an-chòng tī hia.
43020001	Lé-pài ji̍t thàu-chá, thiⁿ iáu-bē kng, [Boa̍t-tāi-lia̍p] ê [Má-lī-a] khì bōng-tōe, khòaⁿ-tio̍h bōng-kháu ê chio̍h í-keng sóa-khui.
43020002	I chiū cháu-khì chhē [Se-bûn] [Pí-tek], koh khì chhē Iâ-so͘ só͘ thiàⁿ hit-ê bûn-tô͘, kā in kóng, “Ū lâng chiong Chú tùi bōng-ni̍h sóa-cháu; goán m̄-chai in kā I khǹg tī tó-ūi.”
43020003	[Pí-tek] kap hit-ê bûn-tô͘ chiū khì bōng-tōe.
43020004	Nn̄g ê lâng chòe-hé cháu, hit-ê bûn-tô͘ pí [Pí-tek] cháu khah kín, seng kàu bōng-ni̍h.
43020005	I àⁿ lo̍h-khì khòaⁿ bōng-lāi, khòaⁿ-tio̍h iù-môa-pò͘ khǹg tī hia, put-kò bô ji̍p-khì.
43020006	[Se-bûn] [Pí-tek] tè-āu mā kàu, ji̍p-khì bōng-lāi. I khòaⁿ-tio̍h iù-môa-pò͘ khǹg tī hia,
43020007	mā khòaⁿ-tio̍h pau-chat Iâ-so͘ thâu-khak ê kun bô kap iù-môa-pò͘ khǹg chòe-hé, kńg-teh, lēng-gōa khǹg.
43020008	Seng kàu bōng hit-ê bûn-tô͘ mā ji̍p-khì, khòaⁿ liáu chiū sìn.
43020009	In iáu-bē liáu-kái Sèng-keng ê ōe, kóng I it-tēng tio̍h tùi sí-lâng tiong koh-oa̍h.
43020010	Jiân-āu, hit nn̄g ê bûn-tô͘ tńg-khì in tau.
43020011	[Má-lī-a] khiā tī bōng-gōa teh khàu. I ná khàu ná àⁿ lo̍h-khì khòaⁿ bōng-lāi,
43020012	khòaⁿ-tio̍h nn̄g ê chhēng pe̍h-saⁿ ê thiⁿ-sài chē tī goân-lâi hē Iâ-so͘ ê ûi-thé ê só͘-chāi, chi̍t ê tī thâu chit pêng, chi̍t ê tī kha hit pêng.
43020013	In mn̄g i kóng, “Hū-jîn-lâng, lí ná teh khàu?” I ìn kóng, “Ū lâng kā góa ê Chú sóa-cháu, góa m̄-chai in kā I khǹg tī tó-ūi.”
43020014	Kóng soah, [Má-lī-a] oa̍t tńg-sin, khòaⁿ-tio̍h Iâ-so͘ khiā tī hia, m̄-kú m̄-chai I sī Iâ-so͘.
43020015	Iâ-so͘ mn̄g i, “Hū-jîn-lâng, lí ná teh khàu? Lí teh chhē sím-mi̍h-lâng?” [Má-lī-a] siūⁿ-chòe I sī kò͘-hn̂g ê, chiū ìn kóng, “Thâu-ke, lí nā ū kā I sóa-cháu, chhiáⁿ kā góa kóng lí kā I khǹg tī tó-ūi, góa thang khì kā I siu tńg-lâi.”
43020016	Iâ-so͘ kā i kiò, “[Má-lī-a]!” [Má-lī-a] oa̍t tńg-sin, ēng [Hi-pek-lâi]-ōe kiò Iâ-so͘, “Lia̍p-pho-nî!” ì-sù chiū-sī “Lāu-su”.
43020017	Iâ-so͘ kā i kóng, “M̄-thang kā góa khîⁿ-teh, in-ūi góa iáu-bē chiūⁿ-khì Pē hia. Lí tio̍h khì kā góa ê hiaⁿ-tī kóng, ‘Góa beh chiūⁿ-khì góa ê Pē, mā-sī lín ê Pē, góa ê Siōng-tè, mā-sī lín ê Siōng-tè hia.”’
43020018	[Boa̍t-tāi-lia̍p] ê [Má-lī-a] chiū khì kā bûn-tô͘ pò-kò kóng, “Góa í-keng kìⁿ-tio̍h Chú,” koh kóng Chú ū kā i kóng chiah-ê ōe.
43020019	Kâng hit-ê lé-pái-ji̍t àm-sî, bûn-tô͘ chū-chi̍p ê só͘-chāi mn̂g lóng koaiⁿ-teh, in-ūi in kiaⁿ [Iû-thài]-lâng ê léng-siù. Iâ-so͘ lâi, khiā tī in tiong-ng, tùi in kóng, “Goān lín pêng-an!”
43020020	I kóng liáu, chiong siang chhiú kap hia̍p-ē hō͘ in khòaⁿ. Bûn-tô͘ khòaⁿ-tio̍h Chú, chin hoaⁿ-hí.
43020021	Iâ-so͘ koh kā in kóng, “Goān lín pêng-an! Chhin-chhiūⁿ Pē ū chhe góa, góa mā chhe lín.”
43020022	Kóng soah, I tùi in pûn-khùi, kóng, “Niá-siū Sèng Sîn!
43020023	Lín sià-bián sím-mi̍h-lâng ê chōe, in chiū tit-tio̍h sià-bián; lín bô sià-bián sím-mi̍h-lâng ê chōe, in chiū bô tit-tio̍h sià-bián.”
43020024	[To-má], mā kiò-chòe [Siang-siⁿ-á], i sī cha̍p-jī sù-tô͘ ê chi̍t ê, Iâ-so͘ lâi hit sî bô kap in chòe-hé tī hia.
43020025	Só͘-í kî-tha ê bûn-tô͘ kā i kóng, “Goán í-keng kìⁿ-tio̍h Chú lah.” [To-má] kā in kóng, “Góa nā bô khòaⁿ-tio̍h I chhiú-tiong ê teng-jiah, ēng chńg-thâu-á bong teng-jiah, koh ēng chhiú bong I ê hia̍p-ē, góa choa̍t-tùi m̄-sìn.”
43020026	Chi̍t lé-pài āu, bûn-tô͘ koh chū-chi̍p tī chhù-lāi, [To-má] mā kap in chòe-hé. Mn̂g koaiⁿ-teh, Iâ-so͘ lâi, khiā tī in tiong-ng, kóng, “Goān lín pêng-an!”
43020027	Jiân-āu, I kā [To-má] kóng, “Chhun chńg-thâu-á lâi chia, thàm góa ê chhiú; chhun-chhiú lâi bong góa ê hia̍p-ē. M̄-thang bô-sìn, tio̍h sìn!”
43020028	[To-má] kóng, “Góa ê Chú, góa ê Siōng-tè!”
43020029	Iâ-so͘ kā i kóng, “Lí khòaⁿ-tio̍h góa chiah sìn ò͘? Bô khòaⁿ-tio̍h lâi sìn ê lâng chin ū hok-khì!”
43020030	Iâ-so͘ tī bûn-tô͘ ê bīn-chêng iáu kiâⁿ chin chōe sîn-jiah, bô kì-chài tī chit pún chheh.
43020031	Kì-chài chiah-ê sī beh hō͘ lín sìn Iâ-so͘ sī Ki-tok, sī Siōng-tè ê Kiáⁿ, koh hō͘ lín thong-kè sìn, khò I ê miâ tit-tio̍h oa̍h-miā.
43021001	Āu-lâi, Iâ-so͘ koh tī [Thê-pí-lī-a] ô͘-piⁿ tùi bûn-tô͘ hián-hiān. Hián-hiān ê keng-kè sī án-ni:
43021002	[Se-bûn] [Pí-tek], kiò-chòe Siang-siⁿ-á ê [To-má], [Ka-lī-lī] ê [Ka-ná]-lâng [Ná-tàn-gia̍p], [Se-pí-thài] ê nn̄g ê kiáⁿ, kap lēng-gōa nn̄g ê bûn-tô͘ lóng chòe-hé.
43021003	[Se-bûn] [Pí-tek] kā in kóng, “Góa beh lâi-khì lia̍h-hî.” In kā i kóng, “Goán mā beh kap lí khì.” In chhut-khì, chiūⁿ-chûn; hit àm, in lia̍h lóng bô.
43021004	Thiⁿ phú kng, Iâ-so͘ khiā tī hōaⁿ-téng; put-kò bûn-tô͘ jīn bōe-chhut I sī Iâ-so͘.
43021005	Iâ-so͘ tùi in kóng, “Siàu-liân-lâng, lín lia̍h ū hî bô?” In ìn kóng, “Bô.”
43021006	I kā in kóng, “Kā bāng pha lo̍h-khì chûn ê chiàⁿ-pêng chiū ōe lia̍h-tio̍h.” In chiū pha lo̍h-khì; in-ūi pha-tio̍h chin chōe hî, soah thoa bōe khí-lâi.
43021007	Iâ-so͘ só͘ thiàⁿ hit-ê bûn-tô͘ kā [Pí-tek] kóng, “Sī Chú!” [Se-bûn] [Pí-tek] chi̍t-ē thiaⁿ-tio̍h sī Chú, in-ūi thǹg-pak-theh, kín chiong gōa-saⁿ moa-teh, thiàu lo̍h-chúi.
43021008	Kî-tha ê bûn-tô͘, in-ūi in lī lio̍k-tōe bô hn̄g, iok chi̍t-pah kong-chhioh, chiū kò hit chiah sòe-chiah chûn kā kui-bāng ê hî thoa óa-hōaⁿ.
43021009	In chi̍t-ē chiūⁿ-hōaⁿ, khòaⁿ-tio̍h hia ū hé-thòaⁿ hé, téng-bīn ū hî, koh ū piáⁿ.
43021010	Iâ-so͘ kā in kóng, “Tú-chiah lia̍h-tio̍h ê hî, lia̍h kúi bé-á lâi.”
43021011	[Se-bûn] [Pí-tek] peh-khì chûn-téng, thoa bāng khí-lâi hōaⁿ-téng, kui-bāng lóng sī tōa bé hî, lóng-chóng chi̍t-pah gō͘-cha̍p-saⁿ bé, sui-jiân hiah-ni̍h chōe, bāng mā bô phòa-khì.
43021012	Iâ-so͘ kā in kóng, “Lâi chia̍h chá-tǹg!” Bûn-tô͘ bô-lâng káⁿ kā I mn̄g, “Lí sī sím-mi̍h-lâng?” in-ūi in chai I sī Chú.
43021013	Iâ-so͘ kiâⁿ óa-lâi, the̍h piáⁿ, pun hō͘ in, hî mā chiàu án-ni pun hō͘ in.
43021014	Iâ-so͘ tùi sí-lâng tiong koh-oa̍h í-āu tùi bûn-tô͘ hián-hiān, che sī tē-saⁿ piàn.
43021015	In chia̍h chá-tǹg liáu-āu, Iâ-so͘ mn̄g [Se-bûn] [Pí-tek], “[Iok-hān] ê kiáⁿ [Se-bûn], lí ū thiàⁿ góa iâⁿ-kè chiah-ê bô?” I ìn kóng, “Chú ah, ū, lí chai góa ū thiàⁿ lí.” Iâ-so͘ kā i kóng, “Iúⁿ-chhī góa ê iûⁿ-á-kiáⁿ!”
43021016	Iâ-so͘ tē-jī piàn mn̄g i kóng, “[Iok-hān] ê kiáⁿ [Se-bûn], lí ū thiàⁿ góa bô?” I ìn kóng, “Chú ah, ū, lí chai góa ū thiàⁿ lí.” Iâ-so͘ kā i kóng, “Bo̍k-ióng góa ê iûⁿ!”
43021017	Iâ-so͘ tē-saⁿ piàn kā i mn̄g, “[Iok-hān] ê kiáⁿ [Se-bûn], lí ū thiàⁿ góa bô?” [Pí-tek] in-ūi Iâ-so͘ tē-saⁿ piàn mn̄g kóng “Lí ū thiàⁿ góa bô?” chiū chin siong-sim, kā Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Chú ah, lí ta̍k hāng lóng chai, lí chai góa ū thiàⁿ lí.” Iâ-so͘ chiū kā i kóng, “Iúⁿ-chhī góa ê iûⁿ!”
43021018	Góa si̍t-si̍t chāi-chāi kā lí kóng, lí siàu-liân ê sî ka-kī hâ io-tòa khì ài khì ê só͘-chāi; m̄-kú nî-lāu ê sî, lí ōe chhun siang-chhiú hō͘ lâng pa̍k, kā lí thoa kàu lí bô ài khì ê só͘-chāi.”
43021019	Iâ-so͘ kóng chiah-ê ōe sī chí [Pí-tek] ōe án-chóaⁿ sí lâi êng-iāu Siōng-tè. Kóng soah, Iâ-so͘ kā i kóng, “Lâi tè góa!”
43021020	[Pí-tek] oa̍t tńg-sin, khòaⁿ-tio̍h Iâ-so͘ só͘ thiàⁿ hit-ê bûn-tô͘ tè tī āu-bīn. I bat tī boán-chhan ê sî the-óa Iâ-so͘ ê heng-chêng, mn̄g kóng “Chú ah, sī sím-mi̍h-lâng beh chhut-bōe lí?”
43021021	[Pí-tek] chi̍t-ē khòaⁿ-tio̍h i chiū mn̄g Iâ-so͘, “Chú ah, chit-ê lâng ōe án-chóaⁿ?”
43021022	Iâ-so͘ ìn i kóng, “Góa nā ài i oa̍h kàu góa koh lâi, kap lí ū sím-mi̍h koan-hē. Lí lâi tè góa!”
43021023	Tùi án-ni, chit-ê ōe tī bûn-tô͘ ê tiong-kan liû-thoân kóng chit-ê bûn-tô͘ bōe sí. Kî-si̍t, Iâ-so͘ m̄-sī kóng i bōe sí, sī kóng “Góa nā ài i oa̍h kàu góa lâi, kap lí ū sím-mi̍h koan-hē.”
43021024	Chit-ê bûn-tô͘ chiū-sī ūi-tio̍h chiah-ê tāi-chì choh-chèng, koh chiong chiah-ê tāi-chì siá khí-lâi ê lâng. Lán chai i ê kiàn-chèng chin-si̍t.
43021025	Iâ-so͘ koh ū chòe kî-tha chin chōe tāi-chì, nā beh chiong chiah-ê tāi-chì chi̍t-hāng chi̍t-hāng siá khí-lâi, só͘ siá ê chheh, góa siūⁿ choân sè-kài mā tóe bōe-liáu.
44001001	[Thê-o-hui-lô] sian-siⁿ: Tī góa só͘ siá ê thâu-chi̍t pún chheh, góa í-keng ū chiong Iâ-so͘ só͘ chòe só͘ kà-sī it-chhè ê tāi-chì, tùi I khai-sí kang-chok ti̍t-kàu chiūⁿ-thiⁿ hit ji̍t, lóng ū kóng-khí. I chiūⁿ-thiⁿ í-chêng, ū thong-kè Sèng Sîn chiong chin chōe tāi-chì chí-sī só͘ kéng-soán ê sù-tô͘.
44001003	I siū-hāi í-āu, ū ēng chin chōe chèng-kù hián-bêng I pún-sin oa̍h-teh, tī sì-cha̍p ji̍t ê tiong-kan ū hián-hiān hō͘ sù-tô͘ khòaⁿ-kìⁿ, tùi in káng-lūn Siōng-tè-kok ê sū.
44001004	Iâ-so͘ kap in chòe-hé ê sî ū hoan-hù in: “M̄-thang lī-khui [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng], chiàu góa bat kā lín kóng, tio̍h thèng-hāu Pē ê èng-ún.
44001005	[Iok-hān] ēng chúi sóe-lé, m̄-kú koh bô kúi ji̍t, lín ōe siū Sèng Sîn sóe-lé.”
44001006	Sù-tô͘ kap Iâ-so͘ chū-chi̍p ê sî, mn̄g I kóng, “Chú ah, lí beh tī chit-ê sî chiong chú-koân hôe-ho̍k hō͘ [Í-sek-lia̍t] sī-bô?”
44001007	I kā in kóng, “Pē ēng ka-kī ê koân-pèng koat-tēng ê sî-kan kap ki-hōe, m̄-sī lín thang chai ê.
44001008	M̄-kú Sèng Sîn lîm-kàu lín ê sî, lín ōe tit-tio̍h lêng-le̍k, tī [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng], choân [Iû-thài], kap [Sat-má-lī-a], ti̍t-kàu thiⁿ-piⁿ hái-kak ūi-tio̍h góa chòe kiàn-chèng.”
44001009	Iâ-so͘ kóng chiah-ê ōe liáu-āu, in teh khòaⁿ ê sî, siū chiap chiūⁿ-thiⁿ; ū chi̍t phìⁿ hûn chiap I khì, in chiū khòaⁿ bōe-tio̍h.
44001010	In iáu teh chù-ba̍k khòaⁿ thiⁿ ê sî, hut-jiân ū nn̄g ê chhēng pe̍h-saⁿ ê lâng khiā tī in sin-piⁿ,
44001011	kóng, “[Ka-lī-lī]-lâng ah, lín ná khiā tī chia teh khòaⁿ thiⁿ? Chit-ūi lī-khui lín siū chiap chiūⁿ-thiⁿ ê Iâ-so͘, lín khòaⁿ-kìⁿ I án-ni chiūⁿ-thiⁿ, I mā ōe chiàu án-ni koh lâi.”
44001012	Āu-lâi, sù-tô͘ tùi hit-ê kiò-chòe [Ka-ná-soaⁿ] ê só͘-chāi tò-khì [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng]; [Ka-ná-soaⁿ] lī [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] bô jōa hn̄g, chha-put-to chi̍t kong-lí, chiū-sī An-hioh-ji̍t ōe ēng-tit kiâⁿ ê lō͘-thêng.
44001013	In ji̍p-siâⁿ liáu-āu, peh-khì in só͘ tòa hit keng chhù lâu-téng ê thiaⁿ; [Pí-tek], [Iok-hān], [Ngá-kok], [An-tek-lia̍t], [Hui-le̍k] kap [To-má], [Pa-to-lô-mái] kap [Má-thài], [A-le̍k-hui] ê kiáⁿ [Ngá-kok], Kek-chìn-tóng ê [Se-bûn], kap [Ngá-kok] ê kiáⁿ [Iû-tāi] tī hia.
44001014	In kap kúi-nā ê hū-jîn-lâng, mā ū Iâ-so͘ ê lāu-bú [Má-lī-a] í-ki̍p I ê hiaⁿ-tī, lóng kè-sio̍k tâng-sim ha̍p-ì pek-chhiat kî-tó.
44001015	Kúi-nā ji̍t āu, chha-put-to ū chi̍t-pah jī-cha̍p ê sìn-tô͘ chū-chi̍p. [Pí-tek] khiā khí-lâi, kóng:
44001016	“Kok ūi hiaⁿ-tī, Sèng Sîn thong-kè [Tāi-pi̍t] ê chhùi tī Sèng-keng só͘ ū-giân koan-hē [Iû-tāi] chhōa lâng lia̍h Iâ-so͘ ê tāi-chì it-tēng tio̍h èng-giām.
44001017	I pún-lâi sī lán tiong-kan ê chi̍t ê, siū soán lâi hun-tam chit-ê chit-hūn.
44001018	“[Iû-tāi] ēng i chòe put-gī ê tāi-chì só͘ tit-tio̍h ê chîⁿ bóe chi̍t tè tōe; I tī hia tò-thâu-chai siak-sí, pak-tó͘ piak-li̍h, tn̂g-á lóng lâu chhut-lâi.
44001019	Tòa tī [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] ê lâng lóng chai chit hāng tāi-chì, só͘-í chiàu in pún-tōe ê ōe kā hit tè tōe kiò-chòe [A-kek-tāi-má], ì-sù sī ‘Huih-hn̂g’.
44001020	“In-ūi Si-phian ū kì-chài: Tio̍h hō͘ i ê chhù hong-hòe, bô-lâng tī hia khiā-khí. Koh ū kì-chài: Tio̍h hō͘ pa̍t-lâng tāi-thòe i léng-tō ê chit-ūi.
44001021	“Só͘-í, tio̍h ū chi̍t ê lâng lâi ka-ji̍p, kap lán chòe-hé choh Chú Iâ-so͘ koh-oa̍h ê kiàn-chèng-jîn. Chit-ê lâng tio̍h tī Chú Iâ-so͘ kap lán chòe-hé chhut-ji̍p ê sî, chiū-sī tùi [Iok-hān] si-sóe khí, kàu Iâ-so͘ lī-pia̍t lán siū chiap chiūⁿ-thiⁿ hit ji̍t, put-sî kap lán chòe-tīn.”
44001023	In chiū thê-miâ nn̄g ê lâng, chiū-sī kiò-chòe [Pa-sat-pa], mā chheng-chòe [Iû-sū-to͘] ê [Iok-sek], kap [Má-thê-a].
44001024	In kî-tó kóng, “Chú ah, lí chai ta̍k ê lâng ê sim. Kiû lí chí-sī goán, chit nn̄g lâng tiong-kan tó chi̍t ê sī lí só͘ kéng-soán,
44001025	beh lâi tam-tng sù-tô͘ ê chit-hūn ê, in-ūi [Iû-tāi] í-keng pàng-sak chit-ê chit-hūn, khì i eng-kai khì ê só͘-chāi.”
44001026	Jiân-āu, in liam-khau, liam-tio̍h [Má-thê-a], i chiū ka-ji̍p cha̍p-it ê sù-tô͘ ê thoân-thé.
44002001	Gō͘-sûn-choeh ê ji̍t kàu, bûn-tô͘ lóng chū-chi̍p tī chi̍t só͘-chāi.
44002002	Hut-jiân ū siaⁿ tùi thiⁿ-téng lâi, chhin-chhiūⁿ thàu tōa-hong, chhiong-móa in teh chē ê kui-keng chhù.
44002003	Koh ū chhin-chhiūⁿ hun-khui ê hé-chi̍h tùi in chhut-hiān, hioh tī ta̍k ê lâng ê téng-bīn.
44002004	In lóng siū Sèng Sîn chhiong-móa, chiàu Sèng Sîn hō͘ in ê châi-lêng khai-sí kóng pa̍t chióng gú-giân.
44002005	Hit sî, ū chi̍t-kóa khiân-sêng ê [Iû-thài]-lâng tùi sè-kài ta̍k kok lâi, tòa tī [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng].
44002006	Thiaⁿ-tio̍h chit-ê siaⁿ hiáng, chèng-lâng chiū lóng chū-chi̍p óa-lâi. In-ūi ta̍k ê lâng thiaⁿ-tio̍h bûn-tô͘ ēng in ê pún-tōe-ōe tùi in kóng-ōe, soah gāng-khì.
44002007	In tio̍h-kiaⁿ koh kî-koài, kóng, “Lí khòaⁿ, chiah-ê teh kóng-ōe ê kiám m̄-sī lóng [Ka-lī-lī]-lâng?
44002008	Lán ná-ōe thiaⁿ-tio̍h in lóng ēng lán ta̍k ê lâng ê pún-tōe-ōe teh kóng-ōe?
44002009	Lán chiah-ê [Phàⁿ-thê-a]-lâng, [Bí-thài]-lâng, [Í-lân]-lâng, í-ki̍p tùi [Bí-só͘-put-ta̍t-bí-a], [Iû-thài] kap [Ka-phàⁿ-to-ka], [Pún-to͘] kap [A-se-a],
44002010	[Hut-lū-ka] kap [Pông-hui-lī-a], [Ai-ki̍p] kap óa-kūn [Kó͘-lī-nāi] ê [Lī-pí-a] tōe-khu lâi ê lâng, mā ū tùi [Lô-má] lâi ê chhut-gōa-lâng, lāi-bīn ū
44002011	[Iû-thài]-lâng kap kái-chong ji̍p [Iû-thài]-kàu ê lâng, koh ū [Kek-lí-te̍k]-lâng kap [A-la-pek]-lâng. Lán kèng-jiân thiaⁿ-tio̍h in lóng ēng lán ê pún-tōe-ōe kóng-khí Siōng-tè só͘ chòe úi-tāi ê tāi-chì.”
44002012	Tāi-ke tio̍h-kiaⁿ koh gông-ngia̍h, mn̄g-lâi mn̄g-khì, “Che sī sím-mi̍h tāi-chì?”
44002013	Ū lâng thí-chhiò kóng, “Chiah-ê lâng sī lim sin-chiú teh chùi.”
44002014	Chit-ê sî, [Pí-tek] kap cha̍p-it ê sù-tô͘ khiā khí-lâi, tōa-siaⁿ tùi chèng-lâng kóng, “[Iû-thài]-lâng kap só͘-ū tòa tī [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] ê lâng, lín tio̍h chai, chù-ì thiaⁿ góa ê ōe.
44002015	Chiah-ê lâng m̄-sī chiàu lín só͘ siūⁿ teh chiú-chùi, chit-chūn chiah chá-khí-sî káu tiám.
44002016	Kî-si̍t che chiū-sī sian-ti [Iok-ní] só͘ kóng ê.
44002017	Siōng-tè kóng: Tī chiong-boa̍t ê ji̍t-chí, Góa beh chiong góa ê Sîn piàⁿ lo̍h-khì hō͘ só͘-ū ê lâng. Lín ê kiáⁿ kap cha-bó͘-kiáⁿ ōe kóng ū-giân; lín ê siàu-liân-lâng ōe khòaⁿ-kìⁿ īⁿ-siōng; lín ê lāu-lâng ōe choh-bāng.
44002018	Koh tī hiah-ê ji̍t, góa mā beh chiong góa ê Sîn piàⁿ lo̍h-khì hō͘ góa ê lô͘-po̍k kap lú-pī; in ōe kóng ū-giân.
44002019	Góa beh tī thiⁿ-téng hián-chhut kî-sū, tī tōe-chiūⁿ kiâⁿ sîn-jiah, ū huih, hé, kap ian-bū.
44002020	Tī Chú tōa koh êng-iāu ê Ji̍t lâi-lîm í-chêng, ji̍t-thâu ōe pìⁿ-chòe o͘-àm, ge̍h pìⁿ-chòe chhin-chhiūⁿ huih hiah-ni̍h âng.
44002021	Hit sî, só͘-ū kiû-kiò Chú ê miâ ê lâng lóng ōe tit-tio̍h kiù.
44002022	“[Í-sek-lia̍t]-lâng, lín tio̍h thiaⁿ chiah-ê ōe. Chiàu lín só͘ chai, Siōng-tè thong-kè [Ná-sat-le̍k]-lâng Iâ-so͘ tī lín tiong-kan kiâⁿ koân-lêng, kî-sū, kap sîn-jiah, lâi tùi lín chèng-bêng I sī Siōng-tè só͘ chí-phài ê.
44002023	Siōng-tè chiàu I ū-tēng ê chí-ì kap kè-ōe, chiong Iâ-so͘ kau hō͘ lín; lín ēng bô Lu̍t-hoat ê lâng ê chhiú chiong I tèng tī si̍p-jī-kè téng, kā I sat-hāi.
44002024	Siōng-tè kā I kái-tû sí ê thòng-khó͘, hō͘ I koh-oa̍h, in-ūi sí bô hoat-tō͘ kā I khòng-chè.
44002025	[Tāi-pi̍t] bat chí I kóng: Góa khòaⁿ-kìⁿ Chú put-sî tī góa ê bīn-chêng, in-ūi I tī góa ê chiàⁿ-pêng, hō͘ góa bōe iô-tāng.
44002026	In-ūi án-ni, góa ê sim hoaⁿ-hí, góa ê chi̍h khoài-lo̍k; góa chit-ê ōe hiú-nōa ê jio̍k-thé ōe khò ǹg-bāng lâi oa̍h.
44002027	In-ūi lí bōe chiong góa ê lêng-hûn pàng-sak tī im-kan, mā bōe hō͘ lí ê Sèng-chiá hiú-nōa.
44002028	Lí í-keng chí-sī góa oa̍h-miā ê tō-lō͘, hō͘ góa tī lí ê bīn-chêng chhiong-móa hoaⁿ-hí.
44002029	“Kok ūi hiaⁿ-tī, koan-hē sian-chó͘ [Tāi-pi̍t] ê sū, góa hó-táⁿ kā lín kóng. I í-keng sí, koh bâi-chòng lah, i ê bōng kin-á-ji̍t iáu tī lán chia.
44002030	I sī sian-ti, chai Siōng-tè ū tùi i chiù-chōa èng-ún, beh tùi i ê kiáⁿ-sun jīm-bēng chi̍t ê choh-ông lâi chē i ê pó-chō.
44002031	[Tāi-pi̍t] seng khòaⁿ-chhut chit-ê tāi-chì, koan-hē Ki-tok ê koh-oa̍h ū kóng: I bô siū pàng-sak tī im-kan; I ê jio̍k-thé mā bô hiú-nōa.
44002032	Chit-ūi Iâ-so͘, Siōng-tè í-keng ū hō͘ I koh-oa̍h. Goán lóng sī chit hāng sū ê kiàn-chèng-jîn.
44002033	I í-keng siū ko-seng kàu Siōng-tè ê chiàⁿ-pêng, koh tùi Pē niá-siū só͘ èng-ún ê Sèng Sîn, I hiān-chāi chiong chit-ūi Sèng Sîn piàⁿ lo̍h-lâi hō͘ goán, chiū-sī lín hiān-chāi só͘ khòaⁿ-kìⁿ koh thiaⁿ-kìⁿ ê.
44002034	[Tāi-pi̍t] m̄-bat chiūⁿ-thiⁿ, m̄-kú i kóng: Chú tùi góa ê Chú kóng: Lí chē góa ê chiàⁿ-pêng,
44002035	kàu góa hō͘ lí ê tùi-te̍k chòe lí ê kha-tiam.
44002036	“Só͘-í, [Í-sek-lia̍t] choân-ke tio̍h khak-si̍t chai, lín kā I tèng si̍p-jī-kè chit-ūi Iâ-so͘, Siōng-tè í-keng jīm-bēng I chòe Chú, chòe Ki-tok lah!”
44002037	Chèng-lâng thiaⁿ-tio̍h chiah-ê ōe, sim-lāi chin chhì-chha̍k, tùi [Pí-tek] kap kî-tha ê sù-tô͘ kóng, “Kok ūi hiaⁿ-tī, goán eng-kai chòe sím-mi̍h?”
44002038	[Pí-tek] tùi in kóng, “Tio̍h hóe-kái, ta̍k ê lâng lóng tio̍h hōng Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok ê miâ siū sóe-lé, hō͘ lín ê chōe tit-tio̍h sià-bián, chiū ōe niá-siū Siōng-tè só͘ sù ê Sèng Sîn.
44002039	In-ūi chit-ê èng-ún sī beh hō͘ lín kap lín ê kiáⁿ-sun, í-ki̍p it-chhè tī hn̄g ê só͘-chāi ê lâng, chiū-sī lán ê Chú Siōng-tè só͘ ho͘-tiàu lâi kui I ê lâng.”
44002040	[Pí-tek] koh ēng chin chōe ōe chhut-la̍t chòe kiàn-chèng, khoàn-bián in kóng, “Tio̍h kiù ka-kī thoat-lī chit-ê siâ-ok ê sè-tāi.”
44002041	Tùi án-ni, niá-siū i ê sìn-sit ê lâng lóng siū sóe-lé; hit ji̍t sìn-tô͘ tāi-iok ke-thiⁿ saⁿ-chheng lâng.
44002042	In choân-sim niá-siū sù-tô͘ ê kà-sī, chham-ú thoân-khè seng-oa̍h, peh-piáⁿ, kî-tó.
44002043	Sù-tô͘ kiâⁿ chin chōe kî-sū sîn-jiah, ín-khí chèng-lâng kèng-ùi ê sim.
44002044	Só͘-ū ê sìn-tô͘ lóng chòe-hé seng-oa̍h, só͘-ū ê mi̍h kong-ke ēng,
44002045	koh bōe ka-sán châi-bu̍t, chiàu ta̍k ê lâng ê su-iàu pun hō͘ tāi-ke.
44002046	In ta̍k ji̍t tâng-sim ha̍p-ì tī Sèng-tiān chū-hōe, koh tī chi̍t-ke chi̍t-ke peh-piáⁿ, ēng hoaⁿ-hí sêng-sim chòe-hé lim-chia̍h,
44002047	siōng-chàn Siōng-tè, koh tit-tio̍h chèng-lâng hoaⁿ-hí chiap-la̍p. Chú chiong tit-kiù ê lâng ji̍t-ji̍t ke-thiⁿ hō͘ in.
44003001	Ū chi̍t ji̍t, ē-po͘-sî saⁿ-tiám kî-tó ê sî-kan, [Pí-tek] kap [Iok-hān] chiūⁿ Sèng-tiān.
44003002	Ū chi̍t ê chhut-sì kha chiū pái ê lâng, ta̍k ji̍t hō͘ lâng kng lâi hē tī Sèng-tiān hit-ê kiò-chòe “Súi-mn̂g” ê mn̂g-kháu, thang tùi ji̍p Sèng-tiān ê lâng kiû-khit.
44003003	I chi̍t-ē khòaⁿ-tio̍h [Pí-tek] kap [Iok-hān] teh-beh ji̍p-khì Sèng-tiān, chiū kiû in siá-sì.
44003004	[Pí-tek] kap [Iok-hān] chù-ba̍k kā i khòaⁿ, [Pí-tek] tùi i kóng, “Khòaⁿ goán!”
44003005	I chiū chù-sîn khòaⁿ in, khòaⁿ ōe-tàng tùi in tit-tio̍h sím-mi̍h.
44003006	[Pí-tek] tùi i kóng, “Kim, gûn, góa lóng bô, góa chiong góa só͘-ū ê hō͘ lí. Góa hōng [Ná-sat-le̍k]-lâng Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok ê miâ bēng-lēng lí, khí-lâi kiâⁿ!”
44003007	Jiân-āu [Pí-tek] khan i ê chiàⁿ-chhiú, kā i hû khí-lâi. I ê kha kap kha-ba̍k sûi-sî ū-la̍t,
44003008	chiū thiàu khí-lâi khiā-teh, koh kiâⁿ, kap in chòe-hé chìn-ji̍p Sèng-tiān, ná kiâⁿ ná thiàu, ná o-ló Siōng-tè.
44003009	Chèng-lâng khòaⁿ-tio̍h i ná kiâⁿ ná siōng-chàn Siōng-tè,
44003010	koh jīn-tit i sī pêng-siông chē tī “Súi-mn̂g” ê mn̂g-kháu teh kiû-khit hit-ê lâng, chiū tùi tī i sin-chiūⁿ só͘ hoat-seng ê tāi-chì kám-kak chin kî-koài tio̍h-kiaⁿ.
44003011	Tī [Só͘-lô-bûn] ê cháu-lông, hit-ê tit-tio̍h i-hó ê lâng kā [Pí-tek] kap [Iok-hān] khiú tiâu-tiâu, chèng-lâng tōa kî-koài, lóng cháu óa-lâi.
44003012	[Pí-tek] khòaⁿ-tio̍h hiah-ê lâng, chiū kā in kóng, “[Í-sek-lia̍t]-lâng, lín sī-án-chóaⁿ tùi chit hāng tāi-chì kám-kak kî-koài? Sī-án-chóaⁿ chù-ba̍k khòaⁿ goán, siūⁿ-kóng goán sī khò ka-kī ê lêng-le̍k á-sī khiân-sêng hō͘ chit-ê lâng khí-lâi kiâⁿ?
44003013	[A-pek-la-hán], [Í-sat], [Ngá-kok] ê Siōng-tè, chiū-sī lán chó͘-sian ê Siōng-tè, í-keng hō͘ I ê lô͘-po̍k Iâ-so͘ tit-tio̍h êng-kng, chit-ūi Iâ-so͘ lín kā I kau hō͘ koaⁿ-hú; [Pí-lia̍p-to] koat-tēng beh pàng I ê sî, lín tong-tiûⁿ kū-choa̍t.
44003014	Lín kū-choa̍t hit-ūi Sèng koh Kong-gī ê, iau-kiû [Pí-lia̍p-to] pàng chi̍t ê sat-jîn-hoān hō͘ lín.
44003015	Lín thâi-sí oa̍h-miā ê Goân-thâu, chiū-sī Siōng-tè hō͘ I tùi sí-lâng tiong koh-oa̍h Hit-ūi. Goán sī chit-ê tāi-chì ê kiàn-chèng-jîn.
44003016	Lín só͘ khòaⁿ-kìⁿ só͘ bat chit-ê kha pái ê lâng, tùi sìn-khò chit-ê miâ, chiū-sī Iâ-so͘ ê miâ, ū tit-tio̍h khùi-la̍t. Tùi sìn-khò Iâ-so͘, chit-ê lâng oân-choân hó khí-lâi, chit hāng tāi-chì lín tāi-ke lóng ū khòaⁿ-tio̍h.
44003017	“Pêng-iú, taⁿ góa chai lín kap lín ê léng-tō-chiá án-ni chòe sī in-ūi m̄-chai.
44003018	Siōng-tè ū thong-kè chèng sian-ti ê chhùi ū-giân I ê Ki-tok tio̍h siū-khó͘, chit-ê tāi-chì kó-jiân èng-giām lah.
44003019	Só͘-í, tio̍h hóe-kái kui-ǹg Siōng-tè, thang hō͘ lín ê chōe tit-tio̍h chhat-siau.
44003020	Án-ni, Chú chiū ōe sù lín keng-sin ê ji̍t-chí, koh chhe-khián chá chiū kéng hó-sè ê Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ lâi.
44003021	Chiàu Siōng-tè thong-kè kó͘-chá sèng sian-ti ê chhùi só͘ soan-pò͘ ê, I it-tēng tio̍h tiàm tī thiⁿ-téng ti̍t-kàu bān-mi̍h ho̍k-heng ê sî.
44003022	[Mô͘-se] bat kóng, ‘Chú --- lín ê Siōng-tè beh tùi lín tông-pau ê tiong-kan kā lín jīm-bēng chi̍t ūi chhin-chhiūⁿ góa chit khoán ê sian-ti. I kā lín kóng ê ōe, lín lóng tio̍h thiaⁿ-thàn.
44003023	M̄-thiaⁿ chit-ūi sian-ti ê ōe ê lâng, ōe tùi chú-bîn tiong lóng kā in tû-bia̍t.’
44003024	Tùi [Sat-bó-ní] kàu í-āu só͘-ū thoân sìn-sit ê sian-ti, lóng ū kóng-khí chiah-ê ji̍t-chí.
44003025	Lín sī sian-ti ê kiáⁿ-sun, mā-sī Siōng-tè kap lín ê chó͘-sian só͘ li̍p ê iok ê kè-sêng-jîn. I bat tùi [A-pek-la-hán] kóng, ‘Tōe-chiūⁿ bān-cho̍k lóng ōe in-ūi lí ê hō͘-tāi tit-tio̍h hok-khì.’
44003026	Siōng-tè jīm-bēng I ê Lô͘-po̍k, seng chhe I lâi lín chia, kā lín sù-hok, hō͘ lín ta̍k ê lâng oa̍t tò-tńg lī-khui siâ-ok.”
44004001	[Pí-tek] kap [Iok-hān] tùi kûn-chiòng teh kóng-ōe ê sî, ū chè-si, Sèng-tiān ê siú-ōe-tiúⁿ, kap [Sat-to͘-kai]-phài ê lâng lâi.
44004002	In hui-siông siū-khì, in-ūi chit nn̄g ê sù-tô͘ teh kà-sī chèng-lâng, kun-kù Iâ-so͘ ê koh-oa̍h soan-káng sí-lâng koh-oa̍h ê sū.
44004003	In chiū lia̍h chit nn̄g ê sù-tô͘, kā in khu-liû kàu keh-ji̍t, in-ūi thiⁿ í-keng àm.
44004004	Thiaⁿ-tio̍h sìn-sit ê ū chin chōe lâng sìn, ta-po͘-lâng ê jîn-sò͘ chha-put-to ū gō͘-chheng.
44004005	Keh-ji̍t, [Iû-thài]-lâng ê léng-siù, tiúⁿ-ló, kap keng-ha̍k-kàu-su chū-chi̍p tī [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng].
44004006	Tōa-chè-si [A-ná] kap [Kai-a-hoat], [Iok-hān], [A-le̍k-san-tāi], kap tōa-chè-si ê ka-cho̍k mā lóng tī hia.
44004007	In kiò sù-tô͘ lâi khiā tī in tiong-kan, mn̄g kóng, “Lín khò sím-mi̍h koân-lêng, hōng sím-mi̍h miâ, chòe chit hāng tāi-chì?”
44004008	Hit sî [Pí-tek] siū Sèng Sîn chhiong-móa, ìn kóng, “Kok ūi bîn-kan ê léng-siù kap tiúⁿ-ló,
44004009	goán kin-á-ji̍t nā-sī ūi-tio̍h chit-ê kha pái ê lâng tit-tio̍h i-hó só͘ chòe ê hó-sū siū chhâ-mn̄g,
44004010	lín tāi-ke kap só͘-ū [Í-sek-lia̍t]-lâng lóng tio̍h chai, chit-ê lâng oân-choân ióng-kiāⁿ khiā tī lín bīn-chêng, sī khò [Ná-sat-le̍k]-lâng Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok ê miâ. Chit-ūi Iâ-so͘ lín kā I tèng si̍p-jī-kè, m̄-kú Siōng-tè hō͘ I tùi sí-lâng tiong koh-oa̍h.
44004011	I chiū-sī Sèng-keng só͘ kóng: Lín chiah-ê khí-chhù-sai-hū só͘ khì-sak ê chio̍h, í-keng chiâⁿ-chòe siōng tiōng-iàu ê ki-chio̍h.
44004012	Iâ-so͘ í-gōa lóng bô chín-kiù, in-ūi tī thiⁿ-ē jîn-kan, Siōng-tè bô sù pa̍t ê miâ hō͘ lán thang sìn-khò lâi tit-kiù.”
44004013	Gī-oân khòaⁿ-tio̍h [Pí-tek] kap [Iok-hān] hiah-ni̍h ióng-kám, chai in sī bô tha̍k-chheh ê phó͘-thong-lâng, chiū chin tio̍h-kiaⁿ, koh jīn-tit in bat kap Iâ-so͘ chòe-hé,
44004014	mā khòaⁿ-tio̍h hit-ê tit-tio̍h i-hó ê lâng khiā tī in sin-piⁿ, chiū bô ōe thang hoán-pok.
44004015	Gī-oân chiū kiò in lī-khui gī-hōe, jiân-āu chham-siông
44004016	kóng, “Lán tio̍h án-chóaⁿ lâi tùi-hù chiah-ê lâng? In só͘ kiâⁿ chit-ê kî-īⁿ ê sîn-jiah, tòa tī [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] ê lâng lóng chai, lán bô hoat-tō͘ hó͘-jīn.
44004017	M̄-kú ūi-tio̍h beh pī-bián chit-ê tāi-chì tī bîn-kan ná thoân ná khoah, lán tio̍h kā in kéng-kò, tùi sím-mi̍h lâng to m̄-thang koh hōng Iâ-so͘ ê miâ káng-lūn.”
44004018	Āu-lâi, in kiò hit nn̄g ê sù-tô͘ lâi, bēng-lēng in bōe ēng-tit koh hōng Iâ-so͘ ê miâ káng-lūn á-sī kà-sī.
44004019	M̄-kú [Pí-tek] kap [Iok-hān] ìn kóng, “Tī Siōng-tè bīn-chêng, thiaⁿ-thàn lín á-sī thiaⁿ-thàn Siōng-tè chiah tio̍h, lín ka-kī phòaⁿ-toàn.
44004020	In-ūi goán só͘ khòaⁿ-tio̍h só͘ thiaⁿ-tio̍h ê, bōe-tàng bô kóng.”
44004021	Hiah-ê gī-oân m̄-chai tio̍h án-chóaⁿ kā in chhú-hoa̍t, chiū giâm-giâm kā in kéng-kò liáu-āu, pàng in khì; in-ūi bîn-chiòng lóng teh ūi-tio̍h só͘ hoat-seng ê tāi-chì kui êng-kng hō͘ Siōng-tè.
44004022	Tùi chit-ê sîn-jiah tit-tio̍h i-hó hit-ê lâng í-keng sì-cha̍p gōa hè.
44004023	[Pí-tek] kap [Iok-hān] siū tháu-pàng, chiū tò-khì tâng-phōaⁿ hia, chiong chè-si-tiúⁿ kap tiúⁿ-ló kā in kóng ê ōe lóng tùi in pò-kò.
44004024	In thiaⁿ liáu chiū tâng-sim tōa-siaⁿ tùi Siōng-tè kî-tó kóng, “Chhòng-chō thiⁿ, tōe, hái, kap kî-tiong bān-mi̍h ê Chú-cháiⁿ,
44004025	lí bat thong-kè Sèng Sîn ēng lí ê lô͘-po̍k goán ê chó͘ [Tāi-pi̍t] ê chhùi kóng: Gōa-pang sī-án-chóaⁿ háng-hoah? Bān-bîn sī-án-chóaⁿ kè-bô͘ bô hāu-kó ê sū?
44004026	Tōe-chiūⁿ ê kun-ông lóng pâi-tīn beh kau-chiàn, thóng-tī-chiá liân-ha̍p khí-lâi, beh kong-kek Chú kap I soán-li̍p ê Ki-tok.
44004027	[Hi-lu̍t] kap [Pâng-siu] [Pí-lia̍p-to] kó-jiân tī chit-ê siâⁿ-lāi kap Gōa-pang-lâng í-ki̍p [Í-sek-lia̍t]-lâng liân-ha̍p lâi kong-kek lí soán-li̍p sèng ê lô͘-po̍k Iâ-so͘.
44004028	In chū-chi̍p beh chòe lí ê koân-lêng kap lí ê chí-ì ū-tēng ōe hoat-seng it-chhè ê sū.
44004029	Taⁿ Chú ah, in teh kā goán khióng-hat, kiû lí kàm-chhat, hō͘ lí ê lô͘-po̍k koh-khah ū ióng-khì thang soan-káng lí ê sìn-sit.
44004030	Kiû lí chhun-chhiú i-tī, koh thong-kè lí sèng ê lô͘-po̍k Iâ-so͘ ê miâ hō͘ goán kiâⁿ sîn-jiah kî-sū.”
44004031	Kî-tó soah, chū-hōe ê só͘-chāi iô-tāng; in lóng siū Sèng Sîn chhiong-móa, ióng-kám soan-káng Siōng-tè ê sìn-sit.
44004032	Choân-thé sìn-tô͘ lóng tâng-sim ha̍p-ì, bô chi̍t ê lâng kóng i ê châi-bu̍t sī ka-kī ê; só͘-ū ê mi̍h-kiāⁿ kong-ke ēng.
44004033	Sù-tô͘ ēng tōa lêng-le̍k kiàn-chèng Chú Iâ-so͘ ê koh-oa̍h, chèng-lâng lóng tit-tio̍h tōa un-tián.
44004034	In tiong-kan bô-lâng ū khiàm-kheh, in-ūi ū chhân-hn̂g chhù-the̍h ê lâng lóng bōe chhut-khì,
44004035	só͘ tit-tio̍h ê chîⁿ the̍h lâi kau hō͘ sù-tô͘, chiàu ta̍k ê lâng ê su-iàu hun-phòe.
44004036	Chi̍t ê chhut-sì tī [Sài-phó͘-lō͘-su] ê [Lī-bī]-lâng [Iok-sek], sù-tô͘ kā i kiò-chòe [Pa-ná-pa], ì-sù chiū-sī An-ùi-chiá.
44004037	I bōe ka-kī ê chhân-hn̂g, chîⁿ the̍h lâi kau hō͘ sù-tô͘.
44005001	Ū chi̍t ê lâng miâ kiò-chòe [A-ná-nî-a], i kap i ê bó͘ [Sat-hui-lah] bōe chi̍t-kóa chhân-hn̂g;
44005002	i tit-tio̍h bó͘ ê tông-ì, chiong só͘ tit-tio̍h ê chîⁿ lâu chi̍t-kóa khí-lâi, chhun-ê the̍h lâi kau hō͘ sù-tô͘.
44005003	[Pí-tek] tùi i kóng, “[A-ná-nî-a], lí ná hō͘ Sat-tàn khòng-chè lí ê sim lâi khi-phiàn Sèng Sîn, kā bōe chhân-hn̂g ê chîⁿ lâu chi̍t pō͘-hūn khí-lâi?
44005004	Chhân-hn̂g iáu-bē bōe sī lí ê, bōe liáu só͘ tit-tio̍h ê chîⁿ lí ū koân thang chhú-lí, lí ná chòe chit khoán tāi-chì? Lí m̄-sī khi-phiàn lâng, sī khi-phiàn Siōng-tè!”
44005005	[A-ná-nî-a] chi̍t-ē thiaⁿ-tio̍h chit-ê ōe, lek lo̍h-khì chiū sí. Thiaⁿ-tio̍h chit-ê tāi-chì ê lâng lóng chin kiaⁿ-hiâⁿ.
44005006	Ū kúi-nā ê siàu-liân-lâng lâi, kā i ê si-thé pau khí-lâi, kng chhut-khì bâi-chòng.
44005007	Chha-put-to saⁿ tiám cheng āu, i ê bó͘ ji̍p-lâi, m̄-chai só͘ hoat-seng ê tāi-chì.
44005008	[Pí-tek] mn̄g i, “Lí kā góa kóng, lín bōe chhân-hn̂g só͘ tit-tio̍h ê chîⁿ kan-ta chiah-ê sī-bô?” I ìn kóng, “Sī, chiah-ê nā-tiāⁿ.”
44005009	[Pí-tek] tùi i kóng, “Lín ná tâng-sim chhì-thàm Chú ê Sîn? Lí khòaⁿ, bâi-chòng lí tiōng-hu ê lâng tú tńg-lâi kàu mn̂g-kháu, in mā beh kā lí kng chhut-khì!”
44005010	[Sat-hui-lah] sûi-sî lek lo̍h-khì [Pí-tek] ê kha-chêng chiū sí. Hiah-ê siàu-liân-lâng ji̍p-lâi khòaⁿ-tio̍h i í-keng sí, chiū kā i kng chhut-khì, bâi-chòng tī i tiōng-hu ê sin-piⁿ.
44005011	Choân kàu-hōe kap thiaⁿ-tio̍h chiah-ê tāi-chì ê lâng lóng chin kiaⁿ-hiâⁿ.
44005012	Sù-tô͘ tī bîn-kan kiâⁿ chin chōe sîn-jiah kî-sū. Sìn-tô͘ lóng tâng-sim ha̍p-ì tī [Só͘-lô-bûn] Cháu-lông chū-hōe.
44005013	Bîn-chiòng lóng chin chun-tiōng in, m̄-kú m̄-káⁿ kap in chiap-kūn.
44005014	Sìn Chú ê lâng it-ti̍t ke-thiⁿ, lâm-ê lú-ê lóng chin chōe.
44005015	Ū lâng chiong pīⁿ-lâng khǹg tī bîn-chhn̂g á-sī chhn̂g-pho͘, kng chhut-lâi hē tī lō͘-piⁿ, tī [Pí-tek] keng-kè ê sî thang hō͘ i ê iáⁿ ìm-tio̍h.
44005016	Koh ū kui-kûn lâng chhōa phòa-pīⁿ ê í-ki̍p hō͘ siâ-sîn khó͘-chhó͘ ê lâng tùi [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] chiu-ûi ê hiong-tìn chū-chi̍p óa-lâi, in lóng ū tit-tio̍h i-hó.
44005017	Tōa-chè-si í-ki̍p kap i kâng-tóng, chiū-sī [Sat-to͘-kai]-tóng ê lâng, tùi sù-tô͘ móa-sim chi̍t-tò͘.
44005018	In hē-chhiú lia̍h sù-tô͘, kā in koaiⁿ-lo̍h kaⁿ.
44005019	Hit mî, Chú ê thiⁿ-sài phah-khui kaⁿ-mn̂g, kā in chhōa chhut-lâi, tùi in kóng,
44005020	“Lín khì, khiā tī Sèng-tiān chiong chit-ê sù oa̍h-miā ê sìn-sit choân-pō͘ tùi bîn-chiòng soan-káng.”
44005021	Sù-tô͘ thiaⁿ i ê ōe, thiⁿ beh-kng ê sî ji̍p-khì Sèng-tiān kà-sī lâng. Tōa-chè-si kap i kâng-tóng ê lâng kàu-ūi, chiū tiàu-chi̍p só͘-ū [Í-sek-lia̍t]-lâng ê tiúⁿ-ló khui-hōe, jiân-āu chhe lâng khì kaⁿ-ga̍k chhōa sù-tô͘ lâi.
44005022	Siú-ōe kàu ê sî, hoat-hiān sù-tô͘ bô tī kaⁿ-ni̍h, chiū tò-lâi pò-kò kóng,
44005023	“Goán hoat-hiān kaⁿ-ga̍k só tiâu-tiâu, khàn-siú khiā tī mn̂g-kháu, goán chi̍t-ē khui kaⁿ-mn̂g, lāi-bīn lóng bô khòaⁿ-tio̍h pòaⁿ-lâng.”
44005024	Sèng-tiān ê siú-ōe-tiúⁿ kap chè-si-tiúⁿ thiaⁿ-tio̍h chit-ê pò-kò, m̄-chai tāi-chì ōe án-chóaⁿ ián-piàn chiū chin tio̍h-kip.
44005025	Hit sî, ū chi̍t ê lâng ji̍p-lâi kā in kóng, “Lín kā in lia̍h-khì koaiⁿ tī kaⁿ-ni̍h hiah-ê lâng, hiān-chāi khiā tī Sèng-tiān teh kà-sī bîn-chiòng!”
44005026	Hit-ê siú-ōe-tiúⁿ kap i ê pō͘-hā chiū khì kā sù-tô͘ chhōa lâi; in bô ēng pō-le̍k, in-ūi kiaⁿ bîn-chiòng ēng chio̍h-thâu kā in tìm.
44005027	In chhōa sù-tô͘ ji̍p-lâi, hō͘ in khiā tī gī-hōe bīn-chêng. Tōa-chè-si chiū kā in sím-mn̄g,
44005028	kóng, “Goán ū giâm-giâm kìm-chí lín m̄-thang ēng chit-ê miâ kà-sī lâng, lín hoán-tńg chiong chit-ê tō-lí thoân-piàn [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng], siūⁿ-beh chiong lâu chit-ê lâng ê huih ê chek-jīm kui hō͘ goán.”
44005029	[Pí-tek] kap kî-tha ê sù-tô͘ ìn kóng, “Goán tio̍h sūn-ho̍k Siōng-tè, m̄-sī sūn-ho̍k lâng.
44005030	Lín kā I tèng-sí tī si̍p-jī-kè téng ê Iâ-so͘, lán chó͘-sian ê Siōng-tè ū hō͘ I koh-oa̍h.
44005031	Chit-ūi Iâ-so͘, Siōng-tè ko-kú I chē tī ka-kī ê chiàⁿ-pêng, choh Siú-léng, choh Kiù-chú, thang hō͘ [Í-sek-lia̍t]-lâng hóe-kái, chōe tit-tio̍h sià-bián.
44005032	Goán sī chiah-ê tāi-chì ê kiàn-chèng-jîn. Siōng-tè sù hō͘ sūn-ho̍k I ê lâng ê Sèng Sîn mā ūi-tio̍h chiah-ê tāi-chì choh chèng-jîn.”
44005033	Gī-hōe ê gī-oân thiaⁿ-tio̍h chiah-ê ōe hui-siông siū-khì, ài-beh thâi in.
44005034	M̄-kú in tiong-kan ū chi̍t ê [Hoat-lī-sài]-phài ê lâng, kiò-chòe [Ka-má-lia̍t], sī chèng-lâng chun-kèng ê keng-ha̍k-kàu-su. I khiā khí-lâi, hoan-hù sù-tô͘ chiām-sî chhut-khì,
44005035	jiân-āu tùi gī-hōe kóng, “[Í-sek-lia̍t]-lâng, lín beh pān chiah-ê lâng tio̍h chin kín-sīn!
44005036	Í-chêng [Tiu-tāi] khí-lâi, chū-chheng tōa jîn-bu̍t, iok ū sì-pah lâng tè i, āu-lâi i hō͘ lâng thâi-sí, só͘-ū tè i ê lâng lóng sì-sòaⁿ, siau-sit khì.
44005037	Āu-lâi ū chi̍t ê [Ka-lī-lī]-lâng [Iû-tāi] tī hō͘-kháu-phó͘-cha ê sî chhut-hiān, chhōa chi̍t-kóa lâng tè i, i mā hō͘ lâng thâi-sí, tè i ê lâng lóng sì-sòaⁿ.
44005038	Taⁿ koan-hē chit hāng tāi-chì, góa kā lín kóng, chiah-ê lâng m̄-thang chhap, chhut-chāi in khì. In só͘ kè-ōe só͘ chòe ê nā chhut tī lâng, it-tēng ōe sit-pāi;
44005039	nā chhut tī Siōng-tè, lín chiū bōe-tàng kā in siau-bia̍t, kiaⁿ-liáu lín soah kap Siōng-tè choh tùi-thâu!” Gī-hōe chiap-la̍p i ê ì-kiàn.
44005040	In kiò sù-tô͘ ji̍p-lâi, ēng piⁿ kā in phah, bēng-lēng in bōe ēng-tit koh hōng Iâ-so͘ ê miâ káng-tō, jiân-āu pàng in chhut-khì.
44005041	Sù-tô͘ lī-khui gī-hōe, móa-sim hoaⁿ-hí, in-ūi in hō͘ lâng khòaⁿ-chòe ōe kham-tit ūi-tio̍h Chú ê miâ siū lêng-jio̍k.
44005042	In ta̍k ji̍t tī Sèng-tiān kap jîn-ke kè-sio̍k kà-sī lâng, thoân Ki-tok Iâ-so͘.
44006001	Bô kú í-āu, bûn-tô͘ ê lâng-sò͘ it-ti̍t ke-thiⁿ, kóng [Hi-la̍h]-gú ê [Iû-thài]-lâng bâi-oàn hiah-ê kóng [Hi-pek-lâi]-gú ê [Iû-thài]-lâng, in-ūi tī hun-phòe ji̍t-siông seng-oa̍h ê su-iàu ū hut-lio̍k in ê kóaⁿ-hū.
44006002	Cha̍p-jī sù-tô͘ chiū tiàu-chi̍p choân-thé bûn-tô͘, tùi in kóng, “Goán chiong soan-káng Siōng-tè sìn-sit ê kang-chok pàng hē-teh, khì koán hun-phòe ji̍t-siông seng-oa̍h ê su-iàu bô ha̍h.
44006003	Só͘-í, hiaⁿ-tī ah, tio̍h tùi lín tiong-kan soán chhit ê ū hó miâ-siaⁿ, siū Sèng Sîn chhiong-móa, koh ū tì-hūi ê lâng, goán thang jīm-bēng in pān-lí chit-ê tāi-chì.
44006004	Goán beh choan-sim tī kî-tó kap thoân-tō ê kang-chok.”
44006005	Sù-tô͘ ê ì-kiàn tit-tio̍h choân hōe-chiòng chàn-sêng, in chiū soán [Sū-thê-hoán], i sī chhiong-móa sìn-sim kap Sèng Sîn ê lâng; koh soán [Hui-le̍k], [Pek-lô-ko-lô], [Nî-ka-ná], [Thê-bûn], [Pa-bí-ná], kap kái-chong ji̍p [Iû-thài]-kàu ê [An-thê-o]-lâng [Nî-ko-la].
44006006	In hō͘ chiah-ê lâng khiā tī sù-tô͘ bīn-chêng, sù-tô͘ chiū ūi-tio̍h in kî-tó, kā in àn-chhiú.
44006007	Siōng-tè ê sìn-sit kè-sio̍k thoân-khui; tī [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] bûn-tô͘ ê lâng-sò͘ ke-thiⁿ chin chōe, koh ū chin chōe chè-si mā thiaⁿ-thàn chit-ê sìn-gióng.
44006008	[Sū-thê-hoán] chhiong-móa un-sù kap lêng-le̍k, tī bîn-chiòng ê tiong-kan kiâⁿ tōa kî-sū kap sîn-jiah.
44006009	Put-kò ū chi̍t-kóa lâng khí-lâi kap [Sū-thê-hoán] piān-lūn, in sī tùi [Kó͘-lī-nāi] kap [A-le̍k-san-tāi] lâi, sio̍k ‘Chū-iû-jîn’ hōe-tn̂g ê hōe-oân, í-ki̍p tùi [Ki-lī-ka] kap [A-se-a] lâi ê lâng.
44006010	Sèng Sîn sù tì-hūi hō͘ [Sū-thê-hoán], hō͘ in bô hoat-tō͘ thang piān-pok.
44006011	Āu-lâi, in bóe-siu chi̍t-kóa lâng chhut-lâi kóng, “Goán bat thiaⁿ-tio̍h i húi-pòng [Mô͘-se] kap Siōng-tè ê ōe.”
44006012	In siàn-tōng bîn-chiòng, tiúⁿ-ló, kap keng-ha̍k-kàu-su, chhiong-khì lia̍h [Sū-thê-hoán], kā i kau hō͘ gī-hōe.
44006013	In kiò chi̍t-kóa ké chèng-jîn chhut-lâi, kóng, “Chit-ê lâng put-sî kóng-ōe kong-kek chit-ê Sèng-tiān kap [Mô͘-se] ê Lu̍t-hoat.
44006014	Goán bat thiaⁿ-tio̍h i kóng, chit-ê [Ná-sat-le̍k]-lâng Iâ-so͘ beh húi-hoāi chit-ê Sèng-tiān, koh kái-piàn [Mô͘-se] thoân hō͘ lán ê kui-lē.”
44006015	Hit sî chē tī gī-hōe ê lâng lóng chù-ba̍k khòaⁿ [Sū-thê-hoán], khòaⁿ-tio̍h i ê bīn chhin-chhiūⁿ thiⁿ-sài ê bīn-māu.
44007001	Tōa-chè-si mn̄g [Sū-thê-hoán], “Sū-si̍t sī án-ni sī-bô?”
44007002	[Sū-thê-hoán] ìn kóng, “Kok ūi hū-ló hiaⁿ-tī, chhiáⁿ thiaⁿ! Lán ê chó͘-sian [A-pek-la-hán] sóa-khì [Hap-lân] í-chêng, iáu tòa tī [Bí-só͘-put-ta̍t-bí-a] ê sî, êng-kng ê Siōng-tè tùi i hián-hiān,
44007003	kā i kóng, ‘Tio̍h lī-khui lí ê kò͘-hiong kap chhin-cho̍k, khì góa beh chí-sī lí ê só͘-chāi.’
44007004	[A-pek-la-hán] chiū lī-khui [Ka-le̍k-tí]-lâng ê tōe-hng, khì tòa tī [Hap-lân]. I ê lāu-pē sí liáu-āu, Siōng-tè tùi hia kā i chhian-sóa lâi hiān-chāi lín teh tòa chit-ê tōe.
44007005	M̄-kú Siōng-tè lóng bô sán-gia̍p hō͘ i, liân kha ta̍h hiah-ni̍h sòe ê tōe to bô. Sui-jiân hit sî i iáu bô kiáⁿ, m̄-kú Siōng-tè èng-ún beh sù i chit-ê thó͘-tōe, hō͘ i kap i ê hō͘-tāi chòe sán-gia̍p.
44007006	Siōng-tè ū án-ni kóng, ‘Lí ê hō͘-tāi ōe khì kià-ku tī gōa-kok, chòe lô͘-châi siū ge̍k-thāi sì-pah nî kú.’
