44007007	I koh kóng, ‘M̄-kú góa beh sím-phòaⁿ hit-ê hō͘ in chòe lô͘-châi ê kok-ka, āu-lâi góa ōe hō͘ in chhut-lâi, tī chit-ê só͘-chāi kèng-pài góa.’
44007008	Jiân-āu Siōng-tè ū kap i li̍p-iok, ēng kat-lé chòe kì-hō. In-ūi án-ni, [A-pek-la-hán] siⁿ [Í-sat] liáu-āu tē-poeh ji̍t kā i kat-lé. Āu-lâi [Í-sat] siⁿ [Ngá-kok], [Ngá-kok] siⁿ cha̍p-jī ê cho̍k-tiúⁿ.
44007009	“Chiah-ê cho̍k-tiúⁿ oàn-tò͘ [Iok-sek], kā i bōe khì [Ai-ki̍p], m̄-kú Siōng-tè kap i tông-chāi,
44007010	kiù i thoat-lī it-chhè ê chai-lān, hō͘ i tī [Ai-ki̍p]-ông Hoat-ló ê bīn-chêng tit-tio̍h koan-ài kap tì-hūi, hō͘ [Hoat-ló] chí-phài i chòe [Ai-ki̍p] ê siú-siòng kap ông-kiong ê chóng-koán.
44007011	Āu-lâi [Ai-ki̍p] kap [Ka-lâm] choân-tōe hoat-seng ki-hng, ín-khí tōa chai-lān, lán ê chó͘-sian bô niû-si̍t thang chia̍h.
44007012	[Ngá-kok] thiaⁿ-tio̍h [Ai-ki̍p] ū niû-si̍t, chiū chhe lán ê chó͘-sian khì hia; che sī thâu-chi̍t piàn.
44007013	Tē-jī piàn in khì ê sî, [Iok-sek] hō͘ i ê hiaⁿ-tī jīn-chhut i ê sin-hūn, tùi án-ni Hoat-ló chiah bat [Iok-sek] ê ka-cho̍k.
44007014	[Iok-sek] chhe lâng khì chhiáⁿ i ê lāu-pē [Ngá-kok] kap choân ka-cho̍k chhit-cha̍p-gō͘ ê lâng lóng khì [Ai-ki̍p].
44007015	[Ngá-kok] chiū lo̍h-khì [Ai-ki̍p], āu-lâi i kap lán ê chó͘-sian lóng sí tī hia;
44007016	in ê ûi-thé hō͘ lâng ūn kàu [Sī-kiàm], bâi-chòng tī [A-pek-la-hán] ēng chîⁿ tùi [Hap-boa̍t] ê kiáⁿ-sun bóe hit-ê bōng-tōe.
44007017	“Siōng-tè tùi [A-pek-la-hán] ê èng-ún jú teh-beh si̍t-hiān, [Í-sek-lia̍t]-lâng tī [Ai-ki̍p] ê jîn-kháu jú ke-thiⁿ chin chōe.
44007018	Āu-lâi ū lēng-gōa chi̍t ê m̄-bat [Iok-sek] ê ông khí-lâi thóng-tī [Ai-ki̍p].
44007019	I ēng khúi-kè tùi-hù lán ê bîn-cho̍k, ge̍k-thāi lán ê chó͘-sian, kiông-pek in kā eⁿ-á tàn tī gōa-bīn, hō͘ in sí.
44007020	Tú chit-ê sî [Mô͘-se] chhut-sì, siⁿ-chòe hui-siông chheng-súi tit-lâng-thiàⁿ. I tī lāu-pē ê chhù siū iúⁿ-chhī saⁿ ge̍h ji̍t kú.
44007021	I siū pàng-sak ê sî, Hoat-ló ê cha-bó͘-kiáⁿ kā i khioh-khì chòe ka-kī ê kiáⁿ iúⁿ-chhī.
44007022	I siū chai-pôe ha̍k-si̍p [Ai-ki̍p] it-chhè ê tì-hūi, kóng-ōe chòe tāi-chì lóng ū châi-lêng.
44007023	“[Mô͘-se] móa sì-cha̍p hè ê sî, siūⁿ-beh khì thàm ka-kī ê hiaⁿ-tī [Í-sek-lia̍t] tông-pau.
44007024	I khòaⁿ-tio̍h chi̍t ê hiaⁿ-tī hō͘ [Ai-ki̍p]-lâng khi-hū, chiū khì kā i pó-hō͘, phah-sí hit-ê [Ai-ki̍p]-lâng, thòe i pò-ho̍k.
44007025	I siūⁿ-kóng ka-kī ê hiaⁿ-tī ōe liáu-kái Siōng-tè beh ēng i ê chhiú lâi kái-kiù in, m̄-kú in bô liáu-kái.
44007026	Keh-ji̍t, i khòaⁿ-tio̍h nn̄g ê [Í-sek-lia̍t]-lâng teh oan-ke, siūⁿ-beh kā in tiâu-kái, kóng, “Pêng-iú, lín sī hiaⁿ-tī, ná teh hō͘-siōng khi-hū?”
44007027	M̄-kú hit-ê teh khi-hū lâng ê kā [Mô͘-se] sak-khui, kóng, “Siáⁿ-lâng jīm-bēng lí choh goán ê thâu-lâng, choh goán ê phòaⁿ-koaⁿ?
44007028	Lí mā beh thâi góa chhin-chhiūⁿ cha-hng thâi hit-ê [Ai-ki̍p]-lâng ò͘?”
44007029	[Mô͘-se] chi̍t-ē thiaⁿ-tio̍h chit-ê ōe chiū tô-cháu, khì [Bí-tiân]-lâng ê tōe kià-ku; i tī hia siⁿ nn̄g ê kiáⁿ.
44007030	“Sì-cha̍p nî āu, tī [Se-nái]-soaⁿ ê khòng-iá ū chi̍t ê thiⁿ-sài tī chhì-phè ê hé-iām tiong tùi [Mô͘-se] hián-hiān.
44007031	[Mô͘-se] khòaⁿ-kìⁿ chit-ê kéng-siōng kám-kak chin hi-kî, kiâⁿ óa-khì beh khòaⁿ khah siông-sè ê sî, ū thiaⁿ-kìⁿ Chú ê siaⁿ kóng,
44007032	‘Góa sī lín chó͘-sian ê Siōng-tè, sī [A-pek-la-hán], [Í-sat], [Ngá-kok] ê Siōng-tè.’ [Mô͘-se] kiaⁿ-kah phi̍h-phi̍h-chhoah, m̄-káⁿ khòaⁿ.
44007033	Chú tùi i kóng, ‘Ôe thǹg khí-lâi, in-ūi lí só͘ khiā ê só͘-chāi sī sèng-tōe.
44007034	Góa ê chú-bîn tī [Ai-ki̍p] só͘ siū ê thòng-khó͘, góa khak-si̍t ū khòaⁿ-tio̍h, mā ū thiaⁿ-tio̍h in ê ai-kiò, góa lo̍h-lâi beh chín-kiù in. Taⁿ lí lâi, góa beh chhe lí khì [Ai-ki̍p].’
44007035	“Chit-ê [Mô͘-se], [Í-sek-lia̍t]-lâng bat kā i kū-choa̍t, mn̄g i kóng ‘Siáⁿ-lâng jīm-bēng lí choh thâu-lâng, choh phòaⁿ-koaⁿ?’ Chit-ê lâng Siōng-tè khiok thong-kè tī hé-iām tiong hián-hiān ê thiⁿ-sài chhe-phài i choh léng-siù, choh chín-kiù-chiá.
44007036	I chhōa in chhut-lâi, tī [Ai-ki̍p], tī [Âng-hái], tī khòng-iá sì-cha̍p nî kú, kiâⁿ chin chōe kî-sū sîn-jiah.
44007037	Chit-ê [Mô͘-se] bat tùi [Í-sek-lia̍t] kiáⁿ-sun kóng ‘Siōng-tè beh tùi lín hiaⁿ-tī ê tiong-kan kā lín heng-khí chi̍t ê chhin-chhiūⁿ góa chit khoán ê sian-ti.’
44007038	[Mô͘-se] mā bat kap tī [Se-nái]-soaⁿ tùi i kóng-ōe hit-ê thiⁿ-sài í-ki̍p lán ê chó͘-sian tī khòng-iá chū-hōe; i ū niá-siū oa̍h ê sìn-sit lâi thoân hō͘ lán.
44007039	Lán ê chó͘-sian m̄-khéng thiaⁿ-thàn, tian-tò kā i kū-choa̍t, siūⁿ-beh tò tńg-khì [Ai-ki̍p].
44007040	In tùi [A-lûn] kóng, ‘Lí tio̍h chō chi̍t-kóa sîn-bêng lâi kā goán chhōa-lō͘, in-ūi chhōa goán chhut [Ai-ki̍p] hit-ê [Mô͘-se] m̄-chai tú-tio̍h sím-mi̍h tāi-chì.’
44007041	Hit sî in chō chi̍t ê gû-á-kiáⁿ ê siōng, tùi hit-ê ngó͘-siōng hiàn-chè, ūi-tio̍h ka-kī ê chhiú só͘ chō ê ngó͘-siōng khèng-chiok.
44007042	M̄-kú Siōng-tè oa̍t-thâu m̄ khòaⁿ in, chhut-chāi in khì pài thiⁿ-téng ê chhiⁿ-sîn, chiàu sian-ti-su só͘ kóng: [Í-sek-lia̍t] ke ah, lín tī khòng-iá sì-cha̍p nî kú, kiám bat hiàn seng-lé á-sī chè-mi̍h hō͘ góa?
44007043	Lín kng [Mô͘-lo̍k] ê pò͘-pîⁿ, í-ki̍p [Lí-hoan] sîn ê chhiⁿ, chiū-sī lín chō lâi pài ê siōng; só͘-í góa beh kā lín chhian-sóa khì [Pa-pí-lûn] hit pêng!
44007044	“Lán ê chó͘-sian tī khòng-iá ū kiàn-chèng ê hōe-bō͘, chiū-sī Siōng-tè tùi [Mô͘-se] kóng-ōe ê sî chí-sī i, chiàu i só͘ khòaⁿ-kìⁿ ê bô͘-hêng kiàn-chō ê.
44007045	Āu-lâi lán ê chó͘-sian kè-sêng chit-ê hōe-bō͘. Siōng-tè tùi in bīn-chêng kā gōa-cho̍k kóaⁿ-cháu; in chiàm-niá hit-ê thó͘-tōe í-āu chiah kap [Iok-su-a] chiong hōe-bō͘ sóa khì hia, it-ti̍t kàu [Tāi-pi̍t] ê sî-tāi.
44007046	[Tāi-pi̍t] ū tit-tio̍h Siōng-tè hoaⁿ-hí, thang kiû Siōng-tè chún i ūi-tio̍h [Ngá-kok] ê ke chhē chi̍t ê khiā-khí ê só͘-chāi.
44007047	M̄-kú āu-lâi ūi-tio̍h Siōng-tè khí Sèng-tiān ê sī [Só͘-lô-bûn].
44007048	“Kî-si̍t Chì-koân ê Siōng-tè pèng bô tòa tī lâng ê chhiú só͘ khí ê chhù, chhin-chhiūⁿ sian-ti só͘ kóng:
44007049	Chú kóng: Thiⁿ sī góa ê pó-chō, tōe sī góa ê kha-tiam. Lín beh kā góa khí sím-mi̍h khoán chhù? Tó-ūi sī góa an-hioh ê só͘-chāi?
44007050	Che it-chhè kiám m̄-sī góa chhin-chhiú chhòng-chō ê?
44007051	“Lín chiah-ni̍h kò͘-chip! Lín ê sim ngī, hīⁿ-khang m̄-thiaⁿ! Lín kap lín ê chó͘-sian sio-siâng, put-sî hoán-khòng Sèng Sîn!
44007052	Tó chi̍t ê sian-ti bô siū-tio̍h lín ê chó͘-sian pek-hāi? Ū-giân hit-ê Kong-gī ê Lô͘-po̍k lâi-lîm hiah-ê lâng lóng hō͘ lín thâi-sí. Taⁿ lín chiâⁿ-chòe chhut-bōe koh thâi-sí hit-ūi Lô͘-po̍k ê lâng.
44007053	Lín sī tùi thiⁿ-sài niá-siū Siōng-tè Lu̍t-hoat ê lâng, kèng-jiân bô chun-siú!”
44007054	In thiaⁿ-tio̍h [Sū-thê-hoán] chiah-ê ōe hui-siông siū-khì, tùi i kā-gê chhiat-chhí.
44007055	M̄-kú [Sū-thê-hoán] hō͘ Sèng Sîn chhiong-móa, gia̍h-thâu khòaⁿ thiⁿ, khòaⁿ-kìⁿ Siōng-tè ê êng-kng, mā khòaⁿ-tio̍h Iâ-so͘ khiā tī Siōng-tè ê chiàⁿ-pêng.
44007056	I kóng, “Lín khòaⁿ! Góa khòaⁿ-kìⁿ thiⁿ khui, Jîn-chú khiā tī Siōng-tè ê chiàⁿ-pêng!”
44007057	Chèng-lâng ng hīⁿ-khang, tōa-siaⁿ hoah, chòe-hé chhi̍h óa-khì,
44007058	kā i thoa chhut-khì siâⁿ-gōa, ēng chio̍h-thâu kā i tìm. Hiah-ê chèng-jîn chiong ka-kī ê gōa-saⁿ kau hō͘ chi̍t ê kiò-chòe [Sò-lô] ê siàu-liân-lâng kò͘.
44007059	In ēng chio̍h-thâu tìm [Sū-thê-hoán] ê sî, [Sū-thê-hoán] kiû-kiò kóng, “Chú Iâ-so͘, kiû lí chiap-la̍p góa ê lêng-hûn!”
44007060	I koh kūi lo̍h-khì, tōa-siaⁿ hoah, “Chú ah, m̄-thang chiong chit-ê chōe kui hō͘ in!” I kóng liáu chiū sí.
44008001	Thâi-sí [Sū-thê-hoán] ê tāi-chì [Sò-lô] mā chàn-sêng. Kâng hit ji̍t, [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] ê kàu-hōe siū-tio̍h chin tōa ê pek-hāi. Sù-tô͘ í-gōa só͘-ū ê sìn-tô͘ lóng hun-sòaⁿ khì [Iû-thài] kap [Sat-má-lī-a] ê ta̍k só͘-chāi.
44008002	M̄-kú ū chi̍t-kóa khiân-sêng ê lâng kā [Sū-thê-hoán] bâi-chòng, ūi-tio̍h i tōa pi-siong.
44008003	Hit sî [Sò-lô] hē-chhiú chân-hāi kàu-hōe, chi̍t-hō͘ chi̍t-hō͘ ji̍p-khì, bô-lūn lâm lú lóng thoa chhut-lâi, kā in sàng khì koaiⁿ-lo̍h kaⁿ.
44008004	Hiah-ê hun-sòaⁿ ê sìn-tô͘ khì ta̍k só͘-chāi thoân-tō.
44008005	[Hui-le̍k] khì [Sat-má-lī-a] ê chi̍t ê siâⁿ, tùi hia ê lâng soan-iông Ki-tok.
44008006	Kûn-chiòng thiaⁿ-tio̍h [Hui-le̍k] só͘ kóng ê ōe, koh khòaⁿ-tio̍h i só͘ kiâⁿ ê sîn-jiah, chiū choan-sim thiaⁿ i só͘ kóng ê ōe.
44008007	Ū chin chōe hō͘ siâ-sîn hū-sin ê lâng tōa-siaⁿ hoah, tùi in só͘ hū-sin ê lâng chhut-khì. Ū chin chōe poàn-sin-put-sūi-ê kap kha-pái-ê mā tit-tio̍h i-hó.
44008008	Hit-ê siâⁿ ê lâng lóng tōa hoaⁿ-hí.
44008009	Ū chi̍t ê lâng miâ kiò-chòe [Se-bûn], í-chêng bat tī hit-ê siâⁿ kiâⁿ siâ-su̍t, ka-kī chū-khoa choh-tōa, hō͘ [Sat-má-lī-a] ê lâng tio̍h-kiaⁿ kî-koài.
44008010	Siâⁿ-lāi ê lâng tōa-tōa sòe-sòe lóng thiaⁿ-thàn i, kóng, “Chit-ê lâng sī Siōng-tè ê koân-lêng, sī lâng teh kóng ê ‘Tāi-lêng-chiá’.”
44008011	In lóng thiaⁿ-thàn i, in-ūi i chin kú ū ēng siâ-su̍t hō͘ in tio̍h-kiaⁿ kî-koài.
44008012	Put-kò in sìn [Hui-le̍k] só͘ thoân Siōng-tè-kok ê hok-im kap Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok ê miâ liáu-āu, lâm-ê lú-ê lóng chiap-siū sóe-lé.
44008013	Liân [Se-bûn] pún-sin mā sìn; i siū sóe-lé í-āu chiū kā [Hui-le̍k] tè tiâu-tiâu. I khòaⁿ-kìⁿ [Hui-le̍k] só͘ kiâⁿ ê sîn-jiah kap só͘ chòe tōa koân-lêng ê kî-sū, kám-kak chin tio̍h-kiaⁿ.
44008014	[Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] ê sù-tô͘ thiaⁿ-tio̍h [Sat-má-lī-a]-lâng í-keng chiap-siū Siōng-tè ê sìn-sit, chiū phài [Pí-tek] kap [Iok-hān] khì in hia.
44008015	In lo̍h-khì, chiū ūi-tio̍h hiah-ê sìn-tô͘ kî-tó, hō͘ in thang tit-tio̍h Sèng Sîn,
44008016	in-ūi hiah-ê sìn-tô͘ tú siū sóe-lé, kui tī Chú Iâ-so͘ ê miâ; Sèng Sîn iáu-bē kàng-lo̍h tī in tiong-kan jīm-hô-lâng.
44008017	[Pí-tek] kap [Iok-hān] kā in àn-chhiú, in chiū tit-tio̍h Sèng Sîn.
44008018	[Se-bûn] khòaⁿ-tio̍h sù-tô͘ àn-chhiú ê lâng lóng tit-tio̍h Sèng Sîn, chiū the̍h chîⁿ hō͘ in,
44008019	kóng, “Chhiáⁿ lín mā chiong chit-ê koân-lêng hō͘ góa, hō͘ góa àn-chhiú ê lâng lóng ōe-tàng tit-tio̍h Sèng Sîn.”
44008020	[Pí-tek] tùi i kóng, “Lí ê chîⁿ kap lí chòe-hé khì sí! Lí káⁿ siūⁿ-beh ēng chîⁿ bóe Siōng-tè ê un-sù!
44008021	Che bô lí ê hūn, kap lí bô koan-hē; in-ūi tī Siōng-tè ê bīn-chêng lí chûn-sim put-liông.
44008022	Só͘-í, tio̍h hóe-kái tû-khì chit-ê siâ-liām, kî-kiû Chú hō͘ lí sim-lāi ê ì-liām ōe-tàng tit-tio̍h sià-bián.
44008023	Góa khòaⁿ-tio̍h lí sim-lāi ū chhiong-móa tham-sim chi̍t-tò͘, siū-tio̍h chōe-ok khu-sok.”
44008024	[Se-bûn] ìn kóng, “Chhiáⁿ lí ūi-tio̍h góa tùi Chú kî-kiû, hō͘ lí só͘ kóng ê tāi-chì bōe lîm-kàu góa.”
44008025	[Pí-tek] kap [Iok-hān] chòe kiàn-chèng, soan-káng Chú ê sìn-sit, jiân-āu tò-khì [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng], iân-lō͘ tī [Sat-má-lī-a] ê chin chōe chng-siā thoân hok-im.
44008026	Chú ê thiⁿ-sài kā [Hui-le̍k] kóng, “Khí-lâi, ǹg lâm-pêng khì, kiâⁿ tùi [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] lo̍h-khì [Ka-sat] hit tiâu lō͘.” Hit tiâu lō͘ í-keng hong-hòe.
44008027	[Hui-le̍k] khí-lâi, chiū khì. I tī lō͘-tiong tú-tio̍h chi̍t ê [I-soh-phit-a] ê thài-kàm; chit-ê lâng sī [I-soh-phit-a] lú-ông [Kam-tāi-ki] ê châi-bū tāi-sîn. I chiūⁿ [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] khì kèng-pài Siōng-tè, tú-beh tò-khì, chē tī chhia-téng teh tha̍k sian-ti [Í-sài-a] ê chheh.
44008029	Sèng Sîn kā [Hui-le̍k] kóng, “Chìn-chêng óa-khì tè hit tâi chhia.”
44008030	[Hui-le̍k] cháu óa-khì, thiaⁿ-tio̍h i teh tha̍k sian-ti [Í-sài-a] ê chheh, chiū mn̄g, “Lí teh tha̍k ê, ū liáu-kái bô?”
44008031	I ìn kóng, “Bô-lâng kā góa kóe-seh, góa ná-ōe liáu-kái?” Thài-kàm chiū chhiáⁿ [Hui-le̍k] chiūⁿ-chhia, kap i chòe-hé chē.
44008032	I teh tha̍k ê hit tōaⁿ Sèng-keng sī án-ni: I chhin-chhiūⁿ iûⁿ hō͘ lâng khan khì thâi, chhin-chhiūⁿ iûⁿ-á tī chián-mn̂g ê lâng bīn-chêng bô chhut-siaⁿ, lóng bô khui-chhùi.
44008033	I jím-siū lêng-jio̍k ê sî bô-lâng thòe I chú-chhî kong-tō. Sím-mi̍h-lâng ōe-tàng soat-bêng I ê sè-hē? In-ūi I ê sìⁿ-miā tùi tōe-chiūⁿ siau-bia̍t.
44008034	Thài-kàm mn̄g [Hui-le̍k], “Chhiáⁿ mn̄g, sian-ti chit-ê ōe sī chí sím-mi̍h-lâng kóng ê? Sī chí i ka-kī á-sī chí pa̍t-lâng?”
44008035	[Hui-le̍k] chiū tùi hit tōaⁿ keng-bûn khai-sí tùi i thoân Iâ-so͘ ê hok-im.
44008036	In tùi hit tiâu lō͘ lo̍h-khì, kàu ū chúi ê só͘-chāi, thài-kàm kóng, “Chia ū chúi, góa kiám bōe ēng-tit tī chia niá-siū sóe-lé?”
44008038	Thài-kàm kiò chhia thêng-teh, [Hui-le̍k] kap thài-kàm nn̄g ê chòe-hé lo̍h-khì chúi-ni̍h, [Hui-le̍k] chiū kā i sóe-lé.
44008039	In tùi chúi-ni̍h khí-lâi ê sî, Chú ê Sîn kā [Hui-le̍k] chiap-khì; thài-kàm bô koh khòaⁿ-tio̍h i, m̄-kú iáu hoaⁿ-hoaⁿ hí-hí kè-sio̍k lú-thêng.
44008040	Put-kò āu-lâi ū lâng tī [A-só-to͘] khòaⁿ-tio̍h [Hui-le̍k]; i iân-lō͘ tī ta̍k ê siâⁿ-chhī thoân hok-im it-ti̍t kàu [Khái-sat-lī-a].
44009001	[Sò-lô] kè-sio̍k khióng-hat beh sat-hāi Chú ê bûn-tô͘. I khì kìⁿ tōa-chè-si,
44009002	iau-kiû tōa-chè-si siá kong-hâm hō͘ [Tāi-má-sū-kek] ta̍k ê hōe-tn̂g, chún i so͘-cha, nā ū chhē-tio̍h sìn-hōng chit-ê Tō-lō͘ ê lâng, bô-lūn lâm lú, thang kā in pa̍k khí-lâi, ah khì [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng].
44009003	I chiū khì, teh-beh kàu [Tāi-má-sū-kek] ê sî hut-jiân ū kng tùi thiⁿ lâi, sì-bīn kā i chiò.
44009004	I chiū poa̍h-lo̍h tōe, thiaⁿ-kìⁿ ū siaⁿ tùi i kóng, “[Sò-lô], [Sò-lô], lí sī-án-chóaⁿ teh pek-hāi góa?”
44009005	I mn̄g kóng, “Chú ah, lí sī sím-mi̍h-lâng?” Hit-ê siaⁿ ìn kóng, “Góa chiū-sī lí teh pek-hāi ê Iâ-so͘.
44009006	Khí-lâi, ji̍p-khì siâⁿ-lāi, lí tio̍h chòe ê sū, ū lâng ōe kā lí kóng.”
44009007	Tâng-kiâⁿ ê lâng chiū khiā-teh, gāng-gāng bōe kóng-ōe; in ū thiaⁿ-tio̍h siaⁿ, lóng bô khòaⁿ-tio̍h lâng.
44009008	[Sò-lô] tùi thô͘-kha peh khí-lâi, ba̍k-chiu thí-khui, lóng bô khòaⁿ-tio̍h sím-mi̍h. In chiū khan i ê chhiú, chhōa i ji̍p-khì [Tāi-má-sū-kek].
44009009	I saⁿ ji̍t kú bô khòaⁿ-kìⁿ, bô chia̍h, mā bô lim.
44009010	Tī [Tāi-má-sū-kek] ū chi̍t ê bûn-tô͘ miâ kiò-chòe [A-ná-nî-a]. Tī īⁿ-siōng tiong Chú kā i kiò, “[A-ná-nî-a]!” I ìn kóng, “Chú ah, góa tī chia.”
44009011	Chú kóng, “Khí-lâi, khì hit tiâu Ti̍t-koe, tī [Iû-tāi] ê chhù chhē chi̍t ê [Tāi-sò͘]-lâng kiò-chòe [Sò-lô]; i tú teh kî-tó,
44009012	tī īⁿ-siōng tiong ū khòaⁿ-kìⁿ chi̍t ê lâng kiò-chòe [A-ná-nî-a] ji̍p-lâi kā i àn-chhiú, hō͘ i ōe-tàng koh khòaⁿ-kìⁿ.”
44009013	[A-ná-nî-a] ìn kóng, “Chú ah, góa ū thiaⁿ-tio̍h chin chōe lâng kóng-khí chit-ê lâng tī [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] tùi lí ê sìn-tô͘ chòe chin chōe ok-to̍k ê tāi-chì.
44009014	I ū chè-si-tiúⁿ ê siū-koân thang lia̍h só͘-ū kiû-kiò lí ê miâ ê lâng, hiān-chāi lâi tī chia.”
44009015	Chú tùi i kóng, “Lí khì, i sī góa kéng-soán ê khì-khū, beh tùi Gōa-pang-lâng, kun-ông, kap [Í-sek-lia̍t]-lâng soan-iông góa ê miâ.
44009016	Góa mā beh hō͘ i chai, ūi-tio̍h góa ê miâ i it-tēng tio̍h siū chin chōe khó͘-lān.”
44009017	[A-ná-nî-a] chiū khì, ji̍p-khì hit keng chhù, kā [Sò-lô] àn-chhiú, kóng, “[Sò-lô] hiaⁿ-tī, lí lâi ê lō͘-tiong tùi lí hián-hiān ê Chú Iâ-so͘ chhe góa lâi beh hō͘ lí ōe-tàng koh khòaⁿ-kìⁿ, koh siū Sèng Sîn chhiong-móa.”
44009018	Sûi-sî ū chhin-chhiūⁿ hî-lân ê mi̍h-kiāⁿ tùi [Sò-lô] ê ba̍k-chiu lak lo̍h-lâi, i chiū koh ōe khòaⁿ-kìⁿ. I khí-lâi, niá-siū sóe-lé;
44009019	chia̍h pá liáu-āu, thé-le̍k ho̍k-goân. [Sò-lô] kap tī [Tāi-má-sū-kek] ê bûn-tô͘ chòe-hé tòa kúi-nā ji̍t.
44009020	I sûi-sî tī ta̍k ê hōe-tn̂g soan-káng Iâ-so͘, kóng, “I sī Siōng-tè ê Kiáⁿ.”
44009021	Thiaⁿ-tio̍h ê lâng lóng tio̍h-kiaⁿ, kóng, “Tī [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] siau-bia̍t kiû-kiò chit-ê miâ ê, kiám m̄-sī chit-ê lâng? I lâi chia kiám m̄-sī beh lia̍h sìn-tô͘, kā in ah-khì kau hō͘ chè-si-tiúⁿ?”
44009022	[Sò-lô] ná kóng ná ū la̍t, chèng-bêng Iâ-so͘ sī Ki-tok, hō͘ tòa tī [Tāi-má-sū-kek] ê [Iû-thài]-lâng bô thang piān-pok.
44009023	Chin chōe ji̍t āu, [Iû-thài]-lâng tàu-tīn kè-bô͘ beh thâi [Sò-lô],
44009024	in ê kè-bô͘ ū hō͘ [Sò-lô] thiaⁿ-tio̍h. In mî-ji̍t tī siâⁿ-mn̂g tng-tán beh kā i thâi.
44009025	M̄-kú i ê bûn-tô͘ tī àm-sî kā i chhōa chhut-lâi, ēng chi̍t ê nâ tùi siâⁿ-chhiûⁿ téng kā i lūi lo̍h-khì.
44009026	[Sò-lô] kàu [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng], siūⁿ-beh kap bûn-tô͘ kau-pôe, in lóng kiaⁿ i, in-ūi bô siong-sìn i sī bûn-tô͘.
44009027	Put-kò [Pa-ná-pa] chiap-la̍p i, chhōa i khì kìⁿ sù-tô͘, kā in soat-bêng [Sò-lô] tī lō͘-tiong khòaⁿ-kìⁿ Chú ê keng-kè, Chú tùi i kóng-ōe, í-ki̍p i tī [Tāi-má-sū-kek] jōa-á-ni̍h ióng-kám hōng Chú ê miâ thoân-tō ê tāi-chì.
44009028	[Sò-lô] tī [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] kap sù-tô͘ ū chhut-ji̍p lâi-óng, hōng Chú ê miâ hó-táⁿ thoân-tō.
44009029	I mā ū kap kóng [Hi-la̍h]-gú ê [Iû-thài]-lâng kóng-ōe piān-lūn, in iáu-kú put-sî kè-bô͘ beh kā i thâi.
44009030	Sìn-tô͘ chai-iáⁿ chit-ê tāi-chì, chiū chhōa i lo̍h-khì [Khái-sat-lī-a], tùi hia sàng i khì [Tāi-sò͘].
44009031	Hit sî, [Iû-thài], [Ka-lī-lī], kap [Sat-má-lī-a] ta̍k só͘-chāi ê kàu-hōe lóng ū pêng-an, ná kian-kò͘ hoat-tián, só͘-kiâⁿ só͘-chòe kèng-ùi Chú, tit-tio̍h Sèng Sîn ê kó͘-lē, jîn-sò͘ it-ti̍t ke-thiⁿ.
44009032	[Pí-tek] khì ta̍k só͘-chāi hóng-būn, mā ū hóng-būn tiàm tī [Lū-tāi] ê sìn-tô͘.
44009033	I tī hia tú-tio̍h chi̍t ê lâng miâ kiò-chòe [Í-nî-ngá]; chit-ê lâng poàn-sin-put-sūi, í-keng tó-chhn̂g poeh nî kú.
44009034	[Pí-tek] tùi i kóng, “[Í-nî-ngá], Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok kā lí i-hó lah. Khí-lâi, chéng-lí ka-kī ê bîn-chhn̂g.” [Í-nî-ngá] sûi-sî khí-lâi.
44009035	Só͘-ū tòa tī [Lū-tāi] kap [Sa-lûn] ê lâng lóng ū khòaⁿ-tio̍h, chiū sìn lâi kui Chú.
44009036	Tī [Iok-phàⁿ] ū chi̍t ê lú sìn-tô͘, miâ kiò-chòe [Tāi-pí-tāi], [Hi-la̍h]-gú sī [To-ka], I ū chòe chin chōe hó-sū, chín-chè sàn-chhiah-lâng.
44009037	I phòa-pīⁿ sí-khì, lâng sóe i ê si-thé liáu-āu, kā i hē tī lâu-téng ê pâng-keng.
44009038	In-ūi [Lū-tāi] lī [Iok-phàⁿ] bô hn̄g, bûn-tô͘ thiaⁿ-tio̍h [Pí-tek] tī hia, chiū chhe nn̄g ê lâng khì hia, kiû i kóng, “Chhiáⁿ lí kóaⁿ-kín lâi goán hia.”
44009039	[Pí-tek] chiū khí-lâi, kap in chòe-hé khì. I chi̍t-ē kàu-ūi, ū lâng chhōa i khì lâu-téng ê pâng-keng. Só͘-ū ê kóaⁿ-hū lóng ûi tī [Pí-tek] ê sin-piⁿ thî-khàu, the̍h [To-ka] siⁿ-chêng só͘ chòe ê lāi-saⁿ gōa-saⁿ hō͘ i khòaⁿ.
44009040	[Pí-tek] kiò tāi-ke lóng chhut-khì, chiū kūi lo̍h-khì kî-tó, jiân-āu oa̍t kè-khì tùi si-thé kóng, “[Tāi-pí-tāi], khí-lâi!” [To-ka] ba̍k-chiu thí-khui, khòaⁿ-tio̍h [Pí-tek] chiū khí-lâi chē.
44009041	[Pí-tek] chhun-chhiú kā i hû khí-lâi, āu-lâi kiò hiah-ê sìn-tô͘ kap kóaⁿ-hū lóng ji̍p-lâi, hō͘ koh-oa̍h khí-lâi ê [To-ka] kap in kìⁿ-bīn.
44009042	Chit-ê siau-sit thoân-piàn [Iok-phàⁿ], chiū ū chin chōe lâng lâi sìn Chú.
44009043	[Pí-tek] tī [Iok-phàⁿ] chi̍t ê choh-phê sai-hū [Se-bûn] ê chhù tòa chin chōe ji̍t.
44010001	Tī [Khái-sat-lī-a] ū chi̍t ê lâng, miâ kiò-chòe [Ko-nî-liû], sī [Lô-má] kun-tūi kiò-chòe “[Ì-tāi-lī]-iâⁿ” ê tūi-tiúⁿ.
44010002	I sī khiân-sêng ê lâng, kap choân-ke lóng kèng-ùi Siōng-tè; i khóng-khài chín-chè sàn-chhiah ê [Iû-thài]-lâng, koh put-sî tùi Siōng-tè kî-tó.
44010003	Ū chi̍t ji̍t, chha-put-to ē-po͘ saⁿ tiám, i tī īⁿ-siōng tiong bêng-bêng khòaⁿ-kìⁿ Siōng-tè ê thiⁿ-sài ji̍p-lâi, kā i kiò, “[Ko-nî-liû]!”
44010004	I kā thiⁿ-sài ti̍t-ti̍t siòng, hui-siông kiaⁿ-hiâⁿ, kóng, “Chú ah, sím-mi̍h tāi-chì?” Thiⁿ-sài kóng, “Lí ê kî-tó kap chín-chè í-keng lóng tit-tio̍h Siōng-tè hoaⁿ-hí chiap-la̍p.
44010005	Taⁿ tio̍h chhe lâng khì [Iok-phàⁿ], chhiáⁿ hit-ê chheng-chòe [Pí-tek] ê [Se-bûn] lâi.
44010006	I choh lâng-kheh tòa tī choh-phê sai-hū [Se-bûn] ê chhù; i ê chhù tī hái-piⁿ.”
44010007	Tùi i kóng-ōe ê thiⁿ-sài lī-khui liáu-āu, [Ko-nî-liû] chiū kiò nn̄g ê lô͘-po̍k kap chi̍t ê pêng-siông teh sū-hāu i kèng-ùi Siōng-tè ê peng lâi,
44010008	chiong chiah-ê tāi-chì lóng kā in kóng liáu-āu, chhe in khì [Iok-phàⁿ].
44010009	Keh-ji̍t, chha-put-to tiong-tàu, chit saⁿ ê lâng kiâⁿ beh kàu [Iok-phàⁿ] ê sî, [Pí-tek] peh-khì chhù-téng kî-tó.
44010010	I pak-tó͘ iau, siūⁿ-beh chia̍h. Lâng teh ūi i chún-pī chia̍h-mi̍h ê sî, i ji̍p-sîn,
44010011	khòaⁿ-kìⁿ thiⁿ khui, ū chi̍t ê mi̍h-kiāⁿ chhin-chhiūⁿ chi̍t tè tōa tè pò͘, sì-kak-thâu tiàu-teh, lūi lo̍h-lâi tōe-chiūⁿ,
44010012	lāi-bīn ū tōe-chiūⁿ ta̍k chióng ê cháu-siù, thâng-thōa, kap khong-tiong ê chiáu-lūi.
44010013	Ū siaⁿ tùi i kóng, “[Pí-tek], khí-lâi, thâi lâi chia̍h.”
44010014	M̄-kú [Pí-tek] kóng, “Chú ah, choa̍t-tùi bōe ēng-tit! Góa m̄-bat chia̍h ù-òe bô chheng-khì ê mi̍h.”
44010015	Hit-ê siaⁿ tē-jī piàn tùi i kóng, “Siōng-tè hō͘ i chheng-khì ê, lí m̄-thang khòaⁿ-chòe ù-òe.”
44010016	Chit-ê tāi-chì kè-sio̍k ū saⁿ piàn, hit-ê mi̍h-kiāⁿ sûi-sî koh siu tò-khì thiⁿ-téng.
44010017	[Pí-tek] kám-kak kî-koài, tú teh siūⁿ chit-ê īⁿ-siōng sī sím-mi̍h ì-sù ê sî, [Ko-nî-liû] só͘ chhe lâi ê lâng í-keng chhē-tio̍h [Se-bûn] ê chhù, lâi khiā tī mn̂g-kháu,
44010018	tōa-siaⁿ mn̄g, “Ū chi̍t ê kiò-chòe [Pí-tek] ê [Se-bûn] tòa tī chia bô?”
44010019	[Pí-tek] iáu teh siūⁿ chit-ê īⁿ-siōng sī sím-mi̍h ì-sù ê sî, Sèng Sîn kā i kóng, “Ū saⁿ ê lâng lâi beh chhē lí!
44010020	Lí khí-lâi, lo̍h-khì, kap in chòe-hé khì; m̄-thang tiû-tû, in-ūi in sī góa chhe lâi ê.”
44010021	[Pí-tek] chiū lo̍h-khì kìⁿ hiah-ê lâng, kā in kóng, “Góa chiū-sī lín teh chhē ê lâng. Lín lâi ū sím-mi̍h kùi-sū?”
44010022	In ìn kóng, “Goán ê tiúⁿ-koaⁿ [Ko-nî-liû] chhe goán lâi, i sī chèng-ti̍t koh kèng-ùi Siōng-tè ê lâng, siū choân-thé [Iû-thài]-lâng ê chun-kèng. I tit-tio̍h sèng thiⁿ-sài ê chí-sī, lâi chhiáⁿ lí khì in tau beh niá-siū lí ê kà-sī.”
44010023	[Pí-tek] chiū chhiáⁿ in ji̍p-khì, lâu in tòa hia kè-mî. Keh-ji̍t, [Pí-tek] khí-lâi kap in chòe-hé khì; mā ū kúi-nā ê [Iok-phàⁿ] ê sìn-tô͘ tàu-tīn khì.
44010024	Koh keh-ji̍t, in kàu [Khái-sat-lī-a], [Ko-nî-liû] í-keng iau-chhiáⁿ i ê chhin-lâng kap pêng-iú teh thèng-hāu.
44010025	[Pí-tek] ji̍p-khì, [Ko-nî-liû] chiū chìn-chêng gêng-chiap, phak tī i ê kha-chêng kā i pài.
44010026	[Pí-tek] kā i khan khí-lâi, kóng, “Khí-lâi, góa ka-kī mā-sī lâng.”
44010027	[Pí-tek] kap i ná kiâⁿ ná kóng-ōe ji̍p-khì lāi-bīn, khòaⁿ-tio̍h chin chōe lâng í-keng chū-chi̍p tī hia,
44010028	chiū tùi in kóng, “Lín chai-iáⁿ, chiàu goán ê kui-tēng, [Iû-thài]-lâng bōe ēng-tit kap Gōa-pang-lâng kau-pôe lâi-óng, m̄-kú Siōng-tè í-keng chí-sī góa, bô-lūn sím-mi̍h cho̍k-kûn ê lâng to m̄-thang khòaⁿ i chòe bô chheng-khì á-sī ù-òe.
44010029	Só͘-í lín chhiáⁿ góa lâi, góa bô the-sî chiū lâi. Taⁿ chhiáⁿ mn̄g, lín ūi-tio̍h sím-mi̍h tāi-chì chhiáⁿ góa lâi?”
44010030	[Ko-nî-liû] kóng, “Sì ji̍t chêng, tú chit-ê sî-chūn, chha-put-to ē-po͘ saⁿ tiám, góa tī chhù-lāi teh kî-tó ê sî, hut-jiân ū chi̍t ê lâng chhēng kng-iàⁿ-iàⁿ ê saⁿ khiā tī góa ê bīn-chêng,
44010031	kóng, ‘[Ko-nî-liû]! Siōng-tè í-keng ū thiaⁿ-kìⁿ lí ê kî-tó, mā ōe kì-tit lí só͘ chòe chín-chè lâng ê sū.
44010032	Lí tio̍h chhe lâng khì [Iok-phàⁿ], chhiáⁿ kiò-chòe [Pí-tek] ê [Se-bûn] lâi; i tòa tī hái-piⁿ choh-phê sai-hū [Se-bûn] in tau.’
44010033	Góa chiū sûi-sî chhe lâng khì chhiáⁿ lí lâi; taⁿ lí lâi lah, si̍t-chāi chin hó. Hiān-chāi goán lóng chū-chi̍p tī Siōng-tè bīn-chêng, beh thiaⁿ Chú bēng-lēng lí só͘ beh kóng lóng-chóng ê ōe.”
44010034	[Pí-tek] khui-chhùi kóng, “Taⁿ góa khak-si̍t chai, Siōng-tè bô phian-thāi lâng.
44010035	Bô-lūn tó chi̍t ê bîn-cho̍k, kèng-ùi I, hêng-ûi chèng-ti̍t ê lâng, I lóng hoaⁿ-hí chiap-la̍p.
44010036	Lín chai: Chêng Siōng-tè ū thong-kè bān-bîn ê Chú Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok tùi [Í-sek-lia̍t]-lâng thoân hô-pêng ê hok-im; [Iok-hān] thoân sóe-lé ê tō-lí í-āu, chit-ê hok-im ū tùi [Ka-lī-lī] khai-sí thoân-piàn [Iû-thài] choân-tōe;
44010038	chiū-sī, [Ná-sat-le̍k]-lâng Iâ-so͘, Siōng-tè ū án-chóaⁿ ēng Sèng Sîn kap tōa lêng-le̍k kā I boah-iû jīm-bēng, ū án-chóaⁿ hō͘ I khì ta̍k só͘-chāi chòe hó-sū, i-hó só͘-ū siū Mô͘-kúi ap-chè ê lâng, in-ūi Siōng-tè kap I tông-chāi.
44010039	Goán chiū-sī I tī [Iû-thài] ta̍k só͘-chāi kap [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] só͘ chòe ê sū ê kiàn-chèng-jîn. In kā I tèng-sí tī si̍p-jī-kè téng,
44010040	tē-saⁿ ji̍t Siōng-tè hō͘ I koh-oa̍h, koh hō͘ I hián-hiān,
44010041	m̄-sī tùi só͘-ū ê lâng, chí-ū tùi goán chiah-ê siū Siōng-tè kéng-soán lâi chòe kiàn-chèng ê lâng hián-hiān; goán bat tī I tùi sí-lâng tiong koh-oa̍h liáu-āu kap I chòe-hé lim-chia̍h.
44010042	I bēng-lēng goán thoân hok-im hō͘ só͘-ū ê lâng, chèng-si̍t I sī Siōng-tè só͘ jīm-bēng choh oa̍h-lâng kap sí-lâng ê sím-phòaⁿ-chiá.
44010043	Só͘-ū ê sian-ti lóng ūi-tio̍h I chòe kiàn-chèng kóng, sìn I ê lâng lóng ōe in-ūi I ê miâ tit-tio̍h sià-chōe.”
44010044	[Pí-tek] iáu teh kóng-ōe ê sî, Sèng Sîn kàng-lîm tī só͘-ū thiaⁿ tō-lí ê lâng.
44010045	Kap [Pí-tek] tùi [Iok-phàⁿ] chòe-hé lâi hiah-ê siū kat-lé ê sìn-tô͘ lóng tōa tio̍h-kiaⁿ, in-ūi Sèng Sîn ê un-sù mā ū piàⁿ-lo̍h tī Gōa-pang-lâng ê sin-chiūⁿ;
44010046	in-ūi in ū thiaⁿ-tio̍h hiah-ê lâng kóng lêng-gú koh chheng-chàn Siōng-tè ê úi-tāi. Jiân-āu [Pí-tek] kóng,
44010047	“Chiah-ê lâng kap lán kâng-khoán í-keng ū niá-siū Sèng Sîn, kiám ū lâng ōe-tàng kìm-chí in niá-siū chúi ê sóe-lé?”
44010048	I chiū bēng-lēng in hōng Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok ê miâ niá-siū sóe-lé. Āu-lâi, in chhiáⁿ [Pí-tek] kap in koh tòa kúi-nā ji̍t.
44011001	Sù-tô͘ kap tòa tī [Iû-thài] ê sìn-tô͘ lóng ū thiaⁿ-tio̍h Gōa-pang-lâng mā chiap-siū Siōng-tè ê tō-lí.
44011002	[Pí-tek] chiūⁿ [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] ê sî, hiah-ê siū kat-lé ê [Iû-thài]-lâng sìn-tô͘ kā i phoe-phêng, kóng,
44011003	“Lí kèng-jiân ji̍p-khì bô siū kat-lé ê lâng ê chhù kap in chòe-hé chia̍h-pn̄g!”
44011004	[Pí-tek] chiū chiong só͘ hoat-seng ê tāi-chì chi̍t-hāng chi̍t-hāng kā in soat-bêng:
44011005	“Góa tī [Iok-phàⁿ]-siâⁿ teh kî-tó ê sî ū ji̍p-sîn khòaⁿ-kìⁿ īⁿ-siōng, ū chi̍t ê mi̍h-kiāⁿ chhin-chhiūⁿ chi̍t tè tōa tè pò͘, sì-kak-thâu tiàu-teh, tùi thiⁿ-téng lūi lo̍h-lâi kàu góa bīn-chêng.
44011006	Góa siông-sè khòaⁿ, lāi-bīn ū tōe-chiūⁿ ê cheng-siⁿ, iá-siù, thâng-thōa, kap khong-tiong ê chiáu-lūi.
44011007	Góa koh thiaⁿ-tio̍h ū siaⁿ kā góa kóng, ‘[Pí-tek], khí-lâi, thâi lâi chia̍h!’
44011008	Góa kóng, ‘Chú ah, choa̍t-tùi bōe ēng-tit! Góa m̄-bat chia̍h ù-òe bô chheng-khì ê mi̍h.’
44011009	Hit-ê siaⁿ tē-jī piàn tùi thiⁿ-téng ìn góa kóng, ‘Siōng-tè hō͘ i chheng-khì ê, lí m̄-thang khòaⁿ-chòe ù-òe.’
44011010	Chit-ê tāi-chì kè-sio̍k ū saⁿ piàn, hiah-ê mi̍h-kiāⁿ chiū lóng koh siu tò tńg-khì thiⁿ-téng.
44011011	Tú hit sî, tùi [Khái-sat-lī-a] phài lâi chhē góa hit saⁿ ê lâng lâi-kàu goán teh tòa hit keng chhù.
44011012	Sèng Sîn kiò góa tio̍h kap in khì, m̄-thang tiû-tû. Hit la̍k ê sìn-tô͘ mā kap góa chòe-hé khì [Khái-sat-lī-a]. Goán chiū lóng ji̍p-khì [Ko-nî-liû] ê chhù.
44011013	[Ko-nî-liû] kā goán kóng i ū khòaⁿ-kìⁿ chi̍t ê thiⁿ-sài khiā tī i ê chhù-lāi, tùi i kóng, ‘Tio̍h chhe lâng khì [Iok-phàⁿ] chhiáⁿ hit-ê kiò-chòe [Pí-tek] ê [Se-bûn] lâi.
44011014	I ū ōe beh kā lí kóng, thang hō͘ lí kap lí ê choân-ke lóng tit-tio̍h kiù.’
44011015	Góa khai-sí kóng-ōe ê sî, Sèng Sîn kàng-lîm tī in sin-chiūⁿ, kap tong-chho͘ kàng-lîm tī lán sin-chiūⁿ kâng-khoán.
44011016	Góa chiū siūⁿ-khí Chú só͘ kóng ê ōe: ‘[Iok-hān] ēng chúi kā lín sóe-lé, m̄-kú lín ōe niá-siū Sèng Sîn ê sóe-lé.’
44011017	Kì-jiân Siōng-tè ū chiong lán sìn Chú Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok ê sî só͘ niá-siū siâng-khoán ê un-sù sù hō͘ Gōa-pang-lâng, góa sǹg siáⁿ-lâng, ná ōe-tàng chó͘-tòng Siōng-tè ê só͘-chòe?”
44011018	In thiaⁿ-tio̍h chiah-ê ōe chiū tiām-khì, kui êng-kng hō͘ Siōng-tè kóng, “Siōng-tè mā ū hō͘ Gōa-pang-lâng hóe-kái lâi tit-tio̍h oa̍h-miā.”
44011019	In-ūi [Sū-thê-hoán] ê tāi-chì siū pek-hāi sì-sòaⁿ ê sìn-tô͘, ū-ê kàu [Hui-nî-ki], [Sài-phó͘-lō͘-su], kap [An-thê-o], in bô tùi pa̍t-lâng, chí-ū tùi [Iû-thài]-lâng thoân-tō.
44011020	M̄-kú kî-tiong ū chi̍t-kóa [Sài-phó͘-lō͘-su] kap [Kó͘-lī-nāi] ê sìn-tô͘ kàu [An-thê-o], mā ǹg [Hi-la̍h]-lâng thoân, tùi in kóng-khí Chú Iâ-so͘ ê hok-im.
44011021	Chú ê khùi-la̍t kap in tông-chāi, sìn lâi kui Chú ê lâng-gia̍h chin chōe.
44011022	Chit-ê siau-sit thoân kàu [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] ê kàu-hōe, in chiū phài [Pa-ná-pa] khì [An-thê-o].
44011023	I chi̍t-ē kàu-ūi, khòaⁿ-tio̍h Siōng-tè ū sù in un-hūi, chiū hoaⁿ-hí, khoàn-bián in tāi-ke tio̍h choân-sim chi̍t-ì sìn-khò Chú.
44011024	[Pa-ná-pa] sī hó-lâng, hō͘ Sèng Sîn chhiong-móa, koh ū sìn-sim. Ū chin chōe lâng sìn Chú.
44011025	Āu-lâi, [Pa-ná-pa] khì [Tāi-sò͘] chhē [Sò-lô],
44011026	chhē-tio̍h chiū chhōa i khì [An-thê-o]. Chiok-chiok chi̍t nî kú, in nn̄g ê kap kàu-hōe ê lâng chū-hōe, kà-sī chin chōe lâng. Bûn-tô͘ kiò-chòe “Ki-tok-tô͘” sī tùi [An-thê-o] khai-sí.
44011027	Hit sî, ū kúi-nā ê sian-ti tùi [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] lo̍h-khì [An-thê-o].
44011028	Kî-tiong chi̍t ê miâ kiò-chòe [A-ka-pò͘]; i tit-tio̍h Sèng Sîn ê chí-sī, khiā khí-lâi ū-giân kóng choân sè-kài teh-beh ū tōa ki-hng. Chit-ê tāi-chì tī [Khek-lô-tē] thóng-tī ê nî-kan kó-jiân hoat-seng.
44011029	Bûn-tô͘ chiū koat-tēng ta̍k ê lâng chiàu ka-kī ê lêng-le̍k koan-hiàn, thang sàng khì chín-chè tòa tī [Iû-thài] ê sìn-tô͘.
44011030	In chiū chiàu án-ni chòe, chiong koan-hiàn thok [Pa-ná-pa] kap [Sò-lô] kau hō͘ hia ê tiúⁿ-ló.
44012001	Chha-put-to hit-ê sî, [Hi-lu̍t]-ông hē-chhiú pek-hāi kàu-hōe ê chi̍t-kóa lâng,
44012002	ēng to thâi-sí [Iok-hān] ê hiaⁿ-ko [Ngá-kok].
44012003	I khòaⁿ-chhut chit-ê tāi-chì ū hō͘ [Iû-thài]-lâng hoaⁿ-hí, mā sòa lo̍h-khì lia̍h [Pí-tek]. Chit-ê tāi-chì tī Tû-kàⁿ-choeh ê kî-kan hoat-seng.
44012004	I lia̍h [Pí-tek], kā i koaiⁿ-lo̍h kaⁿ, kau hō͘ sì pan ê kéng-ōe kò͘-siú, ta̍k pan ū sì ê peng. [Hi-lu̍t] àn-sǹg beh tī Pôaⁿ-kè-choeh āu kā i tòa chhut-lâi tī chèng-lâng ê bīn-chêng sím-phòaⁿ.
44012005	[Pí-tek] chiū án-ni hō͘ lâng koaiⁿ tī kaⁿ-ni̍h; kàu-hōe ūi-tio̍h i tùi Siōng-tè pek-chhiat kî-tó.
44012006	[Hi-lu̍t] beh tòa [Pí-tek] chhut-lâi sím-phòaⁿ ê chêng chi̍t àm, [Pí-tek] khùn tī nn̄g ê kéng-ōe ê tiong-kan, hō͘ lâng ēng nn̄g tiâu thih-liān liān-teh, koh ū kéng-ōe tī mn̂g-gōa kò͘-siú.
44012007	Hut-jiân Chú ê thiⁿ-sài khiā tī hia, ū kng teh chiò kaⁿ-pâng. Thiⁿ-sài tah [Pí-tek] ê keng-thâu, kā i kiò-chhíⁿ, kóng, “Kín khí-lâi!” Thih-liān chiū tùi i ê chhiú lak lo̍h-khì.
44012008	Thiⁿ-sài tùi i kóng, “Io-tòa hâ-leh, ôe chhēng-leh,” [Pí-tek] chiū chiàu án-ni chòe. Thiⁿ-sài koh kóng, “Gōa-saⁿ moa-leh, tè góa lâi!”
44012009	[Pí-tek] chiū tè i chhut-khì, m̄ chai-iáⁿ thiⁿ-sài teh chòe ê sī chin ê, siūⁿ-chòe sī teh khòaⁿ īⁿ-siōng.
44012010	In keng-kè kéng-ōe-só͘ tē-it koan kap tē-jī koan, lâi-kàu thàng ji̍p siâⁿ hit-ê thih-mn̂g, mn̂g chū-tōng khui, in chiū chhut-khì, kiâⁿ kè chi̍t tiâu koe; thiⁿ-sài sûi-sî lī-khui [Pí-tek].
44012011	[Pí-tek] chi̍t-ē chhíⁿ, kóng, “Taⁿ góa chin-chiàⁿ chai, Chú chhe I ê thiⁿ-sài lâi kiù góa thoat-lī [Hi-lu̍t] ê chhiú kap [Iû-thài]-lâng it-chhè ê kè-bô͘.”
44012012	I bêng-pe̍k chit-ê chêng-hêng, chiū khì [Iok-hān], mā kiò-chòe [Má-khó] ê lāu-bú [Má-lī-a] ê chhù; tī hia ū chin chōe lâng chū-chi̍p teh kî-tó.
44012013	[Pí-tek] phah gōa-mn̂g, ū chi̍t ê lú-pī kiò-chòe [Lô-tāi] chhut-lâi beh khui-mn̂g.
44012014	I jīn-tit [Pí-tek] ê siaⁿ, hoaⁿ-hí-kah bōe-kò͘-tit khui-mn̂g, chiū cháu ji̍p-khì pò-kò kóng [Pí-tek] khiā tī mn̂g-kháu.
44012015	In kóng, “Lí teh khí-kông!” I kian-chhî kóng ū-iáⁿ. In chiū kóng, “Án-ni it-tēng sī i ê thiⁿ-sài.”
44012016	[Pí-tek] it-ti̍t phah-mn̂g. In khui-mn̂g, khòaⁿ-tio̍h [Pí-tek], hui-siông tio̍h-kiaⁿ.
44012017	[Pí-tek] pí-chhiú kiò in an-chēng, kā in soat-bêng Chú chhōa i tùi kaⁿ-ga̍k chhut-lâi ê keng-kè. [Pí-tek] koh hoan-hù in chiong chit-ê siau-sit pò-kò [Ngá-kok] kap chèng sìn-tô͘, chiū lī-khui khì pa̍t ê só͘-chāi.
44012018	Thiⁿ-kng ê sî, peng-sū m̄-chai [Pí-tek] khì tó-ūi, chiū loān chhau-chhau.
44012019	[Hi-lu̍t] kiò lâng khì chhē, m̄-kú chhē bô, chiū sím-mn̄g khàn-siú, hā-lēng kā in chhú-sí. Chit-ê tāi-chì í-āu, [Hi-lu̍t] lī-khui [Iû-thài] khì [Khái-sat-lī-a], tòa tī hia.
44012020	Tng-sî, [Hi-lu̍t] tùi [Thài-ní] kap [Se-tùn] ê jîn-bîn hui-siông siū-khì, in chiū phài tāi-piáu cho͘-thoân khì kìⁿ i. In tāi-seng sòe-ho̍k kiong-têng ê chóng-koán [Pek-la-su-to͘], siat-hoat hō͘ in thang khì kìⁿ [Hi-lu̍t], tùi i kiû-hô, in-ūi in ê niû-si̍t khò ông koán-hat ê tōe-khu teh kiong-èng.
44012021	Tī iok-tēng ê ji̍t-chí, [Hi-lu̍t] chhēng ông-ho̍k, chē tī chō-ūi, tùi jîn-bîn ián-káng.
44012022	Chèng-lâng it-ti̍t hoah kóng, “Che sī sîn ê siaⁿ, m̄-sī lâng ê siaⁿ!”
44012023	Chú ê thiⁿ-sài sûi-sî kā [Hi-lu̍t] phah-tó, in-ūi i bô kui êng-kng hō͘ Siōng-tè; āu-lâi i hō͘ thâng kā, chiū sí-khì.
44012024	Siōng-tè ê tō jú thoân-khui jú heng-ōng.
44012025	[Pa-ná-pa] kap [Sò-lô] oân-sêng in ê jīm-bū, chiū chhōa kiò-chòe [Má-khó] ê [Iok-hān] chòe-hé lī-khui [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng].
44013001	[An-thê-o] ê kàu-hōe ū kúi-nā ê sian-ti kap kàu-su, chiū-sī [Pa-ná-pa], hō͘ lâng kiò-chòe “O͘-lâng” ê [Se-biān], [Kó͘-lī-nāi]-lâng [Lō͘-kiû], kap hun-hong ê ông [Hi-lu̍t] chòe-hé tōa-hàn ê [Má-liām], í-ki̍p [Sò-lô].
44013002	In teh kèng-pài Chú, kìm-chia̍h ê sî, Sèng Sîn kā in kóng, “Tio̍h ūi-tio̍h góa chí-phài [Pa-ná-pa] kap [Sò-lô] khì chòe góa ho͘-tiàu in chòe ê kang-chok.”
44013003	In kìm-chia̍h kî-tó liáu-āu, kā in àn-chhiú, chhe-phài in chhut-khì.
44013004	[Pa-ná-pa] kap [Sò-lô] í-keng siū Sèng Sîn chhe-phài, chiū lo̍h-khì [Se-liû-ki], tùi hia chē-chûn khì [Sài-phó͘-lō͘-su].
44013005	In kàu [Sat-lia̍p-bí], chiū tī [Iû-thài]-lâng ê hōe-tn̂g soan-káng Siōng-tè ê tō. [Iok-hān] [Má-khó] mā khì hia kā in hia̍p-chō͘.
44013006	In kiâⁿ-thàu choân tó lâi-kàu [Phàⁿ-hut], tī hia tú-tio̍h chi̍t ê kiâⁿ hoat-su̍t ê lâng, sī [Iû-thài]-lâng ê ké sian-ti, kiò-chòe [Pa] [Iâ-so͘].
44013007	I kap chóng-tok [Sū-kiû] [Pó-lô] ū kau-pôe, chit-ê chóng-tok sī hiân-bêng ê lâng, i chhiáⁿ [Pa-ná-pa] kap [Sò-lô] lâi, beh tùi in thiaⁿ Siōng-tè ê tō.
44013008	Put-kò hit-ê kiâⁿ hoat-su̍t ê [Í-lū-má] --- [Í-lū-má] sī i ê [Hi-la̍h]-miâ --- hoán-tùi in nn̄g lâng, siūⁿ-beh chó͘-tòng chóng-tok chiap-siū chit-ê sìn-gióng.
44013009	M̄-kú [Sò-lô], mā kiò-chòe [Pó-lô], hō͘ Sèng Sîn chhiong-móa, kā i gîn,
44013010	kóng, “Lí chit-ê mô͘-kúi-á-kiáⁿ, lí sī it-chhè kong-gī ê tùi-te̍k, chhiong-móa ta̍k khoán siâ-ok kap khúi-chà, kò͘-ì oai-khiok Chú ê chin-lí!
44013011	Taⁿ, lí khòaⁿ, Chú beh kā lí hêng-hoa̍t, lí ōe chhiⁿ-mî, chiām-sî bōe khòaⁿ-kìⁿ ji̍t-kng.” [Í-lū-má] ê ba̍k-chiu sûi-sî hō͘ o͘-àm tà-teh, khí ian-n̄g; i sì-kòe bong, chhē lâng kā i khan.
44013012	Chóng-tok khòaⁿ-tio̍h só͘ hoat-seng ê tāi-chì chiū sìn, tùi Chú ê kà-sī kám-kak chin hi-kî.
44013013	[Pó-lô] kap i ê tâng-phōaⁿ tùi [Phàⁿ-hut] khui-chûn, kàu [Pông-hui-lī-a] ê [Pia̍t-ka]; [Iok-hān] [Má-khó] tī hia lī-khui in, tò-khì [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng].
44013014	In tùi [Pia̍t-ka] kè-sio̍k hêng-thêng lâi-kàu [Pí-se-tí] ê [An-thê-o]. Tī An-hioh-ji̍t in ji̍p-khì hōe-tn̂g, chē lo̍h-khì.
44013015	[Mô͘-se] ê Lu̍t-hoat kap sian-ti-su tha̍k liáu-āu, hōe-tn̂g ê chú-koán chhe lâng lâi kā in kóng, “Hiaⁿ-tī, lín nā ū ōe beh khoàn-bián tāi-ke, chhiáⁿ lín kóng.”
44013016	[Pó-lô] chiū khiā khí-lâi, pí-chhiú-sè, kóng: “[Í-sek-lia̍t]-lâng kap kèng-ùi Siōng-tè ê chèng-lâng, chhiáⁿ thiaⁿ!
44013017	[Í-sek-lia̍t]-lâng ê Siōng-tè ū kéng-soán lán ê chó͘-sian, tī in kià-ku [Ai-ki̍p] ê sî hō͘ in chiâⁿ-chòe tōa ê bîn-cho̍k, ēng I tōa koân-lêng ê chhiú chhōa in chhut [Ai-ki̍p],
44013018	koh tī khòng-iá khoan-iông in sì-cha̍p nî kú.
44013019	I húi-bia̍t [Ka-lâm] tōe-khu chhit ê bîn-cho̍k liáu-āu, chiong hit-ê thó͘-tōe hō͘ in chòe sán-gia̍p,
44013020	iok sì-pah gō͘-cha̍p nî kú. “Í-āu Siōng-tè ū ūi-tio̍h in siat-li̍p sū-su, it-ti̍t kàu sian-ti [Sat-bó-ní] ê sî.
44013021	Āu-lâi in iau-kiû ài ū chi̍t ê ông, Siōng-tè chiū tùi [Piān-ngá-bín] chi-cho̍k soán-chhut [Ki-sū] ê kiáⁿ [Sò-lô], hō͘ i choh-ông sì-cha̍p nî kú.
44013022	Siōng-tè hòe [Sò-lô] liáu-āu, jīm-bēng [Tāi-pi̍t] chòe in ê ông. Koan-hē [Tāi-pi̍t], I ū án-ni kóng, ‘Góa chhē-tio̍h [Iâ-se] ê hō͘-tāi [Tāi-pi̍t], i sī ha̍h góa sim-ì ê lâng, ta̍k hāng tāi-chì chun-thàn góa ê chí-ì.’
44013023	Siōng-tè chiàu I ê èng-ún, tùi [Tāi-pi̍t] ê hō͘-tāi hō͘ [Í-sek-lia̍t]-lâng chi̍t ūi Kiù-chú, chiū-sī Iâ-so͘.
44013024	Iâ-so͘ chhut-lâi í-chêng, [Iok-hān] tùi chèng [Í-sek-lia̍t]-lâng thoân-tō, kiò in tio̍h hóe-kái lâi niá-siū sóe-lé.
44013025	[Iok-hān] teh-beh kiat-sok i ê kang-chok ê sî, tùi chèng-lâng kóng, ‘Lín siūⁿ góa sī sím-mi̍h-lâng? Góa m̄-sī lín teh thèng-hāu Hit-ūi, m̄-kú ū chi̍t ūi tè tī góa āu-bīn teh lâi, góa liân kā I tháu ôe-tòa to bōe kham-tit.’
44013026	“Kok ūi hiaⁿ-tī, [A-pek-la-hán] ê kiáⁿ-sun kap lín tiong-kan kèng-ùi Siōng-tè ê chèng-lâng, chit-ê chín-kiù ê sìn-sit í-keng ū thoân hō͘ lán.
44013027	In-ūi tòa tī [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] ê lâng kap in ê koaⁿ-tiúⁿ m̄-bat Iâ-so͘, mā bô bêng-pe̍k ta̍k ê An-hioh-ji̍t só͘ tha̍k sian-ti ê ōe, chiū kā I tēng-chōe, che tú èng-giām sian-ti ê ū-giân.
44013028	Sui-jiân in chhē bōe chhut kā I tēng sí-chōe ê lí-iû, iáu-kú iau-kiû [Pí-lia̍p-to] kā I chhú sí-hêng.
44013029	Sèng-keng só͘ kì-chài koan-hē Iâ-so͘ it-chhè ê sū lóng oân-sêng, in chiū chiong I tùi si̍p-jī-kè téng hû lo̍h-lâi, hē tī bōng-ni̍h.
44013030	Chóng-sī Siōng-tè ū hō͘ I tùi sí-lâng tiong koh-oa̍h,
44013031	ū chi̍t tōaⁿ sî-kan, I hián-hiān hō͘ hiah-ê tùi [Ka-lī-lī] tè I lâi [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] ê lâng khòaⁿ-kìⁿ. Chiah-ê lâng hiān-chāi tī chèng-lâng tiong teh choh Iâ-so͘ ê kiàn-chèng-jîn.
44013032	Goán chiong Siōng-tè èng-ún hō͘ chó͘-sian ê hok-im thoân hō͘ lín,
44013033	in-ūi I hō͘ Iâ-so͘ koh-oa̍h, chit-ê èng-ún í-keng ū tùi lán chiah-ê choh kiáⁿ-sun ê èng-giām, chhin-chhiūⁿ Si-phian tē-jī phiⁿ só͘ kì-chài: Lí sī góa ê Kiáⁿ, Góa kin-á-ji̍t siⁿ lí.
44013034	Koan-hē hō͘ I tùi sí-lâng tiong koh-oa̍h bô koh hiú-nōa ê sū, Siōng-tè kóng: Góa beh chiong tùi Tāi-pi̍t só͘ èng-ún hit-ê sîn-sèng khó-khò ê un-tián sù hō͘ lín.
44013035	Só͘-í, tī Si-phian pa̍t ê só͘-chāi mā án-ni kóng: Lí bōe hō͘ lí ê Sèng-chiá hiú-nōa.
44013036	[Tāi-pi̍t] chāi-siⁿ ê sî ū chun-thàn Siōng-tè ê kè-ōe. I sí liáu-āu bâi-chòng tī chó͘-sian ê piⁿ-a, hiú-nōa lah.
44013037	M̄-kú Siōng-tè hō͘ I tùi sí-lâng tiong koh-oa̍h Hit-ūi bô hiú-nōa.
44013038	Só͘-í, kok ūi hiaⁿ-tī, lín eng-kai chai, sià-chōe ê sìn-sit sī tùi chit-ūi Iâ-so͘ thoân hō͘ lín; lín khò [Mô͘-se] ê Lu̍t-hoat bōe-tàng hō͘ lín thoat-lī chōe, m̄-kú só͘-ū sìn Iâ-so͘ ê lâng lóng ōe-tàng tùi chōe tit-tio̍h tháu-pàng.
44013040	Só͘-í lín tio̍h kín-sīn, chiah-bián hō͘ sian-ti só͘ kóng ê lîm-kàu lín:
44013041	Biáu-sī Siōng-tè ê lâng ah, tio̍h khòaⁿ, tio̍h kiaⁿ, tio̍h bia̍t-bông! In-ūi tī lín ê sî-tāi góa só͘ chòe ê sū, ū lâng kā lín soat-bêng, lín mā m̄-sìn.”
44013042	[Pó-lô] kap [Pa-ná-pa] tùi hōe-tn̂g chhut-khì ê sî, chèng-lâng iau-chhiáⁿ in tī āu An-hioh-ji̍t koh lâi kóng chiah-ê tāi-chì hō͘ in thiaⁿ.
44013043	Sòaⁿ-hōe āu, chin chōe [Iû-thài]-lâng kap kái-chong ji̍p [Iû-thài]-kàu hiah-ê khiân-sêng ê Gōa-pang-lâng chiū tè [Pó-lô] kap [Pa-ná-pa] chhut-khì. Nn̄g ê sù-tô͘ kap in tâm-ōe, khoàn-bián in tio̍h khîⁿ-tiâu Siōng-tè ê un-tián.
44013044	Koh lo̍h-khì ê An-hioh-ji̍t, choân siâⁿ ê lâng lóng chū-chi̍p, beh thiaⁿ Chú ê tō.
44013045	[Iû-thài]-lâng khòaⁿ-tio̍h lâng hiah-chōe, sim-lāi chhiong-móa chi̍t-tò͘, hoán-pok [Pó-lô] só͘ kóng ê ōe, koh kā i bú-jio̍k.
44013046	M̄-kú [Pó-lô] kap [Pa-ná-pa] ióng-kám soan-káng kóng, “Siōng-tè ê tō tio̍h seng thoân hō͘ lín, lín kèng-jiân kū-choa̍t, ka-kī toàn-tēng bô chu-keh tit-tio̍h éng-oán ê oa̍h-miā, só͘-í goán chiah choán-ǹg Gōa-pang-lâng.
44013047	In-ūi Chú bat án-ni bēng-lēng goán kóng: Góa í-keng chí-tēng lí chòe Gōa-pang-lâng ê kng, thang hō͘ lí chiong góa ê chín-kiù tòa kàu thiⁿ-piⁿ hái-kak.”
44013048	Gōa-pang-lâng thiaⁿ-tio̍h chiah-ê ōe lóng chin hoaⁿ-hí, kui êng-kng hō͘ Chú ê tō. Hiah-ê í-keng siū Siōng-tè kéng-soán thang tit-tio̍h éng-oán ê oa̍h-miā ê lâng lóng chiâⁿ-chòe sìn-tô͘.
44013049	Tùi án-ni Chú ê tō thoân-piàn hit tōe-hng.
44013050	M̄-kú [Iû-thài]-lâng siàn-tōng khiân-sêng chun-kùi ê hū-lú kap siâⁿ-lāi ū tōe-ūi ê jîn-sū lâi pek-hāi [Pó-lô] kap [Pa-ná-pa], chiong in kóaⁿ chhut-kéng.
44013051	In nn̄g lâng chiū tī chèng-lâng ê bīn-chêng kā kha-ni̍h ê thô͘-hún pōaⁿ hiat-ka̍k piáu-sī khòng-gī, jiân-āu khì [Í-ko-liām].
44013052	Bûn-tô͘ móa-sim hoaⁿ-hí, koh siū Sèng Sîn chhiong-móa.
44014001	Siâng-khoán ê tāi-chì mā hoat-seng tī [Í-ko-liām]. [Pó-lô] kap [Pa-ná-pa] ji̍p-khì [Iû-thài]-lâng ê hōe-tn̂g káng-tō, kiat-kó ū chin chōe [Iû-thài]-lâng kap [Hi-la̍h]-lâng lâi sìn.
44014002	M̄-kú hiah-ê m̄-sìn ê [Iû-thài]-lâng siàn-tōng Gōa-pang-lâng, hō͘ in iàm-ò͘ⁿ sìn-tô͘, tùi in khí hoán-kám.
44014003	Put-kò in nn̄g lâng tī hia tòa chin kú, khò Chú ióng-kám soan-káng; Chú sù in lêng-le̍k kiâⁿ sîn-jiah kî-sū, chèng-bêng in só͘ thoân un-tián ê tō-lí sī chin-si̍t.
44014004	Siâⁿ-lāi ê kûn-chiòng soah hun-lia̍t, ū-ê óa [Iû-thài]-lâng, ū-ê óa sù-tô͘.
44014005	Hit sî, Gōa-pang-lâng kap [Iû-thài]-lâng í-ki̍p in ê koaⁿ-tiúⁿ kè-bô͘ siong-hāi sù-tô͘, beh ēng chio̍h-thâu kā in tìm.
44014006	Sù-tô͘ chai chit-ê tāi-chì, chiū tô-pī khì [Lū-ko-nî] ê [Lō͘-sū-tek] kap [Te̍k-pì] nn̄g ê siâⁿ í-ki̍p chiu-ûi ê tōe-hng,
44014007	tī hia kè-sio̍k thoân hok-im.
44014008	Tī [Lō͘-sū-tek], ū chi̍t ê lâng nńg-kha, put-sî chē-teh, tùi chhut-sì chiū bōe kiâⁿ.
44014009	I thiaⁿ [Pó-lô] káng-tō; [Pó-lô] chù-ba̍k kā i khòaⁿ, khòaⁿ-kìⁿ i ū sìn-sim thang tit-tio̍h i-tī,
44014010	chiū tōa-siaⁿ kóng, “Khiā khí-lâi, khiā ti̍t-ti̍t!” Hit-ê lâng chiū thiàu khí-lâi kiâⁿ.
44014011	Kûn-chiòng khòaⁿ-tio̍h [Pó-lô] ê só͘-chòe, chiū ēng [Lū-ko-nî] ê ōe tōa-siaⁿ hoah, “Ū sîn-bêng hòa-sin chòe lâng kàng-lîm tī lán tiong-kan lah!”
44014012	In chheng [Pa-ná-pa] chòe [Tiū-su], [Pó-lô] chòe [Hi-ní-bí], in-ūi i sī chú-káng-chiá.
44014013	Siâⁿ-gōa ū chi̍t ê [Tiū-su]-biō ê chè-si, i khan gû koh the̍h hoe-khoân lâi-kàu siâⁿ-mn̂g-kháu, beh kap chèng-lâng chòe-hé hiàn-chè.
44014014	[Pa-ná-pa] kap [Pó-lô] nn̄g ê sù-tô͘ thiaⁿ-tio̍h chiū thiah-phòa saⁿ, chông ji̍p-khì kûn-chiòng lāi-bīn, hoah kóng,
44014015	“Lín ná teh chòe chit khoán tāi-chì? Goán mā-sī lâng, kap lín lóng kâng-khoán. Goán lâi chia thoân hok-im sī beh hō͘ lín lī-khui hu-ké ê ngó͘-siōng, lâi kui-ǹg hit-ūi oa̍h-oa̍h ê Siōng-tè, I sī thiⁿ, tōe, hái, kap kî-tiong bān-mi̍h ê Chhòng-chō-chú.
44014016	Chá-chêng ê sè-tāi, I iông-ún bān-bîn kiâⁿ ka-kī ê lō͘.
44014017	Put-kò I it-ti̍t ū thong-kè só͘ chòe ê hó-sū lâi hián-bêng I ka-kī, chiū-sī tùi thiⁿ lo̍h-hō͘, chiàu-sî siu-sêng, hō͘ lín chia̍h-mi̍h chhiong-chiok, sim-lāi hoaⁿ-hí boán-chiok.”
44014018	Sù-tô͘ kóng chiah-ê ōe chiah lím-lím-á chó͘-chí kûn-chiòng tùi in hiàn-chè.
44014019	Ū chi̍t-kóa tùi [Pí-se-tí] ê [An-thê-o] kap [Í-ko-liām] lâi ê [Iû-thài]-lâng siàn-tōng kûn-chiòng ēng chio̍h-thâu tìm [Pó-lô], siūⁿ-kóng i í-keng sí, chiū kā i thoa chhut-khì siâⁿ-gōa.
44014020	Bûn-tô͘ ûi óa-lâi ê sî, i khiā khí-lâi, kiâⁿ ji̍p-khì siâⁿ-lāi. Keh-ji̍t, i kap [Pa-ná-pa] chòe-hé khì [Te̍k-pì].
44014021	[Pó-lô] kap [Pa-ná-pa] tī [Te̍k-pì] thoân hok-im, hō͘ chin chōe lâng chiâⁿ-chòe bûn-tô͘. Āu-lâi in tò-khì [Lō͘-sū-tek], [Í-ko-liām], kap [An-thê-o],
44014022	iân-lō͘ kian-kò͘ bûn-tô͘ ê sìn-sim, kó͘-lē in chhî-siú sìn-gióng, koh tùi in kóng, “Lán tio̍h keng-kè chin chōe khó͘-lān chiah ōe-tàng chìn-ji̍p Siōng-tè-kok.”
44014023	In nn̄g lâng tī ta̍k ê kàu-hōe siat-li̍p tiúⁿ-ló, ēng kìm-chia̍h kî-tó chiong in kau-thok hō͘ só͘ sìn ê Chú.
44014024	In nn̄g lâng keng-kè [Pí-se-tí] lâi-kàu [Pông-hui-lī-a],
44014025	tī [Pia̍t-ka] káng-tō liáu-āu lo̍h-khì [A-tāi-lī],
44014026	tùi hia chē-chûn tò-khì [An-thê-o]; chiū-sI tī hia kàu-hōe ū chiong in kau-thok tī Siōng-tè ê un-tián, chhe in chhut-khì chòe hiān-chāi í-keng oân-sêng ê kang-chok.
44014027	In kàu [An-thê-o] chiū tiàu-chi̍p kàu-hōe ê chèng sìn-tô͘, chiong Siōng-tè kap in chòe-hé chòe ê it-chhè, í-ki̍p I kā Gōa-pang-lâng khui sìn-gióng ê mn̂g ê keng-kè, lóng tùi in pò-kò.
44014028	Āu-lâi in kap chèng bûn-tô͘ tòa chi̍t tōaⁿ sî-kan.
44015001	Ū kúi-nā ê lâng tùi [Iû-thài] lo̍h-lâi [An-thê-o] teh kà-sī sìn-tô͘ kóng, “Lín nā bô chiàu [Mô͘-se] ê kui-kú siū kat-lé chiū bōe tit-tio̍h kiù.”
44015002	[Pó-lô] í-ki̍p [Pa-ná-pa] kap in ū ke̍k-lia̍t ê cheng-piān. Ūi-tio̍h chit-ê būn-tôe, tāi-ke koat-tēng phài [Pó-lô], [Pa-ná-pa], kap in tiong-kan kúi-nā ê lâng chiūⁿ [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] khì kìⁿ sù-tô͘ í-ki̍p tiúⁿ-ló, kap in chham-siông.
44015003	Kàu-hōe ê lâng sàng in chhut-hoat. In keng-kè [Hui-nî-ki] kap [Sat-má-lī-a], tùi chèng sìn-tô͘ pò-kò Gōa-pang-lâng kui Chú ê sū. Tāi-ke thiaⁿ liáu lóng chin hoaⁿ-hí.
44015004	In kàu [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] ê sî siū tio̍h kàu-hōe, sù-tô͘, kap tiúⁿ-ló hoan-gêng, in chiū chiong Siōng-tè kap in tông-chāi só͘ chòe it-chhè ê sū kā in pò-kò.
44015005	Put-kò ū kúi-nā ê sio̍k Hoat-lī-sài-phài ê sìn-tô͘ khiā khí-lâi kóng, “Gōa-pang-lâng it-tēng tio̍h siū kat-lé, koh tio̍h bēng-lēng in chun-siú [Mô͘-se] ê Lu̍t-hoat.”
44015006	Ūi-tio̍h chit-ê būn-tôe, sù-tô͘ kap tiúⁿ-ló khui-hōe thó-lūn.
44015007	Piān-lūn chin kú liáu-āu, [Pí-tek] khiā khí-lâi, kóng, “Kok ūi hiaⁿ-tī, lín chai Siōng-tè chá chiū tùi lín tiong-kan kéng-soán góa, thang hō͘ Gōa-pang-lâng thiaⁿ góa só͘ thoân hok-im ê sìn-sit lâi sìn.
44015008	Hit-ūi chai lâng lāi-sim ê Siōng-tè ū sù Sèng Sîn hō͘ Gōa-pang-lâng, kap hō͘ lán kâng-khoán, chèng-bêng I ū chiap-la̍p in.
44015009	Tùi sìn, I ū kā in ê sim sóe chheng-khì; I tùi-thāi lán kap in lóng bô chha-pia̍t.
44015010	Kì-jiân sī án-ni, lín sī án-chóaⁿ iáu teh chhì-thàm Siōng-tè, chiong lán ê chó͘-sian kap lán taⁿ bōe-khí ê tàⁿ khòa tī hiah-ê bûn-tô͘ ê keng-thâu téng?
44015011	M̄ eng-kai án-ni, lán siong-sìn tio̍h thong-kè Chú Iâ-so͘ ê un-tián chiah ōe tit-tio̍h kiù; in mā-sī án-ni.”
44015012	Tāi-ke lóng chēng-chēng thiaⁿ [Pa-ná-pa] kap [Pó-lô] kóng-khí Siōng-tè thong-kè in tī Gōa-pang-lâng ê tiong-kan só͘ kiâⁿ it-chhè ê sîn-jiah kî-sū.
44015013	In kóng soah, [Ngá-kok] kóng, “Kok ūi hiaⁿ-tī, chhiáⁿ thiaⁿ góa kóng.
44015014	Tú-chiah [Se-bûn] ū kóng-tio̍h Siōng-tè tong-chho͘ án-chóaⁿ khòaⁿ-kò͘ Gōa-pang-lâng, tùi in tiong-kan kéng lâng lâi kui-sio̍k I ka-kī.
44015015	Sian-ti ū kóng-khí kap chit-ê siâng-khoán ì-sù ê ōe. Chiàu Sèng-keng só͘ kì-chài:
44015016	Chú kóng: Chiah-ê sū í-āu góa beh tò tńg-lâi, beh tiông-kiàn í-keng tó-hoāi ê [Tāi-pi̍t] ê ke. Góa beh tùi hong-hòe tiong koh kā i khí-chō, beh têng-sin kā i kiàn-li̍p khí-lâi,
44015017	thang hō͘ só͘-chhun ê lâng --- só͘-ū siū ho͘-tiàu kui góa ê Gōa-pang-lâng --- lóng ōe chhē-kiû Chú. Hit-ūi chiong chit-ê sū tùi kó͘-chá chiū hō͘ lâng chai ê Chú án-ni soan-pò͘.
44015019	“Só͘-í, chiàu góa ê phòaⁿ-toàn, lán m̄-thang kā hiah-ê kui-ǹg Siōng-tè ê Gōa-pang-lâng tiau-lân,
44015020	put-kò tio̍h siá-phoe hoan-hù in m̄-thang chia̍h pài ngó͘-siōng bô chheng-khì ê mi̍h; m̄-thang îm-loān; m̄-thang chia̍h ni̍h-sí ê cheng-siⁿ kap huih.
44015021	In-ūi tùi kó͘-chá í-lâi, [Mô͘-se] ê Lu̍t-hoat tī ta̍k ê siâⁿ-chhī lóng ū lâng soan-káng, ta̍k ê An-hioh-ji̍t, tī ta̍k ê hōe-tn̂g lóng ū lâng soan-tho̍k.”
44015022	Hit sî, sù-tô͘ kap tiúⁿ-ló, í-ki̍p choân kàu-hōe koat-tēng beh tùi in tiong-kan kéng lâng, chhe in kap [Pó-lô], [Pa-ná-pa] chòe-hé khì [An-thê-o]. In só͘ soán-phài ê sī kiò-chòe [Pa-sat-pa] ê [Iû-tāi] kap [Se-la]. Chit nn̄g lâng tī hiaⁿ-tī tiong sī léng-tō jîn-bu̍t.
44015023	Sù-tô͘ kau-tài in tòa khì ê phoe án-ni siá: “Goán chiah-ê choh sù-tô͘ kap tiúⁿ-ló ê hiaⁿ-tī, kā tòa tī [An-thê-o], [Sū-lī-a], kap [Ki-lī-ka] ê Gōa-pang-lâng sìn-tô͘ chhéng-an!
44015024	Thiaⁿ-kóng ū tùi goán chia chhut-khì ê lâng khì lín hia, in ēng goán bô chí-sī in kóng ê ōe kā lín kiáu-jiáu, hō͘ lín ê sim siū-tio̍h jiáu-loān.
44015025	Ūi-tio̍h án-ni, goán tâng-sim ha̍p-ì koat-tēng kéng lâng, chhe in kap goán só͘ kèng-ài ê [Pó-lô] í-ki̍p [Pa-ná-pa] khì lín hia;
44015026	chit nn̄g lâng ūi-tio̍h lán ê Chú Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok kam-goān hiàn sìⁿ-miā.
44015027	Só͘-í, goán chhe-phài [Iû-tāi] kap [Se-la] khì, in ōe chhin-chhùi kā lín kóng kap phoe-lāi só͘ siá kâng-khoán ê tāi-chì.
44015028	In-ūi Sèng Sîn kap goán koat-tēng, ē-bīn chiah-ê tiōng-iàu sū-hāng í-gōa, bô koh ke-thiⁿ lín ê hū-tam:
44015029	Chiū-sī m̄-thang chia̍h pài ngó͘-siōng ê mi̍h; m̄-thang chia̍h huih kap ni̍h-sí ê cheng-siⁿ; mā m̄-thang îm-loān. Chiah-ê tāi-chì lín nā bô hoān-tio̍h chiū hó. Goān lín pêng-an!”
44015030	In siū-phài lo̍h-khì [An-thê-o], tī hia tiàu-chi̍p choân-thé sìn-tô͘, chiong phoe kau hō͘ in.
44015031	Chèng-lâng tha̍k-tio̍h hit tiuⁿ phoe, in-ūi kó͘-lē ê ōe móa-sim hoaⁿ-hí.
44015032	[Iû-tāi] kap [Se-la], in pún-sin mā-sī sian-ti, ū tùi sìn-tô͘ kóng chin chōe kó͘-lē ê ōe, kian-kò͘ in ê sìn-sim.
44015033	In tī hia tòa chi̍t tōaⁿ sî-kan liáu-āu siū sìn-tô͘ hoan-sàng, pêng-an tò-khì chhe in lâi ê lâng ê só͘-chāi.
44015035	[Pó-lô] kap [Pa-ná-pa] kè-sio̍k tòa tī [An-thê-o]; in kap kî-tha chin chōe lâng chòe-hé kà-sī koh soan-káng Chú ê sìn-sit.
44015036	Kúi-nā ji̍t āu, [Pó-lô] tùi [Pa-ná-pa] kóng, “Lán koh lâi-khì chêng thoân Chú ê sìn-sit hiah-ê siâⁿ-chhī thàm sìn-tô͘, khòaⁿ in ê chêng-hêng.”
44015037	[Pa-ná-pa] ài-beh chhōa kiò-chòe [Má-khó] ê [Iok-hān] chòe-hé khì,
44015038	m̄-kú [Pó-lô] siūⁿ-kóng bô sek-ha̍p, in-ūi [Má-khó] bat tī [Pông-hui-lī-a] lī-khui in, bô kè-sio̍k kap in chòe-kang.
44015039	In nn̄g lâng ì-kiàn ke̍k-lia̍t chhiong-tu̍t, tì-kàu tio̍h hun-khui. [Pa-ná-pa] chhōa [Má-khó] chē-chûn khì [Sài-phó͘-lō͘-su];
44015040	[Pó-lô] kéng [Se-la], sìn-tô͘ chiong i kau-thok tī Chú ê un-tián, i chiū chhut-hoat.
44015041	I kiâⁿ-thàu [Sū-lī-a] kap [Ki-lī-ka], kian-kò͘ ta̍k kàu-hōe ê sìn-sim.
44016001	[Pó-lô] koh khì [Te̍k-pì] kap [Lō͘-sū-tek], tī hia ū chi̍t ê bûn-tô͘ kiò-chòe [Thê-mô͘-thài], lāu-bú sī [Iû-thài]-lâng, sī sìn-tô͘, lāu-pē sī [Hi-la̍h]-lâng.
44016002	[Lō͘-sū-tek] kap [Í-ko-liām] ê sìn-tô͘ lóng chheng-chàn i.
44016003	[Pó-lô] siūⁿ-beh chhōa i chòe-hé khì, chiū kā i kiâⁿ kat-lé, in-ūi hit só͘-chāi ê [Iû-thài]-lâng lóng chai i ê lāu-pē sī [Hi-la̍h]-lâng.
44016004	In chi̍t ê siâⁿ kè chi̍t ê siâⁿ chiong [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] ê sù-tô͘ kap tiúⁿ-ló só͘ gī-koat ê kui-lē kau hō͘ in khì chun-siú.
44016005	Tùi án-ni, ta̍k kàu-hōe ê sìn-sim ná kian-kò͘, jîn-sò͘ ji̍t-ji̍t ke-thiⁿ.
44016006	In-ūi Sèng Sîn chó͘-chí [Pó-lô] kap [Se-la] tī [A-se-a]-séng thoân-tō, in chiū tùi [Hut-lū-ka] kap [Ka-lia̍p-thài] ê tōe-hng keng-kè.
44016007	In lâi-kàu [Múi-se-a] pian-kài ê sî, siūⁿ-beh ji̍p-khì [Pí-chhui-nî]-séng, put-kò Iâ-so͘ ê Sîn m̄-chún,
44016008	in chiū se̍h kè [Múi-se-a], lo̍h-khì [Te̍k-lô-a].
44016009	Hit àm, [Pó-lô] khòaⁿ-kìⁿ īⁿ-siōng, ū chi̍t ê [Má-kî-tùn]-lâng khiā-teh, kā i khún-kiû kóng, “Chhiáⁿ kè lâi [Má-kî-tùn] pang-chān goán!”
44016010	[Pó-lô] khòaⁿ-kìⁿ chit-ê īⁿ-siōng liáu-āu, goán sûi-sî chún-pī beh khì hia, in-ūi khak-sìn Siōng-tè ū ho͘-tiàu goán khì thoân hok-im hō͘ [Má-kî-tùn]-lâng.
44016011	Goán tùi [Te̍k-lô-a] khui-chûn, ti̍t-ti̍t khui-khì [Sat-mô͘-te̍k-lat], keh-ji̍t kàu [Nî-a-pho-lí].
44016012	Goán tùi hia lâi-kàu [Má-kî-tùn] tē-it khu ê siâⁿ [Hui-li̍p-pí]; chit-ê siâⁿ sī [Lô-má] ê si̍t-bîn-khu. Goán tī hia tòa kúi-nā ji̍t.
44016013	Tī An-hioh-ji̍t, goán chhut-siâⁿ khì hô-piⁿ, siūⁿ-kóng tī hia ū kî-tó ê só͘-chāi. Goán chē lo̍h-khì, chiū tùi chū-chi̍p tī hia ê hū-lú kóng tō-lí.
44016014	Ū chi̍t ê bōe chí-sek-pò͘ ê [Chhui-ngá-chhui-lat] ê hū-lú, miâ kiò-chòe [Lū-tí-a], sī kèng-ùi Siōng-tè ê lâng, i mā lâi thiaⁿ. Chú khui i ê sim, hō͘ i choan-sim thiaⁿ [Pó-lô] só͘ kóng ê ōe.
44016015	I kap choân-ke lóng siū sóe-lé, āu-lâi i khún-kiû goán kóng, “Lín nā khòaⁿ góa chòe chin-si̍t sìn Chú ê, chhiáⁿ lâi tòa goán tau.” I án-ni kā goán kiông lâu-teh, goán chiū lâu lo̍h-lâi.
44016016	Ū chi̍t ji̍t, goán beh khì kî-tó ê só͘-chāi, ū tú-tio̍h chi̍t ê hō͘ pok-kòa ê sîn hū-sin ê cha-bó͘ lô͘-lē, i khò chiam-pok hō͘ chú-lâng thàn chin chōe chîⁿ.
44016017	I tè tī [Pó-lô] kap goán āu-bīn, tōa-siaⁿ hoah, “Chiah-ê lâng sī Chì-koân Siōng-tè ê lô͘-po̍k, beh tùi lín soan-pò͘ tit-kiù ê tō-lō͘.”
44016018	I chin chōe ji̍t lóng án-ni hoah; [Pó-lô] kám-kak chin thó-ià, chiū oa̍t kè-khì kā hit-ê siâ-sîn kóng, “Góa hōng Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok ê miâ bēng-lēng lí tùi i chhut-khì!” Siâ-sîn sûi-sî tùi i chhut-khì.
44016019	Cha-bó͘ lô͘-lē ê chú-lâng khòaⁿ-tio̍h in thàn-chîⁿ ê ǹg-bāng lóng bô-khì, chiū kā [Pó-lô] kap [Se-la] khiú-teh, thoa in khì chhī-tiong-sim kìⁿ koaⁿ-oân,
44016020	kau hō͘ [Lô-má] koaⁿ-tiúⁿ, khòng-kò, kóng, “Chiah-ê lâng lâi teh jiáu-loān lán ê siâⁿ; in sī [Iû-thài]-lâng,
44016021	teh thoân lán [Lô-má]-lâng m̄ eng-kai chiap-siū á-sī chun-siú ê hong-sio̍k si̍p-koàn.”
44016022	Kûn-chiòng chham-teh kong-kek, koaⁿ-tiúⁿ chiū pak [Pó-lô] kap [Se-la] ê saⁿ, bēng-lēng lâng ēng kùn-á kā in kòng.
44016023	Peng-teng kā in kòng chin chōe ē liáu-āu, kā in koaiⁿ-lo̍h kaⁿ, koh bēng-lēng kò͘-kaⁿ ê lâng giâm-bi̍t khàn-siú.
44016024	Kò͘-kaⁿ ê lâng chiap-tio̍h bēng-lēng, chiū kā in koaiⁿ-lo̍h lāi-kaⁿ, siang-kha khàu tī chhâ-kông.
44016025	Chha-put-to pòaⁿ-mî, [Pó-lô] kap [Se-la] teh kî-tó, gîm-si o-ló Siōng-tè, kî-tha ê hoān-lâng lóng chù-ì teh thiaⁿ.
44016026	Hut-jiân ū tōa tōe-tāng, tì-kàu kaⁿ-ga̍k ê tōe-ki iô-choah; só͘-ū ê kaⁿ-mn̂g sûi-sî khui, hoān-lâng ê só-liān lóng lak-khì.
44016027	Kò͘-kaⁿ ê lâng chhíⁿ khí-lâi, khòaⁿ-tio̍h kaⁿ-mn̂g khui-khui, siūⁿ-kóng hoān-lâng lóng tô-cháu, chiū pu̍ih-to beh chū-sat.
44016028	[Pó-lô] tōa-siaⁿ hoah, “M̄-thang siong-hāi ka-kī, goán lóng tī chia.”
44016029	Kò͘-kaⁿ ê lâng kiò lâng gia̍h-teng lâi, chông ji̍p-khì, phi̍h-phi̍h-chhoah phak tī [Pó-lô] kap [Se-la] ê kha-chêng,
44016030	jiân-āu chhōa in chhut-khì, mn̄g kóng, “Sian-siⁿ, góa tio̍h chòe sím-mi̍h chiah ōe tit-tio̍h kiù?”
44016031	In kóng, “Tio̍h sìn Chú Iâ-so͘, lí kap lí ê ke chiū ōe tit-tio̍h kiù.”
44016032	In chiū chiong Chú ê tō-lí kóng hō͘ i kap in choân-ke ê lâng thiaⁿ.
44016033	Hit mî, kò͘-kaⁿ ê lâng chhōa [Pó-lô] kap [Se-la] khì sóe khang-chhùi, jiân-āu i kap choân-ke ê lâng lóng sûi-sî siū sóe-lé.
44016034	I chhōa in ji̍p-khì i ê chhù, chún-pī mi̍h-kiāⁿ hō͘ in chia̍h. I kap choân-ke lóng tōa hoaⁿ-hí, in-ūi in í-keng sìn Siōng-tè.
44016035	Keh chá-khí, [Lô-má] ê koaⁿ-tiúⁿ phài kéng-koaⁿ lâi, kóng, “Kā hit nn̄g ê lâng pàng chhut-khì.”
44016036	Kò͘-kaⁿ ê lâng chiong chiah-ê ōe kā [Pó-lô] kóng, “Koaⁿ-tiúⁿ ū kau-tài beh pàng lín chhut-khì; taⁿ lín chhut-lâi, thang pêng-an lī-khui.”
44016037	M̄-kú [Pó-lô] tùi kéng-koaⁿ kóng, “Goán sī [Lô-má] kong-bîn, bô siū sím-mn̄g chiū tī chèng-lâng ê bīn-chêng ēng kùn-á kā goán kòng, koh kā goán koaiⁿ-lo̍h kaⁿ. Chit-chūn in beh tiām-tiām-á kā goán kóaⁿ chhut-khì sī-bô? Bōe ēng-tit! Kiò [Lô-má] koaⁿ-tiúⁿ chhin-sin lâi chhōa goán chhut-khì!”
44016038	Kéng-koaⁿ chiong chiah-ê ōe tùi [Lô-má] ê koaⁿ-tiúⁿ pò-kò. In chi̍t-ē thiaⁿ-tio̍h [Pó-lô] kap [Se-la] sī [Lô-má] kong-bîn chiū chin kiaⁿ-hiâⁿ,
44016039	lâi kaⁿ-ni̍h khǹg in, chhōa in chhut-lâi, chhiáⁿ in lī-khui hit-ê siâⁿ.
44016040	[Pó-lô] kap [Se-la] lī-khui kaⁿ-ga̍k, chiū khì [Lū-tí-a] in tau, kap sìn-tô͘ kìⁿ-bīn, kā in kó͘-lē liáu-āu chiah lī-khui.
44017001	[Pó-lô] kap [Se-la] keng-kè [Àm-hui-pho-lí] kap [A-pho-lô-nî-a], lâi-kàu [Thiap-sat-lô-nî-ka], tī hia ū [Iû-thài]-lâng ê hōe-tn̂g.
44017002	[Pó-lô] chiàu si̍p-koàn ji̍p-khì hōe-tn̂g, liân-sòa saⁿ ê An-hioh-ji̍t, ín-iōng Sèng-keng kap lâng piān-lūn.
44017003	I káng-kái koh chèng-bêng Ki-tok it-tēng tio̍h siū-hāi, jiân-āu tùi sí-lâng tiong koh-oa̍h. I kóng, “Góa tùi lín soan-iông ê chit-ūi Iâ-so͘ chiū-sī Ki-tok.”
44017004	In tiong-kan ū lâng siū sòe-ho̍k lâi sìn, chiū khì tè [Pó-lô] kap [Se-la]; kî-tiong ū chi̍t tōa-tīn kèng-ùi Siōng-tè ê [Hi-la̍h]-lâng, koh ū bōe chió chun-kùi ê hū-lú.
44017005	M̄-kú [Iû-thài]-lâng khí chi̍t-tò͘, chiū chio chi̍t-kóa koe-thâu ê húi-lūi, ká-kûn kiat-tóng, jiáu-loān choân-chhī, kong-kek [Iâ-sun] ê chhù, chhē [Pó-lô] kap [Se-la], beh kā in lia̍h-khì kau hō͘ bîn-chiòng.
44017006	In chhē bô, chiū chiong [Iâ-sun] kap chi̍t-kóa sìn-tô͘ thoa khì kìⁿ tōe-hng-koaⁿ, hoah kóng, “Chiah-ê kā thian-hā péng-lìn-tńg ê lâng mā lâi-kàu lán chia lò͘!
44017007	[Iâ-sun] kéng-jiân kā in siu-liû. In ûi-pōe [Lô-má] hông-tè [Khái-sat] ê hoat-lēng, kóng lēng-gōa ū chi̍t ê ông kiò-chòe Iâ-so͘.”
44017008	Kûn-chiòng kap tōe-hng-koaⁿ thiaⁿ-tio̍h chiah-ê ōe tio̍h-kip put-an.
44017009	Koaⁿ-oân tùi [Iâ-sun] kap kî-tha ê lâng siu chîⁿ kau-pó liáu-āu pàng in chhut-khì.
44017010	Hit àm, sìn-tô͘ thàu-mî sàng [Pó-lô] kap [Se-la] khì [Pì-lí-a]. In chi̍t-ē kàu-ūi chiū ji̍p-khì [Iû-thài]-lâng ê hōe-tn̂g.
44017011	Chiah-ê [Iû-thài]-lâng pí [Thiap-sat-lô-nî-ka] ê [Iû-thài]-lâng khah khai-bêng, hui-siông jia̍t-sim niá-siū tō-lí, ta̍k ji̍t chhâ-khó Sèng-keng, khòaⁿ [Pó-lô] só͘ kóng ê ū khak-si̍t bô.
44017012	In tiong-kan ū chin chōe chun-kùi ê [Hi-la̍h] hū-jîn-lâng kap ta-po͘-lâng sìn.
44017013	M̄-kú [Thiap-sat-lô-nî-ka] ê [Iû-thài]-lâng chi̍t-ē chai-iáⁿ [Pó-lô] mā tī [Pì-lí-a] teh thoân Siōng-tè ê tō, chiū khì hia siàn-tōng kûn-chiòng, ín-khí jiáu-loān.
44017014	Sìn-tô͘ sûi-sî sàng [Pó-lô] khì hái-piⁿ; [Se-lah] kap [Thê-mô͘-thài] lâu tī hia.
44017015	In chi̍t-lō͘ hō͘-sàng [Pó-lô] kàu [Ngá-tián]. [Pó-lô] hoan-hù in kiò [Se-lah] kap [Thê-mô͘-thài] chīn-liōng kóaⁿ-kín khì kap i hōe-ha̍p, jiân-āu in chiū lī-khui.
44017016	[Pó-lô] tī [Ngá-tián] teh thèng-hāu [Se-la] kap [Thê-mô͘-thài] ê tiong-kan, khòaⁿ-tio̍h móa-siâⁿ lóng sī ngó͘-siōng, sim chin kan-khó͘.
44017017	I tī hōe-tn̂g kap [Iû-thài]-lâng í-ki̍p kèng-ùi Siōng-tè ê Gōa-pang-lâng tâm-lūn, mā ta̍k ji̍t tī chhī-tiong-sim kap só͘ tú-tio̍h ê lâng tâm-lūn.
44017018	Ū chi̍t-kóa [I-phek-khiu-ló͘] kap [Su-to-a] ha̍k-phài ê tia̍t-ha̍k-ka lâi kap i piān-lūn. Ū lâng kóng, “Chit-ê ài-kóng-ōe-ê teh o͘-pe̍h kóng sím-mi̍h?” Ū lâng kóng, “I chhin-chhiūⁿ teh thoân gōa-kok ê kúi-sîn.” In án-ni kóng sī in-ūi [Pó-lô] thoân Iâ-so͘ kap I koh-oa̍h ê hok-im.
44017019	In chiū kā [Pó-lô] thoa kàu [A-lio̍k] [Pa-kó͘] gī-tiûⁿ, tùi i kóng, “Lí teh káng-lūn ê sin ha̍k-soat ōe-tàng hō͘ goán chai bōe?
44017020	Ū chi̍t-kóa tāi-chì goán thiaⁿ liáu koài-koài, goán ài chai sī sím-mi̍h ì-sù.”
44017021	Goân-lâi só͘-ū [Ngá-tián]-lâng kap tòa tī hia ê gōa-kok-lâng ēng chin chōe sî-kan tâm-lūn kap thiaⁿ sin-kî ê sū.
44017022	[Pó-lô] khiā tī [A-lio̍k] [Pa-kó͘] gī-tiûⁿ ê tiong-ng, kóng, “Kok ūi [Ngá-tián]-lâng, góa khòaⁿ-chhut lín tī ta̍k hong-bīn ū kiông-lia̍t ê chong-kàu jia̍t-sêng.
44017023	Góa tī siâⁿ-lāi teh kiâⁿ, koan-chhat lín kèng-pài ê só͘-chāi, mā ū khòaⁿ-tio̍h chi̍t chō tôaⁿ, téng-bīn siá: ‘Hiàn hō͘ m̄-bat ê sîn.’ Lín teh kèng-pài m̄-bat ê sîn, hiān-chāi góa pò lín chai.
44017024	Chit-ūi chhòng-chō ú-tiū kap kî-tiong bān-mi̍h ê Siōng-tè sī thiⁿ-tōe ê Chú, bô tòa tī lâng ê chhiú só͘ khí ê biō-sī,
44017025	mā bô khiàm-ēng lâng ê chhiú só͘ hiàn ê mi̍h, kî-si̍t I lóng bô su-iàu, I ka-kī tian-tò chiong sìⁿ-miā, kap khùi, í-ki̍p bān-mi̍h sù hō͘ jîn-lūi.
44017026	I tùi chi̍t ê lâng chō-chhut ta̍k chióng-cho̍k ê lâng, hō͘ in khiā-khí tī tōe-bīn-chiūⁿ ta̍k só͘-chāi, koh tāi-seng kā in tēng nî-hān kap khiā-khí ê tōe-kài.
44017027	Siōng-tè án-ni chòe sī beh hō͘ in chhē I, in nā chhiau-chhē chiū ōe chhē-tio̍h, kî-si̍t I kap lán ta̍k ê lâng saⁿ-lī bô hn̄g.
44017028	In-ūi ‘lán khò I seng-oa̍h, hêng-tōng, chûn-chāi’; chhin-chhiūⁿ lín ê si-jîn ū-ê án-ni kóng, ‘In-ūi lán mā-sī I ê kiáⁿ-sun.’
44017029	Kì-jiân lán sī Siōng-tè ê kiáⁿ-sun, bô eng-kai chiong I ê sîn-sèng khòaⁿ-chòe kap ngó͘-siōng kâng-khoán, sī khò lâng ê chhiú-gē, ēng kim, gûn, á-sī chio̍h-thâu tiau-khek chhut-lâi ê.
44017030	Jîn-lūi iáu oa̍h tī bû-ti ê sî-tāi, Siōng-tè bô tui-kiù, m̄-kú hiān-chāi I bēng-lēng choân jîn-lūi tio̍h hóe-kái.
44017031	In-ūi I í-keng koat-tēng ji̍t-chí, beh ēng I só͘ chí-tēng ê lâng, chiàu kong-gī lâi sím-phòaⁿ choân sè-kài; I hō͘ chi̍t ê lâng tùi sí-lâng tiong koh-oa̍h, ēng chit-ê chòe pîn-kù, hō͘ choân jîn-lūi thang sìn.”
44017032	In chi̍t-ē thiaⁿ-tio̍h sí-lâng koh-oa̍h ê sū, ū lâng kā i thí-chhiò, mā ū lâng kóng, “Koan-hē chit-ê sū goán ài koh thiaⁿ lí kóng.”
44017033	Jiân-āu [Pó-lô] tùi in tiong-kan chhut-khì.
44017034	Put-kò ū chi̍t-kóa lâng tè i khì, chiâⁿ-chòe sìn-tô͘, kî-tiong ū [A-lio̍k] [Pa-kó͘] ê gī-oân [Tō͘-nî-siu], koh ū chi̍t ê lú-sū kiò-chòe [Tāi-má-lí], í-ki̍p chi̍t-kóa kap in chòe-hé ê lâng.
44018001	Chit-ê sū í-āu, [Pó-lô] lī-khui [Ngá-tián] khì [Ko-lîm-to].
44018002	I tī hia tú-tio̍h chi̍t ê tī [Pún-to͘] chhut-sì ê [Iû-thài]-lâng, miâ kiò [A-ku-la], chòe-kūn chiah kap i ê bó͘ [Pek-ki-la] tùi [Ì-tāi-lī] lâi, in-ūi [Khek-lô-tē] hông-tè ū bēng-lēng só͘-ū ê [Iû-thài]-lâng lóng lī-khui [Lô-má]. [Pó-lô] khì chhē in,
44018003	in-ūi kâng hâng-gia̍p, lóng sī teh chòe pò͘-pîⁿ, chiū kap in tòa, chòe-hé chòe-kang.
44018004	Ta̍k ê An-hioh-ji̍t, [Pó-lô] lóng tī hōe-tn̂g kap lâng piān-lūn, khó͘-khǹg [Iû-thài]-lâng kap [Hi-la̍h]-lâng sìn Chú.
44018005	[Se-la] kap [Thê-mô͘-thài] tùi [Má-kî-tùn] lâi liáu-āu, [Pó-lô] chiū choân-sim thoân-tō, tùi [Iû-thài]-lâng kiàn-chèng Iâ-so͘ sī Ki-tok.
44018006	In kā i hoán-tùi koh húi-pòng ê sî, [Pó-lô] kā saⁿ-ni̍h ê thô͘-hún pōaⁿ hiat-ka̍k, tùi in kóng, “Lín ka-kī beh thó-sí, bô góa ê tāi-chì! Tùi taⁿ í-āu góa beh khì Gōa-pang-lâng hia.”
44018007	Jiân-āu [Pó-lô] lī-khui in, khì tòa tī chi̍t ê kèng-ùi Siōng-tè ê Gōa-pang-lâng kiò-chòe [Thê-to] [Iû-sū-to͘] ê chhù; i ê chhù tī hōe-tn̂g ê keh-piah.
44018008	Hōe-tn̂g ê chú-koán [Ki-lī-sū-pò͘] kap i ê choân-ke lóng sìn Chú; koh ū chin chōe [Ko-lîm-to]-lâng thiaⁿ liáu lâi sìn, mā siū sóe-lé.
44018009	Ū chi̍t àm, tī īⁿ-siōng tiong Chú tùi [Pó-lô] kóng, “M̄-bián kiaⁿ, tio̍h kè-sio̍k kóng, m̄-thang tiām-khì,
44018010	in-ūi Góa kap lí tông-chāi, bô-lâng ōe hē-chhiú kā lí siong-hāi, in-ūi góa ū chin chōe chú-bîn tī chit-ê siâⁿ-lāi.”
44018011	[Pó-lô] tī hia tòa chi̍t nî pòaⁿ kú, chiong Siōng-tè ê tō kà-sī in.
44018012	[Ka-liû] choh [A-kai-a] chóng-tok ê sî, [Iû-thài]-lâng liân-ha̍p kong-kek [Pó-lô], kā i lia̍h-khì hoat-têng,
44018013	kò i kóng, “Chit-ê lâng siàn-tōng lâng ēng ûi-pōe Lu̍t-hoat ê hong-sek kèng-pài Siōng-tè!”
44018014	[Pó-lô] tú-beh khui-chhùi, [Ka-liû] tùi [Iû-thài]-lâng kóng, “[Iû-thài]-lâng ah, che nā-sī hoān-hoat ê hêng-ûi á-sī ok-chit ê hoān-chōe, góa tong-jiân tio̍h nāi-sim thiaⁿ lín ê khòng-sò͘.
44018015	Só͘ cheng-lūn ê kì-jiân sī koan-hē lín Lu̍t-hoat ê jī-gán kap bêng-chheng, lín ka-kī khì kái-koat; góa m̄ pān chit khoán tāi-chì!”
44018016	I kā in kóaⁿ-chhut hoat-têng.
44018017	Chèng-lâng chiū lia̍h hōe-tn̂g ê chú-koán [Só͘-thê-nî], tī hoat-têng chêng kā i phah. Chit hāng tāi-chì [Ka-liû] lóng bô chhap.
44018018	[Pó-lô] tī [Ko-lîm-to] kap sìn-tô͘ koh tòa chin chōe ji̍t liáu-āu lī-khui in, kap [Pek-ki-la] í-ki̍p [A-ku-la] chòe-hé chē-chûn khì [Sū-lī-a]. Chhut-hoat chêng, [Pó-lô] in-ūi ū hē-goān, tī [Kian-kek-lí] chián thâu-mn̂g.
44018019	In kàu [Í-hut-só͘], [Pó-lô] kap in hun-khui, ka-kī ji̍p-khì hōe-tn̂g kap [Iû-thài]-lâng piān-lūn.
44018020	Tāi-ke chhiáⁿ i lâu lo̍h-lâi ke tòa kúi-ji̍t-à, i bô tah-èng.
44018021	Beh lī-khui ê sî, i kā in kóng, “Nā-sī Siōng-tè ê chí-ì, góa ōe-koh tńg-lâi lín chia,” jiân-āu chē-chûn lī-khui [Í-hut-só͘].
44018022	I tī [Khái-sat-lī-a] lo̍h-chûn, tùi hia chiūⁿ-khì [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng], kā kàu-hōe chhéng-an, jiân-āu lo̍h-khì [An-thê-o].
44018023	[Pó-lô] tī hia tòa chi̍t tōaⁿ sî-kan liáu-āu koh chhut-hoat, keng-kè [Ka-lia̍p-thài] kap [Hut-lū-ka] tōe-khu, kian-kò͘ chèng bûn-tô͘ ê sìn-sim.
44018024	Ū chi̍t ê tī [A-le̍k-san-tāi] chhut-sì ê [Iû-thài]-lâng, kiò-chòe [A-pho-lô], lâi-kàu [Í-hut-só͘]; i ū chin hó ê kháu-châi, tùi Sèng-keng mā cheng-thong.
44018025	I tùi Chú ê Tō-lō͘ ū siū-kè hùn-liān, jia̍t-sim soan-káng, chèng-khak kà-sī Iâ-so͘ ê sū, put-kò chí-ū chai [Iok-hān] ê sóe-lé nā-tiāⁿ.
44018026	I tī hōe-tn̂g hó-táⁿ khai-sí káng-tō. [Pek-ki-la] kap [A-ku-la] thiaⁿ-tio̍h i ê káng-tō chiū chhōa i khì in tau, koh-khah chèng-khak kā i kóe-seh Siōng-tè ê Tō-lō͘.
44018027	Āu-lâi [A-pho-lô] koat-tēng beh khì [A-kai-a], [Í-hut-só͘] ê sìn-tô͘ chiū kā i kó͘-lē, siá-phoe hō͘ [A-kai-a] ê bûn-tô͘, chhiáⁿ in kā i chiap-thāi. I kàu hia í-āu, hiah-ê tùi Siōng-tè ê un-hūi lâi sìn Chú ê lâng siū-tio̍h chin tōa ê pang-chān,
44018028	in-ūi tī kong-khai ê piān-lūn, i ū ēng ū-la̍t ê ōe piān-tó [Iû-thài]-lâng, kun-kù Sèng-keng chèng-bêng Iâ-so͘ sī Ki-tok.
44019001	[A-pho-lô] tī [Ko-lîm-to] ê sî, [Pó-lô] keng-kè lāi-lio̍k ê tōe-khu, lâi-kàu [Í-hut-só͘], tī hia ū tú-tio̍h kúi-nā ê bûn-tô͘.
44019002	I mn̄g in, “Lín sìn Chú ê sî ū niá-siū Sèng Sîn bô?” In ìn kóng, “Bô, goán kàu taⁿ m̄-bat thiaⁿ-tio̍h kóng ū Sèng Sîn.”
44019003	[Pó-lô] koh mn̄g kóng, “Án-ni, lín niá-siū ê sī sím-mi̍h sóe-lé?” In ìn kóng, “Sī [Iok-hān] ê sóe-lé.”
44019004	[Pó-lô] kóng, “[Iok-hān] ê sóe-lé sī hóe-kái ê sóe-lé; i kiò [Í-sek-lia̍t]-lâng tio̍h sìn tè tī i āu-bīn lâi Hit-ūi, chiū-sī tio̍h sìn Iâ-so͘.”
44019005	In thiaⁿ liáu chiū hōng Chú Iâ-so͘ ê miâ niá-siū sóe-lé.
44019006	[Pó-lô] chi̍t-ē kā in àn-chhiú, Sèng Sîn chiū kàng-lîm tī in sin-chiūⁿ, in chiū ēng lêng-gú kóng-ōe, koh soan-káng Siōng-tè ê sìn-sit.
44019007	In lóng-chóng ū cha̍p-jī ê lâng.
44019008	[Pó-lô] liân-sòa saⁿ ge̍h-ji̍t kú ji̍p-khì hōe-tn̂g hó-táⁿ thoân-tō, kap lâng piān-lūn Siōng-tè-kok ê sū, khó͘-khǹg in sìn Chú.
44019009	Put-kò ū chi̍t-kóa lâng kò͘-chip m̄-sìn, tī hōe-chiòng bīn-chêng húi-pòng Chú ê Tō-lō͘. [Pó-lô] chiū chhōa bûn-tô͘ lī-khui in, ta̍k ji̍t tī [Chhui-lat-lô͘] ê káng-tn̂g kap lâng tâm-lūn.
44019010	Án-ni kè-sio̍k nn̄g nî kú, só͘-ū tòa tī [A-se-a]-séng ê lâng, bô-lūn [Iû-thài]-lâng á-sī [Hi-la̍h]-lâng, lóng ū thiaⁿ-kìⁿ Chú ê tō.
44019011	Siōng-tè ēng [Pó-lô] ê chhiú kiâⁿ kî-īⁿ ê sîn-jiah;
44019012	sīm-chì ū lâng the̍h [Pó-lô] ēng-kè ê chhiú-kun á-sī ûi-kûn khǹg tī pīⁿ-lâng sin-chiūⁿ, in ê pīⁿ chiū hó-khì, siâ-sîn chiū tùi in chhut-khì.
44019013	Hit sî ū kúi-nā ê kiâⁿ-kang-ô͘ teh kóaⁿ-kúi ê [Iû-thài]-lâng mā siūⁿ-beh chioh Chú Iâ-so͘ ê miâ lâi chè-ap siâ-sîn hū-sin ê lâng, kóng, “Góa hōng [Pó-lô] só͘ thoân Iâ-so͘ ê miâ bēng-lēng lín chhut-khì!”
44019014	[Iû-thài] ê chè-si-tiúⁿ [Sū-ki-óa] ê chhit ê kiáⁿ mā teh chòe chit khoán tāi-chì.
44019015	M̄-kú siâ-sîn ìn kóng, “Iâ-so͘ góa bat, [Pó-lô] góa mā bat, lín leh, lín sī sím-mi̍h-lâng?”
44019016	Hit-ê hō͘ siâ-sîn hū-sin ê lâng chhi̍h óa-khì kong-kek hiah-ê kiâⁿ-kang-ô͘-ê, kā in chè-ho̍k, hō͘ in siū-siong, chhiah-sin lō͘-thé tùi hit keng chhù tô-cháu.
44019017	Tòa tī [Í-hut-só͘] só͘-ū ê [Iû-thài]-lâng kap [Hi-la̍h]-lâng thiaⁿ-tio̍h chit hāng tāi-chì lóng chin tio̍h-kiaⁿ; Chú Iâ-so͘ ê miâ tōa siū chun-chông.
44019018	Ū chin chōe í-keng sìn ê lâng chhut-lâi, kong-khai sêng-jīn koh pò lâng chai in kè-khì só͘ chòe ê tāi-chì.
44019019	Ū chin chōe kiâⁿ siâ-su̍t ê lâng the̍h in ê chheh lâi, khǹg kui-tui, tī chèng-lâng ê bīn-chêng pàng-hé sio. In kè-sǹg chheh ê kè-ta̍t, tāi-iok ū gō͘-bān ê gûn-goân.
44019020	Tùi án-ni, Chú ê tō it-ti̍t thoân-khui, tōa-tōa heng-ōng.
44019021	Chiah-ê tāi-chì liáu-āu, [Pó-lô] siū Sèng Sîn kám-tōng koat-tēng beh keng-kè [Má-kî-tùn] kap [A-kai-a] khì [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng]. I kóng, “Góa kàu hia í-āu mā it-tēng tio̍h khì hóng-būn [Lô-má].”
44019022	I chiū chhe nn̄g ê chō͘-chhiú [Thê-mô͘-thài] kap [Í-la-to͘] khì [Má-kî-tùn], ka-kī chiām-sî lâu tī [A-se-a].
44019023	Tú hit sî, koan-hē Chú ê Tō-lō͘ tī [Í-hut-só͘] ín-khí giâm-tiōng ê jiáu-loān.
44019024	Ū chi̍t ê kiò-chòe [Tí-bí-tiu] ê phah-gûn sai-hū, i ēng gûn chō lú-sîn [A-tí-bí] ê biō ê bô͘-hêng, hō͘ chi̍t-kóa sai-hū thàn bōe chió chîⁿ.
44019025	[Tí-bí-tiu] kā hiah-ê sai-hū kap só͘-ū ê tông-gia̍p chi̍p óa-lâi, tùi in kóng, “Kok ūi, lín chai lán sī khò chit-ê kang-gē teh thàn-chîⁿ.
44019026	Hiān-chāi lín ū khòaⁿ-tio̍h koh ū thiaⁿ-tio̍h chit-ê [Pó-lô] teh chòe ê tāi-chì. I kóng, ‘Lâng ê chhiú só͘ chō ê lóng m̄-sī sîn.’ Chiah-ê ōe m̄-nā tī [Í-hut-só͘], mā chha-put-to tī choân [A-se-a]-séng, ū hō͘ chin chōe lâng siū kiau-so khì tè in.
44019027	Án-ni, m̄-nā lán chit-ê sū-gia̍p ōe phah-pháiⁿ miâ-siaⁿ, liân úi-tāi ê lú-sîn [A-tí-bí] ê biō to ōe hō͘ lâng khin-sī, choân [A-se-a]-séng kap choân sè-kài só͘ teh pài chit-ê lú-sîn ê chun-giâm mā ōe siū phò-hoāi!”
44019028	Kûn-chiòng chi̍t-ē thiaⁿ-tio̍h chiah-ê ōe hui-siông siū-khì, tōa-siaⁿ hoah, “ [Í-hut-só͘]-lâng ê [A-tí-bí] chin úi-tāi!”
44019029	Choân-siâⁿ lóng loān khí-lâi; chèng-lâng thoa [Pó-lô] ê tâng-phōaⁿ [Má-kî-tùn]-lâng [Kai-iû] kap [A-lí-ta̍t-kó͘], kui-tīn chòe chi̍t-ē chhiong ji̍p-khì ke̍k-tiûⁿ.
44019030	[Pó-lô] siūⁿ-beh ji̍p-khì kûn-chiòng lāi-bīn, m̄-kú bûn-tô͘ kā i chó͘-chí.
44019031	Ū kúi-nā ê [A-se-a]-séng ê koaⁿ-oân, sī [Pó-lô] ê pêng-iú, mā chhe lâng khì khǹg [Pó-lô] m̄-thang ji̍p-khì ke̍k-tiûⁿ.
44019032	Hit sî kui-ê hōe-tiûⁿ loān chhau-chhau, chi̍t lâng hoah chi̍t hāng; tōa-pō͘-hūn ê lâng m̄-chai in sī-án-chóaⁿ teh chū-chi̍p.
44019033	Kûn-chiòng tiong-kan ū lâng chiong jiáu-loān ê chek-jīm kui hō͘ [A-le̍k-san-tāi], in-ūi [Iû-thài]-lâng kā i sak chhut-khì thâu-chêng. [A-le̍k-san-tāi] chiū pí chhiú-sè kiò in an-chēng, siūⁿ-beh kā in piān-bêng.
44019034	In chi̍t-ē jīn-chhut i sī [Iû-thài]-lâng, chiū lóng chôe-siaⁿ hoah, “[Í-hut-só͘]-lâng ê [A-tí-bí] chin úi-tāi!” Án-ni ti̍t-ti̍t hoah, hoah nn̄g tiám-cheng kú.
44019035	Siâⁿ ê su-kì-koaⁿ hō͘ kûn-chiòng lóng an-chēng liáu-āu, kóng, “[Í-hut-só͘]-lâng, siáⁿ-lâng m̄-chai [Í-hut-só͘]-siâⁿ sī úi-tāi ê [A-tí-bí]-biō kap tùi thiⁿ lak lo̍h-lâi hit tè sèng-chio̍h ê siú-hō͘-chiá?
44019036	Kì-jiân bô-lâng ōe-tàng hó͘-jīn chit-ê tāi-chì, lín eng-kai an-chēng, m̄-thang chhiong-tōng.
44019037	Lín thoa chiah-ê lâng lâi chia, m̄-kú in pèng bô chhiúⁿ sī-biō, mā bô siat-to̍k lán ê lú-sîn.
44019038	[Tí-bí-tiu] kap i ê sai-hū nā beh khòng-kò, ū khui-têng ê ji̍t-chí kap chú-chhî sò͘-siōng ê koaⁿ-tiúⁿ, in thang the̍h-chhut kò-sò͘.
44019039	Lín nā ū kî-tha ê iau-kiû, thang tī tēng-kî ê hōe-gī kái-koat.
44019040	Kin-á-ji̍t só͘ hoat-seng ê tāi-chì, lán kiaⁿ-liáu ōe hō͘ lâng tui-kiù chek-jīm, koh tùi chit khoán ê hūn-loān, lán mā the̍h bōe chhut lí-iû thang piān-kái.”
44019041	Kóng chiah-ê ōe liáu-āu, I chiū soan-pò͘ sòaⁿ-hōe.
44020001	Jiáu-loān pêng-chēng liáu-āu, [Pó-lô] tiàu-chi̍p bûn-tô͘, kā in bián-lē, kap in saⁿ-sî, chiū lī-khui hia khì [Má-kî-tùn].
44020002	I keng-kè hiah-ê tōe-khu, kóng chin chōe ōe bián-lē sìn-tô͘, jiân-āu khì [Hi-la̍h],
44020003	tī hia tòa saⁿ ge̍h-ji̍t. I chún-pī beh chē-chûn khì [Sū-lī-a] ê sî, [Iû-thài]-lâng kè-bô͘ beh hāi i, chiū koat-tēng keng-kè [Má-kî-tùn] tńg-khì.
44020004	Kap i chòe-hé khì ê, ū [Pì-lí-a]-lâng [Pit-lō͘-su] ê kiáⁿ [Só͘-pa-te̍k], koh ū [Thiap-sat-lô-nî-ka]-lâng [A-lí-ta̍t-kó͘] kap [Se-kong-to͘], [Te̍k-pì]-lâng [Kai-iû], koh ū [Thê-mô͘-thài] kap [A-se-a]-lâng [Chhui-ki-kó͘] kap [Te̍k-lô-hui-mô͘].
44020005	Chiah-ê lâng seng chhut-hoat, tī [Te̍k-lô-a] teh thèng-hāu goán.
44020006	Tû-kàⁿ-choeh kè liáu, goán tùi [Hui-li̍p-pí] khui-chûn, gō͘ ji̍t āu kàu [Te̍k-lô-a] kap in hōe-ha̍p, tī hia tòa chhit ji̍t.
44020007	Pài-la̍k àm, goán tāi-ke chū-hōe peh-piáⁿ ê sî, [Pó-lô] kap tāi-ke tâm-lūn, in-ūi keh-ji̍t chiū beh lī-khui, só͘-í kóng kàu pòaⁿ-mî.
44020008	Goán teh chū-hōe hit keng lâu-téng ê pâng-keng ū tiám chin chōe teng-hé.
44020009	Ū chi̍t ê siàu-liân-lâng, kiò-chòe [Iû-chhui-kó͘], chē tī thang-á-mn̂g, [Pó-lô] kè-sio̍k kóng chin kú, i soah khùn tāng-bîn, tùi saⁿ lâu poa̍h lo̍h-khì, tāi-ke kā i hû khí-lâi ê sî í-keng sí.
44020010	[Pó-lô] lo̍h-khì, phak tī i ê seng-khu, kā i lám-teh, kóng, “M̄-bián tio̍h-kip, i iáu ū khùi.”
44020011	Jiân-āu i koh peh-khì lâu-téng, peh-piáⁿ, chia̍h, kè-sio̍k kap in tâm-lūn chin kú, kàu thiⁿ-kng chiah lī-khui.
44020012	In kā hit-ê oa̍h khí-lâi ê siàu-liân-lâng chhōa tńg-khì, tāi-ke siū chin tōa ê an-ùi.
44020013	Goán seng chiūⁿ-chûn, khui khì [A-sok], thang tī hia chiap [Pó-lô] chiūⁿ-chûn; in-ūi i beh kiâⁿ lio̍k-lō͘ khì hia, só͘-í ū án-ni an-pâi.
44020014	I tī [A-sok] kap goán hōe-ha̍p, goán chiū chiap i chiūⁿ-chûn khì [Bí-chhui-lī-nî].
44020015	Goán tùi hia khui-chûn, keh-ji̍t kàu [Ki-ò] ê tùi-bīn-hōaⁿ, chi̍t ji̍t āu tī [Sat-mô͘] khò-hōaⁿ, koh keh-ji̍t kàu [Bí-lī-to͘].
44020016	[Pó-lô] í-keng koat-tēng bô ài tī [Í-hut-só͘] thêng-liû, chiah-bián tī [A-se-a] hùi sî-kan. I beh kóaⁿ-kín khì [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng], khòaⁿ ōe-tàng tī Gō͘-sûn-choeh í-chêng kàu-ūi bōe.
