44020017	[Pó-lô] tùi [Bí-lī-to͘] chhe lâng khì [Í-hut-só͘], tiàu-chi̍p kàu-hōe ê tiúⁿ-ló lâi.
44020018	In kàu-ūi ê sî, [Pó-lô] tùi in kóng, “Tùi góa lâi-kàu [A-se-a] hit ji̍t khí it-ti̍t kàu hiān-chāi, góa kap lín án-chóaⁿ chòe-hé seng-oa̍h, lín lóng chai.
44020019	Sui-jiân góa ū tùi [Iû-thài]-lâng ê kè-bô͘ siū-tio̍h chhì-liān, iáu-kú hui-siông khiam-pi koh lâu ba̍k-sái teh ho̍k-sāi Chú.
44020020	Bô-lūn tī kong-kiōng ê tiûⁿ-ha̍p á-sī kò-pia̍t ê ka-têng, nā tùi lín ū lī-ek ê, góa m̄-bat bô tùi lín thoân, bô kā lín kà;
44020021	tùi [Iû-thài]-lâng kap [Hi-la̍h]-lâng góa lóng giâm-giâm khoàn-kò in tio̍h hóe-kái kui-ǹg Siōng-tè, koh sìn lán ê Chú Iâ-so͘.
44020022	Hiān-chāi, góa sūn-ho̍k Sèng Sîn beh khì [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng], tī hia ōe tú-tio̍h sím-mi̍h tāi-chì, góa m̄-chai,
44020023	put-kò góa chai, Sèng Sîn kā góa kéng-kò, kóng tī ta̍k ê siâⁿ-chhī ū kaⁿ-ga̍k kap hoān-lān teh thèng-hāu góa.
44020024	M̄-kú ūi-tio̍h beh kiâⁿ-oân góa ê lō͘-thêng, oân-sêng Chú Iâ-so͘ kau-tài góa ê jīm-bū, thang kiàn-chèng Siōng-tè un-tián ê hok-im, góa oân-choân bô sioh ka-kī ê sìⁿ-miā.
44020025	“Góa it-ti̍t tī lín tiong-kan chhut-ji̍p teh soan-iông Siōng-tè-kok, hiān-chāi góa chai, í-āu lín bōe-tàng koh kìⁿ-tio̍h góa.
44020026	Só͘-í, kin-á-ji̍t góa kā lín kóng chheng-chhó, lín tiong-kan nā ū lâng tîm-lûn, m̄-sī góa ê chek-jīm,
44020027	in-ūi góa í-keng chiong Siōng-tè ê chí-ì lóng-chóng thoân hō͘ lín lah.
44020028	Lín ka-kī tio̍h kín-sīn, mā tio̍h chiàu-kò͘ Sèng Sîn kau-thok hō͘ lín lóng-chóng ê iûⁿ-kûn, choh kam-tok lâi bo̍k-ióng Siōng-tè ê kàu-hōe, chiū-sī I ēng ka-kī ê Kiáⁿ ê sí lâi kiàn-li̍p ê.
44020029	Góa chai góa lī-khui liáu-āu ū hiong-ok ê chhâi-lông ōe ji̍p-lâi lín tiong-kan siong-hāi iûⁿ-kûn.
44020030	Sīm-chì tī lín tiong-kan ū lâng ōe chhut-lâi khiok-kái chin-lí, ín-iú bûn-tô͘ khì tè in.
44020031	Só͘-í, lín tio̍h kéng-séng, ōe kì-tit góa saⁿ nî kú mî-ji̍t lâu ba̍k-sái khoàn-kài lín ta̍k ê lâng.
44020032	“Hiān-chāi góa chiong lín kau-thok hō͘ Siōng-tè, thang tùi I un-tián ê sìn-sit tit-tio̍h chō-chiū, hō͘ lín kap sèng-hòa kui Chú ê lâng lóng thang kè-sêng I só͘ sù ê hok-hūn.
44020033	Góa m̄-bat tham lâng ê kim, gûn, á-sī i-ho̍k.
44020034	Lín ka-kī chai, góa ēng chit nn̄g ki chhiú chòe-kang lâi kiong-kip ka-kī kap tâng-phōaⁿ ê su-iàu.
44020035	Ta̍k hāng sū góa lóng ū chòe hō͘ lín khòaⁿ, ài lín it-tēng tio̍h phah-piàⁿ chòe-kang lâi pang-chān loán-jio̍k ê lâng. Tio̍h ōe kì-tit Chú Iâ-so͘ ka-kī só͘ kóng ê ōe: ‘Hō͘-lâng ê pí niá-siū ê khah ū hok-khì.’ ”
44020036	Chiah-ê ōe kóng soah, [Pó-lô] kap in tāi-ke lóng kūi lo̍h-khì kî-tó.
44020037	Tāi-ke tōa-siaⁿ khàu, kā i lám, kā i chim;
44020038	in-ūi [Pó-lô] kóng “í-āu bōe-tàng koh saⁿ-kìⁿ” chit kù ōe hō͘ in hui-siông siong-sim. Jiân-āu in sàng i chiūⁿ-chûn.
44021001	Lī-pia̍t chèng-lâng liáu-āu, goán khui-chûn it-ti̍t kàu [Ko-sū], keh-ji̍t kàu [Lô-tí], tùi hia khì [Phàⁿ-tāi-lat],
44021002	tī hia tú-tio̍h chi̍t chiah beh kè-khì [Hui-nî-ki] ê chûn, goán chiū chiūⁿ-chûn chhut-hoat.
44021003	Goán lâi-kàu khòaⁿ ōe-tio̍h [Sài-phó͘-lō͘-su] ê sî, tùi lâm-pêng se̍h kè, khì [Sū-lī-a], tī [Thài-ní] lo̍h-chûn, in-ūi chûn beh tī hia lo̍h-hè.
44021004	Goán chhē-tio̍h chi̍t-kóa bûn-tô͘, tī hia kap in tòa chhit ji̍t. In tit-tio̍h Sèng Sîn ê chí-sī, khǹg [Pó-lô] m̄-thang chiūⁿ [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng].
44021005	Goán kap in lī-pia̍t ê sî-kan kàu chiū lī-khui, kè-sio̍k goán ê lō͘-thêng. In lóng chhōa in ê bó͘-kiáⁿ sàng goán kàu siâⁿ-gōa, tī hái-piⁿ kūi lo̍h-khì kî-tó,
44021006	hō͘-siōng saⁿ-sî liáu-āu goán chiūⁿ-chûn, in tò-khì in tau.
44021007	Goán kè-sio̍k hâng-thêng tùi [Thài-ní] khì-kàu [To-lī-mái], tī hia kā sìn-tô͘ chhéng-an, kap in tòa chi̍t ji̍t.
44021008	Keh-ji̍t, goán chhut-hoat khì [Khái-sat-lī-a], tī hia tòa tī thoân hok-im ê [Hui-le̍k] ê chhù, i sī [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] hit chhit ê chip-sū ê chi̍t ê.
44021009	I ū sì ê iáu-bē kiat-hun ê cha-bó͘-kiáⁿ, lóng chòe sian-ti ōe kóng ū-giân.
44021010	Goán tòa tī hia kúi-nā ji̍t ê tiong-kan, ū chi̍t ê sian-ti kiò-chòe [A-ka-pò͘] tùi [Iû-thài] lo̍h-lâi.
44021011	I lâi chhē goán, the̍h [Pó-lô] ê io-tòa pa̍k ka-kī ê kha kap chhiú, kóng, “Sèng Sîn án-ni kóng, ‘Chit tiâu io-tòa ê chú-lâng ōe tī [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] chhin-chhiūⁿ án-ni hō͘ [Iû-thài]-lâng pa̍k khí-lâi, jiân-āu kau hō͘ Gōa-pang-lâng.’ ”
44021012	Goán chi̍t-ē thiaⁿ-tio̍h, chiū kap hit só͘-chāi ê lâng khó͘-khǹg [Pó-lô] m̄-thang chiūⁿ [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng].
44021013	[Pó-lô] ìn kóng, “Lín ná khàu-kah án-ni, hō͘ góa ê sim giōng-beh chhùi-khì? Góa ūi-tio̍h Chú Iâ-so͘ ê miâ, m̄-nā tī [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] hō͘ lâng pa̍k, sīm-chì tī hia sí mā kam-goān.”
44021014	I m̄ siū khó͘-khǹg, goán chiū tiām-tiām, chí-ū kóng, “Goān Chú ê chí-ì si̍t-hiān!”
44021015	Kúi-nā ji̍t āu, goán chún-pī hó-sè, chiū chiūⁿ [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng].
44021016	Ū chi̍t-kóa tùi [Khái-sat-lī-a] lâi ê bûn-tô͘ mā kap goán khì, chhōa goán khì [Sài-phó͘-lō͘-su]-lâng [Ná-sun] ê chhù tòa; i sī chá-kî ê bûn-tô͘.
44021017	Goán kàu Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng ê sî, sìn-tô͘ jia̍t-sêng chiap-thāi goán.
44021018	Keh-ji̍t, [Pó-lô] kap goán khì hóng-būn [Ngá-kok]; kàu-hōe ê chèng tiúⁿ-ló lóng tī hia.
44021019	[Pó-lô] kā in chhéng-an, jiân-āu chiong Siōng-tè thong-kè i tī Gōa-pang-lâng ê tiong-kan só͘ chòe ê kang-chok chi̍t-hāng chi̍t-hāng tùi in pò-kò.
44021020	In thiaⁿ liáu lóng kui êng-kng hō͘ Siōng-tè, tùi [Pó-lô] kóng, “Hiaⁿ-tī, lí chai, tī chia ū kúi-nā bān [Iû-thài]-lâng chiâⁿ-chòe sìn-tô͘, in lóng jia̍t-sim chun-siú Lu̍t-hoat.
44021021	In ū thiaⁿ-tio̍h lí kà-sī tòa tī Gōa-pang ê [Iû-thài]-lâng, kiò in hòng-khì [Mô͘-se] ê Lu̍t-hoat, m̄-bián kā in ê gín-á kiâⁿ kat-lé, mā m̄-bián siú [Iû-thài]-lâng ê hong-sio̍k si̍p-koàn.
44021022	In it-tēng ōe thiaⁿ-tio̍h lí lâi chia ê siau-sit, án-ni beh án-chóaⁿ?
44021023	Taⁿ tio̍h chiàu goán kā lí kóng ê khì chòe. Chia ū sì-ê hē-goān ê ta-po͘-lâng;
44021024	lí chhōa in chòe-hé khì chham-ka kiat-chēng-lé, thòe in la̍p só͘-hùi, hō͘ in thang thì-thâu. Lí án-ni chòe, chèng-lâng chiū chai, in só͘ thiaⁿ-tio̍h koan-hē lí ê sū m̄-sī sū-si̍t, koh chai lí ka-kī mā ū teh chun-siú [Mô͘-se] ê Lu̍t-hoat.
44021025	Put-kò tùi í-keng chòe sìn-tô͘ ê Gōa-pang-lâng, goán í-keng ū siá-phoe kā in kóng, goán ū chhâi-koat kiò in m̄-thang chia̍h chè ngó͘-siōng ê mi̍h, huih, kap ni̍h-sí ê cheng-siⁿ, mā m̄-thang ū îm-loān.”
44021026	Keh-ji̍t, [Pó-lô] chhōa hit sì ê ta-po͘-lâng kap in chòe-hé khì chham-ka kiat-chēng-lé, jiân-āu ji̍p-khì Sèng-tiān pò-kò kiat-chēng-lé sím-mi̍h sî móa, thang ūi-tio̍h in ta̍k ê lâng hiàn chè-mi̍h.
44021027	Chhit-ji̍t ê kî teh-beh móa ê sî, chi̍t-kóa tùi [A-se-a] lâi ê [Iû-thài]-lâng ū khòaⁿ-tio̍h [Pó-lô] tī Sèng-tiān lāi, chiū siàn-tōng kûn-chiòng lia̍h [Pó-lô],
44021028	hoah kóng, “[Í-sek-lia̍t]-lâng, lâi tàu saⁿ-kāng chi̍t-ē! Chit-ê lâng ta̍k só͘-chāi kà lâng hoán-tùi [Í-sek-lia̍t]-lâng kap [Mô͘-se] ê Lu̍t-hoat, mā hoán-tùi chit-ê Sèng-tiān. Hiān-chāi i koh káⁿ chhōa [Hi-la̍h]-lâng chìn-ji̍p Sèng-tiān, ù-jiám chit-ê sîn-sèng ê só͘-chāi.”
44021029	In-ūi in ū khòaⁿ-tio̍h [Í-hut-só͘]-lâng [Te̍k-lō-hui-mô͘] kap [Pó-lô] chòe-hé tī siâⁿ-lāi, siūⁿ-kóng [Pó-lô] ū chhōa i ji̍p-khì Sèng-tiān.
44021030	Choân-siâⁿ jiáu-loān khí-lâi, bîn-chiòng lóng cháu óa-lâi; in lia̍h [Pó-lô], kā i thoa chhut-khì Sèng-tiān ê gōa-bīn, tiān ê mn̂g sûi-sî koaiⁿ khí-lâi.
44021031	In tú siūⁿ-beh thâi [Pó-lô] ê sî, ū siau-sit thoân kàu [Lô-má] kun-iâⁿ ê chí-hui-koaⁿ hia, kóng choân [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] teh khí jiáu-loān.
44021032	Chí-hui-koaⁿ sûi-sî tòa peng kap kun-koaⁿ cháu kàu bîn-chiòng hia. Bîn-chiòng chi̍t-ē khòaⁿ-tio̍h chí-hui-koaⁿ kap peng chiū thêng-chhiú, bô koh phah [Pó-lô].
44021033	Chí-hui-koaⁿ óa-khì lia̍h [Pó-lô], kiò lâng ēng nn̄g tiâu thih-liān kā i liān-teh, koh mn̄g i sī siáⁿ-lâng, ū chòe sím-mi̍h tāi-chì.
44021034	Kûn-chiòng chi̍t ê hoah chi̍t khoán, in-ūi loān-chhau-chhau, chí-hui-koaⁿ bô hoat-tō͘ thang chai si̍t-chêng, chiū bēng-lēng peng ah [Pó-lô] ji̍p-khì iâⁿ-pâng.
44021035	[Pó-lô] teh-beh peh khiat-á ê sî, in-ūi kûn-chiòng hiong-kài-kài, peng soah tio̍h kā [Pó-lô] kng ji̍p-khì.
44021036	Kûn-chiòng tè tī āu-bīn hoah kóng, “Hō͘ i sí!”
44021037	[Pó-lô] tú-beh hō͘ lâng tòa ji̍p-khì iâⁿ-pâng ê sî tùi chí-hui-koaⁿ kóng, “Góa ōe-tàng kā lí kóng chi̍t kù ōe bōe?” Chí-hui-koaⁿ mn̄g kóng, “Lí bat [Hi-la̍h]-gú ò͘!
44021038	Án-ni lí chiū m̄-sī hit-ê bô kú í-chêng chō-hoán, chhōa sì chheng ê sat-chhiú cháu-khì khòng-iá ê [Ai-ki̍p]-lâng lò͘.”
44021039	[Pó-lô] ìn kóng, “Góa sī [Iû-thài]-lâng, chhut-sì tī [Ki-lī-ka] ê [Tāi-sò͘], sī chi̍t ê put-chí ū-miâ ê siâⁿ-chhī ê chhī-bîn. Chhiáⁿ lí chún góa tùi bîn-chiòng kóng-ōe.”
44021040	Chí-hui-koaⁿ ún-chún, [Pó-lô] chiū khiā tī khiat-á téng tùi bîn-chiòng pí chhiú-sè. Chèng-lâng lóng tiām lo̍h-khì ê sî, [Pó-lô] ēng [Hi-pek-lâi]-ōe tùi in kóng-ōe.
44022001	[Pó-lô] kóng, “Kok ūi hū-ló hiaⁿ-tī, chhiáⁿ thiaⁿ góa chit-chūn beh ūi-tio̍h ka-kī piān-hō͘ ê ōe.”
44022002	In chi̍t-ē thiaⁿ-tio̍h [Pó-lô] ēng [Hi-pek-lâi]-ōe tùi in kóng-ōe, chiū koh-khah an-chēng. [Pó-lô] kóng:
44022003	“Góa sī [Iû-thài]-lâng, tī [Ki-lī-ka] ê [Tāi-sò͘] chhut-sì, tī [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] tióng-tōa, chòe [Ka-má-lia̍t] ê ha̍k-seng, kap kin-á-ji̍t tī chia ê chu ūi kâng-khoán ū siū lán chó͘-sian Lu̍t-hoat giâm-keh ê kàu-io̍k, jia̍t-sim ho̍k-sāi Siōng-tè.
44022004	Góa bat pek-hāi sìn-hōng chit-ê Tō-lō͘ ê lâng, hō͘ in tì-kàu sí, bô-lūn lâm, lú, lóng kā in lia̍h-khì koaiⁿ-kaⁿ.
44022005	Tōa-chè-si kap gī-hōe lóng-chóng ê tiúⁿ-ló ōe-tàng ūi góa choh-chèng. Góa mā ū tùi in tit-tio̍h hō͘ [Tāi-má-sū-kek] [Iû-thài] tông-pau ê phoe. Āu-lâi góa ū khì hia beh pa̍k tòa tī hia ê sìn-tô͘, kā in lia̍h lâi [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] siū hêng-hoa̍t.
44022006	“Góa kiâⁿ beh kàu [Tāi-má-sū-kek] ê sî, chha-put-to sī tiong-tàu, hut-jiân ū chin kiông ê kng tùi thiⁿ-téng chiò tī góa ê chiu-ûi.
44022007	Góa poa̍h lo̍h-khì thô͘-kha, thiaⁿ-tio̍h ū siaⁿ tùi góa kóng, ‘[Sò-lô], [Sò-lô]! Lí sī-án-chóaⁿ teh pek-hāi góa?’
44022008	Góa mn̄g kóng, ‘Chú ah, lí sī sím-mi̍h lâng?’ I ìn góa kóng, ‘Góa chiū-sī lí teh pek-hāi ê [Ná-sat-le̍k]-lâng Iâ-so͘.’
44022009	Hiah-ê kap góa chòe-tīn kiâⁿ ê lâng ū khòaⁿ-tio̍h hit-ê kng, bô thiaⁿ-tio̍h tùi góa kóng-ōe Hit-ūi ê siaⁿ.
44022010	Góa koh mn̄g kóng, ‘Chú ah, góa tio̍h chòe sím-mi̍h?’ Chú tùi góa kóng, ‘Khí-lâi, ji̍p-khì [Tāi-má-sū-kek], tī hia ū lâng ōe chiong góa beh chí-phài lí khì chòe lóng-chóng ê tāi-chì kā lí kóng.’
44022011	In-ūi hit-ê kng chin chha̍k-ba̍k, góa soah bōe khòaⁿ-kìⁿ, góa ê tâng-phōaⁿ chiū khan góa ji̍p-khì [Tāi-má-sū-kek].
44022012	“Tī hia ū chi̍t ê lâng kiò-chòe [A-ná-nî-a], sī chi̍t ê chun-siú [Mô͘-se] Lu̍t-hoat khiân-sêng ê lâng, put-chí siū [Tāi-má-sū-kek] ê [Iû-thài]-lâng chun-kèng.
44022013	I lâi chhē góa, khiā tī góa ê sin-piⁿ, kóng, ‘[Sò-lô] hiaⁿ-tī, hō͘ lí ōe-koh khòaⁿ-kìⁿ!’ Hit-chūn góa sûi-sî ōe khòaⁿ-kìⁿ, ū khòaⁿ-tio̍h i.
44022014	I kóng, ‘Lán chó͘-sian ê Siōng-tè í-keng kéng-soán lí, hō͘ lí chai I ê chí-ì, thang khòaⁿ-kìⁿ I hit-ūi Kong-gī ê Po̍k-jîn, koh thiaⁿ-tio̍h I ê chhùi só͘ chhut ê siaⁿ,
44022015	in-ūi lí ōe chiong lí só͘ khòaⁿ-kìⁿ só͘ thiaⁿ-tio̍h ê tùi bān-bîn chòe kiàn-chèng.
44022016	Ná iáu teh iân-chhiân, khí-lâi niá-siū sóe-lé, kiû-kiò I ê miâ thang hō͘ lí ê chōe tit-tio̍h chheng-khì!’ ”
44022017	“Āu-lâi, góa tò-khì [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng]; tī Sèng-tiān teh kî-tó ê sî ji̍p-sîn
44022018	khòaⁿ-tio̍h Chú kā góa kóng, ‘Kóaⁿ-kín, sûi-sî lī-khui [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng], in-ūi chit só͘-chāi ê lâng bōe chiap-siū lí ūi-tio̍h góa só͘ chòe ê kiàn-chèng.’
44022019	Góa ìn kóng, ‘Chú ah, in ka-kī chai góa í-chêng khì ta̍k ê hōe-tn̂g lia̍h sìn lí ê lâng koaiⁿ-lo̍h kaⁿ, koh kā in phah.
44022020	Lí ê kiàn-chèng-jîn [Sū-thê-hoán] hō͘ lâng sat-hāi ê sî, góa mā khiā tī piⁿ-a, chàn-tông in, koh kā hāi-sí i ê lâng kò͘ gōa-saⁿ.’
44022021	Chú tùi góa kóng, ‘Lí khì, in-ūi góa beh chhe lí khì hn̄g-hn̄g ê Gōa-pang-lâng hia.’ ”
44022022	Chèng-lâng it-ti̍t chù-ì thiaⁿ, kàu [Pó-lô] kóng chit kù ōe ê sî, in tōa-siaⁿ hoah, “Chit khoán lâng tio̍h tùi tōe-chiūⁿ siau-bia̍t! M̄-thang hō͘ i oa̍h!”
44022023	In tōa-siaⁿ jióng, thiah-phòa gōa-saⁿ, ǹg khong-tiong iā thô͘-hún ê sî,
44022024	[Lô-má] ê chí-hui-koaⁿ bēng-lēng lâng chiong [Pó-lô] ah ji̍p-khì iâⁿ-pâng, ēng piⁿ kā i phah, ūi-tio̍h beh khak-si̍t chai [Iû-thài]-lâng sī-án-chóaⁿ teh kā i jióng.
44022025	In kā i pa̍k khí-lâi beh piⁿ-phah ê sî, [Pó-lô] tùi khiā tī piⁿ-a ê kun-koaⁿ kóng, “Tùi chi̍t ê bô siū phòaⁿ-chōe ê [Lô-má] kong-bîn, lín ēng piⁿ kā i phah kiám ū ha̍p-hoat?”
44022026	Hit-ê kun-koaⁿ chi̍t-ē thiaⁿ-tio̍h chiū khì kìⁿ chí-hui-koaⁿ, tùi i kóng, “Taⁿ beh án-chóaⁿ? Chit-ê lâng sī [Lô-má] kong-bîn!”
44022027	Chí-hui-koaⁿ khì kìⁿ [Pó-lô], mn̄g i kóng, “Kā góa kóng, lí sī [Lô-má] ê kong-bîn sī-bô?” [Pó-lô] ìn kóng, “Sī.”
44022028	Chí-hui-koaⁿ kóng, “Góa ēng chin chōe chîⁿ chiah tit-tio̍h chit-ê kong-bîn-koân.” [Pó-lô] kóng, “Góa chhut-sì chiū-sī [Lô-má] kong-bîn.”
44022029	Hiah-ê beh sím-mn̄g [Pó-lô] ê lâng sûi-sî lī-khui. Chí-hui-koaⁿ chi̍t-ē chai [Pó-lô] sī [Lô-má] kong-bîn, koh in-ūi kā i pa̍k-teh, chiū chin kiaⁿ.
44022030	Keh-ji̍t, Chí-hui-koaⁿ ài chai [Iû-thài]-lâng khòng-kò [Pó-lô] ê khak-si̍t lí-iû, chiū kā i tháu-khui, koh bēng-lēng chè-si-tiúⁿ kap choân gī-hōe chū-chi̍p, chhōa [Pó-lô] chhut-lâi, hō͘ i khiā tī in bīn-chêng.
44023001	[Pó-lô] chù-ba̍k khòaⁿ gī-oân, kóng, “Kok ūi hiaⁿ-tī, góa tī Siōng-tè ê bīn-chêng chiàu oân-choân chheng-pe̍k ê liông-sim seng-oa̍h, ti̍t-kàu kin-á-ji̍t.”
44023002	Tōa-chè-si [A-ná-nî-a] bēng-lēng khiā tī [Pó-lô] sin-piⁿ ê lâng kā i siàn chhùi-phóe.
44023003	[Pó-lô] tùi i kóng, “Lí chit-ê chhat-kah pe̍h-pe̍h ê chhiûⁿ, Siōng-tè beh phah lí! Lí khui-têng eng-kai chiàu hoat-lu̍t kā góa sím-phòaⁿ, lí kèng-jiân ûi-hoat bēng-lēng lâng phah góa!”
44023004	Khiā tī [Pó-lô] piⁿ-a ê lâng kóng, “Lí káⁿ mē Siōng-tè ê tōa-chè-si?”
44023005	[Pó-lô] ìn kóng, “Hiaⁿ-tī ah, góa m̄-chai i sī tōa-chè-si; Sèng-keng ū kì-chài kóng, ‘M̄-thang bú-jio̍k tī-lí jîn-bîn ê tiúⁿ-koaⁿ.’ ”
44023006	[Pó-lô] chi̍t-ē chai-iáⁿ in tiong-kan ū-ê sī [Sat-to͘-kai]-phài ê lâng, ū-ê sī [Hoat-lī-sài]-phài ê lâng, chiū tī gī-hōe hoah kóng, “Hiaⁿ-tī, góa sī [Hoat-lī-sài]-phài ê lâng, sī [Hoat-lī-sài]-lâng ê kiáⁿ, góa siū sím-mn̄g sī in-ūi ǹg-bāng sí-lâng ê koh-oa̍h!”
44023007	I chi̍t-ē án-ni kóng, [Hoat-lī-sài]-phài ê lâng kap [Sat-to͘-kai]-phài ê lâng chiū khí cheng-lūn, gī-hōe mā hun-lia̍t.
44023008	In-ūi [Sat-to͘-kai]-phài ê lâng kóng bô koh-oa̍h, bô thiⁿ-sài, mā bô sîn-lêng, m̄-kú [Hoat-lī-sài]-phài ê lâng chit saⁿ hāng lóng ū sìn.
44023009	Soan-jióng ê siaⁿ ná lâi ná tōa, kúi-nā ê [Hoat-lī-sài]-phài ê keng-ha̍k-kàu-su khiā khí-lâi, ke̍k-lia̍t khòng-gī kóng, “Goán chhē bōe chhut chit-ê lâng ū sím-mi̍h chhò-gō͘. Káⁿ chin-chiàⁿ ū sîn-lêng á-sī thiⁿ-sài tùi i kóng-ōe ô͘?”
44023010	Cheng-lūn ná lâi ná ke̍k-lia̍t, chí-hui-koaⁿ kiaⁿ-liáu [Pó-lô] hō͘ in thiah-chhùi, chiū bēng-lēng peng lo̍h-khì tùi chèng-lâng tiong-kan kā [Pó-lô] chhiúⁿ chhut-lâi, chhōa ji̍p-khì iâⁿ-pâng.
44023011	Hit mî, Chú khiā tī [Pó-lô] ê sin-piⁿ, kóng, “Tio̍h ióng-kám! Lí í-keng ū tī [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] ūi-tio̍h góa chòe kiàn-chèng, mā it-tēng tio̍h tī [Lô-má] ūi-tio̍h góa chòe kiàn-chèng.”
44023012	Keh chá-khí, [Iû-thài]-lâng tàu-tīn kè-bô͘, chiù-chōa nā bô thâi-sí [Pó-lô] m̄-chia̍h m̄-lim.
44023013	Ū sì-cha̍p gōa ê lâng chham-ka chit-ê im-bô͘.
44023014	In khì kìⁿ chè-si-tiúⁿ kap tiúⁿ-ló, kóng, “Goán í-keng chiù tāng-chōa, nā bô thâi-sí [Pó-lô] lóng m̄-chia̍h!
44023015	Hiān-chāi lín kap gī-hōe tio̍h iau-kiû chí-hui-koaⁿ chhōa [Pó-lô] lâi hō͘ lín, ké-chòe beh khah siông-sè chhâ-mn̄g i ê àn-kiāⁿ, goán ōe chún-pī hó-sè, tī i kàu chia í-chêng kā i thâi-sí.”
44023016	[Pó-lô] ê gōe-seng thiaⁿ-tio̍h chit-ê bâi-ho̍k ê im-bô͘, chiū ji̍p-khì peng-iâⁿ kā [Pó-lô] kóng.
44023017	[Pó-lô] chiū chhiáⁿ chi̍t ê kun-koaⁿ lâi, kā i kóng, “Chhiáⁿ chhōa chit-ê siàu-liân-lâng khì kìⁿ chí-hui-koaⁿ, i ū tāi-chì beh kā i pò-kò.”
44023018	Kun-koaⁿ chiū chhōa siàu-liân-lâng khì kìⁿ chí-hui-koaⁿ, kóng, “Hit-ê hoān-lâng [Pó-lô] kiò góa lâi, iau-kiû góa chhōa chit-ê siàu-liân-lâng lâi kìⁿ lí, in-ūi i ū tāi-chì beh kā lí kóng.”
44023019	Chí-hui-koaⁿ khan i ê chhiú khì piⁿ-a mn̄g i, “Lí ū sím-mi̍h tāi-chì beh kā góa pò-kò?”
44023020	I kóng, “[Iû-thài]-lâng í-keng kóng hó-sè, ké-chòe beh koh-khah siông-sè tiâu-cha [Pó-lô] ê àn-kiāⁿ, beh chhiáⁿ lí bîn-á-chài kā i sàng khì gī-hōe.
44023021	Chhiáⁿ lí m̄-thang thiaⁿ in ê ōe, in-ūi ū sì-cha̍p gōa ê lâng bâi-ho̍k teh tán i. In chiù-chōa, nā bô thâi-sí [Pó-lô] m̄-chia̍h m̄-lim. Hiān-chāi in lóng chún-pī hó-sè, teh thèng-hāu lí ún-chún.”
44023022	Chí-hui-koaⁿ chiū hoan-hù siàu-liân-lâng kóng, “M̄-thang tùi lâng kóng lí ū pò góa chai chit hāng tāi-chì”, jiân-āu kiò i tńg-khì.
44023023	Chí-hui-koaⁿ kiò nn̄g ê kun-koaⁿ lâi, kā in kóng, “Khì chún-pī pō͘-peng nn̄g-pah ê, bé-peng chhit-cha̍p ê, kap gia̍h-chhiuⁿ ê peng nn̄g-pah ê, thang tī kim-àm káu-tiám chhut-hoat khì [Khái-sat-lī-a].
44023024	Koh khì chún-pī bé hō͘ [Pó-lô] khiâ, hō͘-sàng i an-choân kàu [Hui-le̍k-su] chóng-tok hia.”
44023025	Chí-hui-koaⁿ chiū siá chi̍t tiuⁿ phoe án-ni kóng:
44023026	“[Kek-ló-tē] [Lū-se-a] kā chóng-tok [Hui-le̍k-su] kok-hā chhéng-an.
44023027	Chit-ê lâng hō͘ [Iû-thài]-lâng lia̍h-khì, teh-beh hō͘ in thâi-sí ê sî, góa chi̍t-ē chai i sī [Lô-má] kong-bîn, chiū tòa peng khì kā i kiù.
44023028	Góa siūⁿ-beh bêng-pe̍k in khòng-kò i ê lí-iû chiū sàng i khì in ê gī-hōe.
44023029	Góa hoat-hiān i hō͘ lâng kò sī koan-hē in Lu̍t-hoat ê cheng-lūn, pèng bô hoān-tio̍h sím-mi̍h kai-sí á-sī tio̍h koaiⁿ-kaⁿ ê chōe.
44023030	Āu-lâi ū lâng kā góa pò-kò [Iû-thài]-lâng kè-bô͘ beh hāi i, só͘-í góa sûi-sî sàng i khì lí hia, siâng-sî bēng-lēng kò i ê lâng mā tio̍h tī lí ê bīn-chêng kā i khòng-kò.”
44023031	Pō͘-peng chip-hêng bēng-lēng, thàu-mî chiong [Pó-lô] tòa khì kau hō͘ [An-thê-phàⁿ-tí].
44023032	Keh-ji̍t pō͘-peng tńg-khì iâⁿ-ni̍h, hō͘ bé-peng kè-sio̍k hō͘-sàng.
44023033	In kàu [Khái-sat-lī-a], chiong hit tiuⁿ phoe the̍h hō͘ chóng-tok, mā chiong [Pó-lô] kau hō͘ i.
44023034	Chóng-tok tha̍k hit tiuⁿ phoe liáu, mn̄g [Pó-lô] sī tó chi̍t séng ê lâng, chai-iáⁿ sī [Ki-lī-ka]-séng ê lâng,
44023035	chiū kóng, “Kò lí ê lâng kàu-ūi ê sî, góa chiah chhú-lí lí ê àn-kiāⁿ.” Āu-lâi chóng-tok bēng-lēng chiong [Pó-lô] khu-liû tī [Hi-lu̍t] ê kong-sú.
44024001	Gō͘ ji̍t āu, tōa-chè-si [A-ná-nî-a] kap kúi-nā ê tiúⁿ-ló, í-ki̍p chi̍t ê kiò-chòe [Thia̍p-thó͘-lô] ê lu̍t-su lâi-kàu [Khái-sat-lī-a]. In tī [Hui-le̍k-su] chóng-tok bīn-chêng kò [Pó-lô].
44024002	[Pó-lô] chi̍t-ē siū tiàu chhut-têng, [Thia̍p-thó͘-lô] chiū kā i khòng-kò, kóng: “[Hui-le̍k-su] kok-hā, in-ūi lí hiân-bêng ê tī-lí hō͘ goán hióng-siū thài-pêng, só͘ si-hêng ê chōe-chōe kái-kek mā hō͘ kok-ka tit-tio̍h chìn-pō͘.
44024003	Lí ê tek-chèng hō͘ goán ta̍k-sî ta̍k-ūi kám-siā put-chīn.
44024004	Góa m̄-káⁿ tam-gō͘ lí siuⁿ kú, kiû lí khoan-iông lâi thiaⁿ goán kán-iàu ê sin-sò͘.
44024005	Goán khòaⁿ chit-ê lâng sī chi̍t ê gûi-hiám jîn-bu̍t, tī choân sè-kài ê [Iû-thài]-lâng tiong-kan chok-loān, sī [Ná-sat-le̍k]-tóng ê siú-léng.
44024006	I siūⁿ-beh ù-jiám Sèng-tiān, goán chiū kā i lia̍h khí-lâi.
44024008	Lí chhin-sin sím-mn̄g chit-ê lâng chiū ōe bêng-pe̍k goán khòng-kò i it-chhè ê tāi-chì.”
44024009	Chāi-tiûⁿ ê [Iû-thài]-lâng mā lóng chi-chhî chit-ê khòng-kò, kóng sū-chêng khak-si̍t sī án-ni.
44024010	Chóng-tok tùi [Pó-lô] sī-ì, kiò i hoat-giân, [Pó-lô] chiū kóng: “Góa chai lí tī pún-kok phòaⁿ-àn chin chōe nî, góa goān-ì tī lí bīn-chêng ūi-tio̍h ka-kī piān-hō͘.
44024011	Lí tiâu-cha chiū ōe bêng-pe̍k, tùi góa chiūⁿ [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] kèng-pài kàu kin-á-ji̍t chí-ū cha̍p-jī ji̍t.
44024012	[Iû-thài]-lâng pèng bô khòaⁿ-tio̍h góa tī Sèng-tiān kap lâng piān-lūn, mā bô khòaⁿ-tio̍h góa tī hōe-tn̂g á-sī chhī-lāi siàn-tōng kûn-chiòng.
44024013	In mā bōe-tàng tùi lí the̍h-chhut hiān-chāi teh khòng-kò góa ê chèng-kù.
44024014	Put-kò góa tio̍h tùi lí sêng-jīn chi̍t hāng sū, chiū-sī góa chiàu in khòaⁿ-chòe sī īⁿ-toan ê Tō-lō͘ kèng-pài goán chó͘-sian ê Siōng-tè, siong-sìn [Mô͘-se] ê Lu̍t-hoat kap sian-ti ê chheh só͘ kì-chài ê it-chhè.
44024015	Góa tùi Siōng-tè ū khǹg kap in kâng-khoán ê ǹg-bāng, chiū-sī bô-lūn hó-lâng á-sī pháiⁿ-lâng lóng ōe tùi sí koh-oa̍h.
44024016	In-ūi án-ni, góa tùi Siōng-tè kap lâng lóng chīn-la̍t pó-chhî chheng-pe̍k ê liông-sim.
44024017	“Góa lī-khui [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] kúi-nā nî āu koh tńg-khì, sī the̍h chi̍t-kóa chîⁿ beh khì kiù-chè tông-pau, koh hiàn chè-mi̍h.
44024018	In tī Sèng-tiān khòaⁿ-tio̍h góa ê sî, góa í-keng oân-sêng kiat-chēng-lé teh hiàn-chè, hit sî bô kûn-chiòng, mā bô jiáu-loān,
44024019	kan-ta ū kúi-nā ê tùi [A-se-a] lâi ê [Iû-thài]-lâng tī hia. In nā beh khòng-kò góa, eng-kai ka-kī lâi lí ê bīn-chêng kò góa chiah tio̍h.
44024020	Nā bô, góa tī gī-hōe sin-sò͘ ê sî, in tio̍h chí-chhut góa ū chòe sím-mi̍h m̄-tio̍h.
44024021	Chí-ū chi̍t hāng sū in ōe-tàng kā góa khòng-kò, chiū-sī góa bat khiā tī in tiong-kan tōa-siaⁿ kóng, ‘Góa kin-á-ji̍t siū lín sím-phòaⁿ, sī ūi-tio̍h sí-lâng ê koh-oa̍h.’ ”
44024022	[Hui-le̍k-su] tùi chit-ê Tō-lō͘ siong-tong chheng-chhó, chiū soan-pò͘ thòe-têng, tùi in kóng, “Thèng-hāu chí-hui-koaⁿ [Lū-se-a] lâi, góa chiah phòaⁿ-koat lín ê àn-kiāⁿ.”
44024023	Jiân-āu [Hui-le̍k-su] bēng-lēng hit-ê kun-koaⁿ kò͘-siú [Pó-lô], hō͘ i ū tām-po̍h chū-iû, koh chún i ê pêng-iú tòa i só͘ khiàm-ēng ê mi̍h-kiāⁿ lâi hō͘ i.
44024024	Kúi-nā ji̍t āu, [Hui-le̍k-su] kap i ê [Iû-thài] hu-jîn [Thó͘-se-la] lâi. I chhe lâng kiò [Pó-lô] chhut-lâi, beh thiaⁿ i káng-lūn koan-hē sìn Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ ê sū.
44024025	[Pó-lô] kóng kàu kong-gī, chiat-chè, kap chiong-lâi ê Sím-phòaⁿ, [Hui-le̍k-su] kám-kak kiaⁿ-hiâⁿ, chiū tùi [Pó-lô] kóng, “Chit pái kàu chia chiū hó, ū ki-hōe góa chiah koh tiàu lí lâi.”
44024026	Siâng-sî i mā ū teh kî-thāi [Pó-lô] ōe sàng-chîⁿ hō͘ i, só͘-í siông-siông kiò [Pó-lô] chhut-lâi, kap i tâm-lūn.
44024027	Keng-kè nn̄g nî, [Pho-kiû] [Hui-su-to͘] chiap [Hui-le̍k-su] choh chóng-tok. [Hui-le̍k-su] ūi-tio̍h beh hō͘ [Iû-thài]-lâng hoaⁿ-hí, kè-sio̍k kā [Pó-lô] koaiⁿ tī kaⁿ-ni̍h.
44025001	[Hui-su-to͘] chiūⁿ-jīm saⁿ ji̍t āu, tùi [Khái-sat-lī-a] chiūⁿ-khì [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng].
44025002	Chè-si-tiúⁿ kap [Iû-thài]-lâng ê léng-siù tùi i khòng-kò [Pó-lô]. In chhéng-kiû [Hui-su-to͘],
44025003	pài-thok i chiong [Pó-lô] sàng khì [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng]. In kè-bô͘ tī lō͘-tiong bâi-ho̍k beh kā i thâi-sí.
44025004	[Hui-su-to͘] ìn kóng, “[Pó-lô] koaiⁿ tī [Khái-sat-lī-a], góa ka-kī mā liâm-piⁿ beh tńg-khì hia.
44025005	Só͘-í lín tiong-kan chòe thâu ê lâng thang kap góa chòe-hé khì [Khái-sat-lī-a], chit-ê lâng nā ū chòe sím-mi̍h m̄-tio̍h, in thang tī hia kā i kò.”
44025006	[Hui-su-to͘] tòa hia chiâⁿ-cha̍p ji̍t, chiū tò-khì [Khái-sat-lī-a]. Keh-ji̍t, i khui-têng, bēng-lēng lâng tòa [Pó-lô] lâi.
44025007	[Pó-lô] chi̍t-ē chhut-têng, tùi [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] lo̍h-lâi hiah-ê [Iû-thài]-lâng óa-lâi khiā tī i ê chiu-ûi, ēng chin chōe giâm-tiōng ê chōe-miâ kā i khòng-kò, m̄-kú the̍h bōe chhut chèng-kù.
44025008	[Pó-lô] ūi-tio̍h ka-kī piān-hō͘, kóng, “Góa tùi [Iû-thài]-lâng ê Lu̍t-hoat, á-sī Sèng-tiān, á-sī [Lô-má] hông-tè lóng m̄-bat chòe sím-mi̍h m̄-tio̍h ê tāi-chì.”
44025009	M̄-kú [Hui-su-to͘] ūi-tio̍h beh hō͘ [Iû-thài]-lâng hoaⁿ-hí, chiū mn̄g [Pó-lô], “Lí goān-ì chiūⁿ [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng], tī hia ūi-tio̍h chiah-ê kò-sò͘ chiap-siū góa ê sím-phòaⁿ bô?”
44025010	[Pó-lô] kóng, “Góa hiān-chāi khiā tī hông-tè ê hoat-têng, tong-jiân tio̍h tī chia siū sím-phòaⁿ. Lí bêng-bêng chai, góa pèng bô tek-chōe [Iû-thài]-lâng.
44025011	Góa nā ū chòe m̄-tio̍h, hoān-tio̍h kai-sí ê chōe, chiū tio̍h sí, góa mā choa̍t-tùi bōe tô-pī. M̄-kú in ê khòng-kò nā bô sū-si̍t, bô-lâng ōe-tàng kā góa kau hō͘ in. Góa beh tùi hông-tè siōng-sò͘.”
44025012	[Hui-su-to͘] kap kò͘-būn chham-siông liáu-āu, ìn kóng, “Kì-jiân lí í-keng tùi hông-tè siōng-sò͘, chiū khì hông-tè hia.”
44025013	Kè kúi-nā ji̍t, [A-ki-phàⁿ]-ông kap [Pek-nî-ki] lâi [Khái-sat-lī-a], tùi [Hui-su-to͘] piáu-sī kèng-ì.
44025014	In tī hia tòa kúi-nā ji̍t liáu-āu, [Hui-su-to͘] chiong [Pó-lô] ê àn-kiāⁿ kóng hō͘ [A-ki-phàⁿ]-ông thiaⁿ, i kóng, “Tī chia ū chi̍t ê [Hui-le̍k-su] lâu lo̍h-lâi ê hoān-lâng.
44025015	Góa khì [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] ê sî, [Iû-thài]-lâng ê chè-si-tiúⁿ kap tiúⁿ-ló ū kā i kò, iau-kiû góa kā i tēng-chōe.
44025016	Góa kā in kóng, chiàu [Lô-má]-lâng ê koàn-lē, pī-kò iáu-bē kap goân-kò bīn-tùi-bīn tùi-chí, iáu bô ki-hōe ūi ka-kī piān-hō͘, bōe-tàng kā i tēng-chōe.
44025017	Só͘-í, in lóng kàu-ūi, góa sûi-sî tī keh-ji̍t khui-têng, bēng-lēng tòa hit-ê lâng lâi.
44025018	Goân-kò khiā khí-lâi khòng-kò, m̄-kú só͘ kò ê bô chi̍t hāng sī góa só͘ siūⁿ ê hiah-ni̍h pháiⁿ.
44025019	In kap i cheng-lūn ê sī in ka-kī ê chong-kàu būn-tôe, í-ki̍p chi̍t-ê kiò-chòe Iâ-so͘ ê lâng ê tāi-chì. I í-keng sí, m̄-kú [Pó-lô] chú-tiuⁿ I iáu teh oa̍h.
44025020	Chiah-ê būn-tôe góa m̄-chai tio̍h án-chóaⁿ tiâu-cha, só͘-í mn̄g [Pó-lô] khòaⁿ goān-ì chiūⁿ [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] tī hia ūi-tio̍h chiah-ê tāi-chì siū sím-phòaⁿ á-bô.
44025021	M̄-kú [Pó-lô] chhéng-kiû kè-sio̍k kā i khàu-liû, thèng-hāu hông-tè chhâi-koat, só͘-í góa bēng-lēng kā i khàu-liû kàu sàng-kau hō͘ hông-tè.”
44025022	[A-ki-phàⁿ] kā [Hui-su-to͘] kóng, “Góa ka-kī mā ài thiaⁿ chit-ê lâng kóng-ōe.” [Hui-su-to͘] kóng, “Bîn-á-chài lí ōe-tàng thiaⁿ i kóng.”
44025023	Keh-ji̍t, [A-ki-phàⁿ] kap [Pek-nî-ki] hui-siông chhiaⁿ-iāⁿ ji̍p-tiûⁿ, chhōa chí-hui-koaⁿ kap chhī-lāi ê iàu-jîn chìn-ji̍p tōa-thiaⁿ. [Hui-su-to͘] hā-lēng, [Pó-lô] chiū hō͘ lâng chhōa ji̍p-lâi.
44025024	[Hui-su-to͘] kóng, “[A-ki-phàⁿ]-ông kap chāi-chō kok ūi! Lín khòaⁿ chit-ê lâng! Tī chia kap tī [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] só͘-ū ê [Iû-thài]-lâng lóng tùi góa chhéng-kiû, hoah kóng tio̍h hō͘ i sí.
44025025	M̄-kú góa chhâ bōe chhut i ū hoān-tio̍h sím-mi̍h kai-sí ê chōe. I kì-jiân ka-kī tùi hông-tè siōng-sò͘, góa chiū koat-tēng kā i sàng-khì.
44025026	Koan-hē chit-ê lâng, góa bô khak-si̍t ê chu-liāu thang tùi hông-siōng thêng-chàu. In-ūi án-ni góa chiah kā i chhōa lâi kok ūi bīn-chêng, te̍k-pia̍t tī [A-ki-phàⁿ]-ông lí ê bīn-chêng, cha-bêng àn-chêng liáu-āu thang tit-tio̍h chu-liāu thêng-chàu.
44025027	In-ūi chiàu góa khòaⁿ, ah-sàng siû-hoān, bô chí-bêng i ê chōe-miâ sī bô ha̍p-lí.”
44026001	[A-ki-phàⁿ] tùi [Pó-lô] kóng, “Chún lí ūi-tio̍h ka-kī piān-hō͘.” [Pó-lô] chiū chhun-chhiú khai-sí piān-hō͘:
44026002	“[A-ki-phàⁿ]-ông, kin-á-ji̍t ōe-tàng tī lí ê bīn-chêng ūi-tio̍h [Iû-thài]-lâng khòng-kò góa it-chhè ê sū sin-piān, góa kám-kak bān-hēng.
44026003	In-ūi lí tùi [Iû-thài]-lâng ê koàn-lē kap cheng-lūn ê būn-tôe te̍k-pia̍t cheng-thong, só͘-í góa khún-kiû lí nāi-sim thiaⁿ.
44026004	“Góa tùi siàu-liân kàu taⁿ, khí-thâu tī góa pún-kok, āu-lâi tī [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng], choh-lâng án-chóaⁿ, só͘-ū ê [Iû-thài]-lâng lóng chai.
44026005	In í-keng bat góa chin kú, nā khéng, ōe-tàng ūi-tio̍h góa choh-chèng. Góa choh chi̍t ê Hoat-lī-sài-lâng, ū chiàu goán ê chong-kàu siōng giâm-keh kàu-phài ê iau-kiû teh seng-oa̍h.
44026006	Hiān-chāi góa khiā tī chia siū sím-phòaⁿ, sī in-ūi góa ǹg-bāng Siōng-tè tùi goán chó͘-sian ê èng-ún ōe si̍t-hiān;
44026007	goán cha̍p-jī chi-cho̍k ê tông-pau mî-ji̍t jia̍t-sim kèng-pài mā-sī ūi-tio̍h beh hō͘ chit-ê ǹg-bāng si̍t-hiān. Ông ah, ūi-tio̍h chit-ê ǹg-bāng, góa chiah siū [Iû-thài]-lâng khòng-kò.
44026008	Siōng-tè hō͘ sí-lâng koh-oa̍h chit hāng tāi-chì lín sī-án-chóaⁿ toàn-tēng bōe-tàng siong-sìn?
44026009	“Í-chêng góa pún-sin mā siūⁿ-kóng tio̍h ēng ta̍k khoán ê hong-hoat lâi hoán-tùi [Ná-sat-le̍k]-lâng Iâ-so͘ ê miâ.
44026010	Góa tī [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] khak-si̍t ū án-ni chòe, m̄-nā ū tùi chè-si-tiúⁿ niá-siū koân-pèng lia̍h chin chōe sìn-tô͘ koaiⁿ-kaⁿ, koh tī in siū chhú-sí ê sî mā piáu-sī chàn-sêng.
44026011	Góa sî-siông tī kok tōe ê hōe-tn̂g kā in hêng-hoa̍t, kiông-pek in siat-to̍k chit-ê sìn-gióng, koh ēng pō-le̍k tùi-thāi in, sīm-chì kàu gōa-kok ê siâⁿ-chhī kā in pek-hāi.”
44026012	“Ū chi̍t piàn, góa tòa chè-si-tiúⁿ ê koân-pèng kap bēng-lēng khì [Tāi-má-sū-kek].
44026013	Ông ah, tī pòaⁿ-lō͘, tiong-tàu ê sî, góa khòaⁿ-tio̍h pí ji̍t-thâu koh-khah kiông ê kng tùi thiⁿ-téng chiò lo̍h-lâi, kā góa kap tâng-kiâⁿ ê lâng tà-teh.
44026014	Goán lóng poa̍h lo̍h-khì thô͘-kha. Góa ū thiaⁿ-tio̍h chi̍t ê siaⁿ, ēng [Hi-pek-lâi]-ōe tùi góa kóng, ‘[Só-lô], [Só-lô], lí sī-án-chóaⁿ teh pek-hāi góa? Lí án-ni chòe, chhin-chhiūⁿ ēng kûn-thâu-bú teh cheng chio̍h-sai, ka-kī thó phê thiàⁿ.’
44026015	Góa mn̄g kóng, ‘Chú ah, lí sī sím-mi̍h-lâng?’ Chú kóng, ‘Góa chiū-sī lí teh pek-hāi ê Iâ-so͘.
44026016	Khí-lâi, khiā-teh; góa tùi lí hián-hiān sī beh phài lí ūi-tio̍h só͘ khòaⁿ-kìⁿ koan-hē góa ê sū, í-ki̍p chiong-lâi beh tùi lí hián-hiān ê sū choh-chèng.
44026017	Góa beh tùi [Í-sek-lia̍t]-lâng kap Gōa-pang-lâng ê tiong-kan kā lí kiù chhut-lâi, chhe-khián lí khì in hia,
44026018	khui in ê ba̍k-chiu, hō͘ in lī-khui o͘-àm chìn-ji̍p kng-bêng, lī-khui Sat-tàn ê koân-sè kui-ǹg Siōng-tè, hō͘ in tùi sìn góa tit-tio̍h sià-chōe, koh sêng-siū choh Siōng-tè soán-bîn ê tōe-ūi.’ ”
44026019	“Só͘-í, [A-ki-phàⁿ]-ông, góa bô ûi-pōe tùi thiⁿ lâi ê īⁿ-siōng.
44026020	Góa tāi-seng tùi [Tāi-má-sū-kek] kap [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] ê lâng, āu-lâi tùi [Iû-thài] choân-tōe ê lâng, mā tùi Gōa-pang-lâng thoân-tō, khǹg in tio̍h hóe-kái lâi kui-ǹg Siōng-tè, koh tio̍h ēng hêng-ûi chèng-bêng in ū chin-chiàⁿ hóe-kái.
44026021	Ūi-tio̍h chit-ê iân-kò͘, [Iû-thài]-lâng tī Sèng-tiān lāi lia̍h góa, siūⁿ-beh thâi góa.
44026022	Kàu kin-á-ji̍t, góa tit-tio̍h Siōng-tè ê pang-chān, ōe-tàng khiā tī chia tùi chun-kùi kap pi-bî ê lâng chòe kiàn-chèng. Góa só͘ kóng ê, kap sian-ti í-ki̍p [Mô͘-se] só͘ kóng ê kâng-khoán, sī koan-hē chiong-lâi beh hoat-seng ê sū,
44026023	chiū-sī Ki-tok it-tēng tio̍h siū-khó͘, chiâⁿ-chòe thâu-chi̍t-ê tùi sí-lâng tiong koh-oa̍h ê, thang chiong chín-kiù ê kng thoân hō͘ [Iû-thài]-lâng kap Gōa-pang-lâng.”
44026024	[Pó-lô] án-ni ūi-tio̍h ka-kī teh piān-hō͘ ê sî, [Hui-su-to͘] tùi i tōa-siaⁿ hoah, “[Pó-lô], lí khí-kông lah; lí ê phok-ha̍k hō͘ lí khí-kông lah!”
44026025	[Pó-lô] kóng, “Hui-su-to͘ kok-hā! Góa pèng bô khí-kông; góa só͘ kóng ê ōe chin-si̍t koh ha̍p-lí. In-ūi ông lí chai chiah-ê tāi-chì, góa chiah káⁿ tōa-táⁿ tùi lí kóng.
44026026	Góa siong-sìn ông tùi chiah-ê tāi-chì lóng chin chheng-chhó, in-ūi só͘ hoat-seng chiah-ê tāi-chì bô-lâng m̄-chai.
44026027	[A-ki-phàⁿ]-ông, lí ū siong-sìn sian-ti bô? Góa chai lí ū.”
44026028	[A-ki-phàⁿ] tùi [Pó-lô] kóng, “Lí kóng kúi-kù-á ōe chiū beh sòe-ho̍k góa chòe Ki-tok-tô͘ ò͘!”
44026029	[Pó-lô] ìn kóng, “Bô-lūn kúi-kù-á ōe á-sī chin chōe ōe, góa kî-kiû Siōng-tè, m̄-nā sī lí, liân kin-á-ji̍t tī chia só͘-ū thiaⁿ góa kóng-ōe ê lâng mā lóng ōe kap góa kâng-khoán, m̄-kú bô chhin-chhiūⁿ góa hō͘ lâng ēng thih-liān liān-teh.”
44026030	Ông, chóng-tok, [Pek-nî-ki], kap tâng chē ê lâng lóng khiā khí-lâi.
44026031	In thòe-chhut liáu-āu hō͘-siōng tâm-lūn kóng, “Chit-ê lâng pèng bô hoān-tio̍h sím-mi̍h kai-sí á-sī tio̍h koaiⁿ-kaⁿ ê chōe.”
44026032	[A-ki-phàⁿ] tùi [Hui-su-to͘] kóng, “Chit-ê lâng nā bô tùi hông-tè siōng-sò͘, chá chiū thang kā i pàng lah.”
44027001	Goán Í-keng koat-tēng tio̍h chē-chûn khì [Ì-tāi-lī], in chiū chiong [Pó-lô] kap kî-tha ê hoān-lâng kau hō͘ hông-ka kìm-ōe-kun chi̍t ê miâ kiò [Iû-liû] ê siú-ōe-tiúⁿ.
44027002	Goán chē chi̍t chiah tùi [A-tāi-bí-tiân] lâi ê chûn; chit chiah chûn tú-á beh iân [A-se-a]-séng kúi-nā ê káng-kháu khui-chûn. Ū chi̍t ê tùi [Thiap-sat-lô-nî-ka] lâi ê [Má-kî-tùn]-lâng [A-lí-ta̍t-kó͘] kap goán chòe-hé khì.
44027003	Keh-ji̍t goán kàu [Se-tùn]. [Iû-liû] chin chhin-chhiat tùi-thāi [Pó-lô], chún i khì kìⁿ i ê pêng-iú, siū in chiau-thāi.
44027004	Goán tùi hia koh khui-chûn, in-ūi ge̍k-hong, chiū sūn [Sài-phó͘-lō͘-su]-tó óa siám-hong hit pêng kiâⁿ.
44027005	Goán keng-kè [Ki-lī-ka] kap [Pông-hui-lī-a] ê gōa-hái, lâi-kàu [Lū-ka] ê [Múi-la].
44027006	Tī hia, siú-ōe-tiúⁿ [Iû-liû] chhē-tio̍h chi̍t chiah tùi [A-le̍k-san-tāi] lâi ê chûn, beh khui khì [Ì-tāi-lī], chiū kiò goán chiūⁿ hit chiah chûn.
44027007	Liân-sòa kúi-nā ji̍t, chûn kiâⁿ chin bān, bián-kióng chiah lâi-kàu [Kek-nî-thó͘] ê gōa-hái. In-ūi siū-tio̍h hong ê chó͘-tòng, goán chiū sūn [Khek-lí-te̍k]-tó lâm-pêng óa siám-hong hit pêng hōaⁿ kiâⁿ tùi [Sat-mô͘-nî]-kak kè-khì.
44027008	Goán ê chûn sūn hái-kîⁿ kiâⁿ, bián-kióng lâi-kàu lī [La-se-a] bô jōa hn̄g chi̍t ê kiò-chòe [An-choân-káng] ê só͘-chāi.
44027009	Goán í-keng chhiân chin chōe ji̍t, koh in-ūi kìm-chia̍h ê choeh-kî mā kè liáu, kiâⁿ-chûn gûi-hiám, só͘-í [Pó-lô] khǹg tāi-ke,
44027010	kóng, “Kok ūi sian-siⁿ, góa khòaⁿ lán kè-sio̍k kiâⁿ-chûn, m̄-nā hè-mi̍h kap chûn, liân lán ê sìⁿ-miā to ōe tú-tio̍h gûi-hiám koh tōa sún-sit.”
44027011	M̄-kú siú-ōe-tiúⁿ lêng-khó siong-sìn chûn-tiúⁿ kap chûn-chú, m̄-thiaⁿ [Pó-lô] kóng ê ōe.
44027012	Koh chit-ê káng-kháu mā bô sek-ha̍p kè tang-thiⁿ, tōa-pō͘-hūn ê lâng chàn-sêng khui-chûn, ǹg-bāng ōe-tàng kóaⁿ khì [Hui-nî-ki] kè tang-thiⁿ. [Hui-nî-ki] sī [Khek-lí-te̍k]-tó ê chi̍t ê káng-kháu, chi̍t bīn ǹg sai-lâm, chi̍t bīn ǹg sai-pak.
44027013	Hit sî, lâm-hong bî-bî-á chhe lâi, tāi-ke siūⁿ-kóng ōe sūn-lī kàu bo̍k-te̍k-tōe chiū khí-tiàⁿ, óa [Khek-lí-te̍k]-tó ê hái-kîⁿ kiâⁿ.
44027014	Bô kú ū chi̍t chūn kiò-chòe [Iú-la-kek-lô] ê tang-pak tōa-hong tùi [Khek-lí-te̍k]-tó sàu lo̍h-lâi.
44027015	Chûn hō͘ hong sàu, sái bōe kiâⁿ, chiū chhut-chāi i phiau-liû.
44027016	Goán lâi-kàu chi̍t ê sió-tó kiò-chòe [Ko-tāi] ê lâm-pêng, siám-hong ê hit pêng hōaⁿ, bián-kióng chiong kiù-seng-thêng pa̍k hó-sè.
44027017	Jiân-āu chúi-siú chiong kiù-seng-thêng thoa khí-lâi chûn-téng, ēng tōa-soh kā i khún-teh. In kiaⁿ-liáu chûn tī [Sài-ní-tí] ê soa-chiu khò-chhián, chiū lo̍h-phâng, chhut-chāi i phiau-liû.
44027018	Pō-hong kè-sio̍k chhe, keh-ji̍t in khai-sí chiong hè-mi̍h tàn-lo̍h hái.
44027019	Tē-saⁿ ji̍t, in koh chhin-chhiú chiong chûn-téng ê khì-khū tàn-tiāu.
44027020	Chin chōe ji̍t, ji̍t-thâu khòaⁿ bōe-tio̍h, chhiⁿ mā khòaⁿ bōe-tio̍h; hong-éng kè-sio̍k phah-kah chin lī-hāi, chòe-āu goán oân-choân hòng-khì tit-kiù ê ǹg-bāng.
44027021	Chèng-lâng chin kú lóng bô chia̍h, [Pó-lô] khiā tī in tiong-ng, kóng, “Kok ūi sian-siⁿ, lín chá nā thiaⁿ góa ê ōe, bô tùi [Khek-lí-te̍k] khui-chûn, chiū bōe tú-tio̍h chit khoán ê gûi-hiám kap sún-sit.
44027022	Hiān-chāi góa khǹg lín tio̍h ióng-kám; lín tiong-kan bô-kah chi̍t lâng ōe sòng-sit sìⁿ-miā; kan-ta ōe sit-lo̍h chit chiah chûn nā-tiāⁿ.
44027023	In-ūi góa só͘ sio̍k só͘ kèng-pài ê Siōng-tè, cha-àm ū chhe I ê thiⁿ-sài lâi tùi góa
44027024	kóng, ‘[Pó-lô], bián kiaⁿ! Lí it-tēng tio̍h khiā tī hông-tè bīn-chêng. Siōng-tè í-keng chiong chûn-lāi lóng-chóng ê lâng kau-thok lí lah.’
44027025	Só͘-í, tio̍h ióng-kám, in-ūi góa siong-sìn tāi-chì it-tēng ōe chiàu Siōng-tè kā góa kóng án-ni si̍t-hiān.
44027026	Put-kò lán it-tēng ōe tī chi̍t ê tó-sū khò-chhián.”
44027027	Kàu tē-cha̍p-sì ji̍t ê àm-sî, goán iáu tī [A-tek-lī-a]-hái teh phiau-liû. Kàu pòaⁿ-mî, chúi-siú siūⁿ-kóng goán teh-beh óa-kūn lio̍k-tōe,
44027028	chiū tàn chhek-liōng-soh lo̍h-khì thàm, thàm-chhut ū sì-cha̍p kong-chhioh chhim; khah chìn-chêng, koh thàm chi̍t piàn, thàm-chhut ū saⁿ-cha̍p kong-chhioh chhim.
44027029	In kiaⁿ-liáu chûn lôe-tio̍h àm-chiau, chiū tùi chûn-bé pha sì ê tiàⁿ, pek-chhiat thèng-hāu thiⁿ kín kng.
44027030	Chúi-siú siūⁿ-beh pàng-sak chûn tô-cháu, chiong kiù-seng-thêng tūi lo̍h-khì hái-ni̍h, ké-chòe beh tùi chûn-thâu pha-tiàⁿ.
44027031	[Pó-lô] tùi siú-ōe-tiúⁿ kap peng-teng kóng, “Chiah-ê lâng nā bô lâu tī chûn-téng, lín chiū bô kiù.”
44027032	Peng-teng chiū chām-tn̄g kiù-seng-thêng ê soh, hō͘ i lâu-khì.
44027033	Thiⁿ beh kng ê sî, [Pó-lô] khǹg chèng-lâng tio̍h chia̍h. I kóng, “Lín í-keng thèng-hāu cha̍p-sì ji̍t kú lóng bô chia̍h,
44027034	só͘-í góa khǹg lín tio̍h chia̍h chi̍t-kóa mi̍h-kiāⁿ chiah ū khùi-la̍t. Lín liân chi̍t ki thâu-mn̂g to bōe sit-lo̍h.”
44027035	[Pó-lô] kóng liáu-āu, the̍h piáⁿ, tī chèng-lâng ê bīn-chêng kám-siā Siōng-tè, peh-khui chia̍h.
44027036	Chèng-lâng sim chiū tiāⁿ lo̍h-lâi, the̍h mi̍h-kiāⁿ chia̍h.
44027037	Kap goán tâng-chûn ê lâng lóng-chóng ū nn̄g-pah chhit-cha̍p-la̍k ê.
44027038	Tāi-ke chia̍h pá liáu-āu, chiong be̍h-á tàn lo̍h-hái, hō͘ chûn khah khin.
44027039	Thiⁿ-kng ê sî, chúi-siú m̄-bat hit-ê só͘-chāi, put-kò in khòaⁿ-tio̍h ū chi̍t ê hái-oan ū soa-than, chiū siūⁿ-khòaⁿ ōe-tàng chiong chûn sái chiūⁿ-than á-bōe.
44027040	In kā soh chām-tn̄g, chiong tiàⁿ hiat-lo̍h hái, koh tháu-khui chûn-tōa ê soh, kā chûn-thâu ê phâng tiàu khí-lâi, hō͘ i chia̍h-hong, hō͘ chûn sái chiūⁿ-than.
44027041	M̄-kú chûn lôe-tio̍h soa-phiâⁿ soah khò-chhián; chûn-thâu kā tiâu-teh bōe tín-tāng, chûn-bé hō͘ tōa-éng phah-phòa.
44027042	Peng-teng kiaⁿ-liáu hoān-lâng siû-chúi tô-cháu, siūⁿ-beh kā in lóng thâi-sí.
44027043	M̄-kú siú-ōe-tiúⁿ ài-beh kiù [Pó-lô], chiū kā in chó͘-chí. I bēng-lēng ōe-hiáu siû ê lâng seng thiàu-lo̍h chúi, siû chiūⁿ-hōaⁿ;
44027044	kî-tha ê lâng chiah lī-iōng chûn-pang á-sī chûn ê phòa-phìⁿ chiūⁿ-lio̍k. Chòe-āu, chèng-lâng lóng an-choân chiūⁿ-hōaⁿ.
44028001	Goán an-choân chiūⁿ-lio̍k liáu-āu chiah chai hit-ê tó-sū kiò-chòe [Má-ní-tha].
44028002	Tong-tōe ê goân-chū-bîn tùi goán hui-siông chhin-chhiat, in-ūi lo̍h-hō͘ koh kôaⁿ, chiū khí-hé kā goán chiap-thāi.
44028003	[Pó-lô] khioh chi̍t khún chhâ, hiat-lo̍h hé, hit-chūn ū chi̍t bé to̍k-chôa in-ūi hé sio sô chhut-lâi, tîⁿ tī i ê chhiú.
44028004	Tong-tōe ê goân-chū-bîn khòaⁿ-tio̍h hit bé chôa tiàu tī [Pó-lô] ê chhiú-ni̍h, chiū kóng-lâi kóng-khì, “Chit-ê lâng it-tēng sī sat-jîn-hoān, sui-jiân tùi hái-ni̍h khioh-tio̍h miā, thian-lí bô iông-ún i oa̍h.”
44028005	[Pó-lô] chiong hit bé chôa hiù-lo̍h hé-ni̍h, lóng bô siū-siong.
44028006	Hiah-ê lâng lóng kim-kim teh khòaⁿ i ê chhiú ōe chéng khí-lâi, á-sī hut-jiân lek lo̍h-khì, sí-khì á-bōe. In thèng-hāu chin kú, khòaⁿ i lóng bô tāi-chì, chiū tian-tò siūⁿ-kóng i sī sîn-bêng.
44028007	Hái-sū ê thâu-ba̍k [Pō͘-pek-liû] ū chi̍t tè tōe lī hit só͘-chāi bô jōa hn̄g. I hoan-gêng goán tī hia tòa saⁿ ji̍t, chin chhin-chhiat chiap-thāi goán.
44028008	Tng-sî, [Pō͘-pek-liû] ê lāu-pē hoān-tio̍h jia̍t-pīⁿ kap chhiah-lī, tó tī bîn-chhn̂g. [Pó-lô] ji̍p-khì, kā i hōaⁿ-chhiú kî-tó, kā i i-hó.
44028009	In-ūi chit-ê tāi-chì, tong-tōe kî-tha ê pīⁿ-lâng mā lâi, mā lóng tit-tio̍h i-hó.
44028010	In sàng goán chin chōe lé-mi̍h; goán beh khui-chûn ê sî, chiong goán su-iàu ê mi̍h-kiāⁿ sàng kàu chûn-téng hō͘ goán.
44028011	Saⁿ ge̍h-ji̍t āu, goán chē [A-le̍k-san-tāi] miâ kiò “Siang-siⁿ-á-sîn” ê chûn chhut-hoat. Chit chiah chûn tú tī chit-ê tó-sū kè tang-thiⁿ.
44028012	Goán tī [Sū-la-kó͘] chiūⁿ-hōaⁿ, tī hia thêng-liû saⁿ ji̍t,
44028013	āu-lâi tùi hia khui-chûn kàu [Lī-ki-ong], keh-ji̍t ū thàu lâm-hong, tē-jī ji̍t chiū kàu [Pō͘-tiu-lī].
44028014	Goán tī hia tú-tio̍h chi̍t-kóa hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, in chhiáⁿ goán kap in tòa chi̍t lé-pài. Āu-lâi goán lâi-kàu [Lô-má].
44028015	[Lô-má] ê hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē thiaⁿ-tio̍h siau-sit, chiū lâi [A-pí-o͘]-chhī kap [Sam-koán] gêng-chiap. [Pó-lô] kìⁿ-tio̍h in chiū kám-siā Siōng-tè, koh-khah ū ióng-khì.
44028016	Goán kàu [Lô-má] liáu-āu, [Pó-lô] tit-tio̍h ún-chún kap kò͘-siú i ê peng lēng-gōa tòa.
44028017	Saⁿ ji̍t āu, [Pó-lô] chhiáⁿ tong-tōe [Iû-thài]-lâng ê léng-siù lâi. In chū-chi̍p ê sî, i tùi in kóng, “Kok ūi hiaⁿ-tī, góa sui-jiân bô chòe ûi-pōe tông-pau ê tāi-chì á-sī chó͘-sian ê kui-lē, m̄-kú tī [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] siū lia̍h, sàng-kau hō͘ [Lô-má] tong-kio̍k.
44028018	In sím-mn̄g góa, khòaⁿ góa bô hoān-tio̍h kai-sí ê chōe, ū siūⁿ-beh pàng góa;
44028019	put-kò [Iû-thài]-lâng hoán-tùi, góa chiah ko͘-put-chiong tùi hông-tè siōng-sò͘; kî-si̍t góa bô ì-sù beh khòng-kò ka-kī ê tông-pau.
44028020	In-ūi án-ni, góa chiah iau-kiû kap lín kìⁿ-bīn, kap lín tâm-lūn. Góa sī ūi-tio̍h [Í-sek-lia̍t]-lâng só͘ ǹg-bāng Hit-ūi chiah siū thih-liān liān-teh.”
44028021	In tùi i kóng, “Koan-hē lí ê tāi-chì, goán pèng bô tùi [Iû-thài] chiap-tio̍h phoe-sìn, mā bô hiaⁿ-tī lâi tùi goán pò-kò, á-sī kóng lí ê pháiⁿ-ōe.
44028022	Put-kò goán ài thiaⁿ lí ê kiàn-kái, in-ūi goán chai lín chit phài ê lâng tī ta̍k só͘-chāi hō͘ lâng hoán-tùi.”
44028023	In kap [Pó-lô] iok-tēng chi̍t ji̍t, kàu sî ū chin chōe lâng lâi [Pó-lô] só͘ tòa ê só͘-chāi. Tùi chá kàu àm, [Pó-lô] ūi-tio̍h Siōng-tè-kok chòe kiàn-chèng, ín-iōng [Mô͘-se] ê Lu̍t-hoat kap sian-ti ê chheh khǹg in sìn Iâ-so͘.
44028024	I só͘ kóng ê ōe ū lâng sìn, ū lâng m̄-sìn.
44028025	In tiong-kan ê ì-kiàn bô it-tì; in lī-khui í-chêng, [Pó-lô] kóng chit kù ōe: “Sèng Sîn thok sian-ti [Í-sài-a] tùi lín ê chó͘-sian kóng liáu chin tio̍h!
44028026	I kóng: Lí khì kā chit-ê chú-bîn kóng: Lín thiaⁿ koh thiaⁿ, mā lóng bōe liáu-kái; lín khòaⁿ koh khòaⁿ, mā lóng bōe khòaⁿ-kìⁿ.
44028027	In-ūi chit-ê chú-bîn ê sim tūn, hī-khang tāng, ba̍k-chiu pàng khoeh-khoeh. Nā m̄-sī án-ni, in ê ba̍k-chiu ōe khòaⁿ-kìⁿ, hī-khang ōe thiaⁿ-kìⁿ, sim ōe bêng-pe̍k, ōe hôe-sim tńg-ì, góa chiū kā in i-hó.
44028028	“Só͘-í, lín tio̍h chai, Siōng-tè chit-ê chín-kiù ê sìn-sit í-keng thoân hō͘ Gōa-pang-lâng. In ōe thiaⁿ-thàn!”
44028030	[Pó-lô] tòa tī ka-kī sè ê chhù chiok-chiok nn̄g nî kú. Lâi hóng-būn ê lâng, i lóng kā in chiap-thāi.
44028031	I hó-táⁿ soan-iông Siōng-tè-kok ê sìn-sit, koh kà-sī koan-hē Chú Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok ê sū, lóng bô siū chó͘-tòng.
45001001	Góa sī Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ ê lô͘-po̍k [Pó-lô], hōng Siōng-tè soán-tiàu choh sù-tô͘, te̍k-phài lâi thoân I ê hok-im.
45001002	Chit-ê hok-im sī Siōng-tè chá-chêng thong-kè I ê chèng sian-ti kì tī Sèng-keng ê èng-ún.
45001003	Chit-ê hok-im sī teh kóng-khí I ê Kiáⁿ lán ê Chú Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok: Tùi jîn-sèng lâi kóng, I sī [Tāi-pi̍t] ê hō͘-tāi;
45001004	tùi sèng-kiat ê sîn-sèng lâi kóng, Siōng-tè hō͘ I tùi sí-lâng tiong koh-oa̍h, ēng tōa lêng-le̍k hián-bêng I sī Siōng-tè ê Kiáⁿ.
45001005	Goán tùi I tit-tio̍h un-sù choh sù-tô͘, ūi-tio̍h Ki-tok ê miâ beh hō͘ bān-bîn sìn lâi sūn-thàn,
45001006	mā pau-hâm lín chiah-ê siū soán-tiàu kui-sio̍k Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok ê lâng.
45001007	Góa siá chit tiuⁿ phoe hō͘ lín só͘-ū tòa tī [Lô-má], Siōng-tè só͘ thiàⁿ,só͘ soán-tiàu choh I sìn-tô͘ ê lâng. Goān lán ê Pē Siōng-tè kap Chú Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok sù lín un-tián kap pêng-an!
45001008	Tāi-seng, góa thong-kè Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok ūi-tio̍h lín chèng-lâng kám-siā góa ê Siōng-tè, in-ūi lín ê sìn-tek í-keng thoân-piàn choân sè-kài.
45001009	Góa soan-iông I ê Kiáⁿ ê hok-im, ēng sim-lêng teh ho̍k-sāi hit-ūi Siōng-tè thang kā góa choh-chèng, góa siông-siông siàu-liām lín,
45001010	put-sî tī kî-tó tiong khún-kiû Siōng-tè chiàu I ê hó chí-ì kā góa khui-lō͘, hō͘ góa bô kú chiū ōe-tàng sūn-lī khì lín hia.
45001011	Góa chin ài kìⁿ lín, thang kap lín hun-hióng sio̍k-lêng ê un-sù, hō͘ lín kian-kiông;
45001012	chiū-sī góa kàu lín tiong-kan ê sî, lín thong-kè góa ê sìn-gióng, góa thong-kè lín ê sìn-gióng, thang hō͘-siōng tit-tio̍h kó͘-lē.
45001013	Hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, góa chin ài lín chai, góa chin chōe piàn kè-ōe beh khì lín hia, thang kap tī kî-tha Gōa-pang-lâng ê tiong-kan kâng-khoán, mā tī lín tiong-kan siu-sêng chi̍t-kóa ké-chí, m̄-kú kàu taⁿ iáu ū chó͘-tòng.
45001014	Bô-lūn sím-mi̍h khoán lâng, khai-hòa á-sī bī-khai-hòa ê, ū tì-hūi á-sī bô tì-hūi ê, góa lóng khiàm in ê chè.
45001015	Só͘-í, góa pek-chhiat ǹg-bāng mā ōe-tàng chiong hok-im thoân hō͘ lín tī [Lô-má] ê lâng.
45001016	Góa bô khòaⁿ hok-im chòe kiàn-siàu, in-ūi chit-ê hok-im sī Siōng-tè ê tōa lêng-le̍k, beh chín-kiù só͘-ū sìn ê lâng, tāi-seng [Iû-thài]-lâng, āu-lâi Gōa-pang-lâng.
45001017	In-ūi chit-ê hok-im ū khé-sī Siōng-tè ê gī, chit-ê gī tùi-thâu-kàu-bé lóng sī thong-kè sìn lâi tit-tio̍h. Chiàu Sèng-keng só͘ kì-chài, “Gī ê lâng ōe tùi sìn lâi oa̍h.”
45001018	Siōng-tè tùi thiⁿ-téng hoat-chhut siū-khì, khiàn-chek só͘-ū put-khiân put-gī ê lâng; in ê put-gī chó͘-tòng lâng bat chin-lí.
45001019	In-ūi Siōng-tè ū tùi in hián-bêng I pún-sin, só͘-í in eng-kai tùi Siōng-tè ū chheng-chhó ê jīm-sek chiah tio̍h.
45001020	Tùi chhòng-sè í-lâi, jio̍k-gán khòaⁿ bōe-tio̍h ê Siōng-tè éng-oán ê tōa lêng-le̍k kap sîn-sèng, thong-kè siū-chō ê mi̍h ōe-tàng chheng-chhó khòaⁿ-kìⁿ, só͘-í in lóng bōe-tàng the chek-jīm.
45001021	In-ūi in sui-jiân bat Siōng-tè ia̍h bô chun-tiōng I chòe Siōng-tè, mā bô kā I kám-siā; in ê su-siúⁿ hoán-tńg pìⁿ-chòe khang-khang, sim-su gû-gōng, chhiong-móa o͘-àm.
45001022	In chū-chheng chhong-bêng, kî-si̍t gû-gōng.
45001023	In bô chiong êng-kng kui hō͘ bōe-sí-bia̍t ê Siōng-tè, hoán-tńg khì pài ōe-sí-bia̍t ê lâng, pe-chiáu, khîm-siù, thâng-thōa téng ê siōng.
45001024	Só͘-í, Siōng-tè chhut-chāi in thàn ka-kī sim-lāi ê io̍k-bōng khì chòe bô chheng-khì ê tāi-chì, tì-kàu pí-chhú chau-that ka-kī ê sin-thé.
45001025	In ēng hu-ké thòe-ōaⁿ Siōng-tè ê chin-lí. In kèng-pài, ho̍k-sāi pī-chō-bu̍t, bô kèng-pài hit-ūi Chō-bu̍t-chú --- I chiah eng-kai éng-oán tit-tio̍h chheng-chàn. Amen!
45001026	In-ūi án-ni, Siōng-tè chhut-chāi in hòng-chhiòng thang kiàn-siàu ê jio̍k-io̍k: Cha-bó͘-lâng kap cha-bó͘-lâng ēng hoán chū-jiân ê sèng-koan-hē tāi-thòe kap ta-po͘-lâng chū-jiân ê koan-hē;
45001027	ta-po͘-lâng mā kâng-khoán pàng-sak kap cha-bó͘-lâng chū-jiân ê sèng-koan-hē, pí-chhú io̍k-hé kong-sim; ta-po͘-lâng kap ta-po͘-lâng chòe kiàn-siàu ê tāi-chì, kiat-kó tio̍h siū piàn-thài ê hêng-ûi kai siū ê pò-èng.
45001028	Kì-jiân in bô chin-chiàⁿ jīn-bat Siōng-tè, Siōng-tè chiū chhut-chāi in ê sim-su pāi-hoāi, khì chòe bô eng-kai chòe ê tāi-chì.
45001029	In chhiong-móa ta̍k khoán ê put-gī, pháiⁿ-sim, tham-sim, ok-to̍k, móa-sim oàn-tò͘, bô͘-sat, tò͘-cheng, kan-chà, im-bô͘, kóng ka-chiah-āu-ōe,
45001030	húi-pòng, oàn-hūn Siōng-tè, bú-bān Siōng-tè, kiau-ngō͘, khoa-kháu, chè-chō sī-hui, ngó͘-ge̍k pē-bú,
45001031	bô bêng-lí, bô siú-iok, bô chêng, bô lîn-bín.
45001032	In sui-jiân chai, chiàu Siōng-tè kong-gī ê phòaⁿ-toàn, chòe chiah-ê tāi-chì ê lâng eng-kai sí; in m̄-nā ka-kī chòe, sīm-chì mā chàn-sêng pa̍t-lâng án-ni chòe.
45002001	Só͘-í, lí chit-ê phoe-phòaⁿ lâng ê, bô-lūn lí sī sím-mi̍h-lâng lóng bōe-tàng piān-kái; lí phoe-phòaⁿ pa̍t-lâng sī teh phoe-phòaⁿ ka-kī, in-ūi lí phoe-phòaⁿ pa̍t-lâng chòe ê tāi-chì, ka-kī mā ta̍k hāng lóng khì chòe.
45002002	Lán chai, chòe chit khoán tāi-chì ê lâng, Siōng-tè ōe chiàu sū-si̍t kā in sím-phòaⁿ.
45002003	Lí chit-ê lâng, lí phoe-phòaⁿ pa̍t-lâng chòe chiah-ê tāi-chì, ka-kī mā khì chòe kâng-khoán ê tāi-chì, lí siūⁿ-kóng lí ōe-tàng siám-pī Siōng-tè ê sím-phòaⁿ sī-bô?
45002004	Á-sī kóng lí khòaⁿ-khin Siōng-tè ke̍k-tōa ê jîn-chû, khoan-iông, kap thun-lún. Lí kiám m̄-chai I ê jîn-chû sī beh chhōa lí hóe-kái?
45002005	Lí ngī-sim, m̄ hóe-kái, sī teh ūi-tio̍h ka-kī lúi-chek Siōng-tè ê siū-khì; chit-ê siū-khì ōe tī I kong-gī sím-phòaⁿ hit Ji̍t hián-bêng.
45002006	Siōng-tè ōe chiàu ta̍k lâng ê hêng-ûi kā in pò-èng.
45002007	Hiah-ê kian-chhî chòe hó-sū, tui-kiû êng-kng, chun-kùi, kap bōe-pāi-hoāi ê sìⁿ-miā ê lâng, Siōng-tè ōe sù in éng-oán ê oa̍h-miā.
45002008	Hiah-ê chū-su, bô chun-thàn chin-lí, khì thàn put-gī ê lâng, Siōng-tè ê siū-khì kap hêng-hoa̍t ōe lîm-kàu in.
45002009	Só͘-ū chòe pháiⁿ ê lâng ōe siū-tio̍h hoān-lān khùn-khó͘, tāi-seng sī [Iû-thài]-lâng, āu-lâi chiah Gōa-pang-lâng.
45002010	Put-kò só͘-ū chòe hó ê lâng ōe tit-tio̍h êng-kng, chun-kùi, kap pêng-an, tāi-seng sī [Iû-thài]-lâng, āu-lâi chiah Gōa-pang-lâng;
45002011	in-ūi Siōng-tè bô phian-thāi lâng.
45002012	Gōa-pang-lâng bô [Mô͘-se] ê Lu̍t-hoat, nā hoān-chōe mā ōe siū Lu̍t-hoat gōa ê sím-phòaⁿ lâi bia̍t-bông; [Iû-thài]-lâng ū [Mô͘-se] ê Lu̍t-hoat, nā hoān-chōe ōe chiàu Lu̍t-hoat siū sím-phòaⁿ.
45002013	In-ūi, m̄-sī thiaⁿ Lu̍t-hoat ê lâng tī Siōng-tè ê bīn-chêng sī gī-lâng, chí-ū si̍t-hêng Lu̍t-hoat ê lâng chiah ōe hō͘ Siōng-tè soan-phòaⁿ chòe gī-lâng.
45002014	Bô Lu̍t-hoat ê Gōa-pang-lâng nā chiàu pún-sèng chun-siú Lu̍t-hoat ê kui-tēng, in sui-jiân bô Lu̍t-hoat, ka-kī chiū-sī lu̍t-hoat;
45002015	in ê hêng-ûi piáu-sī Lu̍t-hoat ê iau-kiû ū khek tī in sim-lāi. In ê liông-sim mā chèng-si̍t, in ê sim-su ū-sî ka-kī chek-pī, ū-sî ka-kī piān-hō͘.
45002016	Án-ni, tī hit Ji̍t, chiàu góa só͘ thoân ê hok-im, Siōng-tè ōe thong-kè Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ lâi sím-phòaⁿ lâng ún-ba̍t ê sū.
45002017	Án-ni lí leh, lí chū-chheng [Iû-thài]-lâng, óa-khò Lu̍t-hoat, koh ēng Siōng-tè chòe khoa-kháu.
45002018	Lí bêng-pe̍k Siōng-tè ê chí-ì, ū siū-kè Lu̍t-hoat ê kàu-tō, ōe-hiáu hun-pia̍t sī-hui.
45002019	Lí chū-sìn ka-kī sī sit-bêng ê lâng ê chhōa-lō͘, o͘-àm tiong ê lâng ê kng,
45002020	gōng-lâng ê tō-su, iù-tī ê lâng ê lāu-su. Lí siūⁿ-kóng kì-jiân ū Lu̍t-hoat, tùi tì-sek kap chin-lí chiū ū pá-ak.
45002021	Lí kà-sī pa̍t-lâng, sī-án-chóaⁿ bô kà-sī ka-kī? Lí kà lâng m̄-thang thau-the̍h, ka-kī ū thau-the̍h bô?
45002022	Lí kóng m̄-thang hoān kan-îm, ka-kī ū hoān-tio̍h bô? Lí iàm-ò͘ⁿ ngó͘-siōng, ka-kī ū chhiúⁿ biō-sī?
45002023	Lí khoa-kháu ū Lu̍t-hoat, ka-kī ū hoān-hoat lâi bú-jio̍k Siōng-tè bô?
45002024	Sèng-keng ū kì-chài: “In-ūi lín ê iân-kò͘, Siōng-tè ê miâ tī Gōa-pang-lâng ê tiong-kan siū siat-to̍k.”
45002025	Lí nā chun-siú Lu̍t-hoat, kat-lé chiū ū kè-ta̍t; lí nā hoān-hoat, ū kat-lé pìⁿ-chòe bô kat-lé.
45002026	Bô siū kat-lé ê lâng nā chun-siú Lu̍t-hoat ê kui-tēng, bô siū kat-lé kiám bōe sǹg-chòe ū kat-lé?
45002027	Jio̍k-thé bô siū kat-lé m̄-kú ū chun-siú Lu̍t-hoat ê lâng ōe kā lí tēng-chōe, in-ūi lí ū Lu̍t-hoat ê tiâu-bûn koh siū kat-lé, m̄-kú tian-tò ûi-pōe Lu̍t-hoat.
45002028	Kî-si̍t, gōa-piáu choh [Iû-thài]-lâng ê m̄-sī chin-chiàⁿ ê [Iû-thài]-lâng; tī jio̍k-thé só͘ siū gōa-piáu ê kat-lé mā m̄-sī chin-chiàⁿ ê kat-lé.
45002029	Chin-chiàⁿ ê [Iû-thài]-lâng sī lōe-chāi ê; chin-chiàⁿ ê kat-lé sī sim ê kat-lé, sī Sèng Sîn ê chok-ûi, m̄-sī khò Lu̍t-hoat ê tiâu-bûn. Chit khoán lâng siū o-ló m̄-sī tùi lâng, sī tùi Siōng-tè.
45003001	Án-ni kóng, choh [Iû-thài]-lâng ū sím-mi̍h iu-tiám? Kat-lé ū sím-mi̍h lī-ek?
45003002	Tī ta̍k hong-bīn lóng ū chin chōe hó-chhù. Tē-it, Siōng-tè ū chiong I ê ōe kau-thok in.
45003003	In tiong-kan nā ū lâng bô sìn-si̍t, in ê bô sìn-si̍t kiám ōe hō͘ Siōng-tè ê sìn-si̍t pìⁿ-chòe bô-hāu?
45003004	Choa̍t-tùi bōe! Sīm-chì só͘-ū ê lâng lóng pe̍h-chha̍t, Siōng-tè ia̍h it-tēng sī chin-si̍t. Chiàu Sèng-keng só͘ kì-chài: Lí chek-pī ê sî, hián-chhut kong-gī; lí siū khòng-kò ê sî, ōe sèng-sò͘.
45003005	Put-kò, lán ê put-gī nā ōe-tàng hián-bêng Siōng-tè ê gī, lán ōe-tàng kóng sím-mi̍h? Góa chiàu lâng ê siūⁿ-hoat kóng, Siōng-tè tùi lán siū-khì sī put-gī sī-bô?
45003006	Choa̍t-tùi m̄-sī! Nā-sī, Siōng-tè ná ōe-tàng sím-phòaⁿ sè-kan?
45003007	Góa ê hu-ké nā ōe-tàng hō͘ Siōng-tè ê chin-si̍t koh-khah bêng-hián, hō͘ I koh-khah ū êng-kng, góa ná iáu hō͘ I soan-phòaⁿ chòe chōe-jîn?
45003008	Án-ni, ná m̄-kóng “Lán lâi chòe pháiⁿ hō͘ hó-sū si̍t-hiān”? Khak-si̍t ū lâng án-ni kóng lâi kā góa tiòng-siong, in eng-kai siū tēng-chōe.
45003009	Nā án-ni, lán [Iû-thài]-lâng kiám ū khah-iâⁿ Gōa-pang-lâng? Bô! In-ūi góa í-keng ū chí-chek [Iû-thài]-lâng kap Gōa-pang-lâng lóng siū chōe koán-hat.
45003010	Chiàu Sèng-keng só͘ kì-chài: Lóng bô gī-lâng, liân chi̍t ê to bô!
45003011	Bô hiáu-ngō͘ ê lâng; lóng bô-lâng chhē-kiû Siōng-tè.
45003012	Lâng lóng pōe-poān Siōng-tè, lóng kiâⁿ bê-lō͘; lóng bô-lâng chòe hó-sū, liân chi̍t ê to bô!
45003013	In ê nâ-âu chhin-chhiūⁿ khui-khui ê bōng; in ê chhùi-chi̍h kan-chà; in ê chhùi-tûn ū chôa ê to̍k.
45003014	In chhùi-lāi chhiong-móa ok-to̍k chiù-chó͘.
45003015	In cháu chin kín kip-beh thâi-lâng lâu-huih;
45003016	in cháu-kè ê lō͘ lóng ū húi-bia̍t pi-chhám.
45003017	Pêng-an ê lō͘ in m̄-bat,
45003018	tùi Siōng-tè, sim bô chûn kèng-ùi.
45003019	Taⁿ lán liáu-kái, Lu̍t-hoat it-chhè ê iau-kiû sī tùi tī Lu̍t-hoat-ē ê lâng kóng ê, hō͘ lâng lóng bōe-tàng piān-kái, hō͘ choân sè-kài lóng siū Siōng-tè sím-phòaⁿ.
45003020	Só͘-í bô-lâng khò siú Lu̍t-hoat ê tiâu-bûn ōe hō͘ Siōng-tè soan-phòaⁿ chòe gī-lâng; tùi Lu̍t-hoat, lâng chiah chai sím-mi̍h sī chōe.
45003021	Hiān-chāi, Siōng-tè í-keng kā lán chí-sī, lán m̄-bián khò Lu̍t-hoat ōe-tàng kap I kiàn-li̍p ha̍p-gî ê koan-hē. Lu̍t-hoat kap sian-ti lóng ūi-tio̍h che chòe kiàn-chèng.
45003022	Kap Siōng-tè kiàn-li̍p ha̍p-gî ê koan-hē sī thong-kè sìn Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok. Siōng-tè án-ni tùi-thāi só͘-ū sìn Ki-tok ê lâng, lóng bô chha-pia̍t.
45003023	In-ūi só͘-ū ê lâng lóng hoān-chōe, tì-kàu Siōng-tè ê êng-kng tit bōe-tio̍h;
45003024	put-kò, tùi Siōng-tè só͘ sù pe̍h-pe̍h ê un-tián, thong-kè Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ oân-sêng ê kiù-sio̍k, lâng thang kap Siōng-tè ū ha̍p-gî ê koan-hē.
45003025	Siōng-tè hiàn Iâ-so͘ choh sio̍k-chōe-chè, thong-kè I ê sí, hō͘ lâng tùi sìn lâi tit-tio̍h sià-chōe. Siōng-tè ēng án-ni lâi hián-bêng I ê gī. Tī kè-khì, I ēng nāi-sim tùi-thāi lâng, khoan-iông in chêng só͘ hoān ê chōe,
45003026	beh tī hiān-kim chit-ê sî hián-bêng I ka-kī sī gī, koh hō͘ sìn Iâ-so͘ ê lâng kap I ū ha̍p-gî ê koan-hē.
45003027	Nā án-ni, lán iáu ū sím-mi̍h thang khoa-kháu? Lóng bô! Khò sím-mi̍h hoat-chek? Khò hêng-ûi sī-bô? M̄-sī! Sī khò sìn ê hoat-chek.
45003028	Só͘-í, goán jīn-tēng, lâng kap Siōng-tè kiàn-li̍p ha̍p-gî ê koan-hē, m̄-sī khò siú Lu̍t-hoat ê hêng-ûi, chí-ū tùi sìn.
45003029	Siōng-tè kiám chí-ū sī [Iû-thài]-lâng ê Siōng-tè? I kiám m̄-sī Gōa-pang-lâng ê Siōng-tè? Sī, I mā-sī Gōa-pang-lâng ê Siōng-tè.
45003030	Kì-jiân Siōng-tè chí-ū chi̍t ūi, I hō͘ siū kat-lé ê [Iû-thài]-lâng tùi sìn lâi kap I kiàn-li̍p ha̍p-gî ê koan-hē, mā hō͘ bô siū kat-lé ê Gōa-pang-lâng tùi sìn lâi kap I kiàn-li̍p ha̍p-gî ê koan-hē.
45003031	Án-ni kóng, lán in-ūi chit-ê sìn soah hō͘ Lu̍t-hoat sit-khì hāu-le̍k sī-bô? Choa̍t-tùi m̄-sī! Lán tian-tò sī teh khak-li̍p Lu̍t-hoat.
45004001	Án-ni, koan-hē goán hiat-thóng ê chó͘-sian [A-pek-la-hán], lán beh kóng sím-mi̍h?
45004002	[A-pek-la-hán] nā-sī tùi hêng-ûi siū chheng-chòe gī-lâng, i chiū ū thang khoa-kháu, m̄-kú tùi Siōng-tè khòaⁿ, i bô thang khoa-kháu.
45004003	In-ūi Sèng-keng ū kì-chài: “[A-pek-la-hán] sìn Siōng-tè, in-ūi án-ni, Siōng-tè chiū sǹg i chòe gī.”
45004004	Lâng chòe-kang tit-tio̍h kang-chîⁿ bô sǹg un-tián, sī eng-kai ê.
45004005	M̄-kú bô khò hêng-ûi, chí-ū sìn soan-phòaⁿ chōe-jîn chòe bô chōe ê Siōng-tè ê lâng, i in-ūi ū chit-ê sìn, Siōng-tè chiū kā i sǹg-chòe gī.
45004006	[Tāi-pi̍t] mā ū kóng-khí bô khò hêng-ûi hō͘ Siōng-tè kā i sǹg-chòe gī ê lâng ū hok-khì. I kóng:
45004007	Kè-sit tit-tio̍h sià-bián, chōe-kò tit-tio̍h khoan-sià ê, chit khoán lâng chin ū hok-khì!
45004008	Chú bô kā i tēng-chōe ê, chit khoán lâng chin ū hok-khì!
45004009	Án-ni, chit-ê hok-khì chí-ū hō͘ siū kat-lé ê lâng sī-bô? M̄-sī, mā hō͘ bô siū kat-lé ê lâng. In-ūi góa í-keng ū kóng, “[A-pek-la-hán] sìn Siōng-tè, Siōng-tè chiū kā i sǹg-chòe gī.”
45004010	Sī án-chóaⁿ sǹg? Sī i siū kat-lé í-chêng, á-sī í-āu? Sī kat-lé í-chêng, m̄-sī kat-lé í-āu.
45004011	Āu-lâi i ū siū kat-lé; chit-ê kat-lé sī chi̍t chióng kì-hō, ìn-chèng i iáu-bē siū kat-lé í-chêng chiū tùi sìn hō͘ Siōng-tè chiap-la̍p chòe gī-lâng. Hiah-ê bô siū kat-lé ê lâng in-ūi sìn, Siōng-tè ū chiap-la̍p in chòe gī-lâng, thang hō͘ [A-pek-la-hán] choh hiah-ê bô siū kat-lé ê sìn-tô͘ ê chó͘-sian.
45004012	I mā-sī siū kat-lé ê lâng ê chó͘-sian; in m̄-nā siū kat-lé, mā ū chiàu goán ê chó͘-sian [A-pek-la-hán] siū kat-lé í-chêng sìn-sim ê bô͘-hoān teh seng-oa̍h.
45004013	Siōng-tè èng-ún [A-pek-la-hán] kap i ê kiáⁿ-sun beh hō͘ in sêng-siū sè-kài chòe sán-gia̍p; chit-ê èng-ún m̄-sī thong-kè Lu̍t-hoat, sī thong-kè sìn lâi tit-tio̍h ê gī.
45004014	Nā chun-siú Lu̍t-hoat ê lâng chiah ōe-tàng sêng-siū Siōng-tè ê èng-ún, sìn chiū khang-khang, èng-ún mā bô lō͘-ēng.
45004015	Lu̍t-hoat ōe jiá-khí Siōng-tè ê siū-khì; bô Lu̍t-hoat chiū bô ûi-hoat.
45004016	In-ūi án-ni, èng-ún sī ēng sìn chòe kun-kù, beh pó-chèng èng-ún sī chhut-tī Siōng-tè pe̍h-pe̍h ê un-tián, hō͘ [A-pek-la-hán] só͘-ū ê kiáⁿ-sun, m̄-nā ū siū kat-lé ê lâng, mā pau-hâm hiah-ê kap [A-pek-la-hán] siâng-khoán ū sìn Siōng-tè ê lâng. I sī lán chèng-lâng ê chó͘-sian,
45004017	chiàu Sèng-keng só͘ kì-chài: “Góa ū hō͘ lí choh bān-bîn ê chó͘-sian.” Chit-ê èng-ún tī Siōng-tè bīn-chêng ū-hāu. [A-pek-la-hán] sìn chit-ūi hō͘ sí-lâng koh-oa̍h, koh tùi bô chhòng-chō ū ê Siōng-tè.
45004018	I tī bô thang ǹg-bāng ê sî iáu khǹg ǹg-bāng, sìn kóng i ōe chiâⁿ-chòe bān-bîn ê chó͘-sian, chiàu só͘ èng-ún ê ōe kóng, “Lí it-tēng ū chin chōe kiáⁿ-sun.”
45004019	I í-keng chiâⁿ-pah hè, siūⁿ-tio̍h ka-kī ê seng-khu ná chhin-chhiūⁿ sí-khì, [Sa-la] ia̍h í-keng bōe siⁿ-kiáⁿ, m̄-kú [A-pek-la-hán] bô in-ūi án-ni sit-khì sìn-sim.
45004020	I tùi Siōng-tè ê èng-ún bô hoâi-gî, sìn-sim hoán-tńg ná kian-tēng, chiong êng-kng kui hō͘ Siōng-tè.
45004021	I khak-sìn Siōng-tè it-tēng ōe si̍t-hiān ka-kī ê èng-ún.
45004022	Só͘-í, [A-pek-la-hán] in-ūi sìn hō͘ Siōng-tè kā i sǹg-chòe gī.
45004023	M̄-kú, “Kā i sǹg-chòe gī” chit kù ōe m̄-sī kan-ta ūi-tio̍h i,
45004024	mā-sī ūi-tio̍h lán chiah-ê lâng siá ê, in-ūi lán ū sìn Siōng-tè hō͘ lán ê Chú Iâ-so͘ tùi sí-lâng tiong koh-oa̍h, lán mā ōe siū sǹg-chòe gī.
45004025	Ūi-tio̍h lán ê chōe-kò, Siōng-tè chiong Chú Iâ-so͘ kau hō͘ lâng hāi-sí, koh ūi-tio̍h beh hō͘ lán kap Siōng-tè ū ha̍p-gî ê koan-hē, Siōng-tè ū hō͘ I koh-oa̍h.
45005001	Kì-jiân, lán tùi sìn siū chheng-chòe gī-lâng, chiū thong-kè lán ê Chú Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok kap Siōng-tè ū hô-bo̍k ê koan-hē.
45005002	Lán tùi sìn, thong-kè Ki-tok thang chìn-ji̍p hiān-chāi teh hióng-siū chit-ê un-tián, hoaⁿ-hoaⁿ hí-hí ǹg-bāng thang hun-hióng Siōng-tè ê êng-kng.
45005003	M̄-nā án-ni, tī hoān-lān tiong, lán iû-goân hoaⁿ-hoaⁿ hí-hí, in-ūi lán chai, hoān-lān siⁿ-chhut jím-nāi,
45005004	jím-nāi siⁿ-chhut láu-liān, láu-liān siⁿ-chhut ǹg-bāng,
45005005	ǹg-bāng bōe tì-kàu sit-bāng kiàn-siàu, in-ūi Siōng-tè thong-kè sù hō͘ lán ê Sèng Sîn chiong I ê thiàⁿ koàn-ji̍p lán ê sim.
45005006	Lán iáu loán-jio̍k ê sî, Ki-tok tī Siōng-tè só͘ chí-tēng ê ji̍t-chí ūi-tio̍h ū chōe ê lâng sí.
45005007	Thòe gī-lâng sí, chha-put-to bô; thòe hó-lâng sí, kiám-chhái iáu ū lâng káⁿ.
45005008	Put-kò Siōng-tè tùi lán chèng-bêng I thiàⁿ lán, lán iáu sī chōe-jîn ê sî, Ki-tok ū thòe lán sí.
45005009	Hiān-chāi Ki-tok í-keng ūi-tio̍h lán lâu-huih hi-seng, hō͘ lán kap Siōng-tè ū ha̍p-gî ê koan-hē, I koh-khah ōe kiù lán thoat-lī Siōng-tè ê siū-khì.
45005010	In-ūi, lán iáu-kú choh Siōng-tè tùi-te̍k ê sî, I hō͘ ka-kī ê Kiáⁿ thòe lán sí, hō͘ lán kap I koh hô-hó. Kì-jiân koh hô-hó, lán koh-khah ōe in-ūi Ki-tok ê oa̍h lâi tit-tio̍h chín-kiù.
45005011	M̄-nā án-ni, lán hiān-chāi í-keng thong-kè Ki-tok kap Siōng-tè koh hô-hó, mā ōe thong-kè lán ê Chú Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok ēng Siōng-tè chòe khoa-kháu.
45005012	Chōe tùi chi̍t ê lâng chìn-ji̍p sè-kan, sí mā tè ji̍p-lâi; kiat-kó, só͘-ū ê lâng lóng ōe sí, in-ūi só͘-ū ê lâng lóng ū hoān-chōe.
45005013	Iáu-bē ū Lu̍t-hoat í-chêng, chōe í-keng tī sè-kan; put-kò bô Lu̍t-hoat, chōe chiū bô sǹg-chòe chōe.
45005014	M̄-kú tùi [A-tong] kàu [Mô͘-se] hit tōaⁿ kî-kan, sí teh chi-phòe choân jîn-lūi, liân bô hoān-tio̍h A-tong só͘ hoān ê kè-sit ê lâng mā tio̍h sí. [A-tong] sī teh-beh lâi Hit-ūi ê ū-piáu.
45005015	Put-kò [A-tong] ê kè-sit kap Siōng-tè pe̍h-pe̍h ê un-sù bōe pí-tit. In-ūi, nā tùi chi̍t ê lâng ê chōe-kò chèng-lâng lóng tio̍h sí, Siōng-tè ê un-tián, chiū-sī I thong-kè Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok chi̍t ê lâng pe̍h-pe̍h sù hō͘ chèng-lâng ê un-sù, it-tēng koh-khah hong-hù!
45005016	Chi̍t ê lâng só͘ hoān ê chōe kap Siōng-tè pe̍h-pe̍h ê un-sù bōe pí-tit. Chiàu sím-phòaⁿ, liân chi̍t piàn ê kè-sit mā soan-phòaⁿ “Ū chōe”; m̄-kú chiàu pe̍h-pe̍h ê un-sù, chōe-chōe piàn ê kè-sit mā soan-phòaⁿ “Bô-chōe”.
45005017	Nā in-ūi chi̍t ê lâng ê kè-sit, sí thong-kè chit chi̍t ê lâng chi-phòe jîn-lūi, án-ni, Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok chi̍t ê lâng só͘ sêng-chiū ê it-tēng koh-khah tōa; só͘-ū niá-siū Siōng-tè hong-hù ê un-tián, chiū-sī pe̍h-pe̍h hō͘ Siōng-tè soan-phòaⁿ bô-chōe ê lâng, ōe-tàng thong-kè Ki-tok lâi chi-phòe ka-kī ê sìⁿ-miā.
45005018	In-ūi chi̍t ê lâng hoān-chōe, chèng-lâng lóng siū tēng-chōe; kâng-khoán, in-ūi chi̍t ê lâng gī ê hêng-ûi, chèng-lâng lóng siū phòaⁿ bô-chōe lâi tit-tio̍h oa̍h.
45005019	In-ūi chi̍t ê lâng pōe-ge̍k, chèng-lâng lóng chiâⁿ-chòe chōe-jîn; kâng-khoán, chi̍t ê lâng sūn-ho̍k, chèng-lâng lóng chiâⁿ-chòe gī-lâng.
45005020	Lu̍t-hoat ê chè-tēng hō͘ chōe-kò ke-thiⁿ; m̄-kú chōe ke-thiⁿ, Siōng-tè ê un-tián koh-khah ke-thiⁿ.
45005021	Án-ni, chōe thong-kè sí lâi chi-phòe, Siōng-tè ê un-tián sī thong-kè gī lâi chi-phòe, hō͘ lán tùi lán ê Chú Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok tit-tio̍h éng-oán ê oa̍h-miā.
45006001	Án-ni, lán beh kóng sím-mi̍h? Lán tio̍h kè-sio̍k tī chōe-ok tiong seng-oa̍h thang hō͘ un-tián koh-khah ke-thiⁿ sī-bô?
45006002	Choa̍t-tùi m̄-sī! Lán chiah-ê ǹg chōe í-keng sí ê lâng kiám thang kè-sio̍k tī chōe-ok tiong seng-oa̍h?
45006003	Lín kiám m̄-chai, lán lóng siū sóe-lé lâi kap Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ kiat-ha̍p, sī siū sóe-lé lâi kap I sí?
45006004	Kì-jiân lán thong-kè sóe-lé kap I sí, tâng bâi-chòng, só͘-í, chhin-chhiūⁿ Ki-tok thong-kè Thiⁿ-pē êng-kng ê koân-lêng tùi sí koh-oa̍h, lán mā tio̍h kè sin ê seng-oa̍h.
45006005	Kì-jiân lán kap Ki-tok chiâⁿ-chòe chi̍t-thé lâi keng-giām I ê sí, lán it-tēng mā ōe kap I kiat-ha̍p lâi koh-oa̍h.
45006006	Lán chai, lán kū ê chū-ngó͘ í-keng kap Ki-tok chòe-hé tèng si̍p-jī-kè, sī beh hō͘ siū chōe khu-sok hit-ê kū ê lâng húi-bia̍t, hō͘ lán bô koh chòe chōe ê lô͘-lē.
45006007	In-ūi lâng it-tàn sí-khì chiū tùi chōe tit-tio̍h tháu-pàng.
45006008	Kì-jiân lán í-keng kap Ki-tok chòe-hé sí, lán siong-sìn lán mā ōe kap I chòe-hé oa̍h.
45006009	Lán chai Ki-tok í-keng tùi sí-lâng tiong koh-oa̍h, bōe-koh sí, sí bōe-koh chi-phòe I.
45006010	In-ūi I ū sí, chi̍t piàn chiū oân-choân kā chōe chè-ap; I hiān-chāi teh oa̍h, sī ūi-tio̍h Siōng-tè teh oa̍h.
45006011	Án-ni, lín mā tio̍h khòaⁿ ka-kī í-keng kap chōe toān-choa̍t koan-hē, kap Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ kiat-ha̍p, ūi-tio̍h Siōng-tè teh oa̍h.
45006012	Só͘-í, m̄-thang chiong lín ōe-sí ê seng-khu kau hō͘ chōe chi-phòe, khì sūn-thàn pún-sèng ê io̍k-bōng.
45006013	Mā m̄-thang chiong seng-khu ê chi-thé kau hō͘ chōe khì chòe put-gī ê kang-khū. Hoán-tńg tio̍h chòe chi̍t ê tùi sí-lâng tiong koh-oa̍h ê lâng, chiong ka-kī hiàn hō͘ Siōng-tè, chiong seng-khu ê kok chi-thé hiàn hō͘ I chòe gī ê kang-khū.
45006014	M̄-thang hō͘ chōe kā lín chi-phòe, in-ūi lín m̄-sī oa̍h tī Lu̍t-hoat-ē, sī oa̍h tī un-tián-ē.
45006015	Nā án-ni, in-ūi lán m̄-sī tī Lu̍t-hoat-ē, sī tī un-tián-ē, lán chiū thang hoān-chōe sī-bô? Choa̍t-tùi m̄-thang!
45006016	Kiám m̄-chai lín nā chiong ka-kī kau hō͘ bó͘-lâng choh lô͘-lē sūn-thàn i, lín chiū-sī hit-ê lâng ê lô͘-lē; án-ni kóng, lín sī choh chōe ê lô͘-lē tì-kàu sí, á-sī choh Siōng-tè ê lô͘-lē sūn-thàn I tì-kàu kap I ū ha̍p-gî ê koan-hē?
45006017	Kám-siā Siōng-tè, sui-jiân lín bat choh chōe ê lô͘-lē, hiān-chāi í-keng tùi sim-tóe sūn-thàn hit-ê thoân-siū hō͘ lín chòe tián-hoān ê kà-sī.
45006018	Lín í-keng tùi chōe tit-tio̍h tháu-pàng, chiâⁿ-chòe gī ê lô͘-lē.
45006019	Kiaⁿ-liáu lín bōe liáu-kái, góa ēng it-poaⁿ-lâng ê ōe kā lín kóng. Chhin-chhiūⁿ lín í-chêng bat chiong seng-khu oân-choân kau hō͘ ù-òe kap put-hoat, hō͘ put-hoat ke-thiⁿ, hiān-chāi lín tio̍h chiong lín seng-khu ê ta̍k pō͘-hūn hiàn hō͘ gī chòe sèng-kiat ê lō͘-ēng.
45006020	Lín choh chōe ê lô͘-lē hit sî, lín bô siū gī iok-sok.
45006021	Hit sî lín chòe hiān-chāi khòaⁿ-chòe kiàn-siàu ê tāi-chì, kiat-kó sī án-chóaⁿ? Kiat-kio̍k sī sí.
45006022	Hiān-chāi lín í-keng tùi chōe tit-tio̍h tháu-pàng, chiâⁿ-chòe Siōng-tè ê lô͘-lē, hit-ê kiat-kó sī chiâⁿ-chòe sèng-kiat; kiat-kio̍k sī éng-oán ê oa̍h-miā.
45006023	In-ūi chōe ê tāi-kè sī sí, m̄-kú Siōng-tè thong-kè lán ê Chú Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ pe̍h-pe̍h sù hō͘ lán ê un-tián sī éng-oán ê oa̍h-miā.
45007001	Hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, góa sī tùi lín bat Lu̍t-hoat ê lâng teh kóng, lín kiám m̄-chai, lâng oa̍h-teh ê sî chiah siū Lu̍t-hoat iok-sok?
45007002	Kú chi̍t ê lē lâi kóng, kiat-hun ê hū-jîn-lâng, tiōng-hu iáu oa̍h-teh chiū siū Lu̍t-hoat iok-sok kui-sio̍k tiōng-hu; tiōng-hu nā sí chiū bô koh siū chit-ê Lu̍t-hoat iok-sok.
45007003	Só͘-í, tiōng-hu iáu oa̍h-teh, hū-jîn-lâng nā kap pa̍t ê ta-po͘-lâng chòe-hé tòa, ōe hō͘ lâng kiò-chòe îm-hū; tiōng-hu nā sí, i chiū bô siū chit-ê Lu̍t-hoat iok-sok, i kap pa̍t ê ta-po͘-lâng chòe-hé tòa mā m̄-sī îm-hū.
45007004	Góa ê hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, chhin-chhiūⁿ án-ni, lín kap Ki-tok ê seng-khu kiat-ha̍p kap I tâng-sí, í-keng kap Lu̍t-hoat toān-choa̍t koan-hē, bô siū iok-sok, ōe-tàng kui-sio̍k pa̍t-lâng, chiū-sī hit-ūi tùi sí-lâng tiong koh-oa̍h ê Ki-tok, hō͘ lán thang ūi-tio̍h Siōng-tè kiat ké-chí.
45007005	Lán chiàu lâng jio̍k-thé ê pún-sèng teh oa̍h ê sî, lán hoān-chōe ê io̍k-liām siū Lu̍t-hoat kek-khí, tī lán seng-khu ê kok chi-thé ūn-chok, kiat sí-bông ê ké-chí.
45007006	M̄-kú, hiān-chāi lán í-keng thoat-lī Lu̍t-hoat, kap hit-ê sok-pa̍k lán ê toān-choa̍t koan-hē. Án-ni, lán ho̍k-sāi Siōng-tè, m̄-sī chiàu Lu̍t-hoat ê kū hong-sek, sī chiàu Sèng Sîn ê sin hong-sek.
45007007	Án-ni, lán beh kóng sím-mi̍h? Lu̍t-hoat sī chōe sī-bô? Choa̍t-tùi m̄-sī! Put-kò nā bô Lu̍t-hoat, góa chiū m̄-chai sím-mi̍h sī chōe. Lu̍t-hoat nā bô kóng “M̄-thang tham-sim”, góa chiū m̄-chai sím-mi̍h sī tham-sim.
45007008	Chōe lī-iōng kài-bēng chhē ki-hōe tī góa sim-lāi ín-khí ta̍k khoán ê tham-sim. Bô Lu̍t-hoat, chōe chiū bô chok-iōng.
45007009	Í-chêng bô Lu̍t-hoat, góa mā teh oa̍h; kài-bēng chi̍t-ē lâi, chōe oa̍h khí-lâi, góa chiū sí-khì.
45007010	Tùi góa lâi kóng, pún-lâi beh hō͘ lâng oa̍h ê kài-bēng, tian-tò hō͘ lâng sí.
45007011	In-ūi chōe lī-iōng kài-bēng chhē ki-hōe khi-phiàn góa, mā lī-iōng kài-bēng hāi-sí góa.
45007012	Só͘-í, Lu̍t-hoat sī sîn-sèng; kài-bēng mā-sī sîn-sèng, kong-chèng, koh liông-siān.
45007013	Nā án-ni kóng, hit-ê liông-siān-ê hāi-sí góa sī-bô? Choa̍t-tùi m̄-sī! Sī chōe lī-iōng hit-ê liông-siān-ê hāi-sí góa, hō͘ chōe-ok ê pún-chit hián-lō͘; án-ni, chōe lī-iōng kài-bēng hō͘ i ke̍k-kî ok-to̍k ê pún-chit koh-khah hián-lō͘ chhut-lâi.
45007014	Lán chai, Lu̍t-hoat sī sio̍k-lêng-ê, m̄-kú góa sī sio̍k jio̍k-thé-ê, í-keng chhut-bōe hō͘ chōe choh lô͘-lē.
45007015	Góa bô bêng-pe̍k ka-kī ê só͘-chòe; in-ūi góa ài chòe ê, bô khì chòe; góa bô ài chòe ê, tian-tò khì chòe.
45007016	Góa nā chòe góa bô ài chòe ê, chiū-sī chàn-sêng Lu̍t-hoat sī hó.
45007017	Án-ni, teh chòe góa bô ài chòe ê m̄-sī góa, sī tiàm tī góa lāi-bīn ê chōe.
45007018	Góa chai, tī góa jio̍k-thé lāi-bīn bô liông-siān; góa ū chòe hó ê ì-goān, m̄-kú bô chòe hó ê khùi-la̍t.
45007019	Só͘ ì-ài ê hó, góa bô khì chòe, bô ì-ài ê pháiⁿ, góa tian-tò khì chòe.
45007020	Góa nā chòe góa bô ì-ài ê, chiū m̄-sī góa pún-sin teh chòe, sī tiàm tī góa lāi-bīn ê chōe teh chòe.
45007021	Án-ni, góa ū hoat-hiān chi̍t ê hoat-chek, chiū-sī, góa siūⁿ-beh chòe hó ê sî, pháiⁿ kā góa tîⁿ-teh.
45007022	Góa lāi-bīn ê hit-ê lâng ì-ài Siōng-tè ê Lu̍t-hoat,
45007023	m̄-kú góa khòaⁿ, tī góa ê seng-khu ū lēng-gōa chi̍t ê hoat-chek kap góa sim-su ê hoat-chek teh kau-chiàn, lia̍h góa chòe siû-hoān lâi hâng-ho̍k góa seng-khu lāi-bīn ê chōe ê hoat-chek.
45007024	Góa chit-ê lâng ū kàu chhiⁿ-chhám! Sím-mi̍h lâng ōe-tàng kiù góa thoat-lī chit-ê tì-kàu sí ê seng-khu?
45007025	Kám-siā Siōng-tè, thong-kè lán ê Chú Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok I ū kiù góa! Án-ni, góa ê chhù-kéng, chi̍t hong-bīn sī ēng sim-su sūn-ho̍k Siōng-tè ê Lu̍t-hoat, lēng-gōa chi̍t hong-bīn sī ēng jio̍k-thé sūn-ho̍k chōe ê hoat-chek.
45008001	Án-ni hiah-ê kap Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ kiat-liân ê lâng chiū bô siū tēng-chōe.
45008002	In-ūi, thong-kè Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ hit-ê sù oa̍h-miā ê Sèng Sîn ê hoat-chek í-keng ū tháu-pàng lán thoat-lī chōe kap sí ê hoat-chek.
45008003	In-ūi lâng jio̍k-thé ê pún-sèng loán-jio̍k, Lu̍t-hoat chòe bōe-kàu ê, Siōng-tè ū chòe-chiâⁿ: I chhe ka-kī ê Kiáⁿ chhú kap lâng kâng-khoán ōe hoān-chōe ê pún-sèng, soan-phòaⁿ lâng pún-sèng ê chōe chòe ū chōe, lâi kái-koat chōe.
45008004	Siōng-tè án-ni chòe, sī beh hō͘ Lu̍t-hoat chèng-tong ê iau-kiû ōe-tàng si̍t-hiān tī lán chiah-ê bô chiàu pún-sèng, sī chiàu Sèng Sîn ê ín-chhōa teh seng-oa̍h ê lâng.
45008005	In-ūi sūn-thàn pún-sèng ê lâng ì-hiòng pún-sèng ê sū; m̄-kú sūn-thàn Sèng Sîn ê lâng ì-hiòng Sèng Sîn ê sū.
45008006	Ì-hiòng pún-sèng, kiat-kó sī sí; ì-hiòng Sèng Sîn, ōe tit-tio̍h oa̍h-miā kap hô-bo̍k.
45008007	Án-ni, ì-hiòng pún-sèng sī tí-te̍k Siōng-tè, in-ūi bô sūn-ho̍k Siōng-tè ê Lu̍t-hoat; kî-si̍t mā bô hoat-tō͘ sūn-ho̍k.
45008008	Sūn-ho̍k pún-sèng ê lâng bōe-tàng hō͘ Siōng-tè hoaⁿ-hí.
45008009	Kì-jiân Siōng-tè ê Sîn ū tiàm tī lín lāi-bīn, lín chiū m̄-sī sio̍k pún-sèng, sī sio̍k Sèng Sîn. Lâng nā bô Ki-tok ê Sîn chiū bô sio̍k Ki-tok.
45008010	Ki-tok nā tiàm tī lín lāi-bīn, sui-jiân lín ê seng-khu in-ūi chōe sí, Siōng-tè ê Sîn ōe hō͘ lín oa̍h, in-ūi lín í-keng kap Siōng-tè ū ha̍p-gî ê koan-hē.
45008011	Hō͘ Iâ-so͘ tùi sí-lâng tiong koh-oa̍h ê Siōng-tè ê Sîn nā tiàm tī lín lāi-bīn, chiū-sī hō͘ Ki-tok tùi sí-lâng tiong koh-oa̍h ê Siōng-tè thong-kè tiàm tī lín lāi-bīn ê Sèng Sîn, ōe hō͘ lín tì-kàu sí ê seng-khu tit-tio̍h oa̍h-miā.
45008012	Hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, án-ni khòaⁿ, lán ū khiàm-chè, put-kò m̄-sī khiàm pún-sèng ê chè thàn pún-sèng teh oa̍h.
45008013	Lín nā thàn pún-sèng oa̍h ōe tì-kàu sí; lín nā khò Sèng Sîn tû-bia̍t jio̍k-io̍k ê hêng-ûi chiū ōe oa̍h.
45008014	Hō͘ Siōng-tè ê Sîn ín-chhōa ê lâng lóng sī Siōng-tè ê kiáⁿ-jî.
45008015	In-ūi lín tùi Siōng-tè niá-siū ê Sèng Sîn m̄-sī beh hō͘ lín koh tò tńg-khì choh lô͘-lē, iáu seng-oa̍h tī kiaⁿ-hiâⁿ tiong; lín niá-siū ê Sèng Sîn sī beh hō͘ lín chiâⁿ-chòe Siōng-tè ê kiáⁿ-jî; khò chit-ūi Sèng Sîn lán thang tōa-siaⁿ kiò, “A-pa! Pē ah!”
45008016	Sèng Sîn pún-sin kap lán ê sîn chòe-hé choh-chèng, kóng lán sī Siōng-tè ê kiáⁿ-jî.
45008017	Kì-jiân lán sī kiáⁿ-jî, chiū-sī kè-sêng-jîn, sī Siōng-tè ê kè-sêng-jîn, kap Ki-tok pîⁿ-pîⁿ choh kè-sêng-jîn. Kì-jiân lán kap Ki-tok tâng siū-khó͘, sī beh hō͘ lán mā kap I tâng siū êng-kng.
45008018	Góa siūⁿ, hiān-kim chit-ê sî ê khó͘-lān kap chiong-lâi teh-beh tùi lán hián-hiān ê êng-kng bōe pí-tit.
45008019	Pī-chō-bu̍t pek-chhiat teh thèng-hāu Siōng-tè chèng kiáⁿ-jî ê hián-hiān.
45008020	In-ūi pī-chō-bu̍t bōe-tàng ta̍t-kàu siū-chō ê bo̍k-te̍k, m̄-sī chhut tī in ê pún-ì, sī Siōng-tè ê chí-ì. Put-kò pī-chō-bu̍t iáu teh ǹg-bāng,
45008021	ū chi̍t ji̍t in pún-sin mā ōe siū tháu-pàng lâi thoat-lī ōe pāi-hoāi ê khu-sok, thang kap Siōng-tè ê kiáⁿ-jî hun-hióng êng-kng ê chū-iû.
45008022	Lán chai, só͘-ū pī-chō-bu̍t kàu hiān-chāi iáu chòe-hé teh thòng-khó͘ ai-kiò, chòe-hé keng-giām chhui-chūn ê khó͘-thàng.
45008023	M̄-nā pī-chō-bu̍t, liân lán chiah-ê tit-tio̍h Sèng Sîn choh thâu-chúi ê ké-chí-ê mā teh thó͘-khùi thèng-hāu Siōng-tè chiap-la̍p lán choh I ê kiáⁿ-jî, hō͘ lán kui-ê lâng lóng tit-tio̍h sio̍k-hôe.
45008024	In-ūi lán khò chit khoán ǹg-bāng tit-tio̍h kiù. Khòaⁿ-ōe-tio̍h ê ǹg-bāng m̄-sī ǹg-bāng. Khòaⁿ-ōe-tio̍h-ê ná-tio̍h ǹg-bāng?
45008025	Lán nā ǹg-bāng hit-ê khòaⁿ-bōe-tio̍h-ê chiū ōe jím-nāi thèng-hāu.
45008026	Chhin-chhiūⁿ án-ni, lán loán-jio̍k ê sî Sèng Sîn mā ū teh kā lán hû-chhî; in-ūi lán m̄-chai tio̍h án-chóaⁿ kî-tó, m̄-kú Sèng Sîn ka-kī ēng ōe bōe-tàng piáu-ta̍t ê thó͘-khùi thòe lán kî-kiû.
45008027	Liáu-kái lâng lāi-sim ê Siōng-tè bêng-pe̍k Sèng Sîn ê ì-sù, in-ūi Sèng Sîn chiàu Siōng-tè ê chí-ì thòe sìn-tô͘ kî-kiû.
