45008028	Lán chai, bān-hāng sū hō͘-siōng ūn-chok, hō͘ hiah-ê thiàⁿ Siōng-tè ê lâng, chiū-sī chiàu I ka-kī ê chí-ì soán-tiàu ê, lóng ū lī-ek.
45008029	In-ūi Siōng-tè ū-sian bat ê lâng, mā ū-sian koat-tēng hō͘ in kap I ê Kiáⁿ ê hêng-siōng saⁿ-tâng, thang hō͘ I ê Kiáⁿ tī chōe-chōe hiaⁿ-tī tiong choh Tōa-kiáⁿ.
45008030	Koh I ū-sian koat-tēng ê lâng, I mā kā in kéng-tiàu; I kéng-tiàu ê lâng, I mā kā in soan-phòaⁿ chòe gī-lâng; I soan-phòaⁿ chòe gī-lâng ê, I mā hō͘ in tit-tio̍h êng-kng.
45008031	Koan-hē chiah-ê tāi-chì, lán beh án-chóaⁿ kóng? Siōng-tè nā ūi lán, siáⁿ-lâng ōe-tàng tí-te̍k lán?
45008032	I kì-jiân bô sioh ka-kī ê Kiáⁿ, hō͘ I ūi-tio̍h lán chèng-lâng hi-seng, kiám bōe chiong bān-mi̍h mā pe̍h-pe̍h sù hō͘ lán?
45008033	Siáⁿ-lâng ōe-tàng khòng-kò Siōng-tè ê soán-bîn? Soan-phòaⁿ in chòe gī-lâng ê sī Siōng-tè!
45008034	Nā án-ni, siáⁿ-lâng ōe-tàng kā in tēng-chōe? Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ í-keng sí, koh Siōng-tè ū hō͘ I tùi sí-lâng tiong koh-oa̍h, taⁿ chē tī Siōng-tè ê chiàⁿ-pêng teh thòe lán kî-kiû.
45008035	Siáⁿ-lâng ōe-tàng chhiat-tn̄g Ki-tok tùi lán ê thiàⁿ? Sī hoān-lān, sī khùn-khó͘, sī pek-hāi, sī iau-gō, sī sàn-chhiah, sī gûi-hiám, á-sī chhám-sí?
45008036	Chiàu Sèng-keng só͘ kì-chài: Ūi-tio̍h lín ê iân-kò͘, goán kui-ji̍t biān-tùi sí ê ui-hia̍p; goán hō͘ lâng khòaⁿ-chòe teh-beh thâi ê iûⁿ.
45008037	Lóng m̄-sī! Tī chiah-ê it-chhè ê tāi-chì, lán khò thiàⁿ lán ê Siōng-tè tek-sèng kàu ū chhun!
45008038	In-ūi góa khak-sìn, bô-lūn sī sí, sī oa̍h, sī thiⁿ-sài, sī lêng-kài ê thóng-léng-chiá á-sī koân-le̍k-chiá, sī hiān-kim á-sī chiong-lâi ê,
45008039	sī thiⁿ-téng á-sī tōe-ē ê sîn-lêng, á-sī kî-tha ê pī-chō-bu̍t, lóng bōe-tàng chhiat-tn̄g Siōng-tè thong-kè lán ê Chú Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ tùi lán ê thiàⁿ!
45009001	Góa choh chi̍t ê sio̍k Ki-tok ê lâng kóng si̍t-ōe, bô pe̍h-chha̍t; góa ê liông-sim siū Sèng Sîn kám-tōng kā góa choh-chèng:
45009002	Góa hui-siông iu-siong, sim-lāi thòng-khó͘ bô-thêng.
45009003	Góa ūi-tio̍h tông-pau, góa ê kut-jio̍k chì-chhin, pún-sin nā tio̍h siū chiù-chó͘ kap Ki-tok keh-khui mā kam-goān.
45009004	In sī [Í-sek-lia̍t]-lâng; Siōng-tè kéng-soán in chòe kiáⁿ-jî, sù in êng-kng, iok, Lu̍t-hoat, lé-gî, kap èng-ún.
45009005	In sī cho̍k-tiúⁿ ê kiáⁿ-sun; chiàu hiat-thóng, Ki-tok kap in tâng-cho̍k. Goān chhiau-oa̍t bān-mi̍h ê Siōng-tè tit-tio̍h chheng-chàn kàu bān sè-tāi. Amen!
45009006	Án-ni m̄-sī kóng Siōng-tè ê èng-ún bô si̍t-hiān. In-ūi m̄-sī só͘-ū ê [Í-sek-lia̍t]-lâng lóng sī Siōng-tè ê soán-bîn.
45009007	[A-pek-la-hán] ê kiáⁿ-sun mā bô lóng sī èng-ún ê kiáⁿ-jî. Siōng-tè bat tùi [A-pek-la-hán] kóng, “Thong-kè [Í-sat] siⁿ ê chiah thang kiò-chòe lí ê kiáⁿ-sun.”
45009008	Án-ni sī kóng hiat-thóng ê kiáⁿ-jî bô it-tēng sī Siōng-tè ê kiáⁿ-jî; chí-ū tùi Siōng-tè ê èng-ún siⁿ ê chiah sǹg sī Siōng-tè ê kiáⁿ-sun.
45009009	In-ūi èng-ún ê ōe sī án-ni kóng: “Sî-ki kàu, góa ōe koh-lâi, [Sa-la] ōe siⁿ chi̍t ê ta-po͘-kiáⁿ.”
45009010	M̄-nā án-ni, [Lē-pek-ka] ê siang-siⁿ-kiáⁿ mā-sī tùi kâng chi̍t ê lâng, chiū-sī lán ê chó͘-sian [Í-sat] lâi hoâi-īn.
45009011	M̄-kú ūi-tio̍h beh piáu-sī Siōng-tè khak-si̍t kun-kù ka-kī ê bo̍k-te̍k lâi kéng-soán lâng, I tùi [Lē-pek-ka] kóng, “Tōa-ê ōe ho̍k-sāi sòe-ê.” Chit kù ōe sī tī in iáu-bē chhut-sì, iáu-bē chòe hó á-sī chòe pháiⁿ í-chêng, Siōng-tè só͘ kóng ê. Án-ni, Siōng-tè ê kéng-soán m̄-sī kun-kù lâng ê hêng-ûi, sī kun-kù I ka-kī ê soán-tiàu.
45009013	Chiàu Sèng-keng kì-chài, “[Ngá-kok], góa kah-ì; [Í-sò], góa bô kah-ì.”
45009014	Án-ni, lán beh kóng sím-mi̍h? Siōng-tè bô kong-tō sī-bô? Choa̍t-tùi m̄-sī!
45009015	I bat tùi [Mô͘-se] kóng: Góa beh lîn-bín góa ài lîn-bín ê lâng; góa beh thé-thiap góa ài thé-thiap ê lâng.
45009016	Só͘-í, Siōng-tè ê kéng-soán m̄-sī kun-kù lâng ê ì-goān á-sī ló͘-le̍k, sī chhut tī I ê lîn-bín.
45009017	Sèng-keng kì-chài Siōng-tè ū tùi Hoat-ló kóng, “Góa siat-li̍p lí chòe ông, bo̍k-te̍k sī beh ēng lí lâi hián-bêng góa ê koân-lêng, hō͘ góa ê miâ thoân kàu choân sè-kài.”
45009018	Só͘-í, Siōng-tè beh lîn-bín sím-mi̍h-lâng chiū kā i lîn-bín, beh hō͘ sím-mi̍h-lâng sim ngī chiū hō͘ i sim ngī.
45009019	Án-ni, lí ōe kā góa mn̄g, “Kì-jiân sī án-ni, sī-án-chóaⁿ Siōng-tè iáu teh chek-pī lâng? Sím-mi̍h-lâng káⁿ hoán-khòng Siōng-tè ê chí-ì?”
45009020	Lí chit-ê lâng, lí sǹg siáⁿ, káⁿ kā Siōng-tè tú-chhùi! Siū sok-chō ê mi̍h kiám ōe tùi sok-chō-ê kóng, “Lí sī-án-chóaⁿ kā góa chō-kah án-ni?”
45009021	Sio-hûi-ê kiám bô koân thang ēng siâng chi̍t tè liâm-thô͘ chiàu ka-kī ê ì-sù lâi chō chi̍t ê kùi-khì ê khì-khū, chi̍t ê chho͘-sio̍k ê khì-khū?
45009022	Sui-jiân Siōng-tè beh piáu-sī I ê siū-khì hō͘ lâng chai I ê koân-lêng, iáu-kú ēng chin tōa ê khoan-iông thun-lún hiah-ê jiá I siū-khì eng-kai bia̍t-bông ê lâng.
45009023	I ūi-tio̍h só͘ ū-pī lâi chiap-siū I ê êng-kng, chiū-sī I lîn-bín ê tùi-siōng hiah-ê lâng, I koh-khah ōe hō͘ in chai I hong-hù ê êng-kng.
45009024	Lán lóng sī I só͘ ho͘-tiàu ê, m̄-nā tùi [Iû-thài]-lâng, mā tùi Gōa-pang-lâng tiong-kan ho͘-tiàu.
45009025	Chiàu I tī Hô-se-a-su só͘ kóng: Pún-lâi m̄-sī góa ê chú-bîn ê, góa beh chheng-ho͘ in chòe ‘góa ê chú-bîn’. Pún-lâi m̄-sī góa só͘ thiàⁿ ê, góa beh hō͘ in chòe ‘góa só͘ thiàⁿ ê’.
45009026	Tī hit-ê só͘-chāi, góa bat tùi in kóng: ‘Lín m̄-sī góa ê chú-bîn’; tī hia, in ōe kiò-chòe ‘éng-oa̍h Siōng-tè ê kiáⁿ-jî.’
45009027	Koan-hē [Í-sek-lia̍t]-lâng, [Í-sài-a] bat soan-pò͘ kóng, “Sui-jiân [Í-sek-lia̍t] ê kiáⁿ-sun chhin-chhiūⁿ hái-soa hiah-ni̍h chōe, m̄-kú chí-ū só͘-chhun ê chió-sò͘ ōe tit-tio̍h kiù,
45009028	in-ūi Chú tī tōe-chiūⁿ ōe chin kín koh thiat-tóe chip-hêng sím-phòaⁿ.”
45009029	Che sī chiàu [Í-sài-a] í-chêng só͘ kóng: Nā m̄-sī Chú --- Bān-kun ê Thóng-sòe kā lán lâu chéng, lán chá chiū chhin-chhiūⁿ [Só͘-to-má], mā chhin-chhiūⁿ [Gô-mô͘-la].
45009030	Án-ni, lán beh kóng sím-mi̍h? Gōa-pang-lâng bô tui-kiû kap Siōng-tè kiàn-li̍p ha̍p-gî ê koan-hē, khiok tùi sìn kap Siōng-tè ū ha̍p-gî ê koan-hē.
45009031	[Í-sek-lia̍t]-lâng tui-kiû tùi Lu̍t-hoat hō͘ Siōng-tè jīn-tēng in chòe gī-lâng, hoán-tńg bô tit-tio̍h.
45009032	Ná-ōe án-ni? In-ūi in m̄-sī tùi sìn, sī tùi khò hêng-ûi. In khì that-tio̍h hit tè hō͘ lâng poa̍h-tó ê chio̍h poa̍h-tó.
45009033	Sèng-keng ū án-ni kì-chài: Khòaⁿ ah, góa chiong hō͘ lâng poa̍h-tó ê chio̍h, hō͘ lâng poa̍h-tó ê tōa-chio̍h khǹg tī Sek-an, sìn I ê lâng bōe tì-kàu sit-bāng kiàn-siàu.
45010001	Hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, góa ê sim jia̍t-chhiat ǹg-bāng, koh tùi Siōng-tè kî-kiû ê, chiū-sī [Í-sek-lia̍t]-lâng ōe tit-tio̍h kiù.
45010002	Góa ōe-tàng ūi-tio̍h in choh-chèng: In tùi Siōng-tè ū jia̍t-sim, m̄-kú m̄-sī kun-kù chèng-khak ê liáu-kái.
45010003	In-ūi in bô bêng-pe̍k Siōng-tè ê gī, beh ēng ka-kī ê hong-hoat tui-kiû kap Siōng-tè kiàn-li̍p ha̍p-gî ê koan-hē, soah bô sūn-thàn Siōng-tè hō͘ lâng chiâⁿ-chòe gī-lâng ê hong-hoat.
45010004	Kî-si̍t, Ki-tok í-keng oân-sêng Lu̍t-hoat ê bo̍k-te̍k, hō͘ sìn ê lâng ōe-tàng kap Siōng-tè ū ha̍p-gî ê koan-hē.
45010005	Koan-hē tùi khò Lu̍t-hoat tit-tio̍h ê gī, [Mô͘-se] ū án-ni siá, “Siú Lu̍t-hoat ê lâng khò Lu̍t-hoat lâi oa̍h.”
45010006	M̄-kú koan-hē tùi sìn chheng-gī, Sèng-keng ū án-ni kóng, “Lí m̄-thang sim-lāi kóng ‘Sím-mi̍h-lâng ōe peh chiūⁿ-thiⁿ?’ --- chiū-sī kóng, sím-mi̍h-lâng ōe chiong Ki-tok chhōa lo̍h-lâi?
45010007	Mā m̄-thang kóng ‘Sím-mi̍h-lâng ōe lo̍h-khì chhim-ian?’ --- chiū-sī kóng, sím-mi̍h-lâng ōe chiong Ki-tok tùi sí-lâng tiong chhōa khí-lâi?”
45010008	Chiah-ê ōe tàu-tóe sím-mi̍h ì-sù? Ì-sù sī: Siōng-tè ê ōe kap lí chin kūn, tī lí ê chhùi-ni̍h, tī lí ê sim-lāi. Che chiū-sī goán só͘ soan-iông ê sìn ê sìn-sit.
45010009	Lí nā ēng chhùi soan-jīn “Iâ-so͘ sī Chú”, sim sìn Siōng-tè ū hō͘ I tùi sí-lâng tiong koh-oa̍h, chiū ōe tit-tio̍h kiù.
45010010	In-ūi lâng sim sìn chiū tit-tio̍h chheng-gī; chhùi soan-jīn chiū tit-tio̍h kiù.
45010011	Sèng-keng ū án-ni kì-chài, “Sìn I ê lâng bōe tì-kàu sit-bāng kiàn-siàu.”
45010012	[Iû-thài]-lâng kap Gōa-pang-lâng lóng bô chha-pia̍t, in-ūi ū kâng chi̍t ūi Siōng-tè sī bān-bîn ê Chú, I ōe hong-hong hù-hù sù-hok hō͘ só͘-ū kiû-kiò I ê lâng.
45010013	In-ūi só͘-ū “Kiû-kiò Chú ê miâ ê lâng lóng ōe tit-kiù.”
45010014	M̄-kú in to bô sìn I, ná-ōe kiû-kiò I? To bô thiaⁿ-tio̍h, ná-ōe sìn I? To bô-lâng thoân, ná-ōe thiaⁿ-tio̍h?
45010015	To bô chhe-phài, ná-ōe thoân? Chiàu Sèng-keng só͘ kì-chài, “Thoân-pò hok-im ê lâng, in ê kha-jiah jōa-á-ni̍h súi!”
45010016	M̄-kú, m̄-sī só͘-ū ê lâng lóng sūn-thàn chit-ê hok-im. [Í-sài-a] kóng, “Chú ah, sím-mi̍h-lâng sìn goán só͘ thoân ê sìn-sit?”
45010017	Só͘-í, sìn sī tùi thiaⁿ, thiaⁿ sī tùi thiaⁿ Ki-tok ê ōe.
45010018	Put-kò góa beh mn̄g, in kiám chin-chiàⁿ lóng m̄-bat thiaⁿ-tio̍h? Tong-jiân bat! Sèng-keng án-ni kì-chài: In ê siaⁿ-im thoân-piàn choân-tōe; in ê ōe thoân kàu thiⁿ-piⁿ hái-kak.
45010019	Góa beh koh mn̄g, [Í-sek-lia̍t]-lâng kiám chin-chiàⁿ m̄-chai? Tāi-seng [Mô͘-se] thòe Siōng-tè án-ni kóng: Góa beh ēng m̄-sī góa chú-bîn ê lâng lâi ín-khí lín chi̍t-tò͘, ēng gû-gōng ê chú-bîn lâi kek-khí lín siū-khì.
45010020	Āu-lâi [Í-sài-a] mā chin hó-táⁿ thòe Siōng-tè kóng: Bô chhē góa ê lâng, góa ū hō͘ in chhē-tio̍h; bô kiû góa ê lâng, góa ū tùi in hián-hiān.
45010021	M̄-kú koan-hē [Í-sek-lia̍t]-lâng, I ū kóng, “Ngī-sim pōe-ge̍k ê chú-bîn, góa kui-ji̍t chhun siang-chhiú hoan-gêng.”
45011001	Án-ni, góa beh mn̄g, Siōng-tè kiám ū pàng-sak I ê chú-bîn? Choa̍t-tùi bô! Góa pún-sin mā-sī [Í-sek-lia̍t]-lâng, sī [A-pek-la-hán] ê hō͘-tāi, sio̍k [Piān-ngá-bín] chi-cho̍k.
45011002	Siōng-tè m̄-bat pàng-sak I chá chiū kéng-soán ê chú-bîn. Lín kiám m̄-chai Sèng-keng ū kì-chài, [Í-lī-a] tùi Siōng-tè khòng-kò [Í-sek-lia̍t]-lâng,
45011003	kóng, “Chú ah, in thâi-sí lí ê sian-ti, thiah-húi lí ê chè-tôaⁿ, chí-ū chhun góa chi̍t lâng, in mā teh siàu-siūⁿ góa ê sìⁿ-miā.”
45011004	M̄-kú Siōng-tè án-chóaⁿ ìn-tap? I kóng, “Góa ū ūi-tio̍h ka-kī lâu chhit-chheng ê m̄-bat kūi-pài [Pa-le̍k] ê lâng.”
45011005	Hiān-kim chit-ê sî ê chêng-hêng mā-sī án-ni, Siōng-tè ū lâu ēng un-tián kéng-soán ê chió-sò͘-lâng.
45011006	Kì-jiân sī Siōng-tè ê un-tián, chiū m̄-sī kun-kù lâng ê hêng-ûi; nā kun-kù lâng ê hêng-ûi, un-tián chiū m̄-sī un-tián!
45011007	Nā án-ni, [Í-sek-lia̍t]-lâng bô tit-tio̍h in teh tui-chhē ê, chí-ū Siōng-tè só͘ kéng-soán ê chió-sò͘-lâng ū tit-tio̍h. Kî-tha ê lâng sim ngī m̄-thiaⁿ,
45011008	chiàu Sèng-keng só͘ kì-chài: Siōng-tè hō͘ in ê sim-lêng bâ-pì, ba̍k-chiu khòaⁿ bōe-kìⁿ, hī-khang thiaⁿ bōe-tio̍h, ti̍t-kàu kin-á-ji̍t.
45011009	[Tāi-pi̍t] kóng: Tio̍h hō͘ in ê iàn-hōe chiâⁿ-chòe hām-khiⁿ, lô-bāng, hō͘ in poa̍h-tó, chòe in ê pò-èng.
45011010	Tio̍h hō͘ in ê ba̍k-chiu hoe, bōe khòaⁿ-kìⁿ, hō͘ in ê ka-chiah-phiaⁿ éng-oán khiau-ku.
45011011	Án-ni, góa beh kóng, [Í-sek-lia̍t]-lâng tó lo̍h-khì, kiám lóng peh bōe khí-lâi? It-tēng bōe án-ni! Tian-tò in-ūi in ê kè-sit, chín-kiù lîm-kàu Gōa-pang-lâng, lâi kek-khí [Í-sek-lia̍t]-lâng ê chi̍t-tò͘.
45011012	Kì-jiân [Í-sek-lia̍t]-lâng ê kè-sit ōe hō͘ sè-kan-lâng tit-tio̍h hong-hù ê chiok-hok, in ê sit-pāi ōe hō͘ Gōa-pang-lâng tit-tio̍h hong-hù ê chiok-hok, hô-hòng [Í-sek-lia̍t]-lâng nā choân-sò͘ tit-tio̍h kiù, hit-ê chiok-hok kiám-bōe koh-khah hong-hù?
45011013	Hiān-chāi góa tùi lín Gōa-pang-lâng kóng. Kì-jiân góa sī Gōa-pang-lâng ê sù-tô͘, góa khòaⁿ góa ê chit-hūn chòe êng-kng,
45011014	án-ni thang kek-khí góa ê tông-pau ê chi̍t-tò͘, lâi kiù in tiong-kan chi̍t-kóa lâng.
45011015	[Í-sek-lia̍t] tông-pau siū khì-sak nā ōe hō͘ sè-kan-lâng kap Siōng-tè koh hô-hó, in koh siū chiap-la̍p kiám m̄-sī chhin-chhiūⁿ lâng tùi sí koh-oa̍h?
45011016	Thâu-chi̍t tè mī-chhè nā sèng-pia̍t kui hō͘ Siōng-tè, kui-sn̂g mā lóng ōe án-ni; chhiū-kun nā sèng-pia̍t kui hō͘ Siōng-tè, ki mā lóng ōe án-ni.
45011017	Lâng kā ka-ná-chhiū-ki chián khí-lâi, chiong lín chiah-ê iá-seng ê ka-ná-chhiū-ki chiap lo̍h-khì, lâi chiap-siū kâng hit châng chhiū-kun ê êng-ióng-hun,
45011018	lín chiū m̄-thang tùi chián khí-lâi ê chhiū-ki khoa-kháu. Lín nā beh khoa-kháu, tio̍h chai, m̄-sī kun teh óa-khò lín, sī lín teh óa-khò kun.
45011019	Lí kiám-chhái beh kóng, “Chiah-ê chhiū-ki chián khí-lâi sī beh kā góa chiap lo̍h-khì.”
45011020	Tio̍h! In m̄-sìn chiah siū chián khí-lâi, lí tùi sìn chiah khiā ōe-tiâu. Lí m̄-thang kiau-ngō͘, tio̍h kiaⁿ-hiâⁿ.
45011021	In-ūi Siōng-tè nā bô lâu goân-lâi ê chhiū-ki, mā bô it-tēng ōe lâu lí.
45011022	Só͘-í, tio̍h chai Siōng-tè ê chû-ài kap giâm-hat, tùi tūi-lo̍h ê lâng, I chin giâm-hat, m̄-kú lí nā kè-sio̍k óa-khò I ê chû-ài, I chiū ēng chû-ài tùi-thāi lí; nā bô, lí mā ōe siū chián-tn̄g sit-khì I ê chû-ài.
45011023	[Í-sek-lia̍t]-lâng nā m̄-sī kian-chhî m̄-sìn, chiū ōe siū chiap tò tńg-khì, in-ūi Siōng-tè ōe-tàng koh kā in chiap tò tńg-khì.
45011024	Lín chiah-ê tùi iá-seng ê ka-ná-chhiū chián khí-lâi ê chhiū-ki, Siōng-tè to ōe-tàng ûi-hoán chū-jiân kā lín chiap tī hó ê ka-ná-chhiū, hiah-ê goân-lâi ê chhiū-ki kiám-bōe koh-khah eng-kai chiap tò tńg-khì?
45011025	Hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, góa ài lín chai chit-ê ò-biāu ê chin-lí, chiah bōe siūⁿ-kóng ka-kī sī chhong-bêng. Chi̍t pō͘-hūn ê [Í-sek-lia̍t]-lâng chiām-sî ngī-sim, kàu Gōa-pang-lâng kui Chú ê sò͘-bo̍k móa ûi-chí.
45011026	Án-ni, só͘-ū ê [Í-sek-lia̍t]-lâng lóng ōe tit-kiù. Chiàu Sèng-keng só͘ kì-chài: Chín-kiù-chiá ōe tùi [Sek-an] chhut-lâi, I ōe tû-khì [Ngá-kok] ê put-khiân put-gī.
45011027	Hit sî góa beh tû-khì in ê chōe; Che sī góa kap in só͘ li̍p ê iok.
45011028	Chi̍t hong-bīn, tùi hok-im ê koan-tiám lâi kóng, [Í-sek-lia̍t]-lâng in-ūi lín ê iân-kò͘ chiâⁿ-chòe Siōng-tè ê tùi-te̍k. Lēng-gōa chi̍t hong-bīn, tùi kéng-soán ê koan-tiám lâi kóng, in-ūi in chó͘-sian ê iân-kò͘, in chiâⁿ-chòe Siōng-tè só͘ thiàⁿ ê lâng;
45011029	in-ūi Siōng-tè ê un-sù kap kéng-soán bōe kái-piàn.
45011030	Lín Gōa-pang-lâng í-chêng bô sūn-ho̍k Siōng-tè, hiān-chāi in-ūi [Í-sek-lia̍t]-lâng bô sūn-ho̍k, lín chiah tit-tio̍h lîn-bín.
45011031	Kâng-khoán, in-ūi lín ū tit-tio̍h lîn-bín, in hiān-chāi bô sūn-ho̍k Siōng-tè, sī beh hō͘ in mā ōe tit-tio̍h lîn-bín.
45011032	Siōng-tè chiong só͘-ū ê lâng lóng koaiⁿ tī bô sūn-ho̍k ê chōng-thāi, sī ūi-tio̍h beh lîn-bín só͘-ū ê lâng.
45011033	Siōng-tè ê hong-sēng, tì-hūi, chai-bat, jōa-á-ni̍h chhim-tîm ah! I ê phòaⁿ-toàn oh-tit thui-chhek; I ê tō-lō͘ oh-tit chhē-tio̍h!
45011034	Sím-mi̍h-lâng chai Chú ê sim-ì? Sím-mi̍h-lâng ōe-tàng thòe I chhut chú-ì?
45011035	Sím-mi̍h-lâng bat seng hō͘ I sím-mi̍h, I tio̍h pò-tap in?
45011036	In-ūi bān-mi̍h lóng chhut tī I, óa-khò I, kui tī I; goān I tit-tio̍h êng-kng ti̍t-kàu éng-oán. Amen!
45012001	Só͘-í, hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, in-ūi Siōng-tè ê lîn-bín, góa khǹg lín tio̍h chiong ka-kī ê seng-khu hiàn hō͘ Siōng-tè chòe oa̍h-oa̍h ê chè, sī sèng-kiat, I só͘ hoaⁿ-hí ê; che sī lín ha̍p-gî ê kèng-pài.
45012002	M̄-thang hō͘ sè-sio̍k tông-hòa, tian-tò tio̍h hō͘ Siōng-tè kā lín kái-chō, sim-chì tit-tio̍h keng-sin, hō͘ lín thang piān-pia̍t sím-mi̍h sī Siōng-tè só͘ hoaⁿ-hí, khòaⁿ-chòe hó, koh oân-choân ê chí-ì.
45012003	Khò Siōng-tè hō͘ góa ê un-sù, góa tùi lín ta̍k ê lâng kóng: M̄-thang chiong ka-kī khòaⁿ siuⁿ koân, tio̍h chiàu Siōng-tè sù hō͘ lín ta̍k ê lâng sìn-sim ê hūn-liōng sīn-tiōng phêng-kè ka-kī.
45012004	Chhin-chhiūⁿ chi̍t ê seng-khu ū chin chōe chi-thé, ta̍k ê chi-thé kok ū bô sio-siâng ê kong-lêng.
45012005	Sui-jiân lán ū chin chōe lâng, m̄-kú tī Ki-tok sī chi̍t-thé, hō͘-siōng chòe chi-thé.
45012006	Chiàu Siōng-tè sù hō͘ lán ê un-tián, lán ta̍k ê lâng ū tit-tio̍h bô sio-siâng ê un-sù: Soan-káng sìn-sit ê lâng tio̍h hû-ha̍p sìn-sim soan-káng;
45012007	ho̍k-sāi ê lâng tio̍h choân-sim ho̍k-sāi; kàu-tō ê lâng tio̍h choân-sim kàu-tō;
45012008	khoàn-bián ê lâng tio̍h choân-sim khoàn-bián; chín-chè ê lâng tio̍h khóng-khài; léng-tō ê lâng tio̍h jia̍t-sim; chòe chû-siān ê lâng tio̍h kam-sim lo̍k-ì.
45012009	Thiàⁿ tio̍h sêng-sim sêng-ì; tio̍h oàn-hūn pháiⁿ, kian-chhî hó.
45012010	Tio̍h ēng hiaⁿ-tī-ài hō͘-siōng saⁿ-thiàⁿ; tio̍h chek-ke̍k saⁿ kèng-tiōng.
45012011	M̄-thang pîn-tōaⁿ; sim-chì tio̍h jia̍t-sêng, kè-sio̍k ho̍k-sāi Chú.
45012012	Tio̍h khǹg ǹg-bāng lâi hoaⁿ-hí; tio̍h jím-siū hoān-lān; tio̍h put-sî kî-tó.
45012013	Tio̍h pang-chān lín tiong-kan sàn-chhiah ê sìn-tô͘; tio̍h hó khoán-thāi chhut-gōa-lâng.
45012014	Tio̍h chiok-hok pek-hāi lín ê lâng; tio̍h chiok-hok, m̄-thang chiù-chó͘.
45012015	Tio̍h kap hoaⁿ-hí ê lâng chòe-hé hoaⁿ-hí, kap ai-khàu ê lâng chòe-hé ai-khàu.
45012016	Tio̍h tâng-sim ha̍p-ì; m̄-thang kiau-ngō͘; tio̍h chòe pîn-chiān ê lâng ê tâng-phōaⁿ; m̄-thang chū-chok-chhong-bêng.
45012017	M̄-thang ēng pháiⁿ pò pháiⁿ; tio̍h chòe chèng-lâng khòaⁿ-chòe hó ê sū.
45012018	Tio̍h chīn-só͘-ōe kap chèng-lâng hô-bo̍k siong-chhù.
45012019	Chhin-ài ê hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, m̄-thang ūi-tio̍h ka-kī pò-oan, lêng-khó hō͘ Siōng-tè thòe lín siū-khì, in-ūi Sèng-keng ū kì-chài, “Chú kóng, sin-oan chāi-tī góa, góa ōe pò-èng.”
45012020	M̄-kú Sèng-keng mā ū kì-chài, “Lí ê tùi-te̍k nā iau, tio̍h hō͘ i chia̍h, chhùi-ta, tio̍h hō͘ i lim; in-ūi lí án-ni chòe, ná-chún chiong teh to̍h ê hé-thòaⁿ thia̍p tī i ê thâu-khak téng, hō͘ i kiàn-siàu-kah tòng bōe-tiâu.”
45012021	Só͘-í, m̄-thang hō͘ pháiⁿ iâⁿ-kè lín; tio̍h ēng hó khah-iâⁿ pháiⁿ.
45013001	Ta̍k ê lâng tio̍h sūn-ho̍k tī téng-bīn ê koân-pèng, in-ūi koân-pèng lóng sī tùi Siōng-tè lâi. Chiáng-koân-chiá ê koân-pèng lóng sī Siōng-tè chè-tēng ê.
45013002	Só͘-í, hoán-khòng koân-pèng sī ûi-pōe Siōng-tè só͘ chè-tēng ê chè-tō͘; hoán-khòng ê lâng ōe siū sím-phòaⁿ.
45013003	Thóng-tī-chiá m̄-sī beh hō͘ choh-hó ê lâng kiaⁿ-hiâⁿ, sī beh hō͘ choh-pháiⁿ ê lâng kiaⁿ-hiâⁿ. Lí kiám bô ài chòe chi̍t ê bián kiaⁿ koân-pèng ê lâng? Nā ài, tio̍h choh-hó, lí chiū ōe tit-tio̍h chheng-chàn;
45013004	in-ūi i sī Siōng-tè ê chhe-ēng, i ê chit-chek sī beh pang-chān lí. M̄-kú lí nā choh-pháiⁿ, tio̍h kiaⁿ i, in-ūi i tòa kiàm m̄-sī bô bo̍k-te̍k. I sī Siōng-tè ê chhe-ēng, sī sin-oan-chiá, beh thòe Siōng-tè hêng-hoa̍t choh-pháiⁿ ê lâng.
45013005	Só͘-í, lín tio̍h sūn-ho̍k, m̄-sī kan-ta in-ūi kiaⁿ Siōng-tè siū-khì, mā-sī ūi-tio̍h liông-sim ê iân-kò͘.
45013006	Lín la̍p-sè mā-sī ūi-tio̍h chit-ê lí-iû, in-ūi i sī ho̍k-sāi Siōng-tè ê lâng, teh chip-hêng i ê chit-bū.
45013007	Tio̍h tùi chèng-lâng chīn lín ê gī-bū; lín khiàm ê, tio̍h hêng; eng-kai la̍p ê, tio̍h la̍p; eng-kai kiaⁿ-ùi ê, tio̍h kiaⁿ-ùi; eng-kai chun-kèng ê, tio̍h chun-kèng.
45013008	Hō͘-siōng saⁿ-thiàⁿ ê chè í-gōa, choa̍t-tùi m̄-thang khiàm lâng sím-mi̍h; in-ūi thiàⁿ pa̍t-lâng ê, í-keng ū oân-sêng Lu̍t-hoat ê iau-kiû.
45013009	Lu̍t-hoat ê iau-kiû sī: “M̄-thang kan-îm; m̄-thang thâi-lâng; m̄-thang thau-the̍h; m̄-thang tham-sim;” chiah-ê kap kî-tha ê iau-kiû lóng pau-hâm tī “Tio̍h thiàⁿ chhù-piⁿ chhin-chhiūⁿ thiàⁿ ka-kī” chit kù ōe.
45013010	Thiàⁿ chhù-piⁿ ê lâng bōe siong-hāi pa̍t-lâng. Só͘-í, thiàⁿ sêng-choân Lu̍t-hoat.
45013011	Án-ni, lín chai chit-ê sî-chūn sī lín eng-kai khùn-chhíⁿ ê sî, in-ūi hiān-chāi pí lán tú-tú sìn ê sî koh-khah chiap-kūn chín-kiù.
45013012	Mî-sî í-keng chhim, ji̍t-sî teh-beh kàu. Só͘-í, lán tio̍h thǹg-tiāu o͘-àm ê hêng-ûi, ēng kng-bêng chòe bú-chong.
45013013	Lán ê hêng-ûi tio̍h toan-chèng, chhin-chhiūⁿ tī ji̍t-sî teh seng-oa̍h. M̄-thang hòng-chhiòng, chiú-chùi; m̄-thang hò͘ⁿ-sek, hòng-tōng; m̄-thang saⁿ-chiⁿ, oàn-tò͘.
45013014	Tio̍h ēng Chú Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok chòe bú-chong lâi chhēng; m̄-thang chí-ū tô͘-bô͘ jio̍k-thé ê sū lâi boán-chiok su-io̍k.
45014001	Sìn-sim loán-jio̍k ê lâng tio̍h kā i chiap-la̍p, m̄-thang kap i piān-lūn ū cheng-gī ê sū.
45014002	Sìn ê lâng ta̍k hāng lóng ū chia̍h, m̄-kú loán-jio̍k ê lâng chí-ū chia̍h chhài-soe.
45014003	Ta̍k hāng chia̍h ê lâng m̄-thang khòaⁿ-khin bô ta̍k hāng chia̍h ê lâng; bô ta̍k hāng chia̍h ê lâng mā m̄-thang phoe-phòaⁿ ta̍k hāng chia̍h ê lâng, in-ūi Siōng-tè í-keng ū chiap-la̍p i.
45014004	Lí sǹg siáⁿ, ná káⁿ phoe-phòaⁿ pa̍t-lâng ê lô͘-po̍k? I chòe liáu hó á-sī bô hó, i ê chú-lâng ōe kā i sím-phòaⁿ. I ōe chòe hó-sè, in-ūi Chú ōe kā i pang-chān.
45014005	Ū lâng khòaⁿ chit ji̍t pí hit ji̍t khah tiōng-iàu; mā ū lâng khòaⁿ ta̍k ji̍t pîⁿ-pîⁿ tiōng-iàu. Ta̍k ê lâng tio̍h ū ka-kī bêng-khak ê kiàn-kái.
45014006	Siú te̍k-pia̍t ji̍t-chí ê lâng sī ūi-tio̍h Chú lâi siú; ū chia̍h-bah ê lâng mā-sī ūi-tio̍h Chú lâi chia̍h, in-ūi i ū kám-siā Siōng-tè. Bô chia̍h-bah ê lâng sī ūi-tio̍h Chú bô chia̍h, i mā-sī ū kám-siā Siōng-tè.
45014007	Lán bô-lâng ūi-tio̍h ka-kī teh oa̍h, mā bô-lâng ūi-tio̍h ka-kī lâi sí.
45014008	Lán nā oa̍h, sī ūi-tio̍h Chú teh oa̍h; nā sí, mā-sī ūi-tio̍h Chú lâi sí. Só͘-í, bô-lūn oa̍h á-sī sí, lán lóng sī sio̍k Chú ê lâng.
45014009	Ūi-tio̍h chit-ê bo̍k-te̍k Ki-tok ū sí, mā ū koh-oa̍h, thang siâng-sî chòe sí-lâng kap oa̍h-lâng ê Chú.
45014010	Án-ni, sī-án-chóaⁿ lí teh phoe-phòaⁿ lí ê hiaⁿ-tī á-sī chí-bē? Sī-án-chóaⁿ teh khòaⁿ-khin lí ê hiaⁿ-tī á-sī chí-bē? In-ūi lán chèng-lâng lóng tio̍h khiā tī Siōng-tè ê sím-phòaⁿ-tâi chêng.
45014011	Sèng-keng ū kì-chài: Chú kóng, góa sī éng-oa̍h ê Siōng-tè; ta̍k ê kha-thâu-u ōe kā góa kūi-pài, ta̍k ê chhùi-tûn ōe soan-jīn góa sī Siōng-tè.
45014012	Án-ni, lán ta̍k ê lâng tio̍h chiong ka-kī ê tāi-chì tī Siōng-tè ê bīn-chêng kau-tài chheng-chhó.
45014013	Só͘-í, lán m̄-thang koh-chài hō͘-siōng phoe-phòaⁿ, hoán-tńg tio̍h koat-sim bô chòe hō͘ hiaⁿ-tī á-sī chí-bē ê sìn-gióng siū chó͘-gāi, poa̍h-tó ê sū.
45014014	Góa chai, koh Chú Iâ-so͘ hō͘ góa khak-sìn, ta̍k hāng mi̍h pún-sin lóng chheng-khì; lâng nā siūⁿ-kóng bô chheng-khì, tùi hit-ê lâng lâi kóng hit hāng mi̍h chiū bô chheng-khì.
45014015	Lí nā in-ūi só͘ chia̍h ê mi̍h hō͘ hiaⁿ-tī á-sī chí-bē kan-khó͘ sim, lí ê hêng-ûi chiū m̄-sī chhut tī thiàⁿ-sim. Lí m̄-thang ūi-tio̍h ka-kī só͘ chia̍h ê mi̍h hō͘ hiaⁿ-tī á-sī chí-bē tì-kàu bia̍t-bông, in-ūi Ki-tok í-keng ūi-tio̍h i sí.
45014016	Só͘-í, m̄-thang hō͘ lí khòaⁿ-chòe hó ê chiâⁿ-chòe lâng ê húi-pòng.
45014017	Siōng-tè chú-koân ê si̍t-hiān m̄-sī khò lim-chia̍h, sī khò Sèng Sîn só͘ sù ê kong-gī, hô-pêng, kap hoaⁿ-hí.
45014018	Ēng án-ni lâi ho̍k-sāi Ki-tok ê lâng ōe hō͘ Siōng-tè hoaⁿ-hí, mā ōe tit-tio̍h lâng ê chheng-chàn.
45014019	Só͘-í, lán tio̍h tui-kiû hô-bo̍k kap hō͘-siōng chō-chiū ê sū.
45014020	M̄-thang ūi-tio̍h chia̍h-mi̍h phò-hoāi Siōng-tè ê kang-chok. Bān-mi̍h lóng chheng-khì, m̄-kú lâng nā in-ūi chia̍h-mi̍h hō͘ pa̍t-lâng ê sìn-gióng siū chó͘-gāi chiū m̄-hó.
45014021	Khah hó sī bô chia̍h-bah, bô lim-chiú, bô chòe hō͘ hiaⁿ-tī á-sī chí-bē sit-khì sìn-gióng ê tāi-chì.
45014022	Lí tùi chi̍t hāng sū ê sìn-liām sī lí kap Siōng-tè tiong-kan ê tāi-chì. Tùi ka-kī khòaⁿ-chòe tio̍h ê sū bô chū-chek ê lâng chin ū hok-khì.
45014023	M̄-kú sim ū giâu-gî lâi chia̍h ê lâng ōe siū tēng-chōe, in-ūi m̄-sī chhut-tī sìn-sim. M̄-sī chhut-tī sìn-sim lâi chòe ê lóng sī chōe.
45015001	Lán chiah-ê sìn-sim kian-kiông ê lâng eng-kai kā sìn-sim loán-jio̍k ê lâng tàu taⁿ tāng-tàⁿ. M̄-thang kiû hō͘ ka-kī hoaⁿ-hí;
45015002	lán ta̍k ê lâng tio̍h kiû hō͘ chhù-piⁿ hoaⁿ-hí, hō͘ in tit-tio̍h lī-ek thang kiàn-li̍p sìn-sim.
45015003	In-ūi Ki-tok bô kiû hō͘ ka-kī hoaⁿ-hí, hoán-tńg chhin-chhiūⁿ Sèng-keng só͘ kì-chài, “Bú-jio̍k lí ê lâng ê bú-jio̍k kui tī góa.”
45015004	Chá-chêng só͘ siá ê lóng sī ūi-tio̍h beh kà-sī lán lâi siá ê, hō͘ lán tùi jím-nāi kap Sèng-keng ê an-ùi tit-tio̍h ǹg-bāng.
45015005	Goān sù jím-nāi kap an-ùi ê Siōng-tè hō͘ lín tâng sim-chì ha̍k-si̍p Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ ê bô͘-iūⁿ,
45015006	thang tâng-sim tâng-siaⁿ êng-iāu lán ê Chú Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok ê Pē Siōng-tè!
45015007	Só͘-í, ūi-tio̍h êng-iāu Siōng-tè, lín tio̍h hō͘-siōng chiap-la̍p, chhin-chhiūⁿ Ki-tok ū chiap-la̍p lín.
45015008	Góa kā lín kóng, Ki-tok chiâⁿ-chòe siū kat-lé ê lâng ê chhe-ēng, sī beh hián-sī Siōng-tè ê sìn-si̍t, thang chèng-bêng Siōng-tè tùi chó͘-sian ê èng-ún ū si̍t-hiān,
45015009	mā beh hō͘ Gōa-pang-lâng in-ūi Siōng-tè ê lîn-bín thang kui êng-kng hō͘ I. Chiàu Sèng-keng só͘ kì-chài: Só͘-í, góa beh tī Gōa-pang-lâng tiong-kan soan-jīn lí, chhiùⁿ-koa o-ló lí ê miâ.
45015010	I koh kóng: Gōa-pang-lâng ah, tio̍h kap Siōng-tè ê chú-bîn chòe-hé hoaⁿ-hí.
45015011	I koh kóng: Só͘-ū ê Gōa-pang-lâng ah, tio̍h o-ló Chú; bān-bîn ah, tio̍h siōng-chàn I.
45015012	[Í-sài-a] koh-chài kóng: [Iâ-se] ê kun ōe puh-íⁿ, I ōe khí-lâi thóng-tī gōa-pang; Gōa-pang-lâng lóng ōe chiong ǹg-bāng kau-thok I.
45015013	Goān sù ǹg-bāng ê Siōng-tè, in-ūi lín tùi I ê sìn-sim, hō͘ lín chhiong-móa ta̍k khoán ê hoaⁿ-hí kap pêng-an, koh hō͘ lín tùi Sèng Sîn ê lêng-le̍k chhiong-móa ǹg-bāng!
45015014	Góa ê hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, góa ka-kī khak-sìn lín hui-siông liông-siān, chhiong-móa ta̍k khoán ê tì-sek, koh ōe-hiáu hō͘-siōng khó͘-khǹg.
45015015	M̄-kú góa hó-táⁿ siá chit tiuⁿ phoe hō͘ lín, kā lín thê-chhíⁿ kúi tiám; in-ūi Siōng-tè ū sù góa te̍k-pia̍t ê un-tián,
45015016	thang tī Gōa-pang-lâng ê tiong-kan ho̍k-sāi Ki-tok Iâ-so͘, choh chè-si soan-káng Siōng-tè ê hok-im, thang hō͘ Gōa-pang-lâng chiâⁿ-chòe Sèng Sîn só͘ sèng-hòa, Siōng-tè chiap-la̍p ê chè-mi̍h.
45015017	Só͘-í, in-ūi Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ ê iân-kò͘, góa khòaⁿ ho̍k-sāi Siōng-tè chòe êng-kng.
45015018	Góa m̄-káⁿ kóng pa̍t-hāng tāi-chì, chí-ū beh kóng chit hāng, chiū-sī Ki-tok thong-kè góa ê giân-gú kap hêng-ûi, ēng sîn-jiah kî-sū ê lêng-le̍k, kap Siōng-tè ê Sîn ê lêng-le̍k, hō͘ Gōa-pang-lâng sūn-ho̍k Siōng-tè. Só͘-í tùi [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] it-ti̍t kàu [Í-lī-lí-kó͘] ê tōe-khu, góa ta̍k só͘-chāi khì soan-iông Ki-tok ê hok-im.
45015020	Góa koat-ì bô beh tī í-keng thiaⁿ-tio̍h Ki-tok ê miâ ê só͘-chāi thoân hok-im, chiah bōe tī pa̍t-lâng ê tōe-ki téng khí-chhù.
45015021	Chiàu Sèng-keng só͘ kì-chài: M̄-bat thiaⁿ-tio̍h I ê lâng ōe khòaⁿ-kìⁿ; m̄-bat thiaⁿ-kìⁿ I ê lâng ōe bêng-pe̍k.
45015022	Góa chin chōe piàn ū tú-tio̍h chó͘-tòng, bōe-tàng khì lín hia.
45015023	M̄-kú taⁿ tī chiah-ê tōe-khu bô pa̍t-ê só͘-chāi thang khì, koh kúi-nā nî lâi, góa it-ti̍t teh ǹg-bāng ōe-tàng khì lín hia.
45015024	Chit piàn beh khì [Se-pan-gâ] ê lō͘-tiong, góa ǹg-bāng ōe keng-kè lín hia khì khòaⁿ lín, seng kap lín ū chi̍t tōaⁿ sî-kan hoaⁿ-hí ê kau-pôe, jiân-āu chiah hō͘ lín sòng-hêng kè-sio̍k khì [Se-pan-gâ].
45015025	M̄-kú góa hiān-chāi tio̍h seng khì [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] kiong-kip hiah-ê sìn-tô͘ ê su-iàu,
45015026	in-ūi [Má-kî-tùn] kap [A-kai-a] ê kàu-hōe hoaⁿ-hí hiàn chi̍t pit chîⁿ pang-chān [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] chi̍t-kóa sàn-chhiah ê sìn-tô͘.
45015027	Che sī in hoaⁿ-hí chòe ê, kî-si̍t mā-sī in só͘ khiàm ê chè. Kì-jiân [Iû-thài] sìn-tô͘ ū kap Gōa-pang-lâng hun-hióng sio̍k-lêng ê hok-khì, Gōa-pang ê sìn-tô͘ eng-kai tī bu̍t-chit siōng pang-chān in.
45015028	Thèng-hāu góa chit hāng tāi-chì chòe hó-sè, chiong koan-bō͘ ê chit pit chîⁿ kau hō͘ in liáu-āu, chiah keng-kè lín hia khì [Se-pan-gâ].
45015029	Góa chai góa khì lín hia ê sî, mā ōe chiong Ki-tok hong-hù ê un-tián tòa khì hō͘ lín.
45015030	Hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, thong-kè lán ê Chú Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok kap Sèng Sîn só͘ sù ê thiàⁿ-sim, góa chhiáⁿ lín chīn-la̍t kap góa chòe-hé ūi-tio̍h góa kî-kiû Siōng-tè,
45015031	hō͘ góa bián siū-tio̍h [Iû-thài] m̄-sìn ê lâng ê hām-hāi, koh hō͘ góa tī [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] pān-lí kiong-kip ê tāi-chì ōe tit-tio̍h sìn-tô͘ chiap-la̍p.
45015032	Án-ni, góa chiū thang hoaⁿ-hoaⁿ hí-hí chiàu Siōng-tè ê chí-ì khì lín hia, kap lín chòe-hé tiông-sin tit-tio̍h khùi-la̍t.
45015033	Goān sù pêng-an ê Siōng-tè kap lín tāi-ke tông-chāi. Amen!
45016001	Góa tùi lín chhui-chiàn lán ê chí-bē [Hui-pí], i sī [Kian-kek-lí] kàu-hōe ê chip-sū.
45016002	Chhiáⁿ lín in-ūi Chú ê iân-kò͘, chiàu sìn-tô͘ ê pún-hūn kā i chiap-thāi. I ū sím-mi̍h su-iàu, chhiáⁿ lín kā i pang-chān. I it-ti̍t jia̍t-sim pang-chān chin chōe lâng, pau-hâm góa pún-sin.
45016003	Chhiáⁿ thòe góa kā tī Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ ê tâng-kang [Pek-ki-lah] kap [A-ku-lah] chhéng-an.
45016004	In bat ūi-tio̍h góa mō͘ sìⁿ-miā ê gûi-hiám; m̄-nā góa, liân só͘-ū Gōa-pang ê kàu-hōe mā lóng beh kā in kám-siā.
45016005	Mā kā tī in tau teh chū-chi̍p ê kàu-hōe chhéng-an. Chhiáⁿ thòe góa chhéng-an góa só͘ thiàⁿ ê [Í-pài-nî-thó͘]; i sī [A-se-a] thâu-chi̍t ê kui-sìn Ki-tok ê lâng.
45016006	Mā chhéng-an ūi-tio̍h lín siū chin chōe lô-khó͘ ê [Má-lī-a].
45016007	Koh kā góa ê chhin-cho̍k, kap góa chòe-hé koaiⁿ-kaⁿ ê [An-to-nî-kó͘] kap [Iû-nî-a] chhéng-an; in tī sù-tô͘ tiong sī ū bêng-bōng ê lâng, pí góa khah tāi-seng kui-sìn Ki-tok.
45016008	Chhiáⁿ thòe góa chhéng-an Chú-lāi góa só͘ thiàⁿ ê [Àm-pek-lī].
45016009	Chhéng-an tī Ki-tok lāi-bīn ê tâng-kang [Ní-pa-lô͘] kap góa só͘ thiaⁿ ê [Sū-tāi-kó͘].
45016010	Chhéng-an tī Ki-tok keng-kè khó-giām ê [A-pí-lī]. Kā [A-lī-to-pò͘] ke-lāi ê lâng chhéng-an.
45016011	Kā góa ê chhin-cho̍k [Hi-lô-thian] chhéng-an. Kā [Ná-kî-sò͘] ke-lāi sìn Chú ê lâng chhéng-an.
45016012	Chhiáⁿ thòe góa chhéng-an ūi-tio̍h Chú siū chin chōe lô-khó͘ ê [Thó͘-hui-ná] kap [Thó͘-hù-sat]. Kā só͘ thiàⁿ ê [Pí-sek] chhéng-an; i bat ūi-tio̍h Chú lô-khó͘ kang-chok.
45016013	Chhéng-an tī Chú siū kéng-soán ê [Ló͘-hu] kap i ê lāu-bú; i ê lāu-bú mā-sī góa ê lāu-bú.
45016014	Kā [A-sùn-kî-thó͘], [Hut-le̍k-kan], [Hek-bí], [Pat-lô-pa], [Hek-má] í-ki̍p kap in chòe-hé ê hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē chhéng-an.
45016015	Kā [Hui-lô-lô-kó͘] kap [Iû-lī-a], [Nî-lī-a] kap i ê chí-bē, kap [O-lîm-pa], í-ki̍p kap in chòe-hé ê chèng sìn-tô͘ chhéng-an.
45016016	Lín tio̍h ēng sèng-kiat ê saⁿ-chim hō͘-siōng chhéng-an. Ki-tok ê chèng kàu-hōe lóng kā lín chhéng-an.
45016017	Hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, góa khó͘-khǹg lín, tio̍h sió-sim thê-hông hiah-ê chè-chō hun-lia̍t, hō͘ lín hoān-chōe, ûi-pōe lín só͘ niá-siū ê kà-sī hiah-ê lâng.
45016018	In-ūi chit khoán lâng m̄-sī choh lô͘-po̍k teh ho̍k-sāi lán ê Chú Ki-tok, sī teh kò͘ ka-kī ê pak-tó͘, ēng hoa-giân-kháu-gú iú-he̍k láu-si̍t-lâng ê sim.
45016019	In-ūi lín ê sūn-ho̍k, chèng-lâng í-keng lóng chai, só͘-í góa ūi-tio̍h lín hoaⁿ-hí. Góa ài lín tùi hó-sū tio̍h khiáu, tùi pháiⁿ-sū tio̍h gōng.
45016020	Sù pêng-an ê Siōng-tè chin kín chiū ōe chiong Sat-tàn ta̍h-chhùi, hō͘ i khut-ho̍k tī lín kha-ē. Goān lán ê Chú Iâ-so͘ ê un-hūi kap lín tông-chāi!
45016021	Góa ê tâng-kang [Thê-mô͘-thài] í-ki̍p góa ê chhin-cho̍k [Lō͘-kiû], [Iâ-sun], [Só͘-se-pa-tek] kā lín chhéng-an.
45016022	Góa --- [Tek-thê], chiū-sī chit tiuⁿ phoe ê tāi-pit-jîn, tī Chú-lāi kā lín chhéng-an.
45016023	Chiap-thāi góa kap choân kàu-hōe ê [Kai-iû] kā lín chhéng-an. Pún-chhī ê kòe-kè-tiúⁿ [Í-la-to͘] kap lán ê hiaⁿ-tī [Koat-thó͘] mā kā lín chhéng-an.
45016025	Goān êng-kng kui hō͘ Siōng-tè! I ōe chiàu góa só͘ thoân ê hok-im, chiū-sī soan-iông Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok, lâi kian-kò͘ lín ê sìn-sim. Chit-ê hok-im sī bān-kó͘ í-lâi só͘ ún-ba̍t ê ò-biāu,
45016026	taⁿ í-keng chiàu éng-oa̍h Siōng-tè ê bēng-lēng, thong-kè chèng sian-ti ê chheh hián-bêng chhut-lâi, beh hō͘ bān-bîn sìn lâi sūn-thàn.
45016027	Goān êng-kng thong-kè Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok kui tī to̍k-it choân-tì ê Siōng-tè, ti̍t-kàu éng-oán. Amen!
46001001	Góa sī [Pó-lô], hōng Siōng-tè ê chí-ì siū tiàu choh Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ ê sù-tô͘. Góa kap lán ê hiaⁿ-tī [Só͘-thê-nî]
46001002	siá-phoe hō͘ tī [Ko-lîm-to] Siōng-tè ê kàu-hōe, chiū-sī hiah-ê kap tī ta̍k só͘-chāi ho͘-kiò lán ê Chú Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok ê miâ, kap Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ kiat-liân siū tiàu choh sìn-tô͘ kui-sio̍k Siōng-tè ê lâng; Ki-tok sī in ê Chú, mā-sī lán ê Chú.
46001003	Goān lán ê Pē Siōng-tè kap Chú Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok sù lín un-tián kap pêng-an!
46001004	Góa sî-siông ūi-tio̍h lín teh kám-siā góa ê Siōng-tè, in-ūi I thong-kè Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ sù lín un-tián,
46001005	hō͘ lín thong-kè Ki-tok ta̍k hāng tit-tio̍h hù-chiok, chhiong-móa ta̍k khoán kháu-châi kap tì-sek.
46001006	Ki-tok ê sìn-sit í-keng tī lín tiong-kan kian-kò͘ kiàn-li̍p,
46001007	hō͘ lín lóng bô khiàm sím-mi̍h un-sù, thèng-hāu lán ê Chú Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok hián-hiān.
46001008	I mā ōe hō͘ lín kian-kò͘ ti̍t-kàu chòe-āu, tī lán ê Chú Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok ê Ji̍t bô thang hiâm.
46001009	Siōng-tè sī sìn-si̍t, I ho͘-tiàu lín, beh hō͘ lín kap I ê Kiáⁿ lán ê Chú Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok kiat-liân.
46001010	Hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, góa hōng lán ê Chú Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok ê miâ khǹg lín tāi-ke, kóng-ōe tio̍h it-tì; lín tiong-kan mā m̄-thang hun-lia̍t. Tio̍h thoân-kiat, ū siâng-khoán ê siūⁿ-hoat kap kiōng-tông ê bo̍k-phiau.
46001011	Góa ê hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, [Kek-lâi] in tau ê lâng ū tùi góa kóng-khí lín tiong-kan ū hun-cheng.
46001012	Góa án-ni kóng sī in-ūi lín tiong-kan ì-kiàn hun-hun; ū-ê kóng “Góa sio̍k [Pó-lô]”; ū-ê kóng “Góa sio̍k [A-pho-lô]”; ū-ê kóng “Góa sio̍k [Pí-tek]”; mā ū-ê kóng “Góa sio̍k Ki-tok”.
46001013	Ki-tok kèng-jiân hō͘ lâng hun-koah lah! [Pó-lô] kiám ū thòe lín tèng-sí tī si̍p-jī-kè? Lín kiám ū hōng [Pó-lô] ê miâ niá-siū sóe-lé?
46001014	Kám-siā Siōng-tè, [Ki-lī-su-pò͘] kap [Kai-iû] í-gōa, góa bô kā lín tiong-kan sím-mi̍h lâng sóe-lé.
46001015	Án-ni bô-lâng ōe-tàng kóng, lín ū hōng góa ê miâ niá-siū sóe-lé.
46001016	Ū-lah, góa mā ū kā [Sū-thê-hoán-ná] chi̍t ke ê lâng sóe-lé, kî-tha ū kā pa̍t-lâng sóe-lé á-bô, góa bōe kì-tit.
46001017	Ki-tok bô chhe góa kā lâng sóe-lé, sī beh thoân hok-im, m̄-sī ēng tì-hūi ê giân-sû thoân, chiah-bián hō͘ Ki-tok ê si̍p-jī-kè sit-khì hāu-le̍k.
46001018	Si̍p-jī-kè ê sìn-sit, tùi hiah-ê ǹg bia̍t-bông teh kiâⁿ ê lâng sī gû-gōng, put-kò tùi lán chiah-ê ǹg tit-kiù teh kiâⁿ ê lâng sī Siōng-tè ê tōa lêng-le̍k.
46001019	In-ūi Sèng-keng ū kì-chài: Góa beh siau-bia̍t tì-hūi ê lâng ê tì-hūi; góa beh khì-sak chhong-bêng ê lâng ê chhong-bêng.
46001020	Án-ni tì-hūi ê lâng tī tó-ūi? Keng-ha̍k-kàu-su tī tó-ūi? Chit sè-kan ê hiông-piān-ka tī tó-ūi? Siōng-tè í-keng hō͘ chit sè-kan ê tì-hūi pìⁿ-chòe gû-gōng lah!
46001021	Kì-jiân sè-kan-lâng bōe-tàng khò ka-kī ê tì-hūi jīn-bat Siōng-tè, Siōng-tè chiū tùi I ê tì-hūi hoaⁿ-hí ēng goán só͘ thoân gû-gōng ê sìn-sit lâi chín-kiù sìn I ê lâng.
46001022	[Iû-thài]-lâng kiû sîn-jiah, [Hi-la̍h]-lâng chhē tì-hūi,
46001023	put-kò goán soan-iông tèng si̍p-jī-kè ê Ki-tok. Chit-ê sìn-sit tùi [Iû-thài]-lâng sī chó͘-gāi, tùi Gōa-pang-lâng sī gû-gōng,
46001024	m̄-kú tùi Siōng-tè só͘ kéng-tiàu ê lâng, bô-lūn sī [Iû-thài]-lâng á-sī [Hi-la̍h]-lâng, chit-ê sìn-sit sī Siōng-tè ê tōa lêng-le̍k, sī Siōng-tè ê tì-hūi.
46001025	In-ūi Siōng-tè ê gû-gōng pí lâng khah tì-hūi, Siōng-tè ê loán-jio̍k pí lâng khah ióng-chòng.
46001026	Hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, tio̍h ōe kì-tit Siōng-tè ho͘-tiàu lín ê sî, chiàu lâng ê phiau-chún, lín tiong-kan bô jōa chōe lâng ū tì-hūi, bô jōa chōe lâng ū lêng-le̍k, bô jōa chōe lâng ū chun-kùi tōe-ūi.
46001027	Siōng-tè kò͘-ì ēng sè-kan-lâng khòaⁿ-chòe gōng ê tāi-chì lâi hō͘ khiáu ê lâng kiàn-siàu; Siōng-tè ēng sè-kan-lâng khòaⁿ-chòe jio̍k ê tāi-chì lâi hō͘ kiông ê lâng kiàn-siàu.
46001028	Siōng-tè ēng sè-kan-lâng só͘ biáu-sī, khòaⁿ-bōe-khí ê tāi-chì lâi phò-hoāi lâng só͘ khòaⁿ-tāng ê tāi-chì;
46001029	án-ni sè-kan chiū bô-lâng ōe-tàng tī Siōng-tè ê bīn-chêng khoa-kháu.
46001030	M̄-kú Siōng-tè hō͘ lín kap Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ kiat-liân, hō͘ Ki-tok chiâⁿ-chòe lán tùi Siōng-tè lâi ê tì-hūi, hō͘ lán kap Siōng-tè ū ha̍p-gî ê koan-hē, chiâⁿ-chòe Siōng-tè sèng-kiat ê chú-bîn, koh tit-tio̍h chū-iû.
46001031	Chiàu Sèng-keng só͘ kì-chài, “Beh khoa-kháu ê lâng tio̍h khoa-kháu Chú.”
46002001	Hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, góa í-chêng khì lín hia ê sî bô ēng súi ê giân-sû á-sī tì-hūi soan-káng Siōng-tè ê ò-pì.
46002002	In-ūi góa koat-tēng, tī lín tiong-kan sím-mi̍h to m̄-kóng, chí-ū beh kóng Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok í-ki̍p I tèng-sí tī si̍p-jī-kè ê sū.
46002003	Góa tī lín hia ê sî, loán-jio̍k koh kiaⁿ-kah phi̍h-phi̍h-chhoah.
46002004	Góa só kóng ê ōe, só͘ soan-káng ê sìn-sit, lóng bô ēng kháu-biāu tì-hūi ê giân-sû, sī khò Siōng-tè ê Sîn ê tōa lêng-le̍k lâi chèng-si̍t,
46002005	sī beh hō͘ lín ê sìn-gióng m̄-sī khò lâng ê tì-hūi, sī khò Siōng-tè ê tōa lêng-le̍k.
46002006	Sui-jiân sī án-ni, tùi hiah-ê lêng-sèng sêng-se̍k ê lâng góa mā ū kóng tì-hūi, put-kò m̄-sī chit sè-kan ê tì-hūi, mā m̄-sī chit sè-kan chù-tiāⁿ ōe sit-sè ê thóng-tī-chiá ê tì-hūi.
46002007	Góa só͘ kóng ê sī Siōng-tè ò-pì ê tì-hūi, sī tùi lâng ún-ba̍t ê, sī Siōng-tè ūi-tio̍h beh hō͘ lán tit-tio̍h êng-kng, tī chhòng-sè í-chêng chiū seng koat-tēng ê.
46002008	Chit sè-kan ê thóng-tī-chiá bô chi̍t ê jīn-bat chit-ê tì-hūi, in nā bat chiū bōe chiong êng-iāu ê Chú tèng-sí tī si̍p-jī-kè.
46002009	Chiàu Sèng-keng só͘ kì-chài: Siōng-tè ūi-tio̍h thiàⁿ I ê lâng chún-pī ê, sī ba̍k-chiu m̄-bat khòaⁿ-tio̍h, hīⁿ-khang m̄-bat thiaⁿ-tio̍h, mā m̄-bat ū lâng siūⁿ-tio̍h ê.
46002010	M̄-kú Siōng-tè í-keng ū thong-kè Sèng Sîn chiong chiah-ê sū tùi lán khé-sī. Sèng Sîn thiat-tóe chai bān-sū, liân Siōng-tè chhim-tîm ê chí-ì mā chai.
46002011	Chí-ū lâng ka-kī lāi-bīn ê sîn chiah chai ka-kī ê sū; chhin-chhiūⁿ án-ni, chí-ū Siōng-tè ê Sîn chiah chai Siōng-tè ê sū.
46002012	Lán niá-siū ê m̄-sī sè-kan ê sîn, sī tùi Siōng-tè lâi ê Sîn, beh hō͘ lán chai Siōng-tè sù hō͘ lán ê un-sù.
46002013	Só͘-í, goán tùi sio̍k-lêng ê lâng kóe-seh sio̍k Sèng Sîn ê sū, m̄-sī ēng lâng só͘ kà ê tì-hūi, sī ēng Sèng Sîn só͘ kà ê ōe.
46002014	Sio̍k hiat-khì ê lâng bōe-tàng niá-siū tùi Siōng-tè ê Sîn lâi ê un-sù, chiah-ê un-sù tùi i lâi kóng sī gû-gōng ê, bô hoat-tō͘ liáu-kái, in-ūi chí-ū sio̍k-lêng ê lâng chiah ōe-tàng léng-ngō͘.
46002015	Sio̍k Sèng Sîn ê lâng ōe-hiáu phòaⁿ-toàn bān-sū, put-kò i pún-sin ê sū bô-lâng ōe-tàng kā i phòaⁿ-toàn.
46002016	Sèng-keng ū kì-chài: Sím-mi̍h-lâng chai Chú ê sim-ì? Sím-mi̍h-lâng ōe-tàng kā I chhut chú-ì? M̄-kú lán ū Ki-tok ê sim-ì.
46003001	Hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, góa kàu taⁿ tùi lín kóng-ōe, bōe-tàng khòaⁿ lín chòe sio̍k Sèng Sîn ê, sī sio̍k-sè ê, sī Ki-tok sìn-gióng ê eⁿ-á.
46003002	Góa ēng lin chhī lín, bô ēng pn̄g, in-ūi lín iáu bōe-tàng chia̍h-pn̄g, kàu hiān-chāi mā iáu bōe-tàng,
46003003	in-ūi lín iáu-kú sī sio̍k-sè ê lâng. Lín tiong-kan ū chi̍t-tò͘, ū hun-cheng; án-ni kiám m̄-sī chèng-bêng lín sī sio̍k-sè ê, sī chiàu sè-kan-lâng ê hong-sek teh seng-oa̍h?
46003004	Lín tiong-kan ū lâng kóng “Góa sio̍k [Pó-lô]”; mā ū lâng kóng “Góa sio̍k [A-pho-lô]”. Án-ni lín kap sè-kan-lâng ū sím-mi̍h bô kâng-khoán?
46003005	[A-pho-lô] sǹg siáⁿ? [Pó-lô] sǹg siáⁿ? Goán put-kò sī Siōng-tè ê chhe-ēng, ín-chhōa lín siong-sìn; ta̍k ê lâng chiàu Chú só͘ hō͘ goán ê chit-hūn teh chòe.
46003006	Góa iā-chéng, [A-pho-lô] ak-chúi, m̄-kú Siōng-tè hō͘ i tōa-châng.
46003007	Iā-chéng-ê kap ak-chúi-ê lóng bô tiōng-iàu, chí-ū hō͘ i tōa-châng ê Siōng-tè chiah tiōng-iàu.
46003008	Iā-chéng-ê kap ak-chúi-ê lóng kâng-khoán, Siōng-tè ōe chiàu ta̍k lâng ê kang-chok kā in pò-siúⁿ.
46003009	Goán sī Siōng-tè ê tâng-kang; lín sī Siōng-tè ê chhân-hn̂g. Lín mā-sī Siōng-tè ê kiàn-tio̍k-bu̍t.
46003010	Chiàu Siōng-tè hō͘ góa ê un-sù, choh chi̍t ê gâu ê kiàn-tio̍k-su, góa hē tōe-ki, pa̍t-lâng tī hit téng-bīn khí-chō. M̄-kú ta̍k ê lâng tio̍h khòaⁿ ka-kī án-chóaⁿ teh khí-chō.
46003011	In-ūi Siōng-tè í-keng ū hē Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok chòe î-it ê tōe-ki, I í-gōa bô pa̍t-ê tōe-ki.
46003012	Tī chit-ê tōe-ki téng, lâng nā ēng kim, gûn, pó-chio̍h, bo̍k-chhâi, chháu, á-sī tiū-kó khí-chō,
46003013	ta̍k ê lâng kang-thêng ê hó-bái, tī Ki-tok lâi-lîm ê Ji̍t, ōe hō͘ hé kā i lō͘-hiān chhut-lâi, in-ūi hé ōe chhì-giām ta̍k ê lâng kang-thêng ê phín-chit.
46003014	Lâng só͘ khí-chō ê nā hō͘ hé sio bōe-khì, i chiū ōe tit-tio̍h pò-siúⁿ.
46003015	Lâng só͘ khí-chō ê nā hō͘ hé sio-khì, i chiū ōe sún-sit; put-kò i pún-sin ōe tit-tio̍h kiù, chhin-chhiūⁿ tùi hé-tiong tô-miā cháu chhut-lâi.
46003016	Kiám m̄-chai, lín sī Siōng-tè ê tiān, Siōng-tè ê Sîn tiàm tī lín lāi-bīn?
46003017	Nā ū lâng húi-hoāi Siōng-tè ê tiān, Siōng-tè ōe kā hit-ê lâng húi-bia̍t; in-ūi Siōng-tè ê tiān sī sîn-sèng ê, lín chiū-sī hit-ê tiān.
46003018	M̄-thang phiàn ka-kī. Lín tiong-kan nā ū lâng ēng sè-kan ê phiau-chún khòaⁿ ka-kī chòe ū tì-hūi, ūi-tio̍h beh chiâⁿ-chòe chin-chiàⁿ ū tì-hūi, i tian-tò tio̍h chòe gû-gōng ê.
46003019	In-ūi chit sè-kan ê tì-hūi, tùi Siōng-tè lâi khòaⁿ sī gû-gōng. Sèng-keng ū kì-chài: Siōng-tè hō͘ tì-hūi ê lâng tiòng-tio̍h ka-kī ê khúi-kè.
46003020	Pa̍t ê só͘-chāi koh kóng: Chú chai tì-hūi ê lâng ê sim-su bô lō͘-ēng.
46003021	Só͘-í, bô-lūn sím-mi̍h-lâng lóng m̄-thang ēng lâng chòe khoa-kháu. Kî-si̍t it-chhè lóng sī lín ê:
46003022	bô-lūn [Pó-lô], [A-pho-lô], [Pí-tek], chit sè-kài, siⁿ á-sī sí, hiān-chāi á-sī chiong-lâi, che it-chhè lóng sī lín ê;
46003023	lín sī Ki-tok ê, Ki-tok sī Siōng-tè ê.
46004001	Án-ni, lâng tio̍h khòaⁿ goán choh Ki-tok ê lô͘-po̍k, sī Siōng-tè ò-pì ê koán-ke.
46004002	Tùi koán-ke ê iau-kiû sī tio̍h tùi chú-lâng tiong-si̍t.
46004003	Góa siū lín á-sī pa̍t-lâng phêng-toàn, lóng khòaⁿ-chòe sió-sū; liân góa mā bô phêng-toàn ka-kī.
46004004	Góa kám-kak ka-kī ê liông-sim chheng-pe̍k, put-kò m̄-sī án-ni chiū chèng-bêng góa bô-chōe. Sím-phòaⁿ góa ê sī Chú.
46004005	Só͘-í, sî-ki iáu-bē kàu, lín m̄-thang phoe-phòaⁿ lâng. Tán kàu Chú lâi-lîm, hit sî I ōe ēng kng chiò o͘-àm-tiong ê pì-bi̍t, kā ún-chông tī lâng sim-lāi ê tōng-ki po̍k-lō͘ chhut-lâi. Hit sî, ta̍k ê lâng ōe tùi Siōng-tè tit-tio̍h chheng-chàn.
46004006	Hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, ūi-tio̍h lín ê iân-kò͘, góa chiong chiah-ê sū chòe lē ēng tī góa pún-sin kap [A-pho-lô] ê sin-chiūⁿ, hō͘ lín thang tùi goán ha̍k-si̍p “m̄-thang chhiau-kè Sèng-keng só͘ kì-chài” chit kù ōe ê ì-sù. Lín tiong-kan bô-lūn sím-mi̍h-lâng to m̄-thang phô͘-tháⁿ chit-ê, khòaⁿ-khin hit-ê.
46004007	Sím-mi̍h-lâng hō͘ lí siūⁿ-kóng ka-kī pí pa̍t-lâng khah gâu? Lí só͘-ū-ê kiám m̄-sī lóng tùi Siōng-tè niá-siū? Nā án-ni, lí sī-án-chóaⁿ teh chū-khoa, ná-chún m̄-sī tùi Siōng-tè niá-siū.
46004008	Lín í-keng ta̍k hāng lóng ū! Lín í-keng hù-chiok! Lín kā goán sak tī piⁿ-a, ka-kī choh-ông. Lín nā chin-chiàⁿ choh-ông m̄-chai jōa-á-ni̍h hó leh, án-ni góa mā thang kap lín chòe-hé choh-ông!
46004009	Góa siūⁿ, Siōng-tè chiong goán chiah-ê sù-tô͘ pâi tī bé-liu, chhin-chhiūⁿ sí-hêng-hoān hō͘ lâng thoa chhut-lâi sī-chiòng, hō͘ sè-kài, thiⁿ-sài, kap lâng khòaⁿ.
46004010	Goán ūi-tio̍h Ki-tok ê iân-kò͘ chòe gōng-lâng, lín khiok kap Ki-tok kiat-liân chòe khiáu-lâng; goán loán-jio̍k, lín ióng-chòng; lín siū chun-tiōng, goán siū khòaⁿ-khin.
46004011	Kàu hiān-chāi, goán iáu koh-teh chhùi-ta, chhēng phòa-saⁿ, siông-siông hō͘ lâng phah, ta̍k só͘-chāi liû-lōng;
46004012	goán khò siang-chhiú thoa-bôa tō͘-oa̍h. Goán hō͘ lâng mē, hoán-tńg kā in chiok-hok; hō͘ lâng pek-hāi, goán jím-nāi;
46004013	hō͘ lâng bú-jio̍k, goán ēng hó-ōe hôe-tap. Kàu hiān-chāi, goán iáu hō͘ lâng khòaⁿ-chòe sè-kan ê pùn-sò, jîn-kan ê che-tái.
46004014	Góa siá chiah-ê hō͘ lín, m̄-sī beh hō͘ lín kiàn-siàu, sī khòaⁿ lín chòe ka-kī chhin-ài ê kiáⁿ-jî teh kā lín kà-sī.
46004015	Lín sui-jiân ū kui-bān-ê kàu-tok ê lâng teh kà lín bat Ki-tok, m̄-kú lāu-pē chí-ū chi̍t-ê. Thong-kè hok-im, góa tī Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ chiâⁿ-chòe lín ê lāu-pē.
46004016	Só͘-í góa khǹg lín, tio̍h o̍h góa.
46004017	In-ūi án-ni, góa chhe [Thê-mô͘-thài] khì lín hia; tī Chú ê lāi-bīn i sī góa chhin-ài koh tiong-si̍t ê kiáⁿ; i ōe chiong góa kap Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ kiat-liân ê bô͘-hoān, chiū-sī góa tī ta̍k só͘-chāi ta̍k kàu-hōe só͘ kà-sī ê sū kā lín thê-chhíⁿ.
46004018	Lín tiong-kan ū lâng siūⁿ-kóng góa bōe khì lín hia, chiū chū-ko chū-tāi.
46004019	Nā-sī Chú ê ì-sù, góa liâm-piⁿ ōe khì lín hia. Hit sî, góa chiū ōe chai hiah-ê kiau-ngō͘ ê lâng teh kóng sím-mi̍h, mā ōe chai in ōe-tàng chòe sím-mi̍h.
46004020	In-ūi Siōng-tè-kok ê si̍t-hiān m̄-sī khò giân-sû, sī khò koân-lêng.
46004021	Lín ài tó chi̍t hāng? Góa khì lín hia ê sî, lín ài góa gia̍h chhê-á á-sī tòa un-jiû thiàⁿ-thàng ê sim?
46005001	Góa khak-si̍t ū thiaⁿ-tio̍h tī lín tiong-kan ū îm-loān ê sū; chit khoán îm-loān liân kàu-hōe-gōa mā bô, in-ūi ū lâng kap i ê āu-bú tông-ku.
46005002	Án-ni, lín iáu ū sím-mi̍h thang phòng-hong! Lín kiám m̄ eng-kai kám-kak siong-sim, kā chòe chit khoán tāi-chì ê lâng tùi lín tiong-kan khai-tû?
46005003	Sui-jiân góa lâng kap lín saⁿ-lī, sim khiok kap lín chòe-hé. Góa í-keng hōng Chú Iâ-so͘ ê miâ kā chòe chit khoán khó-ò͘ⁿ ê tāi-chì ê lâng phòaⁿ-chōe lah. Lín chū-chi̍p ê sî, góa ê sim mā kap lín chòe-hé, thang khò lán ê Chú Iâ-so͘ ê tōa lêng-le̍k,
46005005	chiong chit-ê lâng kau hō͘ Sat-tàn húi-bia̍t i ê seng-khu, hō͘ i ê lêng-hûn thang tī lán ê Chú ê Ji̍t tit-tio̍h kiù.
46005006	Lín teh khoa-kháu bô eng-kai! Lín kiám m̄-chai “Chi̍t sut-á kàⁿ-bú ōe hō͘ kui oân ê mī-chhè hoat khí-lâi”?
46005007	Kū ê kàⁿ tio̍h tû hō͘ chheng-khì, lín chiah ōe chiâⁿ-chòe sin ê mī-chhè, sū-si̍t lín sī bô kàⁿ ê chhè. Lán Pôaⁿ-kè-choeh ê iûⁿ-ko Ki-tok í-keng hiàn-chòe seng-lé.
46005008	Só͘-í, lán m̄-thang ēng ok-to̍k siâ-ok ê kū kàⁿ-bú, tio̍h ēng sûn-choân chin-si̍t ê bô-kàⁿ-piáⁿ chòe chè-mi̍h lâi siú-choeh.
46005009	Góa chêng kià hō͘ lín ê phoe ū kéng-kài lín m̄-thang kap îm-loān ê lâng lâi-óng.
46005010	Góa m̄-sī chí chit sè-kan hiah-ê îm-loān, tham-loân, chà-khi, kap pài ngó͘-siōng ê lâng; nā m̄-sī lī-khui chit-ê sè-kài chiū bōe-tàng bô kap chiah-ê lâng lâi-óng.
46005011	Góa taⁿ án-ni siá, sī kóng m̄-thang kap hiah-ê chū-chheng Ki-tok-tô͘, khiok sī îm-loān, tham-loân, pài ngó͘-siōng, húi-pòng pa̍t-lâng, chiú-chùi, á-sī chà-khi ê lâng lâi-óng; liân kap chiah-ê lâng tâng-toh chia̍h-pn̄g to m̄-thang.
46005012	Phoe-phòaⁿ kàu-hōe-gōa ê lâng m̄-sī góa ê tāi-chì; Siōng-tè ōe kā in sím-phòaⁿ. Lín kiám m̄-sī tio̍h phoe-phòaⁿ kàu-hōe-lāi ê lâng? Sèng-keng ū kì-chài, “Tio̍h tùi lín tiong-kan chiong siâ-ok ê lâng khai-tû!”
46006001	Lín tiong-kan ū lâng kap pa̍t-ê sìn-tô͘ ū kiù-hun, bô tī sìn-tô͘ bīn-chêng kā i kò, hoán-tńg tùi bô-sìn ê lâng kò i?
46006002	Lín kiám m̄-chai sìn-tô͘ beh sím-phòaⁿ sè-kan? Kì-jiân lín beh sím-phòaⁿ sè-kan, kiám bōe-hiáu kái-koat sió-khóa tāi-chì?
46006003	Lín kiám m̄-chai liân thiⁿ-sài lán to beh sím-phòaⁿ, chit sè-kan ji̍t-siông ê tāi-chì koh-khah m̄-bián kóng.
46006004	Chit khoán tāi-chì, lín kiám thang kau hō͘ bô siū kàu-hōe chun-tiōng ê gōa-lâng chhú-lí ?
46006005	Lín si̍t-chāi chin kiàn-siàu! Lín tiong-kan kiám chin-chiàⁿ bô chi̍t ê ū tì-hūi ê lâng thang phòaⁿ-toàn sìn-tô͘ tiong-kan ê sī-hui?
46006006	Lín kèng-jiân ū sìn-tô͘ kò sìn-tô͘, sīm-chì kò kàu bô-sìn ê lâng bīn-chêng!
46006007	Kî-si̍t lín sio-kò, piáu-sī lín í-keng lóng su lah. Lín ná m̄ lêng-khó siū oan-óng? Ná m̄ lêng-khó siū khek-khui?
46006008	Lín tian-tò oan-óng lâng, khek-khui lâng, sīm-chì tùi hōe-lāi ê hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē mā án-ni chòe!
46006009	Kiám m̄-chai put-gī ê lâng bōe-tàng chòe Siōng-tè-kok ê chú-bîn? M̄-thang phiàn ka-kī; bô-lūn sī îm-loān ê, pài ngó͘-siōng ê, choh lâm-chhiong ê, hò͘ⁿ lâm-sek ê,
46006010	chòe-chha̍t ê, tham-sim ê, chiú-chùi ê, húi-pòng ê, chà-khi ê, lóng bōe-tàng chòe Siōng-tè-kok ê chú-bîn.
46006011	Lín tiong-kan ū lâng í-chêng sī án-ni. M̄-kú lín í-keng sóe chheng-khì, í-keng sèng-hòa kui Siōng-tè, í-keng thong-kè Chú Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok ê miâ, koh thong-kè lán ê Siōng-tè ê Sîn, kap Siōng-tè ū ha̍p-gî ê koan-hē.
46006012	Ū lâng kóng, “Ta̍k hāng tāi-chì góa lóng thang chòe.” M̄-kú m̄-sī ta̍k hāng tāi-chì lóng ū lī-ek. Góa mā thang kóng, “Ta̍k hāng tāi-chì góa lóng thang chòe.” M̄-kú góa bô beh hō͘ jīm-hô tāi-chì khòng-chè.
46006013	Ū lâng kóng, “Chia̍h-mi̍h sī ūi-tio̍h pak-tó͘, pak-tó͘ sī ūi-tio̍h chia̍h-mi̍h.” Tio̍h, m̄-kú chit nn̄g hāng, Siōng-tè lóng ōe kā in húi-hoāi. Seng-khu m̄-sī ūi-tio̍h îm-loān, sī ūi-tio̍h ho̍k-sāi Chú; Chú ōe kiong-kip lán seng-khu ê su-iàu.
46006014	Siōng-tè ū hō͘ Chú tùi sí koh-oa̍h, I mā ōe ēng I ê tōa lêng-le̍k hō͘ lán koh-oa̍h.
46006015	Kiám m̄-chai lín ê seng-khu sī Ki-tok ê chi-thé? Án-ni, góa kiám thang chiong Ki-tok ê chi-thé hō͘ i pìⁿ-chòe ki-lú ê chi-thé? Choa̍t-tùi m̄-thang!
46006016	Kiám m̄-chai, kap ki-lú hoat-seng jio̍k-thé koan-hē chiū-sī kap i chiâⁿ-chòe chi̍t-thé? In-ūi Sèng-keng kóng, “Nn̄g ê lâng beh chiâⁿ-chòe chi̍t-thé.”
46006017	M̄-kú kap Chú kiat-ha̍p ê lâng, chiū tī sim-lêng kap I chiâⁿ-chòe chi̍t-thé.
46006018	Tio̍h kū-choa̍t îm-loān. Lâng bô-lūn hoān sím-mi̍h chōe, lóng bô éng-hióng ka-kī ê seng-khu, put-kò hoān îm-loān ê sī hoān-chōe hāi-tio̍h ka-kī ê seng-khu.
46006019	Kiám m̄-chai lín ê seng-khu sī Sèng Sîn ê tiān? Chit-ūi Sèng Sîn tiàm tī lín lāi-bīn, sī lín tùi Siōng-tè niá-siū ê. Lín m̄-sī sio̍k ka-kī, sī sio̍k Siōng-tè,
46006020	in-ūi lín sī I hù-chhut tāi-kè bóe lâi ê. Só͘-í, tio̍h ēng lín ê seng-khu êng-iāu Siōng-tè.
46007001	Koan-hē lín tī phoe ê lāi-bīn só͘ siá ê būn-tôe: Ta-po͘-lâng bô chhin-kūn cha-bó͘-lâng khah hó.
46007002	M̄-kú ūi-tio̍h îm-loān ê tāi-chì, ta-po͘-lâng eng-kai ū ka-kī ê bó͘; cha-bó͘-lâng eng-kai ū ka-kī ê ang.
46007003	Ta-po͘-lâng tùi bó͘ eng-kai chīn choh-ang ê gī-bū; cha-bó͘-lâng tùi ang eng-kai chīn choh-bó͘ ê gī-bū.
46007004	Bó͘ tùi ka-kī ê seng-khu bô koân, m̄-kú ang ū; siâng-khoán, ang tùi ka-kī ê seng-khu bô koân, m̄-kú bó͘ ū.
46007005	M̄-thang hut-lio̍k tùi-hong ê su-iàu; nā ūi-tio̍h beh choan-sim kî-tó, thang tông-ì chiām-sî hun-khui; chóng-sī í-āu tio̍h koh hôe-ho̍k chèng-siông ê koan-hē, chiah-bián in-ūi bōe-tàng khòng-chè ka-kī tì-kàu siū Sat-tàn iú-he̍k.
46007006	Góa kóng thang chiām-sî hun-khui, sī bián-kióng tông-ì, m̄-sī bēng-lēng.
46007007	Sū-si̍t, góa ài ta̍k ê lâng lóng chhin-chhiūⁿ góa bô kiat-hun. M̄-kú ta̍k ê lâng tùi Siōng-tè niá-siū bô kâng-khoán ê un-sù, chit-ê lâng chit khoán, hit-ê lâng hit khoán.
46007008	Hiān-chāi, góa tùi bô kiat-hun-ê kap kóaⁿ-hū kóng, nā ōe-tàng chhin-chhiūⁿ góa siú to̍k-sin sī khah hó;
46007009	m̄-kú nā bōe-tàng khòng-chè ka-kī, chiū tio̍h kiat-hun. Lêng-khó kiat-hun, pí hō͘ io̍k-hé sio khah hó.
46007010	Í-keng kiat-hun ê lâng, góa bēng-lēng lín --- kî-si̍t m̄-sī góa, sī Chú ê bēng-lēng: Cha-bó͘-lâng m̄-thang lī-khui tiōng-hu,
46007011	nā lī-khui, tio̍h siú to̍k-sin; nā bô, tio̍h koh kap tiōng-hu hô-hó. Tiōng-hu mā m̄-thang pàng-sak bó͘.
46007012	Tùi kî-tha ê lâng, góa kóng --- m̄-sī Chú kóng ê: Lâm ê sìn-tô͘ nā chhōa bô sìn Chú ê lâng chòe bó͘, bó͘ tông-ì kè-sio̍k kap i tòa, i chiū m̄-thang kā i pàng-sak.
46007013	Nā ū lú ê sìn-tô͘ kap bô sìn Chú ê lâng kiat-hun, tiōng-hu tông-ì kè-sio̍k kap i tòa, i mā m̄-thang pàng-sak tiōng-hu.
46007014	Bô sìn Chú ê tiōng-hu ōe in-ūi sìn Chú ê bó͘ tit-tio̍h Siōng-tè chiap-la̍p. Chhin-chhiūⁿ án-ni, bô sìn Chú ê bó͘ mā ōe in-ūi sìn Chú ê tiōng-hu tit-tio̍h Siōng-tè chiap-la̍p. Nā m̄-sī án-ni, in ê kiáⁿ-jî chiū bô sio̍k Siōng-tè; kî-si̍t, in sī sio̍k Siōng-tè.
46007015	M̄-kú, bô sìn Chú ê lâng nā beh lī-khui, chiū chhut-chāi i lī-khui. Tī chit khoán ê chêng-hêng, sìn Chú ê tiōng-hu á-sī bó͘ chiū bô siū hun-in ê iok-sok. Siōng-tè ho͘-tiàu lín, sī ài lín hô-bo̍k khiā-khí.
46007016	Tio̍h chai, sìn Chú ê cha-bó͘-lâng kiám-chhái ōe kiù ka-kī ê tiōng-hu. Tio̍h chai, sìn Chú ê tiōng-hu kiám-chhái ōe kiù ka-kī ê bó͘.
46007017	Bô-lūn án-chóaⁿ, ta̍k ê lâng tio̍h chiàu Chú pun hō͘ lín ê un-sù, chiàu Siōng-tè kéng-tiàu ê bo̍k-te̍k lâi seng-oa̍h. Che sī góa hō͘ ta̍k ê kàu-hōe ê kui-tēng.
46007018	Kat-lé liáu-āu chiah siū ho͘-tiàu ê lâng, m̄-bián am-khàm kat-lé ê kì-hō; siū ho͘-tiàu ê sî iáu-bē kat-lé ê lâng mā m̄-bián siū kat-lé.
46007019	In-ūi ū kat-lé bô kat-lé lóng bô iàu-kín, iàu-kín ê sī tio̍h chun-siú Siōng-tè ê kài-bēng.
46007020	Ta̍k ê lâng tio̍h pó-chhî siū tiàu ê sî ê sin-hūn.
46007021	Lí siū tiàu ê sî sī lô͘-lē sī-bô, m̄-bián khòa-ì; put-kò lí nā ū ki-hōe tit-tio̍h chū-iû, tio̍h pá-ak ki-hōe.
46007022	In-ūi siū Chú ho͘-tiàu ê lô͘-lē sī Chú só͘ tháu-pàng ê chū-iû-jîn; siâng-khoán, siū Chú ho͘-tiàu ê chū-iû-jîn sī Ki-tok ê lô͘-lē.
46007023	Lín sī Siōng-tè hù-chhut tāi-kè bóe lâi ê, m̄-thang chiâⁿ-chòe lâng ê lô͘-lē.
46007024	Hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, lín ta̍k ê lâng tio̍h tī Siōng-tè ê bīn-chêng pó-chhî siū tiàu ê sî ê sin-hūn.
46007025	Koan-hē chāi-sek-lú ê būn-tôe, góa bô tùi Chú tit-tio̍h sím-mi̍h bēng-lēng, put-kò chòe chi̍t ê tit-tio̍h Chú ê lîn-bín chiâⁿ-chòe thang sìn-jīm ê lâng, góa thê-chhut ka-kī ê ì-kiàn.
46007026	Khó-lū ba̍k-chêng kan-lân ê chhù-kéng, góa siūⁿ lâng pó-chhî hiān-chōng sī khah hó.
46007027	Í-keng chhōa-bó͘, m̄-thang siūⁿ-beh chū-iû; iáu-bē chhōa-bó͘, m̄-thang siūⁿ-beh chhōa.
46007028	M̄-kú nā chhōa-bó͘, bô sǹg hoān-chōe; siàu-lú nā chhut-kè, mā bô sǹg hoān-chōe. Put-kò kiat-hun ê lâng ōe ke-thiⁿ seng-oa̍h siōng ê thoa-lūi, góa khah ài lín bián tú-tio̍h chit khoán tāi-chì.
46007029	Hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, góa ài kóng ê sī, sî-kan pek-kūn lah, tùi taⁿ í-āu, ū bó͘ ê tio̍h ná-chún bô bó͘;
46007030	teh khàu ê ná-chún bô teh khàu; teh hoaⁿ-hí ê ná-chún bô teh hoaⁿ-hí; bóe-mi̍h ê ná-chún bô tit-tio̍h pòaⁿ-hāng;
46007031	chhap sè-kan sū ê, ná-chún bô teh chhap. In-ūi chit sè-kan ê hiān-chōng teh kè-khì.
46007032	Góa ài lín lóng bô khòa-lū. Bô chhōa-bó͘ ê lâng koan-sim Chú ê sū, khòaⁿ-beh án-chóaⁿ hō͘ Chú hoaⁿ-hí.
46007033	Chhōa-bó͘ ê lâng koan-sim sè-kan ê sū, khòaⁿ-beh án-chóaⁿ hō͘ bó͘ hoaⁿ-hí,
46007034	soah hun-sim. Bô kè ê cha-bó͘-lâng á-sī siàu-lú koan-sim Chú ê sū, sī beh hō͘ seng-khu kap sim-lêng sèng-kiat; put-kò kè-ang ê cha-bó͘-lâng koan-sim sè-kan ê sū, khòaⁿ-beh án-chóaⁿ hō͘ tiōng-hu hoaⁿ-hí.
46007035	Góa tùi lín án-ni kóng sī ūi-tio̍h lín ê lī-ek, m̄-sī beh kā lín sok-pa̍k, sī ài lín chòe ha̍p-gî ê sū, thang choan-sim chi̍t-ì ho̍k-sāi Chú.
46007036	Nā ū lâng tèng-hun liáu koat-tēng bô beh chhōa, āu-lâi in-ūi chêng-io̍k kiông, bōe-tàng khòng-chè ka-kī, ōe tùi bī-hun-chhe chòe-chhut bô ha̍p-gî ê sū, in tio̍h kiat-hun, án-ni chòe m̄-sī hoān-chōe.
46007037	Put-kò i nā m̄-sī in-ūi gōa-lâi ê ap-le̍k, sī chhut tī ka-kī ê koat-sim, koh ōe-tàng khòng-chè ka-kī ê ì-chì, koat-tēng bô beh kap bī-hun-chhe kiat-hun, hō͘ i pó-chhî chāi-sek-lú ê sin-hūn, i án-ni chòe sī hó.
46007038	Chóng kóng, kap bī-hun-chhe kiat-hun sī hó, bô kap i kiat-hun koh-khah hó.
46007039	Tiōng-hu iáu oa̍h-teh ê sî cha-bó͘-lâng bô chū-iû; tiōng-hu sí liáu, cha-bó͘-lâng thang chū-iû kap kah-ì ê lâng kiat-hun, put-kò, chí-ū thang kè hō͘ sìn Chú ê lâng.
46007040	I nā bô koh kè sī koh-khah ū hok-khì, che sī góa ê ì-kiàn, chóng-sī góa siūⁿ góa mā ū Siōng-tè ê Sîn ê chí-sī.
46008001	Koan-hē chè ngó͘-siōng ê mi̍h, lán chai “lán lóng ū tì-sek.” Kî-si̍t tì-sek ōe hō͘ lâng kiau-ngō͘; m̄-kú thiàⁿ-sim ōe chō-chiū lâng.
46008002	Ka-kī siūⁿ-kóng ū tì-sek ê, si̍t-chè siōng eng-kai chai ê, i iáu m̄-chai.
46008003	Lâng nā thiàⁿ Siōng-tè, chit-ê lâng Siōng-tè í-keng bat i.
46008004	Só͘-í, koan-hē chia̍h chè ngó͘-siōng ê mi̍h, lán chai, sè-kan ê ngó͘-siōng lóng m̄-sī chin ê, lán mā chai chí-ū chi̍t ūi Siōng-tè, í-gōa bô pa̍t ê.
46008005	Sui-jiân tī thiⁿ-téng á-sī tōe-chiūⁿ ū só͘-ūi ê sîn-bêng, koh sui-jiân ū chin chōe “sîn” á-sī “chú”,
46008006	m̄-kú lán chí-ū chi̍t ūi Siōng-tè, chiū-sī Thiⁿ Pē; bān-iú tùi I lâi chhòng-chō, lán ūi-tio̍h I lâi oa̍h. Lán chí-ū chi̍t ūi Chú, chiū-sī Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok; bān-iú thong-kè I chhòng-chō, lán mā thong-kè I lâi chûn-chāi.
46008007	M̄-kú, m̄-sī ta̍k ê lâng lóng ū chit khoán tì-sek. Ū lâng pài ngó͘-siōng koàn-sì, kàu kin-á-ji̍t chia̍h chit khoán mi̍h ê sî iáu siūⁿ-kóng sī teh chia̍h ngó͘-siōng ê mi̍h; in ê liông-sim loán-jio̍k, siūⁿ-kóng ōe hō͘ hit khoán chia̍h-mi̍h bak lâ-sâm.
46008008	Kî-si̍t chia̍h-mi̍h bōe hō͘ lán khah chiap-kūn Siōng-tè; bô chia̍h bô sún-sit, chia̍h mā bô khah ū lī-ek.
46008009	M̄-kú tio̍h sòe-jī, m̄-thang in-ūi lín chū-iû ê hêng-ûi chiâⁿ-chòe loán-jio̍k ê lâng sìn-gióng ê chó͘-gāi.
46008010	Nā ū lâng liông-sim loán-jio̍k, khòaⁿ-tio̍h lín só͘-ūi “ū tì-sek” ê lâng tī ngó͘-siōng ê biō-lāi lim-chia̍h, án-ni lín kiám m̄-sī teh kó͘-lē in chia̍h chè ngó͘-siōng ê mi̍h?
46008011	Án-ni, chit-ê loán-jio̍k ê sìn-tô͘ mā-sī Ki-tok ūi-tio̍h i sí ê lâng, ōe in-ūi lín ê “tì-sek” lâi bia̍t-bông.
46008012	Lín án-ni chòe sī tek-chōe lín ê hiaⁿ-tī á-sī chí-bē, siong-hāi tio̍h in ê liông-sim chiū-sī tek-chōe Ki-tok.
46008013	Só͘-í, nā chia̍h-mi̍h ōe hō͘ hiaⁿ-tī á-sī chí-bē ê sìn-gióng siū chó͘-gāi, góa choa̍t-tùi m̄ chia̍h chè ngó͘-siōng ê bah, chiah-bián hō͘ góa ê hiaⁿ-tī á-sī chí-bē ê sìn-gióng siū chó͘-gāi.
46009001	Góa kiám m̄-sī chū-iû ê lâng? Góa kiám m̄-sī sù-tô͘? Góa kiám m̄-bat kìⁿ-tio̍h lán ê Chú Iâ-so͘? Lín kiám m̄-sī góa ūi-tio̍h Chú kang-chok ê sêng-kó?
46009002	Tùi pa̍t-lâng lâi khòaⁿ góa kiám-chhái m̄-sī sù-tô͘, m̄-kú tùi lín lâi khòaⁿ, góa khak-si̍t sī. In-ūi lín kap Chú kiat-liân chiū-sī góa choh sù-tô͘ ê chèng-kù.
46009003	Tùi hiah-ê phoe-phêng góa ê lâng, góa án-ni piān-bêng:
46009004	Goán kiám bô koân thang chia̍h, thang lim?
46009005	Goán kiám bô koân kap kî-tha ê sù-tô͘, Chú ê hiaⁿ-tī, í-ki̍p [Pí-tek] kâng-khoán, chhōa lú sìn-tô͘ chòe bó͘ chòe-hé lú-hêng?
46009006	Kiám kan-ta góa kap [Pa-ná-pa] it-tēng tio̍h chòe kang chiah ōe-tàng seng-oa̍h?
46009007	Kiám ū lâng choh-peng koh-teh chia̍h ka-kī? Kiám ū lâng chèng-choh phû-tô-hn̂g bô chia̍h hn̂g-lāi chhut-sán ê phû-tô? Kiám ū lâng chhī-iûⁿ bô lim ka-kī ê iûⁿ-lin?
46009008	Góa kóng chiah-ê kiám sī kun-kù lâng ê siūⁿ-hoat? Lu̍t-hoat kiám m̄-sī mā án-ni kóng?
46009009	[Mô͘-se] ê Lu̍t-hoat kui-tēng, “Gû teh lún ngó͘-kok ê sî, m̄-thang kā i kòa gû-chhùi-lam.” Siōng-tè koan-sim ê kiám sī gû?
46009010	I kiám m̄-sī oân-choân ūi-tio̍h lán kóng ê? Tong-jiân sī! In-ūi keng-choh ê lâng khǹg ǹg-bāng keng-choh, siu-koah ê lâng khǹg ǹg-bāng siu-koah, in lóng sī kî-thāi tit-tio̍h ngó͘-kok.
46009011	Goán nā ū tī lín tiong-kan iā sio̍k-lêng ê chéng-chí, tùi lín tit-tio̍h bu̍t-chit siōng ê kiong-kip kiám ū kè-hūn?
46009012	Pa̍t-lâng nā ū koân thang tùi lín iau-kiû, goán kiám m̄-sī koh-khah ū? M̄-kú goán lóng m̄-bat ēng chit-ê koân, hoán-tńg jím-siū it-chhè, chiah-bián hō͘ Ki-tok ê hok-im siū chó͘-gāi.
46009013	Lín it-tēng chai, tī Sèng-tiān teh kang-chok ê lâng tùi Sèng-tiān tit-tio̍h chia̍h-mi̍h; tī chè-tôaⁿ teh hiàn-chè ê lâng pun tôaⁿ téng ê chè-mi̍h.
46009014	Chhin-chhiūⁿ án-ni, Chú ū hoan-hù, thoân hok-im ê lâng eng-kai khò hok-im seng-oa̍h.
46009015	M̄-kú góa lóng m̄-bat ēng chiah-ê koân. Góa hiān-chāi siá chiah-ê ōe mā m̄-sī beh cheng-chhú chit khoán ê koân. Góa lêng-khó sí mā bô ài hō͘ góa só͘ khoa-kháu ê lo̍k-khong!
46009016	Góa thoân hok-im pèng bô sím-mi̍h thang khoa-kháu; góa sī hōng-bēng teh thoân. Góa nā bô thoân ū chai-hō.
46009017	Góa nā kam-goān chòe chit-ê kang, chiū ū pò-siúⁿ; góa nā m̄-sī chhut-tī kam-goān, mā tio̍h chip-hêng Siōng-tè kau-tài ê jīm-bū.
46009018	Án-ni, góa ê pò-siúⁿ sī sím-mi̍h? Chiū-sī góa thang thoân hok-im hō͘ lâng pe̍h-pe̍h tit-tio̍h, góa tian-tò bô hióng-siū-tio̍h thoân hok-im eng-kai ū ê koân-lī.
46009019	Góa sī chū-iû ê lâng, bô siū lâng ê sok-pa̍k, m̄-kú ūi-tio̍h beh tit-tio̍h khah chōe lâng lâi sìn Chú, góa chiâⁿ-chòe chèng-lâng ê lô͘-lē.
46009020	Tùi [Iû-thài]-lâng, góa chiū choh [Iû-thài]-lâng, sī ūi-tio̍h beh tit-tio̍h [Iû-thài]-lâng. Sui-jiân góa bô siū [Mô͘-se] ê Lu̍t-hoat khu-sok, khiok choh Lu̍t-hoat-ē ê lâng, sī ūi-tio̍h beh tit-tio̍h Lu̍t-hoat-ē ê lâng.
46009021	Tùi Lu̍t-hoat-gōa ê lâng, góa chiū choh Lu̍t-hoat-gōa ê lâng, sī ūi-tio̍h beh tit-tio̍h Lu̍t-hoat-gōa ê lâng. Án-ni m̄-sī kóng góa bô chun-siú Siōng-tè ê Lu̍t-hoat; kî-si̍t góa sī siū Ki-tok Lu̍t-hoat iok-sok ê lâng.
46009022	Tùi sìn-sim loán-jio̍k ê lâng, góa chiâⁿ-chòe loán-jio̍k, sī ūi-tio̍h beh tit-tio̍h loán-jio̍k ê lâng. Tùi tó chi̍t khoán lâng, góa chiū choh hit khoán lâng, ēng ta̍k khoán hong-hoat thang ke kiù chi̍t-kóa lâng.
46009023	Góa chòe chiah-ê lóng sī ūi-tio̍h hok-im, bo̍k-te̍k sī beh kap lâng hun-hióng hok-im ê chiok-hok.
46009024	Lín it-tēng chai, tī ūn-tōng-tiûⁿ chham-ka kèng-sài ê lâng lóng lo̍h-khì cháu, m̄-kú chí-ū chi̍t ê tit-tio̍h siúⁿ. Chhin-chhiūⁿ án-ni, ūi-tio̍h beh tit-tio̍h siúⁿ, lín tio̍h phah-piàⁿ cháu.
46009025	Ta̍k ê soán-chhiú lóng ū chiap-siū giâm-keh ê hùn-liān; in án-ni chòe sī beh tit-tio̍h ōe pāi-hoāi ê hoa-koan; m̄-kú lán ài tit-tio̍h ê sī bōe pāi-hoāi ê hoa-koan.
46009026	Án-ni, góa cháu m̄-sī bô bo̍k-phiau teh cháu, phah-kûn m̄-sī teh phah khong-khì.
46009027	Góa giâm-keh chhau-liān ka-kī ê seng-khu kàu ōe-tàng oân-choân khòng-chè, chiah-bián chio pa̍t-lâng lâi chham-ka pí-sài, ka-kī soah sit-lo̍h chu-keh.
46010001	Hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, góa ài lín kì-tit, lán ê chó͘-sian lóng kun-tè [Mô͘-se], tī hûn ê pó-hō͘-ē kè [Âng-hái].
46010002	In tī hûn-lāi, tī hái-ni̍h, siū sóe kui tī [Mô͘-se].
46010003	In lóng chia̍h kâng-khoán sio̍k-lêng ê chia̍h-mi̍h,
46010004	lóng lim kâng-khoán sio̍k-lêng ê chôaⁿ-chúi, chit-ê chôaⁿ-chúi sī tùi kap in tâng-kiâⁿ hit-ê sio̍k-lêng ê chio̍h-pôaⁿ lâu chhut-lâi ê; hit-ê chio̍h-pôaⁿ chiū-sī Ki-tok.
46010005	M̄-kú in tiong-kan tōa-pō͘-hūn ê lâng bô hō͘ Siōng-tè hoaⁿ-hí, lóng siū húi-bia̍t, tó-kah kui khòng-iá.
46010006	Chiah-ê tāi-chì hō͘ lán chòe kàm-kài, kiò lán m̄-thang chhin-chhiūⁿ in tham-loân pháiⁿ-tāi.
46010007	M̄-thang chhin-chhiūⁿ in tiong-kan ū chi̍t-kóa lâng khì pài ngó͘-siōng, chiàu Sèng-keng kì-chài: “Chiah-ê chú-bîn chē lo̍h-khì, tōa-lim tōa-chia̍h; khiā khí-lâi, tian-kông loān-sńg.”
46010008	Lán m̄-thang chhin-chhiūⁿ in ū chi̍t-kóa lâng îm-loān, soah tī chi̍t ji̍t lāi sí nn̄g-bān saⁿ-chheng lâng.
46010009	M̄-thang chhin-chhiūⁿ in tiong-kan ū chi̍t-kóa lâng chhì-thàm Chú, soah hō͘ chôa kā-sí.
46010010	M̄-thang chhin-chhiūⁿ in tiong-kan ū chi̍t-kóa lâng kóng oàn-giân, soah hō͘ Húi-bia̍t-chiá châu-bia̍t.
46010011	In só͘ tú-tio̍h chiah-ê tāi-chì thang chòe pa̍t-lâng ê kàm-kài, koh kì-lio̍k lo̍h-lâi thang kéng-kài lán chiah-ê oa̍h tī boa̍t-sè ê lâng.
46010012	Só͘-í, siūⁿ-kóng ka-kī khiā-chāi ê tio̍h kín-sīn, chiah bōe poa̍h-tó.
46010013	Lín só͘ tú-tio̍h ê chhì-thàm lóng sī lâng ōe tú-tio̍h ê. Siōng-tè sī sìn-si̍t, I bōe hō͘ lín tú-tio̍h tam-tng bōe-khí ê chhì-liān. Lín tú-tio̍h chhì-liān ê sî, I ōe kā lín khui chi̍t tiâu chhut-lō͘, hō͘ lín jím-siū ōe-tiâu.
46010014	Só͘-í, chhin-ài ê hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, pài ngó͘-siōng ê sū lóng m̄-thang chhap-tio̍h.
46010015	Góa khòaⁿ lín chòe bêng-pe̍k sū-lí ê lâng kap lín kóng-ōe; góa só͘ kóng ê lín ka-kī thang phòaⁿ-toàn.
46010016	Lán teh lim hit-ê chiok-siā ê poe, kiám m̄-sī teh hun-hióng Ki-tok ê huih? Lán teh chia̍h hit-ê peh-khui ê piáⁿ, kiám m̄-sī teh hun-hióng Ki-tok ê seng-khu?
46010017	In-ūi piáⁿ chí-ū chi̍t tè, lán sui-jiân chin chōe lâng, iáu-kú sī chi̍t-thé, in-ūi lán chòe-hé chia̍h kâng chi̍t tè piáⁿ.
46010018	Ēng [Í-sek-lia̍t]-lâng chòe lē, hiah-ê chia̍h chè-mi̍h ê lâng kap chè-tôaⁿ ū koan-hē.
46010019	Án-ni góa teh kóng ê sī sím-mi̍h ì-sù? Sī kóng ngó͘-siōng ū sím-mi̍h tiōng-iàu, chè-mi̍h ū sím-mi̍h iàu-kín sī-bô?
46010020	M̄-sī, góa sī teh kóng, hiàn tī īⁿ-kàu chè-tôaⁿ téng ê chè-mi̍h sī hiàn hō͘ kúi, m̄-sī hiàn hō͘ Siōng-tè. Góa bô ài lín kap kúi kau-chhap.
46010021	Lín bōe-tàng lim Chú ê poe, mā lim kúi ê poe; bōe-tàng chham-ka Chú ê iân-sia̍h, mā chham-ka kúi ê iân-sia̍h.
46010022	Lán beh kek hō͘ Chú chi̍t-tò͘ sī-bô? Lán pí I khah kiông sī-bô?
46010023	Ū lâng kóng “Ta̍k hāng lóng thang chòe”, put-kò m̄-sī ta̍k hāng lóng ū lī-ek. “Ta̍k hāng lóng thang chòe”, put-kò m̄-sī ta̍k hāng sū lóng ōe-tàng pang-chān lâng.
46010024	Ta̍k lâng lóng m̄-thang kiû ka-kī ê lī-ek, tio̍h kiû pa̍t-lâng ê lī-ek.
46010025	Chhī-tiûⁿ teh bōe ê bah lóng thang bóe lâi chia̍h, m̄-bián ūi-tio̍h liông-sim ê iân-kò͘ mn̄g-tang mn̄g-sai.
46010026	In-ūi Sèng-keng kóng, “Tōe kap tōe-chiūⁿ ê bān-mi̍h lóng sio̍k tī Chú.”
46010027	Nā ū bī-sìn-chiá chhiáⁿ lín chia̍h-pn̄g, lín nā khì, pâi tī lín bīn-chêng ê mi̍h chòe lín chia̍h, m̄-bián ūi-tio̍h liông-sim ê iân-kò͘ mn̄g-tang mn̄g-sai.
46010028	M̄-kú nā ū lâng kā lín kóng, “Chiah-ê chia̍h-mi̍h ū chè kè ngó͘-siōng”, lín chiū ūi-tio̍h hit-ê kā lín kóng ê lâng kap liông-sim ê iân-kò͘, m̄-thang chia̍h hit-ê chia̍h-mi̍h.
46010029	Góa só͘ chí ê sī hit-ê lâng ê liông-sim, m̄-sī lín ê liông-sim. Kiám-chhái ū lâng ōe mn̄g, “Góa ê chū-iû ná-tio̍h siū pa̍t-lâng ê liông-sim phoe-phòaⁿ?
46010030	Chè kè ê mi̍h, góa nā kám-siā lâi chia̍h, ū sím-mi̍h thang hō͘ lâng húi-pòng?”
46010031	Só͘-í, lín bô-lūn sī chia̍h sī lim, á-sī chòe sím-mi̍h, lóng tio̍h ūi-tio̍h êng-iāu Siōng-tè lâi chòe.
46010032	Bô-lūn sī tùi [Iû-thài]-lâng, Gōa-pang-lâng, á-sī Siōng-tè ê kàu-hōe, lín lóng m̄-thang chiâⁿ-chòe in ê chó͘-gāi.
46010033	Lín tio̍h chiàu góa só͘ chòe ê khì chòe. Góa ūi-tio̍h hō͘ tāi-ke hoaⁿ-hí, m̄-bat kiû ka-kī ê lī-ek, sī kiû tāi-ke ê lī-ek, thang hō͘ in tit-tio̍h kiù.
46011001	Lín tio̍h o̍h góa, chhin-chhiūⁿ góa o̍h Ki-tok.
46011002	Lín put-sî ōe kì-tit góa, koh chun-thàn góa thoân-siū hō͘ lín ê kà-sī, lín si̍t-chāi thang hō͘ góa o-ló.
46011003	Put-kò góa ài lín bêng-pe̍k, ta̍k ê ta-po͘-lâng ê thâu sī Ki-tok, hū-jîn-lâng ê thâu sī tiōng-hu, Ki-tok ê thâu sī Siōng-tè.
46011004	Ta-po͘-lâng tī kong-kiōng tiûⁿ-só͘ kî-tó á-sī soan-káng Siōng-tè sìn-sit ê sî, nā tà thâu-kun sī bú-jio̍k i ê thâu Ki-tok.
46011005	M̄-kú cha-bó͘-lâng tī kî-tó á-sī soan-káng Siōng-tè sìn-sit ê sî, nā bô tà thâu-kun sī bú-jio̍k ka-kī ê thâu, chiū-sī i ê tiōng-hu. Chit khoán ê hū-jîn-lâng kap thâu-mn̂g hō͘ lâng thì khí-lâi ê cha-bó͘-lâng bô sím-mi̍h chha-pia̍t.
46011006	Cha-bó͘-lâng nā m̄ tà thâu-kun, thâu-mn̂g tio̍h chián khí-lâi; kì-jiân khòaⁿ thì kng-thâu á-sī chián thâu-mn̂g chòe kiàn-siàu ê sū, chiū tio̍h tà thâu-kun.
46011007	Ta-po͘-lâng bô eng-kai tà thâu-kun, in-ūi i sī Siōng-tè ê hêng-siōng kap êng-iāu; cha-bó͘-lâng sī ta-po͘-lâng ê êng-iāu.
46011008	In-ūi ta-po͘-lâng m̄-sī tùi cha-bó͘-lâng chō chhut-lâi ê, cha-bó͘-lâng sī tùi ta-po͘-lâng chō chhut-lâi ê.
46011009	Ta-po͘-lâng m̄-sī ūi-tio̍h cha-bó͘-lâng chō ê, m̄-kú cha-bó͘-lâng sī ūi-tio̍h ta-po͘-lâng chō ê.
46011010	Ūi-tio̍h thiⁿ-sài ê iân-kò͘, cha-bó͘-lâng ê thâu eng-kai tà koân-ui ê kì-hō.
46011011	Chóng-sī tī Chú ê lāi-bīn, ta-po͘-lâng su-iàu cha-bó͘-lâng, cha-bó͘-lâng mā su-iàu ta-po͘-lâng.
46011012	In-ūi cha-bó͘-lâng sī tùi ta-po͘-lâng chō chhut-lâi ê, ta-po͘-lâng sī thong-kè cha-bó͘-lâng siⁿ ê, m̄-kú bān-mi̍h lóng sī tùi Siōng-tè chhut-lâi ê.
46011013	Lín tio̍h ka-kī phòaⁿ-toàn: cha-bó͘-lâng bô tà thâu-kun tùi Siōng-tè kî-tó ū ha̍p-gî bô?
46011014	Chū-jiân ê pún-sèng kà lán, lâu tn̂g thâu-mn̂g sī ta-po͘-lâng ê kiàn-siàu,
46011015	m̄-kú cha-bó͘-lâng lâu tn̂g thâu-mn̂g sī i ê êng-iāu. In-ūi tn̂g thâu-mn̂g thang chòe cha-bó͘-lâng ê jia-phè.
46011016	Nā ū lâng ài piān-pok, góa chí-ū ōe-tàng kóng, tī goán kap Siōng-tè ê kàu-hōe pèng bô kî-tha ê kui-kú.
46011017	Góa tī chia beh kóng ê ōe m̄-sī beh kā lín o-ló, in-ūi lín ê chū-hōe sún-hāi pí lī-ek khah chōe.
46011018	Tē-it, góa ū thiaⁿ-kìⁿ kóng, lín tī kàu-hōe chū-hōe ê sî kiat-tóng hun-phài, góa siong-sìn ū chi̍t pō͘-hūn sī sū-si̍t.
46011019	Lín tiong-kan bōe bián-tit ū hun-lia̍t, án-ni hō͘ lín thang khòaⁿ-chhut sím-mi̍h lâng ōe thong-kè khó-giām.
46011020	Lín chū-chi̍p ê sî, m̄-sī teh chia̍h Chú ê Boán-chhan.
46011021	In-ūi lín ta̍k ê lâng kóaⁿ-kín chia̍h ka-kī tòa-lâi ê mi̍h-kiāⁿ, kiat-kó ū-ê iau, ū-ê chiú-chùi.
46011022	Lín kiám bô chhù thang chia̍h, thang lim? Lín sī teh biáu-sī Siōng-tè ê kàu-hōe, ia̍h teh hō͘ bô mi̍h thang chia̍h ê lâng kiàn-siàu sī-bô? Góa beh tùi lín kóng sím-mi̍h? Góa kiám tio̍h kā lín o-ló? Bōe, tī chit hāng sū góa bōe kā lín o-ló!
46011023	Góa tùi Chú só͘ niá-siū ê, góa mā thoân hō͘ lín: Chú Iâ-so͘ hō͘ lâng chhut-bōe hit mî, I the̍h piáⁿ,
46011024	kám-siā Siōng-tè liáu-āu, peh-khui, kóng, “Chit-ê sī góa ê seng-khu, ūi-tio̍h lín hi-seng ê; lín tio̍h chòe chit-ê lâi kì-liām góa.”
46011025	Chiàu án-ni, chia̍h liáu-āu, I koh phâng poe, kóng, “Chit-ê poe sī sin ê iok, ēng góa ê huih siat-li̍p ê, lín ta̍k pái lim ê sî tio̍h chòe chit-ê lâi kì-liām góa.”
46011026	Án-ni, lín ta̍k pái chia̍h chit-ê piáⁿ, lim chit-ê poe, sī teh soan-kò Chú ê sí, ti̍t-kàu I lâi-lîm.
46011027	Só͘-í, bô-lūn sím-mi̍h lâng, nā bô ēng ha̍p-gî ê thài-tō͘ chia̍h Chú ê piáⁿ, lim Chú ê poe, sī tek-chōe Chú ê sin-thé kap huih.
46011028	Ta̍k ê lâng tio̍h séng-chhat ka-kī chiah thang chia̍h chit-ê piáⁿ, lim chit-ê poe.
46011029	Lín chia̍h chit-ê piáⁿ, lim chit-ê poe, nā bô khak-si̍t bêng-pe̍k Chú ê seng-khu ê ì-sù, chia̍h chit-ê piáⁿ lim chit-ê poe sī ka-kī jiá sím-phòaⁿ.
46011030	In-ūi án-ni, tī lín tiong-kan ū chin chōe lâng loán-jio̍k, phòa-pīⁿ, mā ū lâng tì-kàu sí.
46011031	Lán nā seng séng-chhat ka-kī, chiū bōe tì-kàu siū sím-phòaⁿ.
46011032	Put-kò lán siū Chú sím-phòaⁿ ê sî, sī teh siū koán-kàu, hō͘ lán bián tì-kàu kap sè-kan tâng siū tēng-chōe.
46011033	Só͘-í, góa ê hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, lín chū-chi̍p chia̍h Chú ê Boán-chhan ê sî, tio̍h hō͘-siōng thèng-hāu.
46011034	Nā ū lâng iau, tio̍h tī chhù-ni̍h seng chia̍h, chiah-bián chū-hōe tian-tò pìⁿ-chòe siū Siōng-tè sím-phòaⁿ. Kî-tha ê tāi-chì, góa khì lín hia ê sî chiah chhú-lí.
46012001	Hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, koan-hē Sèng Sîn ê un-sù, góa ài lín liáu-kái.
46012002	Lín chai, lín iáu sī īⁿ-kàu-tô͘ ê sî chhut-chāi lâng chhōa-khì kiâⁿ bê-lō͘, khì pài bōe kóng-ōe ê ngó͘-siōng.
46012003	Só͘-í góa ài lín liáu-kái, só͘-ū siū Siōng-tè ê Sîn kám-tōng ê lâng, bô-lâng ōe kóng “Iâ-so͘ tio̍h siū chiù-chó͘”; nā bô siū Sèng Sîn kám-tōng, mā bô-lâng ōe kóng “Iâ-so͘ sī Chú.”
46012004	Un-sù ū chin chōe khoán, m̄-kú sù un-sù ê sī kâng chi̍t ūi Sèng Sîn.
46012005	Sū-hōng ū chin chōe khoán, m̄-kú sī sū-hōng kâng chi̍t ūi Chú.
46012006	Kang-chok ū chin chōe khoán, m̄-kú pang-chān ta̍k ê lâng khì chòe ta̍k hāng tāi-chì ê sī kâng chi̍t ūi Siōng-tè.
46012007	Ūi-tio̍h beh hō͘ tāi-ke tit-tio̍h lī-ek, Sèng Sîn tī ta̍k ê lâng sin-chiūⁿ só͘ hián-bêng ê kang-chok mā-sī chi̍t lâng chi̍t khoán.
46012008	Ū lâng thong-kè Sèng Sîn tit-tio̍h thoân sìn-sit ê tì-hūi; ū lâng kun-kù kâng chi̍t ūi Sèng Sîn tit-tio̍h thoân sìn-sit ê tì-sek;
46012009	ū lâng tùi kâng chi̍t ūi Sèng Sîn tit-tio̍h sìn-sim; ū lâng tùi kâng chi̍t ūi Sèng Sîn tit-tio̍h i-pīⁿ ê un-sù;
46012010	ū lâng tit-tio̍h kiâⁿ sîn-jiah ê un-sù; ū lâng tit-tio̍h thoân Siōng-tè sìn-sit ê un-sù; ū lâng tit-tio̍h hun-piān Siōng-tè ê Sîn kap pa̍t ê sîn ê un-sù; ū lâng tit-tio̍h kóng lêng-gú ê un-sù; ū lâng tit-tio̍h kóe-seh lêng-gú ê un-sù.
46012011	Chiah-ê it-chhè lóng sī kâng chi̍t ūi Sèng Sîn ê ūn-chok, I chiàu ka-kī ê ì-sù chiong bô kâng-khoán ê un-sù pun hō͘ ta̍k ê lâng.
46012012	Chhin-chhiūⁿ seng-khu sī chi̍t ê, m̄-kú ū chin chōe chi-thé; seng-khu sui-jiân ū chin chōe chi-thé, m̄-kú seng-khu chí-ū chi̍t ê; Ki-tok mā-sī án-ni.
46012013	Bô-lūn sī [Iû-thài]-lâng á-sī Gōa-pang-lâng, lô͘-lē á-sī chū-iû ê lâng, lán lóng tùi kâng chi̍t ūi Sèng Sîn niá-siū sóe-lé, chiâⁿ-chòe chi̍t-thé, koh lán mā lóng lim kâng chi̍t ūi Sèng Sîn lâi tit-tio̍h lūn-te̍k.
46012014	Seng-khu m̄-sī chí-ū chi̍t ê chi-thé, sī ū chin chōe chi-thé.
46012015	Kha nā kóng “Góa m̄-sī chhiú, só͘-í bô sio̍k seng-khu”, kha m̄-sī án-ni kóng chiū bô sio̍k seng-khu.
46012016	Hī-á nā kóng “Góa m̄-sī ba̍k-chiu, só͘-í bô sio̍k seng-khu”, hīⁿ-á m̄-sī án-ni kóng chiū bô sio̍k seng-khu.
46012017	Choân seng-khu nā lóng sī ba̍k-chiu, beh ēng sím-mi̍h lâi thiaⁿ? Choân seng-khu nā lóng sī hī-á, beh ēng sím-mi̍h lâi phīⁿ?
46012018	Kî-si̍t, Siōng-tè chiàu I ê chí-ì chiong ta̍k khoán chi-thé an-tì tī seng-khu.
46012019	Choân-pō͘ nā chí-ū sī chi̍t ê chi-thé, ná ōe-tàng sǹg-chòe seng-khu?
46012020	Án-ni, chi-thé ū chin chōe, m̄-kú seng-khu chí-ū chi̍t ê.
46012021	Ba̍k-chiu bōe-tàng kā chhùi kóng “Góa bô su-iàu lí!” Thâu mā bōe-tàng tùi kha kóng “Góa bô su-iàu lí!”
46012022	Kî-si̍t hiah-ê khòaⁿ khí-lâi khah loán-jio̍k ê chi-thé tian-tò khah ū pit-iàu.
46012023	Lán khòaⁿ khah m̄ chiūⁿ-ba̍k ê chi-thé, tian-tò khah tio̍h kā in khòaⁿ-tāng; khah pháiⁿ-khòaⁿ ê chi-thé, tian-tò khah tio̍h kā in chng-thāⁿ;
