46012024	hiah-ê khah hó-khòaⁿ ê chi-thé chiū bô su-iàu chng-thāⁿ. Siōng-tè chiong seng-khu an-pâi hó-sè, hō͘ hiah-ê khah bô tiōng-iàu ê chi-thé tit-tio̍h khah tōa ê chun-tiōng,
46012025	thang hō͘ seng-khu bián tì-kàu hun-lia̍t, tian-tò hō͘ ta̍k ê chi-thé hō͘-siōng chiàu-kò͘.
46012026	Chi̍t ê chi-thé siū-khó͘, kî-tha ê chi-thé chiū chòe-hé siū-khó͘; chi̍t ê chi-thé tit-tio̍h êng-kng, kî-tha ê chi-thé chiū chòe-hé hoaⁿ-hí.
46012027	Lín sī Ki-tok ê seng-khu, ta̍k ê lâng sī seng-khu ê chi-thé.
46012028	Siōng-tè tī kàu-hōe só͘ an-tì ê, tē-it sī sù-tô͘, tē-jī sī sian-ti, tē-saⁿ sī kàu-su, koh ū kiâⁿ sîn-jiah ê, koh ū i-pīⁿ un-sù ê, pang-chān lâng ê, koán-lí sū-bū ê, kóng ta̍k khoán lêng-gú ê.
46012029	Ta̍k ê lâng kiám lóng sī sù-tô͘? Kiám lóng sī sian-ti? Kiám lóng sī kàu-su? Kiám lóng sī kiâⁿ sîn-jiah ê?
46012030	Kiám lóng sī ū i-pīⁿ un-sù ê? Kiám lóng sī kóng lêng-gú ê? Kiám lóng sī kóe-seh lêng-gú ê?
46012031	Lín tio̍h jia̍t-chhiat him-bō͘ koh-khah tiōng-iàu ê un-sù. Taⁿ góa kā lín chí-sī chi̍t tiâu siōng-hó ê lō͘.
46013001	Góa nā ōe-hiáu kóng lâng ê gú-giân, sīm-chì thiⁿ-sài ê gú-giân, nā bô jîn-ài, góa chiū chhin-chhiūⁿ lô teh tân, lâ-poa̍h teh hiáng.
46013002	Góa nā ū thoân-ta̍t Siōng-tè sìn-sit ê un-sù, ōe liáu-kái ta̍k khoán ê ò-pì kap ta̍k khoán ê tì-sek; góa nā ū kàu-gia̍h ê sìn-sim thang î-san tó-hái, nā bô jîn-ài, góa chiū bô lō͘-ēng.
46013003	Góa nā the̍h só͘-ū ê châi-sán khì kiù-chè, á-sī hiàn seng-khu hō͘ hé sio, nā bô jîn-ài, tùi góa lóng bô lī-ek.
46013004	Jîn-ài sī khoan-iông; jîn-ài sī chû-pi; ū jîn-ài chiū bōe chi̍t-tò͘, bōe khoa-kháu, bōe kiau-ngō͘,
46013005	bōe chòe kiàn-siàu ê tāi-chì, bōe kiû ka-kī ê lī-ek, bōe khoài siū-khì, bōe khioh-hūn,
46013006	bōe ài put-gī, chí-ū ài chin-lí.
46013007	Jîn-ài ōe pau-iông it-chhè, tùi it-chhè ū sìn-sim, tùi it-chhè ū ǹg-bāng, tùi it-chhè ū nāi-sim.
46013008	Jîn-ài éng-oán chûn-chāi. Thoân-ta̍t Siōng-tè sìn-sit ê un-sù sī chiām-sî; kóng lêng-gú ê un-sù ōe bô-khì; tì-sek mā ōe bô-khì.
46013009	Lán só͘ bat ê iú-hān; lán thoân-ta̍t Siōng-tè sìn-sit ê un-sù mā iú-hān.
46013010	M̄-kú hit-ê oân-choân-ê chi̍t-ē lâi, hit-ê iú-hān-ê chiū siau-sit.
46013011	Góa choh gín-á ê sî, kóng-ōe chhin-chhiūⁿ gín-á, ì-kiàn chhin-chhiūⁿ gín-á, siūⁿ-hoat mā chhin-chhiūⁿ gín-á. Taⁿ góa í-keng sêng-jîn, chiū chiong gín-á ê sū lóng pàng-sak.
46013012	Lán hiān-chāi chhin-chhiūⁿ chiò-kiàⁿ teh khòaⁿ, bū-bū bô-bêng, chiong-lâi ōe bīn-tùi-bīn khòaⁿ chheng-chhó. Góa hiān-chāi chí-ū chai chi̍t pō͘-hūn, chiong-lâi ōe oân-choân liáu-kái, chhin-chhiūⁿ Siōng-tè oân-choân liáu-kái góa.
46013013	Án-ni, sìn, ǹg-bāng, jîn-ài chit saⁿ-hāng éng-oán chûn-chāi, kî-tiong siōng tiōng-iàu ê sī jîn-ài.
46014001	Tio̍h tui-kiû jîn-ài; tio̍h jia̍t-chhiat him-bō͘ sio̍k-lêng ê un-sù, te̍k-pia̍t sī thoân-ta̍t Siōng-tè sìn-sit ê un-sù.
46014002	Kóng lêng-gú ê lâng m̄-sī teh tùi lâng kóng, sī teh tùi Siōng-tè kóng, in-ūi bô-lâng thiaⁿ ū; i sī khò Sèng Sîn teh kóng ò-pì ê sū.
46014003	Put-kò thoân-ta̍t Siōng-tè sìn-sit ê lâng sī teh tùi lâng kóng, beh hō͘ in tit-tio̍h chō-chiū, kó͘-lē, an-ùi.
46014004	Kóng lêng-gú ê lâng chí-ū chō-chiū ka-kī, put-kò thoân-ta̍t Siōng-tè sìn-sit ê lâng chō-chiū choân kàu-hōe.
46014005	Góa ài lín ta̍k ê lâng lóng ōe kóng lêng-gú, koh-khah ài lín ōe thoân-ta̍t Siōng-tè ê sìn-sit. Kóng lêng-gú nā m̄-sī ū lâng kóe-seh, thang hō͘ kàu-hōe tit-tio̍h chō-chiū, thoân-ta̍t Siōng-tè ê sìn-sit pí kóng lêng-gú khah tiōng-iàu.
46014006	Só͘-í, hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, góa khì lín hia, nā kan-ta kóng lêng-gú, bô thoân-ta̍t Siōng-tè ê khé-sī, á-sī tì-sek, á-sī sìn-sit, á-sī kà-sī, tùi lín ū sím-mi̍h lī-ek?
46014007	Bô sìⁿ-miā ê ga̍k-khì chhin-chhiūⁿ phín-á á-sī khîm, in só͘ hoat-chhut ê im nā bô koân-kē piàn-hòa, lâng ná-ōe chai sī teh chàu sím-mi̍h?
46014008	Lat-pah ê siaⁿ nā bô chún-khak, lâng ná chai thang chún-pī sio-chiàn?
46014009	Chhin-chhiūⁿ án-ni, lín só͘ kóng ê lêng-gú, ì-sù nā bô chheng-chhó, lâng ná-ōe lí-kái lín teh kóng sím-mi̍h? Án-ni lín sī teh tùi khong-khì kóng-ōe.
46014010	Sè-kan ū chin chōe bô kâng-khoán ê gú-giân, ta̍k ê lóng ū ì-sù.
46014011	Góa nā m̄-bat bó͘ chi̍t ê gú-giân, tùi teh kóng chit-ê gú-giân ê lâng lâi khòaⁿ góa sī gōa-kok-lâng; teh kóng chit-ê gú-giân ê lâng tùi góa lâi khòaⁿ mā-sī gōa-kok-lâng.
46014012	Lín mā-sī án-ni, kì-jiân lín jia̍t-chhiat him-bō͘ sio̍k-lêng ê un-sù, tio̍h koh-khah chhut-la̍t tui-kiû hiah-ê ōe chō-chiū kàu-hōe ê un-sù.
46014013	Só͘-í, kóng lêng-gú ê lâng tio̍h kî-kiû ōe-tàng kóe-seh ê lêng-le̍k.
46014014	Góa nā ēng lêng-gú kî-tó, sī góa ê lêng teh kî-tó, m̄-kú góa ê lí-tì bô chok-iōng.
46014015	Án-ni góa beh án-chóaⁿ? Góa beh ēng lêng kî-tó, mā beh ēng lí-tì kî-tó. Góa beh ēng lêng gîm-si, mā beh ēng lí-tì gîm-si.
46014016	Nā bô, lín nā chí-ū ēng lêng kám-siā Siōng-tè, chham-ka chū-hōe ê hiah-ê bô liáu-kái lêng-gú ê sìn-tô͘ m̄-chai lín teh kóng sím-mi̍h, beh ná-ōe tùi lín ê kám-siā kóng “Amen”?
46014017	Lín ê kám-siā kiám-chhái chin hó, m̄-kú bô hō͘ pa̍t-lâng tit-tio̍h chō-chiū.
46014018	Kám-siā Siōng-tè, góa pí lín chèng-lâng kóng koh-khah chōe lêng-gú.
46014019	M̄-kú tī kàu-hōe tiong, góa lêng-khó kóng gō͘ kù ū lí-tì ê ōe thang kà-sī pa̍t lâng, mā bô ài kóng chi̍t-bān kù lêng-gú.
46014020	Hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, lín siūⁿ tāi-chì m̄-thang chhin-chhiūⁿ gín-á; chòe pháiⁿ tāi-chì tio̍h chhin-chhiūⁿ eⁿ-á, siūⁿ tāi-chì tio̍h chhin-chhiūⁿ tōa-lâng.
46014021	Tī Lu̍t-hoat-su ū kì-chài: Chú kóng, Góa beh ēng kóng gōa-kok-ōe ê lâng, ēng īⁿ-pang-lâng ê chhùi-tûn, tùi góa ê chú-bîn kóng-ōe, m̄-kú in iáu m̄-thiaⁿ.
46014022	Án-ni, kóng lêng-gú m̄-sī beh hō͘ sìn-tô͘, sī beh hō͘ bô-sìn ê lâng chòe kì-hō. M̄-kú thoân-ta̍t Siōng-tè sìn-sit ê un-sù m̄-sī beh hō͘ bô-sìn ê lâng, sī beh hō͘ sìn-tô͘ chòe kì-hō.
46014023	Choân kàu-hōe chū-chi̍p ê sî, tāi-ke nā lóng teh kóng lêng-gú, ū bô liáu-kái lêng-gú ê sìn-tô͘ á-sī bô-sìn ê lâng ji̍p-lâi, kiám bōe kóng lín sī teh khí-siáu?
46014024	Tāi-ke nā lóng teh thoân-ta̍t Siōng-tè ê sìn-sit, ū bô-sìn ê lâng á-sī bô liáu-kái lêng-gú ê sìn-tô͘ ji̍p-lâi, thiaⁿ-tio̍h hiah-ê ōe chiū hiáu-ngō͘ chai-chōe,
46014025	sim-lāi ê pì-bi̍t hián-lō͘ chhut-lâi, ōe phak lo̍h-khì kèng-pài Siōng-tè, soan-kò kóng, “Siōng-tè chin-chiàⁿ tī lín tiong-kan!”
46014026	Hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, án-ni beh án-chóaⁿ? Lín chū-hōe ê sî, ū lâng chhiùⁿ sèng-si, ū lâng kà-sī, ū lâng soan-káng Siōng-tè ê khé-sī, ū lâng kóng lêng-gú, mā ū lâng kóe-seh lêng-gú. Ta̍k hāng tāi-chì lóng tio̍h ūi-tio̍h chō-chiū kàu-hōe lâi chòe.
46014027	Nā ū lâng kóng lêng-gú, chí-ū nn̄g ê, siōng-chōe saⁿ ê lûn-liû kóng, koh tio̍h ū lâng kóe-seh.
46014028	Nā-sī bô-lâng thang kóe-seh, in tī chū-hōe tiong tio̍h chēng-chēng, chí-ū tùi ka-kī kap Siōng-tè kóng.
46014029	Soan-káng Siōng-tè ê sìn-sit, thang hō͘ nn̄g ê á-sī saⁿ ê kóng, kî-tha ê lâng thang phòaⁿ-toàn in só͘ kóng ê.
46014030	Put-kò chāi-chō ê lâng nā ū tit-tio̍h Siōng-tè ê khé-sī, tú teh kóng ê lâng tio̍h chēng-chēng.
46014031	Lín ta̍k ê lâng lóng thang lûn-liû soan-káng Siōng-tè ê sìn-sit, thang saⁿ-kap ha̍k-si̍p, hō͘-siōng bián-lē.
46014032	Soan-káng Siōng-tè sìn-sit ê lâng tio̍h ōe-hiáu iok-sok ka-kī ê un-sù,
46014033	in-ūi Siōng-tè m̄-sī hūn-loān ê Siōng-tè, sī hô-hâi ê Siōng-tè. Kap só͘-ū Siōng-tè chú-bîn ê kàu-hōe kâng-khoán,
46014034	hū-jîn-lâng tī chū-hōe tiong tio̍h chēng-chēng, bōe ēng-tit kóng-ōe. Chiàu [Iû-thài] Lu̍t-hoat só͘ kóng, hū-jîn-lâng tio̍h sūn-ho̍k.
46014035	In nā ài o̍h sím-mi̍h, tio̍h tī chhù-ni̍h mn̄g ka-kī ê tiōng-hu; hū-jîn-lâng tī chū-hōe tiong kóng-ōe bô thé-biān.
46014036	Ná án-ni kóng! Siōng-tè ê ōe kiám tùi lín lâi, á-sī kan-ta thoân hō͘ lín?
46014037	Nā ū lâng siūⁿ-kóng ka-kī sī thoân-ta̍t Siōng-tè sìn-sit ê lâng, á-sī sio̍k-lêng ê lâng, tio̍h chai góa teh siá hō͘ lín ê sī Chú ê bēng-lēng.
46014038	Nā ū lâng bô khòaⁿ chit-ê tāi-chì chòe iàu-kín, mā m̄-thang kā i khòaⁿ-chòe iàu-kín.
46014039	Só͘-í, góa ê hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, tio̍h jia̍t-chhiat him-bō͘ thoân-ta̍t Siōng-tè sìn-sit ê un-sù, put-kò mā m̄-thang kìm-chí lâng kóng lêng-gú.
46014040	Hoān-sū tio̍h kui-kui kú-kú, chiàu tia̍t-sū chòe.
46015001	Hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, góa beh kā lín thê-chhíⁿ: Góa thoân hō͘ lín ê hok-im lín ū chiap-siū, mā ēng che chòe sìn-gióng ê ki-chhó͘.
46015002	Lín nā m̄-sī khang-khang sìn, hiān-chāi iáu ū teh kian-siú góa só͘ thoân ê sìn-sit, chiū ōe khò chit-ê hok-im tit-tio̍h kiù.
46015003	Góa í-keng ū chiong góa pún-sin só͘ niá-siū hit-ê siōng tiōng-iàu ê sìn-sit thoân hō͘ lín, chiū-sī chiàu Sèng-keng só͘ kì-chài, Ki-tok ūi-tio̍h lán ê chōe sí,
46015004	bâi-chòng; koh chiàu Sèng-keng só͘ kì-chài, I tē-saⁿ ji̍t koh-oa̍h;
46015005	I ū tùi [Pí-tek] hián-hiān, koh tùi cha̍p-jī sù-tô͘ hián-hiān.
46015006	Āu-lâi I ū chi̍t pái tùi gō͘-pah gōa ê hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē hián-hiān; hiah-ê lâng ū ê í-keng sí, m̄-kú tōa-pō͘-hūn ê lâng iáu oa̍h-teh.
46015007	Āu-lâi I ū tùi [Ngá-kok] hián-hiān, koh tùi só͘-ū ê sù-tô͘ hián-hiān.
46015008	Chòe-āu, I mā tùi góa chit-ê ná-chún bô kàu-ge̍h chiū chhut-sì ê lâng hián-hiān.
46015009	Góa sī sù-tô͘ tiong siōng bî-sòe ê, bōe kham-tit chheng-chòe sù-tô͘, in-ūi góa bat pek-hāi Siōng-tè ê kàu-hōe.
46015010	M̄-kú ū Siōng-tè ê un-tián chiah ū kin-á-ji̍t ê góa, I sù hō͘ góa ê un-tián bô lo̍k-khong. Góa tian-tò pí kî-tha ê sù-tô͘ koh-khah phah-piàⁿ kang-chok, kî-si̍t m̄-sī góa ka-kī, sī Siōng-tè ê un-tián kap góa tông-chāi.
46015011	Só͘-í, bô-lūn sī góa á-sī in, che sī goán só͘ teh thoân, lín í-keng ū teh sìn ê.
46015012	Kì-jiân goán só͘ soan-iông ê sī Ki-tok í-keng ū tùi sí-lâng tiong koh-oa̍h, lín tiong-kan ná ū lâng kóng bô sí-lâng koh-oa̍h?
46015013	Nā bô sí-lâng koh-oa̍h, án-ni Ki-tok chiū bô koh-oa̍h.
46015014	Nā Ki-tok bô koh-oa̍h, án-ni góa só͘ soan-iông ê sī khang-khang, lín ê sìn mā-sī khang-khang.
46015015	Án-ni goán chiū-sī teh ūi Siōng-tè chòe ké kiàn-chèng, in-ūi goán kiàn-chèng Siōng-tè í-keng hō͘ Ki-tok koh-oa̍h; sí-lâng nā bô koh-oa̍h, Siōng-tè chiū bô hō͘ Ki-tok koh-oa̍h.
46015016	Nā sí-lâng bô koh-oa̍h, Ki-tok chiū bô koh-oa̍h.
46015017	Ki-tok nā bô koh-oa̍h, lín ê sìn chiū bô lō͘-ēng, lín chiū iáu tī chōe-ok tiong.
46015018	Án-ni, hiah-ê í-keng sí-khì ê Ki-tok-tô͘ mā lóng bia̍t-bông lah.
46015019	Lán sìn Ki-tok ê lâng nā kan-ta tī hiān-sè ū ǹg-bāng, lán sī só͘-ū ê lâng ê tiong-kan siōng thang khó-lîn ê.
46015020	M̄-kú, hiān-chāi Siōng-tè í-keng ū hō͘ Ki-tok tùi sí-lâng tiong koh-oa̍h, thang chòe í-keng sí-khì ê lâng koh-oa̍h ê pó-chèng.
46015021	In-ūi sí thong-kè chi̍t ê lâng lâi, sí-lâng ê koh-oa̍h mā-sī thong-kè chi̍t ê lâng lâi.
46015022	Tùi [A-tong] chèng-lâng lóng tio̍h sí, án-ni, mā tùi Ki-tok chèng-lâng lóng ōe koh-oa̍h.
46015023	Put-kò ta̍k ê lâng lóng tio̍h chiàu ka-kī ê sūn-sū koh-oa̍h: Thâu-chi̍t ê sī Ki-tok, sòa lo̍h-khì sī Ki-tok lâi-lîm ê sî sio̍k I ê lâng,
46015024	koh lâi chiah-sī boa̍t-kî; hit sî I ōe siau-bia̍t it-chhè ê thóng-léng-chiá, chiáng-koân-chiá, kap koân-le̍k-chiá, jiân-āu chiong thóng-tī-koân kau hō͘ Pē Siōng-tè.
46015025	In-ūi Ki-tok it-tēng tio̍h thóng-tī, ti̍t-kàu Siōng-tè hō͘ it-chhè ê tùi-te̍k lóng khut-ho̍k tī I ê kha-ē.
46015026	Chòe-āu siū húi-bia̍t ê tùi-te̍k sī sí.
46015027	In-ūi Sèng-keng kì-chài kóng, “Siōng-tè hō͘ bān-iú lóng khut-ho̍k tī I ê kha-ē.” Chin bêng-hián, chia só͘ kóng ê “bān-iú” pèng bô pau-hâm hō͘ bān-iú khut-ho̍k tī Ki-tok kha-ē ê Siōng-tè.
46015028	Kàu bān-iú lóng khut-ho̍k Ki-tok ê sî, Kiáⁿ pún-sin mā ōe khut-ho̍k tī hō͘ bān-iú lóng khut-ho̍k ê Siōng-tè, thang hō͘ Siōng-tè oân-choân thóng-hat it-chhè.
46015029	Nā m̄-sī án-ni, lâng thòe sí-lâng siū sóe ū sím-mi̍h ì-sù? Nā bô sí-lâng koh-oa̍h ê sū, sī án-chóaⁿ beh thòe sí-lâng siū sóe?
46015030	Goán sī án-chóaⁿ tio̍h sî-sî khek-khek mō͘-hiám?
46015031	Hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, góa hōng lán ê Chú Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ tùi lín chiah-ê góa só͘ khoa-kháu ê lâng hó-táⁿ kóng: Góa ta̍k ji̍t biān-tùi sí.
46015032	Góa tī [Í-hut-só͘] kap “iá-siù” tò͘-cheng, nā sûn-chhùi sī chhut tī lâng ê tōng-ki, tùi góa ū sím-mi̍h lī-ek? Nā sí-lâng bô koh-oa̍h, chhin-chhiūⁿ lâng teh kóng: Lán bîn-á-chài to beh sí à, lâi chia̍h, lâi lim!
46015033	M̄-thang hō͘ lâng phiàn khì: “Kau-tio̍h pháiⁿ pêng-iú ōe phò-hoāi phín-tek!”
46015034	Tio̍h kak-chhíⁿ, siūⁿ hō͘ chheng-chhó, m̄-thang koh hoān-chōe, in-ūi ū chi̍t-kóa lâng iáu m̄-bat Siōng-tè, góa kóng chiah-ê sī beh hō͘ lín chai thang kiàn-siàu.
46015035	Kiám-chhái ū lâng beh mn̄g, “Sí-lâng án-chóaⁿ koh-oa̍h? In ōe ēng sím-mi̍h khoán ê thé lâi?”
46015036	Gōng-lâng! Lín iā lo̍h-tōe ê chéng-chí nā bô sí-khì, kiám ōe oa̍h khí-lâi?
46015037	Lín só͘ iā ê, bô-lūn sī be̍h-á á-sī pa̍t khoán ngó͘-kok, put-kò kan-ta sī chéng-chí, m̄-sī āu-lâi tióng-tōa ê hêng-thé.
46015038	Siōng-tè chiàu I ê chí-ì hō͘ chéng-chí ū hêng-thé; ta̍k khoán chéng-chí ū ka-kī ê hêng-thé.
46015039	Ta̍k khoán tōng-bu̍t ê jio̍k-thé mā lóng bô kâng-khoán: Lâng ê jio̍k-thé chi̍t khoán, siù-lūi chi̍t khoán, chiáu-lūi chi̍t khoán, hî-lūi koh chi̍t khoán.
46015040	Ū thiⁿ-téng ê thé, ū tōe-chiūⁿ ê thé; thian-thé ê kng kap tōe-chiūⁿ ê thé ê kng bô kâng-khoán.
46015041	Ji̍t-thâu ū ji̍t-thâu ê kng, ge̍h ū ge̍h ê kng, chhiⁿ ū chhiⁿ ê kng; sīm-chì ta̍k lia̍p chhiⁿ ê kng to lóng bô kâng-khoán.
46015042	Sí-lâng ê koh-oa̍h mā-sī án-ni. Tâi-lo̍h-khì-ê ōe hiú-nōa, koh-oa̍h-ê bōe hiú-nōa.
46015043	Tâi-lo̍h-khì-ê sī pi-chiān ê, koh-oa̍h-ê sī êng-iāu ê. Tâi-lo̍h-khì-ê sī loán-jio̍k ê, koh-oa̍h-ê sī ióng-chòng ê.
46015044	Tâi-lo̍h-khì-ê sī hiat-jio̍k ê thé, koh-oa̍h-ê sī sio̍k-lêng ê thé. Kì-jiân ū hiat-jio̍k ê thé, chiū ū sio̍k-lêng ê thé.
46015045	Só͘-í Sèng-keng ū kì-chài, “Thâu-chi̍t ê lâng [A-tong] siū-chō chòe ū oa̍h-miā ê lâng”, m̄-kú lō͘-bé ê [A-tong] sī sù oa̍h-miā ê Sîn.
46015046	Tāi-seng ū ê m̄-sī sio̍k-lêng ê, sī hiat-jio̍k ê, āu-lâi chiah ū sio̍k-lêng ê.
46015047	Thâu-chi̍t ê lâng sī tùi tōe chhut, sī thô͘ chō ê; tē-jī ê lâng sī tùi thiⁿ lâi ê.
46015048	Só͘-ū ēng thô͘ chō ê lâng lóng kap hit-ê thâu-chi̍t ê ēng thô͘ chō ê lâng kâng-khoán; só͘-ū sio̍k-thiⁿ ê lâng mā kap hit-ê lō͘-bé lâi sio̍k-thiⁿ ê lâng kâng-khoán.
46015049	Tú chhin-chhiūⁿ lán ū hit-ê thâu-chi̍t ê ēng thô͘ chō ê lâng ê hêng-siōng, mā ōe ū hit-ê lō͘-bé lâi sio̍k-thiⁿ ê lâng ê hêng-siōng.
46015050	Hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, góa kā lín kóng: Hiat-jio̍k ê thé bōe-tàng sêng-siū Siōng-tè ê kok; ōe hiú-nōa-ê mā bōe-tàng sêng-siū bōe hiú-nōa-ê.
46015051	Góa beh kā lín kóng chi̍t hāng ò-pì: Lán bōe lóng sí, put-kò tī chi̍t sùn-kan, chi̍t-ba̍k-nih-kú, chòe-āu ê lat-pah chi̍t-ē tân, lán lóng ōe kái-piàn; lat-pah tân, sí-lâng ōe koh-oa̍h, pìⁿ-chòe bōe hiú-nōa-ê, lán mā lóng ōe kái-piàn.
46015053	In-ūi chit-ê ōe hiú-nōa-ê it-tēng tio̍h pìⁿ-chòe bōe hiú-nōa-ê, ōe-sí-ê pìⁿ-chòe bōe-sí-ê.
46015054	Tng ōe hiú-nōa-ê pìⁿ-chòe bōe hiú-nōa-ê, ōe-sí-ê pìⁿ-chòe bōe-sí-ê hit sî, Sèng-keng só͘ kì-chài ê ōe chiū ōe èng-giām: Sí hō͘ sèng-lī thun lo̍h-khì lah!
46015055	Sí ah, lí ê sèng-lī tī tó-ūi? Sí ah, lí ê to̍k-chhì tī tó-ūi?
46015056	Sí ê to̍k-chhì sī chōe, chōe ê ui-le̍k sī tùi Lu̍t-hoat lâi ê.
46015057	Kám-siā Siōng-tè, I thong-kè lán ê Chú Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok hō͘ lán tit-tio̍h sèng-lī.
46015058	Só͘-í, chhin-ài ê hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, tio̍h khiā-chāi, m̄-thang iô-tāng. Tio̍h siông-siông chīn-la̍t ūi Chú chòe-kang, in-ūi lín chai ūi Chú tio̍h-bôa chòe-kang it-tēng bōe lo̍k-khong.
46016001	Koan-hē koan-hiàn pang-chān sìn-tô͘ ê tāi-chì, lín mā tio̍h chiàu góa kā [Ka-lia̍p-thài] ê chèng kàu-hōe só͘ chí-sī ê khì chòe.
46016002	Múi lé-pài ê thâu-chi̍t ji̍t, ta̍k ê lâng tio̍h chiàu ka-kī ê siu-ji̍p the̍h chi̍t-kóa khí-lâi khǹg, bián-tit góa khì lín hia ê sî chiah khai-sí bō͘-koan.
46016003	Góa kàu-ūi ê sî, ōe chiong kài-siāu ê phoe kap lín ê koan-hiàn kau hō͘ lín ōe sìn-jīm-tit ê lâng, phài in tòa khì [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng].
46016004	Nā-sī góa mā tio̍h khì khah hó, in ōe kap góa chòe-hé khì.
46016005	Góa chit-chūn tú teh keng-kè [Má-kî-tùn], keng-kè [Má-kî-tùn] liáu-āu àn-sǹg beh khì lín hia,
46016006	tāi-khài ōe tòa lín hia kap lín chòe-hé kè tang-thiⁿ. Án-ni, bô-lūn beh koh khì tó-ūi, lín thang sàng góa chhut-hoat.
46016007	Góa bô ài tī kè-lō͘ ê sî chiah sūn-sòa khì khòaⁿ lín; Chú nā ún-chún, góa ǹg-bāng kap lín tòa chi̍t-chām-á.
46016008	Góa ōe tī [Í-hut-só͘] tòa kàu Gō͘-sûn-choeh.
46016009	Tī chia sui-jiân ū chin chōe hoán-tùi ê lâng, m̄-kú mn̂g ūi góa tōa khui, thang chòe ū-hāu-kó ê kang-chok.
46016010	[Thê-mô͘-thài] kàu-ūi ê sî, lín tio̍h kā i chiap-thāi, hō͘ i ōe-tàng an-sim, in-ūi i kap góa kâng-khoán teh chòe Chú ê kang.
46016011	Lín lóng m̄-thang khòaⁿ i bô-khí. Tio̍h sàng i pêng-an lī-khui, hō͘ i thang tńg-lâi góa chia, in-ūi góa teh thèng-hāu i kap hiah-ê hiaⁿ-tī chòe-hé lâi.
46016012	Koan-hē lán ê hiaⁿ-tī [A-pho-lô], góa ū ke̍k-le̍k khǹg i kap kî-tha ê hiaⁿ-tī khì hóng-būn lín. Put-kò i bo̍k-chêng lóng bô àn-sǹg beh khì. Nā ū tú-hó ê ki-hōe i chiū ōe khì.
46016013	Lín tio̍h kéng-séng, sìn-sim khiā-chāi, tio̍h ióng-kám, kian-kiông.
46016014	Lín só͘ chòe it-chhè ê tāi-chì tio̍h ēng thiàⁿ-sim khì chòe.
46016015	Hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, lín bat [Sū-thê-hoat-ná] chi̍t ke ê lâng; in sī [A-kai-a]-séng thâu-chi̍t ke kui-sìn Ki-tok ê lâng, jia̍t-sim ho̍k-bū sìn-tô͘.
46016016	Góa khǹg lín tio̍h sūn-thàn chit khoán lâng, í-ki̍p só͘-ū kap in chòe-hé tio̍h-bôa kang-chok ê lâng.
46016017	[Sū-thê-hoat-ná], [Hok-tô͘-ná-to͘], kap [A-kai-kó͘] lâi góa chia, góa chin hoaⁿ-hí. Lín bô tī-chia, in thòe lín lâi pang-chān góa.
46016018	In hō͘ góa kap lín pîⁿ-pîⁿ tit-tio̍h kek-lē. Só͘-í lín tio̍h kèng-tiōng chit khoán lâng.
46016019	[A-se-a]-séng ê chèng kàu-hōe lóng beh kā lín chhéng-an. [A-ku-lah] kap [Pek-ki-lah], í-ki̍p tī in tau teh chū-hōe ê kàu-hōe, tī Chú ê lāi-bīn beh jia̍t-chhiat kā lín chhéng-an.
46016020	Só͘-ū ê hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē lóng beh kā lín chhéng-an. Lín tio̍h ēng sèng-kiat ê saⁿ-chim hō͘-siōng chhéng-an.
46016021	Góa --- [Pó-lô] chhin-pit kā lín chhéng-an.
46016022	Nā ū lâng bô thiàⁿ Chú, tio̍h siū chiù-chó͘. Chú ah, chhiáⁿ lâi!
46016023	Goān Chú Iâ-so͘ ê un-tián kap lín tông-chāi!
46016024	Goān góa ê thiàⁿ kap lín só͘-ū sio̍k Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ ê lâng tông-chāi!
47001001	Góa sī [Pó-lô], hōng Siōng-tè ê chí-ì choh Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ ê sù-tô͘. Góa kap hiaⁿ-tī [Thê-mô͘-thài] siá-phoe hō͘ tī [Ko-lîm-to] Siōng-tè ê kàu-hōe kap choân [A-kai-a-séng] só͘-ū sìn-tô͘.
47001002	Goān lán ê Pē Siōng-tè kap Chú Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok sù lín un-tián kap pêng-an!
47001003	Tio̍h chheng-chàn lán ê Chú Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok ê Pē Siōng-tè! I sī chû-pi ê Pē, sù ta̍k hāng an-ùi ê Siōng-tè.
47001004	Tī lán it-chhè ê hoān-lān tiong, I an-ùi lán, hō͘ lán ōe-tàng ēng Siōng-tè sù lán ê an-ùi khì an-ùi hiah-ê tú-tio̍h ta̍k khoán hoān-lān ê lâng.
47001005	In-ūi Ki-tok ūi-tio̍h lán siū chin chōe khó͘-lān, lán mā thong-kè Ki-tok siū hiah-ni̍h chōe ê an-ùi.
47001006	Goán tú-tio̍h hoān-lān, mā-sī beh hō͘ lín tit-tio̍h an-ùi kap chín-kiù; goán tit-tio̍h an-ùi, mā-sī beh hō͘ lín tit-tio̍h an-ùi, ū khùi-la̍t thang jím-siū kap goán só͘ jím-siū siâng-khoán ê khó͘-lān.
47001007	Goán tùi lín ê ǹg-bāng bōe iô-tāng; in-ūi goán chai, lín kap goán tâng siū-khó͘, lín mā ōe kap goán tâng siū an-ùi.
47001008	Hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, goán ài lín chai goán tī [A-se-a]-séng só͘ tú-tio̍h ê hoān-lān. Goán só͘ taⁿ ê tāng-tàⁿ hui-siông tāng, tāng kàu taⁿ bōe-khí, tì-kàu giōng-beh oa̍h bōe lo̍h-khì.
47001009	Goán ka-kī kám-kak ū siū phòaⁿ sí-hêng; án-ni sī beh hō͘ goán bô koh óa-khò ka-kī, chí-ū óa-khò hō͘ sí-lâng koh-oa̍h ê Siōng-tè.
47001010	I ū kiù goán thoat-lī sí ê gûi-hiám; chiong-lâi mā ōe kiù goán. Goán khak-sìn I chiong-lâi it-tēng ōe-koh kiù goán.
47001011	Lín mā tio̍h ēng kî-tó lâi pang-chān goán, án-ni chiah ū chin chōe lâng ōe in-ūi goán tùi lín chin chōe lâng ê kî-tó tit-tio̍h chiok-hok lâi kám-siā Siōng-tè.
47001012	Goán só͘ khoa-kháu ê sī án-ni: Goán ê liông-sim chèng-bêng, goán tī chit sè-kan ê seng-oa̍h lóng sī chiàu Siōng-tè só͘ sù ê sûn-kiat kap sêng-si̍t, m̄-sī khò sio̍k-sè ê tì-hūi, sī khò Siōng-tè ê un-tián; goán tùi-thāi lín koh-khah sī án-ni.
47001013	Goán siá hō͘ lín ê lóng sī lín ōe-hiáu tha̍k ōe-tàng liáu-kái ê. Lín kàu taⁿ só͘ lí-kái ê chí-ū chi̍t pō͘-hūn, góa ǹg-bāng lín kàu lō͘-bé ōe oân-choân liáu-kái. Án-ni, tī lán ê Chú Iâ-so͘ ê Ji̍t, lín ōe chòe goán ê khoa-kháu, goán mā chòe lín ê khoa-kháu.
47001015	In-ūi ū chit-ê khak-sìn, góa chiah kè-ōe seng khì hóng-būn lín, thang hō͘ lín tit-tio̍h ka-pē ê chiok-hok;
47001016	chiū-sī kè-ōe khì [Má-kî-tùn] ê lō͘-tiong seng khì hóng-būn lín, koh tùi [Má-kî-tùn] tò-lâi keng-kè lín hia ê sî, hō͘ lín thang sàng góa chhut-hoat khì [Iû-thài].
47001017	Chit-ê kè-ōe kiám sī chhìn-chhái chòe ê? Góa chòe chit khoán kè-ōe kiám chhut tī chū-su ê tōng-ki, liâm-piⁿ kóng “sī” liâm-piⁿ kóng “m̄-sī”?
47001018	Siōng-tè sī sìn-si̍t, góa tùi lín tah-èng ê ōe chiū m̄-sī liâm-piⁿ “sī” liâm-piⁿ “m̄-sī”.
47001019	In-ūi [Se-lah], [Thê-mô͘-thài], kap góa thoân hō͘ lín hit ūi Siōng-tè ê Kiáⁿ Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok pèng m̄-sī liâm-piⁿ “sī” liâm-piⁿ “m̄-sī” ê. Chāi-tī Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok chí-ū “sī” nā-tiāⁿ.
47001020	Siōng-tè it-chhè ê èng-ún chāi-tī Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok chiâⁿ-chòe “sī”, só͘-í lán chiah thong-kè I kóng “Amen” lâi kui êng-kng hō͘ Siōng-tè.
47001021	Hō͘ goán kap lín lâi kap Ki-tok kiat-liân koh soán-phài goán ê sī Siōng-tè.
47001022	I kā goán khàm-ìn, koh sù Sèng Sîn tī goán sim-lāi chòe tam-pó.
47001023	Góa ēng ka-kī ê sìⁿ-miā chiù-chōa kiû Siōng-tè kā góa choh-chèng. Góa sī thé-thiap lín chiah bô khì [Ko-lîm-to].
47001024	Goán m̄-sī teh kiông-chè lín tio̍h sìn sím-mi̍h, hoán-tńg sī teh chòe lín ê tâng-kang, hō͘ lín thang hoaⁿ-hí, in-ūi lín ê sìn-sim ū khiā-chāi.
47002001	Só͘-í, góa koat-tēng bô beh khì lín hia, chiah-bián koh-chài hō͘ lín kan-khó͘-sim.
47002002	Góa nā ū hō͘ lín kan-khó͘-sim, lín chiah-ê kan-khó͘-sim ê lâng í-gōa iáu ū sím-mi̍h lâng thang hō͘ góa khoài-lo̍k?
47002003	Ūi-tio̍h beh pī-bián góa khì lín hia ê sî, hiah-ê eng-kai hō͘ góa hoaⁿ-hí ê lâng hoán-tńg hō͘ góa kan-khó͘-sim, góa chiah siá chêng hit tiuⁿ phoe hō͘ lín. Góa khak-sìn, góa ê hoaⁿ-hí chiū-sī lín tāi-ke ê hoaⁿ-hí.
47002004	Góa hui-siông khùn-jiáu koh thòng-sim, lâu chin chōe ba̍k-sái siá hit tiuⁿ phoe, m̄-sī beh hō͘ lín kan-khó͘-sim, sī beh hō͘ lín chai góa jōa-á-ni̍h thiàⁿ lín.
47002005	Nā ū lâng hō͘ lâng kan-khó͘-sim, m̄-sī hō͘ góa kan-khó͘-sim --- góa khah bô ài kóng-kah kè-thâu giâm-tiōng --- kàu bó͘ chi̍t ê thêng-tō͘ sī hō͘ lín tāi-ke lóng kan-khó͘-sim.
47002006	Hit khoán lâng siū lín tāi-to-sò͘ ê lâng khiàn-chek í-keng kàu-gia̍h.
47002007	Lín tian-tò tio̍h kā i sià-bián, kā i kó͘-lē, chiah-bián hō͘ i kè-thâu kan-khó͘-sim soah choa̍t-bāng.
47002008	Só͘-í, góa khó͘-khǹg lín, tio̍h hō͘ i chai-iáⁿ lín khak-si̍t ū thiàⁿ i.
47002009	Góa chêng siá hit tiuⁿ phoe sī ài-beh chai lín jōa gâu jím-siū khó-giām, sī m̄-sī hoān-sū goān-ì sūn-ho̍k.
47002010	Lín sià-bián sím-mi̍h lâng, góa mā sià-bián i. Góa nā ū sià-bián sím-mi̍h lâng, sī tī Ki-tok ê bīn-chêng ūi-tio̍h lín ê iân-kò͘ sià-bián i.
47002011	Án-ni chiah-bián hō͘ Sat-tàn kā lán phiⁿ khì, in-ūi lán chin chheng-chhó Sat-tàn ê khúi-kè.
47002012	Góa khì [Te̍k-lô-a] thoân Ki-tok ê Hok-im ê sî, Chú í-keng kā góa khui kang-chok ê mn̂g;
47002013	put-kò bô tú-tio̍h góa ê hiaⁿ-tī [Thê-to], góa bōe an-sim, chiū kap hia ê lâng saⁿ-sî khì [Má-kî-tùn].
47002014	Kám-siā Siōng-tè! In-ūi kap Ki-tok kiat-liân, góa sî-siông hō͘ Siōng-tè chhōa-khì chham-ka Ki-tok khái-soân ê hâng-lia̍t. Siōng-tè koh ēng goán khì ta̍k só͘-chāi soan-iông tùi jīn-bat Ki-tok chiah ū ê phang-bī.
47002015	Bô-lūn tī tit-kiù á-sī tîm-lûn ê lâng tiong-kan, goán chiâⁿ-chòe Ki-tok ê phang-bī hiàn hō͘ Siōng-tè;
47002016	tùi teh-beh tîm-lûn ê lâng sī sí ê chhàu-bī, tùi teh-beh tit-kiù ê lâng sī oa̍h ê phang-bī. Sím-mi̍h lâng ōe kham-tit chòe chit khoán tāi-chì?
47002017	Goán bô chhin-chhiūⁿ chin chōe lâng chiong Siōng-tè ê ōe chòe sio̍k-hè phah-bōe, tian-tò sī chòe chi̍t ê sûn-chin ê lâng, siū Siōng-tè chhe-phài, tī I ê bīn-chêng khò Ki-tok soan-káng.
47003001	Goán kiám koh-teh chhui-chiàn ka-kī? Goán kiám tio̍h chhin-chhiūⁿ chi̍t-kóa lâng siá chhui-chiàn-su hō͘ lín, á-sī su-iàu lín ê chhui-chiàn-su?
47003002	Lín pún-sin chiū-sī goán ê chhui-chiàn-su, siá tī goán ê sim lāi, beh hō͘ chèng-lâng chai, chèng-lâng tha̍k.
47003003	Chin bêng-hián, lín sī Ki-tok só͘ siá thong-kè goán lâi sàng ê phoe. Chit tiuⁿ phoe m̄-sī ēng ba̍k-chúi siá tī chio̍h-pán, sī ēng éng-oa̍h Siōng-tè ê Sîn siá tī lâng ê sim-pán.
47003004	Goán thong-kè Ki-tok tùi Siōng-tè ū chit khoán ê khak-sìn chiah án-ni kóng.
47003005	Che m̄-sī kóng goán ka-kī ū châi-tiāu thang chòe chit-ê tāi-chì, goán ê châi-tiāu sī tùi Siōng-tè lâi ê.
47003006	I sù goán ū châi-tiāu thang chòe sin ê iok ê chhe-ēng; m̄-sī ēng bûn-jī siá ê, sī Sèng Sîn ê iok. Bûn-jī hō͘ lâng sí, m̄-kú Sèng Sîn hō͘ lâng oa̍h.
47003007	Ēng bûn-jī khek tī chio̍h-pán ê Lu̍t-hoat pan-pò͘ ê sî, Siōng-tè ê êng-kng ū hián-hiān. Tùi [Mô͘-se] ê bīn hoán-chiò chhut-lâi ê kng sui-jiân chiām-chiām teh siau-sit, m̄-kú hit-ê kng iáu chin kiông, tì-kàu [Í-sek-lia̍t] kiáⁿ-sun bōe-tàng ba̍k-chiu kim-kim kā i khòaⁿ. Hō͘ lâng tì-kàu sí ê Lu̍t-hoat to ū chit khoán ê êng-kng,
47003008	án-ni Sèng Sîn só͘ hoat-chhut ê êng-kng kiám bōe koh-khah tōa?
47003009	Hit-ê kā lâng tēng-chōe ê thé-chè nā ōe hoat-chhut chit khoán ê êng-kng, hit-ê kā lâng soan-pò͘ bô-chōe ê thé-chè só͘ hián-chhut ê êng-kng kiám bōe koh-khah tōa!
47003010	Án-ni, in-ūi hiān-chāi ê êng-kng pí í-chêng ê koh-khah tōa, í-chêng ê êng-kng soah bô-khì.
47003011	Hit-ê siau-sit-ê nā ōe hoat-chhut êng-kng, hit-ê éng-chûn-ê it-tēng ōe hián-chhut koh-khah tōa ê êng-kng.
47003012	In-ūi goán ū chit khoán ê ǹg-bāng chiah chiah-ni̍h ióng-kám.
47003013	Goán bô chhin-chhiūⁿ [Mô͘-se] tio̍h ēng phè tà ka-kī ê bīn. [Mô͘-se] án-ni chòe, chiah-bián hō͘ [Í-sek-lia̍t] kiáⁿ-sun khòaⁿ-tio̍h i bīn ê êng-kng chiām-chiām siau-sit.
47003014	M̄-kú in ê sim tūn, it-ti̍t kàu kin-á-ji̍t in tha̍k kū ê iok ê sî, in ê sim iáu hō͘ hit tè phè tà-teh. In-ūi chí-ū kap Ki-tok kiat-liân, hit tè phè chiah the̍h khí-lâi.
47003015	Sīm-chì kàu kin-á-ji̍t, in ta̍k pái tha̍k [Mô͘-se] ê Lu̍t-hoat, hit tè phè iáu tà tī in ê sim.
47003016	M̄-kú, koan-hē [Mô͘-se], Sèng-keng ū kì-chài, “Tng i kui-ǹg Chú ê sî, i ê phè chiah the̍h khí-lâi.”
47003017	Tī chia teh kóng ê “Chú” sī Sèng Sîn; ū Chú ê Sîn ê só͘-chāi chiū ū chū-iû.
47003018	Lán tāi-ke lóng ēng bô tà-phè ê bīn teh hoán-chiò Chú ê êng-kng; chit-ê êng-kng sī tùi Chú, chiū-sī tùi Sèng Sîn hoat chhut-lâi ê êng-kng, teh kā lán kái-chō chiâⁿ-chòe I ê hêng-siōng, hō͘ lán ū koh-khah tōa ê êng-kng.
47004001	Kì-jiân Siōng-tè ū lîn-bín goán, chiong chit-ê chit-bū kau-thok goán, goán bô sit-chì.
47004002	Goán pàng-sak it-chhè bô ài lâng chai ê kiàn-siàu-tāi, bô chòe khi-phiàn lâng ê tāi-chì, bô oai-khiok Siōng-tè ê ōe, chí-ū tī Siōng-tè ê bīn-chêng kong-khai hián-bêng chin-lí, lâi kiò-chhíⁿ chèng-lâng ê liông-sim.
47004003	Goán só͘ thoân ê hok-im nā ū am-khàm bô chheng-chhó, chí-ū tùi hiah-ê teh-beh tîm-lûn ê lâng am-khàm bô chheng-chhó nā-tiāⁿ.
47004004	In m̄-sìn sī in-ūi chit sè-kan ê sîn-bêng hō͘ in ê sim-ba̍k chhiⁿ-mî, bōe-tàng khòaⁿ-kìⁿ hok-im ê kng, chit-ê hok-im teh kiàn-chèng êng-kng ê Ki-tok; Ki-tok sī Siōng-tè ê hêng-siōng.
47004005	Goán m̄-sī thoân ka-kī, sī thoân Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok sī Chú; goán ka-kī in-ūi Iâ-so͘ ê iân-kò͘ chòe lín ê lô͘-po̍k.
47004006	Hit-ūi bēng-lēng kng tùi o͘-àm chiò-chhut-lâi ê Siōng-tè, chiū-sī ēng kng chiò lán lāi-sim ê Siōng-tè, hō͘ lán jīn-bat I chiò tī Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok ê bīn hit-ê êng-kng.
47004007	Put-kò goán chiah-ê ū chit-ê sio̍k-lêng pó-pòe ê lâng, sī chhin-chhiūⁿ thô͘ chō ê khì-khū, beh piáu-sī hit-ê chì-tōa ê lêng-le̍k sī sio̍k tī Siōng-tè, m̄-sī tùi goán chhut-lâi ê.
47004008	Goán siông-siông tú-tio̍h ta̍k khoán khùn-lân, m̄-kú bô khut-ho̍k; tú-tio̍h choa̍t-kéng, m̄-kú bô choa̍t-bāng;
47004009	siū-tio̍h khún-pek, m̄-kú bô hō͘ Siōng-tè pàng-sak; siū phah-tó, m̄-kú bô tì-kàu sí.
47004010	Goán put-sî tòa Iâ-so͘ ê sí tī goán ōe-sí ê seng-khu, hō͘ Iâ-so͘ ê oa̍h-miā mā thang tī goán ê sin-chiūⁿ hián-bêng.
47004011	Goán oa̍h tī sè-kan, ūi-tio̍h Iâ-so͘ ê iân-kò͘ sî-siông tú-tio̍h sí ê gûi-hiám, thang hō͘ I ê oa̍h-miā tī goán chit-ê ōe-sí ê seng-khu hián-bêng chhut-lâi.
47004012	Án-ni, sí tī goán ê lāi-bīn teh hoat-seng chok-iōng, m̄-kú oa̍h-miā tī lín ê lāi-bīn teh hoat-seng chok-iōng.
47004013	Sèng-keng kóng, “Góa ū sìn, só͘-í góa chiah kóng”, kun-kù chit khoán sìn-gióng ê cheng-sîn, goán mā sìn, só͘-í goán chiah kóng.
47004014	Goán chai, hō͘ Chú Iâ-so͘ koh-oa̍h ê Siōng-tè mā ōe hō͘ goán kap Iâ-so͘ tâng koh-oa̍h, koh chhōa goán kap lín chòe-hé kàu I ê bīn-chêng.
47004015	Chiah-ê it-chhè lóng sī ūi-tio̍h lín, sī beh hō͘ koh-khah chōe ê lâng tit-tio̍h Siōng-tè ê un-tián, thang hiàn koh-khah chōe ê kám-siā lâi êng-iāu Siōng-tè.
47004016	In-ūi án-ni, goán bô sit-chì. Sui-jiân goán gōa-chāi ê lâng chiām-chiām teh soe-pāi, goán lōe-chāi ê lâng khiok ji̍t-ji̍t teh ōaⁿ-sin.
47004017	Goán só͘ siū chit-ê chiām-sî koh sió-khóa ê kan-khó͘ sī beh hō͘ goán tit-tio̍h bōe thang pí, koh-khah tōa, éng-oán ê êng-kng.
47004018	Goán só͘ tiōng-sī ê m̄-sī khòaⁿ-ōe-tio̍h ê, sī khòaⁿ-bōe-tio̍h ê; in-ūi khòaⁿ-ōe-tio̍h ê sī chiām-sî, khòaⁿ-bōe-tio̍h ê sī éng-oán.
47005001	In-ūi goán chai, lán tī tōe-chiūⁿ teh tòa chit-ê pò͘-pîⁿ ê chhù nā thiah khí-lâi, Siōng-tè ōe hō͘ lán thiⁿ-téng ê chhù, m̄-sī lâng ê chhiú khí ê, sī éng-oán ê chhù.
47005002	Lán hiān-chāi tī chit-ê pò͘-pîⁿ teh thó͘-khùi, jia̍t-chhiat ǹg-bāng thang khì tiàm thiⁿ-téng ê chhù, chhin-chhiūⁿ saⁿ tha̍h lo̍h-khì,
47005003	nā tha̍h lo̍h-khì chiū bōe chhiah-sin lō͘-thé.
47005004	Lán iáu tiàm tī chit-ê pò͘-pîⁿ pē tāng-tàⁿ teh thó͘-khùi; lán m̄-sī ài thǹg-khì tōe-chiūⁿ ê thé, sī beh tha̍h sio̍k-thiⁿ ê thé, thang hō͘ oa̍h-miā kā ōe-sí ê thun lo̍h-khì.
47005005	Hō͘ lán ū chit-ê kái-piàn ê sī Siōng-tè, I sù Sèng Sîn hō͘ lán, kā lán pó-chèng.
47005006	Só͘-í, goán put-sî ū ióng-khì. Goán chai, lán iáu tòa tī chit-ê seng-khu teh oa̍h ê sî, sī kap Chú saⁿ-lī.
47005007	In-ūi lán teh oa̍h, m̄-sī khò ba̍k-chiu khòaⁿ, sī khò sìn-sim.
47005008	Goán ū ióng-khì, khah ài lī-khui chit-ê seng-khu khì kap Chú tòa.
47005009	Só͘-í, bô-lūn tī chit-ê seng-khu á-sī lī-khui chit-ê seng-khu, goán ê bo̍k-te̍k sī ài hō͘ Chú hoaⁿ-hí.
47005010	In-ūi lán lóng it-tēng tio̍h khiā tī Ki-tok ê bīn-chêng siū I sím-phòaⁿ. Ta̍k ê lâng lóng tio̍h chiàu ka-kī tī tōe-chiūⁿ ê seng-khu só͘-chòe ê, bô-lūn sī hó á-sī pháiⁿ, chiap-siū pò-èng.
47005011	Kì-jiân goán chai-iáⁿ tio̍h kèng-ùi Chú, goán chiū khó͘-khǹg lâng. Tùi Siōng-tè lâi khòaⁿ, goán sī sím-mi̍h khoán lâng chin chheng-chhó; góa ǹg-bāng tùi lín ê liông-sim lâi khòaⁿ mā chin chheng-chhó.
47005012	Goán m̄-sī beh koh tùi lín chhui-chiàn ka-kī, sī hō͘ lín ū ki-hōe ēng goán chòe khoa-kháu, hō͘ lín thang hôe-èng hiah-ê chù-tiōng gōa-piáu bô chù-tiōng lāi-sim ê lâng.
47005013	Goán nā bô chèng-siông, sī ūi-tio̍h Siōng-tè; goán nā chèng-siông, sī ūi-tio̍h lín.
47005014	In-ūi Ki-tok ê thiàⁿ chhui-pek goán chòe chit-ê kiat-lūn: Chi̍t lâng ūi-tio̍h chèng-lâng sí, chèng-lâng chiū lóng sí.
47005015	I ūi-tio̍h chèng-lâng sí, sī beh hō͘ hiah-ê oa̍h-teh ê lâng bô koh ūi-tio̍h ka-kī oa̍h, sī ūi-tio̍h hit-ūi thòe in sí-liáu koh-oa̍h ê Ki-tok lâi oa̍h.
47005016	Só͘-í, tùi taⁿ í-āu goán bô koh kun-kù lâng ê phiau-chún bat lâng. Sui-jiân goán bat ēng lâng ê phiau-chún bat Ki-tok, m̄-kú hiān-chāi bô koh án-ni bat I.
47005017	Án-ni, bô-lūn sím-mi̍h lâng, nā kap Ki-tok kiat-liân, chiū-sī sin chhòng-chō ê lâng; kū-ê í-keng kè-khì, taⁿ lóng pìⁿ-chòe sin-ê.
47005018	Chiah-ê it-chhè lóng sī Siōng-tè ê chok-ûi; I thong-kè Ki-tok hō͘ lán kap I koh hô-hó, koh chiong hō͘ lâng hô-hó ê chit-bū kau-tài goán.
47005019	Goán só͘ thoân ê sìn-sit sī án-ni: Siōng-tè thong-kè Ki-tok hō͘ sè-kan-lâng kap I hô-hó. I bô koh tui-kiù in ê chōe-kò, khiok chiong chit-ê hō͘ lâng hô-hó ê sìn-sit kau-thok goán.
47005020	Só͘-í, goán choh Ki-tok ê tāi-sài, Siōng-tè thong-kè goán kā lín khó͘-khǹg. Goán thòe Ki-tok kā lín kiû, tio̍h kap Siōng-tè hô-hó.
47005021	Siōng-tè hō͘ bô-chōe ê Ki-tok ūi-tio̍h lán ê iân-kò͘ chiâⁿ-chòe ū-chōe-ê, hō͘ lán thang khò Ki-tok kap Siōng-tè kiàn-li̍p ha̍p-gî ê koan-hē.
47006001	Goán choh Siōng-tè ê tâng-kang koh kā lín khó͘-khǹg, lín tùi Siōng-tè niá-siū ê un-tián m̄-thang hō͘ i lo̍k-khong.
47006002	In-ūi Siōng-tè kóng: Tī thang siū chiap-la̍p ê sî, góa ū thiaⁿ lí; tī chín-kiù ê ji̍t, góa ū pang-chān lí. Tio̍h thiaⁿ! Chit-chūn sī siū chiap-la̍p ê sî; kin-á-ji̍t sī chín-kiù ê ji̍t!
47006003	Ūi-tio̍h goán sū-hōng ê kang-chok bián siū chí-chek, chó͘-gāi pa̍t-lâng ê tāi-chì goán lóng bô chòe,
47006004	hoán-tńg ēng siōng-tōa ê nāi-sim, hoān-sū thong-kè hoān-lān, kan-lân, kap khùn-khó͘, piáu-sī goán sī Siōng-tè ê chhe-ēng.
47006005	Goán bat siū-tio̍h piⁿ-phah, koaiⁿ-kaⁿ, pō-le̍k ê siong-hāi, lô-khó͘, bô-khùn, bô-chia̍h.
47006006	Goán ēng sûn-kiat, tì-sek, khoan-iông, jîn-chû, óa-khò Sèng Sîn, ēng sûn-chin ê thiàⁿ,
47006007	thoân chin-lí ê sìn-sit kap Siōng-tè ê tōa lêng-le̍k, ēng kong-gī chòe bú-khì kong-kek tùi-te̍k, pó-hō͘ ka-kī.
47006008	Goán siū chun-tiōng, mā siū bú-jio̍k; tit-tio̍h pháiⁿ miâ-siaⁿ, mā tit-tio̍h hó miâ-siaⁿ. Goán hō͘ lâng khòaⁿ-chòe pián-sian, kî-si̍t goán kóng si̍t-ōe;
47006009	ná-chún bô-lâng bat, kî-si̍t lâng-lâng lóng bat; ná-chún sí-khì, kî-si̍t iáu teh oa̍h. Goán sui-jiân siū chhú-hoa̍t, m̄-kú bô hō͘ lâng thâi-sí;
47006010	sui-jiân iu-siong, m̄-kú put-sî hoaⁿ-hí; sui-jiân sàn-chhiah, m̄-kú hō͘ chin chōe lâng hó-gia̍h; chhin-chhiūⁿ bô pòaⁿ-hāng, m̄-kú ta̍k hāng lóng ū.
47006011	[Ko-lîm-to] ê pêng-iú, goán ê sim-heng í-keng phah-khui, khui-chhùi kā lín kóng lah.
47006012	M̄-sī goán tùi lín bô tō͘-liōng, sī lín tùi goán bô tō͘-liōng.
47006013	Góa khòaⁿ lín chòe ka-kī ê kiáⁿ kā lín kóng: Kap goán siâng-khoán, lín ê sim-heng mā tio̍h phah khah khui leh.
47006014	M̄-thang kap bī-sìn ê lâng khan-liân kau-chhap; kong-gī kap put-hoat ū sím-mi̍h koan-liân? Kng-bêng kap o͘-àm ná ōe-tàng kau-óng?
47006015	Ki-tok kap Mô͘-kúi ná ōe-tàng hô-ha̍p? Sìn kap bô-sìn ê lâng ū sím-mi̍h koan-hē?
47006016	Siōng-tè ê tiān kap ngó͘-siōng ná ōe-tàng pâi chòe-hé? In-ūi lán sī éng-oa̍h Siōng-tè ê tiān! Chiàu Siōng-tè só͘ kóng: Góa beh kap góa ê chú-bîn chòe-hé khiā-khí, tī in tiong-kan óng-lâi. Góa beh chòe in ê Siōng-tè, in beh chòe góa ê chú-bîn.
47006017	Só͘-í Chú kóng: Lín tio̍h tùi in tiong-kan chhut-khì, kap in hun-lī. Bô chheng-khì ê m̄-thang chiap-chhiok, án-ni góa chiū chiap-la̍p lín.
47006018	Góa beh chòe lín ê Pē, lín beh chòe góa ê kiáⁿ, cha-bó͘-kiáⁿ. Choân-lêng ê Chú ū án-ni kóng.
47007001	Chhin-ài ê pêng-iú, kì-jiân lán tit-tio̍h chiah-ê èng-ún, lán tio̍h kiat-chēng ka-kī, tû-khì it-chhè hō͘ seng-khu kap sim-lêng phah lâ-sâm ê sū, ēng kèng-ùi Siōng-tè hō͘ seng-oa̍h oân-choân sèng-hòa.
47007002	Lín tio̍h ēng khoan-tāi ê sim tùi-thāi goán. Goán m̄-bat khek-khui lâng, m̄-bat hāi lâng tūi-lo̍h, m̄-bat phiⁿ lâng.
47007003	Góa án-ni kóng, m̄-sī beh kā lín khiàn-chek. Góa í-chêng bat kóng, goán chin thiàⁿ lín, goān-ì kap lín tâng-sí tâng-oa̍h.
47007004	Góa chin sìn-jīm lín, ēng lín chòe khoa-kháu. Góa chhiong-móa an-ùi; tī goán it-chhè ê hoān-lān tiong, góa ū móa-móa ê hoaⁿ-hí.
47007005	Goán kàu [Má-kî-tùn] í-āu, seng-khu bô thang hioh-khùn, hoán-tńg ta̍k hāng tāi-chì lóng tú-tio̍h khùn-lân, gōa-bīn ū hun-cheng, lāi-bīn ū kiaⁿ-hiâⁿ.
47007006	M̄-kú, an-ùi sit-chì ê lâng ê Siōng-tè ū chhe [Thê-to] lâi, hō͘ goán tit-tio̍h an-ùi;
47007007	m̄-nā in-ūi i ū lâi, koh in-ūi i ū kóng-khí lín án-chóaⁿ kā i kó͘-lē ê tāi-chì. I ū kā goán kóng-khí lín ài kìⁿ góa, lín ê sim kan-khó͘, kap lín tùi góa ê jia̍t-chêng, hō͘ góa koh-khah hoaⁿ-hí.
47007008	Sui-jiân góa chêng hit tiuⁿ phoe hō͘ lín sim kan-khó͘, góa bô hō͘-hóe; m̄-kú chai-iáⁿ hit tiuⁿ phoe ū hō͘ lín chi̍t-sî sim kan-khó͘, góa ū hō͘-hóe;
47007009	chóng-sī hiān-chāi góa chin hoaⁿ-hí, m̄-sī in-ūi lín sim kan-khó͘, sī in-ūi lín ê kan-khó͘-sim ū tì-kàu hóe-kái. Siōng-tè ū siān-iōng lín ê kan-khó͘-sim, só͘-í goán só͘ chòe ê tùi lín bô siong-hāi.
47007010	In-ūi Siōng-tè siān-iōng lín ê kan-khó͘-sim lâi hō͘ lín hóe-kái thang tit-tio̍h kiù, goán chiū bô sím-mi̍h thang hō͘-hóe; m̄-kú sio̍k-sè ê kan-khó͘-sim ōe hō͘ lâng tì-kàu sí.
47007011	Lín khòaⁿ, Siōng-tè hiah-ni̍h gâu siān-iōng lín ê kan-khó͘-sim, chiah hō͘ lín hiah-ni̍h pek-chhiat piān-bêng ka-kī ê chheng-pe̍k, hiah-ni̍h hùn-khài, hiah-ni̍h ū kéng-kài-sim, hiah-ni̍h ū kî-thāi, hiah-ni̍h jia̍t-chêng, hiah-ni̍h ke̍k-lia̍t khiàn-chek put-hoat; tī ta̍k hāng tāi-chì, lín í-keng ū chèng-bêng ka-kī ê chheng-pe̍k.
47007012	Só͘-í, sui-jiân góa ū siá hit tiuⁿ phoe, m̄-kú m̄-sī ūi-tio̍h kā lâng khek-khui ê lâng, á-sī siū lâng khek-khui ê lâng, sī beh tùi lín piáu-bêng lín tī Siōng-tè ê bīn-chêng tùi goán ê jia̍t-chêng ū jōa chhim.
47007013	In-ūi án-ni, goán ū tit-tio̍h an-ùi. Goán m̄-nā tit-tio̍h an-ùi, mā in-ūi khòaⁿ-tio̍h [Thê-to] ê hoaⁿ-hí koh-khah hoaⁿ-hí, in-ūi i ê sim ū tùi lín tāi-ke tit-tio̍h kek-lē.
47007014	Góa bat tùi i po-chióng lín, lín bô hō͘ góa làu-khùi. Góa ta̍k hāng tāi-chì lóng tùi lín kóng si̍t-chāi-ōe, góa tùi [Thê-to] po-chióng lín ê ōe mā-sī si̍t-chāi.
47007015	Só͘-í, i siūⁿ-khí lín tāi-ke án-chóaⁿ sūn-ho̍k i, kiong-kiong kèng-kèng kā i chiap-thāi, i tùi lín ê thiàⁿ-sim chiū ná chhim.
47007016	Góa hui-siông hoaⁿ-hí, in-ūi góa ōe-tàng oân-choân sìn-jīm lín.
47008001	Hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, góa ài lín chai Siōng-tè sù hō͘ [Má-kî-tùn] chèng kàu-hōe ê un-hūi.
47008002	In ū tùi hoān-lān keng-le̍k chin chōe khó-giām, iáu-kú chhiong-móa hoaⁿ-hí; sui-jiân hui-siông sàn-chhiah, iáu-kú hui-siông khóng-khài koan-hiàn.
47008003	Góa ōe-tàng kā lín chèng-bêng, in í-keng chīn in só͘-ōe hōng-hiàn, sīm-chì chhiau-kè in ê khùi-la̍t.
47008004	In jia̍t-chhiat kiû goán hō͘ in ū chham-ka kiù-chè [Iû-thài] sìn-tô͘ sū-hōng ê kong-êng.
47008005	In án-ni chòe m̄-nā chhiau-kè goán ê kî-thāi, sīm-chì chun-thàn Siōng-tè ê chí-ì tāi-seng chiong ka-kī hiàn hō͘ Chú, jiân-āu hiàn hō͘ goán.
47008006	Só͘-í goán khǹg [Thê-to] kè-sio̍k hia̍p-chō͘ lín, lâi oân-sêng i só͘ khai-sí chit hāng chû-siān ê kang-chok.
47008007	Lín ê sìn-sim, kháu-châi, tì-sek, pang-chān lâng ê jia̍t-sêng, í-ki̍p tùi goán ê thiàⁿ-sim lóng hiah-ni̍h hong-hù, goán ài lín tùi chit hāng chû-siān ê kang-chok mā tio̍h hiah-ni̍h khóng-khài.
47008008	Góa án-ni kóng m̄-sī teh bēng-lēng, sī ài lín chai pa̍t-lâng jia̍t-sim teh pang-chān lâng, lâi khó-giām lín ê thiàⁿ-sim sī m̄-sī chin ê.
47008009	Lín chai lán ê Chú Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok ê un-tián: I sui-jiân hù-chiok, m̄-kú ūi-tio̍h lín chiâⁿ-chòe sàn-chhiah, sī beh hō͘ lín in-ūi I ê sàn-chhiah chiâⁿ-chòe hù-chiok.
47008010	Koan-hē chit hāng tāi-chì, góa kiàn-gī lín khah hó chit sî tio̍h khì oân-sêng kū-nî khai-sí ê bō͘-koan; lín m̄-nā tāi-seng hêng-tōng, koh tāi-seng thê-chhiòng.
47008011	Taⁿ, lín tio̍h oân-sêng chit-ê kang-chok, ēng khí-thâu kè-ōe ê sî ê jia̍t-sim, chīn lín só͘-ōe khì chòe lâi oân-sêng.
47008012	Lín nā hoaⁿ-hí koan-hiàn, Siōng-tè ōe hoaⁿ-hí chiap-la̍p lín hiàn lín só͘ ū-ê, bōe iau-kiû lín hiàn lín só͘ bô-ê.
47008013	Góa m̄-sī beh ke-thiⁿ lín ê hū-tam, hō͘ pa̍t-lâng khah khin-sang. Kì-jiân lín hiān-chāi hù-chiok, tio̍h kiong-kip sàn-chhiah ê lâng. Án-ni, lín sàn-chhiah in hó-gia̍h ê sî, in mā ōe kiong-kip lín. Án-ni chiah ū kong-pîⁿ.
47008015	Chiàu Sèng-keng só͘ kì-chài: Chōe ê, bô chhun; chió ê, bô khiàm.
47008016	Kám-siā Siōng-tè hō͘ [Thê-to] chhin-chhiūⁿ góa chiah-ni̍h jia̍t-sim pang-chān lín.
47008017	I m̄-nā ū hoaⁿ-hí chiap-siū goán ê khún-kiû, koh hui-siông jia̍t-sim chū-goān pang-chān lín, koat-tēng beh khì lín hia.
47008018	Goán lēng-gōa phài chi̍t ê hiaⁿ-tī kap [Thê-to] chòe-hé khì; chit-ê hiaⁿ-tī tī thoân hok-im ê kang-chok ū siū-tio̍h chèng kàu-hōe ê chheng-chàn.
47008019	M̄-nā án-ni, i siū chèng kàu-hōe soán-phài chòe goán lú-hêng ê tâng-phōaⁿ, lâi chham-ka goán chit hāng chû-siān ê kang-chok; chit-ê kang-chok sī beh kui êng-kng hō͘ Chú, koh piáu-sī goán hoaⁿ-hí kam-goān teh chòe.
47008020	Goán hui-siông kín-sīn teh chhú-lí lâng khóng-khài hōng-hiàn ê chîⁿ-hāng, chiah-bián ín-khí lâng ê phoe-phêng.
47008021	In-ūi goán ê tōng-ki kong-bêng chèng-tāi, m̄-nā tī Chú ê bīn-chêng, tī lâng ê bīn-chêng mā-sī án-ni chòe.
47008022	Só͘-í goán beh koh phài chi̍t ê hiaⁿ-tī kap in chòe-hé khì. I keng-kè goán chin chōe piàn ê khó-giām, chai i tī chin chōe tāi-chì jia̍t-sim pang-chān lâng. Hiān-chāi i hui-siông sìn-jīm lín, chiū koh-khah jia̍t-sim beh pang-chān lín.
47008023	Kóng-tio̍h [Thê-to], i sī góa ê tâng-phōaⁿ, chòe góa ê tâng-kang pang-chān lín; kap i chòe-hé khì hiah-ê hiaⁿ-tī sī ta̍k kàu-hōe chhe-phài ê, sī Ki-tok ê êng-kng.
47008024	Só͘-í, lín tio̍h tùi ta̍k ê kàu-hōe kong-khai chèng-si̍t lín ê thiàⁿ-sim, koh chèng-si̍t goán tùi lín ê khoa-kháu.
47009001	Koan-hē chín-chè [Iû-thài] sìn-tô͘ ê sū, góa m̄-bián koh siá-phoe hō͘ lín.
47009002	Góa chai lín kam-sim pang-chān, góa bat ūi-tio̍h chit hāng tāi-chì tùi [Má-kî-tùn]-lâng khoa-kháu kóng, “[A-kai-a] ê sìn-tô͘ tī kū-nî chiū chún-pī piān.” Lín ê jia̍t-sim ū kám-tōng in tōa-pō͘-hūn ê lâng.
47009003	Góa ū chhe kúi-nā ê hiaⁿ-tī khì lín hia, ǹg-bāng lín chiàu góa só͘ kóng ê chún-pī piān, chiah-bián góa tī chit hāng tāi-chì ūi-tio̍h lín tùi lâng ê khoa-kháu lo̍k-khong.
47009004	Nā bô, [Má-kî-tùn]-lâng nā kap góa khì, khòaⁿ-tio̍h lín bô chún-pī piān, goán ōe in-ūi siuⁿ siong-sìn lín soah chin làu-khùi, lín kiám bōe koh-khah làu-khùi!
47009005	Só͘-í, góa siūⁿ eng-kai kó͘-lē hiah-ê hiaⁿ-tī seng khì lín hia, kiò lín chêng tah-èng beh koan-hiàn ê chîⁿ seng chún-pī piān. Án-ni góa kàu-ūi ê sî lín lóng chún-pī piān lah, piáu-sī lín ê koan-hiàn m̄-sī bián-kióng, sī kam-sim lo̍k-ì.
47009006	Tio̍h chai: Iā chió siu chió, iā chōe siu chōe.
47009007	Só͘-í ta̍k ê lâng tio̍h chiàu ka-kī só͘ koat-tēng ê lâi hiàn, m̄-thang m̄-kam, mā m̄-thang bián-kióng; in-ūi Siōng-tè thiàⁿ hoaⁿ-hí hōng-hiàn ê lâng.
47009008	Siōng-tè ōe chiong ta̍k hāng un-tián hong-hong hù-hù sù-hok hō͘ lín, m̄-nā ka-kī ta̍k hāng kàu-gia̍h, koh ōe-tàng chòe ta̍k hāng hó-sū.
47009009	Chiàu Sèng-keng só͘ kì-chài: I khóng-khài chín-chè sàn-chhiah-lâng; I ê jîn-gī sòa kàu éng-oán.
47009010	Kiong-kip chéng-chí hō͘ iā-chéng-ê, koh siúⁿ-sù chia̍h-mi̍h hō͘ lâng chia̍h hit-ūi Siōng-tè ōe chiong lín só͘ su-iàu ê chéng-chí kiong-kip lín, koh hō͘ chéng-chí ná chōe, mā hō͘ lín jîn-gī ê ké-chí hong-siu.
47009011	I ōe hō͘ lín sū-sū hù-chiok, thang sûi-sî khóng-khài si-sià, hō͘ chin chōe lâng thong-kè goán chiap-tio̍h lín ê lé-mi̍h lâi kám-siā Siōng-tè.
47009012	In-ūi lín só͘ chòe chit-ê sū-hōng ê kang-chok m̄-nā kái-koat sìn-tô͘ ê su-iàu, mā hō͘ in tùi Siōng-tè ê kám-siā ke-thiⁿ kàu móa chhut-lâi.
47009013	Thong-kè lín só͘ chòe chit-ê sū-hōng chèng-si̍t lín ū sūn-thàn só͘ soan-jīn ê Ki-tok ê hok-im, í-ki̍p lín tùi in kap kî-tha só͘-ū ê lâng khóng-khài ê koan-hiàn, thang kui êng-kng hō͘ Siōng-tè.
47009014	Siōng-tè sù lín bû-hān ê un-tián, hō͘ in ōe koh-khah kèng-ài lín, koh ūi-tio̍h lín kî-tó.
47009015	Kám-siā Siōng-tè, I ū hō͘ lán bōe-tàng hêng-iông ê un-sù!
47010001	Lâng kóng góa kap lín kìⁿ-bīn ê sî kheh-khì, kap lín saⁿ-lī ê sî giâm-hat, m̄-kú góa chit-ê [Pó-lô] ēng Ki-tok ê un-jiû kap jîn-chû chhin-sin khó͘-khǹg lín.
47010002	Góa khì lín hia ê sî m̄-thang pek góa tùi lín giâm-hat; tùi hiah-ê phoe-phêng kóng góa ēng sio̍k-sè ê tōng-ki chòe tāi-chì ê lâng, góa it-tēng ōe tùi in bô kheh-khì.
47010003	Sui-jiân lán tiàm sè-kan teh seng-oa̍h, m̄-kú bô chiàu sè-kan ê hong-sek teh cheng-chiàn.
47010004	Góa cheng-chiàn teh ēng ê m̄-sī sio̍k-sè, sī Siōng-tè ū ui-le̍k ê bú-khì, liân kian-kò͘ ê iàu-sài to ōe-tàng phò-hoāi. Goán thui-hoan in ê giân-lūn,
47010005	chiong chó͘-tòng lâng jīn-bat Siōng-tè it-chhè ê kiau-ngō͘ lóng kā siau-bia̍t, koh kái-piàn it-chhè ê ì-liām, hō͘ i oân-choân kui-sūn Ki-tok.
47010006	Lín oân-choân sūn-ho̍k Ki-tok liáu-āu, goán chiū chhú-hoa̍t ta̍k ê m̄ sūn-ho̍k ê lâng.
47010007	Lín kan-ta teh khòaⁿ gōa-piáu. Nā ū lâng káⁿ kóng i sio̍k Ki-tok, i ka-kī tio̍h koh siūⁿ khòaⁿ-bāi, i sio̍k Ki-tok, góa mā kâng-khoán sio̍k Ki-tok.
47010008	Chú hō͘ goán ê koân-pèng sī beh kā lín kiàn-li̍p, m̄-sī beh húi-hoāi. Góa tùi chit-ê koân-pèng nā ū khah khoa-kháu, góa mā bô kám-kak kiàn-siàu.
47010009	Góa bô ài hō͘ lín siūⁿ-kóng góa siá-phoe teh kā lín khióng-hat.
47010010	In-ūi ū lâng kóng, “[Pó-lô] ê phoe giâm-hat koh kiông-ngī, m̄-kú lâng lâi ê sî khiok nńg-chiáⁿ, kóng-ōe bô hūn-liōng.”
47010011	Kóng chit khoán ōe ê lâng tio̍h chai, goán bô tī lín hia ê sî phoe án-chóaⁿ siá, goán kàu lín hia ê sî mā ōe án-ni chòe.
47010012	Goán m̄-káⁿ kap gâu tián ka-kī ê lâng pâi-teh saⁿ-pí; in án-ni pí-chhú chhìn-tāng, hō͘-siōng pí-kàu, si̍t-chāi bô tì-hūi.
47010013	Liân tī lín tiong-kan ê kang-chok pau-hâm chāi-lāi, goán ê khoa-kháu lóng tī Siōng-tè tēng ê hān-tō͘ lāi, lóng bô chhiau-kè.
47010014	Goán bô chhiau-kè hoān-ûi, bô khì lín hia mā kóng ū khì; kî-si̍t, goán sī thâu-chi̍t ê chiong Ki-tok ê hok-im thoân hō͘ lín ê.
47010015	Goán pèng bô chhiau-kè hān-tō͘, ēng pa̍t-lâng só͘ lô-khó͘ ê chòe ka-kī ê sêng-chek lâi khoa-kháu. Goán só͘ ǹg-bāng ê sī lín ê sìn-sim ná cheng-tióng, goán tī lín tiong-kan kang-chok ê hoān-ûi mā ná khui-khoah.
47010016	Án-ni, goán chiah thang chiong hok-im thoân kàu lín í-gōa ê tōe-khu, bô ēng pa̍t-lâng tī pa̍t ê hoān-ûi ê sêng-chiū chòe khoa-kháu.
47010017	Chiàu Sèng-keng só͘ kóng, “Beh khoa-kháu ê lâng, tio̍h khoa-kháu Chú!”
47010018	In-ūi m̄-sī ka-kī chhui-chiàn, sī Chú só͘ chhui-chiàn ê chiah-sī kham-tit siū chiap-la̍p ê lâng.
47011001	Chhiáⁿ lín khoan-iông góa sió-khóa ê gû-gōng; chhiáⁿ khoan-iông góa!
47011002	Góa thiàⁿ lín, chhin-chhiūⁿ Siōng-tè thiàⁿ lín thiàⁿ-kah beh khí chi̍t-tò͘. In-ūi lín chhin-chhiūⁿ sûn-kiat ê chāi-sek-lú, góa ū chiong lín phòe hō͘ chi̍t ê tiōng-hu, chiū-sī Ki-tok.
47011003	Chhin-chhiūⁿ [Hā-oa] hō͘ chôa ê khúi-chà phiàn-khì, góa mā kiaⁿ-liáu lín ê sim-su ōe siū bê-he̍k, soah khì-sak tùi Ki-tok ê sûn-kiat kap chin-sêng.
47011004	In-ūi tùi ū lâng khì lín hia thoân kap goán só͘ thoân bô kâng ê Iâ-so͘, á-sī lín chiap-la̍p kap lín chêng só͘ chiap-la̍p bô kâng ê Sèng Sîn, á-sī lín chiap-siū kap lín chêng só͘ chiap-siū bô kâng ê hok-im, lín mā lóng iông-jím.
47011005	Kap hiah-ê “chhiau-kip sù-tô͘” pí, góa siūⁿ góa chi̍t-sut-á to bô khah-su.
47011006	Kiám-chhái góa kóng-ōe khah ham-bān, m̄-kú tì-sek bô pí lâng khah-su, chit hāng sū góa í-keng ū ēng ta̍k khoán hong-hoat, lī-iōng ta̍k chióng ki-hōe tùi lín piáu-bêng.
47011007	Ūi-tio̍h beh kā lín ko-seng, góa kàng-kē ka-kī, chiong hok-im pe̍h-pe̍h thoân hō͘ lín, án-ni kiám ū sǹg hoān-chōe?
47011008	Góa tī lín hia sū-hōng ê sî, góa ê só͘-hùi lóng sī pa̍t ê kàu-hōe kā góa kiong-kip. Kóng khí-lâi, góa sī teh pak-siah pa̍t ê kàu-hōe lâi pang-chān lín.
47011009	Góa tī lín hia ê sî, ū sím-mi̍h su-iàu lóng m̄-bat kiû lín pang-chān, kā lín mâ-hoân; it-chhè ê su-iàu lóng sī [Má-kî-tùn] lâi ê sìn-tô͘ kā góa kiong-kip. Góa í-chêng bô kā lín mâ-hoân, í-āu mā bōe kā lín mâ-hoân.
47011010	Góa chí só͘ sìn Ki-tok ê chin-lí chiù-chōa, tī choân [A-kai-a]-séng kéng-lāi, góa lóng káⁿ án-ni tián.
47011011	Sī án-chóaⁿ? Kiám kóng góa bô thiàⁿ lín? Góa ū, Siōng-tè chai!
47011012	Góa teh chòe ê, góa beh kè-sio̍k chòe, sī beh hō͘ hiah-ê siūⁿ-beh kap goán siâng-khoán choh “sù-tô͘” ê bô ki-hōe thang khoa-kháu.
47011013	Chit khoán lâng sī ké sù-tô͘, chòe tāi-chì kan-chà, ké-chòe sī Ki-tok ê sù-tô͘.
47011014	Che bô kî-koài, liân Sat-tàn pún-sin mā ké-chòe kng-bêng ê thiⁿ-sài.
47011015	Án-ni Sat-tàn ê po̍k-jîn nā ké-chòe gī ê po̍k-jîn mā m̄-sī sím-mi̍h tōa tāi-chì. Chòe-āu in ê hêng-ûi ōe siū-tio̍h èng-tit ê pò-èng.
47011016	Góa koh kóng chi̍t piàn, m̄-thang khòaⁿ góa chòe gōng-lâng; m̄-kú nā beh, kā góa chiap-la̍p chòe gōng-lâng, góa chiah thang tián chi̍t-ē.
47011017	Góa chit-chūn teh kóng ê m̄-sī Chú ê ì-sù, sī chòe chi̍t ê gōng-lâng teh tián.
47011018	Kì-jiân ū chiah-ni̍h chōe lâng teh tián sio̍k-sè ê sū, góa mā beh tián chi̍t-ē.
47011019	Lín to hiah-ni̍h khiáu, eng-kai ōe hoaⁿ-hí iông-jím góa chit-ê gōng-lâng chiah tio̍h.
47011020	Nā ū lâng kā lín tòng-choh lô͘-lē chhe-kah, kā lín phiⁿ, kā lín hām-hāi, kā lín khòaⁿ-khin, á-sī kā lín siàn chhùi-phóe, lín to ōe iông-jím.
47011021	Chin kiàn-siàu, góa tio̍h sêng-jīn, chit khoán tāi-chì goán m̄-káⁿ chòe. M̄-kú nā ū lâng káⁿ tián sím-mi̍h, chún-chòe chi̍t ê gōng-lâng lâi kóng, góa mā káⁿ.
47011022	In sī [Hi-pek-lâi]-lâng sī-bô? Góa mā-sī. In sī [Í-sek-lia̍t]-lâng sī-bô? Góa mā-sī. In sī [A-pek-la-hán] ê kiáⁿ-sun sī-bô? Góa mā-sī.
47011023	In sī Ki-tok ê chhe-ēng sī-bô? Góa chún-chòe siáu-lâng lâi kóng, góa koh-khah sī. Góa siū koh-khah chōe lô-khó͘, chē koh-khah chōe kaⁿ, siū sǹg bōe-liáu ê piⁿ-phah, chin chōe piàn hiám-hiám-á sí.
47011024	Góa gō͘ piàn hō͘ [Iû-thài]-lâng piⁿ-phah, ta̍k piàn sì-cha̍p ē kiám chi̍t ē.
47011025	Góa saⁿ piàn hō͘ [Lô-má]-lâng ēng kùn-á kòng, chi̍t piàn hō͘ lâng ēng chio̍h-thâu tìm, saⁿ piàn tú-tio̍h chûn phòa, chi̍t piàn tī hái-ni̍h phiau-liû chi̍t-mî chi̍t-ji̍t.
47011026	Tī lú-hêng tiong góa tú-tio̍h tōa-chúi ê gûi-hiám, chhiúⁿ-kiap ê gûi-hiám, [Iû-thài] tông-pau kap Gōa-pang-lâng ê hām-hāi; mā ū siâⁿ-chhī ê gûi-hiám, khòng-iá ê gûi-hiám, hái-siōng ê gûi-hiám, kap ké hiaⁿ-tī ê gûi-hiám.
47011027	Góa lô-lo̍k thoa-bôa, siông-siông bô khùn, iau-gō chhùi-ta, bô thang chia̍h, bô thang tòa, bô thang chhēng.
47011028	Kî-tha ê tāi-chì bián kóng, kan-ta ta̍k ji̍t ūi-tio̍h só͘-ū ê kàu-hōe khòa-lū í-keng kàu-gia̍h.
47011029	Siáⁿ-lâng loán-jio̍k, góa bô loán-jio̍k? Siáⁿ-lâng hoān-chhò sit-pāi, góa bô siū-khì hé-to̍h?
47011030	Góa nā tio̍h tián, beh tián góa ê loán-jio̍k.
47011031	Lán ê Chú Iâ-so͘ ê Pē Siōng-tè --- goān I ê miâ éng-oán tit-tio̍h chheng-chàn --- I chai góa bô kóng pe̍h-chha̍t.
47011032	Góa tī [Tāi-má-sū-kek] ê sî, [A-lí-ta̍t]-ông chhiú-ē ê chóng-tok phài siú-ōe kò͘-siú siâⁿ-mn̂g, beh kā góa lia̍h,
47011033	m̄-kú ū lâng ēng tōa-kha nâ tùi siâⁿ-chhiûⁿ ê thang-á kā góa lūi lo̍h-khì, hō͘ góa thoat-lī i ê chhiú.
47012001	Góa it-tēng tio̍h tián. Sui-jiân bô lī-ek, m̄-kú góa beh kóng Chú hō͘ góa ê īⁿ-siōng kap khé-sī.
47012002	Góa chai ū chi̍t ê Ki-tok-tô͘ tī cha̍p-sì nî chêng hō͘ Chú chhōa kàu tē-saⁿ chàn thiⁿ. Góa m̄-chai i ê seng-khu ū chiūⁿ-khì, á-sī kan-ta khòaⁿ-kìⁿ īⁿ-siōng, chí-ū Siōng-tè chai.
47012003	Góa chai ū chi̍t ê lâng siū chhōa kàu Lo̍k-hn̂g. I ê seng-khu ū siū chiap chiūⁿ-khì, á-sī kan-ta khòaⁿ-kìⁿ īⁿ-siōng, góa m̄-chai, chí-ū Siōng-tè chai. Tī hia i ū thiaⁿ-kìⁿ ēng ōe bōe-tàng piáu-ta̍t, ēng chhùi bōe-tàng kóng chhut ê sū.
47012005	Góa beh tián chit-ê lâng; m̄-kú góa ê loán-jio̍k í-gōa, góa bōe ūi-tio̍h ka-kī tián.
47012006	Kî-si̍t, góa nā beh tián, mā bōe sǹg-sī khong-khám, in-ūi góa beh kóng ê sī sū-si̍t. M̄-kú góa bōe tián ka-kī, chiah-bián lâng tùi góa ê phêng-kè chhiau-kè in só͘ khòaⁿ-tio̍h só͘ thiaⁿ-kìⁿ ê.
47012007	Ūi-tio̍h beh hō͘ góa bô in-ūi ū khòaⁿ-kìⁿ chin chōe ê khé-sī tì-kàu chū-ko tek-ì, tī góa ê seng-khu ū chi̍t ki chhì, chhin-chhiūⁿ Sat-tàn ê sù-chiá teh kā góa khó͘-chhó͘, hō͘ góa bōe siuⁿ chū-ko tek-ì.
47012008	Ūi-tio̍h chit hāng tāi-chì, góa bat saⁿ piàn khún-kiû Chú hō͘ hit ki chhì lī-khui.
47012009	I ìn góa kóng, “Góa ê un-tián ū-kàu thang boán-chiok lí ê su-iàu; in-ūi lí loán-jio̍k ê sî, góa ê khùi-la̍t chiah ōe-tàng oân-choân hoat-hui.” In-ūi án-ni, góa te̍k-pia̍t ài khoa-kháu góa ê loán-jio̍k, thang hō͘ Ki-tok ê khùi-la̍t tiàm tī góa sin-chiūⁿ.
47012010	Ūi-tio̍h Ki-tok ê iân-kò͘, góa kā loán-jio̍k, bú-jio̍k, khùn-khó͘, kan-lân, kap pek-hāi khòaⁿ-chòe hó, in-ūi góa loán-jio̍k ê sî, góa siōng kian-kiông.
47012011	Góa it-ti̍t chòe gōng-lâng, sī lín kā góa pek ê; lín tio̍h kā góa po-chióng chiah tio̍h. Sui-jiân góa bô siū tiōng-sī, mā bô khah-su hiah-ê “chhiau-kip sù-tô͘”.
47012012	Góa tī lín tiong-kan ū ēng siōng-tōa ê nāi-sim kiâⁿ sîn-jiah, kî-sū kap koân-lêng, chèng-bêng góa sī sù-tô͘.
47012013	Góa bô hō͘ lín ki-hōe pang-chān góa í-gōa, góa tùi-thāi lín pí tùi-thāi kî-tha ê kàu-hōe, ū tó chi̍t hāng chòe khah bô kàu? Góa chit-ê “bô kong-tō”, chhiáⁿ lín goân-liōng
47012014	Taⁿ góa tē-saⁿ piàn chún-pī beh khì hóng-būn lín. Góa bōe chiâⁿ-chòe lín ê hū-tam; góa bōe iau-kiû lín sím-mi̍h, in-ūi góa só͘ ài ê sī lín, m̄-sī lín ê chîⁿ. Eng-kai sī pē-bú ūi-tio̍h kiáⁿ-jî, m̄-sī kiáⁿ-jî ūi-tio̍h pē-bú chek-chū châi-bu̍t.
47012015	Góa chin hoaⁿ-hí ūi-tio̍h lín hù-chhut góa só͘-ū ê, sīm-chì liân góa pún-sin to oân-choân hù-chhut. Kiám kóng góa thiàⁿ lín jú chōe, tio̍h tit-tio̍h lín ê thiàⁿ jú chió?
47012016	Chún kóng góa khúi-kè to-toan, ēng khi-phiàn lī-iōng lín tit-tio̍h lī-ek, góa kiám bat kā lín thoa-lūi?
47012017	Góa kiám ū phài sím-mi̍h lâng khì kā lín phiⁿ?
47012018	Góa ū khǹg [Thê-to] khì lín hia, koh phài chi̍t ê hiaⁿ-tī kap i chòe-hé khì. [Thê-to] kiám ū phiⁿ lín? Goán kiám bô kâng sim-sîn teh chòe? Kiám bô kâng pō͘-tiau teh kiâⁿ?
47012019	Lín it-ti̍t siūⁿ-kóng goán tùi lín teh ūi-tio̍h ka-kī piān-hō͘ sī-bô? M̄-sī! Goán tī Siōng-tè bīn-chêng kóng Ki-tok ài goán kóng ê ōe. Chhin-ài ê pêng-iú, goán só͘ chòe ê lóng sī beh hō͘ lín tit-tio̍h chō-chiū.
47012020	Góa kiaⁿ-liáu khì lín hia ê sî khòaⁿ-kìⁿ lín kap góa só͘ kî-thāi ê bô sio-siâng; lín khòaⁿ-kìⁿ góa kap lín tùi góa ê kî-thāi mā bô sio-siâng. Góa kiaⁿ-liáu lín ū hun-cheng, chi̍t-tò͘, pháiⁿ-sèng-tē, chū-su, húi-pòng, kóng ka-chiah-āu-ōe, kiau-ngō͘, bô tia̍t-sū.
47012021	Góa kiaⁿ-liáu āu-piàn koh khì lín hia ê sî, góa ê Siōng-tè ōe hō͘ góa tī lín bīn-chêng kiàn-siàu. Góa ōe ūi-tio̍h chin chōe lâng thî-khàu, in-ūi in tùi kè-khì só͘ hoān ê chōe, ù-òe, îm-loān, hòng-tōng iáu-bē hóe-kái.
47013001	Che sī góa tē-saⁿ piàn beh khì lín hia. Sèng-keng kóng, “Bô-lūn kò sím-mi̍h, tio̍h ū nn̄g ê á-sī saⁿ ê chèng-jîn.”
47013002	Tùi hiah-ê í-chêng hoān-chōe kap kî-tha lóng-chóng ê lâng, tī góa tē-jī piàn hóng-būn ê sî góa ū kā lín kéng-kò, hiān-chāi góa bô tī lín hia, beh koh chi̍t piàn kā lín kéng-kò, āu-piàn góa khì ê sî, góa chiū bōe pàng lín soah;
47013003	in-ūi lín só͘ teh chhē Ki-tok thong-kè góa kóng-ōe ê chèng-kù, lín ōe tit-tio̍h. I tùi-thāi lín pèng m̄-sī loán-jio̍k, tian-tò tī lín tiong-kan hián-chhut tōa lêng-le̍k.
47013004	Sui-jiân I in-ūi loán-jio̍k siū tèng-sí tī si̍p-jī-kè, m̄-kú I khò Siōng-tè ê tōa lêng-le̍k teh oa̍h. Goán kap I kiat-liân pìⁿ-chòe loán-jio̍k, m̄-kú ūi-tio̍h lín, goán khò Siōng-tè ê tōa lêng-le̍k ōe kap I chòe-hé oa̍h.
47013005	Lín tio̍h séng-chhat ka-kī, khòaⁿ ū chiàu sìn-gióng teh seng-oa̍h bô? Tio̍h khó-giām ka-kī. Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok tī lín lāi-bīn, lín ka-kī it-tēng chai --- lín khó-giām nā bô thong-kè chiū bián kóng.
47013006	Góa ǹg-bāng lín chai, goán khó-giām lóng ū thong-kè.
47013007	Goán kî-kiû Siōng-tè hō͘ lín bōe chòe m̄-tio̍h; che m̄-sī beh piáu-sī goán khó-giām ū thong-kè, sī beh hō͘ lín chòe tio̍h ê tāi-chì, sui-jiân goán hō͘ lâng khòaⁿ-chòe khó-giām bô thong-kè mā bô iàu-kín.
47013008	In-ūi goán bōe-tàng chòe ûi-pōe chin-lí ê tāi-chì, chí-ū ióng-hō͘ chin-lí.
47013009	Goán loán-jio̍k, lín kian-kiông, goán chiū hoaⁿ-hí. Goán só͘ kî-kiû ê sī lín ōe-tàng chiâⁿ-chòe oân-choân.
47013010	In-ūi án-ni, thàn góa bô tī lín hia ê sî siá chit tiuⁿ phoe, chiah-bián góa khì ê sî ēng Chú hō͘ góa ê koân-pèng giâm-hat tùi-thāi lín; chit-ê koân-pèng sī beh kiàn-li̍p, m̄-sī beh thiah-húi.
47013011	Hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, chhiáⁿ pó-tiōng. Tio̍h tui-kiû oân-choân, hō͘-siōng kó͘-lē. Tio̍h tâng-sim, hô-bo̍k siong-chhù. Goān sù chû-ài kap pêng-an ê Siōng-tè kap lín tông-chāi!
47013012	Tio̍h ēng sèng-kiat ê saⁿ-chim hō͘-siōng chhéng-an! Só͘-ū ê sìn-tô͘ lóng beh kā lín chhéng-an!
47013013	Goān Chú Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok ê un-tián, Siōng-tè ê chû-ài, Sèng Sîn ê thoân-khè, kap lín tāi-ke tông-chāi!
48001001	Góa sī [Pó-lô]. Góa choh sù-tô͘ m̄-sī tùi lâng á-sī thong-kè lâng, sī tùi Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok kap hō͘ I tùi sí-lâng tiong koh-oa̍h ê Pē Siōng-tè ê ho͘-tiàu.
48001002	Góa kap tī chia ê hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē siá-phoe hō͘ [Ka-lia̍p-thài] ê chèng kàu-hōe.
48001003	Goān lán ê Pē Siōng-tè kap Chú Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok sù lín un-tián kap pêng-an!
48001004	Ūi-tio̍h beh kiù lán thoat-lī hiān-kim chit-ê siâ-ok ê sè-tāi, Ki-tok ū chiàu lán ê Pē Siōng-tè ê chí-ì ūi-tio̍h lán ê chōe hiàn I pún-sin.
48001005	Goān êng-kng kui hō͘ Siōng-tè ti̍t-kàu éng-éng oán-oán. Amen!
48001006	Lín hō͘ góa chin tio̍h-kiaⁿ! Lín kèng-jiân hiah-ni̍h kín chiū pàng-sak hit-ūi thong-kè Ki-tok ê un-tián ho͘-tiàu lín ê Siōng-tè, khì tè pa̍t ê hok-im.
48001007	Kî-si̍t bô pa̍t khoán ê hok-im. Góa án-ni kóng sī in-ūi ū chi̍t-kóa lâng kā lín jiáu-loān, siūⁿ-beh khiok-kái Ki-tok ê hok-im.
48001008	M̄-kú, bô-lūn sī goán á-sī tùi thiⁿ-téng lâi ê thiⁿ-sài, só͘ thoân ê nā kap goán í-chêng thoân hō͘ lín ê hok-im bô kâng-khoán, i eng-kai siū chiù-chó͘!
48001009	Goán bat kóng, hiān-chāi koh kóng chi̍t piàn: Nā ū lâng só͘ thoân ê hok-im kap lín í-keng chiap-siū ê bô kâng-khoán, i eng-kai siū chiù-chó͘!
48001010	Góa chit-chūn án-ni kóng, kiám sī beh tit-tio̍h lâng á-sī Siōng-tè ê chheng-chàn? Góa kiám sī beh tit-tio̍h lâng ê hoaⁿ-hí? Góa nā iáu teh siūⁿ-beh tit-tio̍h lâng ê hoaⁿ-hí, góa chiū m̄-sī Ki-tok ê lô͘-po̍k.
48001011	Hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, góa ài lín chai, góa só͘ thoân ê hok-im m̄-sī lâng siūⁿ chhut-lâi ê.
48001012	Chit-ê hok-im, góa m̄-sī tùi lâng niá-siū, mā m̄-sī tùi lâng ha̍k-si̍p, sī tùi Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok lâi ê khé-sī.
48001013	Lín í-keng ū thiaⁿ-kìⁿ góa í-chêng choh [Iû-thài] kàu-tô͘ ê sî ê só͘-kiâⁿ só͘-chòe. Góa jōa-ni̍h kek-lia̍t pek-hāi Siōng-tè ê kàu-hōe, beh thiat-tí kā i húi-bia̍t.
48001014	Góa pí kâng chi̍t pòe ê [Iû-thài-lâng] koh-khah chek-ke̍k chun-thàn [Iû-thài] kàu-kui, koh-khah jia̍t-sim chun-siú chó͘-sian ê thoân-thóng.
48001015	M̄-kú, tùi Siōng-tè ê un-tián, góa iáu-bē chhut-sì I chiū koat-tēng beh kéng-soán góa,
48001016	tùi góa khé-sī I ê Kiáⁿ, hō͘ góa thang tùi Gōa-pang-lâng soan-iông I ê Kiáⁿ ê hok-im. Hit sî, góa lóng bô kā lâng chhéng-kàu,
48001017	mā bô chiūⁿ [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] khì kìⁿ hiah-ê pí góa khah tāi-seng choh sù-tô͘ ê lâng. Góa sûi-sî khì [A-lah-pek], jiân-āu koh tò-khì [Tāi-má-sū-kek].
48001018	Saⁿ nî āu, góa chiah khì [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] pài-hóng [Pí-tek], kap i tòa cha̍p-gō͘ ji̍t.
48001019	Chú ê hiaⁿ-tī [Ngá-kok] í-gōa, kî-tha ê sù-tô͘ góa lóng bô kìⁿ-tio̍h.
48001020	Góa só͘ siá ê lóng sī sū-si̍t; tī Siōng-tè bīn-chêng góa bô kóng pe̍h-chha̍t.
48001021	Āu-lâi, góa khì [Sū-lī-a] kap [Ki-lī-ka] kéng-lāi ta̍k só͘-chāi.
48001022	Tng-sî, [Iû-thài] tōe-khu chèng kàu-hōe ê sìn-tô͘ lóng m̄-bat góa.
48001023	In chí-ū thiaⁿ-tio̍h pa̍t-lâng kóng “Hit-ê í-chêng pek-hāi lán ê lâng, hiān-chāi teh thoân i kè-khì siūⁿ-beh húi-bia̍t ê sìn-gióng!”
48001024	In chiū in-ūi góa kui êng-kng hō͘ Siōng-tè!
48002001	Cha̍p-sì nî āu, góa koh chiūⁿ [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng], [Pa-ná-pa] kap góa chòe-hé khì, mā chhōa [Thê-to] chòe-hé khì.
48002002	Góa chiūⁿ [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] sī chun-thàn Chú ê khé-sī. Góa ū su-hā tùi hiah-ê léng-siù soat-bêng góa tùi Gōa-pang-lâng só͘ thoân ê hok-im, chiah-bián hō͘ góa kè-khì á-sī hiān-chāi só͘ phun-pho phah-piàⁿ ê lóng lo̍k-khong.
48002003	Kap góa chòe-hé khì ê [Thê-to], sui-jiân sī [Hi-la̍h]-lâng, mā bô-lâng kiông-pek i chiap-siū kat-lé.
48002004	Ū chi̍t-kóa ké sìn-tô͘ pì-bi̍t chǹg-ji̍p lán tiong-kan, chhin-chhiūⁿ cheng-thàm chhàng ji̍p-lâi, beh thàm lán tùi Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ só͘ tit-tio̍h ê chū-iû, siūⁿ-beh hō͘ lán chiâⁿ-chòe lô͘-lē, sòng-sit chū-iû.
48002005	M̄-kú, ūi-tio̍h beh hō͘ lín thang pó-choân hok-im ê chin-lí, goán chi̍t-si-á to bô tùi in niū-pō͘.
48002006	M̄-kú hiah-ê hō͘ lâng khòaⁿ-chòe léng-siù ê, bô-lūn in ê tōe-ūi sī sím-mi̍h, tùi góa lóng bô éng-hióng, in-ūi Siōng-tè bô ēng gōa-māu phòaⁿ-toàn lâng. In pèng bô lēng-gōa hō͘ góa sím-mi̍h chí-sī,
48002007	hoán-tńg liáu-kái Siōng-tè ū chiong thoân hok-im hō͘ Gōa-pang-lâng ê jīm-bū kau-thok góa, tú chhin-chhiūⁿ I ū chiong thoân hok-im hō͘ Iû-thài-lâng ê jīm-bū kau-thok [Pí-tek].
48002008	In-ūi Siōng-tè ū ēng I ê koân-lêng hō͘ góa chiâⁿ-chòe Gōa-pang-lâng ê sù-tô͘, tú chhin-chhiūⁿ I mā ū hō͘ [Pí-tek] chiâⁿ-chòe [Iû-thài]-lâng ê sù-tô͘.
48002009	[Ngá-kok], [Pí-tek], kap [Iok-hān] chiah-ê hō͘ lâng khòaⁿ-chòe sī kàu-hōe thiāu-chio̍h ê, kì-jiân chai-iáⁿ Siōng-tè ū chiong chit-ê te̍k-pia̍t ê sú-bēng kau-tài góa, chiū kap [Pa-ná-pa] í-ki̍p góa ak-chhiú piáu-sī lóng sī tâng-kang, koh tông-ì [Pa-ná-pa] kap góa tī Gōa-pang-lâng tiong-kan kang-chok, in tī [Iû-thài]-lâng tiong-kan kang-chok.
48002010	In chí-ū iau-kiû goán tio̍h koan-hoâi [Iû-thài]-lâng tiong ê sàn-chhiah-lâng; chit hāng tāi-chì tú sī goán it-ti̍t ló͘-le̍k beh chòe ê.
48002011	[Pí-tek] lâi-kàu [An-thê-o] ê sî, góa tng-bīn kā i hoán-tùi, in-ūi i ū thang chek-pī ê só͘-chāi.
48002012	Goân-lâi ū chi̍t-kóa tùi [Ngá-kok] hia lâi ê lâng iáu-bē kàu í-chêng, [Pí-tek] ū kap Gōa-pang-lâng ê hiaⁿ-tī chòe-hé chia̍h-pn̄g, m̄-kú hiah-ê lâng kàu í-āu, i soah siám-pī Gōa-pang-lâng sìn-tô͘, m̄-káⁿ koh kap in chòe-hé, in-ūi kiaⁿ hiah-ê chú-tiuⁿ Gōa-pang-lâng tio̍h siū kat-lé ê lâng.
48002013	Kî-tha ê [Iû-thài]-lâng sìn-tô͘ mā chhin-chhiūⁿ [Pí-tek] chòe hit khoán hu-ké ê tāi-chì, liân [Pa-ná-pa] mā siū éng-hióng khì chòe kâng-khoán bô goân-chek ê tāi-chì.
48002014	Góa chi̍t-ē khòaⁿ-tio̍h in bô chiàu hok-im ê chin-lí teh chòe, chiū tī chèng-lâng ê bīn-chêng tùi [Pí-tek] kóng, “Sui-jiân lí sī [Iû-thài-lâng], bô chiàu [Iû-thài-lâng] khiok chhin-chhiūⁿ Gōa-pang-lâng teh seng-oa̍h, lí ná thang kiông-pek Gōa-pang-lâng tio̍h o̍h [Iû-thài-lâng] seng-oa̍h?”
48002015	Lán pún-sin chhut-sì chiū-sī [Iû-thài]-lâng, m̄-sī lâng só͘ kóng ê “gōa-pang chōe-jîn”.
48002016	Put-kò, lán chai lâng ōe-tàng kap Siōng-tè ū ha̍p-gî ê koan-hē sī khò sìn Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok, m̄-sī khò chun-siú [Mô͘-se] ê Lu̍t-hoat. Lán ka-kī mā sìn Ki-tok Iâ-so͘, sī beh hō͘ lán tùi sìn Ki-tok ōe-tàng kap Siōng-tè ū ha̍p-gî ê koan-hē, m̄-sī khò chun-siú Lu̍t-hoat, in-ūi bô-lâng ōe-tàng khò chun-siú Lu̍t-hoat kap Siōng-tè ū ha̍p-gî ê koan-hē.
48002017	Lán nā siūⁿ-beh tùi óa-khò Ki-tok kap Siōng-tè ū ha̍p-gî ê koan-hē, iáu-kú hō͘ lâng khòaⁿ-chòe kap Gōa-pang-lâng sio-siâng sī chōe-jîn, án-ni Ki-tok sī chōe-ok ê chhe-ēng sī-bô? Choa̍t-tùi m̄-sī!
48002018	Góa nā koh khí-chō góa í-chêng só͘ thiah-húi ê, chiū chèng-bêng góa sī ûi-pōe Lu̍t-hoat ê lâng.
48002019	In-ūi, chiàu Lu̍t-hoat góa í-keng sí tī Lu̍t-hoat-ē, sī beh hō͘ góa ǹg Siōng-tè lâi oa̍h. Góa í-keng kap Ki-tok tâng tèng si̍p-jī-kè;
48002020	án-ni hiān-chāi teh oa̍h ê m̄-sī góa, sī Ki-tok tī góa ê lāi-bīn teh oa̍h. Góa hiān-chāi teh oa̍h, sī khò sìn Siōng-tè ê Kiáⁿ teh oa̍h; I thiàⁿ góa, ūi-tio̍h góa pàng-sak sìⁿ-miā.
48002021	Góa bô hō͘ Siōng-tè ê un-tián sit-khì hāu-le̍k. Lâng nā khò Lu̍t-hoat ōe-tàng kap Siōng-tè ū ha̍p-gî ê koan-hē, Ki-tok sí chiū bô bo̍k-te̍k.
48003001	Lín chiah-ê gōng [Ka-lia̍p-thài]-lâng ah, siáⁿ-lâng kā lín bê-he̍k? Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok tèng si̍p-jī-kè ê sū, kiám m̄-sī chin chheng-chhó hián-sī tī lín ba̍k-chiu chêng?
48003002	Ū chi̍t hāng tāi-chì, góa kā lín chhéng-kàu: Lín niá-siū Sèng Sîn sī tùi siú Lu̍t-hoat á-sī tùi sìn só͘ thiaⁿ-tio̍h ê hok-im?
48003003	Lín ná hiah-ni̍h gōng? Lín kì-jiân tùi khò Sèng Sîn khai-sí, hiān-chāi beh khò jio̍k-sin lâi oân-sêng sī-bô?
48003004	Lín ū hiah-chōe siū-khó͘ ê keng-giām kiám lóng bô lō͘-ēng? It-tēng ū chiah tio̍h.
48003005	Siōng-tè sù lín Sèng Sîn, koh tī lín tiong-kan kiâⁿ sîn-jiah, sī in-ūi lín siú Lu̍t-hoat, á-sī in-ūi lín sìn só͘ thiaⁿ-tio̍h ê hok-im?
48003006	Sèng-keng án-ni kóng, “[A-pek-la-hán] sìn Siōng-tè, Siōng-tè chiū khòaⁿ i chòe gī-lâng.”
48003007	Só͘-í, lín tio̍h chai, sìn ê lâng chiah-sī [A-pek-la-hán] chin-chiàⁿ ê kiáⁿ-sun.
48003008	Sèng-keng sū-sian chiū chai, Siōng-tè ōe hō͘ Gōa-pang-lâng tùi sìn kap I ū ha̍p-gî ê koan-hē, só͘-í ū chiong chit-ê hó siau-sit seng thoân hō͘ [A-pek-la-hán], kóng “Tōe-chiūⁿ bān-bîn ōe in-ūi lí tit-tio̍h chiok-hok!”
48003009	Án-ni it-chhè sìn ê lâng mā ōe kap ū sìn ê [A-pek-la-hán] chòe-hé siū chiok-hok!
48003010	Hiah-ê khò siú Lu̍t-hoat ê lâng lóng oa̍h tī chiù-chó͘ ê ē-bīn, in-ūi Sèng-keng kóng, “Bô chun-siú kì-chài tī Lu̍t-hoat ê chheh-ni̍h só͘-ū kui-tēng ê lâng lóng tio̍h siū Siōng-tè chiù-chó͘.”
48003011	Án-ni, bô-lâng ōe-tàng khò siú Lu̍t-hoat kap Siōng-tè ū ha̍p-gî ê koan-hē, in-ūi Sèng-keng ū kóng, “Gī ê lâng ōe tùi sìn lâi oa̍h.”
48003012	M̄-kú, Lu̍t-hoat m̄-sī ēng sìn chòe kun-kù. Sèng-keng kóng, “Chun-siú Lu̍t-hoat ê lâng ōe khò Lu̍t-hoat lâi oa̍h.”
48003013	Ki-tok í-keng ūi-tio̍h lán siū chiù-chó͘, lâi kiù-sio̍k lán thoat-lī Lu̍t-hoat ê chiù-chó͘, in-ūi Sèng-keng kì-chài kóng, “Só͘-ū tiàu tī chhâ-téng ê lâng lóng tio̍h siū chiù-chó͘.”
48003014	Ki-tok án-ni chòe sī beh chiong Siōng-tè hō͘ [A-pek-la-hán] ê chiok-hok thong-kè Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ sù hō͘ Gōa-pang-lâng, mā beh hō͘ lán tùi sìn lâi niá-siū Siōng-tè só͘ èng-ún ê Sèng Sîn.
48003015	Hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, góa ēng chi̍t ê ji̍t-siông seng-oa̍h ê tāi-chì chòe lē lâi soat-bêng. Lâng só͘ li̍p ê khè-iok it-tàn sêng-li̍p, chiū bōe ēng-tit ke-thiⁿ á-sī hòe-iok.
48003016	Siōng-tè ū tùi [A-pek-la-hán] kap i ê kiáⁿ-sun èng-ún. Sèng-keng pèng m̄-sī kóng “kiáⁿ-kiáⁿ sun-sun”, chí chin chōe lâng, sī kóng “lí ê kiáⁿ-sun”, chí chi̍t ê, chiū-sī Ki-tok.
48003017	Góa ê ì-sù sī án-ni: Siōng-tè ū kap [A-pek-la-hán] li̍p-iok, koh tah-èng beh siú iok. Sì-pah saⁿ-cha̍p nî āu chiah chhut-hiān ê Lu̍t-hoat bōe-tàng hòe-tû chit-ê iok hō͘ Siōng-tè ê èng-ún sit-hāu.
48003018	In-ūi, sêng-chiap Siōng-tè sù ê sán-gia̍p nā-sī kun-kù Lu̍t-hoat, chiū bô koh khò èng-ún. M̄-kú Siōng-tè sī chiàu I ê èng-ún si-un hō͘ [A-pek-la-hán].
48003019	Án-ni, Lu̍t-hoat ū siáⁿ lō͘-ēng? Lu̍t-hoat sī ūi-tio̍h beh hō͘ lâng chai sím-mi̍h sī chōe-kò, thong-kè thiⁿ-sài tùi chi̍t ê tiong-kan-jîn lâi chè-tēng ê, kong-hāu kàu só͘ èng-ún Hit-ūi “kiáⁿ-sun” lâi-lîm ê sî chiū kiat-sok.
48003020	M̄-kú tan-hong chi̍t ê chòe ê tāi-chì chiū bô su-iàu tiong-kan-jîn, Siōng-tè sī tan-hong chi̍t ê chòe chit hāng tāi-chì.
48003021	Án-ni, Lu̍t-hoat kap Siōng-tè ê èng-ún ū saⁿ tí-chhiok bô? Choa̍t-tùi bô! In-ūi Lu̍t-hoat pan-pò͘ ê bo̍k-te̍k nā-sī beh hō͘ lâng tit-tio̍h oa̍h-miā, lâng chiū ōe-tàng khò Lu̍t-hoat kap Siōng-tè ū ha̍p-gî ê koan-hē.
48003022	M̄-kú Sèng-keng toàn-tēng choân sè-kài lóng tī chōe-ok koán-hat ê ē-bīn, thang hō͘ Siōng-tè chiong èng-ún thong-kè sìn Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok sù hō͘ sìn ê lâng.
48003023	M̄-kú “sìn” ê sî-tāi lâi-lîm í-chêng, lán hō͘ Lu̍t-hoat koaiⁿ-teh, siū kàm-sī ti̍t-kàu teh-beh lâi “sìn” ê sî-tāi hián-hiān ê sî.
48003024	Án-ni, tī Ki-tok lâi-lîm í-chêng, Lu̍t-hoat chòe lán ê kàm-hō͘-jîn, thang hō͘ lán tùi “sìn” kap Siōng-tè ū ha̍p-gî ê koan-hē.
48003025	Hiān-chāi “sìn” ê sî-tāi í-keng lâi-lîm, Lu̍t-hoat chiū bô koh chòe lán ê kàm-hō͘-jîn.
48003026	Lín tāi-ke tùi sìn kap Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ kiat-liân chiâⁿ-chòe Siōng-tè ê kiáⁿ-jî.
48003027	Lín só͘-ū niá-siū sóe-lé kap Ki-tok kiat-liân ê lâng í-keng chhēng Ki-tok, ū I ê oa̍h-miā.
48003028	Án-ni, bô hun [Iû-thài]-lâng á-sī Gōa-pang-lâng, lô͘-lē á-sī chū-iû-ê, ta-po͘-lâng á-sī cha-bó͘-lâng, tī Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ ê lāi-bīn lóng chiâⁿ-chòe chi̍t-thé.
48003029	Lín kì-jiân sio̍k Ki-tok, chiū-sī [A-pek-la-hán] ê kiáⁿ-sun, sī Siōng-tè èng-ún ê kè-sêng-jîn.
48004001	Góa koh kóng, kè-sêng-jîn sui-jiân sī choân-pō͘ châi-sán ê só͘-iú-chiá, i tī bī-sêng-liân ê sî kap lô͘-lē bô sím-mi̍h chha-pia̍t,
48004002	it-ti̍t kàu lāu-pē só͘ tēng ê ji̍t-chí, tio̍h siū kàm-hō͘-jîn kap hoat-tēng tāi-lí-jîn ê kàm-tok.
48004003	Lán mā chhin-chhiūⁿ án-ni, tī lêng-sèng bī-sêng-liân ê sî siū ú-tiū ê lêng chi-phòe chòe lô͘-lē.
48004004	M̄-kú sî-kî kàu, Siōng-tè chhe ka-kī ê Kiáⁿ, hō͘ I tùi hū-jîn-lâng lâi chhut-sì, oa̍h tī Lu̍t-hoat-ē,
48004005	ūi-tio̍h beh kiù-sio̍k oa̍h tī Lu̍t-hoat-ē ê lâng, thang hō͘ Siōng-tè kā lán siu khí-lâi chòe kiáⁿ-jî.
48004006	In-ūi lín sī Siōng-tè ê kiáⁿ-jî, I ū chhe I ê Kiáⁿ ê Sîn ji̍p lín ê sim, hō͘ lín kiò “A-pa, Pē!”
48004007	Án-ni, lí bô koh chòe lô͘-lē, sī kiáⁿ-jî; kì-jiân sī kiáⁿ-jî, Siōng-tè chiū hō͘ lí chòe kè-sêng-jîn.
48004008	Í-chêng, lín m̄-bat Siōng-tè ê sî hō͘ hiah-ê pún-chit m̄-sī sîn ê sîn-bêng chòe lô͘-lē chi-phòe.
48004009	M̄-kú hiān-chāi lín í-keng bat Siōng-tè, á-sī kóng hō͘ Siōng-tè bat, sī án-chóaⁿ lín koh tò-khì chhē chi-phòe lêng-kài hiah-ê bô-la̍t koh bô lō͘-ēng ê sîn-lêng, chòe in ê lô͘-lē?
48004010	Lín siú te̍k-pia̍t ê ji̍t, ge̍h, kap nî-á-choeh-á.
48004011	Góa kiaⁿ-liáu góa ūi-tio̍h lín só͘-chòe ê lóng sī pe̍h-pe̍h chòe.
48004012	Hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, in-ūi góa í-keng ū chiâⁿ-chòe chhin-chhiūⁿ lín, góa khún-kiû lín mā tio̍h chiâⁿ-chòe chhin-chhiūⁿ góa. Lín m̄-bat khek-khui góa.
48004013	Lín ōe kì-tit, góa thâu-chi̍t piàn thoân hok-im hō͘ lín ê sî sī in-ūi góa seng-khu ū pīⁿ.
48004014	Sui-jiân góa ê kiān-khong chiâⁿ-chòe lín ê tāng-tàⁿ, lín to bô khòaⁿ-khin góa, bô kū-choa̍t góa. Lín tian-tò chiap-thāi góa chhin-chhiūⁿ teh chiap-thāi Siōng-tè ê thiⁿ-sài, chhin-chhiūⁿ teh chiap-thāi Ki-tok Iâ-so͘.
48004015	Lín tng-sî ê hoaⁿ-hí boán-chiok ná soah bô-khì? Góa káⁿ kóng, lín tng-sî nā tio̍h kā ba̍k-chiu ó͘ chhut-lâi hō͘ góa mā kam-goān.
48004016	Hiān-chāi, góa tùi lín chiàu-si̍t kóng soah pìⁿ-chòe lín ê tùi-te̍k!
48004017	Hiah-ê lâng tùi lín jia̍t-chêng pèng m̄-sī chhut tī hó-ì, tian-tò sī siūⁿ-beh thiah-khui lín kap góa ê koan-hē, hō͘ lín thang tùi in jia̍t-chêng.
48004018	Hó-sū m̄-sī kan-ta góa kap lín chòe-hé ê sî chiah chòe, tio̍h put-sî jia̍t-sim khì chòe.
48004019	Góa ê sòe-kiáⁿ, ūi-tio̍h beh hō͘ lín ū Ki-tok ê khoán-sit, góa koh chi̍t piàn keng-kè siⁿ-kiáⁿ ê thòng-khó͘.
48004020	Góa chin ài chit-chūn chiū khì lín hia, thang ēng bô kâng-khoán ê kháu-khì kap lín kóng-ōe. Góa si̍t-chāi m̄-chai beh án-chóaⁿ tùi-thāi lín!
48004021	Lín chiah-ê ài hō͘ Lu̍t-hoat koán-hat ê lâng, kā góa kóng, lín kiám bô beh thiaⁿ Lu̍t-hoat teh kóng sím-mi̍h?
48004022	In-ūi Lu̍t-hoat ū kì-chài: [A-pek-la-hán] ū nn̄g ê kiáⁿ, chi̍t ê sī lú-pī siⁿ ê, koh chi̍t ê sī chū-iû ê hū-jîn-lâng siⁿ ê.
48004023	Lú-pī ê kiáⁿ sī thàn jio̍k-thé siⁿ ê; tùi chū-iû ê hū-jîn-lâng siⁿ ê kiáⁿ sī thong-kè Siōng-tè ê èng-ún.
48004024	Che thang ēng ē-bīn ê phì-jū lâi soat-bêng: Chit nn̄g ê hū-jîn-lâng tāi-piáu nn̄g chióng khè-iok. Chi̍t ê sī [Hā-kah], tāi-piáu [Se-nái]-soaⁿ ê iok, siⁿ ê kiáⁿ choh lô͘-lē.
48004025	[Hā-kah] chí [A-lah-pek] ê [Se-nái]-soaⁿ, tāi-piáu hiān-chāi ê [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng]; in-ūi i kap i ê kiáⁿ-sun lóng sī lô͘-lē.
48004026	Put-kò thiⁿ-téng ê [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] sī chū-iû ê, sī lán ê lāu-bú.
