48004027	In-ūi Sèng-keng ū kì-chài: Bōe hoâi-īn, bōe siⁿ-kiáⁿ ê hū-jîn-lâng ah, tio̍h hoaⁿ-hí! M̄-bat keng-kè siⁿ-kiáⁿ thòng-khó͘ ê hū-jîn-lâng ah, tio̍h tōa-siaⁿ hoaⁿ-hí chhiùⁿ-koa! In-ūi siū pàng-sak ê hū-jîn-lâng pí ū tiōng-hu ê koh-khah chōe kiáⁿ-jî!
48004028	Hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, lín chhin-chhiūⁿ [Í-sat], sī Siōng-tè èng-ún ê kiáⁿ-jî.
48004029	Tng-sî, thàn jio̍k-thé siⁿ ê pek-hāi thàn Siōng-tè ê Sîn siⁿ ê; hiān-chāi mā-sī án-ni.
48004030	M̄-kú Sèng-keng án-chóaⁿ kóng? “Tio̍h kā lú-pī kap i ê kiáⁿ kóaⁿ chhut-khì, in-ūi lú-pī ê kiáⁿ bōe-tàng kap chū-iû ê hū-jîn-lâng ê kiáⁿ pîⁿ-pîⁿ kè-sêng sán-gia̍p!”
48004031	Só͘-í, hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, lán m̄-sī lú-pī ê kiáⁿ-jî, sī chū-iû ê hū-jîn-lâng ê kiáⁿ-jî.
48005001	Ūi-tio̍h beh hō͘ lán ū chū-iû, Ki-tok í-keng ū kā lán tháu-pàng. Só͘-í tio̍h khiā-chāi, m̄-thang koh chiap-siū ap-chè chòe lô͘-lē!
48005002	Taⁿ góa --- [Pó-lô] kā lín kóng, tio̍h chù-ì thiaⁿ: Lín nā siū kat-lé, Ki-tok chiū tùi lín lóng bô lī-ek.
48005003	Góa koh chi̍t piàn kā ta̍k ê kam-goān chiap-siū kat-lé ê lâng kéng-kò, chit-ê lâng ū gī-bū chun-siú choân-pō͘ ê Lu̍t-hoat!
48005004	Lín chiah-ê siūⁿ-beh khò chun-siú Lu̍t-hoat tit-tio̍h kap Siōng-tè ū ha̍p-gî koan-hē ê lâng, sī kap Ki-tok toān-choa̍t koan-hē, sit-lo̍h Siōng-tè ê un-tián.
48005005	Goán pek-chhiat teh thèng-hāu, ǹg-bāng Siōng-tè hō͘ lán kap I ū ha̍p-gî ê koan-hē; chit-ê ǹg-bāng khò Siōng-tè ê Sîn, tùi sìn chiah ōe-tàng si̍t-hiān.
48005006	In-ūi lán nā kap Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ kiat-liân, ū siū kat-lé á-sī bô siū kat-lé lóng bô iàu-kín, iàu-kín ê sī ū thiàⁿ ê hêng-tōng piáu-hiān chhut-lâi ê sìn-sim.
48005007	Lín í-keng chòe liáu chin hó; sī siáⁿ-lâng kā lín chó͘-tòng, hō͘ lín bô sūn-ho̍k chin-lí?
48005008	Sòe-ho̍k lín ê m̄-sī hit-ūi ho͘-tiàu lín ê Siōng-tè.
48005009	Sio̍k-gú kóng, “Chi̍t-sut-á kàⁿ-bú ōe hō͘ kui sn̂g ê mī-chhè hoat khí-lâi.”
48005010	Tī Chú ê lāi-bīn góa siong-sìn lín bōe kap góa ū bô sio-siâng ê siūⁿ-hoat. Hiah-ê teh jiáu-loān lín ê, bô-lūn sī sím-mi̍h lâng, it-tēng ōe siū Siōng-tè chek-hoa̍t.
48005011	Hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, góa nā kè-sio̍k thoân tio̍h siū kat-lé, sī án-chóaⁿ góa iáu teh siū pek-hāi? Góa nā án-ni chòe, góa soan-iông Ki-tok ê si̍p-jī-kè chiū bōe siū chó͘-gāi.
48005012	Hiah-ê teh jiáu-loān lín ê lâng lêng-khó ka-kī iam khí-lâi!
48005013	Hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, Siōng-tè ho͘-tiàu lín sī beh hō͘ lín chū-iû. Put-kò m̄-thang hō͘ lín ê chū-iû pìⁿ-chòe hòng-chhiòng su-io̍k ê ki-hōe. Tio̍h ēng thiàⁿ-sim hō͘-siōng ho̍k-bū.
48005014	In-ūi choân-pō͘ Lu̍t-hoat pau-hâm tī “Tio̍h thiàⁿ chhù-piⁿ chhin-chhiūⁿ thiàⁿ ka-kī” chit-ê kài-bēng.
48005015	Tio̍h sió-sim, lín nā iáu teh sio-kā sio-thun, ōe hō͘-siōng châu-bia̍t.
48005016	Góa ê ì-sù sī: Lín tio̍h chiàu Sèng Sîn ê ín-chhōa seng-oa̍h, choa̍t-tùi m̄-thang kiû boán-chiok pún-sèng ê io̍k-bōng.
48005017	In-ūi lâng pún-sèng ê io̍k-bōng tùi-khòng Sèng Sîn; Sèng Sîn tùi-khòng lâng ê pún-sèng. Chit nn̄g ê hō͘-siōng te̍k-tùi, tì-kàu lín bōe-tàng chiàu ka-kī só͘ ài khì chòe.
48005018	Lín nā hō͘ Sèng Sîn ín-chhōa, chiū bōe siū Lu̍t-hoat khòng-chè.
48005019	Lâng pún-sèng ê hêng-ûi chin bêng-hián, chiū-sī îm-loān, ù-òe, hò͘ⁿ-sek,
48005020	pài ngó͘-siōng, kiâⁿ siâ-su̍t, te̍k-tùi, tò͘-cheng, chi̍t-tò͘, siū-khì, chū-su, kiat-tóng, hun-phài,
48005021	oàn-tò͘, chiú-chùi, hoa-thian chiú-tōe, téng. Góa í-chêng bat kā lín kéng-kò, chit-chūn koh chi̍t piàn kā lín kéng-kò: Chòe chit khoán tāi-chì ê lâng bōe-tàng chiâⁿ-chòe Siōng-tè-kok ê chú-bîn!
48005022	M̄-kú Sèng Sîn só͘ kiat ê ké-chí sī: Jîn-ài, hoaⁿ-hí, hô-pêng, jím-nāi, jîn-chû, liông-siān, tiong-si̍t,
48005023	un-jiû, chiat-chè. Chit khoán hêng-ûi it-poaⁿ ê hoat-lu̍t bô teh kìm-chí.
48005024	Hiah-ê sio̍k Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ ê lâng í-keng ū chiong pún-sèng kap it-chhè ê siâ-chêng su-io̍k chòe-hé tèng-sí tī si̍p-jī-kè.
48005025	Kì-jiân lán khò Sèng Sîn teh oa̍h, mā tio̍h chun-chiàu Sèng Sîn ê ín-chhōa lâi oa̍h.
48005026	Lán m̄-thang tui-kiû hu-êng, m̄-thang pí-chhú kek-khì, hō͘-siōng chi̍t-tò͘.
48006001	Hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, nā ū lâng hām-lo̍h kè-sit, lín chiah-ê sio̍k-lêng ê lâng tio̍h ēng un-hô ê sim kā i kiù-chèng. Lín ka-kī mā tio̍h sió-sim, chiah-bián siū ín-iú.
48006002	Tio̍h hun-tam tāng-tàⁿ, án-ni chòe chiah-sī teh si̍t-hiān Ki-tok ê lu̍t-hoat.
48006003	Ka-kī bô gâu siūⁿ-kóng chin gâu, sī teh khi-phiàn ka-kī.
48006004	Ta̍k ê lâng tio̍h séng-chhat ka-kī ê hêng-ûi; nā ū hó hêng-ûi, i kan-ta thang tùi ka-kī khoa-kháu, m̄-bián kap pa̍t-lâng pí-kàu.
48006005	In-ūi ta̍k ê lâng tio̍h taⁿ ka-kī ê tàⁿ.
48006006	Ha̍k-si̍p tō-lí ê lâng tio̍h kap kàu-tō i ê lâng hun-hióng ta̍k hāng hó-mi̍h.
48006007	M̄-thang phiàn ka-kī, Siōng-tè sī bōe ēng-tit bú-jio̍k ê. Lâng chèng sím-mi̍h chiū siu sím-mi̍h.
48006008	Lâng só͘ iā-ê nā-sī ūi-tio̍h boán-chiok ka-kī ê io̍k-bōng, chiū ōe siu-sêng bia̍t-bông; lâng só͘ iā-ê nā-sī ūi-tio̍h beh hō͘ Sèng Sîn hoaⁿ-hí, chiū ōe tùi Sèng Sîn siu éng-oán ê oa̍h-miā.
48006009	Chòe hó-sū m̄-thang siūⁿ siān; nā bô hoe-sim, sî kàu chiū thang siu-sêng.
48006010	Só͘-í, bô-lūn sím-mi̍h sî-chūn, tio̍h pá-ak ki-hōe tùi chèng-lâng chòe hó-sū, te̍k-pia̍t sī tùi sìn-gióng chiâⁿ-chòe chi̍t ke ê lâng.
48006011	Lín khòaⁿ, góa chhin-pit ēng chiah-ni̍h tōa ê jī siá hō͘ lín!
48006012	Hiah-ê chù-tiōng gōa-piáu thé-biān ê lâng, siūⁿ-beh kiông-pek lín chiap-siū kat-lé. In án-ni chòe kan-ta sī bô ài ūi-tio̍h Ki-tok ê si̍p-jī-kè siū pek-hāi.
48006013	Kî-si̍t, liân hiah-ê siū kat-lé ê lâng pún-sin mā bô chun-siú Lu̍t-hoat. In pek lín siū kat-lé, chiah ōe-tàng khoa-kháu kóng lín ū chun-siú gōa-piáu ê lé-gî.
48006014	Góa leh, góa chí-ū beh khoa-kháu lán ê Chú Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok ê si̍p-jī-kè, in-ūi chit-ê si̍p-jī-kè, tùi góa lâi kóng, sè-kài í-keng tèng-sí tī si̍p-jī-kè; tùi sè-kài lâi kóng, góa mā í-keng tèng-sí.
48006015	Ū siū kat-lé bô siū kat-lé lóng bô tiōng-iàu; tiōng-iàu ê sī lán tio̍h chiâⁿ-chòe sin chhòng-chō ê lâng.
48006016	Chiàu chit-ê chún-chek seng-oa̍h ê lâng chiū-sī Siōng-tè ê [Í-sek-lia̍t] chú-bîn. Goān pêng-an kap lîn-bín kap in tông-chāi!
48006017	Tùi taⁿ í-āu, bô-lūn sím-mi̍h lâng to lóng m̄-thang kā góa kiáu-jiáu; in-ūi Iâ-so͘ ū tī góa ê seng-khu khàm-ìn chòe kì-hō, chèng-bêng góa sio̍k I.
48006018	Hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, goān lán ê Chú Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok ê un-tián kap lín tông-chāi. Amen!
49001001	Góa sī [Pó-lô], hōng Siōng-tè ê chí-ì choh Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ ê sù-tô͘; góa siá-phoe hō͘ tòa tī [Í-hut-só͘], sio̍k Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ tiong-sìn ê sìn-tô͘.
49001002	Goān lán ê Pē Siōng-tè kap Chú Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok sù lín un-tián kap pêng-an!
49001003	Tio̍h chheng-chàn lán ê Chú Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok ê Pē Siōng-tè! In-ūi I ū chiong thiⁿ-téng ta̍k khoán sio̍k-lêng ê hok-khì, thong-kè lán kap Ki-tok kiat-liân, sù hō͘ lán.
49001004	Chhòng-sè í-chêng, Siōng-tè í-keng thong-kè Ki-tok kéng-soán lán, hō͘ lán tī I bīn-chêng chiâⁿ-chòe sèng-kiat bô khoat-tiám ê lâng. In-ūi Siōng-tè thiàⁿ lán,
49001005	chá chiū koat-tēng beh thong-kè Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok hō͘ lán choh I ê kiáⁿ-jî; che sī I só͘ hoaⁿ-hí ê, sī I ê chí-ì.
49001006	Lán tio̍h siōng-chàn Siōng-tè êng-iāu ê un-tián, in-ūi I ū chiong I só͘ thiàⁿ ê Kiáⁿ bô tiâu-kiāⁿ sù hō͘ lán!
49001007	Tùi Ki-tok, thong-kè I ê sí, lán tit-tio̍h chū-iû, chōe-kò tit-tio̍h sià-bián. Siōng-tè ê un-tián si̍t-chāi chin hong-hù;
49001008	I ū chiong chit-ê un-tián chhiong-chhiong chiok-chiok sù hō͘ lán. I ēng ta̍k khoán ê tì-hūi kap lí-kái,
49001009	chiàu I só͘ hoaⁿ-hí ê chí-ì, hō͘ lán chai I chá chiū koat-tēng thong-kè Ki-tok lâi oân-sêng ò-biāu ê kè-ōe.
49001010	Chit-ê kè-ōe, Siōng-tè beh tī sî-ki sêng-se̍k ê sî oân-sêng, thang hō͘ tī thiⁿ-téng kap tōe-chiūⁿ it-chhè ê pī-chō-bu̍t lóng chun Ki-tok choh thâu, liân-ha̍p chòe chi̍t-ê.
49001011	Bān-iú lóng chiàu Siōng-tè ê kè-ōe kap koat-tēng lâi oân-sêng. Siōng-tè chiàu I tāi-seng koat-tēng ê chí-ì, thong-kè Ki-tok kéng-soán goán lâi sêng-chiap I ê ke-gia̍p.
49001012	Án-ni sī beh hō͘ goán chiah-ê tāi-seng chiong ǹg-bāng khǹg tī Ki-tok ê lâng thang siōng-chàn Siōng-tè ê êng-iāu.
49001013	Thong-kè Ki-tok, lín mā ū thiaⁿ-tio̍h chin-lí ê sìn-sit, chiū-sī hit-ê hō͘ lín tit-kiù ê hok-im, hit sî lín ū sìn, Siōng-tè chiū sù lín só͘ èng-ún ê Sèng Sîn, kā lín khàm-ìn chèng-bêng lín sio̍k I.
49001014	Sèng Sîn pó-chèng lán thang sêng-chiap Siōng-tè só͘ èng-ún ê ke-gia̍p, ti̍t-kàu hō͘ sio̍k I ê lâng tit-tio̍h oân-choân ê chū-iû, thang siōng-chàn I ê êng-iāu.
49001015	In-ūi án-ni, góa chi̍t-ē thiaⁿ-tio̍h lín tùi Chú Iâ-so͘ ū sìn-sim, tùi só͘-ū ê sìn-tô͘ ū thiàⁿ-sim,
49001016	chiū ūi-tio̍h lín put-sî teh kám-siā Siōng-tè. Góa tī kî-tó tiong siàu-liām lín,
49001017	kî-kiû lán ê Chú Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok ê Siōng-tè, êng-iāu ê Thiⁿ Pē, sù Sèng Sîn hō͘ lín ū tì-hūi kap khé-sī thang jīn-bat I.
49001018	Góa khún-kiû Siōng-tè khui lín ê sim-gán, hō͘ lín thang chai I soán-tiàu lín lâi tit-tio̍h ê ǹg-bāng sī sím-mi̍h. I tùi I ê sìn-tô͘ só͘ èng-ún ê chiok-hok jōa-ni̍h hong-hù koh bí-biāu,
49001019	tī lán sìn I ê lâng tiong-kan teh ūn-hêng ê koân-lêng jōa-ni̍h tōa. I ū ūn-iōng chit-ê khùi-la̍t hō͘ Ki-tok tùi sí-lâng tiong koh-oa̍h, koh hō͘ Ki-tok tī thiⁿ-téng chē tī I ka-kī ê chiàⁿ-pêng,
49001021	tī hia koán-hat só͘-ū ê thóng-léng-chiá, chiáng-koân-chiá, koân-le̍k-chiá, kap chú-chèng-chiá, m̄-nā kim-sè, mā pau-koat lâi-sè it-chhè ū koân-pèng ōe-tàng chheng-ho͘ ê hâm-thâu.
49001022	Siōng-tè hō͘ bān-iú lóng khut-ho̍k tī Ki-tok ê kha-ē, hō͘ I choh kàu-hōe ê goân-siú, thóng-tī bān-iú.
49001023	Kàu-hōe sī Ki-tok ê sin-thé, sī chhiong-móa bān-iú ê Ki-tok só͘ oân-choân chhiong-móa ê.
49002001	Í-chêng in-ūi lín hoān-chōe pōe-ge̍k Siōng-tè, lêng-sèng í-keng sí.
49002002	Hit sî, lín thàn sè-kan ê tiâu-liû, sūn-ho̍k khong-tiong ê chiáng-koân-chiá, chiū-sī hiān-chāi teh koán-hat pōe-ge̍k Siōng-tè ê lâng hit-ê siâ-sîn.
49002003	Kî-si̍t, goán í-chêng mā lóng kap chiah-ê lâng kâng-khoán thàn pún-sèng ê io̍k-bōng seng-oa̍h, chiàu ka-kī jio̍k-thé ê su-io̍k kap ì-liām teh hêng-tōng. Goán kap kî-tha ê lâng kâng-khoán, chù-tiāⁿ siū Siōng-tè hêng-hoa̍t.
49002004	M̄-kú Siōng-tè ū hong-sēng ê lîn-bín, ēng ke̍k-tōa ê chû-ài thiàⁿ lán,
49002005	tī lán iáu teh pōe-ge̍k, lêng-sèng í-keng sí ê sî, I hō͘ lán kap Ki-tok chòe-hé koh-oa̍h; lín sī tùi Siōng-tè ê un-tián tit-tio̍h kiù ê.
49002006	Thong-kè lán kap Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ kiat-ha̍p, Siōng-tè hō͘ lán kap I chòe-hé koh-oa̍h, tī thiⁿ-téng chòe-hé chiáng-koân.
49002007	I án-ni chòe sī beh thong-kè Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ tùi lán hián-sī chû-ài, thang tùi āu sè-tāi piáu-bêng I bû-hān hong-hù ê un-tián.
49002008	In-ūi lín sī khò Siōng-tè ê un-tián tùi sìn tit-tio̍h kiù; m̄-sī khò lín ka-kī, sī khò Siōng-tè ê un-sù.
49002009	Kì-jiân m̄-sī khò hêng-ûi, sím-mi̍h lâng to bōe-tàng khoa-kháu.
49002010	In-ūi lán sī Siōng-tè chhòng-chō ê; I thong-kè Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ chhòng-chō lán, hō͘ lán thang chòe I chá chiū chún-pī ài lán chòe ê hó-sū.
49002011	Só͘-í, lín chiah-ê chhut-sì chòe Gōa-pang-lâng ê, tio̍h ōe kì-tit lín kè-khì ū hō͘ chū-chheng siū-kat-lé-ê, chiū-sī ēng chhiú tī seng-khu kiâⁿ kat-lé ê [Iû-thài]-lâng, kiò-chòe bô-siū-kat-lé ê lâng.
49002012	Lín hit sî kap Ki-tok bô koan-hē, bô sio̍k Siōng-tè ê soán-bîn, bô hūn tī Siōng-tè èng-ún ê bêng-iok, tī chit sè-kan bô ǹg-bāng, bô Siōng-tè.
49002013	M̄-kú lín chiah-ê í-chêng lī-khui Siōng-tè hn̄g-hn̄g ê Gōa-pang-lâng, hiān-chāi khò Ki-tok Iâ-so͘, thong-kè I ê sí, í-keng kap Siōng-tè chhin-kūn.
49002014	Ki-tok chhiok-chìn lán ê hô-pêng; I ū hō͘ [Iû-thài]-lâng kap Gōa-pang-lâng chiâⁿ-chòe chi̍t-ê. I ēng ka-kī ê seng-khu thiah-húi kā in keh-khui ê chhiûⁿ, siau-tû in tiong-kan ê te̍k-tùi.
49002015	I hòe-tû [Iû-thài] Lu̍t-hoat ê kài-bēng kap kui-lē, hō͘ nn̄g pêng thong-kè I thang chhòng-chō chi̍t ê sin ê lâng lâi chhiok-chìn hô-pêng.
49002016	Ki-tok thong-kè si̍p-jī-kè siau-bia̍t pí-chhú ê te̍k-tùi, hō͘ nn̄g pêng chiâⁿ-chòe chi̍t-thé, thang kap Siōng-tè hô-hó.
49002017	Án-ni, Ki-tok lâi sī beh thoân hô-pêng ê hok-im hō͘ só͘-ū ê lâng, pau-koat lín chiah-ê í-chêng lī-khui Siōng-tè hn̄g-hn̄g ê Gōa-pang-lâng kap chhin-kūn Siōng-tè ê [Iû-thài]-lâng.
49002018	Thong-kè Ki-tok, lán nn̄g pêng ê lâng lóng ōe-tàng tùi kâng chi̍t ūi Sèng Sîn lâi chhin-kūn Pē.
49002019	Só͘-í, lín Gōa-pang-lâng í-keng m̄-sī gōa-kok-lâng, m̄-sī chhut-gōa-lâng, sī kap Siōng-tè ê chú-bîn pîⁿ-pîⁿ choh kok-bîn, choh Siōng-tè ê ka-cho̍k,
49002020	kiàn-li̍p tī sian-ti kap sù-tô͘ só͘ hē ê tōe-ki téng, ēng Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ pún-sin chòe siōng tiōng-iàu ê ki-chio̍h,
49002021	kui-ê kiàn-tio̍k-bu̍t khò I lâi liân-chiap kiat-ha̍p, chiām-chiām khok-tōa chiâⁿ-chòe sèng ê tiān kui-sio̍k Chú.
49002022	Lín kap I kiat-liân, khò Sèng Sîn ê pang-chān, mā chòe-hé siū khí-chō chòe Siōng-tè khiā-khí ê só͘-chāi.
49003001	In-ūi án-ni, góa --- [Pó-lô], ūi-tio̍h lín Gōa-pang-lâng choh Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ ê siû-hoān, thòe lín tùi Siōng-tè kî-kiû.
49003002	Lín it-tēng ū thiaⁿ-tio̍h, ūi-tio̍h lín, Siōng-tè tùi I ê un-tián ū úi-thok góa chit-ê chit-bū.
49003003	Siōng-tè ū chiong I ê ò-pì khé-sī hō͘ góa chai. Góa í-keng ū kán-lio̍k siá chit-ê tāi-chì,
49003004	lín tha̍k liáu chiū ōe bêng-pe̍k góa tùi Ki-tok ò-pì ê liáu-kái;
49003005	chit-ê ò-pì, tī kè-khì ê sè-tāi bô hō͘ lâng chai, hiān-chāi Siōng-tè thong-kè Sèng Sîn í-keng ū tùi I ê sèng sù-tô͘ kap sian-ti khé-sī.
49003006	Chit-ê ò-pì sī án-ni: Gōa-pang-lâng thong-kè hok-im thang kap [Iû-thài]-lâng pîⁿ-pîⁿ choh kè-sêng-jîn, pîⁿ-pîⁿ sio̍k chi̍t ê sin-thé, kap Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ kiat-liân pîⁿ-pîⁿ sêng-siū Siōng-tè ê èng-ún.
49003007	Tùi Siōng-tè pe̍h-pe̍h ê un-sù, thong-kè I tōa lêng-le̍k ê ūn-hêng, góa chiâⁿ-chòe hok-im ê chhe-ēng.
49003008	Góa tī Siōng-tè só͘-ū ê chú-bîn tiong sī tē-it bî-sòe, I kèng-jiân sù góa te̍k-pia̍t ê un-tián thang chiong Ki-tok sǹg bōe-liáu hong-hù ê hok-im thoân hō͘ Gōa-pang-lâng,
49003009	thang hō͘ só͘-ū ê lâng bêng-pe̍k Siōng-tè án-chóaⁿ si̍t-hiān I ê ò-pì. Chhòng-chō bān-iú ê Siōng-tè tī kè-khì ê sè-tāi ū chiong chit-ê ò-pì ún-ba̍t khí-lâi,
49003010	sī beh tī hiān-kim ê sè-tāi, thong-kè kàu-hōe, hō͘ thian-kài ê thóng-léng-chiá, koân-le̍k-chiá, lóng thang jīn-bat Siōng-tè ta̍k khoán ê tì-hūi.
49003011	Siōng-tè án-ni chòe sī kun-kù I éng-oán ê chí-ì; chit-ê chí-ì í-keng thong-kè lán ê Chú Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ si̍t-hiān lah.
49003012	Kap Ki-tok kiat-liân, thong-kè tùi I ê sìn, lán thang chhiong-móa sìn-sim hó-táⁿ chiū-kūn Siōng-tè.
49003013	Só͘-í, chhiáⁿ lín m̄-bián in-ūi góa ūi-tio̍h lín siū-khó͘ lâi kan-khó͘-sim; kî-si̍t che sī lín ê kong-êng.
49003014	In-ūi án-ni, góa kūi-lo̍h tī Thiⁿ Pē bīn-chêng,
49003015	tùi I thiⁿ-téng tōe-chiūⁿ lóng-chóng ê chong-cho̍k niá-siū miâ-hō.
49003016	Góa tùi I kî-kiû, chiàu I hong-hù ê êng-iāu, thong-kè I ê Sèng Sîn só͘ sù ê khùi-la̍t, hō͘ lín lōe-chāi ê oa̍h-miā ióng-chòng khí-lâi.
49003017	Góa mā kî-kiû Ki-tok ōe in-ūi lín ê sìn lâi tiàm tī lín sim-lāi, hō͘ I ê thiàⁿ chòe tōe-ki tit-tio̍h lo̍k-si̍t,
49003018	hō͘ lín ōe-tàng tit-tio̍h khùi-la̍t kap Siōng-tè só͘-ū ê chú-bîn lóng bêng-pe̍k Ki-tok ê thiàⁿ jōa-ni̍h tn̂g, khoah, koân, chhim,
49003019	koh keng-giām hit-ê chhiau-kè lâng ê tì-sek só͘ ōe-tàng liáu-kái ê thiàⁿ, hō͘ Siōng-tè ê oân-siān kā lín oân-choân chhiong-móa.
49003020	Siōng-tè ōe-tàng ēng I tī lán tiong-kan teh ūn-hêng ê tōa lêng-le̍k, tōa-tōa chhiau-kè lán só͘ kiû só͘ siūⁿ ê, lâi sêng-chiū it-chhè.
49003021	Goān êng-iāu tī kàu-hōe tiong, thong-kè Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ kui hō͘ Siōng-tè, kàu sè-sè tāi-tāi, bû-kiông bû-chīn. Amen!
49004001	Chòe chi̍t ê ūi-tio̍h Chú choh siû-hoān ê lâng, góa khó͘-khǹg lín. Kì-jiân lín siū Siōng-tè ho͘-tiàu, hêng-ûi tio̍h hû-ha̍p I ê ho͘-tiàu.
49004002	Hoān-sū tio̍h khiam-pi, un-jiû, jím-nāi, ēng thiàⁿ hō͘-siōng khoan-iông,
49004003	ēng hô-pêng hō͘-siōng liân-hê, chīn-la̍t pó-chhî Sèng Sîn só͘ sù ê ha̍p-it.
49004004	Sin-thé chí-ū chi̍t ê; Sèng Sîn chí-ū chi̍t ūi; in-ūi Siōng-tè tiàu lán beh tit-tio̍h ê ǹg-bāng sī chi̍t ê.
49004005	Chú chí-ū chi̍t ūi; sìn-gióng chí-ū chi̍t ê; sóe-lé chí-ū chi̍t ê;
49004006	Siōng-tè chí-ū chi̍t ūi, chiū-sī bān-iú ê Pē, I tī bān-iú ê téng-bīn, koàn-chhoàn bān-iú, koh tī bān-iú tiong.
49004007	Lán ta̍k ê lâng lóng chiàu Ki-tok só͘ sù ê hūn-liōng niá-siū un-sù.
49004008	Chiàu Sèng-keng só͘ kóng: I seng-koân kàu siōng-koân ê ūi ê sî, tòa chi̍t tōa-tūi siū-lia̍h-ê kap I khì, sù un-sù hō͘ lâng.
49004009	“I seng-koân” chit kù ōe sī sím-mi̍h ì-sù? Chiū-sī: I mā bat kàng-lo̍h kàu tōe siōng-chhim ê só͘-chāi.
49004010	Án-ni, “kàng-lo̍h” Hit-ūi chiū-sī kap “seng-koân” kàu pôaⁿ-kè chèng-thiⁿ ê téng-bīn lâi chhiong-móa bān-iú Hit-ūi sī kâng chi̍t ūi.
49004011	I só͘ sù ê ū sù-tô͘, ū sian-ti, ū thoân-hok-im-ê, ū bo̍k-ióng-ê kap kàu-tō-ê.
49004012	I án-ni chòe sī beh chong-pī Siōng-tè ê chú-bîn thang chòe sū-hōng ê kang-chok lâi kiàn-li̍p Ki-tok ê thé,
49004013	chòe-āu, lán lóng thang tùi Siōng-tè ê Kiáⁿ ū it-tì ê sìn-gióng kap jīm-sek lâi tióng-tāi sêng-jîn, ta̍t-kàu Ki-tok oân-choân ê thêng-tō͘.
49004014	Án-ni, lán chiū bô koh choh gín-á, hō͘ khi-phiàn-chiá phian-chō chhut-lâi só͘-ū chhò-gō͘ ê ha̍k-soat thoa teh-kiâⁿ, phiau-lâi phiau-khì.
49004015	Lán hoán-tńg tio̍h ēng thiàⁿ-sim kóng chin-si̍t, tī ta̍k hong-bīn ēng choh thâu ê Ki-tok chòe phiau-chún lâi sêng-tióng.
49004016	Tùi Ki-tok, sin-thé ê ta̍k kun-chat hō͘-siōng liân-chiap, ta̍k ê chi-thé hoat-hui eng-kai ū ê kong-lêng, hō͘ kui-ê sin-thé tióng-tōa, ēng thiàⁿ kiàn-li̍p khí-lâi.
49004017	Só͘-í, góa hōng Chú ê miâ khó͘-khǹg lín, m̄-thang kè-sio̍k chhin-chhiūⁿ Gōa-pang-lâng án-ni seng-oa̍h. In in-ūi bû-ti kap ngī-sim, sim-su o͘-àm, tì-kàu su-siúⁿ khong-tōng, kap Siōng-tè só͘ sù ê oa̍h-miā keh-tn̄g.
49004019	In sit-khì liâm-thí ê sim, chīn-chêng hòng-chhiòng, tham-loân ta̍k khoán ù-òe ê hêng-ûi.
49004020	Lín pèng m̄-sī án-ni ha̍k-si̍p Ki-tok.
49004021	Lín eng-kai ū thiaⁿ-tio̍h koan-hē I ê tāi-chì, ū tùi I ha̍k-si̍p, in-ūi tī Iâ-so͘ chiah ū chin-lí.
49004022	Án-ni, tio̍h thoat-lī í-chêng ê seng-oa̍h, thǹg-khì kū ê lâng, in-ūi kū ê lâng siū su-io̍k ê bê-he̍k teh pāi-hoāi.
49004023	Lín ê sim-su ì-liām tio̍h oân-choân ōaⁿ-sin,
49004024	chiū-sī tio̍h chhēng chiàu Siōng-tè ê hêng-siōng chhòng-chō ê sin lâng, ēng kun-kù chin-lí só͘ sán-seng ê kong-gī kap sèng-kiat piáu-hiān chhut-lâi.
49004025	Só͘-í, lín tio̍h thoat-lī hu-ké, tio̍h tùi chhù-piⁿ kóng chin-si̍t-ōe, in-ūi lán lóng sī Ki-tok sin-thé ê chi̍t pō͘-hūn.
49004026	Lín nā siū-khì m̄-thang tì-kàu hoān-chōe. M̄-thang kàu ji̍t-lo̍h iáu teh siū-khì;
49004027	m̄-thang hō͘ Mô͘-kúi ū khang-phāng thang lī-iōng.
49004028	Bat chòe-chha̍t ê m̄-thang koh thau-the̍h; tio̍h khò siang-chhiú chhut-la̍t chòe-kang tit-tio̍h chèng-tong ê siu-ji̍p, ū-la̍t thang pang-chān sàn-chhiah-lâng.
49004029	Pháiⁿ-ōe lóng m̄-thang kóng; tian-tò tio̍h kóng chō-chiū lâng ê hó-ōe, hō͘ thiaⁿ-tio̍h ê lâng tit-tio̍h lī-ek.
49004030	M̄-thang hō͘ Siōng-tè ê Sèng Sîn iu-siong; in-ūi Sèng Sîn sī lín sio̍k Siōng-tè ê ìn-kì, pó-chèng lín tī chín-kiù ê Ji̍t tit-tio̍h tháu-pàng.
49004031	Tio̍h khì-sak it-chhè ê ok-to̍k, pháiⁿ sèng-tē, siū-khì, soan-jióng, húi-pòng, í-ki̍p it-chhè ê pháiⁿ.
49004032	Tio̍h chhin-chhiat jîn-chû saⁿ khoán-thāi, hō͘-siōng sià-bián, tú kap Siōng-tè ū thong-kè Ki-tok sià-bián lín kâng-khoán.
49005001	Kì-jiân lín sī Siōng-tè só͘ thiàⁿ ê kiáⁿ-jî, tio̍h o̍h I.
49005002	Giân-hêng kú-chí tio̍h ū thiàⁿ-sim, chhin-chhiūⁿ Ki-tok thiàⁿ lán, ūi-tio̍h lán hi-seng ka-kī ê sìⁿ-miā chòe phang-phang ê chè-mi̍h hiàn hō͘ Siōng-tè.
49005003	Kì-jiân lín sī Siōng-tè ê chú-bîn, it-chhè îm-loān, ù-òe, á-sī tham-io̍k ê sū, tī lín tiong-kan liân kóng to m̄-thang.
49005004	Mā m̄-thang kóng siâ-îm, chho͘-sio̍k, á-sī hā-liû ê ōe, hoán-tńg tio̍h kám-siā.
49005005	Tio̍h khak-si̍t chai, îm-loān, ù-òe, tham-loân ê lâng --- tham-loân sī chi̍t chióng ê pài ngó͘-siōng --- Ki-tok kap Siōng-tè ê Kok choa̍t-tùi bô in ê hūn.
49005006	M̄-thang hō͘ lâng ēng khong-tōng ê ōe kā lín bê-khì; Siōng-tè ê siū-khì ōe ūi-tio̍h chiah-ê tāi-chì lîm-kàu hiah-ê pōe-ge̍k ê lâng.
49005007	Só͘-í, m̄-thang kap hit khoán lâng kau-chhap.
49005008	Lín chêng tī o͘-àm tiong, m̄-kú hiān-chāi í-keng chiâⁿ-chòe sio̍k Chú ê lâng tī kng-bêng tiong, kiâⁿ-chòe tio̍h ū kng-bêng kiáⁿ-jî ê khoán-sit;
49005009	kng-bêng só͘ kiat ê ké-chí sī ta̍k khoán ê liông-siān, kong-gī, kap chin-lí.
49005010	Tio̍h chhâ-chhut sím-mi̍h sī Chú só͘ hoaⁿ-hí ê sū.
49005011	M̄-thang chham-ú tī o͘-àm tiong teh chòe bô lō͘-ēng ê tāi-chì, tian-tò tio̍h kā in po̍k-lō͘ chhut-lâi.
49005012	In am-am khàm-khàm teh chòe ê, liân kóng to kiàn-siàu!
49005013	It-chhè hō͘ kng po̍k-lō͘ chiū hián-bêng,
49005014	in-ūi it-chhè hián-bêng chhut-lâi ê chiū chiâⁿ-chòe kng. Só͘-í ū chi̍t kù ōe án-ni kóng: Teh khùn ê lâng, khí-lâi; tio̍h tùi sí-lâng tiong peh khí-lâi! Ki-tok beh kā lí chiò-kng!
49005015	Só͘-í, lín ê hêng-ûi tio̍h kín-sīn, m̄-thang chòe bô tì-hūi ê lâng, tio̍h chòe chhong-bêng ê lâng,
49005016	siān-iōng ki-hōe, in-ūi hiān-kim ê sî-tāi siâ-ok.
49005017	Só͘-í, m̄-thang chòe hô͘-tô͘ ê lâng, tio̍h bêng-pe̍k sím-mi̍h sī Chú ê chí-ì.
49005018	M̄-thang chiú-chùi; chiú-chùi ōe hō͘ lín pāi-hoāi; hoán-tńg tio̍h hō͘ Sèng Sîn chhiong-móa.
49005019	Tio̍h ēng si-phian, sèng-si, lêng-koa tùi-chhiùⁿ, tùi sim-tóe chhiùⁿ sèng-si kap si-phian chheng-chàn Chú.
49005020	Tio̍h khò lán ê Chú Iâ-so͘ ê miâ, ūi-tio̍h ta̍k hāng tāi-chì sî-siông kám-siā Thiⁿ Pē Siōng-tè.
49005021	Lín tio̍h ēng kèng-ùi Ki-tok ê sim hō͘-siōng sūn-ho̍k.
49005022	Choh hū-jîn-lâng-ê, tio̍h chhin-chhiūⁿ sūn-ho̍k Chú án-ni sūn-ho̍k tiōng-hu.
49005023	In-ūi tiōng-hu sī hū-jîn-lâng ê thâu, chhin-chhiūⁿ Ki-tok sī kàu-hōe ê thâu; I pún-sin sī kàu-hōe --- I ê seng-khu ê Kiù-chú.
49005024	Chhin-chhiūⁿ kàu-hōe sūn-ho̍k Ki-tok, choh hū-jîn-lâng-ê eng-kai mā tio̍h sū-sū sūn-ho̍k tiōng-hu.
49005025	Choh tiōng-hu-ê, tio̍h thiàⁿ hū-jîn-lâng, chhin-chhiūⁿ Ki-tok thiàⁿ kàu-hōe, ūi-tio̍h kàu-hōe hi-seng ka-kī.
49005026	I án-ni chòe sī beh thong-kè I ê ōe ēng chúi sóe chheng-khì lâi sèng-hòa kàu-hōe kui Siōng-tè,
49005027	hō͘ kàu-hōe ū êng-kng, lóng bô ù-tiám, bô jiâu-bûn, á-sī kî-tha chit khoán ê khoat-tiám, chiâⁿ-chòe sèng-kiat bô hâ-chhû thang hiàn hō͘ ka-kī.
49005028	Siâng-khoán, tiōng-hu tio̍h thiàⁿ ka-kī ê hū-jîn-lâng, chhin-chhiūⁿ thiàⁿ ka-kī ê seng-khu. Thiàⁿ hū-jîn-lâng chiū-sī thiàⁿ ka-kī.
49005029	Bô-lâng oàn-hūn ka-kī ê seng-khu, tian-tò sī kā i pó-ióng, chiàu-kò͘, kap Ki-tok tùi-thāi kàu-hōe kâng-khoán,
49005030	in-ūi lán sī I seng-khu ê chi-thé.
49005031	Sèng-keng kóng, “In-ūi án-ni, lâng ōe lī-khui pē-bú, kap i ê bó͘ kiat-ha̍p, nn̄g lâng chiâⁿ-chòe chi̍t-thé.”
49005032	Chit-ê keng-bûn khé-sī chi̍t ê ke̍k-tōa ê ò-pì; chiàu góa ê lí-kái, che sī teh chí Ki-tok kap kàu-hōe ê koan-hē.
49005033	Chóng-sī, che mā sek-iōng tī lín ta̍k ê lâng: Tiōng-hu tio̍h thiàⁿ ka-kī ê hū-jîn-lâng, chhin-chhiūⁿ thiàⁿ ka-kī; hū-jîn-lâng tio̍h kèng-tiōng i ê tiōng-hu.
49006001	Choh jî-lú-ê, tio̍h sūn-ho̍k pē-bú, che sī sìn Chú ê lâng eng-kai ū ê pún-hūn.
49006002	“Tio̍h hàu-kèng pē-bú”, che sī thâu-chi̍t tiâu hù-tài èng-ún ê kài-bēng, “án-ni chòe lín chiū ōe ta̍k hāng hó-sè, tī chit-ê tōe kú-tn̂g khiā-khí.”
49006004	Choh pē-bú-ê, m̄-thang kek lín ê jî-lú siū-khì, tio̍h chiàu Chú ê koán-kàu kap kà-sī kā in pôe-ióng.
49006005	Choh lô͘-lē-ê, kap sūn-ho̍k Ki-tok kâng-khoán, tio̍h ēng kèng-ùi kap kiaⁿ-hiâⁿ choan-sim sūn-ho̍k lín tī sè-chiūⁿ ê chú-lâng.
49006006	M̄-thang tī lâng ê bīn-chêng kò͘-ì chòe hō͘ lâng khòaⁿ, hō͘ lâng hoaⁿ-hí; tio̍h choh Ki-tok ê lô͘-lē, tùi sim-lāi chun-thàn Siōng-tè ê chí-ì,
49006007	kam-sim lo̍k-ì chīn lô͘-lē ê pún-hūn, chhin-chhiūⁿ teh ho̍k-sāi Chú, m̄-sī teh ho̍k-sāi lâng.
49006008	Tio̍h chai, bô-lūn sī lô͘-lē á-sī chū-iû-ê, Chú lóng ōe chiàu ta̍k ê lâng ê hó hêng-ûi kā in pò-tap.
49006009	Choh chú-lâng-ê, mā tio̍h ēng kâng-khoán ê thài-tō͘ tùi-thāi lín ê lô͘-lē; m̄-thang kā in ui-hia̍p. Tio̍h chai, lín kap lín ê lô͘-lē lóng sio̍k kâng chi̍t ūi thiⁿ-téng ê Chú-lâng; I ēng kâng-khoán ê phiau-chún tùi-thāi ta̍k ê lâng.
49006010	Chòe-āu, góa khǹg lín tio̍h kap Chú kiat-liân, khò I ê tōa lêng-le̍k chòe kian-kiông ê lâng.
49006011	Tio̍h chhēng Siōng-tè só͘ sù choân-thò ê bú-chong, hō͘ lín khiā-chāi, thang tí-khòng Mô͘-kúi ê khúi-kè.
49006012	In-ūi lán m̄-sī kap ū huih ū bah ê lâng teh kau-chiàn, sī kap thian-kài ê siâ-lêng, chiū-sī chit-ê o͘-àm sè-tāi ê ú-tiū thóng-léng-chiá, koân-le̍k-chiá, chiáng-koân-chiá teh kau-chiàn.
49006013	Só͘-í, tio̍h ēng Siōng-tè só͘ sù choân-thò ê bú-chong lâi chong-pī ka-kī, thang tī siâ-ok ê ji̍t-chí ōe-tàng tí-khòng tùi-te̍k ê kong-kek, kian-chhî kàu-tóe chhî-siú tīn-tōe.
49006014	Só͘-í, tio̍h khiā-chāi, ēng chin-lí chòe tòa hâ, ēng chèng-gī chòe hō͘-heng-kah chhēng,
49006015	ēng chún-pī hó-sè ê hô-pêng ê hok-im chòe ôe chhēng.
49006016	Tio̍h put-sî ēng sìn-sim chòe tîn-pâi, thang phah-hoa Siâ-ok-chiá siā lâi hé ê chìⁿ.
49006017	Tio̍h ēng chín-kiù chòe thâu-khoe, ēng Sèng Sîn chòe kiàm, chiū-sī Siōng-tè ê ōe.
49006018	Tio̍h khò Sèng Sîn choân-sim kî-tó, siông-siông kî-kiû. Tio̍h put-sî kéng-séng, sî-siông ūi-tio̍h só͘-ū ê sìn-tô͘ kî-tó;
49006019	mā ūi-tio̍h góa kî-tó, kiû Siōng-tè sù góa sìn-sit, thang hó-táⁿ khui-chhùi soan-iông hok-im ê ò-pì.
49006020	Ūi-tio̍h chit-ê hok-im, góa hiān-chāi chòe chi̍t ê kòa thih-liān ê tāi-sài. Tio̍h ūi-tio̍h góa kî-tó, hō͘ góa thang hó-táⁿ soan-iông eng-kai kóng ê.
49006021	Lán chhin-ài ê hiaⁿ-tī, iā-sī Chú tiong-si̍t ê chhe-ēng [Chhui-ki-kó͘], ōe pò lín chai góa ê tāi-chì kap kūn-hóng.
49006022	Góa chhe i khì lín hia ê bo̍k-te̍k sī beh pò lín chai goán chia ê chêng-hêng, thang hō͘ lín an-sim.
49006023	Goān Pē Siōng-tè kap Chú Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok sù pêng-an, jîn-ài, kap sìn-sim hō͘ chèng hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē!
49006024	Goān Siōng-tè ê un-tián kap só͘-ū ēng bōe-piàn ê thiàⁿ lâi thiàⁿ lán ê Chú Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok ê lâng tông-chāi!
50001001	Góa --- [Pó-lô] kap [Thê-mô͘-thài] sī Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ ê lô͘-po̍k. Goán siá-phoe hō͘ tòa tī [Hui-li̍p-pí], kap Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ kiat-liân lóng-chóng ê sìn-tô͘ í-ki̍p kok ūi kam-tok kap chip-sū.
50001002	Goān lán ê Pē Siōng-tè kap Chú Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok sù lín un-tián kap pêng-an!
50001003	Góa ta̍k piàn siūⁿ-tio̍h lín ê sî lóng kám-siā góa ê Siōng-tè;
50001004	ta̍k piàn ūi-tio̍h lín chèng-lâng kî-tó ê sî lóng ēng hoaⁿ-hí ê sim kî-kiû,
50001005	in-ūi lín, tùi thâu-chi̍t ji̍t khí kàu hiān-chāi, lóng ū chham-ú soan-iông hok-im ê kang-chok.
50001006	Góa chhim-sìn hit-ūi tī lín tiong-kan khai-sí chòe bí-hó kang-chok ê Siōng-tè ōe tī Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ ê Ji̍t kā i oân-sêng.
50001007	Góa siông-siông teh siàu-liām lín, tùi lín chèng-lâng ū chit khoán ê kám-chêng sī tong-jiân ê, in-ūi bô-lūn góa hiān-chāi tī kaⁿ-ga̍k lāi á-sī í-chêng ūi-tio̍h hok-im piān-hō͘ kap choh-chèng ê sî, lín lóng ū kap góa hun-hióng Siōng-tè ê un-sù.
50001008	Góa ēng Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ ê thiàⁿ-sim jōa-ni̍h siàu-liām lín tāi-ke, Siōng-tè thang kā góa choh-chèng.
50001009	Góa só͘ kî-kiû ê sī án-ni: Lín ê thiàⁿ ōe ná ke-thiⁿ, lín ê tì-sek kap tùi ta̍k hāng ê phòaⁿ-toàn-le̍k mā ná chìn-pō͘,
50001010	hō͘ lín ōe-hiáu hun-pia̍t hit-ê siōng-hó ê tāi-chì, án-ni tī Ki-tok ê Ji̍t lín chiah ōe chiâⁿ-chòe sûn-kiat bô thang hiâm ê lâng,
50001011	chhiong-móa khò Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok chiah ū ê hó tek-hēng, thang chiong êng-kng kap o-ló kui hō͘ Siōng-tè.
50001012	Hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, góa ài lín chai, góa só͘ tú-tio̍h ê tāi-chì tian-tò hō͘ hok-im koh-khah chìn-tián,
50001013	tì-kàu ông-kiong ê choân-thé kéng-ōe í-ki̍p kî-tha só͘-ū ê lâng lóng chai-iáⁿ góa koaiⁿ-kaⁿ sī ūi-tio̍h Ki-tok ê iân-kò͘.
50001014	Chin chōe hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē mā in-ūi góa koaiⁿ-kaⁿ tùi Chú koh-khah ū khak-sìn, koh-khah hó-táⁿ bô kiaⁿ-hiâⁿ lâi thoân Siōng-tè ê tō-lí.
50001015	Ū lâng thoân Ki-tok sī chhut tī chi̍t-tò͘ kap hò͘ⁿ cheng-lūn; mā ū lâng sī chhut tī hó ì-sù.
50001016	Chiah-ê lâng sī chhut tī thiàⁿ-sim, chai-iáⁿ góa siū jīm-bēng sī beh ūi hok-im piān-hō͘.
50001017	Lēng-gōa hiah-ê lâng soan-iông Ki-tok sī chhut tī iá-sim, tōng-ki bô sûn, siūⁿ-beh thàn góa koaiⁿ-kaⁿ ê sî ke-thiⁿ góa ê kan-khó͘.
50001018	Án-ni ū sím-mi̍h koan-hē? Sī ké-ì á-sī chin-sim, bô-lūn án-chóaⁿ, Ki-tok siū thoân-khui, góa chiū ūi-tio̍h án-ni hoaⁿ-hí! Tio̍h, góa beh kè-sio̍k hoaⁿ-hí,
50001019	in-ūi góa chai, tùi lín ê kî-tó kap Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok ê Sîn ê pang-chān, góa it-tēng ōe tit-tio̍h chū-iû.
50001020	Góa pek-chhiat kî-thāi kap ǹg-bāng ê, chiū-sī bô chi̍t hāng tāi-chì ōe hō͘ góa kiàn-siàu; góa sî-sî khek-khek, te̍k-pia̍t sī hiān-chāi, ū kàu-gia̍h ê ióng-khì, sī oa̍h á-sī sí, thang hō͘ Ki-tok thong-kè góa chit-ê lâng tit-tio̍h êng-iāu.
50001021	In-ūi, tùi góa lâi kóng, teh-oa̍h sī Ki-tok, sí sī lī-ek.
50001022	Nā-sī kè-sio̍k oa̍h-teh ōe-tàng chòe khah chōe ū hāu-kó ê kang-chok, góa soah m̄-chai beh kéng sím-mi̍h.
50001023	Góa chìn-thòe-lióng-lân. Góa si̍t-chāi chin ài lī-khui chit-ê sè-kan kap Ki-tok chòe-hé, che eng-kai sī khah hó.
50001024	Put-kò, ūi-tio̍h lín ê iân-kò͘, góa koh-khah tio̍h oa̍h lo̍h-khì.
50001025	Tùi chit hāng, góa khak-sìn; góa chai góa beh oa̍h lo̍h-khì, beh kè-sio̍k kap lín tāi-ke oa̍h lo̍h-khì, sī beh hō͘ lín ê sìn-gióng koh-khah chìn-pō͘, koh-khah ū hoaⁿ-hí,
50001026	án-ni góa kap lín koh saⁿ-kìⁿ ê sî, lín ōe in-ūi Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ ū chhiong-hun ê lí-iû thang ēng góa chòe khoa-kháu.
50001027	Bô-lūn án-chóaⁿ, lín ê giân-hêng kú-chí tio̍h hû-ha̍p Ki-tok ê hok-im. Án-ni, bô-lūn góa ōe-tàng koh khì kap lín saⁿ-kìⁿ á-bōe, lóng ōe-tàng thiaⁿ-tio̍h lín ê tāi-chì, chai lín lóng ēng siâng chi̍t ê sim-chì khiā-chāi, tâng-sim saⁿ-kap ūi-tio̍h hok-im ê sìn-gióng phah-piàⁿ.
50001028	Bô-lūn chòe sím-mi̍h, m̄-bián kiaⁿ hoán-tùi-chiá ê ui-hia̍p, án-ni thang chèng-bêng in ōe sit-pāi, lín ōe tek-sèng; chit-ê tek-sèng sī tùi Siōng-tè lâi ê.
50001029	In-ūi Siōng-tè m̄-nā ū sù lín te̍k-pia̍t ê un-hūi lâi sìn Ki-tok, mā hō͘ lín ūi-tio̍h Ki-tok siū-khó͘,
50001030	lâi chham-ú siâng-khoán ê cheng-chiàn; chit-ê cheng-chiàn lín ū khòaⁿ-tio̍h góa án-chóaⁿ chiàn, hiān-chāi koh thiaⁿ-kìⁿ góa iáu teh chiàn.
50002001	Kì-jiân lín kap Ki-tok kiat-liân ū tit-tio̍h kek-lē; kì-jiân lín tùi I ê thiàⁿ ū tit-tio̍h an-ùi; kì-jiân lín kap Sèng Sîn ū kau-gî; kì-jiân lín ū keng-giām Siōng-tè ê chû-pi lîn-bín;
50002002	lín tio̍h ū siâng-khoán ê sim-chì, siâng-khoán ê thiàⁿ-sim, hô-hâi ê kám-chêng, it-tì ê siūⁿ-hoat, thang hō͘ góa chhiong-móa hoaⁿ-hí.
50002003	M̄-thang chū-su chū-lī, mā m̄-thang tui-kiû hu-êng; hoán-tńg tio̍h ū khiam-sùn ê sim, khòaⁿ pa̍t-lâng pí ka-kī khah gâu.
50002004	Lín ta̍k ê lâng m̄-thang chí-ū kò͘ ka-kī ê tāi-chì, mā tio̍h kò͘ pa̍t-lâng ê tāi-chì.
50002005	Lín tio̍h ū Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ ê sim-chì:
50002006	I goân-pún ū Siōng-tè ê sin-hūn, khiok bô lām-iōng kap Siōng-tè pêng-téng ê tōe-ūi.
50002007	I hoán-tńg piàⁿ-khang ka-kī, chhú lô͘-po̍k ê sin-hūn, chhut-sì kap lâng kâng-khoán, ēng lâng ê hêng-thé chhut-hiān.
50002008	I chū-goān khiam-pi, sūn-ho̍k kàu sí --- sīm-chì sí tī si̍p-jī-kè téng.
50002009	In-ūi án-ni, Siōng-tè thê-seng I kàu siōng-koân ê tōe-ūi, sù I chhiau-oa̍t bān miâ ê miâ-hō.
50002010	Án-ni, ūi-tio̍h kèng-tiōng Iâ-so͘ ê miâ, thiⁿ-téng, tōe-chiūⁿ, tōe-ē, it-chhè ê kha-thâu-u lóng ōe kūi-pài,
50002011	it-chhè ê chhùi lóng soan-jīn, “Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok sī Chú”, lâi êng-iāu Pē Siōng-tè.
50002012	Só͘-í, chhin-ài ê hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, góa tī lín hia ê sî, lín lóng ū sūn-thàn góa, hiān-chāi góa bô tī lín hia, lín koh-khah tio̍h án-ni. Tio̍h kè-sio̍k kiaⁿ-hiâⁿ ngia̍uh-ngia̍uh-chhoah lâi oân-sêng lín ê chín-kiù;
50002013	in-ūi Siōng-tè sî-siông tī lín tiong-kan teh chòe-kang, hō͘ lín ū ì-goān koh ōe si̍t-chián I ê hó chí-ì.
50002014	Bô-lūn chòe sím-mi̍h tāi-chì, lóng m̄-thang bâi-oàn á-sī cheng-lūn,
50002015	hō͘ lín thang chheng-pe̍k sûn-kiat, tī chit-ê siâ-ok hú-pāi ê sè-tāi choh Siōng-tè bô khoat-tiám ê kiáⁿ-jî. Tio̍h tī in tiong-kan hoat-kng, chhin-chhiūⁿ kng teh chiò sè-kan,
50002016	lâi kian-siú sù oa̍h-miā ê sìn-sit, hō͘ góa tī Ki-tok ê Ji̍t thang khoa-kháu kóng ka-kī bô khang-khang phun-pho, bô khang-khang lô-khó͘.
50002017	Góa nā tio̍h ēng ka-kī ê huih chòe tiān-chè phoah tī lín ê sìn-sim só͘ hiàn ê chè-mi̍h, góa mā hoaⁿ-hí, mā beh kap lín chòe-hé hoaⁿ-hí.
50002018	Siâng-khoán, lín mā tio̍h hoaⁿ-hí, kap góa hun-hióng hoaⁿ-hí.
50002019	Góa ǹg-bāng Chú Iâ-so͘ hō͘ góa ōe-tàng kín chhe [Thê-mô͘-thài] khì lín hia, hō͘ góa thang thiaⁿ-tio̍h lín ê siau-sit lâi tit-tio̍h kek-lē.
50002020	Chí-ū i ū kap góa tâng-sim chin-chiàⁿ teh koan-sim lín ê sū.
50002021	Chèng-lâng lóng teh tui-kiû ka-kī ê sū, m̄-sī Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok ê sū.
50002022	M̄-kú [Thê-mô͘-thài] ê chòe-lâng lín lóng chai, i kap góa chhin-chhiūⁿ pē kap kiáⁿ chòe-hé ūi-tio̍h thoân hok-im teh ho̍k-sāi.
50002023	Án-ni, góa chi̍t-ē chai góa ê tāi-chì ū sím-mi̍h kiat-kio̍k, ǹg-bāng ōe-tàng sûi-sî chhe i khì lín hia.
50002024	Góa khak-sìn Chú, I mā ōe hō͘ góa chin kín khì kìⁿ lín.
50002025	Put-kò, góa siūⁿ-kóng tio̍h chhe [Í-pa-hut-thê] khì lín hia; i sī góa ê hiaⁿ-tī, tâng-kang, kap chiàn-iú, tī góa su-iàu ê sî lín ū phài i lâi ho̍k-sāi góa.
50002026	I chin siàu-liām lín tāi-ke, mā in-ūi chai-iáⁿ lín ū thiaⁿ-tio̍h i phòa-pīⁿ ê tāi-chì, sim chin kan-khó͘.
50002027	I khak-si̍t ū phòa-pīⁿ, sīm-chì hiám sí-khì. M̄-kú Siōng-tè ū lîn-bín i, m̄-nā i nā-tiāⁿ, mā ū lîn-bín góa, hō͘ góa m̄-bián koh ke-thiⁿ iu-siong.
50002028	In-ūi án-ni, góa kóaⁿ-kín beh chhe i tńg-khì lín hia, hō͘ lín ōe-tàng koh kìⁿ-tio̍h i lâi hoaⁿ-hí, mā thang kiám-chió góa ê khòa-lū.
50002029	Só͘-í, lín tio̍h tī Chú ê lāi-bīn hoaⁿ-hoaⁿ hí-hí kā i chiap-la̍p. Tio̍h chun-tiōng chhin-chhiūⁿ i chit khoán ê lâng,
50002030	in-ūi i ūi-tio̍h Ki-tok ê kang-chok mō͘ sìⁿ-miā ê gûi-hiám hiám-hiám-á sí, beh pó͘ lín chòe bô-kàu ê, thòe lín lâi ho̍k-sāi góa.
50003001	Chòe āu, hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, lín tio̍h khò Chú lâi hoaⁿ-hí! Góa koh kóng-khí í-chêng só͘ siá ê, tùi góa pèng bô mâ-hoân, tùi lín khiok ū pang-chān.
50003002	Tio̍h chù-ì hit tīn káu, chù-ì hiah-ê choh-pháiⁿ ê lâng, chù-ì hiah-ê ka-kī koah-siong seng-khu ê lâng.
50003003	Kî-si̍t, lán chiah-sī chin-chiàⁿ siū kat-lé ê lâng. Lán thong-kè Sèng Sîn kèng-pài Siōng-tè, khoa-kháu Ki-tok Iâ-so͘, bô óa-khò gōa-piáu ê lé-gî.
50003004	Nā kóng beh óa-khò lé-gî, góa mā ōe; nā ū lâng siūⁿ-kóng i ōe-tàng óa-khò lé-gî, góa koh-khah ōe.
50003005	Góa chhut-sì tē-poeh ji̍t chiū siū kat-lé, sī [Í-sek-lia̍t]-lâng, sio̍k [Piān-ngá-bín] chi-cho̍k, sī sûn-chhùi ê [Hi-pek-lâi]-lâng. Tùi siú Lu̍t-hoat lâi kóng, góa sio̍k [Hoat-lī-sài]-phài;
50003006	tùi jia̍t-sim lâi kóng, góa sī kàu-hōe ê pek-hāi-chiá; tùi siú Lu̍t-hoat lâi chiâⁿ-chòe gī ê phiau-chún lâi kóng, góa lóng bô sím-mi̍h thang hiâm.
50003007	M̄-kú, í-chêng tùi góa ū lī-ek ê, hiān-chāi in-ūi Ki-tok ê iân-kò͘, góa kā i khòaⁿ-chòe sún-sit.
50003008	M̄-nā án-ni, góa chin-chiàⁿ khòaⁿ it-chhè chòe sún-sit, in-ūi góa khòaⁿ jīn-bat góa ê Chú Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ chòe siōng pó-pòe. Ūi-tio̍h I góa pàng-sak it-chhè, khòaⁿ bān-sū chòe pùn-sò, sī beh tit-tio̍h Ki-tok,
50003009	oân-choân kap I kiat-liân, bô koh ū hit khoán khò ka-kī siú Lu̍t-hoat lâi tit-tio̍h ê gī. Góa hiān-chāi ū ê gī sī thong-kè sìn-khò Ki-tok, sī kun-kù sìn lâi tit-tio̍h Siōng-tè só͘ siúⁿ-sù ê gī.
50003010	Góa só͘ ài ê sī jīn-bat Ki-tok koh thé-giām I koh-oa̍h ê tōa lêng-le̍k, kap I chòe-hé siū-khó͘, keng-giām I ê sí,
50003011	ǹg-bāng ka-kī mā ōe-tàng tùi sí koh-oa̍h.
50003012	Án-ni m̄-sī kóng góa í-keng tit-tio̍h á-sī í-keng ta̍t-kàu bo̍k-phiau; góa kè-sio̍k ti̍t-ti̍t cháu, ǹg-bāng thang tit-tio̍h siúⁿ; kî-si̍t Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ í-keng tit-tio̍h góa.
50003013	Hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, góa bô siūⁿ-kóng ka-kī í-keng tit-tio̍h. Góa chí-ū choan-sim chi̍t hāng, chiū-sī bōe kì-tit āu-bīn ê sū, phah-piàⁿ tui-kiû thâu-chêng ê sū,
50003014	ǹg bo̍k-phiau ti̍t-ti̍t cháu, ūi-tio̍h beh tit-tio̍h siúⁿ, chiū-sī Siōng-tè thong-kè Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ tiàu góa khì niá-siū hit-ê tùi téng-bīn lâi ê oa̍h-miā.
50003015	Só͘-í, lán tiong-kan sêng-se̍k ê lâng tio̍h ū siâng-khoán ê siūⁿ-hoat. Lín tiong-kan nā ū pa̍t khoán ê siūⁿ-hoat, Siōng-tè mā ōe chiong chit-ê siūⁿ-hoat kā lín chí-sī.
50003016	Bô-lūn án-chóaⁿ, lán tio̍h chiàu í-keng cháu kè-lâi ê lō͘-sòaⁿ kè-sio̍k chiân-chìn.
50003017	Hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, lín lóng tio̍h o̍h góa; tio̍h chù-ì khòaⁿ hiah-ê tè goán ê bô͘-iūⁿ ê lâng án-chóaⁿ teh seng-oa̍h.
50003018	Góa í-keng ū kā lín kóng chin chōe piàn, hiān-chāi koh lâu ba̍k-sái kā lín kóng: Ū chin chōe lâng, in ê hêng-ûi hō͘ in chiâⁿ-chòe Ki-tok si̍p-jī-kè ê tùi-te̍k.
50003019	In ê kiat-kio̍k sī bia̍t-bông; in ēng pak-tó͘ chòe sîn-bêng; in chiong kiàn-siàu khòaⁿ-chòe kong-êng; in chí-ū koan-sim tōe-chiūⁿ ê sū.
50003020	M̄-kú, lán sī thiⁿ-téng ê kong-bîn, teh thèng-hāu tùi hia lâi ê Kiù-sè-chú, chiū-sī Chú Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok.
50003021	I ōe ēng hō͘ bān-iú khut-ho̍k ê lêng-le̍k lâi kái-piàn lán pi-chiān ê thé, hō͘ lán pìⁿ-chòe kap I siâng-khoán êng-iāu ê thé.
50004001	Só͘-í, góa só͘ chhin-ài só͘ siàu-liām ê hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, lín sī góa ê hoaⁿ-hí, góa ê êng-kng, tio̍h óa-khò Chú lâi khiā-chāi.
50004002	Góa khó͘-khǹg [Iú-a-tia̍p], mā khó͘-khǹg [Sûn-to͘-ki], lín tī Chú ê lāi-bīn tio̍h tâng-sim.
50004003	Góa tiong-si̍t ê tâng-phōaⁿ, góa mā ài lí pang-chān chit nn̄g ê hū-jîn-lâng, in-ūi in kap [Kek-lī-bián] í-ki̍p góa kî-tha ê tâng-kang bat ūi-tio̍h hok-im kap góa chòe-hé hùn-tò͘; in ê miâ í-keng ū kì-chài tī oa̍h-miā-chheh.
50004004	Tio̍h sî-siông kap Chú kiat-liân lâi hoaⁿ-hí! Góa koh kóng chi̍t piàn, tio̍h hoaⁿ-hí!
50004005	Tio̍h hō͘ chèng-lâng khòaⁿ ōe chhut lín ê khoan-iông. Chú teh-beh lâi lah.
50004006	Lóng m̄-thang khòa-lū sím-mi̍h. Bān-sū tio̍h ēng kám-siā ê sim kî-kiû kap tāi-tó, chiong lín só͘ kiû ê hō͘ Siōng-tè chai.
50004007	Án-ni, Siōng-tè só͘ sù chhiau-oa̍t lâng it-chhè liáu-kái ê pêng-an, ōe thong-kè Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ pó-siú lín ê sim-su ì-liām.
50004008	Hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, chóng kóng chi̍t kù, hiah-ê ōe kiàn-li̍p hó tek-hēng ê sū, hiah-ê ta̍t-tit chheng-chàn ê sū, chiū-sī it-chhè chin-si̍t ê, it-chhè thang chun-kèng ê, it-chhè kong-chèng ê, it-chhè sûn-kiat ê, it-chhè khó-ài ê, it-chhè thang o-ló ê, chiah-ê lín lóng tio̍h put-sî khǹg tī sim-lāi.
50004009	Lín tùi góa só͘ ha̍k-si̍p koh chiap-siū ê, thiaⁿ-tio̍h koh khòaⁿ-tio̍h ê, chiah-ê lóng tio̍h kè-sio̍k si̍t-hêng. Án-ni, sù pêng-an ê Siōng-tè chiū ōe kap lín tông-chāi.
50004010	Góa tī Chú ê lāi-bīn hui-siông hoaⁿ-hí! In-ūi kè chi̍t tōaⁿ sî-kan liáu-āu, lín tùi góa ê koan-sim ū koh puh-íⁿ khui-hoe; kî-si̍t, lín ū teh kā góa koan-sim, put-kò sī bô ki-hōe thang piáu-sī nā-tiāⁿ.
50004011	M̄-sī kóng góa bô kàu ēng, in-ūi góa í-keng o̍h ōe-hiáu bô-lūn tī sím-mi̍h kéng-gū lóng ti-chiok.
50004012	Góa chai án-chóaⁿ kè sàn-chhiah ê seng-oa̍h, mā chai án-chóaⁿ kè hù-jū ê seng-oa̍h. Sī pá á-sī iau, sī ū-chhun á-sī ū-khiàm, góa í-keng tit-tio̍h pì-koat, chiū-sī bô-lūn sím-mi̍h sî-chūn sím-mi̍h só͘-chāi, góa lóng ti-chiok.
50004013	Óa-khò sù góa lêng-le̍k ê Ki-tok, góa ū khùi-la̍t thang khek-ho̍k ta̍k khoán ê kéng-gū.
50004014	M̄-kú, lín ū hun-tam góa ê khùn-lân, án-ni si̍t-chāi chin hó.
50004015	Lín [Hui-li̍p-pí]-lâng ka-kī mā lóng chai, tī góa thoân hok-im ê chho͘-kî, góa lī-khui [Má-kî-tùn] ê sî, chí-ū lín ê kàu-hōe ū hun-tam góa seng-oa̍h hùi-iōng ê siu-chi.
50004016	Liân góa tī [Thiap-sat-lô-nî-ka] ê sî, lín ū kúi-nā piàn sàng mi̍h-kiāⁿ lâi kiong-kip góa ê su-iàu.
50004017	Góa m̄-sī ài lín sàng mi̍h-kiāⁿ, sī ài lín ū khah chōe ê lī-sûn kì ji̍p-khì lín ê hō͘-thâu.
50004018	Che sī lín hō͘ góa it-chhè mi̍h-kiāⁿ ê siu-kù. Lín hō͘ góa ê í-keng kàu-gia̍h koh ū-chhun. Góa ū tùi [Í-pa-hut-thê] siu-tio̍h lín sàng hō͘ góa ê lé-mi̍h, chhin-chhiūⁿ hoat-chhut phang-bī, Siōng-tè só͘ hoaⁿ-hí ê chè-mi̍h.
50004019	Góa ê Siōng-tè ōe chiàu I êng-iāu ê hong-hù, thong-kè Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ lâi boán-chiok lín só͘-ū ê su-iàu.
50004020	Goān êng-kng kui hō͘ lán ê Pē Siōng-tè, ti̍t-kàu éng-éng oán-oán. Amen!
50004021	Chhiáⁿ thòe góa kā sio̍k Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ ê só͘-ū sìn-tô͘ chhéng-an. Kap góa tī chia ê hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē mā beh kā lín chhéng-an.
50004022	Tī chia só͘-ū ê sìn-tô͘, te̍k-pia̍t sī [Khái-sat] ông-kiong lāi ê sìn-tô͘, lóng beh kā lín chhéng-an.
50004023	Goān Chú Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok ê un-tián kap lín tāi-ke tông-chāi!
51001001	Góa sī [Pó-lô], hōng Siōng-tè ê chí-ì choh Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ ê sù-tô͘, góa kap lán ê hiaⁿ-tī [Thê-mô͘-thài]
51001002	siá-phoe hō͘ tòa tī [Ko-lô-se] ê sìn-tô͘, chiū-sī kap Ki-tok kiat-liân tiong-sìn ê hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē. Goān lán ê Pē Siōng-tè sù lín un-tián kap pêng-an!
51001003	Goán ūi-tio̍h lín kî-tó ê sî sî-siông teh kám-siā lán ê Chú Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok ê Pē Siōng-tè,
51001004	in-ūi ū thiaⁿ-tio̍h lín tùi Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ ū sìn-sim, tùi só͘-ū ê sìn-tô͘ ū thiàⁿ-sim.
51001005	Chiah-ê lóng sī ēng hit-ê ūi-tio̍h lín khǹg tī thiⁿ-téng ê ǹg-bāng chòe kun-kù; chit-ê ǹg-bāng tong-chho͘ hok-im chin-tō thoân hō͘ lín ê sî, lín í-keng ū thiaⁿ-tio̍h.
51001006	Tú kap hok-im khai-sí thoân kàu lín hia koh lín chin-chiàⁿ jīn-bat Siōng-tè ê un-tián hit ji̍t khí ê chêng-hêng siâng-khoán, chit-ê hok-im hiān-chāi í-keng thoân kàu choân sè-kài ta̍k só͘-chāi, kè-sio̍k teh sêng-tióng kiat ké-chí.
51001007	Lín tùi kap goán pîⁿ-pîⁿ choh lô͘-po̍k chhin-ài ê [Í-pa-hut] ū o̍h-tio̍h Siōng-tè ê un-tián; i ūi-tio̍h goán tiong-si̍t teh chòe Ki-tok ê chhe-ēng,
51001008	mā ū tùi goán kóng-khí Sèng Sîn hō͘ lín ū thiàⁿ-sim ê sū.
51001009	In-ūi án-ni, tùi thiaⁿ-tio̍h lín ê siau-sit í-āu, goán ū kè-sio̍k teh ūi-tio̍h lín kî-tó, kiû Siōng-tè hō͘ lín ōe-tàng tùi Sèng Sîn tit-tio̍h ta̍k-khoán ê tì-hūi kap lí-kái, chhiong-hun bêng-pe̍k I ê chí-ì,
51001010	giân-hêng kú-chí chiàu Chú só͘ ài, hoān-sū hō͘ I hoaⁿ-hí, koh hō͘ lín chòe ta̍k hāng hó-sū, kiat hó ké-chí, tùi Siōng-tè ê jīn-bat mā jú ke-thiⁿ.
51001011	Goān lín tùi I êng-iāu ê koân-lêng tit-tio̍h kàu-gia̍h ê khùi-la̍t, ū nāi-sim thang jím-siū it-chhè, koh ēng hoaⁿ-hí ê sim kám-siā Thiⁿ-pē, in-ūi I hō͘ lín ōe kham-tit hun-hióng I ūi-tio̍h ka-kī ê sìn-tô͘ pó-liû tī kng-bêng Kok-tō͘ ê hok-khì.
51001013	I kiù lán thoat-lī o͘-àm ê koân-sè, kā lán sóa ji̍p-khì I só͘ thiàⁿ ê Kiáⁿ ê Kok-tō͘;
51001014	lán tùi I ê Kiáⁿ tit-tio̍h kiù-sio̍k, chōe tit-tio̍h sià-bián.
51001015	Ki-tok sī khòaⁿ-bōe-tio̍h ê Siōng-tè ê hêng-siōng: I sī Tōa-kiáⁿ, pí it-chhè siū-chō-ê khah chá ū.
51001016	In-ūi Siōng-tè thong-kè I lâi chhòng-chō bān-iú, chiū-sī tī thiⁿ-téng kap tōe-chiūⁿ, khòaⁿ-ōe-tio̍h-ê kap khòaⁿ-bōe-tio̍h-ê, lêng-kài chē-ông-ūi-ê kap chú-chèng-chiá, thóng-léng-chiá kap chiáng-koân-chiá. Siōng-tè thong-kè I, iā ūi-tio̍h I, chhòng-chō bān-iú.
51001017	Iáu-bē ū bān-iú í-chêng I chiū chûn-chāi, bān-iú khò I liân-kiat hó-sè.
51001018	I sī kàu-hōe, chiū-sī I ê seng-khu ê thâu. I sī goân-sí, sī Tōa-kiáⁿ; Siōng-tè hō͘ I chiâⁿ-chòe thâu-chi̍t ê tùi sí-lâng tiong koh-oa̍h ê, thang tī bān-iú tiong chiâⁿ-chòe tē-it.
51001019	In-ūi Siōng-tè chiàu ka-kī ê chí-ì, chiong ka-kī oân-chéng ê te̍k-sèng chhiong-móa tī I lāi-bīn.
51001020	Thong-kè I ê Kiáⁿ, Siōng-tè hō͘ bān-iú, bô-lūn tī thiⁿ-téng á-sī tōe-chiūⁿ, lóng kap I hô-hó; Siōng-tè thong-kè I ê Kiáⁿ tī si̍p-jī-kè téng lâu-huih sí lâi chhiok-sêng hô-pêng.
51001021	Lín leh, lín ū chi̍t sî kap Siōng-tè toān-choa̍t koan-hē, sim-su kap I te̍k-tùi, chòe pháiⁿ tāi-chì.
51001022	M̄-kú hiān-chāi, Siōng-tè í-keng thong-kè ka-kī ê Kiáⁿ jio̍k-thé ê sí, hō͘ lín kap I hô-hó, chiâⁿ-chòe sèng-kiat, bô khoat-tiám, bô thang hiâm ê chè-mi̍h hiàn tī I bīn-chêng.
51001023	Lín tio̍h kian-chhî sìn-gióng, kian-kò͘ khiā-chāi, hō͘ lín thiaⁿ-tio̍h hok-im ê sî só͘ tit-tio̍h ê ǹg-bāng bô iô-tāng. Chit-ê hok-im í-keng thoân hō͘ thiⁿ-ē chiòng-seng; góa --- [Pó-lô] chiū-sī chit-ê hok-im ê chhe-ēng.
51001024	Taⁿ góa ūi-tio̍h lín siū-khó͘ kám-kak chin hoaⁿ-hí; in-ūi góa jio̍k-thé ê siū-khó͘ sī teh oân-sêng Ki-tok ūi-tio̍h I ê seng-khu, chiū-sī kàu-hōe, siū iáu-bē liáu ê khó͘-lān.
51001025	Góa choh kàu-hōe ê chhe-ēng; góa tùi Siōng-tè niá-siū ê jīm-bū sī ūi-tio̍h lín, beh chiong I ê sìn-sit oân-choân thoân-khui.
51001026	Chit-ê sìn-sit sī le̍k-tāi í-lâi tùi jîn-lūi só͘ ún-ba̍t ê ò-pì, hiān-chāi í-keng tùi I ê sìn-tô͘ hián-bêng.
51001027	Siōng-tè beh hō͘ in chai-iáⁿ, I ūi-tio̍h Gōa-pang-lâng só͘ chún-pī ê ò-pì sī jōa-ni̍h hong-hù koh êng-iāu. Chit-ê ò-pì sī Ki-tok tī lín lāi-bīn, I sī lín hun-hióng Siōng-tè êng-iāu ê ǹg-bāng.
51001028	Só͘-í, goán tùi só͘-ū ê lâng soan-iông Ki-tok, ēng ta̍k khoán ê tì-hūi lâi khoàn-kài koh kà-sī chèng-lâng, thang hō͘ só͘-ū tī Ki-tok lāi-bīn chiâⁿ-chòe sêng-se̍k ê lâng hiàn hō͘ Siōng-tè.
51001029	Ūi-tio̍h chit-ê bo̍k-te̍k, góa khò Ki-tok tī góa lāi-bīn ūn-chok ê tōa lêng-le̍k chīn-la̍t teh phah-piàⁿ.
51002001	Ūi-tio̍h lín kap [Ló-tí-ka]-lâng, í-ki̍p só͘-ū iáu m̄-bat kìⁿ-tio̍h góa ê lâng, góa ài lín chai góa jōa-á-ni̍h teh phah-piàⁿ.
51002002	Góa ê bo̍k-te̍k sī ài in ê sim siū kó͘-lē, ēng thiàⁿ saⁿ kiat-liân, thang tit-tio̍h hong-hù ê lí-kái-le̍k, ū chhiong-hun ê khak-sìn lâi hiáu-ngō͘ Siōng-tè ê ò-pì, chiū-sī Ki-tok;
51002003	Siōng-tè ê tì-hūi kap tì-sek ê it-chhè pó-pòe lóng ún-chông tī I lāi-bīn.
51002004	Góa án-ni kóng sī ài lín bián hō͘ lâng ēng hoa-giân khá-gú kā lín chhōa-ji̍p bê-lō͘.
51002005	Sui-jiân góa lâng bô tī lín hia, sim khiok kap lín chòe-hé. Góa khòaⁿ-kìⁿ lín ê seng-oa̍h kui-kui kú-kú, tùi Ki-tok ê sìn-sim ū kian-tēng, kám-kak chin hoaⁿ-hí.
51002006	Kì-jiân lín ū chiap-siū Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ chòe Chú, chiū tio̍h kap I kiat-liân lâi seng-oa̍h,
51002007	chiàu lín só͘ siū ê kà-sī, tī I lāi-bīn tèng-kun, tī I téng-bīn kiàn-li̍p, hō͘ sìn-sim tit-tio̍h kian-kò͘, chhiong-móa kám-siā.
51002008	Tio̍h kín-sīn, m̄-thang hō͘ lâng ēng khong-tōng hu-ké ê tia̍t-ha̍k kā lín bê-khì, in-ūi hiah-ê ha̍k-soat sī kun-kù lâng ê thoân-soat kap chi-phòe ú-tiū ê siâ-sîn, m̄-sī Ki-tok.
51002009	In-ūi Siōng-tè oân-chéng ê sîn-sèng tiàm tī khòaⁿ-ōe-tio̍h ê Ki-tok ê hêng-thé lāi-bīn,
51002010	hō͘ lín kap I kiat-liân chiâⁿ-chòe oân-chéng. I sī goân-siú, chhiau-oa̍t it-chhè lêng-kài ê thóng-léng-chiá kap chiáng-koân-chiá.
51002011	Lín mā í-keng ū chiap-siū kap Ki-tok liân-kiat ê kat-lé, m̄-sī ēng lâng ê chhiú, sī thong-kè Ki-tok ê kat-lé chiong lín chōe-sèng ê jio̍k-thé thǹg khí-lâi.
51002012	Tùi sóe-lé, lín ū kap Ki-tok chòe-hé bâi-chòng; koh tùi sóe-lé, thong-kè sìn hō͘ Ki-tok tùi sí-lâng tiong koh-oa̍h ê Siōng-tè ê tāi-lêng, hō͘ lín mā kap I chòe-hé koh-oa̍h.
51002013	Lín í-chêng in-ūi hoān-chōe koh jio̍k-thé bô siū kat-lé, í-keng sí; m̄-kú hiān-chāi Siōng-tè í-keng hō͘ lín kap Ki-tok chòe-hé koh-oa̍h. Siōng-tè ū sià-bián lán it-chhè ê chōe-kò,
51002014	thiat-siau tùi lán put-lī koh ū hoat-lu̍t hāu-le̍k ê chioh-kù, kā i tèng tī si̍p-jī-kè téng, hō͘ i sit-hāu.
51002015	Siōng-tè ū kái-tû lêng-kài ê thóng-léng-chiá kap chiáng-koân-chiá ê koân-sè, hō͘ in tī Ki-tok khái-soân ê hâng-lia̍t tiong chòe chiàn-hoān sī-chiòng.
51002016	Só͘-í, m̄-thang tī lim-chia̍h, siú choeh-kî, chhoe-it, á-sī An-hioh-ji̍t ê būn-tôe hō͘ lâng phoe-phòaⁿ.
51002017	Chiah-ê put-kò sī chiong-lâi ê sū ê iáⁿ; Ki-tok chiah-sī si̍t-thé.
51002018	M̄-thang siū hiah-ê kò͘-ì ké khiam-pi, pài thiⁿ-sài ê lâng éng-hióng, hō͘ lín sit-khì èng-tit ê pò-siúⁿ. Hiah-ê lâng óa-khò hoàn-sióng, chiàu lâng ê siūⁿ-hoat, bô-kun bô-kù chū-khoa chū-tāi,
51002019	kap Thâu --- Ki-tok toān-choa̍t koan-hē. Tùi chit-ê Thâu, choân seng-khu tit-tio̍h êng-ióng, kun kap chat hō͘-siōng liân-chiap, chiàu Siōng-tè ê chí-ì sêng-tióng.
51002020	Kì-jiân lín kap Ki-tok chòe-hé sí, thoat-lī chi-phòe ú-tiū ê siâ-sîn, ná iáu chhin-chhiūⁿ sio̍k chit sè-kan ê lâng teh seng-oa̍h, chun-siú “M̄-thang the̍h”, “M̄-thang chia̍h”, “M̄-thang bong” chit khoán ê kìm-khī?
51002022	Chiah-ê put-kò sī lâng só͘ chō ê kàu-kui kap kà-sī, ēng liáu chiū bô lō͘-ēng.
51002023	Pài thiⁿ-sài, ké khiam-pi, kap khó͘-chhó͘ seng-khu, khòaⁿ khí-lâi ná chhin-chhiūⁿ ū tì-hūi, kî-si̍t tùi khòng-chè jio̍k-thé ê chêng-io̍k lóng bô lō͘-ēng.
51003001	Kì-jiân lín í-keng kap Ki-tok chòe-hé koh-oa̍h, chiū tio̍h tui-kiû thiⁿ-téng ê sū, tī hia Ki-tok chē tī Siōng-tè ê chiàⁿ-pêng.
51003002	Lín tio̍h choan-sim téng-bīn ê sū, m̄-sī tōe-chiūⁿ ê sū.
51003003	In-ūi lín í-keng sí, lín ê oa̍h-miā kap Ki-tok chòe-hé ún-chông tī Siōng-tè lāi-bīn.
51003004	Ki-tok sī lín ê oa̍h-miā, I hián-hiān ê sî, lín mā ōe kap I chòe-hé hián-hiān lâi hun-hióng I ê êng-iāu.
51003005	Só͘-í, tio̍h siau-bia̍t lín lāi-bīn hiah-ê tōe-chiūⁿ ê io̍k-bōng, chiū-sī îm-loān, ù-òe, siâ-chêng, siâ-io̍k, kap tham-loân --- tham-loân sī pài ngó͘-siōng.
51003006	In-ūi chiah-ê sū, Siōng-tè ê siū-khì beh lîm-kàu pōe-ge̍k ê lâng.
51003007	Lín í-chêng thàn chiah-ê io̍k-bōng teh seng-oa̍h ê sî, giân-hêng kú-chí mā siū in chi-phòe.
51003008	M̄-kú hiān-chāi lín tio̍h khì-sak siū-khì, pháiⁿ sèng-tē, oàn-hūn, húi-pòng, kap kóng lah-sap-ōe, téng.
51003009	M̄-thang hō͘-siōng khi-phiàn, in-ūi lín í-keng ū chiong kū ê lâng kap si̍p-koàn thǹg khí-lâi,
51003010	chiong sin ê lâng chhēng lo̍h-khì; chit-ê sin ê lâng, Chhòng-chō-chú chiàu ka-kī ê hêng-siōng kè-sio̍k teh kā i keng-sin, hō͘ lín thang chin-chiàⁿ bat I.
51003011	Án-ni, bô koh hun-pia̍t [Hi-la̍h]-lâng á-sī [Iû-thài]-lâng, siū kat-lé á-sī bô siū kat-lé, bī-khai-hòa, iá-bân, lô͘-lē á-sī chū-iû-jîn. M̄-kú Ki-tok sī it-chhè, iā tī it-chhè ê lāi-bīn.
51003012	Lín sī Siōng-tè só͘ kéng-soán ê chú-bîn, sī I só͘ thiàⁿ ê, só͘-í tio̍h ēng lîn-bín, chû-ài, khiam-pi, un-jiû, kap nāi-sim chòe saⁿ chhēng lo̍h-khì.
51003013	Lín tiong-kan nā ū kiù-hun, tio̍h hō͘-siōng khoan-iông, pí-chhú sià-bián; chhin-chhiūⁿ Chú ū sià-bián lín, lín mā tio̍h án-ni saⁿ sià-bián.
51003014	Chiah-ê í-gōa, tio̍h koh ke tha̍h thiàⁿ-sim, in-ūi thiàⁿ ōe hō͘ it-chhè liân-kiat, oân-choân hô-ha̍p.
51003015	Tio̍h hō͘ Ki-tok só͘ sù ê hô-pêng chi-phòe lín ê sim; ūi-tio̍h beh hō͘ lín ū chit-ê hô-pêng, lín siū kéng-tiàu chiâⁿ-chòe chi̍t-thé. Lín koh tio̍h sî-siông kám-siā.
51003016	Tio̍h hō͘ Ki-tok ê ōe hong-hong hù-hù tiàm tī lín lāi-bīn. Tio̍h ēng ta̍k khoán ê tì-hūi hō͘-siōng kà-sī, pí-chhú khoàn-kài, chhiùⁿ si-phian, sèng-si, lêng-koa, tùi sim-tóe kám-siā o-ló Siōng-tè.
51003017	Lín bô-lūn chòe sím-mi̍h, kóng-ōe á-sī hêng-ûi, lóng tio̍h hōng Chú Iâ-so͘ ê miâ lâi chòe, thong-kè I lâi kám-siā Pē Siōng-tè.
51003018	Choh hū-jîn-lâng-ê, tio̍h sūn-ho̍k tiōng-hu, in-ūi che sī sìn Chú ê lâng ê pún-hūn.
51003019	Choh tiōng-hu-ê, tio̍h thiàⁿ hū-jîn-lâng, m̄-thang kā in pháiⁿ khoán-thāi.
51003020	Choh jî-lú-ê, ta̍k hāng tāi-chì tio̍h sūn-ho̍k pē-bú, in-ūi che sī Chú só͘ hoaⁿ-hí ê.
51003021	Choh lāu-pē-ê, m̄-thang kek jî-lú siū-khì, chiah-bōe hō͘ in hoe-sim sit-chì.
51003022	Choh lô͘-lē-ê, ta̍k hāng tāi-chì tio̍h sūn-ho̍k sè-chiūⁿ ê chú-lâng, m̄-sī ūi-tio̍h beh hō͘ in hoaⁿ-hí chiah tī in bīn-chêng án-ni chòe, sī in-ūi kèng-ùi Chú sêng-sim chòe.
51003023	Lín bô-lūn chòe sím-mi̍h, tio̍h chīn-sim chòe, m̄-sī ūi-tio̍h lâng, sī ūi-tio̍h Chú chòe.
51003024	Tio̍h chai, Chú ōe kā lín pò-siúⁿ, hō͘ lín tùi I tit-tio̍h sán-gia̍p; lín teh ho̍k-sāi ê sī Chú Ki-tok.
51003025	Choh-pháiⁿ ê lâng ōe siū pháiⁿ ê pò-èng, in-ūi Siōng-tè bōe phian-thāi lâng.
51004001	Choh chú-lâng-ê, tio̍h kong-pêng ha̍p-lí tùi-thāi lín ê lô͘-lē, lín chai, lín tī thiⁿ-téng mā ū chi̍t ūi Chú-lâng.
51004002	Tio̍h kè-sio̍k pek-chhiat kî-tó; kî-tó ê sî tio̍h kéng-séng, tio̍h kám-siā.
51004003	Mā tio̍h ūi-tio̍h goán kî-tó, kiû Siōng-tè hō͘ goán ū thoân sìn-sit ê ki-hōe, thang soan-iông Ki-tok ê ò-pì; góa sī ūi-tio̍h chit-ê chiah teh chē-kaⁿ.
51004004	Tio̍h ūi-tio̍h góa kî-tó, hō͘ góa ōe-tàng chiong eng-kai kóng ê ò-pì kóng chheng-chhó.
51004005	Tio̍h siān-iōng ki-hōe, tùi-thāi bī-sìn-chiá tio̍h ū tì-hūi.
51004006	Kóng-ōe put-sî tio̍h un-hô, chhin-chhiūⁿ ēng iâm tiâu-bī, chai-iáⁿ tio̍h án-chóaⁿ ìn-tap ta̍k ê lâng.
51004007	Koan-hē góa it-chhè ê tāi-chì, chhin-ài ê hiaⁿ-tī [Chhui-ki-kó͘] ōe kā lín kóng; tī Chú ê kang-chok i kap góa chòe-hé choh lô͘-po̍k, tiong-si̍t teh ho̍k-sāi.
51004008	Góa chhe i khì lín hia, sī ài pò lín chai goán chia ê chêng-hêng, hō͘ lín ê sim thang tit-tio̍h kó͘-lē.
51004009	[O-nî-se-bô͘] ōe kap i chòe-hé khì; i sī lín hia ê lâng, sī tiong-si̍t koh chhin-ài ê hiaⁿ-tī. In ōe chiong goán chia it-chhè ê tāi-chì pò lín chai.
51004010	Kap góa chòe-hé chē-kaⁿ ê [A-lí-ta̍t-kó͘] beh kā lín chhéng-an; [Pa-ná-pa] ê piáu sió-tī [Má-khó] mā beh kā lín chhéng-an. Koan-hē [Má-khó], góa í-keng ū kā lín kau-tài, i khì ê sî tio̍h kā i chiap-thāi.
51004011	Hit-ê kiò-chòe [Iû-sū-to͘] ê [Iâ-so͘] mā beh kā lín chhéng-an. Tī [Iû-thài]-lâng sìn-tô͘ tiong chí-ū chit saⁿ ê lâng ūi-tio̍h Siōng-tè-kok teh kap góa tâng-kang, in ū hō͘ góa chin tōa ê an-ùi.
51004012	Tùi lín hia lâi Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ ê po̍k-jîn [Í-pa-hut] beh kā lín chhéng-an. I sî-siông ūi-tio̍h lín pek-chhiat kî-tó, kiû Siōng-tè hō͘ lín khiā-chāi, choh sêng-se̍k ê lâng, khak-sìn Siōng-tè lóng-chóng ê chí-ì.
51004013	Góa thang chèng-bêng, i khak-si̍t ūi-tio̍h lín kap tòa tī [Ló-tí-ka] í-ki̍p [Hi-la̍h-pho-lí] ê lâng sin-khó͘ chòe-kang.
51004014	Chhin-ài ê i-seng [Lō͘-ka] kap [Tí-má] beh kā lín chhéng-an.
51004015	Chhiáⁿ lín thòe góa kā [Ló-tí-ka] ê hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē kap [Lêng-hoat], í-ki̍p tī in tau teh chū-hōe ê kàu-hōe chhéng-an.
51004016	Chit tiuⁿ phoe lín tha̍k liáu, tio̍h siat-hoat mā hō͘ [Ló-tí-ka] ê kàu-hōe tha̍k; lín mā tio̍h tha̍k [Ló-tí-ka] ê kàu-hōe choán hō͘ lín ê phoe.
51004017	Tio̍h kā [A-ki-pò͘] kóng, “Lí só͘ niá-siū ho̍k-sāi Chú ê chit-bū it-tēng tio̍h oân-sêng.”
51004018	Góa --- [Pó-lô] chhin-pit kā lín chhéng-an. Tio̍h ōe kì-tit góa teh chē-kaⁿ. Goān Siōng-tè ê un-tián kap lín tông-chāi!
52001001	Góa --- [Pó-lô], [Se-lah], kap [Thê-mô͘-thài] siá-phoe hō͘ [Thiap-sat-lô-nî-ka], sio̍k Pē Siōng-tè kap Chú Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok ê kàu-hōe. Goān lín tit-tio̍h un-tián kap pêng-an!
52001002	Goán sî-siông ūi-tio̍h lín tāi-ke kám-siā Siōng-tè, tī kî-tó tiong put-sî siūⁿ-tio̍h lín.
52001003	Goán tī lán ê Pē Siōng-tè ê bīn-chêng siàu-liām lín khò sìn-sim só͘ chòe ê kang, chhut tī thiàⁿ-sim ê lô-khó͘, kap tùi lán ê Chú Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok ê ǹg-bāng só͘ piáu-hiān ê kian-jím.
52001004	Hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, goán chai, lín sī Siōng-tè só͘ thiàⁿ, só͘ kéng-soán ê,
52001005	in-ūi goán thoân hok-im kàu lín hia, m̄-sī chí-ū ēng giân-gú, mā khò tōa lêng-le̍k kap Sèng Sîn, í-ki̍p tùi hok-im ū oân-choân ê khak-sìn. Chiàu lín só͘ chai, goán tī lín tiong-kan ê sî choh-lâng sím-mi̍h khoán, lóng sī ūi-tio̍h beh hō͘ lín tit-tio̍h lī-ek.
52001006	Lín ū o̍h goán mā ū o̍h Chú, sui-jiân tī chin chōe khó͘-lān tiong, lín iáu-kú ēng Sèng Sîn só͘ sù ê hoaⁿ-hí lâi niá-siū sìn-sit.
52001007	Tùi án-ni, lín chiâⁿ-chòe [Má-kî-tùn] kap [A-kai-a] choân-thé sìn-tô͘ ê bô͘-hoān.
52001008	In-ūi Chú ê sìn-sit sī tùi lín thoân-chhut, m̄-nā tī [Má-kî-tùn] kap [A-kai-a], lín tùi Siōng-tè ê sìn mā thoân kàu ta̍k só͘-chāi, só͘-í m̄-bián goán koh kóng sím-mi̍h.
52001009	In ka-kī ū kóng-khí goán tī lín hia ê sî jōa-ni̍h siū lín hoan-gêng, lín án-chóaⁿ lī-khui ngó͘-siōng kui-ǹg Siōng-tè, lâi sū-hōng oa̍h koh chin ê Siōng-tè,
52001010	thèng-hāu I ê Kiáⁿ tùi thiⁿ lâi; I hō͘ Iâ-so͘ tùi sí-lâng tiong koh-oa̍h, lâi chín-kiù lán thoat-lī beh lâi ê sím-phòaⁿ.
52002001	Hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, lín ka-kī chai goán khì lín hia hóng-būn m̄-sī bô hāu-kó.
52002002	Lín chai goán khì lín hia í-chêng tī [Hui-li̍p-pí] sui-jiân siū-tio̍h pek-hāi kap bú-jio̍k, iáu-kú ū óa-khò lán ê Siōng-tè hó-táⁿ biān-tùi chin chōe chó͘-gāi thoân Siōng-tè ê hok-im hō͘ lín.
52002003	Goán ê khoàn-bián m̄-sī chhut tī chhò-gō͘ á-sī bô sûn-chèng ê tōng-ki, mā m̄-sī beh phiàn lâng.
52002004	Kì-jiân Siōng-tè khòaⁿ goán ōe kham-tit, chiong hok-im kau-thok goán, goán chiū chiàu án-ni kóng, m̄ sī beh hō͘ lâng hoaⁿ-hí, sī beh hō͘ kàm-chhat goán lāi-sim ê Siōng-tè hoaⁿ-hí.
52002005	Lín chai, goán m̄-bat tùi lín kóng phô͘-tháⁿ ê ōe, mā m̄-bat ū tham-sim ê liām-thâu; che Siōng-tè ōe-tàng kā goán choh-chèng.
52002006	Goán mā m̄-bat tùi lâng, bô-lūn sī lín á-sī pa̍t-lâng, kiû êng-kng.
52002007	Sui-jiân choh Ki-tok ê sù-tô͘, goán pún-lâi thang iau-kiû lín chun-tiōng goán; m̄-kú goán tī lín tiong-kan ê sî un-jiû tùi-thāi lín, chhin-chhiūⁿ ni-bú teh io gín-á.
52002008	Kì-jiân goán hiah-ni̍h thiàⁿ-sioh lín, m̄-nā goān-ì kap lín hun-hióng Siōng-tè ê hok-im, liân goán ka-kī ê sìⁿ-miā to kam-goān hō͘ lín, in-ūi lín sī goán só͘ thiàⁿ ê.
52002009	Hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, tio̍h ōe kì-tit goán ê sin-khó͘ kap lô-lo̍k; goán thoân Siōng-tè ê hok-im hō͘ lín ê sî, ūi-tio̍h bô ài ke-thiⁿ lín jīm-hô lâng ê hū-tam, goán mî-ji̍t teh chòe-kang.
52002010	Lín kap Siōng-tè ōe-tàng kā goán choh-chèng, tùi lín chiah-ê sìn-tô͘, goán ê choh-lâng jōa-ni̍h sûn-kiat, chèng-ti̍t, bô thang hiâm.
52002011	Lín chai goán tùi-thāi lín ta̍k ê lâng, chhin-chhiūⁿ lāu-pē tùi-thāi ka-kī ê jî-lú.
52002012	Goán khó͘-khǹg lín, kó͘-lē lín, khoàn-bián lín, ài lín ê giân-hêng kú-chí ōe-tàng hû-ha̍p Siōng-tè ê chí-ì; I ū tiàu lín chìn-ji̍p I ka-kī ê Kok-tō͘ kap êng-iāu.
52002013	Goán mā ūi-tio̍h chit-ê iân-kò͘ siông-siông kám-siā Siōng-tè, in-ūi lín tùi goán thiaⁿ-tio̍h Siōng-tè ê ōe ê sî, bô kā i khòaⁿ-chòe sī lâng ê ōe, tian-tò kā i khòaⁿ-chòe khak-khak si̍t-si̍t sī Siōng-tè ê ōe; chit-ê ōe tī lín sìn-tô͘ tiong-kan teh ūn-chok.
52002014	Hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, lín ū tú-tio̍h tī [Iû-thài] tōe Siōng-tè ê kàu-hōe, chiū-sī sio̍k Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ ê kàu-hōe só͘ tú-tio̍h ê tāi-chì. Lín siū-tio̍h ka-kī tông-pau ê pek-hāi, tú chhin-chhiūⁿ in ū siū-tio̍h [Iû-thài]-lâng ê pek-hāi.
52002015	Hiah-ê [Iû-thài]-lâng thâi-sí Chú Iâ-so͘ kap chèng sian-ti, mā pek-hāi goán. In hō͘ Siōng-tè bô hoaⁿ-hí, mā kap chèng-lâng chòe tùi-te̍k,
52002016	sīm-chì chó͘-tòng goán thoân hok-im hō͘ Gōa-pang-lâng, hō͘ in thang tit-tio̍h kiù. In kè-sio̍k hoān-chōe, ti̍t-kàu chōe-ok koàn-boán. Chòe-āu Siōng-tè ê siū-khì lîm-kàu in sin-chiūⁿ.
52002017	Hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, goán siū pek chiām-sî kap lín hun-lī, put-kò sī seng-khu saⁿ-lī, sim khiok bô lī-khui. Goán jōa-ni̍h pek-chhiat ài koh khòaⁿ-tio̍h lín ê bīn.
52002018	Goán chin ài khì lín hia. Góa --- [Pó-lô] chi̍t piàn koh chi̍t piàn siūⁿ-beh khì hóng-būn lín, m̄-kú Sat-tàn kā goán chó͘-tòng.
52002019	Lán ê Chú Iâ-so͘ lâi-lîm ê sî, goán ê ǹg-bāng, hoaⁿ-hí, kap siōng khoa-kháu ê sī sím-mi̍h? Kiám m̄-sī lín?
52002020	Lín si̍t-chāi sī goán ê êng-kng kap hoaⁿ-hí.
52003001	Só͘-í, goán tán bōe-tiâu, koat-tēng kan-ta goán lâu tī [Ngá-tián],
52003002	chiū chhe goán ê hiaⁿ-tī, iā-sī ūi-tio̍h Siōng-tè thoân Ki-tok hok-im ê tâng-kang [Thê-mô͘-thài], khì lín hia, lâi kó͘-lē lín, kian-kò͘ lín ê sìn-sim,
52003003	hō͘ lín tiong-kan bô-lâng in-ūi só͘ tú-tio̍h ê khó͘-lān tì-kàu iô-tāng. Lín ka-kī chai lán tú-tio̍h khó͘-lān sī Siōng-tè ê an-pâi.
52003004	Goán iáu kap lín chòe-hé ê sî, ū seng kā lín kóng-khí goán ōe siū khó͘-lān, āu-lâi chin-chiàⁿ ū án-ni hoat-seng, che sī lín só͘ chai ê.
52003005	In-ūi án-ni, góa tán bōe-tiâu chiah chhe [Thê-mô͘-thài] khì lín hia, ài chai lín ê sìn-sim án-chóaⁿ, chiah-bián lín siū Chhì-thàm-chiá bê-he̍k, tì-kàu goán tī lín tiong-kan ê lô-khó͘ lo̍k-khong.
52003006	Hiān-chāi [Thê-mô͘-thài] í-keng tùi lín hia tò-lâi, chiong koan-hē lín ê sìn-sim kap thiàⁿ-sim ê hó siau-sit pò goán chai, kā goán kóng lín sî-siông teh siàu-liām goán, ài kap goán kìⁿ-bīn, chhin-chhiūⁿ goán ài kap lín kìⁿ-bīn.
52003007	In-ūi án-ni, hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, tī it-chhè ê hoān-lān kap khùn-khó͘ tiong goán tùi lín ê sìn-sim ū tit-tio̍h an-ùi.
52003008	Lín nā tùi Chú ū kian-kò͘ ê sìn-sim, goán chiah ōe-tàng kóng hiān-chāi ū chin-chiàⁿ teh oa̍h.
52003009	Goán tī Siōng-tè ê bīn-chêng in-ūi lín lâi hoaⁿ-hí; tùi che it-chhè ê hoaⁿ-hí, goán tio̍h án-chóaⁿ kám-siā chiah ū kàu-gia̍h?
52003010	Goán mî-ji̍t pek-chhiat kî-kiû thang kìⁿ lín ê bīn, lâi pó͘-chiok lín sìn-sim ê su-iàu.
52003011	Goān lán ê Thiⁿ-pē Siōng-tè kap lán ê Chú Iâ-so͘ kā goán khui-lō͘ thang khì lín hia.
52003012	Goān Chú hō͘ lín saⁿ-thiàⁿ kap thiàⁿ chèng-lâng ê sim it-ti̍t ke-thiⁿ, chhin-chhiūⁿ goán tùi lín ê thiàⁿ ū ná ke-thiⁿ.
52003013	Án-ni, I ōe hō͘ lín ê sim kian-kò͘, tī lán ê Chú Iâ-so͘ kap I ê chèng sìn-tô͘ lâi-lîm ê sî, tī lán ê Pē Siōng-tè ê bīn-chêng sèng-kiat, bô thang hiâm. Amen!
52004001	Chòe-āu, hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, goán iáu ū ōe beh kā lín kóng, lín ū chiap-siū goán ê kà-sī chai-iáⁿ tio̍h án-chóaⁿ seng-oa̍h chiah ōe hō͘ Siōng-tè hoaⁿ-hí, kî-si̍t lín ū chiàu án-ni teh seng-oa̍h. Put-kò goán hōng Chú Iâ-so͘ ê miâ khún-kiû koh khó͘-khǹg lín tio̍h ka-pē ló͘-le̍k.
52004002	In-ūi lín chai goán ū hōng Chú Iâ-so͘ ê miâ kā lín chí-sī sím-mi̍h.
52004003	Siōng-tè ê chí-ì sī ài lín sèng-kiat, bô îm-loān,
52004004	hō͘ lín ta̍k ê lâng ōe-hiáu ēng sèng-kiat kap chū-chun ê sim khòng-chè ka-kī ê seng-khu,
52004005	bô chhin-chhiūⁿ m̄-bat Siōng-tè ê Gōa-pang-lâng teh hòng-chhiòng chêng-io̍k.
52004006	M̄-thang chhim-hāi, mā m̄-thang khi-hū tâng-sìn ê hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē. Goán í-keng ū kā lín kóng, mā ū giâm-giâm seng kā lín kéng-kò, “Chòe chit khoán tāi-chì ê lâng, Chú ōe pò-èng.”
52004007	Siōng-tè m̄-sī ho͘-tiàu lán kè bô chheng-khì ê seng-oa̍h, sī ho͘-tiàu lán kè sèng-kiat ê seng-oa̍h.
52004008	Só͘-í, kū-choa̍t chit-ê kà-sī ê, m̄-sī kū-choa̍t lâng, sī kū-choa̍t sù lín Sèng Sîn ê Siōng-tè.
52004009	Koan-hē hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē saⁿ-thiàⁿ ê sū, bô su-iàu goán siá sím-mi̍h hō͘ lín, in-ūi lín ka-kī í-keng siū-tio̍h Siōng-tè ê kà-sī tio̍h hō͘-siōng saⁿ-thiàⁿ.
52004010	Kî-si̍t, lín ū chiàu chit-ê kà-sī tùi-thāi choân [Má-kî-tùn] ê hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē. M̄-kú, hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, goán khó͘-khǹg lín tio̍h ka-pē ló͘-le̍k.
52004011	Chiàu goán chêng só͘ hoan-hù, lín tio̍h li̍p-chì kè an-chēng ê seng-oa̍h, chīn ka-kī ê pún-hūn chhin-chhiú chòe-kang.
52004012	Án-ni lín chiū ōe-tàng tit-tio̍h hōe-gōa ê lâng ê chun-kèng, bô su-iàu khò pa̍t-lâng pang-chān.
52004013	Hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, koan-hē í-keng sí-khì ê lâng, goán ài lín chai, chiah-bián chhin-chhiūⁿ hiah-ê bô ǹg-bāng ê lâng án-ni teh pi-siong.
52004014	Kì-jiân lán sìn Iâ-so͘ ū sí, ū koh-oa̍h, só͘-í lán mā sìn Siōng-tè ōe thong-kè Iâ-so͘ chhōa hiah-ê í-keng sí-khì ê lâng kap I chòe-hé lâi.
52004015	Goán chiàu Chú ê ōe kā lín kóng chit-ê sū, chiū-sī lán chiah-ê tī Chú lâi-lîm ê sî iáu oa̍h-teh ê lâng, bōe pí hiah-ê í-keng sí-khì ê lâng khah tāi-seng kìⁿ-tio̍h Chú.
52004016	Bēng-lēng chi̍t-ē chhut, thiⁿ-sài-tiúⁿ ê siaⁿ chi̍t-ē hoah, Siōng-tè ê lat-pah chi̍t-ē hiáng, Chú pún-sin chiū ōe tùi thiⁿ-téng kàng-lîm, hiah-ê sí í-chêng í-keng sìn Ki-tok ê sí-lâng ōe tāi-seng koh-oa̍h,
52004017	jiân-āu lán chiah-ê iáu oa̍h-teh ê lâng lóng ōe kap in chòe-hé siū chiap-khì hûn-lāi, tī khong-tiong kap Chú saⁿ-kìⁿ. Án-ni, lán chiū ōe it-ti̍t kap Chú chòe-hé.
52004018	Só͘-í, lín tio̍h ēng chiah-ê ōe hō͘-siōng kó͘-lē.
52005001	Hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, koan-hē chit-ê tāi-chì hoat-seng ê sî kap kî, bô su-iàu siá-phoe kā lín kóng,
52005002	in-ūi lín ka-kī chai Chú ê Ji̍t ōe chhin-chhiūⁿ chha̍t-á àm-sî thau-thau-á lâi.
52005003	Lâng teh kóng “pêng-an bô-sū” ê sî, chai-lān chhin-chhiūⁿ sán-hū chhui-chūn ê thàng-thiàⁿ hut-jiân lîm-kàu in, bô hoat-tō͘ thang tô-pī.
52005004	M̄-kú, hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, lín m̄-sī tī o͘-àm tiong, hit-ê Ji̍t bōe chhin-chhiūⁿ chha̍t-á tī bô siūⁿ-tio̍h ê sî hut-jiân lâi.
52005005	In-ūi lín lóng sī kng-bêng ê lâng, sī ji̍t-sî ê lâng; lán m̄-sī sio̍k mî-sî, m̄-sī sio̍k o͘-àm.
52005006	Só͘-í, lán m̄-thang chhin-chhiūⁿ kî-tha ê lâng teh khùn, tio̍h chhíⁿ-chhíⁿ, tio̍h kín-sīn.
52005007	In-ūi khùn ê lâng lóng sī àm-sî teh khùn; chiú-chùi ê lâng sī àm-sî teh chùi.
52005008	Kì-jiân lán sī sio̍k ji̍t-sî ê lâng, tio̍h kín-sīn, ēng sìn-sim kap thiàⁿ-sim chòe hō͘-heng-kah chhēng, ēng tit-kiù ê ǹg-bāng chòe thâu-khoe tì.
52005009	Siōng-tè bô an-pâi lán tio̍h siū I ê hêng-hoa̍t, sī beh hō͘ lán thong-kè Chú Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok lâi tit-tio̍h kiù.
52005010	Ki-tok thòe lán sí sī beh hō͘ lán, bô-lūn sī sí á-sī oa̍h, lóng ōe-tàng kap I chòe-hé oa̍h.
52005011	Só͘-í, chhin-chhiūⁿ lín hiān-chāi án-ni, tio̍h kè-sio̍k hō͘-siōng kó͘-lē, pí-chhú chō-chiū.
52005012	Hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, chhiáⁿ lín tio̍h kèng-tiōng tī lín tiong-kan teh tio̍h-bôa, iā-sī Chú kéng-soán lâi chí-tō kap khoàn-bián lín hiah-ê lâng.
52005013	In-ūi in só͘ chòe ê kang, lín tio̍h ēng siōng-tōa ê kèng-ì kap thiàⁿ-sim tùi-thāi in. Lín ka-kī tio̍h hô-bo̍k siong-chhù.
52005014	Hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, goán khó͘-khǹg lín tio̍h kéng-kài pîn-tōaⁿ ê lâng, bián-lē bô-táⁿ ê lâng, pang-chān loán-jio̍k ê lâng; tùi chèng-lâng tio̍h khoan-iông.
52005015	Lín tio̍h kín-sīn, m̄-thang ēng pháiⁿ pò pháiⁿ, tio̍h put-sî ūi-tio̍h pí-chhú í-ki̍p só͘-ū ê lâng chòe hó-sū.
52005016	Tio̍h put-sî hoaⁿ-hí;
52005017	tio̍h kè-sio̍k kî-tó;
52005018	bô-lūn sím-mi̍h kéng-gū lóng tio̍h kám-siā; in-ūi che sī Siōng-tè ê chí-ì, ài lín chiah-ê sio̍k Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ ê lâng án-ni chòe.
52005019	M̄-thang phah-hoa Sèng Sîn ê hé;
52005020	m̄-thang biáu-sī sian-ti ê ōe.
52005021	Sū-sū tio̍h chhat-giām; hó ê tio̍h chhî-siú,
52005022	it-chhè ê siâ-ok tio̍h khì-sak.
52005023	Goān sù pêng-an ê Siōng-tè chhin-sin kā lín oân-choân sèng-hòa, hō͘ lín ê lêng, hûn, kap thé tī lán ê Chú Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok lâi-lîm ê sî tit-tio̍h pó-choân, bô thang hiâm!
52005024	Ho͘-tiàu lín ê Siōng-tè sī sìn-si̍t, I it-tēng ōe oân-sêng chit-ê sū.
52005025	Hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, chhiáⁿ ūi-tio̍h goán kî-tó.
52005026	Tio̍h ēng sèng ê saⁿ-chim kā lóng-chóng ê hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē chhéng-an.
52005027	Goán hōng Chú ê miâ hoan-hù lín tio̍h tha̍k chit tiuⁿ phoe hō͘ chèng hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē thiaⁿ.
52005028	Goān lán ê Chú Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok ê un-tián kap lín tông-chāi!
53001001	Góa --- [Pó-lô], [Se-lah], kap [Thê-mô͘-thài] siá-phoe hō͘ [Thiap-sat-lô-nî-ka] sio̍k Pē Siōng-tè kap Chú Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok ê kàu-hōe.
53001002	Goān lín tùi lán ê Pē Siōng-tè kap Chú Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok tit-tio̍h un-tián kap pêng-an!
53001003	Hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, goán eng-kai put-sî ūi-tio̍h lín kám-siā Siōng-tè; án-ni chòe sī tong-jiân, in-ūi lín ê sìn-sim ū tōa chìn-pō͘, lín chèng-lâng ê saⁿ-thiàⁿ mā it-ti̍t teh ke-thiⁿ.
53001004	Só͘-í goán tī Siōng-tè ê chèng kàu-hōe tiong ēng lín chòe khoa-kháu, in-ūi lín siū it-chhè ê pek-hāi kap jím-siū hoān-lān ê sî iáu pó-chhî kian-jím kap sìn-sim.
53001005	Che chèng-si̍t Siōng-tè phòaⁿ-tēng lín ōe kham-tit sêng-siū Siōng-tè-kok sī kong-tō, lín chiū-sī ūi-tio̍h chit-ê teh siū-khó͘.
53001006	Kì-jiân Siōng-tè sī kong-tō, I ōe ēng chai-lān pò-èng hiah-ê hō͘ lín tú-tio̍h chai-lān ê lâng,
53001007	mā hō͘ lín chiah-ê tú-tio̍h chai-lān ê lâng, tī Chú Iâ-so͘ kap I ū tōa lêng-le̍k ê thiⁿ-sài tī hé-iām tiong tùi thiⁿ hián-hiān ê sî, thang kap goán pîⁿ-pîⁿ tit-tio̍h tháu-pàng.
53001008	Hit sî, I ōe hêng-hoa̍t hiah-ê m̄-jīn Siōng-tè kap m̄ sūn-thàn lán ê Chú Iâ-so͘ ê hok-im ê lâng.
53001009	In ōe siū éng-oán húi-bia̍t ê hêng-hoa̍t, lī-khui Chú ê bīn-chêng, kap I êng-kng ê khùi-la̍t keh-tn̄g.
53001010	I lâi-lîm ê sî ōe tùi I ê sìn-tô͘ tit-tio̍h êng-kng, koh tit-tio̍h só͘-ū sìn I ê lâng ê o-ló. Tī hit Ji̍t lín mā ōe tī in tiong-kan, in-ūi lín ū sìn goán tùi lín só͘ chòe ê kiàn-chèng.
53001011	Ūi-tio̍h chit-ê bo̍k-te̍k, goán put-sî teh ūi-tio̍h lín kî-tó, khún-kiû lán ê Siōng-tè hō͘ lín ê seng-oa̍h ōe hû-ha̍p I ê ho͘-tiàu, mā sù lín khùi-la̍t lâi si̍t-hiān it-chhè siān-liông ê sim-ì kap sìn-sim ê chok-ûi,
53001012	thang hō͘ lán ê Chú Iâ-so͘ ê miâ tī lín tiong-kan tit-tio̍h êng-kng, lín mā tùi I tit-tio̍h êng-kng; che lóng sī lán ê Siōng-tè kap Chú Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok ê un-tián.
53002001	Hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, koan-hē lán ê Chú Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok ê lâi-lîm kap lán siū chū-chi̍p kàu I hia ê sū, goán iau-kiû lín,
53002002	nā ū thiaⁿ lâng kóng goán tī ū-giân, káng-tō, á-sī tī phoe-ni̍h ū kóng-khí “Chú ê Ji̍t kàu” ê sî, lín ê sim m̄-thang tōng-iâu á-sī kiaⁿ-hiâⁿ.
53002003	Lâng bô-lūn ēng sím-mi̍h hong-hoat, lín lóng m̄-thang hō͘ in phiàn-khì, in-ūi tī hit Ji̍t kàu í-chêng it-tēng seng ū pōe-kàu ê sū, mā ū put-hoat ê lâng, chiū-sī chù-tiāⁿ bia̍t-bông ê lâng, ōe chhut-hiān.
53002004	Chit-ê lâng ōe tí-te̍k it-chhè chheng-chòe sîn-bêng á-sī kèng-pài ê tùi-siōng, sīm-chì thê-ko ka-kī khì chē tī Siōng-tè ê tiān, chū-chheng chòe Siōng-tè.
53002005	Chit-ê tāi-chì, góa iáu kap lín chòe-hé ê sî bat kā lín kóng, lín kiám bōe kì-tit?
53002006	Lín lóng chai, hiān-chāi sī sím-mi̍h teh khian-chè hit-ê Put-hoat-chiá; i sî kàu ōe chhut-hiān.
53002007	In-ūi hit-ê sîn-pì ê put-hoat sè-le̍k í-keng teh ūn-chok, put-kò tio̍h thèng-hāu kàu teh khian-chè i ê sè-le̍k sóa-khui hit sî chiah ōe hoat-seng.
53002008	Hit sî Put-hoat-chiá ōe chhut-hiān; Chú Iâ-so͘ ōe ēng tùi I ê chhùi thò͘ chhut-lâi ê khùi kā i thâi-sí, ēng I lâi-lîm ê sî hián-hiān ê êng-kng kā i siau-bia̍t.
53002009	Put-hoat-chiá lâi-lîm ê sî ōe ēng Sat-tàn ta̍k khoán ê koân-lêng kiâⁿ ké sîn-jiah kap kî-sū.
53002010	Koh tùi bia̍t-bông ê lâng kiâⁿ ta̍k khoán siâ-ok ê phiàn-su̍t, in-ūi in kū-choa̍t khì ài hō͘ in tit-kiù ê chin-lí.
53002011	Ūi-tio̍h án-ni, Siōng-tè hō͘ in sán-seng kiông-lia̍t ê chhò-kak khì siong-sìn hu-ké,
53002012	tì-kàu it-chhè m̄-sìn chin-lí, ì-ài put-gī ê lâng lóng siū tēng-chōe.
53002013	Chú só͘ thiàⁿ ê hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, goán eng-kai put-sî ūi-tio̍h lín kám-siā Siōng-tè, in-ūi I tùi khí-thâu chiū kéng-soán lín lâi tit-kiù, tùi Sèng Sîn hō͘ lín chiâⁿ-chòe sèng-kiat ê chú-bîn, koh hō͘ lín khak-sìn chin-lí.
53002014	Ūi-tio̍h chit-ê, Siōng-tè thong-kè goán só͘ thoân ê hok-im ho͘-tiàu lín lâi niá-siū lán ê Chú Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok ê êng-kng.
53002015	Só͘-í, hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, tio̍h khiā-chāi, tio̍h kian-siú goán só͘ kà-sī ê thoân-thóng, bô-lūn sī ēng chhùi kóng ê á-sī ēng phoe siá ê, lóng tio̍h kian-siú.
53002016	Goān lán ê Chú Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok pún-sin kap thiàⁿ lán ê Pē Siōng-tè tùi I ê un-tián sù lán éng-oán ê an-ùi kap bí-hó ê ǹg-bāng,
53002017	lâi an-ùi lín ê sim, hō͘ lín ū khùi-la̍t thang chòe ta̍k hāng hó-sū, kóng ta̍k hāng hó-ōe.
53003001	Hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, goán iáu ū ōe beh kā lín kóng. Chhiáⁿ lín ūi-tio̍h goán kî-tó, hō͘ Chú ê sìn-sit ōe chhin-chhiūⁿ tī lín tiong-kan án-ni chin kín thoân-khui koh tit-tio̍h êng-kng.
53003002	Mā chhiáⁿ lín kî-kiû Siōng-tè hō͘ goán ōe-tàng thoat-lī choh-ok choh-to̍k ê lâng, in-ūi m̄-sī ta̍k ê lâng lóng ū sìn.
53003003	Chú sī khó-khò ê, I ōe hō͘ lín kian-kò͘, ōe pó-siú lín thoat-lī hit-ê Siâ-ok-chiá.
53003004	Chú hō͘ goán tùi lín ū sìn-sim, siong-sìn goán kau-tài lín ê tāi-chì, lín hiān-chāi ū teh chòe, āu-lâi mā ōe chòe.
53003005	Goān Chú ín-chhōa lín, hō͘ lín ha̍k-si̍p Siōng-tè ê thiàⁿ kap Ki-tok ê thun-lún!
53003006	Hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, goán hōng Chú Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok ê miâ bēng-lēng lín, nā ū sìn-tô͘ seng-oa̍h sàn-bān pîn-tōaⁿ, bô chun-siú goán thoân-siū hō͘ in ê kà-sī, lín tio̍h siám-khui.
53003007	Lín ka-kī mā chai lín tio̍h án-chóaⁿ o̍h goán, in-ūi goán tī lín tiong-kan ê sî bô sàn-bān pîn-tōaⁿ.
53003008	Goán m̄-bat pe̍h-chia̍h pa̍t-lâng ê pn̄g; hoán-tńg mî-ji̍t thoa-bôa lô-khó͘, chiah-bián chiâⁿ-chòe lín ê hū-tam.
53003009	Goán án-ni chòe, m̄-sī kóng goán bô koân thang iau-kiû kiong-èng, sī ài ēng goán ka-kī chòe lín ê bô͘-iūⁿ, hō͘ lín thang o̍h goán ê khoán-sit.
53003010	Goán tī lín hia ê sî bat bēng-lēng lín kóng, “M̄-khéng chòe-kang ê lâng m̄-thang chia̍h.”
53003011	Goán án-ni kóng, sī in-ūi goán ū thiaⁿ-kìⁿ lín tiong-kan ū lâng pîn-tōaⁿ m̄ chòe-kang, chí-ū ài chhap lâng ê êng-á-sū.
