53003012	Chit khoán lâng, goán hōng Chú Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok ê miâ kā in kéng-kò, bēng-lēng in tio̍h an-hūn chòe-kang, ka-kī thó-thàn.
53003013	M̄-kú, hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, chòe hó-sū m̄-thang siūⁿ-siān.
53003014	Nā ū lâng m̄ khéng ho̍k-chiông goán tī chit tiuⁿ phoe só͘ hoan-hù ê ōe, tio̍h kā i kì-teh, m̄-thang kap i lâi-óng, thang hō͘ i kám-kak kiàn-siàu;
53003015	put-kò m̄-thang kā i khòaⁿ-chòe tùi-te̍k, tio̍h khòaⁿ i chòe hiaⁿ-tī á-sī chí-bē kā i khoàn-bián.
53003016	Goān sù pêng-an ê Chú put-sî ēng ta̍k khoán hong-hoat chhin-sin sù lín pêng-an! Goān Chú kap lín tāi-ke tông-chāi!
53003017	Góa --- [Pó-lô] chhin-pit kā lín chhéng-an. Góa tī ta̍k tiuⁿ phoe lóng ū án-ni chhiam-miâ. Góa lóng án-ni siá.
53003018	Goān lán ê Chú Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok ê un-tián kap lín tāi-ke tông-chāi!
54001001	Góa sī [Pó-lô], chiàu lán ê Kiù-chú Siōng-tè kap chòe lán ǹg-bāng ê Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ ê bēng-lēng choh Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ ê sù-tô͘,
54001002	siá-phoe hō͘ [Thê-mô͘-thài], sìn-gióng siōng góa chin ê kiáⁿ. Goān Pē Siōng-tè kap lán ê Chú Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ sù lí un-tián, lîn-bín, kap pêng-an!
54001003	Góa beh khì [Má-kî-tùn] ê sî, ū khǹg lí tio̍h lâu tī [Í-hut-só͘], thang bēng-lēng chi̍t-kóa lâng m̄-thang thoân pa̍t khoán kàu-gī,
54001004	mā m̄-thang lōng-hùi cheng-sîn tī bô-iáⁿ-chiah ê thoân-soat kap lò-lò-tn̂g ê cho̍k-phó͘, in-ūi chiah-ê chí-ū ōe ín-khí piān-lūn, bōe pang-chān lâng ēng sìn liáu-kái Siōng-tè ê kè-ōe.
54001005	Chit-ê bēng-lēng ê bo̍k-te̍k sī beh tit-tio̍h jîn-ài; chit-ê jîn-ài sī tùi chheng-khì ê sim, chheng-pe̍k ê liông-sim, kap sûn-chin ê sìn sán-seng ê.
54001006	Ū lâng tùi chiah-ê phian-lī, sit-bê tī khang-hu ê tâm-lūn.
54001007	In liân ka-kī só͘ kóng só͘ chú-tiuⁿ ê to bô lí-kái, koh siūⁿ-beh choh Lu̍t-hoat kàu-su.
54001008	Lán chai, lâng nā ha̍p-hoat sú-iōng Lu̍t-hoat, Lu̍t-hoat sī hó.
54001009	Lán mā chai, Lu̍t-hoat ê chè-tēng m̄-sī ūi-tio̍h chèng-ti̍t ê lâng, sī ūi-tio̍h put-hoat kap bô sūn-ho̍k, bô kèng-khiân kap hoān-chōe, bô sèng-kiat kap tham-loân sè-sio̍k, thâi-sí lāu-pē kap thâi-sí lāu-bú, thâi-sí lâng,
54001010	îm-loān, hò͘ⁿ lâm-sek, koái-iú lâng, kóng pe̍h-chha̍t, choh gūi-chèng, á-sī ûi-hoán kiān-choân ê kàu-gī chit lūi ê lâng.
54001011	Chit-ê kiān-choân ê kàu-gī hû-ha̍p eng-kai tit-tio̍h chheng-chàn ê Siōng-tè só͘ kau-thok góa hit-ê êng-kng ê hok-im.
54001012	Góa kám-siā hō͘ góa khùi-la̍t ê lán ê Chú Ki-tok Iâ-so͘, in-ūi I khòaⁿ góa chòe thang sìn-jīm, chí-phài góa chòe chhe-ēng.
54001013	Sui-jiân í-chêng góa pòng-to̍k, pek-hāi, koh kā I bú-jio̍k, iáu-kú tit-tio̍h lîn-bín, sī in-ūi góa bī-sìn m̄-bat ê sî chiah án-ni chòe.
54001014	Lán ê Chú sù góa hong-sēng kàu móa chhut-lâi ê un-tián, hō͘ góa tit-tio̍h kap Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ kiat-liân chiah ū ê sìn kap thiàⁿ.
54001015	“Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ lîm-kàu sè-kan sī beh chín-kiù chōe-jîn” chit kù ōe thang siong-sìn, ta̍t-tit oân-choân chiap-siū. Chōe-jîn tiong góa sī tē-it pháiⁿ ê.
54001016	M̄-kú góa tit-tio̍h lîn-bín sī in-ūi Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok beh ēng góa chit-ê tē-it pháiⁿ ê lâng lâi hián-bêng Siōng-tè bû-hān ê nāi-sim, thang chòe āu-lâi sìn Iâ-so͘ lâi tit-tio̍h éng-oa̍h ê lâng ê bô͘-iūⁿ.
54001017	Goān chun-kùi, êng-kng kui tī bān-sè ê Kun-ông, éng-oán chûn-chāi, khòaⁿ bōe-tio̍h, to̍k-it bû-jī ê Siōng-tè, ti̍t-kàu éng-éng oán-oán. Amen!
54001018	Góa ê kiáⁿ [Thê-mô͘-thài] ah, chiàu í-chêng koan-hē lí só͘ kóng ê ū-giân, góa chiong chit-ê bēng-lēng kau-thok lí, hō͘ lí thang ēng chiah-ê ū-giân khì cheng-chiàn eng-kai iâⁿ ê chiàn-cheng.
54001019	Lí tio̍h chhî-siú sìn-sim kap chheng-pe̍k ê liông-sim. Ū chi̍t-kóa lâng pàng-sak liông-sim, tì-kàu sìn-sim chhin-chhiūⁿ chûn khò-chhián,
54001020	kî-tiong ū [Hú-bí-nái] kap [A-le̍k-san-tāi]; góa í-keng chiong in kau hō͘ Sat-tàn, hō͘ in siū kà-sī bô koh pòng-to̍k Siōng-tè.
54002001	Só͘-í, tē-it, góa khoàn-bián lí tio̍h ūi-tio̍h só͘-ū ê lâng, kun-ông, kap lóng-chóng ê koaⁿ-oân khún-kiû, kî-tó, tāi-tó, kám-un, hō͘ lán thang kè pêng-chēng an-jiân ê seng-oa̍h, hoān-sū kèng-khiân, toan-chèng.
54002003	Án-ni chòe sī eng-kai, sī lán ê Kiù-chú Siōng-tè hoaⁿ-hí chiap-la̍p ê.
54002004	I ài chèng-lâng tit-kiù, ta̍t-kàu jīm-sek chin-lí.
54002005	In-ūi Siōng-tè sī chi̍t ūi, Siōng-tè kap lâng tiong-kan ê tiong-kan-jîn mā-sī chi̍t ūi, chiū-sī choh-lâng ê Ki-tok Iâ-so͘.
54002006	I hiàn pún-sin lâi sio̍k-hôe chèng-lâng, chit hāng sū tī tú-hó ê sî-ki ū tit-tio̍h chèng-si̍t.
54002007	Ūi-tio̍h án-ni, góa siū jīm-bēng chòe thoân-tō-chiá, sù-tô͘, kap Gōa-pang-lâng ê kàu-su, hō͘ in siong-sìn Siōng-tè jīm-sek chin-lí. Góa sī teh kóng chin ê, m̄-sī kóng ké ê.
54002008	Tī ta̍k só͘-chāi ê chū-hōe, góa ài ta-po͘-lâng bô siū-khì, bô cheng-lūn, gia̍h-khí sèng-kiat ê chhiú kî-tó.
54002009	Góa mā ài hū-jîn-lâng chhēng-chhah phok-sò͘ chéng-chôe, m̄-thang ēng kî-hêng koài-chōng ê thâu-mn̂g-hêng, kim-khì, chu-pó, á-sī chin kùi ê saⁿ chng-thāⁿ ka-kī;
54002010	tio̍h ēng hó hêng-ûi chòe chng-thāⁿ, piáu-sī ka-kī sī kèng-ùi Siōng-tè ê hū-jîn-lâng.
54002011	Hū-jîn-lâng tio̍h tiām-tiām-á o̍h, ēng sūn-chiông ê sim sū-sū sūn-ho̍k.
54002012	Góa m̄-chún hū-jîn-lâng kà-sī á-sī koán-hat ta-po͘-lâng; i tio̍h chēng-chēng.
54002013	In-ūi [A-tong] tāi-seng siū chō, āu-lâi chiah [Hā-oa].
54002014	Koh [A-tong] bô siū iú-he̍k, m̄-kú hū-jîn-lâng siū iú-he̍k hām-lo̍h chōe.
54002015	Put-kò hū-jîn-lâng nā an-hūn siú-kí, chhî-siú sìn-gióng, jîn-ài, kap sèng-kiat, chiū ōe in-ūi siⁿ-kiáⁿ tit-tio̍h kiù.
54003001	Chit kù ōe thang siong-sìn: Nā ū lâng ài choh kam-tok, i sī him-bō͘ hó ê kang.
54003002	Só͘-í, kam-tok tio̍h bô thang hiâm, chí-ū chi̍t ê bó͘, an-hūn siú-kí, chū-chè, toan-chèng, gâu khoán-thāi chhut-gōa-lâng, gâu kà-sī;
54003003	bô chiú-chùi, bô hiong-pō, hoán-tńg ài un-hô, bô saⁿ-chiⁿ, bô tham-châi,
54003004	gâu koán-lí ka-kī ê ka-têng, kiáⁿ-jî ū sūn-ho̍k, sū-sū toan-chong.
54003005	In-ūi lâng nā bōe-hiáu koán-lí ka-kī ê ka-têng, ná ōe-hiáu koàn-kò͘ Siōng-tè ê kàu-hōe?
54003006	Chho͘-sìn-chiá m̄-thang hō͘ i tam-jīm kam-tok, chiah bōe chū-ko chū-tāi, hām-lo̍h kap Mô͘-kúi só͘ siū kâng-khoán ê sím-phòaⁿ.
54003007	I tī kàu-hōe gōa mā tio̍h ū hó kiàn-chèng, chiah-bián siū húi-pòng, hām-lo̍h Mô͘-kúi ê lô-bāng.
54003008	Chip-sū siâng-khoán mā tio̍h toan-chong, bô siang-bīn-ōe, bô hò͘ⁿ-chiú, bô tham châi-lī,
54003009	tio̍h ēng chheng-khì ê liông-sim kò͘-siú sìn-gióng ê ò-pì.
54003010	Chit khoán lâng mā tio̍h seng hō͘ in chiap-siū khó-giām, nā bô thang hiâm chiah hō͘ in tam-jīm chip-sū.
54003011	Lú chip-sū mā-sī tio̍h toan-chong, bô tiòng-siong pa̍t-lâng, an-hūn siú-kí, sū-sū tiong-si̍t.
54003012	Chip-sū eng-kai chí-ū chi̍t ê bó͘, gâu koán-lí kiáⁿ-jî kap ka-kī ê ka-têng.
54003013	Chip-sū ê kang-chok nā chòe ōe hó, pún-sin ōe tit-tio̍h hó miâ-siaⁿ, mā thang chin hó-táⁿ káng-lūn in tùi Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ ê sìn-gióng.
54003014	Góa ǹg-bāng chin kín chiū ōe khì lí hia, m̄-kú kiaⁿ-liáu khah bān kàu, góa seng siá chit tiuⁿ phoe hō͘ lí chai lán tī Siōng-tè ê ke tio̍h án-chóaⁿ seng-oa̍h; chit-ê ke chiū-sī chin-oa̍h Siōng-tè ê kàu-hōe, iā chiū-sī chin-lí ê thiāu-chio̍h kap tōe-ki.
54003016	Tāi-ke lóng soan-jīn lán sìn-gióng ê ò-pì sī jōa-ni̍h tōa: Ki-tok hián-hiān chòe lâng, hō͘ Sèng Sîn jīn-tēng chòe tio̍h, chhut-hiān hō͘ thiⁿ-sài khòaⁿ, siū soan-iông tī bān-pang, hō͘ sè-kan-lâng siong-sìn, siū chiap-la̍p ji̍p êng-iāu.
54004001	Sèng Sîn bêng-bêng kóng, tī āu-lâi ê sî-kî ū chi̍t-kóa lâng ōe pōe-sìn, khì thàn bê-he̍k lâng ê siâ-lêng kap kúi-sîn ê kà-sī.
54004002	Chit khoán ê kà-sī sī tùi khi-phiàn ê lâng ê pe̍h-chha̍t lâi ê, in ê liông-sim í-keng hō͘ Mô͘-kúi ēng jia̍t ê thih-ìn kā in ù kì-hō kui-sio̍k Mô͘-kúi.
54004003	In kìm-chí kè-chhōa, kìm-kài chi̍t-kóa chia̍h-mi̍h, chiū-sī Siōng-tè chhòng-chō beh hō͘ sìn koh bêng-pe̍k chin-lí ê lâng ēng kám-siā lâi niá-siū ê.
54004004	In-ūi Siōng-tè it-chhè ê chhòng-chō lóng sī hó, nā ēng kám-siā lâi niá-siū, chiū bô pòaⁿ-hāng thang kū-choa̍t;
54004005	thong-kè Siōng-tè ê ōe kap lâng ê kî-tó chiū chiâⁿ-chòe sèng.
54004006	Lí nā chiong chiah-ê sū kà-sī hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, chiū ōe tùi só͘ sìn ê tō-lí kap só͘ sūn-thàn kiān-choân ê kà-sī tit-tio̍h pôe-iúⁿ, chiâⁿ-chòe Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ ê hó chhe-ēng.
54004007	Tio̍h kū-choa̍t chho͘-sio̍k kap khong-tōng bô-iáⁿ-chiah ê thoân-soat. Ūi-tio̍h kèng-khiân ê seng-oa̍h, tio̍h kè-sio̍k chhau-liān ka-kī.
54004008	Chhau-liān seng-khu ū tām-po̍h lī-ek, m̄-kú kèng-khiân tùi ta̍k hāng lóng ū lī-ek, in-ūi ū èng-ún thang tit-tio̍h hiān-kim kap lâi-sè ê oa̍h-miā.
54004009	Chit kù ōe thang siong-sìn, ta̍t-tit oân-choân chiap-siū.
54004010	Ūi-tio̍h chit-ê, lán chhut-la̍t tio̍h-bôa, in-ūi lán ê ǹg-bāng chāi-tī chin-oa̍h ê Siōng-tè, I sī chèng-lâng, te̍k-pia̍t sī sìn ê lâng ê Kiù-chú.
54004011	Lí tio̍h chiong chiah-ê tāi-chì kā in khoàn-bián kap kà-sī.
54004012	M̄-thang in-ūi lí ê siàu-liân hō͘ lâng khòaⁿ-khin; tio̍h tī kóng-ōe, kiâⁿ-chòe, thiàⁿ-sim, sìn-sim, sûn-kiat, chòe sìn-tô͘ ê bô͘-hoān.
54004013	Tio̍h tì-ì soan-tho̍k Sèng-keng, khoàn-bián, kap kà-sī, ti̍t-kàu góa lâi.
54004014	M̄-thang hut-lio̍k lí só͘ niá-siū sio̍k-lêng ê un-sù, chiū-sī thong-kè sian-ti ê sìn-sit kap tiúⁿ-ló-thoân ê àn-chhiú sù hō͘ lí ê.
54004015	Chiah-ê tāi-chì, lí tio̍h choan-sim tì-ì khì chòe, hō͘ chèng-lâng thang khòaⁿ-tio̍h lí ê chìn-pō͘.
54004016	Lí ka-kī tio̍h kín-sīn, lí ê kà-sī mā tio̍h kín-sīn; chiah-ê tāi-chì tio̍h kian-chhî khì chòe, án-ni chòe ōe kiù lí pún-sin kap thiaⁿ-thàn lí ê lâng.
54005001	M̄-thang chek-pī lāu-lâng, tio̍h chhin-chhiūⁿ khǹg lāu-pē án-ni kā i khǹg; tio̍h chhin-chhiūⁿ khǹg hiaⁿ-tī án-ni khǹg siàu-liân-lâng;
54005002	tio̍h chhin-chhiūⁿ khoán-thāi lāu-bú án-ni khoán-thāi lāu hū-jîn-lâng; tio̍h chhin-chhiūⁿ khoán-thāi chí-bē án-ni ēng oân-choân sûn-kiat ê sim khoán-thāi siàu-liân ê hū-jîn-lâng.
54005003	Tio̍h chun-tiōng chin-chiàⁿ bô i-óa ê kóaⁿ-hū.
54005004	Kóaⁿ-hū ū kiáⁿ-jî-sun, chiah-ê kiáⁿ-jî-sun tio̍h tāi-seng tī ka-kī ê ka-têng ha̍k-si̍p hàu-sūn ê pún-hūn, lâi pò-tap in ê sī-tōa-lâng, in-ūi che sī Siōng-tè só͘ hoaⁿ-hí ê.
54005005	Chin-chiàⁿ bô-i bô-óa ê kóaⁿ-hū, chí-ū gióng-bōng Siōng-tè, mî-ji̍t kè-sio̍k khún-kiû kî-tó.
54005006	M̄-kú chhia-hoa ê kóaⁿ-hū, sui-jiân teh oa̍h, kî-si̍t sī sí.
54005007	Lí tio̍h chiong chiah-ê kā in kà-sī, in chiah bōe siū chek-pī.
54005008	Nā ū lâng bô chiàu-kò͘ chhin-chhek, te̍k-pia̍t sī bô chiàu-kò͘ ka-kī chhù-lāi ê lâng, i í-keng pōe-poān sìn-gióng, pí bô-sìn ê lâng koh-khah hāi.
54005009	Kóaⁿ-hū tio̍h chhiau-kè la̍k-cha̍p hè chiah thang teng-kì; i tio̍h chí-ū kiat-hun chi̍t piàn,
54005010	tio̍h ū chòe hó-sū ê chèng-kù, chhin-chhiūⁿ ióng-io̍k kiáⁿ-jî, chiap-thāi chhut-gōa-lâng, kā sìn-tô͘ sóe-kha, pang-chān tú-tio̍h hoān-lān ê lâng, choan-sim chòe ta̍k hāng hó-sū.
54005011	M̄-kú siàu-liân ê kóaⁿ-hū m̄-thang kā in teng-kì; in-ūi in chêng-io̍k chi̍t-ē chhiong-tōng lī-khui Ki-tok, chiū siūⁿ-beh kè,
54005012	ûi-pōe tong-chho͘ só͘ hē ê goān, tì-kàu ka-kī chhú-chōe.
54005013	Koh in o̍h pîn-tōaⁿ, chi̍t-ke kè chi̍t-ke se̍h thàu-thàu; m̄-nā pîn-tōaⁿ, mā ài kóng lâng ê sī-hui, ài chhap êng-á-sū, kóng m̄ eng-kai kóng ê ōe.
54005014	Só͘-í góa ài siàu-liân ê kóaⁿ-hū koh-kè, siⁿ-kiáⁿ, liāu-lí ka-kī ê ka-têng, chiah bōe hō͘ tùi-te̍k ū ki-hōe thang kóng lán ê pháiⁿ-ōe;
54005015	in-ūi ū chi̍t-kóa kóaⁿ-hū í-keng lī-khui, khì tè Sat-tàn.
54005016	Sìn Chú ê hū-jîn-lâng chhù-lāi nā ū kóaⁿ-hū, tio̍h ka-kī kā in chiàu-kò͘, m̄-thang chiong chit-ê tàⁿ sak hō͘ kàu-hōe, kàu-hōe chiah ōe-tàng chiàu-kò͘ hiah-ê chin-chiàⁿ bô i-óa ê kóaⁿ-hū.
54005017	Gâu tī-lí kàu-hōe ê tiúⁿ-ló eng-kai tit-tio̍h ka-pē ê pò-siû, te̍k-pia̍t chīn-la̍t tī káng-tō kap kà-sī ê koh-khah tio̍h án-ni,
54005018	in-ūi Sèng-keng kóng, “Teh thoa chio̍h-bō ê gû m̄-thang kā i kòa gû-chhùi-lam”; koh kóng, “Kang-lâng eng-kai tit-tio̍h kang-chîⁿ.”
54005019	Khòng-kò tiúⁿ-ló ê àn-kiāⁿ, nā m̄-sī ū nn̄g ê á-sī saⁿ ê chèng-jîn, m̄-thang siū-lí.
54005020	Kè-sio̍k hoān-chōe ê lâng tio̍h tī chèng-lâng ê bīn-chêng kā in khiàn-chek, hō͘ kî-tha ê lâng tit-tio̍h kéng-kài.
54005021	Góa tī Siōng-tè, Ki-tok Iâ-so͘, kap siū soán ê thiⁿ-sài ê bīn-chêng bēng-lēng lí, tio̍h chun-siú chiah-ê chí-sī, m̄-thang ū sêng-kiàn, bô-lūn chòe sím-mi̍h to m̄-thang phian-sim.
54005022	M̄-thang sûi-piān kā lâng kiâⁿ àn-chhiú-lé. M̄-thang chham-ú pa̍t-lâng ê chōe; tio̍h pó-siú ka-kī sûn-kiat.
54005023	In-ūi lí ê ūi bô hó, siông-siông phòa-pīⁿ, m̄-thang kan-ta lim chúi, mā tio̍h lim tām-po̍h chiú.
54005024	Ū chi̍t-kóa lâng ê chōe chin bêng-hián, iáu-bē sím-phòaⁿ chiū chin chheng-chhó; ū-ê lâng ê chōe āu-lâi chiah hián-lō͘.
54005025	Chhin-chhiūⁿ án-ni, hó hêng-ûi mā chin bêng-hián, bô bêng-hián ê, mā khàm bōe-tiâu.
54006001	Tī lâng ê koán-hat-ē chòe lô͘-lē-ê, tio̍h khòaⁿ ka-kī ê chú-lâng chòe kham-tit siū chhiong-hun ê chun-kèng, Siōng-tè ê miâ kap tō-lí chiah bōe siū húi-pòng.
54006002	Chú-lâng nā-sī sìn Chú ê, m̄-thang in-ūi in sī Chú-lāi ê hiaⁿ-tī chiū bô kā in chun-kèng; kì-jiân tùi lô͘-lē ê ho̍k-sāi lâi tit-tio̍h lī-ek ê chú-lâng sī sìn-tô͘, mā-sī só͘ kèng-ài ê lâng, lín koh-khah tio̍h un-khûn kā in ho̍k-sāi. Lí tio̍h ēng chiah-ê sū lâi kà-sī kap khoàn-bián:
54006003	Nā ū lâng kà pa̍t khoán kàu-gī bô hû-ha̍p lán ê Chú Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok kiān-choân ê tō-lí, bô kun-kù khiân-sêng ê kàu-gī,
54006004	chiū-sī phòng-hong chū-tāi, oân-choân bû-ti, hò͘ⁿ piān-lūn, ài tī jī-bīn siōng cheng-lūn; tùi chiah-ê ín-khí chi̍t-tò͘, hun-cheng, húi-pòng, chhai-gî,
54006005	tì-kàu sim-su pāi-hoāi, sòng-sit chin-lí, hun-cheng bô thêng; in siūⁿ-kóng chong-kàu sī thàn-chîⁿ ê chhiú-tōaⁿ.
54006006	Chong-kàu khak-si̍t ōe hō͘ ti-chiok ê lâng tit-tio̍h tōa lī-ek.
54006007	Seng put tài-lâi, sú put tài-khì;
54006008	ū thang chia̍h, ū thang chhēng, ū chiah-ê lán chiū ti-chiok.
54006009	Siūⁿ-beh hoat-châi ê lâng ōe hām-lo̍h iú-he̍k, hām-chíⁿ, kap chin chōe khoán gû-gōng iú-hāi ê io̍k-bōng, hō͘ lâng tîm-lûn tì-kàu pāi-hoāi kap húi-bia̍t.
54006010	In-ūi tham-châi sī bān-ok ê kun-goân; ū lâng tham-ài chîⁿ-châi, siū bê phian-lī sìn-gióng, ka-kī siū-chīn khó͘-thàng.
54006011	M̄-kú lí chit-ê sio̍k Siōng-tè ê lâng, tio̍h siám-pī chiah-ê sū. Tio̍h tui-kiû chèng-gī, kèng-khiân, sìn-sim, jîn-ài, nāi-sim, kap un-jiû.
54006012	Sìn-gióng bí-hó ê kèng-sài tio̍h chīn-la̍t khì piàⁿ; tio̍h khak-pó éng-oán ê oa̍h-miā; ūi-tio̍h chit-ê oa̍h-miā lí ū siū kéng-tiàu, tī chin chōe kiàn-chèng-jîn ê bīn-chêng soan-jīn bí-hó ê sìn-gióng.
54006013	Tī sù oa̍h-miā hō͘ bān-mi̍h ê Siōng-tè, kap tùi [Pâng-siu] [Pí-lia̍p-to] soan-jīn bí-hó sìn-gióng ê Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ bīn-chêng,
54006014	góa hoan-hù lí tio̍h chun-siú só͘ niá-siū ê bēng-lēng, bô khoat-tiám, bô thang hiâm, ti̍t-kàu lán ê Chú Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok hián-hiān ê sî.
54006015	Tī sî-ki sêng-se̍k ê sî, hit-ūi eng-kai siū o-ló to̍k-it bû-jī ê Chú-cháiⁿ, bān ông ê Ông, bān chú ê Chú Siōng-tè, beh hō͘ I hián-hiān.
54006016	Siōng-tè sī to̍k-it bōe-sí, tiàm tī lâng bōe thang chiap-kūn ê kng-bêng tiong; bô-lâng bat khòaⁿ-kìⁿ I, mā bô-lâng ōe-tàng khòaⁿ-kìⁿ I. Goān chun-kùi kap éng-oán ê chú-koân kui tī I. Amen!
54006017	Tùi hiah-ê kim-sè hó-gia̍h ê lâng, lí tio̍h hoan-hù in m̄-thang kiau-ngō͘, m̄-thang chiong in ê ǹg-bāng khǹg tī bōe óa-khò-tit ê châi-bu̍t, tio̍h óa-khò chiong bān-mi̍h hong-hong hù-hù hō͘ lán ta̍k ê lâng hióng-siū ê Siōng-tè.
54006018	Tio̍h hoan-hù in chòe hó-sū, chòe chin chōe hó-sū, khóng-khài si-sià, kap lâng hun-hióng.
54006019	Án-ni chòe sī teh ūi ka-kī ê chiong-lâi khí-chō kian-kò͘ ê tōe-ki, pá-ak chin-chiàⁿ ê oa̍h-miā.
54006020	[Thê-mô͘-thài], tio̍h chhî-siú Siōng-tè kau-thok lí ê chit-chek. Tio̍h siám-pī bô kèng-khiân ê khong-tâm kap ké tì-sek ê cheng-lūn.
54006021	Ū lâng chū-chheng ū chit khoán tì-sek, tì-kàu sìn-gióng sit-lo̍h bo̍k-phiau. Goān Siōng-tè ê un-tián kap lín tông-chāi!
55001001	Góa sī [Pó-lô], hōng Siōng-tè ê chí-ì choh Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ ê sù-tô͘, lâi thoân Siōng-tè só͘ èng-ún in-ūi kap Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ kiat-liân chiah ū ê oa̍h-miā.
55001002	Góa siá-phoe hō͘ góa só͘ thiàⁿ ê kiáⁿ [Thê-mô͘-thài]. Goān Pē Siōng-tè kap lán ê Chú Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ sù lí un-tián, lîn-bín, kap pêng-an!
55001003	Góa kám-siā góa kap lia̍t-chó͘ kâng-khoán ēng chheng-khì ê liông-sim kèng-pài ê Siōng-tè. Góa mî-ji̍t kî-tó ê sî siàu-liām lí bô-soah.
55001004	Góa siūⁿ-tio̍h lī-pia̍t ê sî lí teh lâu ba̍k-sái, chiū chin ài kìⁿ lí, thang hō͘ góa chhiong-móa hoaⁿ-hí.
55001005	Góa kì-tit lí ū sûn-chin ê sìn-sim; chit-ê sìn-sim lí ê gōa-má [Lô-í] kap lí ê lāu-bú [Iú-nî-ki] seng ū, góa siong-sìn hiān-chāi lí mā ū.
55001006	In-ūi án-ni, góa thê-chhíⁿ lí, góa kā lí àn-chhiú ê sî Siōng-tè hō͘ lí ê un-sù, tio̍h hō͘ i chhin-chhiūⁿ hé koh to̍h khí-lâi.
55001007	In-ūi Siōng-tè hō͘ lán ê m̄-sī kiaⁿ-hiâⁿ ê sim-lêng, sī khùi-la̍t, jîn-ài, kap chū-chè ê sim-lêng.
55001008	Só͘-í, ūi-tio̍h lán ê Chú chòe kiàn-chèng m̄-thang kám-kak kiàn-siàu, mā m̄-thang in-ūi góa ūi-tio̍h Chú chòe siû-hoān lâi kám-kak kiàn-siàu; tio̍h chiàu Siōng-tè só͘ sù ê khùi-la̍t ūi-tio̍h hok-im kap góa chòe-hé siū-khó͘.
55001009	Siōng-tè kiù lán, kéng-tiàu lán chòe I ka-kī ê chú-bîn, m̄-sī kun-kù lán ê hêng-ûi, sī chiàu I ka-kī ê chí-ì kap un-tián. Chit-ê un-tián tī bān-sè í-chêng thong-kè Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ sù hō͘ lán;
55001010	chit-ê un-tián hiān-chāi thong-kè lán ê Kiù-chú Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ ê hián-hiān í-keng si̍t-hiān. Ki-tok í-keng húi-bia̍t sí-bông, koh thong-kè hok-im chiong bōe pāi-hoāi ê oa̍h-miā hián-bêng chhut-lâi.
55001011	Ūi-tio̍h chit-ê hok-im, Siōng-tè jīm-bēng góa chòe thoân-tō-chiá, sù-tô͘, kap kàu-su.
55001012	Só͘-í góa chiah teh siū-khó͘. Chóng-sī góa bô kám-kak kiàn-siàu, in-ūi góa bat góa só͘ sìn ê Siōng-tè, mā chhim-sìn I ōe pó-siú I só͘ kau-thok góa ê ti̍t-kàu hit-ê Ji̍t.
55001013	Tio̍h ēng lí tùi góa thiaⁿ-tio̍h hiah-ê kiān-choân ê tō-lí chòe bô͘-iūⁿ, kian-chhî lán kap Ki-tok kiat-liân lâi tit-tio̍h ê sìn-sim kap jîn-ài.
55001014	Tio̍h kò͘-siú thong-kè tiàm tī lán lāi-bīn ê Sèng Sîn kau-thok hō͘ lí ê hó-mi̍h.
55001015	Lí chai, tī [A-se-a] ê lâng lóng pōe-poān góa, kî-tiong ū [Hui-kiat-lō͘] kap [Hek-mô͘-kî-nî].
55001016	Goān Chú lîn-bín [O-nî-sek-hut] chi̍t ke ê lâng, in-ūi i siông-siông kā góa kó͘-lē, bô in-ūi góa kòa thih-liān kám-kak kiàn-siàu,
55001017	tian-tò kàu [Lô-má] ê sî chiū phah-piàⁿ chhē góa chhē kàu tio̍h.
55001018	Goān Chú hō͘ i tī hit-ê Ji̍t tit-tio̍h lîn-bín! I tī [Í-hut-só͘] hiah-ni̍h gâu ho̍k-sāi góa, lí chin chheng-chhó.
55002001	Só͘-í, góa ê kiáⁿ ah, lí tio̍h khò Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ ê un-tián kian-kiông khí-lâi.
55002002	Lí tī chin chōe kiàn-chèng-jîn bīn-chêng tùi góa thiaⁿ-tio̍h chiah-ê kà-sī, tio̍h kau-thok hō͘ hiah-ê tiong-si̍t, mā ōe kham-tit kà-sī pa̍t-lâng ê lâng.
55002003	Lí tio̍h choh Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ ê cheng-peng kap góa chòe-hé siū-khó͘.
55002004	Ho̍k-ia̍h ê peng nā beh hō͘ koaⁿ-tiúⁿ hoaⁿ-hí, chiū m̄-thang hō͘ seng-oa̍h ê tāi-chì tîⁿ-kha pòaⁿ-chhiú.
55002005	Ūn-tōng-oân nā bô chiàu kui-chek pí-sài chiū bōe tit-tio̍h koan-kun ê hoa-koan.
55002006	Kut-la̍t chèng-choh ê lông-hu tong-jiân seng siu-sêng.
55002007	Góa só͘ kóng ê ōe lí tio̍h hó-hó-á siūⁿ, in-ūi Chú ōe hō͘ lí liáu-kái ta̍k hāng tāi-chì.
55002008	Tio̍h kì-tit Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok, I sī [Tāi-pi̍t] ê hō͘-tāi, Siōng-tè hō͘ I tùi sí-lâng tiong koh-oa̍h; che sī góa só͘ thoân ê hok-im.
55002009	Góa ūi-tio̍h chit-ê hok-im siū-khó͘, sīm-chì chhin-chhiūⁿ hoān-lâng hō͘ lâng ēng kha-khàu khàu-teh; m̄-kú Siōng-tè ê ōe bô siū khàu.
55002010	Só͘-í, góa ūi-tio̍h Siōng-tè só͘ kéng-soán ê lâng jím-siū it-chhè, hō͘ in mā ōe tit-tio̍h Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ ê chín-kiù kap éng-oán ê êng-kng.
55002011	Chit kù ōe thang siong-sìn: Lán nā kap I tâng-sí, mā ōe kap I tâng-oa̍h.
55002012	Lán nā thun-lún, mā ōe kap I chòe-hé chiáng-koân. Lán nā m̄-jīn I, I mā ōe m̄-jīn lán.
55002013	Lán nā sit sìn, I iû-goân sìn-si̍t, in-ūi I bōe-tàng ûi-pōe ka-kī.
55002014	Lí tio̍h thê-chhíⁿ tāi-ke, tī Chú ê bīn-chêng bēng-lēng in m̄-thang ūi-tio̍h giân-sû cheng-piān; án-ni chòe bô lī-ek, ōe hō͘ thiaⁿ ê lâng tì-kàu pāi-hoāi.
55002015	Tio̍h chīn-la̍t chòe, thang hō͘ Siōng-tè khòaⁿ-chòe khó-chhú, bô kiàn-siàu ê kang-lâng, chèng-khak kóe-seh chin-lí ê tō.
55002016	Tio̍h siám-pī chho͘-sio̍k bô lō͘-ēng ê ōe, in-ūi chit khoán tāi-chì ōe hō͘ lâng ná bô kèng-khiân,
55002017	chit khoán ê ōe ōe chhin-chhiūⁿ to̍k-chhng thòaⁿ-khui. [Hú-bí-nái] kap [Hui-lí-tô͘] mā-sī chit khoán lâng;
55002018	in í-keng lī-khui chin-lí, kóng koh-oa̍h ê sū í-keng kè-khì, tì-kàu chi̍t-kóa lâng ê sìn-gióng oân-choân tó-hoāi.
55002019	Siōng-tè ê tōe-ki kian-kò͘ bōe iô-tāng, téng-bīn ū khek jī kóng: “Chú bat sio̍k I ê lâng”, koh kóng: “Kiû-kiò Chú ê miâ ê lâng lóng tio̍h lī-khui put-gī.”
55002020	Tī tōa keng chhù-lāi, m̄-nā ū kim kap gûn, mā ū chhâ kap hûi ê khì-khū; ū ê chòe iù ê, ū ê chòe chho͘ ê lō͘-ēng.
55002021	Lâng nā kiat-chēng ka-kī, lī-khui chiah-ê chho͘-sio̍k ê sū, chiū ōe chiâⁿ-chòe kùi-khì ê khì-khū, sèng-hòa hō͘ Chú-lâng ēng, thang chún-pī hó-sè chòe ta̍k hāng hó-sū.
55002022	Tio̍h siám-pī siàu-liân lâng ê chêng-io̍k; tio̍h kap ēng chheng-khì ê sim kiû-kiò Chú ê lâng chòe-hé tui-kiû kong-gī, sìn-gióng, jîn-ài, kap hô-pêng.
55002023	M̄-thang ū gû-gōng bû-ti ê piān-lūn; lí chai chiah-ê tāi-chì ōe ín-khí oan-ke.
55002024	Chú ê lô͘-po̍k bô eng-kai oan-ke, tio̍h un-hô tùi-thāi chèng-lâng, gâu kà-sī, gâu jím-siū,
55002025	un-jiû khoàn-kài hoán-tùi-chiá, kiám-chhái Siōng-tè ōe hō͘ in hóe-kái, bat chin-lí.
55002026	Án-ni in sui-jiân í-keng hō͘ Mô͘-kúi lia̍h-khì sūn-thàn i ê ì-sù, mā iáu ōe chhíⁿ-ngō͘ lâi thoat-lī i ê lô-bāng.
55003001	Tio̍h chai, sè-kài ê boa̍t-kî kàu ê sî ōe ū chióng-chióng ê khó͘-lān.
55003002	Hit sî, lâng ōe chū-su, tham-châi, khoa-kháu, kiau-ngō͘, húi-pòng, ngó͘-ge̍k pē-bú, bông-un pōe-gī, bô sèng-kiat,
55003003	bô chhin-chêng, chân-jím, tiòng-siong, hêng-ge̍k, hiong-pō, oàn-hūn hó,
55003004	kan-kúi, lām-sám chòe, chū-ko chū-tāi, ài hióng-lo̍k iâⁿ-kè thiàⁿ Siōng-tè,
55003005	ū kèng-khiân ê gōa-māu khiok bô kèng-khiân ê si̍t-chit. Lí tio̍h siám-pī chit khoán lâng.
55003006	In tiong-kan ū lâng chhim-ji̍p lâng ê chhù, khòng-chè ì-chì po̍k-jio̍k ê hū-lú. Chiah-ê hū-lú siū chōe-ok kap ta̍k khoán ê chêng-io̍k chi-phòe;
55003007	in put-sî to teh o̍h, khiok bô hoat-tō͘ bêng-pe̍k chin-lí.
55003008	Chhin-chhiūⁿ chá-chêng [Ngá-nî] kap [Iông-pò͘-lûi] hoán-tùi [Mô͘-se], hiān-chāi chiah-ê lâng mā án-ni hoán-tùi chin-lí, tì-kàu sim-chì pāi-hoāi, sìn-gióng bô sûn-chin.
55003009	M̄-kú chiah-ê lâng, chhin-chhiūⁿ hit nn̄g ê lâng, bōe ū sím-mi̍h éng-hióng, in-ūi in ê gû-gōng ōe tī chèng-lâng ê bīn-chêng po̍k-lō͘.
55003010	Lí ū o̍h góa só͘ kà-sī ê, góa ê chòe-lâng, seng-oa̍h ê bo̍k-phiau, sìn-sim, khoan-iông, thiàⁿ-sim, kian-jím,
55003011	í-ki̍p só͘ siū ê pek-hāi kap khó͘-lān, chiah-ê lín lóng chai, chiū-sī góa tī [An-thê-o], [Í-ko-liām], kap [Lō͘-sū-tek] só͘ tú-tio̍h ê pek-hāi, góa án-chóaⁿ teh jím-siū; m̄-kú Chú ū kiù góa thoat-lī chiah-ê.
55003012	Só͘-ū ài-beh kap Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ kiat-liân kè kèng-khiân seng-oa̍h ê lâng, it-tēng ōe tú-tio̍h pek-hāi.
55003013	Put-kò pháiⁿ-lâng kap khi-phiàn-lâng-ê ōe ná lâi ná pháiⁿ, in phiàn lâng, ka-kī mā hō͘ lâng phiàn.
55003014	Chóng-sī lí tio̍h chhî-siú só͘ ha̍k-si̍p só͘ chhim-sìn ê tō-lí, in-ūi lí chai chiah-ê sī tùi sím-mi̍h lâng ha̍k-si̍p ê.
55003015	Lí mā chai lí tùi sòe-hàn chiū bêng-pe̍k Sèng-keng, chit-ê Sèng-keng ōe-tàng hō͘ lí ū tì-hūi thang thong-kè sìn Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ tit-tio̍h chín-kiù.
55003016	Choân-pō͘ Sèng-keng sī siū Siōng-tè ê lêng-kám siá ê, tùi kàu-tō, tùi tok-chek, tùi kiù-chèng, tùi hùn-liān lâng kiâⁿ chiàⁿ-lō͘, lóng ū lī-ek,
55003017	hō͘ ho̍k-sāi Siōng-tè ê lâng chong-pī hó-sè, thang chòe ta̍k hāng hó-sū.
55004001	Tī Siōng-tè kap teh-beh sím-phòaⁿ só͘-ū oa̍h-lâng kap sí-lâng ê Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ ê bīn-chêng, koh in-ūi Ki-tok beh hián-hiān lâi choh-ông, góa sīn-tiōng hoan-hù lí:
55004002	Tio̍h thoân tō-lí, bô-lūn tio̍h-sî bô tio̍h-sî lóng tio̍h kian-chhî khì thoân; tio̍h ēng chòe-tōa ê nāi-sim kàu-tō, lâi khoàn-bián, tok-chek, kap kó͘-lē.
55004003	In-ūi sî-ki teh-beh kàu, hit sî lâng thiaⁿ bōe-lo̍h kiān-choân ê kà-sī; hoán-tńg thàn ka-kī ê su-io̍k, chi̍t ê koh chi̍t ê phèng-chhiáⁿ sian-siⁿ lâi boán-chiok hīⁿ-khang chiūⁿ ài thiaⁿ kah-ì thiaⁿ ê kà-sī.
55004004	In ng hīⁿ-khang m̄-thiaⁿ chin-lí, tian-tò ài thiaⁿ bô-iáⁿ-chiah ê thoân-soat.
55004005	Lí hoān-sū tio̍h kín-sīn, jím-siū khó͘-lān, chòe thoân-tō-chiá ê kang-chok, chīn lí chòe Siōng-tè chhe-ēng ê pún-hūn.
55004006	Taⁿ góa hi-seng ka-kī hiàn hō͘ Siōng-tè ê sî kàu lah; chit-chūn chiū-sī góa lī-khui sè-kan ê sî.
55004007	Tio̍h cheng-piàⁿ ê góa í-keng piàⁿ liáu; tio̍h pháu-cháu ê lō͘-thêng góa í-keng cháu oân; tio̍h chhî-siú ê sìn-gióng góa í-keng kian-siú.
55004008	Gī ê hoa-koan hiān-chāi í-keng kā góa chún-pī hó-sè, Chú --- kong-gī ê Sím-phòaⁿ-chiá tī hit-ê Ji̍t beh hō͘ góa; m̄-nā hō͘ góa, mā beh hō͘ lóng-chóng him-bō͘ I hián-hiān ê lâng.
55004009	Lí tio̍h chīn-só͘-ōe kóaⁿ-kín lâi góa chia;
55004010	in-ūi [Tí-má] tham-ài hiān-sè, í-keng lī-khui góa khì [Thiap-sat-lô͘-nî-ka]; [Kek-le̍k-sū] mā í-keng khì [Ka-lia̍p-thài], [Thê-to] khì [That-má-thài].
55004011	Chí-ū [Lō͘-ka] kap góa chòe-hé tī chia. Lí tio̍h khì chhōa [Má-khó] kap lí chòe-hé lâi, in-ūi i tùi góa ê kang-chok chin ū pang-chān.
55004012	Góa í-keng phài [Chhui-ki-kó͘] khì [Í-hut-só͘].
55004013	Góa tī [Te̍k-lô-a] ê sî lâu tī [Ka-pò͘] in tau hit niá gōa-saⁿ, lí beh lâi ê sî tio̍h tòa lâi, mā tio̍h tòa hiah-ê chheh lâi, te̍k-pia̍t sī hiah-ê iûⁿ-phê ê chheh.
55004014	Phah-tâng-sai-hū [A-le̍k-san-tāi] kā góa hāi-kah chin chhám; Chú ōe chiàu i ê só͘-chòe kā i pò-èng.
55004015	Lí ka-kī mā tio̍h tî-hông, in-ūi i ke̍k-le̍k hoán-tùi goán só͘ thoân ê sìn-sit.
55004016	Góa thâu-chi̍t piàn sin-sò͘ ê sî bô-lâng tī sin-piⁿ pang-chān góa, ta̍k ê lóng kā góa pàng-sak. Goān chit-ê chōe bô kui tī in.
55004017	M̄-kú, Chú ū khiā tī góa sin-piⁿ, hō͘ góa ū khùi-la̍t thang chhiong-hun pò-iông sìn-sit, hō͘ só͘-ū ê Gōa-pang-lâng lóng thiaⁿ-kìⁿ. Chòe-āu góa ū tùi sai ê chhùi siū kiù chhut.
55004018	Chú ōe kiù góa thoat-lī lóng-chóng ê pháiⁿ-tāi, mā ōe kiù góa chìn-ji̍p I thiⁿ-ni̍h ê Kok-tō͘. Goān êng-kng kui I, ti̍t-kàu éng-éng oán-oán. Amen!
55004019	Chhiáⁿ thòe góa kā [Pek-ki-lah], [A-ku-lah], kap [O-nî-sek-hut] choân-ke chhéng-an.
55004020	[Í-lah-to͘] kè-sio̍k tiàm tī [Ko-lîm-to]; [Te̍k-lô-hui-mô͘] phòa-pīⁿ, góa kā i lâu tī [Bí-lī-to͘].
55004021	Lí tio̍h chīn-só͘-ōe tī tang-thiⁿ í-chêng lâi. [Iú-pò͘-lô], [Pò͘-tiân], [Lī-lô͘], [Kek-ló-tí-a], kap chèng hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē lóng beh kā lí chhéng-an.
55004022	Goān Chú kap lí ê sîn tông-chāi! Goān Siōng-tè ê un-tián kap lín tông-chāi!
56001001	Góa sī [Pó-lô], choh Siōng-tè ê lô͘-po̍k kap Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok ê sù-tô͘, siū soán-phài khì pang-chān Siōng-tè soán-bîn ê sìn-gióng, ín-chhōa in jīn-bat ha̍h tī kèng-khiân ê chin-lí;
56001002	chit-ê chin-lí hō͘ lán tùi éng-oán ê oa̍h-miā ū ǹg-bāng, chiū-sī bōe kóng pe̍h-chha̍t ê Siōng-tè tī bān-sè í-chêng èng-ún beh hō͘ lán ê.
56001003	I tī sî-ki sêng-se̍k ê sî, thong-kè sìn-sit ê soan-káng chiong chit-ê èng-ún hián-bêng chhut-lâi. Góa ū siū thok, hōng lán ê Kiù-chú Siōng-tè ê bēng-lēng soan-káng chit-ê hok-im.
56001004	Góa siá-phoe hō͘ lí --- [Thê-to], tī lán kiōng-tông ê sìn-gióng lí sī góa chin ê kiáⁿ. Goān Pē Siōng-tè kap lán ê Kiù-chú Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ sù lí un-tián kap pêng-an!
56001005	Góa kā lí lâu tī [Kek-lí-tí], sī beh hō͘ lí chhú-lí iáu-bē pān chheng-chhó ê tāi-chì, koh chiàu góa só͘ chí-sī, tī ta̍k ê siâⁿ-chhī jīm-bēng lâng chòe tiúⁿ-ló.
56001006	Choh tiúⁿ-ló ê tio̍h bô thang chí-chek, chí-ū chi̍t ê bó͘, kiáⁿ-jî lóng sī sìn-tô͘, koh bô-lâng khòng-kò sī hòng-tōng á-sī m̄ sūn-ho̍k.
56001007	Kàu-hōe ê kam-tok, kì-jiân choh Siōng-tè ê koán-ke, tio̍h bô thang chí-chek, bô chū-ko, bô pháiⁿ sèng-tē, bô chiú-chùi, bô hiong-pō, bô tham-châi.
56001008	Tio̍h gâu khoán-thāi chhut-gōa-lâng, gâu chòe hó-sū, siú-kí, chèng-ti̍t, sèng-kiat, chiat-chè.
56001009	I it-tēng tio̍h kian-siú hit-ê khó-khò hû-ha̍p kàu-gī ê sìn-sit, án-ni chiah ōe-tàng ēng kiān-choân ê kà-sī khoàn-bián lâng, piān-tó hoán-tùi ê lâng.
56001010	In-ūi ū chin chōe m̄ sūn-ho̍k ê lâng, te̍k-pia̍t sī hiah-ê chú-tiuⁿ tio̍h siū kat-lé ê lâng, in ài kóng bô lō͘-ēng ê ōe, koh khi-phiàn lâng.
56001011	Chit khoán lâng it-tēng tio̍h kìm-chí in kóng-ōe, in-ūi in ūi-tio̍h beh tham put-gī ê chîⁿ-châi, ēng bô eng-kai kà-sī ê ōe phò-hoāi chi̍t-kóa ka-têng.
56001012	In [Kek-lí-tí]-lâng ê chi̍t ê sian-ti bat án-ni kóng, “[Kek-lí-tí]-lâng ài kóng pe̍h-chha̍t, sī hiong-ok ê iá-siù, tham-chia̍h koh pîn-tōaⁿ.”
56001013	I kóng ê sī sū-si̍t. Só͘-í lí tio̍h giâm-keh kā in chek-pī, thang hō͘ in ū kiān-choân ê sìn-gióng,
56001014	bô thiaⁿ-thàn [Iû-thài]-lâng bô iáⁿ-chiah ê thoân-soat kap pōe-ge̍k chin-lí ê lâng ê kui-lē.
56001015	Tùi chheng-khì ê lâng lâi kóng, it-chhè lóng chheng-khì; m̄-kú tùi ù-òe kap m̄-sìn ê lâng lâi kóng, bô chi̍t hāng sī chheng-khì, in-ūi in ê sim-su kap liông-ti lóng sī ù-òe.
56001016	In kong-khai kóng bat Siōng-tè, khiok ēng hêng-ûi hó͘-jīn I. In khó-ò͘ⁿ, pōe-ge̍k, chòe bōe chhut sím-mi̍h hó-sū.
56002001	Chóng-sī lí, lí ê kàu-tō tio̍h hû-ha̍p kiān-choân ê kàu-gī.
56002002	Tio̍h khǹg lāu-lâng ài chiat-chè, ū hó phín-keh, siú-kí, tio̍h ū kiān-choân ê sìn-sim, thiàⁿ-sim, kap nāi-sim.
56002003	Lí mā tio̍h án-ni khǹg lāu hū-jîn-lâng hêng-ûi kín-sīn, m̄-thang kóng lâng ê sī-hui, m̄-thang choh chiú ê lô͘-châi, tio̍h ēng hó bô͘-hoān kà-sī lâng,
56002004	chiah thang kà-sī siàu-liân hū-jîn-lâng thiàⁿ tiōng-hu, kap thiàⁿ kiáⁿ-jî,
56002005	koh tio̍h siú-kí, cheng-kiat, gâu lí-ke, chhin-chhiat, sūn-ho̍k tiōng-hu, Siōng-tè ê tō-lí chiah bōe siū húi-pòng.
56002006	Chhin-chhiūⁿ án-ni, lí mā tio̍h khó͘-khǹg siàu-liân ta-po͘-lâng siú-kí.
56002007	Lí ka-kī hoān-sū tio̍h chòe hó hêng-ûi ê bô͘-hoān, kà-sī lâng ê sî tio̍h sêng-khún ún-tiōng,
56002008	giân-sû tio̍h toan-chiàⁿ, bô thang chí-chek, hō͘ hoán-tùi ê lâng bô thang kóng lán ê pháiⁿ-ōe, soah ka-kī kám-kak kiàn-siàu.
56002009	Choh lô͘-lē-ê tio̍h sūn-ho̍k in ê chú-lâng, sū-sū hō͘ in hoaⁿ-hí; m̄-thang ìn-chhùi ìn-chi̍h;
56002010	m̄-thang thau-the̍h, tio̍h sū-sū tiong-si̍t liông-siān, hō͘ lán ê Kiù-chú Siōng-tè ê kà-sī tī ta̍k hong-bīn koh-khah ū kong-chhái.
56002011	In-ūi Siōng-tè í-keng hián-bêng I ê un-tián beh chín-kiù choân jîn-lūi.
56002012	Chit-ê un-tián hùn-liān lán khì-sak bô kèng-khiân ê seng-oa̍h kap sio̍k-sè ê io̍k-bōng, tī hiān-kim ê sî-tāi kè siú-kí, chèng-ti̍t, kap kèng-khiân ê seng-oa̍h,
56002013	thèng-hāu hit-ê chhiong-móa hok-khì ê ǹg-bāng, chiū-sī chì-chun ê Siōng-tè í-ki̍p lán ê Kiù-chú Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok êng-iāu ê hián-hiān.
56002014	Ki-tok ūi-tio̍h lán hiàn ka-kī, sī beh kiù-sio̍k lán thoat-lī it-chhè ê chōe-ok, hō͘ lán chiâⁿ-chòe I sûn-kiat ê chú-bîn kui-sio̍k I, jia̍t-sim chòe hó-sū.
56002015	Chiah-ê sū, lí tio̍h kóng, tio̍h khoàn-bián, chhiong-hun ūn-iōng chit-koân chek-pī lâng. M̄-thang hō͘ lâng khòaⁿ-khin.
56003001	Tio̍h thê-chhíⁿ tāi-ke ho̍k-chiông chip-chèng-chiá kap tong-koân-chiá; tio̍h sūn-ho̍k, thang piān-piān chòe ta̍k hāng hó-sū.
56003002	Tio̍h khǹg in m̄-thang húi-pòng pa̍t-lâng, m̄-thang oan-ke; tio̍h hô-khì iú-siān, ēng un-hô ê thài-tō͘ tùi-thāi só͘-ū ê lâng.
56003003	In-ūi lán ka-kī í-chêng mā-sī bô tì-sek, pōe-ge̍k, kiâⁿ bê-lō͘, choh chióng-chióng chêng-io̍k kap hióng-lo̍k ê lô͘-lē, tī ok-to̍k kap chi̍t-tò͘ tiong teh tō͘-ji̍t, hō͘-siōng oàn-hūn, pí-chhú iàm-ò͘ⁿ.
56003004	M̄-kú lán ê Kiù-chú Siōng-tè ê chû-pi jîn-ài hián-bêng ê sî,
56003005	I ū chín-kiù lán; m̄-sī in-ūi lán ka-kī ê hó hêng-ûi, sī in-ūi I ê lîn-bín, thong-kè hō͘ lâng têng-sin chhut-sì ê sóe-lé kap Sèng Sîn ê keng-sin lâi chín-kiù lán;
56003006	chit-ūi Sèng Sîn sī Siōng-tè thong-kè lán ê Kiù-chú Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok hong-hong hù-hù kā lán koàn-ak ê,
56003007	hō͘ lán khò I ê un-tián tit-tio̍h chheng-chòe gī, lâi sêng-siū lán só͘ ǹg-bāng éng-oán ê oa̍h-miā.
56003008	Chit kù ōe thang siong-sìn. Góa ài lí te̍k-pia̍t kiông-tiau chiah-ê sū, thang hō͘ sìn Siōng-tè ê lâng choân-sim chòe hó-sū; chiah-ê sū lóng hó, koh tùi lâng ū lī-ek.
56003009	Tio̍h siám-pī gû-gōng ê cheng-lūn, cho̍k-phó͘, hun-cheng, kap Lu̍t-hoat ê cheng-chip, in-ūi chiah-ê lóng bô lō͘-ēng, bô kè-ta̍t.
56003010	Chè-chō hun-cheng ê lâng, kā i kéng-kò chi̍t-nn̄g-piàn í-āu chiū m̄-thang koh kap i lâi-óng.
56003011	Lí chai, chit khoán lâng í-keng pāi-hoāi; i kè-sio̍k hoān-chōe sī teh kā ka-kī tēng-chōe.
56003012	Góa chhe [A-thê-má] á-sī [Chhui-ki-kó͘] khì lí hia ê sî, lí tio̍h kóaⁿ-kín lâi [Nî-ko-pho-lí] chhē góa, in-ūi góa í-keng koat-tēng beh tī hia kè tang-thiⁿ.
56003013	Tio̍h chīn só͘-ōe pang-chān [Se-la̍p] lu̍t-su kap [A-pho-lô] lú-thêng ê su-iàu, hō͘ in thang an-sim chhut-hoat.
56003014	Tio̍h hoan-hù lán ka-kī ê lâng ha̍k-si̍p chòe hó-sū lâi kiong-kip si̍t-chè ê su-iàu, chiah-bián chòe bô lō͘-ēng ê lâng.
56003015	Kap góa tī chia ê lâng lóng beh kā lí chhéng-an. Chhiáⁿ thòe goán kā hiah-ê tâng-sìn ê hó pêng-iú chhéng-an. Goān Siōng-tè ê un-tián kap lín tāi-ke tông-chāi!
57001001	Góa sī [Pó-lô], choh Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ ê siû-hoān, góa kap lán ê hiaⁿ-tī [Thê-mô͘-thài] siá-phoe hō͘ goán só͘-thiàⁿ ê tâng-kang [Hui-lī-bûn],
57001002	chí-bē [A-hui-a], goán ê chiàn-iú [A-ki-pò͘], í-ki̍p tī lí ê chhù teh chū-hōe ê kàu-hōe.
57001003	Goān lán ê Pē Siōng-tè kap Chú Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok sù lín un-tián kap pêng-an!
57001004	Góa ta̍k piàn kî-tó ê sî lóng ū siūⁿ-tio̍h lí, siông-siông kám-siā góa ê Siōng-tè;
57001005	in-ūi góa ū thiaⁿ-tio̍h lí tùi Siōng-tè só͘-ū ê chú-bîn ū thiàⁿ-sim, tùi Chú Iâ-so͘ ū sìn-sim.
57001006	Góa khún-kiû Siōng-tè, thong-kè goán kap lín hun-hióng sìn-gióng, ōe-tàng chhiok-chìn tùi lán kap Ki-tok kiat-liân só͘ tit-tio̍h it-chhè ê chiok-hok ū khah chhim ê liáu-kái.
57001007	Hiaⁿ-tī ah, lí ê thiàⁿ-sim ū hō͘ góa chin tōa ê hoaⁿ-hí kap kó͘-lē! Siōng-tè ê chú-bîn lóng ū tùi lí tit-tio̍h kek-lē.
57001008	Góa khò Ki-tok sui-jiân ōe-tàng hó-táⁿ bēng-lēng lí chòe eng-kai chòe ê tāi-chì,
57001009	m̄-kú, in-ūi thiàⁿ ê iân-kò͘ góa lêng-khó kā lí kiû. Góa --- [Pó-lô] í-keng nî-lāu, hiān-chāi iáu-sī Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ ê siû-hoān.
57001010	Góa thòe [O-nî-se-bô͘] kā lí kiû, i sī góa koaiⁿ-kaⁿ ê sî só͘ siⁿ-ê.
57001011	I í-chêng tùi lí lóng bô lō͘-ēng, hiān-chāi tùi lí tùi góa lóng chin ū lō͘-ēng.
57001012	Hiān-chāi góa sàng i tńg-khì lí hia; i sī góa ê sim-koaⁿ.
57001013	Góa goân-lâi siūⁿ-beh kā i lâu tī sin-piⁿ, thang tī góa ūi-tio̍h hok-im chòe siû-hoān ê tiong-kan thòe lí ho̍k-sāi góa;
57001014	m̄-kú bô lí ê tông-ì, góa m̄-thang án-ni chòe khah hó, hō͘ lí só͘ chòe ê hó-sū m̄-sī bián-kióng, sī kam-sim lo̍k-ì.
57001015	Kiám-chhái in-ūi án-ni, [O-nî-se-bô͘] tio̍h chiām-sî lī-khui lí, sī beh hō͘ lí éng-kiú kā i lâu-teh;
57001016	bô koh sī lô͘-lē, sin-hūn chhiau-kè lô͘-lē, sī só͘-thiàⁿ ê hiaⁿ-tī. Tùi góa lâi kóng te̍k-pia̍t sī án-ni, tùi lí lâi kóng koh-khah sī án-ni; i m̄-nā sī lí ke-lāi ê lâng, mā-sī Chú-lāi ê hiaⁿ-tī.
57001017	Só͘-í, lí nā khòaⁿ góa chòe tâng-phōaⁿ, chiū tio̍h chhin-chhiūⁿ chiap-la̍p góa án-ni kā i chiap-la̍p.
57001018	I nā ū tùi lí chòe sím-mi̍h m̄-tio̍h, á-sī ū khiàm lí sím-mi̍h, sǹg góa ê siàu.
57001019	Góa --- [Pó-lô] chhin-chhiú siá: Góa hū-chek hêng. Góa eng-kai m̄-bián kā lí thê-chhíⁿ, lí khiàm góa ê sī lí pún-sin.
57001020	Sī lah, hiaⁿ-tī, in-ūi Chú ê iân-kò͘, kā góa tàu saⁿ-kāng chi̍t-ē, hō͘ góa ê sim khò Ki-tok tit-tio̍h kek-lē.
57001021	Góa siá-phoe hō͘ lí, in-ūi khak-sìn lí ōe thiaⁿ góa ê iau-kiû; kî-si̍t, góa chai lí ōe chòe pí góa kóng ê koh-khah chōe.
57001022	Mā tio̍h kā góa chún-pī chi̍t keng pâng-keng, in-ūi góa ǹg-bāng Siōng-tè ōe thiaⁿ lín ê kî-tó, hō͘ góa ōe-tàng khì lín hia.
57001023	Ūi-tio̍h Ki-tok Iâ-so͘ kap góa tâng choh siû-hoān ê [Í-pa-hut] beh kā lín chhéng-an.
57001024	Góa ê tâng-kang [Má-khó], [A-lí-ta̍t-kó͘], [Tí-má], [Lō͘-ka] mā beh kā lín chhéng-an.
57001025	Goān Chú Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok ê un-tián kap lín tông-chāi!
58001001	Siōng-tè tī kó͘-chá ū thong-kè I ê chèng sian-ti, chin chōe piàn, ēng chin chōe hong-sek tùi lán ê chó͘-sian kóng-ōe,
58001002	m̄-kú tī chiong-boa̍t ê ji̍t-chí, thong-kè I ê Kiáⁿ tùi lán kóng-ōe. Siōng-tè ū chí-tēng I choh bān-iú ê kè-sêng-jîn, koh ū thong-kè I chhòng-chō ú-tiū.
58001003	I hoán-siā Siōng-tè ê êng-iāu, sī Siōng-tè pún-chit ê chin-siōng. I ēng I koân-lêng ê ōe hû-chhî bān-iú, sóe-tû lâng ê chōe liáu-āu, chē tī Chì-chun Chì-koân Siōng-tè ê chiàⁿ-pêng.
58001004	Siōng-tè ū sù Kiáⁿ pí chèng thiⁿ-sài khah chun-kùi ê miâ, hō͘ I chiâⁿ-chòe pí thiⁿ-sài khah úi-tāi.
58001005	Siōng-tè kiám bat tùi tó chi̍t ê thiⁿ-sài kóng: Lí sī góa ê Kiáⁿ, góa kin-á-ji̍t siⁿ lí? Koh I kiám bat tùi tó chi̍t ê thiⁿ-sài kóng: Góa beh chòe i ê Pē, I beh chòe góa ê Kiáⁿ?
58001006	Koh Siōng-tè chhe-khián I ê Tōa-kiáⁿ ji̍p sè-kan ê sî, I kóng: Siōng-tè só͘-ū ê thiⁿ-sài lóng tio̍h pài I.
58001007	Koan-hē thiⁿ-sài, I kóng: Siōng-tè ēng hong chòe I ê thiⁿ-sài, ēng hé-iām chòe I ê chhe-ēng.
58001008	M̄-kú koan-hē Kiáⁿ, I kóng: Siōng-tè ah, lí ê pó-chō éng-éng oán-oán chûn-chāi; lí ê Kok-tō͘ ê koân-pèng sī chèng-ti̍t ê koân-pèng.
58001009	Lí ài kong-gī, oàn-hūn put-hoat. Só͘-í, Siōng-tè, lí ê Siōng-tè kéng-soán lí, ēng hoaⁿ-hí ê iû boah lí, chhiau-kè boah lí ê tâng-phōaⁿ.
58001010	I koh kóng: Chú ah, lí tī khí-chho͘ ū kiàn-li̍p tōe ê kun-ki; thiⁿ mā-sī lí ê chhiú só͘ chō.
58001011	Thiⁿ-tōe lóng ōe siau-bia̍t, m̄-kú lí éng-oán chûn-chāi. Thiⁿ-tōe lóng ōe chhin-chhiūⁿ i-ho̍k chiām-chiām kū,
58001012	lí ōe chhin-chhiūⁿ kńg gōa-saⁿ kā in kńg khí-lâi; in ōe chhin-chhiūⁿ i-ho̍k kái-piàn. M̄-kú lí éng-oán bōe kái-piàn; lí ê hè-siū bû-kiông-chīn.
58001013	Siōng-tè kiám bat tùi tó chi̍t ê thiⁿ-sài kóng: Lí chē góa ê chiàⁿ-pêng, kàu góa hō͘ lí ê tùi-te̍k khut-ho̍k tī lí kha-ē?
58001014	Thiⁿ-sài kiám m̄-sī lóng teh ho̍k-sāi ê sîn, siū chhe-phài khì ho̍k-bū teh-beh niá-siū chín-kiù ê lâng?
58002001	Só͘-í, lán it-tēng tio̍h koh-khah tì-ì só͘ thiaⁿ-tio̍h ê sìn-sit, chiah-bián phian-lī chin-tō.
58002002	In-ūi thong-kè thiⁿ-sài só͘ thoân ê sìn-sit nā ū kong-hāu, pōe-ge̍k bô sūn-chiông ê lâng tio̍h siū èng-siū ê hêng-hoa̍t;
58002003	án-ni lán hut-lio̍k chiah-ni̍h tōa ê chín-kiù, beh ná ōe-tàng siám-pī tio̍h siū ê hêng-hoa̍t? Chú pún-sin ū tāi-seng soan-pò͘ chit-ê chín-kiù, thiaⁿ-kìⁿ ê lâng mā ū tùi lán chèng-si̍t chit-ê sū.
58002004	Siōng-tè koh ū ēng sîn-jiah, kî-sū, ta̍k khoán tōa koân-lêng ê chok-ûi, kap chiàu I ka-kī ê ì-sù só͘ hun-phòe Sèng Sîn ê un-sù chòe-hé choh-chèng.
58002005	Siōng-tè bô chiong lán só͘ kóng chit-ê chiong-lâi ê sè-kài kau hō͘ thiⁿ-sài koán-lí.
58002006	M̄-kú Sèng-keng ū chi̍t ê só͘-chāi choh-chèng kóng: Lâng sī sím-mi̍h, lí kèng-jiân kā i koan-hoâi? Sè-kan-lâng sī sím-mi̍h, lí kèng-jiân kā i koàn-kò͘?
58002007	Lí hō͘ i sió-khóa khah-su thiⁿ-sài; lí ēng êng-kng chun-kùi hō͘ i chòe hoa-koan,
58002008	hō͘ bān-iú lóng hâng-ho̍k tī i kha-ē. Siōng-tè kì-jiân hō͘ bān-iú lóng hâng-ho̍k i, chiū bô chi̍t hāng bô hâng-ho̍k i. M̄-kú kàu hiān-chāi lán iáu-bē khòaⁿ-kìⁿ bān-iú lóng hâng-ho̍k i.
58002009	Lán khòaⁿ-kìⁿ hit-ê sió-khóa khah-su thiⁿ-sài ê Iâ-so͘ í-keng keng-kè sí ê thòng-khó͘, tit-tio̍h êng-kng chun-kùi ê hoa-koan; án-ni I khò Siōng-tè ê un-tián thang ūi-tio̍h chèng-lâng sí.
58002010	Hit-ūi chhòng-chō koh î-chhî bān-iú ê Siōng-tè ūi-tio̍h beh chhōa chin chōe kiáⁿ-jî chìn-ji̍p êng-kng, chiah tio̍h hō͘ chín-kiù ê khai-thok-chiá Iâ-so͘ keng-kè khó͘-lān chiâⁿ-chòe oân-choân.
58002011	Sū-si̍t, hō͘ lâng chiâⁿ-sèng ê kap tit-tio̍h chiâⁿ-sèng ê, lóng tùi kâng chi̍t ê goân-thâu chhut, in-ūi án-ni, Iâ-so͘ chheng-ho͘ in chòe kâng chi̍t ke ê lâng ia̍h bô kám-kak kiàn-siàu.
58002012	I tùi Siōng-tè kóng: Góa beh tùi góa ê hiaⁿ-tī kap chí-bē pò-iông lí ê miâ, tī in ê hōe tiong gîm-si o-ló lí.
58002013	I koh kóng: Góa beh sìn-khò I; iā kóng: Khòaⁿ ah, góa kap Siōng-tè só͘ hō͘ góa ê kiáⁿ-jî lóng tī chia.
58002014	Kì-jiân chiah-ê kiáⁿ-jî sī ū-huih ū-bah ê lâng, I pún-sin mā kap in siâng-khoán chiâⁿ-chòe ū-huih ū-bah ê lâng, ūi-tio̍h beh thong-kè I ê sí lâi húi-bia̍t hit-ê chiáng-koán sí-bông ê Mô͘-kúi,
58002015	koh tháu-pàng hiah-ê in-ūi sí-bông ê kiaⁿ-hiâⁿ it-seng chòe lô͘-châi ê lâng.
58002016	Tong-jiân, I teh koan-sim ê m̄-sī thiⁿ-sài, sī [A-pek-la-hán] ê kiáⁿ-sun.
58002017	Só͘-í, I tī ta̍k hong-bīn tio̍h kap I ê hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē kâng-khoán, thang tī Siōng-tè ê bīn-chêng choh jîn-chû tiong-sìn ê Tōa-chè-si, thang hō͘ chèng-lâng ê chōe tit-tio̍h sià-bián.
58002018	In-ūi I ka-kī ū siū khó͘, siū khó-giām, I ōe-tàng pang-chān hiah-ê siū chhì-thàm ê lâng.
58003001	Só͘-í, lín tâng siū Siōng-tè soán-tiàu sèng ê hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, lín tio̍h siūⁿ lán só͘ soan-jīn hit-ūi choh sù-chiá, choh Tōa-chè-si ê Iâ-so͘.
58003002	I tùi chí-phài I ê Siōng-tè chīn-tiong, tú kap [Mô͘-se] tī Siōng-tè ê ke chīn-tiong kâng-khoán.
58003003	Khí-chhù ê lâng pí i khí ê chhù khah chun-kùi; án-ni, Iâ-so͘ pí [Mô͘-se] eng-kai siū koh-khah tōa ê êng-kng.
58003004	Só͘-ū ê chhù lóng sī lâng khí ê, m̄-kú khí-chō bān-mi̍h ê sī Siōng-tè.
58003005	[Mô͘-se] choh po̍k-jîn, tùi Siōng-tè ê choân-ke chīn-tiong, ūi-tio̍h Siōng-tè āu-lâi só͘ beh kóng ê ōe choh-chèng;
58003006	m̄-kú, Ki-tok choh Kiáⁿ tī-lí Siōng-tè ê ke. Tùi só͘ ǹg-bāng ê, lán nā ēng khak-sìn kap ióng-khì lâi chhî-siú, lán chiū-sī Siōng-tè ke-lāi ê lâng.
58003007	Só͘-í, chiàu Sèng Sîn só͘ kóng: Kin-á-ji̍t lín nā thiaⁿ Siōng-tè ê siaⁿ,
58003008	m̄-thang ngī-sim, chhin-chhiūⁿ lín ê chó͘-sian tī pōe-ge̍k ê sî, tī khòng-iá chhì-thàm I ê ji̍t.
58003009	Siōng-tè kóng: Lín ê chó͘-sian sui-jiân ū khòaⁿ-tio̍h góa ê chok-ûi, in iû-goân tī hia chhì-thàm góa, khó-giām góa
58003010	sì-cha̍p nî kú. Só͘-í, góa tùi hit tāi ê lâng siū-khì, kóng: In ê sim sit-bê; in m̄-bat góa ê tō-lō͘.
58003011	Góa tī siū-khì tiong chiù-chōa kóng: In choa̍t-tùi bōe-tàng chìn-ji̍p góa só͘ sù ê an-hioh.
58003012	Hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, lín tio̍h chù-ì, chiah-bián lín tiong-kan ū lâng sim siâ-ok m̄-sìn, tì-kàu lī-khui éng-oa̍h ê Siōng-tè.
58003013	Tio̍h thàn iáu ū hit-ê kiò-chòe “kin-á-ji̍t” ê sî, ji̍t-ji̍t saⁿ khoàn-bián, lín tiong-kan chiah-bián ū lâng siū chōe-ok bê-he̍k tì-kàu ngī-sim.
58003014	Lán nā kian-siú tong-chho͘ ê khak-sìn kàu lō͘-bé, chiū chiâⁿ-chòe Ki-tok ê tâng-kang.
58003015	Sèng-keng án-ni kóng: Kin-á-ji̍t lín nā thiaⁿ Siōng-tè ê siaⁿ, m̄-thang ngī-sim, chhin-chhiūⁿ lín ê chó͘-sian tī pōe-ge̍k ê sî.
58003016	Thiaⁿ-kìⁿ Siōng-tè ê siaⁿ iáu-kú pōe-ge̍k I ê sī sím-mi̍h lâng? Kiám m̄-sī hiah-ê [Mô͘-se] tùi [Ai-ki̍p] chhōa chhut-lâi só͘-ū ê lâng?
58003017	Siōng-tè tī hit sì-cha̍p nî kú tùi sím-mi̍h lâng hoat siū-khì? Kiám m̄-sī hiah-ê in-ūi hoān-chōe sí tī khòng-iá ê lâng?
58003018	Hiah-ê pōe-ge̍k ê lâng í-gōa, Siōng-tè kiám bat tùi lâng chiù-chōa kóng, in bōe-tàng chìn-ji̍p I só͘ sù ê an-hioh?
58003019	Án-ni, in bōe-tàng chìn-ji̍p an-hioh sī in-ūi in m̄-sìn.
58004001	Kì-jiân Siōng-tè hō͘ lâng chìn-ji̍p an-hioh ê èng-ún iáu lâu-teh, lán tio̍h sió-sim, chiah-bián lín tiong-kan ū lâng siūⁿ-kóng in tit bōe-tio̍h chit-ê èng-ún.
58004002	Hok-im pîⁿ-pîⁿ ū thoân hō͘ in, mā ū thoân hō͘ lán; m̄-kú in só͘ thiaⁿ-kìⁿ ê sìn-sit tùi in bô lī-ek, in-ūi in hiah-ê thiaⁿ ê lâng bô ēng sìn-sim niá-siū.
58004003	Lán chiah-ê sìn ê lâng ōe-tàng chìn-ji̍p Siōng-tè só͘ sù ê an-hioh, chiàu I só͘ kóng: Góa tī siū-khì tiong chiù-chōa kóng: In choa̍t-tùi bōe-tàng chìn-ji̍p góa só͘ sù ê an-hioh! Kî-si̍t Siōng-tè chhòng-chō ú-tiū ê sî, I ê kang-chok í-keng oân-sêng.
58004004	Koan-hē tē-chhit ji̍t, Sèng-keng chi̍t ê só͘-chāi ū án-ni kóng: “Siōng-tè tī tē-chhit ji̍t soah I it-chhè ê kang-chok lâi an-hioh.”
58004005	Kâng chit-ê só͘-chāi ū koh kóng: “In choa̍t-tùi bōe-tàng chìn-ji̍p góa só͘ sù ê an-hioh.”
58004006	Kì-jiân tāi-seng thiaⁿ-tio̍h hok-im ê lâng in-ūi m̄ sūn-thàn bōe-tàng chìn-ji̍p an-hioh, Siōng-tè chiū ūi-tio̍h kî-tha ê lâng pó-liû chit-ê an-hioh.
58004007	Chin kú í-āu, tī [Tāi-pi̍t] ê chheh ū kì-chài, Siōng-tè siat-tēng chi̍t ji̍t kiò-chòe “kin-á-ji̍t”, chhin-chhiūⁿ téng-bīn só͘ kóng: Kin-á-ji̍t lín nā thiaⁿ Siōng-tè ê siaⁿ, m̄-thang ngī-sim.
58004008	[Iok-su-a] nā ū hō͘ in an-hioh, Siōng-tè chiū bōe tī āu-lâi koh kóng-khí pa̍t ê ji̍t.
58004009	Án-ni, Siōng-tè iáu ūi-tio̍h I ê chú-bîn pó-liû chi̍t ê An-hioh-ji̍t.
58004010	In-ūi chìn-ji̍p Siōng-tè só͘ sù an-hioh ê lâng, chhin-chhiūⁿ Siōng-tè soah I ê kang-chok, mā soah in it-chhè ê kang-chok.
58004011	Só͘-í, lán tio̍h ló͘-le̍k chìn-ji̍p chit-ê an-hioh, chiah-bián ū lâng chhin-chhiūⁿ hiah-ê m̄ sūn-ho̍k ê lâng poa̍h-tó sit-pāi.
58004012	Siōng-tè ê ōe sī oa̍h ê, sī ū kong-hāu ê, pí it-chhè siang-bīn-lāi ê kiàm khah lāi, ōe-tàng chhah-ji̍p, sīm-chì phòa-khui lâng ê lêng kap hûn, koan-chat kap kut-chhé, koh ōe-tàng phòaⁿ-toàn lâng sim-lāi ê io̍k-bōng kap ì-liām.
58004013	Só͘-ū pī-chō-bu̍t bô chi̍t hāng ōe-tàng tùi Siōng-tè ún-ba̍t; it-chhè lóng oân-choân po̍k-lō͘ tī I ê ba̍k-chiu chêng. Lán khiàm I ê siàu lóng tio̍h sǹg chheng-chhó.
58004014	Kì-jiân lán ū chi̍t-ūi úi-tāi ê Tōa-chè-si --- Siōng-tè ê Kiáⁿ Iâ-so͘, I í-keng chiūⁿ-thiⁿ kàu Siōng-tè ê bīn-chêng, lán tio̍h kian-siú só͘ soan-jīn ê sìn-gióng.
58004015	Lán chit-ūi Tōa-chè-si m̄-sī bōe thé-thiap lán ê loán-jio̍k; I tī ta̍k hong-bīn lóng chhin-chhiūⁿ lán ū siū chhì-thàm, put-kò bô hoān-chōe.
58004016	Só͘-í, lán tio̍h hó-táⁿ chiū-kūn Siōng-tè un-tián ê pó-chō, thang niá-siū I ê lîn-bín kap un-tián, chòe lán su-iàu ê sî ê pang-chān.
58005001	Ta̍k ê tōa-chè-si lóng sī tùi lâng ê tiong-kan kéng chhut-lâi, siū chí-phài thòe lâng ho̍k-sāi Siōng-tè, ūi-tio̍h in ê chōe hiàn lé-mi̍h kap chè-phín.
58005002	Tōa-chè-si, in-ūi i pún-sin tī ta̍k hong-bīn lóng loán-jio̍k, só͘-í ōe-tàng thé-liōng bû-ti kap sit-bê ê lâng.
58005003	In-ūi án-ni, i ū gī-bū ūi-tio̍h jîn-bîn, mā tio̍h ūi ka-kī ê chōe hiàn-chè.
58005004	Bô-lâng ka-kī tit-tio̍h tōa-chè-si chit-ê chun-kùi ê chit-hūn; chí-ū chhin-chhiūⁿ [A-lûn], hō͘ Siōng-tè soán-tiàu ê chiah ōe tit-tio̍h.
58005005	Siâng-khoán, Ki-tok mā m̄-sī ka-kī cheng-chhú tōa-chè-si ê êng-iāu, hoán-tńg sī Siōng-tè tùi I kóng: Lí sī góa ê Kiáⁿ, góa kin-á-ji̍t siⁿ lí.
58005006	Tī pa̍t-ūi I mā ū kóng: Lí chiàu [Be̍k-ki-sé-tek] ê pan-chhù éng-oán choh chè-si.
58005007	Iâ-so͘ chāi-sè ê sî bat tōa-siaⁿ âu-kiò koh lâu ba̍k-sái, ǹg hit-ūi ōe kiù I thoat-lī sí-bông ê Siōng-tè kî-tó khún-kiû. In-ūi I ê khiân-sêng, Siōng-tè ū thiaⁿ I ê kî-kiû.
58005008	Sui-jiân I sī Siōng-tè ê Kiáⁿ, iáu-kú ū tùi só͘ siū ê khó͘-lān ha̍k-si̍p sūn-ho̍k.
58005009	Kì-jiân Siōng-tè hō͘ I ta̍t-kàu oân-choân ê tōe-pō͘, I chiū chiâⁿ-chòe só͘-ū sūn-ho̍k I ê lâng éng-oán tit-kiù ê kun-goân,
58005010	hō͘ Siōng-tè chí-tēng I chiàu [Be̍k-ki-sé-tek] ê pan-chhù choh Tōa-chè-si.
58005011	Koan-hē Iâ-so͘ choh Tōa-chè-si ê sū, goán ū chin chōe ōe ài kóng, m̄-kú oh-tit soat-bêng, in-ūi lín hīⁿ-khang tūn.
58005012	Chiàu kóng, lín chá chiū eng-kai chòe lāu-su lah, m̄-kú lín iáu su-iàu lâng kā lín kà Siōng-tè sìn-sit ê chho͘-pō͘; lín iáu su-iàu chia̍h-lin, bōe-tàng chia̍h-pn̄g.
58005013	Chia̍h-lin ê lóng sī eⁿ-á, iáu bōe-hiáu liáu-kái sī-hui ê tō-lí.
58005014	Pn̄g sī tōa-lâng teh chia̍h ê; in sio̍k-lêng ê sim-khiàu ū keng-kè si̍t-chè ê chhau-liān chiah ōe-hiáu hun-pia̍t hó-pháiⁿ.
58006001	Só͘-í, lán m̄-thang thêng-liû tī Ki-tok chho͘-pō͘ ê tō-lí, bô koh-chài kan-ta tī thoat-lī sí ê hêng-ûi lâi sìn Siōng-tè, kiat-chēng-lé kap àn-chhiú-lé, sí-lâng ê koh-oa̍h kap éng-oán ê sím-phòaⁿ, téng ê kà-sī teh phah ki-chhó͘; tio̍h tui-kiû sêng-se̍k.
58006003	Lán tio̍h hiòng-chêng kiû chìn-pō͘, Siōng-tè nā chún, lán beh án-ni chòe.
58006004	Hiah-ê lâng bat hō͘ Siōng-tè ê kng chiò, bat tam-tio̍h sio̍k-thiⁿ ê un-sù, bat hun-hióng Sèng Sîn,
58006005	bat thé-giām Siōng-tè ê ōe ê hó-chhù, mā bat kám-siū teh-beh lâi ê sè-tāi ê koân-pèng.
58006006	Án-ni, in iáu-kú pōe-sìn! Chit khoán lâng bô hoat-tō͘ hō͘ in tiông-sin hóe-kái kiâⁿ tò-tńg; in-ūi in koh chiong Siōng-tè ê Kiáⁿ tèng tī si̍p-jī-kè téng, kong-jiân kā I bú-jio̍k.
58006007	Thó͘-tōe put-sî teh khip-siu tùi thiⁿ lo̍h-lâi ê hō͘-chúi, seng-sán chhài-soe, tùi choh-sit-lâng ū lō͘-ēng, che sī tùi Siōng-tè niá-siū ê chiok-hok.
58006008	M̄-kú thó͘-tōe nā hoat chháu-chhì kap cha̍p-chháu chiū bô lō͘-ēng, liâm-piⁿ ōe siū chiù-chó͘, chòe-āu hō͘ hé sio.
58006009	Só͘ thiàⁿ ê hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, sui-jiân goán án-ni kóng, iáu-kú chhim-sìn lín ê chêng-hêng pí só͘ kóng ê khah hó, ōe-tàng tit-tio̍h kiù.
58006010	Siōng-tè m̄-sī bô kong-tō, I it-tēng ōe kì-tit lín só͘ chòe ê kang-chok, chiū-sī lín ūi-tio̍h I kè-sio̍k teh ho̍k-bū sìn-tô͘ só͘ piáu-hiān ê thiàⁿ-sim.
58006011	Goán chin ài lín ta̍k ê lâng tùi-thâu-kàu-bé pó-chhî jia̍t-sim, hō͘ lín só͘ ǹg-bāng ê ōe oân-choân si̍t-hiān.
58006012	Án-ni lín chiah bōe pîn-tōaⁿ, chiah ōe o̍h hiah-ê tùi sìn kap thun-lún lâi sêng-siū Siōng-tè èng-ún ê lâng.
58006013	Siōng-tè èng-ún [A-pek-la-hán] ê sî, kì-jiân bô pí I khah tōa ê thang chiù-chōa, chiū kí pún-sin chiù-chōa,
58006014	kóng, “Góa it-tēng beh sù-hok hō͘ lí, beh ke-thiⁿ kiáⁿ-sun hō͘ lí.”
58006015	[A-pek-la-hán] gâu thun-lún, só͘-í ū tit-tio̍h só͘ èng-ún ê.
58006016	In-ūi lâng sī kí pí i khah tōa ê lâi chiù-chōa; mā ēng chiù-chōa chòe tam-pó lâi kái-koat in tiong-kan só͘-ū ê cheng-chip.
58006017	Siōng-tè ài hiah-ê sêng-chiap èng-ún ê lâng khak-si̍t chai, I ê kè-ōe bōe kái-piàn, só͘-í ēng chiù-chōa lâi pó-chèng.
58006018	I ê èng-ún kap chiù-chōa chit nn̄g hāng lóng bōe kái-piàn, in-ūi I bōe kóng pe̍h-chha̍t, hō͘ lán chiah-ê tô-pī khì kiû I pó-hō͘ ê lâng ōe-tàng tit-tio̍h chin tōa ê kek-lē, thang chhî-siú hit-ê tī lán thâu-chêng ê ǹg-bāng.
58006019	Lán ū chit-ê ǹg-bāng, chhin-chhiūⁿ sìⁿ-miā ê tiàⁿ pha tī Sèng-só͘ tiùⁿ-lî ê lāi-bīn an-choân khó-khò.
58006020	Iâ-so͘ ūi-tio̍h lán chòe sian-hong í-keng ji̍p-khì hia, chiàu [Be̍k-ki-sé-tek] ê pan-chhù choh Tōa-chè-si ti̍t-kàu éng-oán.
58007001	Chit-ūi [Be̍k-ki-sé-tek] sī [Sat-léng]-ông, mā-sī Chì-koân Siōng-tè ê chè-si. [A-pek-la-hán] thâi-sí hiah-ê ông tńg-lâi ê sî, [Be̍k-ki-sé-tek] ū kā i gêng-chiap koh kā i chiok-hok.
58007002	[A-pek-la-hán] ū chiong i só͘ tit-tio̍h ê cha̍p-hūn-chi̍t pun hō͘ i. Tē-it, [Be̍k-ki-sé-tek] chit-ê miâ ê ì-sù sī “Chèng-gī ê ông”, i koh sī [Sat-léng]-ông, chiū-sī “Hô-pêng-ông”.
58007003	I bô pē bô bú, bô sè-hē, bô chhut-sì ê ji̍t-chí, mā bô sìⁿ-miā ê kiat-sok. I kap Siōng-tè ê Kiáⁿ kâng-khoán; i kè-sio̍k choh chè-si ti̍t-kàu éng-oán.
58007004	Lín khòaⁿ, chit-ê lâng jōa úi-tāi! Sian-chó͘ [A-pek-la-hán] to tio̍h chiong chiàn-lī-phín ê cha̍p-hūn-chi̍t hiàn hō͘ i.
58007005	Ū tam-tng chè-si-chit ê [Lī-bī] ê kiáⁿ-sun, sui-jiân kap kî-tha [Í-sek-lia̍t] jîn-bîn lóng sī [A-pek-la-hán] ê kiáⁿ-sun, pîⁿ-pîⁿ sī hiaⁿ-tī, iáu-kú hōng bēng-lēng chiàu Lu̍t-hoat tùi jîn-bîn siu cha̍p-hūn-chi̍t.
58007006	[Be̍k-ki-sé-tek] m̄-sī sio̍k [Lī-bī] ê sè-hē, m̄-kú i ū tùi [A-pek-la-hán] chiap-siū cha̍p-hūn-chi̍t, koh kā tit-tio̍h Siōng-tè èng-ún ê [A-pek-la-hán] chiok-hok.
58007007	Sī-sòe siū sī-tōa chiok-hok sī lí-só͘-tong-jiân.
58007008	Chi̍t hong-bīn, chiah-ê siu cha̍p-hūn-chi̍t ê lóng sī ōe sí ê lâng; lēng-gōa chi̍t hong-bīn, hit-ūi siu cha̍p-hūn-chi̍t ê, Sèng-keng ū chèng-si̍t i iáu teh oa̍h.
58007009	Án-ni mā thang kóng, tùi lâng siu cha̍p-hūn-chi̍t ê [Lī-bī] í-keng thong-kè [A-pek-la-hán] tùi [Be̍k-ki-sé-tek] la̍p cha̍p-hūn-chi̍t.
58007010	In-ūi [Be̍k-ki-sé-tek] gêng-chiap [A-pek-la-hán] ê sî, [Lī-bī] iáu tī i ê sian-chó͘ [A-pek-la-hán] ê seng-khu lāi.
58007011	[Í-sek-lia̍t]-lâng ê Lu̍t-hoat sī kun-kù [Lī-bī] ê chè-si chè-tō͘ pan-hoat ê, chit-ê chè-tō͘ nā ōe-tàng hō͘ lâng oân-choân, ná ū su-iàu m̄-sī chiàu [A-lûn] ê pan-chhù, sī chiàu [Be̍k-ki-sé-tek] pan-chhù siat-li̍p ê lēng-gōa chi̍t ê chè-si?
58007012	Kì-jiân chè-si chè-tō͘ kái-piàn, Lu̍t-hoat mā tio̍h kái-piàn.
58007013	In-ūi chiah-ê sū só͘ chí Hit-ūi sī sio̍k pa̍t ê chi-cho̍k; chit-ê chi-cho̍k m̄-bat ū lâng tī chè-tôaⁿ chêng sū-hōng.
58007014	Lán ê Chú bêng-bêng sī [Iû-tāi] chi-cho̍k ê kiáⁿ-sun; koan-hē chit-ê chi-cho̍k, [Mô͘-se] m̄-bat kóng-khí chè-si ê sū.
58007015	Góa teh kóng ê hō͘ tāi-chì koh-khah chheng-chhó. Ū lēng-gōa chi̍t ūi chhin-chhiūⁿ [Be̍k-ki-sé-tek] ê chè-si í-keng chhut-hiān.
58007016	I choh Chè-si m̄-sī kun-kù lâng ê tiâu-lē kui-chek, sī kun-kù bōe húi-bia̍t ê oa̍h-miā ê koân-lêng.
58007017	In-ūi Sèng-keng ū án-ni choh-chèng: Chiàu [Be̍k-ki-sé-tek] ê pan-chhù, lí éng-oán choh chè-si.
58007018	Chi̍t hong-bīn, kū ê tiâu-lē in-ūi bô-la̍t, bô lō͘-ēng, soah siū hòe-bô,
58007019	in-ūi [Mô͘-se] ê Lu̍t-hoat sím-mi̍h tāi-chì to bô hoat-tō͘ sêng-choân. Lēng-gōa chi̍t hong-bīn, ū chi̍t ê khah hó ê ǹg-bāng í-keng chún-pī hó-sè, hō͘ lán thang thong-kè chit-ê ǹg-bāng chhin-kūn Siōng-tè.
58007020	Koh chit-ê ǹg-bāng ū keng-kè chiù-chōa. [Lī-bī] hē-thóng ê chè-si bô keng-kè chiù-chōa;
58007021	chí-ū chit-ūi Iâ-so͘ choh Chè-si ê sî ū keng-kè chiù-chōa; I ê Siōng-tè tùi I kóng: Chú ū chiù-chōa, bōe kái-piàn sim-ì; lí éng-oán choh chè-si.
58007022	Chiū-sī in-ūi án-ni, Iâ-so͘ chiâⁿ-chòe koh-khah hó ê iok ê pó-chèng.
58007023	[Lī-bī] hē-thóng ê chè-si ū chin chōe, in-ūi sí ê chó͘-gāi in bōe-tàng kè-sio̍k chòe;
58007024	chí-ū Iâ-so͘ m̄-bián chiong chè-si-chit kau hō͘ pa̍t-lâng, in-ūi I éng-oán oa̍h-teh.
58007025	Án-ni, thong-kè I lâi-kàu Siōng-tè bīn-chêng ê lâng, I ōe-tàng kiù in kàu-tóe, in-ūi I éng-oán oa̍h-teh teh thòe in kî-tó.
58007026	Chit khoán Tōa-chè-si tú-tú ha̍h lán ê su-iàu; I sèng-kiat, bô siâ-ok, bô lâ-sâm, tùi chōe-jîn tiong siū hun-pia̍t chhut-lâi, ko-seng kàu pí thiⁿ khah koân.
58007027	I bô su-iàu chhin-chhiūⁿ kî-tha ê tōa-chè-si ta̍k ji̍t tio̍h seng ūi-tio̍h ka-kī, āu-lâi ūi-tio̍h jîn-bîn ê chōe hiàn-chè. I hiàn pún-sin chòe chè, chi̍t piàn chiū oân-sêng.
58007028	[Mô͘-se] ê Lu̍t-hoat jīm-bēng bô oân-choân ê lâng choh tōa-chè-si; m̄-kú ū Lu̍t-hoat í-āu, Siōng-tè ēng chiù-chōa jīm-bēng I ê Kiáⁿ éng-oán choh oân-choân ê Tōa-chè-si.
58008001	Lán só͘ teh kóng siōng iàu-kín ê sī án-ni: Lán ū chit khoán ê Tōa-chè-si, I chē tī thiⁿ-téng Chì-tōa Siōng-tè pó-chō ê chiàⁿ-pêng.
58008002	I tī Sèng-só͘, chiū-sī chin ê tiùⁿ-bō͘, teh sū-hōng; chit-ê tiùⁿ-bō͘ m̄-sī lâng, sī Chú só͘ tah ê.
58008003	Ta̍k ê tōa-chè-si lóng sī ūi-tio̍h hiàn lé-mi̍h kap chè-phín jīm-bēng ê; só͘-í chit-ūi Tōa-chè-si mā it-tēng tio̍h ū sím-mi̍h thang hiàn.
58008004	I nā tī tōe-chiūⁿ chiū bô choh chè-si, in-ūi í-keng ū chè-si chiàu Lu̍t-hoat teh hiàn lé-mi̍h.
58008005	In só͘ chòe ê ho̍k-sāi put-kò sī thiⁿ-téng tiùⁿ-bō͘ ê hù-pún kap iáⁿ-siōng, tú chiàu [Mô͘-se] beh khí-chō hōe-bō͘ ê sî, Siōng-tè ū kā i chí-sī kóng, “Lí tio̍h kín-sīn, it-chhè tio̍h chiàu tī soaⁿ-téng kā lí chí-sī ê bô͘-sek lâi khí.”
58008006	M̄-kú hiān-chāi Iâ-so͘ í-keng tit-tio̍h koh-khah chun-kùi ê sū-hōng, choh khah hó ê iok ê tiong-kan-jîn, chit-ê iok sī ēng khah hó ê èng-ún chè-tēng ê.
58008007	Thâu-chi̍t ê iok nā bô khoat-tiám, chiū bô su-iàu li̍p tē-jī ê iok.
58008008	M̄-kú Siōng-tè kā in chí-chek kóng: Chú kóng, khòaⁿ ah, ji̍t-chí teh-beh kàu, góa beh kap [Í-sek-lia̍t]-ke kap [Iû-tāi]-ke li̍p sin ê iok.
58008009	Chit-ê iok bô chhin-chhiūⁿ góa chêng kap in ê chó͘-sian só͘ li̍p ê, chiū-sī khan in ê chhiú, chhōa in chhut [Ai-ki̍p] ê sî só͘ li̍p ê; in-ūi in bô kè-sio̍k siú góa ê iok, só͘-í góa m̄-chhap in.
58008010	Chú koh kóng, chiah-ê ji̍t í-āu, góa kap [Í-sek-lia̍t]-ke só͘ beh li̍p ê iok sī án-ni: Góa beh chiong góa ê Lu̍t-hoat khǹg tī in ê náu-lāi, siá tī in ê sim-lāi. Góa beh chòe in ê Siōng-tè; in beh chòe góa ê chú-bîn.
58008011	In lóng bōe-koh kà-sī in ê tông-pau, á-sī ka-kī ê hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē kóng: Tio̍h jīn-bat Chú, in-ūi in tùi siōng-sòe kàu siōng-tōa ê, lóng ōe jīn-bat góa.
58008012	Góa beh sià-bián in ê put-gī, bōe-koh kì-tit in ê chōe-ok.
58008013	Kì-jiân kóng-kàu sin ê iok, Siōng-tè chiū hō͘ thâu-chi̍t ê iok pìⁿ-chòe kū ê. Hit-ê chiām-chiām kū teh soe-thòe ê iok liâm-piⁿ chiū siau-sit.
58009001	Thâu-chi̍t ê iok mā ū lé-pài ê kui-tēng kap tōe-chiūⁿ ê sèng-só͘.
58009002	Ū chi̍t ê tah hó-sè ê tiùⁿ-bō͘, thâu-chêng-keng kiò-chòe Sèng-só͘, lāi-bīn ū teng-tâi, toh, kap pâi-lia̍t ê piáⁿ.
58009003	Tē-jī ê tiùⁿ-lî āu ê āu-bīn-keng kiò-chòe Chì-sèng-só͘,
58009004	lāi-bīn ū kim-hiuⁿ-tôaⁿ, choân-pō͘ ēng kim pau ê Iok-kūi, kūi-lāi ū tóe má-ná ê kim-ô͘, [A-lûn] hit ki puh-gê ê koáiⁿ-á, kap nn̄g tè iok ê chio̍h-pán.
58009005	Kūi téng ū êng-kng ê ki-lō͘-peng thiⁿ-sài, in ê si̍t jia-khàm Si-un-chō. Koan-hē chiah-ê sū, hiān-chāi góa bōe-tàng siông-sè soat-bêng.
58009006	Chiah-ê mi̍h-kiāⁿ án-ni an-pâi hó-sè, chè-si chiū ta̍k ji̍t ji̍p-khì tiùⁿ-bō͘ ê thâu-chêng-keng kú-hêng lé-pài gî-sek.
58009007	Āu-bīn-keng chí-ū tōa-chè-si chiah thang ji̍p-khì, m̄-kú ta̍k nî chí-ū chi̍t piàn, ta̍k piàn tio̍h tòa huih ji̍p-khì, ūi-tio̍h pún-sin í-ki̍p bîn-chiòng bô-ì-tiong hoān ê chōe lâi hiàn.
58009008	Tùi chiah-ê an-pâi Sèng Sîn ū bêng-bêng piáu-sī, tiùⁿ-bō͘ ê thâu-chêng-keng iáu chûn-chāi, chìn-ji̍p Chì-sèng-só͘ ê lō͘ chiū iáu-bē khui.
58009009	Tiùⁿ-bō͘ ê thâu-chêng-keng phì-jū hiān-sè, sī kóng, só͘ hiàn ê lé-mi̍h kap chè-phín bōe-tàng hō͘ lé-pài ê lâng ê liông-sim chheng-pe̍k.
58009010	Chiah-ê kan-ta sī koan-hē lim-chia̍h kap ta̍k khoán ê kiat-chēng-lé, sī sio̍k gōa-piáu ê kui-lē, chí-ū sek-iōng kàu Siōng-tè keng-sin bān-mi̍h ê sî.
58009011	M̄-kú Ki-tok í-keng lâi, choh Tōa-chè-si, ū si̍t-hiān hó-sū. I ū keng-kè khah tōa khah oân-choân, m̄-sī lâng ê chhiú só͘ tah, m̄-sī sio̍k chit sè-kan ê tiùⁿ-bō͘.
58009012	I chí-ū chi̍t piàn chìn-ji̍p Chì-sèng-só͘, m̄-sī ēng soaⁿ-iûⁿ ê huih kap gû-á ê huih, sī ēng ka-kī ê huih ūi-tio̍h lán sêng-choân éng-oán ê kiù-sio̍k.
58009013	Soaⁿ-iûⁿ kap gû-káng ê huih, í-ki̍p gû-bú-á ê kut-hu nā hiù tī bô chheng-khì ê lâng to ōe hō͘ in sèng-hòa chheng-khì,
58009014	hô-hòng Ki-tok thong-kè éng-oán ê Sîn hiàn I bô hâ-chhû ê pún-sin hō͘ Siōng-tè, I ê huih kiám bōe hō͘ lán ê liông-sim koh-khah chheng-khì, thoat-lī sí ê hêng-ûi, lâi ho̍k-sāi éng-oa̍h ê Siōng-tè?
58009015	In-ūi án-ni, Ki-tok chòe sin ê iok ê tiong-kan-jîn, sī beh hō͘ Siōng-tè ho͘-tiàu ê lâng ōe-tit niá-siū I só͘ èng-ún éng-oán ê sán-gia̍p, in-ūi Ki-tok í-keng ēng I ê sí sio̍k-hôe in tī chêng ê iok ê sî só͘ hoān ê chōe-kò.
58009016	Koan-hē ûi-chiok, it-tēng tio̍h seng chèng-si̍t li̍p ûi-chiok ê lâng í-keng sí.
58009017	In-ūi ûi-chiok it-tēng tio̍h li̍p ûi-chiok ê lâng sí chiah ū-hāu. Li̍p ûi-chiok ê lâng iáu oa̍h-teh, ûi-chiok chiū bô-hāu.
58009018	Án-ni, liân thâu-chi̍t ê iok mā-sī ū ēng huih lâi sêng-li̍p.
58009019	[Mô͘-se] chiàu Lu̍t-hoat chiong it-chhè ê kài-bēng thoân hō͘ jîn-bîn, jiân-āu phâng gû-káng kap soaⁿ-iûⁿ ê huih chham chúi, ēng chu-âng sek ê iûⁿ-mn̂g kap gû-chhek-chháu hiù tī hit pún chheh ê téng-bīn kap choân-thé jîn-bîn ê sin-chiūⁿ,
58009020	kóng, “Che sī khè-iok ê huih, sī Siōng-tè bēng-lēng lín tio̍h chun-siú ê.”
58009021	Siâng-khoán, [Mô͘-se] mā chiong huih hiù tī tiùⁿ-bō͘ kap lé-pài ê sî só͘ ēng it-chhè ê khì-khū.
58009022	Chiàu Lu̍t-hoat, chha-put-to só͘-ū ê mi̍h lóng ēng huih lâi kiat-chēng; bô lâu-huih chiū bô sià-chōe.
58009023	Chiàu thiⁿ-téng ê khoán-sit só͘ hóng-chō ê mi̍h su-iàu ēng cheng-siⁿ ê huih lâi kiat-chēng; m̄-kú thiⁿ-téng ê goân-mi̍h su-iàu ēng pí chiah-ê khah hó ê chè-mi̍h lâi kiat-chēng.
58009024	Ki-tok ji̍p-khì ê pèng m̄-sī lâng ê chhiú chō ê Sèng-só͘ --- che put-kò sī chin Sèng-só͘ ê hù-pún, sī ji̍p-khì thiⁿ-téng ê chin Sèng-só͘. I hiān-chāi ūi-tio̍h lán chhut-hiān tī Siōng-tè ê bīn-chêng.
58009025	Ki-tok m̄-bián chi̍t piàn koh chi̍t piàn hiàn pún-sin, chhin-chhiūⁿ tōa-chè-si tio̍h ta̍k nî kè-sio̍k tòa cheng-siⁿ ê huih ji̍p-khì Chì-sèng-só͘.
58009026	Nā tio̍h chi̍t piàn koh chi̍t piàn hiàn, tùi chhòng-chō sè-kài í-lâi, Ki-tok tio̍h chi̍t piàn koh chi̍t piàn siū-khó͘. M̄-kú hiān-chāi tī chit-ê sè-tāi ê lō͘-bé, I chí-ū chhut-hiān chi̍t piàn, chiong pún-sin hiàn chòe chè lâi tû-khì chōe.
58009027	Chiàu só͘ chù-tiāⁿ, lâng tio̍h chi̍t pái sí, sí āu tio̍h siū Siōng-tè sím-phòaⁿ.
58009028	Chhin-chhiūⁿ án-ni, Ki-tok í-keng ū chi̍t piàn hi-seng lâi tam-tng chèng-lâng ê chōe; I ōe tē-jī piàn hián-hiān, m̄-sī beh tùi-hù chōe, sī beh chín-kiù pek-chhiat teh thèng-hāu I lâi ê lâng.
58010001	Kì-jiân Lu̍t-hoat sī teh-beh lâi ê hó-sū ê iáⁿ, m̄-sī hó-sū pún-sin ê chin-siōng, só͘-í bōe-tàng chi̍t nî kè chi̍t nî kè-sio̍k ēng siâng-khoán ê chè-mi̍h hō͘ chhin-kūn Siōng-tè ê lâng tit-tio̍h oân-choân.
58010002	Nā-sī ōe, in-ūi kèng-pài ê lâng chi̍t piàn chiū oân-choân tit-tio̍h kiat-chēng, bô koh ū chōe ê ì-sek, hiàn-chè ê sū eng-kai í-keng thêng-chí à.
58010003	Kî-si̍t, ta̍k nî só͘ hiàn ê chè-mi̍h, chí-ū ōe hō͘ lâng siūⁿ-khí in ê chōe;
58010004	in-ūi gû, iûⁿ ê huih bōe-tàng tû-khì lâng ê chōe.
58010005	Só͘-í, Ki-tok lâi-kàu sè-kan ê sî ū kóng: Chè-sū kap lé-mi̍h, lí bô ài; m̄-kú lí ū kā góa chún-pī seng-khu.
58010006	Sio-chè kap sio̍k-chōe-chè, lí bô kah-ì.
58010007	Hit sî góa kóng: Siōng-tè ah, góa lâi lah; góa lâi sī beh si̍t-hêng lí ê chí-ì. Góa ê sū ū kì-chài tī chheh-ni̍h.
58010008	Góa téng-bīn ū kóng, “Chè-sū kap lé-mi̍h, sio-chè kap sio̍k-chōe-chè lí bô ài, mā bô kah-ì; chiah-ê sī chiàu Lu̍t-hoat lâi hiàn ê.”
58010009	I sòa lo̍h-khì kóng, “Khòaⁿ ah, góa lâi sī beh si̍t-hêng lí ê chí-ì.” Án-ni, Siōng-tè hòe-tû chêng-ê, sī beh kiàn-li̍p āu-ê.
58010010	Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok si̍t-hêng Siōng-tè ê chí-ì, chí-ū chi̍t piàn hiàn I ka-kī ê seng-khu chiū kàu-gia̍h hō͘ lán tit-tio̍h sèng-hòa kui Siōng-tè.
58010011	Chè-si ta̍k ji̍t khiā-teh ho̍k-sāi Siōng-tè, chi̍t piàn koh chi̍t piàn hiàn siâng-khoán ê chè, éng-oán bōe-tàng tû-khì lâng ê chōe.
58010012	M̄-kú Ki-tok chí-ū chi̍t piàn hiàn sio̍k-chōe-chè, jiân-āu chē tī Siōng-tè ê chiàⁿ-pêng,
58010013	thèng-hāu Siōng-tè hō͘ I ê tùi-te̍k chòe I ê kha-tiam.
58010014	Ki-tok thong-kè chi̍t piàn ê hiàn-chè, hō͘ sèng-hòa kui Chú ê lâng éng-oán oân-choân.
58010015	Sèng Sîn mā ū tùi lán choh-chèng. I ū kóng:
58010016	Chú kóng, hiah-ê ji̍t-chí í-āu, Góa kap in só͘ beh li̍p ê io̍k chiū-sī án-ni: Góa beh chiong góa ê Lu̍t-hoat khǹg tī in ê sim-lāi, siá tī in ê náu-lāi.
58010017	Jiân-āu I koh kóng: Góa bô koh kì-tit in ê chōe-ok kap kè-hoān.
58010018	Kì-jiân chōe í-keng tit-tio̍h sià-bián, chiū m̄-bián koh hiàn sio̍k-chōe-chè.
58010019	Só͘-í, hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, lán khò Iâ-so͘ lâu-huih sí ōe-tàng ū khak-sìn kap ióng-khì chìn-ji̍p Chì-sèng-só͘.
58010020	I thong-kè tiùⁿ-lî, chiū-sī ka-kī ê seng-khu, kā lán khui chi̍t tiâu sin koh oa̍h ê lō͘.
58010021	Lán í-keng ū chi̍t ūi úi-tāi ê chè-si teh tī-lí Siōng-tè ê ke,
58010022	lán tio̍h ēng chin-sêng ê sim, kian-koat ê sìn, chheng-khì bô khui-khiàm ê liông-sim kap chheng-chúi sóe kè ê seng-khu lâi chhin-kūn Siōng-tè.
58010023	Lán tio̍h kian-koat chhî-siú só͘ soan-jīn ê ǹg-bāng, in-ūi èng-ún lán ê Siōng-tè khó-khò.
58010024	Lán tio̍h hō͘-siōng koan-sim thang kek-lē saⁿ-thiàⁿ kap chòe hó-sū.
58010025	Ū chi̍t-kóa lâng thêng-chí chū-hōe, m̄-thang o̍h in ê si̍p-koàn, tian-tò tio̍h hō͘-siōng khoàn-bián; kì-jiân lín chai Chú ê Ji̍t teh-beh kàu, koh-khah tio̍h án-ni.
58010026	Lán jīm-sek chin-lí í-āu iáu kò͘-ì hoān-chōe, chiū bô koh ū thang sio̍k-chōe ê chè-mi̍h,
58010027	chí-ū ēng kiaⁿ-hiâⁿ ê sim thèng-hāu sím-phòaⁿ kap teh-beh sio-bia̍t te̍k-tùi Siōng-tè ê lâng ê lia̍t-hé.
58010028	Ûi-hoān [Mô͘-se] ê Lu̍t-hoat ê, kun-kù nn̄g ê á-sī saⁿ ê lâng choh-chèng chiū thang kā i chhú-sí, lóng bô khoan-sià.
58010029	Án-ni, thún-ta̍h Siōng-tè ê Kiáⁿ, biáu-sī hō͘ in sèng-hòa kui Chú ê iok ê huih, koh bú-bān si-un ê Sèng Sîn ê lâng, lín siūⁿ in eng-kai siū ê hêng-hoa̍t ōe ke jōa tāng?
58010030	Lán chai, kóng “Sin-oan chāi góa, góa beh pò-èng”, koh kóng “Chú beh sím-phòaⁿ I ê chú-bîn” hit-ūi sī sím-mi̍h lâng?
58010031	Hām-lo̍h éng-oa̍h Siōng-tè ê chhiú si̍t-chāi chin thang kiaⁿ!
58010032	Lín tio̍h ōe kì-tit kè-khì ê ji̍t-chí. Lín siū Siōng-tè ê kng chiò í-āu, ū jím-siū tōa cheng-tò͘ ê khó͘-lān;
58010033	ū sî lín kong-jiân siū bú-jio̍k, ge̍k-thāi; ū sî lín kap pa̍t-lâng tâng-siū ge̍k-thāi.
58010034	Lín kap siû-hoān tâng siū-khó͘; lín ê châi-bu̍t siū chhiúⁿ-toa̍t mā kam-goān jím-siū, in-ūi chai lín ka-kī ū koh-khah hó koh éng-oán chûn-chāi ê sán-gia̍p.
58010035	Só͘-í, m̄-thang sit-lo̍h ióng-khì; chit-ê ióng-khì ōe hō͘ lín tōa ê pò-siúⁿ.
58010036	Lín tio̍h ū nāi-sim chiah ōe-tàng si̍t-hêng Siōng-tè ê chí-ì, niá-siū I só͘ èng-ún ê hok-hūn.
58010037	In-ūi koh chi̍t-sî-á kú, Hit-ūi teh-beh-lâi ê ōe kàu, bōe iân-tî.
58010038	M̄-kú sio̍k góa ê gī-lâng ōe tùi sìn lâi oa̍h. Nā ū lâng tiû-tû thòe-āu, góa chiū bô kah-ì.
58010039	Lán leh, lán m̄-sī thòe-āu tì-kàu tîm-lûn, sī tùi sìn tì-kàu sìⁿ-miā tit-tio̍h pó-choân.
58011001	Sìn sī tùi só͘ ǹg-bāng ê sū ū pá-ak, tùi bô khòaⁿ-kìⁿ ê sū ōe-tàng khéng-tēng.
58011002	Kó͘-chá-lâng in-ūi chit-ê sìn tit-tio̍h Siōng-tè jīn-tēng chiap-la̍p.
58011003	Tùi sìn, lán chai ú-tiū sī tùi Siōng-tè ê ōe chhòng-chō ê; án-ni khòaⁿ-ōe-tio̍h-ê sī tùi khòaⁿ-bōe-tio̍h-ê lâi chō ê.
58011004	Tùi sìn, [A-pek] pí [Kai-ún] hiàn khah hó ê chè-mi̍h hō͘ Siōng-tè; tùi chit-ê sìn, i tit-tio̍h Siōng-tè jīn-tēng chiap-la̍p chòe gī-lâng. Sui-jiân [A-pek] í-keng sí, thong-kè chit-ê sìn, i iáu teh kóng-ōe.
58011005	Tùi sìn, [Í-lo̍k] bô keng-giām sí, siū chhian-sóa khì Siōng-tè hia. Lâng bô koh khòaⁿ-tio̍h i, in-ūi Siōng-tè kā i chhian-sóa khì; [Í-lo̍k] siū chhian-sóa í-chêng, í-keng hō͘ Siōng-tè jīn-tēng chiap-la̍p.
58011006	Bô sìn chiū bōe-tàng hō͘ Siōng-tè hoaⁿ-hí, in-ūi chhin-kūn Siōng-tè ê lâng it-tēng tio̍h sìn Siōng-tè ū chûn-chāi, koh sìn I ōe hō͘ chhē-kiû I ê lâng tit-tio̍h pò-siúⁿ.
58011007	Tùi sìn, [Ná-a] tùi iáu-bē khòaⁿ-tio̍h ê sū ū thiaⁿ Siōng-tè ê kéng-kò, chûn kèng-ùi ê sim, chō chi̍t chiah tōa-chûn kiù i choân-ke. Tùi chit-ê sìn, i tēng sè-kan-lâng ê chōe, koh kun-kù chit-ê sìn, i chiâⁿ-chòe gī ê kè-sêng-jîn.
58011008	Tùi sìn, [A-pek-la-hán] siū tiàu khì teh-beh sêng-siū chòe sán-gia̍p ê tōe ê sî, sui-jiân m̄-chai beh khì tó-ūi, iáu-kú i ū sūn-thàn chhut-khì.
58011009	Tùi sìn, i kià-ku tī èng-ún ê tōe, ná chhin-chhiūⁿ tiàm tī gōa-kok, kap chòe-hé sêng-siū kâng èng-ún ê [Í-sat], [Ngá-kok] tòa tī pò͘-pîⁿ;
58011010	in-ūi i kî-thāi Siōng-tè só͘ siat-kè kap khí-chō hit-ê ū tōe-ki ê siâⁿ.
58011011	Tùi sìn, [A-pek-la-hán] sui-jiân í-keng lāu, [Sat-la̍h] mā í-keng chhiau-kè seng-sán ê nî-hè, i iáu ōe-tàng choh lāu-pē, in-ūi khak-sìn èng-ún i ê Siōng-tè sī sìn-si̍t.
58011012	Só͘-í thang kóng, tùi chi̍t ê teh-beh sí ê lâng ū siⁿ-thòaⁿ kiáⁿ-sun, chhin-chhiūⁿ thiⁿ-téng ê chhiⁿ hiah-ni̍h chōe, chhin-chhiūⁿ hái-piⁿ ê soa sǹg bōe-liáu.
58011013	Chiah-ê lóng sī kàu sí it-ti̍t ū sìn-sim ê lâng; in bô tit-tio̍h só͘ èng-ún ê, m̄-kú tùi hn̄g-hn̄g khòaⁿ-kìⁿ chiū hoaⁿ-hí, sêng-jīn ka-kī put-kò sī tōe-chiūⁿ ê chhut-gōa-lâng, liû-lōng-kheh.
58011014	Kóng chiah-ê ōe ê lâng piáu-sī in sī teh chhē chi̍t ê ka-hiong.
58011015	In nā-sī teh hoâi-liām lī-khui ê só͘-chāi, iáu ū ki-hōe thang tò-khì.
58011016	Put-kò, hiān-chāi in teh him-bō͘ ê sī thiⁿ-téng hit-ê koh-khah hó ê só͘-chāi. Só͘-í, Siōng-tè bô in-ūi in chheng I chòe Siōng-tè lâi kám-kak kiàn-siàu. I sīm-chì í-keng ūi-tio̍h in chún-pī chi̍t ê siâⁿ.
58011017	Tùi sìn, [A-pek-la-hán] siū khó-giām ê sî hiàn [Í-sat] chòe chè-mi̍h, chiū-sī sêng-siū èng-ún ê [A-pek-la-hán] hoaⁿ-hí hiàn i ê ko͘-kiáⁿ.
58011018	Siōng-tè ū tùi i kóng, “Tùi [Í-sat] siⁿ ê chiah thang sǹg-chòe lí ê kiáⁿ-sun.”
58011019	[A-pek-la-hán] siūⁿ-kóng Siōng-tè ōe-tàng hō͘ [Í-sat] tùi sí-lâng tiong koh-oa̍h, só͘-í thang phì-jū kóng [Í-sat] sī sí koh tò tńg-lâi.
58011020	Tùi sìn, [Í-sat] ūi-tio̍h chiong-lâi ê sū kā [Ngá-kok] kap [Í-sò] chiok-hok.
58011021	Tùi sìn, [Ngá-kok] lîm-chiong ê sî kā [Iok-sek] ê kiáⁿ chi̍t-ê chi̍t-ê chiok-hok; i khò tī koáiⁿ-á-thâu kèng-pài Siōng-tè.
58011022	Tùi sìn, [Iok-sek] lîm-chiong ê sî ū thê-khí [Í-sek-lia̍t]-lâng chhut [Ai-ki̍p] ê sū, koh hoan-hù koan-hē i ê kut-hâi bâi-chòng ê sū.
58011023	Tùi sìn, [Mô͘-se] chhut-sì í-āu, i ê pē-bú khòaⁿ-tio̍h eⁿ-á chheng-siù, bô kiaⁿ ông ê bēng-lēng, chiong i chhàng saⁿ ge̍h-ji̍t kú.
58011024	Tùi sìn, [Mô͘-se] tióng-tōa í-āu, kū-choa̍t lâng kā i chheng-chòe [Ai-ki̍p] kong-chú ê kiáⁿ,
58011025	khah ài kap Siōng-tè ê chú-bîn tâng siū khó͘-lān, bô ài hióng-siū chōe tiong chi̍t-ē-á kú ê khoài-lo̍k.
58011026	I khòaⁿ ūi-tio̍h Ki-tok siū lêng-jio̍k pí [Ai-ki̍p] ê châi-pó khah pó-kùi, in-ūi i gióng-bōng chiong-lâi ê pò-siúⁿ.
58011027	Tùi sìn, [Mô͘-se] bô kiaⁿ ông ê siū-khì lī-khui [Ai-ki̍p]; in-ūi i ká-ná ū khòaⁿ-kìⁿ lâng só͘ khòaⁿ bōe-tio̍h ê Siōng-tè, kian-chhî m̄-khéng tò-khì.
58011028	Tùi sìn, [Mô͘-se] siat-li̍p Pôaⁿ-kè-choeh, hoan-hù tio̍h hiù huih tī mn̂g-ni̍h, chiah bōe hō͘ Châu-bia̍t-chiá kha̍p-tio̍h [Í-sek-lia̍t]-lâng ê tōa-kiáⁿ.
58011029	Tùi sìn, [Í-sek-lia̍t]-lâng kè [Âng-hái] chhin-chhiūⁿ teh kiâⁿ ta-tōe; [Ai-ki̍p]-lâng mā siūⁿ-beh kè, soah hō͘ chúi im-sí.
58011030	Tùi sìn, [Í-sek-lia̍t]-lâng se̍h [Iâ-lī-ko]-siâⁿ chhit ji̍t, siâⁿ-chhiûⁿ chiū tó lo̍h-khì.
58011031	Tùi sìn, chhiong-ki [Lat-ha̍p] chhin-chhiat chiap-thāi cheng-thàm, só͘-í bô kap hiah-ê m̄ sūn-ho̍k Siōng-tè ê lâng chòe-hé bia̍t-bông.
58011032	Góa kiám tio̍h koh kóng? Góa bô kàu sî-kan thang thê-khí [Ki-tiân], [Pa-la̍k], [Chham-sun], [Iâ-hut-tha], [Tāi-pi̍t], [Sat-bó-ní], kap chèng sian-ti ê sū.
58011033	Chiah-ê lâng khò sìn-sim thâi-iâⁿ lia̍t-kok. In thui-hêng chèng-gī, niá-siū Siōng-tè ê èng-ún. In hong-ba̍t sai ê chhùi,
58011034	phah-hoa lia̍t-hé, tô-thoat to-kiàm ê sat-hāi. In loán-jio̍k pìⁿ-chòe kian-kiông, tī chiàn-tiûⁿ pìⁿ-chòe ióng-béng, phah-iâⁿ gōa-kok ê kun-tūi.
58011035	Ū chi̍t-kóa hū-jîn-lâng ū chiap in ê chhin-lâng tùi sí-lâng tiong tò tńg-lâi. Mā ū chi̍t-kóa lâng ūi-tio̍h beh koh-oa̍h, tit-tio̍h khah hó ê oa̍h-miā, kū-choa̍t tháu-pàng, kam-goān siū khok-hêng kàu sí.
58011036	Ū chi̍t-kóa lâng siū hì-lāng, piⁿ-phah; mā ū chi̍t-kóa lâng siū khún-pa̍k, koaiⁿ-kaⁿ.
58011037	In hō͘ lâng ēng chio̍h-thâu tìm-sí, ēng kú-á kù-sí, ēng to thâi-sí. In chhēng mî-iûⁿ á-sī soaⁿ-iûⁿ ê phê, ta̍k só͘-chāi phun-pho, jím-siū khiàm-kheh, pek-hāi, ge̍k-thāi.
58011038	Chit sè-kan bô ta̍t-tit in khiā-khí; in tī khòng-iá, soaⁿ-niá, chio̍h-tōng á-sī tōe-hia̍t, sì-kòe liû-lōng.
58011039	Chiah-ê lâng thong-kè in ê sìn lóng ū tit-tio̍h Siōng-tè jīn-tēng chiap-la̍p, m̄-kú bô tit-tio̍h só͘ èng-ún ê,
58011040	in-ūi Siōng-tè ūi-tio̍h lán ū khah hó ê an-pâi; I ê chí-ì sī ài chiah-ê lâng kap lán ū hūn tī chit-ê an-pâi, án-ni só͘ sìn ê chiah ōe-tàng oân-choân si̍t-hiān.
58012001	Kì-jiân ū chiah-ni̍h chōe ê kiàn-chèng-jîn chhin-chhiūⁿ hûn kā lán pau-ûi teh, lán tio̍h pâi-tû it-chhè ê chó͘-gāi kap it-ti̍t teh tîⁿ-pòaⁿ lán ê chōe, kian-jím pháu-cháu thâu-chêng ê lō͘-thêng.
58012002	Tio̍h chù-sîn khòaⁿ sìn ê chhòng-sí-chiá kap oân-sêng-chiá Iâ-so͘. I ūi-tio̍h pâi tī thâu-chêng ê hí-lo̍k, bû-sī lêng-jio̍k, jím-siū si̍p-jī-kè ê khó͘-lān, hiān-chāi í-keng chē tī Siōng-tè pó-chō ê chiàⁿ-pêng.
58012003	Tio̍h siông-sè siūⁿ chit-ê lâng ê só͘-chòe, lín chiah bōe hoe-sim sit-chì. I án-chóaⁿ jím-siū chōe-jîn tùi I ê ngó͘-ge̍k.
58012004	Lín kap chōe-ok tò͘-cheng iáu-bē tí-khòng kàu sí ê thêng-tō͘.
