58012005	Lín kiám bōe kì-tit Siōng-tè khó͘-khǹg lín chhin-chhiūⁿ teh khó͘-khǹg kiáⁿ-jî. I kóng: Góa ê kiáⁿ ah, m̄-thang khòaⁿ-khin Chú ê koán-kàu; siū I chek-pī mā m̄-thang hoe-sim.
58012006	In-ūi Chú koán-kàu I só͘ thiàⁿ ê lâng, piⁿ-phah I só͘ chiap-la̍p ê ta̍k ê kiáⁿ-jî.
58012007	Tio̍h jím-siū koán-kàu. Siōng-tè khoán-thāi lín chhin-chhiūⁿ kiáⁿ-jî, kiám ū kiáⁿ-jî bô siū pē-bú koán-kàu?
58012008	Lín nā bô siū só͘-ū ê kiáⁿ-jî só͘ siū ê koán-kàu, lín chiū-sī su-seng-chú, m̄-sī chin-chiàⁿ ê kiáⁿ-jî.
58012009	Siū jio̍k-thé ê pē-bú koán-kàu, lán to chun-tiōng in, hô-hòng siū lêng-sèng ê Pē koán-kàu, lán kiám m̄ eng-kai koh-khah goān-ì sūn-chiông lâi tit-tio̍h oa̍h-miā?
58012010	Jio̍k-thé ê pē-bú chiām-sî kú chiàu ka-kī ê ì-sù koán-kàu, m̄-kú Siōng-tè ê koán-kàu sī beh hō͘ lán tit-tio̍h lī-ek, bo̍k-te̍k sī beh hō͘ lán ū hūn tī I ê sèng-kiat.
58012011	Lán ta̍k piàn siū koán-kàu bōe kám-kak hoaⁿ-hí, hoán-tńg iu-siong, m̄-kú keng-kè koán-kàu thoàn-liān liáu-āu, ōe kiat hô-pêng ê ké-chí, kiâⁿ-chòe chèng-ti̍t.
58012012	Só͘-í, lín kha-sng chhiú-nńg ê, tio̍h kian-kiông khí-lâi.
58012013	Tio̍h siu-ti̍t lín beh kiâⁿ ê lō͘, chiah-bián hō͘ pái ê kha thu̍t-lûn, hoán-tńg tit-tio̍h i-hó.
58012014	Tio̍h ló͘-le̍k kap chèng-lâng hô-bo̍k, kè sèng-kiat ê seng-oa̍h; nā bô, bô-lâng ōe kìⁿ-tio̍h Chú.
58012015	Tio̍h kín-sīn, chiah-bián ū lâng sit-khì Siōng-tè ê un-tián; chiah-bián ū to̍k-chháu hoat khí-lâi, chō-sêng gûi-hāi, tì-kàu chin chōe lâng siū ù-jiám;
58012016	chiah-bián ū lâng îm-loān, bô kèng-ùi Siōng-tè, chhin-chhiūⁿ [Í-sò] ūi-tio̍h chi̍t-tǹg-chia̍h chhut-bōe tōa-kiáⁿ ê bêng-hūn.
58012017	Lín chai, āu-lâi i ài tit-tio̍h chiok-hok ê sî siū kū-choa̍t; sui-jiân i lâu ba̍k-sái khún-kiû mā bô tit-tio̍h, in-ūi i chhē bô ki-hōe thang hóe-kái.
58012018	Lín m̄-sī lâi-kàu hit-ê bong ōe-tio̍h ê [Se-nái]-soaⁿ, tī hia ū hé-iām, ba̍t-hûn, o͘-àm, kap pō-hong,
58012019	koh ū lat-pah ê hiáng-siaⁿ kap kóng-ōe ê siaⁿ. Thiaⁿ-kìⁿ ê lâng khún-kiû Siōng-tè m̄-thang koh tùi in kóng-ōe,
58012020	in-ūi in bōe-tàng jím-siū bēng-lēng in ê ōe, kóng: “Liân cháu-siù nā kha̍p-tio̍h soaⁿ mā tio̍h ēng chio̍h-thâu tìm-sí.”
58012021	Hit-ê kéng-siōng hui-siông thang kiaⁿ, tì-kàu [Mô͘-se] kóng, “Góa kiaⁿ-kah phi̍h-phi̍h-chhoah.”
58012022	M̄-kú, lín sī lâi-kàu [Sek-an]-soaⁿ, éng-oa̍h Siōng-tè ê siâⁿ, thiⁿ-téng ê [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng], tī hia ū chheng-chheng bān-bān ê thiⁿ-sài chū-chi̍p khèng-chiok.
58012023	Lín lâi-kàu Siōng-tè ê tōa-kiáⁿ chū-chi̍p ê hōe-só͘; in ê miâ í-keng kì tī thiⁿ-téng. Lín lâi-kàu sím-phòaⁿ bān-lâng ê Siōng-tè bīn-chêng, kàu í-keng tit-tio̍h kái-chō chiâⁿ-chòe oân-choân ê gī-lâng ê lêng-hûn hia.
58012024	Lín lâi-kàu sin ê iok ê tiong-kan-jîn Iâ-so͘ ê bīn-chêng, kap só͘ hiù ê huih hia, chit-ê huih pí [A-pek] ê huih só͘ piáu-ta̍t ê koh-khah hó.
58012025	Tio̍h kín-sīn, m̄-thang kū-choa̍t teh tùi lín kóng-ōe Hit-ūi. Hiah-ê kū-choa̍t tī tōe-chiūⁿ kéng-kài in hit-ūi ê lâng to bōe-tàng thoat-lī chōe, lán nā kū-choa̍t tùi thiⁿ-téng kéng-kài lán Hit-ūi, koh-khah bōe-tàng thoat-lī.
58012026	Hit sî I ê siaⁿ iô-tāng tāi-tōe, m̄-kú taⁿ I ū èng-ún kóng, “Koh chi̍t piàn, góa m̄-nā hō͘ tōe, mā beh hō͘ thiⁿ iô-tāng.”
58012027	“Koh chi̍t piàn” chit kù ōe chí-bêng, hiah-ê siū chō ê mi̍h siū iô-tāng, siū chhian-sóa, sī beh hō͘ hiah-ê bô siū iô-tāng ê lâu lo̍h-lâi.
58012028	Só͘-í, lán tio̍h kám-siā, in-ūi lán ū tit-tio̍h hit-ê bōe siū iô-tāng ê Kok-tō͘. Lán tio̍h chiàu Siōng-tè só͘ hoaⁿ-hí ê, ēng khiân-sêng kap kèng-ùi lâi ho̍k-sāi I,
58012029	in-ūi lán ê Siōng-tè sī húi-bia̍t ê hé.
58013001	Tio̍h kè-sio̍k saⁿ-chhin saⁿ-thiàⁿ.
58013002	Tio̍h ōe kì-tit hó khoán-thāi chhut-gōa-lâng. In-ūi ū lâng án-ni chòe, bô-ì tiong chiap-thāi tio̍h thiⁿ-sài.
58013003	Tio̍h koan-hoâi siū koaiⁿ-kaⁿ ê lâng, chhin-chhiūⁿ kap in teh tâng siū koaiⁿ; tio̍h koan-hoâi siū ge̍k-thāi ê lâng, chhin-chhiūⁿ lín pún-sin teh siū ge̍k-thāi.
58013004	Hun-in lâng-lâng tio̍h chun-tiōng; tio̍h pó-chhî sûn-kiat ê hu-chhe koan-hē, in-ūi Siōng-tè ōe sím-phòaⁿ su-thong kiâⁿ-îm ê lâng.
58013005	M̄-thang tham-châi, ka-kī só͘-ū ê tio̍h ti-chiok, in-ūi Siōng-tè ū kóng, “Góa bōe lī-khui lí, mā bōe pàng-sak lí.”
58013006	Só͘-í lán ōe-tàng hó-táⁿ kóng: Chú sī góa ê pang-chān, góa bô kiaⁿ-hiâⁿ, lâng ōe-tàng kā góa án-chóaⁿ?
58013007	Tio̍h siàu-liām ín-chhōa lín, thoân Siōng-tè ê sìn-sit hō͘ lín ê lâng, chù-ì khòaⁿ in ê seng-oa̍h kap kiat-kio̍k lâi ha̍k-si̍p in ê sìn.
58013008	Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok cha-ji̍t, kin-á-ji̍t, kàu éng-oán lóng bōe kái-piàn.
58013009	Lín m̄-thang hō͘ ta̍k khoán kî-īⁿ ê kàu-gī chhōa bê-lō͘, in-ūi sim-lêng khah hó tio̍h khò Siōng-tè ê un-tián lâi kian-kò͘, m̄-sī khò chia̍h-mi̍h, che tùi chun-siú chia̍h-mi̍h kui-lē ê lâng lóng bô lī-ek.
58013010	Lán ū chi̍t ê chè-tôaⁿ, chè-tôaⁿ téng ê chè-mi̍h, tī hōe-bō͘ lāi ho̍k-sāi ê [Iû-thài] chè-si bô koân thang chia̍h.
58013011	In ê tōa-chè-si tòa cheng-siⁿ ê huih chìn-ji̍p Chì-sèng-só͘ ūi-tio̍h jîn-bîn sio̍k-chōe, cheng-siⁿ ê seng-khu khiok tī iâⁿ-gōa sio.
58013012	Só͘-í, ūi-tio̍h beh ēng ka-kī ê huih hō͘ jîn-bîn tit-tio̍h kiat-chēng, Iâ-so͘ mā tī iâⁿ-gōa hi-seng lâi sí.
58013013	Án-ni, lán tio̍h chhut-khì iâⁿ-gōa, kàu I hia, kap I tâng siū lêng-jio̍k.
58013014	In-ūi tī chia lán bô éng-kiú ê siâⁿ; lán sī teh chhē hit-ê teh-beh lâi ê siâⁿ.
58013015	Só͘-í, lán tio̍h thong-kè Iâ-so͘ kè-sio̍k chiong o-ló ê chè hiàn hō͘ Siōng-tè, che sī soan-jīn Chú ê miâ ê lâng ê chhùi-tûn só͘ kiat ê ké-chí.
58013016	Tio̍h ōe kì-tit chòe hó-sū, hō͘-siōng pang-chān, in-ūi che sī Siōng-tè só͘ hoaⁿ-hí ê chè-mi̍h.
58013017	Tio̍h ho̍k-chiông ín-chhōa lín ê lâng, thiaⁿ-thàn in ê ōe, in-ūi in put-sî teh khòaⁿ-kò͘ lín ê lêng-hûn, thang hō͘ in tùi Siōng-tè kau-tài chheng-chhó. Lín tio̍h hō͘ in hoaⁿ-hí kang-chok, bô thó͘-khùi; nā bô, tùi lín bô lī-ek.
58013018	Tio̍h kè-sio̍k ūi-tio̍h goán kî-tó; goán khak-sìn ka-kī ū chheng-pe̍k ê liông-sim, ì-ài hoān-sū chiàu khí-kang seng-oa̍h.
58013019	Góa khún-kiû lín tio̍h te̍k-pia̍t ūi-tio̍h góa kî-tó, kiû Siōng-tè hō͘ góa thang khah kín khì lín hia.
58013020	Siōng-tè í-keng hō͘ lán ê Chú Iâ-so͘ tùi sí-lâng tiong koh-oa̍h. I thong-kè Iâ-so͘ só͘ lâu ê huih khak-li̍p éng-oán ê iok, hō͘ Iâ-so͘ chiâⁿ-chòe iûⁿ-kûn ê Tōa-bo̍k-chiá. Goān chit-ūi sù pêng-an ê Siōng-tè hō͘ lín tī ta̍k hāng hó-sū oân-choân lâi kiâⁿ I ê chí-ì, thong-kè Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok tī lán tiong-kan sêng-chiū I só͘ hoaⁿ-hí ê sū! Goān êng-kng kui hō͘ Siōng-tè, ti̍t-kàu éng-éng oán-oán. Amen!
58013022	Hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, góa hō͘ lín ê phoe bô jōa tn̂g, góa khǹg lín nāi-sim thiaⁿ góa khoàn-bián ê ōe.
58013023	Góa ài lín chai, lán ê hiaⁿ-tī [Thê-mô͘-thài] í-keng chhut-ga̍k; i nā khah-chá lâi, góa ōe sûi-sî kap i chòe-hé khì kìⁿ lín.
58013024	Chhiáⁿ thòe góa kā só͘-ū lín ê léng-tō-chiá kap lóng-chóng ê sìn-tô͘ chhéng-an. Tùi [Ì-tāi-lī] lâi ê sìn-tô͘ mā beh kā lín chhéng-an.
58013025	Goān Siōng-tè ê un-tián kap lín tāi-ke tông-chāi. Amen!
59001001	Góa --- [Ngá-kok] sī Siōng-tè kap Chú Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok ê lô͘-po̍k, beh kā só͘-ū hun-sòaⁿ tī ta̍k só͘-chāi Siōng-tè ê chú-bîn chhéng-an.
59001002	Hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, lín tú-tio̍h ta̍k khoán chhì-liān ê sî, tio̍h siūⁿ-chòe sī thang hoaⁿ-hí ê tāi-chì,
59001003	in-ūi chai-iáⁿ lín ê sìn-sim keng-kè khó-giām ōe sán-seng jím-nāi.
59001004	Lín tio̍h jím-nāi kàu lō͘-bé chiah ōe-tàng ta̍t-kàu oân-choân koh oân-chéng, lóng bô khoat-tiám.
59001005	Lín tiong-kan nā ū lâng khiàm-kheh tì-hūi, tio̍h tùi Siōng-tè kî-kiû, I ōe sù hō͘ lín, in-ūi Siōng-tè ōe chin khóng-khài bô pó-liû sù hō͘ lóng-chóng ê lâng.
59001006	Put-kò, lín tio̍h khò sìn-sim kî-kiû, m̄-thang giâu-gî; giâu-gî ê lâng chhin-chhiūⁿ hái-éng hō͘ hong sàu, khí-khí lo̍h-lo̍h.
59001007	Chit khoán lâng sam-sim lióng-ì, só͘-chòe bô tēng-sèng, bián siūⁿ-beh tùi Chú tit-tio̍h sím-mi̍h.
59001009	Pîn-chiān ê hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē tit-tio̍h Siōng-tè thê-seng sin-hūn, tio̍h hoaⁿ-hí;
59001010	hù-kùi ê lâng siū Siōng-tè kàng-kē sin-hūn, mā tio̍h hoaⁿ-hí. Hù-kùi ê lâng ōe chhin-chhiūⁿ chháu hoe siā-khì.
59001011	Ji̍t-thâu chi̍t-ē chhut, sio-hong chi̍t-ē chhe, chháu ta-khì, hoe siā-khì, i ê súi chiū siau-sit. Hù-kùi ê lâng mā-sī án-ni, ōe tī bô-êng phun-pho ê tiong-kan siau-sit.
59001012	Jím-siū chhì-liān ê lâng chin ū hok-khì; in-ūi i ū keng-kè khó-giām, ōe niá-siū Siōng-tè èng-ún hō͘ thiàⁿ I ê lâng oa̍h-miā ê hoa-koan.
59001013	Lâng siū ín-iú ê sî, m̄-thang kóng “Góa hō͘ Siōng-tè ín-iú”, in-ūi Siōng-tè bōe siū siâ-ok iú-he̍k, I ka-kī mā bōe ín-iú lâng.
59001014	Lâng siū ín-iú, sī hō͘ ka-kī ê io̍k-bōng ín-iú hām-hāi.
59001015	Io̍k-bōng hoâi-īn chiū siⁿ-chhut chōe-ok; chōe-ok sêng-se̍k chiū sán-seng sí-bông.
59001016	Chhin-ài ê hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, m̄-thang siū khi-phiàn.
59001017	It-chhè bí-hó ê siúⁿ-sù kap it-chhè oân-choân ê un-sù sī tùi thiⁿ-téng kng-bêng ê Goân-thâu só͘ sù. I bô kái-piàn, mā bô thian-thé tńg-se̍h ín-khí ê iáⁿ.
59001018	I chiàu ka-kī ê chí-ì ēng chin-lí ê tō lâi chō lán, hō͘ lán tī siū-chō ê bān-mi̍h tiong ū siōng tiōng-iàu ê tōe-ūi.
59001019	Chhin-ài ê hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, tio̍h chai! Ta̍k ê lâng tio̍h kip-beh thiaⁿ; m̄-thang kip-beh kóng; m̄-thang kip-beh siū-khì;
59001020	in-ūi lâng ê siū-khì bōe-tàng si̍t-hiān Siōng-tè kong-gī ê iau-kiû.
59001021	Só͘-í, tio̍h siau-tû it-chhè lâ-sâm ê si̍p-koàn kap koàn-boán ê siâ-ok; tio̍h ēng un-jiû ê sim chiap-la̍p hit-ê chèng tī lín sim-lāi ōe-tàng kiù lín ê tō-lí.
59001022	Tio̍h si̍t-hêng tō-lí, m̄-thang phiàn ka-kī kóng kan-ta thiaⁿ tō-lí chiū hó.
59001023	Kan-ta thiaⁿ tō-lí bô khì si̍t-hêng ê lâng, tú chhin-chhiūⁿ lâng chiò-kiàⁿ khòaⁿ ka-kī siⁿ-chòe siáⁿ-khoán;
59001024	ka-kī siông-sè khòaⁿ, liáu-āu chi̍t-ē lī-khui, sûi-sî bōe kì-tit ka-kī siⁿ-chòe siáⁿ-khoán.
59001025	M̄-kú ū teh siông-sè chhâ-khó hō͘ lâng tit-tio̍h chū-iû hit-ê oân-chéng ê Lu̍t-hoat koh ū-teh kian-siú ê lâng, i ê só͘-chòe it-tēng ōe tit-tio̍h Siōng-tè sù-hok, in-ūi i ū si̍t-chāi khì si̍t-hêng, m̄-sī thiaⁿ liáu chiū bōe kì-tit.
59001026	Nā ū lâng siūⁿ-kóng ka-kī chin kèng-khiân, m̄-kú bô khòng-chè ka-kī ê chhùi-chi̍h, sī teh khi-phiàn ka-kī, chit-ê lâng ê kèng-khiân lóng bô lō͘-ēng.
59001027	Chiàu-kò͘ khó͘-lān tiong ê ko͘-jî kóaⁿ-hū, koh pó-siú ka-kī bô jiám-tio̍h sè-sio̍k ê hú-pāi, tùi Pē Siōng-tè khòaⁿ khí-lâi, che chiah-sī sûn-choân bô khoat-tiám ê kèng-khiân.
59002001	Góa ê hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, kì-jiân lín sìn lán êng-kng ê Chú Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok, tio̍h m̄-thang khòaⁿ gōa-piáu tùi-thāi lâng.
59002002	Nā ū chi̍t ê kòa kim chhiú-chí, chhēng súi-saⁿ ê hó-gia̍h-lâng ji̍p-lâi lín ê hōe-tn̂g, koh ū chi̍t ê chhēng phòa-saⁿ ê sàn-chhiah-lâng ji̍p-lâi,
59002003	lín kan-ta chù-ì hit-ê chhēng súi-saⁿ ê, tùi i kóng, “Chhiáⁿ lâi chē tōa-ūi”, tùi hit-ê sàn-chhiah-lâng kóng, “Lí khiā tiàm hia”, á-sī kóng, “Chē góa ê kha-tiam piⁿ”,
59002004	án-ni lín kiám m̄-sī phian-sim, ēng pháiⁿ ê tōng-ki teh phòaⁿ-toàn lâng?
59002005	Chhin-ài ê hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, tio̍h thiaⁿ! Siōng-tè ū kéng-soán sè-kan ê sàn-chhiah-lâng, hō͘ in tī sìn-gióng siōng hù-chiok, thang sêng-chiap I èng-ún hō͘ thiàⁿ I ê lâng ê Kok-tō͘.
59002006	M̄-kú lín bô chun-tiōng sàn-chhiah-lâng! Ap-pek lín, thoa lín chiūⁿ hoat-têng ê, kiám m̄-sī hiah-ê hó-gia̍h-lâng?
59002007	In chiah-sī húi-pòng Siōng-tè sù lín chun-kùi ê miâ hiah-ê lâng!
59002008	Lín nā chun-thàn Sèng-keng só͘ kì-chài “Tio̍h thiàⁿ chhù-piⁿ chhin-chhiūⁿ thiàⁿ ka-kī” hit-ê Siōng-tè-kok ê Lu̍t-hoat, án-ni chiū tio̍h.
59002009	M̄-kú lín nā khòaⁿ gōa-piáu tùi-thāi lâng chiū-sī hoān-chōe, siū Lu̍t-hoat phòaⁿ-chòe hoān-hoat.
59002010	Lâng nā bô siú Lu̍t-hoat tiong ê chi̍t tiâu kài-bēng, chiū-sī bô siú choân-pō͘ ê Lu̍t-hoat.
59002011	In-ūi Hit-ūi bēng-lēng “M̄-thang hoān kan-îm” ê, mā kóng “M̄-thang thâi-sí lâng”. Sui-jiân lí bô hoān kan-îm, lí nā thâi-sí lâng chiū-sī ûi-hoān Lu̍t-hoat.
59002012	Kì-jiân lín teh-beh siū hō͘ lâng chū-iû ê Lu̍t-hoat sím-phòaⁿ, tio̍h chiàu Lu̍t-hoat ê iau-kiû kóng-ōe, chòe tāi-chì.
59002013	In-ūi, bô ēng chû-pi tùi-thāi lâng ê, tī Sím-phòaⁿ ê sî, Siōng-tè bōe ēng chû-pi tùi-thāi i; chû-pi iâⁿ-kè sím-phòaⁿ.
59002014	Hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, nā ū lâng kóng i ū sìn, m̄-kú bô ēng hêng-ûi lâi chèng-bêng, ū siáⁿ lō͘-ēng? Hit khoán ê sìn kiám ōe kiù i?
59002015	Lín tiong-kan nā ū hiaⁿ-tī á-sī chí-bē bô saⁿ thang chhēng, saⁿ-tǹg bô thang chia̍h,
59002016	lín kan-ta tùi in kóng, “Chiok lín pêng-an, tio̍h chhēng hō͘ sio, chia̍h hō͘ pá!” m̄-kú bô kiong-kip in jio̍k-thé só͘ su-iàu ê mi̍h, ū siáⁿ lō͘-ēng?
59002017	Án-ni, bô hêng-ûi, sìn-sim sī sí ê.
59002018	Kiám-chhái ū lâng beh kóng, “Lí ū sìn-sim, góa ū hêng-ûi.” Góa beh ìn kóng, “Hō͘ góa khòaⁿ bô hêng-ûi ê sìn-sim, góa chiū ēng hêng-ûi hō͘ lí khòaⁿ góa ê sìn-sim.”
59002019	Lín sìn Siōng-tè chí-ū chi̍t ūi, án-ni sī tio̍h; liân kúi mā sìn, koh kiaⁿ-kah phi̍h-phi̍h-chhoah.
59002020	Gōng-lâng ah, lín ài chai bô, bô hêng-ûi ê sìn-sim bô lō͘-ēng.
59002021	Lán ê chó͘-sian [A-pek-la-hán] sī án-chóaⁿ hō͘ Siōng-tè kā i chheng-chòe gī-lâng? Kiám m̄-sī tùi i hiàn ka-kī ê kiáⁿ [Í-sat] tī chè-tôaⁿ téng chit-ê hêng-ûi?
59002022	Khó-kiàn, i ê sìn-sim kap hêng-ûi chòe-hé ūn-chok; i ê sìn-sim sī thong-kè hêng-ûi lâi oân-sêng.
59002023	Che sī èng-giām Sèng-keng só͘ kóng, “[A-pek-la-hán] sìn Siōng-tè, in-ūi án-ni, Siōng-tè chiap-la̍p i chòe gī-lâng”; i mā chheng-chòe Siōng-tè ê pêng-iú.
59002024	Khó-kiàn, lâng siū chiap-la̍p chòe gī-lâng sī tùi hêng-ûi, m̄-sī kan-ta tùi sìn.
59002025	Ki-lú [Lat-ha̍p] ê chêng-hêng mā-sī án-ni. I chiap-la̍p [Í-sek-lia̍t]-lâng ê sù-chiá, pang-chān in tùi pa̍t tiâu lō͘ tô-cháu, án-ni i kiám m̄-sī tùi hêng-ûi siū chiap-la̍p chòe gī-lâng?
59002026	Seng-khu bô khùi sī sí ê; sìn-sim bô hêng-ûi mā-sī sí ê.
59003001	Hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, lín tiong-kan m̄-thang ū chin chōe lâng choh kàu-su, in-ūi lín chai choh kàu-su ê lâng ōe siū khah giâm-keh ê sím-phòaⁿ.
59003002	In-ūi lán tāi-ke lóng siông-siông hoān chin chōe chhò-gō͘; kóng-ōe bô chhò-gō͘ ê sī oân-choân ê lâng, i ōe-hiáu khòng-chè ka-kī.
59003003	Lán ēng bé-kā-kiuⁿ tàu tī bé ê chhùi-ni̍h, hō͘ in sūn-ho̍k, thang khòng-chè kui-chiah bé ê hêng-tōng.
59003004	Koh khòaⁿ, chûn sui-jiân hiah tōa chiah, hō͘ tōa-hong chhe, phah, chí-ū ēng chi̍t ki sòe-sòe ê chûn-tōa kā i khòng-chè, sái-chûn ê lâng chiū ōe-tàng chiàu ka-kī ê ì-sù sái.
59003005	Chhin-chhiūⁿ án-ni, chhùi-chi̍h sī sòe ê khì-koan, iáu-kú ōe kóng tōa-ōe. Koh siūⁿ-khòaⁿ leh, chi̍t-tiám-á hé-chhiⁿ mā ōe hō͘ kui-ê chhiū-nâ lóng sio-khì.
59003006	Chhùi-chi̍h sī hé. Tī lán ê chi-thé tiong, chhùi-chi̍h sī siâ-ok ê sè-kài, ōe ù-jiám lán kui seng-khu. Chit-ê hé sī tùi tōe-ge̍k tiám-to̍h ê, ōe hō͘ lâng kui-ê jîn-seng sio-bia̍t.
59003007	Lâng ōe-tàng hō͘ ta̍k chióng iá-siù, pe-chiáu, thâng-thōa, kap hî-lūi sûn-ho̍k; kî-si̍t mā í-keng hō͘ in lóng sûn-ho̍k lah.
59003008	M̄-kú, bô-lâng ōe-tàng hō͘ chhùi-chi̍h sûn-ho̍k; chhùi-chi̍h sī bô-lâng khòng-chè ōe-tiâu ê siâ-ok, chhiong-móa tì-miā ê to̍k.
59003009	Lán ēng chhùi-chi̍h o-ló Chú lán ê Pē, mā ēng chhùi-chi̍h chiù-chó͘ chiàu Siōng-tè ka-kī ê hêng-siōng só͘ chō ê lâng.
59003010	Kám-siā kap chiù-chó͘ ê ōe lóng tùi kâng chi̍t ê chhùi chhut. Hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, án-ni sī bô eng-kai!
59003011	Tùi kâng chi̍t ê chôaⁿ-goân kiám ōe chhèng-chhut tiⁿ ê kap khó͘ ê chúi!
59003012	Hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, bû-hoa-kó-chhiū kiám ōe siⁿ ka-ná? Phû-tô-chhiū kiám ōe siⁿ bû-hoa-kó? Kiâm ê chúi-goân mā bōe chhut tiⁿ ê chúi!
59003013	Lín tiong-kan sím-mi̍h lâng ū tì-hūi, ū kiàn-sek? Nā ū, tio̍h ēng khiam-pi kap tì-hūi, thong-kè ka-kī ê hó phín-hēng piáu-hiān chhut-lâi.
59003014	Lín sim-lāi nā ū ok-to̍k, chi̍t-tò͘, kap chū-su, chiū m̄-thang khoa-kháu, kóng pe̍h-chha̍t tí-te̍k chin-lí.
59003015	Chit khoán tì-hūi m̄-sī tùi thiⁿ-téng lâi ê, sī sio̍k tōe-chiūⁿ, sio̍k hiat-khì, tùi Mô͘-kúi lâi ê.
59003016	In-ūi ū chi̍t-tò͘ kap chū-su chiū ū hūn-loān kap ta̍k hāng pháiⁿ hêng-ûi.
59003017	Tùi téng-bīn lâi ê tì-hūi, tē-it sī sûn-chin, koh lâi sī hô-pêng, un-hô, kap iú-siān, chhiong-móa chû-pi, kiat hó tek-hēng ê ké-chí; bô phian-su, bô hu-ké.
59003018	Kong-gī sī chhiok-chìn hô-pêng ê lâng ēng hô-pêng iā ê chéng-chí só͘ kiat ê ké-chí.
59004001	Lín tiong-kan ê tò͘-cheng kap cheng-chip tùi tó-ūi lâi? Kiám m̄-sī tùi lín chi-thé tiong-kan put-sî teh cheng-chip kap tò͘-cheng ê io̍k-bōng lâi?
59004002	Lín siūⁿ-beh tit-tio̍h, tit bōe-tio̍h, chiū beh thâi lâng. Lín io̍k-bōng móa-móa, m̄-kú bōe-tàng boán-chiok, chiū cheng-chip tò͘-cheng. Lín tit bōe-tio̍h só͘ ài ê, in-ūi bô tùi Siōng-tè kiû.
59004003	Lín kî-kiû, m̄-kú tit bōe-tio̍h, in-ūi lín ê tōng-ki m̄-hó, só͘ kiû ê sī kan-ta beh boán-chiok ka-kī ê khoài-lo̍k.
59004004	Lín chiah-ê m̄-sìn ê lâng ah, kiám m̄-chai kap sè-kan choh pêng-iú chiū-sī kap Siōng-tè choh tùi-te̍k?
59004005	Sèng-keng kóng, “Siōng-tè chhim-chhim ì-ài I khǹg tī lán lāi-bīn ê Sîn”, lín siūⁿ Sèng-keng só͘ siá chit kù ōe bô ì-sù sī-bô?
59004006	Put-kò Siōng-tè sù lán ê un-tián koh-khah tōa. In-ūi án-ni, Sèng-keng ū kóng: Siōng-tè te̍k-tùi kiau-ngō͘ ê lâng, si-un hō͘ khiam-pi ê lâng.
59004007	Só͘-í, lín tio̍h sūn-ho̍k Siōng-tè, hoán-khòng Mô͘-kúi, Mô͘-kúi chiū ōe tô-cháu lī-khui lín.
59004008	Tio̍h chhin-kūn Siōng-tè, Siōng-tè chiū ōe chhin-kūn lín. Chōe-jîn ah, tio̍h sóe lín ê chhiú; bô tēng-sèng ê lâng ah, tio̍h kiat-chēng lín ê sim.
59004009	Tio̍h pi-siong, ai-thòng, thî-khàu; tio̍h hō͘ lín ê khoài-lo̍k pìⁿ-chòe pi-ai, hoaⁿ-hí pìⁿ-chòe iu-chhiû.
59004010	Tio̍h tī Chú ê bīn-chêng khiam-pi, I chiū ōe kā lín ko-seng.
59004011	Hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, m̄-thang hō͘-siōng kóng pháiⁿ-ōe. Kóng hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē ê pháiⁿ-ōe, phoe-phòaⁿ hiaⁿ-tī á-sī chí-bē, chiū-sī kóng Lu̍t-hoat ê pháiⁿ-ōe, phoe-phòaⁿ Lu̍t-hoat. Lí nā phoe-phòaⁿ Lu̍t-hoat chiū m̄-sī Lu̍t-hoat ê chun-siú-chiá, sī Lu̍t-hoat ê phoe-phòaⁿ-chiá.
59004012	Lu̍t-hoat ê chè-tēng-chiá kap sím-phòaⁿ-chiá chí-ū chi̍t ūi, I ōe chín-kiù, mā ōe húi-bia̍t. Lí sī siáⁿ-lâng, ná káⁿ phoe-phòaⁿ lí ê chhù-piⁿ?
59004013	Eh, lín thiaⁿ góa kóng. Ū lâng kóng “Kin-á-ji̍t á-sī bîn-á-chài goán beh khì bó͘ chi̍t ê siâⁿ, tī hia tòa chi̍t nî, chòe seng-lí thàn-chîⁿ”.
59004014	Lín liân bîn-á-chài sìⁿ-miā ōe pìⁿ án-chóaⁿ to m̄-chai! Lín ká-ná bông-bū chhut-hiān chi̍t-ē-á kú liâm-piⁿ chiū siau-sit.
59004015	Lín eng-kai án-ni kóng, “Chú nā goān-ì, goán chiū ōe oa̍h, thang chòe chit hāng chòe hit hāng.”
59004016	Lín hiān-chāi káⁿ kiau-ngō͘ chū-tāi; chit khoán ê kiau-ngō͘ lóng sī siâ-ok.
59004017	Só͘-í, lâng chai-iáⁿ tio̍h chòe hó-sū, bô khì chòe chiū-sī hoān-chōe.
59005001	Eh, lín chiah-ê hó-gia̍h-lâng, chù-ì thiaⁿ, tio̍h ūi-tio̍h teh-beh siū ê chai-lān ai-siong thî-khàu!
59005002	Lín ê châi-hù í-keng pāi-hoāi, lín ê i-ho̍k í-keng hō͘ chiù-thâng kā-phòa.
59005003	Lín ê kim, gûn siⁿ-sian, chiah-ê sian ōe chiâⁿ-chòe khòng-kò lín ê chèng-kù, koh ōe chhin-chhiūⁿ hé sio-bia̍t lín ê seng-khu. Lín ūi-tio̍h chiong-boa̍t ê ji̍t-chí chek-chū chîⁿ-châi.
59005004	Tī lín ê chhân-hn̂g ūi lín chòe-kang kā lín siu-koah ê lâng, lín bô kang-chîⁿ hō͘ in. Tio̍h thiaⁿ in kiò-khó͘ ê siaⁿ! Hiah-ê siu-koah ê kang-lâng ho͘-kiò ê siaⁿ Chú --- Bān-kun ê Thóng-sòe í-keng ū thiaⁿ-tio̍h.
59005005	Lín tī tōe-chiūⁿ hióng-siū chhia-hoa iàn-lo̍k. Lín ka-kī chia̍h-kah pûi chut-chut, teh tán hō͘ lâng thâi ê ji̍t.
59005006	Lín kā bû-ko͘ ê lâng tēng-chōe, kā i sat-hāi, i mā bô kā lín tí-khòng.
59005007	Só͘-í, hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, tio̍h jím-nāi kàu Chú ê lâi-lîm. Lín khòaⁿ, lông-hu án-chóaⁿ thèng-hāu chhân-ni̍h pó-kùi ê siu-sêng; i nāi-sim thèng-hāu chhun-lîm chhiu-ú.
59005008	Lín mā tio̍h jím-nāi. Lín ê sim tio̍h kian-tēng, in-ūi Chú ê lâi-lîm kūn lah.
59005009	Hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, m̄-thang hō͘-siōng bâi-oàn, chiah-bián siū Siōng-tè sím-phòaⁿ. Lín khòaⁿ, Sím-phòaⁿ-chiá khiā tī mn̂g-kháu lah.
59005010	Hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, tio̍h ēng hiah-ê hōng Chú ê miâ kóng-ōe ê sian-ti chòe jím-siū khó͘-lān ê bô͘-iūⁿ.
59005011	Hiah-ê thun-lún kàu-bé ê lâng, lán khòaⁿ in chòe ū hok-khì. Lín bat thiaⁿ-kìⁿ [Iok-pek] ê jím-nāi, chai Chú chòe-āu ū án-chóaⁿ kā i chiàu-kò͘, in-ūi Chú chhiong-móa lîn-bín kap chû-ài.
59005012	Góa ê hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, siōng tiōng-iàu ê chiū-sī, m̄-thang kí thiⁿ, tōe, á-sī sím-mi̍h mi̍h-kiāⁿ chiù-chōa. “Sī” chiū kóng “sī”, “m̄-sī” chiū kóng “m̄-sī”; án-ni lín chiah-bián siū Siōng-tè sím-phòaⁿ.
59005013	Lín tiong-kan ū thòng-khó͘ ê lâng bô? Nā ū, i tio̍h kî-tó. Lín tiong-kan ū hoaⁿ-hí ê lâng bô? Nā ū, i tio̍h chhiùⁿ o-ló ê si-koa.
59005014	Lín tiong-kan ū phòa-pīⁿ ê lâng bô? Nā ū, i tio̍h chhiáⁿ kàu-hōe ê tiúⁿ-ló thòe i kî-tó, hōng Chú ê miâ kā i boah-iû.
59005015	Ū sìn-sim ê kî-tó ōe kiù pīⁿ-lâng; Chú ōe hō͘ i koh hó khí-lâi, i só͘ hoān ê chōe mā ōe tit-tio̍h sià-bián.
59005016	Só͘-í, lín tio̍h hō͘-siōng jīn-chōe, saⁿ-thòe kî-tó, thang hō͘ lín tit-tio̍h i-hó. Gī-lâng ê kî-tó ū tōa kong-hāu.
59005017	[Í-lī-a] kap lán pîⁿ-pîⁿ sī lâng. I pek-chhiat kî-tó kóng m̄-thang lo̍h-hō͘, kó-jiân ū saⁿ nî pòaⁿ kú tōe-chiūⁿ bô lo̍h-hō͘.
59005018	I koh kî-tó, thiⁿ kó-jiân lo̍h tōa-hō͘, thó͘-tōe chiū seng-sán ngó͘-kok.
59005019	Góa ê hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, lín tiong-kan nā ū lâng phian-lī chin-lí, ū lâng koh kā i chhōa tò tńg-lâi,
59005020	lín tio̍h chai, hō͘ sit-bê-ê tò tńg-lâi hit-ê lâng ōe kiù chōe-jîn ê lêng-hûn thoat-lī sí-bông, hō͘ i chin chōe ê chōe-kò tit-tio̍h jia-khàm.
60001001	Góa --- [Pí-tek] sī Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok ê sù-tô͘, góa siá-phoe hō͘ hun-sòaⁿ tī [Pún-to͘], [Ka-lia̍p-thài], [Ka-phàⁿ-to-ka], [A-se-a], [Pí-chhui-nî] téng só͘-chāi khiā-khí ê lâng.
60001002	Lín siū kéng-soán sī chiàu Pē Siōng-tè ū-tēng ê chí-ì, tùi Sèng Sîn chiâⁿ-chòe sèng-kiat, thang sūn-ho̍k Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok, koh tùi I ê huih tit-tio̍h kiat-chēng. Goān Siōng-tè hong-hong hù-hù sù lín un-tián kap pêng-an!
60001003	Tio̍h chheng-chàn lán ê Chú Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok ê Pē Siōng-tè! Kun-kù I bô-hān ê jîn-chû, thong-kè Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok tùi sí-lâng tiong koh-oa̍h, Siōng-tè ū hō͘ lán têng-chhut-sì thang tit-tio̍h oa̍h-oa̍h ê ǹg-bāng,
60001004	lâi sêng-siū I ūi-tio̍h lín pó-chûn tī thiⁿ-ni̍h hit-ê bōe hiú-nōa, bōe phah lâ-sâm, bōe siau-sit ê hok-khì.
60001005	Che sī beh hō͘ lín chiah-ê thong-kè sìn siū I ê tōa lêng-le̍k pó-siú ê lâng thang tit-tio̍h chún-pī tī chiong-boa̍t ê sî-ki beh si̍t-hiān ê chín-kiù.
60001006	Ūi-tio̍h án-ni, sui-jiân lín hiān-chāi chiām-sî iáu tio̍h siū chióng-chióng ê chhì-liān sim kan-khó͘, lín tio̍h hoaⁿ-hí.
60001007	Che sī beh chèng-bêng lín ê sìn-sim kham-tit siū khó-giām, pí hō͘ hé liān-kè iáu ōe pāi-hoāi ê kim koh-khah pó-kùi, thang hō͘ lín tī Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok hián-hiān ê sî tit-tio̍h o-ló, êng-kng, kap chun-kùi.
60001008	Lín sui-jiân m̄-bat khòaⁿ-tio̍h I, mā thiàⁿ I; hiān-chāi bô khòaⁿ-kìⁿ I, iáu-kú sìn I. Lín ū ēng giân-gú bōe-tàng piáu-ta̍t ke̍k-tōa ê hoaⁿ-hí,
60001009	in-ūi lín ōe tit-tio̍h sìn ê kiat-kó, chiū-sī lêng-hûn ê tit-kiù.
60001010	Koan-hē chit-ê chín-kiù, ū-giân lín ōe tit-tio̍h un-tián hiah-ê sian-ti í-keng ū gián-kiù koh siông-sè cha-khó.
60001011	In tit-tio̍h tī in sim-lāi Ki-tok ê Sîn tùi in ê chí-sī, cha-khó koan-hē Ki-tok ê siū-khó͘ kap āu-lâi tit-tio̍h êng-kng chit-ê ū-giân ōe tī sím-mi̍h sî, ōe án-chóaⁿ si̍t-hiān.
60001012	Siōng-tè ū kā in khé-sī, hō͘ in chai in ê sū-hōng m̄-sī ūi-tio̍h ka-kī, sī ūi-tio̍h lín. Chiah-ê sū hiān-chāi í-keng ū khò tùi thiⁿ lâi ê Sèng Sîn, thong-kè hok-im ê sù-chiá thoân ho͘ lín; chiah-ê sū liân thiⁿ-sài mā pek-chhiat teh thèng-hāu ài chai.
60001013	Só͘-í, lín ê sim-chì tio̍h chún-pī piān, tio̍h kéng-séng, choân-sim ǹg-bāng Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok hián-hiān ê sî só͘ beh sù lín ê un-tián.
60001014	Tio̍h chòe sūn-ho̍k ê kiáⁿ-jî, m̄-thang chiàu lín chêng m̄-bat Siōng-tè ê sî án-ni hòng-chhiòng su-io̍k.
60001015	Ho͘-tiàu lín ê Siōng-tè sī sèng-kiat, lín tī it-chhè ê hêng-ûi mā tio̍h sèng-kiat.
60001016	In-ūi Sèng-keng ū kì-chài, “Lín tio̍h sèng-kiat, in-ūi góa sī sèng-kiat. ”
60001017	Lín kì-jiân kiû-kiò ēng kâng chi̍t ê phiau-chún, chiàu ta̍k lâng ê hêng-ûi sím-phòaⁿ lâng Hit-ūi chòe Pē, chiū tio̍h ēng kèng-ùi ê sim tī sè-kan ê ji̍t-chí choh kiâu-bîn seng-oa̍h.
60001018	In-ūi lín chai, lín siū sio̍k-hôe thoat-lī chó͘-sian lâu hō͘ lín hit khoán bô lō͘-ēng ê thoân-thóng, m̄-sī ēng ōe pāi-hoāi ê kim-gûn,
60001019	sī ēng hit-ūi bô khoat-tiám bô ù-tiám ê iûⁿ-ko Ki-tok só͘ lâu ê pó-huih.
60001020	Ki-tok tī chhòng-chō ú-tiū í-chêng seng hō͘ Siōng-tè kéng-soán, tī chit-ê boa̍t-kî chiah ūi-tio̍h lín hián-hiān.
60001021	Lín thong-kè Ki-tok sìn hō͘ I tùi sí-lâng tiong koh-oa̍h koh sù I êng-kng hit-ūi Siōng-tè; án-ni, lín ê sìn kap ǹg-bāng lóng chāi-tī Siōng-tè.
60001022	Lín í-keng tùi sūn-thàn chin-lí lâi kiat-chēng ka-kī, ū sûn-chin ê chhiú-chiok-chi-chêng, chiū tio̍h ēng chheng-khì ê sim tùi sim-tóe jia̍t-chhiat saⁿ-thiàⁿ.
60001023	Lín m̄-sī tùi ōe pāi-hoāi, sī tùi bōe pāi-hoāi ê chéng-chí, chiū-sī thong-kè Siōng-tè oa̍h-oa̍h, éng-oán bōe bô-khì ê ōe lâi têng-chhut-sì.
60001024	In-ūi Sèng-keng ū kì-chài: Lâng lóng chhin-chhiūⁿ chháu, in ê êng-hôa lóng chhin-chhiūⁿ chháu hoe; chháu ōe ta, hoe ōe siā,
60001025	chóng-sī Chú ê ōe éng-oán chûn-chāi. Che chiū-sī thoân hō͘ lín ê hok-im ê sìn-sit.
60002001	Só͘-í, tio̍h khì-sak it-chhè ê pháiⁿ, it-chhè ê khúi-chà, ké-hó, chi̍t-tò͘, kap it-chhè ê húi-pòng.
60002002	Tio̍h chhin-chhiūⁿ tú chhut-sì ê eⁿ-á chin ài sûn ê sio̍k-lêng ê lin, hō͘ lín thang sêng-tióng kàu tit-tio̍h kiù;
60002003	in-ūi lín í-keng ū tam-tio̍h Chú ê jîn-chû.
60002004	Tio̍h chhin-kūn Chú, I sī oa̍h-chio̍h, sui-jiân hō͘ lâng khì-sak, m̄-kú siū Siōng-tè kéng-soán khòaⁿ-chòe pó-kùi.
60002005	Lín mā tio̍h choh oa̍h-chio̍h, hō͘ Siōng-tè ēng lâi khí-chō sio̍k-lêng ê tiān, koh choh sèng-kiat ê chè-si, thong-kè Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok hiàn Siōng-tè só͘ hoaⁿ-hí sio̍k-lêng ê chè-mi̍h.
60002006	In-ūi Sèng-keng ū kì-chài: Khòaⁿ ah, góa beh tī Sek-an hē chi̍t tè chio̍h, sī siū kéng pó-kùi ê chhù-kak-chio̍h; sìn I ê lâng choa̍t-tùi bōe sit-bāng.
60002007	Chit tè chio̍h tùi lín chiah-ê sìn ê lâng sī pó-kùi ê, m̄-kú tùi m̄-sìn ê lâng sī: Khí-chhù sai-hū só͘ khì-sak ê chio̍h í-keng chiâⁿ-chòe siōng tiōng-iàu ê ki-chio̍h!
60002008	Tī pa̍t-ūi ū kì-chài: Chit tè sī poàn-kha-chio̍h, sī hō͘ lâng poa̍h-tó ê chio̍h. In m̄ sūn-thàn tō-lí lâi poa̍h-tó sī Siōng-tè ê an-pâi.
60002009	M̄-kú lín leh, lín sī siū kéng-soán ê chióng-cho̍k, ông-ka ê chè-si, sèng-kiat ê kok-tō͘, Siōng-tè ê chú-bîn, beh hō͘ lín thang soan-iông Siōng-tè úi-tāi ê chok-ûi; chit-ūi Siōng-tè ū tiàu lín chhut o͘-àm lâi ji̍p tī I chhàn-lān ê kng-bêng.
60002010	Sèng-keng kóng: Lín chêng m̄-sī Siōng-tè ê chú-bîn, hiān-chāi sī I ê chú-bîn; lín chêng bô tit-tio̍h Siōng-tè ê lîn-bín, hiān-chāi tit-tio̍h I ê lîn-bín.
60002011	Chhin-ài ê hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, lín tī sè-kan choh kiâu-bîn, choh lú-kheh, góa khǹg lín m̄-thang hòng-chhiòng jio̍k-thé ê chêng-io̍k; chit-ê chêng-io̍k put-sî teh kong-kek lêng-hûn.
60002012	Lín tī bī-sìn-chiá ê tiong-kan tio̍h ū hó hêng-ûi, hō͘ hiah-ê húi-pòng lín sī pháiⁿ-lâng ê lâng thang khòaⁿ-kìⁿ lín ê hó hêng-ûi, tī Chú lâi-lîm ê Ji̍t kui êng-kng hō͘ Siōng-tè.
60002013	Ūi-tio̍h Chú ê iân-kò͘, lín tio̍h sūn-thàn lâng it-chhè ê chè-tō͘, bô-lūn sī tùi chòe-ko ê thóng-tī-chiá kun-ông,
60002014	á-sī tùi kun-ông só͘ phài lâi chióng-lē chòe hó ê lâng, hêng-hoa̍t chòe pháiⁿ ê lâng ê koaⁿ-tiúⁿ lóng tio̍h án-ni.
60002015	In-ūi che sī Siōng-tè ê chí-ì; I ài lín chòe hó, hō͘ bô tì-sek ê gōng-lâng bô ōe thang kóng.
60002016	Lín choh chū-iû ê lâng, m̄-thang ēng chū-iû chòe siâ-ok ê chià-kháu, tio̍h choh Siōng-tè ê lô͘-po̍k.
60002017	Lín tio̍h chun-tiōng só͘-ū ê lâng; tio̍h thiàⁿ hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, kèng-ùi Siōng-tè, chun-kèng kun-ông.
60002018	Lín choh po̍k-jîn ê, tio̍h kiong-kèng sūn-thàn lín ê chú-lâng, m̄-nā tùi siān-liông un-hô ê chú-lâng, liân khek-po̍k ê mā tio̍h án-ni.
60002019	Tú-tio̍h bô eng-kai siū ê thòng-khó͘, nā liáu-kái sī Siōng-tè ê ì-sù lâi jím-siū sī thang chheng-chàn ê.
60002020	Lín nā chòe m̄-tio̍h hō͘ lâng phah lâi jím-siū thòng-khó͘, ū sím-mi̍h thé-biān? M̄-kú lín nā choh-hó lâi jím-siū khó͘-lān, che sī Siōng-tè só͘ chheng-chàn ê.
60002021	Ūi-tio̍h chit-ê, Siōng-tè ho͘-tiàu lín; in-ūi Ki-tok mā ū ūi-tio̍h lín siū-khó͘, lâu bô͘-iūⁿ hō͘ lín, beh hō͘ lín thang tè I ê kha-pō͘.
60002022	I bô hoān-chōe; I ê chhùi mā bô khúi-chà.
60002023	I siū lóe-mē, bô lóe-mē tò-tńg; siū ge̍k-thāi, mā bô kā lâng ui-hia̍p; chí-ū chiong ka-kī kau-thok hō͘ hit-ūi kong-gī ê Sím-phòaⁿ-chiá.
60002024	Ki-tok tī si̍p-jī-kè téng chhin-sin tam-tng lán ê chōe, hō͘ lán ǹg chōe sí, ǹg gī lâi oa̍h; tùi I ê siū-siong, lín tit-tio̍h i-tī.
60002025	Lín chêng chhin-chhiūⁿ iûⁿ bê-lō͘, hiān-chāi í-keng tńg-lâi kui tī lín lêng-hûn ê Bo̍k-chiá kap Kàm-hō͘-chiá.
60003001	Siâng-khoán, lín choh hū-jîn-lâng-ê tio̍h sūn-ho̍k ka-kī ê tiōng-hu. Án-ni, in tiong-kan nā ū lâng bô sūn-thàn tō-lí ê, ōe tùi lín ê hó phín-hēng siū kám-hòa; lín lóng m̄-bián kóng pòaⁿ-kù ōe,
60003002	in-ūi in ōe khòaⁿ-chhut lín ê seng-oa̍h sûn-kiat koh kèng-khiân.
60003003	Lín m̄-thang khò pīⁿ thâu-mn̂g, kòa kim-khì, chhēng súi-saⁿ téng chng-thāⁿ,
60003004	tio̍h khò lōe-chāi ê súi, ēng un-jiû kap an-chēng ê sèng-chêng chòe bōe pāi-hoāi ê chng-thāⁿ; che tī Siōng-tè ê bīn-chêng sī siōng pó-kùi ê.
60003005	In-ūi chá-sî gióng-bōng Siōng-tè hiah-ê sèng-kiat ê hū-jîn-lâng mā-sī án-ni chng-thāⁿ ka-kī, sūn-ho̍k in ê tiōng-hu;
60003006	chhin-chhiūⁿ [Sat-la̍h] sūn-chiông [A-pek-la-hán], chheng-ho͘ i chòe “Chú-lâng”. Lín nā chòe hó-sū, bô siū khióng-hat tì-kàu kiaⁿ-hiâⁿ, chiū-sī [Sat-la̍h] ê cha-bó͘-kiáⁿ.
60003007	Kâng-khoán, lín choh tiōng-hu-ê tio̍h kap ka-kī ê hū-jîn-lâng chòe-hé seng-oa̍h, thé-thiap in jio̍k-thé-siōng khah loán-jio̍k. Tio̍h kā in chun-tiōng, in-ūi in mā kap lín pîⁿ-pîⁿ sī hun-hióng Siōng-tè un-sù ê oa̍h-miā ê lâng. Án-ni, lín ê kî-tó chiah bōe siū chó͘-gāi.
60003008	Chóng kóng, lín tio̍h tâng-sim, tâng-chêng, saⁿ-thiàⁿ chhin-chhiūⁿ hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, tio̍h ū jîn-chû, sim chûn khiam-pi;
60003009	bô ēng pháiⁿ pò pháiⁿ, á-sī ēng bú-jio̍k tùi-hù bú-jio̍k; tian-tò tio̍h ēng chiok-hok hôe-pò, in-ūi lín sī ūi-tio̍h chit-ê siū ho͘-tiàu, hō͘ lín thang sêng-siū hok-khì.
60003010	In-ūi Sèng-keng ū kì-chài: Lâng nā ài sìⁿ-miā, ài kè hó ji̍t-chí, tio̍h kìm-chí chhùi-chi̍h bô kóng pháiⁿ ōe, chhùi-tûn bô kóng khúi-chà.
60003011	Tio̍h lī-khui pháiⁿ, chòe hó-sū, it-sim tui-kiû hô-pêng.
60003012	In-ūi Chú ê ba̍k-chiu khòaⁿ-kò͘ gī-lâng, I ê hīⁿ-khang thiaⁿ in ê kî-kiû; m̄-kú I ōe tùi choh-pháiⁿ ê lâng pìⁿ-bīn.
60003013	Lín nā jia̍t-sim choh-hó, siáⁿ-lâng ōe hāi lín?
60003014	Chóng-sī lín nā ūi-tio̍h gī siū-khó͘, chiū ū hok-khì. M̄-bián kiaⁿ lâng ê ui-hia̍p, mā m̄-bián tio̍h-kip put-an.
60003015	Tio̍h chun-chông Ki-tok chòe Chú. Nā ū lâng mn̄g lín sim-tiong ê ǹg-bāng, tio̍h chún-pī piān-piān thang tùi in piān-bêng.
60003016	Put-kò tio̍h ēng un-hô kap chun-tiōng ê thài-tō͘ lâi hôe-tap. Tio̍h ū chheng-pe̍k ê liông-sim, thang tī lín siū bú-jio̍k ê sî hō͘ hiah-ê bú-jio̍k lín ê lâng khòaⁿ-kìⁿ lín khò Ki-tok só͘ piáu-hiān ê hó phín-hēng kám-kak kiàn-siàu.
60003017	Siū-khó͘ nā-sī Siōng-tè ê chí-ì, choh-hó lâi siū-khó͘ pí choh-pháiⁿ lâi siū-khó͘ khah hó.
60003018	In-ūi Ki-tok mā bat ūi-tio̍h chōe siū-khó͘, chi̍t piàn chiū oân-sêng; gī ê lâng thòe put-gī ê lâng siū-khó͘, sī ūi-tio̍h beh chhōa lín kàu Siōng-tè ê bīn-chêng. Tī jio̍k-thé, I siū chhú-sí; tī lêng, I ū koh-oa̍h.
60003019	Thong-kè I ê lêng, I mā ū khì tùi hiah-ê tī kaⁿ-lāi ê lêng thoân-tō,
60003020	chiū-sī [Ná-a] chún-pī tōa-chûn ê sî, Siōng-tè ū nāi-sim thèng-hāu hiah-ê m̄ sūn-ho̍k I ê lâng. Tng-sî chìn-ji̍p tōa-chûn ê lâng bô kúi ê, chí-ū poeh ê, in ū tùi chúi-ni̍h tit-tio̍h kiù.
60003021	Chit-ê chúi ū-piáu sóe-lé, m̄-sī beh sóe-tû lín seng-khu ê lah-sap, sī beh hō͘ lín ū chheng-pe̍k ê liông-sim thang tùi Siōng-tè kî-kiû; chit-ê sóe-lé thong-kè Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok ê koh-oa̍h hō͘ lín tit-tio̍h chín-kiù.
60003022	I í-keng chiūⁿ-thiⁿ, hiān-chāi tī Siōng-tè ê chiàⁿ-pêng teh chiáng-koán chèng thiⁿ-sài í-ki̍p lêng-kài ê chiáng-koân-chiá kap koân-le̍k-chiá.
60004001	Ki-tok kì-jiân tī jio̍k-thé siū-khó͘, lín mā tio̍h ū kâng-khoán ê sim-chì lâi chong-pī ka-kī, in-ūi tī jio̍k-thé siū-khó͘ sī kap chōe-ok toān-choa̍t koan-hē.
60004002	Án-ni, lín tī sè-kan só͘ chhun ê ji̍t-chí chiū bô koh chiàu lâng ê chêng-io̍k, sī chiàu Siōng-tè ê chí-ì lâi oa̍h.
60004003	Lín ū lōng-hùi kong-im chòe bī-sìn-chiá só͘ ài chòe ê sū, îm-loān, sek-io̍k, chiú-chùi, iàn-lo̍k, tōa-chia̍h tōa-lim, kap khó-ò͘ⁿ ê ngó͘-siōng chông-pài téng, í-keng kàu-gia̍h lah.
60004004	In khòaⁿ-kìⁿ lín bô koh kap in kè hòng-tōng bô chiat-chè ê seng-oa̍h, chiū kî-koài soah kā lín húi-pòng.
60004005	In tio̍h kap teh-beh sím-phòaⁿ oa̍h-lâng kap sí-lâng ê Siōng-tè sǹg-siàu.
60004006	Ūi-tio̍h án-ni, hok-im sīm-chì ū thoân hō͘ sí-khì ê lâng, án-ni, in ê jio̍k-thé sui-jiân ū chiàu it-poaⁿ lâng ê khoán siū sím-phòaⁿ, m̄-kú in ê lêng ōe-tàng chiàu Siōng-tè ê khoán lâi oa̍h.
60004007	Bān-iú ê chiong-kio̍k kūn lah! Só͘-í, tio̍h kín-sīn siú-kí, thang kéng-séng kî-tó.
60004008	Siōng iàu-kín ê, sī tio̍h jia̍t-chhiat saⁿ-thiàⁿ, in-ūi thiàⁿ ōe jia-khàm chin chōe chōe-kò.
60004009	Tio̍h hō͘-siōng hó khoán-thāi, m̄-thang bâi-oàn.
60004010	Choh Siōng-tè só͘ sù ta̍k hāng un-sù ê hó koán-ke, tio̍h chiàu ta̍k ê lâng só͘ tit-tio̍h ê un-sù hō͘-siōng ho̍k-bū.
60004011	Kóng tō-lí ê, tio̍h kóng Siōng-tè ê sìn-sit; sū-hōng ê, tio̍h chiàu Siōng-tè só͘-sù un-sù ê le̍k-liōng lâi sū-hōng, hō͘ Siōng-tè thong-kè Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok tī bān-sū tit-tio̍h êng-iāu. Goān êng-kng koân-pèng lóng kui I, ti̍t-kàu éng-éng oán-oán. Amen!
60004012	Chhin-ài ê hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, lín tú-tio̍h chhin-chhiūⁿ hé ê chhì-liān, m̄-thang ná-chún tú-tio̍h kî-koài ê sū;
60004013	hoán-tńg tio̍h in-ūi ū hun-tam Ki-tok ê khó͘-lān lâi hoaⁿ-hí, hō͘ lín tī I êng-iāu hián-hiān ê sî mā thang hoaⁿ-hí khoài-lo̍k.
60004014	Lín nā ūi-tio̍h Ki-tok ê miâ siū lêng-jio̍k, lín chin ū hok-khì, in-ūi ū Siōng-tè êng-kng ê Sîn tiàm tī lín sin-chiūⁿ.
60004015	Lín tiong-kan m̄-thang ū lâng in-ūi thâi-lâng, choh-chha̍t, choh-pháiⁿ, á-sī ài koán pa̍t-lâng ê tāi-chì lâi siū-khó͘.
60004016	Nā in-ūi choh Ki-tok-tô͘ lâi siū-khó͘, m̄-bián kiàn-siàu, hoán-tńg tio̍h in-ūi ū chit-ê miâ kui êng-kng hō͘ Siōng-tè.
60004017	Sím-phòaⁿ ê sî kàu lah! Siōng-tè ê ke tio̍h tāi-seng siū sím-phòaⁿ; nā tùi lán khai-sí, hiah-ê m̄ sìn-thàn Siōng-tè hok-im ê lâng ê kiat-kio̍k kiám bōe koh-khah giâm-tiōng?
60004018	Sèng-keng ū kóng: Gī-lâng tit-kiù to chin oh, bô kèng-khiân ê lâng kap chōe-jîn kiám bōe koh-khah khùn-lân?
60004019	Só͘-í, hiah-ê chiàu Siōng-tè ê chí-ì siū-khó͘ ê lâng, tio̍h chiong ka-kī kau-thok hō͘ hit-ūi thang sìn-khò ê Chō-bu̍t-chú, kè-sio̍k chòe hó-sū.
60005001	Góa choh tiúⁿ-ló, koh choh Ki-tok siū-khó͘ ê kiàn-chèng-jîn, ū hūn tī I teh-beh hián-hiān ê êng-kng, góa kā lín tiong-kan pîⁿ-pîⁿ teh choh tiúⁿ-ló ê lâng khó͘-khǹg.
60005002	Tio̍h bo̍k-ióng Siōng-tè kau-tài lín ê iûⁿ-kûn, kā in koàn-kò͘, m̄-sī bián-kióng, sī chiàu Siōng-tè ê chí-ì kam-sim lo̍k-ì; m̄-sī ūi-tio̍h tham-châi, sī chū-goān jia̍t-sim lâi chòe.
60005003	Kau-tài hō͘ lín ê iûⁿ-kûn, m̄-thang ēng koân-ui koán-hat, tio̍h chòe in ê bô͘-iūⁿ.
60005004	Án-ni, lín tī Tōa-bo̍k-chiá hián-hiān ê sî ōe-tàng tit-tio̍h éng-oán bōe sit-khì kong-chhái êng-kng ê hoa-koan.
60005005	Siâng-khoán, lín siàu-liân-lâng tio̍h sūn-ho̍k tióng-pòe. Lín tāi-ke tio̍h khiam-pi saⁿ tùi-thāi; in-ūi Sèng-keng ū kì-chài: Siōng-tè te̍k-tùi kiau-ngō͘ ê lâng, si-un hō͘ khiam-pi ê lâng.
60005006	Só͘-í, lín tio̍h tī Siōng-tè tōa khùi-la̍t ê chhiú-ē khiam-pi, I kàu sî chiū ōe kā lín ko-seng.
60005007	Lín tio̍h chiong it-chhè ê khòa-lū kau hō͘ Siōng-tè, in-ūi I koan-sim lín.
60005008	Tio̍h kín-sīn, tio̍h kéng-séng, in-ūi lín ê tùi-te̍k Mô͘-kúi chhin-chhiūⁿ teh háu ê sai, sì-kòe kiâⁿ teh chhē thang thun-chia̍h ê lâng.
60005009	Tio̍h khò kian-tēng ê sìn-sim lâi tí-tng i, in-ūi lín chai choân sè-kài ê chèng hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē lóng teh keng-le̍k siâng-khoán ê khó͘-lān.
60005010	Sù it-chhè un-tián ê Siōng-tè, chiū-sī thong-kè Ki-tok lâi ho͘-tiàu lín chìn-ji̍p éng-oán ê êng-kng Hit-ūi, tī lín chiām-sî siū-khó͘ í-āu, it-tēng ōe chhin-sin kā lín tiông-sin kiàn-li̍p, sù lín khùi-la̍t, hō͘ lín kian-kò͘ khiā-chāi.
60005011	Goān koân-lêng kui hō͘ I, ti̍t-kàu éng-oán. Amen!
60005012	Thong-kè tiong-si̍t ê hiaⁿ-tī [Se-lah], góa siá chit tiuⁿ té-té ê phoe hō͘ lín, lâi bián-lē lín, koh kiàn-chèng che sī Siōng-tè chin-si̍t ê un-tián. Tio̍h tī chit-ê un-tián téng-bīn khiā-chāi.
60005013	Tiàm tī [Pa-pí-lûn] kap lín pîⁿ-pîⁿ siū kéng-tiàu ê kàu-hōe kā lín chhéng-an. Góa ê kiáⁿ [Má-khó] mā kā lín chhéng-an.
60005014	Tio̍h ēng thiàⁿ ê saⁿ-chim hō͘-siōng chhéng-an. Goān pêng-an kui tī lín só͘-ū sio̍k Ki-tok ê lâng!
61001001	Góa --- [Se-biān] [Pí-tek] sī Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok ê lô͘-po̍k kap sù-tô͘, góa siá-phoe hō͘ hiah-ê khò lán ê Siōng-tè kap Kiù-chú Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok ê gī kap goán hun-hióng kâng-khoán pó-kùi sìn-gióng ê lâng.
61001002	Goān Siōng-tè, thong-kè lín jīn-bat I kap lán ê Chú Iâ-so͘, hong-hong hù-hù sù lín un-tián kap pêng-an!
61001003	Siōng-tè ū ēng I ê lêng-le̍k chiong kèng-khiân ê seng-oa̍h só͘ su-iàu ê it-chhè sù hō͘ lán; che sī thong-kè lán jīm-sek tiàu lán lâi hun-hióng I ê êng-kng kap liông-siān hit-ūi Siōng-tè lâi ê.
61001004	Án-ni, I ū chiong ke̍k-tōa koh pó-kùi ê èng-ún sù hō͘ lán, hō͘ lín thong-kè chiah-ê èng-ún thang thoat-lī sè-chiūⁿ ê io̍k-bōng só͘ chō-sêng ê hú-pāi lâi hun-hióng Siōng-tè ê pún-sèng.
61001005	Ūi-tio̍h chit-ê, lín tio̍h chīn-la̍t phah-piàⁿ, hō͘ lín ū sìn-sim koh ū tek-hēng, ū tek-hēng koh ū tì-sek,
61001006	ū tì-sek koh ū chiat-chè, ū chiat-chè koh ū jím-nāi, ū jím-nāi koh ū kèng-khiân,
61001007	ū kèng-khiân koh ū chhiú-chiok-chi-chêng, ū chhiú-chiok-chi-chêng koh ū jîn-ài.
61001008	Chiah-ê sī lín só͘ su-iàu ê phín-tek. Chiah-ê lín nā lóng ū, koh ná chhiong-si̍t, ōe hō͘ lín koh-khah chek-ke̍k, koh-khah iú-hāu jīn-bat lán ê Chú Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok.
61001009	Lâng nā bô chiah-ê tek-hēng, sī toán-sī, sī sit-bêng, bōe kì-tit i í-chêng ê chōe í-keng ū sóe chheng-khì.
61001010	Só͘-í, góa ê hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, lín tio̍h koh-khah ló͘-le̍k lâi chèng-bêng Siōng-tè tùi lín ê ho͘-tiàu kap kéng-soán sī khak-si̍t ê; lín nā án-ni chòe chiū bōe tūi-lo̍h.
61001011	Án-ni, Siōng-tè ōe tōa-tōa sù-hok hō͘ lín thang chìn-ji̍p lán ê Chú --- Kiù-chú Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok éng-oán ê Kok-tō͘.
61001012	Án-ni, sui-jiân lín í-keng chai chiah-ê tāi-chì, koh kian-tēng chip-siú lín só͘ niá-siū ê chin-lí, góa iáu-kú beh put-sî kā lín thê-chhíⁿ chiah-ê tāi-chì.
61001013	Góa siūⁿ, góa iáu oa̍h-teh ê sî, tio̍h kā lín thê-chhíⁿ.
61001014	Lán ê Chú Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok í-keng ū chheng-chhó kā góa chí-sī, hō͘ góa chai bô kú chiū ōe thoat-lī chit-ê ōe hú-pāi ê seng-khu.
61001015	Góa beh chīn-la̍t siūⁿ pān-hoat, hō͘ lín tī góa lī-khui sè-kan í-āu put-sî ōe kì-tit chiah-ê tāi-chì.
61001016	Goán tùi lín só͘ kóng Chú Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok tōa koân-lêng lâi-lîm ê sū, m̄-sī kun-kù lâng liap-chō chhut-lâi hu-ké ê thoân-soat; goán ū chhin-ba̍k khòaⁿ-kìⁿ I ê chun-êng.
61001017	I tùi Pē Siōng-tè niá-siū chun-kùi kap êng-iāu ê sî, hit-ūi Chun-giâm ê Êng-kng --- Siōng-tè chhut-siaⁿ kóng, “Chit-ê sī góa só͘ thiàⁿ ê Kiáⁿ, I, góa chin ì-ài.”
61001018	I tī sèng-soaⁿ ê sî goán mā tī hia, ū chhin-sin thiaⁿ-kìⁿ tùi thiⁿ-téng chhut-lâi chit-ê siaⁿ.
61001019	Só͘-í goán tùi sian-ti só͘ soan-pò͘ ê sìn-sit koh-khah ū khak-sìn. Lín tio̍h chù-ì thiaⁿ, in-ūi chit-ê sìn-sit chhin-chhiūⁿ chi̍t pha teng tī o͘-àm ê só͘-chāi teh chiò, chiò kàu thiⁿ-kng, kàu khé-bêng-chhiⁿ chhut-hiān tī lín sim-lāi ê sî.
61001020	Siōng iàu-kín ê, tio̍h chai, Sèng-keng ê ū-giân m̄-thang chiàu ka-kī ê ì-sù kóe-seh.
61001021	In-ūi ū-giân m̄-sī chhut-tī lâng ê ì-sù, sī lâng siū Sèng Sîn kám-tōng kóng chhut tùi Siōng-tè lâi ê sìn-sit.
61002001	Í-chêng mā ū ké sian-ti tī bîn-kan chhut-hiān; kâng-khoán, hiān-chāi mā ū ké kàu-su ōe tī lín tiong-kan chhut-hiān. In àm-tiong chiong hō͘ lâng bia̍t-bông ê īⁿ-toan tòa ji̍p-lâi, sīm-chì m̄ sêng-jīn hit-ūi sio̍k-hôe in ê Chú-cháiⁿ, tì-kàu ka-kī chin kín chiū bia̍t-bông.
61002002	M̄-kú iáu ū chin chōe lâng o̍h in îm-loān ê seng-oa̍h, tì-kàu chin-lí ê Tō-lō͘ in-ūi in siū húi-pòng.
61002003	Chiah-ê ké kàu-su in-ūi tham-sim, ōe ēng liap-chō ê kò͘-sū pián lín ê châi-bu̍t. Tùi chit khoán lâng ê tēng-chōe chá chiū koat-tēng; in chin kín chiū bia̍t-bông.
61002004	Siōng-tè bô khoan-iông hoān-chōe ê thiⁿ-sài, kā in tàn-lo̍h tōe-ge̍k, koaiⁿ tī o͘-àm ê chhim-khiⁿ, thèng-hāu sím-phòaⁿ.
61002005	Siōng-tè mā bô khoan-iông kó͘-tāi ê sè-kài, ēng tōa-chúi im-bia̍t bô kèng-ùi Siōng-tè ê sè-kan-lâng, chí-ū kiù soan-iông kong-gī ê [Ná-a] kap kî-tha chhit ê lâng.
61002006	Siōng-tè chhú-hoa̍t [Só͘-to-má] kap [Gô-mô͘-la̍h] ê siâⁿ-chhī, ēng hé húi-bia̍t in, hō͘ bô kèng-ùi Siōng-tè ê lâng chòe kéng-kài.
61002007	Siōng-tè ū kiù gī-lâng [Lô-tek], in-ūi [Lô-tek] ūi-tio̍h siâ-ok ê lâng îm-loān ê só͘-chòe chhau-sim.
61002008	Hit-ê gī-lâng [Lô-tek] tiàm tī in tiong-kan, ta̍k ji̍t ū thiaⁿ-kìⁿ koh khòaⁿ-tio̍h hiah-ê siâ-ok ê tāi-chì, sim-lāi hui-siông thòng-khó͘.
61002009	Chú chai án-chóaⁿ kiù kèng-khiân ê lâng thoat-lī chhì-liān, mā chai kā put-gī ê lâng lâu kàu Sím-phòaⁿ ê Ji̍t siū hêng-hoa̍t, te̍k-pia̍t sī hiah-ê hòng-chhiòng jio̍k-thé chêng-io̍k kap biáu-sī Siōng-tè koân-ui ê lâng. Chiah-ê ké kàu-su tōa-táⁿ koh kiau-ngō͘, sīm-chì káⁿ bú-jio̍k chun-kùi ê chèng thiⁿ-sài.
61002011	Hiah-ê thiⁿ-sài ê khùi-la̍t kap lêng-le̍k sui-jiân pí ké kàu-su khah tōa, mā bô tī Siōng-tè ê bīn-chêng ēng bú-jio̍k ê ōe kā in khòng-kò.
61002012	M̄-kú, chiah-ê lâng kap chhut-sì chiū thàn pún-lêng teh oa̍h, beh hō͘ lâng lia̍h-khì thâi ê iá-siù kâng-khoán, in húi-pòng ka-kī m̄-bat ê sū; iá-siù húi-bia̍t, in mā ōe án-ni siū húi-bia̍t,
61002013	siū-tio̍h ka-kī put-gī ê hêng-ûi èng-tit ê pò-èng. Tùi in lâi kóng, hióng-lo̍k sī tī ji̍t-sî chiū tîm-bê tī chêng-io̍k ê boán-chiok. In kap lín chòe-hé lim-chia̍h ê sî, tōa-chia̍h tōa-lim, hòng-chhiòng iàn-lo̍k, oân-choân sit-thài.
61002014	In ê ba̍k-chiu chí-ū ài khòaⁿ siâ-îm, bô hoān-chōe tòng bōe-tiâu. In ín-iú ì-chì po̍k-jio̍k ê lâng. In ê sim chí-ū siūⁿ tham-châi. In sī Siōng-tè chiù-chó͘ ê lâng!
61002015	In lī-khui chiàⁿ-lō͘, kiâⁿ bê-lō͘, kiâⁿ [Pí-ní] ê kiáⁿ [Pa-lân] só͘ kiâⁿ ê lō͘. [Pa-lân] tham-ài put-gī ê chîⁿ-châi,
61002016	ūi-tio̍h só͘ hoān ê chōe siū chek-pī. Chi̍t chiah bōe kóng-ōe ê lû-á kèng-jiân ēng lâng ê siaⁿ chó͘-chí sian-ti [Pa-lân] hong-kông ê siūⁿ-hoat.
61002017	Chiah-ê lâng chhin-chhiūⁿ ta-khì ê chúi-chôaⁿ, chhin-chhiūⁿ hō͘ tōa-hong chhe-sòaⁿ ê hûn-bū; Siōng-tè í-keng ū kā in tī o͘-àm ê chhim-ian lâu chi̍t ê só͘-chāi.
61002018	In kóng khong-tōng ê gōng-ōe, ēng bōe-tàng khòng-chè ê jio̍k-thé ê chêng-io̍k ín-iú tú-tú-á thoat-lī sit-bê seng-oa̍h ê lâng.
61002019	In tah-èng hō͘ lâng chū-iû, m̄-kú ka-kī chòe hú-pāi seng-oa̍h ê lô͘-lē; in-ūi lâng siū sím-mi̍h khòng-chè, chiū chiâⁿ-chòe hit-ê ê lô͘-lē.
61002020	Lâng jīn-bat lán ê Chú --- Kiù-chú Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok thoat-lī sè-kan ê hú-pāi í-āu, nā koh hō͘ hú-pāi ê sè-le̍k tîⁿ-teh koh ap-chè, chit khoán ê kiat-kio̍k ōe pí í-chêng koh-khah bái.
61002021	In jīn-bat kong-gī ê Tō-lō͘, jiân-āu lī-khui só͘ thoân-siū hō͘ in sîn-sèng ê kài-bēng, án-ni lêng-khó tùi khí-thâu chiū m̄-bat khah hó.
61002022	In ê chêng-hêng tú chhin-chhiūⁿ sio̍k-gú só͘ kóng, “Káu oa̍t tńg-lâi chia̍h ka-kī thò͘ chhut-lâi ê mi̍h”, á-sī, “Ti sóe chheng-khì í-āu sûi-sî koh khì kō lō͘-kô͘-bê.”
61003001	Chhin-ài ê pêng-iú, góa hiān-chāi siá hō͘ lín ê sī tē-jī tiuⁿ phoe. Góa siá chit nn̄g tiuⁿ phoe sī beh thê-chhíⁿ lín lâi kek-khí lín sûn-kiat ê sim-chì.
61003002	Góa ài lín ōe kì-tit kó͘-chá ê sèng sian-ti só͘ kóng ê ōe, kap lín ê sù-tô͘ só͘ thoân lán ê Chú --- Kiù-chú hō͘ lín ê bēng-lēng.
61003003	Siōng iàu-kín ê, lín tio̍h chai, tī chiong-boa̍t ê ji̍t-chí ū chi̍t-kóa thàn su-io̍k seng-oa̍h ê lâng ōe chhut-hiān, kā lín thí-chhiò
61003004	kóng, “Chú èng-ún beh lâi-lîm, taⁿ án-chóaⁿ? I tī tó-ūi? Lán ê chó͘-sian lóng sí-khì, m̄-kú tùi chhòng-sè í-lâi it-chhè lóng kâng-khoán.”
61003005	In kò͘-ì bû-sī chit-ê sū-si̍t, chiū-sī tī kó͘-chá thiⁿ tùi Siōng-tè ê ōe siū chhòng-chō, tōe sī tùi chúi, mā ēng chúi lâi hêng-sêng.
61003006	Tng-sî ê sè-kài sī hō͘ chúi im-ba̍t lâi húi-bia̍t.
61003007	M̄-kú hiān-chāi ê thiⁿ kap tōe mā kâng-khoán tùi Siōng-tè ê ōe tit-tio̍h pó-liû kàu sím-phòaⁿ kap put-khiân ê lâng hō͘ hé húi-bia̍t ê ji̍t.
61003008	Chhin-ài ê pêng-iú, ū chi̍t hāng tāi-chì chhiáⁿ lín m̄-thang bōe kì-tit, chiū-sī tùi Chú lâi khòaⁿ, chi̍t ji̍t ná-chún chi̍t-chheng nî, chi̍t-chheng nî ná-chún chi̍t ji̍t.
61003009	Ū lâng siūⁿ-kóng Chú iân-tî I tah-èng beh chòe ê sū, kî-si̍t I m̄-sī teh iân-tî, sī teh iông-jím lín, bô ài ū lâng bia̍t-bông, ài ta̍k ê lâng lóng hóe-kái.
61003010	M̄-kú Chú ê Ji̍t ōe chhin-chhiūⁿ chha̍t-á hut-jiân lâi. Tī hit-ê Ji̍t, chiah-ê thiⁿ ōe tī tōa ê hiáng-siaⁿ tiong siau-bia̍t, thian-thé hō͘ hé siau-iûⁿ, tōe kap tōe-chiūⁿ it-chhè ê pī-chō-bu̍t lóng siau-bia̍t.
61003011	Kì-jiân chiah-ê it-chhè ōe án-ni húi-bia̍t, lín tio̍h án-chóaⁿ choh-lâng? Lín ê seng-oa̍h tio̍h sèng-kiat, kèng-khiân,
61003012	thèng-hāu Siōng-tè ê Ji̍t kóaⁿ-kín lâi-lîm. Tī hit Ji̍t, chiah-ê thiⁿ ōe hō͘ hé sio-bia̍t, thian-thé ōe hō͘ hé sio-iûⁿ.
61003013	M̄-kú lán teh thèng-hāu ê sī Siōng-tè só͘ èng-ún ê sin ê thiⁿ sin ê tōe, tī hia kong-gī éng-oán tit-tio̍h kiàn-li̍p.
61003014	Só͘-í, chhin-ài ê pêng-iú, kì-jiân lín teh thèng-hāu chiah-ê tāi-chì, tī Siōng-tè ê bīn-chêng tio̍h chīn-la̍t tui-kiû bô khoat-tiám, bô thang chí-chek, thang kap I hô-hó.
61003015	Tio̍h chiong lán ê Chú ê khoan-iông khòaⁿ-chòe lín tit-kiù ê ki-hōe, che mā-sī lán chhin-ài ê hiaⁿ-tī [Pó-lô] ēng Siōng-tè sù hō͘ i ê tì-hūi siá-phoe só͘ khoàn-bián ê.
61003016	I só͘-ū ê phoe lóng ū kóng-khí chiah-ê sū. I ê phoe ū chi̍t-kóa oh lí-kái ê ōe, hō͘ hiah-ê gû-gōng bô tēng-sèng ê lâng kā i khiok-kái, tú kap in teh khiok-kái kî-tha ê keng-bûn kâng-khoán; kiat-kó, in ka-kī thó bia̍t-bông.
61003017	Só͘-í, chhin-ài ê pêng-iú, lín kì-jiân tāi-seng chai chit-ê tāi-chì, tio̍h kéng-kài, chiah-bián hō͘ pháiⁿ-lâng ēng chhò-gō͘ ê giân-lūn chhōa-khì kiâⁿ chhò-gō͘ ê lō͘, lī-khui lín kian-kò͘ ê li̍p-tiûⁿ.
61003018	Tio̍h tī Chú --- lán ê Kiù-chú Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok ê un-tián-ē kap tùi I ê jīm-sek kè-sio̍k chìn-pō͘. Goān êng-kng kui hō͘ I, tùi hiān-chāi ti̍t-kàu éng-oán. Amen!
62001001	Goán beh kā lín soat-bêng chhòng-sè í-chêng chiū chûn-chāi hit-ê oa̍h-miā ê Tō; chit-ê Tō goán ū thiaⁿ-tio̍h, ū chhin-ba̍k khòaⁿ-tio̍h, ū siông-sè khòaⁿ-tio̍h, mā ū chhin-chhiú bong-tio̍h.
62001002	Chit-ê oa̍h-miā í-keng hián-hiān; goán ū khòaⁿ-tio̍h, hiān-chāi chòe kiàn-chèng, koh tùi lín soan-pò͘ goân-lâi kap Pē tông-chāi koh í-keng ū tùi goán hián-hiān chit-ê éng-oán ê oa̍h-miā.
62001003	Goán khòaⁿ-tio̍h koh thiaⁿ-tio̍h ê, hiān-chāi mā tùi lín soan-pò͘, sī beh hō͘ lín mā thang kap goán ū thoân-khè; chit-ê thoân-khè sī goán kap Pē kap I ê Kiáⁿ Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok tiong-kan ê thoân-khè.
62001004	Goán siá chiah-ê sī beh hō͘ lán ū oân-boán ê hoaⁿ-hí.
62001005	Goán tùi Siōng-tè ê Kiáⁿ thiaⁿ-tio̍h, hiān-chāi thoân hō͘ lín ê sìn-sit sī án-ni: Siōng-tè sī kng, tī I oân-choân bô o͘-àm.
62001006	Lán nā kóng lán kap I ū thoân-khè, iáu-kú kè-sio̍k tī o͘-àm tiong seng-oa̍h, sī kóng pe̍h-chha̍t, bô si̍t-hêng chin-lí.
62001007	M̄-kú, Siōng-tè tī kng-bêng tiong, lán nā chiàu án-ni tī kng-bêng tiong seng-oa̍h, lán chiū hō͘-siōng ū thoân-khè, I ê Kiáⁿ Iâ-so͘ ê huih ōe kè-sio̍k sóe-chheng lán lóng-chóng ê chōe.
62001008	Lán nā kóng lán bô chōe, sī phiàn ka-kī, chin-lí bô tī lán lāi-bīn.
62001009	Lán nā sêng-jīn lán ê chōe, Siōng-tè sī sìn-si̍t kong-gī, beh sià-bián lán ê chōe, sóe-chheng lán lóng-chóng ê put-gī.
62001010	Lán nā kóng lán m̄-bat hoān-chōe, sī kā Siōng-tè khòaⁿ-chòe pe̍h-chha̍t, I ê tō bô tī lán lāi-bīn.
62002001	Siàu-liân-lâng, góa siá chiah-ê sī beh hō͘ lín bōe khì hoān-chōe. Nā ū lâng hoān-chōe, lán ū gī-lâng Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok tī Pē ê bīn-chêng chòe lán ê Piān-hō͘-jîn.
62002002	I ūi-tio̍h lán ê chōe, m̄-nā lán ê chōe, mā ūi-tio̍h choân sè-kài ê chōe, choh sio̍k-chōe-chè.
62002003	Lán nā ū teh chun-siú Siōng-tè ê kài-bēng, chiū chai lán chin-chiàⁿ bat Siōng-tè.
62002004	Nā ū lâng kóng “góa bat Siōng-tè”, m̄-kú bô teh chun-siú I ê kài-bēng, chit-ê lâng sī pe̍h-chha̍t, i lāi-bīn bô chin-lí.
62002005	M̄-kú lâng nā chun-siú Siōng-tè ê tō, Siōng-tè ê thiàⁿ chiū chin-chiàⁿ tī i sin-chiūⁿ oân-choân si̍t-hiān. Lâng nā kóng i tiàm tī Siōng-tè lāi-bīn, eng-kai chiàu Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok ê giân-hêng seng-oa̍h. Án-ni chiū chai lán ū tī Siōng-tè lāi-bīn.
62002007	Chhin-ài ê pêng-iú, góa siá hō͘ lín ê m̄-sī sin ê kài-bēng, sī lín tùi khí-thâu chiū niá-siū hit-ê kū ê kài-bēng, sī lín bat thiaⁿ-tio̍h ê sìn-sit.
62002008	Chóng-sī góa siá hō͘ lín ê kài-bēng mā thang kóng sī sin ê, che tùi Ki-tok kap tùi lín lóng sī chin ê; in-ūi o͘-àm teh kè-khì, chin kng í-keng teh chiò.
62002009	Lâng nā kóng i tī kng-bêng tiong, m̄-kú oàn-hūn hiaⁿ-tī á-sī chí-bē, sū-si̍t i iáu-kú tī o͘-àm tiong.
62002010	Thiàⁿ hiaⁿ-tī á-sī chí-bē ê lâng sī tī kng-bêng tiong teh seng-oa̍h, bōe tì-kàu hō͘ lâng poa̍h-tó hoān-chōe.
62002011	M̄-kú oàn-hūn hiaⁿ-tī á-sī chí-bē ê lâng sī tī o͘-àm tiong, tī o͘-àm tiong teh seng-oa̍h, m̄-chai beh khì tó-ūi, in-ūi o͘-àm hō͘ i ê ba̍k-chiu bô khòaⁿ-kìⁿ.
62002012	Siàu-liân-lâng, góa siá-phoe hō͘ lín, in-ūi khò Ki-tok ê miâ lín ê chōe í-keng tit-tio̍h sià-bián.
62002013	Hū-ló sī-tōa, góa siá-phoe hō͘ lín, in-ūi lín jīn-bat tùi khí-thâu chiū chûn-chāi Hit-ūi. Chheng-liân-lâng, góa siá-phoe hō͘ lín, in-ūi lín í-keng ū iâⁿ-kè hit-ê Siâ-ok-chiá.
62002014	Sòe-kiáⁿ, góa siá-phoe hō͘ lín, in-ūi lín jīn-bat Pē. Hū-ló sī-tōa, góa siá-phoe hō͘ lín, in-ūi lín jīn-bat tùi khí-thâu chiū chûn-chāi Hit-ūi. Chheng-liân-lâng, góa siá-phoe hō͘ lín, in-ūi lín ióng-chòng, Siōng-tè ê tō tiàm tī lín lāi-bīn, koh lín í-keng ū iâⁿ-kè hit-ê Siâ-ok-chiá.
62002015	M̄-thang tham-ài sè-kan á-sī sè-kan ê mi̍h. Nā ū lâng tham-ài sè-kan, i chiū bô thiàⁿ Pē.
62002016	In-ūi it-chhè sio̍k sè-kan ê, chhin-chhiūⁿ jio̍k-thé ê io̍k-bōng, ba̍k-chiu ê io̍k-bōng, tián ka-kī ê châi-hù, téng, lóng m̄-sī tùi Pē lâi, sī tùi sè-kan lâi ê.
62002017	Chit sè-kan kap sè-kan ê io̍k-bōng lóng teh kè-khì, chóng-sī si̍t-hêng Siōng-tè chí-ì ê lâng éng-oán seng-chûn.
62002018	Sòe-kiáⁿ, che sī chiong-boa̍t ê sî. Lín ū thiaⁿ-tio̍h Ki-tok ê Te̍k-tùi-chiá teh-beh lâi, hiān-chāi í-keng ū chin chōe Ki-tok ê te̍k-tùi-chiá chhut-hiān; tùi án-ni, lán chai che sī chiong-boa̍t ê sî.
62002019	In lī-khui lán, in-ūi in m̄-sī lán ê lâng; in nā-sī lán ê lâng, ōe kè-sio̍k kap lán chòe-hé. M̄-kú in lī-khui, piáu-sī in lóng m̄-sī lán ê lâng.
62002020	Lín í-keng ū niá-siū Sèng Sîn, lín lóng chai.
62002021	Góa siá-phoe hō͘ lín, m̄-sī in-ūi lín m̄-bat chin-lí, sī in-ūi lín bat chin-lí, koh chai it-chhè ê hu-ké m̄-sī tùi chin-lí lâi.
62002022	Sím-mi̍h lâng sī pe̍h-chha̍t-ê? It-tēng sī kū-choa̍t Iâ-so͘ sī Ki-tok hit-ê lâng! Kū-choa̍t Pē kap Kiáⁿ ê chiū-sī Ki-tok ê Te̍k-tùi-chiá.
62002023	Kū-choa̍t Kiáⁿ ê bô chiap-la̍p Pē; soan-jīn Kiáⁿ chiū-sī chiap-la̍p Pē.
62002024	Tio̍h kian-siú lín tùi khí-thâu só͘ thiaⁿ-tio̍h ê sìn-sit. Lín nā kian-siú tùi khí-thâu só͘ thiaⁿ-tio̍h ê sìn-sit chiū ōe kè-sio̍k oa̍h tī Kiáⁿ kap Pē ê lāi-bīn.
62002025	Che chiū-sī Ki-tok hō͘ lán ê èng-ún, sī éng-oán ê oa̍h-miā.
62002026	Góa siá chiah-ê hō͘ lín, sī koan-hē siūⁿ-beh bê-he̍k lín ê lâng ê sū.
62002027	Tùi lín lâi kóng, lín tùi Ki-tok niá-siū ê Sèng Sîn tiàm tī lín lāi-bīn, chiū bô su-iàu pa̍t-lâng kā lín kà-sī, in-ūi chit-ê Sèng Sîn beh kà-sī lín ta̍k hāng tāi-chì; I ê kà-sī sī chin ê, m̄-sī ké ê. Án-ni, tio̍h chiàu Sèng Sîn kà-sī lín ê, tiàm tī Ki-tok lāi-bīn.
62002028	Taⁿ, siàu-liân-lâng, tio̍h tiàm tī Ki-tok lāi-bīn, án-ni tī I hián-hiān ê sî, lán tī I bīn-chêng chiah ōe hó-táⁿ, bōe in-ūi I ê lâi-lîm kám-kak kiàn-siàu.
62002029	Lín nā chai I sī kong-gī, eng-kai chai si̍t-hêng kong-gī ê lâng chiah-sī Siōng-tè ê kiáⁿ-jî.
62003001	Lín siūⁿ-khòaⁿ leh, Pē jōa-ni̍h thiàⁿ lán, hō͘ lán thang chheng-chòe I ê kiáⁿ-jî; sū-si̍t mā-sī án-ni. Sè-kan-lâng m̄-bat lán, in-ūi in m̄-bat Siōng-tè.
62003002	Chhin-ài ê pêng-iú, hiān-chāi lán sī Siōng-tè ê kiáⁿ-jî, chiong-lâi ōe án-chóaⁿ iáu-bē bêng-hián. M̄-kú lán chai, Ki-tok hián-hiān ê sî, lán ōe chhin-chhiūⁿ I, in-ūi lán ōe khòaⁿ-kìⁿ I ê chin-siōng.
62003003	Ki-tok sī sûn-kiat, só͘-í tùi Ki-tok ū chit khoán ǹg-bāng ê lâng ōe ka-kī pó-chhî sûn-kiat.
62003004	Lâng hoān-chōe sī ûi-pōe Siōng-tè ê Lu̍t-hoat, in-ūi chōe sī ûi-pōe Siōng-tè ê Lu̍t-hoat.
62003005	Lín chai Ki-tok hián-hiān sī beh tû-khì lâng ê chōe, m̄-kú I pún-sin bô chōe.
62003006	Kap Ki-tok pó-chhî bi̍t-chhiat koan-hē ê lâng bōe kè-sio̍k hoān-chōe; kè-sio̍k hoān-chōe ê lâng m̄-bat khòaⁿ-kìⁿ Ki-tok, mā m̄-bat I.
62003007	Siàu-liân pêng-iú, m̄-thang siū bê-he̍k. Ki-tok sī gī-lâng, só͘-í si̍t-hêng kong-gī-ê chiah-sī gī-lâng.
62003008	Kè-sio̍k hoān-chōe ê lâng sio̍k Mô͘-kúi, in-ūi Mô͘-kúi tùi khí-thâu chiū hoān-chōe. Siōng-tè ê Kiáⁿ hián-hiān ê bo̍k-te̍k sī beh phò-hoāi Mô͘-kúi ê chok-ûi.
62003009	Tùi Siōng-tè siⁿ ê bōe kè-sio̍k hoān-chōe, in-ūi Siōng-tè ê oa̍h-miā tī in lāi-bīn; in bōe kè-sio̍k hoān-chōe, in-ūi in sī tùi Siōng-tè siⁿ ê.
62003010	Tùi án-ni, sím-mi̍h lâng sī Siōng-tè ê kiáⁿ-jî á-sī Mô͘-kúi ê kiáⁿ-jî chin chheng-chhó: Bô si̍t-hêng kong-gī, bô thiàⁿ hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē ê, m̄-sī Siōng-tè ê kiáⁿ-jî.
62003011	Lán tio̍h saⁿ-thiàⁿ; che sī lín tùi khí-thâu só͘ thiaⁿ-tio̍h ê sìn-sit.
62003012	Lán m̄-thang chhin-chhiūⁿ [Kai-ún]; i sio̍k Siâ-ok-chiá, ū thâi-sí ka-kī ê sió-tī. I ná-ōe thâi-sí sió-tī? In-ūi i ê hêng-ûi siâ-ok, m̄-kú sió-tī ê hêng-ûi chèng-ti̍t.
62003013	Hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, sè-kan-lâng nā oàn-hūn lín, lín m̄-bián kî-koài.
62003014	Lán chai, lán í-keng chhut-sí ji̍p-oa̍h, in-ūi lán ū thiàⁿ hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē. Bô thiàⁿ-lâng-ê sī tiàm tī sí ê koán-hat-ē.
62003015	Oàn-hūn hiaⁿ-tī á-sī chí-bē chiū-sī thâi-lâng; lín mā chai, thâi-lâng-ê, éng-oán ê oa̍h-miā bô tiàm tī i lāi-bīn.
62003016	Ki-tok ūi-tio̍h lán hi-seng sìⁿ-miā, tùi án-ni lán chai sím-mi̍h sī thiàⁿ; án-ni lán mā ài ūi-tio̍h hiaⁿ-tī á-sī chí-bē hi-seng sìⁿ-miā.
62003017	Nā ū hó-gia̍h-lâng khòaⁿ-tio̍h hiaⁿ-tī á-sī chí-bē ū khiàm-kheh ia̍h bô tông-chêng lîn-bín, ná ōe-tàng kóng i ū thiàⁿ Siōng-tè?
62003018	Siàu-liân pêng-iú, saⁿ-thiàⁿ m̄-thang chí-ū ēng ōe á-sī ēng chhùi kóng, tio̍h si̍t-si̍t chāi-chāi si̍t-hêng.
62003019	Tùi án-ni lán chai lán sio̍k chin-lí. Lán nā siū liông-sim chek-pī, tī Siōng-tè ê bīn-chêng lán ōe-tàng an-ún chū-chāi, in-ūi I ê sim pí lán ê sim koh-khah khoan-tāi, I ta̍k hāng lóng chai.
62003021	Chhin-ài ê pêng-iú, lán ê liông-sim nā bô kā lán chek-pī, lán tī Siōng-tè bīn-chêng chiū thang ióng-kám m̄-bián kiaⁿ.
62003022	Lán bô-lūn tùi I kiû sím-mi̍h lóng ōe tit-tio̍h, in-ūi lán chun-siú I ê kài-bēng, tī I bīn-chêng chòe I só͘ hoaⁿ-hí ê sū.
62003023	I ê kài-bēng sī án-ni: lán tio̍h sìn I ê Kiáⁿ Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok ê miâ, mā tio̍h chiàu I hō͘ lán ê bēng-lēng saⁿ-thiàⁿ.
62003024	Chun-siú Siōng-tè kài-bēng ê lâng tiàm tī I lāi-bīn, I mā tī in lāi-bīn. Tùi Siōng-tè sù hō͘ lán ê Sèng Sîn lán chai Siōng-tè tiàm tī lán lāi-bīn.
62004001	Chhin-ài ê pêng-iú, m̄-thang siong-sìn ta̍k ê sîn; tio̍h chhat-giām chiah-ê sîn sī tùi Siōng-tè lâi á m̄-sī, in-ūi ū chin chōe ké sian-ti í-keng chhut-hiān tī chit sè-kan.
62004002	Lín thang ēng án-ni lâi jīn-bat Siōng-tè ê Sîn: Soan-jīn Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok chiâⁿ-chòe lâng lâi sè-kan hit-ūi Sîn sī tùi Siōng-tè lâi ê;
62004003	m̄ soan-jīn Iâ-so͘ hiah-ê sîn m̄-sī tùi Siōng-tè lâi ê. Che sī Ki-tok ê Te̍k-tùi-chiá ê sîn, lín ū thiaⁿ-tio̍h i teh-beh lâi, hiān-chāi í-keng tī sè-kan.
62004004	Siàu-liân pêng-iú, lín sī sio̍k Siōng-tè, koh í-keng iâⁿ-kè ké sian-ti, in-ūi tiàm tī lín lāi-bīn ê Sèng Sîn pí tiàm tī sè-kan-lâng lāi-bīn ê sîn khah kiông khah tōa.
62004005	Ké sian-ti sī sio̍k sè-kan, kóng sè-kan sū, só͘-í sè-kan-lâng ōe thiaⁿ in.
62004006	Lán sī sio̍k Siōng-tè. Bat Siōng-tè ê lâng ōe thiaⁿ lán; bô sio̍k Siōng-tè ê lâng m̄ thiaⁿ lán. Tùi chit-ê lán jīn-bat chin-lí ê Sîn kap bê-he̍k lâng ê sîn.
62004007	Chhin-ài ê pêng-iú, lán tio̍h saⁿ-thiàⁿ, in-ūi thiàⁿ tùi Siōng-tè lâi. Ū thiàⁿ ê lâng sī Siōng-tè ê kiáⁿ-jî, mā bat Siōng-tè.
62004008	Bô thiàⁿ ê lâng m̄-bat Siōng-tè, in-ūi Siōng-tè sī thiàⁿ.
62004009	Siōng-tè chhe I to̍k-it ê Kiáⁿ lâi-kàu sè-kan, beh hō͘ lán tùi I tit-tio̍h oa̍h-miā; tùi chit-ê, Siōng-tè ê thiàⁿ hián-bêng tī lán tiong-kan.
62004010	M̄-sī lán thiàⁿ Siōng-tè, sī I ū thiàⁿ lán, chhe I ê Kiáⁿ chòe sio̍k-chōe-chè lâi sio̍k lán ê chōe. Che chiū-sī thiàⁿ.
62004011	Chhin-ài ê pêng-iú, Siōng-tè nā hiah-ni̍h thiàⁿ lán, lán mā tio̍h saⁿ-thiàⁿ.
62004012	Bô-lâng bat khòaⁿ-kìⁿ Siōng-tè, lán nā saⁿ-thiàⁿ, Siōng-tè chiū tiàm tī lán lāi-bīn, I ê thiàⁿ thong-kè lán oân-choân si̍t-hiān chhut-lâi.
62004013	Siōng-tè í-keng ū chiong I ê Sèng Sîn sù hō͘ lán, tùi chit-ê lán chai lán tiàm tī Siōng-tè lāi-bīn, I mā tī lán lāi-bīn.
62004014	Pē chhe I ê Kiáⁿ lâi chòe sè-kan ê Kiù-chú, goán ū khòaⁿ-tio̍h, hiān-chāi chòe kiàn-chèng.
62004015	Soan-jīn Iâ-so͘ sī Siōng-tè ê Kiáⁿ ê lâng, Siōng-tè tiàm tī i lāi-bīn, i mā tī Siōng-tè lāi-bīn.
62004016	Só͘-í, lán chai koh sìn Siōng-tè ū thiàⁿ lán. Siōng-tè sī thiàⁿ, ū teh si̍t-hêng thiàⁿ ê lâng tiàm tī Siōng-tè lāi-bīn, Siōng-tè mā tiàm tī i lāi-bīn.
62004017	Tùi án-ni, thiàⁿ tī lán tiong-kan oân-choân si̍t-hiān chhut-lâi, hō͘ lán tī Sím-phòaⁿ ê Ji̍t thang ióng-kám m̄-bián kiaⁿ, in-ūi lán tī chit sè-kan kap Ki-tok kâng-khoán.
62004018	Ū thiàⁿ chiū bô kiaⁿ-hiâⁿ; oân-choân ê thiàⁿ kóaⁿ-chhut kiaⁿ-hiâⁿ. In-ūi ū kiaⁿ-hiâⁿ chiū ū hêng-hoa̍t; ū kiaⁿ-hiâⁿ ê lâng, thiàⁿ iáu bô oân-choân si̍t-hiān chhut-lâi.
62004019	Lán tio̍h saⁿ-thiàⁿ, in-ūi Siōng-tè ū tāi-seng thiàⁿ lán.
62004020	Nā ū lâng kóng “Góa thiàⁿ Siōng-tè”, m̄-kú oàn-hūn hiaⁿ-tī á-sī chí-bē, i sī pe̍h-chha̍t. In-ūi, bô thiàⁿ ū-khòaⁿ-tio̍h ê hiaⁿ-tī á-sī chí-bē, ná-ōe thiàⁿ bô-khòaⁿ-tio̍h ê Siōng-tè.
62004021	Thiàⁿ Siōng-tè mā tio̍h thiàⁿ ka-kī ê hiaⁿ-tī á-sī chí-bē, che sī lán tùi Ki-tok niá-siū ê kài-bēng.
62005001	Sìn Iâ-so͘ sī Ki-tok ê lâng lóng sī Siōng-tè ê kiáⁿ-jî. Thiàⁿ pē-bú, mā ōe thiàⁿ in só͘ siⁿ ê kiáⁿ-jî.
62005002	Lán nā thiàⁿ Siōng-tè koh chun-siú I ê kài-bēng, án-ni chiū chai lán ū teh thiàⁿ Siōng-tè ê kiáⁿ-jî.
62005003	Chun-siú Siōng-tè ê kài-bēng chiū-sī thiàⁿ Siōng-tè. I ê kài-bēng m̄-sī oh chun-siú.
62005004	In-ūi Siōng-tè ê kiáⁿ-jî lóng ōe-tàng khah-iâⁿ sè-kan; hō͘ lán khah-iâⁿ sè-kan ê chiū-sī lán ê sìn.
62005005	Khah-iâⁿ sè-kan ê sī sím-mi̍h lâng? Kiám m̄-sī sìn Iâ-so͘ sī Siōng-tè ê Kiáⁿ hit-ê lâng?
62005006	Chit-ūi Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok chiū-sī thong-kè chúi kap huih lâi ê; m̄-sī chí-ū thong-kè chúi, sī thong-kè chúi kap huih. Sèng Sîn chòe kiàn-chèng, in-ūi Sèng Sîn sī chin-lí.
62005007	Ū saⁿ ê chòe kiàn-chèng,
62005008	chiū-sī Sèng Sîn, chúi, kap huih; chit saⁿ ê kiàn-chèng lóng it-tì.
62005009	Lâng ê kiàn-chèng lán to chiap-siū, Siōng-tè ê kiàn-chèng koh-khah ū-hāu. Chit-ê sī Siōng-tè ūi-tio̍h I ê Kiáⁿ só͘ chòe ê kiàn-chèng.
62005010	Sìn Siōng-tè ê Kiáⁿ ê, tī i sim-lāi ū chit-ê kiàn-chèng; m̄-sìn Siōng-tè ê chiū-sī khòaⁿ Siōng-tè chòe pe̍h-chha̍t, in-ūi i m̄-sìn Siōng-tè ūi-tio̍h I ê Kiáⁿ só͘ chòe ê kiàn-chèng.
62005011	Chit-ê kiàn-chèng chiū-sī: Siōng-tè í-keng ū sù lán éng-oán ê oa̍h-miā, chit-ê oa̍h-miā sī tùi I ê Kiáⁿ lâi ê.
62005012	Lâng ū Siōng-tè ê Kiáⁿ chiū ū oa̍h-miā; bô Siōng-tè ê Kiáⁿ chiū bô oa̍h-miā.
62005013	Góa siá chiah-ê sī beh hō͘ lín sìn Siōng-tè ê Kiáⁿ ê lâng chai, lín ū éng-oán ê oa̍h-miā.
62005014	Lán tī Siōng-tè bīn-chêng ióng-kám bô kiaⁿ, in-ūi lán nā chiàu I ê chí-ì kî-kiû, I ōe kā lán thiaⁿ.
62005015	Kì-jiân chai I ōe thiaⁿ lán ê kî-kiû, chiū chai lán tùi I só͘ kiû ê í-keng ū tit-tio̍h.
62005016	Nā ū lâng khòaⁿ-tio̍h hiaⁿ-tī á-sī chí-bē hoān-tio̍h bōe tì-kàu sí ê chōe, tio̍h kî-kiû Siōng-tè, Siōng-tè ōe sù i oa̍h-miā; góa sī chí hiah-ê hoān-tio̍h bōe tì-kàu sí ê chōe ê lâng teh kóng. Mā ū ōe tì-kàu sí ê chōe, góa kóng “Tio̍h kî-kiû”, pèng m̄-sī chí chit-ê.
62005017	It-chhè put-gī ê hêng-ûi lóng sī chōe, m̄-kú mā ū bōe tì-kàu sí ê chōe.
62005018	Lán chai, Siōng-tè ê kiáⁿ-jî bōe kè-sio̍k hoān-chōe, in-ūi Siōng-tè ê Kiáⁿ teh kā in pó-siú, Siâ-ok-chiá bong in bōe-tio̍h.
62005019	Lán chai, lán sī sio̍k Siōng-tè, m̄-kú choân sè-kài siū Siâ-ok-chiá koán-hat.
62005020	Lán mā chai Siōng-tè ê Kiáⁿ í-keng lâi-lîm, koh hō͘ lán ū hiáu-ngō͘ ê sim thang jīn-bat hit-ūi chin Sîn Siōng-tè. Lán kap chin Sîn Siōng-tè kiat-liân, in-ūi lán kap I ê Kiáⁿ Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok kiat-liân. Chit-ūi chiū-sī chin Sîn Siōng-tè, sī éng-oán ê oa̍h-miā.
62005021	Sòe-kiáⁿ, lín tio̍h siám-khui ngó͘-siōng.
63001001	Góa --- tiúⁿ-ló siá-phoe hō͘ siū kéng-soán ê hu-jîn kap lí ê kiáⁿ-jî: Góa chin-sim thiàⁿ lín, m̄-nā góa, liân só͘-ū jīn-bat chin-lí ê lâng mā thiàⁿ lín;
63001002	in-ūi chin-lí tiàm tī lán lāi-bīn, ōe éng-oán kap lán tông-chāi.
63001003	Goān Pē Siōng-tè kap Pē ê Kiáⁿ Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok sù lán un-tián, lîn-bín, kap pêng-an, hō͘ lán ê seng-oa̍h chhiong-móa chin-lí kap jîn-ài!
63001004	Góa hui-siông hoaⁿ-hí, in-ūi góa hoat-hiān lí ê kiáⁿ-jî tiong-kan ū lâng chun-thàn Pē ê kài-bēng, si̍t-hêng chin-lí.
63001005	Hu-jîn ah, góa iau-kiû lí, lán tio̍h saⁿ-thiàⁿ. Góa teh siá hō͘ lí ê m̄-sī sin ê kài-bēng, sī lán tùi khí-thâu chiū niá-siū ê.
63001006	Lán chiàu Siōng-tè ê kài-bēng seng-oa̍h, chiū-sī thiàⁿ. Chit-ê kài-bēng sī lín tùi khí-thâu só͘ thiaⁿ-tio̍h ê, tio̍h chiàu chit-ê kài-bēng seng-oa̍h.
63001007	Ū chin chōe bê-he̍k-chiá í-keng lâi-kàu chit sè-kan; in m̄ kong-khai sêng-jīn Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok chòe lâng lâi sè-kan. Chit khoán lâng sī bê-he̍k-chiá, sī Ki-tok ê Te̍k-tùi-chiá.
63001008	Tio̍h sió-sim, lín só͘ chòe ê kang chiah bōe lo̍k-khong, hoán-tńg ōe tit-tio̍h chhiong-chiok ê pò-siúⁿ.
63001009	Phian-lī bô kian-siú Ki-tok kà-sī ê lâng bô kap Siōng-tè kiat-liân. Kian-siú kà-sī ê lâng chiah ū kap Pē í-ki̍p Kiáⁿ kiat-liân.
63001010	Nā ū lâng khì lín hia, só͘ thoân ûi-pōe chit khoán ê kà-sī, m̄-thang chiap-la̍p i ji̍p lín ê chhù, mā m̄-thang kā i chhéng-an,
63001011	in-ūi kā i chhéng-an chiū-sī chham-ú i ê pháiⁿ hêng-ûi.
63001012	Góa iáu ū chin chōe ōe ài siá, m̄-kú bô ài ēng chóa-pit; góa khah ǹg-bāng khì lín hia, tng-bīn kap lín kóng, thang hō͘ lán ê hoaⁿ-hí chhiong-móa.
63001013	Kap lí pîⁿ-pîⁿ siū kéng-soán hit-ê chí-bē ê kiáⁿ-jî beh kā lí chhéng-an.
64001001	Góa --- tiúⁿ-ló siá-phoe hō͘ chhin-ài ê [Kai-iû]; lí sī góa chin-sim só͘ thiàⁿ ê.
64001002	Chhin-ài ê pêng-iú, góa chiok lí bān-sū heng-thong, mā chiok lí sin-thé kiān-khong, chhin-chhiūⁿ lí ê sim-sîn hiah-ni̍h ióng-chòng.
64001003	Ū kúi-ê sìn-tô͘ lâi, kā góa chèng-si̍t lí tùi chin-lí tiong-sêng, sū-si̍t lí it-ti̍t ū teh si̍t-hêng chin-lí, góa hui-siông hoaⁿ-hí.
64001004	Thiaⁿ-tio̍h kóng góa ê kiáⁿ-jî ū teh si̍t-hêng chin-lí, bô chi̍t hāng pí che koh-khah hō͘ góa hoaⁿ-hí.
64001005	Chhin-ài ê pêng-iú, lí ū tiong-si̍t chiap-thāi sìn-tô͘, te̍k-pia̍t sī chhut-gōa-lâng.
64001006	In bat tī hōe-chiòng bīn-chêng chèng-si̍t lí ê thiàⁿ-sim. Chhiáⁿ lí chiàu Siōng-tè só͘ hoaⁿ-hí ê pang-chān in kè-sio̍k in ê lú-thêng.
64001007	In-ūi in ūi-tio̍h Ki-tok ê iân-kò͘ chhut-gōa thoân-tō, lóng bô tùi bī-sìn-chiá chiap-siū sím-mi̍h.
64001008	Só͘-í lán ū gī-bū chiap-thāi chit khoán ê lâng, hō͘ lán thang ūi-tio̍h chin-lí chiâⁿ-chòe tâng-kang.
64001009	Góa bat siá-phoe hō͘ kàu-hōe. Khó-sioh, ài-beh chòe kàu-hōe léng-siù ê [Tiu-te̍k-hui] m̄ chiap-la̍p góa.
64001010	Só͘-í, góa nā khì, beh kóng-khí i só͘ chòe ēng pháiⁿ-ōe húi-pòng kong-kek goán ê tāi-chì. M̄-nā án-ni, i pún-sin m̄ chiap-thāi sìn-tô͘, sīm-chì chó͘-tòng goān-ì chiap-thāi ê lâng, sòa kā in kek-chhut kàu-hōe.
64001011	Chhin-ài ê pêng-iú, m̄-thang o̍h pháiⁿ, tio̍h o̍h hó. Choh-hó-ê sio̍k Siōng-tè; choh-pháiⁿ-ê m̄-bat khòaⁿ-kìⁿ Siōng-tè.
64001012	Chèng-lâng lóng chheng-chàn [Tí-bí-tiu]; chin-lí pún-sin mā ūi-tio̍h i choh-chèng. Goán mā ūi-tio̍h i choh-chèng; lí chai goán ê kiàn-chèng sī chin-si̍t.
64001013	Góa iáu ū chin chōe ōe ài siá, m̄-kú bô ài ēng chóa-pit.
64001014	Góa ǹg-bāng bô kú ōe kìⁿ-tio̍h lí, lán chiah tng-bīn lâi kóng.
64001015	Goān lí pêng-an! Lí ê pêng-iú lóng kā lí chhéng-an. Chhiáⁿ thòe góa kā lán ê pêng-iú chi̍t-ê chi̍t-ê chhéng-an.
65001001	Góa sī Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok ê lô͘-po̍k, [Ngá-kok] ê hiaⁿ-tī [Iû-tāi], góa siá-phoe hō͘ hiah-ê siū Siōng-tè soán-tiàu, tit-tio̍h Pē Siōng-tè ê thiàⁿ, siū Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok pó-iū ê lâng.
65001002	Goān Siōng-tè hong-hong hù-hù sù lín lîn-bín, pêng-an, kap chû-ài!
65001003	Chhin-ài ê pêng-iú, góa chá chiū it-ti̍t ài-beh siá-phoe hō͘ lín, kap lín tâm-lūn lán lóng ū-hūn ê chín-kiù. Góa kám-kak chit-chūn sûi-sî su-iàu siá-phoe kā lín kó͘-lē, ài lín ūi-tio̍h Siōng-tè chí-ū chi̍t piàn chiū kàu-gia̍h thoân-siū hō͘ I chú-bîn chit-ê sìn-gióng kè-sio̍k hùn-tò͘.
65001004	In-ūi ū chi̍t-kóa bô kèng-ùi Siōng-tè ê lâng thau-thau-á chǹg ji̍p-lâi lán tiong-kan, lī-iōng lán ê Siōng-tè ê un-tián chòe hòng-chhiòng ê chià-kháu, koh m̄-jīn î-it ê Chú-cháiⁿ lán ê Chú Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok. Chin chá í-chêng Sèng-keng chiū ū-giân chiah-ê lâng it-tēng tio̍h siū hêng-hoa̍t.
65001005	Sui-jiân lín chai chiah-ê it-chhè ê sū, góa iáu-kú beh kā lín thê-chhíⁿ, Chú chi̍t piàn chiū oân-choân chiong [Í-sek-lia̍t] peh-sìⁿ tùi [Ai-ki̍p] tōe kiù chhut-lâi, āu-lâi húi-bia̍t hiah-ê m̄-sìn ê lâng.
65001006	Koh hiah-ê bô siú pún-hūn, lī-khui pún-ūi ê thiⁿ-sài, in hō͘ só-liān éng-oán liān tī o͘-àm ê chhim-ian; Siōng-tè kā in koaiⁿ tī hia, thèng-hāu sím-phòaⁿ ê tōa Ji̍t-chí.
65001007	Tòa tī [Só͘-to-má], [Gô-mô͘-la̍h], kap hù-kūn siâⁿ-chhī ê lâng, mā kap hiah-ê thiⁿ-sài siâng-khoán kiâⁿ îm-loān, hòng-chhiòng hoán chū-jiân ê sèng-io̍k, siū-tio̍h éng-oán bōe hoa ê hé ê hêng-hoa̍t, chòe chèng-lâng ê kéng-kài.
65001008	Siâng-khoán, chiah-ê khong-su bōng-sióng ê lâng mā ū sún-hāi ka-kī ê seng-khu, biáu-sī Siōng-tè ê koân-ui, bú-jio̍k thiⁿ-téng hiah-ê chun-êng-chiá.
65001009	Thiⁿ-sài-tiúⁿ [Bí-ka-le̍k] ūi-tio̍h [Mô͘-se] ê ûi-thé kap Mô͘-kúi cheng-lūn ê sî, mā m̄-káⁿ ēng húi-pòng ê ōe chek-pī, chí-ū kóng, “Chú khiàn-chek lí!”
65001010	M̄-kú chiah-ê lâng húi-pòng in só͘ bô liáu-kái ê sū; in chhin-chhiūⁿ iá-siù khì chòe chiàu pún-lêng só͘ chai ê tāi-chì, kiat-kó siū húi-bia̍t.
65001011	In chhám à! In-ūi in kiâⁿ [Kai-ún] ê lō͘, koh ūi-tio̍h chîⁿ-châi hām-lo̍h tī [Pa-lân] ê chhò-gō͘. In kap [Khó-lah] siâng-khoán, in-ūi pōe-poān lâi bia̍t-bông.
65001012	In m̄-chai kiàn-siàu, tōa-chia̍h tōa-lim, ka-kī kò͘-chia̍h, lâi phò-hoāi lín ê ài-chhan. In chhin-chhiūⁿ hûn hō͘ hong chhe-lâi chhe-khì, lóng bô lo̍h-hō͘; chhin-chhiūⁿ chhiū kàu chhiu-thiⁿ ia̍h bô kiat ké-chí, hō͘ lâng liân kun khau khí-lâi, sí-kah ta-khok-khok.
65001013	In mā chhin-chhiūⁿ pho-lōng phùn-chhut chúi-phe̍h, lō͘-chhut ka-kī ê kiàn-siàu; chhin-chhiūⁿ lī-khui khúi-tō ê chhiⁿ lak ji̍p-khì Siōng-tè ūi-tio̍h in éng-oán pó-liû hit-ê o͘-àm ê chhim-ian.
65001014	[A-tong] ê tē-chhit tāi sun [Í-lo̍k] ū-giân chiah-ê lâng kóng, “Lín khòaⁿ! Chú ōe chhōa chheng-chheng bān-bān ê sèng thiⁿ-sài lâi,
65001015	beh sím-phòaⁿ só͘-ū ê lâng, hêng-hoa̍t it-chhè bô kèng-khiân ê chōe-jîn, in-ūi in ēng bô kèng-khiân ê hong-hoat chòe it-chhè bô kèng-khiân ê sū, koh kóng siat-to̍k Siōng-tè ê ōe.”
65001016	Chiah-ê lâng put-sî ngau̍h-ngau̍h-liām, bâi-oàn, thàn su-io̍k chòe tāi-chì, kóng tōa-ōe, ūi-tio̍h lī-ek phô͘-tháⁿ pa̍t-lâng.
65001017	Chhin-ài ê pêng-iú, tio̍h ōe kì-tit lán ê Chú Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok ê sù-tô͘ ū-giân ê ōe.
65001018	In ū kā lín kóng, “Tī boa̍t-kî, ū chi̍t-kóa thàn ka-kī bô kèng-khiân ê io̍k-liām chòe tāi-chì ê lâng ōe chhut-hiān, in ài thí-chhiò pa̍t-lâng ê sìn-gióng.”
65001019	Chiah-ê sī chè-chō hun-cheng, siū pún-sèng chi-phòe, bô kap Sèng Sîn kiat-liân ê lâng.
65001020	Lín leh, chhin-ài ê pêng-iú, tio̍h chiong ka-kī kiàn-li̍p tī chì-sèng ê sìn-gióng téng-bīn; tio̍h khò Sèng Sîn kî-tó.
65001021	Tio̍h tiàm tī Siōng-tè ê thiàⁿ pó-siú ka-kī, gióng-bōng lán ê Chú Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok ê lîn-bín, ti̍t-kàu tit-tio̍h éng-oán ê oa̍h-miā.
65001022	Tùi chi̍t-kóa sim chûn giâu-gî ê lâng, tio̍h lîn-bín in;
65001023	ū chi̍t-kóa lâng, tio̍h tùi hé-tiong kā in kiù chhut-lâi; koh ū chi̍t-kóa lâng, tio̍h lîn-bín in, m̄-kú tio̍h ka-kī kéng-kài, liân in hō͘ chêng-io̍k bak-tio̍h ê saⁿ to tio̍h iàm-ò͘ⁿ.
65001024	Siōng-tè ōe pó-hō͘ lín bōe tūi-lo̍h, hō͘ lín bô khoat-tiám, hoaⁿ-hoaⁿ hí-hí khiā tī I êng-iāu ê bīn-chêng.
65001025	Goān to̍k-it ê Siōng-tè lán ê Kiù-chú, thong-kè lán ê Chú Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok, tit-tio̍h êng-kng, chun-giâm, lêng-le̍k, kap koân-pèng, tùi bān-kó͘ kàu hiān-chāi, ti̍t-kàu éng-oán. Amen!
66001001	Che sī Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok ê khé-sī. Siōng-tè hō͘ I chit-ê khé-sī, ài I chiong liâm-piⁿ it-tēng ōe hoat-seng ê tāi-chì chí-sī Siōng-tè ê chèng lô͘-po̍k. Ki-tok ū chhe-khián I ê thiⁿ-sài khì chí-sī I ê lô͘-po̍k [Iok-hān].
66001002	[Iok-hān] ūi-tio̍h Siōng-tè ê sìn-sit kap Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok ê kiàn-chèng, chiū-sī i só͘ khòaⁿ-kìⁿ ê it-chhè, lóng choh-chèng.
66001003	Tha̍k chit pún chheh ê lâng chin ū hok-khì; thiaⁿ-kìⁿ chit-ê ū-giân koh chun-siú chheh-ni̍h só͘ kì-chài ê lâng chin ū hok-khì; in-ūi sî-ki kūn lah.
66001004	Góa --- [Iok-hān] siá-phoe hō͘ [A-se-a] ê chhit ê kàu-hōe, kóng: Goān hiān-chāi chûn-chāi, kè-khì chûn-chāi, chiong-lâi mā chûn-chāi ê Siōng-tè, kap I chō-ūi chêng ê chhit ê sîn, í-ki̍p Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok, sù lín un-tián kap pêng-an! Ki-tok sī sìn-si̍t ê kiàn-chèng-jîn, thâu-chi̍t-ê tùi sí-lâng tiong koh-oa̍h, sī tōe-chiūⁿ bān ông ê Chú-cháiⁿ. I thiàⁿ lán, ūi-tio̍h lán lâu-huih hi-seng lâi tháu-pàng lán thoat-lī chōe,
66001006	hō͘ lán chiâⁿ-chòe chi̍t ê kok-tō͘, choh chè-si lâi ho̍k-sāi I ê Pē Siōng-tè. Goān êng-kng kap koân-lêng kui tī Iâ-so͘ Ki-tok, tāi-tāi bô-chīn. Amen!
66001007	Lí khòaⁿ, I chē hûn teh lâi, chèng-lâng ōe khòaⁿ-kìⁿ I, liân ēng chhiuⁿ chha̍k I ê lâng mā ōe khòaⁿ-kìⁿ. Tōe-chiūⁿ bān-cho̍k lóng ōe in-ūi I thî-khàu. Chit-ê sū it-tēng ōe hoat-seng. Amen!
66001008	Hiān-chāi chûn-chāi, kè-khì chûn-chāi, chiong-lâi mā chûn-chāi, Choân-lêng ê Chú Siōng-tè kóng, “Góa sī A-ní-hoat, sī A-bí-ka.”
66001009	Góa sī [Iok-hān], sī lín ê hiaⁿ-tī, kap lín chòe-hé hun-tam Iâ-so͘ ê hoān-lān kap thun-lún, koh ū-hūn tī I ê thóng-tī. Ūi-tio̍h thoân Siōng-tè ê sìn-sit kap kiàn-chèng Iâ-so͘, góa bat tòa tī chi̍t ê miâ kiò [Poa̍t-mô͘] ê hái-tó.
66001010	Ū chi̍t ê Chú-ji̍t, góa siū Sèng Sîn kám-tōng, thiaⁿ-kìⁿ tī góa ê āu-bīn ū tōa ê siaⁿ chhin-chhiūⁿ lat-pah teh hiáng,
66001011	kóng, “Lí tio̍h chiong só khòaⁿ-kìⁿ ê siá chòe chheh, kià hō͘ [Í-hut-só͘], [Sū-múi-ná], [Pia̍t-ka-mô͘], [Chhui-ngá-chhui-lat], [Sat-te̍k], [Hui-la̍h-thiat-hui], kap [Ló-tí-ka] chit chhit ê kàu-hōe.”
66001012	Góa oa̍t tńg-sin beh khòaⁿ tùi góa kóng-ōe ê sī sím-mi̍h lâng, chi̍t-ē oa̍t tńg-sin ū khòaⁿ-tio̍h chhit ki kim teng-tâi.
66001013	Teng-tâi ê tiong-ng ū chi̍t ūi chhin-chhiūⁿ Jîn-chú, chhēng chi̍t niá sûi-lo̍h kàu kha ê tn̂g-phàu, heng-khám hâ kim-tòa.
