66001014	I ê thâu kap thâu-mn̂g chhin-chhiūⁿ iûⁿ-mn̂g hiah-ni̍h pe̍h, chhin-chhiūⁿ seh hiah-ni̍h pe̍h; I ê ba̍k-chiu chhin-chhiūⁿ hé-iām.
66001015	I ê kha chhin-chhiūⁿ kè hé-lô͘ thoàn-liān kng-liāng ê tâng; I ê siaⁿ chhin-chhiūⁿ tōa-chúi teh chhiâng ê siaⁿ.
66001016	I ê chiàⁿ-chhiú the̍h chhit lia̍p chhiⁿ, I ê chhùi thò͘-chhut siang-bīn-lāi ê kiàm; I ê bīn chhin-chhiūⁿ iām-jia̍t ê ji̍t-thâu hoat-kng.
66001017	Góa chi̍t-ē khòaⁿ-tio̍h I, chiū phak tī I kha-chêng chhin-chhiūⁿ sí-khì ê lâng. I ēng chiàⁿ-chhiú hōaⁿ góa, kóng, “M̄-bián kiaⁿ! Góa sī khí-thâu ê, mā-sī soah-bé ê.
66001018	Góa sī oa̍h-ê. Góa ū sí, hiān-chāi teh oa̍h, ōe éng-oán oa̍h-teh. Góa ū sí-bông kap im-hú ê só-sî.
66001019	Só͘-í, lí tio̍h chiong só͘ khòaⁿ-kìⁿ ê, í-ki̍p hiān-kim só͘ teh hoat-seng, kap í-āu ōe hoat-seng ê tāi-chì lóng siá khí-lâi.
66001020	Lí só͘ khòaⁿ-tio̍h góa chiàⁿ-chhiú the̍h hit chhit lia̍p chhiⁿ kap chhit ki kim teng-tâi ê ò-biāu sī án-ni: Chhit lia̍p chhiⁿ sī chhit ê kàu-hōe ê thiⁿ-sài; chhit ki teng-tâi sī chhit ê kàu-hōe.”
66002001	“Lí tio̍h siá-phoe hō͘ [Í-hut-só͘] ê kàu-hōe ê thiⁿ-sài, kóng: “Chiàⁿ-chhiú tháⁿ chhit lia̍p chhiⁿ, tī chhit ki kim teng-tâi ê tiong-kan teh kiâⁿ Hit-ūi án-ni kóng:
66002002	Góa chai lí ê só͘-chòe, lí ê lô-khó͘ kap thun-lún. Góa chai lí bōe iông-jím pháiⁿ-lâng; lí mā bat khó-giām chū-chheng sù-tô͘ kî-si̍t m̄-sī hiah-ê lâng, khòaⁿ-chhut in sī pe̍h-chha̍t ê.
66002003	Lí ū thun-lún, bat ūi-tio̍h góa ê miâ jím-siū kan-khó͘, lóng bô ià-siān.
66002004	M̄-kú, ū chi̍t hāng tāi-chì góa beh kā lí chek-pī, chiū-sī lí í-keng pàng-sak lí tong-chho͘ ê thiàⁿ.
66002005	Só͘-í, tio̍h kì-tit lí tùi tó-ūi tūi-lo̍h; tio̍h hóe-kái, chòe lí tong-chho͘ só͘ chòe ê kang-chok. Nā bô, góa ōe khì lí hia, chiong lí ê teng-tâi tùi i ê só͘-chāi sóa-khui.
66002006	Put-kò, lí iáu ū chi̍t hāng khó-chhú ê sū, chiū-sī lí mā kap góa kâng-khoán oàn-hūn [Nî-ko-la̍h]-tóng ê só͘-chòe.
66002007	“Ū hīⁿ-khang ê lâng lóng tio̍h thiaⁿ Sèng Sîn kā chiah-ê kàu-hōe kóng ê ōe. “Tek-sèng ê lâng, góa beh hō͘ in chia̍h Siōng-tè ê Lo̍k-hn̂g tiong hit châng oa̍h-miā-chhiū ê ké-chí.”
66002008	“Lí tio̍h siá-phoe hō͘ [Sū-múi-ná] ê kàu-hōe ê thiⁿ-sài, kóng: “Khí-thâu-ê kap soah-bé-ê, sí ū koh-oa̍h Hit-ūi án-ni kóng:
66002009	Góa chai lí ê hoān-lān kap sàn-chhiah; kî-si̍t lí sī hó-gia̍h. Góa chai lí ū siū-tio̍h chū-chheng [Iû-thài]-lâng ê lâng ê húi-pòng; kî-si̍t in m̄-sī [Iû-thài]-lâng, sī Sat-tàn ê chi̍p-thoân.
66002010	M̄-bián kiaⁿ lí teh-beh siū ê khó͘-lān. Lí khòaⁿ, Mô͘-kúi teh-beh chiong lín tiong-kan kúi-nā lâng koaiⁿ-lo̍h kaⁿ, kā lín khó-giām, lín ōe siū khó͘-lān cha̍p ji̍t. Lí tio̍h chīn-tiong kàu sí, góa ōe sù lí oa̍h-miā ê hoa-koan.
66002011	“Ū hīⁿ-khang ê lâng lóng tio̍h thiaⁿ Sèng Sîn kā chiah-ê kàu-hōe kóng ê ōe. “Tek-sèng ê lâng choa̍t-tùi bōe siū-tio̍h tē-jī piàn sí ê chai-hāi.”
66002012	“Lí tio̍h siá-phoe hō͘ [Pia̍t-ka-mô͘] ê kàu-hōe ê thiⁿ-sài, kóng: “Ū siang-bīn-lāi ê kiàm Hit-ūi án-ni kóng:
66002013	Góa chai lí tòa tó-ūi, chiū-sī ū Sat-tàn ê chō-ūi hia. Lí ū kian-siú góa ê miâ, sīm-chì góa tiong-si̍t ê kiàn-chèng-jîn [An-thê-phàⁿ] tī lín tiong-kan, chiū-sī Sat-tàn tòa ê só͘-chāi, siū sat-hāi ê sî, lí mā bô hó͘-jīn tùi góa ê sìn-gióng.
66002014	M̄-kú góa ū kúi-nā hāng tāi-chì beh kā lí chek-pī: In-ūi tī lí hia ū lâng chip-siú [Pa-lân] ê kà-sī, chit-ê [Pa-lân] ū kà [Pa-la̍k] khì ín-iú [Í-sek-lia̍t] ê kiáⁿ-sun, hō͘ in chia̍h chè ngó͘-siōng ê mi̍h, koh kiâⁿ kan-îm.
66002015	Chhin-chhiūⁿ án-ni, lí hia mā ū lâng chip-siú [Nî-ko-la̍h]-tóng ê kà-sī.
66002016	Só͘-í, tio̍h hóe-kái. Nā bô, góa liâm-piⁿ ōe kàu lí hia, ēng góa chhùi-lāi ê kiàm kap in kau-chiàn.
66002017	“Ū hīⁿ-khang ê lâng lóng tio̍h thiaⁿ Sèng Sîn kā chiah-ê kàu-hōe kóng ê ōe. “Tek-sèng ê lâng góa beh chiong pó-chûn khí-lâi ê má-ná hō͘ i, koh beh hō͘ i chi̍t tè pe̍h-chio̍h, chio̍h ê téng-bīn ū siá sin ê miâ; chit-ê miâ, niá-siū ê lâng í-gōa, bô-lâng bat.”
66002018	“Lí tio̍h siá-phoe hō͘ [Chhui-ngá-chhui-lat] ê kàu-hōe ê thiⁿ-sài, kóng: “Siōng-tè ê Kiáⁿ, chiū-sī ba̍k-chiu chhin-chhiūⁿ hé-iām, kha chhin-chhiūⁿ kng-liāng ê tâng Hit-ūi án-ni kóng:
66002019	Góa chai lí ê só͘-chòe, lí ê thiàⁿ, sìn-sim, ho̍k-sāi, kap thun-lún; koh chai lí chòe-kūn ê só͘-chòe pí khí-thâu ê khah hó.
66002020	M̄-kú, ū chi̍t hāng tāi-chì góa beh kā lí chek-pī, chiū-sī lí iông-ún chū-chheng choh sian-ti ê hū-jîn-lâng [Iâ-sé-pia̍t]; i kà-sī koh bê-he̍k góa ê lô͘-po̍k khì hoān kan-îm koh chia̍h chè ngó͘-siōng ê mi̍h.
66002021	Góa ū hō͘ i sî-kan thang hóe-kái, m̄-kú i m̄-khéng hóe-kái lī-khui îm-hēng.
66002022	Khòaⁿ ah, góa beh hō͘ i kan-khó͘ tó-chhn̂g; hiah-ê kap i hoān kan-îm ê lâng nā bô hóe-kái, thêng-chí in kap i ê îm-hēng, góa mā beh hō͘ in siū tōa khó͘-lān.
66002023	Góa beh thâi-sí hiah-ê tè i ê lâng. Án-ni lóng-chóng ê kàu-hōe chiū ōe chai góa sī kàm-chhat lâng ê sim-su ì-liām ê, góa beh chiàu lín ta̍k ê lâng ê só͘-chòe kā lín pò-èng.
66002024	“Chóng-sī lín chiah-ê kî-tha ê [Chhui-ngá-chhui-lat]-lâng, lín bô siū chit khoán kàu-tō, m̄-bat só͘-ūi Sat-tàn ê ò-pì ê lâng, góa kā lín kóng, góa bōe ke-thiⁿ pa̍t khoán ê tāng-tàⁿ hō͘ lín.
66002025	M̄-kú, lín tio̍h kian-siú lín í-keng ū ê, ti̍t-kàu góa lâi.
66002026	“Tek-sèng koh kè-sio̍k ūi-tio̍h góa chòe-kang kàu lō͘-bé ê lâng, góa beh hō͘ i koân-pèng thang tī-lí bān-kok;
66002027	i beh ēng thih-koáiⁿ tī-lí in, chhin-chhiūⁿ kòng-chhùi hûi-khì;
66002028	góa mā ū án-ni tùi góa ê Pē niá-siū koân-pèng. Tek-sèng ê lâng, góa mā beh hō͘ i khé-bêng-chhiⁿ.
66002029	“Ū hīⁿ-khang ê lâng lóng tio̍h thiaⁿ Sèng Sîn kā chiah-ê kàu-hōe kóng ê ōe.”
66003001	“Lí tio̍h siá-phoe hō͘ Sat-te̍k ê kàu-hōe ê thiⁿ-sài, kóng: “Ū Siōng-tè ê chhit ê sîn kap chhit lia̍p chhiⁿ Hit-ūi án-ni kóng: Góa chai lí ê só͘-chòe, lâng kóng lí teh oa̍h, kî-si̍t sī sí.
66003002	Tio̍h chhíⁿ khí-lâi, ka-kiông teh-beh bô-khì ê khùi-si-á, in-ūi góa khòaⁿ, tī góa ê Siōng-tè bīn-chêng, lí ê só͘-chòe iáu bô oân-choân.
66003003	Só͘-í, tio̍h kì-tit lí só͘ niá-siū, só͘ thiaⁿ-tio̍h ê; tio̍h chun-siú, tio̍h hóe-kái. Lí nā bô chhíⁿ khí-lâi, góa ōe chhin-chhiūⁿ chha̍t lâi; lí it-tēng m̄-chai góa sím-mi̍h sî ōe lâi-kàu lí hia.
66003004	M̄-kú, tī [Sat-te̍k] iáu ū chi̍t-kóa lâng in ê saⁿ bô phah lâ-sâm, in ōe chhēng pe̍h-saⁿ kap góa chòe-hé kiâⁿ, in-ūi in ōe kham-tit.
66003005	“Tek-sèng ê lâng siâng-khoán ōe chhēng pe̍h-saⁿ; góa it-tēng bōe tùi oa̍h-miā-chheh kā i tû-miâ. Góa ōe tī góa ê Pē kap I hiah-ê thiⁿ-sài bīn-chêng kong-khai jīn i ê miâ.
66003006	“Ū hīⁿ-khang ê lâng lóng tio̍h thiaⁿ Sèng Sîn kā chiah-ê kàu-hōe kóng ê ōe.”
66003007	“Lí tio̍h siá-phoe hō͘ [Hui-la̍h-thiat-hui] ê kàu-hōe ê thiⁿ-sài, kóng: “Sèng-kiat koh chin-si̍t, chiáng-ak [Tāi-pi̍t] ê só-sî, khui chiū bô-lâng ōe-tàng koaiⁿ, koaiⁿ chiū bô-lâng ōe-tàng khui Hit-ūi án-ni kóng:
66003008	Góa chai lí ê só͘-chòe, lí khòaⁿ, góa í-keng tī lí ê bīn-chêng kā lí khui chi̍t ê mn̂g, sī bô-lâng ōe-tàng koaiⁿ ê; góa chai lí kan-ta ū tām-po̍h khùi-la̍t, khiok ū siú góa ê tō-lí, m̄-bat hó͘-jīn góa ê miâ.
66003009	Lí khòaⁿ, Sat-tàn ê chi̍p-thoân, in chū-chheng [Iû-thài]-lâng, kî-si̍t m̄-sī, sī hiah-ê kóng pe̍h-chha̍t ê; lí khòaⁿ, góa beh hō͘ in lâi phak tī lí ê kha-chêng, in chiū chai góa ū thiàⁿ lí.
66003010	In-ūi lí ū chun-siú góa ê tō-lí thun-lún kàu lō͘-bé, góa mā beh pó-siú lí thoat-lī hit-ê chhì-liān ê sî, chit-ê sî teh-beh lîm-kàu choân sè-kài, lâi khó-giām tòa tī tōe-chiūⁿ ê lâng.
66003011	Góa liâm-piⁿ kàu; lí só͘-ū ê tio̍h kian-siú, chiah-bián ū lâng kā lí ê hoa-koan the̍h-khì.
66003012	“Tek-sèng ê lâng, góa beh hō͘ i chiâⁿ-chòe góa ê Siōng-tè tiān-lāi ê thiāu; i éng-oán bōe-koh lī-khui. Góa beh chiong góa ê Siōng-tè ê miâ, í-ki̍p góa ê Siōng-tè ê siâⁿ, chiū-sī tùi thiⁿ-téng góa ê Siōng-tè hia kàng-lo̍h sin ê [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng] ê miâ, kap góa sin ê miâ, lóng siá tī i téng-bīn.
66003013	“Ū hīⁿ-khang ê lâng lóng tio̍h thiaⁿ Sèng Sîn kā chiah-ê kàu-hōe kóng ê ōe.”
66003014	“Lí tio̍h siá-phoe hō͘ [Ló-tí-ka] ê kàu-hōe ê thiⁿ-sài, kóng: “Hit-ūi Amen, tiong-sìn koh chin-si̍t ê kiàn-chèng-jîn, Siōng-tè chhòng-chō ê kun-goân, án-ni kóng:
66003015	Góa chai lí ê só͘-chòe, lí bô sio bô léng. Góa khah ài lí khòaⁿ sī sio á-sī léng.
66003016	Kì-jiân lí lâ-lûn-sio, m̄-chiâⁿ sio m̄-chiâⁿ léng, góa teh-beh tùi góa ê chhùi kā lí phùi chhut-khì.
66003017	In-ūi lí kóng, ‘Góa hó-gia̍h, í-keng tōa hoat-châi, lóng bô khiàm-kheh.’ Lí khiok m̄-chai lí pi-chhám, khó-lîn, sàn-chhiah, sit-bêng, koh chhiah-sin lō͘-thé.
66003018	Góa khǹg lí tùi góa bóe keng-kè hé thoàn-liān ê kim, thang hō͘ lí hó-gia̍h; koh bóe pe̍h ê saⁿ khì chhēng, chiah-bián hō͘ lâng khòaⁿ-tio̍h lí thǹg-theh ê kiàn-siàu; mā bóe io̍h-ko lâi boah lí ê ba̍k-chiu, hō͘ lí ōe khòaⁿ-kìⁿ.
66003019	Góa só͘ thiàⁿ ê lâng, góa lóng kā in chek-pī kap koán-kàu. Só͘-í, tio̍h jia̍t-sim, tio̍h hoán-hóe.
66003020	Lí khòaⁿ, góa í-keng khiā tī mn̂g-gōa teh phah-mn̂g; thiaⁿ-kìⁿ góa ê siaⁿ lâi khui-mn̂g ê lâng, góa beh ji̍p-khì chhē i, kap i chòe-hé chia̍h-pn̄g, i mā kap góa chòe-hé chia̍h.
66003021	“Tek-sèng ê lâng, góa beh hō͘ i kap góa chòe-hé chē tī góa ê pó-chō, chhin-chhiūⁿ góa í-keng tek-sèng kap góa ê Pē chòe-hé chē tī I ê pó-chō.
66003022	“Ū hīⁿ-khang ê lâng lóng tio̍h thiaⁿ Sèng Sîn kā chiah-ê kàu-hōe kóng ê ōe.”
66004001	Āu-lâi góa koh khòaⁿ, khòaⁿ-kìⁿ thiⁿ-téng ū chi̍t ê khui-khui ê mn̂g. Góa ū thiaⁿ-kìⁿ hit-ê thâu-chi̍t piàn tùi góa kóng ōe ê siaⁿ, chhin-chhiūⁿ lat-pah teh hiáng, kóng, “Khí-lâi chia, góa beh chí-sī lí í-āu it-tēng tio̍h hoat-seng ê tāi-chì.”
66004002	Góa chiū sûi-sî siū Sèng Sîn kám-tōng, khòaⁿ-kìⁿ thiⁿ-téng ū chi̍t ê pó-chō, ū chi̍t ūi chē tī pó-chō.
66004003	I ê bīn-māu chhin-chhiūⁿ phek-ge̍k kap âng-pó-chio̍h; pó-chō ê chiu-ûi ū khēng, khòaⁿ khí-lâi chhin-chhiūⁿ le̍k pó-chio̍h.
66004004	Pó-chō ê chiu-ûi ū jī-cha̍p-sì ê chō-ūi, ū jī-cha̍p-sì ê tiúⁿ-ló chē tī chō-ūi, in chhēng pe̍h-saⁿ, thâu-khak tì kim ê hoa-koan.
66004005	Tùi pó-chō ū hoat-chhut sih-nà, hiáng-siaⁿ, kap lûi; tī pó-chō chêng ū chhit ki tiám-to̍h ê hé-pé, chiū-sī Siōng-tè ê chhit ê sîn.
66004006	Pó-chō chêng ū chhin-chhiūⁿ chúi-chiⁿ hiah-ni̍h thàu-bêng ê po-lê-hái. Pó-chō ê chiu-ûi ū sì ê oa̍h-mi̍h, in ê seng-khu chêng-āu lóng ū ba̍k-chiu.
66004007	Thâu-chi̍t ê oa̍h-mi̍h chhin-chhiūⁿ sai, tē-jī ê oa̍h-mi̍h chhin-chhiūⁿ gû-káng-á, tē-saⁿ ê oa̍h-mi̍h ū chhin-chhiūⁿ lâng ê bīn, tē-sì ê oa̍h-mi̍h chhin-chhiūⁿ teh pe ê eng-chiáu.
66004008	Chit sì ê oa̍h-mi̍h ta̍k ê lóng ū la̍k ê si̍t, chiu-ûi kap lāi-bīn kui seng-khu ū chin chōe ba̍k-chiu. In mî-ji̍t bô-thêng teh chhiùⁿ: Sèng chài! Sèng chài! Sèng chài! Choân-lêng ê Chú Siōng-tè, kè-khì chûn-chāi, hiān-chāi chûn-chāi, chiong-lâi mā chûn-chāi.”
66004009	Ta̍k piàn oa̍h-mi̍h chiong êng-kng, chun-kùi, kám-siā, kui hō͘ chē tī pó-chō, oa̍h kàu tāi-tāi bô-chīn Hit-ūi ê sî,
66004010	jī-cha̍p-sì ê tiúⁿ-ló chiū phak lo̍h-khì tī chē tī pó-chō Hit-ūi ê bīn-chêng, kèng-pài oa̍h kàu tāi-tāi bô-chīn Hit-ūi; koh chiong in ê hoa-koan hiat tī pó-chō chêng, kóng:
66004011	Goán ê Chú, goán ê Siōng-tè! Lí eng-kai tit-tio̍h êng-kng, chun-kùi, kap koân-lêng, in-ūi lí chhòng-chō bān-iú; tùi lí ê chí-ì, bān-iú siū-chō, seng-chûn.
66005001	Góa khòaⁿ-kìⁿ chē tī pó-chō Hit-ūi ê chiàⁿ-chhiú ū chi̍t kńg chheh, lāi-bīn gōa-bīn lóng ū siá-jī, ēng chhit ê ìn hong-teh.
66005002	Góa koh khòaⁿ-kìⁿ chi̍t ê ū tōa khùi-la̍t ê thiⁿ-sài, tōa-siaⁿ soan-pò͘ kóng, “Sím-mi̍h lâng ū chu-keh thang thí-khui hit kńg chheh, thiah chheh ê hong-ìn?”
66005003	Tī thiⁿ-téng, tī tōe-chiūⁿ, tī tōe-ē, lóng bô-lâng ōe-tàng thí-khui á-sī tha̍k hit kńg chheh.
66005004	Chhē bô chi̍t ê lâng ū chu-keh thí-khui á-sī tha̍k hit kńg chheh, góa chiū tōa-siaⁿ khàu.
66005005	Tiúⁿ-ló ê tiong-kan ū chi̍t-ê tùi góa kóng, “M̄-thang khàu; lí khòaⁿ, tùi [Iû-tāi] chi-cho̍k chhut-lâi ê Sai, [Tāi-pi̍t] ê Kun, I í-keng tek-sèng, ōe-tàng khui hit kńg chheh kap hit chhit ê hong-ìn.
66005006	Āu-lâi góa khòaⁿ-kìⁿ Iûⁿ-ko khiā tī pó-chō chêng, ū sì ê oa̍h-mi̍h kap hiah-ê tiúⁿ-ló kā I ûi-teh. Iûⁿ-ko ká-ná bat siū sat-hāi, ū chhit ki kak, chhit lúi ba̍k-chiu, chiū-sī siū chhe-khián kàu phó͘-thiⁿ-ē Siōng-tè ê chhit ê sîn.
66005007	Iûⁿ-ko chiū chìn-chêng, tùi chē tī pó-chō Hit-ūi ê chiàⁿ-chhiú the̍h hit kńg chheh.
66005008	I the̍h-tio̍h ê sî, hit sì ê oa̍h-mi̍h kap jī-cha̍p-sì ê tiúⁿ-ló lóng phak tī Iûⁿ-ko ê bīn-chêng, ta̍k ê ū the̍h khîm kap tóe móa hiuⁿ ê kim-lô͘; hiuⁿ chiū-sī sìn-tô͘ ê kî-tó.
66005009	In gîm chi̍t siú sin ê si, kóng: Lí ū chu-keh the̍h hit kńg chheh, thiah-khui i ê hong-ìn; in-ūi lí ū siū sat-hāi, ēng lí ê huih tùi ta̍k ê cho̍k-kûn, ta̍k chióng gú-giân, ta̍k ê bîn-cho̍k, ta̍k ê pang-kok, sio̍k-hôe lâng kui Siōng-tè.
66005010	Lí hō͘ in chiâⁿ-chòe kok-tō͘, kap chè-si lâi ho̍k-sāi lán ê Siōng-tè; in ōe tī tōe-chiūⁿ chiáng-koân.
66005011	Góa koh khòaⁿ, góa ū thiaⁿ-kìⁿ chheng-chheng bān-bān thiⁿ-sài ê siaⁿ-im. In lóng ûi tī pó-chō, oa̍h-mi̍h, í-ki̍p tiúⁿ-ló ê chiu-ûi,
66005012	tōa-siaⁿ, kóng: Siū sat-hāi ê Iûⁿ-ko eng-kai tit-tio̍h koân-lêng, hù-jū, tì-hūi, khùi-la̍t, chun-kùi, êng-kng, kap chheng-chàn.
66005013	Góa koh thiaⁿ-kìⁿ, tī thiⁿ-téng, tī tōe-chiūⁿ, kap tōe-ē, hái-ni̍h, kap ú-tiū tiong it-chhè ê pī-chō-bu̍t, lóng kóng: Goān chheng-chàn, chun-kùi, êng-kng, koân-sè, lóng kui hō͘ chē tī pó-chō Hit-ūi kap Iûⁿ-ko, tāi-tāi bô-chīn!
66005014	Hit sì ê oa̍h-mi̍h ìn kóng, “Amen!” Hiah-ê tiúⁿ-ló chiū phak lo̍h-khì kèng-pài.
66006001	Iûⁿ-ko khui chhit ê hong-ìn ê chi̍t-ê ê sî, góa koh khòaⁿ, góa ū thiaⁿ-kìⁿ sì ê oa̍h-mi̍h ê chi̍t-ê, i ê siaⁿ chhin-chhiūⁿ lûi ê siaⁿ, kóng, “Lâi!”
66006002	Góa khòaⁿ ê sî, ū khòaⁿ-tio̍h chi̍t chiah pe̍h-bé, khiâ-bé ê lâng gia̍h keng; i niá-siū hoa-koan chhut-hoat, ūi-tio̍h beh pek-chiàn pek-sèng.
66006003	Iûⁿ-ko khui tē-jī ê hong-ìn ê sî, góa ū thiaⁿ-kìⁿ tē-jī ê oa̍h-mi̍h kóng, “Lâi!”
66006004	Hit sî ū pa̍t chiah bé chhut-lâi, sī chhiah-sek ê; khiâ-bé ê lâng ū niá-siū koân-pèng thang tùi tōe-chiūⁿ chhiúⁿ-toa̍t hô-pêng, hō͘ lâng hō͘-siōng chân-sat; i ū koh niá-siū chi̍t ki tōa ki kiàm.
66006005	Iûⁿ-ko khui tē-saⁿ ê hong-ìn ê sî, góa ū thiaⁿ-kìⁿ tē-saⁿ ê oa̍h-mi̍h kóng, “Lâi!” Góa khòaⁿ ê sî, ū khòaⁿ-tio̍h chi̍t chiah o͘-bé, khiâ-bé ê lâng chhiú the̍h chhìn-á.
66006006	Góa thiaⁿ-kìⁿ ká-ná ū siaⁿ tùi sì ê oa̍h-mi̍h tiong-kan hoat-chhut kóng, “Chi̍t ji̍t ê kang-chîⁿ chí-ū thang bóe chi̍t kong-seng sió-be̍h; chi̍t ji̍t ê kang-chîⁿ chí-ū thang bóe saⁿ kong-seng tōa-be̍h; ka-ná-iû kap chiú m̄-thang phah-sńg.”
66006007	Iûⁿ-ko khui tē-sì ê hong-ìn ê sî, góa ū thiaⁿ-kìⁿ tē-sì ê oa̍h-mi̍h kóng, “Lâi!”
66006008	Góa khòaⁿ ê sî, ū khòaⁿ-tio̍h chi̍t chiah hé-hu-sek ê bé, khiâ-bé ê lâng miâ kiò-chòe Sí-bông, Im-hú tè tī āu-bīn; in ū niá-siū koân-pèng thang koán-hat tōe-chiūⁿ sì-hūn-chi̍t ê thó͘-tōe, ēng to-kiàm, ki-hng, un-e̍k, kap tōe-chiūⁿ ê iá-siù khì sat-hāi.
66006009	Iûⁿ-ko khui tē-gō͘ ê hong-ìn ê sî, góa khòaⁿ-kìⁿ chè-tôaⁿ-ē ū ūi-tio̍h Siōng-tè ê ōe kap ūi-tio̍h chòe kiàn-chèng siū sat-hāi ê lâng ê lêng-hûn.
66006010	In tōa-siaⁿ âu-kiò kóng, “Sèng koh chin ê Chú-cháiⁿ ah, tio̍h koh jōa kú lí chiah beh sím-phòaⁿ tōe-chiūⁿ ê lâng, thang ūi-tio̍h goán só͘ lâu ê huih sin-oan?”
66006011	Ta̍k ê lâng chiū niá-siū chi̍t niá pe̍h-saⁿ, koh ū siaⁿ kā in kóng, tio̍h koh thèng-hāu chi̍t-sî-á kú, kàu pîⁿ-pîⁿ chòe lô͘-po̍k ê lâng í-ki̍p in ê hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē, chiū-sī teh-beh kap in siâng-khoán siū sat-hāi ê lâng ê sò͘-bo̍k móa ê sî.
66006012	Āu-lâi góa khòaⁿ-kìⁿ Iûⁿ-ko khui tē-la̍k ê hong-ìn ê sî, hut-jiân tōe tōa tín-tāng, ji̍t-thâu pìⁿ-chòe chhin-chhiūⁿ o͘ môa-pò͘ hiah-ni̍h o͘, kui-ê ge̍h pìⁿ-chòe chhin-chhiūⁿ huih hiah-ni̍h âng;
66006013	thiⁿ-téng ê chhiⁿ tūi-lo̍h tōe, chhin-chhiūⁿ bû-hoa-kó-chhiū hō͘ tōa-hong sàu tín-tāng, iáu-bē sek ê ké-chí lóng lak liáu-liáu.
66006014	Thiⁿ siau-sit, chhin-chhiūⁿ chi̍t kńg chheh kńg khí-lâi; soaⁿ kap hái-tó lóng choah lī-khui goân-ūi.
66006015	Tōe-chiūⁿ ê kun-ông, thóng-tī-chiá, chiòng-léng, ū-chîⁿ-ê, ū-sè-ê, it-chhè choh lô͘-po̍k-ê, kap chū-iû-ê lóng khì bih tī tōng-lāi kap soaⁿ-giâm tiong-kan ê phāng.
66006016	In ǹg soaⁿ-niá kap soaⁿ-giâm hoah kóng, “Tó lo̍h-lâi kā goán khàm-teh, hō͘ goán thang siám-pī chē tī pó-chō Hit-ūi ê bīn kap Iûⁿ-ko ê siū-khì.
66006017	In-ūi in siū-khì ê tōa Ji̍t-chí kàu lah, sím-mi̍h lâng khiā ōe-tiâu?”
66007001	Āu-lâi, góa ū khòaⁿ-kìⁿ sì ê thiⁿ-sài khiā tī tōe ê sì kak-thâu, chiong tōe sì-bīn ê hong cha̍h khí-lâi, hō͘ hong bōe chhe-tio̍h tōe, hái, kap it-chhè ê chhiū-ba̍k.
66007002	Góa koh khòaⁿ-kìⁿ lēng-gōa chi̍t ê thiⁿ-sài the̍h éng-oa̍h Siōng-tè ê ìn, tùi ji̍t-chhut ê só͘-chāi chiūⁿ-lâi; i tùi ū niá-siū koân-pèng thang siong-hāi tōe kap hái hit sì ê thiⁿ-sài tōa-siaⁿ hoah,
66007003	kóng, “Goán iáu-bē tī Siōng-tè lô͘-po̍k ê thâu-hia̍h khàm-ìn í-chêng, m̄-thang siong-hāi tōe, hái, kap chhiū-ba̍k.”
66007004	Góa thiaⁿ-kìⁿ, tī [Í-sek-lia̍t] ta̍k ê chi-cho̍k tiong siū khàm-ìn ê lâng, lóng-chóng ū cha̍p-sì-bān sì-chheng.
66007005	Sio̍k [Iû-tāi] chi-cho̍k siū khàm-ìn ê lâng ū chi̍t-bān nn̄g-chheng; sio̍k [Lū-piān] chi-cho̍k ê lâng ū chi̍t-bān nn̄g-chheng; sio̍k [Ka-te̍k] chi-cho̍k ê lâng ū chi̍t-bān nn̄g-chheng;
66007006	sio̍k [A-siat] chi-cho̍k ê lâng ū chi̍t-bān nn̄g-chheng; sio̍k [Ná-hut-tha-lī] chi-cho̍k ê lâng ū chi̍t-bān nn̄g-chheng; sio̍k [Má-ná-se] chi-cho̍k ê lâng ū chi̍t-bān nn̄g-chheng;
66007007	sio̍k [Se-biān] chi-cho̍k ê lâng ū chi̍t-bān nn̄g-chheng; sio̍k [Lī-bī] chi-cho̍k ê lâng ū chi̍t-bān nn̄g-chheng; sio̍k [Í-sat-ka] chi-cho̍k ê lâng ū chi̍t-bān nn̄g-chheng;
66007008	sio̍k [Se-pò͘-lûn] chi-cho̍k ê lâng ū chi̍t-bān nn̄g-chheng; sio̍k [Iok-sek] chi-cho̍k ê lâng ū chi̍t-bān nn̄g-chheng; sio̍k [Piān-ngá-bín] chi-cho̍k siū khàm-ìn ê lâng ū chi̍t-bān nn̄g-chheng.
66007009	Āu-lâi, góa koh khòaⁿ, ū khòaⁿ-kìⁿ chi̍t tōa-kûn lâng, bô-lâng ōe-tàng kè-sǹg in ê sò͘-bo̍k, sī tùi ta̍k kok, ta̍k cho̍k-kûn, ta̍k bîn-cho̍k, ta̍k khoán gú-giân lâi ê, lóng khiā tī pó-chō kap Iûⁿ-ko ê bīn-chêng, chhēng pe̍h-saⁿ, chhiú gia̍h chang-chhiū ki.
66007010	In tōa-siaⁿ hoah: Goān chín-kiù kui tī chē tī pó-chō ê lán ê Siōng-tè, mā kui tī Iûⁿ-ko!
66007011	Só͘-ū ê thiⁿ-sài lóng khiā tī pó-chō, tiúⁿ-ló, kap sì ê oa̍h-mi̍h ê chiu-ûi, in tī pó-chō chêng bīn phak lo̍h-khì kèng-pài Siōng-tè,
66007012	kóng: Amen! Goān siōng-chàn, êng-kng, tì-hūi, kám-siā, chun-kùi, koân-lêng, khùi-la̍t, kui tī lán ê Siōng-tè, kàu éng-éng oán-oán. Amen!
66007013	Tiúⁿ-ló tiong ū chi̍t-ê mn̄g góa kóng, “Chiah-ê chhēng pe̍h-saⁿ ê sī sím-mi̍h lâng? In tùi tó-ūi lâi?”
66007014	Góa ìn kóng, “Sian-siⁿ, lí chai.” Āu-lâi i kā góa kóng, “Chiah-ê lâng sī keng-kè tōa chai-lān chhut-lâi ê, in ū sóe in ê saⁿ, ēng Iûⁿ-ko ê huih sóe kàu pe̍h.
66007015	Só͘-í, in tī Siōng-tè ê pó-chō chêng, mî-ji̍t tī I ê sèng-tiān ho̍k-sāi I; chē tī pó-chō Hit-ūi beh pó-hō͘ in.
66007016	In bōe-koh iau, bōe-koh chhùi-ta; ji̍t-thâu kap iām-jia̍t lóng bōe siong-hāi in.
66007017	Tī pó-chō tiong ê Iûⁿ-ko beh chòe in ê bo̍k-chiá; I beh chhōa in kàu oa̍h-miā-chúi ê chôaⁿ-goân; Siōng-tè beh tùi in ê ba̍k-chiu chhit-khì lóng-chóng ê ba̍k-sái.
66008001	Iûⁿ-ko khui tē-chhit ê hong-ìn ê sî, thiⁿ chēng-chēng iok pòaⁿ tiám cheng kú.
66008002	Āu-lâi góa ū khòaⁿ-kìⁿ chhit ê thiⁿ-sài khiā tī Siōng-tè bīn-chêng, in ū niá-siū chhit ki lat-pah.
66008003	Koh ū chi̍t ê thiⁿ-sài lâi, chhiú the̍h kim hiuⁿ-lô͘ khiā tī chè-tôaⁿ chêng, niá-siū chin chōe hiuⁿ thang kap chèng sìn-tô͘ ê kî-tó chòe-hé hiàn tī pó-chō chêng ê kim chè-tôaⁿ téng.
66008004	Hiuⁿ-ian kap sìn-tô͘ ê kî-tó tùi thiⁿ-sài ê chhiú chhèng kàu Siōng-tè bīn-chêng.
66008005	Jiân-āu, thiⁿ-sài the̍h hiuⁿ-lô͘, tóe móa chè-tôaⁿ téng ê hé, kā i hiat-lo̍h tōe, sûi-sî ū tân-lûi, hiáng-siaⁿ, sih-nà, kap tōe-tāng.
66008006	Gia̍h chhit ki lat-pah ê chhit ê thiⁿ-sài chún-pī hó-sè beh pûn.
66008007	Thâu-chi̍t ê thiⁿ-sài pûn, sûi-sî ū phau̍h kap hé, chham huih hiat-lo̍h tōe; tōe ê saⁿ-hūn-chi̍t sio-khì, chhiū-ba̍k ê saⁿ-hūn-chi̍t sio-khì, só͘-ū chhiⁿ-chhùi ê chháu lóng sio-khì.
66008008	Tē-jī ê thiⁿ-sài pûn, sûi-sî ū chhin-chhiūⁿ hé teh sio ê tōa-soaⁿ hiat-lo̍h hái; hái ê saⁿ-hūn-chi̍t pìⁿ-chòe huih;
66008009	hái-ni̍h ê oa̍h-mi̍h saⁿ-hūn-chi̍t sí-khì; chûn-chiah ê saⁿ-hūn-chi̍t sún-hoāi.
66008010	Tē-saⁿ ê thiⁿ-sài pûn, sûi-sî ū chi̍t lia̍p tōa lia̍p chhiⁿ tùi thiⁿ-téng lak lo̍h-lâi, chhin-chhiūⁿ teh to̍h ê hé-pé lak tī saⁿ-hūn-chi̍t ê kang-hô kap só͘-ū ê chúi-chôaⁿ.
66008011	Chit lia̍p chhiⁿ ê miâ kiò-chòe Khó͘-hiāⁿ. Saⁿ-hūn-chi̍t ê chúi pìⁿ khó͘, chin chōe lâng in-ūi chit-ê chúi sí-khì, in-ūi chúi pìⁿ khó͘.
66008012	Tē-sì ê thiⁿ-sài pûn, ji̍t ê saⁿ-hūn-chi̍t, ge̍h ê saⁿ-hūn-chi̍t, chhiⁿ ê saⁿ-hūn-chi̍t lóng siū kong-kek, tì-kàu ji̍t, ge̍h, chhiⁿ ê saⁿ-hūn-chi̍t pìⁿ àm, ji̍t-sî saⁿ-hūn-chi̍t bô kng, mî-sî mā saⁿ-hūn-chi̍t bô kng.
66008013	Āu-lâi góa khòaⁿ, ū thiaⁿ-kìⁿ chi̍t chiah tī khong-tiong teh pe ê eng-chiáu tōa-siaⁿ kiò kóng, “Chhám à! Chhám à! Tòa tī tōe-chiūⁿ ê lâng chhám à! In-ūi kî-tha ê saⁿ ê thiⁿ-sài teh-beh pûn lat-pah lah.”
66009001	Tē-gō͘ ê thiⁿ-sài pûn, góa ū khòaⁿ-tio̍h tùi thiⁿ-téng lak lo̍h-lâi tōe-bīn hit lia̍p chhiⁿ; chit lia̍p chhiⁿ ū niá-siū hit-ê bô-tóe chhim-khiⁿ ê só-sî.
66009002	I khui bô-tóe chhim-khiⁿ, chiū ū tōa hé-lô͘ ê ian chhèng khí-lâi. Ji̍t-thâu kap thài-khong in-ūi chhim-khiⁿ ê ian chiū pìⁿ o͘-àm.
66009003	Chháu-meh tùi ian ê lāi-bīn chhut-lâi hioh tī tōe-bīn; in niá-siū koân-pèng chhin-chhiūⁿ tōe-chiūⁿ ê giat-á-thâng ū ê koân-pèng.
66009004	In siū kau-tài m̄-thang siong-hāi tōe-chiūⁿ ê chháu, ta̍k chióng ê chhiū-ba̍k, kap it-chhè chhiⁿ-chhùi ê mi̍h, chí-ū thang siong-hāi thâu-hia̍h bô khàm Siōng-tè ê ìn ê lâng.
66009005	Chháu-meh bô tit-tio̍h koân thang thâi-sí chiah-ê lâng, chí-ū thang hō͘ in siū thòng-khó͘ gō͘ ge̍h-ji̍t kú, in ê thòng-khó͘ chhin-chhiūⁿ lâng hō͘ giat-á-thâng kā-tio̍h ê thòng-khó͘.
66009006	Chiah-ê ji̍t ê tiong-kan, lâng kiû sí mā bōe tit sí, ài sí mā sí bōe-khì.
66009007	Chháu-meh ê hêng-chōng chhin-chhiūⁿ chún-pī beh chhut-chiàn ê bé; in ê thâu-khak téng tì chhin-chhiūⁿ kim ê hoa-koan; in ê bīn chhin-chhiūⁿ lâng ê bīn;
66009008	in ê thâu-mn̂g chhin-chhiūⁿ hū-jîn-lâng ê thâu-mn̂g; in ê gê chhin-chhiūⁿ sai ê gê;
66009009	in ê heng-khám chhēng chhin-chhiūⁿ thih ê hō͘-heng-kah; in ê si̍t hoat-chhut ê siaⁿ chhin-chhiūⁿ chin chōe bé thoa-chhia phun-pháu beh khì kau-chiàn ê siaⁿ.
66009010	In ū bé-liu chhin-chhiūⁿ giat-á-thâng ê bé-liu ū chhì; in siong-hāi lâng gō͘ ge̍h-ji̍t kú ê koân-pèng sī tī bé-liu.
66009011	In ê ông sī koán-hat bô-tóe chhim-khiⁿ ê thiⁿ-sài; i ê miâ [Hi-pek-lâi]-gú kiò-chòe [A-pa-tùn], [Hi-la̍h]-gú kiò-chòe [A-pho-lûn], ì-sù sī Húi-bia̍t-chiá.
66009012	Thâu-chi̍t ê chai-hō í-keng kè-khì; iáu ū nn̄g ê chai-hō teh-beh lâi.
66009013	Tē-la̍k ê thiⁿ-sài pûn, góa ū thiaⁿ-kìⁿ chi̍t ê siaⁿ tùi Siōng-tè bīn-chêng ê kim chè-tôaⁿ hit sì ê kak chhut-lâi,
66009014	kā gia̍h lat-pah ê tē-la̍k ê thiⁿ-sài kóng, “Lí tio̍h chiong koaiⁿ tī [Iù-hoat-la-tí] tōa-hô hit sì ê thiⁿ-sài pàng chhut-lâi.”
66009015	Chit sì ê thiⁿ-sài siū tháu-pàng, sī chá chiū an-pâi hó-sè, tī tiāⁿ-tio̍h ê nî, ge̍h, ji̍t, kap sî beh sat-hāi jîn-lūi ê saⁿ-hūn-chi̍t.
66009016	Góa ū thiaⁿ-kóng bé-peng ê sò͘-bo̍k lóng-chóng ū nn̄g-ek.
66009017	Tī īⁿ-siōng tiong, góa só͘ khòaⁿ-kìⁿ bé kap khiâ-bé ê lâng sī án-ni: In ū chhēng hé-iām, nâ-pó-chio̍h, kap liû-hông ê sek-tì ê hō͘-heng-kah. In ê bé ê thâu chhin-chhiūⁿ sai ê thâu, tùi in ê chhùi thò͘-chhut hé, ian, kap liû-hông.
66009018	Jîn-lūi ê saⁿ-hūn-chi̍t tùi bé ê chhùi thò͘ chhut-lâi ê hé, ian, kap liû-hông chit saⁿ hāng chai-hāi siū sat-hāi.
66009019	Chiah-ê bé ê koân-pèng sī tī in ê chhùi kap bé-liu; in ê bé-liu chhin-chhiūⁿ chôa ū thâu, ēng chiah-ê thâu siong-hāi lâng.
66009020	Kî-tha só͘ chhun ê chiū-sī chiah-ê bô siū chai-hō sat-hāi ê lâng. In iáu bô hoán-hóe, bô pàng-sak in ê chhiú só͘ chō ê ngó͘-siōng; in chiàu-siông pài chiah-ê kúi, kap hiah-ê bōe khòaⁿ, bōe thiaⁿ, bōe kiâⁿ, ēng kim, gûn, tâng, chio̍h, chhâ chō ê ngó͘-siōng.
66009021	In mā bô hoán-hóe, bô pàng-sak in hiong-sat, siâ-su̍t, îm-loān, thau-the̍h ê hêng-ûi.
66010001	Góa khòaⁿ-kìⁿ lēng-gōa chi̍t ê tōa khùi-la̍t ê thiⁿ-sài tùi thiⁿ lo̍h-lâi; i ēng hûn choh saⁿ chhēng, thâu-khak téng ū khēng, i ê bīn chhin-chhiūⁿ ji̍t-thâu, kha chhin-chhiūⁿ hé-thiāu.
66010002	I ê chhiú ū the̍h chi̍t kńg í-keng thí-khui ê sòe-kńg-chheh. I chiàⁿ-kha ta̍h hái, tò-kha ta̍h tōe.
66010003	I tōa-siaⁿ hoah, chhin-chhiūⁿ sai teh háu, hit chhit ê lûi chiū chhut-siaⁿ ìn.
66010004	Chhit ê lûi chhut-siaⁿ liáu-āu, góa tú-beh siá, thiaⁿ-kìⁿ tùi thiⁿ ū siaⁿ kóng, “Chhit ê lûi só͘ kóng ê, lí tio̍h hong khí-lâi, m̄-thang kì-lio̍k.”
66010005	Āu-lâi, góa só͘ khòaⁿ-kìⁿ kha ta̍h hái kap tōe hit-ê thiⁿ-sài gia̍h chiàⁿ-chhiú kí thiⁿ,
66010006	kí hit-ūi oa̍h kàu éng-éng oán-oán ê Siōng-tè, chiū-sī chhòng-chō thiⁿ kap thiⁿ-téng ê mi̍h, tōe kap tōe-chiūⁿ ê mi̍h, hái kap hái-ni̍h ê mi̍h ê, chiù-chōa kóng, “Bōe-koh iân-tî lah!
66010007	Put-kò tē-chhit ê thiⁿ-sài teh-beh pûn lat-pah, lat-pah ê siaⁿ tân ê ji̍t, Siōng-tè tùi I ê lô͘-po̍k --- sian-ti só͘ soan-kò ê ò-biāu ōe si̍t-hiān.”
66010008	Āu-lâi, góa chêng só͘ thiaⁿ-kìⁿ tùi thiⁿ lâi hit-ê siaⁿ koh chi̍t piàn tùi góa kóng, “Lí khì, khì the̍h kha ta̍h hái kap tōe hit-ê thiⁿ-sài chhiú-tiong hit kńg thí-khui ê chheh.”
66010009	Góa chiū khì thiⁿ-sài hia, kiò i chiong hit kńg sòe-kńg-chheh hō͘ góa; i kā góa kóng, “Lí the̍h-khì, chia̍h lo̍h-khì, tī pak-tó͘-lāi ōe khó͘, m̄-kú tī chhùi-lāi ōe chhin-chhiūⁿ bi̍t hiah-ni̍h tiⁿ.”
66010010	Góa chiū tùi thiⁿ-sài ê chhiú the̍h hit kńg sòe-kńg-chheh lâi chia̍h; chhùi-lāi kó-jiân chhin-chhiūⁿ bi̍t hiah-ni̍h tiⁿ, m̄-kú thun lo̍h-khì pak-tó͘-lāi chiū pìⁿ-chòe khó͘.
66010011	Thiⁿ-sài koh kā góa kóng, “Lí tio̍h koh soan-pò͘ Siōng-tè koan-hē chin chōe bîn-cho̍k, pang-kok, gú-giân, kap kun-ông ê ū-giân.”
66011001	Góa ū niá-siū chi̍t ki chhioh, hêng chhin-chhiūⁿ koáiⁿ-á, koh ū siaⁿ tùi góa kóng, “Khí-lâi, khì niû Siōng-tè ê sèng-tiān kap chè-tôaⁿ, koh sǹg tiān-lāi kèng-pài ê jîn-sò͘.
66011002	M̄-kú, sèng-tiān ê gōa-īⁿ m̄-thang niû, in-ūi gōa-īⁿ í-keng kau hō͘ Gōa-pang-lâng; in ōe thún-ta̍h sèng-siâⁿ sì-cha̍p-jī ge̍h-ji̍t kú.
66011003	Góa beh chún góa nn̄g ê kiàn-chèng-jîn chhēng môa-saⁿ, ū koân thoân-tō chi̍t-chheng nn̄g-pah la̍k-cha̍p ji̍t kú.”
66011004	Chit nn̄g ê kiàn-chèng-jîn chiū-sī khiā tī choân-tōe ê Chú bīn-chêng ê nn̄g châng ka-ná-chhiū kap nn̄g ki teng-tâi.
66011005	Nā ū lâng beh hāi in, in ōe tùi chhùi thò͘-chhut hé, chiong tùi-te̍k sio-bia̍t; nā ū lâng beh hāi in, it-tēng tio̍h án-ni siū sat-hāi.
66011006	Chit nn̄g ê kiàn-chèng-jîn ū koân thang koaiⁿ thiⁿ, hō͘ in thoân-tō ê kî-kan bô lo̍h-hō͘; in mā ū koân chiáng-koán chúi hō͘ i pìⁿ-chòe huih; koh chiàu in só͘ ài, thang put-koán-sî kàng ta̍k chióng chai-hāi kong-kek tāi-tōe.
66011007	In kiàn-chèng oân-sêng liáu-āu, tùi bô-tóe chhim-khiⁿ chiūⁿ-lâi hit chiah siù ōe kap in kau-chiàn, chiong in cheng-ho̍k, kā in thâi-sí.
66011008	In ê sin-si ōe tó tī tōa siâⁿ-chhī ê koe-lō͘; chit-ê siâⁿ-chhī lâng kā i pí-phēng chòe [Só͘-to-má] á-sī [Ai-ki̍p]; in ê Chú mā tī hia hō͘ lâng tèng si̍p-jī-kè.
66011009	Saⁿ ji̍t pòaⁿ kú, tùi ta̍k ê bîn-cho̍k, ta̍k ê cho̍k-kûn, ta̍k khoán gú-giân, ta̍k ê pang-kok, ū lâng ōe lâi khòaⁿ in ê sin-si, m̄-chún lâng kā in bâi-chòng tī bōng-ni̍h.
66011010	Tòa tī tōe-bīn-chiūⁿ ê lâng ōe in-ūi in ê sí lâi hoaⁿ-hí khoài-lo̍k, kau-ōaⁿ lé-mi̍h; in-ūi chit nn̄g ê sian-ti ū hō͘ tōe-chiūⁿ ê lâng siū-tio̍h khó͘-chhó͘.
66011011	Saⁿ ji̍t pòaⁿ kè liáu, tùi Siōng-tè hia ū oa̍h-khì ji̍p-khì in lāi-bīn, in chiū peh khí-lâi khiā; khòaⁿ-tio̍h ê lâng tōa kiaⁿ-hiâⁿ.
66011012	In nn̄g lâng thiaⁿ-kìⁿ tùi thiⁿ lâi tōa ê siaⁿ tùi in kóng, “Khí-lâi chia!” In chiū tī tùi-te̍k ê bīn-chêng chē hûn chiūⁿ-thiⁿ.
66011013	Tú hit sî, ū tōa tōe-tāng, hit chō siâⁿ tó cha̍p-hūn-chi̍t; in-ūi tōe-tāng sí-khì ê ū chhit-chheng lâng; kî-tha ê lâng tōa kiaⁿ-hiâⁿ, kui êng-kng hō͘ thiⁿ-téng ê Siōng-tè.
66011014	Tē-jī ê chai-hō í-keng kè; tē-saⁿ ê chai-hō liâm-piⁿ kàu.
66011015	Tē-chhit ê thiⁿ-sài pûn, thiⁿ-téng ū tōa ê siaⁿ, kóng: Sè-kan ê kok chiâⁿ-chòe lán ê Chú kap I ê Ki-tok ê kok; I beh éng-éng oán-oán choh-ông.
66011016	Tī Siōng-tè bīn-chêng chē tī in ê chō-ūi ê jī-cha̍p-sì ê tiúⁿ-ló, bīn phak lo̍h-khì kèng-pài Siōng-tè,
66011017	kóng: Hiān-chāi chûn-chāi, kè-khì chûn-chāi Choân-lêng ê Chú Siōng-tè, goán kám-siā lí; in-ūi lí í-keng chiáng-ak tāi-koân; lí í-keng choh-ông.
66011018	Gōa-pang tōa siū-khì, lí mā hoat siū-khì; sí-lâng siū sím-phòaⁿ ê sî-ki kàu lah. Lí ê lô͘-po̍k --- sian-ti, lí ê sìn-tô͘, kap kèng-ùi lí ê miâ ê, bô-lūn tōa-ê sòe-ê, lí pò-siúⁿ in ê sî-ki kàu lah. Pāi-hoāi tōe ê, lí pāi-hoāi in ê sî-ki kàu lah.
66011019	Tī thiⁿ-téng ê Siōng-tè ê sèng-tiān chiū khui; tī sèng-tiān-lāi I ê Iok-kūi khòaⁿ hiān-hiān; hut-jiân ū sih-nà, hiáng-siaⁿ, lûi tân, tōe-tāng, kap tōa phau̍h.
66012001	Āu-lâi, tī thiⁿ-téng ū chi̍t ê tōa kéng-siōng chhut-hiān: Ū chi̍t ê hū-jîn-lâng chhēng ji̍t-thâu, kha ta̍h ge̍h-niû, thâu tì cha̍p-jī lia̍p chhiⁿ ê hoa-koan.
66012002	I ū hoâi-īn, teh-beh siⁿ-kiáⁿ, chhui-chūn, thàng-thiàⁿ, âu-kiò.
66012003	Tī thiⁿ-téng koh ū chi̍t ê kéng-siōng chhut-hiān: Ū chi̍t bé chhiah-sek ê tōa bé lêng, i ū chhit ê thâu, cha̍p ki kak; chhit ê thâu tì chhit téng ông-koan.
66012004	I ēng bé-liu kā thiⁿ-téng saⁿ-hūn-chi̍t ê chhiⁿ sàu-lo̍h tōe. Hit bé lêng khiā tī teh-beh siⁿ-kiáⁿ ê hū-jîn-lâng ê bīn-chêng, thèng-hāu i ê kiáⁿ siⁿ chhut-lâi thang kā i thun lo̍h-khì.
66012005	Hit-ê hū-jîn-lâng siⁿ chi̍t ê ta-po͘-kiáⁿ, i beh ēng thih-koáiⁿ tī-lí bān-kok. M̄-kú, i ê kiáⁿ hō͘ lâng chiap-khì Siōng-tè bīn-chêng, kàu I ê pó-chō hia.
66012006	Hit-ê hū-jîn-lâng tô-cháu khì khòng-iá, tī hia Siōng-tè ū kā i pī-pān chi̍t ê só͘-chāi, hō͘ i thang tit-tio̍h chiàu-kò͘ chi̍t-chheng nn̄g-pah la̍k-cha̍p ji̍t.
66012007	Āu-lâi tī thiⁿ-téng ū chiàn-cheng. [Bí-ka-le̍k] kap i ê sù-chiá khì kap hit bé lêng kau-chiàn, lêng mā kap i ê sù-chiá khí-lâi èng-chiàn.
66012008	Lêng thâi su, i kap i ê sù-chiá tī thiⁿ-téng chiū bô só͘-chāi thang tòa.
66012009	Hit bé tōa bé lêng chiū siū hiat lo̍h-khì; i chiū-sī hit bé lāu-chôa, kiò-chòe Mô͘-kúi, Sat-tàn, choân jîn-lūi ê bê-he̍k-chiá; i siū hiat-lo̍h tōe, i ê sù-chiá mā lóng kap i chòe-hé siū hiat-lo̍h tōe.
66012010	Āu-lâi góa thiaⁿ-kìⁿ tī thiⁿ-téng ū tōa ê siaⁿ kóng: Hiān-chāi lán ê Siōng-tè ê chín-kiù, koân-lêng, kap chú-koân í-keng si̍t-hiān! I í-keng hián-sī I ê Ki-tok ê koân-pèng! Hit-ê mî-ji̍t tī lán ê Siōng-tè bīn-chêng khòng-kò lán ê hiaⁿ-tī chí-bē ê í-keng siū hiat lo̍h-khì.
66012011	In khò Iûⁿ-ko ê huih, kap in só͘ kiàn-chèng ê sìn-sit í-keng khah-iâⁿ hit bé lêng; in sīm-chì kàu sí to bô sioh ka-kī ê sìⁿ-miā.
66012012	Só͘-í, chiah-ê thiⁿ kap tiàm tī hit tiong-kan ê, lín lóng tio̍h hoaⁿ-hí! Chóng-sī, tōe kap hái chhám à, in-ūi Mô͘-kúi í-keng khì-phut-phut lo̍h-khì lín hia, i chai-iáⁿ ka-kī ê sî bô kú lah.
66012013	Hit bé lêng chi̍t-ē chai ka-kī í-keng siū hiat-lo̍h tōe, chiū khì jip hit-ê siⁿ ta-po͘-kiáⁿ ê hū-jîn-lâng.
66012014	Hū-jîn-lâng ū tit-tio̍h tōa chiah eng-chiáu ê nn̄g ki si̍t thang pe-khì khòng-iá, kàu i ka-kī ê só͘-chāi, tī hia tit-tio̍h chiàu-kò͘ saⁿ nî pòaⁿ kú, bô siū-tio̍h lāu-chôa ê kong-kek.
66012015	Hit bé chôa tī hū-jîn-lâng ê āu-bīn, tùi chhùi thò͘-chhut chhin-chhiūⁿ tōa-hô ê chúi beh kā i chhiong-cháu.
66012016	M̄-kú, tāi-tōe pang-chān hū-jîn-lâng, khui-chhùi kā hit bé lêng thò͘ chhut-lâi ê hô-chúi thun lo̍h-khì.
66012017	Lêng chiū tùi hū-jîn-lâng hoat siū-khì, khì kap hū-jîn-lâng kî-tha ê kiáⁿ-sun, chiū-sī hiah-ê chun-siú Siōng-tè ê bēng-lēng í-ki̍p ūi-tio̍h Iâ-so͘ chòe kiàn-chèng ê lâng, kau-chiàn.
66012018	Āu-lâi, hit bé lêng khì khiā tī hái-phiâⁿ ê soa téng.
66013001	Āu-lâi, góa ū khòaⁿ-kìⁿ chi̍t chiah siù tùi hái-ni̍h khí-lâi; i ū cha̍p ki kak, chhit ê thâu; cha̍p ki kak ū tì cha̍p téng ông-koan; ta̍k ê thâu-khak téng lóng ū pòng-to̍k Siōng-tè ê miâ-hō.
66013002	Góa só͘ khòaⁿ-kìⁿ hit chiah siù chhin-chhiūⁿ pà; i ê kha chhin-chhiūⁿ hîm ê kha, chhùi chhin-chhiūⁿ sai ê chhùi. Hit bé lêng chiong i ê lêng-le̍k, ông-chō, kap tōa koân-pèng kau hō͘ hit chiah siù.
66013003	Siù ê chi̍t ê thâu-khak chhin-chhiūⁿ ū siū-tio̍h tì-miā ê tāng-siong, m̄-kú i ê tì-miā-siong ū tit-tio̍h i-hó. Thong sè-kài ê lâng lóng kám-kak chin hi-kî, khì tè tī siù ê āu-bīn.
66013004	In lóng pài hit bé lêng, in-ūi lêng ū chiong i ê koân-pèng kau hō͘ siù; in mā pài siù, kóng, “Siáⁿ-lâng ōe-tàng kap chit chiah siù saⁿ-pí? Siáⁿ-lâng ōe-tàng kap i kau-chiàn?”
66013005	Āu-lâi, chit chiah siù ū tit-tio̍h chi̍t ê kóng tōa-ōe kap húi-pòng ê chhùi; i tit-tio̍h ún-chún thang chip-hêng koân-pèng sì-cha̍p-jī ge̍h-ji̍t kú.
66013006	I khui-chhùi húi-pòng Siōng-tè, húi-pòng I ê miâ kap I ê pò͘-pîⁿ, chiū-sī hiah-ê tòa tī thiⁿ-téng ê lâng.
66013007	I mā tit-tio̍h ún-chún thang kong-kek sìn-tô͘, kā in cheng-ho̍k; i koh tit-tio̍h koân thang tī-lí ta̍k ê cho̍k-kûn, ta̍k ê bîn-cho̍k, ta̍k khoán gú-giân, kap ta̍k ê pang-kok.
66013008	Só͘-ū tòa tī tōe-chiūⁿ ê lâng, in ê miâ, tī chhòng-chō sè-kài í-lâi, bô kì tī siū thâi ê Iûⁿ-ko ê oa̍h-miā-chheh ê, lóng ōe pài hit chiah siù.
66013009	Ū hīⁿ-khang ê lóng tio̍h thiaⁿ:
66013010	Hit-ê eng-kai siū lia̍h ê tio̍h siū lia̍h; hit-ê eng-kai siū sat-hāi ê tio̍h siū to sat-hāi. In-ūi án-ni, sìn-tô͘ tio̍h ū nāi-sim kap sìn-sim.
66013011	Āu-lâi, góa ū khòaⁿ-kìⁿ koh ū chi̍t chiah siù tùi tōe-ni̍h khí-lâi; i ū nn̄g ki kak chhin-chhiūⁿ iûⁿ ê kak, kóng-ōe chhin-chhiūⁿ lêng.
66013012	I tī thâu-chi̍t chiah siù ê bīn-chêng chip-hêng thâu-chi̍t chiah siù ê koân-pèng. I kiò tōe kap tòa tī tōe-chiūⁿ ê lâng khì pài thâu-chi̍t chiah siù, chiū-sī siū-tio̍h tì-miā-siong koh tit-tio̍h i-hó hit chiah siù.
66013013	I kiâⁿ tōa kî-chek, tī lâng ê bīn-chêng kiò hé tùi thiⁿ kàng-lo̍h tōe;
66013014	koh ēng siū ún-chún tī siù ê bīn-chêng kiâⁿ ê kî-chek lâi bê-he̍k tōe-chiūⁿ ê lâng, hoan-hù in tio̍h kā hit chiah siū to-siong iáu oa̍h-teh ê siù chō chi̍t chō siōng.
66013015	I koh siū ún-chún chiong oa̍h-khì pûn ji̍p-khì siù ê siōng, hō͘ siù ê siōng ōe kóng-ōe, koh sat-hāi só͘-ū bô pài siù ê siōng ê lâng.
66013016	I mā kā chèng-lâng, bô-lūn tōa-ê sòe-ê, hó-gia̍h sàn-chhiah, chū-iû-ê choh lô͘-po̍k-ê, tī in ê chiàⁿ-chhiú á-sī thâu-hia̍h khàm-ìn chòe kì-hō.
66013017	Bô khàm siù ê miâ, á-sī bô tāi-piáu i ê miâ ê sò͘-jī ê, chiū bōe-tàng bóe bōe.
66013018	Tùi chit-ê tāi-chì tio̍h ū tì-hūi. Chhong-bêng ê lâng tio̍h sǹg-chhut siù ê sò͘-jī, in-ūi sò͘-jī tāi-piáu chi̍t ê lâng ê miâ, chit-ê sò͘-jī sī la̍k-pah la̍k-cha̍p-la̍k.
66014001	Āu-lâi góa koh khòaⁿ, ū khòaⁿ-kìⁿ Iûⁿ-ko khiā tī [Sek-an]-soaⁿ, ū cha̍p-sì-bān sì-chheng lâng kap I chòe-hé; in ê thâu-hia̍h lóng ū siá Iûⁿ-ko ê miâ kap I ê Pē ê miâ.
66014002	Góa thiaⁿ-kìⁿ ū siaⁿ tùi thiⁿ-téng chhut-lâi, chhin-chhiūⁿ tōa-chúi teh chhiâng ê siaⁿ, koh chhin-chhiūⁿ chhè-lûi ê siaⁿ; góa só͘ thiaⁿ-kìⁿ chit-ê siaⁿ chhin-chhiūⁿ khîm-su teh tôaⁿ khiā-khîm ê siaⁿ.
66014003	In tī pó-chō kap sì ê oa̍h-mi̍h í-ki̍p chèng tiúⁿ-ló ê bīn-chêng chhiùⁿ chi̍t siú sin ê koa, chit siú koa tû-liáu tùi tōe-chiūⁿ sio̍k-hôe hit cha̍p-sì-bān sì-chheng lâng bô-lâng ōe-tàng o̍h.
66014004	In sī m̄-bat chhin-kūn lú-sèng ê tông-lâm. Iûⁿ-ko bô-lūn khì sím-mi̍h só͘-chāi, in lóng tè kàu hia. In sī tùi jîn-lūi tiong-kan sio̍k-hôe chhut-lâi chòe khí-thâu sek ê ké-chí hiàn hō͘ Siōng-tè kap Iûⁿ-ko ê.
66014005	In m̄-bat kóng pe̍h-chha̍t, lóng bô khoat-tiám.
66014006	Góa koh khòaⁿ-kìⁿ lēng-gōa chi̍t ê thiⁿ-sài tī pòaⁿ khong-tiong teh pe; i ū éng-oán ê hok-im beh thoân hō͘ tiàm tī tōe-chiūⁿ ê lâng, hō͘ ta̍k ê pang-kok, ta̍k ê cho̍k-kûn, ta̍k khoán gú-giân, kap ta̍k ê bîn-cho̍k.
66014007	I tōa-siaⁿ kóng, “Tio̍h kèng-ùi Siōng-tè, kui êng-kng hō͘ I! In-ūi I sím-phòaⁿ jîn-lūi ê sî kàu lah; tio̍h kèng-pài hit-ūi chhòng-chō thiⁿ, tōe, hái, kap chúi-goân ê Chú.”
66014008	Lēng-gōa ū tē-jī ê thiⁿ-sài sòa lo̍h-khì kóng, “Tó lo̍h-khì lah! Hō͘ bān-kok lim i îm-loān ê lia̍t-chiú ê tōa [Pa-pí-lûn] tó lo̍h-khì lah!”
66014009	Lēng-gōa ū tē-saⁿ ê thiⁿ-sài sòa lo̍h-khì tōa-siaⁿ kóng, “Nā ū lâng pài hit chiah siù kap siù ê siōng, thâu-hia̍h á-sī chhiú ū khàm-ìn,
66014010	hit-ê lâng mā tio̍h lim Siōng-tè siū-khì ê chiú, chiū-sī thîn tī Siōng-tè siū-khì ê poe ê sûn-chiú. I ōe tī sèng thiⁿ-sài kap Iûⁿ-ko ê bīn-chêng siū-tio̍h hé kap liû-hông ê khó͘-chhó͘.
66014011	Khó͘-chhó͘ in ê hé-ian chhèng chiūⁿ-koân, éng-oán bô-thêng. Hiah-ê pài hit chiah siù kap siù ê siōng, í-ki̍p ū khàm-tio̍h siù ê miâ ê ìn ê lâng mî-ji̍t lóng bōe-tàng an-hioh.”
66014012	In-ūi án-ni, chun-siú Siōng-tè ê bēng-lēng koh kian-chhî sìn Iâ-so͘ ê sìn-tô͘ tio̍h ū nāi-sim.
66014013	Góa koh thiaⁿ-kìⁿ tùi thiⁿ ū siaⁿ kóng, “Lí tio̍h siá khí-lâi! Tùi taⁿ í-āu ūi-tio̍h Chú sòng-sit sìⁿ-miā ê lâng chin ū hok-khì!” Sèng Sîn kóng, “Sī, in ōe thoat-lī lô-khó͘ tit-tio̍h an-hioh, in-ūi in ê só͘-chòe ōe tit-tio̍h jīn-tēng.”
66014014	Āu-lâi, góa koh khòaⁿ, ū khòaⁿ-kìⁿ chi̍t phìⁿ pe̍h hûn, hûn-téng chē chi̍t ūi chhin-chhiūⁿ Jîn-chú ê, thâu-khak tì kim hoa-koan, chhiú gia̍h chi̍t ki lāi ê liâm-le̍k-á.
66014015	Koh ū chi̍t ê thiⁿ-sài tùi sèng-tiān hia chhut-lâi, tùi chē tī hûn-téng Hit-ūi tōa-siaⁿ hoah, “Tio̍h gia̍h liâm-le̍k-á lâi siu-koah; in-ūi siu-koah ê sî í-keng kàu, tōe-chiūⁿ ê lông-chok-bu̍t í-keng chin sek lah.”
66014016	Chē tī hûn-téng Hit-ūi chiū chiong liâm-le̍k-á hiat-lo̍h tōe, tōe-chiūⁿ ê lông-chok-bu̍t chiū siu-sêng.
66014017	Lēng-gōa chi̍t ê thiⁿ-sài tùi thiⁿ-téng ê sèng-tiān chhut-lâi, i mā gia̍h chi̍t ki lāi ê liâm-le̍k-á.
66014018	Koh lēng-gōa chi̍t ê koán hé ê thiⁿ-sài tùi chè-tôaⁿ hia chhut-lâi, tōa-siaⁿ tùi gia̍h lāi ê liâm-le̍k-á hit-ê thiⁿ-sài hoah, kóng, “Ēng lí lāi ê liâm-le̍k-á koah tōe-chiūⁿ kui pha ê phû-tô, in-ūi phû-tô í-keng sek lah.”
66014019	Thiⁿ-sài chiū chiong liâm-le̍k-á hiat-lo̍h tōe, koah tōe-chiūⁿ ê phû-tô, chiong phû-tô hiat lo̍h-khì Siōng-tè tōa siū-khì ê chiú-khut.
66014020	Phû-tô tī siâⁿ-gōa ê chiú-khut hō͘ lâng ta̍h, chiū ū huih tùi chiú-khut lâu chhut-lâi, tāi-iok ū nn̄g kong-chhioh chhim, saⁿ-pah kong-lí tn̂g.
66015001	Āu-lâi, góa koh khòaⁿ-kìⁿ tī thiⁿ-téng ū lēng-gōa chi̍t ê tōa koh kî-īⁿ ê kéng-siōng chhut-hiān, ū chhit ê thiⁿ-sài chiáng-koán chòe-āu chhit ê chai-hō, in-ūi Siōng-tè beh kàng chiah-ê chai-hō, chiong I ê siū-khì piàⁿ kàu-chīn.
66015002	Góa koh khòaⁿ-kìⁿ chhin-chhiūⁿ ū hé chham tī lāi-bīn ê po-lê-hái, mā khòaⁿ-kìⁿ hiah-ê tek-sèng ê lâng, in chiū-sī í-keng thoat-lī hit chiah siù, siù ê siōng, kap ēng sò͘-jī lâi tāi-piáu miâ-jī hiah-ê lâng. In khiā tī po-lê hái-ni̍h, chhiú the̍h Siōng-tè hō͘ in ê khiā-khîm.
66015003	In chhiùⁿ Siōng-tè ê lô͘-po̍k Mô͘-se ê koa kap Iûⁿ-ko ê koa, kóng: Chú, Choân-lêng ê Siōng-tè, lí ê chok-ûi tōa koh kî-īⁿ; bān ông ê Ông, lí ê tō-lō͘ kong-gī chin-si̍t.
66015004	Chú ah, sím-mi̍h lâng káⁿ bô kèng-ùi lí, káⁿ bô êng-kng lí ê miâ? In-ūi chí-ū lí sī sèng; bān-kok lóng ōe lâi, tī lí ê bīn-chêng kèng-pài lí; in-ūi lí kong-gī ê chok-ûi í-keng hián-bêng.
66015005	Góa koh khòaⁿ-kìⁿ thiⁿ-téng ê sèng-tiān í-keng khui, lāi-bīn ū hē kiàn-chèng ê Hōe-bō͘.
66015006	Chiáng-koán chhit ê chai-hō ê chhit ê thiⁿ-sài tùi sèng-tiān chhut-lâi, chhēng chheng-khì koh kng-liāng ê iù-môa-pò͘ ê saⁿ, heng-khám hâ kim-tòa.
66015007	Sì ê oa̍h-mi̍h ê chi̍t ê chiong chhit ê kim-óaⁿ kau hō͘ hit chhit ê thiⁿ-sài, lāi-bīn tóe móa éng-oán oa̍h-teh ê Siōng-tè ê siū-khì.
66015008	Sèng-tiān lāi chhiong-móa tùi Siōng-tè ê êng-kng kap koân-lêng chhèng chhut-lâi ê ian, it-ti̍t kàu chhit ê thiⁿ-sài só͘ chiáng-koán hit chhit ê chai-hō kiat-sok í-chêng, bô-lâng ōe-tàng chìn-ji̍p sèng-tiān.
66016001	Āu-lâi, góa thiaⁿ-kìⁿ ū tōa ê siaⁿ tùi tiān-ni̍h chhut-lâi kā hit chhit ê thiⁿ-sài kóng, “Lín khì, chiong hit chhit óaⁿ Siōng-tè ê siū-khì piàⁿ-lo̍h tōe.”
66016002	Thâu-chi̍t ê thiⁿ-sài chiū khì, chiong i hit óaⁿ piàⁿ-lo̍h tōe, hiah-ê ū siù ê kì-hō kap pài kè siù ê siōng ê lâng chiū siⁿ chhàu koh to̍k ê chhng.
66016003	Tē-jī ê thiⁿ-sài chiong i hit óaⁿ piàⁿ-lo̍h hái, hái-chúi chiū pìⁿ-chòe chhin-chhiūⁿ sí-lâng ê huih, hái-ni̍h ê oa̍h-mi̍h lóng sí-khì.
66016004	Tē-saⁿ ê thiⁿ-sài chiong i hit óaⁿ piàⁿ-lo̍h kang-hô kap chúi-chôaⁿ, chúi chiū pìⁿ-chòe huih.
66016005	Góa thiaⁿ-kìⁿ chiáng-koán chúi ê thiⁿ-sài kóng: Hiān-chāi chûn-chāi, chá chûn-chāi, chì-sèng ê Siōng-tè, lí sī kong-gī, lí ê sím-phòaⁿ kong-chèng.
66016006	In-ūi in ū lâu sìn-tô͘ kap sian-ti ê huih, hiān-chāi lí ēng huih hō͘ in lim. Che sī in èng siū ê pò-èng.
66016007	Āu-lâi góa thiaⁿ-kìⁿ chè-tôaⁿ ū siaⁿ kóng: Sī lah, Choân-lêng ê Chú Siōng-tè, lí ê sím-phòaⁿ chin-si̍t kong-gī.
66016008	Tē-sì ê thiⁿ-sài chiong i hit óaⁿ piàⁿ tī ji̍t-thâu, ji̍t-thâu chiū tit-tio̍h koân ēng iām-hé sio lâng.
66016009	Lâng hō͘ tōa iām-hé sio chiū húi-pòng ū koân chiáng-koán chiah-ê chai-hō ê Siōng-tè ê miâ; in iáu-kú bô hóe-kái, bô kui êng-kng hō͘ Siōng-tè.
66016010	Tē-gō͘ ê thiⁿ-sài chiong i hit óaⁿ piàⁿ tī hit chiah siù ê chō-ūi, siù ê ông-kok chiū pìⁿ-chòe o͘-àm, lâng in-ūi thòng-khó͘ kā-chi̍h,
66016011	koh in-ūi thòng-khó͘ kap to̍k-chhng siat-to̍k thiⁿ-téng ê Siōng-tè; in iáu-kú bô hóe-kái lâi kái-piàn in ê só͘-chòe.
66016012	Tē-la̍k ê thiⁿ-sài chiong i hit óaⁿ piàⁿ-lo̍h [Iù-hoat-la̍h-tí] tōa-hô, hô-chúi chiū ta-khì, ūi-tio̍h tùi tang-hng lâi hiah-ê kun-ông chún-pī chi̍t tiâu lō͘.
66016013	Góa koh khòaⁿ-kìⁿ ū saⁿ ê bô chheng-khì ê sîn, chhin-chhiūⁿ chhân-kap-á, tùi lêng ê chhùi, siù ê chhùi, kap ké sian-ti ê chhùi chhut-lâi.
66016014	Chiah-ê sī ōe kiâⁿ kî-chek ê ok-mô͘ ê sîn, in chhut-khì chio-chi̍p phó͘-thiⁿ-ē ê kun-ông, tī Choân-lêng ê Siōng-tè só͘ tiāⁿ-tio̍h hit-ê tōa Ji̍t-chí chhut-lâi kau-chiàn.
66016015	“Tio̍h chù-ì! Góa ōe chhin-chhiūⁿ chha̍t lâi. Hit-ê chhíⁿ-chhíⁿ, saⁿ chhēng piān-piān ê lâng chin ū hok-khì, in sî kàu m̄-bián thǹg-theh kiâⁿ, chiah-bián hō͘ lâng khòaⁿ-tio̍h i chhiah-sin lō͘-thé ê kiàn-siàu.”
66016016	Hiah-ê ok-mô͘ ê sîn chiū chū-chi̍p phó͘-thiⁿ-ē ê ông tī chi̍t ê só͘-chāi, [Hi-pek-lâi]-ōe kiò-chòe [Hap-má-kiat-tùn].
66016017	Tē-chhit ê thiⁿ-sài chiong i hit óaⁿ piàⁿ tī khong-tiong, chiū ū tōa ê siaⁿ tùi sèng-tiān ê pó-chō hoat-chhut, kóng, “Oân-sêng lah!”
66016018	Hit sî ū sih-nà, hiáng-siaⁿ, lûi, kap tōa tōe-tāng; tōe-chiūⁿ ū jîn-lūi í-lâi m̄-bat ū chiah-ni̍h tōa ê tōe-tāng.
66016019	Hit-ê tōa-siâⁿ [Pa-pí-lûn] chiū li̍h-chòe saⁿ tè, lia̍t-kok ê siâⁿ-chhī mā tó-hoāi. Siōng-tè kì-tit tōa [Pa-pí-lûn]-siâⁿ, hō͘ i lim hit poe tóe Siōng-tè ke̍k tōa siū-khì ê chiú.
66016020	Só͘-ū ê hái-tó lóng cháu bô-khì, soaⁿ mā bô koh khòaⁿ-kìⁿ.
66016021	Jiân-āu tùi thiⁿ-téng ū lo̍h tōa-phau̍h lâi tìm lâng, ta̍k tè tāng iok gō͘-cha̍p kong-kun, lâng ūi-tio̍h phau̍h ê chai-hō chiū siat-to̍k Siōng-tè, in-ūi chit-ê chai-hō hui-siông giâm-tiōng.
66017001	Hiah-ê the̍h chhit tè óaⁿ ê chhit ê thiⁿ-sài ê chi̍t ê lâi kap góa kóng-ōe, kóng, “Lâi, góa beh hō͘ lí khòaⁿ chē tī hô-liû téng hit-ê tōa îm-hū só͘ tio̍h siū ê sím-phòaⁿ.
66017002	Tōe-chiūⁿ ê kun-ông bat kap i kiâⁿ-îm; tōe-chiūⁿ ê chū-bîn mā bat lim i îm-loān ê chiú lim kàu chiú-chùi.”
66017003	Góa siū Sèng Sîn kám-tōng, hō͘ thiⁿ-sài chhōa khì khòng-iá. Góa ū khòaⁿ-kìⁿ chi̍t ê hū-jîn-lâng chē tī chi̍t chiah chu-âng sek, koh chhiong-móa siat-to̍k ê miâ-hō ê siù téng-bīn; chit chiah siù ū chhit ê thâu, cha̍p ki kak.
66017004	Chit-ê hū-jîn-lâng chhēng chí-sek kap chu-âng sek ê saⁿ, ēng kim, pó-chio̍h kap chin-chu chng-thāⁿ, chhiú the̍h kim poe, tóe móa khó-ò͘ⁿ ê mi̍h kap îm-loān ê ù-òe.
66017005	I ê thâu-hia̍h ū siá chi̍t ê miâ, ū ún-ba̍t ê ì-sù, chiū-sī “Tōa [Pa-pí-lûn], tōe-chiūⁿ îm-hū kap khó-ò͘ⁿ ê mi̍h ê lāu-bú”.
66017006	Góa khòaⁿ-kìⁿ hit-ê hū-jîn-lâng lim sìn-tô͘ ê huih kap ūi-tio̍h Iâ-so͘ chòe kiàn-chèng ê sûn-tō-chiá ê huih, lim kàu chùi. Góa khòaⁿ-tio̍h i ê sî tōa tio̍h-kiaⁿ.
66017007	Thiⁿ-sài chiū kā góa kóng, “Sī án-chóaⁿ tio̍h-kiaⁿ? Góa beh chiong chit-ê hū-jîn-lâng kap i só͘ khiâ hit chiah ū chhit ê thâu cha̍p ki kak ê siù ê pì-bi̍t kā lí kóng.
66017008	Lí só͘ khòaⁿ-tio̍h hit chiah siù, chá ū, hiān-chāi bô, teh-beh koh tùi chhim-ian khí-lâi, chòe-āu bia̍t-bông. Tōe-chiūⁿ ê chū-bîn, in ê miâ tùi chhòng-sè í-lâi bô kì tī oa̍h-miā-chheh ê, khòaⁿ-tio̍h hit chiah siù ōe tio̍h-kiaⁿ kî-koài, in-ūi hit chiah siù chá ū, hiān-chāi bô, āu-lâi ōe-koh chhut-hiān.
66017009	“Chit-ê tāi-chì tio̍h ēng tì-hūi lâi lí-kái. Hit chhit ê thâu chiū-sī hū-jîn-lâng só͘ chē ê chhit chō soaⁿ, in mā-sī chhit ê ông.
66017010	Kî-tiong gō͘ ê í-keng tó lo̍h-khì, chi̍t ê iáu tī-teh, lēng-gōa chi̍t ê iáu-bē lâi, nā lâi i it-tēng chiām-sî lâu-teh nā-tiāⁿ.
66017011	Chá ū, hiān-chāi bô hit chiah siù chiū-sī tē-poeh ê ông, sī chhit ê ông ê tiong-kan ê chi̍t ê, in mā ōe bia̍t-bông.
66017012	“Lí só͘ khòaⁿ-tio̍h ê cha̍p ki kak chiū-sī hit cha̍p ê iáu m̄-bat thóng-tī ê ông; m̄-kú in ōe tit-tio̍h koân choh-ông kap siù chòe-hé thóng-tī chi̍t tiám cheng kú.
66017013	Chit cha̍p ê ông tông-ì chiong in ê lêng-le̍k kap koân-pèng kau hō͘ hit chiah siù.
66017014	In beh kap Iûⁿ-ko kau-chiàn, m̄-kú Iûⁿ-ko ōe thâi-iâⁿ chiah-ê ông, in-ūi I sī bān chú ê Chú, bān ông ê Ông; kap I chòe-hé hiah-ê siū ho͘-tiàu, siū kéng-soán, tiong-si̍t ê lâng mā ōe tek-sèng.”
66017015	Thiⁿ-sài koh kā góa kóng, “Lí só͘ khòaⁿ-tio̍h hit-ê îm-hū chē-teh ê hô-liû, chiū-sī ta̍k ê bîn-cho̍k, ta̍k ê kûn-chiòng, ta̍k ê pang-kok, kap ta̍k khoán gú-giân ê lâng.
66017016	Lí só͘ khòaⁿ-tio̍h hit cha̍p ki kak kap hit chiah siù ōe oàn-hūn hit-ê îm-hū, mā ōe hō͘ i bô i-óa, chhiah-sin lō͘-thé; in ōe thun-chia̍h i ê bah, koh ēng hé kā i sio-bia̍t.
66017017	In-ūi Siōng-tè chiong chip-hêng I ê chí-ì ê ì-liām hē tī hit cha̍p ê ông ê sim, hō͘ in tâng-sim chiong in ê kok kau hō͘ hit chiah siù, ti̍t-kàu Siōng-tè ê ōe èng-giām.
66017018	Lí só͘ khòaⁿ-tio̍h hit-ê hū-jîn-lâng chiū-sī teh chiáng-koán tōe-chiūⁿ hiah-ê kun-ông hit chō tōa-siâⁿ.”
66018001	Āu-lâi, góa ū khòaⁿ-kìⁿ lēng-gōa chi̍t ê thiⁿ-sài tùi thiⁿ-téng lo̍h-lâi. I ū tōa koân-pèng; i ê êng-kng hō͘ tōe-chiūⁿ kng khí-lâi.
66018002	I tōa-siaⁿ hoah: Tó lo̍h-khì lah! Tōa [Pa-pí-lûn] tó lo̍h-khì lah! Chit-ê siâⁿ chiâⁿ-chòe kúi khiā-khí ê só͘-chāi, it-chhè ù-òe ê sîn ê kaⁿ-lô, it-chhè ù-òe ê chiáu ê chiáu-lang, it-chhè ù-òe koh khó-ò͘ⁿ ê iá-siù ê lông-á.
66018003	In-ūi lia̍t-kok lóng ū lim-tio̍h chit-ê îm-hū îm-loān ê chiú ín-khí Siōng-tè tōa siū-khì, tōe-chiūⁿ ê kun-ông lóng ū kap i kiâⁿ-îm, tōe-chiūⁿ ê seng-lí-lâng lóng ū tùi i ê chhia-hoa hòng-tōng hoat tōa-châi.
66018004	Góa koh ū thiaⁿ-kìⁿ lēng-gōa chi̍t ê siaⁿ tùi thiⁿ-téng chhut-lâi, kóng: Góa ê chú-bîn ah, chhut-lâi, tio̍h tùi îm-hū hia chhut-lâi, chiah-bián bak-tio̍h i ê chōe, chiah-bián hō͘ i ê chai-hō liân-lūi-tio̍h.
66018005	In-ūi i ê chōe í-keng lúi-chek tú thiⁿ, Siōng-tè kì-tit i ê siâ-ok.
66018006	I án-chóaⁿ khoán-thāi lâng, tio̍h chiàu án-ni khoán-thāi i, chiàu i ê só͘-chòe ka-pē kā i pò-èng, ēng i tiâu-hô chiú ê poe, tiâu-hô ka-pē ê chiú hō͘ i!
66018007	I bat án-chóaⁿ êng-kng ka-kī, án-chóaⁿ chhia-hoa, tio̍h chiàu án-ni hō͘ i thòng-khó͘ pi-siong. In-ūi i sim-lāi ka-kī kóng: Góa chē tī pó-chō choh lú-ông; góa m̄-sī kóaⁿ-hū, choa̍t-tùi bōe tú-tio̍h choh kóaⁿ-hū ê pi-siong.
66018008	Só͘-í, tī chi̍t ji̍t lāi un-e̍k ōe kàu --- ū sí-bông, pi-siong, ki-hng. I ōe hō͘ hé sio-bia̍t, in-ūi sím-phòaⁿ i ê Chú Siōng-tè ū tōa khùi-la̍t.
66018009	Kap i kiâⁿ-îm, kè chhia-hoa seng-oa̍h chiah-ê tōe-chiūⁿ ê ông, khòaⁿ-tio̍h siâⁿ tio̍h-hé-sio ê ian, ōe ūi-tio̍h siâⁿ pi-siong thî-khàu.
66018010	In khòaⁿ-tio̍h siâⁿ só͘ siū ê kan-khó͘ chin kiaⁿ-hiâⁿ, lóng khiā hn̄g-hn̄g, kóng: Chhám à, chit-ê tōa-siâⁿ! [Pa-pí-lûn] chit-ê kian-kò͘ ê siâⁿ, chhám à! In-ūi bô jōa kú, lí chiū ōe siū-tio̍h sím-phòaⁿ!
66018011	Tōe-chiūⁿ ê seng-lí-lâng ūi-tio̍h i thî-khàu ai-siong, in-ūi bô-lâng koh bóe in ê hè,
66018012	chiū-sī kim, gûn, pó-chio̍h, chin-chu; iù-môa-pò͘, si-tiû, ko-kùi ê chí-sek kap âng-sek pò͘-liāu; ta̍k chióng hiuⁿ-chhâ, ta̍k khoán chhiūⁿ-gê chè-phín, ta̍k khoán kùi-khì ê bo̍k-chhâi chè-phín, tâng-khì, thih-khì, kap tāi-lí-chio̍h chè-phín;
66018013	jio̍k-kùi, phang-liāu, hiuⁿ, jú-hiuⁿ; chiú, ka-ná-iû, iù mī-hún, be̍h; gû, iûⁿ, bé, bé-chhia, lô͘-lē, í-ki̍p lâng.
66018014	Chiah-ê seng-lí-lâng tùi i kóng: Lí ê sim só͘ ì-ài hiah-ê hó-mi̍h lóng bô-khì; lí ê êng-hôa hù-kùi lóng siau-sit, éng-oán bōe-tàng koh khòaⁿ-tio̍h.
66018015	Khò chit-ê siâⁿ chòe seng-lí hoat tōa-châi ê seng-lí-lâng, in-ūi khòaⁿ-tio̍h chit-ê siâⁿ só͘ siū ê khó͘-chhó͘ chin kiaⁿ-hiâⁿ, lóng ōe khiā hn̄g-hn̄g pi-siong thî-khàu,
66018016	kóng: Chhám à, chhám à, chit-ê tōa-siâⁿ! Lí koàn-sì chhēng iù-môa-pò͘, ko-kùi ê chí-sek kap âng-sek pò͘-liāu ê saⁿ, kòa kim, pó-chio̍h, kap chin-chu chòe chng-thāⁿ.
66018017	Chi̍t-sî-á kú, só͘-ū ê châi-hù lóng bô-khì. Só͘-ū ê chûn-tiúⁿ, lú-kheh, chúi-siú, kap só͘-ū khò hái seng-oa̍h ê lâng, khiā hn̄g-hn̄g,
66018018	khòaⁿ-tio̍h siâⁿ tio̍h-hé-sio ê ian, lóng hoah: Ū tó chi̍t ê siâⁿ chhin-chhiūⁿ chit-ê tōa-siâⁿ?
66018019	In sám thô͘-hún tī ka-kī ê thâu-khak téng, thî-khàu pi-siong tōa-siaⁿ hoah: Chhám à, chhám à, chit-ê tōa-siâⁿ! Tī hái-ni̍h kiâⁿ-chûn ê lâng lóng khò chit-ê siâⁿ ê châi-hù hoat-châi. In-ūi chi̍t-sî-á kú, i ê it-chhè lóng bô-khì.
66018020	Thiⁿ ah, tio̍h ūi-tio̍h chit-ê siâⁿ hoaⁿ-hí! Lín chiah-ê sìn-tô͘, sù-tô͘, kap sian-ti tio̍h hoaⁿ-hí, in-ūi Siōng-tè í-keng ū thòe lín sin-oan kā i hêng-hoa̍t lah!
66018021	Āu-lâi, ū chi̍t ê tōa khùi-la̍t ê thiⁿ-sài giâ chi̍t tè chio̍h, chhin-chhiūⁿ tōa chio̍h-bō, kā i hiat-lo̍h hái, kóng: Tōa [Pa-pí-lûn]-siâⁿ mā ōe chhin-chhiūⁿ án-ni, tōa-la̍t kā i hiat lo̍h-khì, éng-oán bōe-koh khòaⁿ-kìⁿ.
66018022	Tôaⁿ-khîm, chhiùⁿ-koa, pûn-siau, pûn lat-pah ê siaⁿ, lí mā bōe-koh thiaⁿ-kìⁿ; ta̍k chióng kang-gē sai-hū, lí mā bōe-koh khòaⁿ-kìⁿ; oe-bō ê siaⁿ, lí mā bōe-koh thiaⁿ-kìⁿ;
66018023	teng-hé ê kng, bōe-koh kā lí chiò; sin kiáⁿ-sài kap sin-niû ê siaⁿ, lí bōe-koh thiaⁿ-kìⁿ; in-ūi lí ê seng-lí-lâng í-chêng tī tōe-chiūⁿ sī ū sè-le̍k ê lâng, in-ūi lí ū ēng siâ-su̍t bê-he̍k bān-kok.
66018024	Sian-ti, kap sìn-tô͘, í-ki̍p só͘-ū tī tōe-chiūⁿ siū thâi ê lâng ê huih, lóng ū tī chit-ê siâⁿ khòaⁿ-tio̍h.
66019001	Āu-lâi, góa ū thiaⁿ-kìⁿ tī thiⁿ-téng chhin-chhiūⁿ ū chi̍t tōa-kûn lâng tōa-siaⁿ teh hoah: Ha-lé-lú-iah, chàn-bí Siōng Chú! Chín-kiù, êng-kng, koân-lêng lóng tùi lán ê Siōng-tè lâi!
66019002	I ê sím-phòaⁿ chin-si̍t kong-gī. In-ūi I ū sím-phòaⁿ hit-ê ēng îm-hēng pāi-hoāi tōe-chiūⁿ jîn-lūi ê tōa îm-hū, ū hêng-hoa̍t i lâu Siōng-tè lô͘-po̍k ê huih ê chōe.
66019003	In tē-jī piàn hoah: Ha-lé-lú-iah, chàn-bí Siōng Chú! Siâⁿ tio̍h-hé-sio ê ian chhèng-koân eng-oán bōe-thêng.
66019004	Hit jī-cha̍p-sì ê tiúⁿ-ló kap hit sì ê oa̍h-mi̍h phak lo̍h-khì kèng-pài chē tī pó-chō ê Siōng-tè, kóng: Amen. Ha-lé-lú-iah!
66019005	Tùi pó-chō ū siaⁿ chhut-lâi, kóng: Só͘-ū Siōng-tè ê lô͘-po̍k, só͘-ū kèng-ùi Siōng-tè ê lâng, bô-lūn pi-chiān chun-kùi, lóng tio̍h chàn-bí lán ê Siōng Chú!
66019006	Góa ū koh thiaⁿ-kìⁿ chhin-chhiūⁿ chi̍t tōa-kûn lâng ê siaⁿ, chhin-chhiūⁿ chin chōe tiâu hô-liû ê siaⁿ, chhin-chhiūⁿ lûi tōa-tân ê siaⁿ, kóng: Ha-lé-lú-iah, chàn-bí Siōng Chú! In-ūi lán ê Chú, Choân-lêng ê Siōng-tè choh-ông lah!
66019007	Lán tio̍h hoaⁿ-hí khoài-lo̍k, chiong êng-kng kui hō͘ I! In-ūi Iûⁿ-ko hun-lé ê ji̍t kàu lah; I ê sin-niû í-keng chún-pī piān lah.
66019008	Siōng-tè í-keng hō͘ sin-niû chhēng iù-môa-pò͘ kng-liāng chheng-pe̍h ê saⁿ. Iù-môa-pò͘ ê saⁿ sī sìn-tô͘ gī ê kiâⁿ-chòe.
66019009	Āu-lâi, thiⁿ-sài kā góa kóng, “Lí tio̍h siá khí-lâi; siū iau-chhiáⁿ chham-ka Iûⁿ-ko hun-iàn ê lâng chin ū hok-khì!” Thiⁿ-sài koh kā góa kóng, “Chiah-ê sī Siōng-tè chin-si̍t ê ōe.”
66019010	Góa chiū phak tī thiⁿ-sài ê kha-chêng beh kā i pài. M̄-kú i kā góa kóng, “Choa̍t-tùi m̄-thang! Góa kap lí, í-ki̍p hiah-ê ūi-tio̍h Iâ-so͘ choh-chèng ê lâng lóng pîⁿ-pîⁿ chòe lô͘-po̍k; lí tio̍h pài Siōng-tè!” In-ūi ūi-tio̍h Iâ-so͘ choh-chèng sī siū-tio̍h ū-giân ê Sîn ê kám-tōng.
66019011	Āu-lâi, góa khòaⁿ-kìⁿ thiⁿ khui, khòaⁿ-tio̍h chi̍t chiah pe̍h-bé. Khiâ tī bé téng ê kiò-chòe “Tiong-sìn” kap “Chin-si̍t”; I chiàu kong-gī sím-phòaⁿ kap chok-chiàn.
66019012	I ê ba̍k-chiu chhin-chhiūⁿ hé-iām; thâu-khak ū tì chin chōe ông-koan; seng-khu ū siá chi̍t ê miâ, chit-ê miâ i ka-kī í-gōa bô-lâng bat.
66019013	I chhēng bak-tio̍h huih ê tn̂g-phàu, I ê miâ kiò-chòe Siōng-tè ê Tō.
66019014	Thian-kun chhēng iù-môa-pò͘ ê tn̂g-phàu, pe̍h koh chheng-khì, khiâ pe̍h-bé teh tè I.
66019015	Tùi I ê chhùi thò͘-chhut chi̍t ki lāi-kiàm, beh ēng lâi phah-pāi lia̍t-kok; I beh ēng thih-koáiⁿ tī-lí in; I mā beh ta̍h Choân-lêng ê Siōng-tè ê chiú-khut, hō͘ I ê tōa siū-khì hoat-chhut.
66019016	Tī I ê tn̂g-phàu kap tōa-thúi ū siá chi̍t ê miâ “Bān ông ê Ông, bān chú ê Chú.”
66019017	Góa ū koh khòaⁿ-kìⁿ chi̍t ê thiⁿ-sài khiā tī ji̍t-thâu téng, tōa-siaⁿ tùi hiah-ê tī khong-tiong teh pe lóng-chóng ê pe-chiáu hoah, “Lâi! Chū-chi̍p lâi hù Siōng-tè ê tōa iàn-se̍k!
66019018	Lâi chia̍h chiah-ê kun-ông ê bah, chiong-kun ê bah, kap ióng-sū ê bah, chiah-ê bé kap khiâ-bé ê lâng ê bah, í-ki̍p lóng-chóng chū-iû ê lâng kap lô͘-lē ê bah, pi-chiān kap chun-kùi ê lâng ê bah.”
66019019	Góa ū koh khòaⁿ-kìⁿ hit chiah siù, tōe-chiūⁿ ê kun-ông kap in ê kun-tūi chū-chi̍p beh kap Hit-ūi khiâ pe̍h-bé ê í-ki̍p I ê kun-tūi kau-chiàn.
66019020	Hit chiah siù siū lia̍h, hit-ê ké sian-ti, chiū-sī chêng bat tī siù ê bīn-chêng kiâⁿ sîn-jiah ê, mā kap siù chòe-hé siū lia̍h. Chit-ê ké sian-ti bat ēng sîn-jiah bê-he̍k hiah-ê ū siù ê kì-hō kap bat pài siù ê siōng ê lâng. Hit chiah siù kap hit-ê ké sian-ti nn̄g ê lóng hō͘ lâng oa̍h-oa̍h hiat-lo̍h liû-hông teh to̍h ê hé-ô͘.
66019021	Só͘-chhun ê kun-tūi lóng hō͘ Hit-ūi khiâ-bé-ê ê chhùi thò͘-chhut ê kiàm sat-hāi; só͘-ū ê chiáu lóng lâi chia̍h in ê bah, chia̍h kàu pá.
66020001	Āu-lâi, góa ū khòaⁿ-kìⁿ chi̍t ê thiⁿ-sài tùi thiⁿ-téng lo̍h-lâi, chhiú the̍h bô-tóe chhim-khiⁿ ê só-sî kap chi̍t tiâu tōa-tiâu thih-liān.
66020002	I lia̍h hit chiah lêng, chiū-sī hit bé lāu-chôa, sī Mô͘-kúi, sī Sat-tàn, kā i pa̍k chi̍t-chheng nî.
66020003	Thiⁿ-sài kā i hiat-lo̍h bô-tóe chhim-khiⁿ, jiân-āu kā bô-tóe chhim-khiⁿ koaiⁿ-ba̍t, koh ēng ìn hong khí-lâi, i chiah bōe-koh khì bê-he̍k lia̍t-pang, it-ti̍t kàu chi̍t-chheng nî móa. Chit-ê kî-hān kè liáu, i it-tēng tio̍h chiām-sî siū tháu-pàng.
66020004	Góa ū koh khòaⁿ-kìⁿ kúi-nā ê pó-chō, chē tī pó-chō ê ū tit-tio̍h sím-phòaⁿ ê koân-pèng. Góa mā ū khòaⁿ-kìⁿ hiah-ê ūi-tio̍h Iâ-so͘ choh-chèng kap ūi-tio̍h Siōng-tè ê Tō hō͘ lâng chām-thâu ê lâng ê lêng-hûn. Chiah-ê lâng m̄-bat pài siù, mā m̄-bat pài siù ê siōng, in ê thâu-hia̍h á-sī chhiú bô chiap-siū siù ê kì-hō. In lóng koh-oa̍h kap Ki-tok chòe-hé thóng-tī chi̍t-chheng nî.
66020005	Só͘-chhun ê sí-lâng kàu chi̍t-chheng nî móa ê sî chiah ōe koh-oa̍h. Che sī thâu-chi̍t piàn ê koh-oa̍h.
66020006	Ū-hūn tī thâu-chi̍t piàn koh-oa̍h ê lâng chin ū hok-khì, in sī sèng-kiat ê lâng. Tē-jī piàn ê sí bô koân thang kā in koán-hat, in ōe chòe Siōng-tè kap Ki-tok ê chè-si, mā ōe kap Ki-tok chòe-hé thóng-tī chi̍t-chheng nî.
66020007	Chi̍t-chheng nî móa ê sî, Sat-tàn ōe siū tháu-pàng chhut-kaⁿ.
66020008	I ōe chhut-khì bê-he̍k tōe-chiūⁿ sì-hng ê lia̍t-pang, chiū-sī [Ko-kek] kap [Má-kok], chū-chi̍p in khì kau-chiàn, in ê sò͘-ba̍k chhin-chhiūⁿ hái-soa hiah-ni̍h chōe.
66020009	In chìn-kun piàn-móa choân-tōe, ûi-khùn sìn-tô͘ ê iâⁿ kap Siōng-tè só͘-thiàⁿ ê siâⁿ. M̄-kú ū hé tùi thiⁿ kàng-lo̍h kā in sio-bia̍t.
66020010	Hit-ê bê-he̍k in ê Mô͘-kúi siū hiat-lo̍h hé kap liû-hông ê ô͘; hit chiah siù kap hit-ê ké sian-ti í-keng tī hia. In ōe ji̍t-mî siū khó͘-chhó͘, éng-oán bōe-thêng.
66020011	Āu-lâi, góa ū khòaⁿ-kìⁿ chi̍t ê pe̍h-sek ê tōa pó-chō, kap chē tī hit téng-bīn Hit-ūi; thiⁿ kap tōe tùi I ê bīn-chêng tô-cháu, chiū bô koh khòaⁿ-kìⁿ.
66020012	Góa koh ū khòaⁿ-kìⁿ sí-khì ê lâng, bô-lūn pi-chiān á-sī chun-kùi, lóng khiā tī pó-chō chêng. Kì-lio̍k ê chheh lóng thí-khui; lēng-gōa chi̍t pún oa̍h-miā-chheh mā thí-khui. Sí-khì ê lâng chiàu in ê hêng-ûi, kun-kù chiah-ê chheh só͘ kì-chài ê siū sím-phòaⁿ.
66020013	Hái chiong i lāi-bīn ê sí-lâng kau chhut-lâi, Sí kap Im-hú mā chiong in lāi-bīn ê sí-lâng lóng kau chhut-lâi; ta̍k ê lâng lóng chiàu in ê hêng-ûi siū sím-phòaⁿ.
66020014	Āu-lâi, Sí kap Im-hú siū hiat-lo̍h hé-ô͘. Chit-ê hé-ô͘ chiū-sī tē-jī piàn ê sí.
66020015	Miâ bô kì-chài tī oa̍h-miā-chheh ê lâng lóng siū hiat-lo̍h hé-ô͘.
66021001	Āu-lâi, góa ū khòaⁿ-kìⁿ sin ê thiⁿ sin ê tōe, in-ūi chêng ê thiⁿ chêng ê tōe í-keng kè-khì, hái mā bô-khì.
66021002	Góa koh khòaⁿ-kìⁿ Sèng-siâⁿ, sin ê [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng], tùi thiⁿ-téng Siōng-tè hia kàng lo̍h-lâi, chhin-chhiūⁿ sin-niû chng-thāⁿ hó-sè beh gêng-chiap tiōng-hu.
66021003	Góa koh thiaⁿ-tio̍h ū tōa ê siaⁿ tùi pó-chō hoat-chhut, kóng, “Khòaⁿ ah, Siōng-tè ê hōe-bō͘ tī lâng ê tiong-kan! Siōng-tè beh kap in chòe-hé khiā-khí; in beh chòe I ê chú-bîn; Siōng-tè beh chhin-sin kap in tông-chāi, chòe in ê Siōng-tè.
66021004	I beh chhit-khì in ba̍k-chiu lóng-chóng ê ba̍k-sái; bô koh ū sí-sit, mā bô koh ū ai-siong, âu-kiò, thàng-thiàⁿ, in-ūi chêng ê tāi-chì í-keng kè-khì.”
66021005	Āu-lâi, chē tī pó-chō Hit-ūi kóng, “Khòaⁿ ah, góa chiong bān-mi̍h lóng ōaⁿ-sin!” I koh kóng, “Tio̍h siá khí-lâi, in-ūi chiah-ê ōe chin-si̍t khó-khò”.
66021006	I koh kā góa kóng, “Oân-sêng lah! Góa sī A-ní-hoat kap A-bí-ka, sī khai-sí kap kiat-sok. Chhùi-ta ê lâng góa beh chiong oa̍h-miā-chúi ê chúi-chôaⁿ pe̍h-pe̍h hō͘ in lim.
66021007	Tek-sèng ê lâng ōe sêng-chiap chiah-ê; góa beh chòe in ê Siōng-tè, in beh chòe góa ê kiáⁿ-jî.
66021008	M̄-kú, hiah-ê bô-táⁿ-ê, pōe-sìn-ê, hú-pāi-ê, thâi-lâng-ê, îm-loān-ê, kiâⁿ-siâ-su̍t-ê, pài-ngó͘-siōng-ê, í-ki̍p só͘-ū kóng-pe̍h-chha̍t-ê, in tio̍h khì ê só͘-chāi sī hit-ê ēng hé kap liû-hông teh sio ê ô͘, chit-ê chiū-sī tē-jī piàn ê sí.”
66021009	Āu-lâi, chhit ê thiⁿ-sài, chiū-sī the̍h chhit tè óaⁿ tóe móa lō͘-bé chhit hāng chai-hō ê, kî-tiong chi̍t ê lâi tùi góa kóng, “Lâi, góa beh pò lí khòaⁿ Sin-niû, chiū-sī Iûⁿ-ko ê bó͘.”
66021010	Góa siū Sèng Sîn kám-tōng, hō͘ thiⁿ-sài chhōa kàu chi̍t chō tōa koh koân ê soaⁿ, hō͘ góa khòaⁿ tùi thiⁿ-téng Siōng-tè hia kàng lo̍h-lâi ê Sèng-siâⁿ [Iâ-lō͘-sat-léng].
66021011	Chit-ê siâⁿ ū Siōng-tè ê êng-kng; siâⁿ ê kng chhin-chhiūⁿ siōng pó-kùi ê pó-chio̍h, chhin-chhiūⁿ phek-ge̍k, chhin-chhiūⁿ chúi-chiⁿ hiah-ni̍h kng-liāng.
66021012	Siâⁿ ū tōa koh koân ê chhiûⁿ, siâⁿ-chhiûⁿ ū cha̍p-jī ê mn̂g, chiah-ê mn̂g ū cha̍p-jī ê thiⁿ-sài teh kò͘-siú, ū khek [Í-sek-lia̍t] kiáⁿ-sun cha̍p-jī chi-cho̍k ê miâ;
66021013	tang-pêng ū saⁿ ê mn̂g, sai-pêng ū saⁿ ê mn̂g, lâm-pêng ū saⁿ ê mn̂g, pak-pêng ū saⁿ ê mn̂g.
66021014	Siâⁿ-chhiûⁿ ū cha̍p-jī ê tōe-ki, tōe-ki téng ū Iûⁿ-ko ê cha̍p-jī sù-tô͘ ê cha̍p-jī ê miâ.
66021015	Tùi góa kóng-ōe ê thiⁿ-sài ū the̍h chi̍t ki kim lô͘-tek ê chhioh, beh niû hit-ê siâⁿ, siâⁿ-mn̂g, kap siâⁿ-chhiûⁿ.
66021016	Siâⁿ sī sì-kak-hêng, tn̂g khoah sio-siâng. Thiⁿ-sài ēng chhioh niû siâⁿ: Ū nn̄g-chheng sì-pah kong-lí, tn̂g, khoah, koân lóng sio-siâng.
66021017	Thiⁿ-sài mā chiàu lâng ê chhùn-chhioh niû siâⁿ-chhiûⁿ, koân la̍k-cha̍p kong-chhioh.
66021018	Siâⁿ-chhiûⁿ sī ēng phek-ge̍k chō ê, siâⁿ sī ēng chhin-chhiūⁿ po-lê chheng-liāng ê sûn-kim khí ê.
66021019	Siâⁿ-chhiûⁿ ê tōe-ki ēng ta̍k chióng pó-chio̍h chong-sek: Thâu-chi̍t ê tōe-ki sī phek-ge̍k, tē-jī ê sī nâ-pó-chio̍h, tē-saⁿ ê sī le̍k-bé-ló, tē-sì ê sī le̍k-pó-chio̍h,
66021020	tē-gō͘ ê sī âng-bé-ló, tē-la̍k ê sī âng-pó-chio̍h, tē-chhit ê sī n̂g-ka-ná-chio̍h, tē-poeh ê sī chhùi-chhong-ge̍k, tē-káu ê sī n̂g-ge̍k, tē-cha̍p ê sī húi-chhùi-ge̍k, tē-cha̍p-it ê sī chí-bé-ló, tē-cha̍p-jī ê sī chí-chúi-chiⁿ.
66021021	Hit cha̍p-jī ê mn̂g sī cha̍p-jī lia̍p chin-chu, ta̍k ê mn̂g sī ēng chi̍t lia̍p chin-chu chòe ê. Siâⁿ ê koe-lō͘ sī sûn kim, chhin-chhiūⁿ thàu-bêng ê po-lê.
66021022	Tī siâⁿ-lāi góa bô khòaⁿ-tio̍h sèng-tiān, in-ūi Chú Choân-lêng ê Siōng-tè kap Iûⁿ-ko chiū-sī chit-ê siâⁿ ê sèng-tiān.
66021023	Chit-ê siâⁿ bô su-iàu ji̍t á-sī ge̍h lâi chiò, in-ūi Siōng-tè ê êng-kng teh chiò, koh Iûⁿ-ko chiū-sī chit-ê siâⁿ ê teng.
66021024	Lia̍t-pang ōe khò teng ê kng kiâⁿ-lō͘; tōe-chiūⁿ kun-ông ōe chiong in ê êng-hôa tòa lâi hō͘ chit-ê siâⁿ.
66021025	Ji̍t-sî, siâⁿ-mn̂g lóng bōe koaiⁿ; tī hia lóng bô mî-sî.
66021026	Lâng ōe chiong lia̍t-pang ê êng-kng kap chun-kùi tòa ji̍p-lâi chit-ê siâⁿ.
66021027	M̄-kú, bô chheng-khì ê mi̍h, í-ki̍p hêng-ûi khó-ò͘ⁿ kap kóng pe̍h-chha̍t ê lâng choa̍t-tùi bōe ēng-tit ji̍p-khì; chí-ū miâ ū kì-chài tī Iûⁿ-ko ê oa̍h-miā-chheh ê lâng chiah ōe ēng-tit ji̍p-khì.
66022001	Thiⁿ-sài koh pò góa khòaⁿ oa̍h-miā-chúi ê hô, chhin-chhiūⁿ chúi-chiⁿ hiah-ni̍h kng-liāng, tùi Siōng-tè kap Iûⁿ-ko ê pó-chō hia lâu chhut-lâi,
66022002	thong-kè siâⁿ tiong-sim ê koe-lō͘. Hô ê siang-pêng ū oa̍h-miā-chhiū, ōe kiat ké-chí cha̍p-jī piàn, ta̍k ge̍h-ji̍t kiat chi̍t piàn, chhiū-hio̍h ōe chòe i-tī lia̍t-pang ê lō͘-ēng.
66022003	Siâⁿ-lāi lóng bōe-koh ū chiù-chó͘. Siōng-tè kap Iûⁿ-ko ê pó-chō ōe tī siâⁿ-lāi; I ê lô͘-po̍k ōe kèng-pài I,
66022004	mā ōe khòaⁿ-kìⁿ I ê bīn, I ê miâ ōe siá tī in ê thâu-hia̍h.
66022005	Bōe-koh ū mî-sî; in bô su-iàu teng ê kng á-sī ji̍t-thâu, in-ūi Chú Siōng-tè ōe kā in chiò-kng, in ōe éng-éng oán-oán choh-ông chiáng-koân.
66022006	Thiⁿ-sài kā góa kóng, “Chiah-ê ōe chin-si̍t khó-khò. Hit-ūi kám-tōng chèng sian-ti ê Chú Siōng-tè ū chhe I ê thiⁿ-sài chiong it-tēng sûi-sî ōe hoat-seng ê tāi-chì chí-sī I ê chèng lô͘-po̍k.”
66022007	Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Khòaⁿ ah, góa liâm-piⁿ lâi. Chun-siú chit pún chheh ū-giân ê ōe ê lâng chin ū hok-khì!”
66022008	Góa --- [Iok-hān] sī chhin-sin ū thiaⁿ-kìⁿ koh khòaⁿ-kìⁿ chiah-ê sū hit-ê lâng. Góa thiaⁿ-tio̍h koh khòaⁿ-tio̍h liáu-āu, chiū phak lo̍h-khì tī chiong chiah-ê sū chí-sī góa ê thiⁿ-sài kha-chêng beh kā i pài.
66022009	Put-kò i kā góa kóng, “Choa̍t-tùi m̄-thang! Góa kap lí, í-ki̍p kap lí pîⁿ-pîⁿ chòe hiaⁿ-tī ê sian-ti kap chun-siú chit pún chheh ê ōe ê lâng, lóng pîⁿ-pîⁿ chòe lô͘-po̍k. Lí tio̍h pài Siōng-tè!”
66022010	I koh kā góa kóng, “M̄-thang chiong chit pún chheh ū-giân ê ōe hong-ba̍t, in-ūi ū-giân si̍t-hiān ê sî-khek kūn lah.
66022011	Hō͘ put-gī ê lâng kè-sio̍k chòe put-gī; hō͘ ù-òe ê lâng kè-sio̍k ù-òe; hō͘ gī ê lâng kè-sio̍k si̍t-hêng kong-gī; hō͘ sèng-kiat ê lâng kè-sio̍k sèng-kiat.”
66022012	Iâ-so͘ kóng, “Khòaⁿ ah, góa liâm-piⁿ lâi! Góa beh tòa pò-siúⁿ lâi, chiàu ta̍k ê lâng ê só͘-chòe kā i hôe-pò.
66022013	Góa sī A-ní-hoat kap A-bí-ka, sī khí-thâu kap soah-bé, sī khai-sí kap kiat-sok.”
66022014	Chiong tn̂g-phàu sóe chheng-khì hiah-ê lâng chin ū hok-khì, in ū tit-tio̍h koân thang chia̍h oa̍h-miā-chhiū ê ké-chí, koh thang tùi chiah-ê mn̂g ji̍p-siâⁿ.
66022015	Hiah-ê káu-lūi, kiâⁿ-siâ-su̍t-ê, îm-loān-ê, thâi-sí-lâng-ê, pài-ngó͘-siōng-ê, kap it-chhè ài kóng pe̍h-chha̍t koh choh-sū kan-chà ê, lóng tio̍h lâu tī siâⁿ-gōa.
66022016	“Góa --- Iâ-so͘ í-keng chhe góa ê thiⁿ-sài, tī chiah-ê kàu-hōe chiong chiah-ê sū tùi lín choh-chèng. Góa sī [Tāi-pi̍t] ê Kun, sī i ê hō͘-tāi, sī kng-liāng ê Khé-bêng-chhiⁿ.”
66022017	Sèng Sîn kap Sin-niû lóng kóng, “Lâi!” Thiaⁿ-kìⁿ ê lâng tio̍h kóng, “Lâi!” Chhùi-ta ê lâng tio̍h lâi! Ì-ài ê lâng thang pe̍h-pe̍h niá-siū oa̍h-miā-chúi.
66022018	Góa kā ta̍k ê thiaⁿ-tio̍h chit pún chheh ū-giân ê ōe ê lâng kéng-kò: Nā ū lâng kā i ke-thiⁿ, Siōng-tè ōe chiong chit pún chheh só͘ kì ê chai-hō ke-thiⁿ hō͘ i.
66022019	Nā ū lâng san-tû chit pún chheh ū-giân ê ōe, Siōng-tè mā ōe tùi chit pún chheh só͘ kì oa̍h-miā-chhiū kap Sèng-siâⁿ ê hok-hūn san-tû i ê hūn-gia̍h.
66022020	Ūi-tio̍h chiah-ê sū choh-chèng Hit-ūi kóng, “Tio̍h, góa liâm-piⁿ lâi!” Amen! Chú Iâ-so͘ ah, chhiáⁿ lâi!
66022021	Goān Chú Iâ-so͘ ê un-tián kap lín tāi-ke tông-chāi!
